rgya gar skad du /
aa bhi dharmma ko sham bh'a shyam /
bod skad du / chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa /
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo /
yaḥ sarvathāsarvahatāndhakāraḥ saṃsārapaṅkājjagadujjahāra gang zhig kun la mun pa gtan bcom zhing /
'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs mdzad pa /
tasmai namaskṛtya yathārthaśāstre śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmyabhidharmakośam /
śāstraṃ praṇetukāmaḥ svasya śāsturmāhātmyajñāpanārthaṃ guṇākhyānapūrvakaṃ tasmai namaskāramārabhate ya iti /
buddhaṃ bhagavantamadhikṛtyāha hatamasyāndhakāramanena veti hatāndhakāraḥ /
sarveṇa prakāreṇa sarvasmin hatāndhakāraḥ sarvathāsarvahatāndhakāraḥ 		don bzhin ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas /
chos mngon mdzod kyi bstan bcos rab bshad bya /
bstan bcos byed par 'dod pas rang gi ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir de la yon tan brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyag 'tshal ba rtsom mo /
gang zhig ces bya ba ni /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang du byas nas smras pa'o /
'di'i 'am 'dis mun pa bcom bas mun pa bcom pa'o /
thams cad la mun pa rnam pa thams cad du bcom pas kun la mun pa gtan bcom pa'o /
ajñānaṃ hi bhūtārthadarśanapratibandhādhakāram /
tacca bhagavato buddhasya pratipakṣalābhenātyantaṃ sarvathā sarvatra jñeye punaranutpattidharmatvāddhatam /
ato 'sau sarvathāsarvahatāndhakāraḥ 		mi shes pa ni yang dag pa'i don mthong ba la bgegs su gyur pa'i phyir mun pa ste /
de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyen po brnyes nas shes bya thams cad la phyis mi skye ba'i chos can du gyur pa'i phyir gtan nas ye bcom pa ste /
pratyaikabuddhaśrāvakā api kāmaṃ sarvatra hatāndhakārāḥ /
kliṣṭasaṃmohātyantavigamāt /
na tu sarvathā /
tatha hyeṣāṃ buddhadharmeṣvativiprakṛṣṭadeśakāleṣu artheṣu cānantaprabhedeṣu bhavatyevākliṣṭamajñānam 		de'i phyir 'di'i ni kun la mun pa gtan bcom pa'o /
de rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams kyang nyon mongs pa can gyi rmongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir kun la mun pa bcom par ni 'dod mod kyi gtan nas ni ma yin te 'di ltar de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yul dang dus shin tu bskal pa dang don rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa rnams la nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa yod pa nyid do /
ityātmahitapratipattisaṃpadā saṃstutya punastameva bhagavantaṃ parahitapratipattisaṃpadā saṃstauti saṃsārapaṅkājjagadujjahāreti de ltar bdag la phan pa sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pas yang dag par bstod nas /
yang bcom ldan 'das de nyid la gzhan la phan pa sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pas yang dag par bstod pa ni /
'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs mdzad pa / zhes bya ba ste /
saṃsāro hi jagadāsaṅgasthānatvāt duruttaratvācca paṅkabhūtaḥ 'khor ba ni 'gro ba kun tu chags pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dang brgal bar dka' ba'i phyir 'dam lta bu yin te /
tatrāvamagnaṃ jagadatrāṇamanukampamāno bhagavān saddharmadeśanāhastapradānairyathābhavyamabhyuddhṛtavān iti ya evamātmaparahitapratipattisaṃpadā yuktastasmai namaskṛtyeti śirasā praṇipatya 'gro ba der bying ba skyabs med pa la bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas dam pa'i chos ston pa'i phyag brkyang ba dag gis skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du drangs so /
yathārthamaviparītaṃ śāstīti yathārthaśāstā don ji lta ba bzhin phyin ci ma log par ston pas na don bzhin ston pa'o /
anena parahitapratipattyupāyamasyāviṣkaroti /
yathābhūtaśāsanācchāstā bhavanntasau saṃsārapaṅkājjagadujjahāra na tvṛddhivarapradānaprabhāveṇeti /
tasmai namaskṛtya kiṃ kariṣyāmī tyāha śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmi 		'dis ni 'di'i gzhan la phan pa sgrub pa'i thabs ston te / de ni ston pa na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas 'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs kyi rdzu 'phrul dang dam pa sbyin pa'i mthus ni ma yin no /
de ltar bdag dang gzhan la phan pa sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba ni mgos btud nas so don bzhin ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
bstan bcos rab bshad bya zhes bya ba smos te /
śiṣyaśāsanācchāstram /
slob ma 'chos pas na bstan bcos so /
katamacchāstramityāha abhidharmakośam ko 'yamabhidharmo nāma /
bstan bcos gang zhe na /
chos mngon mdzod ces bya ba smos so /
chos mngon pa zhes bya ba 'di gang zhe na /
prajñā 'malā sānucarā 'bhidharmaḥ prajñā dharmapravicayaḥ chos mngon shes rab dri med rjes 'brang bcas /
zhes bya ba ste /
de la shes rab ces bya ba ni /
chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o /
amaleti anāsravā /
sānucareti saparivārā /
evamanāsravaḥ pañcaskandhako 'bhidharma ityuktaṃ bhavati /
eṣa tāvat pāramārthiko 'bhidharmaḥ /
sāṃketikastu /
tatprāptaye yāpi ca yacca śāstram 		dri med ces bya ba ni gang zag pa med pa'o /
rjes 'brang bcas zhes bya ba ni 'khor dang bcas pa ste /
de ltar na zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga po la chos mngon pa zhes bstan par 'gyur ro /
de zhig 'di ni don dam pa'i chos mngon pa'o /
brdar btags pa ni /
de thob bya'i phyir gang dang bstan bcos gang zhes bya ba ste /
yāpi ca śrutacintābhāvanāmayī sāsravā prajñā upapattipratilambhikā ca sānucarā /
yacca śāstramasyāḥ prāptyarthamanāsravāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ tadapi tatsaṃbhārabhāvādabhidharma ityucyate 		gang dang zhes bya ba ni thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab gang zag pa dang bcas pa dang skyes nas thob pa rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa'o /
bstan bcos gang zhes bya ba ni de yang zag pa med pa'i shes rab thob par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshogs su gyur pas chos mngon pa zhes bya'o /
nirvacanaṃ tu svalakṣaṇadhāraṇād dharmaḥ nges pa'i tshig tu rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos te /
tadayaṃ paramārthadharmaṃ vā nirvāṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyabhimukho dharma ityabhidharmaḥ de lta bas na 'di ni don dam pa'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa 'am /
chos kyi mtshan nyid la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir chos mngon pa'o /
ukto 'bhidharmaḥ chos mngon pa bshad zin to /
idaṃ tu śāstraṃ kathamabhidharmakośam /
tasyārthato 'smin samanupraveśāt 		bstan bcos 'di ji ltar na chos mngon pa'i mdzod yin zhe na /
'dir de don du yang dag chud phyir ram /
sa cāśrayo syetyabhidharmakośam 'di yi gnas de yin pas chos mngon mdzod ces bya ba smos te /
sa hi śāstrasaṃjñako 'bhidharma etasminnarthato yathāpradhānamantarbhūta ityetacchāstraṃ tasya kośasthānīyaṃ bhavati chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos zhes bya ba de ji ltar gces gces rnams don du 'dir chud de /
de lta bas na bstan bcos 'di ni de'i mdzod lta bu yin no /
athavā so 'bhidharma etasyāśrayabhūtaḥ śāstrasya yang na de las 'di phyung bas chos mngon pa de bstan bcos 'di'i gnas lta bu yin no /
tato hyetannirākṛṣṭam /
ataḥ sa evāsyābhidharmaḥ kośa ityetacchāstramabhidharvarmakośam /
kimarthaṃ punarabhidharmopadeśaḥ kena cāyaṃ prathamata upadiṣṭo yaṭa ācāryo 'bhidharmakośaṃ vaktumādriyata iti 		de'i phyir chos mngon pa de nyid 'di'i mdzod yin te /
de lta bas na bstan bcos 'di ni chos mngon pa'i mdzod yin no /
yang ci'i phyir chos mngon pa bstan /
'di dang po nyid du sus bstan na /
'di ltar slob dpon chos mngon pa'i mdzod 'chad par gus she na /
āha /
dharmāṇāṃ pravicayamantareṇa nāsti kleśānāṃ yata upaśāntaye 'bhyupāyaḥ 		chos rnams rab tu rnam 'byed med par nyon mongs rnams /
gang phyir nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs med la /
kleśaiśca bhramati bhavārṇave 'tra lokastaddhetorata uditaḥ kilaiṣa śāstrā nyon mongs pas kyang 'jig rten srid mtsho 'dir 'khyams te /
de bas de phyir 'di ni ston pas gsungs so lo /
zhes bya ba smos te /
yato na vinā dharmapravicayenāsti kleśopaśamābhyupāyaḥ gang gi phyir chos rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed pa med par nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs med la /
kleśāśca lokaṃ bhramayanti saṃsāramahārṇeve 'sminan /
atastaddhetostasya dharmapravicayasyārthe śāstrā kila buddhenābhidharma uktaḥ /
nahi vinā 'bhidharmopadeśena śiṣyaḥ śakto dharmān pravicetumiti 		nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po 'dir 'khyam par byed pa de'i phyir chos rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed par 'dod pa de'i don du ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mngon pa gsungs so lo /
chos mngon pa bstan pa med par ni slob mas chos rab tu rnam par 'byed par mi nus so /
sa tu prakīrṇa ukto bhagavatā bhadantakātyāyanīputraprabhṛtibhiḥ piṇḍīkṛtya sthapitobhadanta dharmatrāto dānavargīyakaraṇavadityāhurvaibhāṣikāḥ bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sil bur bshad la /
btsun pa k'a ty'a'i bu la sogs pas bsdus nas bzhag ste /
btsun pa chos skyob kyis ched du brjod pa'i sde /
katame punaste dharmā yeṣāṃ pravicayārthamabhidharmopadeśa ityāha sde tshan du byas pa bzhin no zhes zer ro /
gang dag chos mngon pa bstan pas rab tu rnam par dbye par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
sāsravā 'nāsravā dharmāḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samāsanirddeśaḥ /
tatra katame sāsravā dharmā ityāha 		zag bcas zag pa med chos rnams /
zhes bya ba smos te /
'di ni chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o /
de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
saṃskṛtā mārgavarjitāḥ /
sāsravāḥ varjayitvā 'nye saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ sāsravāḥ 		lam ma gtogs pa 'dus byas rnams /
zag bcas zhes bya ba ste /
lam gyi bden pa ma gtogs pa 'dus byas kyi chos gzhan rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag go /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
āsravāsteṣu yasmāt samanuśerate /
kāmaṃ nirodhamārgasatyālambanā api āsravā upajāyante na tinuśerate tatreti na tayoḥ sāsravatvaprasañgaḥ /
yathā 'tra nānuśerate tat paścādanuśayanirdeśa eva jñāpayiṣyāmaḥ 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang phyir de dag la /
zag rnams kun tu rgyas par 'gyur /
zhes bya ba ste /
'gog pa dang lam gyi bden pa la dmigs pas kyang zag pa skye bar ni 'dod mod kyi /
de gnyis la rgyas par mi 'gyur bas de gnyis zag pa dang bcas pa nyid du thal ba med do /
ji ltar rgyas par mi 'gyur ba de ni 'og nas phra rgyas bstan pa nyid du bstan par bya'o /
uktāḥ sāsravāḥ /
anasravāḥ katame /
anāsravā mārgasatyaṃ trividhaṃ cāpyasaṃskṛtam /
katamattri vidham /
ākāśaṃ dvau nirodhau ca dvau /
pratisaṃkhyānirodho 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaśca /
ityetadākāśādi trividhamasaṃskṛtaṃ mārgasatyaṃ cānāsravā dharmāḥ 		zag pa dang bcas pa dag bshad zin to /
zag pa med pa rnams gang zhe na /
zag med lam gyi bden pa dang /
'dus ma byas rnam gsum yang ste /
zhes bya ba'o /
rnam gsum gang zhe na /
nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis /
zhes bya ba ste /
gnyis gang zhe na /
so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ste /
de ltar nam mkha' la sogs pa 'dus ma byas rnam pa gsum po de dang lam gyi bden pa ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams te /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
nahi teṣvāsravā anuśerata iti 		de dag la zag pa rgyas par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro /
yadetat trividhamasaṃskṛtamuddiṣṭam /
tatrākāśamanāvṛtiḥ 		'dus ma byas rnam pa gsum po bstan pa gang yin pa de la nam mkha' mi sgrib pa /
anāvaraṇasvabhāvamākāśaṃ yatra rūpasya gatiḥ nam mkha' ni sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin te gang na gzugs kyi go yod pa'o /
pratisaṃkhyānirodho yo visaṃyogaḥ sāsravairdharmairvisaṃyogaḥ sa pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānaṃ pratisaṃkhyā prajñāviśeṣastena prāpyo nirodhaḥ 		so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang bral ba'o /
gang zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams dang bral ba de ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o /
sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la so sor rtog pa ni so sor brtags pa ste shes rab kyi bye brag go /
pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
madhyapadalopāt gorathavat /
kiṃ punareka eva sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
netyāha /
kiṃ tarhi /
pṛthak pṛthak 		des thob par bya ba'i 'gog pa ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o /
bar gyi tshig mi mngon par bya ba ste /
dper na ba lang dag dang ldan pa'i shing rta la ba lang gi shing rta zhes bya ba lta bu'o /
ci zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gcig kho na 'am zhe na /
smras pa /
ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
so so so so yin /
yāvanti hi saṃyogadravyāṇi tāvanti visaṃyogadravyāṇi ldan pa'i rdzas rnams ji snyed pa bral ba'i rdzas rnams kyang de snyed do /
anyathā hi duḥkhadarśanaheyakleśanirodhasākṣātk karaṇāt sarvakleśanirodhasākṣātkriyā prasajyeta /
sati caivaṃ śeṣapratipakṣabhāvanāvaiyarthyaṃ syāt 		de lta ma yin na sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i 'gog pa mngon sum du byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gos pa mngon sum du byed par thal bar 'gyur ro /
de lta ma yin na lhag ma'i gnyen po bsgom pa don med par 'gyur ro /
yattarhyuktam asabhāgonirodha ityasya ko 'rthaḥ /
nāsya kaścit sabhāgaheturasti nāsau kasyacidityayamasya vākyasyārtho na tu nāsya kaśicat sabhāgo 'stīti 		'o na 'gog pa ni 'dra ba ma yin no zhes bshad pa 'di'i don ji lta bu yin zhe na /
tshig de'i don ni 'di 'dra ba'i rgyu gang yang ma yin la /
'di yang gang gi 'dra ba'i rgyu yang ma yin no zhes bya'o /
'di la 'dra ba gang yang med do zhes bya ba ni ma yin no /
uktaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ so sor brtags pas 'gog pa bshad zin to /
utpādātyantavighno 'nyo nirodho 'pratisaṃkhyayā skye la gtan du bgegs byed pa /
'gog gzhan so sor brtags min pas /
anāgatānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādasyātyantaṃ vighnabhūto visaṃyogād yo 'nyo nirodhaḥ so 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ chos ma 'ongs pa rnams skye ba la gtan du bgegs su gyur pa bral ba las gzhan pa'i 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ste /
na hyasau pratisaṃkhyayā labhyate 'di so sor brtags pas 'thob pa ni ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
pratyayavaikalyāt /
yathaikarūpavyāsaktacakṣurmanaso yāni rūpāṇi śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni cātyayante tadālambanaiḥ pañcabhirvijñānakāyairna śakyaṃ punarutpattum 		rkyen ma tshang ba las thob ste /
dper na mig dang yid gzugs gcig la yengs pa'i gzugs gzhan pa rnams dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya gang yin pa dag ni 'das par 'gyur la /
de dag la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag ni yang skye bar yang mi nus te /
na hi te satyā atītaṃ viṣayamālambayi tulmiti /
ataḥ sa teṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ pratyayavaikalyāt prāpyate /
catuṣkoṭikaṃ cātra bhavati 		de dag 'das pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i mthu med pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir de dag gi so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa de ni rkyen ma tshang bas 'thob bo /
'dir mu bzhir 'gyur te /
santi te dharmā yeṣāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodha eva labhyate gang dag gis so sor brtags pas 'gog pha kho na 'thob pa'i chos de dag kyang yod de /
tadyathā atitapratyutpannotpattidharmāṇāṃ sāsravāṇām 'di lta ste / zag pa dang bcas pa 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang 'byung ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o /
santi yeṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodha eva /
tadyathā 'nutpattidharmāṇāmanāsravasaṃskṛtānām /
santi te yesāmubhayam 		gang dag gis so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa kho na 'thob pa yang yod de /
'di lta ste /
zag pa med pa'i 'dus byas mi skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o /
gang dag gis gnyi ga 'thob pa yang yod de /
'di lta ste /
tadyathā sāsravāṇāmanutpasttidharmāṇām /
santi yeṣāṃ nobhayam /
tadyathā atītapratyutpannotpattidharmāṇāmaṇāsravāṇāmiti 		zag pa dang bcas pa mi skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o /
gang dag gis gnyi ga mi 'thob pa yang yod de /
'di lta ste /
zag pa med pa 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang 'byung ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o /
uktaṃ trividhamasaṃskṛtam 'dus ma byas rnam pa gsum bshad zin to /
yattūktaṃ saṃskṛtā mārgavarjitāḥ lam ma gtogs pa 'dus byas rnams /
sāsravā iti katame te saṃskṛtāḥ /
te punaḥ saṃskṛtā dhārmā rūpādiskandhapañcakam 		zag bcas zhes gang smras pa'i 'dus byas de dag gang zhe na /
'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang /
gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga /
rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandhaścetyete saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ gzugs kyi phung po dang tshor ba'i phung po dang 'du shes kyi phung po dang 'du byed kyi phung po dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so /
sametya saṃbhūya pratyayaiḥ kṛtāḥ iti saṃskṛtāḥ /
nahyekapratyayajanitaṃ kiñcidastīti /
tajjātīyatvādanāgateṣvavirodho dugdhendhanavat 		rkyen rnams 'dus shing phrad nas byas pa dag na 'dus byas rnams te /
rkyen gcig gis bskyed pa ni 'ga' yang med do /
de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa dag la yang mi 'gal te 'o ma dang shing bzhin no /
ta evādhvā kathāvastu saniḥsārāḥ savastukāḥ /
ta eva saṃskṛtā gatagacchadgamiṣyadbhāvādadhvānaḥ adyante 'nitayatyeti vā 		de dag nyid dus gtam gzhi dang /
nges par 'byung ba gzhi dang bcas /
de dag nyid ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so /
song ba dang 'gro ba dang 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram /
mi rtag pa nyid kyis za ba'i phyir dus rnams so /
kathā vāvāyam tasyā vastu nāma /
sārthakavastugrahaṇāt tu saṃskṛntaṃ kathāvastūcyate /
anyathā hi urakaraṇagrantho virudhyeta 		gtam ni ngag go /
de'i gzhi ni ming ste /
don dang bcas pa'i gzhi smos pa'i phyir na 'dus byas ni gtam gyi gzhi zhes bya'o /
de lta ma yin na rab tu byed pa las /
kathāvastūnyaṣṭādaśabhirdhatubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāni gtam gyi gzhi rnams ni khams bco brgyad kyis bsdus so zhes 'byung ba'i gzhung dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro /
niḥsaraṇaṃ niḥsāraḥ sarvasya saṃskṛtasya nirvāṇam gdon mi za bar 'byung ba ni nges par 'byung ba ste /
'dus byas thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o /
tadeṣāmastīti saniḥsārāḥ de 'di dag la yod pas nges par 'byung bcas dag go /
sahetukatvāt savastukāḥ /
hetuvacanaḥ kila vastuśabda iti vaibhāṣicāḥ 		rgyu dang bcas pa'i phyir gzhi dang bcas pa dag ste /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gzhi zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rgyu'i tshig yin lo /
ityete saṃskṛtadharmauaryāyāḥ /
ta eva puyaḥ saṃskṛtā dharamāḥ 		de ltar na de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dag yin no /
yang 'dus byas de dag nyid /
ye sāsravā upādānaskandhāste kiṃ diddhaṃ /
ya upādānaskandhāḥ skandhā api te syuḥ eva nopādānaskandhāḥ /
anāsravāḥ saṃskārā iti 		gang dag zag bcas nyer len pa'i /
phung po'ang de dag /
'dis ci zhig grub par 'gyur zhe na /
nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gang dag yin pa de dag ni phung po yang yin no /
phung po dag kho na yin la nye bar len pa'i phung po ma yin pa dag kyang yod de /
'du byed zag pa med pa rnams so /
tatra upādānāni kleśāḥ /
tatsaṃbhūtatvādupādānaskandhāḥ 		de la nye bar len pa dag ni nyon mongs pa rnams so /
de dag las byung ba'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phung po dag ste /
truṇatupāgnivat /
taddhidheyatvādvā rājapurūpavat 		dper na rtsva dang sog ma'i me bzhin pa 'am /
de dag la rag lus pa'i phyir rgyal po'i mi bzhin no /
upādānāni vā tebhyaḥ saṃbhavantīti upādānaskandhāḥ puṣpaphalavṛkṣavat /
ta eva sāsravā dharmā ucyante 		yang na de dag las nye bar len pa rnams 'byung bas nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams te /
me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa bzhin no /
zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos de dag nyid /
saraṇā api /
raṇsā hi kleśāḥ /
ātmapāravyāvādhanāt 		'thab bcas kyang zhes bya'o /
'thab pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams te /
bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa'i phyir ro /
stadanuśayitatvāt saraṇāḥ /
sāsravavat 		de dag gis rgyas par byas pa'i phyir 'thab bcas dag ste zag pa dang bcas pa bzhin no /
punaḥ /
duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te 		sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang /
lha gnas srid pa'ang de dag yin /
āryāṇāṃ pratikūlatvādduḥkham 'phags pa rnams dang mi mthun pa'i phyir sdug bsngal lo /
samudetyasmād duḥkhamiti samudayaḥ 'di las sdug bsngal kun 'byung bas kun 'byung ba'o /
lakṣyata iti lokaḥ 'jig pas na 'jig rten no /
dṛṣṭirasmiṃstiṣṭhatyanuśayanāditi dṛṣṭisthānam 'di la lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i sgo nas gnas pas na lta ba'i gnas so /
bhavatīti bhavaḥ 'byung bas na srid pa ste /
ityete sāsravāṇasaṃ dharmāṇāmānvarthaparyāyāḥ /
pañca rūpādayaḥ skandhā ityuktam 		de ltar na 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi rnam grangs don dang mthun pa dag go /
gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga /
tatra /
rūpaṃ pañcendriyāṇyarthāḥ pañcāvijñaptireva ca /
pañcendriyāṇi cakṣuḥśtrotragrhāṇajihvākāyendariyā ṇa /
pañcārthāsteṣāmevacakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ yathāsvaṃ ye pañca viṣayāḥ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyāḥ 		zhes smras pa de la /
gzugs ni dbang po lnga dang don /
lnga dang rnam rig byed min nyid /
dbang po lnga po mig dang rna ba dang /
sna dang lce dang lus kyi dbang po rnams dang don lnga po mig la sogs pa rnams de dag nyid kyi yul gang dag yin pa gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ste de snyed cig ni gzugs kyi phung po'o /
avijñaptiśceti /
etāvān rūpaskandhaḥ 		de la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag smos pa gang dag yin pa /
tatra ya ete pañca rūpādayo 'rthā uktāḥ /
tadvijñānāśrayā rūpaprasādāścakṣurādayaḥ /
rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyavijñānānāmāśrayabhūtā ye pañca rūpātmakāḥ prasādāste yathākramaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyā veditavyāḥ 		de dag rnams kyi rnam shes rten /
mig la sogs gzugs dang ba rnams /
gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i rnam par shes pa rnams kyi rten du gyur pa gzugs dang ba'i bdag nyid lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag ni go rims bzhin du mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dag yin par rig par bya ste /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpa prasāda iti vistaraḥ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du dge slong mig ni nang gi skye mched de /
'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs dang ba'o zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o /
yānyetāni cakṣurādīnyuktani tadvijñānāśrayā rūpaprasādāścakṣurādayaḥ /
cakṣurvijñānādyāśrayā ityarthaḥ 		yang na mig la sogs pa 'di dag smos pa gang dag yin pa /
de dag rnams kyi rnam shes rten /
mig la sogs gzugs dang ba rnams /
mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i rten yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
evaṃ kṛtvā prakaraṇagraṇtho 'pyanuvṛtto bhavati /
cakṣuḥ katamat 		de ltar bshad na rab tu byed pa las /
mig gi dbang po gang zhe na /
cakṣurvijñānāśrayo rūpaprasāda iti vistaraḥ /
nirddiṣṭāni pañcendriyāṇi /
arthāḥ pañcā nirddeśyāḥ /
tatra tāvat] 		mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gzugs dang ba'o zhes rgyas par 'byung ba'i gzhung dang yang mthun par 'gyur ro /
dbang po lnga dag bshad zin to /
don lnga bshad par bya ste /
de la re zhig /
rūpaṃ dvidhā /
varṇaḥ saṃsthānaṃ ca 		gzugs rnam gnyis dang kha dog dang dbyibs so /
tatra varṇaścaturvidho nīlādiḥ de la kha dog ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
sngon po la sogs pa'o /
tadbhedā anye /
samsthānamaṣṭavidhaṃ dīrghadi visātāntam 		gzhan dag ni de'i bye brag go /
dbyibs ni rnam pa brgyad de /
ring po la sogs pa nas phya le ba ma yin pa la thug pa'o /
tadeva rūpāyatanaṃ punarucyate yang gzugs kyi skye mched de nyid /
vimśatidhā rnam pa nyi shu zhes bya ste /
tadyathā nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitamavadātaṃ dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ unnatamavanataṃ sātaṃ visātaṃ abhraṃ dhūmo rajo mahikā cchāyā ātapaḥ ālokaḥ andhakāramiti 'di lta ste / sngon po dang ser po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ring po dang thung ngu dang lham pa dang zlum po dang mthon po dang dma' ba dang phya le ba dang phya le ba ma yin pa dang sprin dang du ba dang rdul dang khug rna dang grib ma dang nyi ma dang snang ba dang mun pa'o /
kecinnabhaścaikavarṇamiti ekaviṃśatiṃ saṃpaṭhanti /
tatra sātaṃ samasthānam /
ālokaḥ candratārakāgnyoṣadhimaṇīnaṃ prabhā /
chāyā yatra rūpāṇāṃ darśanam /
viparyayādandhakāram 		kha cig ni nam mkha' la kha dog gcig dang rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'don to /
de la phya le ba ni dbyibs mnyam pa'o /
phya le ba ma yin pa ni dbyibs mi mnyam pa'o /
khug rna ni lho bur ro /
nyi ma ni nyi ma'i 'od do /
snang ba ni zla ba dang skar ma dang me dang sman dang nor bu rnams kyi 'od dag go /
grib ma ni gang na gzugs rnams snang ba'o /
de las bzlog pa ni mun pa'o /
śeṣaṃ sugamatvānna vipañcitam /
asti rūpāyatanaṃ varṇato vidyate na saṃsthānataḥ 		lhag ma ni brda phrad par sla bas rnam par ma phye ba'o /
gzugs kyi skye mched kha dog tu yod la dbyibs su med pa yang yod de /
nīlapītalohitavadātacchāyātapālokāndhakārākhyam /
asti saṃsthānato na varṇataḥ /
ghādīnāṃ pradeṣaḥ kāyavijñaptisvabhāvaḥ 		sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang grib ma dang nyi ma dang snang ba dang mun pa zhes bya'o /
dbyibs su yod la kha dog tu med pa yang yod de /
ring po la sogs pa'i phyogs lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyi ngo bo nyid do /
astyubhayathā /
pariśiṣṭaṃ rūpāyatanam 		gnyi gar yod pa yang yod de /
gzugs kyi skye mched lhag ma'o /
ātapālokāveva varṇato vidyete ityapare /
dṛśyate hi nīlādīnaṃ dīrghādipariccheda iti /
kathaṃ punarekaṃ dravyamubhayathā vidyate 		gzhan dag na re /
sngon po la sogs pa dang ring po la sogs par yongs su chad par snang bas na nyi ma dang snang ba kho na kha dog tu yod do zhes zer ro /
ji ltar na rdzas gcig la gnyi gar yod ce na /
astyubhayasya tatra prajñānāt /
jñānārtho hyeṣa vidirna sattārthaḥ 		de la gnyi ga mngon pa'i phyir te /
yod pa 'di ni shes pa'i don yin gyi yod pa'i don ni ma yin no /
kāyavijñaptāvapi tarhi prasaṅgaḥ 'o na ni lus kyi rnam par rig byed la'ang thal bar 'gyur ro /
uktaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ /
śabdastvaṣṭavidhaḥ /
upāttānupāttamahābhūtahetukaḥ sattvāsattvākhyaśceti caturvidhaḥ 		gzugs kyi skye mched bshad zin to /
sgra ni rnam pa brgyad yod de /
zin pa dang ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba sems can dang sems can ma yin par ston pa ste rnam pa bzhi'o /
punarmanojñāmanojñabhedādaṣṭavidho bhavati de yang yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro /
tatropāttamahābhūtahetuko yathā hastavākchabdaḥ de la zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba ni 'di lta ste /
lag pa dang ngag gi sgra lta bu'o /
anupāttamahābhutahetuko yathā vāyuvanaspatinadīśabdaḥ ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba ni 'di lta ste /
rlung dang nags tshal dang chu'i sgra lta bu'o /
sattvākhyo vāgvijñaptiṣabdaḥ sems can du ston pa ni ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi sgra'o /
asattvākhyo 'nyaḥ /
upāttānupāttamahābhūtahetuko 'pyasti śabda ityapare 		gzhan ni sems can du ston pa ma yin pa'o /
gzhan dag na re zin pa dang ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyus las byung ba'i sgra yang yod de /
tadyathā hastamṛdaṅgasaṃyogaja iti /
sa tu yathaikau varṇaparamāṇurna bhūtacatuṣkadvayamupādāyeṣyate tathā naivaiṣṭavya iti 		dper na lag pa dang rdza rnga phrad pa las skyes pa lta bu'o zhes zer te /
de ni 'di ltar kha dog gi rdul phra rab gcig las byung ba bzhi tshan gnyis rgyur byas par mi 'dod pa de bzhin du mi 'dod par bya'o /
uktaḥ śabdaḥ sgra bshad zin to /
rasaḥ /
ṣoḍha 		ro ni rnam pa drug /
madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭukatittakaṣāyabhedāt /
caturvidho gandhaḥ 		mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshva dang tsha ba dang kha ba dang bska ba'i bye brag gis so /
dri rnam bzhi /
sugandhadurgandhayoḥ samaviṣamagandhatvāt dri zhim pa dang dri nga ba rnam pa gnyis /
dri mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i phyir ro /
trividhastu śāstre /
sugandho durgandhaḥ samagandha iti 		bstan bcos las ni dri zhim pa dang dri nga ba dang dri mnyam pa'o zhes rnam pa gsum 'byung ngo /
spṛśyamekādaśātmadkam /
spraṣṭavyamekādaśadravyasvabhāvam /
catvāri mahābhūtāni ślakṣṇatvaṃ karkaśatvaṃ gurutvaṃ laghutvaṃ śītaṃ jighatsā pipāsā ceti 		reg bya bcu gcig bdag nyid do /
reg bya rdzas kyi rang bzhin ni bcu gcig ste /
'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang 'jam pa nyid dang rtsub pa nyid dang lci ba nyid dang yang ba nyid dang grang ba dang bkres pa dang skom pa'o /
tatra bhūtāni paścādvakṣyāmḥ /
ślakṣṇatvaṃ mṛdutā /
karkaśatvaṃ paruṣatā 		de la 'byung ba rnams ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o /
'jam pa nyid ni mnyen pa'o /
rtsub pa nyid ni rud rud pa'o /
gurutvaṃ yena bhāvāstulyante lci ba nyid ni gang gis na dngos po rnams 'jal bar byed pa'o; /
laghutvaṃ viparyayāt /
śītamuṣṇābhilāṣakṛt /
jighatsā bhojanābhilāṣakṛt 		bzlog pa ni yang ba nyid do /
grang ba ni dro bar 'dod par byed pa'o /
bkres pa ni zad 'dod par byed pa'o /
kāraṇe kāryopacārāt skom pa ni skom 'dod par byed pa'o /
yathā /
buddhānāṃ sukha utpādaḥ sukhā dharmasya deśanā 		rgyu la 'bras bu brtags pa'i phyir te dper na /
sangs rgyas rnams na 'byung ba bde /
chos bstan pa yang bde pa'o /
sukhā saṅghasya sāmagrī samagrāṇāṃ tapaḥ sukhaṃ /
tatra rūpadhātau jighatsāpipāse na staḥ 		dge 'dun mthun pa bde ba yin /
mthun pa rnams kyi dka' thub bde /
zhes bya ba bzhin no /
de la gzugs kyi khams na ni bkres pa dang skom pa med do /
śeṣamasti /
yadyapi tatra vastrāṇyekaśo na tulyante sañcitāni punastulyante 		lhag ma ni yod do /
gal te de ni gos re re nas mi 'jal yang bsags pa dag ni 'jal lo /
śītamupaghātakaṃ nāsti /
anugrāhakaṃ kilāsti /
yadetadbahuvidhaṃ rūpamuktaṃ tatra kadācidekena dravyeṇa cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate yadā tatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati 		gnod par byed pa'i grang ba med kyi phan par byed pa ni yod do lo /
gang 'di gzugs rnam ba mang po bshad pa de la res 'ga' ni rdzas gcig gis mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed de /
gang gi tshe de'i rnam pa bye brag tu gcod par 'gyur ba na'o /
kadācid bahubhiryadā na vyavacchedaḥ /
tadyathā senāvyūhamanekavarṇasaṃsthānaṃ maṇisamūhaṃ ca dūrāt paśyataḥ /
evaṃ śrotrādivijñānaṃ veditavyaṃ 		res 'ga' ni mang pos te /
gang gi tshe bye brag tu mi gcod pa na ste; dper na thag ring po nas dmag bshams pa 'am /
nor bu'i tshogs kyi kha dog dang dbyibs du ma la lta ba lta bu'o /
rna ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
kāyavijñānaṃ tu paraṃ pañcabhiḥ spraṣṭavyairutpadyata ityeke /
caturbhirmahābhūtairekena ca ślakṣṇatvādinā 		lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni kha cig na re shin tu mang na 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang; 'jam pa nyid la sogs pa gcig dang reg bya lngas skyed do zhes zer ro /
sarvairekādaśabhirityapare /
nanu caivaṃ samastālambanatvāt sāmānyaviṣayāḥ pañca vijñānakāyāḥ prāpnuvanti na svalakṣaṇaviṣayāḥ 		gzhan dag na re bcu gcig po thams cad kyis kyang skyed do zhes zer ro /
de lta na spyi la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag spyi'i yul can du 'gyur gyi /
rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin pa ma yin nam zhe na /
āyatanasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratyete svalakṣaṇaviṣayā iṣyante na dravyasvalakṣaṇamityadoṣaḥ /
idaṃ vicāryate /
kāyajihvendriyayoryugapad viṣayaprāptau satyāṃ katarad vijñānaṃ pūrvamutpadyate 		'di dag ni skye mched kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can du 'dod kyi /
rdzas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi ni ma yin pas nyes pa med do /
'di dpyad par bya ste /
lus dang lce'i dbang po gnyis cig car du yul dang phrad na rnam par shes pa gang sngar skye zhe na /
yasya viṣayaḥ paṭīyān /
samaprāpte tu viṣaye jihvāvijñānaṃ pūrvamutpadyate /
bhoktukāmatāvarjitatvātsasntateḥ /
uktāḥ pañācendriyārthāḥ yathā ca teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ 		gang gi yul shas che ba'o /
yul mnyam pa dang phrad na ni lce'i rnam par shes pa sngar skye ste /
za bar 'dod pas rgyud gtad pa'i phyir ro /
dbang po lnga dang don lnga dang de dag la ji ltar 'dzin pa yang bshad zin to /
avijñaptiridānīṃ vaktavyā /
seyamucyate /
vikṣiptācittakasyāpi yo 'nubaṇdhaḥ śubhāśubhaḥ 		da ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bsnyad par bya ba de brjod par bya ste /
g yengs dang sems med pa yi yang /
dge dang mi dge'i rjes 'brel gang /
mahābhūtānyupādāya sa hyavijñaptirucyate /
vikṣiptacittakasyeti tadanyacittasyāpi /
acittakasyāpītyasaṃjñinirodhasamāpattisamāpannasyāpi 		'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa /
de ni rnam rig byed min brjod /
sems g yengs pa zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i sems kyi yang yin pa'o /
sems med pa'i yang zhes bya ba ni 'du shes med pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i yang yin pa'o /
apiśabdenāvikṣiptasacittasyāpīti vijñāyate yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ma g yengs pa sems dang bcas pa'i yang yin no zhes bya bar mngon no /
yo 'nu bandha iti yaḥ pravāhaḥ dge dang mi dge zhes bya ba ni dge legs dang dge legs ma yin ba'o; /
śubhāśubha iti kuśalākuśalaḥ /
kuśalākuśale prāptivāho 'pyastīdṛśa iti tadviśeṣaṇārthamucyate mahābhūtānyupādāyeti 		rjes 'brel gang zhes bya ba ni rgyun to /
thob pa'i rgyun yang 'di lta bu yod pas bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir /
'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa /
hetvartha upādāyārtha iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
jananādihetubhāvāt /
sa hyavijñaptiriti hiśabdastannāmakaraṇavijñāpanārthaḥ /
rūpakriyāsvabhāvāpi satī vijñaptivat paraṃ na vijñāpayatītyavijñaptiḥ 		zhes bya ba brjod do /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re rgyur byas pa'i don ni rgyu'i don to /
skyed pa la sogs pa rgyu'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
de ni rnam rig byed min zhes bya ba la /
de ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de'i ming shes par bya ba'i phyir te /
gzugs dang byed pa'i rang bzhin yin yang rnam par rig byed bzhin du gzhan dag la rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o /
ucyata iti ācāryavacanaṃ darśayati /
samāsatastu vijñaptisamādhisaṃbhūtaṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ rūpamavijñaptiḥ 		brjed ces bya ba ni slob dpon gyi tshig yin par ston pa'o /
mdor na rnam par rig byed dang ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i gzugs dge ba dang mi dge ba ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o /
mahābhūtānyupādāyetyuktāni katamāni bhūtāni 'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa /
zhes smras pa de dag gang zhe na /
bhūtāni pṛthivīdhāturaptejovāyudhātavaḥ /
ityete catvāraḥ svalakṣaṇopādāyarūpadhāraṇād dhātavaścatvāri mahābhūtāny ucyante 		'byung ba dag ni sa'i khams dang; chu dang me dang rlung gi khams rnams zhes bya ba ste /
bzhi po de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i phyir khams dag go /
mahattvameṣāṃ sarvānyarūpāśrayatvenaudārikatvāt /
atha vā tadudbhūtavṛttiṣu pṛthivyaptejovāyuskandheṣveṣāṃ mahāsṇniveśatvāt 		'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gzugs gzhan thams cad kyi rten nyid du rigs pa'i phyir na chen po nyid do /
yang na sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi phung po de dag bya ba la shas che ba de dag la de rnams chen por gnas pa'i phyir ro /
te punahete dhātavaḥ kasmin karmaṇi saṃsidhāḥ kiṃsvabhāvāścetyāha /
dhṛtyādikarmasaṃsiddhāḥ 		yang khams de dag gi las ni gang du yang dag par 'grub /
rang bzhin ni ci zhe na /
'dzin pa la sogs las su grub /
ces bya ba smos te /
dhṛtisaṃgrahapaktivyūhanakarmasvete yathākramaṃ saṃsiddhāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātavaḥ /
vyūhanaṃ punarvṛddhiḥ prasarpaṇaṃ ca veditavyam /
idameṣāṃ karma /
svabhāvastu yathākramaṃ 		sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams 'di dag ni go rims bzhin du 'dzin pa dang sdud pa dang smin par byed pa dang rgyas par byed pa'i las dag tu grub bo /
rgyas par byed pa ni 'phel ba dang rgyas par byed par rig par bya ste /
'di dag ni de dag gi las yin no /
rang bzhin ni go rims bzhin du /
kharasnehosṇateraṇāḥ sra gsher dro nyid g yo ba rnams te /
kharaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ sra ba ni sa'i khams so /
sneho 'bdhātuḥ /
uṣṇatā tejodhātuḥ 		gsher ba ni chu'i khams so /
dro ba ni me'i khams so /
īraṇā vāyudhātuḥ g yo ba ni rlung gi khams so /
īryate 'nayā bhūtasroto deśāntarotpādanāt pradīperaṇavaditīraṇā 'dis 'byung ba'i rgyun yul gzhan du skyed ba'i phyir g yo bar byed de /
sgron ma g yo ba bzhin du g yo bar byed pa yin no /
vāyudhātuḥ katamo laghusamudīraṇatvam iti prakāraṇeṣu nirdiṣṭaṃ sūtre ca rab tu byed pa dag dang mdo sde las rlung gi khams gang zhe na /
yang ba nyid do zhes gsungs la /
tattu laghutvamupādāya rūpamapyuktaṃ prakaraṇeṣu rab tu byed pa dag las /
yang ba nyid de rgyur byas pa'i gzugs zhes kyang bshad do /
ato ya īraṇāsvabhāvo dharmaḥ sa vāyuriti karṃaṇā 'sya svabhāvo 'bhivyaktaḥ /
kaḥ punaḥ pṛthivyādināṃ pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ ca viśeṣaḥ /
pṛthivī varṇasaṃsthānamucyate lokasaṃjñayā /
tathā hi pṛthivīṃ darśayanto varṇaṃ saṃsthānaṃ ca darśayanti /
yathā pṛthivī evaṃ /
āpastejaśca /
varṇasaṃsthānamevocyate lokasaṃjñayā /
vāyustu dhātureva /
ya eva tu vāyudhātuḥ sa eva loke vāyuarityucyate /
tathapi ca 		de'i phyir g yo ba'i rang bzhin gyi chos gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams shes pa ste /
'di'i rang bzhin las kyis gsal ba yin no /
sa la sogs pa dang sa'i khams la sogs pa la bye brag ci yod ce na /
'jig rten gyi ni tha snyad do /
kha dog dbyibs la sa zhes brjod /
'di ltar sa ston pa na kha dog dang dbyibs ston par byed do; /
sa la ji lta ba de bzhin du /
chu me yang ngo /
'jig rten gyi tha snyad du kha dog dang dbyibs nyid la brjod do /
rlung tshogs khams nyid yin /
rlung gi khams gang yin pa de nyid la 'jig rten na rlung zhes 'dogs so /
de dang 'dra ba'ang yin /
yathā pṛthivī varṇasaṃsthānamucyate lokasaṃjñayā tatha vāyuarapi /
nīlikā vātyā maṇḍalikā vātyeti /
kasmāt punarayamavijñaptiparyanto rūpaskandha ityucyate 		ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du kha dog dang dbyibs la sa zhes brjod pa de bzhin du rlung la yang rlung sngon po rlung zlum po'o zhes brjod do /
ci'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin ba'i par 'di gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya zhe na /
raupaṇāt /
uktaṃ bhagavatā rūpyate rupyata iti bhikṣavastasmādrūpopādānasdandha ityucyate 		gzugs su rung ba'i phyir te /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gzugs su yod cing gzugs su rung bas /
de'i phyir gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o /
kena rupyate cis gzugs su rung zhe na /
pāṇisparśenāpi spṛṣṭo rūpyata iti vistaraḥ lag pa'i 'dus te reg pas na reg na yang gzugs su rung ngo zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o /
rūpyate bādhyata ityarthaḥ /
tathā hyarthavargīyeṣūktam /
tasya cet kāmayānasya cchandajātasya dehinaḥ 		gzugs su rung zhes bya ba ni gnod par byar rung zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste 'di ltar don gyi sde tshan dag las /
gal te 'dod pa tshol byed cing /
'dun pa skyes pa'i lus can te /
'dod pa de dag ma 'byor na /
te kāmā na samṛdhyanti śalyaviddha iva rūpyate zug rngus zug bzhin gnod par 'gyur /
zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
rūpasya punaḥ kā badhanā gzugs kyi gnod pa gang zhe na /
vipariṇāmotpādanā yongs su 'gyur ba skyed pa'o; /
pratighāto rūpeṇetyapare /
paramāṇurūpaṃ tarhi rūpaṃ na prāpnotyarūpaṇāt 		gzhan dag na re gzugs su rung ba ni thogs pa'o zhes zer ro /
'o na ni rdul phra rab gzugs ma yin par 'gyur te /
gzugs su med pa'i phyir ro /
na vai paramāṇurūpamekaṃ pṛthag bhūtamasti rdul phra rab kyi gzugs gcig pu logs shig tu gyur pa ni med pa nyid do /
sañghātasthaṃ tu tad rūpyata eva /
atītānāgataṃ tarhi rūpaṃ na prāpnoti 		'dus pa la gnas pa de la ni gzugs su rung ba nyid do /
'o na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs ba gzugs ma yin par 'gyur ro /
tadapi rūpitaṃ rūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ tajjātīyaṃ ceti rūpamindhanavat de yang gzugs su yod zin pa dang gzugs su yod par 'gyur ba dang de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir gzugs yin te bud shing bzhin no /
avijñaptistarhi na prāpnoti /
sāpi vijñaptirūpaṇād rūpitā bhavati 		'o na ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gzugs ma yin par 'gyur ro /
de yang rnam par rig byed la gzugs su lod pa'i phyir gzugs su yod par 'gyur te /
vṛkṣapracalane cchāyāpracalanavat shing ljon pa g yos bas grib ma g yo ba bzhin no /
nāvikārāt /
vijñaptinivṛttau cāvijñaptinivṛttiḥ syād vṛkṣābhāve cchāyā 'bhāvavat 		'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ma yin te /
rnam par rig byed log na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yang ldog par 'gyur te /
shing ljon pa med na grib ma med pa bzhin no /
āśrayabhūtarūpaṇādityapare evaṃ tarhi cakṣurvijñānādīnāmapyāśrayarūpaṇāt rūpatvaprasaṅgaḥ gzhan dag na re rten gyi 'byung ba la gzugs su yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
de lta na 'o na ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang rten gzugs su yod pa'i phyir gzugs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro /
viṣamo 'yamupanyāsaḥ nye bar bkod pa 'di ni mi mthun pa yin te /
avijñaptirhi cchāyeva vṛkṣaṃ prabheva maṇiṃ bhūtānyāśrtya varttate rnam par rig byed ma yin ba 'di ni shing ljon pa la grib ma nyid dang nor bu la 'od nyid bzhin du 'byung ba rnams la brten nas 'jug go /
na tvevaṃ cakṣurādīnyāśritya varttante cakṣurvijñānādīni kevalaṃ tūtpattinimiktamātraṃ tāni teṣāṃ bhavantīti /
idaṃ tāvadavaibhāṣikīyaṃ vṛkṣamāśritya cchāyā varttate maṇiṃ cāśritya prabheti /
cchāyādivarṇaparamāṇūnāṃ pratyekaṃ svabhūtacatuṣkāśritatvābhyupagamāt 		mig gi rnam par shes ba la sogs pa ni de ltar mig la sogs pa la brten nas 'jug pa ma yin te /
de dag ni de dag gi skye ba'i rgyu mtshan tsam yin pa 'ba' zhig tsam du zad pas so /
shing ljon pa la brten nas grib ma dang mar me la brten nas 'od 'jug go zhes bya ba 'di ni re zhig bye brag tu smra ba ma yin te /
grib ma la sogs pa kha dog gi rdul phra rab rnams so so rang gi 'byung ba bzhi tshan la brten pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir ro /
satyapi ca tadāśritatve cchāyāprabhayornāvijñaptistathaivāśritā /
yujyate /
niruddheṣvapi avijña ptyāśayeṣu mahābhūteṣu tasyā anirodho 'bhyupagamyate /
ato na bhavatyeṣa parihāraḥ 		grib ma dang 'od de dag la brten pa nyid yin yang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rten 'byung ba chen po dag 'gags kyang 'gag par khas len pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni de ltar brten par mi rung ngo /
de'i phyir de ni lan du mi rung ngo /
gzhan dag ni 'di la mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i rten ni tha dad du gyur pa ste /
anye punaratra parihāramāhuḥ cakṣurvijñānādīnāmāśrayo bhedaṃ gataḥ kha cig ni gzugs su rung ba ste mig la sogs pa'o /
la la ni gzugs su mi rung ba ste yid do /
kaṣcidrūpyate cakṣurādiḥ kaścinna rūpyate yathā manaḥ /
na tvevamavijñaptiḥ /
tasmādasamānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ ityata upapannametadāśraya rūpaṇādrūpamiti 		rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni de lta ma yin te /
de lta bas na 'dra bar thal ba med do /
de'i phyir gzugs su yod pas na gzugs so zhes bya ba 'di ni 'thad pa yin no zhes lan 'debs so /
ya eva rūpaskandhasvabhāvā uktāḥ gzugs kyi phung po'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa gang dag yin pa /
indriyārthasta eveṣṭā aśāyatanadhātavaḥ /
āyatanavyavasthāyāṃ daśāyatanāni 		dbang don de dag kho na la /
skye mched dang ni khams bcur 'dod /
skye mched rnam par gzhag pa ni skye mched bcu ste /
cakṣurāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ yāvat kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanamiti /
dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ ta eva daśadhātavaścakṣurchātū rūpadhāturyāvat kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhāturiti 		mig gi skye mched dang gzugs kyi skye mched nas /
lus kyi skye mched dang reg bya'i skye mched kyi bar yin no /
khams rnam par gzhag pa ni de dag nyid khams bcu ste /
mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams nas /
lus kyi khams dang reg bya'i khams kyi bar yin no /
ukto rūpaskandhastasya cāyatanavyavasthānam gzugs kyi phung po dang de'i skye mched dang khams rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to /
vedanādayo vaktavyaḥ /
tatra /
vedanā 'nubhavaḥ 		tshor ba la logs pa brjod par bya ste /
de la tshor ba myong ba /
trividho 'nubhavo vedanāskandhaḥ myong ba rnam pa gsum ni tshor ba'i phung po ste /
sukho duḥkho duḥkhāsukhaśca /
sa punarbhidyamānaḥ ṣaḍ vedanākāyāḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yāvamvanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedaneti 		bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'o /
de yang dbye na tshor ba'i tshogs drug ste /
mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nas /
yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar ro; /
saṃjñā nimittodgrahaṇātmikā 'du shes ni /
mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do /
yāvannīlapītadīrghahrasvastripuruṣamitramitrasukhaduḥkhādinimittodgrahaṇamasau saṃjñāskandhaḥ /
sa punarbhidyamānaḥ ṣaṭsaṃjñākāyā vedanāvat /
caturbhyo 'nye tu saṃskāraskandhaḥ /
rūpavedanāsaṃjñāvijñānebhyaścatubbryo 'nye tu saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ 		gang sngon po dang ser po dang ring po dang thung ngu dang pho dang mo dang mdza' bshes dang mdza' bshes ma yin pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par la mtshan mar 'dzin ba de ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o /
de yang dbye na 'du shes kyi tshogs drug ste /
tshor ba bzhin no /
'du byed phung po bzhi las gzhan /
gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang rnam par shes pa dang phung po bzhi las gzhan pa'i 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed kyi phung po'o; /
bhagavatā tu sūtre ṣaṭ cetanākāyā ityuktaṃ prādhānyāt /
sā hi karmasvarūpatvādabhisaṃskaraṇe pradhānā 		bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las /
sems pa tshogs drug go zhes gsungs pa ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te /
de ni las kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir mngon par 'du bya ba la gtso bo yin no /
ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā saṃskṛtamabhisaṃskaroti /
tasmāt saṃskārā upādānaskandha ity ucyata iti 		de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
'dus byas mngon par 'du byed de; de lta bas na 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes gsungs so /
anyathā hi śeṣāṇāṃ caitasikānāṃ viprayuktānāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ skandhāsaṃgrahādduḥkhasamudayasatyatvaṃ na syāditi parijñāparihāṇe api na syātām /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā nāhamekadharmamapi anabhijñāyāparijñāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāṃ vadāmīti 		de lta ma yin na sems las byung ba lhag ma rnams dang ldan ba ma yin pa rnams phung por 'dus pa'i phyir sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i bden pa nyid du mi 'gyur bas yongs su shes pa dang spang bar yang mi 'gyur ro /
bcom ldan 'das kyis ni /
chos gcig mngon par ma shes shing yongs su ma shes par yang sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par nga mi smra'o zhes gsungs la /
evamaprahāye tyuktam /
tasmādavaśyameṣāṃ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgraho bhyupagantavyaḥ 		de bzhin du ma spangs par yang zhes gsungs te /
de lta bas na gdon mi za bar de dag 'du byed kyi phung por bsdus par khas blang bar bya'o /
ete punastrayaḥ /
vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāraskandhāḥ āyatanadhātuvyavasthāyāṃ 		de gsum /
tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed kyi phung po dag ste /
skye mched dang khams rnam par gzhag pa ni /
dharmāyatanadhātvākhyāḥ sahāvijñaptyasaṃskṛtaiḥ /
ityetāni sapta dravyāṇi dharmāyatanaṃ dharmadhātuścetyākhyāyante 		rnam rig byed min dang 'dus ma byas rnams bcas pa ni /
chos kyi skye mched khams zhes bya; /
de ltar na rdzas bdun po de dag ni chos kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams zhes bya'o /
vijñānaṃ prativijñaptiḥ /
viṣayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati vijñaptirupalabdhirvijñāna skandha ityucyate /
sa punaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ cakṣurvijñānaṃ yāvanmanovijñānamiti 		rnam shes so sor rnam rig pa /
yul dang yul la so sor rnam par rig cing dmigs pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya'o /
de yang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste /
mig gi rnam par shes pa nas /
yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar ro /
ya eṣa vijñānaskandha ukta āyatanavyavasthāyāṃ /
mana āyatanaṃ ca tat /
dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ sa eva /
dhātavaḥ saspta ca matāḥ /
katame sapta /
ṣaḍ vijñānānyatho manaḥ /
cakṣurvijñānadhāturyāvanmanovijñānadhātumanodhātuśca /
evamatra pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo nirddiṣṭā bhavaṇti 		rnam par shes pa'i phung po bstan pa gang yin pa de skye mched rnam par gzhag pa ni /
yid kyi skye mched kyang de yin /
khams rnam par gzhag pa yang de dag nyid /
khams bdun dag tu'ang 'dod pa ste /
bdun gang zhe na /
rnam par shes pa drug dang yid /
mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yid kyi khams kyi bar ro /
de ltar na 'dir phung po lnga dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang khams bco brgyad du bstan par 'gyur te /
avijñaptivarjyo rūpaskandho daśāyatanāni daśa dhatavaḥ /
vedanā dayaḥ skandhāstrayo vijñaptirasaṃskṛtāni ca dharmāyatanaṃ dharmadhātuśca vijñānaskandho mana āyatanaṃ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātavo manodhātuśceti /
nanu ca ṣaḍ vijñānakāyā vijñānaskandha ityuktam 		rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs pa gzugs kyi phung po'i skye mched bcu dang khams bcu dag go /
tshor ba la sogs pa phung po gsum dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang 'dus ma byas dag ni chos kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams so /
rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni yid kyi skye mched dang rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang yid kyi khams so /
rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ni rnam par shes pa'i phung por bshad pa ma yin nam /
atha ko yaṃ punastebhyo nyo manodhātuḥ na khalu kaścidanyaḥ yang de dag las gzhan pa yid kyi khams de gang zhe na /
gzhan ni gang yang med do /
kiṃ narhi /
teṣāmeva 		'o na ci zhe na /
drug po de dag /
ṣaṇṇāmanantarātītaṃ vijñānaṃ yaddhi tanmanaḥ /
yadyatsamanantaraniruddhaṃ vijñānaṃ tanmanodhāturityucyeta /
tadyathā sa eva putro nyasya pitā bhavati tadeva phalamanyasya bījamiti /
evaṃ tarhi dravyataḥ saptadaśa dhātavo bhavanti dvādaśa vā ṣaḍvijñānadhātumanodhātūnāmitaretarāntarbhāvāditi kasmādaṣṭādāśa vyavasthāpyante 		nyid las 'das ma thag pa yi /
rnam shes gang yin de yod do /
rnam par shes pa gang dang gang 'gags ma thag pa de nyid ni yid kyi khams zhes bya ste /
dper na bu de nyid gzhan gyi phar 'gyur ba dang 'bras bu de nyid gzhan gyi sa bon yin pa lta bu'o /
de lta na 'o na ni rnam par shes pa'i khams drag dang yid kyi khams rnams gcig gi nang du gcig 'dus pa'i phyir rdzas su na khams bcu bdun nam bcu gnyis su 'gyur na ci'i phyir khams bco brgyad du rnam par gzhag ce na /
yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi de lta'ang yin mod kyi /
'on kyang /
ṣaṣṭhāśrayaprasiddhyartha dhātavo ṣādaś smṛtāḥ /
pañcānāṃ vijñānadhātūnāṃ cakṣurdhātvāyatanādayaḥ pañcāśrayāḥ /
ṣaṣṭhasya manovijñānadhātorāśrayo nyo nāsti /
atastadāśrayaprasiddhacyartha manodhāturūpadiṣṭaḥ /
evamāśrayāśritālambanaṣṭkavyavasathānādaṣṭādaśa dhātavo bhavantīti /
arhatastarhi caramaṃ cittam na mano bhaviṣyati 		drug pa'i rten ni rab bsgrub phyir /
khams ni bco brgyad dag tu 'dod /
rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga po dag gi rten lnga ni mig gi khams la sogs pa yin na drug po yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rten ni gzhan med de /
de'i phyir de'i rten rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir yid kyi khams bstan to /
de ltar na rten pa dang dmigs pa drug tshan rnam par gzhag pas khams bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur ro /
'o na ni dgra bcom pa'i sems tha ma yid ma yin par 'gyur ta /
nahi tadasti yasya tatsasmanantarātītaṃ syāditi /
na /
tasyāpi manobhāvenāvasthitatvāt /
anyakāraṇavaikalyāttu nottaravijñānasaṃbhūtiḥ /
tatra skandhaiḥ sarvasaṃskṛtasaṃgrahaḥ /
upādānaskandhaiḥ sarvasāsravāṇāmā yatanadhātubhiḥ sarvadharmāṇām 		de gang gis mtshungs pa de ma thag pa 'das par 'gyur ba de ni med do zhe na /
de yang yid kyi ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir na ma yin te /
rgyu gzhan mtshang ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa phyi ma mi skye bar zad do /
de la phung po dag gis ni 'dus byas thams cad bsdus so; /
nye bar len pa'i phung po de dag gis ni zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad bsdus so /
samāsatastu jñātavyaḥ /
sarvasaṃgraha ekena skandehnāyatanena ca /
dhātunā ca /
rūpaskandhena mana āyatanena dharmadhātunā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃgraho boddhavyaḥ 		skye mched dang khams dag gis ni chos thams cad bsdus so /
mdor bsdu na phung po dang ni skye mched dang khams gcig gis ni thams cad bsdus par shes par bya ste /
gzugs kyi phung po dang yid kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams kyis chos rnams thams cad bsdus par rig par bya'o /
sa khalveṣa saṃgraho yatra kvaciducyamāno veditavyaḥ /
svabhāvena 		bsdu ba de ni gang dang gang nas 'byung yang rung /
rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis te /
na parabhāvena /
kim kāraṇam /
parabhāvaviyogataḥ 		gzhan gyi dngos pos ni ma yin par rig par bya'o /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
gzhan gyi dngos dang mi ldan phyir /
viyukto hi parabhavena dharmaḥ /
tasmānna yena viyuktastenaiva saṃgṛhīto yujyate 		chos ni gzhan gyi dngos po dang mi ldan no /
de lta bas na gang dang mi ldan bde nyid kyis bsdus par ni mi rung ste /
tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ rūpaskandhena cakṣurāyatanadhātubhyāṃ ca duḥkhasamudayasatyābhyāṃ ca saṃgṛhītam /
tatsvabhāvatvāt 		dper na mig gi dbang po ni gzugs kyi phung po dang mig gi skye mched dang khams dag dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dag gis bsdus te /
de dag gi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
nānyaiḥ skandhādibhistadbhāva viyuktatvāt de dag gi ngo bo dang mi ldan pa'i phyir phung po la sogs pa gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no /
yastvanyenānyasya saṃgraha ucyate yathā saṃgrahavastubhiḥ parṣadāṃ sa hi kādācitkatvāt sāṃketiko veditavyaḥ dper na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis 'khor rnams bsdus pa lta bu gzhan gyis gzhan bsdus so zhes bya ba gang yin ba de ni res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir brdar btags pa yin par bya'o /
nanu caikaviṃśatyā dhātubhirbhavitavyam /
cakṣuṣo dvitvāt śrotraghrāṇayośca /
na bhavitavyam 		mig dang rna ba dang sna dag gnyis gnyis yod pa'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na mi 'gyur te /
'di ltar /
yasmāt /
jātigocaravijñānasāmānyādekadhātutā 		mig la sogs pa gnyis mod kyi /
rigs dang spyod yul rnam par shes /
dvitve pi cakṣuradīnaṃ /
tra jātisāmānyamubhayoścakṣuḥsvabhāvatvāt /
gocarasāmānyamubhayo rūpaviṣayatvāt 		'dra ba'i phyir na khams gcig nyid /
de la rigs 'dra ba ni gnyi ga mig gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro /
spyod yul 'dra ba ni gnyi ga'i yul gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro /
vijñānasāmānyamubhayorekacakṣurvijñānāśrayatvāt /
tasmadeka eva cakṣurdhātuḥ 		rnam par shes pa 'dra ba ni gnyi ga mig gi rnam par shes pa gcig gi rten yin pa'i phyir te /
de lta bas na mig gi khams ni gcig pa nyid do /
evaṃ śrotraghrāṇayorapi yojyam /
śobhārthaṃ tu dvayodbhavaḥ /
ekadhātutve pi tu cakṣurādīnaṃ dvayoḥ saṃbhava āśrayasya śobhārtham /
anya thā hyekacakṣuḥśrotrādhiṣṭhānaikanāsikāvilasaṃbhavāt mahad vairupyaṃ syāditi 		de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
mdzes bya'i phyir na gnyis 'byung ngo /
mig la sogs pa khams gcig pa nyid yin yang rten mdzes par bya ba'i phyir gnyis 'byung ngo /
de lta ma yin te /
mig dang rna ba'i rten gcig dang /
sna'i bu ga gcig tu gyur na shin tu mi mdzes par 'gyur ro /
uktāḥ skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag bshad zin to /
idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kaḥ skandhāyatanadhātvartha iti phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi don gang yin pa 'dir brjod par bya ste /
rāśyāyadvāragotrārthāḥ skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ /
'yat kiñcidrūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannamādhyātmibāhyam audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yadvā dūre antike tatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya rūpaskandha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī ti vacanāt sūtre rāśyarthaḥ skandhārtha iti siddham 		spungs dang skye dgu rigs kyi don /
phung po skye mched khams rnams yin /
mdo las /
gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung 'das pa 'am /
ma 'ongs pa 'am /
da ltar byung ba 'am /
nang gi 'am /
phyi'i 'am /
rags pa 'am /
phra ba'am /
ngan pa 'am /
gya nom pa 'am /
thag ring ba na yod pa gang yin ba 'am /
nye ba na yod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir spungs pa'i don ni phung po'i don to zhes bya bar grub po /
tatrātītaṃ rūpamanityatāniruddham /
anāgatamanutpannam 		de la bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gzugs 'das pa ni mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'gags pa'o /
ma 'ongs pa ni ma byung ba'o /
pratyutpannamutpannāniruddham /
ādhyātmikaṃ svāsāntānikaṃ bāhyamanyadāyatanato vā 		da ltar byung ba la ma 'gags pa'o /
nang gi ni rang gi rgyud la yod pa'o /
gzhan ni phyi'i 'o /
yang skye mched kyi sgo nas so /
rags pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'o /
audārikaṃ sapratighaṃ sūkṣmamapratighamāpekṣikaṃ vā phra ba ni thogs pa med pa'o /
yang na ltos pa pa yin no /
āpekṣikatvādasiddhamiti cet gal te ltos pa pa yin pa'i phyir ma grub bo zhe na /
na /
apekṣābhedāt /
yadapekṣyau dārikaṃ na jātu tadapekṣya sūkṣmaṃ pitāputravat 		ma yin te /
ltos pas tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
gang la ltos te rags pa yin pa ni nam du yang de la ltos nas phra ba ma yin te /
pha dang bu bzhin no /
hīnaṃ kliṣṭam /
praṇitamakliṣṭam /
dūramatītānāgatam /
antikaṃ pratyutpannam 		ngan pa ni nyon mongs pa can no /
gya nom pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o /
ring ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'o /
nye ba ni da ltar byung ba ste /
evaṃ yāvat vijñānam /
ayaṃ tu viśaṣaḥ 		rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de dang 'dra'o /
'di ni khyad par yin te /
audārikaṃ pañcendriyāśrayam sūkṣmaṃ mānasam rags pa ni dbang po lnga la brtan pa'o /
phra ba ni yid las byung ba'o /
bhūmito veti vaibhāṣikāḥ yang na sa las rig par bya'o zhes so /
bhadanta āha audārikarūpaṃ pañacendriyagrāhyam sūkṣmamanyat btsun pa na re ni gzugs rags pa ni dbang po lngas gzung bar bya ba'o /
gzhan ni phra ba'o /
hīnamamanāpaṃ praṇītaṃ manāpam ngan pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba'o /
dūramadṛśyadeśam /
antikaṃ dṛśyadeśam /
atītādīnāṃ svaśabdenābhi hitatvāt /
evam vedanādayo 'pi veditavyāḥ /
dūrāntikatvaṃ tu teṣāmāśrayavaśāt /
audārikasūkṣmatvaṃ tu pūarvavaditi 		gya nom pa ni yid du 'ong ba'o /
ring ba ni yul mi snang ba can no /
nye ba ni yul snang ba can no /
'das pa la sogs pa ni rang gi ming gis bstan pa'i phyir te /
tshor ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
de dag gis ring ba dang nye ba nyid ni de rten gyi dbang gis so /
rags pa dang phra ba nyid ni snga ma bzhin no zhes zer ro /
cittacaittāyadvārārtha āyatanārthaḥ /
nirvacanaṃ tu cittacaittānāmāyaṃ tanvantīti āyatanāni 		sems dang sems las byung ba rnams skye ba'i sgo'i don ni skye mched kyi don te; nges pa'i tshig tu na sems dang sems las byung ba rnams skye ba mched par byed bas skye mched rnams te /
vistṛṇvantītyarthaḥ /
gotrārtho dhātvarthaḥ /
yathaikasmin parvate bahūnyayastāmrarūpyasuvarṇādigotrāni dhātava ucyante evam ekasminnāśraye santāne vā aṣṭādaśa gotrāṇi aṣṭādaśa dhātava ucyante 		rgyas par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
rigs kyi don ni khams kyi don te /
dper na ri 'ga' zhig la lcags dang zangs dang dngul dang gser la sogs pa rigs mang po dag yod pa la khams zhes brjod pa de bzhin du rten dang rgyud gcig la rigs bco brgyad dag yod pa la khams bco brgyad ces bya'o /
ākarāstatra gotrāṇyuacyante /
ta ime cakṣurādayaḥ kasyākarāḥ 		de la 'byung gnas dag ni rigs zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa 'di dag gang gi 'byung gnas yin zhe na /
svasyā jāteḥ rang gi rigs kyi yin te /
sabhāgahetutvāt /
asaṃskṛtaṃ tarhi na dhātuḥ syāt /
cittacittānāṃ tarhi jātivācako yaṃ dhātuśabda ityapare /
aṣṭādaśdharmāṇāṃ jātayaḥ svabhāvā aṣṭādaśa dhātava iti /
yadi rāśyarthaḥ skandhārthaḥ prajñaptisantaḥ skandhāḥ prāpnuvanti /
anekadravyasamūhatvāt rāśipudgalavat 		skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro /
'dus ma byas khams ma yin bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
'o na ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams yin no /
gzhan dag na re chos bco brgyad po dag rigs kyi rang bzhin no zhe na /
khams bco brgyad ces bya bas khams zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni rigs kyi tshig yin zhes zer ro /
gal te spungs pa'i don phung po'i don yin na phung po rnams btags pa'i yod par 'gyur te /
rdzas sum 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir spungs pa dang gang zag bzhin no zhe na /
na /
ekasyāpi dravyaparamāṇoḥ skandhatvāt 		ma yin te /
rdzas kyi rdul phra rab gcig pu yang phung po yin pa'i phyir ro /
na tarhi rāśyarthaḥ skandhārtha iti vaktavyam /
na hyekasyāsti rāśitvamiti /
kāryab hārodvahanārthaḥ skandhārtha ityapare 		de lta na gcig pu la spungs pa nyid med pas spungs pa'i don ni phung po'i don to zhes brjod par mi bya'o /
gzhan dag na re /
bya ba'i khur khyer ba'i don nam /
yongs su chad pa'i don ni phung po'i don te /
pracchedārtho vā /
tathāhi vaktāro bhavanti tribhiḥ skandhakairdeyaṃ dāsyāma iti 		'di ltar smra ba po dbul bar bya ba'i phung po gsum dag tu dbul bar bya'o zhes smra ba bzhin no zhes zer te /
tadetadutsūtram /
sūtraṃ hi rāśyarthameva bravīti yatkiñcidrūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannamiti vistaraḥ /
pratyekamatītādirūpasya skandhatvaṃ tatra vijñāpyate 		de ni mdo dang 'gal lo /
mdo las ni spungs pa'i don kho nar gsungs te /
gzugs gang ci yang rung ba 'das pa'am /
ma 'ongs pa'am zhes rgyas par gsungs so /
der ni gzugs 'das pa la sogs pa so sor phung po nyid yin par shes te /
sarvametadatītādi rūpamekaśo rūpaskandha iti /
na śakyamevaṃ vijñātum /
tatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipyeti vacanāt 		gzugs 'das pa la sogs pa 'di thams cad re re zhing gzugs kyi phung po yin no zhe na /
de ltar ni shes par mi nus te /
de thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
rūpoīnyapi tarhyāyatanāni prajñaptisanti prāpnuvanti /
bahunāṃ cakṣurādiparamāṇūnāmāyadvāra bhāvāt /
na /
ekaśaḥ samagrāṇāṃ kāraṇabhāvāt viṣayasahakāritvādvā nendriyaṃ pṛthagāyatanaṃ syāt 		de lta bas na gzugs kyi phung po dag ni spungs pa bzhin du btags pa'i yod pa yin no /
de lta na skye mched gzugs can rnams kyang btags pa'i yod par 'gyur te /
mig la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab mang po ni skye ba'i sgor gyur pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
ma yin te tshogs pa rnams re re nas rgyu'i ngo bor gyur pa'i phyir ram /
yul lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir dbang po las logs shig tu skye mched du yang mi 'gyur ro /
vibhāṣāyāṃ tūcyate yadyābhidharmikaḥ skandhaprajñaptimapekṣate /
sa āha paramāṇurekasya dhātorekasyāyatanasyaikasya skandhasya pradeśaḥ /
atha nāpekṣate 		bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ni /
gal te chos mngon pa ba zhig phung po btags pa'i yod par lta na ni de rdul phra rab khams gcig dang skye mched gcig dang phung po gcig gi phyogs yin no zhes smra'o /
sa āha /
paramāṇureko dhāturekamāyatanamekaḥ skandha iti 		'on te mi lta na ni de rdul phra rab khams gcig dang skye mched gcig dang phung po gcig yin no zhes smra'o zhes 'byung ngo /
bhavati hi pradeśe pi pradeśivadupacāro yathā paṭṭaiakadeśe dagdhe paṭo dagdha iti phyogs yin yang phyogs can yin bzhin du nye bar 'dogs pa yang yod de /
dper na ras yug gi phyogs gcig tshig pa la ras yug tshig gi zhes bya ba bzhin no /
kirthaṃ bhagavān skandhādimudhena trividhāṃ deśanāmārabhate yang ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po la sogs pa'i sgo nas ston pa rnam pa gsum rtsom par mdzad ce na /
āha /
vineyānāṃ 		smras pa /
gdul ba rnams kyi /
mohendriyarucitraidhāttisraḥ skandhādideśanāḥ rmongs dbang 'dod rnams gsum gyi phyir /
phung po la sogs gsum bstan to /
trayaḥ prakārāstraidham rnam pa gsum ni rnam gsum mo /
triprakāraḥ kila sattvānāṃ mohaḥ sems can rnams kyi rmongs pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
keciccaitteṣu saṃmūḍhāḥ piṇḍātmagrahaṇataḥ kha cig ni sems las byung ba rnams la ril po'i bdag nyid du 'dzin pas rmongs so /
kecidrūpa eva /
kecidrūpacittayoḥ 		kha cig ni gzugs kho na la'o /
kha cig ni gzugs dang sems dag la'o /
indriyāṇyapi trividhāni /
tīkṣṇamadhyamṛdvindriyatvāt /
rūcirapi trividhā 		dbang po dag kyang rnam pa gsum ste /
dbang po rnon po dang 'bring dang rtul po'i phyir ro /
'dod pa yang rnam pa gsum ste /
saṃkṣiptamadhyavistaragrantharucitvāt /
teṣāṃ yathākramaṃ tisraḥ skandhāyatanadhātudeśanā iti 		tshig bsdus pa dang bar ma dang rgya chen po 'dod pa'i phyir te /
de dag la go rims bzhin du phung po dang skye mched dang khams dang gsum bstan to zhes grag go /
kim punaḥ kāraṇaṃ caitasikā ekatra saṃskāraskandhanikṣiptā vedanāsaṃjñe tu pṛthak skandhīkṛte ityāha /
vivādamūlasaṃsārahetutvāt kramakāraṇāt 		yang ci'i phyir sems las byung ba gzhan rnams ni 'du byed kyi phung po gcig tu bsdus la 'du shes dang tshor ba dag ni logs shig tu phung por byas she na /
smras pa /
rtsod pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa dang /
'khor ba'i rgyu phyir rim rgyu'i phyir /
caittebhyo vedanāsaṃjñe pṛthakaskndhau niveśitau sems byung rnams las tshor ba dang /
'du shes logs shig phung por bzhag /
dve vivādamūle /
kāmādhyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭyadhyavasānaṃ ca 		rtsod pa'i rtsa bdag ni gnyis te /
'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa dang lta ba la lhag par zhen pa'o /
tayorvedanāsaṃjñe yathākramaṃ pradhānahetū de gnyis kyi rgyu'i gtso bo ni go rims bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dag ste /
vedanāsvādavaśāddhi kāmānabhiṣvajante viparītasaṃjñāvaśācca dṛṣṭīriti tshor ba ro myang ba'i dbang gis ni 'dod pa rnams las mngon par zhen la /
'du shes phyin ci log gis ni lta ba rnams la'o /
saṃsārasyāpi te pradhānahetū de dag ni 'khor pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo yang yin te /
vedanāsvādagṛddho hi viṣaryastasaṃjñaḥ saṃsarati tshor ba la zhen cing 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa ni 'khor ro /
yacca skandhakrame kāraṇamupadekṣyamāṇaṃ tato 'pi kramakāraṇādanayoḥ pṛthakskandhīkaraṇaṃ veditavyam gang yang phung po'i go rims kyi rgyu ston par 'gyur ba'i go rims kyi rgyu de'i phyir yang 'di gnyis logs shig tu phung por byas par rig par bya ste /
etacca tredho papādayiṣyāmaḥ de ni de nyid du bshad par bya'o /
skandheṣva saṃskṛtaṃ noktamarthāyogāt 'o na ci'i phyir skye mched dang khams dag tu ni 'dus ma byas bshad la /
taddhi skandheṣūcyamānaṃ na tāvadeteṣvevāntarṇetuṃ śakyate phung po dag tu ni ma yin zhe na /
phung po dag tu 'dus ma byas /
arthāyogāt /
nahi tadrūpaṃ nāpi yāvadvijñānamiti /
nacāpi ṣaṣṭhaḥ skandho vaktuṃ śakyate /
kutaḥ /
arthāyogāt /
rāśyartho hi skandhārtha ityuktam /
nacāsaṃskṛtamatītādibhedabhinnaṃ rūpādivadyatastatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipyāsaṃskṛtaskandha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchet 		don du mi rung phyir ma bshad /
de ni phung po dag gi nang du brjod na de ni gzugs ma yin zhing rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang ma yin pas don du mi rung ba'i phyir re zhig de dag nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar ni mi nus so /
phung po drug par brjod par yang mi nus so /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
don du mi rung ba'i phyir te /
spungs pa'i don du ni phung po'i don to zhes bshad na /
'dus ma byas na gzugs bzhin du 'di ltar de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas 'dus ma byas kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'das pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa ma yin no /
saṃkleśavastujñāpanārthaṃ khalūpādānaskandhavacanaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānavastujñāpanārthaṃ skandhavacanaṃ yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi shes par bya ba'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya la /
kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i gzhi shes par bya ba'i phyir phung po zhes kyang bya na /
nacobhayathā pyasaṃskṛtamityarthāyogānna teśu vyavasthāpitam /
yathā ghaṭoparamo na ghaṭa evaṃ skandhoparamo na skandho bhavitumarhatītyapare 		'dus ma byas ni don du mi rung ba'i phyir gnyi ga yang ma yin te /
de dag tu rnam par gzhag go /
kha cig na re ji ltar bum pa chag pa bum pa ma yin pa de bzhin du phung po zhig pa yang phung po yin par mi 'os so zhes zer te /
teṣāṃ dhātvāyataneṣvapyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ /
uktaḥ skandhānāmanyaḥ prakāraḥ 		de dag gi ltar na khams dang skye mched dag la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro /
phung po rnams kyi rnam pa gzhan bshad zin to /
kramaḥ punaḥ /
yathaudārikasaṃkleśabhājanādyarthadhātutaḥ 		rim ni rags dang kun nyon mongs /
snod sogs don khams ji bzhin no /
rūpaṃ hi sapratighatvātsarvaudārikam gzugs ni thogs pa dang ba cas pa'i phyir thams cad pas rags so /
arupiṇāṃ vedanā pracāraudārikatayā /
tathā hi vyapadiśanti haste me vedanā pāde me vedaneti 		gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi nang na yang tshor ba ni rgyu ba rags pa'i phyir te /
'di ltar nga'i lag pa la tshor ro /
nga'i rkang pa la tshor ro zhes tha snyad 'dogs so /
dvābhyāṃ cau dārikatarā saṃjñā /
vijñānātsaṃskārā ityato yadaudārikataraṃ tatpūrvamuktam 		'du shes ni gnyis pas ches rags so /
rnam par shes pa bas ni 'du byed de /
de'i phyir gang ches rags pa de sngar bshad do /
athavā anādimati saṃsāre strīpuruṣā anyonyaṃ rūpābhirāmāste ca vedanāsvādagarddhāt yang na thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor ba na pho dang mo dag phan tshun gzugs la mngon par dga' ste /
de dag kyang tshor ba'i ro myang ba la chags pa'i phyir ro; /
tadgarddhaḥ saṃjñāviparyāsāt /
tadviparyāsaḥ kleśaiścittaṃ aca tatsaṃkliṣṭamiti yathāsaṃkleśaṃ ca kramaḥ /
bhājanādyarthena vā /
bhajanabhojanavyañjanakarttṛ bhoktṛbhūtā hi rūpādayaḥ skandhāḥ 		de la chags pa yang 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i phyir ro /
phyin ci log de yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dag gis so /
sems kyang de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa can du byas pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i go rims ji lta ba bzhin no /
yang na snod la sogs pa'i don gyis te /
gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po ni snod dang zas dang tshod ma dang byan po dang za ba po lta bu'o /
dhātuto vā /
kāmaguṇarūpaprabhāvito hi kāmadhātuḥ 		yang na khams kyis te 'dod ba'i yon tan gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ni 'dod pa'i khams so /
vedanāprabhāvitāni dhyānāni /
saṃjñāprabhāvitāḥ trayaḥ ārūpyāḥ /
saṃskāramātraprabhāvitaṃ bhavāgram /
etā eva vijñānasthitayaḥ tāsu ca pratiṣṭhitaṃ vijñānamiti kṣetrabijasaṃdarśanārthaḥ skandhānukramaḥ /
ata eva pañcaskandhā nālpīyāṃso na bhūyāṃsaḥ /
ata eva ca kramakāraṇādvedanāsaṃjñe saṃskārebhyaḥ pṛthaka skandhīkṛte /
yata ete audārikatare saṃkleśānukramahetū bhājanavyañjanabhūte tatprabhāvitaṃ ca dhātudvayamiti 		tshor bas rab tu phye ba ni bsam gtan rnams so /
'du shes kyis rab tu phye ba ni gzugs med pa gsum mo /
'du byed tsam gyis rab tu phye ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo ste /
'di dag ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa yin la /
de dag la rnam par shes pa gnas so zhes phung po'i go rims zhing dang sa bon gyi go rims lta bur bstan pa'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir phung po rnams ni lnga ste mi nyung mi mang ngo /
gang gi phyir 'di dag ni ches rags pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i go rims kyi rgyu dang zas dang tshod ma lta bu dang de dag gi khams gnyis rab tu phye ba'i go rims kyi rgyu de nyid kyi phyir tshor ba dang 'du shes dag ni 'du byed rnams las logs shig tu phung por byas so /
āyatanadhātūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ cakṣurādīnāmanukramo vaktavyaḥ /
tadvaśenaiva hi tadviṣayavijñānānāṃ kramaḥ /
teṣāṃ ca punaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ 		mig la sogs pa'i khams dang skye mched drug gi ge rims brjod par bya ste /
de'i dbang nyid kyis na de'i yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyi go rims su 'gyur ro /
drug po de dag las /
prāk pañca vārttamārthyāt da lta'i don phyir dang por lnga; /
cakṣurādīni pañca varttamānaviṣayatvāt pūrvamuktāni /
manastvaniyataviṣayam 		mig la sogs pa lnga'i yul ni da ltar yin pa'i phyir sngar smos so /
yid kyi yul ma nges pa can yin te /
kha cig gi yul ni da ltar yin pa nas /
kiñcidvarttamānaviṣayaṃ kiñcit vyadhvānadhraviṣayam kha cig gi yul ni dus gsum dang dus ma yin pa'i par yin no /
bhautikārthyāccatuṣṭayam 'byung ba las gyur don phyir bzhi /
prāgiti varttate dang por zhes bya bar snyegs so /
pañcānāṃ punaśctvāri pūrvamuktāni /
bhautikaviṣayatvāt 		lnga rnams las kyang bzhir sngar smos pa ni yul 'byung ba las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
lus kyi yul ni ma nges te /
kāyasya tvaniyato viṣayaḥ res 'ga' ni 'byung ba dag yin la /
kadācid bhūtāni kadācid bhautikam kadācidubhayam res 'ga' ni 'byung ba las gyur pa dag yin no /
res 'ga' ni gnyi ga yin no /
dūrāśutaravṛttyā 'nyat gzhan ni ches ring myur 'jug phyir /
śeṣaṃ punaritasmād yathāyogaṃ dūrāśutaravṛttyā pūrvamuktam lhag ma ni ci rigs par ches rgyang ring ba dang myur bar 'jug pas gzhan bas sngar smos te /
cakṣuḥśrotraṃ hi dūraviṣayam /
tat pūrvamuktaṃ dvayāt 		mig dang rna ba'i yul rgyang ring ba'i phyir gnyis pas de dag sngar smos so /
tayorapi cakṣuṣo dūratare vṛttiḥ /
paśyato 'pi dūrānnadīṃ tacchabdāśravaṇādatastat pūrvamuktam 		de gnyis las kyang mig ni ches rgyang ring po la 'jug ste /
chu klung rgyang ring po nas mthong yang de'i sgra mi thos pas de'i phyir de sngar smos so /
ghrāṇasya tu nāsti dūre vṛttiḥ /
jihvāyāśca 		sna dang lce ni rgyang ring po la 'jug pa med mod kyi /
tayorāśutaravṛttitvāt ghrāṇaṃ pūrvamuktamaprāptasyaiva jihvā bhojyasya gandhagrahaṇāt de gnyis las kyang sna ni ches myur bar 'jug pa'i phyir sngar smos te /
zas lce dang ma phrad pa nyid kyi dri 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
yathāsthānaṃ kramo 'thavā yang na ji ltar gnas bzhin rim; /
athavā asmin śarīre cakṣuṣo 'dhiṣṭhānamupāriṣṭāt niviṣṭam /
tasmādadhaḥ śrotrasya /
tasmādadho ghrāṇasya 		yang na lus 'di la mig gi rten ni dang po na gnas so /
de'i 'og na ni rna ba'i 'o /
de'i 'og na ni sna'i 'o /
de'i 'og na ni lce'i 'o /
takyāḥ syāsya bahulyena lus kyi ni phal cher de'i 'og na'o /
manaḥ punastānyeva niśritamadeśasthaṃ ceti yathāsthānameṣāṃ kramaḥ syāt /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ daśasvāyataneṣu rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhīteṣvekaṃ rūpāyatanamucyate /
sarveṣu ca dharmasvabhaveṣvekaṃ dharmāyatanamityāha /
viśeṣaṇārthaṃ prādhānyādbahudharmāgrasaṃgrahāt 		yid ni de dag la brten pa dang yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir te /
de dag gi go rims ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin yin no /
yang ci'i phyir gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i skye mched bcu po dag las gcig gzugs kyi skye mched du brjod la /
thams cad kyang chos kyi rang bzhin yin na gcig chos kyi skye mched ces bya zhe na /
smras pa /
bye brag don dang gtso po'i phyir /
chos mang ba dang mchog bsdus phyir /
ekamāyatanaṃ rūpamekaṃ dharmākhyamucyate gcig ni gzugs kyi skye mched dang /
gcig ni chos zhes bya bar brjod /
kathaṃ viśeṣaṇārtham /
yathā gamyeta pratyekameṣāṃ daśānāmāyatanatvaṃ viṣayaviṣayitvena vyavasthānaṃ na samastānāmiti /
cakṣurādibhiśca viśeṣitairyanna cakṣurādisaṃjñakaṃ rūpaṃ ca tadrūpakayātanaṃ jñāsyata ityasya punarnāmāntaraṃ nocyate 		bye brag gi don ci lta bu zhe na /
ci nas kyang yul dang yul can nyid du rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo nas bcu po 'di dag gi so sor skye mched nyid yin gyi spyir ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya ba yin la /
mig la sogs pa bye brag tu byas pa dag gis ni gang mig la sogs par ni ming ma btags la gzugs ni yin pa de gzugs kyi skye mched du shes par 'gyur bas 'di'i ming gzhan ma brjod do /
athavā rūpāyatanasya prādhānyāt yang na gzugs kyi skye mched ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te /
taddhi sapratighatvācca /
pāṇyādisaṃsparśaiḥ spṛṣṭaṃ rūpyate /
sanidarśanatvācca 		de ni thogs pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir lag pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis reg na gzugs su rung ba dang bstan du rung ba'i phyir te /
'di ni 'di na'o /
idamihāmutreti nirūpaṇāt loke 'pi ca tadrūpamiti pratītaṃ nānyāni che ge mo zhig na'o zhes brtag tu rung ba'i phyir ro /
'jig rten na yang de gzugs so zhes grags kyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin no /
viśeṣaṇārthameva caikaṃ dharmāyatanamuktaṃ na sarvāṇi /
api cātrabahūnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgraho vedanādīnām /
ataḥ sāmānyenābhidhānaṃ kriyate dharmaśabdena /
agrasya ca nirvāṇadharmasyātra saṃgraho nānyeṣviti /
viṃśatiprakāratvenaudārikatvānmāṃsa divyāryaprajñācakṣustrayagocaratvāccaikaṃ rūpāyatanamityapare /
anyānyapi skandhāyatanadhātusaṃśabditānyupalabhyante sūtreṣu teṣāṃ kiṃebhireva saṃgraho veditavya āhosvidvyatirekaḥ /
ebhireva saṃgraho na vyatirekaḥ 		bye brag gi don nyid kyis gcig ni chos kyi skye mched du bshad kyi thams cad ni ma yin no /
gzhan yang 'dir tshor ba la sogs pa chos mang po rnams bsdus te /
de'i phyir chos kyi sgrar spyir rjod par byed do /
chos kyi mchog mya ngan las 'das pa de yang der bsdus te gzhan dag tu ni ma yin no /
gzhan dag na re rnam pa nyi shu'i rig pa'i phyir dang sha'i dang lha'i dang 'phags pa'i shes rab dang mig gsum gyi spyod yul yin pa'i phyir gcig gzugs kyi skye mched du bstan to zhes zer ro /
mdo dag las phung po dang skye mched dang khams zhes bya ba gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang dmigs na /
ci de rnams 'di dag nyid kyis bsdus sam /
'on te tha dad pa zhig yin par rig par bya zhe na /
'di dag nyid kyis bsdus kyi tha dad pa ni med de de la re zhig /
tatra tāvat /
dharmaskandhasahasrāṇi yānyaśītiṃ jagau muniḥ 		chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dag /
gang rnams thub pas gsungs de dag /
tāni vāṅnāma vetyeṣāṃ rūpasaṃskārasaṃgrahaḥ tshig gam ming yin de dag ni /
gzugs dang 'du byed dag tu 'dus /
yeṣāṃ vāksvabhāvaṃ buddhavacanaṃ teṣāṃ tāni rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītāni gang dag gi ltar na sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshig gi rang bzhin yin ba de dag gi ltar na de dag ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus so /
yeṣāṃ nāmasvabhāvaṃ teṣāṃ saṃskāraskandhena /
kiṃ punardharmaskandhasya pramāṇam /
śāstrapramāṇa ityeke 		gang dag gi ltar na ming gi rang bzhin yin pa de dag gi ltar na ni 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus so /
yang chos kyi phung po'i tshad ji tsam zhe na /
kha cig bstan bcos tshad ces zer /
eke tāvat āhurdharmaskandhasaṃjñakasyaivābhidharmaśāstrasyāsya opramaṇamiti /
tacca ṣaṭsahasrāṇi /
apare punarāhuḥ 		kha cig na re de ni chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba bstan bcos mngon pa'i tshad tsam mo zhes zer te /
de ni shlo ka drug stong ngo /
yang gzhan dag na re /
skandhādīnaṃ kathaikaśaḥ phung po la sogs gtam re yin /
zhes zer te /
skandhāyatanadhātupratītyasamutpādasatyāhāradhyānāpramāṇārūpyavimokṣābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanabodhipākṣikābhijñāpratisaṃvitpraṇidhijñānāraṇādīnāṃ kathā prātyekaṃ dharmaskandha iti /
caritapratipakṣastu dharmaskandho 'nuvarṇitaḥ 		phung po dang skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang bden pa dang zas dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa dang rnam par thar pa dang zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang zad par gyi skye mched dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang smon nas shes pa dang nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i gtam rgyud re re ni chos kyi phung po'o zhes zer ro /
spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por ni /
chos kyi phung po mthun par gsungs /
evaṃ tu varṇayantyaśītiścaritasahasraṇi sattvānām /
rāgadveṣamohamānādicaritabhedena 		'di skad du /
sems can rnams kyi spyod pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang nga rgyal la sogs pa spyod pa tha dad pa brgyad khri yod de /
teṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa bhagavatā 'śītirdharmaskandhasahasrāṇyuktāni /
yathaitānyaśītirdharmaskandhasahasrāṇyeṣveva pañcaskandheṣu opratipāditāni 		de dag gi gnyen por bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri gsungs so zhes brjod do /
ji ltar chos kyi phung po brgyad khri 'di phung po lnga po 'di dag nyid du bsdus pa /
tathā 'nye 'pi yathāyogaṃ skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ de bzhin gzhan yang ci rigs par /
phung po skye mched khams rnams ni /
pratipādyā yathokteṣu saṃpradhārya svalakṣaṇam rang gi mtshan nyid legs dpyad de /
ji skad bshad par bsdu par bya /
ye 'pyanye skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ sūtrāntareṣūktāste 'pyeṣveva yathokteṣu skandhādiṣu pratiopādyāḥ svaṃ svaṃ lakṣaṇameṣāṃ yathāvihitamasmiṃacchāstre saṃpradharya /
tatra tāvat pañcānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaskandhānāṃ śīlaskandho rūpaskandhena saṃgṛhītaḥ 		mdo gzhan dag las phung po dang skye mched dang khams gzhan gang dag gsungs pa de dag kyang bstan bcos 'di las /
ji skad bshad pa bzhin de dag gi rang rang gi mtshan nyid legs par dpyad nas phung po la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa 'di dag nyid du bsdu bar bya ste /
de la re zhig tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dag las tshul khrims kyi phung po ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus so /
śeṣāḥ saṃskāraskandhena lhag ma rnams ni 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus so /
daśānāṃ kṛtsnāyatanānāmaṣṭāvalobhasvabhāvatvāddharmāyatanena /
saparivārāṇi tu pañcaskandhasvabhāvatvānmanodharmāyatanābhyām 		zad par gyi skye mched bcu po dag las brgyad ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus so /
'khor rnams dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus te /
tathā 'bhibhvāyatanāni /
ākāśavijñānānantyāyatanakṛtsne catvāri cākāśānantyāyatanādīni catuḥskandhasvabhāvatvāt manodharmāyatanābhyām /
pañca vimuktyāyatanāni prajñāsvabhāvatvāddharmāyatanena 		zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o /
zad par nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni phung po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so /
rnam par grol ba'i skye mched lnga po dag ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus so /
saparivārāṇi tu śabdo manodharmāyatanaiḥ 'khor rnams dang bcas na ni sgra dang yid dang chos kyi skye mched rnams kyis bsdus so /
dvayorāyatanayorasaṃjñisattvā daśabhirāyatanairgandharsāyatanābhāvāt /
naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagā manodharmāyatanābhyām /
evaṃ bahudhātuke 'pi dvāṣaṣṭirdhātavo deśitāḥ /
teṣāṃ yathāyogaṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ 		skye mched gnyis las 'du shes med pa'i sems can ni dri dang ro'i skye mched bcu bzhi po rnams kyis bsdus so /
'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba ni yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so /
de bzhin du khams mang po la las khams drug cu rtsa gnyis bstan pa de dag kyang ci rigs par bsdu par rig par bya'o /
ya ime tatra ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ uktāḥ pṛthivīdhāturabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturityeṣāṃ dvayorlakṣaṇamanuktam der gang dag sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams drug bstan pa la /
de dag las gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ma bshad na /
tat kimākāśamevākāśadhāturveditavyaḥ sarvaṃ aca vijñānaṃ vijñānadhātuḥ de ci nam mkha' nyid nam mkha'i khams yin la /
rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams yin par rig par bya 'am zhe na /
netyāha /
kiṃ tarhi 		smras pa ma yin no /
'o na ci zhe na /
dvāravātāyanamukhanāsikādiṣu /
chidramākāśadhātvākhyam /
chidramityucyamānaṃ kiṃ veditavyam 		sgo dang skar khung dang kha dang sna la sogs pa'i bu ga nam mkha'i khams zhes bya /
bu ga zhes bya ba ci zhig yin par rig par bya /
ālokatamasī kila snang dang mun ba dag yin lo /
nahi chidramālokatamobhyāmanyad gṛhyate bu ga ni snang ba dang mun pa dag las gzhan du gzung du med do /
tasmāt kilākāśadhāturālokatamaḥsvabhāvo rātrindivasvabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
sa eva cāghasāmantakaṃ rūpamityucyate 		de lta bas na nam mkha'i khams ni snang ba dang mun pa'i rang bzhin te /
mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i rang bzhin du yin par rig par bya'o zhes grag go /
de nyid thogs pa'i nye ba'i 'khor gyi gzugs zhes bya ste /
aghaṃ kila cittasthaṃ rūpam /
atyarthaṃ ghātāt /
tasya tatsāmantakamiti /
aghaṃ ca tadanyasya rūpasya tatrāpratighātātsāmantakaṃ cānyasya rūpasyetyapare 		thogs ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu gnod par byar rung ba'i phyir bsags par gnas pa'i gzugs te /
de ni de'i 'khor ro lo /
gzhan dag na re de la gzhan mi thogs pa'i phyir te /
de ni thogs med kyang yin la gzugs gzhan gyi nye 'khor yang yin pas thogs med nye 'khor yin no zhes zer ro /
vijñānadhāturvijñānaṃ sāsravaṃ /
kasmādanāsravaṃ nocyate 		zag pa dang bcas pa'i rnam shes ni /
rnam shes khams yin /
ci'i phyir zag pa med pa la mi bya zhe na /
yasmādime ṣaḍ dhātava iṣṭāḥ 'di ltar khams drug po 'di dag ni /
janmaniśrayāḥ /
ete hi janmanaḥ pratisandhicittādyāvat cyuticittasādhāraṇabhūtāḥ /
anāsravāstu dharmā naivamiti 		skye ba'i rten yin par 'dod de /
de dag nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sems nas 'chi ba'i sems kyi bar du skye ba'i gzhir gyur pa ste /
zag pa med pa'i chos rnams ni de lta ma yin no /
tadevaṃ satyeṣāṃ catvāro dhātavaḥ spraṣṭavyadhātāvantarbhūtāḥ pañcamo rūpadhātau ṣaṣṭhaḥ saptasu vijñānadhātuṣviti de'i phyir de ltar na de dag las khams bzhi ni reg bya'i khams kyi nang du 'dus so /
lnga pa ni gzugs kyi khams kyi nang du 'dus so /
drug pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams bdun po dag tu 'dus so /
ye punarime aṣṭādaśa dhātava uktāsteṣāṃ kati sanidarśanāḥ katyanidarśanāḥ gang dag khams bco brgyad bstan pa de dag las bstan du yod pa rnams ni du /
bstan du med pa rnams ni du zhe na /
sanidarśana eko 'tra rūpaṃ bstan yod 'dir ni gzugs gcig tu /
sa hi śakyate nidarśayitumidamihāmutreti de ni 'di ni 'di na 'o /
che ge mo zhig na'o zhes bstan par nus so /
uktaṃ bhavati anidarśanāḥ śeṣā iti lhag ma rnams ni bstan du med pa'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro /
kati sapratighāḥ katyapratighāḥ thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du /
saparatighā daśa thogs pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na /
rūpiṇaḥ /
ya ete rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītā daśa dhātava uktāste sapratighāḥ 		thogs dang bcas pa gzugs can bcu /
