gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i khams bcu gang dag bshad pa de dag ni thogs pa dang bcas pa yin te /
pratigho nāma pratighātaḥ sa ca trividhaḥ /
āvaraṇaviṣayālambanapratighātaḥ /
tatrāvaraṇapratighātaḥ svadeśe parasyotpattiporativandhaḥ 		thogs pa zhes bya ba ni rdugs pa'o /
de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
sgrib pa dang yul dang dmigs pa la thogs pa'o /
de la sgrib pa la thogs pa ni rang gi yul du gzhan skye ba'i gegs byed pa ste /
yathā hasto haste pratihanyate upale vā dper na lag pa 'am /
rdo ba la lag pa rdugs shig thogs pa'am /
upalo 'pi tayoḥ /
viṣayapratighātaścakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayiṇāṃ rūpādiṣu viṣayeṣu 		rdo ba yang de gnyis la thogs pa lta bu'o /
yul la thogs pa ni mig la sogs pa yul can rnams gzugs la sogs pa yul rnams la thogs pa ste /
yathoktaṃ prajñaptāvasti cakṣurjale pratihanyate na sthale btags pa las ji skad du /
chu la thogs pa la skam lam yin pa'i mig kyang yod de /
yathā matsyānām dper na nya rnams kyi lta bu'o /
asti sthale na jale /
prāyeṇa manuṣyāṇām 		skam thogs la chu la ma yin pa yang yod de /
mi phal che ba'i lta bu'o /
astyubhayatra /
śiśumāramaṇḍūkapiśācakaivarttādīnām /
asti nobhayatra /
etānākārān sthāpayitvā /
asti cakṣuryadrātrau pratihanyate na divā 		gnyi gar thogs pa yang yod de /
chu srin byis pa gsod pa dang sbal pa dang sha za ba dang nya pa la sogs pa rnams kyi lta bu'o /
gnyi gar ma yin pa yang yod de /
rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
mig gang mtshan mo thogs la nyin par ma yin pa yod de /
tadyathā titīlolūkādīnām pha wang dang 'ug pa la sogs pa rnams kyi lta bu'o /
divā na rātrau /
prāyeṇa manuṣyāṇām 		nyin par thogs la mtshan mo ma yin pa ni mi phal che'i lta bu'o /
rātrau divā ca /
śvaśṛgālaturagadvīpimārjārādīnām 		mtshan mo dang nyin par thogs ba ni khyi dang wa dang rta dang gung dang byi la la sogs pa rnams kyi lta bu'o /
nobhayatra /
etānākārān sthāpayitvetyayaṃ viśayapratighātaḥ 		gnyi gar yang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
'di ni yul la thogs pa'o /
ālambanapratighātaścittacaittānāṃ sveṣbālamvaneṣu /
kaḥ punarviṣayālambanayorviśeṣaḥ /
yasmin yasya kāritraṃ sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
yaccittacaittairgṛhyate tadālambanam 		dmigs pa la thogs pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rang gi dmigs pa dag la thogs pa'o /
yul dang dmigs pa dag la bye brag ci yod ce na /
gang la gang zhig byed pa de ni yul yin la /
gang zhig sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyis 'dzin pa de ni dmigs pa yin no /
kaḥ punaḥ svasminviṣaye pravarttamānamālamvane vā pratihanyata ityucyate yang ji ltar na rang gi yul la dmigs pa la 'jug pa la thogs pa zhes bya zhe na /
de las gzhan du mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
tasmāt pareṇāpravṛtteḥ yang na 'di la gtod pa ni thogs pa yin te /
nipāto vā 'tra pratighāto yā svaviṣaye pravṛttiḥ /
tadihāvaraṇapratighātena daśānāṃ sapratighatvaṃ veditavyamanyonyāvaraṇāt 		rang gi yul la 'jug pa gang yin pa'o /
de lta bas na 'dir bcu po dag ni sgrib pa la thogs pas thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid du rig par bya ste /
phan tshun sgrib pa'i phyir ro /
ye dharmā viṣayapratighātena sapratighā āvaraṇapratighātenāpi ta iti catuṣkoṭikaḥ /
prathamā koṭiḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca yaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ /
dvitīyā pañca viṣayāḥ 		chos gang dag yul la thogs pas thogs pa dang bcas pa de dag sgrib pa la thogs pas kyang yin nam zhe na /
mu bzhi ste /
mu dang po ni sems kyi khams bdun dag dang chos kyi khams kyi phyogs mtshungs par ldan pa gang yin pa'o /
gnyis pa ni yul lnga po dag go /
tṛtīyā pañcendriyāṇi gsum pa ni dbang po lnga dag go /
caturthī dharmadhātupradeśaḥ saṃprayuktakavarjyaḥ bzhi pa ni mtshungs par ldan pa ma gtogs pa chos kyi khams kyi phyogs so /
ye dharmā viśayapratighātena sapratighā ālambana pratighātenāpi ta iti gang dag yul la thogs pas thogs pa dang bcas pa de dag nyid dmigs pa la thogs bas kyang yin nam zhe na /
paścātpādakaḥ /
ye tāvadālambanapratighātenāpi viṣayapratighātenāpi te 		tshig phyi ma dang sbyor ba ste /
re zhig dmigs pa la thogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni yul la thogs pas kyang yin no /
syurviṣayapratighatenaiva nālambanapratighātena yul la thogs pas yin la dmigs pa la thogs pas ma yin pa yang yod de dbang po lnga rnams so /
pañcendriyāṇi /
yatrotpitsormanasaḥ pratighataḥ śakyate paraiḥ karttum 		btsun pa gzhon nu lan na re ni gang la yid skye bar 'dod pa la gzhan dag gis thogs par byed nus pa de ni thogs pa dang bcas ba yin par shes par bya la /
tatsapratighaṃ jñeyaṃ viparyayādapratighamiṣṭamiti bzlog pa ni thogs pa med par 'dod do zhes zer ro /
bhadantakumāralātaḥ thogs ba dang bcas pa dag bshad zin to /
uktāḥ sapratighā apratighāśca khams bco brgyad po de dag las dge ba rnams ni du /
eṣāmaṣṭādaśadhātūnāṃ kati kuśalāḥ katyakuśalāḥ katyavyākṛtā /
avyākṛtā aṣṭau /
katame aṣṭau 		yi dge ba rnams ni du /
lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni du zhe na /
lung ma bstan brgyad /
brgyad po dag gang zhe na /
ya ete sapratighā daśoktāḥ /
ta evārūpaśabdakāḥ 		thogs pa dang bcas pa bcu bshad pa gang dag yin pa /
de dag nyid /
pañcendriyāṇi gandharasaspraṣṭavyā dhātavaśca /
ete 'ṣṭau kuśalākuśalabhāvenāvyākaraṇādavyākṛtāḥ 		gzugs sgra ma gtogs dbang po lnga rnams dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams rnams dang brgyad po de dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i ngo bor lung bstan du med pa'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa dag go /
vipākaṃ pratyavyākaraṇādityapare /
evamanāsrave 'pi prasaṅgaḥ 		gzhan dag na re ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir lung bstan du med pa'i phyir zhes zer te /
de ltar na ni zag pa med pa la thal bar 'gyur ro /
tridhā 'nye gzhan rnam gsum /
anye daśa dhātavaḥ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtāḥ gzhan khams bcu po dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa yang yin te /
tatra sapta dhātavo 'lobhādisaṃprayuktā kuśalāḥ de la sems kyi khams bdun ma chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba dag ni dge ba yin no /
lobhādisaṃprayuktā akuśalāḥ /
anye avyākṛtāḥ /
dharmadhāturalobhādisvabhāvasaṃprayuktasamutthaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaśca kuśalaḥ 		chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag ni mi dge ba yin no /
gzhan dag ni lung du ma bstan ba yin no /
chos kyi khams ni ma chags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas bslang ba dang so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni dge ba'o /
lobhādisvabhāvasaṃprayuktasamuttho 'kuśalaḥ chags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs bar ldan pa dang kun nas bslang ba ni mi dge ba'o /
anyo 'vyākṛtaḥ /
rūpaśabdadhātū kuśalākuśalacittasamuṭthau kuśalākuśalau kāyavāgvijñaptisaṃgṛhītau 		gzhan ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
gzugs dang sgra'i khams ni lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis bsdus pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems kyis kun nas bslang ba dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba yin no /
tadanyāvyākṛtau /
uktaḥ kuśalādibhāvaḥ /
eṣāmaṣṭādaśadhātūnāṃ kati kāmadhātvāptāḥ kati rūpadhātvāptāḥ /
kāmadhātvāptāḥ sarve /
āptā aviyuktāḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktā ityarthaḥ 		de las gzhan pa dag ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
dge ba la sogs pa'i dngos po bshad zin to /
khams bco brgyad po de dag las 'dod par gtogs pa rnams ni du /
gzugs dang gzugs med par gtogs pa rnams ni du zhe na /
'dod khams gtogs pa thams cad do /
gtogs pa ni ma bral ba ste /
'dod pa'i khams dang ldan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
rupe caturdaśa /
rūpadhātau caturdaśa dhātavaḥ /
vinā gandharasaghrāṇajihvāvijñānadhātubhiḥ /
tatra hi gandharasau na staḥ 		gzugs kyi khams ni bcu bzhi'o /
gzugs kyi khams na ni khams bcu bzhi ste /
dri dang ro dang sna dang ni /
lce'i rnam par shes khams ma gtogs /
de na dri dang ro dag med /
tayoḥ kavaḍīkārāhāratvāttaddvītarāgāṇāṃ ca tatropapatteḥ de gnyis ni khams kyi zas yin pa'i phyir la /
de dag gi 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyang der skye ba'i phyir ro /
tato ghrāṇajihvāvijñāne api na staḥ /
ālambanābhāvāt 		de lta bas na dmigs pa med pa'i phyir sna dang lce'i rnam par shes pa dag kyang med do /
evaṃ tarhi spraṣṭavyadhātorapi tatrabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
kavaḍīkārāhāratvāt /
yo nāhārasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāsti 		de lta na ni 'o na de ni rig bya'i khams kyang med par thal bar 'gyur te /
khams kyi zas yin pa'i phyir ro /
zas kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa gang yin pa de de na yod do /
gandharasayorapyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ /
nāsti vinā 'bhyavahāreṇa gandharasayoḥ paribhogaḥ /
asti tu spraṣṭavyasyendriyāśrayādhāraprāvaraṇabhāvena /
tasmādabhyavahāravītarāgāṇāṃ gandharasau tatra niṣprayojanau na tu spraṣṭavyam /
anye punarāhuḥ 		dri dang ro dag kyang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro /
reg bya dbang po'i rten dang gzhi dang bgo ba la sogs pa'i dngos por yod du chug kyang zas mid pa med par dri dang ro dag la yongs su longs spyod pa med de /
de lta bas na de na zas mid pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la dri dang ro dag dgos pa med kyi reg bya ni ma yin no /
dhyānasamāpattisaniśrayeṇeha rūpāṇi saṃdṛśyante śabdāśca śrūyante /
prasrabdhisahagatena spraṣṭavya viśeṣeṇa ca kāyo 'nugṛhyate 		gzhan dag na re ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan la brten nas 'dir gzugs rnams kyang mthong zhing sgra rnams kyang thos la shin tu sbyangs pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa'i reg bya'i khyad bar gyis kyang lus la phan 'dogs pas /
ata eṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ dhyānopapattau saṃbhavo na gandharasayoriti /
evaṃ tarhi ghrāṇajihvendriyayorabhāvaprasaṅgo niṣprayojanatvāt /
asti prayojanam /
tābhyāṃ hi vinā’ śrayaśobhaiva na syāditi vyavahārśca /
yadyetat prayojanamadhiṣṭhānamevāstu śobhārthaṃ vacanārthaṃ ca mā bhūdindriyam 		de'i phyir skye ba'i bsam gtan na gsum po de dag srid kyi /
dri dang ro dag ni ma yin no zhes zer ro; /
de lta na ni 'o na sna dang lce'i dbang po dag kyang med par thal bar 'gyur te /
dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro /
dgos pa yod de /
de dag med par ni rten mdzes pa nyid dang mngon bar brjod par yang mi 'gyur ro /
gal te dgos pa der zad na mdzes par bya ba'i don dang tshig gi don du rten kho nas chog gi dbang po ni dgos pa med do /
nānindriyamadhiṣṭhānaṃ saṃbhavati dbang po med pa'i rten ni mi srid de /
puruṣendriyādhiṣṭhānavat /
yuktastadasaṃbhavo niṣprayojanatvāt /
ghrāṇajihvādhiṣṭhānaṃ tu saprayojanam 		pho'i dbang po'i rten bzhin no /
de ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir mi srid par rigs kyi sna dang lce'i dbang po'i rten ni dgos pa dang bcas pa yin pas /
ato 'sya vinā 'pīndriyeṇa yuktaḥ saṃbhavaḥ /
niḥprayojanā 'pīndriyābhinirvṛttirbhavati 		de'i phyir 'di dag ni dbang po med par yang srid par rigs so /
dgos pa med par yang dbang po mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te /
yathā garbhe niyatamṛtyūnām /
syānnāma niḥprayojanā na tu nirhetukā /
kaśca heturindriyotpatteḥ 		dper na mngal du nges par 'chi ba rnams kyi lta bu'o /
dgos pa med pa yin mod kyi rgyu med pa can ni ma yin no /
dbang po skye ba'i rgyu gang zhe na /
indariyasatṛṣṇasya karmaviśeṣaḥ dbang po la sred pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi khyad par ro /
yaśca viṣayādvitṛṣṇaḥ sa niyatamindriyādapīti /
na tadviṣayavītarāgāṇāṃ ghrāṇajihvendriye saṃbhavitumarhataḥ /
puruṣendraiyamapi vā kiṃ na nivarttate 		gang yang yul la sred pa dang bral ba de ni gdon mi za bar dbang po las kyang sred pa dang bral ba yin pas de dag gi yul la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la sna dang lce'i dbang po dag 'byung bar 'os pa ma yin no /
yang na pho'i dbang po yang ci ste 'grub par mi 'gyur /
aśobhākaratvāt /
kośagatavastiguhyānāṃ kiṃ na śobheta /
na ca prayojanavaśādutpattiḥ 		mi mdzes par byed pa'i phyir ro /
mdoms kyi spa ba sbubs su nub pa rnams kyi ci'i phyir mi mdzes par 'gyur /
dgos pa'i dbang gis 'byung ba yang ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
kāraṇavaśādityaśobhākarasyāpi syādeva sati hetāvutpattiḥ rgyu'i dbang gis 'byung bas rgyu yod na mi mdzes par byed bzhin du yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid do /
sūtraṃ tarhi virudhyate /
avikalā ahīnendariyā iti /
yāni tatrendriyāṇi tairavikalā ahīnendriyā iti ko 'tra virodhaḥ 		'o na ni mdo las dbang po rnams mtshang ba med cing med pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal lo zhe na /
de na dbang po gang dag srid pa de dag gis dbang po med pa ma yin bas 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod /
itarathā hi puruśendriyasyāpi syāt prasaṅgaḥ /
evaṃ tuvarṇayanti /
sta eva tatra ghrāṇajivhendriye na tu gandharasau /
ātmabhāvamukhena hi ṣaḍāyatane tṛṣṇāsamudācāro na viṣayamukhena 		de lta ma yin na pho'i dbang po yang yod par thal bar 'gyur ro /
'di skad du lus kyi sgo nas skye mched drug la sred pa kun du spyod kyi yul gyi sgo nas ni ma yin bas de na sna dang lce'i dbang po dag ni yod pa nyid kyi dri dang ro dag ni ma yin no /
puruṣendriye tu maithunasparśamukheneti /
tasmātsiddhametadrūpadhātvāptāścaturdaśa dhātava iti 		pho'i dbang po ni 'khrig pa reg pa'i sgo nas sred pa kun tu spyod pas de lta bas na gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i khams bcu bzhi'o zhes bya ba de grub po zhes brjod do /
ārūpyāptā manodharmamanovijñānadhātavaḥ /
rūpavītarāgāṇāṃ tatropapattirato 'tra daśa rūpasvabhāvā dhātavastadāśrrayālambanāśca pañca vijñānadhātāvo na saṃabhavanti 		gzugs med gtogs pa yid dang ni /
chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes /
khams gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams der skye ste /
de'i phyir de ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi khams bcu dang de dag la rten pa dang dmigs pa rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga yang med do /
kati sāsravāḥ katyanāsravāḥ /
ya ete manodharmamanovijñānadhātava uktāḥ 		zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du /
zag pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na /
yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang dag bshad pa /
sāsravānāsravā ete trayaḥ de gsum zag bcas zag pa med /
ye mārgasatyāsaṃskṛtasaṃghṛhītāste 'nāsravā anye sāsravāḥ gang dag lam gyi bden pa dang 'dus ma byas kyis bsdus pa de dag ni zag pa med pa yin no /
gzhan dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa yin no /
śeṣāstu sāsravāḥ /
pañcadaśa dhātavaḥ śeṣāstvekāntasāsravāḥ 		lhag ma rnams ni zag bcas so /
lhag ma khams bco lnga po de dag ni gcig tu zag pa dang bcas pa yin no /
kati savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ katyavitarkā vicāramātrāḥ katyavitarkā avicārāḥ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du /
rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dag ni du /
rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa rnams ni du zhe na /
savitarkavicārā hi pañca vijñānadhātavaḥ rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa ni /
rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga yin; /
nityamete vitarkavicārābhyāṃ saṃprayuktāḥ 'di dag ni rtag tu rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin te /
avadhāraṇārtho hiśabdaḥ /
antyāstrayastriprakārāḥ /
manodhāturdharmadhāturmanovijñānadhātuścāntyāḥ /
ete trayastriprakārāḥ /
tatra manodhāturmanovijñānadhātuḥ saṃprayuktaśca dharamadhāturanyatra vitarkavicārābhyāṃ kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ 		'di ltar kha phyi rol du bltas pa'i phyir rtsing ba yin no /
ni zhes bya ba ni nges par bzung ba'i don to /
tha ma gsum ni rnam gsum mo /
tha ma dag ni yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te /
gsum po de dag ni rnam pa gsum ste /
de la yid kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag las gzhan ba chos kyi khams mtshungs par ldan pa dag dang 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po na ni rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dag yin no /
dhyānāntare 'vitarkā vicāramātrāḥ bsam gtan khyad par can ni rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam dag yin no /
dvitīyāddhyānāt prabhṛtyābhavāgrādavitarkā avicārāḥ /
sarvaścāsaṃprayukto dharmadhāturdhyānātare aca vicāraḥ /
vitarkastū nityamaviatarko vicāramātro dvitīyavitarkābhāvāt vicārasaṃprayogācca 		bsam gtan gnyis pa nas bzung ste /
srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi dang chos kyi khams mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa thams cad dang bsam gtan khyad par can gyi dpyod pa ni rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa dag yin no /
rtog pa ni rtog pa gnyis pa med pa'i phyir dang dpyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir rtag tu rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam yin no /
kāmadhātau prathame dhyāne vicāra eṣu triprakāreṣu nāntarbhavati /
sa kathaṃ vaktavyaḥ /
avicāro vitarkamātaraḥ /
dvitīyavicārābhāvāt vitarkasaṃprayogācca /
ata evocyate syuḥ savitarkasavicārāyāṃ bhūmau dharmāścatuḥprakārāḥ 		'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i dpyod pa rnam pa gsum po 'di dag gi nang du mi 'dun de ji skad du brjod par bya zhe na /
dpyod pa gnyis pa med pa'i phyir dang rtog pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dpyod pa med cing rtog pa tsam yin no /
de nyid kyi phyir rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa na chos rnam pa bzhi yod de /
savitarkāḥ savicārā vicāravitarkavarjyāḥ saṃprayuktāḥ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dag ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa ma rtogs pa mtshungs par ldan pa rnams so /
avitarko vicāramātro vitarkaḥ rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam dag ni rtog pa'o /
avitarkā avicārā asaṃprayuktāḥ /
avicāro vitarkamātro vicāra iti 		rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dag ni mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa rnams so /
dpyod pa med cing rtog pa tsam ni dpyod pa'o zhes bya'o /
śeṣā ubhayavarjitāḥ lhag ma rnams ni gnyi ga spangs /
daśa rupiṇo dhātavaḥ śeṣā nityamavitarkā avicārā asaṃprayogitvāt /
yadi pañca vijñānakāyāḥ savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ kathamavikalpakā ityucyante 		lhag ma rnams ni gzugs can gyi khams bcu po dag ste /
de dag ni mtshungs par ldan ba ma yin pa'i phyir rtag tu rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dag yin no /
gal te rnam par shes pa'i tshogs ba lnga po rnams rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa dag yin na /
ji ltar na rnam par rtog pa med pa dag ces bya zhe na /
nirūpaṇānusmaraṇavikalpenāvikalpakāḥ nges par rtog dang rjes dran pa'i /
rnam par rtog pa rnams mi rtog /
trividhaḥ kila vikalpaḥ rnam par rtog pa ni rnam pa gsum mo zhes grag ste /
svabhāvābhinirūpaṇānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ ngo bo nyid dang nges par rtog pa dang rjes su dran ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
tadeṣāṃ svabhāvavikalpo 'sti /
netarau /
tasmādavikalpakā ityucyante 		de bas na de dag la ngo bo nyid kyi rtog pa yod kyi gzhan dag yin te /
de lta bas na rnam par rtog pa med pa dag ces bya ste /
yathā ekapādako 'śvo 'pādaka iti dper na rta rkang gcig pa la rkang med ces bya ba bzhin no /
tatra svabhāvavikalpo vitarkaḥ de la ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa ni rtog pa yin te /
sa caitteṣu paścānnirdekṣyate de ni 'og nas sems las byung ba dag gi nang nas ston to /
itarau punaḥ kiṃsvabhāvau gzhan dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
yathākramaṃ /
tau prajñā mānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī /
manovijñānasaṃprayuktā prajñā mānasītyucyate 		rim bzhin du /
de dag yid kyi shes rab g yeng; /
yid kyi dran pa thams cad nyid /
yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab ni yid kyi zhes bya'o /
asamāhitā vyagretyucyate /
sā hyabhinirūpaṇāvikalpaḥ /
mānasyeva sarvā smṛtiḥ samāhitā cāsamāhitā cānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ 		mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa ni g yeng ba zhes bya ste /
de ni nges par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o /
yid kyi dran pa nyid mnyam par gzhag pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa thams cad ni rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
kati sālambanāḥ katyanālambanāḥ /
sapta sālambanāścittadhātavaḥ /
cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātavo manodhātuśca ete sapta cittadhātavaḥ sālambanā viṣayagrahaṇāt 		dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du /
dmigs pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na /
dmigs bcas sems kyi khams bdun no /
mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams dang yid kyi khams te /
sems kyi khams bdun po de dag ni yul 'dzin pa'i phyir dmigs pa dang bcas pa dag go /
ardhaṃ ca dharmataḥ chos kyi skye mched kyang /
sālambanaṃ yaccaitasikasvabhāvam /
śeṣā daśa rūpiṇo dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaścāsaṃprayuktako 'nālambanā it isiddham /
katyupāttāḥ katyanupāttāḥ /
navānupāttāḥ /
katame nava 		dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin te /
sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o /
lhag ma gzugs can gyi khams bcu po dag dang chos kyi khams kyi phyogs ldan pa ma yin pa ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya bar grub bo /
zin pa rnams ni du /
ma zin pa rnams ni du zhe na /
ma zin dgu /
dgu gang zhe na /
ye sapta sālambanā uktāḥ aṣṭamaṣyārdhena sārdham /
te cāṣṭau śabdaśca 		dmigs pa dang bcas pa bdun brgyad pa'i phyed dang bcas te bshad pa gang dag yin pa /
brgyad po de dag rnams dang sgra /
ime te navānupāttāḥ /
sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuḥ śabdadhātuśca 		de ltar na sems kyi khams bdun dang chos kyi khams dang sgra'i khams dang khams dgu po de dag ni ma zin pa yin no /
anye nava dvidhā /
upāttā anupāttāśca /
tatra cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyāḥ pratyutpannā upāttāḥ 		dgu po gzhan na rnam pa gnyis /
zin pa dag kyang yin /
ma zin pa dag kyang yin te /
de la mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang da ltar byung ba rnams ni zin pa yin no /
atītānāgatā anupāttāḥ /
rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyadhātavaḥ pratyutpannā indriyāvinirbhāgiṇa upāttāḥ 		'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rnams ni ma zin pa yin no /
gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams da ltar byung ba dbang po dang tha mi dad pa rnams ni zin pa yin no /
gzhan dag ni ma zin pa rnams te /
anye 'nupāttāstadyathā mūlavarjeṣu keśaromanakhadanteṣu viṇmūtrakheṭasiṃghāṇakaśeṇitādiṣu bhūmyudakādiṣu ca 'di lta ste rtsa ba ma gtogs pa'i skra dang ba spu dang sen mo dang so dag la yod pa dang phyis dang gcin dang mchil ma dang; snabs dang khrag la sogs pa dag la yod pa dang sa dang chu la sogs pa dag la yod pa lta bu'o /
upāttamiti ko 'rthaḥ zin pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
yaccittacaittairadhiṣṭhānabhāvenopiagṛhītamanugrahopaghātābhyāmanyonyānuvidhānāt phan pa dang gnod pa dag gis phan tshun mthun par byed pa'i phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyis rten gyi dngos por nye bar gzung ba ste /
yalloke sacetanamityucyate /
kati dhātavo bhūtasvabhāvāḥ kati bhautikāḥ /
spraṣṭavyaṃ dvividhaṃ 		'jig rten gyi na sems pa dang bcas pa zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'o /
khams nga dag gcig ni 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid yin /
du dag gcig ni 'byung ba las gyur pa yin zhe na /
reg bya rnam pa gnyis yin te /
bhūtāni bhautikaṃ ca 'byung ba dag dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'o /
tatra bhūtāni catvāri de la 'byung ba dag ni bzhi'o /
bhautikaṃ ślakṣṇatvādi saptavidham 'byung ba las gyur pa ni 'jam pa nyid la sogs pa rnam pa bdun te /
bhūteṣu bhavatvāt 'byung ba dag la yod pa'i phyir ro /
śeṣā rūpiṇo nava bhautikāḥ lhag ma gzugs can dgu po ni /
pañcendriyadhātavaśca catvāro viṣayāḥ 'byung gyur /
dbang po lnga'i khams dag dang yul bzhi ste /
ete nava dhātavo bhautikā eva /
dharmadhātvekadeśaśca 		khams dgu po de rnams ni 'byung ba las gyur pa dag kho na'o /
chos khams phyogs gcig kyang /
'byung ba las gyur pa ste /
avijñaptisaṃjñako bhautikaḥ /
śeṣāḥ cittadhātavo dharmadhātuścāvijñaptivarjyo nobhayathā 		rnam par rig byed ma yin ba zhes bya'o /
lhag ma sems kyi khams bdun dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs pa chos kyi khams ni gnyis ga ma yin pa'o /
bhūtamātraṃ daśāyatanānīti bhadantbduddhadevaḥ btsun pa sangs rgyas lha na re ni skye mched bcu po dag ni 'byung ba tsam mo zhes zer ro /
tacca naivaṃ bhūtānāṃ catuṣṭva khakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt sūtre de ni de lta ma yin te /
mdo las 'byung ba rnams ni bzhi nyid dang sra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du nges par gzung ba'i phyir la /
teṣāṃ spraṣṭavyatvāt /
na hi kāṭhinyādīni cakṣurādibhirgṛhyante nāpi varṇādayaḥ kāyendriyeṇa 		de dag kyang reg bya yin pa'i phyir ro /
mig la sogs pas kyang sra ba la sogs pa mi 'dzin la /
lus kyi dbang pos kyang kha dog la sogs pa ma yin no /
uktaṃ ca sūtre cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādo arupyanidarśanaṃ saprataighaṃ evaṃ yāvat kāyaḥ mdo las kyang dge slong mig ni nang gi skye mched yin te /
'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs dang ba gzugs can bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa ste lus kyi bar du yang de bzhin no /
rūpāṇi bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāyarupi sanidarśanaṃ sapratigham dge slong gzugs rnams ni phyi'i skye mched yin te /
'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs can bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no /
śabdo bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rupyanidarśanaṃ sapratigham dge slong sgra ni phyi'i skye mched yin te /
'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs can bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa ste /
evaṃ gandharasāḥ dri dang ro yang de bzhin no /
spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpyanidarśanaṃ sapratighamiti dge slong reg bya rnams ni phyi'i skye mched yin te /
'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs can bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'o zhes gsungs te /
spraṣṭrvyāyatanikadeśenaiva bhūtānāṃ saṃgrahāccheṣaṃ na bhūtānīti spaṣṭamādarśitam reg bya'i skye mched kyi phyogs gcig kho nas 'byung ba rnams bsdus pa'i phyir lhag ma rnams ni 'byung ba dag ma yin no zhes bya bar gsal bar kun du bstan pa yin no /
yattarhi sūtre uktaṃ yaccakṣuṣi maṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatamiti 'o na mdo las /
gang mig gi sha'i gong bu la sra ba mkhrang bar gyur pa gang yin pa zhes gsungs so /
tenāvinirbhadivarttino maṃsapiṇḍsyaiṣa upadeśaḥ de dang tha mi dad par 'jug pa'i sha'i gong bu la de skad du bstan par zad do /
mngal du 'jug pa las /
ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ bhikṣo puruṣaiti garbhavakrāntau maulasattvadravyasaṃdarśanārtham dge song 'di ni khams drug pa yin no zhes gsungs so /
sems can gyi rdzas kyi gzhi bstan pa'i phyir te /
punaḥ ṣaṭsparśyatanavacanāccaittābhāvaprasaṅgācca /
na ca yuktaṃ cittameva caittā ityabhyupetum /
saṃjñā ca vedanā ca caitasika eṣa dharmaścittānvayāccittaniśrita’ iti sūtre vacanātsarāgacittādi vacanācca 		yang reg pa'i skye mched drug ces gsungs pa'i phyir dang sems las byung ba rnams med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
sems nyid sems las byung ba rnams yin no zhes bya bar khas blangs par rigs pa yang ma yin te /
mdo las; 'du shes dang sems pa'i chos 'di ni sems las byung ba sems la brten pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
tasmācyathoktaṃ dhātūnaṃ bhūtabhautikatvam /
kati saṃcitāḥ katyasaṃcitāḥ /
saṃcitā daśa rūpiṇaḥ /
pañcendriyadhātavaḥ pañca viṣayāḥ saṃcitāḥ /
paramāṇusaṃghātatvāt śeṣā na saṃcitā iti siddhaṃ bhavati 		de lta bas na khams rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin yin no /
bsags pa rnams ni du /
bsags pa ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na /
gzugs can bcu ni bsags pa'o /
dbang po'i khams lnga dang yul lnga dag ni rdul phra rab 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir bsags pa dag go /
aṣṭādaśānaṃ dhātūnāṃ kaśchīnatti kaśiciādyate ko dahati ko dahyate kastulayati kastulyate khams bco brgyad po dag las gcod par byed pa ni gang gcad par bya ba ni gang /
sreg par byed pa ni gang /
bsreg par bya ba ni gang /
'jal bar byed pa ni gang /
gzhal bar bya ba ni gang zhe na /
chinatti cchidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātue catuṣṭayam gcod byed gcad par bya ba nyid /
phyi rol gyi ni khams bzhi yin /
rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyaṃ paraśudārvādisaṃjñakam gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya zhes bya ba ste /
dgra sta dang shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
chedo nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhe na /
saṃbandhotpādinaḥ saṃghātasrotaso vibhaktotpādanam 'dus pa'i rgyun 'brel bar 'byung ba can rnam par 'byed pa skyed pa'o /
na kāyendriyādīni cchidyante lus kyi dbang po la sogs pa ni gcad par bya ba ma yin te /
niravaśeṣāṅgacchede tadadvaidhīkaraṇāt yan lag ma lus par bcad na de dag la gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro /
na hīndriyāṇi dvidhā bhavanti dbang po rnams la ni gnyis su 'gyur ba med de /
chinnasyāṅgasya nirindriyatvāt /
na cāpi cchindanti 		gcad pa'i yan lag la dbang po med pa'i phyir ro /
gcod par byed pa yang ma yin te /
maṇiprabhāvadandhatvāt nor bu'i 'od bzhin du dang ba'i phyir ro /
yathā cchinattī cchiyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayam ji ltar gcod byed gcad par bya ba nyid phyi rol gyi khams bzhi yin ba ltar de bzhin bsreg bya 'jal bar byed pa'o /
dahyate tulayatyevaṃ /
tadeva dahyate tadeva tulayati 		de dag nyid bsreg par bya ba yin la /
de dag nyid 'jal bar byed pa yin no /
nendriyāṇyacchatvānmaṇiprabhāvat /
na śabda ucheditvāt 		dbang pa rnams ni ma yin te /
dang ba'i phyir 'od bzhin no /
sgra yang ma yin te /
vivādo dagdhṛtulyayoḥ /
kecidāhuḥ tadeva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ dāhakaṃ tulyaṃ ca 		chad pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
sreg dang gzhal la mi mthun smra /
kha cig na re ni khams bzhi po de dag nyid sreg par byed pa yang yin la /
kecidāhustejodhātureva dagdhā gurutvameva ca tulyamiti /
kati vipākajāḥ dhātavaḥ katyaupacayikāḥ kati naihṣyandikāḥ kati dravayuktāḥ kati kṣaṇikāḥ /
āha /
vipākajaupacayikāḥ pañcādhyātmaṃ /
adhyātmaṃ tāvat pañca dhātavaḥ cakṣurādayo vipākajāścaupacayikāśca 		gzhal bar bya ba 'ang yin no zhes brjod do /
kha cig na re ni me'i khams kho na sreg par byed pa yin la /
lci ba nyid kho na gzhal bar bya ba yin no zhes brjod do /
rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i khams rnams ni du; rgyas pa las byung ba rnams ni du /
rgyu mthun pa las byung ba rnams ni du /
rdzas dang ldan pa rnams ni du /
skad cig pa rnams ni du zhe na /
smras pa /
rnam par smin las skyes pa dang /
rgyas las byung ba nang gi lnga /
re zhig mig la sogs pa nang gi khams lnga po dag ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yang yin la; rgyas pa las byung ba yang yin no /
naiḥṣyandikā na santi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba ni med de /
tadvyatiriktaniṣyandābhāvāt de dag las ma gtogs pa rgyu mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro /
tatra vipākahetorjātāḥ vipākajāḥ /
madhyapadalopāt gorathavat /
phalakālaprāptaṃ vā karma vipāka ityucyate 		de la rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las skyas pa ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ste /
bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ba lang gi shing rta zhes bya ba lta bu'o /
yang na 'bras bu'i dus su phyin pa'i las ni rnam par smin pa zhes bya ste /
vipacyata iti kṛtvā rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
tasmājjātā vipākajāḥ /
phalaṃ tu vipaktireveti vipākaḥ 		de las skyes pa ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa rnams so /
'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa kho na yin pas rnam par smin pa'o /
bhavatu phalahetau phalopacāro yathā phale hetūpacāraḥ /
ṣaḍimāni sparśāyatanāni paurāṇaṃ karma veditavyamiti 		yang na rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa yin te /
dper na 'bras bu la rgyu btags pa reg pa'i skye mched drug po 'di dag ni sngon gyi las yin par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs ba lta bu'o /
āhārasaṃskārasvapnasamādhiviśeṣairupacitā aupacayikāḥ /
brahṃacaryeṇa cetyeke /
anupaghātamātraṃ tu tena syānnopacayaḥ /
vipākasantānasyopacayasantānaḥ pratiprākāra ivārakṣā /
śabda aupacayiko naiḥṣyandikaścāsti 		zas dang legs par bya ba dang gnyid log pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dag gis rgyas par byas pa rnams ni rgyas pa las byung ba dag go /
gzhan dag na re ni tshangs par spyod pas kyang rgyas par byed do zhes zer te /
des ni mi gnod pa tsam du zad kyi rgyas pa ni ma yin no /
rgyas pa'i rgyud ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyud la phyir bzhin du kun tu bsrung ngo /
sgra ni rgyas pa las byung ba dang rgyu mthun pa las byung ba yod kyi /
vipākajaḥ /
na śabdaḥ 		sgra ni rnam smin las skyes min /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
īhātaḥ pravṛtteḥ 'dod dgur 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
yattarhi prajñaptiśāstre uktaṃ pāruṣyavirateḥ subhāvitatvād brahmasvaratā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvartta iti /
tṛtīyā 'sau paraṃparetyeke /
karmabhyo hi bhūtāni bhūtebhyaḥ śabdaḥ iti 		'o na gang bstan bcos btags pa las /
tshig rtsub po spong ba shin tu bsgom pa'i phyir skyes bu chen po'i mtshan tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid 'grub po zhes gsungs so /
kha cig na re ni brgyud pa 'di ni gsum pa yin te /
las dag las ni 'byung ba rnams 'grub /
'byung ba rnams las ni sgra 'grub bo zhes zer ro; /
pañcamyasau paraṃparetyapare /
karmabhyo hi vipākajāni mahābhūtāni tebhyaścaupacayikāni tebhyo naiḥṣyandikāni tebhyaḥ śabda iti /
evam tarhi śāhī hikyapi vedanā karmajabhūtasaṃbhūtatvānna vipākaḥ prapnoti 		kha cig na re brgyud pa 'di ni lnga pa yin te /
las dag las na rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'byung ba rnams 'grub /
de dag las ni rgyas pa las byung ba rnams 'grub /
de dag las ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba rnams 'grub bo /
de dag las ni sgra 'grub po zhes zer ro /
de lta na 'o na ni lus kyi tshor ba yang las las skyes pa'i 'byung ba las byung ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa ma yin par 'gyur ro /
yadi śabdavad yuktivirodhaḥ syāt /
apratighā aṣṭau naiḥṣyandikavipoākajāḥ /
katame 'ṣṭau 		gal te sgra bzhin du rigs pa dang 'gal bar gyur na rnam par smin pa ma yin par 'gyur ro /
rgyu mthun las byung rnam smin skyes /
thogs pa med pa brgyad /
brgyad gang zhe na /
sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuśca /
naiḥṣyandikāḥ sabhāgasarvatragahetujanitāḥ 		sems kyi khams bdun dag dang chos kyi khams te skal pa mnyam ba dang kun du 'gro ba'i rgyus bskyed pa rnams ni rgyu mthun ba las byung ba dag go /
vipākajā vipākahetujanitāḥ /
aupacayikā na santyapratighānāṃ sañābhāvāt /
tridhā 'nye /
anye catvāraḥ śeṣā rūparasagandhaspraṣṭavyadhātavaḥ 		rnam par smin pa'i rgyus bskyed pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag go /
rgyas pa las byung ba ni med de /
thogs pa med pa rnams la rgyas pa med pa'i phyir ro; /
gzhan rnam gsum /
gzhan ni lhag ma bzhi po gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams dag ste /
te vipākajā apyaupacayikā api naiḥṣyandrikā api /
dravyavānekaḥ /
asaṃskṛtaṃ hi sāratvād dravyam /
tacca dharmadhātāvastyato dharmadhātureko dravyayuktaḥ 		de dag ni rnam par smin pa las skyes ba dag kyang yin /
rgyas pa las byung ba dag kyang yin /
rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dag kyang yin no /
rdzas dang lhan cig /
'dus ma byas ni brtan pa'i phyir rdzas so /
de yang chos kyi khams la yod pas de'i phyir chos kyi khams gcig pu rdzas dang ldan pa yin no /
kṣaṇikāḥ paścimāstrayaḥ tha ma gsum skad cig ma ste /
manodhāturdharmadhāturmanovijñānadhātuśca pāṭhakrameṇa paścimāḥ yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni 'don pa'i rim pas tha ma dag yin te /
te prathamānāsrave duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikalāpe kṣaṇamekamanaiḥṣyandikā bhavantyataḥ kṣaṇikā ityucyante de dag ni zag pa med pa'i bzod pa'i dang po sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs la skad cig ma gcig rgyu mthun pa las byung ba ma yin par 'gyur te /
de'i phyir skad cig ma rnams zhes bya'o /
anyasaṃbhūtasaṃskṛto nāsti kaścidanaiḥṣyandikaḥ /
tatra duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntisaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ manodhāturmanovijñānadhātuśca 		'dus byas gzhan ni rgyu mthun ba las ma byung ba 'ga' yang med do /
de la sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni yid kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no /
śeṣāstatsahabhuvo dharmadhātuḥ /
idaṃ vicāryate /
yaścakṣurdhātunā 'samanvāgataḥ samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate cakṣurvijñānadhātunā 'pi saḥ 		lhag ma de dang lhan cig 'byung ba rnams ni chos kyi khams so /
'di dpyad par bya ste /
gang gis mig gi khams dang mi ldan pa las ldan pa 'thob pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang yin nam /
yo vā cakṣurvijñānadhātunā cakṣurdhātunā 'pi saḥ gang mig gi rnam par shes pa dang yin pa de mig gi khams dang yang yin nam zhe na /
smras pa /
āha /
cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca 		mig dang ni /
rnam shes khams dag so so dang /
lhan cig tu yang 'thob pa yod /
pṛthak tāvat syāccakṣurdhātunā na cakṣurvijñānadhātunā /
kāmadhātau krameṇa cakṣurindriyaṃ pratilabhamānaḥ /
ārupyadhātucyutaśca dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣūpapadyamānaḥ /
syāccakṣurvijñānadhātunā na cakṣurdhātunā /
dvitīyādidhyānopapannaścakṣurvijñāna saṃmukhīkurvāṇastatpracyutaścādhastādupapadyamānaḥ /
sahāpi syādubhayena samanvāgamaṃ pratilabhate 		re zhig so so ni mig gi khams dang yin la /
mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang ma yin pa yang yod de /
'dod pa'i khams na rim gyis mig gi dbang po 'thob pa dang gzugs med pa nas shi 'phos nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skye ba na'o /
mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yin la mig gi khams dang ma yin pa yang yod de /
bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon du byed pa dang de dag nas shi 'phos nas 'og mar skye ba na'o /
lhan cig tu yang ni gnyi ga dang ldan pa yang yod de /
ārūpyadhātucyutaḥ kāmadhātau brahmaloke copapadyamānaḥ gzugs med pa'i khams nas shi 'phos nas 'dod pa'i khams dang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba na'o /
nobhayena /
etānākārān sthāpayitvā /
yaścakṣurdhātunā samanvāgataścakṣurvijñānadhātunā 'pi saḥ /
catuṣkoṭikaḥ 		gnyi ga dang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
gang mig gi khams dang ldan pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yang yin nam zhe na /
mu bzhi ste /
prathamā koṭirdvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣūpapannaścakṣurvijñānāsaṃmukhīkurvāṇaḥ /
dvitīyā kāmadhātāvalabdhavihīna cakṣuḥ /
tṛtīyā kāmadhātau labdhāvihīnacakṣuḥ prathamadhyānopapanno dvitīyādidhyānopapannaśca paśyan 		mu dang po ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon du mi byed pa na'o /
gnyis pa ni 'dod pa'i khams na mig ma thob ba dang nyams pa'o /
gsum pa ni 'dod pa'i khams na mig gi thob pa dang ma nyams pa dang bsam gtan dang por skyes pa dang bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa lta bu'o /
catuṛthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā /
evaṃ cakṣurdhāturūpadhātvoścakṣurvijñānarūpadhātvośca pratilambhasamanvāgamau yathāyogamabhyūhitavyau /
etasya prasaṅgasya samuccayārthaścaśabdaḥ sahāpi ca iti 		bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
de bzhin du mig gi khams dang gzugs dag dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang gzugs dag 'thob pa dang ldan ba dag kyang ci rigs par brtag par bya'o /
lhan cig tu yang zhes bya ba'i yang gi sgra ni zhar la 'ongs pa 'di bsdu ba'i don to /
katyādhyātmikā dhātavaḥ kati bāhyāḥ /
dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ /
katame dvādaśa 		khams du dag gcig ni nang gi yin /
du dag gcig ni phyi'i yin zhe na /
nang gi bcu gnyis /
bcu gnyis gang dag ce na /
hitvā rūpādan /
ṣaḍ vijñānāni ṣaḍāśrayā ityete dvādaśa dhātava ādhyātmakāḥ /
rūpādayastu ṣaḍ viṣayadhātavo bāhyāḥ 		gzugs la sogs pa ma gtogs rnam par shes pa drug dang rten drug ste /
khams bcu gnyis po de dag ni nang gi yin no /
gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi khams drug po de dag ni phyi'i yin no /
ātmanyasati kathamādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā /
ahaṅkārasanniśrayatvāccittamātmetyupacaryate 		bdag med na ji ltar na nang gi 'am /
phyi'i yin zhe na /
sems ni ngar 'dzin pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir bdag ces nye bar 'dogs te /
ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ mkhas pas bdag nyid shin tu ni; /
dul bas mtho ris thob par 'gyur /
ityuktam zhes gsungs la /
cittasya cānyatra damanamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham iti 		bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan las /
sems dul ba ni legs pa ste /
sems dul bas ni bde ba 'dren /
ata ātmabhūtasya cittasyāśrayabhāvena pratyāsannatvāt /
cakṣurādīnāmādhyātmikatvaṃ rūpādīnāṃ viṣayabhāvād bāhyatvam 		zhes sems dul ba yan par gsungs pas de'i phyir mig la sogs pa ni sems bdag tu gyur pa'i rten gyi dngos por nye bar gyur pa'i phyir nang gi nyid yin no /
gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni yul du gyur pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi nyid yin no /
evam tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti /
na hyete manodhātutvamaprāptāścittasyāśrayībhavanti 		de lta na /
'o na ni rnam par shes pa'i khams drug po dag nang gi yin par mi 'gyur te /
de dag yid kyi khams nyid du ma gyur pa ni sems kyi rten du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātibarttante gang gi tshe yin pa de'i tshe na yang de dag nyid de dag yin te mtshan nyid las ni mi 'da'o /
anyathā hi manodhāturatīta eva syānnānāgatapratyutpannaḥ /
iṣyante cāṣṭādaśa dhātavastraiyadhvikāḥ /
yadi cānāgatapratyutpannasya vijñānasya manodhātulakṣaṇaṃ na syāt atīte 'pyadhvani manodhāturna vyavasthāpyeta /
nahi lakṣaṇasyādhvasu vyabhicāro 'stīti 		de lta ma yin na yid kyi khams 'das pa kho na yin par 'gyur gyi ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba yin par ni mi 'gyur ba zhig na khams bco brgyad po dag ni dus gsum pa yin par yang 'dod do /
gal te yang rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba yid kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid ma yin par gyur na 'das pa'i dus na yang yid kyi khams su rnam par gzhag par mi 'gyur te /
mtshan nyid ni dus rnams su 'khrul pa med do /
kati dhātavaḥ sabhāgāḥ kati tatsabhāgāḥ /
ekāntena tāvat /
dharmasaṃjñakaḥ 		brten pa dang bcas pa'i khams rnams ni du /
de dang mtshungs pa rnams ni du zhe na /
re zhig gcig tu /
chos zhes bya ba ni /
sabhāgaḥ /
yo hi viṣayo yasya vijñānasya niyato yadi tatra tadvijñānamutpantaṃ bhavatyutpattidharmi vā evaṃ sa viṣayaḥ sabhāga ityucyate /
na ca so 'sti kaściddharmadhāturyatra nānantaṃ manovijñānamutpannamutpatsyate vā /
tathā hi sarvāryapudgalānāmidaṃ cittamavaśyamutpadyate sarvadharmā anātmāna iti 		brten pa dang bcas /
gang zhig rnam par shes pa gang gi yul du nges la gal te de la rnam par shes pa de skyes pa 'am skyes pa'i chos can gyi yul de ni brten pa dang bcas pa zhes bya la /
gang la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa ma skyes pa'am skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khams gang yin pa de ni 'ga' yang med de /
'di ltar 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad ni gdon mi za bar chos thams cad la bdag med do snyam pa'i sems 'di skye'o /
tasya ca svabhāvasahabhūnirmuktāḥ sarvadharmā ālambanam /
sa punaścittakṣaṇo 'nyasya cittakṣaṇasyālambanamiti dvayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ sarvadharmā hyālambanaṃ bhavanti 		de'i dmigs pa yang rang gi ngo bo dang lhan cig 'byung ba ma gtogs pa chos thams cad yin no /
sems kyi skad cig ma de yang sems kyi skad cig ma gzhan gyi dmigs pa ma yin pas skad cig ma gnyis kyi dmigs par ni chos thams cad 'gyur te /
tasmād dharmadhātuarnityaṃ sabhāgaḥ /
tatsabhāgāśca śeṣāḥ 		de lta bas na chos kyi khams ni rtag tu brten pa dang bcas pa yin no /
lhag ma ni /
de dang mtshungs pa dag kyang yin /
sabhāgaśceti caśabdaḥ /
ko 'yaṃ tatsabhāgo nāma /
yo na svakarmakṛt /
uktaṃ bhavati yaḥ svakarmakṛt sa sabhāga iti /
tatra yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇyapaśyat paśyati drakṣyati vā taducyate sabhāgaṃ acakṣuḥ /
evaṃ yāvanmanaḥ svena viṣayakāritreṇa vaktavyam 		kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni brten pa dang bcas pa dag kyang yin pa'o /
de dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na /
gang zhig rang gi las mi byed /
gang rang gi las byed pa de ni brten pa dang bcas pa'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro /
de la mig gang gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang lta ba 'am lta bar 'gyur ba'i mig de ni brten pa dang bcas zhes bya ste /
de bzhin du yid kyi bar la yang rang rang gi yul la byed pas brjod par bya'o /
tatsabhāgaṃ cakṣuḥ kāśmīrāṇāṃ caturvidham kha che ba rnams kyi ltar na de dang mtshungs pa'i mig ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
yad dṛṣṭvā rūpāṇi niaruddhaṃ nirudhyate nirotsyate vā yaccānutpattidharmi /
pāścāttyānāṃ punaḥ pañcavidham /
tadevānutpattidharmi dvidhā kṛtvā vijñānasamāyuktaṃ cāsamāyusktaṃ ca /
evaṃ yāvat kāyo veditavyaḥ /
manastvanutpattidharmakameva tatsabhāgam 		gzugs rnams ma mthong bar 'gags pa dang 'gag pa dang 'gag par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang mi skye ba'i chos gang yin ba'o /
nub phyogs pa rnams kyi ltar na rnam pa lnga ste; mi skye ba'i chos de nyid rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang rnam pa gnyis su phye ba'i phyir te /
lus kyi bar du yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
yid ni mi skye ba'i chos kho na de 'dra ba yin no /
rūpāṇi ca yāni cakṣuṣā 'paśāyat paśyati drakṣyati vā tāni sabhāgāni gzugs gang dag mig gis mthong bar gyur pa dang mthong ba dang mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag ni brten pa dang bcas pa rnams so /
tatsabhāgāni caturvidhāni de dang 'dra ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
yānyadṛṣṭānyeva niruddhāni nirudhyante nirutsyante vā yāni cānutpattidharmīṇi gang dag ma mthong ba nyid du 'gags pa dang 'gag pa dang 'gag par 'gyur ba dang gang dag mi skye ba'i chos rnams te /
evaṃ yāvat spraṣṭavyāni /
svendriyakāritreṇa sabhāgatatsabhāgāni veditavyāni 		de bzhin du reg bya'i bar dag la yang rang gi dbang po'i byed pas de dang 'dra ba dag tu rig par bya'o; /
yadekasya cakṣuḥ sabhāgaṃ tatsarveṣām gcig gi mig brten pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad kyi yin no /
evaṃ tatsabhāgamapi /
tatha yāvanmanaḥ 		de dang mtshungs pa rnams kyang de bzhin te /
yid kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o /
rūpaṃ tu yaḥ paśyati tasya sabhāgaṃ yo na paśyati tasya tatsabhāgam gzugs ni gang zhig lta ba de'i brten pa dang bcas pa yin la gang mi lta ba de'i ni de dang mtshungs pa yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
asti hi saṃbhavo yadrūpamekaḥ paśyati taddhavo 'pi paśyeyuryathā candranaṭmallaprekṣāsu /
natu saṃbhavo 'sti yadekena cakṣuṣā dvau paśyetām /
ato 'syāsādhāraṇatvādekasantānavaśena vyavasthānam 		gzugs gang la gcig lta ba de la mang po yang lta bar 'gyur ba srid pa yod de /
dper na zla ba dang bro gar dang gyad dag la lta ba lta bu'o /
gang gnyis mig gcig gis lta bar 'gyur ba srid pa ni med de /
de'i phyir 'di thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rgyud gcig gi dbang gis rnam par gzhag go /
rūpasya tu sādhāraṇatvāt anekasantānavaśena /
yathā raupamevaṃ śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadhātavo veditavyāḥ /
bhavatu śabda evam /
gandhādayastu ya ekena gṛhyante na te 'nyena prāptagṛhaṇādityasādhāraṇatvādeṣāṃ cakṣurādivadatideśo nyāyyaḥ /
astyetadevamapi tveśāmapi saṃbhavaṃ prati sādhāraṇatvam /
asti hyeṣa saṃbhavo ya eva gandhādaya ekasya ghrāṇādivijñānamutpādayeyusta evānyeṣāmapi /
na tvevaṃ cakṣurādayaḥ /
tasmāndeṣāṃ rūpādivadatideśaḥ 		gzugs ni thun mong yin pa'i phyir rgyud ma'i dbang gis rnam par gzhag go /
gzugs ji lta ba de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams dag la yang rig par bya'o /
sgra ni de lta yin du chug na dri la sogs pa ni gang dag gcig gis 'dzin pa de dag gzhan gyis mi 'dzin te /
phrad nas 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
de lta bas na de dag kyang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa bzhin du bsgre ba'i rigs so zhe na /
de lta bu yod mod kyi 'on kyang de dag la yang srid pa'i phyir thun mong ba nyid de /
gcig gis sna la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa bskyed par 'gyur ba'i dri la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag nyid gzhan dag gi yang yin pa srid pa de ni yod kyi mig la sogs pa ni de lta ma yin no /
de lta bas na de dag ni gzugs bzhin du bsgre'o /
cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgatvamutpattyanutpattidharmitvādyathā manodhātoḥ mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag gi brten pa dang bcas pa dang de dang mtshungs pa nyid ni skye ba dang mi skye ba'i chos yin pa'i phyir yid kyi khams ji lta ba bzhin no /
sabhāga iti ko 'rthaḥ /
indriyaviṣayavijñānānāmanyonyabhajanaṃ kāritrabhajanaṃ vā bhāgaḥ 		brten pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na; dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams phan tshun brten pa 'am /
byed pa la brten pa ni brten pa'o /
sa eṣāmastīti sabhāgaḥ /
sparśasamānakāryatvādvā /
ye punarasabhāgāste teṣā sabhāgānāṃ jātisāmānyena sabhāgatvāt tatsabhāgāḥ 		de 'di dag la yod pas brten pa dang bcas pa rnams sam /
'bras bu reg pa 'dra ba'i phyir brten pa mtshungs pa'o /
gang dag brten pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa de dag ni brten pa dang bcas pa de dag dang rigs 'dra ba'i phyir de dag dang mtshungs pa dag go /
kati dhātavo darśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ katyaheyāḥ mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i khams rnams ni du /
bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba rnams ni du /
rūpiṇastāvat /
daśa bhāvanayā heyāḥ pañca ca 		spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na /
re zhig gzugs can bcu ni bsgoms pas spang bya yin /
vijñānadhātavaḥ /
antyāstrayastridhā /
manodhāturdharmadhāturmanovijñānadhātuśca /
ete trayo dhātavaḥ pāṭhānupūrvyā 'ntyāstriprakārāḥ 		lnga yang yin te rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga po dag go /
tha ma'i gsum rnam gsum /
yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang khams gsum po 'di dag ni rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ste /
phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad dang /
aṣṭāśītyanuśayāḥ tatsahabhuvastatpraptayaśāca sānucarā daṛśanaheyāḥ de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang de dag gi thob pa rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa rnams ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag yin no /
śeṣāḥ sāsravā bhāvanāheyāḥ /
anāsravā aheyāḥ /
nanu cānyadapi darśanaprahātavyamasti pṛthagjanatvamāpāyikaṃ ca kāyavākkarma /
āryamārgavirodhitvāt na tad daṛśanaprahātavyam /
eṣa hi saṃkṣepaḥ 		zag pa dang bcas pa lhag ma rnams ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no /
zag pa med pa rnams ni spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dag go /
so so'i skye bo nyid dang ngan song ba'i lus dang ngag gi las kyang 'phags pa'i lam dang 'gal ba'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba gzhan yang yod ba ma yin nam zhe na /
de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin te /
mdor bsdu ba ni 'di yin no /
na dṛṣṭiheyamakliṣṭaṃ na rūpaṃ nāpyaḍaḍtḥajaṃ /
nāsti kiñcidakliṣṭaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ nāpi rūpam 		nyon mongs can min mthong spang min /
gzugs min drug pa min skyes min /
nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba cung zad kyang med la gzugs kyang ma yin no /
akliṣṭavyākṛtaṃ ca pṛthagjanatvam /
samucchinnakuśalamūlavītarāgāṇāmapi tatsamanvāmat rūpaṃ kāyavākkarma 		so so'i skye bo nyid ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i lung du ma bstan pa yin te /
dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyang de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
lus dang ngag gi las ni gzugs yin no /
tasmānna darśanaprahātavyam /
satyeṣva vipratipatterduḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau prthagjanatvaprasaṅgācca 		de lta bas na de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin te /
bden pa dag la log par mi rtog pa'i phyir dang sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa na so so'i skye bo nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i yang phyir ro /
nāpyaṣaṣṭajam /
ṣaṣṭhamucyate mana āyatanam /
tasmādanyatra jātamaṣaṣṭhajaṃ pañcendriyajaṃ ca yattadapi nāsti darśnaprahātavyam 		drug pa las ma skyes pa yang ma yin te /
drug pa zhes bya ba ni yid kyi skye mched do /
de las gzhan pa las skyes pa ni drug pa las ma skyes pa ste /
dbang po lnga las skyes pa gang yin pa ste /
de yang mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni med do /
aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ kati dṛṣṭiḥ kati na dṛṣṭiḥ /
cakṣuśca dharmadhātośca pradeśu dṛṣṭiḥ 		khams bco brgyad po dag las lta ba ni du /
lta ba ma yin pa ni du zhe na /
mig dang chos kyi khams phyogs ni /
lta ba yin te /
katamaḥ sa ityāha de gang zhe na /
smras pa /
aṣṭadhā /
pañca satkāyadṛṣṭyādikā dṛṣṭayaḥ laukikī samyag dṛṣṭiḥ śaiṅkṣī dṛṣṭiraśaikṣī dṛṣṭirityayamaṣṭaprakāro dharmadhāturdṛṣṭi ravraśiṣṭo na dṛṣṭiḥ 		rnam pa brgyad /
'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa la lta ba lnga dag dang 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang; slob pa'i lta ba dang mi slob pa'i lta ba ste /
chos kyi khams rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag ni lta ba yin no /
tatra satkāyadṛṣṭyādīnāmanuśāyanirdeśe nirddeśaḥ prāptakālo bhaviṣyati /
laukikī punaḥ samyagdṛṣṭirmanovijñānasaṃprayuktā kuśalasāsravā prajñā 		lhag ma ni lta ba ma yin no /
de la 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa ni phra rgyas bstan par ston pa'i dus la 'bab par 'gyur ro /
'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa'o /
śaikṣasyanāsravā dṛṣṭiḥ ṣaikṣī aśaikṣasya akśaikṣī slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i lta ba ni slob pa'i 'o /
mi slob pa ni mi slob pa'i 'o /
sameghāmegharatrindivarūpadarśanavat kliṣṭākliṣṭalaukikīśaikṣyaśaikṣībhirdṛṣṭibhirdharmadarśanam /
atha kasmāllaudikī samyagdṛṣṭirmanovijñānasaṃprayuktaivocyate 		sprin dang bcas pa dang sprin med pa'i mtshan mo dang nyin mo gzugs la lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten pa nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lta ba dag gis chos la lta ba'o /
yang ci'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa kho na la 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya zhe na /
yasmāt 'di ltar /
pañcavijñānasahajā dhīrna dṛṣṭiratīraṇāt rnam shes lnga dang mtshungs skyes blo /
nges rtog med phyir lta ma yin /
santīrikā hi dṛṣṭirupadhyānapravṛttattvāt /
na caivaṃ pañcavijñānasahājā prajñā 		rtog par byed pa ni lta ba yin te /
nges par sems pa la zhugs pa dag lta ba yin na rnam par shes pa lnga dang lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab ni de lta ma yin te /
tasmādsau na dṛṣṭiḥ /
ata eva cānyā 'pi kliṣṭā 'kliṣṭā vā prājñā na dṛṣṭiḥ 		de lta bas na 'di ni lta ba ma yin no /
de nyid kyi phyir shes rab nyon mongs pa can nam nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa gzhan yang lta ba ma yin no /
cakṣuridānīmasantīrakatve kathaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ 'o na ni mig kyang rtog par byed pa nyid med na /
ji ltar lta ba yin zhe na /
rūpālocanārthena gzugs la lta ba'i don gyis te /
yasmāt /
cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi 		gang gi phyir /
mig gis gzugs rnams mthong /
yadi cakṣuḥ paśyedanyavijñānasamaṅgino 'pi paśyet gal te mig gis mthong bar gyur na /
rnam par shes pa gzhan dang ldan pas kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
na vai sarvaṃ cakṣuḥ paśyati mig thams cad kyis mthong ba ni ma yin pa nyid do /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
sabhāgaṃ /
savijñānakaṃ yadā bhavati tadā paśyatyanyadā neti /
evam tarhi tadeva cakṣurāśritam vijñānaṃ paśyatītyastu 		brten bcas /
gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa de'i cho mthong gi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
de lta na 'o na ni mig la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa de kho nas mthong bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
na tadāśritam /
vijñānaṃ /
paśyatīti śasyamavijñātum 		de la brten pa'i rnam par shes pas mthong ngo zhes nges par bya bar nus pa ni min no /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ 		gang phyir bar du chod pa yi /
gzugs ni mthong ba min phyir lo /
yasmāt kila rūpaṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ na dṛśyate gang gi phyir rtsig pa la sogs pas bar du chod pa'i gzugs mi mthong ngo zhes grag go /
yadi hi vijñānaṃ paśyettassyāpratighatvāt kuḍyādiṣu pratighāto nāsti ityvāṛtamapi rūpaṃ paśyet gal te rnam par shes pas mthong bar gyur na de ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir rtsig pa la sogs pa la yang thogs pa med pas gzugs bsgribs pa la yang mthong bar 'gyur ro /
naiva hāvṛte cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata ityanutpannaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati /
kiṃ khalu notpadyate /
yasya tu cakṣuḥ paśyati tasya cakṣuṣaḥ saparatighatvādvyayavahite vṛttyabhāva iti vijñānasyānutpatti rāśrayeṇaika viṣayapravṛttatvāt yujyate /
kiṃ nu vai cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayaṃ kāyendriyavat yata āvṛtaṃ na paśyet 		bsgribs pa la ni mig gi rnam par shes pa mi skye ba nyid de /
de bas na ma skyes pas ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur /
ci ste mi skye /
gang gi ltar na mig gis mthong ba de'i ltar na ni mig thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir bsgribs pa la 'jug pa med pas rnam par shes pa yang rten dang lhan cig tu yul gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir mi skye bar mi rung ngo /
mig kyang lus kyi dbang po bzhin du yul de phrad pa zhig yin nam ci na /
sapratighatvāt /
kācābhrapaṭalasphaṭikāmbubhiścāntaritaṃ kathaṃ dṛśyate 		'di ltar thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir bsgribs pa mi mthong mching bu dang lhang tsher dang shel dang chu dag gis bar du chod pa yang ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te /
sapratighatvāccakṣuṣa āvṛtasya rūpasyādarśanam de lta bas na mig thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir gzugs bsgribs pa mi mthong ba ni ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
yatrālokasyāpratibandha āvṛte 'pi rupe tatropapadyata eva cakṣurvijñānam /
yatra tu pratibandhastatra notpadyata ityanutpannatvādāvṛtaṃ nekṣyate /
yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭveti 		'o na ji lta zhe na /
gang la snang ba la gegs med na gzugs bsgribs bzhin du yang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba nyid yin la /
gang la gegs yod pa de ni mi skye bas ma skyes pa'i phyir bsgribs pa mi mthong ngo /
'o na gang mdo las /
gang mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas zhes gsungs so /
tenāśrayeṇetyayamatrābhisandhiryathā manasā dharmān vijñāye tyāha der ni dgongs pa ni de la brten te zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
dper na yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes par byas nas zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
na ca mano dharmān vijānāti /
atītatvāt 		yid ni 'das pa yin pa'i phyir /
chos rnams rnam par mi shes so /
kiṃ tarhi /
manovijñānam 		'o na ci ltar zhe na /
yid kyi rnam par shes pas so /
āśritakarma vā āśrayasyopacaryate yang na brten pa'i las brten la nye bar btags pa yin te /
yathā mañcāḥ krośantīti dper na khri'u dag 'bod do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
yathā ca sūtra uktaṃ cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭāni kāntāniti ji ltar mdo las /
mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba sdug pa rnams zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
na ca tāni cakṣuṣā vijñāyante /
uktaṃ ca sūtre cakṣurbrāhmaṇa dvāraṃ yāvadeva rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya ityato gamyate cakṣuṣā dvāreṇa vijñānaṃ paśyatīti 		de dag mig gis rnam par mi shes so /
mdo las /
bram ze mig ni 'di lta ste /
gzugs rnams mthong bar bya ba la sgo yin no zhes kyang gsungs te /
de'i phyir mig gi sgo nas mig gi rnam par shes pas mthong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud do /
darśane tatra dvārākhyā /
nahyetadyujyate /
cakṣurdārśanaṃ arūpāṇāṃ darśnāyeti 		der ni lta ba la sgo zhes bya bar zad do /
mig ni gzugs rnams mthong bar bya ba la lta ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rung ngo /
yadi vijñānaṃ kpaśyati ko vijānāti kaścānayorviśeṣaḥ gal te rnam par shes pas mthong na gang gis rnam par shes she na /
'di gnyis la khyad par yang ci zhig yod de /
yadeva hi rūpasya vijñānaṃ tadevāsya darśnamiti /
tadyathā kācit prajñā paśyatītyapyucyate prajānātītyapyevaṃ kiñcidvijñānaṃ paśyatītyapyucyāte vijānātītyapi 		gang gis gzugs rnam par shes pa de nyid kyis 'di mi mthong mod /
dper na shes rab 'ga' zhig la mthong zhes kyang bya /
rab tu shes pa zhes kyang bya ba de bzhin du /
rnam par shes pa 'ga' zhig la mthong zhes kyang bya ste /
anye punarāhuḥ /
yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kartṛbhūtasya cakṣuṣaḥ kā 'nyā dṛśikriyeti vaktavyam 		rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya'o /
gzhan dag na re ni gal te mig gis mthong na mig byed pa por gyur pa'i lta ba'i bya ba gzhan gang zhig yin pa brjod dgos so zhes zer ro /
tadetadacodyam /
yadi hi vijñānaṃ vijānātītīṣyate 		de ni klan kar mi rung ste /
ji ltar rnam par shes pas shas so zhes bya bar 'dod la /
na ca tatra kartṛkriyābhedaḥ /
evamatrāpi /
apare punarbruvate /
cakṣurvijñānaṃ darśanaṃ tasyāśrayabhāvāccakṣuḥ paśyatītyucyate 		de la byed pa po dang bya ba'i bye brag kyang med pa de bzhin du 'di la yang rung bar 'gyur ro /
gzhan dag na re ni mthong ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa yin la /
mig ni de'i rten du gyur pa'i phyir mthong ba zhes bya ste /
yathā nādasyāśrayabhāvāt ghaṇṭā nadatītyucyate iti dper na sgrogs ba'i rten du gyur pa'i phyir dril sgrogs sa zhas bya ba bzhin no zhes zer ro /
nanu caīvaṃ vijñānasyāśrayabhāvācakṣurvijānātīti prāpnoti /
na prāpnoti /
tadvijñānaṃ darśanamiti ruḍhaṃ loke 		de ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten du gyur ba'i phyir rnam par shes so zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
mi 'gyur te /
'jig rten na rnam par shes pa de ni mthong ba'o zhes grags te /
tathā hi tasminnutpanne rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamityucyate na vijñātam /
vibhāṣāyāmapyuktaṃ cakṣuḥ saṃpraptaṃ cakṣurvijñānānubhūtaṃ dṛṣṭamityucyata iti /
tasmāccakṣuḥ paśyatītyevocyate na vijānātīti /
vijñānaṃ tu sānnidhyamātreṇa rūpaṃ vijānātītyucyate 		'di ltar de skyes na gzugs mthong ngo zhes zer gyi rnam par shes so zhes ni mi zer ro /
bye brag tu bshad pa las kyang /
mig dang phrad cing rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba la mthong ba zhes bya ba'o zhes 'byung ste /
de lta bas na mig gis mthong ba kho na zhes bya'i /
rnam par shes pa zhes ni mi bya'o /
rnam par shes pa ni yod pa tsam gyis gzugs rnam par shes pas so zhes bya ste /
yathā sūryo divasakara iti dper na nyi mas nyin par byed do zhes bya ba bzhin no /
atra sautrāntikā āhuḥ /
kimidamākāśaṃ khādyate /
cakṣurhi pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
tatra kaḥ paśyati ko vā dṛśyate /
nivryāpāraṃ hīdaṃ dharmamātraṃ hetuphalamātraṃ ca 		mdo sde pa rnams na re ni nam mkha' ldan pa 'dis ci dgos /
mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba de la lta ba ni su zhig yin /
lta ba ni gang zhig yin te /
'di ni byed pa med pa dang chos tsam dang rgyu dang 'bras bu tsam du zad la /
tatra vyavahārārthaṃ cchandata upacārāḥ kriyante de la yang tha snyad du gdags pa'i don du 'dun pa'i sgo nas mig gis mthong ngo /
cakṣuḥ paśyati vijñānaṃ vijānātīti nātrābhiniveṣṭavyam rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes nye bar 'dogs par byed pas 'di la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā janapadaniruktiṃ nābhiniviśeta saṃjñāṃ ca lokasya nābhidhāvediti bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ljongs kyi mi'i tshig la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o /
'jig rten gyi ming la mngon par brgyug par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro /
eṣa tu kāśmīravaibhāṣikāṇāṃ siddhāntaḥ mig gis mthong ngo /
rna bas thos so /
snas tshor ro /
lces myong ngo /
cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti ghrāṇaṃ jighrati jihvā āsvādayati kāyaḥ spṛśati mano vijānātīti lus kyis reg go /
yid kyis rnam par shes so zhes bya ba 'di ni kha che bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mtha' yin no /
tadyadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kimekena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyatyāhosvidubhābhyām /
nātra niyamaḥ 		ci mig gcig gis gzugs rnams mthong ngam /
'on te gnyi gas she na /
'di la nges pa med do /
ubhābhyāmapi cakṣubhuyāṃ paśyati vyaktadarśanāt mig ni gnyi ga dag gis kyang /
mthong ste gsal bar mthong phyir ro /
ubhābhyāmapi cakṣurbhyāṃ paśyatītyābhidhārmikāḥ chos mngon pa pa rnams na re mig gnyi gas kyang mthong ste /
tathā hi dvayorvivṛtayoḥ paraiśāuddhataraṃ darāśanaṃ bhavati /
ekasmiṃścīnmīlite cakṣuṣi dvitīye cārdhanimīlite dvicandrādigrahaṇaṃ bhavati /
naikatarānyathībhāvāt /
na cāśrayavicchedād vicchedaparasaṅgo vijñānasya deśāpratiṣṭhitatvād raupavaditi 		'di ltar gnyi ga phye na gsal bar rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro /
mig gcig phye la gnyis pa phyed phye na zla ba gnyis su 'dzin gyi gang yang rung ba zhig gzhan du gyur na nim yin no /
rten rnam par chad par thal bar yang med de /
rnam par shes pa ni gzugs bzhin du yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti yāvanmano vijānāti kimeṣāṃ prāpto viṣaya āhosvidaprāptaḥ /
cakṣuḥśrotramano 'prāptaviṣayaṃ /
tathā hi dūrādrūpaṃ paśyatyakṣisthamañjanaṃ na paśyati 		gal te mig gis mthong ba dang rna bas thos pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yin na ci 'di dag yul dang phrad pa zhig gam /
'on te ma phrad pa zhig yin zhe na /
mig dang yid dang rna ba ni; yul dang ma phrad /
'di ltar gzugs rgyang ring po nas mthong zhing mig la yod pa'i mig sman mi mthong la /
dūrācchabdaṃ śṛṇoti /
sati ca prāptaviṣayatve divyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotramiha dhyāyināṃ nopajāyeta /
ghrāṇādivat /
yadyaprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥ kasmānna sarvamaprāptaṃ paśyati dūraṃ tiraskṛtaṃ ca 		de bzhin du sgra rgyang ring po nas thos so /
yul dang phrad pa nyid cig yin na ni 'di na bsam gtan pa rnams la lha'i mig dang rna ba skye bar mi 'gyur te /
sna la sogs pa bzhin no /
gal te mig yul dang ma phrad pa yin na ci'i phyir thag ring ba dang bar du chod pa ma phrad pa thams cad mi mthong zhe na /
kathaṃ tāvadayskānto na sarvamaprāptamayaḥ karṣati re zhig khab long gis kyang lcags ma phrad pa thams cad ji ltar mi 'dren /
prāptaviṣayatve 'pi caitatsamānam /
kasmānna sarvaṃ prāptaṃ paśyatyañjanaṃ śalākāṃ vā 		yul dang phrad pa nyid cig yin na yang ci'i phyir mig sman nam thur ma phrad pa thams cad mi mthong ste de ni mtshungs so /
yathā ca ghrāṇādīnaṃ prāpto viṣayo na tu sarvaḥ /
sahabhūgandhādyagrahaṇāt /
evaṃ cakṣuṣo 'pyaprāptaḥ syānna tu sarvaḥ /
manastvarūpitvāt prāptumevāśaktam 		ji ltar yang sna la sogs pa yul dang phrad pa yin yang lhan ci skyes pa'i dri la sogs pa mi 'dzin pa'i phyir thams cad ni ma yin ba de bzhin du /
mig kyang ma phrad pa yin mod kyi thams cad ni ma yin no /
yid ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phyir phrad pa nyid du mi nus so /
kecit punaḥ śrotraṃ praptāprāptaviṣayaṃ manyayante yang kha cig ni rna ba'i nang du yang sgra thos pa'i phyir /
karṇabhyantare 'pi śabdaśravaṇāt /
śeṣaṃ tu ghrāṇajihvākāyākhyam /
trayamanyathā 		rna ba ni yul dang phrad pa dang ma phrad pa yang yin par sems so /
lhag ma sna dang lce dang lus zhes bya ba /
gsum gzhan du /
prāptaviṣayamityarthaḥ /
ghrāṇaṃ kathaṃ prāptaviṣayam 		yul dang phrad pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
sna ji ltar yul dang phrad pa yin zhe na /
nirucchvāsasya gandhāgrahaṇāt dbugs ma brngubs par dri mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
keyaṃ prāptirnāma phrad pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
nirantarotpattiḥ /
kiṃ punaḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśantyanyonyamāhosvinna 		'dab chags par 'byung ba'o /
ci rdul phra rab rnams phan tshun reg gam 'on te mi reg ce na /
na spṛśantīti kāśmīrakāḥ kha che ba rnams na re mi reg go zhes zer ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
yadi tāvat sarvānmanā spṛśeyurmiśrībhaveyurdravyāṇi re zhig gal te bdag nyid thams cad kyis reg par 'gyur na ni rdzas rnams 'dres par 'gyur ro /
athaikadeśena sāvayavāḥ prasajyeran /
niravayavāśca paramāṇavaḥ 		'on te phyogs gcig gis reg na ni cha shas dang bcas ba dag tu thal bar 'gyur ba zhig na rdul phra rab rnams ni cha shas med pa yin no /
kathaṃ śabdābhiniśpattirbhavati /
ata eva yadi hi spṛśeyurhasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ sajyeto palaścopale 		'o na ji ltar sgra mngon bar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
de nyid kyi phyir te /
gal te reg par gyur na lag ba sa lag pa la bsnun na 'bying bar 'gyur la /
rdo bas rdo ba la bsnun na yang 'bying bar 'gyur ro /
kathaṃ citaṃ pratyāhataṃ na viśīryate /
vāyudhātusaṃdhāritatvāt 		ji ltar bsags pa la brgyab na zhigs par mi 'gyur zhe na; rlung gi khams kyis bzung ba'i phyir ro /
kaścidvāyudhāturvikiraṇāya pravṛtto yathā saṃvarttanyāṃ kaścit saṃdhāraṇāya yathā vivarttanyāmiti rlung gi khams kha cig ni 'jig bar zhugs pa yin te dper na 'jig pa'i tshe lta bu'o /
kha cig ni 'dzin par zhugs pa yin te dper na chags pa'i tshe lta bu'o /
kathamidānīṃ nirantara prāptyā prāptaviṣayaṃ trayamucyate /
tadevaiṣāṃ niruttaratvaṃ yanmadhye nāsti kiñcit 		da ni ji ltar 'dab chags par phrad bas gsum po yul dang phrad pa zhes bya zhe na; de dag gi dbus na cung zad kyang med pa gang yin pa da kho na 'dab chags ba nyid yin no /
apikhlu saṃghātāḥ sāvayavatvāt spṛśantītyadvīṣaḥ /
evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'yamapi grantha upapanno bhavati vibhāṣāyām 		yang 'dus pa rnams ni cha shas dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir reg par 'gyur bas nyes pa med do /
de ltar byas na bye brag tu bshad pa las /
kiṃ nu spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭamutpadyate āhosvidaspṛṣṭahetukamiti praśnayitvāhakāraṇaṃ prati ci reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa zhig skyes pa 'am /
'on te ma reg pa'i rgyu can zhig skye zhes dris nas smras pa /
kadācit spṛṣṭahetukamaspṛṣṭamutpadhate yadā viśīryate rgyu'i phyir res 'ga' ni rig pa'i rgyu chan gyi ma reg pa skye ste /
kadācidaspṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadā cayaṃ gacchati /
kadācit spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadā cayavatāṃ cayaḥ /
kadācidaspṛṣṭahetukamaspṛṣṭaṃ yadā vātāyanaraja iti /
yadi paramāṇavaḥ spṛśeyuruttarakṣaṇāvasthānaṃ syāditi bhadantavasumitraḥ 		gang gi cho rnam par zhigs pa na'o /
res 'ga' ni ma reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa skye ste /
gang gi cho bsags par 'gyur ba na'o /
res 'ga' ni reg pa'i rgyu can gyi reg pa skye ste /
gang gi tshe bsags pa dang ldan pa bsags pa kho na'o /
res 'ga' ni ma reg pa'i rgyu can gyi ma reg pa skye ste dper na nyi zer gyi rdul lta bu'o zhes 'byang ba'i gzung 'di yang 'thad par 'gyur ro /
btsun pa dbyig bshes na re ni rdul phra rab rnams reg par gyur na ni skad cig ma phyi mar gnas bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
na spṛśanti /
nirantare tu spṛṣṭasaṃjñeti bhadantaḥ 		btsun pa na re ni reg pa ni med kyi 'dab chags pa la reg go snyam du 'du shes par zad do zhes zer te /
bhadantamataṃ caiṣṭavyam btsun pa'i lugs 'dod par bya'o /
anyathā hi sāntarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ śūnyeṣvantareṣu gatiḥ kena pratibadhyeta /
yataḥ sapratighā iṣyante 		de lta ma yin na ni rdul phra rab bar dang bcas pa rnams kyis bar stong pa dag tu 'gro ba la su zhig 'gog na 'di ltar thogs pa dang bcas pa dag tu 'dod /
naca paramāṇubhyo 'nye saṃghātā iti /
ta eva te saṃghātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśyante yathā rūpyante 		rdul phra rab rnams las bsags pa dag gzhan yang ma yin pas de dag kho na bsags pa la reg pa yin te dper na gzugs su rung ba lta bu'o /
yadi ca paramāṇordigbhāgabhedaḥ kalpyate spṛṣṭasyāspṛṣṭasya vā sāvayavatvaprasaṅgaḥ gal te rdul phra rab la phyogs cha tha dad par rtog na ni reg gam ma reg kyang rung ste /
cha shas dang bcas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro /
no cet spṛṣṭasyāpyaprasaṅgaḥ /
kiṃ punarebhiścakṣurādibhirātmaparimāṇatulyasyārthasya grahaṇaṃ bhavatyāśuvṛttyā ca parvatādīnāmalātakrādivadāhosvittulyātulyasya 		gal te ma yin na ni /
reg kyang thal bar mi 'gyur ro /
yang ci'i mig la sogs pa 'di dag gis bdag nyid kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i don la mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhin du myur du 'jug pas ri la sogs pa 'dzin tam /
'on te mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa zhig la 'dzin ce na /
yāni tāvadetāni prāptaviṣayāṇyuktānyebhiḥ re zhig gang dag yul dang phrad par bshad pa /
tribhirghrāṇādibhistulyaviṣayagrahaṇaṃ matam /
yāvanto hīndriyaparamāṇavastāvanto hi viṣayaparamāṇavaḥ sametya vijñānaṃ janayanti /
cakṣuḥśrotrābhyāṃ tvaniyamaḥ /
kadācidalpīyāṃso yadā vālāgraṃ paśyati /
kadācit samā yadā drākṣāphataṃ paśyati /
kadācit bhūyāṃso yadā mahāntaṃ parvataṃ paśyatyunmiṣitamātreṇa 		sna la sogs pa gsum po de dag rnams kyis ni /
yul ni mnyam par 'dzin par 'dod /
dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi yul gyi rdul phra rab rnams dang phrad nas rnam par shes pa skyed de /
mig dang rna ba dag gis ni ma nges te /
res 'ga' ni chung ste gang gi tshe skra'i rtse mo mthong ba na'o /
res 'ga' ni mnyam ste gang gi tshe rgun 'brum mthong ba na'o /
res 'ga' ni che ste gang gi tshe mig phye ba tsam gyis ri chen po mthong ba na'o /
evam śrotreṇa maśakameghādiśabdaśravaṇe ghoṣam /
manastvamūrttivadeveti nāsya parimāṇaparicchedaḥ saṃpradhāryate /
katahaṃ punareṣāṃ cakṣurādīndriyaparamāṇūnāṃ saṃniveśaḥ 		de bzhin du rna bas sbrang bu dang 'brug la sogs pa'i sgra thos pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
yid ni lus can ma yin pa kho na bas 'di'i tshad yongs su chad pa ni mi spyod do /
yang mig gi dbang po la sogs pa 'di dag gi rdul phra rab rnams ji ltar gnas she na /
cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavastāvadakṣitārakāyāmajājīpuṣpavadavasthitāḥ re zhig mig gi rdul phra rab rnams ni mig gi 'bras bu la /
go snyod kyi me tog bzhin du gnas te /
acchacarmāvacchāditāstu na vikīryante kha dog dang bcas bkab pas gyes par mi 'gyur ro /
adharauttaryeṇa piṇḍavadavasthitā ityapare /
na cānyo 'nyamāvṛṇvanti sphaṭikavadacchatvāt /
śrotrendriyaparamāṇavo bhūrjābhyantarāvasthitāḥ 		gzhan dag na re gong bu bzhin du bla 'og na gnas te /
shel bzhin du dang ba'i phyir phan tshun mi sgrib po zhes zer ro /
rna ba'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni rna ba'i bu ga'i nang na gnas so /
ghrāṇendriyaparamāṇavo ghaṭābhyantareṇa śalākāvat sna'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni mtshul pa'i nang na gnas te /
ādyāni trīṇīndriyāṇi mālāvadavasthitāni dbang po dang po gsum ni phreng ba bzhin du gnas so /
jihvendriyaparamāṇvo 'rdhacandravat lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni zla ba kham pa lta bu yin te /
vālāgramātraṃ kila madhyajivhāyāṃ jihvendriyaparamāṇubhirasphuṭam /
kāyendriyaparamāṇavaḥ kāyavadavasthitāḥ 		lce'i dbus na skra'i rtse mo'i byon tsam zhig lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab dag gis ma khebs so zhes grag go /
lus kyi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni lus bzhin du gnas so /
strīndriyaparamāṇavo bherīkaṭāhavat mo'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni rnga'i sbubs lta bu yin no /
puruṣendriyaparamāṇavo 'ṅguṣṭhavat pho'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni mthe bong lta bu yin no /
tatra cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavaḥ kadācit sarve sabhāgā bhavanti kadācittatsabhāgāḥ de la mig gi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams res 'ga' ni thams cad bsten pa dang bcas pa dag yin no /
res 'ga' ni de dang mtshungs pa dag yin no /
kadācideke sabhāgāḥ eke tatsabhāgāḥ /
evam yāvajjihvendriyaparamāṇavaḥ /
kāyendriyaparamāṇavastu sarve sabhāgā na bhavanti /
pradīptanarakābhyantarāvaruddhānāmapi hyaparimāṇāḥ kāyendriyaparamāṇavastatsabhāgā bhavanti 		res 'ga' ni kha cig bsten pa dang bcas pa dag yin la /
kha cig de dang mtshungs pa yin te /
lce'i dbang po'i rdul phra rab kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o /
lus kyi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni ril gyis bsten pa dang bcas pa ni med de /
rab tu 'bar ba'i dmyal ba'i nang na 'khod pa rnams la yang lus kyi dbang pa'i rdul phra rab tshad med ba zhig de dang mtshungs pa yin te /
sarvaiḥ kila vijñānotpattāvāśrayo viśīryeta /
na caika indriyaparamāṇurviṣayaparamāṇurvā vijñānaṃ janayati 		thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa bskyed na ni lus zhig par 'gyur ro lo /
dbang po'i rdul phra rab bam yul gyi rdul phra rab gcig gis rnam par shes bskyed pa ni med de /
saṃcitāśrayālambanatvāt pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānām /
ata evānidarśanaḥ paramāṇuradṛśyatvāt 		rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag gi rten dang dmigs pa ni bsags pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir rdul phra rab ni mi mthong ba'i phyir bstan du med pa yin no /
ya ime ṣaḍvijñānadhātava uktāścakṣurvijñānaṃ yavanmanovijñānaṃ kimeṣāṃ yatha viṣayo varttamānaḥ pañcānāṃ caramasya trikāla evamāśrayo 'pi ci mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi khams drug po bshad pa gang dag yin pa'i dag ji ltar lnga rnams kyi yul da ltar yin la /
tha ma'i dus gsum yin pa ltar rten kyang de lta bu yin nam zhe na /
netyāha /
kiṃ tarhi 		smras pa ma yin no /
'o na ci zhe na /
caramasyāśrayo 'tītaḥ tha ma'i rten 'das /
manovijñānadhātoḥ samanantaraniruddhaṃ mana āśrayaḥ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rten ni 'gags ma thag pa'i yid do /
lnga rnams kyi /
pañcānāṃ sahajaśca taiḥ de dag lhan cig skyes pa'ang yin /
atītaśceti caśabdaḥ /
tatra cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣuḥ sahaja āśārayo yāvat kāyavijñānasya kāyaḥ /
atītaḥ punareṣāmāśrayo mana ityapyete pañca vijñānakāyā indriyadvayāśrayāḥ /
ata evocyate yaścakṣurvijñānasyāśrayabhāvena samanantarapratyayabhāvenāpi sa tasyeti 		'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das pa yang yin pa'o /
de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rten ni mig yin pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang lus yin la /
de dag 'das pa'i rten ni yid yin no /
de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po de dag gi rten ni dbang po gnyis gnyis yin no /
de gnyis kyi phyir gang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi dngos por yin pa de de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis dngos por yang yin zhe na /
catuṣkotikaḥ /
prathamā kotiścakṣuḥ /
dvitīyā samanantarātītaścaitasiko dharmadhātuḥ /
tṛtīyā samanantarātītaṃ manaḥ /
caturthī koṭiruktanirmuktā dharmāḥ /
evaṃ yāvat kāyavijñānasya svamindriyaṃ vaktavyam 		mu bzhi ste /
mu dang po ni mig yin no /
gnyis pa ni chos kyi khams sems las byung ba 'das ma thag pa yin no /
gsum pa ni 'das ma thag pa'i yid yin no /
bzhi pa ni bshad pa las ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams yin te /
lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du rang gi dbang po brjod par bya'o /
manovijñānasya pūrvapādakaḥ /
yastāvadāśrayabhāvena samanantarapratyayabhāvenāpi saḥ 		yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ni tshig snga ma dang sbyor ba ste; re zhig gang rten gyi dngos por yin pa de ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi dngos por yang yin no /
syātsamanantarapratyayabhāvena nāśrayabhāvena /
samanantarābhyatītaścetasiko dharmadhāturiti 		mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi dngos por yin la rten gyi dngos por ma yin pa yang yod de /
chos kyi khams sems las byung ba 'das ma thag pa'o /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamubhayādhīnāyāṃ vijñānotpattau cakṣurādayaḥ evāśrayā ucyante na rūpādayaḥ yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ni gnyi ga la rag lus te skye na /
ci'i phyir mig la sogs pa kho na la rten zhes bya'i gzugs la sogs pa ni ma yin zhe na /
tadvikāravikāritvādāśrayāścakṣurādayaḥ /
dhātava ityadhikāraḥ 		de dag gyur pas 'gyur nyid phyir /
rten ni mig la sogs pa yin /
khams rnams zhes bya bar sbyar te /
cakṣurādīnāṃ hi vikāreṇa tadvijñānānāṃ vikāro bhavatyanugrahopaghātapaṭumandatānuvidhānāt na tu rūpādīnāṃ vikāreṇa tadvikāraḥ mig la sogs pa rnams gyur pas rnam par shes pa rnams 'gyur ba yin te; phan pa dang gnod pa dang gsal ba dang mi gnod pa dang mi gsal ba nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro /
gzugs la sogs pa rnams gyur pas ni de dag 'gyur ba ma yin te /
tasmāt sādhīyastadadhīnatvat ta evāśrayā na rūpādayaḥ /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpādayaśca tairvijñāyante cakṣurvijñānaṃ cocyate yāvanmanovijñānam 		de lta bas na de dag la rag lus pa'i phyir de dag nyid rten yin no /
zhes bya ba ni shin tu legs pa yin gyi gzugs la sogs pa ni ma yin no /
yang de dag gis ni gzugs la sogs pa rnam par shes na /
ci'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas /
na punā rūpavijñānaṃ yāvaddharmavijñānamiti /
ya ete cakṣurādaya āśrayā eṣām /
ato 'sādhāraṇatvāddhi vijñānaṃ tairnirucyate 		yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar yin gyi gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas chos kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ni ma yin zhe na /
gang gi phyir de dag gi rten ni mig la sogs pa yin na /
de'i phyir thun mong ma yin phyir /
de dag gis ni rnam shes bstan /
kathamasādhāraṇatvam /
na hi cakṣuranyasya vijñānasyāśrayībhavitumutsahate /
rūpaṃ tu manovijñānasyālambanībhavatyanyacakṣurvijñānasyāpīti /
evaṃ yāvat kāyo veditavyaḥ /
tasmādāśrayabhāvādasādhāraṇatvācca vijñānaṃ tenaiva nirdiśyate na rūpādibhiḥ 		ji ltar na thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin zhe na /
mig ni rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi rten du 'gyur bar mi nus la /
gzugs ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs par yang 'gyur la; mig gi rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi dmigs par yang 'gyur te /
lus kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o /
de lta bas na rten du gyur pa'i phyir dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir de dag kho nas rnam par shes pa bstan gyi gzugs la sogs pas ni ma yin te /
yathā bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
atha yatra kāye sthitaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati kiṃ tāni kāyacakṣūrūpavijñānānyekabhūmikānyeva bhavantyāhosvidanyabhūmikānyapi 		dper na rnga bo che'i sgra dang; nas kyi myu gu bzhin no /
yang lus dag la gnas te mig gis gzugs rnams la lta ba nas /
ci lus dang mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa de rnams gcig pa kho na zhig yin nam /
āha /
sarveṣāṃ bhedaḥ /
kāmadhātūpapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikam bhavati /
tasyaiva svāni rūpāṇi prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyano rūpāṇi trīṇapi tadbhūmikāni /
dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpoāṇi paśyataḥ kāyarūpe svabhūmike cakṣustadbhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ prathamadhyāna bhūmikam 		'on te gzhan gyis pa yang yin zhe na /
smras pa; thams cad la bye brag yod de /
'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa rang gi mig gis rang gi gzugs rnams la lta ba ni thams cad rang gis pa yin no /
de nyid rang gi gzugs rnams la bsam gtan dang po'i mig gis lta ba na lus dang gzugs dag ni rang gi sa pa yin la /
rnam par shes pa dang mig dag ni de'i sa pa yin no /
bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag la lta na ni gzugs rnams kyang de'i sa pa yin no /
rang gi gzugs rnams kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mig gis lta ba na lus dang gzugs dag ni rang gis pa yin la /
mig ni de'i sa pa yin no /
prathamadhyānabhūmīni paśyato vijñānarupe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaraścakṣurdvitīyadyānabhūmikam /
dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūarūpe tadbhūmike kāyaḥ kāmāvacaro vijñānaṃ prathamabhūmīkam /
evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikādharabhumikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yojayitavyam 		mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sa ni bsam gtan dang pho'i sa pa yin no /
bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag la lta ba na rnam par shes pa dang gzugs dag ni de'i sa pa yin la /
lus ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no /
mig ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa yin no /
bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa dag la lta ba na mig dang gzugs dag ni de'i sa pa yin la /
lus ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no /
rnam par shas pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa yin te /
de ltar bsam gtan gsum pa dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i mig gis de dag gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs rnams la lta ba yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o /
prathmadhyānopapannasya svena cakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyataḥ sarvaṃ svabhūmikamadharāṇi paśyataḥ trayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ bsam gtan dang po'i skyes pa rang gi mig gis rang gi gzugs rnams la lta ba na thams cad rang gi sa pa yin no /
'og ma rnams la lta ba ni gsum rang gi sa pa yin no /
dvitīyadhyānacakṣuṣā svāni rūpāṇi paśyatastrayaṃ svabhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikam rang gi gzugs rnams la bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mig gis lta ba na gsum ni rang gi sa pa yin la /
mig ni de'i sa pa yin no /
kāmāvacarāṇi paśyataḥ kāyavijñāne svabhūmike rūpāṇyadharāṇi cakṣustadbhūmikam 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams la lta ba na lus dang rnam par shes pa dag na rang gi sa pa yin la /
gzugs rnams ni 'og ma pa yin no /
mig ni de'i sa pa yin no /
dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūrūpe tadbhūmike śeṣaṃ svabhūmikam bsam gtan gnyis pa rnams la lta ba na mig dang gzugs ni de'i sa pa yin la /
lhag ma ni rang gi sa pa yin te /
evaṃ tṛtīyadhyānacakṣuṣā yojyam /
dvitīyādidhyānopapannasya svaparacakṣurbhyāṃ svaparabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam /
ayaṃ tu niyamaḥ 		bsam gtan gsum pa la sogs pa'i mig gis lta ba'i yang de bzhin du sbyar ro /
bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa rang dang gzhan gyi mig dag gis rang dang gzhan gyi sa pa'i gzugs rnams la lta ba la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o /
'di ni nges pa yin te /
na kāyasyādharaṃ cakṣuḥ /
pañcabhūmikāni hi kāyacakṣūrūpāṇi kāmāvacarāṇi yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmikāni /
dvibhūmikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca /
tatra yadbhūmikaḥ kāyastadbhūmikaṃ cakṣurūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā cakṣurbhavati na tvadharabhūmikam 		lus la 'og ma'i mig ma yin /
lus dang mig dang gzugs rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar sa lnga pa yin no /
mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang sa gnyis pa yin no /
de las gang ba'i lus yin pa sa de ba'am /
sa gong ma pa'i mig yin gyi sa 'og ma pa ni ma yin no /
yadbhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikamadharabhūmikaṃ vā rūpaṃ viṣayo bhavati 'di'i mig gi yul ni de'i sa pa 'am /
sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs yin gyi /
ūdhrvaṃ rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣaḥ /
na hi kadācidūrdhrvabhūmikaṃ rūpamadhobhūmikena cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ śakyate /
vijñānaṃ ca 		mig gi gong ma'i gzugs ma yin /
sa gong ma pa'i gzugs sa 'og ma pa'i mig gis mthong bar ni nam yang mi nus so /
rnam par shes pa'ang /
ūrdhva na cakṣuṣo rūpavat gong ma ni mig gi ma yin te /
gzugs bzhin no /
asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ /
asyetyanantaroktasya cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ sarvato viṣayaḥ ūrdhvamadhaḥ svabhūmau ca /
kāyasya cobhe rūpavijñāne sarvato bhavataḥ /
yathā cecaṃ cakṣuruttaṃ vistareṇa veditavyam 		de yi gzugs /
lus kyi 'ang gnyi ga thams cad du /
