tatra mahatī bhūmireśāmiti mahābhūmikāḥ ye sarvatra cetasi bhavanti de la 'di dag la sa mang po pa yod pas nas mang po pa rnams te /
gang dag sems thams cad la 'byung ba'o /
ke punaḥ sarvatra cetasi /
vedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
manaskāro 'dhimokṣaśca samādhiḥ sarvacetasi 		gang dag sems thams cad la 'byung ba de dag kyang gang zhe na /
tshor dang sems pa 'du shes dang /
'dun dang reg dang blo gros dran /
yid la byed dang mos pa dang /
ting nge 'dzin sems thams cad la /
ime kila daśa dharmāḥ sarvatra cittakṣaṇe samagrā bhavanti /
tatra vedanā trividho 'nubhavaḥ 		chos bcu po 'di dag ni sems kyi skad cig ma thams cad la tshogs par 'byung ngo zhes grag go lo /
de la tshor ba ni myong ba rnam pa gsum ste /
sukho duḥkho 'duḥkhā sukhaśca /
cetanā cittābhisaṃskāro manaskarma 		bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o /
sems pa ni sems mngon par 'du byed pa'o /
saṃjñā saṃjñānaṃ viṣayanimittodrūha 'du shes ni 'dus nas shes pa ste /
yul la mtshan mar 'dzin pa'o /
cchandaḥ karttṛkāmatā /
sparśa indriyaviṣayavijñānasannipātajā spṛṣṭiḥ 		'dun pa ni byed 'dod pa'o /
reg pa ni yul dang dbang po rnam par shes pa 'dus pa las skyes pa'i reg pa'o /
matiḥ prajñā dharmapravicayaḥ /
smṛtirālambanāsaṃpramoṣaḥ 		blo gros ni shes rab ste /
chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o /
dran ba ni dmigs pa mi brjed pa'o /
manaskāraścetasa ābhogaḥ /
adhimokṣo 'dhimuktiḥ /
samādhiścittasyaikāgratā 		yid la byed pa ni sems kyi 'jug pa'o /
mos pa ni 'dod pa'o /
ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa nyid do /
sūkṣmo hi cittacaittānāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
sa eva duḥparicchedaḥ pravāheṣvapi tāvat kiṃ punaḥ kṣaṇeṣu 		sems dad sems las byung ba rnams kyi bye brag ni phra bas de ni re zhig rgyun rnams la yang yongs su gcad par dka' na skad cig ma dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos /
rūpiṇīnāmapi tāvadoṣadhīnāṃ bahurasānāṃ kāsaṃcidindriyagrāhyā rasaviśeṣā duravadhārā bhavanti kiṃ punarye dharmā arūpiṇo buddhigrāhyāḥ re zhig sman la sogs pa gzugs can rnams la yang ro mang po kha cig gi ro'i khyad par dbang pos gzung bar bya ba rnams nges par gzung bar dka' na; chos gang dag gzugs can ma yin zhing blos gzung bar bya ba rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
kuśalā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kuśala mahābhūmikā ye sarvadā kuśale cetasibhavanti 'di dag la dge pa'i sa mang po yod pas 'di dag ni dge pa'i sa mang po pa dag yin te /
gang dag dge pa'i sems la rtag tu 'byung ba'o /
ke punasta iti de dag kyang gang zhe na /
śraddhā 'pramādaḥ praśrabdhirupekṣā hrīrapatrapā dad dang bag yod shin tu sbyangs; /
btang snyoms ngo tsha shes khrel yod /
mūladvayamahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśale sadā /
ime daśa dharmā kuśale cetasi nityaṃ bhavanti /
tatra śraddhā cetasaḥ prasādaḥ 		rtsa ba gnyis rnam mi 'tshe dang /
brtson 'grus rtag tu dge las 'byung /
chos 'di dag ni dge ba'i sems la rtag tu 'byung ngo /
de la dad pa ni sems dang ba'o /
satyaratna karmaphalābhisaṃpratyaya ityapare /
apramādaḥ duśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvanāḥ 		gzhan dag na ni bden pa dang dkon mchog dang las dang 'bras bu rnams la mngon bar yid ches pa yin no zhes zer ro /
bag yod pa ni dge pa'i chos rnams bsgom pa'o /
kā punaste bhyo 'nyā bhāvanā de dag las gzhan pa bsgom pa de gang zhig yin zhe na /
yā teṣvavahitatā /
cetasa ārakṣeti nikāyāntarītāḥ sūtre paṭhanti 		de dag nyid la gces su 'dzin pa nyid gang yin pa'o /
sde pa gzhan dag gi mdo las ni sems kun tu bsrung ba'o zhes 'don to /
praśrabdhiścittakarmaṇyatā /
nanu ca sūtre kāyapraśrabdhirapyuktā 		shin tu sbyangs pa ni sems las su rung ba nyid do /
mdo las lus shin tu sbyangs pa zhes kyang gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
na khalu noktā /
sā tu yathā kāyikī vedanā tathā veditavyā 		ma gsungs pa ni ma yin mod kyi de ni lus kyi tshor ba ji lta ba de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
kathaṃ sā bodhyaṅgeṣu yokṣyate /
tatra tarhi kāyakarmaṇyataiva kāyikī praśrabdhirveditavyā 		de ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag tu rung bar 'gyur zhe na /
'o na der ni lus las su rung ba kho na la lus shin tu sbyangs pa yin par rig par bya'o /
kathaṃ sā bodhyaṅgamitayucyate da ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya zhe na /
bodhyaṅgānukūlyāt /
sā hi kāyakarmaṇyatā cittakarmaṇyatā bodhyaṅgamāvahati /
asti punaḥ svacit anyatrāpyevaṃ dṛśyate 		byang chub kyi yan lag dag mthun pa'i phyir te /
lus las su rung ba de ni sems las su rung ba byang chub kyi yan lag 'dren par byed do /
de lta bu gzhan la lar snang ba yod dam zhe na /
astītyāha smras pa yod de /
tadyathā prītiḥ prītisthānīyāśca dharmāḥ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
pratighaḥ pratighanimittaṃ ca vyāpādanivaraṇamuktam /
samyakdṛṣṭisaṃkalpavyāyāmāśca prajñāskandha uktāḥ /
naca saṃkalpavyāyāmau prajñāsvabhāvau tasyāstvanuguṇāviti tāsyātvanuguṇāviti tācchaydyaṃ labhete 		dper na bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba dang dga' ba'i gnas lta bu'i chos rnams dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu gsungs pa dang khong khro ba dang khong khro ba'i rgyu mtshan gnod sems kyi sgrib par gsungs pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba dang rtog pa dang rtsol ba rnams shes rab kyi phung por gsungs pa dag lta bu ste /
rtog pa dang rtsol ba dag shes rab kyi rang bzhin ma yin yang de dang mthun pa'i phyir de'i sgra 'thob bo /
de bzhin du lus shin tu sbyangs pa yang byang chub kyi yan lag dang mthun pa'i phyir /
evaṃ kāyapraśrabdhirapi bodhyaṅgānuguṇyādvodhyaṅgaśabdaṃ labhate /
upekṣā cittasamatā cittānābhogatā 		byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i sgra 'thob par 'gyur ro /
btang snyoms ni sems mnyam pa nyid dang sems lhun gyis grub pa nyid do /
kathamidānīmetadyokṣyate /
tatraiva citte ābhogātmako manaskāro 'nābhogātmikā copekṣeti 		da ni ji ltar na sems de nyid la rtsol pa'i bdag nyid yid la byed pa yang 'byung /
rtsol ba med pa'i bdag nyid btang snyoms kyang 'byung zhes bya ba 'di rung par 'gyur zhe na /
nanu coktaṃ durjñāna eṣāṃ viśeṣa iti /
asti hi nāma durjñānamapi jñāyate 		'di dag gi bye brag ni shes par dka'o zhes bshad pa ma yin nam /
shes par dka' ba yang shes pa ni yod kyi /
idam tu khalvatidurjñānaṃ yadvirodhe 'pyavirodha iti gang 'gal bzhin du yang mi 'gal lo zhes bya ba ni shin tu shes par dka'o /
rtsol ba yang gzhan du 'byung la /
anyatrābhogo 'nyatrānābhoga iti ko 'tra virodhaḥ rtsol ba med pa yang gzhan du 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di la 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
na tarhīdānīmekālambanāḥ sarve saṃprayuktāḥ prāpnuvanti /
evañjātīyakamatrānyadapyāyāsyatīti yastasya nayaḥ so 'syāpi veditavyaḥ 		'o na ni mtshungs par ldan pa thams cad dmigs pa gcig tu mi 'gyur ro /
'di las 'di lta bu'i rigs gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas dang tshul gang yin pa de 'di la yang rig par bya'o /
hrīrapatrāpyaṃ ca paścādvakṣyate ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro /
mūladvayaṃ dve kuśalamūle alobhādveṣau /
amoho 'pyasti sa tu prajñātmakaḥ /
prajñā ca mahābhūmiketi nāsau kuśalamahābhūmika evocyate 		rtsa ba gnyis ni dge pa'i rtsa ba gnyis po chags pa med pa dang zhe sdang med pa dag yin no /
gti mug med pa yang yod mod kyi de ni shes rab kyi bdag nyid yin la /
shes rab ni sa mang po pa yin pas 'di dge ba'i sa mang po pa kho na yin par ni mi brjod do /
avihiṃsā aviheṭhanā /
vīryaṃ cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ 		rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni rnam par tho mi 'tshams pa'o /
brtson 'grus ni sems mngon par spro ba'o /
uktāḥ kuśalā mahābhūmikāḥ dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams bshad zin to /
mahatī bhūmirmahābhūmiḥ /
kleśā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kleśamahābhūmikā ye dharmāḥ sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti 		sa mang po ni sa mang ba yin no /
'di dag la nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po yod pas /
'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa dag yin te /
chos gang dag nyon mongs pa can gyi sems la rtag tu 'byung ba yin no /
ke punaste sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti nyon mongs pa can gyi sems la rtag tu 'byung ba de dag kyang gang zhe na /
mohaḥ pramādaḥ kauśīdyamā śraddhyaṃ styānmuddhavaḥ rmongs dang bag med le lo dang /
ma dad pa dang rmugs dang rgod /
kliṣṭe sadaiva /
tatra moho nāmāvidyā 'jñānamasaṃprakhyānam 		nyon mongs can la rtag tu 'byung /
de la rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa ste /
mi shes pa dang mi gsal ba'o /
pramādaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhāvanā 'pramāda vipakṣo dharmaḥ bag med pa ni dge pa'i chos rnams mi bsgom pa ste /
bsgom pa'i mi mthun ba'i phyogs kyi chos so /
kauśīdyaṃ cetaso nābhyutsāhho vīryavipakṣaḥ le lo ni sems mngon par mi spro ba ste /
brtson 'grus kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs so /
āśraddhyaṃ cetaso 'prasādaḥ śraddhāvipakṣaḥ /
styānaṃ katamat 		ma dad pa ni sems ma dad pa ste /
dad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so; /
rmugs pa gang zhe na /
yā kāyagurutā cittagurutā kāyākarmaṇyatā cittākarmaṇyatā /
kāyikaṃ satyānaṃ caitasikaṃ styānamityuktamabhidharme /
kathaṃ caitasiko dharmaḥ kāyika ityucyate /
yathā kāyikī vedanā 		lus lci ba nyid dang /
sems lci ba nyid dang lus las su mi rung ba nyid dang sems las su mi rung ba nyid gang yin pa'o /
chos mngon pa las lus kyi rmugs pa dang sems kyi rmugs pa zhes bshad pa ji ltar na sems las byung ba'i chos lus kyi zhes bya zhe na /
lus kyi tshor ba ji ltab bzhin no /
auddhatyaṃ punaścetaso 'vyupaśamaḥ rgod pa ni sems rnam par ma zhi ba ste /
itīme ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ /
nanu cābhidharme daśa kleśamahābhūmikāḥ paṭhyante /
āśraddhyaṃ kauśīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā cetaso vikṣepaḥ avidyā asaṃprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśce ti 		de ltar na drug po 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa dag yin no /
chos mngon pa las /
nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa bcu po 'di dag ma yin nam /
de las rmugs pa mi 'byung ste /
ma dad pa dang le lo dang brjed ngas pa dang sems rnam par g yeng ba dang ma rig pa dang shes bzhin ma yin pa dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang log par mos pa dang rgod pa dang bag med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo zhe na /
praptijño devānāṃ priyo na tviṣṭijñaḥ 'gyur ba shes pa ni lha rnams dga' ba yin gyi /
kā punaratreṣṭiḥ 'dod pa shes pa ni ma yin no /
muṣitasmṛtivikṣepāsaṃprajanyāyoniśomanasikāramithyādhimokṣā mahābhūmikatvāt na kleśamahābhūmikā evāvadhāryante 'di la 'dod pa gang yin zhe na /
brjed ngas pa dang rnam par g yeng ba dang shes bzhin ma yin pa dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang log par mos pa rnams ni sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir /
yathivāmohaḥ kuśalamahābhūmiko nāvadhāryate prajñāsvabhāvatvāt /
smṛtireva hi kliṣṭā muṣitasmṛtitā /
samādhireva kliṣṭo vikṣepa ityevamādi /
ata evocyate ye mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikā api ta iti /
catuṣkoṭikaḥ /
prathamā koṭirvedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśaśca /
dvitīyā 'śrāddhyaṃ kauśīdyamavidyā auddhatyaṃ pramādaśca /
tṛtīyā muṣitasmṛtyādayaḥ pañca kliṣṭā yaṭhoktāḥ 		dper na gti mug med pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de dge ba'i sa mang po par nges par ma bzung ba ltar nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa dag khon yin par nges par mi bzung ste /
dran pa nyon mongs pa can kho na brjed ngas pa yin la /
ting nge 'dzin nyon mongs pa can kho na rnam par g yeng ba yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yin no /
de nyid kyi phyir gang dag sa mang po pa yin ba de dag nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa yang yin nam zhe na /
mu bzhi ste /
mu dang po ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa dang 'dun pa dang reg pa'o /
gnyis pa ni ma dang pa dang le lo dang; ma rig pa dang rgod pa dang bag med pa'o /
gsum pa ni dran pa la sogs ba nyon mongs pa can lnga ji skad bshad pa rnams so /
caturthyetānākārān sthāpayitveti bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o zhes 'byung ngo /
kecittu mithyāsamādheranyacetaso vikṣepamicchanti kha cig ni sems rnam par g yeng ba log pa'i ting nge 'dzin las gzhan du 'dod de /
teṣāmanyathā catuṣkoṭikaḥ de dag gi mu bzhi pa ni de lta ma yin no /
styānaṃ punariṣyate sarvakleśasaṃprayogīti kleśamahābhūmikeṣu tasyāpāṭhe kasyāparādhaḥ /
evaṃ tvāhuḥ paṭhitavyaṃ bhavetsamādhyanuguṇatvāttu na paṭhitam 		rmugs pa ni nyon mongs ba thams cad dang mtshungs bar ldan par 'dod pa de nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa dag tu ma bton ba su zhig gis nyes /
'di skad du gdon par bya ba ni yin mod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i phyir ma bton te /
kṣiprataraṃ kila styānacaritaḥ samādhimutpādayennauddhatyacarita iti rmugs pa spyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin shin tu myur du skyed par 'gyur gyi rgod pa spyod pa ni ma yin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
kaḥ punaḥ styānacarito yo nauddhatyacaritaḥ ko vā auddhatyacarito yo na styānacaritaḥ gang zhig rgod pa mi spyod la rmugs pa spyod pa yang su zhig yod /
yang na gang zhig rmugs pa mi spyod la rgod pa spyod pa yang su zhig yod de /
nahyete jātu sahacariṣṇutāṃ jahītaḥ 'di dag ni nam du yang lhan cig spyod pa nyid 'dor bar mi 'gyur mod kyi /
tathāpi yadyasyādhimātraṃ sa taccarito jñātavyaḥ 'on kyang gang zhig gang la shas che ba de ni spyod par shes par bya ste /
ataḥ ṣaḍeva kleśamahābhūmikāḥ siddhyanti de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i sa chen po pa ni drug po kho nar 'grub bo /
ete hi sadā kleṣṭa eva cetasi bhavanti nānyatra de dag kyang rtag tu nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kho na la 'byung gi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
akuśale tvāhrīkyamanapatrapā /
akuśale tu cetasyāhrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ ca nityaṃ bhavata ityetau dvau dharmāvakuśalamahābhūmikāvucyete /
tayośca paścāllakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyate 		mi dge la ni khrel med dang /
ngo tsha med pa'o; /
ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa ni mi dge ba'i sems la rtag tu 'byung bas chos 'di nyid ni mi dge ba'i sa chen po pa dag ces bya'o /
de gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ni 'og nas 'chad do /
krodhopanāhaśāṭhyerṣyāpradāsamrakṣamatsarāḥ khro ba dang khon du 'dzin dang g yo dang ni /
phrag dog 'tshig 'chab ser sna dang /
māyāmada vihiṃsāśca parīttakleśbhūmikāḥ sgyu dang rgyags dang rnam 'tshe ni /
nyon mongs chung ngu'i sa pa rnams /
parīttakleśā bhūmireṣāṃ ta ime parīttakleśabhūmikā avidyāmātreṇa bhāvanāheyena manobhūmikenaiva ca saṃprayogāt 'di dag la nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa yod pas 'di ni nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa pa rnams te /
ma rig pa tsam dang bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dang yid kyi sa pa kho na dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro /
eṣāṃ tu nirdekśa upakleśeṣu kariṣyate 'di dag ni nye pa'i nyon mongs pa dag gi nang nas ston par 'gyur ro /
uktā ime pañcaprakārāścaittāḥ sems las byung ba rnam pa lnga po de dag bshad zin to /
anye 'pi cāniyatāḥ santi vitarkavicārakaukṛtyamiddhādayaḥ rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang 'gyod pa dang gnyid la sogs pa ma nges pa gzhan dag kyang yod pas /
tatra vaktavyaṃ kasmiṃścitte kati caittā avaśyaṃ bhavantīti /
kāmāvacaraṃ tāvat pañcavidhaṃ cittam 		de la sems gang zhig la sems las byung ba du zhig gdon mi za par 'byung ba brjod par bya ste /
re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems ni rnam pa lnga ste /
kuśalamakuśalam /
tatrākuśalaṃ dvividhamāveṇikamanyakleśasaṃprayuktaṃ ca /
avyākṛtaṃ dvividhaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca 		dge ba dang mi dge ba rnam pa gnyis te /
ma 'dres pa dang nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang lung du ma bstan pa rnam pa gnyis te /
bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang ma bsgribs pa la lung du ma bstan pa'o /
tatra tāvat kāmāvacaracittamavaśyaṃ savitarkaṃ savicāram /
ato 'tra 		de la re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems ni nges par rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa yin pas de'i phyir 'di la /
savitarkavicāratvāt kuśale kāmacetasi 'dod pa'i dge pa'i sems la ni /
rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa'i phyir /
dvāviṃśatiścaitasikāḥ sems las byung ba nyi shu gnyis /
avaśyaṃ bhavanti /
daśa mahābhūmikā daśa kuśalamahābhūmikā vitarko vicāraśca 		gdon mi za par [*bar?] 'byung ste /
sa mang po pa bcu dang dge ba'i sa mang po pa bcu dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa'o /
kaukṛtyamadhikaṃ kvacit /
nahi sarvatra kuśale cetasi kaukṛtyamasti /
yatra tvasti tatra tadevādhikaṃ kṛtvā trayoviṃśatiścaittā bhavanti /
kimidaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ nāma 		la la dag tu 'gyod pa bsnan /
dge ba'i sems thams cad la ni 'gyod pa med pas gang la yod pa der de nyid kyis glags na sems las byung ba nyi shu rtsa gsum 'byung ngo /
'gyod pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na /
kukṛtasya bhāvaḥ kaukṛtyam /
iha tu punaḥ kaukṛtyālambano dharmaḥ kaukṛtyamucyate cetaso vipratisāraḥ 		ngan par byas pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'gyod pa'o /
'di ni 'gyod pa la dmigs pa'i chos yid la gcags pa la 'gyod pa zhes bya ste /
tadyathā śūnyatālalmvanaṃ vimokṣamukhṃ śūnyatetyucyate aśubhālambanaścālobho 'śubha iti dper na stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la stong pa zhes bya ba dang mi sdug pa la dmigs pa'i ma chags pa la mi sdug pa zhes bya ba bzhin no /
loke 'pi ca dṛṣṭaḥ sthānena sthānināmatideśaḥ sarvo grāma āgataḥ sarvo deśa āgata iti /
sthānabhūtaṃ ca kaukṛtyaṃ vipratisārasya 		'jig rten na yang grong thams cad lhags so /
yul thams cad lhags so zhes gnas pa ston pa mthong la /
'gyod pa yang yid la gcags pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no /
phale vā hetūpacāro 'yam yang na 'di ni 'bras bu la rgyu btags pa yin te /
yathoktaṃ ṣaḍimāni sparśāyatanāni paurāṇaṃ karma veditavyamiti /
yattarhi akṛtālambanaṃ tat kathaṃ kaukṛtyam 		dper na reg pa'i skye mched drug po 'di dag ni sngon gyi las yin par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
'o na gang ma byas pa la dmigs pa de ji ltar 'gyod pa yin zhe na /
akṛte 'pi kṛtākhyā bhavati ma byas pa la byas pa zhes bya ba yod de /
na mayā sādhu kṛtaṃ yanna kṛtamiti /
katamat kaukṛtyaṃ kuśalam 		bdag gis ma byas pa gang yin pa de ma legs pa byas so zhes bya ba lta bu'o /
'gyod pa dge ba gang zhe na /
yatkuśalamakṛtvātapyate akuśalaṃ ca kṛtvā /
viparyayādakuśalaṃ kaukṛtyam /
tadetadubhayamapyubhayādhiṣṭānam 		dge ba ma byas pa dang mi dge ba byas pa nas gdung ba gang yin pa'o /
bzlog pa ni 'gyod pa mi dge ba yin te /
de gnyi ga yang gnyi ga la brten pa yin no /
āveṇike tvakuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca viṃśātiḥ /
yadakuśalaṃ cittamāveṇikaṃ tatra viṃśatiścaittāḥ 		mi dge ba ni ma 'dres dang /
lta dang ldan la'ang nyi shu 'byung /
mi dge ba'i sems ma 'dres pa gang yin pa de la ni sems las byang ba nyi shu 'byung ste /
daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleāśamahābhūmikā dvāvakuśalamahābhūmikau vitarkovicāraśca /
āveṇikaṃ nāma cittaṃ yatrāvidyaiva kevalā nānyaḥ kleśo 'sti rāgādiḥ /
dṛṣṭiyukte 'pyakuśale viṃśatirya evāveṇike /
nanu ca dṛṣṭyadhikatvādeka viṃśatirbhavanti 		sa mang po pa bcu dang nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa drug dang mi dge ba'i rtsa pa'i sa mang po pa gnyis dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa'o /
ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni /
sems gang la ma rig pa 'ba' zhig yod kyi 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa gzhan med pa'o /
mi dge ba'i sems lta ba dang ldan pa la yang nyi shu 'byung ste /
ma 'dres pa la gang dag 'byung ba kho na'o /
lta ba lhag pa'i phyir nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ba ma yin nam zhe na /
na bhavanti /
yasmānmahābhūmika eva kaścit prajñāviśeṣo dṛṣṭirityucyate /
tatrākuśalaṃ dṛṣṭiyuktaṃ yatra mithyādṛṣṭirvā dṛṣṭiparāmarśo vā śīlavrataparāmarśo vā 		ma yin te /
'di ltar sa mang po pa kho na'i shes rab kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la lta ba zhes bya'o /
de la mi dge ba lta ba dang ldan ba ni gang la log par lta ba'am /
lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa'am /
tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yod pa'o /
kleśaiścaturbhiḥ krodhādyaiḥ kaukṛtyenaikaviṃśatiḥ /
yatra punaścaturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃprayuktamakuśalaṃ cittaṃ rāgeṇa va pratighena vā mānena vā vicikitsayā vā tatraikaviṃśatirbhavanti /
sa ca kleśaḥ āveṇikoktāśca viṃśatiḥ /
krodhādibhirapyupakleśairyathoktaiḥ saṃprayukte citte ete ca viṃśatiḥ sa copakleśa ityekaviṃśatirbhavanti 		nyon mongs pa zhi dang khro sogs dang /
'gyod pa dang ni nyi shu gcig /
mi dge ba'i sems 'dod chags kyang rung /
khong khro ba yang rung /
nga rgyal yang rung /
the tshom yang rung; nyon mongs pa bzhi dang mtshungs par ldan ba gang yin pa de la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ste /
nyon mongs pa de dang ma 'dres par bshad pa nyi shu'o /
khro ba la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ji skad bshad pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems la yang nyi shu po de dag dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dang nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ngo /
kaukṛtyenāpyekaviṃśatiḥ /
tadeva kaukṛtyamekaviṃśatitamaṃ bhavati 		'gyod pa dang ldan pa la yang nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ste /
'gyod pa de nyid nyi shu rtsa gcig pa yin no /
samāsata āveṇike cetasyakuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca viṃśatiḥ mdor na mi dge ba'i sems ma 'dres pa dang lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan ba la yang nyi shu 'byung la /
anyakleśopakleśasaṃprayukte tvekaviṃśatiḥ /
nivṛte 'ṣṭadaśa 		nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ngo /
bsgribs la bco brgyad /
satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ kāmadhātau nivṛtāvyākṛtam 'dod pa'i khams na 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o /
tatrāṣṭādaśa caittāḥ /
daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ vitarkavicārau ca 		de la ni sems las byung ba bco brgyad 'byung ste; sa dang po pa bcu dang nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa drug dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa'o /
dṛṣṭiḥ pūrvavadeva nādhikā bhavati lta ba ni snga ma dang 'dra ba nyid de lhag pa ma yin no /
aynatra dvādaśāvyākṛte matāḥ lung ma bstan pa gzhan la bcu gnyis dag tu 'dod /
nivṛtādanyadavyākṛtamanivṛtāvyākṛtam /
tatra dvādaśa caittā iṣṭāḥ /
daśa mahābhūmikā vitarkavicārau ca 		bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa las gzhan ba ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o; /
de la ni sems las byung ba bcu gnyis 'byung bar 'dod de /
sa mang po pa bcu dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag go /
bahirdeśakā avyākṛtamapi kaukṛtyamicchanti /
teṣāṃ tatsaṃprayukte cetasi trayodaśa bhavanti /
middhaṃ sarvāvirodhitvādyatra syādadhikam hi tat 		nyi 'og pa dag ni 'gyod pa lung du ma bstan par yang 'dod la yid mi bde ba yang yid bde ba dang 'dra bar lung du ma bstan par yang 'dod de /
de dag gi ltar na de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems la bcu gsum 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
gnyid ni kun la mi 'gal phyir /
gang la yod pa des bsnan no /
sarvairebhiryathoktai ścaitairmiddhamaviruddhaṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtatvāt /
ato tatra tatsyāt tatrādhikaṃ tadveditavyam 		gnyid ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang yin pa'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i sems thams cad dang mi 'gal bas /
de'i phyir gang la de yod pa de la des bsnan par rig par bya ste /
yatra dvāviṃśatistatra trayoviṃśatiryatra trayoviṃśatistatra caturviṃśatirityevamādi gang la nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'byung ba de la ni nyi shu rtsa gsum mo /
gang la nyi shu rtsa gsum 'byung ba de la ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
ya eva kāmadhātau caittānāṃ niyama uktaḥ gang de ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems las byung ba nges par bshad pa /
kaukṛtyamiddhākuśalānyādye dhyāne na santyataḥ /
ato yathoktāt kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ ca sarvathā nāsti prathame dhyāne yat kiñcidakuśalam 		de las 'gyod gnyid mi dge rnams /
bsam gtan dang po dag na med /
bsam gtan dang po na ni ji skad bshad pa de las 'gyod pa dang gnyid dang gang yang cung zad mi dge ba 'di lta ste /
pratighaḥ śāṭhyamadamāyāvarjyāśca krodhādaya āhrīkyānapatrāpye ca g yo dang sgyu dang rgyags pa ma gtogs pa khro ba la sogs pa dang khong khro ba dang nga cha med pa dang khrel med pa dag thams cad du med de /
anyatsarva tathaiva gzhan thams cad ni de dang 'dra'o /
ya eva prathame dhyāne na santi ta eva /
dhyānāntare vitarkaśca 		bsam gtan dang po na med pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho na dang rtog pa'ang bsam gtan khyad par can na med de /
nāsti /
śeṣaṃ tathaiva /
vicāraścāpyataḥ param /
dhyānāntarāt pareṇa dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣvārūpyeṣu ca yathāpratiṣiddhaṃ nāsti vicāraśca /
māyā śāṭhyaṃ cetyapiśabdāt /
śeṣaṃ tathaiva 		lhag ma ni de dang 'dra'o /
de yi gong na dpyod pa yang /
bsam gtan khyad par can las gong ma bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dang gzugs med pa dag na ni ji skad rtog pa dang dpyod pa yang med do /
yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni g yo dang sgyu yang med de /
lhag ma ni de dang 'dra'o /
brahmaṇo hi yāvacchāṭhyaṃ paṭhyate parṣatsambandhatvānnordhvam tshangs pa'i bar du sgyu yod par 'byung gi /
'khor dang 'brel ba ma yin pa'i phyir gong na ni med de /
sa hi svasyāṃ parṣadyaśvajitā bhikṣuṇā praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ kutremāni brahman catavāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante iti de ni rang gi 'khor gyi nang du dge slong rta thul gyis 'byung ba chen po 'di dag yongs su ma lus par gang du 'gag par 'gyur zhes dri ba dris pa dang mi shes pas kho bo ni tshangs pa'o /
tshangs pa chen po'o /
aprajānan kṣepamakārṣīt /
ahamasmin brahmā īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto bhūtānāmiti 		dbang phyug go /
byed pa po'o; /
sprul pa po'o /
'byin par byed pa po'o /
'byin pa po'o /
dngos po rnams kyi pha lta bu yin no zhes gtam rlung la bskur ro /
uktametadyasyāṃ bhūmau yatra citte yāvantaścaittāḥ sa gang na sems gang la sems las byung ba ji snyed cig 'byung ba de ni bshad zin to /
idānīṃ keṣāñcideva caittānāṃ tantravihitaṃ nānākāraṇaṃ vakṣyate da ni gzhung la sems las byung ba kha cig gi tha dad du bya ba 'byung ba brjod par bya ste /
āhrīkyasyānapatrāpyasya ca kiṃ nānākāraṇam ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na /
ahrīragurutā ma gus ngo tsha med /
guṇeṣu guṇavatsu cāgauravatā apratīśatā abhayamavaśavartitā āhrīkyaṃ gauravapratidvandvo dharmaḥ yon tan rnams dang yon tan can rnams la ma gus pa nyid de /
bkur ba med pa nyid dang 'jigs pas dbang mi sgyur ba nyid ni ngo tsha med pa nyid de gus pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so; /
avadye bhayādarśitvamatrapā khrel med /
kha na ma tho 'jigs mi lta /
avadyaṃ nāma yadvigarhitaṃ sadbhiḥ kha na ma tho ba zhes bya ba ni dam pa rnams kyis smad pa ste /
tatrābhayadarśitā 'napatrāpyam /
bhayamatrāniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ bhīyate 'smāditi 		de la 'jigs par mi lta ba ni khrel med pa'o /
'dir 'jigs pa ni mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ste /
'di las 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
kathamidaṃ vijñātavyam abhayasya darśanamabhayadarśitā āhosvit bhayasyādarśanam 'di ji ltar shes par bya /
mi 'jigs par lta ba 'jigs par mi lta ba nyid yin nam 'on te 'jigs par mi lta ba nyid yin /
kiṃ cātaḥ /
abhayasya darśanaṃ cet prajñā vijñāsyate bhayasyādarśanaṃ cedavidyā vijñāsyate 		de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
gal te mi 'jigs par lta ba yin na ni shes rab yin par shes par 'gyur ro /
gal te 'jigs par mi lta ba yin na ni ma rig par shes par 'gyur ro /
naiva hi darśanaṃ darśitā nāpyadarśanamadarśitā lta ba yang lta ba nyid ma yin la mi lta ba yang mi lta ba nyid ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
yastayornimittamupakleśastaccānapatrāpyamiti 		'o na ci zhe na /
de gnyis kyi rgyu mtshan nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa ste /
anye punarāhuḥ de ni khrel med pa zhes bya'o /
ātmāpekṣayā doṣairalajjana māhrīkyaṃ parāpekṣayā 'napatrāpyamiti /
evamapi dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyataḥ 		gzhan dag na re ni bdag la ltos nas nyes pa rnams kyis mi 'dzem pa ni ngo tsha med pa yin te /
gzhan la ltos nas ni khrel med pa yin no zhes zer ro /
de lta na yang ltos pa gnyis cig car ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
na khalūcyate yugapadātmānaṃ paraṃ cāpekṣata ityapi tvastyasau kadācidalajjā yā ātmānamapekṣamāṇasyāpi pravartate sā āhrīkyam bdag dang gzhan la ltos pa cig car ro zhes ni mi zer ro /
'on kyang mi 'dzem pa kha cig bdag la ltos nas kyang 'jug pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni ngo tsha med pa yin no /
asti yā paramapekṣamāṇasya pravarttate sā 'napatrāpyam gzhan la ltos nas 'jug pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni khrel med pa yin no /
viparyayeṇa hrīrapatrāpyaṃ ca veditavyam bzlog pa ni ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa yin par rig par bya ste /
pratahamena tāvat kalpena sagauravatā sapratīśatā na bhayavaśavrtitā hrīḥ /
avadyeṣvabhayadarśiatā 'patrāpyam 		re zhig rtog pa dang po ltar na gus pa dang bcas pa nyid de /
bkur ba dang bcas pa nyid dang 'jigs pas dbang sgyur ba dang bcas pa nyid ni ngo tsha shes pa yin la; kha na ma tho ba dag la 'jigs par lta ba nyid ni khrel yod pa yin no /
dvitīyena kalpenātmaparāpekṣābhyāṃ lajjane rtog pa gnyis pa ltar na ni bdag dang gzhan la ltos ba dag las 'dzem pa dag yin no /
premṇo gauravasya ca kiṃ nānākāraṇam /
prema śraddhā /
dvividhaṃ hi prema kliṣāṭamakliṣṭaṃ ca /
tatra kliṣṭaṃ tṛṣṇā yathā putradārādiṣu 		dga' ba dang gus pa la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na /
dga' dang zhes bya ba smos te /
dga' ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o /
de la nyon mongs pa can ni srid pa ste /
dper na bu dang chung ma la sogs pa dag la dga' ba lta bu'o /
akliṣṭaṃ śraddhā śāstṛguruguṇānviteṣu /
syācchraddhā naprema /
duḥdhasamudayālambanā śraddhā /
syāt prema na śraddhā /
kliṣṭaṃ prema /
ubhayaṃ nirodhamārgālambanā śraddhā 		nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni dad pa ste /
dper na ston pa dang bla ma dang yon tan can rnams la dga' ba lta bu'o /
dad pa yin la dga' ba ma yin pa yang yod de /
sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i dad pa lta bu'o /
dga' ba yin la dad pa ma yin pa yang yod de /
dga' ba nyon mongs pa can lta bu'o /
gnyi ga yin pa ni 'gog pa dang lam la dmigs pa'i dad pa lta bu'o /
nobhayametānākārān sthāpayitvā gnyi ga ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
pudgaleṣu tu prema na gauravaṃ putradārasārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsiṣu gang zag dag la ltos nas ni dga' ba yin la gus pa ma yin pa ni bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag la dga' ba lta bu'o /
gauravaṃ na prema anyaguruṣu /
ubhayaṃ svaguruṣu /
nobhayam etānākārān sthāpayitvā 		gus pa yin la dga' ba ma yin pa ni bla ma gzhan dag la gus pa lta bu'o /
gnyi ga yin pa ni rang gi bla ma dag la gus pa lta bu'o /
de gnyi ga ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
śraddhā hi nāma guṇasaṃbhāvanā /
tatpūrvikā ca priyatā prema /
tasmānna saiva premetyapare 		gzhan dag na re dad pa zhes bya ba ni yon tan la yid ches pa yin la /
de sngon du 'gro ba'i dga' ba ni dga' pa yin te /
de lta bas na de nyid dga' ba yin no zhes zer ro /
gurutvaṃ hrīḥ /
gauravaṃ hi nāma sapratīśatā /
tatpūrvikā ca lajjā hrīḥ /
ato na gauravameva hlīrityapare /
te punaḥ kāmarūpayoḥ /
ārūpyadhātau premagaurave na staḥ /
nanu ca śraddhā hrīśca kuśalamahābhūmikatvāttatrāpi vidyete 		gus nyid ngo tsha shes; gus pa ni ngo tsha shes pa ji skad bshad pa yin no /
gzhan dag na re gus pa zhes bya ba ni bkur ba dang bcas pa nyid yin la /
de sngon du 'gro ba'i 'dzem pa ni ngo tsha shes pa yin te /
de'i phyir gus pa nyid ngo tsha shes pa ma yin no zhes zer ro /
de gnyis 'dod dang gzugs dag na; gzugs med pa'i khams na ni dga' ba dang gus pa dag med do /
dad pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dge pa'i sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir de na yang yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
dvividhā hi śraddhā dharmeṣu pudgaleṣu ca /
evaṃ sapratīśatā 'pi /
tatra ye pudgalālambane śraddhāhriyau te tatra na staḥ 		dad pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
chos dag dang gang zag la dad pa yin la /
bkur ba dang bcas pa nyid kyang de dang 'dra'o /
de la gang dag gang zag la dmigs pa'i dad pa dang ngo tsha shes pa de dag de na med de /
te ceha premagaurave abhiprete 'dir ni dga' ba dang gus pa de dag la bsams pa yin no /
vitarkavicārayoḥ kiṃ nānākāraṇam rtogs pa dang dpyod pa dag la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na /
vitarkacārā vaudāryasūkṣmate rtog dang dpyod pa rtsing zhib nyid /
kasya /
cetasa iti paścādvakṣyati /
cittaudārikatā vitarkaḥ /
cittasūkṣmatā vicāraḥ 		gang gi zhe na /
sems kyi'o zhes 'og nas 'chad de /
rtog pa ni sems rtsing ba'o /
dpyod pa ni sems zhib pa'o /
kathaṃ punaḥ anayorekatra citte yogaḥ /
kecidāhuḥ /
yathā 'pyasuniṣṭhyūtaṃ sarpiḥ sūryaraśmibhirūpariṣṭātspṛṣṭaṃ nātiśyāyate nātivilīyate evaṃvitarkavicārayogāccittaṃ nātisūkṣmaṃ bhavati nātyodārika mityubhayorapi tatrāsti vyāpāraḥ /
evaṃ tarhi nimiṭtabhūtau vitarkavicārāvaudārika sūkṣmatayoḥ prāpnuto yathā payaścā tapaścasarpiṣaḥ śyānatva vilīnatvayornatu punastatsvabhāvau 		sems gcig la de gnyis ji ltar ldan zhe na /
kha cig na re dper na mar sar chu dag gi nang du bor ba steng nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis reg na ha cang yang mi 'khyag la /
ha cang yang mi 'ju ba de bzhin du /
sems kyang rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ha cang zhib par yang mi 'gyur /
ha cang rtsing bar yang mi 'gyur la /
de la gnyi ga'i bya ba yang yod do zhes zer ro /
de lta na ni ji ltar nyi ma dang chu mar sar 'khyag pa nyid dang 'ju ba nyid dag gi rgyu mtshan nyid yin gyi de dag gi ngo bo nyid ni ma yin pa ltar rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag kyang rtsing ba dang zhib pa nyid dag gi rgyu mtshan du gyur pa yin no /
āpekṣikī caudārikasūkṣmatā bhūmiprakārabhedādityābhavāgrādvitarkavicārau syātām rtsing ba dang zhib pas dang rnam pa'i bye brag gis ltos pa can yang yin pas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag yod par 'gyur ro /
nacaudārikasūkṣmātayā jātibhedo yukataḥ /
anye punarāhuḥ 		rtsing ba dang zhib pa nyid kyis rang bzhin tha dad par yang rigs pa ma yin no /
vāksaṃskārā vitrkavicārāḥ sūtra uktāḥ /
vitarkya vicārya vācaṃ bhāṣate nāvitasryāvicāryeti /
tatra ye audārikāste vitarkāḥ ye sūkṣmāste vicārāḥ /
yadi caikatra citte 'nyo dharma audāriko 'nyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ko 'tra virodha iti /
na syādvirodho yadi jātibhedaḥ syādvedanāsaṃjñāvat /
ekasyāṃ jātau mṛdvadhimātratā yugapanna saṃbhavati 		gzhan dag na re mdo las rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag ni ngag mngon par 'du byed pa yin par gsungs te /
brtags shing dpyad nas tshig tu smra'i ma brtags ma dpyad par ni ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo /
de la rtsing ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni rtog pa yin no /
zhib pa gang dag yin pa de dag na dpyod pa yin no zher zer ro /
gal te sems rtse gcig la rtsing ba yang chos gzhan yin /
zhib pa yang chos gzhan yin na 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod /
gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes bzhin du rigs tha dad pa zhig yin na ni 'gal ba med do /
rigs gcig pa ni chung du dang chen pa nyid cig car 'byung ba mi srid do /
jātibhedo /
sa tarhi vaktavyaḥ /
durvaco hyasāvato mṛdvadhimātratayā vyajyate 		rigs tha dad pa yang yod do /
'o na ni de brjod par bya dgos so /
de brjod par ni dka' ste /
de'i phyir chung du dang chen po'i nyid kyis gsal bar 'gyur ro /
naivaṃ vyakto bhavati /
pratyekaṃ jātīnāṃ mṛdvadhimātratavāt 		de lta na ni gsal bar mi 'gyur te; rigs re re la yang chung du dang chen po yod pa'i phyir ro /
naiva hi vitarkavicārāvekatra citte bhavata ityapare /
kathamidānīṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ pañcāṅgayuktam /
bhūmitastat pañcāṅgayukataṃ na kṣaṇataḥ 		gzhan dag na re sems gcig la rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag mi 'byung ba nyid do zhes zer ro /
da ni ji ltar bsam gtan dang po yan lag la par bshad ce na /
sa las de yan lag lnga par bshad kyi skad cig las ni ma yin no /
mānamadayoḥ kiṃ nānākāraṇam /
māna unnatiḥ /
madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ 		nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dag la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na /
nga rgyal khengs pa rgyags pa ni /
rang gi chos la chags pa yi /
sems ni yongs su gtugs pa'o /
yena kenacit parato viśeṣaparikalpena cetasa unnatiḥ mānaḥ pha rol po las gang yang rung pa'i khyad par zhig yongs su brtags nas sems khengs pa ni nga rgyal lo /
madastu svadharmeṣveva raktasya yaccetasaḥ paryādānam rgyags pa ni rang gi chos rnams kho na la chags pa'i sems yongs su gtugs pa gang yin pa'o /
yathā madyaja evaṃ rāgajaḥ /
saṃprahaṛśaṇaviśeṣo mada ityapare /
uktāḥ saha cittena caittāḥ prakāraśa steṣāṃ punarimāḥ saṃjñāḥ paribhāṣyante 		gzhan dag na re chang las skyes pa ji lta bde bzhin du rgyags pa yang 'dod chags las skyes pa'i kun tu dga' ba'i bye brag yin no zhas zer ro /
sems las byung ba rnams sems dang bcas te rnam pa re re nas bshad zin to /
pravacana etābhiḥ sadvyavahārāt /
cittaṃ mano 'tha vijñānamekārthaṃ /
cinotīti cittam 		gsung rab las 'di dag gis tha snyad du 'dogs pa'i phyir de dag gi ming 'di dag brjod de /
sems dang yid dang rnam shes ni don gcig 'byed pas na sems so /
manuta iti manaḥ shes pas na yid do /
vijānātīti vijñānam rnam par shes pa nas rnam par shes pa'o; /
cittaṃ śubhāśubhairdhātubhiriti cittam /
tadevāśrayabhutaṃ manaḥ 		kha cig na re dge ba dang mi dge ba'i khams dag gis bsags pas na sems so /
de nyid rten du gyur pa ni yid do /
āśritabhūtaṃ vijñānamityapare rten par gyur pa ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes zer ro /
yathā cittaṃ mano vijñānamityeko 'rthaḥ /
evaṃ /
cittacaitasāḥ /
sāśrayā lambanākārāḥ saṃparayuktāśca /
eko 'rthaḥ /
ta eva hi cittacaittāḥ sāśrayā ucyante indriyāśritatvāt 		ji ltar sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba don gcig pa de bzhin du sems dang sems byung dang; /
rten dang dmigs dang rnam bcas dang mtshungs par ldan ba'ang /
don gcig ste /
sems dang sems las byung ba de dag nyid dbang po la brten pa'i phyir rten dang bcas pa dag ces bya'o /
sālambanā viṣayagrahaṇāt yul la 'dzin pa'i phyir dmigs pa dang bcas pa dag go /
sākārāstasyaivālambanasya prakāraśa ākaraṇāt dmigs pa de nyid la rnam pa re re nas bye brag tu gcod pa'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas pa dag go /
samprayuktāḥ samaṃ prayuktatvāt mnyam par ldan pa'i phyir mtshungs par ldan ba dag go /
kena prakāreṇa samaṃ parayuktā ityāha rnam pa gang dag gis mtshungs par ldan zhe na /
pañcadhā /
pañcabhiḥ samatāprākārairāśrayālambanākārakāladravyasamatābhiḥ 		rnam pa lngas /
mtshungs pa rnam pa lnga po rten dang dmigs pa dang rnam pa dang dus dang rdzas mtshungs pa dag gis mtshungs par ldan no /
keyaṃ samatā /
yathaiva hyekaṃ cittamevaṃ caittā apyekaikā iti 		rdzas mtshungs pa gang zhe na /
ji ltar sems gcig kho na yin pa de bzhin du sems las byung ba rnams kyang re re yin pa'o /
nirdiṣṭāścittacaittāḥ savistaraprabhedāḥ sems dang sems las byung ba rgyas pa dang rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa dag bstan zin to /
viprayuktāstu saṃskārāḥ prāptyaprāptī sabhāgatā mi ldan pa yi 'du byed rnams /
thob dang ma thob skal mnyam dang /
āsaṃjñikaṃ samāpattī jīvitaṃ lakṣaṇāni ca /
nāmakāyādayaśceti /
ime saṃskārā na cittena asaṃprayuktā naca rūpasvabhāvā iti cittaviprayuktāucyante 		'du shes med snyoms 'jug dag dang srog dang mtshan nyid rnams dang ni /
ming gi tshogs la sogs pa yang /
'du byed 'di dag ni sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin la gzugs kyi nga bzhin yang ma yin bas sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag ces bya'o /
tatra tāvat /
praptirlābhaḥ samanvayaḥ /
dvividhā hi prāptiraprāptavihīnasya ca lābhaḥ pratilabdhena ca samanvāgamaḥ 		de la re zhig thob pa rnyed dang ldan pa'o /
thob pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
ma thob pa dang rnam par nyams pa las rnyed pa dang thob nas ldan pa'o /
viparyayādaprāptiriti siddham bzlog pa ni ma thob pa zhes bya bar grub bo /
kasya punarime prāptyaprāptī thob pa dang ma thob pa 'di dag gang gi yin zhe na /
prāptyaprāptī svasaṃtāna patitānāṃ thob dang ma thob dang rgyud du /
gtogs pa rnams kyi'o /
na parasaṃtānapatitānām gzhan gyi rgyud du gtogs pa rnams kyi ni ma yin te /
nahi parakīryaiḥ kaścitsamanvāgataḥ nāpyasaṃtatipatitānām /
na hyasatatvasaṃkhyātaiḥ kaścitsamanvāgataḥ 		gzhan gyi dag dang ni 'gal yang ldan pa med do /
rgyud du ma gtogs pa rnams kyi yang ma yin te /
sems can du mi bgrang ba dag dang ni 'ga' yang ldan pa med do /
eṣa tāvat saṃskṛteṣu niyamaḥ 'di ni re zhig 'dus ma byas dag gi nges pa yin no /
asaṃskṛteṣu punaḥ prāptyaprāptī 'dus ma byas rnams kyi thob pa dang ma thob pa dag ni /
nirodhayoḥ 'gog gnyis kyi /
sarvasattvā apratisaṃkhyānirodhena samanvāgatāḥ so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang ni sems can thams cad dang ldan no /
ata eva hi cottamabhidharme anāsravairdharmaḥ kaḥ samanvāgataḥ de nyid kyi phyir chos mngon pa las /
zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang su zhig ldan zhe na /
āha /
sarvasattvā iti /
pratisaṃkhyānirodhena sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthavarjyāḥ sarva āryāḥ pṛthagjanāśca kecitsamanvāgatāḥ /
ākāśena tu nāsti kaścitsamanvāgataḥ /
tasmādasya nāsati prāptiḥ /
yasya ca nāsti prāptistastasyāprāptirapi nāstīti siddhāntaḥ 		smras pa /
sems can thams cad do zhes 'byung ngo zhes grag go /
so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang ni 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa skad cig ma dang po la gnas pa ma gtogs pa 'phags pa thams cad dang so so'i skye bo kha cig kyang yin no /
nam mkha' dang ni 'ga' yang ldan ba med de /
de bas na 'di la thob pa med de /
gang la thob pa med pa de la ni ma thob pa yang med do zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin no /
prāptirnāmāsti kiñcit bhāvāntarmiti /
kuta etat 		thob pa zhes bya ba rdzas gzhan cung zad cig yod do zhes bya ba 'di gang las /
āha sūtrāt /
sūtre hyustaṃ sa eṣāṃ daśānāmaśaikṣāṇāṃ dharmaṇāmutpādāt pratilambhātsamanvāgamādaryo bhavati pañcāṅgaviprahīṇa iti vistaraḥ /
tena tarhi asattvākhyairapi samanvāgamaḥ prāpnoti parasattvaiśca 		smras pa mdo las te /
mdo las de mi slob pa'i chos bcu po 'di dag bskyed cing so sor thob pa las kun tu ldan pas na yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa'i 'phags par gyur ro zhes rgyas par gsungs so /
'o na ni des ni sems can du mi sten pa dag dang sems can gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur te /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
sūtra vacanāt /
rājā bhikṣavaścakravarti saptabhī ratnaiḥ samanvāgata iti vistaraḥ /
vaśitvamatra samanvāgamaśabdenoktam 		mdo las dge slong dag 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhes rgyas par 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
der ni dbang ba de nyid la ldan pa'i sgrar gsungs te /
tasya teṣu ratneṣu vaśitvaṃ kāmacāra iti /
atra vaśitvaṃ samanvāgamo 'nyatra punardravyāntaramiti 		de rin po che sna bdun dag la dbang nyid dga' dgur byed pa'i phyir ro /
ldan ba der ni dbang ba nyid yin la /
gzhan du ni rdzas gzhan yin no /
zhes bya ba 'di dag las /
kuta etat kaḥ punarevamayogaḥ /
ayam ayogaḥ yad asyā naiva svabhāvaḥ prajñāyate rūpaśabdādivad rāgadveṣādivad vā na cāpi kṛtyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrādivat 		de lta na yang mi rung ba ci zhig yod /
mi rung ba 'di dag yod de /
gang gi phyir gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa ltar ram /
'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa ltar 'di'i rang gi ngo bo yang mi snang la /
tasmāt dravyadharmāsaṃbhavādayogaḥ /
utpattiheturdharmāṇāṃ prāptiriti cet /
asaṃskṛtasya na syāt 		mig dang rna ba la sogs pa ltar bya ba yang mi snang ba de'i phyir rdzas kyi chos mi srid pas mi rung ngo /
gal te chos rnams skye ba'i rgyu la thob pa'o zhes bya'o zhe na /
'dus ma byas kyi ma yin par 'gyur ro /
ye ca dharmā aprāptā ye ca tyaktā bhūmisaṃcāravaiarāgyatasteṣāṃ kathamutpattiḥ syāt chos gang dag ma thob pa rnams dang gang dag sa 'phos pa dang 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms pa de dag kyang ji ltar skye bar 'gyur ro /
sahajaprāptihetukā cet /
jātiridānīṃ kiṅkarī jātijātirvā /
sakalabandhanānāṃ khalvapi mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattibhedo na syāt prāptyabhedāt 		'on te lhan cig skyes pa'i thob pa'i rgyu rkyen yin no zhe na /
de'i tshe skye ba'am /
skye ba'i skye ba ci zhig byed par 'gyur /
'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po skye ba'i khyad par du yang mi 'gyur te /
thob pa bye brag med pa'i phyir ro /
yato vā sa bhedastata evāstu tadutpattiḥ 'on te de las de dag gi bye brag tu 'gyur na ni de kho na las de dag skye ba yin no /
tasmānnotpattihetuḥ prāptiḥ /
kaścaivamāhotpattihetuḥ prāptiriti 		de lta bas na thob pa skye ba'i rgyu ma yin no /
thob pa skye ba'i rgyu yin no zhes de skad du su zer /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
vyavasthā hetuḥ rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin te /
asatyāṃ hi prāptau laukikamānasānāmāryapṛthagjanānāmāryā ime pṛthagjanā ima iti na syād vyavasthānam thob pa med na 'jig rten pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo rnams la 'di dag ni 'phags pa'o /
'di dag ni so so'i skye bo ngo shes rnam par gzhag par mi 'gyur ro /
prahīṇāprahīṇa kleśatāviśeṣādetat bhavitumarhati /
etaccaiva kathaṃ bhaviṣyatyeṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣāmaprahīṇa iti /
praptau satyāmetatsidhyati tadvigamāvigamāt /
āśrayaviśeṣādetatsidhyati /
āśrayo hi sa āryāṇāṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgasāmarthyāttathā parāvṛtto bhavati yathā na punastatpraheyāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prarohasamartho bhavati 		de ni nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang ma spangs pa nyid kyi bye brag las 'gyur bar 'os so /
'di dag ni nyon mongs pa spangs pa'o /
'di dag ni nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid du yang ji ltar 'gyur /
thob pa yod na ni de dang bral ma bral las 'di yang 'grub bo /
'di ni rten gyi bye brag las 'grub par 'gyur te /
'phags pa rnams kyi gnas de ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi mthus ji ltar de dag gis spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yang 'byung bar mi nus pa de ltar gyur pa yin te /
ato 'gnidagdhavrīhivadavījībhūte āśraye kleśānāṃ prahīṇakleśa ityucyate /
upahatavījabhāve vā laukikena mārgeṇa 		de'i phyir rten 'bru mes tshig pa bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sa bon du ma gyur pa'am /
'jig rten pa'i lam gyi sa bon gyi dngos po nyams par byas na nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes bya la /
viparyayādaprahīṇakleśaḥ /
yaścāprahīṇastena samanvāgato yaḥ prahīṇastenā samanvāgata iti prajñapyate /
kuśalā api dharmā dviprakārā ayatnabhāvino yatnabhāvinaśca ye ta ucyante utpattipratilambhikāḥ prāyogikāśceti 		bzlog pa ni ma spangs pa ma yin pas gang ma spangs pa de dang mi ldan /
gang spangs pa de dang ni mi ldan no zhes gdags so /
dge ba'i chos rnams kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
ma 'bad par skye ba rnams dang 'bad de skye ba rnams te /
gang dag skye bas thob pa dang sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba de dag yin no /
tatrāyatnabhāvibhirāśrayasya tadvījabhāvānupaghātāt samanvāgata upaghātādasamanvāgata ucyate samucchinnakuāśalamūlaḥ /
tasya tūpaghāto mithyādṛṣṭyā veditavyaḥ 		de la ma 'bad par skye ba rnams dang ni rten de dag gi sa bon gyi dngos po nyams par ma byas pa'i phyir ldan la /
nyams par byas pa'i phyir mi ldan pa zhes bya ste /
dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa yin no /
de yang log par lta bas yin par rig par bya'o /
na tu khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vījabhāvasyātyantaṃ santatau samudghātaḥ /
yepunaryatnabhāvinastairutpannaistadutpattirvaśitvā vighātātsantateḥ samanvāgata ucyate /
tasmādvījamevātrānapoddhṛtamanupahatam paripṛṣṭaṃ ca vāśiatvakāle samanvāgamākhyāṃ tabhate nānyad dravyam /
kiṃ punaridaṃ bījaṃ nāma 		rgyu la dge ba'i chos rnams gyi [*kyi?] sa bon gyi dngos po gtan du yang dag par bcom pa ni ma yin no /
gang dag 'bad de skye ba ni skyes pa de dag dang rgyud la de dag skye ba'i dbang nyid thogs pa med pa'i phyir ldan pa zhes bya'o /
de'i phyir 'dir sa bon kho na rtsa nas ma bton pa dang nyams par ma byas pa dang dbang nyid kyi dus na rgyas par gyur pa ni ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob kyi rdzas gzhan ni med do /
sa bon zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin /
yannāmarūpaṃ phalotpattau samartha sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa vā /
santatipariṇāmaviśeṣāt 		'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la rgyud 'gyur ba'i bye brag gi mngon sum mam brgyud pas nus pa'i ming dang gzugs gang yin pa'o /
ko 'yaṃ pariṇāmo nāma 'gyur ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin /
santateranyathātvam /
hetuphalabhūtastraiyadhvikāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
yat tūkta lobhena samanvāgato 'bhavyaścatvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayitumiti /
tatrādhivāsanaṃ lobhasyāvinodanaṃ vā samanvāgamaḥ 		rgyud gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba'o /
rgyud ces bya ba 'di yang ci zhig yin /
'du byed dus gsum pa rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa rnams so /
gang las chags pa dang ldan pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gzhi po dag bsgom pa'i skal ba dang mi ldan no zhes gsungs pa der ni ldan pa chags pa dang du len ba'am mi sel ba yin te /
yāvaddhi tasyādhivāsako 'vinodako bhavati tāvat bhavyastāni bhāvayitum /
evamayaṃ samanvāgamaḥ sarvāthā prajñaptidharmo na tu dravyadharmaḥ /
tasya ca pratiṣedho 'samanvāgama iti 		ji srid du de dang du len ba'am mi sel ba de srid du de dag bsgom pa'i skal ba dang mi ldan no /
de ltar na ldan pa 'di dang de 'gog pa mi ldan pa ni rnam pa thams cad du btags pa'i chos yin gyi rdzas kyi chos ni ma yin no /
dravyameva tu vaibhāṣikāḥ ubhayaṃ varṇayanti bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gnyi ga rdzas kho na yin no zhes brjod do /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
eṣa hi naḥ siddhānta iti /
sā kilaiṣā praptiḥ 		'di ni kho bo cag gis grub pa'i mtha' yin no zhes zer ro /
thob pa de ni /
traiyadhvikānāṃ trividhā /
atītānāṃ dharmāṇāmatītā 'pi prāptirastyanāgatyā 'pi pratyutpannā 'pi 		dus gsum pa'i rnam pa gsum zhes grag ste /
chos 'das pa rnams kyi thob pa 'das pa yang yod /
ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba yang yod la /
evamanāgataparatyutpannānāṃ pratyekaṃ trividhā de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi yang so sor rnam pa gsum mo /
ṣubhādīnāṃ ṣubhādikā /
kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ kuāśalākuśalāvyākṛtaiva yathākramaṃ prāptiḥ /
svadhātukā tadāptānāṃ /
ye dharmāstaddhātvāptāsteṣāṃ svadhātukā prāptiḥ 		dge la sogs kyi dge la sogs /
dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi thob pa ni rim pa bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no /
der gtogs rnams kyi rang khams pa /
chos gang dag khams gang du gtogs pa de dag gi thob pa ni rang gi khams pa yin te /
kāmarūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarī yathākramam /
anāptā nāṃ caturvidhā /
anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ caturvidhā praptiḥ /
samāsena traidhātukī cānāsravā ca /
tatrāpraptiṃsaṃṅkhyānirodhasya traidhātukī pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya rūpārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ca /
mārgasatyasyānāsravaiva 		'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi thob pa ni rim pa bzhin du 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa yin no /
ma gtogs rnams kyi rnam pa bzhi /
zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi thob pa ni mdong bsdu na rnam pa bzhi ste /
khams gsum pa dang zag pa med pa'o /
de la so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa'i ni khams gsum pa yin no /
so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa yang yin la /
zag pa med pa yang yin no; /
lam gyi bden pa'i zag pa med pa nyid do /
seyaṃ samasya caturvidhā bhavati de ni mdor bsdus te rnam pa bzhi yin no /
śaikṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śaikṣaiva prāptiḥ akṣaikṣāṇāmaśaikṣānāśaikṣāṇāntubhedaḥ /
sa nirdiśyate 		slob pa'i chos rnams kyi thob pa ni slob pa kho na yin no /
mi slob pa rnams kyi ni mi slob pa kho na yin no /
slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa rnams kyi ni bye brag yod pas de bstan par bya ste /
tridhā naśaikṣā 'śaikṣāṇāṃ /
naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā dharmā ucyante sāsravā dharmā asaṃskāṛtaṃ ca /
teṣāṃ śaikṣādibhedena trividhā prāptiḥ /
sāsravāṇāṃ tāvat naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣī prāptiḥ /
apratisaṃkhyānirodhasya ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya cānāryeṇa praptasya 		slob dang mi slob min gyi gsum /
slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i chos zhas bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams dang 'dus ma byas so /
de dag gi thob pa ni slob pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum ste /
re zhig zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pas thob pa so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i thob pa ni slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin no /
tasyaiva śaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa praptasya śaikṣī aśaikṣeṇāśaikṣī de nyid slob pa'i lam gyis thob pa'i ni slob pa'o /
mi slob pa'i lam gyi sa thob pa'i ni mi slob pa'o /
darśanabhāvanāheyānāṃ yathākramaṃ darāśanabhāvanāheyaiva parāptiḥ mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams ni thob pa ni rim pa bzhin du mthong bas dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na yin no /
aheyānāṃ tu bhedaḥ /
sa nirdiśyate /
aheyānāṃ dvidhā matā 		spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams kyi ni bye brag yod pas de bstan par bya ba ste /
sang bya min pa'i rnam gnyis 'dod /
apraheyādharmā anāsravāḥ /
teṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodhasya bhāvanāheyā prāptiḥ anāryaprāptasya ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya /
tasyaivāryamārgaprāptasyānāsravā 'heyā mārgasatyasya ca 		spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i chos dag ni zag pa med pa rnams te /
de dag las so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pas thob pa so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i thob pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya'o /
de nyid 'phags pa'i lam gyis thob pa'i dang lam gyi bden pa ni zag pa med pa ste spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'o /
yaduktaṃ traiyadhvikānāṃ trividhe ti tasyotsargasyāyamapavādaḥ dus gsum pa'i rnam pa gsum zhes spyir bstan pa gang yin pa de'i dmigs kyis bstan pa ni 'di yin te /
avyākṛtāptiḥ sahajā lung bstan min thob lhan cig skye /
anivṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ sahajaiva prāptirnāgrajā na paścātkālajā /
durbalatvāt 		ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi thob pa ni stobs chung ba'i phyir lhan cig skye ba kho na ste /
sngar skye ba yang med la dus phyis skye ba yang med do /
tenateṣāmatītānāmatītaiva yāvat pratyutpannānāṃ pratyutpannaiva /
kiṃ sarvasyaivānivṛtāvyākṛtasya 		des na de dag gi ni 'das pa rnams kyi yang 'das pa kho na yin la /
da ltar byung ba rnams kyi bar du yang da ltar byung ba kho na yin no /
ci ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa thams cad kyi de dang 'dra'am zhe na /
na sarvasya /
abhijñānairmāṇikādṛte 		mngon shes sprul pa ma gtogs pa /
thams cad kyi de dang mi 'dra ste /
dve abhijñe avyākṛte nirmāṇacittaṃ ca varjayitvā /
teṣāṃ hi balavattvāt prayogaviśeṣaniṣpatteḥ pūrva paścāt sahajā prāptiḥ 		mngon par shes pa lung du ma bstan pa gnyis dang sprul pa'i sems ma gtogs pa'o /
de dag ni sbyor ba'i khyad par gyis 'grub pas stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir sngar dang phyis dang lhan cig tu skye ba yang yod do /
śailpasthānikasyāpi kasyacidīryāpathikasyā bzo'i gnas pa kha cig dang spyod lam pa shin tu goms pa yang 'dod do /
tyarthamabhyastasyecchanti /
kimanivṛtāvyākṛtasyaiva sahajā praptirityāha 		ci ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na'i thob pa la lhan cig skye ba yin nam zhe na /
smras pa /
nivṛtasya ca rūpasya bsgribs pa'i gzugs kyi'ang /
nivṛtāvyākṛtasyāpi vijñaptirūpasya saharjaiva prāptiradhimātreṇāpyavijñaptyanutthāpanādaurbalyasiddheḥ /
yathā 'vyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ praptibhedaḥ kimevaṃ kuśalākuśalānāmapikaścit prāptibhedo 'sti 		gzugs kyi rnam par rig byed bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i thob pa yang lhan cig skye ba kho na ste /
chen pos kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa mi slob pas stobs chung bas grub pa'i phyir ro /
ji ltar lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams kyi thob pa'i bye brag 'di yin pa ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi thob pa la yang bye brag 'ga' zhig yod dam zhe na /
astītyāha smras pa /
kāme rūpasya nāgrajā yod de; 'dod pa na /
kāmāvacarasya vijñaptyavijñaptirūpasyāgrajā praptiḥ sarvathā nāsti /
sahajā cāsti paścātkālajā ca /
kimaprāpterapi prāptivatprakārabhedaḥ 		gzugs kyi sngar ni skye ba med /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi thob pa ni rnam pa thams cad du sngar skye ba med do /
lhan cig skye ba dang dus phyis skye ba ni yod do /
ci ma thob pa yang thob pa bzhin du rnam pa'i bye brag yod dam /
netyāha /
kiṃ tarhi /
akliṣṭāvyākṛtā 'prāptiḥ 		smras pa med do /
'o na ci lta bu zhe na ma thob ma bsgribs lung ma bstan /
aprāptiranivṛtāvyākṛtaiva sarvā /
adhvabhedena punaḥ 		ma thob pa thams cad ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no /
dus kyi bye brag gis ni /
sā 'tītājātayostridhā /
pratyutpannasya nāratyaprāptiḥ pratyutpannā 		'das ma skyes kyi de rnam gsum /
da ltar byung ba'i ma thob pa da ltar byung ba ni med do /
atītānāgatayostu traiyadhvikī /
kāmādyāptāmalānāṃ ca 		'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag gi ni dus gsum pa ma yin no /
'dod sogs gtogs dang dri med kyi'ang /
trividheti varttate rnam gsum zhes bya bar sbyar te /
kāmāptānāṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarī /
evaṃ rūpārūpyāptānāmanāsravāṇāṃ ca nāstyanāsravā kācidaprāptiḥ /
tathāhi 		'dod par gtogs pa rnams kyi ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa yin la /
gzugs dang gzugs med par gtogs pa rnams dang ma gtogs pa rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra'o /
ma thob pa zag pa med pa ni 'ga' yang med de /
'di ltar /
mārgasyāprāptiriṣyate lam ma thob pa so so yi /
skye bor 'dod do /
pṛthagjanatvam /
pṛthagjanatvaṃ katamat /
āryadharmāṇāmalābha iti śāstrapāṭhaḥ 		bstan bcos las /
so so'i skye bo nyid gang zhe na /
'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi ma rnyed pa'o zhes 'don te /
alābhaśca nāmāprāptiḥ /
naca pṛthagjanatvamanāsravaṃ bhavitumarhati 		gal te ma rnyed pa zhes bya ba ma thob pa yin pas so so'i skye bo nyid ni zag pa med pa yin par mi 'os so /
katameṣāmāryadharmāṇāmalābhaḥ 'phags pa'i chos gang dag gi ma rnyed pa yin zhe na /
sarveṣāmaviśeṣavacanāt /
sa tu yo vinā lābhenālābhaḥ 		thams cad kyi yin te /
khyad par med par 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
de ni rnyed pa med par ma rnyed pa gang yin pa ste /
anyathā hi cuddho 'pi śrāvakapratyekabuddhagotrakai rasamanvāgamādanāryaḥ syāt da lta ma yin na sangs rgyas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can dag dang mi ldan pa'i phyir dang 'phags pa ma yin par 'gyur ro /
evaśabdastarhi paṭhitavyaḥ /
na paṭhitavyaḥ /
ekapadānyapi hyavadhāraṇāni bhavanti 		'o na ni kho na zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don dgos so /
gdon mi dgos te /
tshig gcig pu dag kyang nges par 'dzin pa yin te /
dper na chu 'thung ba'o /
tadyathā abbhakṣo vāyubhakṣa iti rlung za ba'o zhes bya ba bzhin no /
duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntitatsahabhuvāmalābha ityapare gzhan dag na re sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang de dag lhan cig 'byung ba rnams kyi'o zhes zer ro /
na ca tadyogā danāryatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
tadalābhasyātyantaṃ hatatvāt 		de dag btang bas 'phags pa ma yin pa nyid du thal bar yang mi 'gyur te /
de dag gi ma rnyed pa gtan du bcom pa'i phyir ro /
te tarhi trigotrā iti katameṣāmalābhaḥ 'o na ni de dag kyang rigs gsum pa yin na gang dag gi ma rnyed pa yin /
sarveṣām /
evaṃ tarhi sa eva doṣaḥ /
punaḥ sa eva parihāraḥ 		thams cad kyi yin no /
'o na ni nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro /
lan yang de nyid yin no /
yatnastarhi vyarthaḥ /
evaṃ tu sādhu yathā sautrāntikānām 		'o na ni 'bad pa don med par 'gyur bas mdo sde pa rnams kyi ji lta ba de lta bu ni legs pa yin no /
kathaṃ ca sautrāntikānām mdo sde pa rnams kyi ji lta bu yin /
anutpannāryadharmasantatiḥ pṛthagjanatvamiti 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma skyes pa'i rgyud ni so so'i skye bo nyid yin no zhes bya ba'o /
atheyamaprāptiḥ kathaṃ vihīyate yang ma thob pa 'di ji ltar rnam par nyams par 'gyur zhe na /
yasya yā dharmasya prāptirasau /
tatprāptibhusaṃcārād vihīyate 		chos gang gi ma thob pa gang yin pa de ni /
de thob dang sa 'phos nas ni rnam nyams 'gyur /
re zhig 'di lta ste /
yathā tāvadāryamārgasyālābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ tasya lābhāttadvihīyate bhūmisaṃcārācca 'phags pa'i lam gyi ma rnyed pa ni so so'i skye bo nyid de /
de ni de rnyed pa dang sa 'phos pa las rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /
evamanyeṣāmapi yojyam gzhan dag gi yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o /
vihīyata iti tasyā aprāpteraprāptirutpadyate prāptiśchidyate /
kiṃ punaraprāptiprāptyorapi prāptyaprāptī bhavataḥ 		rnam par nyams par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ma thob pa de ma thob pa skye zhing thob pa 'chad par 'gyur ro /
ci ma thob pa dang thob pa dag gi yang thob pa dang ma thob pa yod dam /
ubhayorapyubhayaṃ bhavtītyāhuḥ smras pa /
gnyi ga'i yang gnyi ga yod do /
nanu caivamanavasthā prasaṅgaḥ praptīnām de lta na thob pa rnams thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
nānavasthāprasaṅgaḥ /
parasparasamanvāgamāt /
ātmanā tṛtīyo hi dharma utpadyate /
sa ca dharmastasya prāptiḥ prāptiprāptiśca /
tatra prāptyutpādāttena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bhavati prāptiprāptyā ca /
prāptiprāptyutpādāt punaḥ prāptyaiva samanvāgato bhavatyato nānavsthā /
evaṃ ca kṛtva ātmanā tṛtīyasya dharmasya kuśalasya kliṣṭasya kliṣṭasya vā dvitīye kṣaṇe tisraḥ prāptayo jāyante /
tāsāṃ ca punastisro 'nuprāptaya iti ṣaḍ bhavanti /
tṛtīye kṣaṇe prathamadvitīyakṣaṇotpannānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ nava prāptayaḥ sārdhamanuprāptibhirityaṣṭādāśa bhavanti /
evamuttarottaravāṛddhiprasaṇṅgenaitāḥ praptayo visarpantyaḥ sarveṣāmatītānāgatānāṃ kleśopakleśakṣaṇānāmupapattilābhikānāṃ ca kuśalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃprayoga sahabhuvāmanādyantasaṃsāraparyāpannānāmanantā ekasya prāṇinaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe upajāyante ityanantadravyāḥ pratisantānamātmabhāvakṣaṇāḥ sattvānāṃ bhavanti 		phan tshun ldan pa'i phyir thug pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro /
chos bdag nyid gtogs pa gsum skye ste /
chos de dang de'i thob pa dang thob pa'i thob pa'o /
de la thob pa skyes pas chos de dang thob pa'i thob pa dang ldan par 'gyur la /
thob pa'i thob pa skyes pas thob pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur bas de'i phyir thug pa med pa ma yin no /
de ltar byas na skad cig ma gnyis pa la dge ba'ang rung nyon mongs pa can yang rung chos bdag gnyid gtogs par gsum gyi thob pa gsum skye bar 'gyur la /
de dag gi rjes kyi thob pa yang gsum yin pas drug tu 'gyur ro /
skad cig ma gsum pa la ni skad cig ma dang po dang gnyis pa la skyes pa'i rdzas rnams kyi thob pa dgu po rjes kyi thob pa dang bcas pas bco brgyad du 'gyur ro /
de ltar thob pa rnams gong nas gong du spel ba'i 'gres kyis bskyed na srog chags gcig la yang skad cig skad cig la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang skyes nas thob pa'i dge ba'i skad cig ma mtshungs par ldan pa dang lhan cig 'byung bar bcas pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i 'khor bar gtogs pa thams cad kyi mtha' yas pa dag skye bar 'gyur bas sems can rnams kyi so so'i rgyud kyi lus kyi skad cig ma la rdzas mtha' yas pa can dag 'byung ngo /
atyutsavo vatāyaṃ prāptīnāṃ varttate /
kevalaṃ tu apratighātinyo yato 'vakāśamākāśe labhante 		kye ma 'di ni thob pa rnams kyi dga' ston chen po zhig ste; de thogs pa med pas 'di ltar go skabs rnyed kyi /
itarathā hyākāśe 'pyava kāśo na syāt dvitīyasya prāṇinaḥ de lta ma yin na srog chags gnyis pa'i ni nam mkha' la go skabs yod par mi 'gyur ro /
atha keyaṃ sabhāgatā /
sabhāgatā sattvasāmyaṃ 		yang skal ba mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
skal mnyam sems can 'dra ba'o /
sabhāgatā nāma dravyam /
sattvānāṃ sākṛśyaṃ nikāyasa bhāga ityasyāḥ śāstre saṃjñā 		skal ba mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i rdzas ni sems can rnams kyi 'dra ba yin te /
bstan bcos las ni 'di'i ming ris mthun pa zhes 'byung ngo /
sā punarabhinnā bhinnā ca de yang tha dad pa ma yin pa dang tha dad pa ste /
abhinnā sarvasattvānāṃ sattvasabhāgatā tha dad pa ma yin pa ni /
sems can thams cad sems can du skal ba mnyam pa ste /
pratisattvaṃ sarveṣu bhāvāt /
bhinnā punasteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ dhātubhūmigatiyonijātistrīpuruṣopāsakabhikṣuśaikṣā śaikṣyādibhedena pratiniyatā dharmasabhāgatā /
punaḥ skndhāyatanadhātutaḥ yadi satvasabhāgatā dravyamaviśiṣtaṃ na syāt anyonyaviśeṣabhinneṣu sattveṣu sattvasttva ityabhedena buddhirna syāt prajñaptiśca /
evaṃ skandhādi buddhiprajñaptayyo 'pi yojyāḥ /
syāccyavetopapadyeta na ca sattvasabhāgatāṃ vijahyānna ca pratilabheteti /
catuṣkoṭikaḥ /
prathamā koṭiḥ yataścyavate tatraivopapadyamānaḥ 		thams cad la yang sems can re re yod pa'i phyir ro /
tha dad pa ni sems can de dag nyid khams dang sa dang 'gro ba dang skye gnas dang rigs dang pho dang mo dang dge bsnyen dang dge slong dang slob pa dang mi slob pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so sor nges pa'o /
chos kyi skal ba mnyam pa ni phung po dang skye mched dang khams kyi sgo nas so /
gal te skal pa mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rdzas khyad par med pa zhig med na phan tshun khyad par tha dad pa'i sems can rnams la bye brag med par sems can zhes bya ba'i blo 'jug pa dang 'dogs par yang mi 'gyur te /
phung po la sogs pa'i blo dang 'dogs pa dag la yang de bzhin du sbyor bar bya'o /
'chi 'pho bar yang 'gyur zhing skye bar yang 'gyur la /
sems can gyi skal ba mnyam pa nyid 'dor par yang mi 'gyur thob par yang mi 'gyur pa yod dam zhe na /
mu bzhi ste /
mu dang po ni gang nas 'chi 'pho ba de nyid du skye ba na'o /
dvitīyā niyāmamavkrāman gnyis pa ni nges pa la 'jug pa na ste /
sa hi pṛthagjanasabhāgatāṃ vijahyādāryasabhāgatāṃ pratilabhate de ni sems can gyi skal ba mnyam pa nyid 'dor zhing /
'phags pa'i skal ba mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo /
tṛtīyā gatisaṃcārāt gsum pa ni 'gro ba 'pho ba las so /
caturthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
yadi pṛthagjanasabhāgatā nāma dravyamasti kiṃ punaḥ pṛthagjanatvena gal te so so'i skye bo'i skal ba mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i rdzas shig yod na go so so'i skye bo nyid kyis ci zhig bya ste /
nahi manuṣyasabhāgatāyā anyanmanuṣyatvaṃ kalpyete /
naiva ca lokaḥ sabhāgatāṃ paśyatyarūpiṇītvāt nacaināṃ prajñayā paricchinatti pratipadyate ca satvānāṃ jātyabhedamiti satyā api tasyāḥ kathaṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ 		mi'i skal pa mnyam pa las ni mi nyid gud na brtag tu med do /
'jig rten gyis ni skal ba mnyam pa nyid gzugs can ma yin pa'i phyir mi mthong ba nyid la /
'di shes rab kyis kyang yongs su mi chod mod kyi /
sems can rnams kyi rigs tha mi dad pa yang khong du chud do /
de yod du chug na yang de las ji lta bu zhig byed /
apicāsattvasabhāgatā 'pi kiṃ neṣyate gzhan yang sems can ma yin pa'i skal ba mnyam pa nyid kyang ci'i phyir mi 'dod de /
śāliyavamudgamāsāmrapanasalohakāñcanādīnāṃ svajātisādṛśyāt tāsāṃ ca sabhāgatānāmanyonyabhinnānāṃ kathamabhedena sabhāgatā prajñaptiḥ kriyate s'a lu dang nas dang mon sran sde'u dang mon sran gre'u dang aa mra dang shing pa nas dang lcags dang gser la sogs pa rnams rang gi rigs 'dra ba'i phyir ro /
skal pa mnyam pa phan tshun tha dad pa de dag kyang ji ltar bye brag med par skal ba mnyam pa nyid du 'dogs par byed /
vaiśeṣikāścaivaṃ dyotitā bhavanti /
teṣāmapi hyeṣa siddhāntaḥ 		de lta na ni bye brag pa rnams kyis gsal pa byas pa yin te; de dag gi grub pa'i mtha' ni spyi zhes bya ba'i dngos po zhig yod de /
sāmānyapadārtho nāmāsti yataḥ samānapratyayotpattiratulyaprakāreṣvapīti des na rnam pa mi 'dra ba rnams la yang shes pa mtshungs pa skye'o zhes bya ba 'di yin no /
ayaṃ tu teṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
sa eko 'pyanekasmin varttate yadi dyotitā yadi na dyotitā 		de dag gcig yin yang du ma la 'jug pa 'di ni de dag gi khyad par yin no /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gal te gsal bar byas kyang rung /
gal te gsal bar ma byas kyang rung ste /
astyeṣā tu sabhāgatā sūtre vacanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ mdo las 'byung ba'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa ni yod pa kho na ste /
ustaṃ hi bhagavatā sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāmiti /
uktametannatūktaṃ dravyāntaramiti 		bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang brgya la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam pa 'di lta bu nyid du 'ong na zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro /
de skad gsungs mod kyi rdzas gzhan no zhes ni ma gsungs so /
kā tarhi sā 'o na ci zhe na /
ta eva hi tathābhūtāḥ saṃskārā yeṣu manuṣyādiprajñaptiḥ śālyādiṣu sabhāgatāvat gang dag la mi la sogs par 'dogs pa'i 'du byed de lta bur gyur pa de dag kho nar zad de /
s'a lu la sogs pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang 'dra'o /
tattvetanna varṇayanti /
atha kimidamāsaṃjñikaṃ nāma 		de skad du ni mi brjod do /
yang 'du shes med pa pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
āsaṃjñikamasaṃjñiṣu 'du shes med pa pa 'du shes /
nirodhaścittacaittānāṃ med par sems dang sems byung rnams /
'gog pa'o /
asaṃjñisattveṣu devepūpapannānāṃ yaścittacaittānāṃ nirodhastadāsaṃjñikaṃnāma dravyaṃ yena cittacaittā anāgate 'dhvani kālāntaraṃ saṃnirudhyante notpattuṃ labhante /
nadītoyasaṃnirodhavat 		'du shes med pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba dag gi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes med pa pa zhes bya ba'i rdzas yin te /
gang gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dus gzhan gyi bar du klung gi chu 'gog pa bzhin du 'gog cing skyer mi ster ba'o /
tat punarekāntena de yang gcig tu rnam par smin /
vipākaḥ /
kasya vipākaḥ 		gang gi rnam par smin pa yin zhe na /
asaṃjñisamāpatteḥ /
katame te sattvā yeṣvasaṃjñisattvāḥ /
te bṛhatphalāḥ 		'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i yin no /
gang dag na 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams 'khod pa'i sems can de dag gang zhe na /
de 'bras che'ang /
bṛhatphalā nāma devā yeṣāṃ kecidasaṃjñisattvāḥ pradeśe bhavanti dhyānāntarikāvat /
kiṃ punastenaiva kadāciat saṃśino bhavanti 		gang dag gi phyogs gcig na sems can 'du shes med pa kha cig 'khod pa'i lha de dag ni 'bras bu che ba zhes bya ba yin te /
bsam gtan khyad par can bzhin no /
ci de dag nam yang 'du shes can du mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
bhavantyupapattikāle cyutikāle ca skye ba'i dus dang 'chi 'phos pa'i dus na 'gyur te /
mdo las /
prakṛṣṭamapi kālaṃ sthitvā saha saṃjñotpādātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatsthānāt cyutirbhavatīti sūtre pāthaḥ sems can de dag dus ring mo zhig tu 'dug ste /
'du shes skyes nas gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo /
te ca tato dīrghasvapnavyutthitā iva cyutvā kāmadhātāvupapadyante nānyatra /
pūrvasamāpattisaṃskāraparikṣayāt apūrvānupacayācca kṣiptā iva kṣīṇavegā iṣavaḥ pṛthivīṃ patanti /
yena ca tatropapattavyaṃ tasyāvaśyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ karmāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃbhavati 		de dag kyang yun ring por gnyid kyis log pa las sangs pa bzhin du de nas shi 'phos nas sngon gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du byed yongs su zad pa'i phyir dang sngon med pa ma bsags pa'i phyir mda' 'phangs pa shugs zad pa dag sa la ltung ba bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur te /
gzhan du ni ma yin no /
gang zhig der skye bar 'gyur ba de la ni gdon mi za bar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las yod de /
yathottarakauravāṇāṃ devopapāttivedanīyam dper na byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi lhar skye ba myong bar 'gyur ba bzhin no /
yang /
atha samāpattī iti yaduktaṃ katame te samāpattī /
asaṃjñisamāpattirnirodhasamāpattiśca 		snyoms 'jug dag ces gang bshad pa /
snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gang yin zhe na /
'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o /
keyamasaṃjñisamāpattiḥ /
yathaivāsaṃjñikamuktaṃ niarodhaścittacaittānāmiti 		'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ci zhe na /
ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'gog pa la 'du shes med pa par bshad pa /
tathā 'saṃjñisamāpattiḥ de bzhin 'du shes med snyoms 'jug /
asaṃjñināṃ samāpattirasaṃjñā ve tyasaṃjñisamāpattiḥ /
sā 'pi cittacaittānāṃ nirodhaḥ 		'du shes med pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am 'du shes med pa can yin pas 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
de yang sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi 'gog pa yin no /
etāvattathāśabdenānvākṛṣyate /
sā tu samāpattiḥ /
dhyāne 'ntye 		de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de tsam zhig mthun par 'don to; /
snyoms par 'jug pa de ni bsam gtan tha mar /
antyadhyānaṃ caturthaṃ tatparyāpannā 'sau nānyabhumikā bsam gtan tha ma ni bzhi pa ste /
de ni der gtogs pa yin gyis gzhan pa ni ma yin no /
kimarthamenāṃ samāpadyante ci'i phyir 'di la snyoms par 'jug ce na /
niḥsṛtīcchayā 'byung 'dod pas /
niḥsaraṇameṣāṃ manyante /
ato mokṣakāmatayā samāpadyante 		'di la nges par 'byung bar sems te /
de'i phyir thar par 'dod pas snyoms par 'jug go /
āsaṃjñikaṃ vipākatvāt avyākṛtamiti siddham /
iyaṃ tu /
śubhā /
kuśalaivāsaṃjñisamāpattiḥ 		'du shes med pa pa ni rnam par smin pa yin pa'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya bar grub bo /
'di ni dge ba'o /
'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni dge ba kho na yin no /
tasyā asaṃjñisattveṣu pañcaskandhako vipākaḥ /
kuśalā satī 		de'i rnam par smin pa ni 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du phung po lnga 'grub pa'o /
de dge ba yin yang /
upapadyavedyaiva skyes nas myong 'gyur nyid /
upapadyavedanīyaiva /
na dṛṣṭadharmaparyāyavedanīyā nāpi aniyatā 		skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba kho na yin gyi mthong ba'i chos dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin la ma nges pa yang ma yin no /
yo 'pyenāmutpādya parihīyate so 'pi kilāvaśyaṃ punarutpādyāsaṃjñisattveṣūpapadyata iti /
ata eva tallābhī niyāmaṃ nāvakrāmati /
seyaṃ pṛthagjanasyaiveṣyate 		gang zhig gis 'di bskyed nas yongs su nyams pa de yang gdon mi za bar yang bskyed nas 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro /
zhes grag go /
de nyid kyi phyir de thob pa ni nges pa la mi 'jug go /
de yang so so'i skye bo kho na'i yin par 'dod kyi /
nāryasya /
nahyāryāṃ asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ samāpadyante vinipātasthānamivaitāṃ paśyantaḥ /
niḥsaraṇasaṃjñino hi tāṃ samāpadyante 		'phags pa'i ma yin /
'phags pa rnams ni 'di la rnam par ltung ba'i gnas lta bur gzigs pas 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par mi 'jug gi nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes can dag ni de la snyoms par 'jug go /
atha kimenāmāryāścaturthadhyānalābhādatītānāgatāṃ pratilabhante dhyānavat yang ci 'phags pa bsam gtan bzhi pa thob nas bsam gtan bzhin du 'di 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag kyang 'thob bam zhe na /
anye 'pi atāvanna pratilabhante /
kiṃ kāraṇam 		re zhig gzhan dag gis kyang mi 'thob po ci'i phyir zhe na /
eṣā hyucitā 'pi satī mahābhisaṃskārasādhyatvādacittakatvācca 'di ni 'dris pa yin yang mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang sems med pa pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
ekādhvikāpyate /
ekakāliketyarthaḥ 		dus gcig 'thob dus gcig pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
varttamānakālikaiva labhyate /
yathā prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ /
labdhayā tu dvitaīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣvatītayā 'pi samanvāgato bhavati yāvanna tyajati /
acittaka tvānnānāgatā bhāvyate /
nirodhasamāpattiridāniṃ katamā 		so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ji lta ba bzhin du da ltar gyi dus pa kho na 'thob po /
skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs par ni ji srid mi gtong bde srid du thob pa 'das pa dang yang ldan pa yin no /
sems med pa pa yin pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa ni mi 'thob po /
da ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na /
nirodhākhyā tathaiveyaṃ 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ji lta bur /
yathaivāsaṃjñimāpatthiḥ 'gog pa zhes pa'ang de bzhin nyid /
tathāśabdena kaḥ prakāro gṛhyate de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgras rnam pa gang zhig gzung zhe na /
nirodhaścittacaittānāmiti /
ayaṃ tvasyā viśeṣaḥ /
iyaṃ /
vihārārthaṃ /
śāntavihārasaṃjñāpūarvakeṇa manasikāreṇa enāṃ samāpadyante 		sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'gog pa'o zhes bya ba gzung ngo /
'di'i khyad par ni 'di yin te /
'di gnas don du /
zhi bar gnas pa'i 'du shes sngon du btang ba'i yid la byed pas 'di la snyoms par 'jug gi /
tāṃ tu niḥsaraṇasaṃjñā pūrvakeṇa de la ni nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes sngon du btang bas so /
sā khalvapi caturthadhyānabhūmikā /
iyaṃ tu /
bhavāgrajā /
naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanabhūmikaiva /
sā ceyaṃ 		yang de ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin gyi 'di ni; srid rtse skyes /
'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sa pa kho na yin no /
'di ni dge ba'o /
śubhā /
kuśalaiva na klilṣṭā nāvyākāṛtā /
kuśalā satī /
dvivedyā 'niyatā ca /
dvayoḥ kālayorvedyā upapadyavedanīyā cāparaparyāyavedanīyā ca 		dge ba kho na yin te /
nyon mongs pa can yang ma yin la /
lung du ma bstan pa yang ma yin no /
dge ba yin yang /
gnyis su myong 'gyur dang ma nges /
skye nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ste /
aniyatā ca vipākaṃ prati kadācinna vipacyate dus gnyis su myong bar 'gyur ba dang rnam par smin pa'i phyir ma nges pa yang yin te /
yadīha pariniarvāyāt tasyā hi bhavāgre catuḥskandhako vipākaḥ /
sā ceyamekāntena /
āryasya /
nahi pṛthagjanā nirodhasamāpattimutpādayituṃ śaknuvantyucchedabhīrutvādāryamārgabalena cotpādanāddṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasya tadadhimuktitaḥ 		gal te 'dir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed na nam yang rnam par mi smin pa kho nar 'gyur ro /
de'i rnam par smin pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i phung po bzhi yin no /
de yang gcig tu 'phags pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skyed mi nus te /
chad pas 'jigs pa'i phyir dang 'phags pa'i lam gyi stobs kyis bskyed pa'i yang phyir ro /
mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa ni de la mos pa'i phyir ro /
āryasyāpi ceyaṃ na vairāgyalabhyā 'phags pa'i yang 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral bas thob par bya ba ma yin te /
kiṃ tarhi /
āpyā prayogataḥ 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
sbyor bas 'thob /
prayogalabhyaiveyam /
na cātītā labhyate nāpyanāgata bhāvyate 		'di ni sbyor bas 'thob par bya ba kho na yin pas /
'das pa yang mi 'thob la ma 'ongs pa yang mi 'thob ste /
cittabalena tadbhāvanāt de ni sems kyi stobs kyis 'thob pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ bhagavato 'pi parāyogikī /
netyāha /
bodhilabhyā muneḥ /
kṣayajñānasamanaṃ kālaṃ buddhā bhagavanta enāṃ labhante nāsti kiñcidbuddhānāṃ prāyogikaṃ nāma 		ci bcom ldan 'das kyi yang sbyor ba las byung ba yin nam zhe na /
smras pa; ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
thub pa'i byang chub kyis thob bya /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni 'di zad pa mkhyen pa dang dus mnyam du brnyes so /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba cung zad kyang med de /
icchāmātrapratibaddho hi teṣāṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpātsaṃmukhībhāvaḥ /
tasmādeṣāṃ sarvavairāgyalābhikam 		de dag gi yon tan 'byor ba mngon sum du 'gyur ba thams cad ni bzhed pa tsam la rag lus pa yin pas de lta bas na de dag gi thams cad ni /
'dod chags dang bral bas brnyes pa yin no /
kathaṃ khalvi dānīmanutpāditāyāṃ nirodhasamāpattau kṣayajñānakāle bhagavānubhayotobhāgavimuktaḥ sidhyati da ni yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma bskyed na zad pa mkhyen pa'i dus su gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol bar ji ltar 'grub ce na /
'grub ste /
sidhyatyutpāditāyāmiva tasyāṃ vaśitvāt prāgeva tāṃ bodhisattvaḥ śaikṣyāvasthāyāmutpādayatīti pāścattyāḥ /
atha kasmādevaṃ neṣyate 		bskyed zin pa bzhin du de la mnga' ba'i phyir ro /
nub phyogs pa dag na re de ni dang po kho nar byang chub sems dpa' slob pa'i gnas skabs na skyed par byed do zhes zer ro /
yang 'di ci'i phyir mi 'dod ce na /
evaṃ ca sthaviropaguptasyāpīdaṃ netrīpadaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ bhaviṣyati /
nirodhasamāpattimutpādya kṣayajñānamutpādayatīti vaktavyaṃ tathāgataiti 		de ltar na gnas brtan nye bsrungs kyi lugs kyi tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed nas zad pa mkhyen pa skyed par mdzad do zhes brjod par bya'o /
zhes bya ba 'byung ba 'di tshad mar byas pa yin no /
na prāk /
nahi pūrvaṃ tasyā utapādanaṃ yujyata iti kāśmīrakāḥ 		dang por ma yin /
kha che ba rnams na re de ltar bskyed du mi rung ngo zhes zer ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
catustriṃśatkṣaṇāptitaḥ skad cig ma /
sum cu rtsa bzhis 'thob phyir ro /
catusriṃśatā kila cittakṣaṇairbodhisattvo bodhimanuprāptaḥ /
satyābhisamaye ṣoḍaśabhirbhavāgravairāgye cāṣṭādaśabhirnavaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya navānantaryavimuktimārgotpādanāt 		byang chub sems dpa' ni sems kyi skad cig ma sum cu rtsa bzhis byang chub rjes su 'thob pa ste /
bden pa mngon par rtogs pa na bcu drug dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'dod chags dang bral ba na nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa dgu spong bar byed pa na bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu dgu skye ba'i phyir bco brgyad de /
ta ete catustriṃśat bhavanti de dag ni sum cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro /
ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasyāsyaniyāmāvakramaṇādadhobhūmikā na punaḥḥ praheyā bhavanti /
ata etasminnantare visabhāgacittāsaṃbhavānnirodhasamāpatterayoga iti 		ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba de nges pa la 'jug pa'i phyir sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni yang spang bar bya ba ma yin no /
de'i phyir bar skabs 'dir mi 'dra ba'i sems mi srid pas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi rung ngo zhes zer ro /
kiṃ punaḥ syādyadi visabhāgacittamantarā saṃmukhīkkuryāt zhes grag go /
gal te bar skabs su mi 'dra ba'i sems mngon du byas na cir 'gyur zhe na /
vyutthānāśayaḥ syādavyutthānāśayāśca bodhisattvāḥ bsam ba ldang ba can du 'gyur te /
byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsam ba mi ldang ba can yin no /
satyamavyutthānāśayā natu āsrava mārgāvyutthānāt nyi 'og pa rnams na re bsam pa mi ldang ba can yin ba bden mod kyi /
zag pa med pa'i lam las ni ma yin no /
kathaṃ tarhi na tāvat bhetsyāmi paryaṅkamaprāpte āsravakṣaya iti /
asyāśayasyāvyutthānā dekāyana eva sarvārthaparisamāpteriti bahirdeśakāḥ /
pūrvameva tu varṇayanti kāśmīrāḥ /
yadyapyanayoḥ samāpattyorbahuprakāro viśeṣaḥ 		'o na ci zhe na /
zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du re zhig skyil mo krung mi gzhig go snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di mi ldang ba'i phyir te /
stan gcig kho na la don thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
snga ma kho na yin no zhes ni brjod do /
snyoms par 'jug pa 'di gnyis kyi rnam ba'i bye brag ma yin mod kyi /
kāmarūpāśraye bhūte /
ubhe api tvete asaṃjñinirodhasamāpattī kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cotpatsyete 		gnyi ga 'dod dang gzugs rten can /
'du shes med pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di gnyi ga yang 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su skyed do /
ye tvasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ rūpadhātau necchanti teṣāmayaṃ grantho virudhyate gang dag 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gzugs kyi khams su mi 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na chos mngon pa'i gzhung gzugs kyi srid pa yin la /
syādrūpabhavo na cāsau bhavaḥ pañcavyavacāraḥ /
syādrūpāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñināṃ devānāṃ visabhāge citte sthitānāmasaṃjñisamāpattiṃ nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāmasaṃjñināṃ ca devānāmāsaṃjñike pratilabdhe yo bhava iti /
ata ubhe apyete kāmarūpāśraye /
tatrāpi tvayaṃ viśeṣaḥ 		srid pa de rnams dang 'drid pa can snga ma yin pa yod dam zhe na /
yod de /
gzugs na spyod pa'i sems can lha 'du shes can sems mi 'dra ba la gnas pa rnams dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams dang lha 'du shes med pa 'du shes med pa pa thob pa rnams kyi srid pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ba 'di dang 'gal te /
de'i phyir 'di gnyi ga yang 'dod pa dang gzugs la brten pa dag yin no /
de la yang khyad par ni 'di yod do /
nirodhākhyādito nṛṣu /
nirodhasamāpattiḥ prathamato manuṣyepūtpādyate paścādrūpadhātau parihīṇapūrvaiḥ /
kimato 'pyasti parihāṇiḥ 		'gog pa dang por mi'i nang du; 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni dang po nyid du mi dag gi nang du skyed do /
phyis ni sngar yongs su nyams pa dag gis gzugs kyi khams su yang skyed do /
ci 'di las kyang yongs su nyams pa yod dam zhe na /
astītyāha smras pa yod do /
anyathā hi ndāyi sūtraṃ virudhyeta /
ihāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ śīlasaṃpannaśca bhavati samādhisaṃpannaśca prajñāsaṃpannaśca /
so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāvedayita nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate cāsti caitat sthānamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sa na haiva dṛṣṭa eva dharme pratipattye vājñāmārāgayati nāpi maraṇakālasamaye bhedācca kāyasyātikramya devān kavaḍīkārāhāra bhakṣānanyatarasmin divye manomaye kāya upapadyate 		de lta ma yin na 'char byed kyi mdo las tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yang yin /
ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yang yin /
shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang yin pa de ni yang dang yang du 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba'i gnas de yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so /
de ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la dang po nyid du kun shes pa thob par yang mi byed cing 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang ma yin la lus zhig nas kyang kham gyi zas za ba'i lha las 'das te /
sa tatropapanno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ saṃjñāveditanirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭahate cāsti caitat sthānamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti yid las byung ba'i lha'i lus gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro /
