de der skyes nas yang dang yang du 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang pa'i gnas de yang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal lo /
atra hi divyo manomayaḥ kāyo rūpāvacara ukto bhagavatā /
iyaṃ ca samāpattirbhāvāgrikī /
tatkathamaparihīṇasya tallābhino rūpadhātau syādupapattiḥ 		der yang bcom ldan 'das kyis yid las byung ba'i lus can gyi lha ni gzugs na spyod pa yin par gsungs la /
snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ni srid pa'i rtse mo pa yin na de ji ltar de thob pa yongs su ma nyams pa gzugs kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur /
caturthadhyānabhūmikāmapi nirodhasabhāpatiṃ nikāyāntarīyā icchanti /
teṣāṃ vināpi parihāṇyā sidhyatyetat /
etadeva tu na sidhyati /
caturthadhyānabhūmikā 'pyasāvastīti 		sde pa gzhan dag 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yang yin par 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na 'di yongs su nyams pa med bzhin du yang 'grub pa 'dra mod kyi /
'di bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yang yod do zhes bya ba 'di ni mi 'grub bo /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
navānupūrvasamāpattaya iti sūtre vacanāt /
yadyeṣa niyamaḥ kathaṃ vyutkrāntasamāpattayo bhavanti 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
mdo las mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
gal te de nges pa yan na ji ltar thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa dag yin zhe na /
prāthamakalpikaṃ pratyeṣa niyamaḥ 'di ni rtsom pa dang po pa las nges pa yin te /
praptaprakāmavāśitvāstu santo vilaṅghyāpi samāpadyante /
evamanayoḥ samāpattyorbhūmito 'pi viśeṣaḥ 		dga' mgu'i dbang thob pa dag yin na ni rnam par rgal te yang snyoms par 'jug go /
de ltar na snyoms par 'jug pa 'di gnyis ni sa las kyang khyad par yod de /
caturthadhyānatayā 'grābhūmikatvāt bsam gtan bzhi pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
prayogato 'pi niḥsaraṇavihārasaṃjñāpūrvakamanasikāraprayogāt /
saṃtānato 'pi pṛthagjanāryasaṃtānatvāt 		sbyor ba las kyang nges par 'byung ba dang gnas pa'i 'du shes sngon du btang ba'i yid la byed pas sbyor ba'i phyir ro /
rgyud las kyang so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa'i rgyud la skye ba'i phyir ro /
phalato 'pyāsaṃjñikabhavāgraphalatvāt /
vedanīyato 'pi niyatāniyatopapadyobhayathāvedanīyatvāt /
prathamotpādanato 'pi dvidhātumanuṣyotpādanāt /
kasmāt punarete cittatacaittanirodhasvabhāve satyāvasaṃjñisamāpattiḥ saṃjñāveditanirodhasamāpattiścocyate 		'bras bu las kyang 'du shes med pa pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro /
myong bar 'gyur ba las kyang myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang gnyi ga yin pa'i phyir ro /
dang po skyed pa las kyang khams gnyis dang mi'i nang du skyed pa'i phyir ro /
yang ci'i phyir 'di dag sems dang sems las byung ba 'gog pa'i rang bzhin yin na 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya zhe na /
tatprātikūlyena tatsamāpattiprayogāt de dag dang mi mthun pas de dag la snyoms par 'jug par sbyor ba'i phyir te /
vedanādijñāne 'pi paracittajñānavacanavat /
kathamidānīṃ bahukālaṃ niruddhāccittāt punarapi cittaṃ jāyate /
atītasyāpyastitvāt iṣyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ samanantarapratyayatvam 		tshor ba la sogs pa yang shes mod kyi gzhan gyi sems shes pa zhes bya ba bzhin no /
da ni ji ltar 'gags nas yun ring du lon pa'i sems las yang sems skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'das pa yang yod pa'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du 'dod de /
apare punarāhuḥ /
kathaṃ tāvad rūpopapannānāṃ ciraniruddhe 'pi rūpe punarapi rūpaṃ jāyate /
cittād eva hi taj jāyate na rūpāt /
evaṃ cittam apy asmād eva sendriyāt kāyāj jāyate na cittāt /
anyonyabījakaṃ hy etadubhayaṃ yaduta cittaṃ ca sendriyaśca kāya iti pūrvācāryāḥ 		sngon gyi slob dpon gzhan dag na re ni re zhig gzugs med par skyes pa rnams kyi gzugs 'gags nas ring du lon na yang gzugs ji ltar skye zhe na /
de ni sems kho na las skye'i gzugs las ni ma yin /
de bzhin du sems kyang dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus 'di kho na las skye'i sems las ni ma yin te /
'di lta ste; sems dang dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus gnyis ni phan tshun sa bon can yin no zhes zer ro /
bhadantavasumitrastvāha paripṛcchāyāṃ yasyācittikā nirodhasamāpattistasyaiṣa doṣo mama tu sacittikā samāpattiriti /
ti /
bhadantaghoṣaka āha tadidaṃ nopapadyate 		btsun pa dbyig bshes kyis ni yongs su dris pa las /
'di ni gang gi ltar na 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sems med pa pa yin pa de la skyon du 'gyur gyi kho bo ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sems dang bcas pa yin no zhes zer ro /
btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs na re de ni mi 'thad de /
sati hi vijñāne trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ /
sparśapratyayā ca vedanā saṃjñā cetan''etyuktaṃ bhagavatā 		bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa yod na gsum 'dus pa las reg pa /
reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa zhes gsungs te /
ataḥ saṃjñāvedanayorapyatra nirodho na syāt /
athāpi syāt /
yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyuktam /
satyāmapi tu vedanāyāmarhato na tṛṣṇotpattirevaṃ satyapi sparśe vedannādayo na syuriti 		de'i phyir 'di la 'du shes dang tshor ba dag kyang 'gag par mi 'gyur ro /
'on te tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes gsungs mod kyi dgra bcom pa la tshor ba yod bzhin du sred pa mi skye ba de bzhin du reg pa yod bzhin du tshor ba las sogs pa mi 'byung ngo zhe na /
tasyāviśeṣitatvāt /
avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ hi veditaṃ pratītyotpannā tṛṣṇetyuktaṃ natu vedanotpattau sparśo viśeṣita ityasamānametat 		khyad par du byas pa'i phyir de ni ma yin te /
ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba la brten nas sred pa skyes so zhes gsungs kyi /
tshor ba skyes pa la reg pa ni bye brag tu ma byas pas 'di ni mi 'dra'o /
tasmādacittikā nirodhasamāpattiriti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
kathamacittikāyāḥ samāpattitvam 		de lta bas na bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni sems med pa pa yin no zhes zer ro /
ji ltar na sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid yin zhe na /
mahābhūtasamatāpādanāt /
samāpatticittena ca tāṃ samāpadyante samāgacchantīti samāpattiḥ /
kiṃ punarete samāpattī dravyataḥ sta utāho prajñaptitaḥ 		'byung ba chen po mnyam pa nyid du sgrub pa'i phyir ram /
yang na snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kyis de la snyoms par 'jug cing 'thob par 'gyur bas na snyoms par 'jug pa yin no /
yang ci snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag rdzas su yod dam 'on te btags par yod ce na /
dravyata ityāha /
cittotpattipratibandhanāt 		sems skye ba la bgegs byed pa'i phyir rdzas su yod do zhes zer ro /
na /
samāpatticittenaiva tatpratibandhanāt /
samāpatticittameva hi taccittāntaraviruddhamutpadyate yena kālāntaraṃ cittasyā pravṛttimātraṃ bhavati /
tadviruddhāśrayāpādanāt /
yā 'sau samāpattiriti prajñapyate taccāpravṛttimātraṃ na pūrvamāsīnna paścāt bhavati vyutthitasyeti saṃskṛtā 'sau samāpattiḥ prajñapyate 		ma yin te /
snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kho na de la bgegs byed pa'i phyir ro /
snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kho na de dang 'gal ba'i rten skyed pa'i phyir gang gis na dus gzhan gyi bar du sems mi 'jug pa tsam du 'gyur ba de las gzhan pa'i sems dang 'gal bar skye ste /
de la snyoms par 'jug pa zhes gdags so /
mi 'jug pa tsam ste yang sngon ma byung ba dang phyis langs pa la med pa yin pas snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ni 'dus byas su btags so /
athavā āśrayasyaiva tathā samāpādanaṃ samāpattiḥ /
evamāsaṃjñikamapi draṣṭavyam /
cittamevāsau tatra cittapravṛttiviruddhaṃ labhate taccāpravṛttimātramāsaṃjñikaṃ prajñapyata iti tadetanna varṇayanti 		yang na rten nyid de ltar mnyam par bsgrubs pas na snyoms par 'jug pa yin no /
'du shes med pa pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste /
'dis des sems kho na sems 'jug pa dang 'gal ba thob ste /
mi 'jug pa tsam de yang 'du shes med pa par gdags so /
de skad du ni mi brjod do /
vyākhyāte samāpattī /
jīvitaṃ katamat 		snyoms par 'jug pa dag bshad zin to /
srog gang zhe na /
āyurjīvitam srog ni tshe yin /
evaṃ hyuktamabhidharme 'jīvitenriyaṃ katamat chos mngon pa las 'di skad du /
srog gi dbang po gang zhe na /
traidhātukamāyuriti /
etaccaiva na jñāyate āyurnāma ka eṣa dharma iti 		khams gsum pa'i tshe yin no zhes 'byung ngo /
tshe zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin pa de yang mi shes pas /
drod dang ni /
rnam shes rten gang yin pa'o /
ādhāra ūṣmavijñānayorhi yaḥ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du /
idamuktaṃ bhagavatā tshe dang drod dang rnam shes 'dis /
āyurūṣmātha vijñānaṃ yadā kāyaṃ jahatyamī gang tshe lus ni 'dor byed cing /
bor nas de tshe 'dug pa ni; /
apaviddhastadā śete yathā kāṣṭhamacetana iti /
tad ya ūṣmaṇo vijñānasya cādhārabhūto dharmaḥ sthitihetustadāyuḥ 		sems med ji ltar shing bzhin no /
zhes gsungs te /
de lta bas na drod dang rnam par shes pa'i rten du gyur ba'i chos gnas pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni tshe yin no /
tasyedānīmāyuṣaḥ ka ādhārabhūtaḥ da ni tshe de'i rten du gyur ba gang yin zhe na /
evaṃ tarhi parasparāpekṣyavṛttitvādeṣāṃ kaḥ pūrvaṃ nivartiṣyate drod dang rnam par shes pa de dag nyid yin no /
'o na ni phan tshun ltos te 'jug pa'i phyir /
yadvaśādibhavau vivarttiṣyete iti nityānivṛttiprasaṅgaḥ /
āyuṣastarhi karmādhārabhūtaṃ yāvadākṣiptaṃ karmaṇā tāvadanuvarttanāt /
ūṣmavijñānayorapi kimarthaṃ karmaivādhārabhūtaṃ neṣyate 		de dag las gang gi dbang gis na gzhan dag ldog par 'gyur ba gang zhig sngar ldog par 'gyur te /
rtag tu ldog pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro /
'o na ni tshe'i rten du gyur pa las yin te /
las kyis ji srid du 'phangs pa de srid du rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
drod dang rnam par shes pa dag gi rten du gyur pa yang las kho na yin par ci'i phyir mi 'dod do /
mā bhūt sarvaṃ vijñānamāmaraṇādvipāka iti ma shi ba'i bar du rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par smin par 'gyur du 'ong ngo /
ūṣmaṇastarhi karmādhārbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati ūṣmā ca vijñānasya 'o na ni drod kyi rten du gyur pa las yin par 'gyur la /
drod kyang rnam par shes pa'i rten du gyur pa yin par 'gyur ro /
evamapyārūpyeṣvanādhāraṃ vijñānaṃ syādūṣmābhāvāt de lta na ni gzugs med pa dag na drod med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa rten med par 'gyur ro /
tasya punaḥ karmādhāro bhaviṣyati de'i rten ni las yin par 'gyur ro /
na vai labhyate kāmacāro yat kvacidevoṣmā vijñānasyādhāro bhaviṣyati kvacideva karmeti /
uktaṃ cātra 		gang la lar ni rnam par shes pa'i rten drod kho na yin par 'gyur ro /
la lar ni las kho na yin no zhes bya ba 'dod dgu mi 'thob pa nyid de bshad kyang zin to /
kimuktam /
mā bhūtsarvaṃ vijñānamāmaraṇādvipāka iti /
tasmādastyeva tayorādhārabhūtamāyuḥ /
nahi nāstīti brūmo natu dravyāntaram 		ji skad du bshad ce na /
ma shi ba'i bar du rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par smin par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes bshad do /
de lta bas na de gnyis kyi rkyen du gyur pa tshe ni yod pa kho na'o /
med do zhes ni mi smra mod kyi rdzas gzhan ni med do /
kiṃ tarhi /
traidhātukena karmaṇā nikāyasabhāgasya sthitikālāvedhaḥ 		'o na de ci yin zhe na /
khams gsum pa'i las kyis ris mthun pa gnas pa'i dus kyis 'phen pa yin te /
yāvaddhi karmaṇā nikāyasabhāgasyāvedhaḥ kṛto bhavatyetāvantaṃ kālamavasthātavyamiti tāvat so 'vatiṣṭhate tadāyurityucyate /
sasyānāṃ pākakālāvedhavat kṣipteṣusthitikālāvedhavacca 		dus 'di srid cig tu gnas par bya'o zhes ji srid du las kyi ris mthun pa 'phangs pa de srid du de gnas pa de la tshe zhes bya ste /
'bru rnams kyi smin pa'i dus kyis 'phen pa lta bu dang mda' 'phangs pa dag gi gnas pa'i dus kyis 'phen pa bzhin no /
yastu manyate saṃskāro nāma kaścin guṇaviśeṣa iṣau jāyate yadvaśādgamanamāpatanād bhavatīti /
tasya tadekatvāt pratipannābhāvācca deśāntaraiḥ śīghra taratamaprāptikālabhedā nupapattiḥ patanānupapattiśca 		gang zhig 'du byed ces bya ba yon tan gyi khyad par 'ga' mda' la skye ste /
de'i dbang gis na ma ltung gi bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa de'i de ni gcig pu yin pa'i phyir dang gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir yul gzhan dag tu mgyogs pa dang ches dang shin tu ches mgyogs par phyin pa'i dus kyi bye brag kyang mi 'thad la ltung ba yang mi 'thad do /
vāyunā tatpratibandha iti cet gal te rlung gis de la gegs byed do zhe na /
arvākpatanaprasaṅgo na vā kadācidvāyoraviśeṣāt /
evaṃ tu varṇayanti dravyāntaramevāyurastīti 		rlung la khyad par med pa'i phyir drung du ltung ba'am yang na gzhar yang mi ltung bar thal bar 'gyur ro /
'di skad du tshe rdzas gzhan kho na zhig yod do zhes ni brjod do /
atha kimāyuḥkṣayādeva maraṇaṃ bhavatyāhosvidanyathāpi yang ci tshe zad pa kho nas 'chi bar 'gyur ram /
'on te gzhan du yang yin zhe na /
prajñaptāvuktam āyuḥkṣayānmaraṇaṃ na puṇyakṣayāditi /
catuṣkoṭiḥ /
prathamā koṭirāyurvipākasya karmaṇaḥ paryādānāt 		btags pa las /
tshe zad par 'chi bar 'gyur la bsod nams zad pas ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhi gsungs te /
mu dang po ni tshe rnam par smin pa can gyi las yongs su gtugs pa las so /
dvitīyā bhogavipākasya /
tṛtīyobhayoḥ /
caturthī viṣamāparihāreṇa /
āyurutsargācceti vaktavyakm 		gnyis pa ni longs spyod rnam par smin pa can gyi las yongs su gtugs pa las so /
gsum pa ni gnyi ga'o /
bzhi pa ni ya nga ba yongs su ma spangs so /
na vaktavyam /
āyuḥkṣayādeva tanmaraṇam 		tshe btang ba las kyang brjod par bya'o /
prathamakoṭyantargamāt /
kṣīṇe tvāyuṣi puṇyakṣayasya maraṇe nāsti sāmarthyam /
tasmādubhayakṣaye sati maraṇamāyuḥkṣayādityuktam 		tshe zad na bsod nams zad pa 'chi bar bya ba la nus pa med do /
de lta bas na gnyi ga zad na gnyi ga zad pa las 'chi bar bshad do /
jñānaprasthāne 'pyuktam āyuḥ santatyupanibaddhaṃ vartata iti vaktavyam /
sakṛdutpannaṃ tiṣṭhanīti vaktavyam 		ye shes la 'jug pa las /
tshe rgyud la rag lus te 'jug pa zhes brjod par bya'am /
lan cig skyes nas gnas pa zhes brjod par bya /
āha /
kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃjñisamāparttiṃ nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāṃ santatyupanibaddhaṃ varttata iti vaktavyam 		smras pa; 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par ma zhugs pa rnams kyi ni rgyud la rag lus te /
'jug pa zhes brjod par bya'o /
samāpannānāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sakrdutpannaṃ tiṣṭhatīti vaktavyam /
ko 'sya bhāṣitasyārthaḥ /
yasyāśrayopaghātādupāghatastatsantatyadhīnatvāt prathamam /
yasya tvāśrayopaghāta eva nāsti tadyatho tpannāvasthānāt dvitīyam 		snyoms par zhugs pa rnams dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi ni lan cig skyes nas gnas pa zhes brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa bshad pa 'di'i don gang yin zhe na /
gang la lus la gnas pas gnod par 'gyur ba de ni rgyud la rag lus pa'i phyir dang po yin no /
gang gi lus la gnod pa nyid med pa de ni ji ltar skyes pa bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir gnyis pa yin no /
sāntarāyaṃ prathamaṃ nirantarāyaṃ dvitīyamiti kāśmīrāḥ kha che ba rnams na re glo bur dang bcas pa ni dang po yin no /
glo bur med pa ni gnyis pa yin no zhes zer te /
tasmādastyakālamṛtyuḥ /
sūtra uktam catvāra ātmabhāvapratilambhāḥ /
astyātmabhāvapratilambho yatrātmasaṃcetanā kramate na parasaṃcetaneti /
catuṣkoṭikaḥ /
ātmasaṃcetanaiva kramate kāmadhātau krīḍāpramoṣkāṇāṃ devānāṃ manaḥpradūṣakāṇāṃ ca /
teṣāṃ hi praharṣamanaḥopradoṣābhyāṃ tasmāt sthānāccyutirbhavati nānyathā 		de lta bas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do /
mdo las lus thob pa ni bzhi ste /
lus thob pa gang la bdag nyid 'chi bar 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis gsod pas ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhir gsungs pa /
'dod pa'i khams na lha rtsed mos myos pa rnams dang yid rab tu 'khrugs pa rnams ni bdag nyid 'chi ba kho nar 'gyur ba yin te /
de rnams ni rab tu dga' ba dang yid rab tu 'khrugs pa dag gi gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
duddhānāṃ ceti vaktavyam sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang yin par brjod par bya ste /
svayaṃmṛtyutvāt bdag nyid 'grongs pa'i phyir ro /
parasaṃcetanaiva kramate garbhāṇḍagatānām mngal dang sgo da na 'dug pa rnams ni gzhan gyis gsod pa kho nar 'gyur ba yin no /
ubhayamapyeṣāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ prāyeṇa /
nobhayaṃ sarveṣā mantarābhavikāṇāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāmanekajātīyānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ tadyathā nārakāṇā muttarakauravāṇāṃ darśanamārgamaitrīnirodhāsaṃjñi samāpattisamāpannānāṃ rājarṣijinadūtajinādiṣṭa dharmilo ttaragaṅgila śreṣṭhiputrayaśaḥ dumārajīvakādīnāṃ sarveṣā caramabhavikānāṃvodhisattva mātustadgarbhāyāḥ cakravarttinaścakravarttimātuśca tadgarbhāyāḥ 		'dod pa na spyod pa rnams gzhan dag phal cher ni gnyi ga yin no /
srid pa bar ma pa thams cad dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams dang 'dod pa na spyod pa kha cig 'di lta sta dmyal pa ba rnams dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang mthong ba'i lam dang byams pa dang 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams dang rgyal po'i drang srong dang rgyal po'i pho nya dang rgyal bas bstan pa dang chos len pa dang mchog can dang gang la len pa dang tshong dpon gyi bu grags pa gzhon nu dang 'tsho byed la sogs pa rnams dang srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'i yum de lhums na gnas pa dang 'khor los sgyur ba dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i ma de mngal na gnas pa gnyi ga ma yin no /
atha kasmātsūtra uktaṃ katame te bhadanta sattvā yeṣāṃ nātmasaṃcetanā kramate na parasaṃacetanā /
naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāḥ śāriputreti /
anyeṣu kila dhyānarūpyedhvātmasaṃcetanāsvabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā uttarabhūmisāmantakastatra cobhayaṃ nāstīti /
nanu caivaṃ tatrāpi parabhūmika āryamārgaḥ parasaṃcetanā prāpnoti /
paryantagrahaṇāttarhi tadādisaṃpratyayaḥ 		yang ci'i phyir mdo las /
btsun pa gang dag bdag nyid 'gum par yang mi 'gyur la gzhan gyis gsod pa yang ma lags pa'i sems can de dag gang lags /
sh'a ri'i bu 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams yin no zhes gsungs she na; bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa gzhan dag ni bdag nyid 'chi ba ni rang gi sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yin la /
gzhan gyis gsod pa ni sa gong ma'i nyer bsdogs yin gyi /
de na ni gnyi ga med do zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
kvacidādisaṃpratyayaḥ kvacidādinā paryanto 'pi pratīyate /
yadāha /
tadyathā devā brahmakāyikāḥ /
iyaṃ prathamā sukhopapattiriti /
kvacit paryantenādirapi pratīyate 		de lta na 'o na de na yang gzhan gyi sa pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gzhan gyis gsod par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
'o na ni mthar smos pas de la sogs pa go'o /
la lar ni mtha' yang dang pos go ste /
'di lta ste tshangs ris kyi lha dag lta bu ste /
'di ni bde ba skye ba dang po yin no zhes gang bshad pa lta bu'o /
la lar ni dang po yang mthas go ste /
yadāha /
tadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ 		'di lta ste /
'od gsal ba'i lha rnams lta bu ste /
iyaṃ dvitīyā sukhopapattiriti 'di ni bde ba skye ba gnyis pa yin no zhes gang bshad pa lta bu'o /
ayamatra tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācaka iti yukta etasmāccheṣasaṃ pratyayaḥ /
eṣa hi dṛṣṭāntadharmo yadekamapi tajjātīyakaṃ dṛśyate /
sa ceha tadyathāśabdo nāstītyanupasaṃhāra eṣaḥ /
yadyayaṃ tadyathāśabdo dṛṣṭāntavācakaḥ syādiha na prāpnuyāt /
santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā manuṣyastadekatyāścadevā iti 		'dir ni 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di dper na brjod pa yin pas 'di las lhag ma go bar yang rigs te /
dpe'i chos ni gang gcig yin yang de dang 'dra ba yang ston par byed pa 'di yin no /
'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra de yang 'di na med pas 'di ni nye bar sbyar du mi rung ngo /
gal te 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di dper brjod pa yin na ni sems can lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag kyang yod de /
'di lta ste mi rnams dang lha kha cig go zhes bya ba 'dir thob par mi 'gyur te /
tasmādupadarśanārtha evāyaṃ draṣṭavya ityalamatiprasaṅgena de lta bas na 'di ni nye bar bstan pa'i don kho nar blta bar bya'o /
ha cang thal bas chog go /
uktaṃ jīvitam srog bshad zin to /
lakṣaṇāni punarjātirjarā sthitiranityatā /
etāni hi saṃskṛtasya catvāri lakṣaṇāni 		mtshan nyid dag ni skye ba dang /
rga dang gnas dang mi rtag nyid /
bzhi po 'di rnams ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dag yin te /
yatraitāni bhavanti sa dharmaḥ saṃskṛto lakṣyate gang la 'di dag yod pa'i chos de ni 'dus byas su mngon no /
viparyayādasaṃskṛtaḥ /
tatra jātistaṃ dharmaṃ janayati sthitiḥ sthapayati jarā jarayati anityatā vināśayati /
nanu trīṇimāni saṃskṛta lakṣaṇānīti sūtra uktam 		bzlog pa ni 'dus ma byas so /
de la skye bas ni chos de skyed par byad do /
gnas pas ni gnas par byed do /
rga bas ni rnyings par byed do /
mi rtag pa nyid kyis ni 'jig par byed do /
mdo las gsum po 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin no zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam /
caturthamapyatra vaktavyaṃ syāt der bzhi pa yang brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur ro /
kiṃ cātra noktam der gang zhig ma gsungs /
āha /
sthitiḥ 		smras pa /
gnas pa'o /
yattarhi idaṃ sthityanyathātvamiti /
jarāyā eṣa paryāyastadyathā jāterutpāda ityanityatāyāśca vyaya iti /
ye hi dharmāḥ saṃskārāṇāmadhvasaṃcārāya pravṛttāsta eva sūtre lakṣaṇānyuktānyudvejanārtham 		'o na ni gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di yin no /
'di ni rga ba'i rnam grangs yin te /
dper na skye ba'i 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang mi rtag pa nyid kyi 'jig pa zhes bya ba bzhin no /
mdo las ni yid 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir chos gang dag 'du byed rnams kyi dus 'pho bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa de dag nyid mtshan nyid du gsungs te /
jātirhi yā saṃskārānanāgatādadhvanaḥ pratyutpannamadhvānaṃ saṃcārayati /
jarā 'nityate punaḥ pratyutpannādatītaṃ durbalīkṛtya pratighātāt 		skye bas ni 'du byed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus nas da ltar byung ba'i dus su skyed par byed do /
rga ba dang mi rtag pa nyid dag gis ni da ltar byung ba nas 'das par te /
tadyathā kila gahanapraviṣṭasya puruṣasya trayaḥ śatravaḥ nyam chung ngur byas te 'joms par byed pa'i phyir dper na thibs por zhugs pa'i mi zhig la dgra gsum yod de /
tata eka enaṃ gahanādākarṣet dvau punarjīvitādvacyaparopayetāṃ tadvaditi /
sthitistu tān saṃskārānupaguhya tiṣṭhatyaviyogamivecchantī 		de las gcig gis ni thibs po nas 'byin par byed /
gnyis kyis ni srog gcod par byed pa de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
gnas pa ni mi 'bral bar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'du byed de dag 'khyud nas gnas so /
ato 'sau saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ na vyavasthāpitā /
asaṃskṛtasyāpi ca svalakṣaṇe sthitibhāvāt 		de'i phyir 'di ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du rnam par ma bzhag go /
'dus ma byas kyang rang gi mtshan nyid la gnas pa yod pa'i phyir ro /
anye punaḥ kalpayanti sthitiṃ jarāṃ cābhisamasya sthityanyathātvamityekaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ sūtre /
kiṃ prayojanam 		gzhan dag rtog par byed pa ni mdo las gnas pa dang rga ba bsdus te /
gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid ces mtshan nyid gcig tu gsungs so /
ci dgos she na /
eṣā hyeṣu saṅgāspadamataḥ śriyamivaināṃ kālakarṇīsahitāṃ darśayāmāsa tasyāmanāsaṅgārthamiti /
ataścatvāryeva saṃskṛta lakṣaṇāni /
teṣāmapi nāma jātyādīnāṃ saṃskṛtatvādanyairjātyādibhirbhavitavyam 		'di dag gi nang na 'di ni chags pa'i gzhi yin pas de'i phyir de la ma chags par bya ba'i don du de ni dpal dang 'dra ba 'di dang rna nag ma dang lhan cig tu bstan te /
de'i phyir 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni bzhi kho na'o snyam mo /
skye ba la sogs pa de dag kyang 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir skye ba la sogs pa gzhan yang yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
bhavantyeva /
jātijātyādayasteṣāṃ /
teṣāmapi catvāryanulakṣaṇāni bhavanti /
jātijātiḥ sthitisthitiḥ jarājarā anityatā 'nityatā iti 		yod pa kho na ste /
de dag skye ba'i skye la sogs /
de dag la yang skye ba'i skye ba dang rga ba'i rga ba dang gnas pa'i gnas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid kyi mi rtag pa nyid ces bya ba rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid bzhi yod do /
nanu caikasyaikasya caturlakṣaṇī prāpnoti aparyavasānadoṣaśca /
teṣāṃ punaranyajātyādiprasaṅgāt /
na prāpnoti 		de dag la yang skye ba la sogs pa gzhan du thal ba'i phyir re re la yang mtshan nyid bzhi pa dang mthar thug pa med pa'i skyon du yang 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
mi 'gyur te /
yasmāt /
te 'ṣṭadharmaikavṛttayaḥ /
teṣāṃ jātyādīnāmaṣṭāsu dharmeṣu vṛttiḥ /
kimidaṃ vṛttiriti 		'di ltar /
de chos brgyad dang gcig la 'jug /
skye ba la sogs pa de dag ni chos brgyad la 'jug go /
'jug pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
kāritraṃ puruṣakāraḥ /
jātijātyādīnāṃ caikatra dharme kathaṃ kṛtvā ātmanā navamo hi dharma utpadyate /
sārdhaṃ lakṣaṇānulakṣaṇairaṣṭābhiḥ 		byed pa ste skyes bu'i rtsal lo /
skye ba'i skye ba la sogs pa ni chos gcig la 'jug go /
ji lta zhe na /
chos bdag nyid gtogs par mtshan nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid brgyad dang lhan cig tu dgu skye la /
tatra jātirātmānaṃ virahayyānyānaṣṭau dharmān janayati de la skye bas ni bdag nyid ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan brgyad skyed par byed do; /
jātijātiḥ puna stāmeva jātim skye ba'i skye bas ni skye ba de kho na skyed par byed do /
tadyathā kila kācit kukkuṭī bahūnya patyāni prajāyate kācidalpāni dper na khyim bya mo la la las ni phru gu mang du 'brang la /
la las ni nyung du 'brang ba de dang 'dra'o /
tadvat sthitirapyātmānaṃ varjayitvā 'nyānaṣṭau dharmān sthāpayati sthitisthitistu tāmeva sthitim gnas pas kyang bdag nyid ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan brgyad gnas par byed la /
gnas pa'i gnas pas ni gnas pa de kho na gnas par byed do /
evaṃ jarā 'nityate api yathāyogyaṃ yajye de bzhin du rga ba dang mi rtag pa nyid dag la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya ste /
tasmānā bhavatyanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ de bas na thug pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes grag go /
tadetadākāśaṃ pāṭyata iti sautrāntikāḥ mdo sde pa rnams na re 'di ni nam mkha' la 'dral bar bskyod pa yin te /
nahyete jātyādayo dharmā dravyataḥ saṃvidyante yathā 'bhivyajyante skye ba la sogs pa'i chos can de dag ni ji ltar rnam par 'byed pa ltar rdzas su yod pa ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
pramāṇābhāvāt /
nahyeṣāṃ dravyato 'stitve kiñcidapi pramāṇamasti pratyakṣamanumānamāptāgamo vā yathā rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmiti /
yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ saṃskṛtasyotpādo 'pi prajñāyate vyayo 'pi sthityanyathātvamapī ti 		tshad ma med pa'i phyir te /
de dag rdzas su yod pa'i tshad ma ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i chos bzhin du mngon sum pa 'am /
rjes su dpag pa 'am /
yid ches pa'i lung ni cung zad kyang med do /
'on gang mdo sde las /
'dus byas skye bar yang mngon no /
'jig par yang mngon no /
gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid du yang mngon no zhes gsungs so zhe na /
granthajño devānāṃ priyo natvarthajñaḥ tshig shes pa ni lha rnams dga' ba yin gyi don shes pa ni ma yin no /
arthaśca pratiśaraṇa muktaṃ bhagavatā /
kaḥ punarasyārthaḥ /
avidyāndhā hi bālāḥ saṃskārapravāhamātmāta ātmīyataścādhimuktā abhiṣvajante 		bcom ldan 'das kyis ni don la brten par gsungs so /
'di'i don gang zhe na /
ma rig pas ldongs pa'i byis pa rnams 'du byed kyi rgyun la bdag dang bdag gir mos pas mngon par zhen pas mos pa de bzlog pa'i phyir /
tasya mithyādhimokṣasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ bhagavāṃstasya saṃskārapravāhasyasaṃskṛtatvaṃ pratītyasamutpannatāṃ dyotayitukāma idamāha triṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni /
na tu kṣaṇasya /
nahi kṣaṇasyotpādādayaḥ prajñāyante /
nacāprajñāyamānā ete lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
atha evātra sūtre saṃskṛtasyotpādo 'pi prajñāyata ityuktam 		bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed kyi rgyun de 'dus byas nyid dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid du bstan par bzhed nas /
gsum po 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dag yin no zhes gsungs par zad kyi yang skad cig ma la ni ma yin no /
skad cig ma la ni skye ba la sogs pa mi mngon no /
mi mngon pa de dag ni mtshan nyid yin par 'os pa ma yin te /
de nyid kyi phyir mdo de las /
'dus byas skye bar yang mngon no zhes gsungs so /
punaḥ saṃskṛtagrahaṇaṃ saṃskṛtatve lakṣaṇānīti yathā vijñāye ta yang 'dus byas zhes smos pa ni ci nas kyang 'dus byas nyid kyi mtshan nyid dag yin no snyam du shes par bya ba'i chu dang chu skyar ltar ram /
maivaṃ vijñāyi saṃskṛtasya vastuno 'stitve lakṣaṇāni jalavalākāvat sādhvasādutve vā kanyālakṣaṇavaditi dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid kyi bu mo'i mtshan bzhin du 'dus byas kyi dngos po yod pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dag yin no zhes bya ba de ltar shes na ni mi rung ngo snyam nas smos pa yin no /
tatra pravāhasyādirutpādo nivṛttirvyayaḥ /
sa eva pravāho 'nuvarttamānaḥ sthitiḥ 		de la rgyun gyi dbang po ni skye ba yin no /
ldog pa ni 'jig pa yin no /
rgyun de nyid rjes su 'jug pa ni gnas pa yin no /
tasya pūrvāparaviśeṣaḥ sthityanyathātvam /
evaṃ ca kṛtvoktaṃ viditā eva nandasya kulaputrasya vedanā utpadyante viditā ava tiṣṭhante viditā astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchantīti /
āha cātra 		de'i snga phyi'i bye brag ni gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid yin no /
de lta yin pas na /
rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i tshor ba ni rig bzhin du skye'o /
rig bzhin du gnas so /
rig bzhin du nub pa dang yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so /
'dir smras pa /
jātirādiḥ pravāhasya vyayaśchedaḥ sthitistu saḥ /
sthityanyathātvaṃ tasyaiva pūrvāparaviśiṣṭatā 		rgyun gyi dang po skye ba yin /
chad pa 'jig pa gnas pa ste /
de nyid snga phyi'i bye brag ni; /
gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid /
yang 'dir smras pa /
jātirapūrvo bhāvaṃ sthitiḥ prabandho vyayastaducchedaḥ sngon med las byung skye ba ste /
rgyun gnas de chad 'jig pa yin /
sthityanyathātvamiṣṭaṃ prabandhapūrvāparaviśeṣa iti rgyun gyi snga phyi'i bye brag ni /
gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur bar 'dod /
kṣaṇikasya hi dharmasya vinā sthityā vyayo bhavet skad cig ma yi chos la ni /
gnas pa med na 'jig par 'gyur /
na ca vyetyeva tenāsya vṛthā tatparikalpanā /
tasmāt pravāha eva sthitiḥ /
evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'yamapyabhidharmanirdeśa upapannno bhavati /
sthitiḥ katamā 		de yang 'jig 'gyur de yi phyir /
de yi der rtogs don med do /
de lta bas na gnas pa ni rgyun kho na yin no /
de ltar bshad na chos mngon pa las gnas pa gang zhe na /
utpannānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmavināśa iti /
nahi kṣaṇasyotpannasyāvināśo 'stīti /
yadapi ca jñānaprasthāna uktam ekasmiṃścitte ka utpādaḥ 		'dus byas skye ba rnams mi 'jig pa yin no zhes bstan pa 'di yang 'thad pa yin te /
skyes pa skad cig ma la ni 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro /
gang yang ye shes la 'jug pa las /
sems gcig la 'byung ba gang zhe na /
āha /
jātiḥ 		smras pa /
skye ba'o /
ko vyayo maraṇam 'jig pa gang zhe na /
'chi ba'o /
kiṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ jareti gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid gang zhe na /
tatrāpi nikāyasabhāgacittaṃ yujyate /
pratikṣaṇaṃ cāpi saṃskṛtasyaitāni lakṣaṇāni yujyante vinā 'pi dravyāntarakalpanayā 		rga ba'o zhes gsungs pa der yang ris mthun pa'i sems la rung bar 'gyur ro /
skad cig ma re re la yang rdzas gzhan du rtogs pa med pa bzhin du 'dus byas kyi de dag rung ste /
kathamiti ji lta zhe na /
pratikṣaṇamabhūtvābhāva utpādaḥ skad cig ma re re la ma byung ba las byung ba ni skye ba'o /
bhūtvā 'bhāvo vyayaḥ byung nas med pa ni 'jig pa'o /
pūrvasya pūrvasyottarakṣaṇānuvandhaḥ sthitiḥ snga ma snga ma dang phyi ma phyi ma'i skad cig ma rjes su 'brel ba ni gnas pa'o /
tasyāvisdṛśatvaṃ sthityanyathātvamiti de'i mi 'dra ba nyid ni gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid do /
yadā tarhi sadṛśā utpadyante 'o na gang gi tshe 'dra bar yang skye'o zhe na /
na te nirviśeṣā bhavanti /
kathamidaṃ jñāyate 		de dag khyad par med pa ma yin no /
'di ji ltar shes she na /
kṣiptākṣiptabalidurbalakṣiptasya vajrādeścirāśutarapātakālabhedāttanmahābhūtānāṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣasiddheḥ /
nātivahuviśeṣabhinnāstu saṃskārāḥ satyapyanyathātve sadṛśā eva dṛśyante /
antimasya tarhi śabdārciḥkṣaṇasya parinirvāṇakāle ca ṣaḍāyatanasyottarakṣaṇābhāvāt sthityahnyanyathātvaṃ nāstītyavyāpinī lakṣaṇavyavasthā prāpnoti /
na vai saṃskṛtasya sthitirevocyate /
lakṣaṇamapi tu sthityanyathātvam /
ato yasyāsti sthitistasyāvaśyamanyathātvaṃ bhavatīti nāsti lakṣaṇavyavasthābhedaḥ /
samāsatastvatra sūtre saṃskṛtasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamiti dyotitaṃ bhagavatā saṃskṛtaṃ nāma yadbhūtavā bhavati bhūtvā ca punarna bhavati yaścāsya sthitisaṃjñakaḥ prabandhaḥ so 'nyathā cānyathā ca bhavatīti 		rdo rje la sogs pa 'phangs pa dang ma 'phangs pa dang stobs chen po dang stobs chung ngus 'phangs pa bul ba dang myur ba dang ches dal ba dang ches myur bar ltung ba'i dus kyi bye brag las de'i 'byung ba rnams yongs su gyur ba'i bye brag 'grub pa'i phyir ro /
'dus byas rnams ni bye brag gi khyad par chen po mtshar cig med pas gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid yod du zin kyang 'dra ba bzhin du snang ngo /
'o na ni sgra dang me lce'i skad cig ma tha ma dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe'i skye mched drug la skad cig ma phyi ma med pa'i phyir gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa ma khyab pa can du 'gyur ro /
'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gnas pa kho na yang ma yin gyi gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid kyang yin no /
de'i phyir gang la gnas pa yod pa de la gdon mi za bar gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid kyang yod pas rnam par gzhag pa nyams pa med do /
mdor na bcom ldan 'das kyis ni mdo 'di las 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni /
gang ma byung ba las 'byung ba dang byung nas kyang mi 'byung ba 'di 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin par gsungs la /
'di'i gnas pa zhes bya ba rgyun gang yin pa de yang gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur ba yin na /
kim atra dravyāntarair jātyādibhiḥ katham idānīṃ sa eva dharmo lakṣyas tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yokṣyate /
kathaṃ tāvan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni mahāpuruṣān nānyāni sāsnālāṅgūlakakudaśaphaviṣāṇādīni ca gotvalakṣaṇāni gor nānyāni kāṭhinyādīni ca pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ lakṣaṇāni tebhyo nānyāni 		'dir skye ba la sogs pa rdzas gzhan dag gis ci zhig bya /
de ni ji ltar na mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i chos de nyid kyi mtshan nyid du rung bar 'gyur zhe na /
re zhig ji ltar na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams skyes bu chen po las mi gzhan pa yin /
ba lang nyid kyi mtshan nyid lkog shal dang mjug ma dang nog dang rmig pa dang rva rnams kyang ba lang las mi gzhan pa yin /
yathā codhrvagamanena dūrāddhūmasya dhūmatvaṃ lakṣyate naca tattasmādanyat /
sa evātra nyāyaḥ syāt /
naca saṃskṛtānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ tāvat saṃskṛtatvaṃ lakṣyate /
gṛhṇatāpi svabhāvaṃ yāvat prāgabhāvo na jñāyate paścācca santateśca viśeṣaḥ /
tasmānna tenaiva tallakṣitaṃ bhavati naca tebhyo dravyāntarāṇyeva jātyādīni vidyante 		sa'i khams la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid sra ba nyid la sogs pa rnams kyang de dag las mi gzhan pa yin /
gzhan yang ji ltar gyen du 'gro ba las ni thag ring po nas du ba la du ba nyid du shes mod kyi /
de ni de las kyang mi gzhan pa ltar 'dir yang tshul de nyid yin no /
'dus byas gzugs la sogs pa rang gi ngo bo bzung yang ji srid du snga na med pa dang phyis med pa dang rgyun gyi bye brag mi shes pa de srid du 'dus byas nyid du mi shes te /
de lta bas na de nyid kyis de mtshon pa yang ma yin la /
de dag las skye ba la sogs pa rdzas gzhan nyid du yod pa yang ma yin no /
athāpi nāma dravyāntarāṇyeva jātyādīni bhaveyuḥ /
kimayuktaṃ syāt 		'on te skye ba la sogs pa rdzas gzhan zhig tu gyur na yang ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
eko dharmaḥ ekasminneva kāle jātaḥ sthito jīrṇo naṣṭaḥ syādeṣāṃ sahabhūtvāt de dag ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir chos gcig dus gcig tu skyes pa dang gnas pa dang rgas pa dang zhig par 'gyur ro /
ma yin te /
kāritrakālabhedāt bya ba'i dus tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
anāgatā hi jātiḥ kāritraṃ hi karoti skye ba ma 'ongs pa ni bya ba byed de /
'di ltar ma skyes pa skyed do /
yasmānna jātaṃ janyate janite tu dharme varttamānāḥ kṣityādayaḥ kāritraṃ kurvantīti na yadā jāyate tadā tiṣṭati jīryati vinaśyati vā /
idaṃ tāvadiha saṃpradhāryaṃ bhavet /
kimanāgataṃ dravyato 'sti nāstīti paścājjanayati vā naveti sidhyet 		bskyed zin pa'i chos la ni da ltar gnas pa la sogs pa bya ba byed pas gang gi tshe skye ba de tshe gnas pa'am /
rga ba 'am /
'jig par mi 'gyur ro /
re zhig 'dir ci ma 'ongs pa rdzas su yod dam med ces bya ba 'di dpyad dgos par 'gyur te /
phyis ni skyed par byed dam 'on te ma yin zhes bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro /
satyapi tu tasmin jātiḥ kāritaraṃ kurvatī kathamanāgatā sidhyatītyanāgata lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam de yod du chug na yang skye ba bya ba byed na ji ltar ma 'ongs par 'grub par 'gyur /
de lta bas na ma 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang brjod par bya'o /
uparatakāritrā cotpannā kathaṃ varttamānā sidhyatīti varttamānalakṣāṇaṃ vaktavyam byung ba yang bya ba zhig pa yin na ji ltar na da ltar 'grub par 'gyur /
de lta bas na da lta'i mtshan nyid kyang brjod par bya'o /
sthityādayo 'pi ca yugapat kāritre varttamānā ekakṣaṇa eva dharmasya sthitajīrṇavinaṣṭatāṃ prasañjeyuḥ gnas pa la sogs pa yang cig car bya ba la 'jug pa yin na ni skad cig ma gcig kho na la chos gnas pa dang rga ba dang 'jig par thal bar 'gyur te /
yadaiva hyenaṃ sthitiḥ sthāpayati tadaiva jrā jarayati anityatā vināśayatīti /
kimayaṃ tatra kāle tiṣṭatvāhosvijjīryatu vinaśyatu vā yo 'pi hi brūyāt sthityādīnāmapi kāritraṃ krameṇeti tasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ bādhyate 		'di gang gi tshe gnas pas gnas par byed pa de nyid kyi tshe rga bas rga bar byed cing mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'jig par byed pa'i phyir 'di ci dus der gnas sam /
'on te rga ba 'am /
'on te 'jig par 'gyur /
gang yang skye ba la sogs pa rnams kyang bya ba rim gyis byed do zhes zer ba de'i ltar na skad cig ma gcig la gnod par 'gyur ro /
athāpyevaṃ brūyāt eṣa eva hi naḥ kṣaṇo yāvataitat sarvaṃ samāpyata iti 'on te ji skad du kho bo cag gi skad cig ma ni ji tsam gyis 'di thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur bde yin no zhes brjod na /
evamapoi tābhyāṃ sahotpannā sthitistāvat sthāpayati na jrā jarayati anityatā vā vināśyatīti /
kuta etat 		de lta na yang de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba las re zhig gnas pas ni gnas par byed kyi rga bas kyang rgas par mi byed la /
mi rtag pa nyid kyis kyang 'jig par mi byed do zhes bya ba 'di ga las /
sthiterbalīyastvāt gnas pa stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
punaḥ kenāvalīyastvam /
yadaināṃ saha dharmeṇānityatā hanti /
kṛtakṛtyā punaḥ karttuṃ notsahate jātivat 		phyis ci'i phyir stobs dang mi ldan pa nyid du 'gyur /
gang gi phyir na 'di chos dang lhan cig tu mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'joms /
bya ba byas zin pas yang mi nus te skye ba bzhin no /
sthaturyuktamanutsoḍhum /
nahi śakyaṃ jātyādijanyaṃ vartamānatāmānītaṃ punarānetum /
śakyaṃ tu khalu sthityā sthāpyamatyantamapi sthāpayitum 		skye bas ni mi nus par rigs te; skye bas bskyed par bya ba da lta nyid du khyer te 'ongs nas yang bkur bar ni mi nus so /
gnas pas ni gnas par bya ba ye gnas par bya bar yang nus so /
ato na yuktaṃ yannotsahate de lta bas na gang mi nus pa ni rigs pa ma yin no /
ko vā 'tra pratibandhaḥ yang na 'di la bgegs byed pa yang gang zhig yin te /
te eva jarā 'nityate /
yadi hi te balīyasyau syātāṃ pūrvameva syātām /
nivṛttakāritrāyāṃ khalvapi sthitau ta cāpi na tiṣṭataḥ sa cāpi dharma iti kathaṃ kutra vā kāritraṃ karttumutsahiṣyete kiṃ vā punastābhyāṃ karttavyam /
sthitiparigrahāddhi sa dharma utpannamātro na vyanaśyat /
sa tu tayā vyupekṣyamāṇo niyataṃ na sthāsyatyayamevāsya vināśaḥ /
syācca tāvadekasya dharmasyotpannasyāvināśaḥ sthitiḥ vināśo 'nityatā /
jarā tu khalu sarvathātvena na tathā 		rga ba dang mi rtag pa nyid de dag kho na yin no /
gal te de dag stobs dang ldan pa zhig yin na ni sngon kho na yin no /
gnas pa'i bya ba log na yang de dag kyang mi gnas la chos de yang mi gnas na ji ltar gang la bya ba byed pa nus par 'gyur /
yang na de dag gis ci zhig bya ste /
gnas pas yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos skyes pa tsam de ma zhig par gyur pa yin la /
des de yal bar btang na ni nges par mi gnas pas 'di nyid 'di'i 'jig pa yin no /
re zhig chos skyes pa gcig la mi 'jig pa ni gnas pa yin la /
'jig pa ni mi rtag pa nyid yin la /
gcig la rga ba ni rnam pa thams cad du mi srid de /
pūrvāparaviśeṣāt vipariṇāmācca /
atastadanyathātve 'nya eva 		rga ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan nyid du 'gyur zhing rnam par 'gyur ba yin na de nyid las de'i rnam pa gzhan nyid du ni rung ba ma yin no /
uktaṃ hi 'dir smras pa /
tathātvena jarā 'siddhiranyathātve 'nya eva saḥ de bzhin na ni rga mi 'gyur /
gzhan du 'gyur na de gzhan nyid /
tasmānaikasya bhāvasya jarā nāmopapadyate de lta bas na dngos gcig la /
rga zhes bya ba mi 'thad do /
yo 'pyāha nikāyāntarīyo vināśa kāraṇaṃ prāpyānityatā vināśāyatīti tasya harītakīṃ prāpya devatā virecayatītyāpannaṃ bhavati kiṃ punastāṃ kalpayitvā /
tat evāstu vināśakāraṇādvināśaḥ cittacaittānāṃ ca kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamāttadanityatāyā vināśakāraṇānapekṣatvāt sthityanityate kāritramabhinnakālaṃ kuryātāmityekasyaikatra kāle sthita vinaṣṭatā saṃprasajyeta /
tasmāt pravāhaṃ pratyetāni saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyuktānītyevametatsūtraṃ sūnītaṃ bhavati 		gang yang sde pa gzhan dag na re 'jig pa'i rgyu dang phrad nas mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'jig par byed do zhes zer ba de'i ni 'khru ba dang phrad nas lhas 'khru bar byed do zhes bya ba lta bur 'gyur te /
'jig pa'i rgyu de nyid kyis 'jig na de brtags pas ci zhig bya /
sems dang sems las byung ba rnams skad cig ma nyid du khas blangs pas de dag gis mi rtag pa nyid 'jig pa'i rgyu la mi ltos pa'i phyir gnas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid dag dus tha mi dad par bya ba byed par 'gyur bas cig la dus gcig tu gnas pa dang 'jig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro /
de lta bas na rgyun la 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid 'di dag gsungs pa yin te /
de lta na mdo de legs par drangs pa yin no /
apica yadyanāgatā jātirjanyasya janikā kimarthaṃ sarvamanāgataṃ yugapannotpadyate gzhan yang gal te ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba bskyed par bya ba skyed par byed pa yin nam 'ongs pa thams cad cig car ci'i phyir mi bskyed /
yasmāt 'di ltar /
janyasya janikā jātirna hetupratyayairvenā rgyu dang rkyen dag med par ni /
skye bas bskyed bya skyed byed min /
nahi vinā hetupratyayasāmagrayā jātirjanikā bhavati rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med par ni skye bas skyed par byed pa ma yin no /
hetupratyayānāmeva tarhi sāmarthyaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
sati sāmargya bhāvādasati cābhāvānna jāteriti hetupratyayā eva jana kāḥsantaḥ /
kiṃ ca bhoḥ sarvaṃ vidyamānamupalabhyate /
sūkṣmā api dharmaprakṛtayaḥ saṃvidyante /
jātamityeva tu na syādasatyāṃ jātau ṣaṣṭhivacanaṃ ca rūpasyotpādaḥ iti yathā rūpasya rūpamiti /
evaṃ yāvadanityatā yathāyogaṃ vaktavyā 		'o na ni tshogs pa yod na ni 'byung la med na ni mi 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen rnams kho na'i mthu yin par blta bar bya'i skye ba ni ma yin pas rgyu dang rkyen kho na skyed par byed pa dag yin no zhes zer ro /
kye yod pa thams cad dmigs sam ci chos kyi rang bzhin phra mo dag yod bzhin du yang mi dmigs so /
skye ba zhig med na skyes zhes bya ba nyid dang gzugs kyi skye ba zhes bya ba drug pa'i tshig tu yang mi 'gyur te dper na gzugs kyi gzugs zhes mi bya ba bzhin no /
de bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid kyi bar du ci rigs par brjod par bya'o /
tena tarhy anātmatvam apy eṣṭavyam anātmabuddhisiddhyartham 'o na ni des na bdag med pa'i blo 'grub par bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa nyid cig kyang 'dod par byas la /
saṃkhyāparimāṇapṛthaktvasaṃyogavibhāgaparatvaaparatvasattādayo 'pi tīrthakaraparikalpitā abhyupagantavyā ekadvimahadaṇupṛthaksaṃyuktaviyuktaparāparasadādibuddhisiddhyartham /
ṣaṣṭīvidhānārthaṃ ca rūpasya saṃyoga iti /
eṣā ca ṣaṣṭo kathaṃ kalpyate /
rūpasya svabhāva iti /
tasmāt prajñaptimātramevaitadabhūtvābhāvajñāpanārthaṃ kriyate jātamiti 		gcig dang gnyis dang chen po dang chung ngu dang tha dad pa dang ldan pa dang rnam par phye ba dang gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa dang yod pa la sogs pa'i blo 'grub par bya ba'i phyir dang drug par bya ba'i phyir mu stegs byed kyis yongs su brtag pa grangs dang tshad dang tha dad pa nyid dang ldan pa dang rnam par dbye ba dang gzhan nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang yod pa la sogs pa dang gzugs kyi ldan pa zhes bya ba yang khas blang bar bya dgos so /
gzugs kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba drug pa 'di yang ji ltar brtag /
de lta bas na skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ma byung ba las byung ba kho nar shes par bya ba'i don du brtags pa tsam mdzad pa yin no /
sa cābhūtvābhāvalakṣāṇa utpādo bahuvikalpaḥ /
tasya viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasyotpāda iti ṣaṣṭīṃ kurvanti yathā rupasaṃjñaka evotpādaḥ pratīyeta mā 'nyaḥ pratyāyīti 		ma byung ba las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi skye bde yang rnam pa mang du yod pas de bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir gzugs kyi skye bzhes drug par mdzad de /
ci nas kyang gzugs zhes bya ba kho na skye bar shes par bya'i gzhan du ni shes par mi 'gyur bar bya ba yin te /
tadyathā candanasya gandhādayaḥ śilāputrakasya śarīramiti /
evaṃ sthityādayo 'pi yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
yadi jātyā vinā jāyate kasmādasaṃskṛtamapyākāśādikaṃ na jāyate 		dper na tsan dan gyi dri la sogs pa dang mchi gu'i lus zhes bya ba bzhin no /
de bzhin du gnas pa la sogs pa la yang ci rigs par bya'o /
gal te skye ba med par skye na nam mkha' la sogs pa 'dus ma byas kyang ci'i phyir mi skye zhe na /
jāyat ityabhūtvā bhavati /
asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nityamastīti na jāyate /
yathā ca dharmatayā na sarvaṃ jātimadiṣyate tathā na sarvaṃ jāyata ityeṣṭavyam 		skye ba zhes bya ba ni ma byung ba las 'byung ba yin na 'dus ma byas ni rtag tu yod pa'i phyir mi skye'o /
yang ji ltar chos nyid kyis thams cad skye ba dang ldan par mi 'dod pa de ltar thams cad mi skye'o zhes bya bar 'dod par bya'o /
yathā ca tulye jātimattve tadanye pratyayāstadanyasyotpādane na samarthā bhavantyevamevāsaṃskṛtasyotpādane sarve 'pyasamarthāḥ syuḥ yang na ji ltar skye ba dang ldan par mtshungs pa las de dag las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams kyis de dag las gzhan pa bskyed par nus pa ma yin pa de bzhin du thams cad kyis kyang 'dus ma byas bskyed par mi nus par 'gyur ro /
siddhā eva tu dravyabhāvena jātyādaya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re skye ba la sogs pa rdzas kyi dngos por grub pa nyid do /
nahi dūṣakāḥ santītyāgamā apāsyante nahi mṛgāḥ santīti yavā noṣyante nahi makṣikāḥ patantīti modakā na bhakṣyante /
tasmāddoṣeṣu pratividhātavyaṃ siddhāntaścānuvarttitavyaḥ 		ri dags dag yod ces te nas mi rmo ba ma yin pa dang sbrang bu dag yod ces tel du mi bza' ba ma yin pa ltar sun 'byin pa dag yod ces te lung dor du mi rung bas de lta bas na skyon rnams la yang lan gdab par bya la; grub pa'i mtha'i rjes su 'brang bar yang bya'o zhes zer ro /
uktāni lakṣaṇāni mtshan nyid rnams bshad zin to /
nāmakāyādayaḥ katame ming gi tshogs la sogs pa gang zhe na /
nāmakāyādayaḥ saṃjñāvākyākṣarasamuktayaḥ ming gi tshogs la sogs pa ni /
ming dang ngag dang yi ge'i tshogs /
ādigrahaṇena padavyañjanakāyagrahaṇam /
tatra saṃjñākaraṇaṃ nāma 		sogs pa smos pas ni tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs gzung ngo /
de la ming byed pa ni ming ste /
tadyathā rūpaṃ śabda ityevamādiḥ /
vākyaṃ padaṃ yāvatā 'rthaparisamāptistadyathā anityā vata saṃskārā ityevamādi yena kriyāguṇakālasaṃbandhaviśeṣā gamyante 		dper na gzugs sgra zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa lta bu'o /
ngag ni tshig ste /
dper na /
kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /
ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa ji tsam gyis don yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
gang gis bya ba dang yon tan dang dus kyi 'brel ba'i khyad par rtogs par 'gyur ro /
yi ge ni yi ge ste /
vyañjanamakṣaraṃ tadyathā a ā ityevamādi dper na aa a'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o /
nanu cākṣarāṇyapi lipyavayavānāṃ nāmāni yi ge rnams kyang yi ge 'bru'i yan lag dag gi ming dag ma yin nam zhe na /
na vai lipyavayavānāṃ pratyāyanārthamakṣārāṇi praṇītānyakṣarāṇāmeva tu pratyāyanārthaṃ lipyavayavāḥ praṇītāḥ /
kathamaśrūyamāṇāni lekhyena pratīyeranniti nākṣarāṇyeṣāṃ nāmāni /
eṣāṃ ca saṃjñādīnāṃ samuktayo nāmādikāyāḥ 		yi ge 'bru'i yan lag rnams go bar bya ba'i phyir yi ge rnams byas pa ni ma yin gyi /
ji ltar na ming thos pa bris pas go bar 'gyur zhes yi ge rnams go bar bya ba'i phyir ni yi ge'i 'bru rnams byas pa yin pas /
yi ge rnams ni de dag gi ming ma yin no /
uca samavāye paṭhanti /
tasya samuktirityetad rūpaṃ bhavati 		ming la sogs pa de dag gi tshogs ni ming la sogs pa'i tshogs dag yin te /
yo 'rthaḥ samavāya iti so 'rthaḥ samuktiriti /
tatra nāmakāyastadyathā rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyānītyevamādi 		mang po'i don gang yin pa'o /
de la ming gi tshogs ni dper na gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dag ces bya ba ste; de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
padakāyaḥ tadyathā sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvadharma anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇami tyevamādi tshig gi tshogs ni dper na 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dag go /
mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba ste /
de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
vyañjanakāyastadyathā ka kha ga gha ñetyevamādi yi ge'i tshogs ni dper na ka kha ga gha nga zhes bya ba ste /
nanu caite vāksvabhāvatvācchabdātmakā iti rūpasvabhāvā bhavanti /
kasmāccittaviprayuktā ityucyante 		de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
de dag kyang ngag ni rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sgra'i bdag nyid yin pas gzugs kyi rang bzhin dag ma yin nam ci'i phyir sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams zhes bya zhe na /
naite vāksvabhāvāḥ /
ghoṣo hi vāk naca ghoṣāmātrenārthāḥ pratīyante 		de dag ni ngag gi rang bzhin ma yin te /
ngag gi sgra yin na sgra tsam gyis ni don gang dag go bar mi 'gyur ro /
kiṃ tarhi /
vāṅnāmni pravrttate nāmārthaṃ dyotayati naiva ghoṣamātraṃ vāg yena tu ghoṣeṇārthaḥ pratīyate sa ghoṣo vāk /
kena punarghoṣeṇārthaḥ pratīyate 		'o na ci zhe na /
ngag ni ming la 'jug la ming gis ni don rjod par byed do /
sgra tsam kho na ni ngag ma yin gyi sgra gang gis don go bar 'gyur ba'i sgra de dag yin no /
yang sgra gang gis don go bar 'gyur zhe na /
gang gis smra ba po rnams kyis don dag la mtshams bcad pa ste /
yo 'rtheṣu kṛtāvadhirvaktṛbhistadyathāgaurityeṣa śabdo navasvartheṣu kṛtāvadhiḥ dper na goo zhes bya ba lta bu'o /
sgra de ni don dgu dag la mtshams bcad pa yin te /
vāgdigbhūraśmivajreṣu paśvakṣisvargavāriṣu ngag phyogs pa dang 'od zer dang /
phyugs dang mig dang rdo rje dang /
navasvartheṣu medhāvī gośabdamupadhārayediti /
yo 'pi hi manyate nāmārthaṃ dyotayatīti tenāpyetadavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ yadi pratīpadārthakaṃ bhavatīti /
taccaita cchabdamātrādeva pratītapadārthakāt sidhyatīti kimartharaṃ nāma kalpayitvā /
idaṃ cāpi na jñāyate kathaṃ vāṅnāmni pravarttata iti /
kiṃ tāvadutpādayatyāhosvit prakāśayati 		mtho ris chu dang don dgu la /
mkhas pas goo sgra des gzung bya /
zhes bya ba lta bu'o /
gang yang ming gis don rjod par byed do snyam du sems pa des kyang gdon mi za bar gal te don go bar byed pa yin zhes bya ba 'di khas blang bar bya dgos te /
de ni don go bar byed pa'i sgra tsam kho nas 'grub na don gzhan rdzas ming btags te ci zhig bya /
ji star [*ltar?] na ngag ming la 'jug pa 'di yang mi shes so /
ci re zhig skyed par byed dam /
yadyutpāda yati 'on te gsal bar byed /
ghoṣasvavatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāmotpādayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviāśeṣa iṣyate nāmna utpādakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati /
atha prakāśayati 		gal te skyed par byed na ni ngag ni sgra'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sgra tsam thams cad kyis ming skyed par 'gyur ro /
'on te sgra'i khyad par de lta bu zhig ming skyed par byed pa yin par 'dod na ni de nyid don rjod par byed pa yin par 'gyur ro /
ghoṣasvabhāvatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāma prakaśayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviśeṣa iṣyate nāmnaḥ parakāśakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati 'on te gsal bar byed pa yin no zhe na ni ngag gi sgra'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sgra tsam thams cad kyi ming gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro /
'on te sgra'i khyad par de lta bu zhig gsal bar byed pa yin par 'dod na ni de nyid don gsal bar byed pa yin par 'gyur ro /
na khalvapi śabdānāṃ sāmargyamasti kṣaṇaikamilanam /
na caikasya bhāgaśa utpādo yukta iti kathamutpādayantī vāṅnāmotpādayet 		yang sgra rnams ni tshogs pa med la chos gcig la cha shas kyi skyed pa yang rigs pa ma yin la /
skyed par byed pa na ji ltar dag gis ming skyed par byed /
kathaṃ tāvadatītāpekṣaḥ paścimo vijñaptikṣaṇa utpādayatyavijñaptim /
evaṃ tarhi paścima eva de nāmna utpādādyo 'pi tamevaikam śṛṇoti so 'pyarthaṃ pratipadyeta 		re zhig ji ltar na 'das pa la ltos pa'i rnam par rig byed kyi skad cig ma tha mas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skyed par byed /
de lta na 'o na ni sgra tha ma kho nas ming skyed pa'i phyir gang gis de gcig kho na thos pa des kyang don go ngar 'gyur ro /
athāpyevaṃ kalpyeta vāgvyañjanaṃ janayati vyañjanaṃ tu nāmeti 'on te 'di snyam du ngag gis ni yi ge skyed par byed la /
yi ges ni ming skyed par byed do snyam du rtog par byed na /
atrāpi sa eva prasaṅgo vyañjanāṃ sāmargyābhāvāt /
eṣa eva ca prasaṅgo nāmnaḥ prakāśakatve vācaḥ 		'di la yang skyon de nyid yod de /
yi ge rnams tshogs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
ngag ming gsal bar byed pa yin na yang skyon de nyid yod do /
vyañjanāṃ pi vāgviśiṣṭaprajñā apyavahitacetaskā lakṣaṇataḥ paricchettum notsahanta iti vyañjayāpi vāk naivotpādikā na prakāśikā yujyate yi ge yang ngag las khyad par du yod par shes rab dang ldan par yid brtan pas kyang mtshan nyid gyi [*kyi?] sgo nas yongs su bcad par mi nus pas dag ni yi ge skyed par byed pa yin par yang mi rung la /
gsal bar byed pa yin par yang mi rung ngo /
athāpyarthasahajaṃ nāma jātyādivadiṣyate /
evaṃ satyatītānāgatasyārthasya varttamānaṃ nāma na syād /
apatyānāṃ pitṛbhiryatheṣṭaṃ nāmāni kalpyanta iti katamannāma tatsahajaṃ syāt asaṃskṛtānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ kena sahajaṃ nāma syādityaniṣṭireveyam /
yadapyuktaṃ bhagavatā 		'on te mang don dang lhan cig skyed pa yin te /
skye ba la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya bar 'dod na ni de lta na don 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i ming da lta ba yin par mi 'gyur ro /
pha rnams kyis bu dag gi ming dga' mgur 'dogs na ming gang zhig de dang lhan cig skyes pa yin par 'gyur /
chos 'dus ma byas pa rnams kyi ming yang gang dang lhan cig skyes pa yin par 'gyur /
de lta bas na 'di nyid mi 'dod pa nyid do /
gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis /
nāmasaṃniśāritā gāthā gāthānāṃ kavirāśrayaḥ iti /
atrārtheṣu kṛtāvadhiḥ śabdo nāma nāmnā ca racanāviśeṣo gātheti nāmasaṃnitābhavati racanāviśeṣāśca dravyāntaraṃ nopapadyate 		tshigs bcad ming la brten pa ste /
tshigs bcad bzhi ni snyan dngags mkhan /
zhes gsungs pa der yang don rnams la mtshams bcad pa'i sa ni ming yin la /
ming rnams bkod pa'i khyad par yang tshigs su bcad pa yin pas ming la brten pa yin no /
bkod pa'i khyad par yang rdzas gzhan du mi 'thad de phreng ba lta bu dang sems kyi rim pa bzhin no /
paṅktivaccittānupūrvyavacca /
astu vā vyañjanamātrasya dravyāntarabhāvaparikalpanā 		yi ge tsam zhig rdzas gzhan gyi dngos por yongs su rtog pa yin du chug na yang de'i tshogs kho na ming gi tshogs la sogs pa yin par 'gyur bas de dag tu rtog don med pa yin no /
tatsamūhā eva nāmakāyādayo bhaviṣyantītyapārthikā tatprajñaptiḥ /
santyeva tu viprayuktasaṃskārabhāvanā nāmakāyā dravyata iti vaibhāṣikāḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re chos thams cad rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pas ldan pa yang ma yin pa'i 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ming gi tshogs la sogs pa ni rdzas su yod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro /
nahi sarva dharmāstarkagamyā bhavantīti yang ci ming gi tshogs la sogs pa 'di dag ldan pa 'am /
atha kiṃpratisaṃyuktā ete nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā asattvākhyā vipākajā aupacayikā naiḥṣyandikāḥ kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā iti vaktavyam sems can du ston pa 'am; sems can du ston pa ma yin pa 'am /
rnam par smin pa las skyes pa 'am /
rgyas pa las 'byung ba 'am /
rgyu mthun pa las byung ba 'am /
āha /
kāmarūpāptasattvākhyā niḥṣyandāvyākṛtāḥ /
kāmāptā rūpāptāśceti /
ārupyāptā api santi te tvanabhilāpyā ityapare /
sattvākhyā ete /
yaśca dyotayati sa taiḥ samanvāgato na yo dyotyate /
naiḥṣyandikā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca /
yathā caite nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā naiḥṣyandikā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca /
tathā /
sabhāgatā sā tu punarvipāko 'pi /
na kevalaṃ naiḥṣyandikī kāmarūpārūpyāvacarī /
āptayo dvidhā 		dge ba 'am /
mi dge ba 'am /
lung du ma bstan pa dag cig ces brjod par bya zhe na /
smras pa /
'dod dang gzugs gtogs sems can ston; /
rgyu mthun las byung lung bstan min /
'di dag ni 'dod par gtogs pa dang gzugs su gtogs pa dag yin no /
gzhan dag na re gzugs med par gtogs ba yang yod mod kyi de dag ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes zer ro /
de dag ni sems can du ston pa yin no /
gang zhig rjod par byed pa de dag dang ldan gyi brjod par bya ba gang yin pa dang ni ma yin no /
rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag yin no /
ji ltar ming gi tshogs la sogs pa 'di dag sems can du ston pa dang rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag yin ba de bzhin skal mnyam de ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
rnam par smin pa 'ang yin /
khams gsum pa ste /
'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa yin no /
thab rnam gnyis /
prāptayo naiḥṣyandikyo vipākajāśca /
lakṣaṇāni ca /
dvidheti varttate prāptivat 		thob pa rnams ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang; rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag yin no /
mtshan nyid rnams kyang /
rnam gnyis zhes bya bar sbyar te thob pa bzhin no /
niḥṣyandāḥ samāpattya samanvayāḥ snyoms 'jug dang mi ldan pa dag rgyu mthun pa /
dve acittasamāpattī asamanvāgamaśca naiḥṣyandikā eva sems med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa gnyis dang mi ldan pa rnams ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dag kho na yin no /
śeṣameṣāṃ vaktavyamuktam /
śeṣayoścāsaṃjñikajīvitayorato na punarbrumaḥ 		'di dag gi brjod par bya ba lhag ma dang lhag ma 'du shes med pa pa dang srog gi dbang po dag gis ni bshad zin pas de'i phyir yang mi brjod do /
kathaṃ prāptyādīnāṃ sattvākhyatoktā samanvāgamavacanāt ji ltar thob pa rnams kyi sems can du ston pa nyid bshad zin ce na /
ldan pa zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ sattvāsattvākhyatoktā /
sarvasaṃskṛṭasahabhūtvāt 		ji ltar mtshan nyid rnams sems can du ston pa dang sems can du ston pa ma yin par bshad ce na /
'dus byas thams cad dang lhan cig 'byung pa'i phyir ro /
uktā viprayuktāḥ /
yaktūktaṃ janyasya janikā jātirna hetupratyayairvinā iti ka ime hetavaḥ keca pratyayāḥ 		ldan ba ma yin pa rnams bshad zin to /
rgyu dang rkyen dag med par ni /
skye ba bskyed bya skyed byed min /
kāraṇaṃ sahabhūścaiva sabhāgaḥ saṃprayuktakaḥ zhes gang bshad pa /
rgyu rnams ni gang; rkyen rnams ni gang zhe na /
sarvatrago vipākākhyaḥ ṣaḍvidho heturiṣyate /
ṣaḍime hetavaḥ /
kāraṇahetuḥ sahabhūhetuḥ sabhāgahetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sarvatragahetuḥ vipākaheturiti /
tatra 		byed rgyu lhan cig 'byung ba dang /
skal mnyam mtshungs par ldan pa dang /
kun tu 'gro dang rnam smin dang /
rgyu ni rnam pa drug tu 'dod /
rgyu ni drug po 'di dag ste /
byed pa'i rgyu dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu dang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'o /
svato 'nye kāraṇaṃ hetuḥ /
saṃskṛtasya hi dharmasya svabhāvavrjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kāraṇaheturutpādayati 		de la rang las gzhan pa byed rgyu'i rgyu /
rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa chos thams cad ni chos 'dus byas kyi byed rgyu'i rgyu yin te /
avighnabhāvāvasthānāt /
nanu ca ye 'syājānata udapatsyantāsravā jānato 'sya te notpadyanta iti jñānameṣāṃ vighnamuatpattau karoti sūryaprabhāvajjyotiṣāṃ darśanasyeti kathaṃ svabhāvavarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtasya kāraṇaheturbhavanti 		skye ba la bgegs mi byed pa'i ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir ro /
zag pa gang dag mi shes pa de la skye ba de dag shes pa de la mi skye'o zhes gsungs pas de dag skye ba la yang shes pa gegs byed la /
skar ma rnams mthong ba la yang nyi ma'i 'od bgegs byed pa ma yin nam /
ji ltar na rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa chos thams cad chos 'dus byas kyi byed rgyu yin zhe na /
utpadyamānasyāvidhnabhāvenāvasthānāditi jñātavyam skye ba la bgegs mi byed pa'i ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir shes par bya'o /
bhavettāvadutpattau vidhnakāraṇe samarthānāmavighnakāraṇāddhetutvam re zhig skye ba la bgegs byed nus pa rnams ni bgegs mi byed pa'i phyir rgyu nyid du yang 'gyur te /
tadyathā anupadrotāraṃ bhojakamadhikṛtya grāmīṇā bhavanti vaktāraḥ svāminā smaḥ sukhitā iti /
yasya punarnāstyeva śaktirvighnayituṃ tasya kathaṃ hetubhāvastadyathā nirvāṇasyānutpattidharmakāṇāṃ ca sarvotpattau nārakādīnāṃ carūpyasattva skandhotpattau /
asanto 'pi hyete tathaiva vidhnaṃ karttumasamarthaḥ syuḥ 		dper na spyod par byed pa'i mi 'tshe ba'i dbang du byas nas grong mi rnams bdag cag ni rje bos bde bar byas so zhes 'dzer blta bu yin na /
gang zhig bgegs byed par mi nus pa dper na chos thams cad skye ba la mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi skye ba'i chos can rnams lta bu dang gzugs med pa'i sems can gyi phung po skye ba la dmyal ba la sogs pa dag lta bu de go ji ltar na rgyu'i dngos po yin /
de dag med du zin kyang de kho na bzhin du bgegs byed mi nus par 'gyur te /
asamarthe 'pi hi bhojake tathā vaktāro bhavantīti sa evātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ sāmānyenaiva nirdeśaḥ spyod par byed par mi nus bzhin du yang de skad du 'dzer ba yod pas 'dir dpe ni de nyid yin no /
'di ni spyir bstan pa yin gyi /
yastu pradhānaḥ kāraṇahetuḥ sa utpādane 'pi samartho yathā cakṣūrūpe cakṣurvijñānasya āhāraḥ śarīrasya vījādayo 'ṅkurādīnāmiti byed rgyu'i rgyu gtso bo gang yin pa 'di ni bskyed par bya ba la yang nus /
yod de dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig dang gzugs dag dang lus la zas dang myu gu la sogs pa la sa bon la sogs pa bzhin no /
gang zhig 'di skad du gal te mi sgrib pa'i ngo pos chos thams cad rgyu dag yin no /
yastvevaṃ codayati anāvaraṇabhāvena cetsarva dharmahetavo bhavanti kasmānā sarvasyotpādo yugapadbhavati prāṇātipātena ca ghātakavat sarve tadbhājo bhavantīti ci'i phyir chos thams cad cig car skye bar mi 'gyur ro /
srog gcod pa la sogs pa la yang gshed ma pa bzhin du thams cad de bsten par mi 'gyur zhes rgol bar byed pa de'i de ni klan kar mi rung ste /
tasyedamacodyam /
yasmādanāvaraṇabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ hetuḥ pratijñāyante na kārakabhāveneti 		'di ltar mi sgrib pa'i ngo bos chos thams cad rgyu yin par dam 'cha'i /
byed pa po'i ngo bo ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
sarvasyaiva kāraṇahetoḥ sarvotpattau sāmarthyamityapare gzhan dag na re thams cad skyes pa la byed pa'i rgyu thams cad kyang nus pa yod de /
tadyathā nirvāṇasyāpi cakṣurvijñānam /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
tena hyālambanāt manovijñānamutpadyate kuśalākuśālaṃ yataḥ krameṇa paścāccakṣurvijñānamiti kāraṇaparaparayā tasyāpi pratyayībhāvādasti sāmarthyam /
evamanyasyāpi pratipattavyam 		'di lta ste mya ngan las 'das pa yang mig gi rnam par shes pa la nus pa yod pa lta bu'o zhes zer ro /
ji lta bu zhe na /
dmigs pa des yid kyi rnam par shes pa dge ba dang mi dge ba skye la /
des rim gyis phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i phyir rgyu rgyud pa'i sgo nas de yang rkyen du gyur pa'i phyir nus pa yod do /
de bzhin du gzhan la yang rtogs par bya ste /
eṣā hi dik /
uktaḥ kāraṇahetuḥ 		'di ni phyogs tsam du zad do /
byed pa'i rgyu bshad zin to /
sahabhūrye mithaḥphalāḥ lhan cig 'byung gang phan tshun 'bras /
mithaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa ye dharmāḥ parasparaphalāste parasparaḥ sahabhūheturyathā phan tshun zhes bya ba ni gcig la gcig ste /
chos gang dag phan tshun gyi 'bras bu yin pa de dag ni phan tshun lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu'o /
katham /
bhūtavaccittacittānuvartilakṣaṇalakṣyavat 		dpe ji lta bu zhe na /
'byung bzhin sems kyi rjes 'jug dang /
sems dang mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi bzhin /
catvāri mahābhūtānyanyonyaṃ sahabhūhetuḥ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag ni phan tshun lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin no /
cittaṃ cittānuvarttināṃ dharmāṇāṃ te 'pi tasya sems ni sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i chos rnams kyi yin la de dag kyang sems kyi yin no /
saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni lakṣyasya so 'pi taṣām 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams ni mtshan gzhi'i yin la de yang de dag gi yin te /
evaṃ ca kṛtvā sarvameva saṃskṛtaṃ sahabhūheturyathāyogam de ltar na 'dus byas thams cad ni ci rigs par lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid yin no /
vināpi cānyonyaphalatvena dharmo 'nulakṣaṇānāṃ sahabhūheturna tāni tasyetyupasaṃkhyātavyam /
ke punarete cittānuvarttino dharmāḥ /
caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca 		phan tshun 'bras bu nyid med bzhin du chos ni mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin la de dag ni de'i ma yin pas kha bskang bar bya'o /
sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
sems las byung dang sdom gnyis dang /
cittānuvarttinaḥ /
sarvecittasaṃprayuktāḥ 		sems dang de dag gi mtshan nyid /
sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /
dhyānasaṃvaro 'nāsravasaṃvarasteṣāṃ ca ye jātyādayaścittasya ca /
ete dharmāścittānuvarttina ucyante /
kathamete cittamanuparivarttante /
samāsataḥ 		sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa thams cad dang bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dang de dag dang sems kyi skye ba la sogs pa gang dag yin pa'i chos de dag ni sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o /
de dag ji ltar sems kyi rjes su 'jug ce na /
mdor bsdu na /
kālaphalādiśubhatādibhiḥ /
kālastāvaccitenaikotpādasthitinirodhatayā ekādhvapatitatvena ca 		dus dang ni /
'bras sogs dge la sogs pas so /
re zhig dus las ni sems dang lhan cig skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'gag pa gcig pa nyid dang dus gcig tu gtogs pa nyid kyis so /
phalādibhirekaphalavipākaniḥṣyandatayā /
pūrvakastvekaśabdaḥ sahārthe veditavyaḥ 		'bras bu la sogs pas ni 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa dang; rgyu mthun pa gcig pa nyid kyis te /
gcig ces bya ba'i sgra snga ma ni lhan cig pa'i don du rig par bya'o /
śubhatādibhiḥ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtacitte kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtatayā dge ba la sogs pas ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems la /
dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa nyid kyis te /
evaṃ daśabhiḥ kāraṇaiścittānuparivarttina ucyante /
tatra sarvālpa cittamaṣṭapañcāśato dharmāṇāṃ sahabhūhetuḥ 		de ltar na rgyu bcus sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o /
de la sems nang na nyung ba ni chos lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te /
daśānāṃ mahābhūmikānāṃ cattvāriṃśatastallakṣaṇānāmaṣṭānāṃ ca svalakṣaṇānulakṣāṇānām sa mang po pa bcu dang de dag gi mtshan nyid bzhi bcu dang rang gi mtshan nyid dang mthun pa'i mtshan nyid brgyad kyi yin no /
tasya punaścatuḥpañcāśaddharmāḥ sahabhūhetuḥ de'i lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu ni chos lnga bcu rtsa bzhi ste /
svānyanulakṣaṇāni sthāpayitvā rang gi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa rnams so /
caturdaśetyapare /
daśa mahabhūmikāḥ svānyeva ca lakṣaṇānīti /
tadetanna varṇayanti /
prakaraṇagrantho hyevaṃ virudhyeta 		gzhan dag na re bcu bzhi yin te /
sa mang po pa bcu dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag kho na'o zhes zer ro /
de skad du ni mi brjod de /
de ltar na rab tu byed pa'i gzhung /
syādduḥkhasatyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerhetuḥ sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la 'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu can yin la 'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu ma yin pa yang yod de /
satkāyadṛṣṭestatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerhetuḥ /
satkāyadṛṣṭekśca heturyadetat sthāpitami ti /
ye tarhi tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇā mi tyetanna pathanti tairapyetat pathitavyam arthato vaivaṃ boddhavyamiti kāśmīrāḥ 		'jig tshogs la lta ba dang de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi skye ba dang rga ba dang gnas pa dang mi rtag pa dag ma gtogs pa de dag las gzhan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa'o; /
'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu can yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu yang yin pa ni ma gtogs pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro /
kha che ba rnams na re'o na ni gang dag de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi zhes de skad du mi 'don pa de dag gis kyang de skad du gdon par bya ba 'am /
yaktāvat sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ sahabhvapi tat /
syāttu sahābhūrna sahabhūhetunā hetuḥ 		yang na don gyis de ltar go bar bya'o zhes zer ro /
re zhig gang lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyus rgyu yin pa des ni lhan cig 'byung ba yang yin no /
dharmasyānulakṣaṇāni /
tāni cānyonyam 		lhan cig 'byung ba yin la lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyus rgyu ma yin pa yang yod de /
anuparivarttyanulakṣanāni caivaṃ cittasya tāni cānyonyaṃ sapratighaṃ copādāyarūpamanyonyamapratighaṃ ca kiñcit sarvaṃ ca bhūtaiḥ prāptayaśca sahajāḥ prāptimataḥ sahabhuvo na sahabhūheturanekaphalavipāka niṣyandatvāt chos kyi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams dang de dag phan tshun dang sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams nyid dang de dag phan tshun dang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs thogs pa dang bcas pa phan tshun dang thogs pa med pa cung zad dang thams cad 'byung ba dag dang lta bu'o /
thob pa dang ldan pa'i thob pa lhan cig skyes pa rnams kyang lhan cig 'byung ba yin la lhan cig 'byung pa'i rgyu ni ma yin te /
'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa gcig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
na caitāḥ sahacariṣṇavaḥ pūrvamapyutpatteḥ paścādapīti /
sarvamapyetat syāt /
kiṃ tu prasiddhahetuphalabhāvānāṃ bījādīnāmeṣa nyāyo na dṛṣṭa iti vaktavyametat kathaṃ sahotpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hetuphalabhāva iti 		de dag ni sems dang lhan cig spyod pa'i dang tshul can yang ma yin te sngar yang skye la phyis kyang skye ba'i phyir ro /
de thams cad kyang rung mod kyi 'on kyang sa bon la sogs pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por grags pa rnams la tshul 'di mi snang bas ji ltar lhan cig 'byung pa'i chos rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin pa de brjod par bya'o /
tadyathā pradīpaprabhayoraṅkuracchāyayośca /
saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetatkiṃ prabhāyāḥ pradīpo heturāhosvit pūrvotpannaiva sāmagrī saprabhasya pradīpasya sacchāyasyāṅdurasyotpattau heturiti 		dper na mar me dang 'od dag dang myu gu dang grib ma dag lta bu yin no /
re zhig ci mar me 'od kyi rgyu yin nam /
'on te tshogs pa sngar byung ba kho na mar me 'od dang bcas pa skye ba'i rgyu yin zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya'o /
itastarhi bhāvābhāvayostadvattvāt /
etaddhi hetuhetumato lakṣaṇamācakṣater hetukāḥ 		'o na ni yod dam med na de dag dang lhan cig de'i phyir rgyu smra ba rnams rgyu dang ldan pa'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni de yin no zhes zer ro /
yasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ yasya bhāvābhāvau niyamataḥ sa heturitaro hetumāniti gang zhig yod dam med na gang zhig nges par yod dam med pa de ni rgyu yin zhing cig shos ni rgyu dang ldan pa yin la /
sahabhuvām ca dharmāṇāmekasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāva ekasyābhāve sarveṣāmabhāva iti yukto hetuphalabhāvaḥ lhan cig 'byung pa'i chos rnams kyang gcig yod na thams cad yod la gcig med na thams cad med pas rgyu de dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rigs pa yin no /
syāttāvatsahotpannānāṃ parasparaṃ tu katham re zhig lhan cig 'byung ba rnams ni rung na phan tshun du go ji ltar rung /
de nyid kyi phyir ro /
atha evāha evaṃ tarhyavinirbhāviṇo 'pyupādāyarūpasyānyonyameṣa prasaṅgaḥ bhūtaiśca sārdhaṃ cittānulakṣaṇādīnāṃ ce cittādibhiḥ de lta na 'o na ni rgyur byas pa'i gzugs med na mi 'byung ba phan tshun dang 'byung ba rnams dang yang lhan cig der thal bar 'gyur la /
sems kyi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa yang sems la sogs pa dang nger thal bar 'gyur ro /
tridaṇḍānyonyabalāvasthānavattarhi sahabhuvāṃ hetuphalabhāvaḥ sidhyati 'o na ni myu gu gsum phan tshun stobs kyis gnas pa bzhin du lhan cig 'byung ba rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por 'grub bo /
mīmāṃsyaṃ tāvadetat /
kimeṣāṃ sahotpannabalenāvasthānamāhosvit pūrvasāmagrīvaśāttathaivotpāda iti annyadapi ca tatra kiñcidbhavati sūtrakaṃ śaṅkuko vā pṛthivī vā dhārikā /
eṣāmapi nāmānye 'pi sabhāgahetutvādayo bhavantīti siddhaḥ sahabhūhetuḥ 		re zhig ci 'di dag lhan cig 'byung ba'i stobs kyis gnas sam /
'on te tshogs pa snga ma'i dbang gis de ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya'o /
de la gzhan yang srad bu 'am gzer bu 'am rten par byed pas yang cung zad yod do /
de la yang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yod pas lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid grub bo /
sabhāgahetuḥ katamaḥ skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
sabhāgahetuḥ sadṛśāḥ /
sadṛśā dharmāḥ sadṛśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sabhāgahetustadyathā kuśalāḥ pañca skandhāḥ kuśalānāmanyoyyaṃ kliṣṭāḥ kliṣṭānāmavyākṛtā avyākṛtānāṃ rūpamavyākṛtaṃ pañcānām 		skal mnyam rgyu ni 'dra ba'o /
chos 'dra ba rnams ni chos 'dra ba rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin te /
'di lta ste /
dge ba'i phung po lnga po dag ni phan tshun dge ba rnams kyi yin no /
nyon mongs pa can rnams ni nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi yin no /
lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi yin no /
catvārastu na rūpasyetyapare /
nyūnatvāt /
kalalaṃ kalalādīnāṃ daśānāmavasthānām arvudāyo 'rvudādīnāmekaikāparhāsenaikasminnikāyasabhāge /
anyeṣu tu samānajātīyeṣu daśāpyavasthā daśānām 		gzhan dag na re lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs ni lnga po dag gi yin la /
bzhi ni gzugs kyi ma yin te /
dman pa dang stobs chung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
nur nur po ni nur nur po la sogs pa gnas skabs bcu po dag gi yin no /
mer mer po la sogs pa ni ris mthun pa gcig la re re phri nas mer mer po la sogs pa'i yin no /
rnam pa mthun pa gzhan dag tu ni gnas skabs bcu char yang bcu po dag gi yin no /
bāhyeṣvapi yavo yavasya śāliḥ śāleriti vistareṇa yojyam /
ye tu rūpaṃ rūpasya necchanti sabhāgahetuṃ teṣāmeṣa granthaḥ icchāvighātāyasaṃpravarttate atītāni mahābhūtānyanāgatānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ heturadhipati riti 		phyi'i dag la yang nas ni nas kyi yin la /
s'a lu ni s'a lu'i yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o /
gang dag gzugs kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu gzugs yin par mi 'dod pa de dag la ni 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rgyu dang bdag po yin no zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di 'dod pa la gnod par gnas so /
kiṃ punaḥ sarve sadṛśānāṃ sabhāgahetaḥ ci 'dra ba thams cad 'ang ba thams cad kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin nam zhe na /
netyāha /
kiṃ tarhi /
svanikāyabhuvaḥ 		smras pa ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
rang ris sa pa'o /
svo nikāyo bhūścaiṣāṃ ta ime svanikāyabhuvaḥ 'di dag la rang gi ris dang sa yod pas 'di dag ni rang gi ris dang sa pa dag go /
pañca nikāyāḥ duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo yāvat bhāvanāprahātavyaḥ ris ni lnga ste /
sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nas bsgom pas spang par bya pa'i bar ro /
nava bhūmayaḥ /
kāmadhāturaṣṭau ca dhyānārūpyāḥ 		sa ni dgu ste /
'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa brgyad do /
tatra duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ duḥkhadarśanaheyānāṃ sabhāgaheturnānyeṣām /
evaṃ yāvat bhāvanāheyā bhāvanāheyānām /
te 'pi kāmāvacarāḥ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikāstadbhūmikānāmevaṇānyaṣām /
te 'pi na sarve 		de la sdug bsngal mthong bas spang par bya ba rnams ni sdug bsngal mthong bas spar par bya ba rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin gyi gzhan dag gi ni ma yin no /
de bzhin du bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bar du yang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi yin no /
de dag kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams ni yang 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyi yin la /
bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa rnams kyang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i yin pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa pa'i par dag kyang de'i sa pa'i rnams kho na'i yin gyi gzhan dag gi ni ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
agrajāḥ /
pūrvotpannāḥ paścimānāmutpannānutpannānāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ 		de dag kyang thams cad ni ma yin no /
'o na ci zhe na /
sngar skyes pa rnams ni phyi ma skye ba dang ma skyes pa rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no /
anāgatā naiva sabhāgahetuḥ /
evamatīte kuta etat āha 		ma 'ongs pa khon skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di dag las smras pa /
śāstrāt /
sabhāgahetuḥ katamaḥ /
pūrvotpannāni kuśalamūlānipaścādutpannānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ svadhātau sabhāgahetunā hetuḥ /
evamatītānyatītapratyutpannānām 		bstan bcos las te /
skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
dge ba'i rtsa ba sngar byung ba rnams ni rang gi khams na dge ba'i rtsa ba phyis 'byung ba rnams dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyus rgyu yin no /
de ltar na 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi yin no /
atītapratyutpannānyanāgatānāmiti vaktavyam /
idapi śāstraṃ yo dharmo yasya dharmasya hetuḥ kadācitsa dharmastasya na hetuḥ /
āha 		'das pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams ni ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi yin no zhes brjod par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo /
chos gang chos gang gi rgyu'i yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i rgyu ma yin pa yin nam zhe na smras pa /
nam yang ma yin no zhes 'byung ba 'di yang bstan bcos yin no /
na kadāciditi sahabhūsaṃprayuktakavipākahetvabhisandhivacanādadoṣaḥ eṣaḥ lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las dgongs nas gsungs pa'i phyir de ni nyes pa med do; /
yastu manyate anāgato 'pi sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ sabhāgahetutve niyatībhūto bhavatyatastāṃ caramāvasthāmabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ na kadācinna heturiti /
tasyā yamaparihāro yasmātsa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sabhāgaheturabhūtvā paścāt bhavati /
ihapi ca praśne yo dharmo yasya dharmasya samanantaraḥ kadācit sa dharmastasya dharmasya na samanantara iti śakyamanayā kalpanayā vaktuṃ syānna kadāciditi /
kasmādevamāha /
yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavatīti dvimukhasaṃdarśanārthaṃ yathā tatra tathehāpi karttavyam /
yathā ceha tathā tatreti 		gang zhig chos ma 'ongs pa de yang skye pa'i tshe'i gnas skabs na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu nyid du nges par 'gyur ba yin no /
de'i phyir tha ma'i gnas skabs de las dgongs nas nam yang rgyu ma yin pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so snyam du sems pa de ni de'i lan du mi rung ste /
'di ltar chos de skye pa'i gnas skabs kyi sngon rol nas skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin pa las phyis yin pas so /
chos gang zhig chos gang gi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yin pa'i chos de res 'ga' zhig chos de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba 'dri ba 'di yang yongs su rtogs pa 'dis res 'ga' yang ma yin no zhes brjod par nus na ci'i phyir 'di skad du gal te chos de ma skyes par gyur na'o zhes gsungs /
der ji lta ba de bzhin 'dir yang brjod par bya la /
'dir ji lta ba de bzhin der yang brjod par bya'o zhes sgo gnyis su bstan par bya ba'i bar ro /
evaṃ sati ko guṇo labhyata ityakauśala mevātra śāstrakārasyaiva saṃbhāvyeta /
tasmāt pūrvaka evātra parihāraḥ sādhuḥ /
yattarhīdamuktam anāgatānāṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ tatsaṃprayuktaṃ ca duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturyattu sthāpitaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭeśca heturiti /
anāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvetyevametat karttavyamarthato 'pi caivaṃ boddhavyamiti 		de lta yin na yon tan ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur te /
de lta na 'dir bstan bcos byed pa mi mkhas pa kho nar yid ches par 'gyur ro /
de lta bas na 'dir lan snga ma kho na legs pa yin no /
'o na gang 'di skad du 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa dang de dang mtshungs bar ldan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las byung ba ni yin la /
'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu ni ma yin no /
ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las byung ba yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin no zhes gsungs so zhe na /
de ni 'di skad du 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma 'ongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ma gtogs pa zhes brjod par bya ba'am /
yang na don gyis na de ltar go par bya'o /
idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate sarvadharmāścatuṣke niyatā hetauphale āśraye ālamvane niyatā iti /
heturatra saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sahabhūhetuśca 		'o na btags pa'i bshad pa chos thams cad ni bzhi chen du nges pa yin te /
rgyu dang 'bras bu dang rten dang dmigs par nges so zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar dang 'dir rgyu ni mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dang lhan cig 'byung pa'i rgyu yin no /
phalaṃ puruṣakāraphalamadhipatiphalaṃ ca 'bras bu ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang bdag po'i 'bras bu yin no /
āśrayaścakṣurādirālambanaṃ rūpādikamiti draṣṭavyam rten ni mig la sogs pa'o /
dmigs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa yin no zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o /
nanu caivaṃ sati sabhāga heturabhūtvā heturbhavatīti prāptam /
iṣyata evāvasthāṃ prati na dravyam 		de lta na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma yin pa las rgyu yin par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
gnas skabs ni 'dod pa kho na yin gyi rdzas la ni ma yin te /
avasthāphalalṃ hi sāmargyaṃ na dravyaphalam tshogs pa ni gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu can yin gyi /
rdzas kyi 'bras bu can ni ma yin no /
kiṃ punaḥ syādyadi vipākahetuvadanāgato 'pi sabhāgahetuḥ syāt gal te rnam par smin pa'i rgyu bzhin du skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang ma 'ongs pa yin na cir 'gyur zhe na /
śāstre tasya grahaṇaṃ syāt bstan bcos las de smos par 'gyur ro /
sa eva hi phaladānagrahaṇakriyāsamarthastasyaiva grahaṇādadoṣaḥ 'bras bu 'byin pa dang 'dzin par byed nus pa gang yin pa de kho na smos pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
naitadasti de ni ma yin te /
niḥṣyandaphalena hi saphalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ /
taccānāgatasyāyuktaṃ pūrvapaścimatā 'bhāvāt /
na cotpannamanāgatasya niṣyando yujyate 		skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin na de yang ma 'ongs pa la rigs pa ma yin te /
snga phyi med pa'i phyir ro /
byung zin pa yang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu mthun par mi rung ste /
yathā 'tītaṃ varttamānasya dper na da lta'i 'das pa bzhin no /
mā bhūddhetoḥ pūrvaṃ phalamiti /
nāstyanāgataḥ sabhāgahetuḥ /
vipākaheturapi evamanāgato na prapnoti 		rgyu bas 'bras bu nga na mi rung bas skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa ni med do /
de lta na rnams par smin pa'i rgyu yang ma 'ongs pa yin par mi 'gyur te /
vīpākaphalasya pūrvaṃ saha cāyogādanāgate cādhvati pūrvapaścimatā 'bhāvāt rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu snga ba dang lhan cig pa mi rung ba'i phyir la /
ma 'ongs pa'i dus la yang snga phyi med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
naitadasti /
sabhāgahetorvinā paurvāparyeṇa sadṛśaḥ sadṛśasya sabhāgaheturityanyonyahetutvādanyonyaniḥṣyandatā saṃprasajyeta 		de ni ma yin te /
skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni snga phyi med par 'dra ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'dra ba yin bas phan tshun du rgyur gyur pa'i phyir phan tshun rgyu mthun pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
nacānyonyaniḥṣyandatā yuktimatīti /
natveva vipākahetorvinā paurvāparyeṇānyonyahetuphalatā saṃprasajyate 		phan tshun rgyu mthun pa nyid du ni rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no /
rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni snga phyi med bzhin du yang de ltar phun tshun 'bras bu nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur te /
bhinnalakṣaṇātvāddhetuphalayoḥ rgyu dang 'bras bu dag mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir do [*ro?] /
tasmādavasthāvyavsthitaṃ eva sabhāgaheturlakṣaṇavyavasthitastupākaheturityanāgato 'pi na vāryate de lta bas na skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni gnas skabs las rnam par gnas pa kho na yin la /
rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni mtshan nyid las rnam par gnas pa yin pas ma 'ongs pa yang mi bzlog go /
yaduktaṃ svabhūmikaḥ sabhāgaheturbhavatīti kimeṣa niyamaḥ sarvasya sāsravasyaiṣa niyamaḥ skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni rang gi sa pa yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa ci de ltar nges sam zhe na /
de zag pa dang bcas pa la ni nges so /
anyo 'nyaṃ navabhūmistu mārgaḥ sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du /
skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no /
sabhāgaheturityadhikāraḥ /
