anāgamye dhyānāntarikāyāṃ caturṣuraneṣu triṣu cārūpyeṣu mārgasatyamanyo 'nyaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ 		zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar te /
mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa gsum dag gi lam gyi bden pa ni phan tshun du skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
āgantuko hyasau tāsu bhūmiṣu na taddhātupatitastadbhami kābhistṛṣṇābhirasvīkṛtatvāt /
ataḥ mānajātīyasyānyabhūmikasyāpi sabhāgaheturbhavati 		'di ni sa de dag tu glo bur du 'ongs pa yin la /
sa de pa dag gis bdag gir ma byas pa'i phyir khams de dag tu gtogs pa ma yin te /
de bas na sa gzhan pa'i rigs mthun pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang yin no /
sa punaḥ de yang /
samaviśiṣṭayoḥ /
nyūnasya heturbhavati /
tadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntistasyā evānāgatāyāḥ sabhāgahetuviśiṣṭasyaca yāvadanutpādajñānasya /
anutpādajñānamanutpādajñānasyaivānyaviśiṣṭabhāvāt 		mnyam dang khyad par can gyi yin /
chung ngu'i rgyu ni ma yin te /
'di lta ste /
sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni de nyid ma 'ongs pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i khyad par can gyi rgyu yang yin no /
mi skye ba shes pa ni khyad par can gzhan med pa'i phyir mi skye ba shes pa kho na'i yin no /
darśanabhāvanā 'śaikṣyamārgāstridhyekeṣām /
tatrāpi mṛdvindriyamārgo mṛdutīkṣṇendriyamārgasya hetuḥ /
tīkṣṇendriyamārgastīkṣṇendriyamārgasyaiva /
tadyathā śraddhānusāriśraddhādhimuktasamayavimukttamārgāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ caturṇāṃ dvayośca 		mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam rnams ni gsum dang gnyis dang gcig dag gi yin no /
de la yang dbang po rtul po'i lam ni dbang po rtul po dang rnon po'i lam gyi rgyu yin la /
dbang po rnon po'i lam ni dbang po rnon po'i lam kho na yin te /
'di lta ste dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni drug dang bzhi dang gnyis dag gi yin no /
dharmānusāriṣṭaprāptāsamayavimuktamārgāḥ trayāṇāṃ dvayorekasya /
kathaṃ punarūrdhvaṃbhūmikasyādhobhūmmikomārgaḥ samo vā bhavati viśiṣṭo vā 		chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol pa'i lam rnams ni gsum dang gnyis dang gcig gi yin no /
yang ji ltar sa gong ma pas 'og ma pa'i lam dang mnyam ba'am khyad par can yin zhe na /
indriyato hetūpacayataśca /
tatra darśanādimārgāṇāṃ mṛdumṛdvādīnāṃ cottarottara hetūpacitatarāḥ 		dbang po dang rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas te /
de la rgyus shin tu rgyas par byas pa ni mthong pa'i lam la sogs pa dang chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa gong nas gong du'o /
yadyapyekasantāne śraddhārnusārimārgayorasaṃbhavaḥ utpannastvanāgatasya hetuḥ rgyud gcig la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba'i lam dag mi srid mod kyi 'byung ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu yin no /
kiṃ punaḥ mārga eva samaviśiṣṭayoḥ sabhāgaheturbhavati /
netyāha /
laukikā api hi 		ci lam kho na mnyam pa dang khyad par can dag gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin nam zhe na smras pa ma yin te /
'jig rten pa dag kyang /
prayogajāstayoreva sbyor byung de gnyis kho na'i yin /
samaviśiṣṭayoḥ sabhāgaheturbhavanti na nyūnasya mnyam pa dang khyad par can dag gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin gyi dman pa'i ni ma yin no /
yathā katame ityāha dper ji lta bu zhe na smras pa /
śrutacintāmayādikāḥ thos dang bsams byung la sogs pa'ang; /
ete hi prāyogikāḥ śrutacintābhāvanāmayā guṇāḥ samaviśiṣṭayoreva heturnanyūnānām thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba sbyor ba las 'byung ba'i yon tan de dag kyang nyams pa dang khyad par can dag kho na'i rgyu yin gyi dman pa rnams kyi ni ma yin te /
tadyathā kāmāvacarāḥ śrutamayāḥ śrutacintāmayānāṃ cintāmayācintāmayānām /
bhāvanāmayābhāvāt /
rūpāvacarāḥ śrutamayāḥ śrutabhāvanāmayānāṃ cintāmayābhāvāt /
bhāvanāmayā bhāvanāmayānāmeva 		'di lta ste /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i thos pa las byung ba rnams ni thos pa las byung ba dang bsams pa las byung ba rnams kyi yin no /
bsam pa las byung ba rnams ni bsams pa las byung ba rnams kyi yin te /
bsgoms pa las byung ba ni med pa'i phyir ro /
gzugs na spyod pa'i thos pa las byung ba rnams ni thos pa las byung ba dang bsgoms pa las byung ba rnams kyi yin te /
bsams pa las byung ba ni med pa'i phyir ro /
ārūpyāvacarābhāvanāmayā bhāvanāmayānāmeva bsgoms pa las byung ba rnams ni bsgoms pa las byung ba rnams kho na'i yin no /
teṣāmapi navaprakārabhedāt mṛdumṛdavaḥ sarveṣāṃ mṛdumadhyā aṣṭānāmityeṣānītiḥ de dag kyang rnam pa dgu tha dad pa'i phyir chung ngu'i chung ngu dag ni thams cad kyi yin la /
chung ngu'i 'bring po dag ni brgyad kyi yin te /
upapattipratilambhikāstu kuśalā dharmāḥ sarve navaprakārāḥ paraspara sabhāgahetuḥ lugs ni de lta bu'o /
skyes nas thob pa can gyi dge ba'i chos rnams ni rnam pa dgu po thams cad phan tshun du skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin te /
kliṣṭā apyevam /
anivṛtāvyākṛtāstu caturvidhāḥ /
vipākajā airyapathikāḥ śailpasthānikāḥ nirmāṇacittasahajāśca 		nyon mongs pa can rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o /
ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang spyod lam pa 'am /
bzo'i gnas pa dang sprul pa'i sems lhan cig skyes pa rnams te /
te yathākramaṃ catustrīdvekeṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ nirmāṇacittamapoi kāmāvacara caturdhyanaphalam /
tatra nottaradhyānaphalamadharadhyānaphalasya 		de dag ni go rims bzhin du bzhi dang gsum dang gnyis dang gcig dag gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no /
sprul pa'i sems bsam gtan bzhi'i 'bras bu 'dod pa na spyod pa yang yin te /
de la bsam gtan gong ma'i 'bras bu ni bsam gtan 'og ma'i 'bras bu ni ma yin no /
nahyābhisaṃskārikasya sabhāgahetorhīyamānaṃ phalaṃ bhavati 'bad pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu mngon par 'du byed pa can gyi 'bras bu ni dman pa ma yin te /
tadyathā śāliryavādīnāṃ mā bhūnniṣphalaḥ prayatna iti /
ata eva cāhuḥ syādutpanno 'nāsravo 'nutpannasyāsravasya na hetuḥ syāttadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpanāmanutpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntīnām /
sarvaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ nyūnasya na hetuḥ /
syādekasantānaniyataḥ pūrvapratilabdho 'nāsravo dharmaḥ paścādutpannasya nahetuḥ /
syādanāgatāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayo duḥkhe dharmajñānasyayasmānna pūrvataraṃ phalamastyanāgato vā sabhāgahetuḥ /
syāt pūrvotpanno 'nāsravo dharmaḥ paścādutpannasyānāsravasya na hetuḥ 		dper na s'a lu dang nas la sogs pa'i lta bu'o /
de nyid kyi phyir zag pa med pa skyes pa zag pa med pa ma skyes pa'i rgyu ma yin pa yod dam zhe na yod de /
dper na sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ma skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu dang khyad par can thams cad dman pa'i lta bu'o /
rgyu gcig la nges pa'i zag pa med pa'i chos sngon thob pa phyis skyes pa'i rgyu ma yin pa yod dam zhe na /
yod de sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ma 'ongs pa dag sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i lta bu'o /
'di ltar 'bras bu snga ma 'am /
skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu ma 'ongs pa ni med do /
zag pa med pa'i chos sngar skyes pa rnams zag pa med pa'i chos phyis skye ba'i rgyu ma yin pa yod dam zhe na yod de /
syādavimātro nyūnasya /
tadyathottaraphalaparihīṇasyāvara phalasaṃmukhībhāve duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptiścottarottara kṣaṇa sahotpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptīnāṃ nyūnatvāditi 		chen po chung ngu'i lta bu ste /
'di lta ste /
'bras bu gor ma las yongs su nyams pa 'bras bu 'og ma mngon du byed pa'i tshe dang sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i thob pa skad cig ma phyi ma dang lhan cig skyes pa sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i thob pa rnams kyi lta bu ste /
dman pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so /
uktaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu bshad zin to /
saṃprayuktakahetustu cittacaittāḥ /
evaṃ sati bhinnakālasantānajānāma pyanyonyasaṃprayuktakahetutvaprasaṅgaḥ 		mtshungs ldan rgyu ni sems dag dang /
sems byung /
de lta na ni dus dang rgyud tha dad pa las skyes pa rnams phan tshun du mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro /
ekākārā lambanāstarhi /
evamapi sa eva prasaṅgaḥ /
ekakālāstarhi 		'o na ni rnam pa dang dmigs pa gcig la dag pa yin no /
de lta na yang de nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro /
'o na ni dus gcig pa dag yin no /
evaṃ tarhi sati bhinnasantānajānāmapi prasaṅgo navacandrādīni paśyatām de lta na zla ba tshes pa la sogs pa la lta ba'i lta bur rgyud tha dad pa las skyes pa rnams la yang thal bar 'gyur te /
tasmāttarhi /
samāśrayāḥ 		de lta bas na rten mtshungs pa can rnams so /
samāna āśrayo yeṣāṃ te cittacaittāḥ anyonyaṃ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ /
samāna ityabhinnastatadyathā ya eva cakṣurindriyakṣaṇaścakṣurvijñānasyāśrayaḥ sa eva tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ vedanādīnāmeva yāvanmanaḥ /
indriyakṣaṇo manovijñānatsaṃprayukṭānāṃ veditavyaḥ 		gang dag la rten mtshungs pa yod pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba de dag ni phan tshun du mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu yin no /
mtshungs pa zhes bya ba ni tha mi dad pa ste /
'di lta ste /
mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten mig gi dbang po'i skad cig ma gang yin pa de nyid de dang mtshungs par ldan pa tshor ba la sogs pa rnams kyi yang yin pa lta bu ste /
yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams kyi yid kyi skad cig ma yin pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
yaḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sahabhūheturapi saḥ mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yang yin no /
atha kenārthena sahabhūhetuḥ kena saṃprayuktakahetuḥ yang don gang gis na lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin /
gang gis na mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu gang yin zhe na /
anyonyaphalārthena sahabhūhetuḥ phan tshun 'bras bu'i don gyis na lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te /
sahasārthikānyonyabalamārgaprayāṇavat 'dron pa rnams phan tshun gyi stobs kyis lhan cig lam du 'gro ba yin no /
pañcabhiḥ samatābhiḥ saṃprayogārthena saṃprayuktakahetuḥ /
teṣāmeva sārthikānāṃ samānānnapānādiparibhogakriyāprayogavat /
ekenāpi hi vinā sarveṇa na saṃprayujyanta ityayameṣāṃ hetubhāvaḥ 		mtshungs pa lngas mtshungs par ldan pa'i don gyis na mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu yin te /
'dron pa de dag nyid zas la sogs pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i bya ba la 'dra bar sbyor ba bzhin no /
gcig med na yang thams cad mtshungs par mi ldan pas 'di ni de dag gi rgyu'i dngos po yin no /
uktaḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu gang zhe na /
sarvatragahetuḥ katamaḥ kun 'gro zhes bya nyon mongs can /
sarvatragākhyaḥ klilṣṭānāṃ svabhūmau pūrvasarvagāḥ /
svabhūmikāḥ pūrvotpannāḥ sarvatragā dharmāḥ paścimānāṃ kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sarvatragahetuḥ 		rnams kyi rang sar kun 'gro lnga /
rang gis pa'i kun tu 'gro ba'i chos sngar skyes pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa can gyi chos /
phyi ma rnams kyi kun tu 'gro pa'i rgyu yin no /
tān punaḥ paścādanuśayanirdeśakośasthāna eva vyākhyāsyāmaḥ de dag kyang 'og nas phra rgyas bstan pa'i mdzod kyi gnas nyid nas bshad par bya'o /
kliṣṭadharmasāmānyakāraṇatvenāyaṃ sabhāgahetoḥ pṛthak vyavasthāpyate /
nikāyāntarīyāṇāmapi hetutvādeṣāṃ hi prabhāveṇānyanaikāyikā api kleśā upajāyante /
kimāryapudgalasyāpi kliṣṭā dharmāḥ sarvatragahetukāḥ 		'di ni nyon mongs pa can gyi chos kyi thun mong gi rgyu nyid yin bas na skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyu las logs shig tu rnam par gzhan go /
ris gzhan dag gi yang rgyu yin pa'i phyir te /
de dag gi mthus ni ris gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa dag kyang skye bar 'gyur ro /
ci 'phags pa'i gang zag gi nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams kyang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu las byung ba dag yin nam zhe na /
sarva eva kliṣṭā dharmā darśanaprahātavyahetukā iti kāśmīrāḥ kha che ba rnams na re nyon mongs pa can gyi chos thams cad kyang mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rgyu las byung ba dag yin te /
tathā prakāraṇeṣūktaṃ darśanaprahātavyahetukāḥ dharmāḥ katame 'di ltar rab tu byed pa dag las mthong bas spang par bya pa'i rgyu las byung pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
kliṣṭā dharmāḥ yaśca darśanaprahātavyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipāka iti /
avyākṛtahetukā dharmāḥ katame 		nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams dang mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
avyākṛtāḥ saṃskṛtā dharmā akuśalāśceti /
duḥkhasatyaṃ syāt satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturiti vistaro yāvanna satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭam duḥkhasatyamiti 		lung du ma bstan pa'i chos 'dus byas rnams dang mi dge ba rnams so zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la 'jig tshogs la lta pa'i rgyu can yin pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin pa yang yod de zhes bya ba nas rgyas par 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang chos de dag gi skye ba dang rga ba dang gnas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid dag ma gtogs pa de dag las gzhan pa sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so zhes zer ro /
idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate syāddharmo 'kuśalo 'kuśalahetuka eva 'o na btags pa'i bshad pa mi dge ba'i chos mi dge ba'i rgyu can kho na yin pa yod dam zhe na /
syādāryapudgalaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāṃ tatprathamataḥ klilṣṭāñcetanāṃ saṃmukhīkarotīti /
aprahīṇahetumetat saṃdhāyoktam 		yod de /
'phags pa'i gang zag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa de las dang por nyon mongs pa can gyi sems pa mngon du byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa 'di ji ltar drang zhe na /
darśanaprahātavyo hi tasyā hetuḥ prahīṇatvānnoktaḥ /
uktaḥ sarvadagahetuḥ /
vipākahetuḥ katamaḥ 		de ni rgyu ma spangs pa las dgongs nas gsungs pa yin gyi de'i rgyu mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni spangs zin pa'i phyir ma gsungs so /
kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu bshang zin to /
rnam par smin pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
vipākaheturaśubhāḥ kuśalāścaiva sāsravāḥ rnam smin rgyu ni mi dge dang /
dge ba zag bcas rnams kho na /
akuśalāḥ kuśalasāsravāśca dharmā vipākahetuḥ mi dge pa rnams dang dge ba'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yin te /
vipākadharmatvāt /
kasmādavyākṛtā dharmāḥ vipākaṃ na nirvarttayanti 		rnam par smin pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro /
ci'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams rnam par smin pa 'grub par mi byed ce na /
durbalatvāt /
pūti bījavat 		stobs chung ba'i phyir te sa bon rul pa bzhin no /
kasmānnānāsravāḥ /
tṛṣṇānabhiṣyanditatvāt 		ci'i phyir zag pa med pa rnams ma yin zhe na /
sred pas mngon par ma brlan pa'i phyir te /
anabhiṣyanditasārabījavat mngon par ma brlan pa'i sa bon grung po bzhin no /
apratisaṃyuktā hi kiṃpratisaṃyuktaṃ vipākamabhinirvarttayeyuḥ ldan pa ma yin pa rnams gang dang ldan pa'i rnam par smin pa zhig mngon par 'grub par byed par 'gyur /
śeṣāstūbhayavidhatvānnirvarttayanti /
sārābhiṣyanditabījavat /
kathamidaṃ vijñātavyaṃ vipākasya heturvipākaheturāhosvidvipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ /
kiṃ cātaḥ /
yadi vipākasya heturvipākahetuḥ vīpākajaṃ cakṣuriti etanna prāpnoti 		lhag ma rnams ni rnam pa gnyi ga yin pa'i phyir 'grub par byed de sa bon grung po mngon par brlan pa bzhin te /
'di ji ltar shes par bya /
rnam par smin pa'i rgyu zhig rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yin nam /
'on te rnam par smin pa nyid rgyu yin pas rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yin /
des na cir 'gyur /
atha vipāka eva heturvipākahetuḥ karmaṇo vipāka ityetanna prāpnoti gal te rnam par smin pa'i rgyu zhig rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yin na ni mig gi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yin no zhes bya ba der mi 'gyur ro /
naiṣa doṣaḥ ci'i phyir zhe na /
ubhayathāpi yoga ityuktaṃ prāk /
atha vipāka iti ko 'rthaḥ 		las las skyes pa'i phyir la las kyang rnam par smin pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
visadṛśaḥ pāko vipākaḥ /
anyeṣāṃ tu hetūnāṃ sadṛśaḥ pākaḥ 		'on te rnam par smin pa nyid rgyu yin pas rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yin na ni las kyi rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba der mi 'gyur ro /
ekasyobhayatheti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
naiva tu teṣāṃ pāko yuktaḥ /
pāko hi nāma santatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phalaparyantaḥ 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
rnam par smin pa ni rgyu yin pa'i phyir la rnam par smin pa yang las kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
na ca sahābhūsaṃprayuktahetvoḥ santatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaṃ phalamasti /
na cāpi sabhāgahetvādīnāṃ phalaparyanto 'sti /
punaḥ punaḥ kuśalādyāsaṃsāraphalatvāt /
kāmadhātāvekaskandhako vipākaheturekaphalaḥ pratyayastajjātyādayaśca 		gnyi ga ltar yang rung ngo zhes sngar bshad zin to /
yang rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
mi 'dra bar smin pa ni rnam par smin pa'o /
'dod pa'i khams na rnam par smin pa'i rgyu phung po gcig la 'bras bu gcig pa can ni thob pa rnams dang de dag gi skye ba la sogs pa'o /
dviskandhaka ekaphalaḥ kāyavākkarma tajjātyādayaśca /
catuskandhaka ekaphalaḥ kuśalākuśalāścittacaittāḥ saha jātyādibhiḥ 		phung po gnyis pa la 'bras bu gcig pa can ni lus dang ngag gi las dang de dag gi skye ba la sogs pa'o /
phung po bzhi las 'bras bu gcig pa can ni sems dang sems las byung ba dge ba dang mi dge ba skye ba la sogs pa dang bcas pa dag go /
rūpadhātāvekaskandhako vīpākaheturekaphalaḥ prāptirasaṃjñisamāpattiśca saha jātyādibhiḥ gzugs kyi khams na rnam par smin pa'i rgyu phung po gcig la rnam par smin pa gcig pa can ni thob pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye ba la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o /
dviskandhaka ekaphalaḥ prathame dhyāne vijñaptiḥ saha jātyādibhiḥ phung po gnyis pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i rnam par rig byed skye ba la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o /
catuskandhaka ekaphalaḥ kuśale cetasyasamāhite phung po bzhi pa ni dge ba'i sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa na'o /
pañcaskandhaka ekaphalaḥ samāhite /
ārūpyadhātāvekaskandhako vipākaheturekaphalaḥ prāptirnirodhasamāpatiśca saha jātyādibhiḥ 		phung po lnga pa ni mnyam par bzhag pa na'o /
gzugs med pa'i khams na rnam par smin pa'i rgyus phung po gcig la 'bras bu gcig pa can ni thob pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye ba la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o /
catuskandhakaḥ kuśalāścittacaittāḥ tajjātyādayaśca phung po bzhi pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba dge ba rnams dang de dag gi skye ba la sogs pa'o /
asti karma yasyaikameva dharmāyatanaṃ vīpāko vipacyate jīvitendriyam gang gi rnam par smin pa chos kyi skye mched gcig kho na rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i las kyang yod de /
gang gi srog gi dbang po yin pa'o /
yasya mana āyatanaṃ tasya dve manodharmāyatane /
evaṃ yasya spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ yasya kāyāyatanaṃ tasya trīṇi kāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni 		gang gi yid kyi skye mched yin pa de'i ni gnyis te /
yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag go /
gang gi reg bya'i skye mched yin pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
gang gi lus kyi skye mched yin pa de'i ni gsum ste /
lus dang reg bya dang chos kyi skye mched dag go /
evaṃ yasya rūpagandharasāyatanāni gang gi gzugs dang dri dang ro'i skye mched dag yin pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
yasya cakṣurāyatanaṃ tasya catvāri cakṣuḥkāyaspraṣṭavyadharmāyatanāni /
evaṃ yasya śrotragrāṇajihvāyatanāni /
asti tat karma yasya pañca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśaikādaśāyatanāni vipāko vipacyate 		gang gi mig gi skye mched yin pa de'i ni bzhi ste /
mig dang lus dang reg bya dang chos kyi skye mched rnams so /
gang gi rna ba dang; sna dang lce'i skye mched dag yin pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
gang gi rnam par smin pa lnga dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad dang dgu dang bcu dang bcu gcig smin par 'gyur ba'i las de yang yod de /
vicitrāvicitraphalatvāt karmaṇo bāhyabījavat las kyi 'dras bu sna tshogs dang sna tshogs ma yin pa'i phyir phyi'i sa bon bzhin no /
tadyathā bāhyāni vījāni kānicidvicitraphalāni bhavanti dper na phyi'i sa bon rnams la kha cig ni 'bras bu sna tshogs pa yin te /
tadyathā padmadāḍimanyagrodhādīnām /
kānicidavicitraphālāni tadyathā yavagodūmādīnām 		'di lta ste padma dang bal po se'u dang shing n+ya gro dha la sogs pa dag gi lta bu'o /
kha cig ni 'bras bu sna tshogs pa ma yin te /
'di lta ste /
nas dang gro la sogs pa dag gi lta bu'o; /
ekādhvikasya karmaṇastraiyadhviko vipāko vipacyate /
na tu dvaiyadhvikasyāpyekādhviko mā bhūdatinyūnaṃ hetoḥ phalamiti 		las dus gcig pa'i rnam par smin pa dus gsum pa rnam par smin pa ni mi 'gyur gyi las dus gnyis pa'i yang dus gcig pa ni ma yin te /
rgyu bas 'bras bu ha cang nyung bar 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro /
ekamekakṣanikasya bahukṣāṇiko nanu viparyayāt de bzhin du skad cig ma gcig pa'i skad cig ma du ma pa ni yin gyi bzlog pa ni ma yin no /
na ca karmaṇā saha vipāko vipacyate nāpyanantaraṃ samanantarapratyayākṛṣṭatvāt samanantarakṣaṇasya rnam par smin pa ni las dang lhan cig tu rnam par smin pa yang ma yin la mjug thogs su yang ma yin te /
mjug thogs kyi skad cig ma ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis drangs pa'i phyir ro /
pravāhāpekṣo hi vipākahetuḥ /
atha ka eṣāṃ hetūnāmadhvaniyamaḥ 		rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu smin pa ni rgyu la ltos pa yin no /
yang rgyu 'di dag gi dus nges pa gang zhe na /
ukta eṣāmarthato 'dhvaniyamaḥ natu sūtrita ityataḥ sūtryate 'di dag gi dus nges par don gyis ni bshad mod kyi mdor byas nas ma bshad pas /
sarvatragaḥ sabhāgaśca dvayadhvagau /
atītapratyutpannāveva anāgatau na staḥ 		de'i phyir mdor byas te /
kun 'gro skal mnyam dus gnyis pa dang 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba kho na yin gyi ma 'ongs pa dag ni med do /
uktaṃ cātra kāraṇam 'dir gtan tshigs ni bshad zin to /
tryadhvagā strayaḥ gsum po dag ni dus gsum pa /
sahabhūsaṃprayuktakavipākahetava strikālāḥ /
kāraṇahetustu kālaniyamānupadarśanāt /
sarvādhvaka ścādhvaviprayuktaśca veditavyaḥ 		lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu dag ni dus gsum pa yin no /
byed rgyu'i rgyu ni dus nges pa ma bstan pas dus thams cad pa dang dus dang bral bar yang rig par bya'o /
uktā hetavaḥ rgyu rnams bshad zin to /
kiṃ punastatphalaṃ yasyaite hetavaḥ rgyu de dag gang gi yin pa'i 'bras bu de dag gang zhe na /
saṃskṛtaṃ savisaṃyoga phalaṃ 'dus byas bral bcas 'bras bu yin /
phalaṃ dharmāḥ bstan bcos las /
katame /
saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaśceti śāstram /
evaṃ tarhi phalatvādasaṃskṛtasya hetunā bhavitavyaṃ yasya tat phalaṃ hetutvācca phalena bhavitavyaṃ yasya taddhetuḥ /
saṃskṛtasyaiva dharmasya hetuphale bhavataḥ /
nāsaṃskṛtasya te 		'bras bu'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
'dus byas kyi chos thams cad dang so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o zhes 'byung ba'o /
de lta na 'o na ni 'dus ma byas 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir de gang gi 'bras bu yin pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur la /
rgyu yin pa'i phyir de gang gi rgyu yin pa'i 'bras bur yang 'gyur ro /
'dus byas kho na la rgyu dang 'bras bu dag yod kyi /
'dus ma byas la de dag med /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
ṣaḍvidhahetvasaṃbhavāt pañcavidhaphalāsaṃbhavācca /
kasmāt mārgo visaṃyogasya kāraṇaheturneṣyate 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
rgyu rnam pa drug mi srid pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu rnam pa lnga mi srid pa'i phyir ro /
ci'i phyir lam 'bral ba'i byed rgyu'i rgyur mi 'dod ce na /
yāsmāt sa utpādāvighnabhāvena vyavasthāpito na cāsaṃskṛtamutpattimat /
kasyedānīṃ tatphalaṃ kathaṃ vā mārgasya phalam /
tadbalena prāpteḥ 		'di ltar de ni skye ba la bgegs mi byed pa'i ngo bor rnam par gzhag pa yin na 'dus ma byas ni skye ba dang ldan pa ma yin no /
da ni de gang gi 'am ji ltar na 'bras bu yin zhe na /
lam gyi 'bras bu yin te /
de'i stobs kyis 'thob pa'i phyir ro /
prāptireva tarhi mārgasya phalaṃ prāpnoti /
tasyāmeva tasya sāmarthyānna visaṃyogaḥ /
anyathā hysya prāptau sāmarthyamanyathā visaṃyoge 		'o na ni de de kho na la nus pa'i phyir thob pa kho na lam gyi 'bras bu yin gyi bral ba ni ma yin no /
thob pa la yang de'i nus pa gzhan la /
bral ba la yang gzhan te /
kathamasya prāptau sāmarthyam /
utpādanāt 		thob pa la de ji ltar nus she na bskyed pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ visaṃyoge bral ba la ji ltar zhe na /
prapaṇāt /
tasmānna tāvadasya mārgaḥ kathañcidapi hetuḥ /
phalaṃ cāsya visaṃyogaḥ /
athāsatyadhipatiphale kathamasaṃskṛtaṃ kāraṇahetuḥ 		thob par byed pa'i phyir ro /
de lta bas na re zhig lam ni ji ltar yang 'di'i rgyu ma yin gyi bral ba ni 'di'i 'bras bu yin no /
yang bdag po'i 'bras bu yang med na go ji ltar na 'dus ma byas byed rgyu'i rgyu yin zhe na /
utpattyanāvaraṇabhāvena kāraṇahetuḥ /
na cāsya phalamastyadhvavinirmuktasya phalapratigrahaṇadānāsamarthatvāt /
naiva hi kvacidasaṃskṛtaṃ bhagavatā heturityuktam 		skye ba la mi sgrib pa'i dngos pos byed rgyu'i rgyu yin gyi 'di la 'bras bu yod pa ni ma yin te /
dus las grol ba la 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang smin pa'i mthu med pa'i phyir ro /
mdo sde pa rnams na re /
bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las kyang 'dus ma byas rgyu yin no zhes ma gsungs kyi /
uktaṃ tu paryāyeṇa heturiti sautrāntikāḥ rgyu ma yin no zhes rnam grangs kyis gsungs so /
kathamuktam ji ltar gsungs she na /
ye hetavo ye pratyayā rūpasyotpādāya te 'pyanityāḥ /
anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityam bhaviṣyati 		gzugs skyed pa'i rgyu gang dag yin pa dang rkyen gang dag yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag pa yin na rgyu dang rkyen mi rtag pa dag la brten nas byung ba'i gzugs lta rtag par ga la 'gyur /
evaṃ yāvaddhi vijñānamiti /
evaṃ tarhi vijñānasyālamabanapratyayo 'pyasaṃskṛtaṃ na prāpnoti 		rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro /
de lta na 'o na ni 'dus ma byas rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i rkyen du yang mi 'gyur ro /
utpādāyetyavadhāraṇāt /
prāpnoti 		skyes pa'i zhes dkar ba'i phyir 'gyur te /
ye hetavo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāya te 'pyanityā /
ityuktaṃ natūktaṃ ye vijñānasya pratyayāḥ tepyanityā iti /
nanu ca hetavo 'pi ya utpādāya ta evānityā iti vacanādasaṃskṛtasyānāvaraṇabhāvamātreṇa kāraṇahetutvāpratiṣedhaḥ /
ukta ālambanapratyayaḥ sūtre na tvanāvaraṇaheturiti na sūtre sidhyatyasaṃskṛtasya hetubhāvaḥ /
yadyapi nokto natu pratiṣiddhaḥ /
sūtrāṇi ca bahūnyantarhitānīti kathametannirdhāryate nokta iti /
atha ko 'yaṃ visaṃyogo nāma /
nanu coktaṃ prāk pratisaṃkhyānirodha iti 		rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i rgyu gang dag yin pa dang rkyen gang dag yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag na zhes gsungs kyi rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gang dag yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag na zhes ni mi gsungs so /
rgyu rnams kyang gang dag skyed pa'i rgyu de dag kho na mi rtag go zhes 'byung ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas kyang mi sgrib pa'i dngos po tsam gyis byed rgyu'i rgyu nyid du mi dgag pa yin nam /
mdo las dmigs pa'i rkyen yin par gsungs kyi mi sgrib pa'i rgyu yin par ni ma gsungs pas /
mdo las 'dus ma byas rgyu'i dngos po mi 'grub bo /
ma gsungs mod kyi bkag pa ni med do /
mdo rnams kyang phal cher nub nam gsungs so zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar nges par gzung yang bral ba zhes bya ba 'di ci /
sngar so sor brtags pas 'gog pa yin no zhes ma bshad dam /
tadānīṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ katamo yo visaṃyoga ityuktamidānīṃ isaṃyogaḥkathamaḥ de'i tshe ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gang zhe na /
gang bral ba'o zhes bshad /
yaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodha ityucyate /
tadidamitaretarāśrayaṃ vyākhyānamasamarthaṃ tatsvabhāvadyotane 		da ni bral ba gang zhe na /
gang so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o zhes bshad pas phan tshun rten pa'i bshad pa 'di ni de'i rang gi ngo bo gsal bar bya ba la nus pa ma yin te /
tasmādanyathā tatsvabhāvo yaktavyaḥ de lta bas na de'i rang gi ngo bo gzhan du brjod par bya'o /
āryaireva tatsvabhāvaḥ pratyātmavedyaḥ /
etāvaktu śakyate vaktum nityaṃ kuśalaṃ cāsti dravyāntaram /
tadvisaṃyogaścocyate pratisaṃkhyānirodhaśceti 		de'i rang gi ngo bo ni 'phags pa rnams kho nas so sor rang gis rig par bya ba yin te /
bral ba zhes bya ba dang so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa brtags pa dang dge ba'i rdzas gzhan zhig yod do zhes bya ba de tsam zhig ni brjod par nus so /
sarvamevāsaṃskṛtamadravyamiti sautrāntikāḥ /
nahi tadrūpavedanādiyat bhāvāntaramasti 		mdo sde pa rnams na re 'dus ma byas thams cad kyang rdzas su med pa kho na ste /
de ni gzugs dang tshor pa la sogs pa bzhin du rdzas gzhan du ni med do /
kiṃ tarhi /
spraṣṭavyābhāvamātramākāśam /
tadyathā hyandhakāre pratidhātamavindanta ākāśamityāhuḥ /
utpannānuśayajanmanirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyāvalenānyasyānutpādaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ 		'o na ci zhe na /
reg bya med pa tsam ni nam mkha' yin te /
'di ltar mun pa'i nang dag na thogs pa ma rnyed na nam mkha'o zhes zer to /
phra rgyas dang skye ba skyes pa 'gags nas so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis gzhan mi skye ba ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa yin no /
vinaiva pratisaṃkhyayā pratyayavaikalayādanutpādo yaḥ so /
tadyathā nikāyasabhāgaśeṣasyāntarāmaraṇe 		so sor brtags pa med pa kho nar rkyen ma tshang bas mi skye ba ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ste dper na bar ma dor 'chi ba'i ris mthun pa lhag ma lta bu'o zhes zer ro /
nikāyāntarīyāḥ punarāhuḥ /
anuśayānāmutpattau prajñāyāḥ sāmarthyamato 'sau pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
yastu punaḥ duḥkhasyānutpādaḥ saḥ utpādakāraṇānuśayavaikalyādeveti na tasminprajñāyāḥ sāmarthyamastyato 'sāvapratisaṃkhyānirodha iti /
so 'pi tu nāntareṇa pratisaṃkhyāṃ sidhyatīti pratisamkhyānirodha evāsau /
ya evotpannasya paścādabhāvaḥ sa eva svarasa nirodhādapratisaṃkhyānirodha ityapare 		sde pa gzhan dag na re phra rgyas rnams mi skye bar bya ba la shes rab kyi nus pa yod do /
de'i phyir de ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa yin no /
sdug bsngal mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i rkyen phra rgyas med pa kho na'i phyir de la shes rab kyi nus pa med de /
de'i phyir de ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa yin no zhes zer te de yang so sor brtags pa med pas mi 'grub pas de ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa kho na yin no /
gzhan dag na re sngar skyes pa phyis med pa gang yin pa de nyid rang gi dang gis 'gag pa'i phyir so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa yin no zhes zer te /
asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāmanityo 'pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ prāpnotyavinaṣṭe tadabhāvāt rtogs pa de la ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa mi rtag pa kho nar 'gyur te /
ma zhig na de med pa'i phyir ro /
nanu ca pratisaṃkhyānirodho 'pyanityaḥ prāpnoti /
pratisaṃkhyāpūrvakatvāt /
na vai sa pratisaṃkhyāpūrvako nahi poūrvaṃ pratisaṃkhyā paścādanutpannānāmanutpādaḥ 		so sor brtags pas 'gog pa yang so sor brtags pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir mi rtag par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
de ni so sor brtags pa sngon du 'gro ba ma yin te /
sngar so sor brtags pa yin la phyis skye ba rnams kyi mi skye ba ni ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
pūrvameva sa teṣāmanutpādo 'sti /
vinā tu pratisaṃkhyayā ye dharmā utpatsyante tadutpannāyāṃ pratisaṃkhyāyāṃ punarnopapadyanta iti 		de dag mi skye ba de ni snga nas yod pa kho na yin no /
chos gang dag so sor brtags ba med na skye bar 'gyur ba de dag so sor brtags pa skyes na yang mi skye'o /
'di la so sor brtags pa'i mthu ni 'di yin te /
etadatra pratisaṃkhyāyā samarthyaṃ yadutākṛtotpattipratibandhānāmutpattipratibandhabhāvaḥ /
yadi narhi anutpāda eva nirvāṇamidaṃ sūtrapadaṃ kathaṃ nīyate pañcemānīndriyāṇi āsevitāni bhāvitāni bahulīkṛtānyatītānāgatapratyūtpannasya duḥkhasya prahāṇāya saṃvarttanta iti /
prahāṇaṃ hi nirvāṇamanāgatasyaiva cānutpādo nātītapratyutpannasyete 		'di lta ste gegs ma byas pa rkyen rnams skye ba la gegs byed pa'i dngos po yin no /
gal te mi skye ba kho na mya ngan las 'das pa yin na 'o na mdo'i tshig dbang po lnga po 'di dag kun tu bsten /
goms par byas /
lan mang du byas na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sdug bsngal spangs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar drang /
spangs pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no /
mi skye ba ni ma 'ongs pa kho na yin gyi 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba ni ma yin no /
astyetadevam /
kiṃ tu tadālambanakleśaprahāṇāt duḥkhasya prahāṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā yo rūpe cchandarāgastaṃ prajahīta 		de skad du 'byung ba yang yod mod kyi 'on kyang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pas sdug bsngal spong bar gsungs pa yin te /
gzugs la 'dun pa dang 'dod chags gang yin pa di spongs shig /
cchandarāge prahīṇe evaṃ vastadrūpaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pārijñātaṃ vistareṇa yāvad vijñānamiti /
evaṃ traiyadhvikasyāpi duḥkhasya prahāṇaṃ yujyate 		'dun pa dang 'dod chags spangs na khyed kyis gzugs de lta bu de yang spangs pa dang yongs su shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas /
rgyas par rnam par shes pa'i bar du gsungs te /
de ltar na dus gsum pa'i sdug bsngal yang spangs par rung ngo /
athāpyatītānāgatapratyutpannasya kleśasya prahāṇāyetyucyeta ci ste 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung bar 'gyur na /
atrāpyeṣa nayaḥ /
athavā 'yamabhiprāyo bhavedatītaḥ kleśaḥ paurvajanmikaḥ pratyutpannaḥ kleśa aihajanmiko yathā tṛṣṇā vicariteṣvaṣṭādaśa tṛṣṇāvicaritānyatītamadhvānamupādāyetyatītaṃ janmādhikṛtyoktamevaṃ yāvat pratyutpannam /
tenā ca kleśadvayenāsyāṃ santatau bījabhāva āhito 'nāgatasyotpattaye /
tasya prahāṇāttadapi prahīṇaṃ bhavati 		der yang tshul ni 'di kho na yin no /
yang na dgongs pa ni 'das pa'i nyon mongs pa ni tshe rabs snga ma pa yin la /
da ltar byung ba'i nyon mongs pa ni tshe 'di pa yin te /
dper na sred pa rnam par spyad pa dag la 'das pa'i dus la brten nas sred pa rnam par spyad pa bcva brgyad do zhes 'byung ba 'das pa'i tshe rabs kyi dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra ba lta bu'o /
nyon mongs pa gnyis po 'dis kyang rgyud 'di la ma 'ongs pa bskyed pa'i phyir sa bon gyi dngos po bzhag pa de spangs pas de yang spangs pa yin te /
yathā vipākakṣayātkarmaṃ kṣīṇaṃ bhavati /
anāgatasya punarduḥkhasya kleśasya vā bījābhāvāt atyantamanutpādaḥ prahāṇam /
anyathā hyatītapratyutpannasya kiṃ prahātavyam 		dper na rnam par smin pa zad pa las zad par 'gyur ba lta bu'o /
ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal la nyon mongs pa ni sa bon med pa'i phyir gtan du mi skye ba spangs pa yin no /
de lta ma yin na 'das pa dang da ltar la ci zhig spang du yod de /
nahi niruddhe nirodhābhimukhe ca yatnaḥ sārthako bhavatīti /
yadyasaṃskṛṭaṃ nāstyeva yaduktaṃ bhagavatā ye keciddharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā 'saṃskṛtā vā virāgasteṣāmagra ākhyāyate iti kathamasatāmasannagro bhavitumarhati /
na vai nāstyevāsaṃskṛtamiti brūmaḥ /
etattu tadīdṛśaṃ yathā 'smābhiruktam 		'gags zin pa dang 'gag pa la mngon du phyogs pa la ni 'bad pa don dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro snyam pa 'di yin par 'gyur ro /
gal te 'dus ma byas med pa kho na yin na /
bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang dag 'dus byas kyang rung 'dus ma byas kyang rung de dag gi mchog ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin par bshad do zhes gang gsungs pa /
ji ltar na med pa rnams kyi mchog yin par 'os /
'dus ma byas med pa kho na'o zhes kyang mi smra'i de ni kho bo cag gis ji skad du bshad pa de lta bu yin no /
tadyathā asti śabdasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva ityucyate /
atha ca punarnābhāvo bhāvaḥ sidhyati 		dper na sgra la snga na med pa yang yod /
phyis med pa yang yod ces bya mod kyi 'on kyang med pa ni yod par mi 'grub pa ltar 'dus ma byas kyang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o /
evamasaṃskṛtamapi draṣṭavyam med pa yang kha cig shin tu bsngags pa yod de /
abhāvo 'pi ca kaścit praśasyatamo bhavati yaḥ sakalasyopadravasyātyantamabhāva ityanyeṣāṃ so 'gra iti praśaṃsāṃ labdhumarhati /
vineyānāṃ tasminnupacchandanārtham /
yadyapyasaṃskṛtamabhāvamātraṃ syānnirodha āryasatyaṃ na syāt 		gang gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba de ni 'dul ba rnams de la 'dun par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag gi mchog yin no zhes bsngags pa 'thob par 'os so /
gal te 'dus ma byas med pa tsam zhig yin na 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa yin par mi 'gyur te /
nahi tatu kiñcidastīti /
kastāvadayaṃ satyārthaḥ /
nanu cāviparītārthaḥ /
ubhayamapi caitadaviparītaṃ dṛṣṭamāryairyaduta duḥkhaṃ ca duḥkhameveti duḥkhābhāvaścābhāva eveti ko 'syāryasatyatve virodhaḥ kathamabhāvaśca nāma tṛtīyaṃ cāryasatyaṃ syāt 		de cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir ro /
re zhig 'gog pa'i bden pa'i don 'di gang yin /
phyin ci ma log pa'i don ma yin nam /
'phags pa rnams kyis 'di lta ste /
sdug bsngal la yang sdug bsngal kho na'o /
sdug bsngal med pa la yang med pa kho na'o zhes 'di gnyi ga yang phyin ci ma log par gzigs na 'di 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid yin par 'gal ba ci zhig yod /
ji ltar med pa yang yin la 'phags pa'i bden pa gsum pa yang yin par 'gyur /
ustaṃ yathāryasatyaṃ dvitīyasyānantaraṃ dṛṣṭamuddṛṣṭaṃ ceti tṛtīyaṃ bhavati /
yadyasaṃskṛtamabhāvamātraṃ syādākāśanirvāṇālambanavijñānamasadālambanaṃ syāt /
etadatītānāgatasyāstitvacintāyāṃ cintayiṣyāmaḥ /
yadi punardravyamevāsaṃskṛtamiṣyeta kiṃ syāt /
kiṃ ca punaḥ syāt 		ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa yin pa ni bshad zin to /
gnyis pa'i 'og tu mthong ba dang bstan pas na gsum pa yin no /
gal te 'dus ma byas dngos po med pa tsam yin na nam mkha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa la dmigs pa'i shes pa med pa la dmigs par 'gyur ro /
'di ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yod pa nyid bsam par bya'o /
gal te 'dus ma byas rdzas kho nar 'dod par gyur na cir 'gyur /
ci zhig tu yang 'gyur /
vaibhāṣikapakṣaḥ pālitaḥ syāt bye brag tu smras pa'i phyogs bskyab par 'gyur ro /
devatā enaṃ pālayiṣyanti pālanīyaṃ cet maṃsyate gal te 'di bskyab par bya ba yin par sems na lha skyob par 'gyur grang /
abhūtaṃ tu parikalpitaṃ syāt yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu brtags par 'gyur ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
nahi tasya rūpavedanādivat svabhāva upalabhyate nacāpi cakṣurādivatkarma /
amuṣya ca vastuno 'yaṃ nirogha iti ṣaṣṭhīvyavasthā kathaṃ prakalpyate /
nahi tasya tena sārdhaṃ kaścitsaṃbandho hetuphalādibhāvāsaṃbhavāt /
pratiṣedhamātraṃ tu yujyate amuṣyābhāva iti /
bhāvāntaratve 'pi yasya kleśasya prāptivicchedāydyo nirodhaḥ prāpyate sa tasyeti vyavadiśyate 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa bzhin du de'i rang gi ngo bo yang mi dmigs la mig la sogs pa bzhin du las kyang mi dmigs so /
dngos po che ge mo zhig gi 'gog pa 'di yin no zhes rnam par gzhag pa yang ji ltar rab tu brtags te /
rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i dngos po mi srid pa'i phyir de ni de dang lhan cig 'brel pa 'ga' yang med kyi che ge mo zhig med pa'o zhes 'gag pa tsam du rung ngo /
dngos po gzhan nyid yin na yang nyon mongs pa gang gi thob pa chad nas 'gog pa gang thob pa de de'i yin no zhes tha snyad gdags so /
tasya tarhi prāptiniyame ko hetuḥ /
dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇaprāpto bhikṣurityuktaṃ sūtre /
tatra kathamabhāvasya prāptiḥ syāt /
pratipakṣalābhena kleśapunarbhavotpādātyantaviruddhāśraya lābhāt prāptaṃ nirvāṇamityucyate /
āgamaścāpyabhāvamātraṃ dyotayati 		'o na de thob par 'dod pa'i rgyu gang zhig yin /
mdo las mthong pa'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar na med pa thob par rung /
gnyen po thob pas nyon mongs pa dang yang srid pa'i skye ba dang shin tu 'gal ba'i rten thob pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa zhes bya'o /
lung las kyang dngos po med pa tsam nyid du brjod par mdzad de /
'di skad du sdug bsngal 'di ma lus par spangs pa /
nges par spangs pa /
byang bar 'gyur ba /
zad pa /
'dod chags dang bral ba /
evaṃ hyāha /
yat svalpasya duḥkhasyāśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupakṣamo 'staṅgamaḥ anyasya ca duḥkhasyāprati sandhiranutpādo 'prādurbhāvaḥ 		'gog pa /
rnam par zhi ba /
nub pa /
sdug bsngal gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyong ba med pa /
len pa med pa /
'byung ba med pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste /
phung po thams cad nges par spangs pa /
sred pa zad pa /
'dod chags dang bral ba /
'gog pa /
etatkāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta srvopādhipraniniḥ sargastṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇa miti /
kimevaṃ neṣyate nāsmin prādurbhavbatītyato 'prādurbhāva iti 		mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni zhi ba'o /
'di ni gya nom pa'o zhes gsungs so /
'dir yin na 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba de ltar ci ste mi 'dod ce na /
asamarthāmetāṃ saptamīṃ paśyāmaḥ bdun pa 'di ni nus pa med par lta'o /
kimuktaṃ bhavati /
nāsminprādurbhavatīti yadi satītyabhisaṃbadhyate nityamevāprādurbhāvaprasaṅgo nirvāṇasya nityatvāt /
atha prāpta ityabhisaṃbadhyate yata eva tatprāptiḥ parikalpyate tasminneva saṃmukhībhūte prāpte vā duḥkhasyeṣyatāmaprādurbhāvaḥ 		'dir yin na 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya pa ji skad du bshad pa yin /
gal te yod na zhes bya bar sbyar na ni mya ngan las 'das pa ni mi rtag pa'i phyir rtag tu mi 'byung ba kho nar thal bar 'gyur ro /
'on te thob na zhes bya bar sbyar na ni gang kho nas de 'thob par yongs su rtog pa de nyid yod dam thob na sdug bsngal mi 'byung bar 'dod par gyis shig /
de ltar na /
ayaṃ ca dṛṣṭānta evaṃ sūpanīto bhavati mar me shi bar gyur pa ltar /
de yi sems kyi rnam par thar /
pradyotasyeva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣastasya cetasa iti /
yathā pradyotasya nirvāṇamabhāva evaṃ bhagavato 'pi cetaso vimokṣa iti /
abhidharme 'pi coktam avastukā dharmāḥ katame /
asaṃskṛtā dharmā iti 		zhes gsungs pa'i dpe 'di yang legs par drangs pa yin te /
ji ltar mar me shi ba med pa ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sems kyi rnam par thar pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
chos mngon pa las kyang dngos po med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
'dus ma byas kyi chos dag yin no zhes gsungs te /
avastukā aśarīrā asvabhāvā ityuktaṃ bhavati dngos po med pa ni lus med pa dang rang gi ngo bo med pa ni zhes bshad pa yin no /
nāsyāyamarthaḥ /
kastarhi /
pañcavidhavastu /
svabhāvavastu yathoktaṃ yadvastu pratilabdhaṃ samanvāgataḥ sa tena vastuneti /
ālambanavastu 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'di'i don ni 'di ma yin no /
'o na ci zhe na /
dngos po ni rnam pa lnga ste /
rang bzhin gyi dngos po ni ji skad du de dngos po gang zhig thob pa'i dngos po de dang ldan no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
yathoktaṃ sarvadharmajñeyā jñānena yathāvastveti /
saṃyogavastu 		dmigs pa'i dngos po ni ji skad du chos thams cad dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas shes par bya ba yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
yathoktaṃ yasmin vastuni anunayaḥ saṃyojanena saṃprayuktaḥ pratighasaṃyojanenāpi tasminniti ldan pa'i dngos po ji skad du dngos po gang la rjes su chags pa'i kun nas dkris pa dang ldan pa de yang khong khro ba'i kun nas bkris pa dang yang ldan no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
hetuvastu yathoktaṃ savastukā dharmāḥ katame rgyu'i dngos po ni ji skad du dngos po dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
saṃskṛtā dharmā iti /
parigrahavastu /
yathoktaṃ kṣatravastu gṛhavastviti /
tadatra heturvastuśabdenoktastasmādastyevāsaṃskṛtaṃ dravyata iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
tasya tu hetuphale na vidyete iti 		'dus byas kyi chos rnams so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
yongs su gzang ba'i dngos po ni ji skad du zhing gi dngos po dang khyim gyi dngos po zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
de la 'dir ni rgyu'i dngos po'i sgrar gsungs pa yin te /
de lta bas na 'dus ma byas rdzas su yod pa kho na yin la de la yang rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ni med do zhes zer ro /
gataṃ tāvadetat re zhig de ni rdzogs so /
athaiṣāṃ phalānāṃ katamat phalaṃ kasya hetoḥ yang 'bras bu 'di dag las 'bras bu gang zhig rgya gang gi yin zhe na /
vipākaphalamantyasya rnam smin 'bras bu tha ma'i yin /
vipākaheturantye 'bhihitatvāt antyaḥ rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni tha mar bstan pa'i phyir tha ma ste /
tasya vipākaphalam /
pūrvasyādhipataṃ phalam 		rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni de yin no /
bdag po'i 'bras bu dang po'i yin /
kāraṇahetuḥ pūrvamuktatvāt pūrvaḥ /
tasyādhipajaṃ phalam /
anāvaraṇabhāvamātreṇāvasthitasya kimādhipatyam 		byed rgyu'i rgyu ni dang par bstan pa'i phyir dang po ste bdag po'i 'bras bu ni de'i yin no /
bdag po'i 'bras bu ni bdag po yin no /
mi sgrib pa'i dngos po tsam du gnas pa go ci zhig dbang byed ce na /
de nyid dbang byed pa yin no; /
etadeva aṅgībhāvo 'pi cāsti kāraṇahetostadyathā pañcasu vijñānakāyeṣudaśānāmāyatanānāṃ bhājanaloke ca karmaṇām /
śrotrādīnāmapyasti cakṣurvijñānotpattau pāraṃparyeṇādhipatyam 		byed rgyu'i rgyu la skyed pa'i dngos po yang yod de /
'di lta ste rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag la skye mched bcu lta bu dang snod kyi 'jig rten la las rnams lta bu'o /
rna ba la sogs pa la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa bskyed pa la brgyud pas dbang byed pa yod de /
śrutvā draṣṭukāmatotpatte rityevamādi yojyam thos nas lta bar 'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par sbyar bar bya'o /
sabhāga sarvatragayorniṣyandaḥ rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i /
sadṛśaphalatvādanayorniḥṣyandaphalam 'di gnyis dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no /
pauruṣaṃ dvayoḥ skyes bu pa ni gnyis kyi yin /
sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetvoḥ puruṣakāraphalam skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag gi yin no /
puruṣabhāvavyatirekāt puruṣakāraḥ puruṣaṃ eva skyes bu'i ngo bo las mi gzhan pa'i phyir skyes bu byed pa ni skyes bu nyid yin no /
tasya phalaṃ pauruṣam de'i 'bras bu ni skyes bu yin pa'o /
ko 'yaṃ puruṣakāro nāma skyes bu byed pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na /
yasya dharmasya yat kāritram /
puruṣakāra iva hi puruṣakāraḥ /
tadyathā kākajaṅghā oṣadhirmattahastī manuṣya iti 		chos gang gi byed pa gang yin pa de skyes bu'i byed pa lta bu ni skyes bu byed pa ste /
dper na sman bya rog rkang dang mi glang po che myos pa zhes bya ba bzhin no /
kimanyeṣāmapyasti puruṣakāraphāmutāho dvayoreva /
anyeṣāmapyastyanyatra vipākahetoḥ 		ci gzhan dag la yang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yod dam /
'on te gnyis kho na'i yin zhe na /
rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ma gtogs pa gzhan dag la yang yod de /
yasmātsahotpannaṃ vā samanantarotpannaṃ vā puruṣakāraphalaṃ bhavati /
na caivaṃ vipākaḥ /
tasyāpyasti viprakṛṣṭapuruṣakāraphalam 		'di ltar skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang de ma thag tu 'byung ba yin na rnam par smin pa ni de lta ma yin no /
gzhan dag na re de la yang skyes bu'i byed pa'i 'bras bu'i skal ba ni yod do /
yathā karṣakāṇāṃ sasyamityapare dper na zhing pa rnams kyi 'bras bu lta bu'o zhes zer ro /
kiṃ punaridaṃ vipākaphalaṃ nāma kiṃ yāvadadhipatiphalam yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'di ni ci yin /
bdag po'i 'bras bu'i bar du ci zhig yin zhe na /
vipāko 'vyākṛto dharmaḥ /
anivṛtāvyākṛto hi dharmaḥ vipākaḥ /
asattvākhyo 'pi syādata āha 		rnam smin lung du ma bstan chos /
rnam par smin pa ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i chos yin no /
sems can du ston pa ma yin ba yang yod pas de'i phyir /
sattvākhyaḥ /
aupacayiko 'pi syāt naiḥṣyandiko 'pyat āha 		sems can brjod ces bya ba smos so /
rgyas pa las byung ba dang rgyu mthun pa las byung ba yang yod pas de'i phyir /
vyākṛtodbhavaḥ /
kuśalākuśalaṃ hi vipākaṃ prati vyākaraṇādvyākṛtam 		lung bstan phyis byung zhes bya ba smos te /
dge ba dang mi dge ba ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir lung du bstan pas lung du bstan pa'o /
tasmādya utarakālaṃ bhavati na saha nāntaraṃ sa vipākaḥ gang zhig de las dus phyi ma la 'byung zhing de ma thag tu ma yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa ste /
etadvipākasya lakṣaṇam 'di ni rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid yin no /
kasmādasattvākhyo 'rthaḥ karmajo na vipākaḥ /
sādhāraṇatvāt /
anyo 'pi hi tattathaiva paribhoktuṃ samarthaḥ 		ci'i phyir sems can du ston pa ma yin pa'i don las las skyes pa rnam par smin pa ma yin nam zhe na /
thun mong ba'i phyir te /
de ni gzhan gyis kyang de bzhin du yongs su spyad par nus so /
asādhāraṇastu vipākaḥ rnam par smin pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i ste /
nahyanyakṛtasya karmaṇo 'nyo vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
adhipatiphalaṃ kasmāt pratisaṃvedayate /
sādhāraṇakarmasaṃbhūtatvāt /
niḥṣyando hetusadṛśaḥ 		gzhan gyis byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gzhan gyis myong bar ni med do /
bdag po'i 'bras bu ci'i phyir myong zhe na /
thun mong gi las las byung ba'i phyir ro /
rgyu mthun rgyu dang 'dra ba'o /
hetoryaḥ sadṛśo dharmaḥ sa niṣyandaphalam rgyu dang 'dra ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ste /
tadyathā sabhāgasarvatragahetvoḥ /
yadi sarvatragahetorapi samānaṃ phalaṃ kasmānna sabhāgahetoreveṣyate /
yasmāt bhūmitaḥ kliṣṭatayā cāsya sādṛśyaṃ natu prakārataḥ 		'di lta ste skal ba mnyam pa dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu dag gi lta bu'o /
gal te kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu'i 'bras bu yang 'dra ba yin na go ci'i phyir skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu kho nar mi 'dod ce na /
'di ltar de ni sa dang nyon mongs pa can las 'dra ba yin gyi /
yasya tu prakārato 'pi sādṛśyaṃ so 'bhyupagamyata eva sabhāgahetuḥ rnam pa las kyang 'dra ba ni ma yin no /
gang zhig rnam pa las kyang 'dra ba de ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin par khas len pa nyid do /
atha eva yo yasya sabhāgahetuḥ sarvatragaheturapi sa tasyeti catuṣkoṭikaḥ kriyate de nyid kyi phyir gang zhig gang gi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa de kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu yang yin nam zhe na /
mu bzhir bya ste /
prathamā koṭirasarvatragaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ mu dang po ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni kun tu 'gro ba ma yin pa'o /
dvitīyā 'nyanaikāyikaḥ sarvatragahetuḥ gnyis pa ni ris gzhan pa'i kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu'o /
tṛtīyaikanaikāyikaḥ sarvatragahetuḥ /
caturthyatānākārānsthāpayitveti 		gsum pa ni ris gcig pa'i kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu'o /
bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
visaṃyogaḥ kṣayo dhiyā /
kṣayo nirodhaḥ 		bral ba blo yis zad pa'o /
zad pa ni 'gog pa'o /
dhīḥ prajñā /
tenā pratisaṃkhyā nirodho visaṃyogaphalamityuktaṃ bhavati /
yadvalājjāyate yattatphalaṃ puruṣakārajam 		blo ni shes rab ste /
des na so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni bral ba'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro /
gang gi stobs kyis gang skye ba'i /
tadyathā adharabhūmikasya prayogacittasyoparibhūmikaḥ samādhiḥ sāsravasyānāsravo dhyānacittasya nirmāṇacittamityevamādi /
pratisaṃkhyānirodhastu yadvalāt prāpyata iti vaktavyam 		'bras de skyes bu byed las skyes /
dper na sa 'og ma pa'i sbyor ba'i sems kyis gong ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang zag pa dang bcas pa'i zag pa med pa dang bsam gtan gyi sems kyi sprul pa'i sems so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni gang gi stobs kyis 'thob pa zhes brjod par bya'o /
apūrvaḥ saṃskṛtasyaiva saṃskṛto 'dhipateḥ phalam /
pūrvotpannādanyaḥ saṃskṛto dharmaḥ saṃskṛtasyaiva sarvasyādhipatiphalam 		sngon byung ma yin 'dus byas ni /
'dus byas kho na'i bdag po'i 'bras /
sngar byung ba las gzhan pa'i 'dus byas kyi chos ni 'dus byas thams cad kyi bdag po'i 'bras bu yin no /
puruṣādhipatiphalayoḥ kiṃ nānā kāraṇam skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na /
kartuḥ puruṣakāraphalam skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni byed pa po'i yin no /
akarturapyadhipatiphalam /
tadyathā śilpini śilpaṃ puruṣakāraphalamadhipatiphalaṃ ca 		bdag po'i 'bras bu ni byed pa po ma yin pa'i yang yin te /
'di lta ste /
bzo bo rnams kyi bzo ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yang yin la bdag po'i 'bras bu yang yin no /
anyeṣāmadhipatiphalameva /
athaiṣāṃ hetūnāṃ katammo hetuḥ kasminkāle phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti dadāti vā /
vartamānāḥ phalaṃ pañca gṛhṇanti 		gzhan dag gi ni bdag po'i 'bras bu kho na yin no /
yang rgyu 'di dag las rgyu gang zhig dus gang du 'bras bu 'dzin tam 'byin ce na /
lnga po da ltar 'bras bu 'dzin /
nātītāḥḥ pratigṛhītatvānnāpyanāgatā niṣpuruṣakāratvāt /
kāraṇaheturapyevam /
sa tu nāvaśyaṃ saphala iti nocyate 		yongs su bzung zin pa'i phyir 'das pa rnams kyang ma yin la skyes bu byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang ma yin no /
byed rgyu'i rgyu yang de dang 'dra mod kyi de ni 'bras bu dang bcas par ma nges pas ma brjod do /
dvau prayacchataḥ gnyis ni rab tu 'byin par byed /
sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetū varttamānau phalaṃ prayacchataḥ /
samānakālameva hyanayeḥ phaladānagrahaṇam 		lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag ni da ltar 'bras bu 'byin par byed de /
'di gnyis kyi 'bras bu 'dzin pa dang 'byin pa ni dus mnyam pa kho na yin no /
varttamānābhyatītau dvau da ltar gyi dang 'das pa dag /
phalaṃ prayacchataḥ sabhāgasarvatragahetū 'bras bu 'byin par byed de /
skal ba mnyam pa dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu dag go /
yuktaṃ tāvadyadatītāviti /
atha kathaṃ varttamānau niṣyandaphalaṃ prayacchataḥ 		re zhig gang 'das pa dag ni rigs ni da ltar gyi dag go /
rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar 'byin ce na /
samanantaranivarttanāt /
nivṛtte tu phale tau cābhyatītau bhavataḥ /
phalaṃ cāpi dattaṃ na punastadeva dattaḥ 		mjug thogs su bsgrub pa'i phyir te /
'bras bu grub na ni de dag kyang 'das pa yin la 'bras bu yang byung zin pas yang de nyid mi 'byin to /
asti kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhṇāti na dadātīti catuṣkoṭikaḥ dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'bras bu 'dzin la mi 'byin pa yod dam zhe na /
mu bzhi ste /
prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchindan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti mu dang po ni dge ba'i rtsa bdag kun tu gcod pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba'i thob pa gang dag yin pa'o /
dvitīyā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdadhāno yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate gnyis pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gi nyid mtshams sbyor bas thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa gang dag yin pa'o /
evaṃ tu vaktavyam /
syāttā eva pratisaṃdadhānasya tṛtīyā asamucchinnakuśalamūlasya śeṣāsvavasthāsu /
caturthyatānākārān sthāpayitvā 		'di skad du de dag nyid kyis nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no /
gsum pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu ma chad pa'i gnas skabs lhag ma rnams su'o /
bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
akuśalasya tu prathamā koṭiḥ /
kāmavairāgyamanuprāpnuvan yāḥ prāptīḥ sarvapaścādvijahāti dvitīyā kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇo yāḥ sarvaprathamaṃ pratilabhate 		mi dge ba'i mu dang po ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral pa thob pa dang ldan pas thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba'i thob pa gang dag yin pa'o /
gnyis pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pas thams cad kyi dang por 'thob pa gang dag yin pa'o /
evaṃ tu vaktavyam /
syāttā eva parihīyamāṇasya 		'di skad du de dag nyid kyis yongs su nyams pa'i zhes brjod par bya ba ni yin no /
tṛtīyā kāmāvītarāgasya śeṣāsvavasthāsu /
caturthyatānākārān sthāpayitvā /
evaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtasyāpyarhattvaprāptiparihāṇito yathāyogaṃ yojyam 		gsum pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral pa'i gnas skabs lhag ma rnams su'o /
bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i yang de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang yongs su nyams pa las ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o /
anivṛtāvyākṛtasya paścātpādakaḥ /
yāstāvat dadāti pratigṛhṇātyapi saḥ 		ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i ni tshig phyi ma dang sbyor ba ste /
re zhig 'byin pa gang yin pa ni 'dzin pa yang yin no /
syāt pratigṛhṇāti na dadātyarhataścaramāḥ skndhāḥ 'dzin pa las mi 'byin pa yang yod de /
dgra bcom pa'i phung po tha ma rnams so /
sālambananiyamena tu kṣaṇaśaḥ dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i nges pas ni skad cig re re la ste /
kuśalaḥ sabhāgahetuḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhlāti na dadātīti /
catuṣkokṭikaḥ /
prathamā koṭiḥ kuśalacittānantaraṃ kliṣṭamavyākṛtaṃ vā cittaṃ saṃmukhīkarotīti 		dge ba'i skal pa mnyam pa'i 'bras bu 'dzin la mi 'byin pa zhes bya ba mu bzhi'o /
mu dang po ni dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su nyon mongs pa can nam lung du ma bstan pa'i sems mngon du byed pa'o /
dvitīyā viparyayāt /
tṛtīyā kuśalacittānantaraṃ kuśalameva /
caturthyatānākārān sthāpayitvā /
evamakuśalādayo 'pi yojyāḥ /
kathaṃ punaḥ phalaṃ pratigṛhītaṃ bhavati 		gnyis pa ni bzlog pa'o /
gsum pa ni dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su dge ba kho na'o /
bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
mi dge ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o /
yang ji ltar na 'bras bu gzung ba yin zhe na /
tasya bījabhāvopagamāt /
eko 'tītaḥ prayacchati /
vipākaheturatīta eva phalaṃ prayacchati /
yasmānna saha vā samanantaro vā 'sti vipākaḥ 		de'i sa bon gyi dngos por nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir ro /
gcig ni 'das pas 'byin par 'gyur /
rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni 'das pa kho nas 'bras bu 'byin te /
'di ltar lhan cig gam de ma thag tu rnam par smin pa ni med do /
punaranye caturvidhaṃ phalamāhuḥ gzhan dag ni 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhig tu yang 'chad de /
pratiṣṭhāphalam rten gyi 'bras bu ni /
yathā jalamaṇḍalaṃ vāyumaṇḍalasya yāvattṛṇādayaḥ pṛthivyāḥ 'di lta ste rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis chu'i dkyil 'khor lta bu nas sa gzhi'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i bar lta bu'o /
prayogaphalam /
yathā 'śubhāyā yāvadanutpādajñānam 		sbyor ba'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste mi sdug pa nas mi skye ba shes pa'i bar lta bu'o /
sāmagrīphalam /
yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ cakṣurvijñānādīni 		tshogs pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste /
mig la sogs pa dag gi mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag lta bu'o /
bhāvanāphalam /
yathā rūpāvacarasya cittasya nirmāṇam 		bsgom pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste gzugs na spyod pa'i lam gyi sprul pa'i sems lta bu'o /
etattu puruṣakārādhipatiphalayorantarbhūtam 'di thams cad ni skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag gi khongs su 'dus so /
uktā hetavaḥ phalāni ca /
tatra katame dharmāḥ katibhiḥ hetubhirutpadyanta ityāha samāsata ime caturvidhā dharmāstadyathā kliṣṭā dharmā vipākajāḥ prathamānāsravāstebhyaśca śeṣāḥ 		rgyu rnams dang 'bras bu rnams bshad zin to /
de la chos gang zhig rgyu dag du zhig gis skyed par byed ce na smras pa /
mdor bsdu na chos ni rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag yin te /
'di lta ste chos nyon mongs pa can rnams dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa rnams dang zag pa med pa'i dbang po rnams dang de dag gi lhag ma rnams so /
ke punaḥ śeṣāḥ /
vipākavarjyāḥ avyākṛtāḥ prathamānāsravakṣaṇavarjyāśca kuśalā iti 		lhag ma yang gang dag yin zhe na /
rnam par smin pa las ma gtogs pa'i lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang zag pa med pa'i skad cig ma dang po ma gtogs pa'i dge ba rnams so /
ete caturvidhā dharmāḥ chos rnam pa bzhi po de dag ni /
kliṣṭā vipākajāḥ śeṣāḥ prathamāryā yathākramam nyon mongs can dang rnam smin skyes /
lhag dang dang po 'phags rim bzhin /
vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajāḥ rnam smin kun 'gro de gnyis dang /
skal mnyam ma gtogs lhag las skyes /
kliṣṭā dharmā vipākahetuṃ hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhyo jāyante chos nyon mongs pa can rnams ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ma gtogs pa lhag ma lnga las skye'o /
vipākajā sarvatragahetuṃ hetvā śeṣebhyaḥ pañcabhya eva rnam par smin pa las skyes pa rnams ni kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu ma gtogs pa lhag ma lnga po kho na las skye'o /
śeṣā dharmāstau vipākasarvatragahetū hitvā śeṣebhyaścaturbhryo jāyante chos lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu de dag ma gtogs pa lhag ma bzhi las skye'o /
prathamānāsravāstau ca vipākasarvatragahetū sabhāgahetuṃ ca hitvā śeṣebhyaḥ tribhyo jāyante /
katame ime dharmāścaturvidhā nirdiṣṭā ityāha 		zag pa med pa'i dang po rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu de dag dang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ma gtogs pa lhag ma gsum las skye'o /
chos rnam pa bzhi po bstan pa de dag gang yin snyam pa la /
cittacaittāḥ /
atha ye cittaviprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmāste kathamityāha 		sems dang sems las byung ba yin zhes bya ba smos so /
'o na gang dag sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang gzugs can gyi chos de dag ji lta bu zhe na /
tathā 'nye 'pi saṃprayuktakavarjitāḥ mtshungs ldan ma gtogs gzhan de bzhin /
prayuktakahetunaikena varjitāḥ anye 'pi kliṣṭādayo dharmāstathaivotpadyante yathā cittacaīttāḥ /
tatra kliṣṭāścatubhryo vipākajāśca 		mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu gcig po ma gtogs pa chos nyon mongs pa can la sogs pa gzhan yang sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ji lta ba de kho na bzhin du skye ste /
de la nyon mongs pa can rnams dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa rnams ni bzhi las so /
śeṣāstribhyaḥ prathamānāsravā dvābhyām /
ekahetusaṃbhūto nāsti dharmaḥ /
samāpto hetuvistaraḥ 		lhag ma rnams ni gsum las so /
zag pa med pa'i dang po ni gnyis las te /
rgyu gcig las byung ba'i chos ni med do /
rgyu rgya cher bshad pa rdzogs so /
pratyayāḥ katame rkyen rnams gang zhe na /
catvāraḥ pratyayā uktāḥ rkyen ni bzhi po dag tu gsungs /
kvavoktāḥ /
sūtre /
catasraḥ pratyayatāḥ /
hetupratyayatā samanantarapratyayatā ālambanapratyayatā adhipatipratyayatā ceti /
pratyayajātiḥ pratyayatā /
tatra 		gang nas gsungs she na /
mdo las rkyen nyid ni bzhi ste rgyu'i rkyen nyid dang de ma thag pa'i rkyen nyid dang dmigs pa'i rkyen nyid dang bdag po'i rkyen nyid do zhes gsungs so /
rkyen du 'dra ba ni rkyen nyid do /
hetvākhyaḥ pañca hetavaḥ /
kāraṇahetuvarjyāḥ paṇyca hetavo hetupratyayaḥ 		de la rgyu zhes bya ba rgyu lnga yin; byed rgyu'i rgyu ma gtogs pa rgyu lnga ni rgyu'i rkyen yin no /
cittacaittā acaramā utpannāḥ samanantaraḥ sems dang sems byung skyes pa rnams /
tha ma yin mtshungs de ma thag /
arhataḥ paścimānapāsyotpannāścittacaittāḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ dgra bcom pa'i tham ma gtogs pa sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin te /
samaścāyamanantaraśca pratyaya iti samanantarapratyayaḥ rkyen 'di ni mtshungs pa yang yin la de ma thag pa'i yang yin pas mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen to /
ata eva rūpaṃ na samanantarapratyayo viṣamotpatteḥ /
tathāhi kāmāvacarasya rūpasyānantaraṃ kadācit kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ cāvijñaptirūpamutpadyate kadācitkāmāvacaraṃ cānāsravaṃ ceti vyākulo rūpasaṃmukhībhāvaḥ 		de nyid kyi phyir mi mnyam par 'byung ba'i phyir gzugs ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin te /
'di ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi mjug thogs su res 'ga' ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs 'byung ngo /
res 'ga' ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa 'byung bas gzugs mngon du 'gyur ba 'chol pa yin no /
avyākulastu samanantarapratyayaḥ aniruddha evaikasminnaupa cayikarūpasantāne dvitīyotpatteriti bhadantavasumitraḥ mtshungs pa de ma theg pa'i rkyen ni 'chol pa ma yin no /
btsun pa dbyig bshes na re rgyas pa las byung ba'i gzugs kyi rgyud gcig ma 'gags pa kho nar gnyis pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
alpabahutarotpatteriti bhadantaḥ btsun ba na re ches mang ba dang nyung du 'byung ba'i phyir te /
kadāciddhi mahato rūpādalpamutpadyate res 'ga' ni gzugs mang po las nyung du 'byung ste /
tadyathā palālarāśerbhasma dper na sog ma'i thal ba lta bu'o /
kadācidalpādvahūtpadyate res 'ga' ni nyung du las mang po 'byung ste /
tadyathā vaṭanikāyāḥ krameṇa yāvadanekaśākhāvaroho nyagrodha iti dper na shing pa ta'i sa bon chung du las rim gyis yal ga du ma skye ba dang ldan pa'i shing n+ya gro dha'i bar lta bu'o zhes zer ro /
nanu cāsti caittānā mapyalpabahutarotpattiḥ /
kuśalākuśalāvyākṛteṣu cittesu savitarkasavicārādau ca samādhitraye /
asti jātyantaraṃ prati na svajātim /
nahi kadācidvahutarā vedanotpadyate saṃjñādayo vā /
kiṃ punaḥ svajātereva samanantarapratyayo bhavati 		sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la yang dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dag dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum la chos mang ba dang nyung du 'byung ba ma yin nam zhe na /
rigs gzhan la ni yod kyi rang gi rigs la ni med de /
nam yang tshor ba'am 'du shes la sogs pa ches mang du 'byung ba med do /
yang ci rang gi rigs kho na'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin nam zhe na /
naitadasti /
sakala eva kalāpaḥ sakalasya kalāpāntarasya samanantarapratyayo natvalpakādvedanādidravyāt prabhūtaṃ vedanādi dravyamutpadyata ityetāvadevātrottam 		de ni ma yin te /
'dir ni tshogs mtha' dag kho na tshogs mtha' dag gzhan gyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin gyi /
'dir ni tshor ba la sogs pa'i rdzas nyung ngu las tshor ba la sogs pa'i rdzas mang po 'byung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de tsam zhig bshad par zad do; /
santānasabhāgikāstu manyante svajātereva samanantarapratyayaḥ /
tadyathā cittaṃ cittasyaiva vedanā vedanāyā eveti vistaraḥ /
yadā tvakliṣṭāntaraṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate tasya kleśasya pūrvaniruddhaḥ kleśaḥ samanantarapratyayastadyathā nirodhasamāpatticittaṃ vyutthānacittasyeti 		rgyud 'dra ba dag ni rang gi rigs kho na'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen yin te /
sems kyang sems kho na'i yin la /
tshor ba yang tshor ba kho na'i yin no snyam du rgyas par sems shing gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mjug thogs su nyon mongs pa can 'byung ba'i nyon mongs pa de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni sngon 'gags pa'i nyon mongs pa yin te /
dper na ldang ba'i sems kyi 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems lta bu'o zhes zer te /
tadetanna vatsryate de skad du ni mi brjod do /
prathamānāsravacittānutpattiprasaṅgat cittaviprayuktā api saṃskārāḥ /
ata eva vyākulasaṃmukhībhāvānna samanantarapratyayastraivātukāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ yugapat saṃmukhībhāvāt /
kasmādanāgato neṣyate samanantarapratyayaḥ 		ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams kyang 'chol bar mngon du gyur pa de nyid kyi phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin te /
khams gsum pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams cig car mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
ci'i phyir ma 'ongs pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du mi 'dod ce na /
vyākulatvādanāgatasyādhvanaḥ pūrvottaratā 'bhāvāt ma 'ongs ba'i dus ni 'chol ba yin pa'i phyir te /
snga phyi med pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ tarhi bhagavān jānāti amuṣyānāgatattyānantaramidamanāgataṃ bhāvīti 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa che ge mo zhig gi mjug tu ma 'ongs pa 'di 'byung ngo zhes bya bar ji ltar mkhyen ce na /
atītasāṃpratānumānāt /
atītaṃ kilādhvānaṃ paśyati bhagavānevañjātīyakātkarmaṇaḥ evañjātīyako vīpākaḥ utpanno dharmādvā dharmaḥ /
idaṃ cāpi saṃpratyevañjātīyakaṃ karma /
tasmādato 'pyevañjātīyako vipāka utpatsyate dharmādvā dharma iti jānāti 		'das pa dang da ltar gyi las rjes su dpag pa'i phyir te /
bcom ldan 'das kyis las 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa ni 'di lta bu 'am chos las chos skyes so zhes bya bar 'das pa'i dus gzigs la /
da lta'i las 'di yang de lta bu yin pas /
de lta bas na 'di las kyang rnam par smin pa de lta bu'am /
chos las chos skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mkhyen la /
nacānyat jñānamānumānikaṃ bhavati /
yasmādatītasāṃpratānumānena bhagavān vikīrṇānyanāgatāni dravyāṇi pratyakṣamīkṣitvā jānātyanena pudgalenaivaṃvidhaṃ karma kurvatedamanāgataṃ phalaṃ parigṛhītamiti 		de'i mkhyen pa de yang rjes su dpag pa las byung ba yang ma yin te; 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dang da ltar las rjes su dpag nas ma 'ongs pa'i rdzas 'chol pa rnams mngon sum du brtags te /
gang zag 'dis las 'di lta bu byas pas ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu 'di yongs su bzung ngo zhes bya bar mkhyen to zhes grag go /
evaṃ tarhi bhagavān pūrvāntamadṛṣṭvā 'parāntaṃ na jānīyāt de lta na bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi mtha' ma gzigs par phyi ma'i mtha' mi mkhyen par 'gyur ro /
anye punarāhuḥ /
phalacihnabhūtaḥ sattvānāṃ santatau cittaviprayuktaḥ saṃskāraviśeṣo 'sti yaṃ vyavalokya bhagavānanāgataṃ jānātyasaṃmukhīkṛtvāpi dhyānamabhijñāṃ ceti 		gzhan dag na re sems can rnams kyi rgyud la 'bras bu'i rtags su gyur pa sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed kyi khyad par zhig yod de /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de gzigs nas bsam gtan nam mngon par mkhyen pa mngon du mdzad bzhin du yang ma 'ongs pa mkhyen to zhes zer ro /
naimiktiko hi nāma bhagavān syādevaṃ sati na punaḥ sākṣātkārī /
tasmātsarvamicchāmātreṇa bhagavān jānātīti sautrāntikāḥ 		mdo sde pa rnams na re di ltar na bcom ldan 'das mtshan mkhan kho na yin par 'gyur gyi mngon sum du mdzad pa ni ma yin no /
de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das ni bzhed pa tsam gyis thams cad mkhyen te /
acintyo hi buddhānāṃ buddhiviṣaya ityuktaṃ bhagavatā /
atha asatyanāgatasya kramaniyamāvasthāne kasmādagradharmānantaraṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirevotpadyate nānyo dharmaḥ /
evaṃ yāvadvarjo pamānantaraṃ kṣayajñānamevotpadyate nānyo dharma iti /
yasya yatpratibaddha utpādaḥ sa tasyānantaramutpadyate /
tadyathā vījādīnāmaṅkurādayo vināpi samanantarapratyayeneti 		bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro /
ma 'ongs pa'i go rims nges par gnas pa med na ci'i phyir chos kyi mchog gi mjug thogs su sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa kho na skye'i gzhan ni ma yin no /
de bzhin du rdo rje lta bu'i mjug thogs su zad pa shes pa kho na skye'i gzhan ma yin pa'i bar du yin zhe na /
gang zhig gang la rag las te skye ba de ni de'i mjug thogs su skye ste /
dper na mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen med bzhin du yang sa bon la sogs pa'i myu gu la sogs pa bzhin no /
kasmādarhataścaramāścittacaittā na samanantarapratyayaḥ ci'i phyir dgra bcom pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba tham rnams mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ma yin zhe na /
anyacittāsaṃbandhanāt /
nanu caivaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ cittaṃ mano bhavatītyanantara vijñānābhāvāt mano 'pi caramaṃ cittaṃ na prāpnoti 		sems gzhan dang 'brel pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
de lta na 'gags ma thag pa'i sems yid yin no zhes bya ba de ma thag pa'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir sems tha ma yid du yang mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
āśrayabhāvapratibhāvitaṃ mano na kāritraprabhāvitamityastyevāśrayabhāvaḥ /
kāraṇāntaravaikalyāttu vijñānāntaraṃ notpadyata iti /
kāritraprabhāvitastu samanantarapratyayastena yo dharmaḥ phalaṃ kpratigṛhītaḥ sa sarvairapi dharmaīḥ sarvaprāṇibhirvā na śakyaṃ pratibnddhuṃ yathā notpadyate 		yid ni rten gyi dngos pos rab tu phye ba yin gyi /
byed pas rab tu phye ba ni ma yin pas rten ni yod pa nyid kyi rgyu ma tshang bas rnam par shes pa gzhan mi skye ba kho nar zad do /
mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni byed pas rab tu phye ba yin no /
des chos gang 'bras bur gzung ba de ni chos thams cad dam srog chags thams cad kyis kyang ji ltar yang mi skye bar dgag par mi nus so /
ye dharmāścittasamanantarāścittanirantarā api te /
catuṣkoṭikaḥ /
prathamā koṭiracittakāyāḥ samāpattervyutthāna cittaṃ dvitīyādayaśca samāpattikṣaṇāḥ /
dvitīyā koṭiḥ prathamasya samāpattikṣaṇasya sacittakāyāścāvasthāyā jātyādayaḥ /
tṛtīyā koṭiḥ prathamaḥ samāpattikṣaṇaḥ sacittikā cāvasthā /
caturthī koṭi dvīrtīyādīnāṃ samāpattikṣaṇānāṃ jātyādayo vyutthānacittasya ca 		chos gang dag sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yin pa de dag sems kyi de ma thag pa can yang yin nam zhe na /
mu bzhi ste /
mu dang po ni sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba'i sems dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa dag go /
mu gnyis pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po dang sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi skye ba la sogs pa'o /
mu gsum pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma dang po dang sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs dag go /
mu bzhi pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa dang ldang ba'i sems kyi skye ba la sogs pa'o /
ye dharmāścittasamanantarāḥ samāpattinirantarā api te /
catuṣkoṭikaḥ 		chos gang dag sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can yin pa de dag snyoms par 'jug pa'i de ma thag pa can yin nam zhe na /
mu bzhi ste /
ye tṛtīyāvaturthyau te prathamādvitīye ye prathamādvitīye te tṛtīyācaturthyau karttavye /
kathamidānīṃ dūrāntaravicchinnaṃ vyutthānacittaṃ samāpatticittasya samanantaramityucyate /
cittāntarāvyavahitatvāt 		gsum pa dang bzhi pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni dang po dang gnyis pa dag go /
dang po dang gnyis pa gang dag yin ba de dag ni gsum pa dang bzhi pa gang dag yin par bshad do /
da ni ji ltar ldang ba'i sems yun ring mo zhig tu chad pa snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa zhes bya zhe na /
sems gzhan gyis mchod pa'i phyir ro /
uktaḥḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
ālambanaṃ sarvadharmāḥ 		mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen bshad zin to /
dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad do /
yathāyogaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya sasaṃprayogasya rūpam ci rigs par mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'i ni gzugs so /
śrotravijñānasya śabdaḥ rnam ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ni sgra'o /
grāṇavijñānasya gandhaḥ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ni dri'o /
jihvāvijñānasya rasaḥ /
kāyavijñānasya spraṣṭavyam 		lce'i rnam par shes pa ni ro'o /
lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni reg bya'o /
mannovijñānasya sarvadharmāḥ /
yo dharmo yasya dharmasyālambanaṃ na kadācitsa dharmastaddharmasya nālambanam /
anālambyamāno 'pi tathālakṣaṇatvād /
yathā 'nidhyamānamapīndhanamucyate kāṣṭhādikaṃ tathālakṣāṇatvāditi 		yid kyi rnam bar shes ba ni chos thams cad do /
chos gang zhig chos gang gi dmigs pa yin pa'i chos de ni mi dmigs kyang de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir nam yang dmigs pa ma yin te /
dper na shing la sogs pa mi sreg kyang de lta ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir bud shing zhes bya ba bzhin no /
ta ete cittacaitā dharmā āyatanadravyalakṣaṇaniyamenālambane yathāsvaṃ niyatāḥ /
kimāśrayaniyamenāpi niyatāḥ 		sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos skye mched dang rdzas dang skad cig ma des pas dmigs pa la skad cig bdag nyid ji lta bar nges pa 'di dag ci rten nges pas kyang nges pa zhig yin nam zhe na /
omityāha /
utpannāstvāśrayasahitā anutpannā hyatītā āśrayaviśliṣṭāḥ 		smras pa de bzhin te /
skyes pa rnams ni rten dang lhan cig pa dag yin no /
ma skyes pa rnams dang 'das pa rnams ni rten dang ma 'brel pa dag yin no /
atītā apyāśrayasahitā ityapare /
ukta ālambanapratyayaḥ 		gzhan dag na re 'das pa rnams kyang rten dang lhan cig pa dag yin no zhes zer ro /
dmigs pa'i rkyen bshad zin to /
kāraṇākhyo 'dhipaḥ smṛtaḥ byed rgyu zhes bya bdag por bshad /
ya eva kāraṇahetuḥ sa evā dhipatipratyayaḥ byed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de nyid bdag po'i rkyen yin no /
adhiko 'yaṃ pratyaya ityadhipatipratyayaḥ rkyen 'di ni lhag pa yin pas bdag po'i rkyen to /
ālambanapratyayo 'pi savandharmāḥ adhipatipratyayo 'pīti kimastyādhikyam dmigs pa'i rkyen yang chos thams cad yin la /
bdag po'i rkyen yang chos thams cad yin na 'di la lhag pa ci zhig yod ce na /
na jātu sahabhuvo dharmā ālambanaṃ bhavanti /
bhavanti tvadhipati pratyaya ityasyaivādhikyam 		lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni nam yang dmigs pa ma yin gyi bdag po'i rkyen ni yin pas 'di la lhag pa yod pa nyid do /
adhikasya vā pratyayaḥ yang na lhag pa'i rkyen yin te /
sarvaḥ sarvasya saṃskṛtasya svabhāvavarjyasya chos thams cad rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa'i 'dus byas thams cad kyi yin no /
syāddharmo dharmasya caturbhirapi pratyayairna pratyayaḥ rkyen bzhi char gyis kyang chos kyi rkyen ma yin pa'i chos lta yod dam zhe na /
yod de /
syātsvabhāvaḥ svabhāvasya parabhāvo 'pi /
syātsaṃskṛtamasaṃskṛtasyāsaṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtasya 		rang gi ngo bos rang gi ngo bo lta bu'o /
gzhan gyi ngo po yang yod de /
'dus ma byas kyi 'dus byas lta bu dang 'dus ma byas kyi 'dus ma byas lta bu'o /
athaite pratyayāḥ kāritraṃ kurvantaḥ kimavasthe dharme kurvanti yang rkyen 'di dag bya ba byed pa na gnas skabs gang gi chos la byed ce na /
hetupratyayastāvat pañcavidha uktaḥ /
tatra /
nirudhyamāne kāritraṃ dvī hetū kurutaḥ 		re zhig rgyu'i rkyen rnam pa ldar bshad pa de las /
rgyu gnyis po dag 'gag pa la bya ba byed do /
nirudhyamānaṃ nāma varktamānam /
nirodhābhimukhatvāt /
tatra sahabhūsaṃprayuktakahetu kāritraṃ kurutaḥ 		'gag pa zhes bya ba ni da ltar yin te /
'gag pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir ro /
de la ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag bya ba byed de /
sahotpanne 'pi phale tayorvyāpāraḥ de gnyis ni lhan cig 'byung ba'i 'bras bu la bya ba byed do /
trayaḥ /
jāyamāne /
jāyamānaṃ nāmānāgatamutpādābhimukham 		gsum po ni skye ba la'o /
skye ba zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa ste /
skye ba la mngon du phyogs pa yin no /
tatra sabhāgasarvatragavipākahetavaḥ kāritraṃ kurvanti de la ni skal ba mnyam pa dang kun tu 'gro ba dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu rnams bya ba byed de /
evaṃ tāvaddhetupratyayaḥ re zhig rgyu'i rkyen ni de lta bu yin no /
tato 'nyau tu pratyayau tadviparyayāt /
yena kāritranyāyena hetupratyayau dvidhā kṛtvoktastadviparyayātsamanatarapratyayālambanapratyayau veditavyau 		de las gzhan pa'i rkyen dag de las bzlog pa yin /
mtshungs pa de ma thag pa dang dmigs pa'i rkyen dag ni byed pa'i tshul gang gis rgyu'i rkyen rnam pa gnyis su byas nas bshad pa de las bzlog par rig par bya ste /
samantarapratyayo jāyamāne kāritraṃ karotyavakāśadānāt mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni skabs 'byed pa'i phyir skye ba la bya ba byed do /
ālambanapratyayo nirudhyamāne /
varttamānaiścittacaitairgrahaṇāt /
adhipatipratyayastu sarvasyāmavasthāyāmanāvaraṇabhāvenāvasthita ityetadevāsya kāritram 		dmigs pa'i rkyen ni da ltar gyi sems dang sems las byung pa rnams kyis 'dzin pa'i phyir 'gag pa la bya ba byed do /
bdag po'i rkyen ni gnas skabs thams cad du mi sgrib pa'i ngo por gnas pas 'di'i bya ba ni 'di nyid yin no /
uktāḥ sakāritrāḥ pratyayāḥ rkyen rnams byed pa dang bcas par bshad zin to /
atha katamo dharmaḥ katibhiḥ pratyayairutpadyate /
caturbhiścattacaittā hi /
tatra hetupratyaya eṣāṃ sarve pañca hetavaḥ 		yang chos gang zhig rkyen du zhig gis skyed ce na /
bzhi yis sems dang sems byung rnams /
de la 'di dag rgyu'i rkyen ni rgyu lnga po thams cad do /
samantarapratyayaḥ pūrvakāścittacaittā anyairavyavahitāḥ /
ālambanapratyayo yathāyogaṃ pañca viṣayāḥ sarve dharmāśca 		mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni sems dang sems las byung ba snga ma gzhan dag gi bar du ma chod pa rnams so /
dmigs pa'i rkyen ni ci rigs par yul lnga po dag dang chos thams cad do /
adhipatipratyayaḥ svabhāvarjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ bdag po'i rkyen ni rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa chos thams cad do /
samāpattidvayaṃ tribhiḥ /
nirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattyo rālambanapratyayo nāsti 		gsum gyis snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis /
'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la ni dmigs pa'i rkyen med de /
nahi te ālambike /
hetupratyayastutayordvividho hetuḥ 		de dag ni dmigs par byed pa ma yin no /
de gnyis kyi rgyu'i rkyen ni rnam pa gnyis te /
sahabhūhetuśca jātyādayaḥ sabhāgahetuśca pūrvotpannā samānabhūmikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu ni skye ba la sogs pa'o /
skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni sa mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i chos sngar byung ba rnams so /
samanantarapratyayaḥ sasaṃprayogaṃ samāpatticittam mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'o /
adhipatipratyayaḥ pūrvavat /
cittābhisaṃskārajatvādete samāpattī cittasamanantare 		bdag po'i rkyen ni snga ma bzhin no /
snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa las skye ba'i phyir /
cittotpattivibandhakatvāt na samanantarapratyayaḥ /
dvābhyāmanye tu jāyante /
anye tu viprayuktā rūpiṇaśca dharmā hetvadhipatipratyayābhyāṃ jāyante yathāvihitameva 		sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa can dag ni yin gyi sems skye pa la bgegs byed pa'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni ma yin no /
gzhan ni gnyis po dag las skye /
chos gzhan ldan pa ma yin pa rnams dang gzugs can rnams ni rgyu dang bdag po'i rkyen dag las skye'o /
āha tu pratyayebhyo bhāvā upajāyante na punaḥ sarvasyaiva jagataḥ īśvarapuruṣapradhānādikaṃ kāraṇamiti /
ko 'tra hetuḥ 		dngos po rnams ni ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kho na las skye'i 'gro pa thams cad kyi rgyu gcig pu dbang phyug dang skyes bu dang gtso bo la sogs pa ni med do zhes bya ba 'di la gtan tshigs ci zhig yod /
yadi khalu hetukṛtāṃ siddhiṃ manyase /
nanu ca atha evāsya vādasya vyudāsaḥ prāpnotyekaṃ kāraṇamīśvarādikaṃ sarvasyeti 		gal te gtan tshigs kyis byas pa'i grub par sems na de nyid kyis thams cad kyi rgyu dbang phyug la sogs pa cig car du zhig yin no zhes bya ba'i smra ba 'di pa stsal ba ma yin nam /
apica /
neśvarādeḥ kramādibhiḥ 		gzhan yang /
dbang phyug sogs min rim sogs phyir /
yadi hyekameva kāraṇamīśvaraḥ syādanyadvā yugapatsarveṇa jagatā bhavitavyaṃsyāt gal te dbang phyug gam /
gzhan yang rung ste rgyu gcig pu kho na zhig yin na 'gro ba thams cad cig car du 'byung bar 'gyur pa zhig na /
dṛśyate ca bhāvānāṃ kramasaṃbhavaḥ /
sa tarhi cchandavaśā dīśvarasya syādayamidānīmutpadyatāmayaṃ nirudhyatāmayaṃ paścāditi 		dngos po rnams ni rim gyis 'byung ba yang snang ngo /
de ni 'di ni da ltar skye bar gyur cig /
'di ni 'gag par gyur cig /
'di ni phyis skye bar gyur cig ces dbang phyug gi 'dod pa'i dbang gis yin no /
cchandabhedāttarhi siddhamanekaṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt 'o na ni 'dod pa tha dad pa'i phyir rgyu du mar 'grub par 'gyur la /
sa cāpi cchandarbhedo yugapatsyāttaddhetorīśvarasyābhinnatvāt /
kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇe vā neśvara eva kāraṇaṃ syāt /
teṣāmapi ca kramotpattau kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇādanavasthāprasaṅga syādityanantarabhedāyāḥ kāraṇaparaṃparāyā anāditvābhyupagamādayamīśvarakāraṇādhimuktaḥ śākyayūrvīyameva nyāyaṃ nātivṛttaḥ syāt 		'dod pa tha dad pa de yang de'i rgyu'i dbang phyug la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir cig car 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
'on te rgyu gzhan la ltos na ni dbang phyug rgyu ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur la /
de dag kyang rim gyis skye ba la rgyu gzhan gyi bye brag la ltos pa'i phyir thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur bas rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa thog ma med pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir dbang phyug gi rgyur mos pa 'di ni sh'akya'i sras po'i lus kho na las ma 'das pa yin no /
yogapadye 'pīśvaracchandānāṃ jagato na yaugapadyam gal te dbang phyug gi 'dod pa rnams cig car yin du zin kyang 'gro ba ni cig car ma yin te /
yathācchandamutpādanādi ti cet 'dod pa ji lta bar skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
na /
teṣāṃ paścādviśeṣābhāvāt /
kaśca tāvadīśvarasyeyatā sargaprayāsenārthaḥ /
yadi prītistāṃ tarhi nāntareṇopāye śaktaḥ kartumiti na tasyāmīśvaraḥ syāttathaiva cānyasmin 		de dag la phyis khyad par med pa'i phyir ro /
re zhig dbang phyug gi 'byin pa'i tshegs 'di rnyed la don ci zhig yod /
gal te dga' ba yin no zhe na /
'o na ni thabs med par de byed par mi nus pas de la dbang phyug ma yin par 'gyur te /
yadi ceśvaro narakādiṣu prajāṃ bahubhiścetibhirūpasṛṣṭāṃ sṛṣṭvā tena prīyate namo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāyeśvrāya gzhan la yang de kho na dang 'dra'o /
gal te yang dbang phag dmyal ba la sogs par skye dgu gnod pa mang po dang 'bol pa dag phyung nas des dga' bar 'gyur na ni de lta bu'i dbang phyug de la phyag 'tshal lo /
sugītaścāyaṃ tamārabhya śloko bhavati de las brtsams nas /
gang phyir ma lus sreg pa dang /
yannirdahati yattīkṣṇo yadugro yatpratāpavān /
māṃsaśoṇitamajjādo yattato rudra ucyata iti 		gang phyir rna dang gang phyir gtum /
gang phyir gdung ldan gang gi phyir /
sha dang khrag dang rkang za ba /
de phyir drag po zhes bya'o /
ekaṃ khalvapi jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇatā 'nyeṣāmarthānāṃ pratyakṣaḥ puruṣakāro nihgṛhṇtaḥ syāt /
sahāpi ca kāraṇaiḥ kāraka mīśvaraṃ kalpayatā kevalo bhaktivādaḥ syat 		zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang legs par smras pa yin no /
yang 'gro ba'i rgyu gcig tu yongs su bzung bas don gzhan dag gi skyes bu'i phyed pa mngon sum ni bsnyon par 'gyur ro /
rgyu rnams dang bcas pa'i dbang phyug la yang rgyur rtog pa rnams ni gus pas smra ba 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
kāraṇebhyo 'nyasya tadutpattau vyāpārādarśanāt rgyu rnams las gzhan gyis byed pa mi snang ba'i phyir ro /
sahakāriṣu cānyeṣu kāraṇeṣvīśvaro neśvaraḥ syāt dbang phyug de lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu dang po rnams la yang dbang phyug ma yin par 'gyur ro /
athādisarga īśvarahetukaḥ /
tasyāpyanyānapekṣatvādīśvaravadanāditvaprasaṅga /
evaṃ pradhāne 'pi yathāyogaṃ vācyam 		'on te dang po byung pa dbang phyug gi rgyu las byung ba yin no zhe na /
