de yang rgyu gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir dbang phyug bzhin du thog ma med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro /
de bzhin du gtso bo la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o /
tasmānna lokasyaikaṃ kāraṇamasti /
svānyevaiṣāṃ karmāṇi tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau janayanti 		de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi rgyu gcig pu ni med kyi 'di ni rang gi las rnams kho nas skye ba de dang der skye bar byed do /
akṛtabuddhayastu varākāḥ svaṃ svaṃ vipākaphalaṃ cānubhavanta īśvaramaparaṃ mithyā parikalpayanti nyon mongs blo ma sbyangs pa rnams ni rang rang gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba na log par gzhan dbang phyug tu yongs su rtog par byed do /
de ni rdzogs so /
yang /
gatametadyattu khalu taduktaṃ dvābhyāmanye tu jāyanta iti /
atha kathaṃ bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ hetupratyayaḥ 		gzhan ni gnyis po dag las skye /
zhes gang bshad pa de ji ltar na 'byung ba rnams 'byung ba rnams kyi rgyu'i rkyen yin zhe na /
dvidhā bhūtāni taddhetuḥ de yi 'byung ba rnam pa gnyis /
bhūtaheturityarthaḥ /
sabhāgasahabhūhetubhyāṃ /
bhautikasya tu pañcadhā 		'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
skal ba mnyam pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu dag gis so; /
'byung las gyur pa'i rnam pa lnga /
bhautikasya tu bhūtāni pañcaprakāro hetuḥ byung ba rnams 'byung ba las gyur pa'i ni rgyu rnam pa lnga yin te /
katham /
jananānniḥśrayāt sthānādupastambhogavṛṃhaṇāt 		ji lta zhe na /
skyed phyir brten phyir gnas phyir dang rtog pa'i phyir dang 'phel byed phyir /
so 'yaṃ kāraṇahetureva punaḥ paṇycadhā bhinnaḥ de yang byed rgyu'i rgyu kho na rnam pa lnga tha dad pa yin te /
jananahetustebhya utpatteḥ skyed pa'i rgyu ni de dag las skye pa'i phyir ro /
niśrayaheturjātasya bhūtānuvidhāyitvāt puruṣakāraphalādācāryādiniḥśrayavat brten pa'i rgyu ni skyes pa 'byung ba'i rjes su mthun par byed pa'i phyir te /
slob dpon la sogs pa la brten pa bzhin no /
pratiṣṭhāheturādhārabhāvāt gnas pa'i rgyu ni rten du gyur pa'i phyir te /
citrakṛtyavat ri mo'i rtsig pa bzhin no /
upastambhaheturanucchedahetutvāt /
evameṣāṃ janmavikārādhārasthitivṛddhihetutvamākhyātaṃ bhavati /
tridhā bhautikamanyonyaṃ /
hetusahabhūsabhāgavipākahetubhiḥ kāraṇaheturaviśeṣayattitvāt na sarvadā gaṇyate 		rton pa'i rgyu ni rgyan mi 'chad pa'i rgya yin pa'i phyir ro /
'phel bar byed pa'i rgyu ni 'phel ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir te /
de lta bas na de dag gi skye ba dang 'gyur ba dang brten pa dang gnas pa dang rton pa dang 'phel ba'i rgyu nyid du bstan pa yin no /
'byung 'gyur rnam gsum phan tshun du /
rgyu yin te /
lhan cig 'byung ba dang skal ba mnyam pa dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu dag gis so /
byed rgyu'i rgyu ni bye brag med par 'jug pa'i phyir rtag tu mi bgrang ngo /
tatra sahabhūheturanyonyaṃ cittānuparivartti kāyavākkarma /
nānyadupādāyarūpam 		de la lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu ni lus dang ngag gi las sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa phan tshun du yin gyi rgyur byas pa'i gzugs gzhan ma yin no /
sabhāgahetuḥ sarvaṃ pūrvotpannaṃ sabhāgasya skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ni sngar byung ba thams cad skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no /
vipākaheturyasya vākkarmaṇaścakṣurādayo vipākaḥ /
bhūtānāmekadhaiva tat 		rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni lus dang ngag gi las gang gi rnam par smin pa mig la sogs pa yin pa'o /
'byung ba rnams kyi de rnams gcig /
bhūtānāṃ tu tadbhūtikaṃ rūpaṃ vipākahetureva yasya kāyavākkarmaṇo bhūtāni vipākāḥ 'byung pa las gyur pa'i gzugs 'byung ba rnams kyi ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyu kho na yin te /
lus dang ngag gi las gang gi rnam par smin pa rnams yin pa'o /
abhedena cittacaittāḥ samanantarapratyaya uktā niyamastu noktaḥ kasya cittasyānantaraṃ kasyotpaktiriti /
sa idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ /
tatra tāvat samāsena dvādaśa cittāni 		sems dang sems las byung ba rnams bye brag med par mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du bshad kyi /
sems gang gi mjug thogs su gang 'byung zhes bya ba nges pa ni ma bshad pas da ni de brjod par bya'o /
de la re zhig mdor bsdu na sems bcu gnyis so /
kimarthamityāha ji lta zhe na /
kuśalākuśalaṃ kāme nivṛtānivṛtaṃ manaḥ /
kāmadhātau catvāri cittāni 		'dod yid dge dang mi dge dang /
bsgribs pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa /
zhes bya ba smos te /
'dod pa'i khams na sems bzhi ste /
kuśalamakuśalaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtamanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca dge ba dang mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o /
rūpārūpyeṣvakuśalādanyatra gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag na /
mi dge las gzhan /
rūpadhātāvakuśalaṃ nāsti /
trīṇi santi 		gzugs kyi khams na mi dge ba med kyi gsum yod do /
evamārūpyadhātau /
ityetāni sānusravāṇi daśa cittāni bhavanti 		gzugs med pa'i khams na yang de dang 'dra ste /
de ltar na bcu po de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems yin no /
anāsravaṃ dvidhā /
śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /
evametāni dvādaśa cittāni bhavanti /
tatra 		zag med gnyis /
slob pa dang mi slob pa ste /
de ltar na de dag ni sems bcu gnyis yin no /
de la /
kāme nava śubhāccittāccittāni /
anantaramiti paścādvakṣyati /
kāmadhātau yatkuśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaraṃ nava cittānyutpadyante 		'dod sems dag pa las sems dgu /
mjug thogs su zhes 'og nas 'chad de /
'dod pa'i khams na dge ba'i sems gang yin pa de'i mjug thogs su ni sems dgu 'byung ste /
svabhūmikāni catvāri /
rūpāvacare dve 		rang gi sa pa bzhi dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dang gzugs na spyod pa gnyis te /
samāpattikāle kuśalaṃ pratisandhikāle nivṛtam snyoms bar 'jug pa'i tshe dge ba dang nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe bsgribs pa'o /
ārūpyāvacaraṃ nivṛtameva pratisandhikāle gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe bsgribs pa kho na ste /
ativiprakṛṣṭatvāt na kuśalam shin tu bskal pa'i phyir dge ba ni ma yin no /
ārūpyā hi kāmadhātoścatasṛbhirdūratābhirdūre /
āśrayākārālambanapratipakṣadūratābhiḥ /
śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ceti /
aṣṭābhya eva tat /
tatra punaḥ kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ cittamaṣṭābhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /
svabhūmikebhyaścaturbhyo rūpāvacarābhyāṃ dvābhyām /
kuśalācca vyutthānakāle /
nivṛtācca kliṣṭasamāpattyutpīḍitasyādhārakuśalabhūmisaṃśrayaṇāt /
śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca vyutthānakāle /
daśabhyo 'kuśalaṃ /
śaikṣāśaikṣe hitvā kāmadhātau hi pratisandhimukhataḥ sarvebhyo rūpārūpyacittebhyaḥ samanantaramakuśalaṃ cittamutpadyate /
tasmāccatvāri /
akuśalāccittāt samanantaraṃ cittānyutpadyante svabhūmikānyeva /
yathā 'kuśalamuktaṃ kāmadhātau /
nivṛtaṃ tathā /
daśabhya eva samanantaram /
tasmācca punaścatvāryeva 		gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nas ring ba yin te /
rten dang rnam pa dang dmigs pa dang gnyen po ring ba nyid dag gis so /
de la rten ring ba nyid ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi rten nyid du mi srid pa'i phyir ro /
rnam par ring ba nyid ni 'dod pa'i khams rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag tu rnam par mi byed pa'i phyir ro /
des na dmigs pa ring ba nyid kyang bshad pa yin te /
bsam gtan bzhi pa kho na la rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag tu dmigs so /
gnyen po ring ba nyid ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ma bral ba la de mngon du 'gyur mi srid pa'i phyir ro /
rnam par sun 'byin pa la sogs pa yang mi 'thad pa'i phyir te /
yul ma yin pa ni rnam par sun dbyung bar mi nus so /
slob pa dang mi slob pa'o /
de ni brgyad po kho na las 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems de ni brgyad kyi mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
rang gi sa pa bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa gnyis las te /
ldang ba'i tshe dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can gyi snyoms par 'jug pas gzir ba sa 'og ma'i dge ba la brten pa'i phyir bsgribs pa dang ldang ba'i tshe slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so /
mi dge ba ni bcu dag las /
slob pa dang mi slob pa dag ma gtogs te /
'dod pa'i khams su nying mtshams sbyor ba na gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i sems thams cad kyi mjug thogs su mi dge ba'i sems 'byung ngo /
de las bzhi ste /
mi dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su ni sems bzhi 'byung ste /
rang gi sa pa dag kho na'o /
ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi mi dge ba'i sems bshad pa /
bsgribs de bzhin /
bcu po kho na'i mjug thogs su 'byung la; de las ni bzhi kho na'o /
pañcabhyo 'nivṛtaṃ ma bsgribs pa ni lnga dag las /
kāma iti varttate /
anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ cittaṃ pañcabhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /
svabhūmikebhya ścaturbhyo rūpāvacarācca kuśalānnirmāṇacittam /
tasmātsapta cittānyanantaram 		'dod pa na zhes bya bar sbyar te /
ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems ni lnga'i mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
rang gi sa pa bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba las sprul pa'i sems so /
de las mjug thogs sems bdun no /
anivṛtāvyākṛṭātkāmāvacarātsvabhūmikāni catvāri /
rūpāvacare dve /
kuśalaṃ nirmāṇacittādanantaram 		'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pas las ni rang gi sa pa bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa gnyis te /
kliṣṭam pratisandhikāle /
ārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kliṣṭam pratisandhikāla eva /
rūpe daśaikaṃ ca śubhāt /
rūpe dhātau yatkukśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaramekādaśa cittānyutpadyante 		sprul pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su dge ba dang nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa can dang nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can kho na'o /
gzugs na dge ba las bcu gcig go /
gzugs kyi khams na dge ba'i sems gang yin pa de'i mjug thogs su sems bcu gcig kho na 'byung ste /
ārupyāvacaramanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ varjayitvā /
navabhyastadanantaram /
rūpāvacaraṃ tu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ navabhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate 		gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so /
de ni dgu yi mjug thogs su /
gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems de ni dgu'i mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayamārupyāvacaraṃ cānivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ hitvā 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so; /
aṣṭābhyo nivṛtaṃ /
nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ cittamaṣṭabhya utpadyate 		bsgribs pa brgyad las /
gzugs na spyod pa'i sems bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni brgyad las 'byung ste /
kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayaṃ śaikṣāśaikṣe ca sthāpayitvā 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis dang slob pa dang mi slob pa gnyis ma gtogs so /
tasmāt ṣaṭ /
rūpāvacarānnivṛtāvyākṛtādanantaraṃ ṣaṭ /
svabhūmikāni trīṇi kāmāvacarāṇi cānivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ muktvā 		de las drug gzugs na spyod pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i mjug thogs su ni drug ste /
rang gi sa pa gsum dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs pa rnams so /
tribhyo 'nivṛtaṃ punaḥ /
rūpāvacaramanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ tribhyaḥ svabhūmikebhya eva 		ma bsgribs pa ni gsum las so /
gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni gsum kho na las 'byung ste /
tasmāt ṣaṭ /
svabhūmikāni trīṇi 		rang gi sa pa dag kho na las so /
de las drug ste /
kāmāvacare ca kliṣṭe /
ārūpyāvacaraṃ ca /
yathā rūpadhātāvanivṛtāvyākṛtamuktam /
evamārūpye tasya nītiḥ /
tatastadapyanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ tribhya evotpadyate svabhūmikebhyaḥ /
tasmādapi ca ṣaḍevotpadyante /
svabhūmikāni trīṇi adharadhātukāni ca kliṣṭāni 		rang gi sa pa gsum dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can no /
gzugs kyi khams kyi ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ji skad du bshad pa ltar; gzugs med pa'ang de'i tshul lo /
de na yod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rang gi sa pa gsum kho na las 'byung la /
de las kyang rang gi sa pa gsum dang sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams dang drug 'byung ngo /
śubhātpunaḥ /
nava cittāni 		dge ba las sems dgu dag go /
ārūpyāvacarātṛ kukśalānnava cittānyutpadyante gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge pa'i sems las ni sems dgu 'byung ste /
kāmāvacaraṃ kukśalaṃ kāmarūpāvacare cānivṛtāvyākṛte hitvā /
tat ṣaṇṇāṃ 		'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dang 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag ma gtogs so /
de drug gi /
ārūpyāvacaraṃ kukśalaṃ svebhyastribhyo rūpāvacarāt kukśalācchaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba ni rang gi sa pa gsum dang gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so /
nivṛtātsapta /
ārūpyāvacarānnivṛtātsvabhūmikāni trīṇi rūpāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ nivṛtaṃ ca kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayam /
tattathā /
tadapi saptabhya evotpadyate 		bsgribs pa las bdun /
gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i bsgribs pa las ni rang gi sa pa gsum dang gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba dang bsgribs pa dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis so /
de de bzhin /
de yang bdun kho na las 'byung ste /
kāmarūpāvacarāṇi kliṣṭāni śaikṣāśaikṣe ca hitvā /
caturbhyaḥ śaikṣam /
traidhātukebhyaḥ kuśalebhyaḥ śaikṣācca /
asmāttu pañca /
tānyeva catvāryaśaikṣaṃ ca /
aśaikṣaṃ tu pañcakāt 		'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag ma gtogs so /
slob pa bzhi las /
khams gsum pa'i dge ba dang slob pa las so /
de las lnga /
bzhi po de dag nyid dang; mi slob pa'o /
mi slob pa ni lnga las so /
ata evānantaroktāt /
tasmāccatvāri cittāni /
tasmātpunaraśaikṣāccittātsamanantaraṃ catvāri cittānyutpadyante /
traidhātukāni kuśalānyaśaikṣaṃ ca /
samāptāni dvādaśa cittāni 		bshad ma thag pa'i lnga po de nyid las so /
de las sems ni bzhi dag go /
mi slob pa'i sems de'i mjug thogs su ni sems bzhi 'byung ste /
khams gsum pa'i dge ba dang mi slob pa'o /
sems bcu gnyis rdzogs so /
punaḥ kriyante /
dvādaśaitāni viṃśatiḥ 		yang bcu gnyis de dag nyi shur yang bshad de /
kathaṃ kṛtvā ji ltar byas nas she na /
prāyogikopapattyāptaṃ śubhaṃ bhittvā triṣu dvidhā gsum du skyes nas thob pa dang /
sbyor byung dge rnams gnyis phye nas /
triṣu dhātuṣu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ dvidhā bhidyate /
prāyogikaṃ copapattilābhikaṃ ca 		khams gsum po dag tu skyes nas thob pa dang sbyor ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i sems rnam pa gnyis su dbye'o /
vipākajaiyapithikaśailpasthānikanairmitam rnam smin skyes dang spyod lam pa /
bzo yi gnas dang sprul pa dang /
caturdhā 'vyākṛtaṃ kāme 'dod na lung bstan min rnam bzhir /
bhittveti varttate phye nas zhes bya bar sbyar te /
kāmāvacaramanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ caturdhā bhidyate /
vipākajamairyāpathikaṃ śelpasthānikaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ ca 		'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa la ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa dang sprul pa'i sems dang rnam pa bzhir dbye'o /
rūpe śilpavivarjitam gzugs na bzo ma gtogs pa'o /
rūpadhātau tridhā bhidyate śailpasthānikaṃ varjayitvā /
tatra śilpābhāvāt 		gzugs kyi khams ni rnam pa gsum dbye ste /
de na bzo med pa'i phyir bzo'i gnas pa ma gtogs so /
evametāni dvādaśa cittāni punarviśartirbharvanti /
ṣoḍhā kuśalamanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca saptadhā bhidyate /
airyāpathikādīni cittānīryāpathādyabhāvādārūpyadhātau na santi /
rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyānyeṣāmālambanam /
śailpasthānikasya tu śabdo 'pi /
etāni manovijñānānyeva /
pañca tu vijñānakāyā airyāpathikaśailpasthānikayoḥ prāyogikāḥ 		de ltar na sems bcu gnyis po de dag ni yang dge ba drug dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa bdun du phye nas nyi shur 'gyur ro /
gzugs med pa'i khams na ni spyod lam la sogs pa med pa'i phyir spyod lam pa la sogs pa'i sems med do /
de dag gi dmigs pa ni gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams yin no /
bzo'i gnas pa ni sgra yang yin no /
yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag kho na yin no /
spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa dag gi sbyor ba pa ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga yin no /
airyāpathikābhinirhṛtaṃ manovijñānamasti dvādaśāyatanālambananityapare /
eṣāṃ punarviśatekścittānāṃ kasya katamatsamanantaram /
kāmāvacarāṇāṃ tāvadaṣṭānāṃ prāyogikānantaraṃ daśa cittānyutpadyante /
svabhūmikāni saptā 'nyatrābhijñāphalāt /
rūpāvacaraṃ prāyogikaṃ śaikṣalmaśaikṣaṃ ca /
tat punaraṣṭacittānantaram 		gzhan dag na re bzo'i gnas pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis la dmigs pa yang yod do zhes zer ro /
yang sems nyi shu po 'di dag las gang gi mjug thogs su gang zhig 'byung zhe na /
re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i brgyad las sbyor ba las byung ba'i mjug thogs su ni sems bcu 'byung ste /
mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gis pa bdun dang gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang slob pa dang mi slob pa'o /
de ni brgyad kyi mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
svebhyaḥ kuśalakliṣṭebhyaḥ rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogika kliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
upapattipratilambhikānantaraṃ nava /
svabhūmikāni sapta 'nyatrābhijñāphalādrūpā rūpāvacare ca kliṣṭe /
tat punarekādaśānantaram 		rang gi dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag dang gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so /
skyes nas thob pa'i mjug thogs su ni dgu ste /
mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi sa pa bdun dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go /
de ni bcu gcig gi mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
svebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvavat rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
akuśala nivṛttāvyākṛtānantaraṃ sapta 		snga ma bzhin du rang gi bdun dang gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so /
mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i mjug thogs su ni bdun te /
svānyeva pūrvavat /
te punaścaturdaśacittānantaram 		snga ma bzhin du rang gi dag kho na'o /
de dag ni sems bcu bzhi'i mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
svebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ rūpāvacarebhyaścaturbhyo 'nyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyām /
ārupyāvacarebhyastribhyo 'nyatra prāyogikāt 		rang gi bdun dang sbyor ba las byung ba dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs pa gzugs na spyod pa bzhi dang sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa na spyod pa gsum las so /
airyāpathikavipākajānantaramaṣṭau /
svabhūmikāni ṣaḍanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ rūpārupyāvacāre ca kliṣṭe 		spyod lam pa dang; rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mjug thogs su ni brgyad de /
sbyor ba las byung ba dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs pa rang gi sa pa drug dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go /
te punaḥ saptacittānantaraṃ svebhya eva pūrvavat de dag ni sems bdun gyi mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
snga ma bzhin du rang gi bdun kho na las so /
śailpasthānikānantaraṃ ṣaṭ bzo'i gnas pa'i mjug thogs su ni drug ste /
svānyevānyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyām /
tat punaḥ saptānantaraṃ svebhya evānyatrābhijñāphalāt 		sbyor ba las byung ba dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs pa rang gi rnams kho na'o /
de ni bdun gyi mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi dag kho na las so /
abhijñāphalānantaraṃ dve /
svaṃ cābhijñāphalameva /
rūpāvacaraṃ ca prāyogikam /
tadapyasmādeva dvayāt 		mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i mjug thogs su ni gnyis te /
mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dang rang gi drug dang gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'o /
de yang de gnyis kho na las so /
rūpāvacarāṇāmidānīṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ vakṣāmaḥ /
prāyogikānantaraṃ dvādaśa /
kāmāvacare kuśale abhijñāphalaṃ ca svāni ṣaṭ ārupyāvacaraṃ ca prāyogikaṃśaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /
tat punardaśacittānantaram 		da ni gzugs na spyod pa'i drug gi brjod par bya ste /
sbyor ba las byung ba'i mjug thogs su ni bcu gnyis te /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dag dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dang rang gi drug dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang slob pa dang mi slob pa'o /
de na sems bcu'i mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
kāmāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ svebhyaścaturbhyo 'nyatreryāpathikavipākajābhyāmārūpyāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
upapattipratilambhikānantaramaṣṭau 		'dod pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag dang spyod lam pa dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i dag ma gtogs pa rang gi bzhi dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs ba can dag dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so /
skyes nas thob pa'i mjug thogs su ni brgyad de /
kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni pañcānyatrābhijñāphalāt ārupyāvacaraṃ kliṣṭam 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi lnga dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can no /
tat punaḥ pañcabhyaḥ svebhyaḥ evānyatrābhijñāphalāt de ni lnga las te /
mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi dag kho na las so /
kliṣṭānantaraṃ nava /
kāmāvacarāṇi catvāri kuśalakliṣṭāni svāni pañcānyatrābhijñāphalāt /
tat punarekādaśacittānantaram 		nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su ni dgu ste /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dag dang nyon mongs pa can dag ste bzhi dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi lnga'o /
de ni sems bcu gcig gi mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
kāmāvacarebhya utpattipratilambhikairyāpathika vipākajebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ pañcabhyo 'nyatrābhijñāphalāt ārūpyāvacarebhyastribhyo 'nyatra prāyogikāt /
airyāpathikānantaraṃ sapta 		'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa dang spyod lam pa dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi lnga dang sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa na spyod pa gsum las so /
spyod lam pa'i mjug thogs su ni bdun te /
kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni catvāryanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāmārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kliṣṭam 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag dang sbyor ba las byung ba dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi bzhi dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can no /
tat punaḥ paṇycānantaraṃ svebhya evānyatrābhijñāphalāt de ni lnga'i mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi dag kho na las so /
evaṃ vipākajaṃ vaktavyam /
abhijñāphalānantaraṃ dve /
sve eva prāyogikābhijñāphale /
tadapyābhyāmeva /
ārūpyāvacarāṇāmidānīṃ caturṇāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
prāyogikānantaraṃ sapta /
rūpāvacaraṃ prāyogikaṃ svāni catvāri śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /
tat punaḥ ṣaṭcittānantaram 		rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yang de dang 'dra bar brjod par bya'o /
mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i mjug thogs su ni gnyis te /
rang gi sbyor ba las byung ba dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag kho na'o /
de yang de dag kho na las so /
da ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i bzhi brjod par bya ste /
sbyor ba las byung ba'i mjug thogs su ni bdun te /
gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang; rang gi bzhi dang slob pa dang mi slob pa'o /
de ni sems drug gi mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
rūpāvacarāt prāyogikātsvebhyastribhyo 'nyatra vīpākajāt śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
upapattiprātilambhikānantaraṃ sapta /
svāni catvāryadharabhūmikāni ca kliṣṭāni 		gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ma gtogs pa rang gi gsum dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so /
skyes nas thob pa'i mjug thogs su ni bdun te /
rang gi bzhi dang sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go /
tat punaścaturbhyaḥ svebhya eva de ni bzhi las te /
rang gi dag kho na las so /
kliṣṭānantaramṣṭau /
svāni catvāri rūpāvacare prāyogikakliṣṭe kāmāvacāre kliṣṭe /
tat punardaśānantaram 		nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su ni brgyad de /
rang gi bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go /
de ni bcu'i 'jug thogs su 'byung ste /
svebhyaścaturbhyaḥ kāmāvacararūpāvacarebhyaścopapattiprātiṃlambhikairyāpathikavipākajebhyaḥ rang gi bzhi dang 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i skye gnas thob pa dang spyod lam pa dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag las so /
vipākajānantaraṃ ṣaṭ /
svāni trīṇyanyatra prāyogikādadharāṇi trīṇi kliṣṭāni 		rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mjug thogs su ni drug ste /
sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa rang gi gsum dang 'og ma'i nyon mongs pa can gsum mo /
tat punaścaturbhyaḥ svebhya eva /
śaikṣānantaraṃ ṣaṭ /
traidhātukāni prāyogikāṇi kāmāvacaramupapattipratilambhikaṃ śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /
tat punaścaturbhyaḥ /
prāyogikebhyaḥ tribhyaḥ śaikṣācca 		de ni bzhi las te /
rang gi dag kho na las so /
slob pa'i mjug thogs su ni drug ste /
khams gsum pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba rnams dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skye gnas thob pa dang slob pa dang mi slob pa'o /
de ni bzhi las te /
sbyor ba las byung ba gsum dang slob pa las so /
aśaikṣānantaraṃ pañca mi slob pa'i mjug thogs su ni lnga ste /
yathā śaikṣānantaraṃ śaikṣamekaṃ hitvā /
tat punaḥ pañcabhyaḥ /
tribhyaḥ prāyogikebhyaḥ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ceti 		slob pa gcig pu ma gtogs pa slob pa'i mjug thogs ji lta ba bzhin du /
de ni lnga las te /
sbyor ba las byung ba gsum dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prāyogikacittānantaraṃ vīpākajaiyāpathikaśailpasthānikānicittānyutpadyante na punrebhyaḥ prāyogikam ci'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa'i sems dag 'byung la /
sbyor ba las byung ba ni de dag las ma yin zhe na /
īryāpathaśilpābhisaṃskaraṇapravṛttatvāt durbalānabhisaṃskāravāhitvāccaittāni na prāyogikānukūlāni de dag ni spyod lam dang bzo mngon par 'du bya ba la zhugs pa'i phyir dang stobs chung ba dang mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pa'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin no /
niṣkramaṇacittaṃ tvanabhiskāravāhīti yukto 'sya prāyogikacittānantaramutpādaḥ /
evaṃ tarhi kliṣṭebhyo 'pi prāyogikaṃ notpadyate /
viguṇatvāt /
tathāpi kleśasamudācāraparikhinnasya tatparijñānadyuktaḥ prāyogikasaṃmukhībhāvaḥ /
kāmāvacaramupapattipratilambhikaṃ paṭutvāt śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ rūpāvacaraprāyogikāccānantaramutpadyate /
anabhisaṃskāravāhitvāttasmādetāni notpadyante 		'byung ba'i sems ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pas de ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su 'byung bar rigs so /
de lta na 'o na ni nyon mongs pa can dag las kyang sbyor ba las byung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
mi mthun pa'i phyir ro /
'on kyang nyon mongs pa kun tu 'byung bas yongs su skyo ba la ni de yongs su shes pa las sbyor ba las byung ba mngon du 'gyur bar rigs so /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i skye gnas thob pa la ni gsal ba'i phyir slob pa dang mi slob pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i mjug thogs su 'byung gi mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'byung ba'i phyir de las ni de dag mi 'byung ngo /
rūpāvacarakilaṣṭānantaraṃ kāmāvacaramupapattipratilambhikamutpadyate /
paṭutvāt /
ārūpyāvacarakliṣṭānantaraṃ tu rūpāvacaramupapattipratilambhikaṃ notpadyate 'paṭutvāditi 		gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skye gnas thob pa 'byung ste /
gsal ba'i phyir ro /
gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su ni gzugs na spyod pa'i skye gnas thob pa mi 'byung ste /
mi gsal ba'i phyir ro /
trayo manaskārāḥ yid la byed pa ni gsum ste /
svalakṣaṇamanaskāraḥ /
tadyathā rūpaṇālakṣaṇaṃ rūpamityevamādi 		rang gi mtshan nyid yid la byed pa ni dper na gzugs ni gnod par byar rung ba'i mtshan nyid can no snyam pa de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
sāmānyalakṣaṇamanaskāraḥ /
ṣoḍaśākārasaṃprayuktaḥ 		spyi'i mtshan nyid yid la byed pa ni rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'o; /
adhimuktimanaskāraḥ /
aśubhāpramāṇārūpyavimokṣābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanādiṣu /
trividhamanaskārānantaramāryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti tasmādapi trividhaṃ māskāram evaṃ sati yutamidaṃ bhavati aśubhāsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅga bhāvayatīti /
sāmānyamanaskārānantaramevāryamārga saṃmukhīkaroti /
tasmāttu trividhamityapare 		mos pa yid la byed pa ni mi sdug pa dang tshad med pa dang gzugs can gyi rnam par thar pa dang zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang zad par gyi skye mched la sogs pa dag la'o /
de la yid la byed pa rnam pa gsum gyi mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed la /
de las kyang yid la byed pa rnam pa gsum ste /
de lta na mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa'i dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgom par byed do zhes bya ba 'di rigs pa yin no /
gzhan dag na re spyi yid la byed pa kho na'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed la /
de las ni rnam pa gsum ste /
aśubhayā tu cittaṃ damayitvā sāmānyamanaskārānantaraṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti /
ataḥ pāraṃparyamabhisaṃdhāyoktam aśubhāsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃvodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayatīti /
āryamārgānantaramapi sāmānyamanaskāramevetyapare /
syāttāvadanāgamyāditribhūmisaṃniḥśrayeṇa niyāmāvakrāntau tanmārgānantaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ sāmānyamanaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkuryād /
atha dvitīyādidhyānasaṃniḥśrayeṇa niyāmā vakrāntau katham /
nahi kāmāvacaraḥ śakyo 'tiviprakṛṣṭatvāt /
naca tadbhūmikaḥ pratilabdho 'nyatra nirvedhabhāgīyāt 		mi sdug pas sems btul nas spyi yid la byed pa'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed pa de'i phyir brgyud pa las dgongs nas mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa'i dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag sgom par byed do zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro /
gzhan dag na re 'phags pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su yang spyi yid la byed pa kho na'o zhes zer ro /
re zhig mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs pas gsum la brten nas nges pa la 'jug na ni lam de rnams kyi mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyi yid la byed pa mngon du byed pa par 'gyur na /
gal te bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa la brten nas nges pa la 'jug na go ji ltar te /
shin tu bskal pa'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa ni mi nus so /
nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs par de dag gis pa yang mi thob bo /
nacāryo nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ punaḥ saṃmukhīkaroti 'phags pa ni yang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa mngon du mdzad pa yang ma yin te /
nahi prāptaphalasya tatprayogasaṃmukhībhāvo yukta iti anyo 'pyasya tajjātīyaḥ sāmānyamanaskāro bhāvanāṃ gacchati /
tadyathā sarvasaṃkārā anityāḥ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti tatsaṃmukhī kariṣyati 		'bras bu thob zin pa de'i sbyor ba mngon du byed pa ni rigs pa ma yin no /
des ni de dang 'dra ba'i spyi yid la byed pa gzhan yang 'di lta ste; 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o /
chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o /
mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam pa 'thob par 'gyur te /
tadetanna varṇayanti /
anāgamyaṃ niśrityārhattvaṃ prāpnuvataḥ tadbhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ vā vyutthānaṃ cittam 		de mngon du byed par 'gyur ro /
de skad du ni mi brjod do /
mi lcogs pa med pa la brten nas dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa'i ldang ba'i sems ni de'i sa pa'am 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no /
ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ niśritya tadbhūmikaṃ bhāvāgrikaṃ vā ci yang med pa'i skye mched la brten nas 'thob pa ni de'i sa pa'am srid pa'i rtse mo pa yin no /
śeṣāsu svabhūmikameva sa lhag ma rnams su ni rang gi sa pa kho na'o /
kāmadhātau trayo manaskārāḥ śrutacintāmayopapattipratilambhikāḥ 'dod pa'i khams na ni yid la byed pa gsum ste /
thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba dang skyes nas thob pa rnams so /
bhāvanāmayo nāsti gzugs kyi khams na ni gsum ste /
rūpadhātau trayaḥ śrutabhāvanāmayopapattipratilambhikāḥ thob pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba dang skyes nas thob pa rnams so /
cintāmayo nāsti bsams pa las byung ba ni med do /
yadā cintamitumārabhante tadaiṣāṃ samādhirevopatiṣṭhate gang gi tshe de dag sems par rtsom pa de'i tshe de dag gi ting nge 'dzin kho na nye bar gnas pa yin no /
ārūpyadhātau bhāvanāmayopapattipratilambhikau /
tatra pañcavidhamanaskārānantaramāryamārgasaṃmukhībhāvo 'nyatropapattipratilabhbhikebhyaḥ /
prayogapratibaddhatvāt /
mārgānantaraṃ tūpapattipratilambhikasyāpi kāmāvacarasya saṃmukhībhāvaḥ /
paṭutvāditi /
yāni dvādaśa cittāni uktānyeṣāṃ katamasmiṃścitte katīnāṃ lābhaḥ 		gzugs med pa'i khams na ni bsgoms pa las byung ba dang skyes nas thob pa dag go /
de la skyes nas thob pa dag ma gtogs pa yid la byed pa rnam pa lnga'i mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam mngon du 'gyur te /
sbyor ba la rag lus pa'i phyir ro /
lam gyi mjug thogs su ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa yang mngon du 'gyur te /
gsal ba'i phyir ro /
gang dag sems bcu gnyis bshad pa de dag las sems gang la du zhig rnyed ce na /
kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ khams gsum pa yi nyon mongs can /
drug dang drug dang gnyis rnyed do /
kāmāvacare kliṣṭe citte saṃmukhībhūte ṣaṇṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhaḥ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mngon du gyur na /
sems drug po 'di dag dang mi ldan pa las rnyed de /
tairsamanvāgatasya kāmāvacarasya kuśalasya vicikitsayā kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānāddhātupratyāgamanācca /
akuśalanivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ rūpāvacarasya ca kliṣṭasya dhātupratyāgamanāt parihāṇitaśca 		the tshom gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba dang khams su slar ldog pa las 'dod pa'i khams kyi dge ba dang khams su slar ldog pa dang yongs su nyams pa las mi dge ba dang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang slob pa'o /
ārūpyāvacarasya kliṣṭasya parihāṇitaḥ śekṣasya ca /
rūpāvacare 'pi klilṣṭe ṣaṇṇāṃ lābhaḥ /
rūpāvacarāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ kāmāvacarasya cānivṛtāvyākṛtasya dhātupratyāgamanāt /
ārūpyāvacarasya kliṣṭasya śaikṣasya ca parihāṇitaḥ 		gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la yang drug rnyed de /
khams su slar log pa las gzugs na spyod pa gsum dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang slob pa'o /
ārūpyāvacare tu kliṣṭe dvayorlābhaḥ /
parihāṇitastasyaiva kliṣṭasya śaikṣasya ca /
śubhe 		gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la ni gnyis rnyed de /
yongs su nyams pa las nyon mongs pa can de nyid dang slob pa'o /
trayāṇāṃ rūpaje /
rūpāvacare kuśale trayāṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhastasyaiva kuśalasya kāmarūpāvacarayoścānivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ /
śaikṣe caturṇāṃ /
tasyaiva śaikṣasya kāmarūpāvacarayoścānivṛtāvyākṛtayorārūpyāvacārasya ca kuśalasya /
āryamārgeṇa kāmarūpadhātuvairāgye 		gzugs skyes dge la gsum dag go /
gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba la sems gsum rnyed de /
dge ba de nyid dang 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag go /
slob pa la bzhi /
slob pa de nyid dang 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang gzugs med pa'i dge ba'o /
tasya śeṣite lhag ma de /
śeṣaṃ kṛtaṃ śeṣitam /
yatra citte lābhho na vyākhyātastatra tasyaiva lābho draṣṭavyo nānyasya 		lhag mar byas pas lhag ma ste /
sems gang la rnyed pa ma bshad pa de la ni de nyid rnyed par blta bar bya'o /
anye punarabhedenāhuḥ /
kliṣṭe citte navānāṃ hi lābhaḥ ityucyate budhaiḥ 		gzhan dag la ni khyad par med par nyon mongs can gyi sems la ni /
mkhas pa rnams kyi dgu rnyed brjod /
dge ba'i sems la drug yin te /
ṣaṇṇāṃ tu kuśale citte tasyaivā vyākṛṭe khalu lung ma bstan la de nyid do /
zhes 'chad de /
tatra saptānāṃ kuśale citta iti vaktavyam /
kāmāvacarasya kuśalasya samyagdṛṣṭyā kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānāt kāmarūpāvacarayoranivṛtāvyākṛtayorvairāgyataḥ rūpārūpyāvacarayoḥ kuśalayostatastyasamādhilābhataḥ śaikṣāśaikṣasya ca niyāmāvakrāntyarhattvayoḥ śeṣamata evavyākhyānādavadhāryam 		der mi dge ba'i sems la bdun yin te /
zhes brjod par bya ste /
yang dag pa'i lta bas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba las 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba las 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang de ni yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob pa las gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dag dang des 'jug dgra bcom nyid kyi tshe /
saṃgrahaślokaḥ slob pa dang ni mi slob pa'o /
upapattisamāpattivairāgyaparihāṇiṣu lhag ma ni rnam par bshad pa 'di nyid kyis khong du chud par bya'o /
kuśalapratisaṃdhau ca cittalābho hyatadvataḥ /
iti 		bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
skye dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
abhidharmakośabhāṣye indriyanirddeśo nāma /
dvitīyaṃ kośasthānaṃ 		'dod chags bral dang yongs nyams dang /
dge ba'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe /
samāptamiti /
śrīlāmāvākasya 		sems de ldan pa min las rnyed /
rkyen gyi skabs rdzogs so /
tṛtīyaṃ kośasthānam /
oṃ namo duddhāya 		dbang po bstan pa zhes bya ba mjod [*mdzod?] kyi bshad pa las gnas gnyis pa rdzogs so /
idamidānīṃ vaktavyam /
kāmarūpārūpyanaiyamyena cittādīnāṃ kṛto nirdeśaḥ 		da ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi nges pa nyid kyi sems la sogs pa bstan pa byas pa de la /
tatra katame te kāmarūpārūpyadhātava ityucyate 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams de dag gang yin pa brjod par bya ste /
de'i phyir /
narakapretatiryañco manuṣyāḥ ṣaḍ divaukasaḥ dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro dang /
mi rnams dang ni lha drug dag /
kāmadhātuḥ /
catasro gatayaḥ /
ṣaṭ ca devanikāyāstadyathā cāturmahārājakāyikā strāyastriṃśā yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavarttinaścetyeṣa kāmadhātuḥ saha bhājanalokena /
sa eṣa kati sthānānītyāha /
sa narakadvīpabhedena viṃśatiḥ 		'dod pa'i khams yin zhes bya ba 'di smos te /
'gro ba bzhi dang lha'i ris drug po 'di lta ste /
rgyal chen bzhi po rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral ba rnams dang dga' ldan pa rnams dang 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams te /
de ltar na de dag snod kyi 'jig rten dang bcas pa ni 'dod pa'i khams yin no /
de la gnas du zhig yod ce na /
dmyal ba dang gling dbye ba las de nyi shu zhes bya ba smos te /
sthānānīti vākyaśeṣaḥ saṃbadhyate gnas rnams zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma dang sbyar ro /
aṣṭau mahānarakāḥ /
saṃjīvaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃghāto rauravo mahārauravastapanaḥ pratāpano 'vīciśceti /
catvāro dvīpāḥ 		dmyal ba chen po brgyad yod de /
yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang gling bzhi ste /
jambūdvīpaḥ pūrvavideho 'varagodānīyaḥ uttarakuruśca /
ṣaṭ cānantaroktā devanikāyāḥ tiryaścaḥ pretāśca viṃśatiḥ sthānāni 		'dzam bu'i gling dang shar gyi lus 'phags gling dang nub kyi ba lang spyod dang byang gi sgra mi snyan dang bshad ma thag pa'i lha'i ris drug dang yi dvags rnams dang dud 'gro ste /
kāmadhātuḥ paranirmitavaśavartibhyo yāvadavīciḥ sabhājanagrahaṇena tu yāvadvāyumaṇḍalam /
etasmācca kāmadhātoḥ 		de ltar na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa dag nas mnar med pa'i bar gyi gnas nyi shu po de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams yin no /
snod dang bcas par bzung na ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi bar yin no /
'dod pa'i khams 'di'i /
ūrdhvaṃ saptadaśasthāno rūpadhātuḥ gong ma'i gnas dag bcu bdun ni /
gzugs khams yin /
kathamityāha ji lta zhe na /
pṛthak pṛthak /
dhyānaṃ tribhūmikaṃ tatra /
prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānāni pratyekaṃ tribhūmikāni /
caturthaṃ tvaṣṭabhūmikam 		der so so'i /
bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yin /
zhes bya ba smos te /
bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dag na re re zhing sa gsum pa dag yin no /
bzhi bas ni brgyad pa yin /
tatra prathamadhyānaṃ brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ de la bsam gtan dang po ni tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang tshangs chen rnams so /
dvitīyaṃ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ gnyis pa ni 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams so /
tṛtīyaṃ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ gsum pa ni dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams so /
caturthamanabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā ityetāni saptadaśa sthānāni rūpadhātuḥ /
saha tannivāsibhiḥ sattvaiḥ ṣoḍaśeti kāśmīrāḥ 		bzhi pa ni sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che ba rnams dang mi che ba rnams dang mi gdung ba rnams dang gya nom snang ba rnams dang shin tu mthong ba rnams dang 'og min rnams te /
de ltar na gnas bcu bdun po 'di dag den gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang bcas pa ni gzugs kyi khams yin no /
kha che ba rnams na re bcu drug yin no zhes zer ro /
brahmapurohiteṣveva kila sthānamutkṛṣṭataraṃ mahābrahmaṇaḥ parigaṇa ivābhinirvṛttamekanāyakaṃ natu bhūmyantaramiti tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don kho na dag na tshangs pa chen po'i gnas ches mchog tu gyur pa gtso bo gcig pa can cig spags pa bzhin du mngon par grub kyi sa gzhan ni med do zhes grag go /
ārūpyadhāturasthānaḥ /
nahyarūpiṇāṃ dharmānāṃ sthānamasti 		gzugs med khams na gnas med do /
chos gzugs can ma yin pa rnams la ni gnas med de /
atītānāgatāvijñaptyarūpiṇo hi dharmā ādeśasthā iti niyamaḥ /
sa tu 		'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang; chos gzugs can ma yin pa rnams ni yul na mi gnas zhes bya bar nges pa yin no /
de yang /
upapattyā caturvidhaḥ /
upapattibhedena caturvidha ārūpyadhātuḥ 		skye ba las ni rnam pa bzhi /
gzugs med pa'i khams skye ba'i bye brag gis ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
yaduta ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanamākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivarāñjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamiti /
natveṣāṃ deśakṛtamauttarādharya bhidyate /
yatraiva hi deśe tatsmāpattilābhinaścyavante tatraivopapadyante iti /
punaśca tasmāccyavamānānāṃ tatraivāntarābhavo 'bhinirvarttate /
yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasaṃtatirevamārūpyeṣu kiṃ niśritya pravrttate 		'di lta ste /
nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched do /
de dag la yul gyis byas pa'i bla 'og ni med do /
ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnams yul gang du 'chi 'pho ba de nyid du skye la /
yang de nas 'chi 'pho ba rnams kyi srid pa bar ma yang de nyid du 'grub bo /
ji ltar sems can gzugs can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud gzugs la brten nas 'jug pa de ltar gzugs med pa dag na ci la brten nas 'jug ce na /
nikāyaṃ jīvitaṃ cātra niśritā cittasantatiḥ /
nikāyasabhāgaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ ca niśrityetyābhidhārmikāḥ /
rupiṇāmapi tarhi sattvānāṃ kimartha na tadeva dvayaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasantatiḥ /
durbalatvāt 		der ni ris dang srog la yang /
sems kyi rgyud ni brten pa yin /
chos mngon pa pa rnams na re ris mthun pa dang srog gi dbang po la brten nas so zhes zer ro /
'o na ci'i phyir sems can gzugs can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyun yang de gnyis kho na la brten nas 'jug par mi 'gyur /
stobs chung ba'i phyir ro /
tasyāḥ kena balavattvam /
samāpattiviśeṣajatvāt 		de na ci'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa nyid yin; snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par las skyes pa'i phyir te /
sā hi samāpattirvibhūtarūpasaṃjñā /
tata eva tarhi balavattvāt pravarttiṣyate kim punarniśrayeṇa /
idaṃ cāpi vaktavyam /
yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate nikāyasabhāgo jīvitendriyaṃ ca evamarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kiṃ niśritya pravarttate /
tadeva dvayamanyo 'nyam /
rūpiṇāmapi tarhi kimarthaṃ na tadeva dvayamanyonyam 		snyoms par 'jug pa de ni gzugs dang bral ba'i 'du shes can yin no /
'o na ni stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir de kho nas 'jug par 'gyur gyi rten gyis ci zhig bya /
ji ltar sems can gzugs can rnams kyi ris mthun pa dang srog gi dbang po gzugs la brten nas 'jug pa de ltar sems can gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi ci la brten nas 'jug pa 'di yang brjod par bya'o /
de gnyis phan tshun du'o /
'o na ni gzugs can rnams kyi yang de gnyis kho na phan tshun du ci'i phyir mi brten /
durbalatvāttayoḥ de gnyis stobs chung ba'i phyir ro /
tatredānīṃ kena balavattvām /
samāpattiviśeṣajatvāt /
tadetaccittasantatau samānaṃ cittacaitteṣu vā /
tasmānnāstyarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantateranyonyam niśraya iti sautrāntikāḥ 		de ni ci'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa nyid yin /
snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par las skyes pa'i phyir ro /
mdo sde pa rnams na re de ni sems kyi rgyud dam /
sems kyang sems las byung bdag la yang mtshungs te de lta bas na sems can gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi sems kyi rten gzhan ni med do zhes zer ro /
api tu yasyāścittasantaterākṣepaheturavītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyāḥ saha rūpeṇa saṃbhavādrūpaṃ niśritya pravṛttiryasyāstu heturvītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyā anapekṣya rūpaṃ pravṛttiḥ /
hetostadvimukhatvāditi 		gzhan yang sems kyi rgyun gang gi 'phen pa'i rgyu gzugs la sred pa dang ma bral ba de ni gzugs dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir /
gzugs la brten nas 'jug go /
gang gi rgyu gzugs la sred pa dang bral ba de ni gzugs la mi ltos par 'jug ste /
rgyu de la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro /
atha kasmādete kāmarūpārūpyadhātava ityucyante yang ci'i phyir 'di dag 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams rnams zhes bya zhe na /
svalakṣaṇadhāraṇāddhātuḥ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir na khams so /
kāmapratisaṃyuktodhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ rūpapratisaṃyukto dhātū rūpadhāturmadhyapadalopādvajrabālakavat maricapānakavacca /
nātra rūpamastityarūpaḥ 		'dod pa dang ldan pa'i khams ni 'dod pa'i khams so /
gzugs dang ldan pa'i khams ni gzugs kyi khams so /
bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir te /
rdo rje'i sor gdub lta bu dang na le sham gyi btung ba zhes bya ba bzhin no /
'di na gzugs med pas gzugs med pa'o /
gzugs med pa'i ngo bo ni gzugs med pa nyid do /
arūpasya bhāva ārupyam yang na gzugs su rung ba ni gzugs so /
rūpaṇīyo vā rūpyaḥ /
na rūpyo 'rūpyastadbhāva ārūpyam 		gzugs med pas na gzugs med pa'o /
de'i ngo bo ni gzugs med pa nyid do /
tatpratisaṃyukto dhāturārūpyadhātuḥ de dang ldan pa'i khams ni gzugs med pa'i khams so /
kāmānāṃ dhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ kāmān yo dadhāti yang na 'dod pa rnams kyi khams ni 'dod pa'i khams te /
gang zhig 'dod pa rnams 'dzin pa'o /
evaṃ rūpārūpyadhātū veditavyau /
ko 'yaṃ kāmo nāma 		gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag kyang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o /
'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na /
samāsātaḥ kavaḍīkārāhāra maithunopasaṃhito rāgaḥ /
na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ 		mdor bsdu na kham gyi zas dang 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i 'dod chags yin te; 'jig rten sna tshogs gang yang 'dod pa min /
skyes bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'dod pa yin /
tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathaiva loke aṭhātra dhīrā vinayanti kāmam 'jig rten dag na sna tshogs de bzhin gnas /
'on kyang rten rnams 'di la 'dun pa 'dul /
iti /
gāthābhidhānān 		zhes tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
ajīvaka āryaśāriputraṃ pratyāha kun tu rgyu 'tsho byed kyis 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la /
na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaṃ vadasīha kāmam 'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod min gyi /
kun rtog 'dod chags 'dir 'dod yin smra na /
bhikṣurbhaviṣyatyapi kāmabhogī saṃkalpayan so 'kuśalān vitarkān de ni mi dge'i rtog pa kun rtog tshe /
dge slong yang ni 'dod spyod can du 'gyur /
āryaśāriputra āha /
te cetkāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgo yadi te na kāmaḥ 		zhes smras pa dang 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus /
gal te 'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod /
ci ste khyod kyi kun rtog 'dod chags ni /
śāstā 'pi te bhavitā kāmabhogī dṛṣṭvaiva rūpāṇi manoramāṇi 'dod pa min na gzugs rnams mthong nas ni /
khyod kyi ston pa 'ang 'dod spyod can du 'ong /
kiṃ punarye kecana dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyadhātuṣu samudācaranti sarve te kāmarūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāḥ zhes smras so /
yang ci chos gang dag 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag na spyod pa de dag thams cad 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dag cig yin nam zhe na /
netyāha /
kiṃ tarhi 		smras pa ma yin no /
'o na ci zhe na /
yeṣu kāmarūpārupyarāgā anuśerate /
ke punaramī kāmarūpārūpyarāgāḥ /
ye kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣvanuśerate /
idamidānīṃ tadaśvavandhīyam /
kasyāyamaśvabandho yasyāyamaśvaḥ /
kasyāyamaśvaḥ /
yasyāyamaśvabandhaḥ 		gang dag la 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dag rgyas par 'gyur ba'o /
'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags de dag kyang gang yin zhe na; gang dag 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu rgyas par 'gyur ba'o /
da ni 'di rta dang bres lta bu de yin te /
rta'i bres 'di su'i yin zhes smras na /
rta 'di su'i yin pa'o zhes zer ro /
rta 'di su'i yin zhes smras na /
ityubhayamapi na jñāyate /
nedamaśvabandhīyam 		rta'i bres 'di su'i yin pa'o zhes zer bas gnyi ga yang mi shes pa lta bu yin no /
kṛtanirdeśāni hi sthānāni kāmadhātau 'di ni rta dang bres lta bu ma yin te /
teṣvavītarāgasya yo rāgaḥ sa kāmarāgaḥ /
yatrānuśete so 'pi dharmaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaḥ 		'dod pa'i khams su gnas brten pa de dag la 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i 'dod chags gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags yin la de gang du rgyas par 'gyur ba'i chos de yang 'dod pa dang ldan pa yin no /
evaṃ rūpārūpyarāgāvadhovītarāgasya yathāyogaṃ veditavyau de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang 'og ma'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dag kyang ci rigs par rig par bya'o /
asamāhitabhūmiko vā rāgaḥ kāmarāgaḥ yang na mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i 'dod chags ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags so /
dhyānārūpyeṣu rāgo rūpārūpyarāgaḥ /
nirmāṇacitte kathaṃ kāmarāgaḥ /
śrutvā parihāya ca tadāsvādanāt 		bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa dag la 'dod chags pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags so /
sprul pa'i sems la ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags pa yin zhe na /
thos pa dang yongs su nyams nas de la chags pa'i phyir ro /
nirmāṇavaśena vā nirmāyaka citto 'pi rāgaḥ yang na sprul pa'i dbang gis sprul pa byed pa'i sems la yang 'dod chags so; /
gandharasanirmāṇādvā /
tasya kāmavacaratvam 		yang na dri dang ro sprul pa'i phyir na de 'dod pa na spyod pa nyid yin te /
rūpāvacareṇa tayoranirmāṇāt /
kiṃ punarekameva traidhātukam /
traidhātukānāmanto nāsti 		gzugs na spyod pas ni de gnyis mi sprul pa'i phyir ro /
yang ci khams gsum gcig kho na zhig yin nam zhe na /
khams gsum rnams la mtha' med de /
yāvadākāśaṃ tāvanto dhātavaḥ /
atha eva ca nāstyapūrvasattvaprādurbhāvaḥ /
pratibuddhotpādaṃ cāsaṃkhyeyasattvaparinirvāṇe 'pi nāsti sattvānāṃ parikṣaya ākāśavat 		nam mkha' ji tsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang de tsam mo /
de nyid kyi phyir sngon med pa'i sems can 'byung ba yang med la /
sangs rgyas 'byung ba re res sems can grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang sems can rnams yongs su gtugs pa med de nam mkha' bzhin no /
kathamavasthānaṃ lokadhatūnāṃ 'jig rten gyi khams rnams ji ltar gnas she na /
tiryaksūtra uktaṃ tadyathā īṣādhāre deve varṣati nāsti vīcirvā antarikā va antarīkṣādvāridhārāṇāṃ prapatantīnām /
evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi nāsti vīcirvā antarikā vā lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvarttamānānāṃ vivarttamānāṃ ca /
yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇāsyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāmiti /
natūktamūrdhvamadhaśceti 		thad kar gnas te /
mdo las dper na char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam 'bab pa na bar snang las chu'i rgyun 'bab pa rnams kyi mtshams sam bar med do /
de bzhin du shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams 'chags pa dang 'jig pa rnams kyi mtshams sam bar med do /
shar phyogs su ji lta bar lho dang nub dang byang gi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs kyi steng dang 'og ces ni ma gsungs so /
ūrdhvamapyadhho 'pītyapare /
nikāyāntarapāṭhād /
akaniṣṭhādūrdhvaṃ punaḥ kāmadhātuḥ /
kāmadhātoścādhaḥ punarakaniṣṭhāḥ 		gzhan dag na re sde pa gzhan dag las byung ba'i phyir steng dang 'og dag na yang yod de /
'og min gyi gong na yang 'dod pa'i khams yod la /
'dod pa'i khams kyi 'og na yang 'og min yod do zhes zer ro /
yaścaikasmāt kāmadhātorvītarāgaḥ sa sarvebhyaḥ gang 'dod pa'i khams gcig las 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni thams cad las 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no /
evaṃ rūpārūpyebhyaḥ /
yaśca prathamadhyānasaṃniśrayāddhi utpādayati sa yatra lokadhātau jāta utpādayati tatratyameva brahmalokamupāgacchati nānyam 		gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag las kyang de dang 'dra'o /
gang zhig bsam gtan dang po la brten pa'i rdzu 'phrul skyed par byed pa de ni des 'jig rten gyi khams gang du skyes pa nas skyed par byed pa de kho na na yod pa'i tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro'i gzhan du ni ma yin no /
ya ete trayo dhātava uktāḥ khams gsum po dag bshad pa gang yin pa /
narakādisvanāmoktā gatayaḥ pañca teṣu der ni dmyal sogs 'gro ba lnga /
rang gi ming gis bstan /
narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyā iti /
svaireva nāmabhisteṣu pañca gatayaḥ proktāḥ 		de dag tu dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dags dang lha dang mi zhes bya ba 'gro ba lnga po rang gi ming dag kho nas bstan te /
kāmadhāto catasro gatayaḥ pañcamyāśca pradeśaḥ 'dod pa'i khams na ni 'gro ba bzhi dang lnga pa'i phyogs so /
rūpārūpyadhātvorekasyā devagateḥ pradeśaḥ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag na ni lha'i 'gro ba gcig kho na'i phyogs so /
kiṃ punargatinirmuktāḥ santi dhātavo yata dhātuṣvityucyante gang gis na /
de dag khams dag tu zhes bya ba ci 'gro ba las ma gtogs pa'i khams dag cig yod dam zhe na /
santi kuśalakliṣṭabhājanāntarābhavasvabhāvā api dhātavaḥ /
yāstu pañca gatayaḥ 		yod de khams rnams ni dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can dang snod dang srid pa bar ma pa'i rang bzhin dag kyang yin gyi 'gro ba lnga po gang dag yin pa /
tāḥ /
akliṣṭāvyākṛtā eva sattvākhyā nāntarābhavaḥ 		de dag nyon mongs can min lung bstan min /
sems can zhes bya bar srid min /
anivṛtāvyākṛtā eva gatayaḥ /
anyathā hi gatisaṃbhedaḥ syāt /
sattvākhyā eva ca nacāntarābhavasvabhāvāḥ 		'gro ba rnams ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na'o /
de lta ma yin na 'gro ba lnga 'chol bar 'gyur ro /
sems can zhes bya ba kho na yin yang srid pa bar ma'i rang bzhin dag ni ma yin no /
prajñyaptipūktam catasṛbhiryonibhiḥ pañca gatayaḥ saṃgṛhītā natu pañcabhirgatibhiścatasro yonayaḥ btags pa las kyang /
skye gnas bzhis ni 'gro ba lnga bsdus kyi 'gro ba lngas ni skye gnas bzhi ma bsdus te /
kimasaṃbṛhītam gang zhig ma bsdus she na /
antarābhava iti /
dharmaskandhe 'pi coktam cakṣurdhātuḥ katamaḥ /
catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya yo rūpaprasādaścakṣuścakṣurindriyaṃ cakṣurāyatanaṃ cakṣurdhātunarikastairyagyonikaṃ paitṛviṣayiko devyo mānuṣyako bhāvanāmayo 'ntarābhavikaśceti 		srid pa bar ma'o zhes gsungs so /
chos kyi phung po las kyang mig gi khams gang zhe na /
'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang ba gang yin pa dmyal ba 'am dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang yi dvags pa'i yul pa'am /
lha 'am mi 'am /
bsgoms pa las byung ba'am /
srid pa bar ma pa'i mig dang mig gi dbang po dang mig gi skye mched dang; mig gi khams so zhes gsungs so /
sūtre 'pi ca bahiṣkṛto 'ntarābhavo gatibhyaḥ mdo las kyang srid pa bar ma 'gro ba rnams las logs shig tu mdzad do /
kasmin sūtre /
sapta bhavā narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti 		mdo gang las she na srid pa ni bdun te /
dmyal ba'i srid pa dang dud 'gro'i srid pa dang yi dvags kyi srid pa dang lha'i srid pa dang mi'i srid pa dang; las kyi srid pa dang srid pa bar ma'o zhes gsungs pa las te /
atra hi pañca gatayaḥ sahetukāḥ sahāgamanāścoktāḥ /
atha eva cānivṛtāvyākṛtāḥ sidhyanti 		'dir ni 'gro ba lnga po rgyu dang bcas pa dang 'gro ba dang bcas par bshad do /
de nyid kyi phyir ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan par 'grub ste /
taddhetoḥ karmabhavasya tābhyo bahiṣkaraṇāt de'i rgyu las de dag las logs shig tu mdzad pa'i phyir ro /
kāśmīrāśca sūtraṃ paṭhanti /
sthaviraśāriputreṇoktaṃ nārakāṇāmāyuṣmannāsravāṇāṃ saṃmukhībhāvānnarakavedanīyāni karmāṇi karotyupacinoti /
teṣāmāyuṣman kāyavāṅmanovaṅkānāṃ kāyavāṅmanodoṣakaṣāyāṇā narakeṣu rūpaṃ saṃjñā vedanā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ vipāko vipacyate /
nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati 		kha che ba rnams kyang gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa dmyal ba pa'i zag pa rnams mngon du gyur pa las dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur pa'i las rnams byed cing sogs par 'gyur ro /
tshe dang ldan pa lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dkyil 'khor dang lus dang ngag dang yid skyon dang snyigs ma de dag gi rnam par smin pa gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni dmyal ba dag tu rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
rnam par smin par grub nas dmyal bzhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o /
tatrāyuṣmannārako nopalabhyate 'nyatra tebhyo dharmebhya iti tshe dang ldan pa de la chos de dag ma gtogs pa dmyal ba mi dmigs so zhes gsungs so zhes mdo 'don te /
ato 'pyanivṛtāvyākṛtā eva gatayaḥ /
prakaraṇāgranthastarhi parihāryo gatiṣu sarve 'nuśayā anuśerata iti /
pratisaṃdhicittāni hi gatīnāṃ pañcaprakārāṇi santyataḥ sapraveśagatigrahaṇādadoṣa eva /
grāmagrahaṇe grāmopacāra grahaṇavat 		de'i phyir yang 'gro ba dag ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no /
'o na ni rab tu byed pa'i gzhung 'gro ba dag la phra rgyas thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i lan gdab par bya dgos so zhe na; 'gro ba rnams su nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i sems rnam pa lnga yod de /
de'i phyir 'jug pa dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba smos pas de ni nyes pa med de /
grong smos na grong gi nye 'khor yang smos pa bzhin no /
kuśalakliṣṭā apītyapare /
yaktūktam karmabhavasya tābhyo bahiṣkaraṇāditi /
nāvaśyaṃ pṛthagvacanādbahiṣkṛto bhavati 		gzhan dag na re dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag kyang yod do /
las de dag las logs shig tu mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes gang bshad pa ni tha dad du gsungs pa'i phyir logs shig tu mdzad pa yin par nges pa med de /
tadyathā pañcasu kaṣāyeṣu kleśadṛṣṭikaṣāyau pṛthaguktau /
na ca dṛṣṭayo na kleśāḥ /
evaṃ karmabhavo 'pi gatiśca syāt /
pṛthak cāsya vacanaṃ syāt gatihetujñāpanāṛtham /
antarābhave 'pyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ /
nāyogāt /
gacchanti tāmiti gatiḥ /
nacāntarābhavo gantavyaścyutideśa evotpādanāt /
ārūpyā api gatirna bhaviṣyanti 		dper na snyigs ma lnga po dag tu nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i snyigs ma dag tha dad du gsungs kyang lta ba rnams nyon mongs pa dag ma yin pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du las kyi srid pa yang yin 'gro ba yang yin 'gro ba'i rgyu shes par bya ba'i phyir 'di tha dad du bstan pa yang yin no zhes zer ro /
'di ni srid pa bar ma yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
mi rung ba'i phyir ma yin te /
der 'gro bas na 'gro ba yin na srid pa bar ma ni 'gro bar bya ba ma yin te /
'chi 'pho ba'i yul nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro /
gzugs med pa rnams kyang 'gro ba ma yin par 'gyur te 'chi 'pho ba'i yul nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro /
cyutideśa evotpādāt /
evaṃ tarhyantarābhavatvādevāntarābhavo na gatirgatyantarālatvāt 		de lta na 'o na ni srid pa bar ma yin pa kho na'i phyir srid pa bar ma 'gro ba ma yin te /
'gro ba'i bar ma do yin pa'i phyir ro /
yadi hi gatiḥ syādantarābhava ityeva na syāt /
yatarhi sthaviraśāriputreṇoktaṃ nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatīti /
nirvṛtte vīpāka ityuktaḥ natu vipāka eveti /
yattarhyaktaṃ tatrāyuṣmannārako nopalabhyate 'nyatra tebhyo dharmebhya iti /
gatigāminaḥ pudgaladravyasya pratiṣedhaṃ karoti nānyatra skandhebhya upalabhyate nāraka iti na tu skandhāntarapratiṣedham 		gal te 'gro ba yin par gyur na ni srid pa bar ma zhes bya ba nyid du yang mi 'gyur ro /
'o na gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus rnam par smin pa grub nas dmyal ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes gang bshad pa ji ltar drang /
rnam par smin pa grub nas zhes bshad kyi rnam par smin pa kho na'o zhes ni ma bshad pa ji ltar /
'o na tshe dang ldan pa de la chos de dag ma gtogs pa dmyal ba mi dmigs so zhes gang bshad pa ji ltar drang /
phung po dag las gzhan pa dmyal ba mi dmigs so zhes 'gro bar 'gro ba'i gang zag gi rdzas 'gog par byed pa yin gyi phung po gzhan 'gog pa ni ma yin no /
avyākṛtā eva tu gatayo varṇyante vaibhāṣikaiḥ /
tāśca vipākasvabhāvā evetyeke /
aupacayikasvabhāvā apītyapare /
atraiva pañcagatike dhātutraye yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /
nānātvakāyasaṃjñāśca nānākāyaikasaṃjñinaḥ /
viparyayāccaikakāyasaṃjñāścārūpiṇasrayaḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'gro ba rnams ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag kho na yin no zhes zer ro /
de dag kyang kha cig na re rnam par smin pa'i rang bzhin dag kho na yin no zhes zer ro /
gzhan dag na re rgyas pa las byung ba'i rang bzhin dag kyang yin no zhes zer ro /
'gro ba lnga pa'i khams gsum pa 'di nyid du /
lus dang 'du shes tha dad dang lus tha dad cing 'du shes gcig /
bzlog dang lus dang 'du shes gcig /
gzugs can ma yin gsum po dag /
vijñānasthitayaḥ sapta /
sūtre uktaḥ rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathāmanuṣyāstadekatyāśca devāḥ 		rnam shes gnas pa bdun rim bzhin du rig par bya'o /
mdo las sems can gzugs can lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag kyang yod de /
'di la ste mi rnams dang lha kha cig go /
iyaṃ prathamā vijñānasthitiḥ /
katame punaste tadekatyā devāḥ 		'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas dang po'o zhes gsungs te /
lha kha cig gang zhe na /
kāmāvacarāḥ prathamaghyānabhūmikāśca prathamābhinirvṛttavarjyāḥ 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang bsam gtan dang po pa dang por byung ba ma gtogs pa rnams so /
de dag gi lus tha dad pa'i phyir ram /
nānātvena kāya eṣāmiti nānātvakāyāḥ /
anekavarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānatvāt /
nānātvena saṃjñā nānātvasaṃjñā /
saiṣāmastīti nānātvasaṃjñinaḥ 		de dag gi lus tha dad pa yin pas na lus tha dad pa dag ste /
kha dog dang rtags dang dbyibs du ma'i phyir ro /
'du shes du ma'i phyir ro /
'du shes du ma'i phyir 'du shes tha dad pa'o /
de 'di dag la yod pas 'du shes tha dad pa rnams te /
sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvāt /
rūpiṇaḥ santi nānātvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā brahmakāyikā ye tatprathamābhinirvṛttāḥ /
iyaṃ dvitīyā vijñānasthitiḥ 		bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
sems can gzugs can lus tha dad cing 'du shes gcig pa dag kyang yod de /
'di lta ste tshangs ris kyi lha gang dag dang por byung ba de dag go; /
'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa gnyis pa'o zhes gsungs te /
te hi prathamābhinirvṛttāḥ sarva ekaikasaṃjñino bhavanti anena vayaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā iti dang por byung ba de dag thams cad ni 'di snyam du bdag cag ni tshangs pa 'dis phyung ngo snyam du 'du shes par 'gyur la /
brahmaṇo 'pyevaṃ bhavati mayaite sṛṣṭā ityabhinnakārasaṃjñānādekatvasaṃjñinaḥ /
anyathaiva tu mahābrahmaṇa ārohapariṇāha ākṛtivigraho vāgbhāṣā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ ca anyathā tatparṣada iti nānātvakāyāḥ /
yadidamuktaṃ sūtre teṣāmevaṃ bhavati imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ yāvadaho vatānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeranmama sabhāmatāyāmiti /
asya ca sattvasyaivañcetasaḥ praṇidhirvayaṃ cehopapannā iti 		tshangs pa yang 'di snyam du 'di dag ni bdag gis phyung ngo snyam du sems pas 'du shes kyi rgyu ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir 'du shes gcig pa dag yin no /
tshangs pa chen po'i chu zheng dang dbyibs kyi lus dang tshig tu brjod pa dang gos gyon pa yang gzhan yin la /
de'i 'khor gyi yang gzhan yin pas na lus tha dad pa dag yin no /
mdo las de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis sems can 'di tshe ring zhing dus ring por gnas par mthong la zhes bya ba nas sems can 'di yang sems la 'di snyam du kye ma sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir bdag dang skral ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig snyam du smos la /
bdag cag kyang 'dir skyes pas zhes bya bar shes so zhes gang gsungs pa /
kathaṃ tamadrākṣuḥ de dag gis de ji ltar mthong zhe na /
ābhāsvarasthā ityeke /
tato hi te pracyutāḥ kathamidānīmalabdhāyāṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpattau tadbhūmikaṃ pūrvenivāsamasmārṣuḥ labdhāyāṃ vā kathaṃ mahābrahmālambanāṃ śīlavrataparāmarśadṛṣṭiṃ niviṣṭāḥ 		kha cig na re 'od gsal la gnas pa rnams kyis te /
de dag ni de nas shi 'phos pa yin no zhes zer ro /
de ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma thob na ni ji ltar na de'i sa pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran 'on te thob na ni ji ltar na tshangs pa chen po la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba la zhen pa dag yin /
antarābhavasthā adrākṣurityapare /
tatrāpi na dīrghamadhvānamavasthātuṃ saṃbhavaḥ pratibandhābhāvāditi /
kathaṃ teṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantamiti 		gzhan dag na re srid pa bar ma la gnas pa dag gis mthong ngo zhes zer ro /
de na yang bgegs byed pa med pa'i phyir dus ring por gnas pa mi srid na ji ltar na de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis sems can 'di tshe ring zhing dus ring por gnas pa mthong ngo snyam du shes par 'gyur /
tasmāttatrasthā eva te tasya pūrvavṛttāntaṃ samanusmaranta eva dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ dṛṣṭavanto dṛṣṭvā ca paścādadrākṣmetyeṣāṃ babhūva de lta bas na de na gnas pa de dag kho nas de'i sngon gyi tshul rjes su dran zhing de ltar dus ring por gnas pa mthong ngo /
mthong nas kyang phyis de dag mthong ngo snyam du shes pa yin no /
rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ /
iyaṃ tṛtīyā vijñānasthitiḥ /
atra punaḥ paryantagrahaṇātsakaladvitīyadhyānagrahaṇaṃ veditavyam 		sems can gzugs can lus gcig cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag kyang yod de /
'di lta ste 'od gsal gyi lha rnams so /
'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa gsum pa'o zhes gsungs te /
'dir ni mtha' smos pas bsam gtan gnyis pa mtha' dag smos par rig par bya'o /
anyathā hi parīttābhā apramāṇābhāśca kasyāṃ vijñānasthitau vyavasthāpyeran /
tatrābhinnavarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānatvādekatvakāyāḥ /
sukhasaṃjñitvādaduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvācca nānātvasaṃjñinaḥ 		de lta ma yin na 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams rnam par shes pa gnas pa gang du rnam par gzhag par 'gyur la /
de la kha dog dang rtags dang dbyibs tha mi dad pa'i phyir lus gcig pa dag go /
bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyir dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin par 'du shes pa'i phyir 'du shes tha dad pa dag ste /
te kila maulyāṃ bhūmau saumanasyendriyaparikhinnāḥ sāmantakādupekṣendriyaṃ saṃmukhībhavanti /
sāmantake copekṣendriyaparikhinnāḥ punamaulyā bhumeḥ saumanasyendriyaṃ saṃmukhīkurvanti 		de dag ni dngos gzhi'i sa la yid bde ba'i dbang pos yongs su skyo nas nyer bsdogs las btang snyoms kyi dbang po mngon du byed la /
nyer bsdogs kyi btang snyoms kyi dbang po sa yongs su skyo nas ni yang dngos gzhi'i sa la yid bde ba'i dbang po mngon du byed de /
yathā kāmaratiparikhinnā īśvarā dharmaratiṃ pratyanubhavanti dharmaratiparikhinnāḥ kāmaratimiti dper na dbang phyug dag 'dod pa'i dga' bas yongs su skyo nas chos kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed la /
chos kyi dga' bas yongs su skyo nas ni yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed pa bzhin no zhes grag go /
nanu ca śubhakṛtsneṣvapyeṣa prasṅgaḥ 'di dge rgyas pa dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
na teṣāṃ tena sukhenāsti parikhedaḥ ma yin te /
de dag ni bde ba des yongs su skyo ba med do /
kiṃ kāraṇam de ci'i phyir zhe na /
śāntaṃ hi tatsukhamaśāntaṃ ca saumanasyaṃ cetasa utplāvakatvāditi sautrāntikā vyācakṣate /
sūtra uktaṃ yathā te nānātvasaṃjñinaḥ /
tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye 'ciropapannā bhavanti naiva saṃvarttanīkuśalā na vivarttanīkuśalā asya lokasya te tāmarciṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ santa udvijante saṃvegamāpadyante /
sahaivaiṣā 'rciḥ śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ dagdhvā 'rvāgāgamiṣyatīti 		bde ba ni zhi ba yin la /
yid bde ba ni sems g yo bar byed pa yin pas ma zhi ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
mdo sde pa rnams ni mdo las 'od gsal ba'i lha'i ris de na sems can gang dag skyes nas ring po ma lon pa 'jig rten 'di 'jig pa la mi mkhas shing 'chags pa la mi mkhas pa de dag me lce de mthong nas me lce de tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong pa bsregs nas 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur na mi rung ngo zhes skra gnas yi chad cing skyo bar 'gyur ro /
tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye ciropapannāḥ saṃvarttanīkuśalā vivarttanīkuśalāścāsya lokasya te tān sattvān bhītānāśvāsayanti 'od gsal ba'i lha'i ris de na sems can gang dag skyes nas ring du lon pa 'jig rten 'di 'jig pa la mkhas shing 'chags pa las mkhas pa la de dag sems can skrag pa de dag la grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig /
mā bhaiṣṭa māṛṣāḥ mā bhaiṣṭa mārṣāḥ /
pūrvamapyeṣā 'rciḥ śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ dagdhvā 'traivāntarhiteti /
ato 'rciṣa āgamavyapagamasaṃjñitvāt bhītā bhītasaṃjñitvācca te nānātvasaṃjñino na sukhāduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvāditi /
rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ 		grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig /
mi lce 'di ni sngon yang tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong pa bsregs nas de nyid du med par gyur to zhes dbugs 'byin par byed do zhes de dag ji ltar 'du shes tha dad pa dag yin par bshad de /
de lta bas na de dag me lce 'ong ba dang med par 'du shes pa'i phyir dang skrag pa dang mi skrag par 'du shes pa'i phyir 'du shes tha dad pa dag yin gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin par 'du shes pa'i phyir ni ma yin no zhes 'chad do /
sems can gzugs can lus gcig 'du shes gcig pa dag kyang yod de /
'di lta ste /
iyaṃ caturthī vijñānasthitiḥ /
tatrābhinnavarṇasaṃsthānaliṅgatvādekatvakāyāḥ 		dge rgyas kyi lha rnams so /
'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi pa'o zhes gsungs te /
ekatvasaṃjñinaḥ sukhasaṃjñitvāt 'du shes gcig pa dag ces bya ba ni /
bde bar 'du shes pa dag go /
tatra prathame dhyāne kliṣṭayā saṃjñayā ekatvasaṃjñinaḥ de la bsam gtan dang po na ni nyon mongs pa can gyi 'du shes su 'du shes gcig pa dag yin no /
dvitīye kuśalayā saṃjñayā nānātvasaṃjñinastṛtīye vipākajayā saṃjñayāekatvasaṃjñinaḥ gnyis pa na ni dge ba'i 'du shes su 'du shes tha dad pa dag yin no /
gsum pa na ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'du shes su 'du shes gcig pa dag yin no /
ārupyāstrayo yathāsūtramityetāḥ sapta vijñānasthitayaḥ gzugs med pa gsum po ni mdo las ji skad 'byung ba ste /
de ltar na de dag gi ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun yin no /
kā 'tra vijñānasthitiḥ /
tatpratisaṃyuktāḥ pañca skandhāścatvāraśca yathāyogam 		'di la rnam par shes pa gnas pa gang yin zhe na /
ci rigs par de dag dang ldan pa'i phung po lnga dang bzhi yin no /
śeṣaṃ kasmānnā vijñānasthitiḥ ci'i phyir lhag ma rnam par shes pa gnas pa ma yin zhe na /
yasmāt 'di ltar /
śeṣaṃ tatparibhedavat lhag ma de 'joms byed ldan /
kiṃ punaḥ śeṣam /
durgatayaścaturtha dhyānaṃ bhavagraṃ ca 		lhag ma gnag zhig ce na /
ngan 'gro rnams dang bsam gtan bzhi pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'o /
atra hi vijñānaparibhedāḥ santyata eva na vijñānasthitiḥ /
kaḥ punaḥ paribhedaḥ yena vijñānaṃ paribhidyate 		'di dag na rnam par shes pa 'joms par byed pa dag yod pas de'i phyir 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa ma yin no /
'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
gang gis rnam par shes pa 'joms par byed pa ste /
tatrāpāyeṣu duḥkhā vedanā paribheda upadhātidatvāt /
catuteṃ dhyāne āsaṃjñikamasaṃjñisamāpattiśca 		de la ngan song dag na ni 'joms par byed pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yin te /
gnod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
bsam gtan bzhi pa na ni 'du shes med pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yin no /
bhavāgre nirodhasamāpattiścittasantaticchedāt srid pa'i rtse mo na ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yin te /
sems kyi rgyun gcod pa'i phyir ro /
punarāha yang smras pa /
yatrehasthānāṃ gantukāmatā tatrasthānāṃ cāvyuccalitukāmatā 'sau vijñānasthitiruktā /
apāyeṣu cobhayaṃ nāshi /
caturthe dhyāne sattvā uccalitamānasāḥ pṛthagjanā āsaṃjñikaṃ praveṣṭukāmā āryāḥ śuddhāvāsān bhavāgrānapaṭupracāratvānna vijñānasthitiriti /
etāśca sapta vijñānasthitayo yathoktāḥ /
bhavāgrāsaṃjñisattvāśca sattvāvāsā nava smṛtāḥ 		gang du 'di na gnas pa rnams na 'gro bar 'dod la /
de na gnas pa rnams ni bskyod par mi 'dod pa de rnam par shes pa gnas par bshad na /
ngan song dag na ni gnyi ga med do /
bsam gtan bzhi pa na ni sems can rnams bskyod pa'i yid dang ldan pa dag yin te /
so so'i skye bo rnams ni 'du shes med par 'jug 'dod la /
'phags pa rnams ni gnas gtsang mar ro /
srid pa'i rtse mo ni rgyu ba mi gsal ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa gnas pa ma yin no /
rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun po ji skad bshad pa de dag dang srid rtse dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams /
sems can gyi ni gnas dgur bshad /
eṣu hi sattvā āvasanti svecchayā 'di dag tu sems can rnams rang dgas kun tu gnas so /
anicchāvasanānnānye mi 'dod bzhin gnas phyir gzhan min /
ke punaranye gzhan gang zhe na /
apāyāḥ /
teṣu hi sattvā akāmakāḥ karmarākṣasairāvāsyante /
natvicchayā vasanti 		ngan song rnams te /
de dag tu sems can rnams mi 'dod bzhin du las kyi srin po dag gis kun tu gnas su 'jug gi dga' ste gnas pa ni ma yin no /
atastena sattvāvāsā bandhanasthānavat /
anyatra sūtre sapta vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ anyatra 		de'i phyir de dag ni sems can rnams kyi gnas pa ma yin te btson ra bzhin no /
mdo gzhan las ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun zhes gsungs so; /
catasraḥ sthitayaḥ punaḥ gzhan las ni gnas pa dag ni yang bzhi ste /
katamāścatasraḥ /
rūpopagā vijñāna sthitirvedanopagā saṃjñopagā saṃskāropagā iti /
tāsāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ 		zhes gsungs pa /
bzhi gang zhe na /
rnam par shes pa gnas pa gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba dang tshor bar yang nye bar 'gro ba dang 'du shes su nye bar 'gro ba dang 'du byed du nye bar 'gro ba'o /
de dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
tā hi yathākramaṃ de dag ni go rims bzhin du /
catvāraḥ sāsravāḥ skandhāḥ zag dang bcas pa'i phung po bzhi /
te punaḥ /
svabhūmāveva 		de dag kyang rang gi sa pa nyid /
nānyatra bhūmau sa gzhan du ni ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
pratiṣṭā hi sthitiḥ 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
gnas pa ni brten pa yin na /
na ca visabhāgabhūmikeṣu skanheṣu vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇāvaśāt pratitiṣṭhatīti skal ba mi mnyam pa'i sa pa'i phung po dag la ni rnam par shes pa sred pa'i dbang gis mi brten pa'i phyir ro /
kasmānna vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitirucyate yathā saptasu vijñānasthitiṣu pañca skandhā iti /
sthātuḥ parihāreṇa sthitividhānāt 		ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa gnas pa zhes mi bya zhe na /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gnas pa po yongs su spangs nas gnas pa zhes bya ba med pa'i phyir te /
nahi sthātaiva sthitirucyate /
yathā na rājaiva rājāsanamiti 		gnas pa po nyid la ni gnas pa zhes mi bya ste /
dper na rgyal po nyid rgyal po'i bstan ma yin pa bzhin no /
yāṃśca dharmānabhiruhya vijñānaṃ vāhayati naunāvikanyāyena te dharmā vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ /
natu vijñānaṃ vijñānamevāruhya vāhayatyato noktamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ vijñāne āhāre asti nandī asti rāga iti /
yatrāsti nandī asti rāgaḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ tatra vijñānamadhirūḍhamiti /
tatkatham /
sapta ca vijñānasthitayaḥ pañcaskandhasaṃgṛhītā iti tatkatham 		yang na chos gang dag la rnam par shes pa gnas nas gru dang mnyen pa'i tshul du 'gro bar byed pa'i chos de dag rnam par shes pa gnas pa dag ces bshad na /
rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par shes pa la gnas nas 'gro bar byed pa ni ma yin pas de'i phyir ma bshad do zhes zer ro /
'o na mdo las /
rnam par shes pa'i zas la dga' ba yang yod /
'dod chags kyang yod do /
gang la dga' ba yod cing 'dod chags yod pa de la rnam par shes pa brten cing gnas so zhes gang gsungs pa de ni ji lta bu /
rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun phung po lnga'i rang bzhin dag yin no zhes bya ba de yang ji lta bu /
evaṃ tarhyabhedenopapattyāyatanasaṃgṛhīteṣu skandheṣu sābhirāmāyāṃ vijñānapravṛttau vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitiḥ de lta na 'o na ni bye brag med par ni skye ba'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i phung po dag la mngon par dga' ba dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa 'jug na rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa gnas pa zhes bya'o /
pratyekaṃ tu yathā rūpādayo vijñānasya saṃkleśāya bhavanti /
tasmāccatasṛṣu vijñānasthitiṣu 		so sor dbye ba ni ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa yin pa ltar rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig ni de lta ma yin te /
de lta bas na rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi dag tu /
kevalam /
vijñānaṃ na sthitiḥ proktaṃ /
api ca kṣetrabhāvena bhagavatā catasro vijñānasthitayo deśitāḥ 		rnam shes 'ba' zhig gnas par ma bshad do /
gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi ni zhing gi ngo bor bstan la /
vījabhāvena ca sopādānaṃ vijñānaṃ kṛtsnameveti na punarbījaṃ bījasya kṣetrabhāvena vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvetyabhiprāyaṃ parikalapayāmāsa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa zag par ni sa bon gyi ngo bo kho nar bstan gyi /
sa bon nyid sa bon gyi zhing gi ngo bor rnam par gzhag par gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa yongs su brtag go /
ye dharmāḥ sahavarttino vijñānasya te 'sya kṣetrabhāvena sādhīyāṃso bhavantīti ta evāsya sthitaya uktāḥ /
atha kathaṃ saptabhirvijñānasthitibhiścatasro vijñānasthitayaḥ saṃgṛhītāścātasṛbhirvā sapta /
naiva hi saptabhiścatasro nāpi catasṛbhiḥ sapta /
catuṣkoṭi tu saṃgrahe 		chos gang dag rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba de dag ni 'di'i zhing gi ngo bor shin tu legs pa yin pas de dag nyid 'di'i gnas pa dag ces bshad do /
yang ci rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun gyis bzhi bsdus sam /
'on te bzhis bdun bsdus she na /
bdun gyis bzhi yang ma yin la bzhis kyang bdun ma yin gyi /
bsdu na mu ni bzhi yin no /
saṃgrahe vicāryamāṇe catuṣkoṭikaṃ veditavyam /
syātsaptabhiḥ saṃgṛhītaṃ na catasṛbhirityevamādi 		bsdu ba dpyad na bdun gyis bsdus la bzhis ma yin pa yang yod de zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa mu bzhir rog par bya ste /
prathamāḥ koṭiḥ saptasu yaddhijñānam mu dang po ni bdun dag tu rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'o /
dvitīyā apāyeṣu caturthe dhyāne bhavāgre ca vijñānavarjyāḥ skandhāḥ gnyis pa ni ngan song rnams dang bsam gtan bzhi pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo na rnam par shes pa ma gtogs pa'i phung po rnams so /
tṛtīyā saptasu catvāraḥ skandhāścaturthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā /
yaccaitat gatyādibhedabhinnaṃ traidhātukamuktaṃ veditavyāḥ 		gsum pa dag ni bdun dag tu phung po bzhi rnams so /
bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
'gro ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa'i khams gsum bshad pa gang yin pa /
catasro yonayastatra sattvānāmaṇḍajādayaḥ der ni sgo nga las skyes sogs /
sems can skye gnas bzhi dag tu /
rig par bya ste /
aṇḍajā yonirjarāyujā saṃsvedajā upapādukā yoniḥ /
yonirnāma jātiḥ /
yuvāntyasyāṃ sattvā miśrībhavanti prasavasāmyāditi yoniḥ /
aṇḍajā yoniḥ katamā /
ye sattvā aṇḍebhyo jāyante /
tadyathā haṃsakroñcacakravākamayūraśūkaśārikādayaḥ 		sgo nga las skyes pa'i skye gnas dang mngal nas skyes pa'i skye gnas dang drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnas dang rdzus te skyes pa'i skye gnas so /
skye gnas zhes bya ba ni skye ba yin te /
'dir sems can rnams 'chol bar 'gyur zhing skye ba thun mong pa'i phyir 'dra bar 'gyur bas skye gnas so /
sgo nga las skyes pa'i skye gnas gang zhe na /
sems can gang dag sgo nga las skyes pa rnams te /
'di lta ste /
ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang rma bya dang ne tso dang ri skegs la sogs pa lta bu'o /
jarāyujā yoiḥ katamā mngal nas skyes pa'i skye gnas gang zhe na /
ye sattvā jarāyorjāyante /
tadyathā hastyaśvagomahiṣakharavarāhādayaḥ 		sems can gang dag mngal las skyes pa rnams te /
'di lta ste /
glang po che dang rta dang ba lang dang ma he dang bong bu dang phag la sogs pa lta bu'o /
saṃsvedajā yoniḥ katamā drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnas gang zhe na /
ye sattvā bhūsaṃsvedājjāyante sems can gang dag 'byung ba'i drod gsher las skye ba rnams te /
tadyathā kṛmikīṭapataṅgamaśakādayaḥ /
upapādukā yoniḥ katamā 		'di lta ste srin bu dang sbur pa dang phye ma leb dang sbrang bu la sogs pa lta bu'o /
rdzus te 'byung ba'i skye gnas gang zhe na /
ye sattvā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetāḥ sakṛdupajāyante /
ata eva upapadane read: upapādane sādhukāritvādupapādukā ityucyante 		sems can gang dag dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin zhing dman pa ma yin la /
yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan par cig car du skye ba rnams so /
de nyid kyi phyir de dag skye ba la mdzes par byed pa'i phyir rdzus te 'bang ba rnams zhes bya ste /
tadyathā devanārakāntarābhavikādayaḥ 'di lta ste /
lha dang srid pa bar ma la sogs pa lta bu'o /
atha kasyāṃ gatau kati yonayaḥ saṃvidyanta ityāha yang 'gro ba gang na skye gnas du zhig yod ce na /
smras pa /
caturdhā nara tiryañcaḥ mi dang dud 'gro rnam pa bzhi /
manuṣyāścaturvidhāḥ mi rnams ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
aṇḍajāstāvadyathā kroñcīniryātau śailopaśailau sthavirau mṛgāramātuśca dvātriṃśat putrāḥ pañcālarājasya ca pañca putraśatāni re zhig sgo nga las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste /
khrung khrung mo las skyes pa brag dang nye brag dang ri dvags 'dzin gyi ma'i bu sum cu rtsa gnyis dang rgyal po lnga len gyi bu lnga brgya rnams so /
jarāyujā yathedānīm /
saṃsvedajāstadyathā māndhātucāruśpacārūpacārukapotamālinyāmrapālyādayaḥ 		mngal na skyes pa ni ji ltar da ltar gyi lta bu'o /
drod gsher las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste /
da las nu ba dang mdzes pa dang nye mdzes dang thi ba'i phreng ba can dang aa mra skyong ma la sogs pa lta bu'o /
upapādukāḥ punaḥ prāthamakalpikāḥ /
evaṃ tiryañco 'pi caturvidhāḥ 		rdzus te skye ba ni bskal pa dang po pa rnams kho na'o /
dud 'gro yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
trividhā dṛśyanta eva rnam pa gsum ni snang ba kho nar zad do /
upapādukāstu nāgasuparṇi prabhṛtayaḥ rdzus te skye ba rnams ni klu dang 'dab bzangs la sogs pa lta bu'o /
nārakā upapādukāḥ /
antarābhavadevāśca /
sarve nārakā antarābhavikāḥ devāścopapādukā eva 		dmyal ba rnams dang lha rnams dang /
srid pa bar ma rdzus te skye /
dmyal ba dang srid pa bar ma pa dang lha thams cad ni rdzus te skye ba kho na yin no /
pretā api jarāyujāḥ yi dvags mngal nas skye ba yang yin /
apiśabdādapyupapādukā iti /
āyuṣmate mahāmaudgalyāyanāya pretī nivedayate 		'di zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rdzus te skye ba dag yin no zhes bya ste /
tshe dang ldan pa mod gal gyi bu chen po la yi dvags mo zhig na re /
pañca putrānahaṃ rātrau divā paña tathā parān bdag gis mtshan mo bu lnga dang /
de bzhin nyi na mo gzhan lnga dag /
bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptistathāpi me bskyed nas de dag za mod kyi /
'on kyang bdag ni tshim pa med /
ces smras pa'o /
katamā yoniḥ sarvasādhvī /
upapādukā /
atha kimarthaṃ caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ prāptopapattivaśitve 'pi jarāyurjāṃ yorni bhajate /
evaṃ hi kriyamāṇe mahāntamarthaṃ paśyati /
jñātisaṃbandhena mahataḥ śākyavaṃśasya dharme 'vataraṇārthaṃ cakravarttivaṃśyo 'yamiti cānyeṣāṃ bahumānādarāvarjanārthaṃ manuṣyabhūtā api caināṃ siddhiṃ gacchantīti vineyānā mutsāhārtham /
itarathā hyaprajñāyamānakulagotraḥ ko 'pyayaṃ māyāpuruṣa ityevaṃ parikalpayeyurdevaḥ piśāca iti vā yathā 'nyatīrthyā apabhāṣante kalpaśatasyātyayādevaṃvidho māyāvī loke prādurbhūya māyayā lokaṃ bhakṣayatīti 		skye gnas thams cad kyi nang na bzang ba gang yin zhe na /
rdzus te skye ba yin no /
'o na ci'i phyir srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba la dbang thob pa yang mngal nas skye ba'i skye gnas la brten ce na; de ltar mdzad na don chen po gzigs pa yin te /
nye du dang 'brel bas sh'akya'i rigs chen po chos la gzud pa'i phyir dang 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs yin no zhes gzhan dag rim gro bskyed du gzhug pa'i phyir dang mir gyur pa dag gis kyang grub pa 'di thob bo zhes gdul bya rnams spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro /
de lta ma yin te /
rigs dang gdung med na /
ji ltar gzhan mu stegs can na re bskal pa brgyar 'das nas sgyu ma mkhan 'di lta bu zhig 'jig rten du byung nas sgyu mas 'jig rten za'o zhes kha zer ba ltar 'di su zhig yin /
apare tvāhuḥ /
śarīradhātūnāmavasthāpanārthaṃ yeṣumanuṣyā anye ca prajāṃ vijñāya sahasraśaḥ svargaṃ ca prāptā apavargaṃ ceti upapādukānāṃ hi sattvānāṃ bāhyabījābhāvān mṛtānāṃ kāyo nāvatiṣṭhate niśānta iva tailapradyoto 'ntardhīyate 		sgyu ma'i skyes bu'am /
'on te sha za zhig ces de snyam du yongs su rtog par 'gyur ro /
gzhan dag na re gang dag la mi rnams dang gzhan dag gis mchod pa byas nas /
