stong phrag gis mtho ris dang byang grol 'thob pa ring bsrel sku gdung rnams bzhag pa'i phyir te /
rdzus te skye ba'i sems can rnams la ni phyi'i sa bon med pa'i phyir shi ba rnams kyi lus mi gnas te /
tho rangs kyi til mar gyi mar me shi bar gyur pa bzhin no zhes zer te /
ādhiṣṭhānikīmṛddhiṃ bhagavata icchatāṃ na yukta ekṣa parihāraḥ /
praśnātpraśnāntaramupajāyate 		bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul yin par 'dod pa rnams la ni lan de rigs pa ma yin no /
dri ba las dri ba gzhan 'byung ste /
yadyapyupapādukānāṃ kāyanidhanaṃ na prajñayate kathamuktaṃ sūtre upapādukaḥ suparṇī upapādukaṃ nāgamuddharati bhakṣārthamiti /
noktaṃ bhakṣayatītyapi tūddharati bhakṣārthamajñatvādityadoṣaḥ 		gal te rdzus te skye ba rnams kyi lus zhig pa med na /
ji ltar mdo las rdzus te skye ba'i nam mkha' lding gis rdzus te skye ba'i klu bza' ba'i phyir 'byin to zhes gsungs she na /
za'o zhes ni ma gsungs pas ma shes nas bza' ba'i phyir 'byin pas nyes pa med do /
bhakṣayati vā yāvanna mṛto bhavati na pounrmṛtasyāsya tṛṣyatīti yang na ji srid ma shi'i bar du za bar byed kyi shi pa de'i tshim par 'gyur pa ni ma yin no /
katamā yoniḥ sarvavahvī /
upapādukaiva /
sā hi dvigatī tisṛṇāṃ ca pradeśaḥ sarve cāntarābhāvikā iti 		skye gnas thams cad kyi nang nas mang ba gang yin zhe na /
rdzus te skye ba yin te /
de ni 'gro ba gnyis dang gsum gyi phyogs dang srid pa bar ma thams cad yin no /
ko 'yamastarābhāvo nāma srid pa bar ma zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
mṛtyūpapattibhavayorantarā bhavatīha vaḥ /
maraṇabhavasyopapattibhavasya cāntarā ya ātmabhāvo 'bhinirvarttate deśāntaropapattisamprāptaye so 'ntarābhava ityucyate 		'dir gang 'chi dang skye ba yin /
srid pa'i bar du 'byung ba'o /
lus gang yul gzhan du skye ba thob par bya ba'i phyir 'chi ba'i srid pa dang skye ba'i srid pa'i bar du mngon par 'grub pa de ni srid pa bar ma zhes bya ste /
gatyantarālatvāt /
kathamayaṃ jātaśca nāma nacopapanno bhavati 		'gro ba'i bar ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
ji ltar na 'di skye ba yang yin la byung ba yang ma yin zhe na /
gamyadeśānupetatvānnopapanno 'ntarābhavaḥ bgrod pa'i yul du ma phyin phyir /
srid pa bar ma byung ba min /
upapattigato hyupapanna ityucyate /
padergatyarthatvāt 		son pa ni byung ba yin na srid pa bar ma 'di ni bgrod par bya ba'i yul du son pa ma yin te /
nacāyaṃ gamyadeśamupagatontarābhavastasmānnopapannaḥ /
kaḥ punarasau deśo gantavyaḥ /
yatrākṣiptasya vīpākasyābhivyaktiḥ samāptiśca 		de lta bas na byung ba ma yin no /
bgrod par bya ba'i yul de gang zhig ce na /
gang du rnam par smin pas 'phangs pa mngon zhing rdzogs pa'o /
vicchinna evopapattibhavo maraṇabhavātsaṃbhavatīti nikāyāntarīyāḥ /
tadetanneṣyate 		sde pa gzhan dag na re /
'chi ba'i srid pa chad pa kho na las skye ba'i srid pa 'byung ngo zhes zer te /
de ni mi 'dod do /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
yuktitaśca āgamataśca /
tatra tāvat yuktiṃ niśrityocyate 		de ci'i phyir zhe na /
rigs pa dang lung las te /
re zhig rigs pa la brten nas /
vrīhisantānasādharmvādavicchinnabhavodbhavaḥ 'bru'i rgyun dang chos mthun phyir /
srid pa chad las 'byung ba min /
santānavarttināṃ hi dharmāṇāmavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāvo dṛṣṭastadyathā vrīhisantānasya rgyun gyi 'jug pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun mi 'chad par yul gzhan dag tu 'byung ba mthong ste /
dper na 'bru'i rgyun lta bu'o /
tasmādasyāpi sattvasantānasyāvicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāvo bhaviṣṇuḥ de lta bas na sems can gyi sems kyi rgyun 'di yang mi 'chad par yul gzhan du 'byung ba'i chos can yin no /
vicchinno 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ prādurbhāvastadyathā ādarśādiṣu bimbāt pratibimbasya chad nas 'byung ba yang mthong ste /
dper na me long la sogs pa dag gi nang du gzugs las gzugs brnyan lta bu'o /
evaṃ maraṇabhavādupapattibhavasya syāt de bzhin du 'chi ba'i srid pa las kyang skye ba'i srid pa rung ngo zhe na /
pratibimbamasiddhatvādasāmyācchānidarśanam gzugs brnyan ma grub phyir ba dang /
mi 'dra'i phyir na dpe ma yin /
pratibimbaṃ nāmānyadevotpadyate dharmāhntaramityasiddhametat /
siddhāvapi ca satyāmasāmyādanidarśanaṃ bhavati /
kathaṃ tāvadasiddham /
sahaikatra dvayābhāvāt 		gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba kha dog gi khyad par gzhan kho na zhig 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de ni ma grub bo /
grub tu zin kyang mi 'dra ba'i phyir dpe ma yin no /
re zhig ji ltar ma grub ce na /
gcig na lhan cig gnyis med phyir /
tatraiva hi deśe ādarśarūpaṃ dṛśyate pratibimbaṃ ca /
na caikatra deśe rūpadvayasyāsti sahabhāva āśrayabhūtabhedāt /
tathā digbhedavyavasthiterekasminvāpyambudeśe svābhimukhadeśasthānāṃ rūpāṇāmanyo 'nyaṃ pratibimbakamupalabhyate natvekatra rūpe dvayoḥ paśyatoḥ sahadarśanaṃ na bhavatīti na tatra rūpāntaropapattiryuktā 		yul de nyid na me long gi gzugs kyang snang /
gzugs brnyan yang snang ste /
rten gyi 'byung ba tha dad pa'i phyir yul gcig tu gzugs gnyis lhan cig 'byung ba ni med do /
de bzhin du phyogs tha dad pa na gnas pa rnams kyi mtshe'u'i chu yul gcig na rang gi mdun rol gyi yul na gnas pa'i gzugs rnams kyi gzugs brnyan phan tshun dmigs te /
gzugs gcig la lta ba po gnyis kyis lhan cig mi mthong ba ni ma yin pas der gzugs gzhan zhig 'byung bar rigs pa ni ma yin no /
chāyātapayośca dvayoḥ sahaikatrabhāvo na dṛṣṭaḥ /
upalabhyate ca chāyāstha ādarśe sūryasya prativimbakamiti na yukto 'sya tatra prādurbhāvaḥ 		grib ma dang nyi ma gnyis kyang lhan cig 'byung ba ma mthong ba na grib ma na 'dug pa'i me long gi nang na nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan yang dmigs pas der de 'byung bar rigs pa ni ma yin no /
yang na /
athavā sahaikatra dvayābhāvāditi katamasya dvayasya /
ādarśatalasyendupratibimbakasya ca /
anyatraiva hi deśe ādarśatalaṃ bhavatyanyatraivāntargataṃ candrapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate kūpa ivodakam /
tacca tatropapadyamānaṃ nānyatropalabhyate /
ato nāstyeva tat kiñcit /
sāmagryāstu sa tasyāstādṛśaḥ prabhāvo yattathā darśanaṃ bhavati 		gcig na lhan cig gnyis med phyir /
zhes bya ba gnyis gang zhe na /
me long gi ngos dang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan te /
me long gi ngos kyang gzhan kho na la yod la /
zla ba'i gzugs brnyan nang du song ba yang khron pa'i chu bzhin du gzhan kho na na snang ngo /
de yang de'i nang du 'byung na ni gzhan na dmigs par mi 'gyur ro /
de lta bas na de ni cung zad kyang med kyi gang phyir de ltar snang ba de ni tshogs la de'i mthu de 'dra ba yin te /
acintyo hi dharmāṇāṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ śaktibhedaḥ chos rnams kyi mthu'i bye brag ni bsam gyis mi khyab po /
evaṃ tāvandasiddhatvāt re zhig ma grub pa'i phyir ni de lta bu yin no /
kathamasāmyādanidarśanaṃ bhavati ji ltar na mi 'dra ba'i phyir dpe ma yin zhe na /
asantānād rgyun min phyir /
nahi vimvasya pratibimbakaṃ santānabhūtamādarśasantānasaṃvaddhatvāt sahabhāvācca /
yathā maraṇasyopapattibhavaḥ 		ji ltar 'chi ba'i srid pa skye ba'i srid pa lta bur gzugs brnyan ni gzugs kyi rgyun du gyur pa ma yin te /
me long gi rgyud dang 'brel pa'i phyir dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
santānaṃ ca pratyavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāva udāhṛato nāsantānamityasāmyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pratibimbasya ca rgyun la mi 'chad par yul gzhan dag tu 'byung bar brjod kyi rgyun ma yin pa la ni ma yin pas dpe mi 'dra ba yin no /
gzugs brnyan ni /
dvayodayāt /
dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ pratibimbasyodayo bhavati /
bimbāccādarśā cceti yat prādhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadāśrityotpadyate /
nacaivamupapattibhavasyāpi dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃbhavo maraṇabhavāccānyataśca pradhānabhūtādityato 'pyayamasamāno dṛṣṭāntaḥ 		gnyis las 'byung phyir /
gzugs brnyan ni gzugs dang me long dang rgyu gnyis las 'byung bar 'gyur te /
gtso bo'i rgyu gang yin pa de la brten nas 'byung na /
skye ba'i srid pa yang de ltar 'chi ba'i srid pa dang gtso bo'i rgyu gang yang rung ba zhig dang rgyu gnyis las 'byung ba ni med do /
de'i phyir yang de'i 'di ni mi 'dra ba yin no /
na ca yuktamuktaṃ bāhyameva cetanaṃ śukraśoṇitaṃ pradhānakāraṇamiti /
yatra cāndhakāṇa eva prādurbhāva upapādukānāṃ tatra kiṃ parikalpyate /
evaṃ tāvadyuktito neṣyate /
na marāṇabhavādvicchinna upapattibhavaprādurbhāvaḥ 		phyi'i khu chu dang khrag la sogs pa sems pa med pa gtso bo'i rgyu yin pa yang rigs pa ma yin te /
gang du rdzus te skye ba rnams nam mkha' kho na la 'byung ba der ci zhig yongs su brtag /
de ltar re zhig rigs pa las 'chi ba'i srid pa 'byung bar mi 'dod do /
tasmādastyevāntarābhavaḥ de lta bas na srid pa bar ma ni yod pa nyid do /
kaṇṭhokteścāsti /
sūtra uktaṃ sapta bhavāḥ 		mgur nas gsungs phyir yod; mdo las /
srid pa ni bdun te /
narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti /
naitatsūtraṃ tairāmnāyate 		dmyal ba'i srid pa dang dud 'gro'i srid pa dang yi dags kyi srid pa dang lha'i srid pa dang mi'i srid pa dang las kyi srid pa dang srid pa bar ma'o zhes gsungs so /
mdo 'di ni de dag mi 'don to zhe na /
itastarhi /
gandharvāt 		'o na /
dri za zhes bya ba 'di las te /
trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt mātuḥ kukṣau garbhasyāvakrāntirbhavati /
mātā kalyā spi bhavati ṛtumatī ca /
mātāpitarau raktau bhavataḥ sanipatitau ca /
gandharvaśca pratyupasthito bhātīti 		gnas gsum mngon du gyur pas ma'i mngal du bu chags par gyur te /
ma rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang pha ma chags par gyur cing phrad pa dang dri za yang nye bar gnas par gyur na'o zhes gsungs pa /
antarābhavaṃ hitvā ko 'nyo gandharvaḥ /
etadapi naiva tairāmnāyate 		srid pa bar ma ma gtogs par dri za gzhan gang zhig yin /
'di yang de dag 'di skad du mi 'don to /
kathaṃ tarhi /
skndhabhedaśca pratyupasthito bhavatīti /
yadyevamāśvalāyanasūtraṃ kathaṃ nīyate 		'o na ji ltar zhe na /
phung po zhig pa nye bar gnas par gyur na'o zhes 'don to /
gal te de lta na lnga len gyi bu'i mdo /
jānanta bhavanto yo 'sau gandharvaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ khyod kyi dri za nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa 'di rgyal rigs sam /
kṣatriyo vā 'sau brāhmaṇo vā vaiśyo vā śūdro vā bram ze 'am /
rje'u rigs sam; dmangs rigs sam /
yadi vā pūrvasyā diśa āgato yadi vā dakṣiṇasyā paścimāyā uttrasyā iti 'on te shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa zhig gam /
'on te lho dang nub dang byang nas 'ongs pa zhig shes sam zhes bya ba ji ltar drang /
nahi skandhabhedasyāgamanaṃ yujyate /
athaitadapi na paṭhacyate 		phung po zhig pa ni 'ong bar rung ba ma yin no /
'on te 'di yang mi 'don to zhe na /
itastarhi /
pañcokteḥ 		'o na /
sngar gsungs /
pañcānāgāmina ityuktaṃ bhagavatā /
antarāparinirvāyī upapadyaparinirvāyī anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī ūrdhvastrotāśceti /
asatyantarābhave kathamantarāparinirvāyī nāma syāt 		zhes bya ba 'di las te /
bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir mi 'ong ba ni lnga ste /
bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang gong du 'pho ba'o zhes gsungs pa srid pa bar ma med na ji ltar bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya bar 'gyur /
antarā nāma devāḥ santītyeke /
upapadyādayo 'pi hi nāma devā evaṃ sati prasajyate 		kha cig na re bar ma dor zhes bya ba'i lha dag cig yod do zhes zer ro /
de lta na skyes ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang lha dag cig yin par thal bar 'gyur ro /
tasmānyeyaṃ kalpanā sādhvī /
itaśca 		de lta bas na rtog pa 'di ni bzang po ma yin no /
gatisūtrataḥ /
sapta satpuruṣagatayaḥ ityatra sūtre /
antarāparinirvāyiṇastraya uktāḥ /
kāladeśaprakarṣabhedena /
tadyathā parīttaḥ sakalikāgnirabhinivarttamāna eva parinirvāyādevaṃ prathamaḥ 		'gro mdo zhes bya ba 'di las kyang 'grub ste /
skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun zhes bya ba'i mdo las kyang dus dang yul gyi khyad par gyi bye brag gis bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gsum du bshad de /
dper na zhog ma'i me chung du mngon par 'grub bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu ni dang po yin no /
tadyathā 'yaḥ prapāṭikā utpatantyeva nirvāyādevaṃ dvitīyaḥ dper na lcags kyi tsha tsha gnam du yar ba bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu ni gnyis pa'o /
tadyathā 'yaḥprapātikā utplutya pṛthivyāmapatitaiva nirvāyādevaṃ tṛtīyaḥ /
nacaivamantarā nāma devāstriprakārāḥ kāladeśaprakarṣabhinnāḥ santīti kalpanaiveyaṃ kevalā 		dper na lcags kyi tsha tsha gnam du yar nas sa la ma lhung ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu ni gsum pa'o zhes gsungs la /
bar mdo zhes bya ba'i lha ni yul dang dus kyi khyad par gyi tha dad pa rnam pa gsum pa de lta bu med pas 'di ni rtog pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do /
anye punarāhuḥ /
āyupramāṇāntare vā devasamīpāntare vā yaḥ kleśān prajahāti so 'ntarāparinirvāyī /
sa punardhātugato vā parinirvāti saṃjñāgato vā vitarkagato vā /
tena trividho bhavatīti 		gzhan dag na re gang zhig tshe'i tshad kyi bar du'am /
lha dang nye ba'i bar du nyon mongs pa rnams spong bar byed pa gang yin pa der ni bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yin te /
de yang khams kyi gnas skabs pa'am /
'du shes kyi gnas skabs pa'am /
rnam par rtog pa'i gnas skabs pa zhig yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
des na rnam pa gsum yin no /
prathamo vā rūpadhātau nikāyasabhāgaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāti yang na dang po ni gzugs kyi khams su ris mthun pa yongs su blangs nas mya ngan las 'da' ba yin no /
dvitīyo devasamṛddhiṃ cānubhūya gnyis pa ni lha rnams kyi 'byor ba nyams su myong nas so /
tṛtīyo devānāṃ dharmasaṃgītimanupraviśya gsum pa ni lha rnams kyi chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i nang du zhugs nas so /
upapadyaparinirvāyī punaḥ prakarṣayuktāṃ saṃgītimanupraviśya parinirvāti bhūyasā vā āyurūpahatya nopapannamātra eveti ta ete sarve 'pi śakalikādidṛṣṭāntairna saṃvadhyante skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni yang dag par 'gro ba mchog tu ldan pa'i nang du zhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am /
skyes pa tsam kho nar ma yin gyi tshe phal cher bcom nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o zhes zer te /
deśagativiśeṣābhāvāt /
ārupyeṣvapi cāntarāparinirvāyī paṭhyetāyuḥpramāṇāntare parinirvāṇāt /
na ca paṭhyate /
dhyānaiścatasro daśikā ārupyaiḥ saptikātrayam 		de dag thams cad kyang yul du 'gro ba'i bye brag med pa'i phyir zhog ma la sogs pa'i dpe dag dang mi 'byor ro /
tshe'i tshad kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir gzugs med pa dag tu yang bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gsungs par 'gyur ba zhig na /
bsam gtan dag gi bcu tshan bzhi /
gzugs med dag gi bdun tshan gsum /
saṃjñayā ṣaṭṭikāṃ kṛtvā vargo bhavati samuditaḥ 'du shes kyi ni drug tshan du /
mdzad nas tshoms su yang dag bsdeb /
ityetasyāyurdānagāthāyām /
tasmādetadapi sarvaṃ kalpanāmātram 		zhes gsungs pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di las kyang mi 'byung ngo /
de lta bas na de dag thams cad kyang rtog pa tsam du zad do /
athaitānyapi sūtrāṇi tairnāmnāyante 'on te de dag ni mdo de dag kyang mi 'don to zhe na /
kimidānīṃ kurmo yacchāstā ca parinirvṛtaḥ śāsanaṃ cedamanāyakaṃ bahudhā bhinnaṃ bhidyate cādyāpi yathecchaṃ granthataścārthataśca /
yeṣāṃ tu tāvadayamāgamaḥ pramāṇaṃ teṣāmāgamato 'pi siddho 'ntarābhavaḥ /
yattarhi sūtra uttam atha ca punardūṣī māraḥ svaśarīreṇāvicau mahānarake prapatita iti 		ston pa gang yin pa ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das /
bstan pa 'di'i 'dren pa ni med /
rnam pa mang po ni tha dad kyi steng du da dung yang tshig dang don la dga' dgur byed na go /
da ci zhig byar yod de re zhig gang dag la lung 'di tshad ma yin pa de dag la ni lung las kyang srid pa bar ma grub bo /
tat kathamiti 'o na mdo las /
sa hi jīvanneva nārakībhirjvālābhirāliṅgitaḥ /
kālalṃ kṛtvā 'ntarābhavenāvīciṃ prāpta ityayaṃ tatrābhiprayaḥ /
atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi kāyasya nikṣepaṃ na pratīkṣante /
ato 'sya dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma pūrvaṃ vīpakvaṃ paścādupapadyavedanīyamiti /
idamidānīṃ kathaṃ nīyate pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi yāni kṛtvopacitya samanantaraṃ narakeṣūpapadyata iti 		de nas bdud sun 'byin byed rang gi lus kho nas mnar med pa'i dmyal pa chen por lhung do zhes gang gsungs pa ji ltar drang 'dir dgos pa ni de gson po kho nar dmyal ba'i me dag gis bskor te shi nas srid pa bar mas mnar med par song do snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
las shin tu drag po yongs su rdzogs pa rnams ni lus 'dor ba la mi sdod pas de'i phyir 'di'i mthong ba'i chos la myang bar 'gyur ba'i las ni dang por smin la /
skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ni phyis smin te /
da ni mtshams med pa lnga'i las gang dag byas shing bsags nas de ma thag tu dmyal ba dag tu skye'o zhes gsungs pa 'di ji ltar drang /
anyāṃ gatimagatvetyabhiprāyaḥ /
upapadyavedanīyatvaṃ tatra karmaṇo dyotitam /
atha yathārutaṃ kalpyate /
pañcaiva kṛtvā naikamiti prāpnoti 		dgongs pa ni 'gro ba gzhan du mi 'gro bar zhes bya ba yin te /
der ni skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las su gsungs so /
'on te sgra ji bzhin du brtags na ni lnga kho na byas nas yin gyi gcig ces bya bar yang mi 'gyur la /
kriyānantaraṃ ca /
na kālāntaraṃ jīvitvā ko vā 'ntarābhavasyopapadyamānatvaṃ necchati 		byas ma thag tu yin gyi dus gzhan gyi bar du gson por 'dug nas kyang ma yin no /
srid pa bar ma skye ba nyid yin par go su zhig mi 'dod de /
antarā bhavenaiva hyasau maraṇāntaraṃ narakeṣūpapadyate /
abhimukhatvāt /
na ca brūma upapanno bhavatīti 		'di 'chi ba'i srid pa'i mjug thogs su skye ba la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir srid pa bar ma kho nas dmyal ba dag tu skye ba yin gyi skyes pa yin no zhes ni mi smra'o /
'o na /
bram ze na tshod khyer zin rga ba dang /
iyaṃ tarhi gāthā kathaṃ nīyate /
upanītatayā jarāturaḥ saṃprāpto hi mamāntikaṃ dvija 		na ba yin te gshin rje'i drung du phyen /
bar na khyod kyi gnas kyang yod min zhing /
vāso 'pi hi nāsti te 'ntarā pātheyaṃ ca na vidyate tave ti /
atrāpi manuṣyeṣvantarāvāso nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ 		khyod kyi lam brgyags kyang ni yod ma yin /
zhes gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ji ltar drang /
'dir yang dgongs pa ni mi dag gi nang na gnas su med do snyam pa yin no /
athavā 'ntarābhave 'pyasya vāso nāstyupapattideśasaṃprāptiprati gamanādhiṣṭhānāditi /
ayamatrābhiprāyo nāyamabhiprāya iti duta evaitat /
tulya eṣa bhavato 'pyanuyogaḥ /
tasmādubhayasminnapi pakṣe yathhottasūtrāvirodhānna bhavatyetadantarābhavasyābhāve jñāpakam 		yang na skye ba'i yul du phyin par bya ba'i phyir dang 'gro ba la bgegs byed pa med pa'i phyir srid pa bar ma na yang 'di gnas pa med do snyam pa yin no /
'di la 'di ni dgongs pa yin gyi 'di ni dgongs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las brtags pa 'di ni khyod la yang mtshungs te /
de lta bas na gnyi ga'i phyogs la yang ji skad gsungs pa'i mdo mi 'gal ba'i phyir 'di ni srid pa bar ma med pa'i khungs ma yin no /
jñāpakaṃ hi nāmāgatikā gatiriti /
atha kāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyataḥ kimākṛtirantarābhavo 'bhinivarttate 		khungs zhes bya ba ni shes par byed pa gzhan du shes par mi byed pa yin no /
yang 'gro ba gang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i srid pa bar ma'i sha tshugs ji lta bu zhig mngon par 'grub ce na /
ekākṣepādasāvaiṣyatpūrvakālabhavākṛtiḥ de ni 'phen pa gcig pa'i phyir /
sngon dus srid 'byung sha tshugs can /
yenaiva karmaṇā gatirākṣipyate tenaivāntarābhavastatprāptaye las gang gis 'gro ba 'phen pa de nyid kyi der phyin par bya ba'i phyir sred pa bar ma yang 'phen te /
ato yāṃ gatiṃ gantā bhavati tasyāṃ gatau ya āgamiṣyatpūrvakālabhavastasyaivāsyākṛtirbhavati de'i phyir de ni 'gro ba gang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro bde dus snga ma'i srid pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i sha tshugs lta bur 'gyur ro /
evaṃ tarhi śunīprabṛtīnāmekasmin kukṣau pāñcagatiko 'ntarābhavo 'bhinirvarttate iti nārako 'ntarābhavaḥ kukṣiṃ nirdahet /
pūrvakālabhave 'pi tāvannārakā na nityaṃ prajvalitā bhavantyutsadeṣu bhramantaḥ kiṃ punarantarābhavikāḥ 		de lta na 'o na khyi mo la sogs pa'i mngal gcig tu 'gro ba lnga pa'i srid pa bar ma mngon par 'grub pas dmyal ba'i srid pa bar mas ma'i mngal tshig par 'gyur ro zhe na /
re zhig srid pa snga ma la yang dmyal ba pa rnams lhag pa dag na 'phyan pa na rtag tu 'bar ba ma yin na srid pa bar ma pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
astu vā prajvalitaḥ /
sa tu yathā na draṣṭuṃ śasyate tathā na spraṣṭumapyacchatvādātmabhāvasyetyacodyametat 		yang na 'bar du chug na yang de ni lus shin tu dang ba'i phyir ji lta ba bltar mi nus pa de ltar reg pa yang mi nus pas 'di ni klan kar mi rung ngo /
antarābhavānāmapyanyonyaṃ kukṣāvasaṃśleṣātkarmapratibandhācca na dāhaḥ /
pramāṇaṃ tu yathā pañcaṣaḍvarṣasya dārakasya sa tu ṣaṭindriyo bhavati bodhisattvasya punaryathā saṃpūrṇayūnaḥ salakṣaṇānuvyañjanaśca 		srid pa bar ma rnams kyang mngal na phan tshun mi reg pa'i phyir dang las la rag lus pa'i phyir mi tshig go /
bong tshod ni /
dper na byis pa lo lnga 'am drug lon pa lta bu ste /
de yang dbang po gsal ba yin no /
byang chub sems dpa' ni dper na gzhon nu thor bu lta bu mtshan dang dpe byad dang bcas pa yin no /
ata evāntarābhavasthena mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśatā koṭīśataścāturdvīpikānāmavabhāsitaḥ de nyid kyi phyir srid pa bar ma la gnas pa yum gyi lhums su zhugs pas gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya snang bar mdzad do /
yattarhi mātā bodhisatvasya svapne gajapotaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ kukṣiṃ praviśantamadrākṣīt /
nimittamātraṃ tat tiryagyoneściravyāvṛttatvāt /
tadyathā kṛkī rājā daśa svapnānadrākṣīditi 		'o na gang byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi rmi lam na lhums su glang po che'i phru gu dkar po zhugs par gzigs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
dud 'gro'i skye gnas bzlog nas yun ring du lon pa'i phyir de ni mtshan ma tsam du zad de /
karikūpasaktu candanakalabhārāmāsta thā kaperabhiṣekaḥ /
aśucikapiḥ paṭakalahāviti daśa dṛṣṭā nṛpeṇa kṛkiṇā svapnāḥ /
naiva cāntarābhavikaḥ kukṣiṃ bhittvā praviśatyapi tu māturyonidvāreṇa 		dper na rgyal po kri kis glang po dang khron pa dang phye dang tsan dan dang tshal dang glang po che'i phru gu dang spre'u gnyis dang ras yug dang 'thab mo zhes bya ba rmi lam bcu mthong ba lta bu'o /
srid pa bar ma ni lto ba brtol te 'jug pa ma yin gyi skye gnas kyi sgo nas 'jug ste /
ata eva yamalayoryaḥ paścāt prajāyate sa jyāyānucyate yaḥ pūrvaṃ sa kanīyāniti de nyid kyi phyir mtshe ma las gang phyis byung ba de ni nu bo zhes bya'o /
gang sngar byung ba de ni phu bo zhes bya'o /
dharmasūtravibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate 'o na chos ldan rab 'byor gyis /
glang chen dkar po mche ba drug ldan pa /
vāraṇa tvamupagamya pāṇḍaraṃ ṣaḍviṣāṇaruciraṃ catuṣkramam rkang bzhi mdzes dang ldan par zhal bzhes nas /
drang srong gnas zhes pa ni ji bzhin du /
mātṛgarbhaśayanaṃ viśeṣasaṃprajānanṛṣirāśramaṃ yatheti yum gyi lams kyi gnas su zhugs par gyur /
ces bshad pa 'di ji ltar drang zhe na /
naitadavaśyanetavyam /
nahyetat sūtraṃ na vinayaḥ nābhidharmaḥ 		'di ni gdon mi za bar drang bar bya ba ma yin te /
'di ni mdo sde yang ma yin /
'dul ba yang ma yin /
chos mngon pa yang ma yin gyi /
kāvyametat /
kavīnāṃ ca kāvyaṃ samāyojayatāṃ kecit bhāvāḥ samāropitā gacchanti 		'di ni rang bzo yin te /
rang bzo mkhan rang bzo sbyor ba rnams kyi bsam pa kha cig ni sgro 'dogs par yang 'gyur ro /
athavā netavyameva /
yathā 'sya mātā svapne taṃ praviśantamadrākṣittathā so 'pi gāthāmakārṣīditi 		'on te gdon mi za bar drang bar bya'o zhe na yang ji ltar yum gyi rmi lam na de zhugs par gzigs pa ltar des kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di ltar byas so zhes de ltar drang bar bya'o /
rūpāvacaro 'pyantarābhavaḥ saṃpūrṇapramāṇaḥ savastraśca prādurbhavati gzugs na spyod pa'i srid pa bar ma yang bong tshod rdzogs pa dang ngo tsha shes pa'i shas che ba'i phyir gos dang bcas par 'byung ngo /
apatrāpyotsadatvāt /
bodhisattvasya savastraḥ śuklāyāśca bhikṣuṇyāḥ praṇidhānavaśādhyāvantameva pariveṣṭitā nirdagdhā 		byang chub sems dpa'i yang gos dang bcas pa yin no /
dge slong ma dkar mo'i yang gos dang bcas pa yin te /
smon lam gyi dbang gis de nyid kyis dkris nas bsregs pa'i bar du yin no /
anyo nagnaḥ /
kāmadhātoranapatrāpyotsadatvāt 		'dod pa'i khams na ngo tsha med pa'i shas che ba'i phyir gzhan ni gcer bu yin no /
atha ko 'yaṃ pūrvakālabhavo nāma yang srid pa snga ma zhes bya ba 'di gang yin zhe na /
sa punarmaraṇātpūrva upapattikṣaṇātparaḥ de ni 'chi ba'i sngon rol te /
skye ba'i skad cig phan chad do /
bhavo hi nāmāviśeṣeṇa pañcopādānaskandhāḥ /
sa eva caturdhā bhidyate 		srid pa zhes bya ba ni bye brag med par nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag go /
da ni rnam pa bzhir dbye ste /
antarābhavo yathoktaḥ srid pa bar ma ni ji skad bshad pa'o /
upapattibhabo gatīṣu pratisandhikṣaṇaḥ /
tasmāt pareṇa maraṇakṣaṇaṃ paryudasyānyaḥ sarvo bhavaḥ pūrvakālabhavaḥ 		skye ba'i srid pa ni 'gro ba rnams su nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma'o /
de phan chad 'chi ba'i skad cig ma ma gtogs pa'i srid pa gzhan thams cad ni dus snga ma'i srid pa yin no /
caramakṣaṇo maraṇabhabo yata ūrdhvamantarābhavo bhavati rūpiṣu cetsattveṣūpapadyate skad cig ma tha ma ni 'chi ba'i srid pa yin te /
gal te sems can gzugs can dag gi nang du skye na gang gi 'og tu srid pa bar ma 'byung ba yin no /
sa cāyamantarābhavaḥ /
sajātiśuddhadivyākṣidṛśyaḥ 		srid pa bar ma de yang /
ris mthun lha mig dag pas mthong /
samānajātīyairevāntarābhavikairdṛśyate srid pa bar ma ris mthun pa dag gis mthong ngo /
yeṣāṃ ca divyaṃ cakṣuḥ suviśuddhamabhijñāmayaṃ ta enaṃ paśyanti gang dag la lha'i mig shin tu rnam par dag pa mngon par shes pa las byung ba yod pa de dag gis 'di mthong gi /
upapattikṣuṣā tu na dṛśyate /
jātyarthamacchatvāt 		shin tu dang ba'i phyir skyes nas thob pa'i mig gis ni mi mthong ngo /
devāntarābhavikaḥ sarvān paśyati gzhan dag na re lha'i srid ba bar ma pas ni thams cad mthong ngo /
manuṣyapretatiryagnārakāntarābhavikāḥ pūrva pūrvamapātyetyapare mi dang; yi dags dang dud 'gro dang dmyal ba'i srid pa bar ma rnams kyis ni gong ma ma gtogs pa'o zhes zer ro /
karmarddhivegavān las kyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ldan /
ṛddhirākāśagamanam rdzu 'phrul ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o /
karmaṇā ṛddhiḥ karmarddhiḥ /
tasyā vegaḥ karmarddhivegaḥ śīgratā 		las kyi rdzu 'phrul byed pas na las kyi rdzu 'phrul lo /
de'i shugs ni las kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs de mgyogs pa nyid do /
so 'syāstīti karmarddhivegavān de 'di la yod pas na las kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs dang ldan pa'o /
yenāsau na śakyo buddhairapi pratibanddhum des na 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang dgag par mi spyod de /
karmaṇo 'sya balīyastvāt las stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
sakalākṣaḥ dbang po kun tshang /
samagrapañcendriyaḥ dbang po lnga char tshang pa'o /
apratighavān thogs med ldan /
pratighātaḥ pratighaḥ thogs pa ni rdugs pa'o /
so 'syāstīti pratighavān de 'di la yod pas thogs pa dang ldan pa'o /
na pratighavānapratighavān /
vajrādibhirapyanivāryatvāt 		thogs pa med pa dang ldan pas na thogs med ldan te /
rdo rje la sogs pas kyang mi zlogs pa'i phyir ro /
tathā hi pradīptāyaḥpiṇdabhede tanmadhyasaṃbhūtaḥ krimirūpalabdhaḥ śrūyate 'di ltar lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba gshegs nas de'i nang nas byung ba'i srin bu dmigs so zhes grag go /
yasyāṃ ca gatau sa utpatsyamānastasyāḥ sarvathā /
anivartyaḥ 		de 'gro ba gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de las rnam pa thams cad du mi zlogs te /
nahi kadācinmanuṣyāntarābhavo 'ntardhāya devāntarābhavo bhavatyanyo vā /
niyatamanena yāmeva gatimadhikṛtyābhinirvṛttastasyāmevopapattavyam nānyasyāmiti /
kiṃ punarantarābhavo 'pi kāmāvacaraḥ kavaḍīkāramāhāraṃ bhuṅkte 		mi'i srid pa bar ma med par gyur nas lha'i srid pa bar ma'am /
gzhan du 'gyur ba ni nam yang med kyi 'di 'gro ba gang gi dbang du byas nas mngon par 'grub pa de kho nar skye bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar nges so /
yang ci 'dod pa na spyod pa'i srid pa bar ma yang kham gyi zas za'am zhe na /
omityāha /
na tvaudārikam 		smras pa de bzhin te /
rags pa ni ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
sa gandhabhuk /
ata eva gandharva ityucyate /
dhātūnāmanekārthatvāt 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
de ni dri za'o /
de nyid kyi phyir dri za zhes bya'o /
hrasvatvaṃ śakandhukarkandhuvat /
alpeśākhyastu durgandhāharo maheśakhyaḥ sugandhāhāraḥ 		dbang chung bar grags pa ni dri mi zhim pa za ba'o /
dbang che bar grags pa ni dri zhim po za ba'o /
kiyantaṃ kālamavatiṣṭhate /
nāsti niyama iti bhadantaḥ 		dus ji srid kyi bar du gnas she na /
btsun pa na re nges pa med de /
yāvadupapattisāmagrīṃ na labhate nahi tasyāyuṣaḥ pṛthagevākṣepaḥ ji srid du skye ba'i tshogs pa ma rnyed kyi bar du'o /
de'i tshe 'phen pa logs shig na med de /
ekanikāyasabhāgatvāt ris mthun pa gcig pa'i phyir ro /
itarathā hi tasyāyuṣaḥ kṣayānmaraṇabhavaḥ prasajyeta de lta ma yin na de'i tshe zad pas 'chi ba'i srid par yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
yadyāsumeroḥ sthalaṃ māṃsasya syāttatsarva varṣāsu krimīṇāṃ pūryeta gal te sha'i phung po ri rab tsam du gyur la de dag thams cad srin bu rnams kyis gang bar gyur na /
kimidānīṃ tatpratīkṣā eva teṣāmantarābhavā āsan kuto yā tadā tebhyo gatā iti vaktavyam de ci de dag gi srid pa bar ma rnams der sdod pa kho nar gyur tam /
de dag ga las 'ongs pa brjod par bya'o zhe na /
naitadāgataṃ sūtre śāstre vā /
evaṃ tu yujyate 		'di mdo 'am bstan bcos dag las ni mi 'byung mod kyi /
gandharasābhigṛddhānāmalpāyuṣāṃ jantūnāmanto nāsti /
te taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā gandharasābhigṛddhāḥ kālaṃ kurvantaḥ krimibhāvasaṃvarttanīyaṃ karma pravodhya tayā tṛṣṇayā krimiṣūpapadyanta iti /
athavā nūnaṃ tatpratyayapracūra eva kāle tatsaṃvarttanīyāni karmāṇi vīpākābhinirvṛttau vṛttiṃ labhnte nānyatra 		'di ltar dri dang ro la mngon par chags pa'i skye bo phra mo tshe thung du rnams mtha' med pas de dag dri tshor nas dri dang ro la mngon par chags pa rnams 'chi ba na srin bu'i ngo bor 'gyur ba'i las sang par byas nas /
srid pa des srin bu'i nad dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar mi rung ngo /
yang na gdon mi za bar de'i rkyen mang po kho na'i dus su der 'gyur ba'i las rnams rnam par smin pa mngon par 'grub par bya ba la 'jug pa rnyed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
tathāhi cakravarttisaṃvarttanīyāni karmaṇi aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vahutarāyuṣi vā cakravarttino jāyante nānyasyām /
ata eva coktaṃ bhagavatā acintyaḥ sattvānāṃ karmavipāka iti 		'di ltar 'khor los sgyur pa'i las yod du zin kyang skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri 'am /
tshe lo ches mang ba na 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung gi gzhan du ma yin pa lta bu'o /
de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes gsungs so /
saptāhaṃ tiṣṭhatīti bhadantavasumitraḥ btsun pa dbyig bshes na re zhag bdun du gnas so /
yadi tāvatā sāmagrīṃ na labhate tatraiva punaścyutyā jāyante /
sapta saptāhānītyapare 		gal te da srid kyi tshogs pa ma rnyed na shi 'phos shing shi 'phos nas yang de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
alpaṃ kālamiti vaṃbhāṣikāḥ gzhan dag na re zhag bdun phrag bdun du'o zhes zer ro /
sa hi saṃbhavaiṣitvātsamdhāvagatvā samdhiṃ badhnātīti yathātvasamagrāḥ pratyayā bhavanti bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de ni srid pa tshol ba yin pa'i phyir myur ba kho nas song ste nyid mtshams sbyor bas na dus thung ngur gnas so /
niyataṃ cānena tasmin deśe tasyāṃ jātau janitavyaṃ bhavati /
tadā karmāṇyeva pratyayānāṃ sāmagrīmāvahanti 		gang gi tshe rkyen tshogs pa yang ma yin la 'di nges par yul der skye bar 'gyur pa yang yin no de'i tshe las rnams kho nas rkyen dag tshogs pa 'dren par byed do /
athāniyātaṃ tato 'nyatra deśe tasyāṃ jātau jāyate sadṛśyā mityapare 'on te ma des na ni de las gzhan pa'i yul du skye ba der skye bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
tadyathā gavāmūṣmasu maithunasya prācuryaṃ śaradi śunāṃ ṛkṣānāṃ hemante cākṣvānām /
gavayaśṛgālakharatarakṣāṇāṃ punaḥ kālo nāstīti yenānyatra kāle goṣūpapattavyaṃ sa gavayeṣūpapadyate yena śvas sa śṛgāleṣu yenāśvesu sa gardabheṣu yena ṛkṣeṣu sa tarakṣeṣūpapadyate iti 		gzhan dag na re de 'dra bar skye bar 'gyur te /
'di lta ste ba lang dag ni dbyar rnams su 'khrig pa mang la /
khyi rnams ni ston kar ro /
dom rnams ni dgun kar ro /
rta rnams ni sos kar ro /
ba men dang ce spyang dang bong bu dang dred mo rnams la ni dus med pas dus gzhan pa ba lang rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni ba men rnams kyi nang du skye'o /
khyi rnams kyi nang du gang yin pa de ni ce spyang rnams kyi nang du'o /
rta rnams kyi nang du gang yin pa de ni bong bu rnams kyi nang du'o /
na tvasya nikāyasabhāgāntarābhavo nānyatra nikāyasabhāge śakyamutpattumekakāmākṣepāditi vaktavyametat dom rnams kyi nang du gang yin pa de ni dred mo rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
'phen pa gcig pa'i phyir ris gzhan gyi srid pa bar mas ris mthun pa gzhan du skye bar mi nus pas de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no /
sa khalveṣa gatideśasaṃprāptyarthaṃ prādurbhūto 'ntarābhavaḥ yang 'gro ba'i yul du phyin par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba'i srid pa bar ma de ni /
viparyastamatiryāti gatideśam riraṃsayā /
sa hi karmaprabhāvasaṃbhūtena cakṣuṣā sudūrastho 'pi svamupapattideśaṃ prekṣate 		blo ni phyin ci log gyur pas /
rtse dgas 'gro ba'i yul du 'gro /
da ni las kyi mthu las byung ba'i mig gis rang gi skye ba'i yul thag ring po na 'dug kyang mthong ngo /
tatrāsya mātāpitrostāṃ vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃsaḥ sataḥ pauṃsno rāga utpadyate mātari stryā satyā straiṇo rāgāḥ udpadyate pitari des de na pha ma nyal pa byed pa de mthong nas pa zhig yin na ni des ma la pho'i 'dod chags skye'o /
mo zhig yin na ni pha la mo'i 'dod chags skye'o /
viparyayāt pratighaḥ /
evaṃ paṭhacyate prajñaptau gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataraccittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ veti 		bzlog pa ni khong khro ba skye ba ste; btags pa las 'di skad du de'i che dri za la sems gnyis las rjes su chags pa dang ldan pa'am /
khong khro ba dang ldan pa'i sems gang yang rung ba'i mngon du gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo /
sa tābhyāṃ viparyasto rantukāmatayā tam deśamāśliṣya tāmavasthāmātmanyadhimucyate /
tasmiṃścāśucau garbhasthānasaṃprāpte jātaharṣo 'bhiniviśate /
tato 'sya skandhā ghanībhavantyantarābhavaskandhāścāntardhīyante ityupapanno bhavati 		de ni gnyis kyi phyin ci log tu gyur pas yul der phyin pa dang dga' bar 'dod pa'i gnas skabs der bdag nyid mos so /
mngal gyi gnas mi gtsang ba der phyin nas dga' ba skyes nas gnas so /
de nas de'i phung po mkhrang por 'gyur la srid pa bar ma yang 'gag par 'gyur bas na skyes pa yin no /
sa cetpumān bhavati māturdakṣiṇakukṣimāśritya pṛṣṭhābhimukha utkeṭukaḥ saṃbhavatyatha strī tato vāmakukṣimāśrityodarābhimukhī gal te de pho zhig yin na ni ma'i lto'i g yas phyogs su snyes nas rgyab rol du kha bltas te tsog tsog por skye'o /
gal te mo zhig yin na ni de ma'i lto'i g yon phyogs su snyes nas lto'i mdun rol du kha lta'o /
athedānīṃ napuṃsakaṃ tadyena rāgeṇāśliṣṭaṃ tathā tiṣṭhati 'on te de ma ning zhig yin na ni de 'dod chags gang dang ldan pa de bzhin du gnas so /
na cāstyantarābhavo vyantaraḥ sakalendriyatvāt srid pa bar ma'i dbang po thams cad tshang ba yin pa'i phyir dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa ste /
athaḥ strībhūtaḥ puruṣabhūto vā 'nupraviśya yathāsthānaṃ tiṣṭhati paścāt garbha āpyāyamāno napuṃsakaṃ bhavatīti /
idaṃ vicāryate /
kimasya śukrakśoṇitamahābhūtānyevendriyāśrayabhāvamāpadyante karmavaśādāhosvit bhūtāntarāṇyeva karmabhirjāyante 		de'i phyir mor gyur pa dang phor gyur pa zhugs nas gnas pa'i lta ba bzhin du gnas so /
phyis lus skye zhing ma ning du 'gyur ro /
da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /
ci las kyi dbang gis khu chu dang khrag gi 'byung ba chen po dag kho na 'di'i dbang po'i rten du 'gyur ram /
tānyupaśrityeti 'on te las rnams las /
tānyevetyeke /
anindriyaṃ hi śukraśoṇitamantarābhavena sārdhaṃ nirudhyate sendriyaṃ prādurbhavati 		de dag la brten nas 'byung ba kho na zhig skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
kha cig na re de dag kho na yin te /
khu chu dang khrag dbang po med pa na ni 'gag la /
vījāṅduranirodhotpādanyāyena yattatkālamityākhyāyate /
evaṃ ca kṛtvedaṃ sūtrapadaṃ sūtre sūnītaṃ bhavati mātāpitraśucikalalasaṃbhutasyeti 		sa bon dang myu gu 'gag pa dang skye ba'i tshul du dbang po dang bcas pa nur nur po zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni skye'o /
de ltar bshad na pha ma'i nur nur po mi gtsang ba las skyes pa zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du dge slong dag khyed kyis ni yun ring po nas ngur khrod skyed do /
tathā dīrgharātraṃ yuṣmābhirbhikṣivaḥ katasiḥ saṃvarddhitā rudhiravindurūpātta iti khrag gi thigs pa blangs so zhes gsungs pa'i mdo'i tshig legs pa yin no zhes zer ro /
bhūtāntarāṇyevetyapare /
tadyathāparṇakrimeḥ /
aśucisaṃniśrayotpattyabhisaṃbandhivacanāttu kalalasya sūtrāvirodha iti 		gzhan dag na re 'byung ba gzhan dag kho na yin te /
dper na lo ma'i srin bu lta bu yin la /
mi gtsang ba la brten nas skye ba la dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir mdo dang yang mi 'gal lo zhes zer ro /
evaṃ tāvadaṇḍajāṃ jarāyujāṃ ca yorni pratipadyate /
anyatra tu yathāyogaṃ vaktavyamityāhuḥ /
tatra cāyaṃ yogo dṛśyate /
gandhasthānābhikāmo 'nyaḥ 		re zhig sgo nga las skye ba dang mngal nas skye ba'i skye gnas su 'jug pa ni de lta bu'o /
gzhan la ni ci rigs par brjod par bya'o zhes zer te /
de la rigs pa ni 'di yin par snang ngo /
dri dang gnas la mngon 'dod gzhan /
saṃsvedajāṃ yoniṃ pratipadyamāna upapattisthānaṃ gatvābhilāṣāt gacchatyamedhyaṃ medhyaṃ vā yathākramam drod gsher las skye ba'i skye gnas su skye ba ni las ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba'i gnas gtsang ma'am mi gtsang bar dri 'dod pas 'gro'o /
upapādukāṃ tu yoniṃ prapadyamānaḥ sthānābhilāṣāt /
kathaṃ narakeṣu sthānābhilāṣaḥ /
viparyastabuddhitvāt 		rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas su skye ba ni gnas 'dod pas so /
ji ltar na dmyal ba dag tu gnas 'dod ce na /
blo phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i phyir te /
sa hi śītavātavarṣābhiṣekairātmānaṃ bādhyamānaṃ paśyati narakeṣu cāgniṃ dīpyamānam /
tatra uṣṇābhilāṣāddhāvati /
punastaptavātātapāgnisaṃtāpairātmānaṃ bādhyamānamanupaśyan śaityaṃ ca narakeṣu śītābhilāṣāddhāvati /
yad avasthas tad upapattisaṃvarttanīyaṃ karmākārṣīt tadavasthātmānaṃ tāśca sattvān paśyan dhāvatīti pūrvācāryāḥ 		de ni bdag nyid rlung dang char pa shin tu grang mo dag gis btab nas nyen pa dang dmyal ba dag na me 'bar ba mthong ste /
de'i phyir dro bar 'dod de rgyug go /
yang bdag nyid rlung tsha ba dang nyi ma dang me'i gdung ba dag gis nyen pa dang dmyal ba dag na bsil ba mthong bas bsil ba 'dod pas rgyug go /
sngon gyi slob dpon dag na re bdag nyid gnas skabs gang gis der skye bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa'i gnas skabs de yin pa dang sems can de dag kyang mthong nas rgyug go zhes zer ro /
tatra punardevāntarābhava ūrdhvaṃ gacchatyā sanādivottiṣṭhan manuṣyatiryakpretānāṃ manuṣyādivat /
ūrdhvapādastu nārakaḥ 		de la lha'i srid pa bar ma ni stan las ldang ba bzhin du gyen du 'gro'o /
mi dang dud 'gro dang yi dags rnams kyi ni mi la sogs pa bzhin no /
dmyal ba yi ni spyi'u tshugs yin /
yang dag sdom dang dka' thub can /
drang srong rnams la skur 'debs pa /
te vai patanti narakādūrdhvapādā avāṅmukhāḥ de dag spyi'u tshugs dag tu ni /
dmyal ba kho nar ltung bar 'gyur /
ṛṣīṇāmabhivaktāraḥ saṃyatānāṃ tapasvinām iti zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
gāthābhidhānāt blo ni phyin ci log gyur pas /
yaduktaṃ viparyastamatiryātīti rtse dgas 'gro ba'i yul du 'gro /
zhes bshad pa /
kimavaśyaṃ sarvo 'ntarābhavastathā mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāmati ci nges par srid pa bar ma pa thams cad ma'i mngal du de ltar 'jug gam zhe na /
nityāha /
kiṃ tarhi 		smras pa ma yin no /
catasro garbhāvakrāntayaḥ sūtra uktāḥ 'on kyang mdo las mngal du 'jug pa ni bzhi zhes gsungs te /
katamāścatasraḥ /
saṃprajānan viśatyekaḥ 		bzhi gang zhe na /
gcig ni shes bzhin du 'jug go /
tiṣṭhati niṣkrāmati sā saṃprajānan gnas pa dang 'byung ba ni shes bzhin du ma yin no /
tiṣṭhatyapyaparaḥ /
saṃprajānanniti varttate /
praviśatyapītyapikṣabdāt 		gzhan ni gnas pa yang shes bzhin du zhes bya bar sbyar te /
yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'jug pa yang ngo /
aparaḥ /
niṣkrāmatyapi /
saṃprājānan praviśati tiṣṭhatyapi /
sarvāṇi mūḍho 'nyaḥ 		gzhan ni /
'byung ba'ang /
shes bzhin du ste /
yang zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa dang gnas pa'o /
gzhan ni thams cad rmongs /
kaścit punaḥ sarvāṇyevāsaṃprajānan karoti praviśatyasaṃprajānan tiṣṭhati niṣkrāmatyapi la la ni thams cad shes bzhin ma yin par 'gyur te /
'jug pa yang shes bzhin ma yin la gnas pa dang 'byung ba yang shes bzhin ma yin no /
etāścatasro garbhāvakrāntayaḥ pratilomaṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ /
ślokabandhānuguṇyataḥ 		mngal du 'jug pa de bzhi ni tshigs su bcad pa bsdeb pa dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir bzlog ste bstan to /
nityamaṇḍajaḥ /
aṇḍajaḥ sattvo nityaṃ mūḍha eva sarvāṇi karoti 		sgo nga las skyes rtag tu'o /
sems can sgo nga las skyes pa ni rtag tu thams cad rmongs pa kho nar 'gyur ro /
kathamaṇḍājjāto garbhaṃ praviśati sgo nga las skyes pa ji ltar skye gnas su 'jug ce na /
yo 'pi janiṣyate so 'pyaṇdajaḥ gang zhig skye bar 'gyur ba de yang sgo nga las skyes pa zhes bya'o /
athavā bhāvinyāpi saṃjñayā nirdeśāḥ kriyante yang na 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i ming gis bstan te /
tadyathā saṃkṛtamabhisaṃskarotīti sūtre odanaṃ pacatīti saktum pinaṣṭīti loke dper na mdo las 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed do zhes gsungs pa dang 'jig rten na 'bras chan 'tshed do /
phye 'thag go zhes pa lta bu ste; de lta bas na de ni nyes pa med do /
tasmānnaiṣa doṣaḥ /
kathaṃ punarasaṃprajānan mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśati yāvanniṣkrāmati kathaṃ vā saṃprajānan 		yang ji ltar na shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal du 'jug cing 'byung ba'i bar du yin pa'am /
ji ltar na shes bzhin du yin zhe na /
alpeśākhyasya tāvatsattvasya mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśataḥ evaṃ vīparītau saṃjñādhimokṣau pravarttete re zhig sems can dbang thang chung bar grags pa ma'i mngal du 'jug pa la 'di snyam du rlung langs pa'am /
char pa 'bab pa'am /
vāto vāti devo varṣati grang ba'am /
yul ngan nam /
śītaṃ durdinaṃ mahato vā janakāyasya kolāhalaṃ hnta tṛṇagahanaṃ vā praviśāmi vanagahanaṃ vā tṛṇakuṭīṃ vā parṇakuṭīṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ vā sarpāmi kuṇḍayamūlaṃ veti skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ku co 'don pa snyam byed nas /
ma la rtsva thibs po'am /
nags thibs po'am /
rtsva'i spyil po'am /
lo ma'i spyil por 'jug pa'am /
shing drung ngam /
tiṣṭhato 'pyeṣu tiṣṭhāmiti niṣkrāmato spyebhyo niryāmīti rtsig pa'i drung du 'gro'o /
gnas na yang 'di dag tu gnas par bya'o /
maheśākhyasya tu sattvasyārāmaṃ vā praviśāmyudyānaṃ vāprāsādaṃ vā 'bhirohāmi kūṭāgāraṃ vā paryaṅka veti /
tathā tiṣṭhāmi niryāmīti /
evaṃ tāvadasaṃprajānan praviśati yāvanniṣkrāmati /
saṃprajānaṃstu samyak prajānāti mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśāmyatraiva tiṣṭhāmi ata eva niryāmiti /
nāsya viparītau saṃjñādhimokṣau pravarttete 		'byung na yang 'di dag nas 'byung ngo snyam du log pa'i 'du shes dang mos pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
sems can dbang thang che bar grags pa ni kun dga' ra ba'am /
skyed mos tshal lam /
khang bzangs su 'jug pa'am /
khang pa brtsegs pa'am /
khri la 'dzeg go /
de bzhin du gnas so /
'byung ngo snyam du sems so /
re zhig shes bzhin ma yin par 'jug pa nas 'byung ba'i bar ni de lta bu yin no /
shes bzhin yin pa ni ma'i mngal la 'jug go /
de nyid du gnas so /
de nyid nas 'byung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bar du rab tu shes te /
'di la phyin ci log gi 'du shes dang mos pa dag mi 'byung ngo /
atra punarapadiśyate /
garbhāvakrāntayastisraścakravarttisvayaṃbhuvām /
cakravarttinaśca svayaṃbhuvośca pratyekabuddhasaṃbuddhayośca /
yathākramamityante vakṣyati /
tatra prathamā cakravarttinaḥ 		yang 'dir bstan pa dang mngal du 'jug pa gsum dag ste /
'khor los sgyur dang rang byung gnyis /
'khor los sgyur ba dang rang byung rang sangs rgyas dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ste /
'og nas go rims zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
de la 'khor los sgyur ba ni dang po ste /
sa hi praviśatyeva saṃprajānan na tiṣṭhati nāpi niṣkrāmati /
pratyekabuddhastiṣṭhatyapi /
buddho niṣkrāmatyapi 		de ni 'jug pa kho na shes bzhin yin gyi gnas pa yang ma yin la /
'byung ba yang ma yin no /
rang sangs rgyas ni gnas pa yang ngo /
sangs rgyas ni 'byung ba yang ngo /
atrāpi bhāvinyā saṃjñayā nirdeśaḥ 'dir yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ming gis bstan to /
karmajñānobhayeṣāṃ vā viśadatvād yathākramam las sam ye shes sam gnyi ga /
rgya che'i phyir na go rims bzhin /
viśadakarmaṇāmdārapuṇyakriyāṇāṃ prathamā las rgya chen po bsod nams rgya chen po byed pa rnams ni dang po yin no /
viśadajñānānāṃ bāhuśrutyakṛtapravicayānāṃ dvitīyā /
viśada puṇyakarmajñānānāṃ tṛtīyā 		ye shes rgya chen po thos pa mang ba dang rab tu 'byed pa byas pa rnams ni gnyis pa yin no /
bsod nams kyi las dang ye shes rgya che ba rnams ni gsum pa yin te /
ta eva tvete cakravarttyādaya evaṃbhūtā yujyante yathākramam de lta bur gyur pa de dag ni rim bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa yin par rig par bya'o /
śeṣāṇāṃ caturthīti siddhaṃ bhavati /
atredānīṃ bāhyakā ātmavādaṃ parigṛhyottiṣṭhante /
yadi sattvo lokāntaraṃ saṃcaratīti pratijñāyate siddha ātmā bhavatīti /
sa eṣa pratiṣidhyate 		lhag ma rnams ni bzhi pa yin no zhes bya bar grub po /
da ni 'dir phyi rol pa rnams gal te sems can 'jig rten gzhan du 'pho'o zhes bya bar dam bca' na bdag grub pa yin no zhes bdag tu smra ba yongs su bzung nas rgol te /
de dgag pa'i phyir /
nātmāsti /
kīdṛśa ātmā ya imān nikṣipatyanyāśca skndhān pratisaṃdadhātīti parikalpyate /
sa tadṛśo nāstyantarvyāpārapuruṣaḥ /
evaṃ tūktaṃ bhagavatā asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāt 		bdag med ces bya ba smos so /
bdag ji lta bu zhig ce na /
gang phung po 'di dag 'dor zhing phung po gzhan dag tu nying mtshams sbyor ro zhes bya bar yongs su rtog pa nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu de lta bu de med de bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du /
las ni yod do /
rnam par smin pa ni yod do /
chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa gang phung po 'di dag 'dor zhing phung po gzhan dag tu nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i byed pa po ni mi dmigs so /
tatrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketo yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pratītyasamutpādaḥ /
kīdṛśastarhyātmā na pratiṣidhyate /
skandhamātraṃ tu /
yadi tu skandhamātramevātmeti upacaryate tasyāpratiṣedhaḥ /
evaṃ tarhi skandhā eva lokāntaraṃ saṃcarantīti prāptaṃ skandhamātraṃ tu nātra saṃcaratīti /
kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtam 		de la chos su brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te /
'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba'o zhes rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyas par gsungs so /
'o na bdag ji lta bu zhig mi dgag ce na /
phung po tsam nyid do /
gal te phung po tsam kho na la bdag ces 'dogs na de la ni dgag pa med do /
de lta na 'o na phung po bdag nyid 'jig rten gzhan du 'pho'o zhes bya bar gyur to zhe na /
de dag ni mi 'pho ba'i phung po tsam ni /
nyon mongs las kyis mngon du byas /
antarābhavasaṃtatyā kukṣimeti pradīpavat srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis na /
mar me bzhin du mngal du 'gro /
kṣaṇikā hi skandhāsteṣāṃ saṃcarituṃ nāsti śaktiḥ /
kleśaistu paribhāvitaṃ karmabhiśca kleśamātramantarābhāsaṃjñikayā saṃtatyā mātuḥ kukṣimāyāti /
tadyathā pradīpaḥ kṣaṇiko 'pi saṃtatyā deśāntaramiti nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ /
tasmātsiddhametadasatyapyātmani kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛṭaḥ skandhānāṃ saṃtāno mātuḥ kukṣimāpadyata iti 		phung po rnams ni skad cig ma ste /
de dag la ni 'pho ba'i mthu med kyi nyon mongs pa rnams dang las rnams kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i phung po tsam gyis srid pa bar ma zhes bya ba'i rgyun gyis ma'i mngal du 'gro ste /
dper na mar me skad cig ma yin yang rgyun gyis yul gzhan du 'gro ba lta bu yin pas de ni nyes pa med do /
de lta bas na bdag med bzhin du yang nyon mongs pa dang las rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i phung po rnams kyi rgyun ma'i mngal du 'jug go zhes bya ba 'di grub bo /
sa punaḥ de yang /
yathākṣepaṃ kramādvṛddhaḥ santānaḥ kleśakarmabhiḥ ji ltar 'phangs bzhin rim gyis rgyun /
skyes nas las dang nyon mongs kyis; /
paralokaṃ punaryāti 'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'gro /
nahi sarvasya skandhasantānasyākṣepastulyo bhavatyāyupyasya karmaṇo bhedāt tshe'i las tha dad pa'i phyir phung po'i rgyun thams cad kyi 'phen pa 'dra ba ni ma yin te /
ato yasya yāvānākṣpastasya tāvatī vṛddhiḥ krameṇa bhavati /
kena krameṇa 		de'i phyir gang zhig ji srid du 'phangs pa de de srid du rim gyis skye bar 'gyur ro /
rim pa gang gis she na /
gtsug lag las /
kalalaṃ prathamaṃ dhavati kalalājjāyate 'rbudaḥ dang por nur nur po yin no /
nur nur po las mer mer skye /
arbudājjāyate peśī peśīto jāyate ghanaḥ mer mer po las nar nar skye /
nar nar po las mkhrang 'gyur skye /
ghanāt praśākhā jāyante keśaromanakhādayaḥ mkhrang las rkang lag 'gyus pa 'dra /
skra spu sen mo la sogs pa /
indriyāṇi ca rūpīṇi vyañjanānyanupūrvaśaḥ dbang po gzugs can rnams dang ni /
mtshams rnams rim gyis skye bar 'gyur /
ityāryāḥ /
etāḥ pañca garbhāvasthāḥ kalalārbudapeśīghanapraśākhāvasthāḥ 		zhes 'byung ngo; /
nur nur po dang mer mer po dang nar nar po dang mkhrang 'gyur dang rkang lag 'gyus pa'i gnas skabs de dag ni mngal gyi gnas skabs lnga yin no /
tasya khalu kālāntareṇa paripākaprāptasya garbhaśatlasyābhyantarāt mātuḥ kukṣau karmavipākajā vāyavo vānti ye taṃ garbhaśalyaṃ saṃparivarttya mātuḥ kāyāvakṣaradvārābhimukhamavasthāpayanti /
sakrūrapurīṣapiṇḍa ivātimātraṃ sthānāt pracyuto duḥkhaṃ saṃparivarttyate /
yadi punaḥ kadācinmāturāhāravihārakriyāpacāreṇa ca pūrvakarmāparādhena garbha eva vyāpādaṃ prāpnoti tata enaṃ tajjñāstriyaḥ kumārabhṛtyakā vā sukhoṣṇena sarpistailena supiṣṭena śālmalīkalkenānyena vā hastamabhyajya tīkṣṇaṃ tanukaṃ cātra śastrakamupanivadhya tasminvarcaskūpa ivogradurgandhāndhakārasamalapalvale suvahukrimikulasahasrāvāse nityasrāviṇi satatapratikriye śukraśroṇitalasikāmalasaṃklinnaviklinnakvathitapicchile paramavībhatsadarśane chidratanucarmāvacchādite pūrvakarmavīpākarje mahati kāmanāḍīrvaṇe hastaṃ praveśyā ṅgamaṅgaṃ nikṛtyādhyāharanti 		yang dus gzhan na mngal gyi zug rngu de yongs su smin par gyur pa mngal gyi nang na gang dag gis mngal gyi zug rngu de bsgyur nas ma'i lus kyi mi gtsang ba'i sgo logs su kha bstan nas 'jog par byed pa las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i rlung dag ldang ste /
de gnas nas sbed pa na mi gtsang ba mkhrang po de shin tu chen po 'chir ba bzhin du spo dka' ba yin no /
gal te na res 'ga' ma'i zas dang gnas pa'i bya ba mi mthun par spyod pa'am sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas mngal kho nar 'chi bar 'gyur ro /
de nas 'di de shes pa'i bud med dam /
gzhon nu'i sman pas mar sar ram /
til mar 'jam tsam mam /
shing shal ma le legs par btags pa'i phye ma'am /
gzhan yang rung bas lag pa bskus nas /
de la mtshon rnon po srab mo btags te /
rkyag dong lta bur mi bzad pa dri nga ba mun khung la sogs pa'i 'dam rdzab srin bu'i rigs shin tu mang po stong phrag gi gnas /
rtag tu 'dzag par 'gyur ba /
rtag tu byi dor bya dgos pa /
khu chu dang khrag dang chu ser dang dri mas kun tu myags pa /
rnam par myags pa /
rul pa; rnags pa /
'gred pa /
mthong na 'jigs su rung ba pags pa rdol ba srab mos g yogs pa /
sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa lus kyi rma 'khyims pa chen po der lag pa bcug ste /
sa cāpyaparaparyāyavedanīyena karmaṇā pūrvakeṇa kāmapi gatiṃ nīyate /
atha punaḥ svasti prajāyate tata enaṃ mātā putrābhilāṣiṇī tatparikā vā striyaḥ sadyojātakaṃ taruṇavrṇāyamānātmānaṃ śastrakṣārā yamāṇasaṃsparśābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ parigṛhya snāpayanti stanyena sarpipā vāpyāyayanti audārikaṃ cāhāramāhartuṃ krameṇābhyāsayanti 		yan lag dang nying lag bcad nas 'byin to /
de yang sngon gyi las lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur bas shed du khrid par byed do /
'on te bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur na ni de nas 'di bu 'dod pa'i ma'am /
de'i g yog bu med rnams kyis btsas ma thag pa'i lus rma sar pa lta bu mtshon dang thal ba'i sman lta bu'i reg pa dang ldan pa'i lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas 'khru bar byed do /
nu zho dang mar sar gyis skyed par byed cing rim gyis kha zas rags pa bza' bar goms par yang byed do /
tasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākānpunarapi kleśāḥ samudācaranti karmaṇi copacayaṃ gacchanti de skye ba'i rgyus dbang po rnams longs su smin nas ni yang nyon mongs pa rnams kun tu spyod cing /
las rnams kyang stsogs par 'gyur ro /
saḥ taiḥ kāyasya bhedādantarābhavasaṃtatyā pūrvavat paralokaṃ punaryāti de dag gi lus zhig nas yang snga ma bzhin du srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ste /
ityanadibhavacakrakam srid pa'i 'khor lo thog ma med /
etena prakāreṇa kleśakarmahetukaṃ janma taddhetukāni punaḥ kleśakarmāṇi tebhyaḥ punarjanmetyanādibhavacakrakaṃ veditavyam /
ādau hi parikalpyamāne tsyāhetukatvameteṣu sajyeta sati cāhetukatve sarvamevedamahetukaṃ prāduḥsyāt /
dṛṣṭaṃ cāṅkurādīṣu vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ deśakālapratiniyamādagnyādīnāṃ ca pākajādiṣviti nāsti nirhetukaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ /
nityakāraṇāstitvavādaśca prāgeva paryudastaḥ 		rnam pa des na las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i skye ba dang yang de las byung ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa rnams dang yang de las skye ba rnams yin pas na srid pa'i 'khor lo thog ma med pa yin par rig par bya'o /
thog ma zhig brtags na ni de'i rgyu med pa nyid du thal par 'gyur ro /
rgyu med pa nyid gcig yin na ni 'di thams cad kyang rgyu med pa kho nar 'gyur ba zhig na yul dang dus so sor nges pa las myu gu la sogs pa la sa bon la sogs pa dang chos pa la sogs pa la me la sogs pa'i nus pa yang mthong bas rgyu med pa las 'byung ba ni med do /
rgyu rtog pa yod par smra ba ni sngar bsal zin pa nyid do /
tasmānnāstyeva saṃsārasyādiḥ de lta bas na 'khor ba'i thog ma ni med pa kho na'o /
antastu hetukṣayāt yuktaḥ /
hetvadhīnatvājjanmano vījakṣayādivaṅkurasyeti 		skye ba ni rgyu la rag lus pa'i phyir rgyu zad pa las mtha' dang ldan par ni rigs te /
sa bon zad bas myu gu bzhin no /
ya eṣa skandhasaṃtāno janmatrayāvastha ūpadiṣṭaḥ de ltar phung po'i rgyun skye ba'i gnas skabs gsum pa bstan pa gang yin pa /
sa pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśāṅgastrikāṇḍakaḥ de ni rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i /
yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum mo /
tatra dvādaśāṅgāni avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca /
trīṇi kāṇḍāni pūrvāparāntamadhyānyatītānāgatapratyutpannāni janmāni 		de la yan lag bcu gnyis ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi dang cha gsum ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang bar dag ste /
'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i skye ba dag yin no /
kathameṣu trikāṇḍeṣu dvādaśāṅgāni vyavasthāpyante cha gsum po 'di dag tu yan lag bcu gnyis ji ltar rnam par gzhag ce na /
pūrvāparāntayordve dve madhye 'ṣṭau /
avidyā saṃskārāśca pūrvānte jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ cāparānte 		sngon dang phyi mtha'i gnyis gnyis pa /
ma rig pa dang 'du byed rnams ni sngon gyi mthar ro /
skye ba dang rga shi ni phyi ma'i mthar ro /
śeṣāṇyaṣṭau madhye lhag ma brgyad ni bar du'o /
kiṃ punaretānyaṣṭāṅgāni sarvasyāṃ jātau bhavanti yang ci thams cad kyi skye ba 'di la yan lag brgyad po 'di dag yod dam zhe na /
netyāha /
kasya tarhi 		smras pa; ma yin no /
'o na su la yod ce na /
paripūriṇaḥ /
parīpūro 'syāstīti paripūro ya etāni sarvāṇyevāvasthāntarāṇi spṛśati so 'tra pudgalo 'bhipreto na tu yo 'ntarāla eva mriyate 		yongs rdzogs ldan no /
'di la yongs su rdzogs pa yod pas na yongs su rdzogs ldan no /
'dir ni gang zag gang zhig gnas skabs kyi bye brag 'di thams cad la reg pa de la dgongs pa yin gyi /
gang bar ma do kho nar 'chi ba yang ma yin la /
nāpi rūpārupyāvacaraḥ /
tathā hi mahānidānaparyāye kāmāvacara eva pudgalo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
vijñānaṃ cedānanda mātuḥ kukṣiṃ nāvakrāmediti vacanāt 		gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa yang ma yin te /
'di ltar gleng gzhi chen po'i rnam grangs kyi mdo las kun dga' bo gal te rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs par ma gyur na zhes gsungs pa'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gang zag kho nar bstan pa yin no /
yadā tu dvividhaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ucyate paurvāntikaścāparāntikaśceti tadā saptāṅgāni paurvāntiko yāvadvedanāntaḥ pañcāparāntikaḥ gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sngon gyi mtha' ba dang phyi ma'i mtha' pa zhes rnam pa gnyis su brjod pa de'i tshe ni tshor ba la thug pa'i bar yan lag bdun ni sngon gyi mtha' pa yin la /
lnga ni phyi ma'i mtha' pa yin te /
saphalahetukayoḥ pūrvāparāntayorgrahaṇāt sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang 'bras bu dang rgyu dang bcas pa dag smos pa'i phyir ro /
atha ka ime 'vidyādayaḥ /
pūrvakleśā daśā 'vidyā 		yang ma rig pa la sogs pa 'di dag gang yin zhe na /
ma rig nyon mongs sngon gnas skabs /
yā pūrvake janmani kleśāvasthā sehāvidyetyucyate tshe snga ma la nyon mongs pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de ni 'di la ma rig pa zhes bya ste /
sāhacaryāttadvaśena teṣāṃ samudācārācca /
rājāgamanavacane tadanuyātrikā gamanasiddhavat 		lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir dang de'i dbang gis de dag kun tu 'byung ba'i phyir rgyal po gshegs so zhes byas na de'i zha 'bring pa yang 'ong bar 'grub pa bzhin no /
saṃskārāḥ pūrvakarmaṇaḥ 'du byed dag ni sngon las kyi /
daśeti varttate /
pūrvajanmanyeva yā puṇyādikarmāvasthā seha saṃskārā ityucyante yasya karmaṇa iha vipākaḥ 		gnas skabs zhes bya bar sbyar te /
che snga ma la bsod nams la sogs pa'i las kyi gnas skabs gang yin pa de ni 'di la 'du byed rnams zhes bya ste /
las gang gis 'dir rnam par smin pa'o /
saṃdhiskandhāstu vijñānaṃ rnam shes mtshams sbyor phung po yin /
mātuḥ kukṣī pratisaṃdhikṣaṇe pañca skandhā vijñānam ma'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma la phung po lnga ni rnam par shes pa yin no /
nāmarūpamataḥ param ming dang gzugs ni de phan chad /
prāk ṣaḍāyatanotpādāt skye mched drug dong tshun chad do /
saṃdhicittāt pareṇa yāvat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ notpadyate sā 'vasthā nāmarūpaṃ tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate mtshams sbyor ba'i sems phan chad nas ji srid du skye mched drug ma dod kyi bar gyi gnas skabs de ni ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o /
prakcaturāyatanotpādādini vaktavye ṣaḍāyatanavacanaṃ tadā tadvyavasthāpanāt skye mched bzhi dod tshun chad do zhes brjod pa bya ba yin pa las skye mched drug ces brjod pa ni de'i tshe de rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro /
tatpūrvaṃ trikasaṃgamāt /
utpanne ṣaḍāyatane sāvasthā tāvat ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate yāvadindriyaviṣayavijñānatrikasaṃnipātaḥ /
sparśaḥ prāksukhaduḥkhādikāraṇajñānaśaktitaḥ /
trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātāt sparśo bhavati /
sa yāvadvedanātrayakāraṇaparicchedena samartho bhavati sā 'vasthā sparśa ityucyate 		de ni gsum 'dus tshun chad do /
skye mched drug dong nas ji srid du dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa dang gsum ma 'dus pa de srid kyi gnas skabs de ni skye mched drug ces bya'o zhes reg pa bde sdug la sogs kyi rgyu shes nus pa tshun chad do /
reg pa ni gsum 'dus te des ji srid du tshor ba gsum gyi rgyu yongs su gcod par ma nus pa'i gnas skabs de ni reg pa zhes bya'o /
paricchedasāmarthye sati yongs su gcod nus nas ni /
vittiḥ prāk maithunāt /
vedanāvasthā yāvanmaithunarāgo na samudācarati 		tshor 'khrig tshun chad; tshor ba'i gnas skabs ni ji srid du 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kun tu mi spyod pa'i bar ro /
tṛṣṇā bhogamaithunarāgiṇaḥ sred pa ni /
longs spyod 'khrig pa'i chags can gyi /
kāmaguṇamaithunarāgasamudācārāvasthā tṛṣṇetyucyate yāvanna tadviṣayaparyeṣṭimāpadyate 'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kun tu spyod pa'i gnas skabs ji srid du yul yongs su tshol ba la ma zhugs pa ni srid pa zhes bya'o /
upādānaṃ tu bhogānāṃ prāptaye paridhāvataḥ /
yasyāmavasthāyāṃ viṣayaprāptaye paryeṣṭimāpannaḥ sarvato dhāvatyasāvavasthā upādānamityucyate 		nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams /
thob par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa'i /
gnas skabs gang du yul thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su tshol ba la zhugs nas thams cad du rgyug pa de ni len pa zhes bya'o /
tathā ca paridhāvan de ltar yongs su rgyug pa na /
sa bhaviṣyat bhavaphalaṃ kurute karma tat bhavaḥ de srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i /
las byed de ni srid pa yin /
sa viṣayāṇāṃ prāptihetoḥ paridhāvan paunarbhavikaṃ karmopacinoti so 'sya bhavaḥ de yul rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su rgyug pa na yang srid pa la sogs pa de ni de'i srid pa yin no /
tena hi karmaṇā punaritaḥ pracyutasyāyatyāṃ pratisaṃdhirbhavati las des yang 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshe phyi mar nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te /
yo 'sau /
pratisaṃdhiḥ punarjātiḥ /
yadeveha vijñānāṅgaṃ tadevāsyānyatra janmani jātiḥ 		nying mtshams sbyor ba de ni skye ba yin /
'di la rnam par shes pa'i yan lag gang yin pa de ni tshe gzhan du skye ba yin no /
tat ūrdhvaṃ /
jarāmaraṇamā vidaḥ /
jāteḥ pareṇa yāvadedanāvasthā jarāmaraṇam 		de phan chad tshor ba'i bar ni rga shi yin /
skye ba phan chad tshor ba'i gnas skabs kyi bar ni rga shi ste /
yānyeveha catvāryaṅgāni nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanāstānyevānyatra jarāmaraṇamityetāni dvādaśāṅgāni /
sa caiṣa pratītyasamutpādaścaturvidha ucyate 		'di la yan lag bzhi po ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba gang dag yin pa de dag nyid gzhan dag tu rga shi yin no /
de ltar na de dag ni yan lag bcu gnyis yin no /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de ni rnam pa bzhir brjod do /
kṣaṇikaḥ prakarṣikaḥ sāṃbandhikaḥ āvasthikaśca skad cig pa dang rgyun chags pa dang 'brel pa can dang; gnas skabs pa'o /
kathaṃ kṣaṇikaḥ skad cig ma ji lta bu zhe na /
ekasmin khalvapi kṣaṇe dvādaśāṅgāni bhavanti skad cig ma gcig la yan lag bcu gnyis yod pa ste /
tadyathā lobhavaśena prāṇinaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayet /
yo mohaḥ sā 'vidyā 		'di lta ste /
chags pa'i dbang gis srog gcod pa'i rmongs pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa'o /
yā cetanā te saṃskārāḥ /
vastuprativijñaptirvijñānam 		sems pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'du byed rnams so /
dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa'o /
vijñānasahabhuvaścatvāraḥ skandhā nāmarūpam rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i phung po bzhi ni ming dang gzugs so /
nāmarūpe vyavasthāpitāni indriyāṇi ṣaḍāyatanam ming dang gzugs la rnam par gnas pa'i dbang po rnams ni skye mched drug go /
ṣaḍḍāyatanābhinipātaḥ sparśaḥ /
sparśānubhavanaṃ vedanā 		skye mched drug 'dus pa ni rig pa'o /
reg pa nyams su myong ba ni tshor ba'o /
yo lobhaḥ sa tṛṣṇā /
tatsaṃprayuktāni paryavasthānāni upādānam 		chags pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa'o /
de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i kun nas dkris pa rnams ni len pa'o /
tatsamutthitaṃ kāyavākkarma bhavaḥ des kun nas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las ni srid pa'o /
teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmutsarjanaṃ jātiḥ parīpāko jarā bhaṅgo maraṇamiti /
punarāhuḥ 		las de rnams skye ba ni skye ba'o /
yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o /
zhig pa ni shi ba'o /
yang smras pa /
kṣaṇikaḥ sāṃbandhikaśca yathā prakaraṇeṣu pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ /
sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti /
āvasthiko dvādaśa pañcaskandhikā avasthā nirantarajanmatrayasaṃbaddhāḥ /
sa eva prākarṣikaḥ /
eṣāṃ katamo 'yamabhipreto bhagavataḥ /
āvasthikaḥ kileṣṭo 'yaṃ /
yadyaṅgamaṅgaṃ pañca skandhāḥ kiṃ kāraṇamavidyādīneva dharmān kīrttayati sma 		skad cig pa dang 'brel pa can ni rab tu byed pa dag las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no /
rab tu byed pa dag las ji skad du 'byung zhe na /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang zhe na /
'dus byas kyi chos thams cad do /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
'dus byas kyi chos thams cad do zhes 'byung ngo /
gnas skabs pa ni bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i phung po lnga'i gnas skabs tshe gsum bar chad med par 'brel ba dag yin no /
de nyid rgyun chags pa yang yin no /
de rnams las bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gang las dgongs she na /
'di ni gnas skabs par 'dod lo /
gal te yan lag dang yan lag la phung po lnga char yod na ci'i phyir ma rig pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams kho nar bsgrags she na /
prādhānyattvaṅgakīrtanam gtso bo'i phyir na yan lag bsgrags /
avidyāpradhānāmavasthāmavidyāṃ jagāda saṃskārapradhānāṃ saṃskārānyāvajjarāmaraṇamityadoṣaḥ ma rig pa gtso bo yin pa'i gnas skabs su ni ma rig par bshad la /
'du byed gtso bo yin par ni 'du byed nas rga shi gtso bo yin pa'i bar du ni rga shi kho na bshad pas nyis pa med do /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sūtre dvādaśāṅga uktaḥ prakaraṇeṣvanyathā pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ yang ci'i phyir mdo sde las ni yan lag bcu gnyis su gsungs la /
rab tu byed pa dag las ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang zhe na /
sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti /
abhiprāyikaḥ sūtre lākṣaṇiko 'bhidharmaḥ 		'dus byas kyi chos thams cad do zhes gzhan du 'byung zhe na /
mdo las gsungs pa ni dgongs pa can yin no /
chos mngon pa las ni mtshan nyid pa yin te /
tathāvasthikaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ prākarṣikaḥ sāṃbandhikaḥ sattvākhyo 'sattvākhyaśceti bhedaḥ /
kimarthaṃ punaḥ sūtre sattvākhya eva 		de bzhin du gnas skabs pa dang skad cig pa dang rgyun chags pa dang 'brel pa can dang sems can du ston pa dang sems can ma yin par ston pa zhes bya ba tha dad pa yin no /
yang ci'i phyir mdo las sems can du ston pa kho na gsungs she na /
pūrvāparāntamadhyeṣu saṃmohavinivṛttaye /
ata eva ca trikāṇḍaḥ 		sngon dang phyi mtha' bar dag la /
rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir cha gsum pa yin no /
tatra pūrvāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kiṃ nva hamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani āhosvinnābhūvaṃ ko nvahamabhūvaṃ kathaṃ nvahamabhūvamiti /
aparāntasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicicitsā kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvanīti vistaraḥ 		de la sngon gyi mtha' la rmongs pa la ne 'di ji ltar bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur tam /
'on te byung bar ma gyur bdag ci zhig tu ni byung bar gyur /
bdag ji ltar na ni byung bar gyur snyam pa'i the tshom 'di skye'o /
phyi ma'i mtha' la rmongs pa la ni 'di ltar ci ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram snyam pa rgyas par the tshom 'di skye'o /
madhyasaṃmoho yata iyaṃ vicikitsā kimsvididaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāma iti /
etasya trividhasya saṃmohasya vyāvarttanārthaṃ sattvākhya eva trikāṇḍaśca pratītyasamutpāda upadiṣṭaḥ sūtre yathākramamavidyā saṃskārāśca jātirjarāmaraṇaṃ ca vijñānaṃ yāvat bhavaśca /
tathāhi sūtra evoktaṃ yataśca bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā pratītyasamutpādaśca pratītyasamutpannāśca dharmā evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭā bhavanti /
sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvanīti vistaraḥ /
tṛṣṇopādānabhavā apyaparāntasaṃmohavyāvartanārthamityapare 		bar du rmongs pa la ni 'di ltar ci zhig yin /
'di ji ltar yin /
yod pa ni ci zhig yin /
'gyur ba ni ci zhig yin snyam pa'i the tshom 'di skye'o /
de ltar na rmongs pa rnam pa gsum po 'di bzlog pa'i phyir mdo las rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sems can du ston pa kho na cha gsum du bstan te /
ma rig pa dang 'du byed rnams dang skye ba dang rga shi dang rnam par shes pa nas srid pa'i bar dang go rims bzhin no /
'di ltar mdo nyid las dge slong dag dge slong gis gang phan chad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba de ni ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur tam snyam du sngon gyi mtha' la 'brang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs so /
gzhan dag na re phyi ma'i mtha' la rmongs pa bzlog pa'i phyir sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dag kyang bstan te /
tasyaiva hyete hetava iti sa punareṣa dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādastrisvabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
kleśakarmavastūni 		'di dag ni de kho na'i rgyu yin no zhes zer ro /
yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa de ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang bzhi ngag dang gsum gyi rang bzhin du rig par bya ste /
tatra /
kleśāstrīṇi 		de la nyon mongs gsum mo /
trīṇyaṅgāni kleśasvabhāvānyavidyātṛṣṇepādānāni /
dvayaṃ karma 		yan lag gsum ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin can te /
ma rig pa dang sred pa dang len pa rnams so /
las gnyis so /
aṅgadvayaṃ karmasvabhāvaṃ saṃskārā bhavaśca /
sapta vastu 		yan lag gnyis ne las kyi rang bzhin yin te /
'du byed dang srid pa'o /
gzhi bdun /
saptāṅgāni vastusvabhāvāni vijñānanāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanājātijarāmaraṇāni /
kleśakarmāśrayatvāt 		yan lag bdun po rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang skye ba dang rga shi rnams ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir gzhi'i yan lag yin no /
yathā ca vastu saptāṅgāni /
phalaṃ tathā 		ji ltar yan lag bdun gzhi yin pa de bzhin 'bras bu yin /
saptaivāṅgāni phābhūtāni yan lag bdun po nyid 'bras bur gyur pa dag yin no /
śeṣāṇi pañca hetubhūtāni /
karmakleśasvabhāvabhūtatvāt 		lhag ma lnga ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin yin ba'i phyir rgyur gyur pa dag yin no /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ madhye phalahetū viśālitau /
vastunaḥ pañcadhā bhedāt 		yang ci'i phyir gzhi rnam pa lnga dang nyon mongs pa rnam pa gnyis tha dad pa'i phyir dbus su ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dag rgya cher bskyed la /
kleśasya dvidhā /
anāgate 'dhvani phalaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ dvidhā bhedāt 		ma 'ongs pa'i dus su ni rnam pa gnyis tha dad pa'i phyir 'bras bu mdor bsdus /
atīte 'dhvani heturekamukhakleśopadeśāditi /
phalahetvabhisaṃkṣepo dvayormadhyānumānataḥ 		'das pa'i dus su ni nyon mongs pa sgo gcig tu bstan pa'i phyir rgyu mdor bsdus she na /
gnyis kyi rgyu 'bras mdor bsdus pa /
bar ma'i rjes su dpag pa las /
madhyenaiva hi pūrvāntāparāntayorapi hetuphalavistaraḥ śakyo 'numānumiti noktaḥ /
punaraparātmakaṃ hi yatnaṃ mā kāryamiti /
yadi khalu dvādaśāṅga eva pratītyasamutpāda evaṃ satyavidyāyā anupadiṣṭahetukatvādādimān saṃsāraḥ prāpnoti jarāmaraṇasya cānupadiṣṭaphalatvādantavān 		bar ma kho nas sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag gi rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyas par rjes su dpag par nus pas ma bshad de /
yang don med pa'i 'bad pa ma byas so /
gal te yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis kho na yin na de lta na go /
ma rig pa'i rgyu ma bstan pa'i phyir 'khor ba thog ma can du yang 'gyur la /
rga shi'i 'bras bu ma bstan pa'i phyir mtha' dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba'am /
aṅgāntaraṃ vā punarupasaṃkhyātavyaṃ tasyāpyanyasmāditya navasthāprasaṅgaḥ yang na ni yan lag gzhan gyis kha bskang dgos so /
de la yang gzhan zhig yod na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
nopasaṃkhyātavyam kha bskang bar bya mi dgos te /
yasmādupadarśito 'tra bhagavatā /
kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ 		'di ltar 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
nyon mongs pa las nyon mongs dang /
bya ba nyid do de las gzhi /
vastukleśāśca jāyante bhavāṅganāmayaṃ nayaḥ de las gzhi dang nyon mongs skyes /
'di ni srid pa'i yan lag lugs /
zhes bstan zin to /
kleśāt kleśo jāyate tṛṣṇāyā upādānam /
kleśāt karma /
upādānāt bhavo 'vidyāyāśca saṃskārā 		nyon mongs pa las nyon mongs pa skye ste /
sred pa las len pa'o /
nyon mongs pa las las te /
len pa las ni srid pa dang ma rig pa las 'du byed rnams so /
karmavastusaṃskārebhyo vijñānaṃ bhavācca jātiḥ /
vastuno vastuvijñānānāmarūpaṃ yāvat sparśādvedanā jāteśca jarāmaraṇam 		las las gzhi ste /
'du byed rnams las rnam par shes pa dang srid pa las skye ba'o /
gzhi las gzhi ste /
rnam par shes pa las ming dang gzugs nas reg pa las tshor ba'i bar dang skye ba las rga shi'o /
vastunaḥ kleśo vedanāyā stṛṣṇeti /
yasmādeṣa nayo vyavasthito bhavāṅgānāṃ tasmādavidyā 'pi kleśasvabhāvā vastunaḥ kleśādveti jñāpitaṃ bhavati /
vedanāvaśācca jarāmaraṇavastunaḥ punaḥ kleśo bhāvīti nātra punaḥ kiñcidupasaṃkhyeyam /
evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatīti vacanāt /
anyathā hi kimasya sāmarthyaṃ syāt 		gzhi las nyon mongs pa ste /
tshor ba las srid pa'o /
gang gi phyir srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi lugs de ltar rnam par gzhag pa de'i phyir ma rig pa nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin yang gzhi 'am nyon mongs pa las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin la /
rga shi ni tshor ba la thug pa'i gzhi las kyang nyon mongs pa 'byung ngo zhes bstan pa yin pas yang 'di la kha bskang bar bya ba cung zad kyang med de; de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
de lta ma yin na 'di'i nus pa ci zhig yod par 'gyur /
ayoniśomanaskārahetukā 'vidyoktā sūtrāntare /
avidyāhetukaścāyoniśomanaskāraḥ /
sa cehāpyupādānāntarbhūtatvādukto bhavatīti apare 		gzhan dag na re mdo gzhan las ma rig pa yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no /
tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yang ma rig pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no /
zhes gsungs la /
de ni 'dir yang len pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir bshad pa yin no zhes zer te /
kathamayoniśomanaskārasyopādāne 'ntarbhāvaḥ /
yadi saṃprayogataḥ 		tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa /
len pa'i nang du ji ltar 'dus /
tṛṣṇā 'vidyayorapi tasyāntarbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
satyapi cāntarbhāve kathamatredaṃ jñāpitaṃ bhavatyayoniśomanaskārahetukā avidyeti 		gal te mtshungs par ldan pa las yin no zhe na ni srid pa dang ma rig pa dag gi nang du yang de 'dus par thal bar 'gyur ro /
nang du 'dus pa yin du chug na yang ji ltar 'dir ma rig pa ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no zhes bya bar bstan pa yin /
yadi tarhyantarbhāvenaiva hetuphalabhāvo vijñāyate tṛṣṇā 'vidyayorapi tarhi tatrāntarbhāvā daṅgantaratvaṃ śakyamakarttum /
anyaḥ punarāha 		gal te nang du 'dus pa kho nas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por shes par 'gyur na /
'o na ni sred pa dang ma rig pa dag kyang de'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir yan lag gzhan nyid du mi bya bar nus so /
ayoniśo manaskāro heturavidyāyā uktaḥ sūtrāntare /
sa cāpi sparśakāle nirdiṣṭaḥ /
cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate āvilo manaskāro mohaja iti /
vedanākāle cāvaśyamavidyayā bhavitavyam /
avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ veditaṃ pratītyotpannā tṛṣṇeti sūtrāntarāt 		gzhan dag na re mdo gzhan las ma rig pa'i rgyu tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin par gsungs te /
de yang mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas gti mug las skyes pa'i yid la byed pa'i rnyog pa skye'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir reg pa'i dus su bstan pa yin la /
mdo gzhan las ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la brten nas sred pa skye'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir tshor ba'i dus su yang ma rig pa gdon mi za bar yod do /
ataḥ sparśakāle bhavannayoniśomanaskāro vedanāsahavarttinyā avidyāyāḥ pratyayabhāvena siddha iti nāstyahetukatvamavidyāyā na cāṅgāntaramupasaṃkhyeyam de lta bas na reg pa'i dus na yod pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni tshor ba dang lhan cig 'jug pa'i ma rig pa'i rkyen gyi ngo bor grub pas ma rig pa rgyu med pa nyid kyang ma yin zhing /
yan lag gzhan gyis kha bskang bar yang mi bya'o /
nacāpyanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
tasyāpyayoniśomanaskārasya punarmohajavacanādāvilo manaskāro mohaja iti /
tattarhyetadantyatroktamiha punarvaktavyam 		gti mug las skyes pa'i yid la byed pa rnyog pa zhes 'byung bas tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de yang gti mug las skyes par gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
'o na ni de ni gzhan du gsungs pas 'dir yang brjod par bya dgos so zhe na /
na vaktavyam brjod par bya mi dgos so /
kathamanucyamānaṃ gamyate ma brjod bzhin du ji ltar go zhe na rigs pa las so /
yuktitaḥ /
kayā yuktyā 		rigs pa gang gis she na /
nahi niravadyā vedanā tṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayībhavatyarhatāṃ na cāvīparītaḥ sparśaḥ kliṣṭāyā vedanāyāḥ /
naca punarniravadyasyārhataḥ sparśo viparīta ityanayā yuktyā 		dgra bcom pa rnams kyi tshor ba ma rig pa med pa ni sred pa'i rkyen ma yin no /
phyin ci log med pa'i srid pa yang nyon mongs pa can gyi tshor ba'i rkyen ma yin la /
dgra bcom pa ma rig pa med pa'i reg pa yang phyin ci log ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pa 'dis so /
atiprasaṅga evaṃ prāpnoti /
yauvat yuktyā saṃbhavati tāvadanuktam gamyata iti /
tasmānna bhavatyayaṃ parihāraḥ /
acodyameva tvetad 		ji snyed rigs pas 'thad pa de snyed ma bshad bzhin du yang go bar 'gyur na /
de lta na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur te /
de lta bas na 'di ni lan ma yin no /
avidyājarāmaraṇayoḥ pareṇāṅgantarānabhidhānātsaṃsārasyādyantavattvaprasaṅgaḥ /
nacāparipūrṇo nirdeśa iti 		ma rig pa dang rga shi dag las gzhan ma bstan pa'i phyir 'khor ba la thog ma dang tha ma dang ldan par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni klan kar mi rung ba kho na yin la ma tshang bar bstan pa yang ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
pravṛttisaṃmūḍebhyo vineyebhyaḥ kathaṃ paralokādihaloka ihalokācca punaḥ paralokaḥ saṃbadhyata ityetāvato 'trārthasya vivakṣitatvāt 'dir ni ji ltar na 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir /
'jig rten 'di nas yang 'jig rten pha rol du 'brel snyam du 'jug pa la rmongs pa'i gdul ba rnams la de tsam zhig brjod par bzhed pa'i phyir la /
etasya ca pūrvamevottatvāt de ni /
sngon dang phyi mtha'i bar dag la /
pūrvāparāntamadhyeṣu saṃmoha vinivṛttaye rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro /
zhes bya ba 'dis sngar bshad zin pa'i phyir ro /
uktaṃ bhagavatā pratītyasamutpādaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi pratītyasamutpannāṃśca dharmānityathaka eṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag khyed la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams kyang bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
yang de dag la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
śāstratastāvanna kaścit /
ubhyaṃ hi sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti /
kathamidānīmanutpannā evānāgatāḥ pratītyasamutpannā ityucyante 		re zhig bsnyan [*bstan?] bcos las ni khyad par cung zad kyang med de /
gnyi ga yang 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad yin par gsungs so /
da ni ji ltar na ma 'ongs pa ma byung ba rnams rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dag ces bya /
kathaṃ tāvadakṛtā evānāgatāḥ saṃskṛtā ucyante re zhig ma 'ongs pa ma byas pa rnams kho na yang ji ltar na 'dus byas dag ces bya /
ābhisamskārikayā cetanayā cetitatvāt /
anāsravāḥ katham 		mngon par 'du byed pa'i sems pas bsams pa'i phyir ro /
zag pa med pa rnams ji ltar /
te 'pi cetitāḥ kuśalayā cetanayā prāptiṃ prati de dag kyang thob par bya ba'i phyir sems pa dge bas bsams pa dag yin no /
nirvāṇe 'pi prasaṅgaḥ /
tajjātīyatvāttattatraivātideśo yathā naca tāvadrūpyate rūpaṃ cocyate tajjātīyatvādityadoṣaḥ 		mya ngan las 'das pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir de kho na bzhin du mthun par bsgres pa yin te /
dper na re zhig gzugs su ni rung ba yang de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba bzhin pas de ni nyes pa med do /
sūtrābhiprāyastvayamucyate mdo'i dgongs pa ni /
'dir ni 'byung ba rgyu yin te /
heturatra samutpādaḥ samutpannaṃ phalaṃ matam /
hetubhūtamaṅgapratītyasamutpādaḥ samutpadyate 'smāditi dṛtvā phalabhūtamaṅga pratītyasamutpannam 		byung ba 'bras bu yin par 'dod /
ces pa 'di yin te /
rgyur gyur pa'i yan lag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin te /
'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
'bras bur gyur pa'i yan lag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste /
evaṃ sarvāṇyaṅgānyubhayayathā sidhyanti /
hetuphalabhavāt 		de ltar na yan lag thams cad kyang rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i phyir gnyi gar 'grub par 'gyur ro /
na caivaṃ satyavyavasthā bhavantyapekṣābhedāt de lta yin yang ltos pa'i bye brag gis rnam par gzhag pa med pa yang ma yin te /
yadapakṣaya pratītyasamutpādo na tadevāpekṣya pratītyasamutpannaṃ hetuphalavat pitṛputravacca gang la ltos nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa yin pa de nyid la ltos nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ma yin te /
rgyu dang 'bras bu bzhin dang pha dang bu bzhin no /
gnas brtan bsam rdzogs na re /
sthavirapūrṇāśaḥ kilāha syāt pratīyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpannā dharmā iti /
catuṣkoṭikaḥ /
prathamā koṭiranāgatā dharmāḥ 		rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin la /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos dag ma yin pa yang yod do zhes bya ba mu bzhi ste /
mu dang po ni chos ma 'ongs pa rnams so /
dvitīyā 'rhataścaramāḥ /
tṛtīyā tadanye 'tītapratyupannā dharmāḥ /
caturthya saṃskṛtā dharmā iti 		gnyis pa ni dgra bcom pa'i chos tha ma 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams so /
gsum pa ni de las gzhan pa'i chos 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams so /
bzhi pa ni chos 'dus ma byas rnams so zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
atra tu sautrāntikā vijñāpayanti 'dir mdo sde pa rnams rgol bar bye de /
kiṃ khalvetā iṣṭaya ucyante yā yasyeṣṭirāhosvitsūtrārthaḥ ci 'di dag gang zhig gang 'dod pa'i 'dod rgyal du 'chad pa zhig gam /
'on te mdo'i don yin /
sūtrārtha ityāha /
yadi sūtrārtho naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ 		smras pa /
mdo'i don yin no /
gal te mdo'i don yin no zhe na /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
yattāvaduktamā vasthika eṣa pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśa pañcaskandhikā avasthā dvādaśaṅgānī tyetadutsūtram 		'di ni mdo'i don ma yin no /
ji ltar zhe na re zhig gnas skabs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i phung po lnga'i gnas skabs kyi yan lag bcu gnyis pa dag yin no zhes gang smras pa ni mdo dang 'gal ba yin no /
sūtre 'nyathā nirdeśād mdo las ni ma rig pa gang zhe na /
avidyā katamā /
yattat pūrvānte 'jñānamiti vistareṇa /
yacca nītārthaṃ na tat punarneyaṃ bhavatīti naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ 		smras pa /
sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa gang yin pa'o zhes rgyas par gsungs te /
nges pa'i don gang yin pa de ni drang ba'i don ma yin pas 'di ni mdo'i don ma yin no /
na vai sarvaṃ nirdeśato nītārthaṃ bhavati /
yathāpradhānaṃ cāpi nirdeśāḥ kriyante 		bstan pa'i sgo nas thams cad nges pa'i don kho na yang ma yin gyi /
gtso bo ji lta bar bstan par yang mdzad de /
tadyathā hastipadopame pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ ityadhikṛtyāha keśā romāṇīti /
santi ca tatrānye 'pi rūpādayaḥ /
evamatrāpi yathāpradhānaṃ nirdeśaḥ syāt 		dper na glang po che'i rjes lta bu las /
sa'i khams gang zhe na zhes bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas 'di lta ste /
skra dang kha spu dag go zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
de dag la ni gzugs la sogs pa gzhan yang yod de /
de bzhin du 'dir yang gtso bo ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa yin no /
aupasaṃhāra eṣaḥ /
nahi tatra keśādayaḥ pṛthivīdhātunā nirdiśyante /
yata eṣāmaparipūrṇo nirdeśaḥ syādapi tu keśādibhireva pṛthivīdhātuḥ tatra nirdeśyate /
na ca keśādīnabhyatītyāpyasti pṛthivīdhāturiti saṃpūrṇa evāsya nirdeśaḥ 		'di ni dpe ma yin te /
de las ni gang gis na de dag ma rdzogs par bstan par 'gyur ba sa'i khams kyi skra la sogs pa ston pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de las ni skra la sogs pa dag kho nas sa'i khams ston pa yin te /
skra la sogs pa ma gtogs pa yang sa'i khams med pas 'di rdzogs par bstan pa kho na yin no /
evamihāpyavidyādīnāṃ paripūrṇa eva nirdeśo na sāvaśeṣaḥ /
nanu cābhyatītyāpi keśādīnaśrukheṭa śiṅghāṇakā diṣvasti pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
so 'pi nirdiṣṭa eveti /
yadva punaranyadapyasmin kāye khakūkhaṭaṃ kharagatamiti vacanāt bhavatu vā tathaivāvidyāvaśeṣo yadi śakyate darśayitum /
jātyantarasya tvavidyāyāṃ kiṅkṛtaḥ prakṣepaḥ /
yadyapi ca tāsvavasthāsu pañca skandhā vidyante yasya tu bhāvābhāvayoryasya bhāvābhāvaniyamaḥ tadevāṅgaṃ vyavasthāpayitum /
satyapi ca pañcaskandhake 'rhataḥ saṃskārā na bhavanti pañcaskandhahetukāḥ /
kiṃ tarhi 		de bzhin du 'di las kyang ma rig pa la sogs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa kho nar bstan pa yin gyi lhag ma dang bcas par ni ma yin no /
