tasya puṣṭaye kavaḍīkārāhārāḥ de rgyas par byed pa ni kham gyi zas so /
āśritāścittacaittāsteṣāṃ puṣṭaye sparśaḥ /
anayostāvadihotpannasya bhavasya poṣaṇe prādhānyam 		rten pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so /
de dag rgyas par byed pa ni reg pa ste /
re zhig 'di gnyis ni 'dir skyes pa'i srid pa gso bar bya ba gtso bo yin no /
manaḥsaṃcetanayā punarbhavasyākṣepaḥ ākṣiptasya punaḥ karmaparibhāvitādvijñānavījādabhinirvṛttirityanayoranutpannasya bhavasyākaraṇe prādhānyam yid la sems pas ni yang srid pa 'phen par byed do /
'phangs zin pa ni las kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa'i sa bon las mngon par 'grub pas 'di gnyis ni ma skyes pa'i srid pa skyes ba la gtso bor yin no /
ataścatvāra uktāḥ de'i phyir bzhir gsungs so /
pūrvakau hi dvau dhātrīsthānīyau jātasya poṣakatvāt snga ma gnyis ni skyes zin pa gso bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ma ma lta bu dag yin no /
uttarau mātṛsthānīyau janakatvāditi phyi ma gnyis ni skyed par byed ba ma yin pa'i phyir ma lta bu dag yin no /
yaḥ kaścit kavaḍīkāraḥ sarvaḥ sa āhāraḥ /
syāt kavaḍīkāro nāhāra iti catuṣkoṭikam 		gang la la kham yin pa de thams cad zas kyang yin nam zhe na /
kham yin la zas ma yin pa yang yod do zhes bya ba mu bzhi ste /
prathamā koṭiryaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmapacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca paribhedaḥ mu dang po ni kham gang la brten nas dbang po rnams nyams par 'gyur la /
'byung ba chen po rnams kyang yongs su 'jig par 'gyur ba'o /
dvitīyā koṭistraya āhārāḥ /
tṛtīyā yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ 		mu gnyis pa ni zas gsum pa dag go /
gsum pa ni kham gang la brten nas dbang po rnams rgyas par 'gyur zhing 'byung ba chen po rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o /
caturthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā /
evaṃ sparśadibhirapi yathāyogaṃ catuḥkoṭikāni karttavyāni 		bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
de bzhin du reg pa la sogs pas kyang ci rigs par mu bzhir bya'o /
syāt sparśādīn pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhirna ca ta āhārāḥ reg pa la sogs pa la brten nas dbang po rnams rgyas par 'gyur zhing 'byung ba rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ba de dag zas kyang ma yin pa lta yod dam zhe na /
syādanyabhūmikānanāsravāṃśca /
yo 'pi hi paribhukto bhokturbādhāmādadhāti so 'pyāhāra eva 		yod de /
gzhan gyi sa pa dang zag pa med pa rnams so /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
gang zhig zos nas za ba po la gnod par byed pa de la yang dang po phan 'dogs pa'i phyir zas yin no /
āpāte 'nugrahāt /
dvayorhi kālayorāhāra āhārakṛtyaṃ karoti paribhujyamāno jīryaṃśceti vaibhāṣikāḥ 		zas ni dus gnyis su zas kyi bya ba byed de /
yongs su longs spyod pa'i tshe dang 'ju ba'i tshe'o zhes zer ro /
'gro ba gang na zas du zhig yod ce na /
atha kasyāṃ gatau katyāhārāḥ thams cad na thams cad yod de /
sarvāsu sarve /
evaṃ yoniṣvapi 		skye gnas dag na yang de dang 'dra'o /
kathaṃ narakeṣu kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ /
pradīptāyaspiṇḍāḥ svathitaṃ ca tāmrām /
yadyūpaghātako 'pyāhāro bhavati catuḥkoṭikaṃ bādhyate prakaraṇagranthaśca kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ katamaḥ 		dmyal ba dag na kham gyi zas ji lta bu zhe na /
lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba dang zangs zhun ma yin no; /
gal te gnod par byed pa yang zas yin na ni mu ba zhi la yang gnod par 'gyur la rab tu byed pa'i gzhung kham gyi zas gang zhe na /
yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhutānāṃ ca vṛddhiryāpanā 'nuyāpaneti vistareṇa yāvadvijñānam kham gang la brten nas dbang po rnams rgyas par 'byung zhing 'gyur ba chen po rnams kyang 'phel ba dang 'tsho ba dang nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba nas /
rnam par shes pa'i bar du rgyas par gsungs pa la yang gnod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
upacayāhārābhisaṃdhivacanādavirodhaḥ rgyas par 'gyur ba'i zas la dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do /
apacayāhārastu narakekṣu lakṣaṇaprāptatvāt nyams par 'gyur ba'i zas ni dmyal ba dag tu zas kyi mtshan nyid thob pa'i phyir te /
so 'pi hi jighatsāṃ pipāsāṃ hantuṃ samartha iti des kyang bkres pa dang skom pa dag 'joms par nus pa'i phyir ro /
apitu pratyekanarakeṣu manuṣyavat kavaḍīkārāhārasadbhāvādyuktaṃ pāñcagatikatvam gzhan yang nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba dag na mi dang 'dra bar kham gyi zas yod pa'i phyir 'gro ba lnga pa nyid du rigs so /
uktaṃ bhagavatā yaśca bāhyakānāmṛṣīṇāṃ kāmebhyo vītarāgāṇāṃ śataṃ bhojayedyaścaikaṃ jambūṣaṇḍagataṃ pṛthagajanam /
ato dānādidaṃ dānaṃ mahāphalataramiti 		bcom ldan 'das kyis /
gang gis phyi'i drang srong 'dod pa dag las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya la zas byin pa bas gang gis 'dzam bu'i tshal na 'dug pa'i so so'i skye bo gcig la byin na spyin pa de bas spyin pa 'di 'bras bu ches che'o zhes gsungs pa /
ko 'yaṃ jambūṣaṇḍagato nāma pṛthagjanaḥ 'dzam bu'i tshal na 'dug pa'i so so'i skye bo zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na /
jambūdvīpanivāsinaḥ kukṣimanta ityeke kha cig na re 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa lto dang ldan pa dag yin no zhes zer ro /
tadetanna yuktamekamiti vacanāt de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
gcig ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
kaścātra viśeṣaḥ /
syādyadi bhūyasaḥ pṛthagjanān bhojayitvā bhūyaḥ puṇyaṃ syāt nālpīyaso vītarāgāniti 		so so'i skye bo mang po la zas byin na bsod nams mang por 'gyur gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba nyung du la zas byin pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di la khyad par ci zhig yod /
saṃnikṛṣṭo bodhisattva ityapare gzhan dag na re byang chub sems dpa' nye ba yin no zhes zer ro /
tadetanna varṇayanti bahutaraṃ hi tasmai datvā puṇyaṃ nārhatkoṭibhya iti bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni de skad du mi brjod de /
de la byin na dgra bcom pa bye ba la byin pa bas bsod nams che sa mang ba'i phyir ro /
ato nirvedhabhāgīyalābhī pṛthagjana eṣo'bhipretaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ de lta bas na 'di ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa so so'i skye bo yin par dgongs so zhes zer ro /
natviyamanvarthā saṃjñā nāpikvacitparibhāṣitā sūtre śāstre vā /
jambūṣaṇḍagato nirvedhabhāgīyalābhīti parikalpa evāyaṃ kevalaḥ 		'di'i ming yang don dang mthun pa ma yin la /
mdo 'am bstan bcos gang las kyang 'dzam bu'i tsha la du gtogs pa ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa'o zhes 'ol phyir ma ba shad pas 'di ni yongs su rtog pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi /
bodhisattva eva tveṣu jambūdvīpaṣaṇḍeṣu niṣaṇṇo yujyate 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'dzam bu'i tshal na bzhugs pa kho na yin par rigs te /
sa hi pṛthagjana kāmavairāgyasaṃbandhena tadānīṃ tebhyo viśiṣyamāṇa ukta iti so so'i skye bo de ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar 'dra bas de'i tshe de dag las khyad par du 'phags par gsungs so /
anantebhyo 'pi hi sa tebhyo viśiṣyamāṇaḥ de ni de dag mtha' yas pa pas kyang khyad par du 'phags na /
śatagrahaṇaṃ tu pūrvādhikārāt brgya smos pa ni dang po'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro /
itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yadevaṃ paryudasya bāhyakebhya eva srotāpatti phalapratipannakaṃ viśeṣayāṃbabhūva de ni gdon mi za bar de lta yin par shes par bya ste /
'di ltar de ma gtogs pa'i phyi rol pa rnams las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa khyad par du 'phags par mdzad par gyur to /
anyathā hi jambūṣaṇḍagatādeva vyaśeṣayiṣyat de lta ma yin na 'dzam bu'i tshal du gtogs pa las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa kho nar 'gyur ro /
ukto yathā sattvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādo yathāvasthitiścyutirapyuktā yathāyuḥkṣayādibhiḥ sems can rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji lta ba dang ji ltar gnas pa bshad zin to /
ji ltar tshe zad pa la sogs pas 'chi 'pho ba la yang bshad zin to /
idamidānīṃ vaktavyam /
katamasmin vijñāne vartamāne cyutyupapattī bhavata ityāha /
chedasaṃdhāna vairāgyahānicyutyupapattyaḥ /
manovijñāna eveṣṭāḥ 		da ni sems gang la gnas te 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar 'gyur ba 'di brjod par bya ste /
'chad dang mtshams sbyor 'dod chags bral; /
nyams dang 'chi 'pho skye ba rnams /
yid kyi rnam shes kho nar 'dod /
kuśalalmūlasamucchedaḥ kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānaṃ dhātubhūmivairāgyaṃ parihāṇiścyutirupapattiśca /
ete ṣaṭ dharmā manovijñāna eveṣyante nānyatra 		ces bya ba smos so /
de dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'chad pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba nying mtshams sbyor ba dang khams dang sa las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang yongs su nyams pa dang 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang chos drug po 'di dag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa kho na yin par 'dod kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
upapattivacanādantarābhavapratisaṃdhirapyuktarūpo veditavyaḥ /
vedanāyāṃ tu /
upekṣāyāṃ cyutodbhavau 		skye ba smos pa ni srid pa bar mar nyid mtshams sbyor ba bshad zin pa'i ngo bor rig par bya'o /
tshor ba ni /
'chi 'pho skye ba btang snyoms la /
cyutireva cyutamupapattirudbhavaḥ 'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho ba nyid yin no /
skye ba ni skye ba yin no /
etāvaduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ bhavatastasyā apaṭutvāt 'di gnyis bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba yin te /
de ni mi gsal ba'i phyir ro /
itare hi vedane paṭvyau /
na ca paṭuvijñāne cyutyupapattī yujyete /
tatrāpi ca manovijñāne 'pi 		tshor ba gzhan dag ni gsal ba yin te /
rnam par shes pa gsal ba dag gis 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar ni rung ba ma yin no /
yid kyi rnam par shes pa de la yang /
naikāgrācittayoretau rtse gcig sems med la de med /
cyutodbhavāviti vartate /
nahi samāhitacittasyāsti cyutirupapattirvā /
visabhāgabhūmikatvādabhisaṃskārikatvādanugrāhakatvācca 		'chi 'a pho ba dang skye ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
skal pa mi nyam pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir dang mngon par 'du byed pa las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dang phan 'dogs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la 'chi 'pho ba 'am skye ba med do /
nāpyacittasya sā nahyacittaka upakramituṃ śasyeta /
yadā cāsyāśrayo vipariṇantumārabhate tadāvaśyamasya tadāśrayapratibaddhaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūya paścāt pracyaveta nānyathā 		sems med pa la yang med de /
sems med pa la ni gnod pa bya bar mi nus so /
gang gi tshe de'i lus yongs su 'jig par rtsom pa de'i tshe yang de las gdon mi za bar de'i lus dang 'brel pa'i sems mngon du gyur nas phyis 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
upapattau ca cittacchedahetvabhāvādvinā ca kleśenānupapatterayuktamacittakatvam skye ba la yang sems 'chad pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa med par mi skye ba'i phyir sems med par rigs pa nyid ma yin no /
maraṇabhavastriprakāra ityuktam 'chi ba'i srid pa rnam pa gsum du bshad pa la /
arhastu /
nirvātyavyākṛtadvaye 		dgra bcom pa ni /
mya ngan 'das lung bstan min gnyis /
airyāpathike vipākacitte vā /
asti cetkāmadhātau vipāka upekṣā /
nāsti cedairyāpathika eva 		spyod lam pa dang gal te 'dod pa'i khams na rnam par smin pa'i btang snyoms yod na rnam par smin pa'i sems la gnas nas so /
ci ste med na ni spyod lam pa kho na la'o /
kimarthamavyākṛṭa eva nānyasmin /
tadvi cittacchedānukūlaṃ durbalatvāt /
atha mriyamāṇasya kasmin śarīrapradeśe vijñānaṃ nirudhyate /
sakṛnmaraṇe samanaskaṃ kāyendriyaṃ sahasā'ntardīyate 		ci'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa kho na la yin gyi gzhan lam yin zhe na /
de ni nyam chung ba'i phyir sems 'chad pa'i rjes su mthun pa yin no /
yang 'chi ba na lus kyi phyogs gang du rnam par shes pa 'gag ce na /
cig car 'chi na ni yid dang bcas pa'i lus kyi dbang po mod la 'gag par 'gyur ro /
yadi tu krameṇa cyavate tataḥ /
kramacyutau pādanābhihṛdayeṣu manaścyutiḥ 		gal te rim gyis 'chi 'pho ba na de'i tshe /
'og min lhar 'gro mi skye rnams /
rim gyis 'chi na rkang pa dang /
lte ba snying gar yid 'chi 'pho /
adhonṛsuragājānāṃ /
adho gacchantītyadhogā apāyagāminaḥ 		'og tu 'gro bas na 'og tu 'gro ba ste /
ngan song du 'gro ba rnams so /
mir 'gro bas na mir 'gro bas te /
nṛn gacchantīti nṛgā manuṣyagāminaḥ /
surān gacchantīti suragā devagāminaḥ 		mi'i nang du 'gro ba rnams so /
lhar 'gro bas na lhar 'gro ba ste /
lha'i nang du 'gro ba rnams so /
teṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pādayornābhyāṃ hṛdaye ca vijñānaṃ saṃnirudhyate de dag gi rnam par shes pa ni grangs bzhin du rkang pa dang lte ba dang snying gar 'gag go /
na punarjāyanta ityajā arhantaḥ /
teṣāmapi hṛdaye vijñānaṃ nirudhyate 		yang mi skye bas na mi skye ba ste /
dgra bcom pa dag go /
de dag gi rnam par shes pa snying khar 'gag go /
mūrdhnītyapare /
kāyendriyasya teṣu nirodhāt kāyendriyaṃ hi mriyamāṇasya tapta ivopale jalaṃ niṣṭhyūtaṃ saṃkocamāpadyamānaṃ pādādiṣvantardhīyata iti /
evaṃ ca punaḥ krameṇa maraṇam 		gzhan dag na re spyi bor zhes zer ro /
de dag tu lus kyi dbang po 'gag pa'i phyir ro /
'chi ba'i lus kyi dbang po ni rdo leb bsregs pa'i thog tu chus btab pa zhum par 'gyur ba bzhin du rkang pa la sogs par nub par 'gyur ro /
prāṇināṃ prāyeṇa marmacchedavedanābhyāṃ hatānāṃ jāyate /
marmacchedastvabādibhiḥ 		gnad 'chad pa'i tshor bas nyen pa'i srog chags rnams ni phal cher de lta de ltar rim gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro /
śarīrapradeśāḥ kecidupahanyamānā maraṇamānayanti /
te hyetaducyante marmāṇīti /
tāni cāptejovāyudhātūnāmanyatamenātiprāyaṃ gatena niśitaśastrasaṃpātasyardhināḍītībrābhirvedanābhiḥ chidyanta iva na ca punastāni kāṣṭhādivacchidyante chinnabadvā punarna ceṣṭanta iti cchinnānyucyante 		gnad gcod pa ni tshul sogs kyis lus kyi phyogs 'ga' zhig nyams na 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag ni gnad rnams zhes bya'o /
de dag kyang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig drag tu 'khrugs par gyur pa mtshon cha thams cad bdar bas btab pa dang 'dra bas tshor ba mi bzad pa dag gis bcad pa lta bu yin gyi /
de dag shing gcod pa lta bur ni ma yin no /
yang na bcad pa dang 'dra bar yang g yo ba med pas na bcad pa zhes bya'o /
kasmānna pṛthivīdhātunā ci'i phyir sa'i khams kyi ma yin zhe na /
caturthadoṣābhāvāt skyon bzhi pa med pa'i phyir te /
vātapittaśleṣmāṇo hi trayo doṣāḥ /
te cāptejovāyudhātupradhānā yathāyogamiti 		rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rnams ni skyon gsum yin pa de dag gi gtso bo ni ci rigs par chu dang me dang rlung gi khams dag yin no /
bhājanalokasaṃvarttanīsādharmyeṇetyapare gzhan dag na re snod kyi 'jig rten 'jig pa dang chos mthun pas so zhes zer ro /
deveṣu nāsti marmacchedaḥ lha dag gi nang na ni gnad 'chad pa med mod kyi /
kiṃ tu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañcopanimittāni prādurbhavanti /
vastrāṇāmābharaṇānāṃ ca manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati śarīraprabhā mandībhavati snātasyodabindavaḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhante capalātmanā 'pyekatra viṣaye buddhiravatiṣṭhate unmeṣanimeṣau cākṣṇoḥ saṃbhavataḥ 		'on kyang lha'i bu 'chi ba'i chos can la ni nye ba'i snga ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te /
gos rnams dang rgyan rnams las sgra yid du mi 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
lus kyi 'od chung bar 'gyur /
khrus byas pa'i chu'i thigs pa dag lus la chags par 'gyur /
g yo ba'i bdag nyid can yang blo yul gcig la gnas par 'gyur /
mig gnyis 'dzums pa dang 'byed pa dag srid par 'gyur te /
etāni tu vyabhicārīṇi de dag ni 'khrul pa can yin no /
pañca punarnimittāni maraṇaṃ nātivarttante /
vāsāṃsi kliśyanti mālā mlāyanti kakṣābhyāṃ svedo mucyate daurgandhyaṃ kāye'vakrāmati sve cāsane devaputro nābhiramate /
so'yaṃ sattvaloka evamutpadyamānastiṣṭhan cyavamanaśca triṣu rāśiṣu sthāpito bhagavatā 		'chi ba'i ltas lnga las ni mi 'da' ste /
gos dri ma can du 'gyur /
me tog phreng rnyings par 'gyur /
mchan khung gnyis nas rdul 'byung bar 'gyur /
lus las dri da ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur /
lha'i bu rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o /
sems can gyi 'jig rten 'di de ltar skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'chi 'pho ba na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs gsum du bzhag ste /
trayo rāśayaḥ /
samyaktvaniyato rāśirmithyātvaniyato rāśiraniyato rāśiriti 		tshogs gsum ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs dang log pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs dang ma nges pa'i tshogs so /
tatra punaḥ /
samyaṅmithyātvaniyatā āryānantaryakāriṇaḥ /
samyaktvaṃ katamat /
yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya sarvakleśaprahāṇamidamucyate samyaktvamiti sūtram 		de la 'phags dang mtshams med byed pa dag yang dag log pa nyid du des /
yang dag pa nyid gang zhe na /
mdo las gang 'dod chags gtan nas spangs pa dang zhe sdang gtan nas spangs pa dang gti mug gtan nas spangs pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan nas spangs pa nyid ni yang dag pa nyid do zhes 'byung ngo /
āryāḥ katame /
yeṣāmanāsravo mārga utpannaḥ 		'phags pa rnams gang zhe na /
gang dag la zag pa med pa'i lam skyes pa'o /
ārādyātāḥ pāpakebhyo dharmebhya ityāryāḥ sdig pa'i chos las ring du song pas na 'phags pa rnams te /
ātyantikavisaṃyogaprāptilābhāt gtan du 'bral ba'i thob pa rnyed pa'i phyir ro /
ete hi kleśakṣaye niyatatvāt samyaktvaniyatāḥ mokṣabhāgīyalābhino 'pyavaśyaṃ parinirvāṇadharmāṇa iti /
kasmānna samyaktve niyatāḥ /
te hi mithyātve'pi niyatā bhaveyuḥ 		de dag ni nyon mongs pa zad par nges pa'i phyir yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dag yin no /
thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa yang gdon mi za bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin na ci'i phyir yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dag ma yin zhe na /
de dag ni log pa nyid du yang nges par 'gyur la /
na ca te kālaniyamena samyaktve niyatā yathā saptakṛtvaḥ paramādayaḥ de dag ji ltar de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa la sogs pa ltar dus nges par yang dag pa nyid du nges pa yang ma yin no /
mithyātvaṃ katamat log pa nyid gang zhe na /
narakāḥ pretāstiryañca idamucyate mithyātvam /
tatrānantaryakāriṇo narake niyatatvānmithyātvaniyatāḥ 		dmyal ba rnams dang dud 'gro dang yi dags te /
'di ni log pa nyid ces bya'o /
de la mtshams med pa byed pa rnams ni dmyal bar nges pa'i phyir log pa nyid du nges pa dag yin no /
niyatebhyo'nye'niyatā iti siddham /
pratyayāpekṣaṃ hi teṣāmubhayabhāktvamanubhayabhāktvaṃ ca 		nges pa de dag las gzhan pa ni ma nges pa'o zhes bya bar grub ste /
de dag ni rkyen la ltos na gnyi ga la brten pa nyid dang gnyi ga la mi brten ba nyid kyang yin no /
uktaḥ sattvaloko bhājanaloka idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ sems can gyi 'jig rten bshad zin to /
da ni snod kyi 'jig rten bshad par bya ste /
tatra bhājanalokasya saṃniveśamuśantyadhaḥ de la snod kyi 'jig rten gyi /
gnas par 'dod pa'i 'og dag gi /
lakṣaṣoḍaśakodvedhamasaṃkhyaṃ vāyumaṇḍalam rlung gi dkyil 'khor rngams su ni /
sa ya drug 'bum grangs med do /
trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātorevaṃ saṃniveśamicchanti stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni 'di ltar gnas par 'dod de /
yadutākāśaṣpratiṣṭhamadhastādvāyumaṇḍalamabhinirvṛttaṃ sarvasattvānām /
karmādhipatyena tasya yojanalakṣāṇāṃ ṣoḍaśakamudvedhaḥ pariṇāhenāsaṃkhyaṃ tathā ca dṛḍhaṃṃ yanmahālagno'pi vajreṇa bhettumaśaktaḥ 		'di lta ste /
sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis 'og na nam mkha' la brten pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub ste /
de'i rngams su ni dpag tshad sa ya drug 'bum mo /
rgyar ni grangs med de /
'di ltar gang tshan po che chen po'i rdo rjes kyang gzhig par mi nus par sra ba yin no /
tasyopariṣṭāt de'i steng na /
apāmekādaśodvedhaṃ sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ chu rngams 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang /
stong phrag dag ni nyi shu'o /
maṇḍalamiti varttate dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar sbyar te /
tasmin vāyumaṇdale sattvānāṃ karmabhirmeghāḥ saṃbhūyākṣamātrābhirdhārābhirabhivarṣanti /
tat bhavatyaṣāṃ maṇḍalam /
tasya yojanānāmekādaśalakṣāṇyūrdhve'dho viṃśatiśca sahasrāṇi 		sems can rnams kyi las dag gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor der sprin rnams 'dus nas /
char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam la bab pa de chu'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur te /
de'i rngams su ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang nyi khri'o /
kathaṃ tā āpo na tiryaṅgvisravanti /
sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena 		ji ltar na chu de dag thad kar mi 'bo zhe na /
kha cig na re sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis te /
yathā hi bhuktaṃ pītamannaṃ pānaṃ ca nāpakvaṃ pakvāśayamāpatatī tyeke dper na bza' ba dang btung ba zos pa dang 'thung ba ma zhu ba long kar mi ltung ba bzhin no zhes zer ro /
kusūlanyāyena vāyunā saṃdhāryanta iti nikāyāntarīyāḥ sde pa gzhan dag na re sbyang gi tshul du rlung gis 'dzin to zhes zer ro /
tāśca punarāpaḥ sattvānāṃ karmaprabhāvasaṃbhūtairvāyubhirāvartyamānā upariṣṭātkāñcanībhavanti pakvakṣīrīśarībhāvayogena yang sems can rnams kyi las kyi mthu las byung ba'i rlung dag gis chu de kun nas dkrugs pa na'o ma bskol ba spris ma chags pa'i tshul du steng ma gser du 'gyur ro /
tat bhavatyaṣāṃ maṇḍalam /
aṣṭalakṣocchrayaṃ paścāccheṣaṃ bhavati kāñcanam 		chu'i dkyil 'khor de phyis ni rngams su 'bum phrag brgyad /
lhag ma dag ni gser du 'gyur /
kiṃ ca śeṣam /
trayo laklṣāḥ sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ /
sā kāñcanamayī mahī bhavatyapāmupariṣṭāt ukto jalakāñcanamaṇḍalocchrāyaḥ 		lhag ma yang gang zhig ce na /
chu'i steng rim dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khri gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhir gyur pa de'i chu dang gser gyi rngams bshad zin to /
chu dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor gyi /
tiryak trīṇi sahasrāṇi sārdhaṃ śatacatuṣṭayam /
lakṣadvādaśakaṃ caiva jalakāñcanamaṇḍalam 		thad kar 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang /
stong phrag gsum dang brgya phrag ni /
phyed dang lnga rnams kho na'o /
samānaṃ hyetadubhayaṃ vistārataḥ /
samantatastu triguṇaṃ /
samantataḥ parikṣepeṇa tu parigaṇyamānaṃ triguṇaṃ jāyate ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣā daśasahasrāṇi sārdhāni ca trīṇi śatāni yojanānām 		'di gnyi ga rgya mnyam mo /
khor yug tu ni sum 'gyur ro /
khor yug tu brtsi na ni sum 'gyur du 'gyur te /
dpag tshad sa ya phrag gsum dang 'bum phrag drug dang khri sum brgya lnga bcu'o /
yacca tatkāñcanamayaṃ mahīmaṇḍalamapāmupariṣṭāt saṃniviṣṭaṃ gser gyi sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor chu'i steng na gnas pa gang yin pa /
tatra meruryugandharaḥ /
īśādhāraḥ khadirakaḥ sudarśanagiristathā 		de la lhun po gnya' shing 'dzin /
gshol mda' 'dzin dang seng ldeng can /
aśvakarṇo vinitako nimindharagiriḥ /
itīme kāñcanamaṇḍalapratiṣṭhā aṣṭau mahāparvatāḥ 		de bzhin blta na sdug ri dang rta rna dang ni rnam bdud dang /
mu khyud 'dzin ri'o /
ri chen po brgyad po 'di dag ni gser gyi dkyil 'khor la brten pa yin te /
madhye sumeruḥ ri rab ni dbus na'o /
śeṣāḥ sumeruparicāyāvasthitāḥ lhag ma rnams kyis ni ri rab bskor te gnas so /
tasyānyasaptaparvataprākāraparikṣiptasya yo bāhyaḥ parvate nimindharagiriḥ ri bdun gyi ra bas bskor ba de'i phyi rim gang yin pa de ni ri mu khyud 'dzin no /
tataḥ /
dvīpāḥ 		de nas ni gling rnams yin no /
tato bahiścatvāro dvīpāḥ de'i phyi rol na ni gling bzhi dag go /
tebhyaḥ punaḥ /
bahiścakravāḍaḥ 		de dag gi yang phyi rol na ni khor yug ste /
tena cāturdvipakaścakrīkṛtaḥ /
teṣāṃ tu 		des ni gling bzhir khor yag tu bskor te /
de dag las /
sapta haimāḥ sa āyasaḥ bdun ni gser yin te lcags so /
yugandharādayaḥ sapta parvatāḥ sauvaṛṇāścakravāḍaḥ śastrakaḥ gnya' shing 'dzin la sogs pa'i ri bdun ni gser gyi rang bzhin yin no /
khor yug ni lcags kyi rang bzhin yin no /
catūratnamayo meruḥ lhun po rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin /
suvarṇamayo rūpyamayo vaidūryamayaḥ sphaṭikamayaśca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu /
yacca yanmayaṃ pārśvaṃ sumerostasyānubhāvena tadvarṇa tasyāṃ diśi nabho dṛśyate 		gser gyi rang bzhin dang dngul gyi rang bzhin dang beed'urya'i rang bzhin dang shel gyi rang bzhin te /
ngos bzhi dag tu grangs bzhin no /
ri rab kyi ngos gang zhig gang gi rang bzhin yin pa de'i mthus de'i ngos kyi nam mkha' yang de'i kha dog tu snang ste /
jāmbūdvīpakamasya pārśvaṃ vaidūryamayaṃ varṇayanti de'i ngos 'dzam bu'i gling logs bee d'urya'i rang bzhin yin la /
tasyeha prabhānurāgeṇa vaidūryamayaṃ nabho dṛśyata iti /
atha kathaṃ teṣāṃ saṃbhavaḥ 		de'i 'od kyi kha dog gis 'di'i nam mkha' yang bee d'urya'i kha dog tu snang ngo zhes brjod do /
yang de dag ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
kāñcanamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ punarvāridhārā atipatanti gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi la char pa'i rgyun 'bab ste /
tā hyāpo nānāvidhabījagarbhā bahuvidhaprabhāvabhinnairvāyubhirmathyamānāstāṃ tāṃ jātiṃ pariṇamayanti sa bon rnam pa sna tshogs khong na yod pa'i chu de dag mthu rnam pa du ma'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i rlung dag gis bshig pa na ri de dang de dag tu 'gyur ro /
evaṃ ca punaḥ pariṇamayanti yadbhinnajātīyasya kāryaviśeṣotpattāvasamavadhānena pratyayībhavanti 'di ltar 'gyur te /
gang rigs tha dad pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par bskyed par bya ba la ma phrad par rkyen du 'gyur ba yin gyi /
na tu khalu yathā sāṃkhyānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ ji ltar grangs can pa rnams kyi 'gyur ba lta bu ni ma yin no /
kathaṃ ca sāṃkhyānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ /
avasthitasya dravyasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāntaraprādurbhāva iti 		grangs can pa rnams kyi 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na /
rdzas gnas pa la chos gzhan log na chos gzhan 'byung ba'o /
kaścātra doṣaḥ /
sa eva hi dharmī na saṃvidyate yasyāvasthitasya dharmāṇāṃ pariṇāmaḥ kaspyeta 		'di la nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na /
gnas pa gang gi chos rnams kyi bye brag brtag par bya ba'i chos can nyid med do /
kaścaiṃvamāha dharmebhyo'nyo dharmīti /
tasyaiva tu dravyasyānyathībhāvamātraṃ pariṇāmaḥ 		chos can rnams las chos can gzhan no zhes de skad du zer /
chos de nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba tsam ni 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
evamapyayuktam /
kimatrāyuktam /
tadeva cedaṃ na cedaṃ tatheti apūrvaiṣā vāyo yuktiḥ 		de lta na yang rigs pa ma yin no /
'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod ce na /
de nyid 'di yin la /
'dis de lta bu yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lugs 'di ni sngon ma byung ba yin no /
evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃbhūtāḥ suvarṇādayaḥ karmaprabhāvāt preritairvāyubhiḥ samāhṛtya rāśīkriyante /
ta ete parvatāśca bhavanti dvīpāśca 		de ltar byung ba'i gser la sogs pa las gyi [*kyi] mthus bskyed pa'i rlung dag gis bsdus nas phung por byed de /
de dag ni ri dag tu 'ang 'gyur la /
te punaḥ sumevadayaścakravāḍaparyantāḥ parvatāḥ /
jale'śītisahasrake 		gling rnams su yang 'gyur ro /
ri rab la sogs pa khor yug la thug pa'i ri de dag ni chu'i nang du brgyad khri dag nub bo /
magnāḥ /
kāñcanamayyāḥ pṛthivyā uparyaśītiyyojanasahasrāṇyudakaṃ tatra te magnāḥ 		de dag gser gyi sa gzhi'i steng na chu dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa der nub bo /
ūrdhvaṃ jalāt merurbhūyo 'śītisahasrakaḥ /
iti hi meroḥ ṣaṣṭi yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayaḥ 		chu'i steng du yang /
dpag tshad dag ni brgyad khri'o /
de ltar na ri rab ni 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum drug khri'o /
ardhārdhahāniraṣṭāsu brgyad po'i 'phang du phyed phyed dbri /
jalādūrdhvaṃ yāvānsumerustato'rdhena yugandharaścatvāriṃśadyojanasahasrāṇi /
tato 'rdhena īśādhara ityevamanyeṣvapyardhārdhahānirveditavyā yāvannimindharārdhenārdhatrayodaśottarāṇi trīṇi yojanaśatāni cakravāḍaḥ /
samocchrāyaghanāśca te /
yāvāneva caiṣāṃ jalādūrdhvaṃ samucchrāyastāvāneva ghano vistāra ityarthaḥ 		ri rab chu'i steng du ji tsam 'phags pa de'i phyed ni gnya' shing 'dzin te /
dpag tshad bzhi khri yin la /
de'i phyed ni gshol mda' 'dzin to zhes bya bas /
de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang mu khyud 'dzin gyi phyed ni khor yug ste /
'phang du dpag tshad sum brgya phyed dang bcu gsum yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du phyed phyed kyis dbri bar rig par bya'o /
de dag rngams su 'phang dang mnyam /
de dag chu las ji tsam gyen du 'phags pa rngams su yang de tsam ste /
rgyar zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
śītāḥ saptāntarāṇyeṣāṃ de dag bar bdun rol mtsho yin /
eṣāṃ ca nimindharāntanāṃ parvatānāṃ saptāntarāṇi sapta śītā ucyante pūrṇā aṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya /
taddhi pānīyaṃ śītalaṃ ca svādu ca laghu ca mṛdu cācchaṃ ca niṣpratikaṃ ca pibataśca kaṇṭhaṃ na kṣiṇoti pītaṃ ca kukṣiṃ na vyābādhate /
tāsāṃ ca punaḥ /
ādyāśītisahasrikā 		mu khyud 'dzin la thug pa'i ri de dag gi bar bdun ni rol mtsho bdun zhes bya ste /
yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ngo /
chu de ni bsil ba dang zhim pa dang yang pa dang 'jam pa dang dangs pa dang dri nga ba med pa dang 'thung na mgrin pa la mi gnod pa dang 'thungs na lto la mi gnod pa'o /
yang de dag las /
dang po stong phrag brgyad cu'o /
sumeruyugandharāntaraṃ prathamā śītā /
aśītiryojanasahasrāṇi vaipulyena 		ri rab dang gnya' shing 'dzin gyi bar gyi rol mtsho dang po ni kha tshon dpag tshad brgyad khri'o /
ābhyantaraḥ samudro'sau /
dvau hi samudrāvābhyantaro bāhyaśca 		de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin /
rgya mtsho ni gnyis te /
nang gi dang phyi'i 'o /
tadā'sau śītā'bhyantaraḥ samudraḥ rol mtsho de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin no /
triguṇaḥ sa tu pārśvataḥ /
aśītiryojanasahasrāṇyasya vaipulyamuktam 		de'i ngos la sum 'gyur ro /
kha tshon ni dpag tshad brgyad khri bshad do /
pārśvatasriguṇo bhavati yugandharatīreṇa gaṇyamānaḥ catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi lakṣadvayaṃ ca ngos la ni gnya' shing 'dzin gyi 'gram nas bgrangs na sum 'gyur te /
dpag tshad nyis 'bum bzhi khri'o /
ardhārdhenāparāḥ śītāḥ rol mtsho gzhan ni phyed phyed do /
yugandharasyeṣādhārasya cāntaraṃ dvitīyā śītā ardhena prathamāyāścatvāriṃśat yojanasahasrāṇi gnya' shing 'dzin nas gshol mda' 'dzin gyi bar gyi rol mtsho gnyis pa ni dang po'i phyed de /
dpag tshad bzhi khri yin la /
tato 'rdhena punastṛtīyetyevamardhārdhenāparāḥ śītāḥ bhavanti gsum pa ni de'i phyed do zhes bya ba nas /
de bzhin du rol mtsho bdun pa ni /
yāvadardhatrayodaśaśatāni saptamī śītā dpag tshad stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
dairdhyaṃ tu tāsāṃ na parisaṃkhyātamatibahuprakarṣavisarpaṇāt rol mtsho gzhan rnams phyed phyed kyis dbri'o /
de dag gi srid du ni ha cang 'byams klas pa'i phyir ma bgrangs so /
śeṣaṃ bāhyo mahodadheḥ /
kiṃ śeṣam /
nimindharacakravāḍayorantaram /
taddhi bāhyo mahāsamudro lavaṇaṃ pūrṇaḥ hṣārodakasya 		lhag ma phyi'i mtsho chen yin /
lhag ma gang zhig ce na mu khyud 'dzin dang khor yug gi bar de'i ni phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po yin te /
sa khalu vistāreṇa yojanānāṃ tshva sgo'i tshva chus gang ngo /
lakṣatrayaṃ sahasrāṇi viṃśatirdve ca /
tatra catvāro dvīpāścaturṣu sumerupārśveṣu 		de yang kha tshon du dpag tshad 'bum phrag gsum dang stong phrag ni nyi shu gnyis so /
de la ri rab kyi ngos bzhi ni gling bzhi ste /
tatra tu /
jambūdvīpo dvisāhasrastripārśvaḥ śakaṭākṛtiḥ 		de la ni 'dzam bu'i gling ste ngos gsum la /
stong phrag gnyis po shing rta'i dbyibs /
sāhasrāṇi trīṇi pārśvānyasya śakaṭasyevākṛtiḥ de'i ngos gsum la dpag tshad nyis stong nyis stong yod la /
tasya ca madhye kāñcanamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ vajrāsanamabhinirvṛttaṃ yasminniṣadya sarve bodhisattvā vajropamaṃ samādhimutpādayanti de'i dbyibs kyang shing rta dang 'dra'o /
de'i dbus su gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi la gang du byang chub sems dpa' ba zhugs nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyed par mdzad pa rdo rje'i gdan mngon par 'grub ste /
nahi tamanya āśrayaḥ pradeśo vā soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ /
sārdhatriyojanaṃ tvekaṃ 		de ni lus sam sa phyog [*phyogs?] gzhan gyis bzod par mi nus so /
gcig la dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi'o /
cturthamasya pārśvaṃ sārdhāni trīṇi yojanāni de'i ngos bzhi pa dag la ni dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi ste /
ata eva hyasau śakaṭākṛtiḥ /
prāgvideho'rdhacandravat 		de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shing rta chen po'i dbyibs lta bu yin no /
shar gyi lus 'phags zla gam 'dra /
itaḥ pūrveṇa sumerupārśve pūrvaṃ videho dvīpaḥ 'di nas shar phyogs kyi ri rab kyi ngos rol na shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling yod de /
so 'rdhacandra ivābhinirvṛttaḥ /
parimāṇatastu /
pārśvatrayaṃ tathā 'sya 		de ni zla ba kham pa lta bur mngon par grub bo /
rgyar ni ngos gsum 'di dang 'dra'o /
yathā jambūdvīpasya dve dve yojanasahasre /
ekaṃ sārdhaṃ triśatayojanam 		ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling la dpag tshad nyis stong nyis yod pa bzhin no /
gcig la dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu'o /
caturthaṃ pārśvaṃ sārdhāni trīṇi yojanaśatāni ngos bzhi pa la ni dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu'o /
godānīyaḥ sahasrāṇi sapta sārdhāni maṇḍalaḥ ba lang spyod gling zlum po ste /
stong phrag phyed dang brgyad yin no /
itaḥ paścimena sumerupārśve 'paragodānīyo dvīpaḥ sārdhāni sapta yojanasahasrāṇi sākalyena 'di nas nub phyogs kyi ri rab kyi ngos rol na ba lang spyod kyi gling yod de /
dpag tshad bdun stong lnga brgya'o /
maṇḍalaścāsau pūrṇacandravat de ni zla ba nya ba bzhin du kun nas zlum po yin te /
sārdhe dve madhyamasya de dbus stong phrag phyed dang gsum /
madhyamasyārdhatṛtīye yojanasahasre /
aṣṭau caturasraḥ kuruḥ samaḥ 		chu zheng du ni dpag tshad stong phrag phyed dang gsum mo /
sgra mi snyan brgyad gru bzhir mnyam /
iha uttareṇa sumerupārśve uttarakurudvīpaḥ /
so 'ṣṭau yojanasahasrāṇi sākalyena caturasraḥ 		'di nas byang phyogs kyi ri rab kyi ngos la byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling yod de /
kun du dpag tshad brgyad stong yod do /
kṛtyāpīṭhikāvat /
sarveṣu ca pārśveṣu samo yathaikaṃ pārśvaṃ dviyojanasahasre /
tathā 'nyāni stokamapi nādhikam /
yaśca dvīpo yadākṛtistadākṛtīnyeva tatra manuṣyāṇāṃ mukhāni /
teṣāṃ khalu dvīpānāmantarāle 'ntaradvīpā abhinirvṛttāḥ 		dbyibs ni khri'u bzhin du kun nas gru bzhi ste /
ji ltar ngos gcig la dpag tshad nyis stong yod pa ltar gzhan dag kyang de dang 'dra ste /
cung zad kyang lhag ma med do /
gling gang gi dbyibs ci 'dra ba de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi gdong gi dbyibs kyang de dang 'dra'o /
yang de dag gi bar bar na bar gyi gling rnams mngon par grub pa de dag ni gang yin /
ke punaste kati cetyāha /
dehā videhāḥ kuravaḥ kauravāścāmarāvarāḥ 		du zhig ni yod ce na /
de yi bar gyi gling brgyad ni; /
lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan /
sgra mi snyan gyi zla dang ni /
aṣṭau tadantaradbvīpā gāṭhā uttaramantriṇaḥ rnga yab dang ni rnga yab gzhan /
g yo ldan dang ni lam mchog 'gro /
tatra dehavidehau pūrvavidehaparivārau de la lus dang lus 'phags ni shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling 'khor yin no /
kurukauravau uttarakuroḥ /
gāṭhottaramantriṇāvaparagodānīyasya 		sgra mi snyan dang sgra mi snyan gyi zla ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi'o /
g yo ldan dang lam mchog 'gro ni nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi'o /
cāmarāvarau jambūdvīpasya rnga yab dang rnga yab gzhan ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi ste /
sarve manuṣyairāvāsitāḥ /
eko rākṣasairityapare 		thams cad na yang mi rnams gnas so /
kha cig na re /
gcig na srin po dag gnas so zhes zer ro /
ihottareṇa kīṭādrinavakāddhimavān /
ihaiva jambūdvīpe uttareṇāsya jambūdvīpasya kṛṣṇaparvatāstrayastānatikramyāpare trayaḥ punaśca traya iti navabhyaḥ kīṭaparvatebhyaḥ pareṇa himavān parvataḥ /
tataḥ 		'di nas byang du ri nag po /
dgu 'das gangs ri'o /
'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i byang phyogs 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid na ri nag po gsum yod do /
de dag 'das nas yang gsum yod de /
de 'das nas yang gsum yod do /
ri nag po dgu 'das pa'i pha rol na gangs ri yod do /
de nas ni /
pañcāśadvistṛtāyāmaṃ saro 'rvāggandhamādanāt spos ngad ldang ba'i tshu rol na /
chu zheng lnga bcu yod pa'i mtsho /
tasmāddhimavataḥ pareṇānavataptaṃ nāma saro gandhamādanādarvāk yataścatasro nadyaḥ sravnti gaṅga sindhuḥ śītā vakṣuśca gangs ri de'i pha rol ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i tshu rol na mtsho ma dros pa zhes bya ba gnas pa las chu bo chen po bzhi po gang g'a dang sin dhu dang si ta dang pakshu 'bab pa yod do /
tasya pañcāśadyojanāni vistāraḥ pañcāśadāyāmaḥ de'i zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod la /
chur yang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod de /
pūrṇamaṣṭāṅgasyāṅgopetasyāmbhasaḥ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ngo /
durgamaṃ ca manuaṣyāṇāmanṛddhimatām der ni rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa'i mis 'gro bar dka'o /
tasyaiva cāntike jambūrabhinirvṛttā madhurasvādūni yasyāḥ phalāni tasyā adhikāreṇāyaṃ jambūdvīpa iti khyātaḥ de nyid kyi drung na gang la 'bras bu mngar bo dag yod pa shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba mngon par 'grub ste /
de'i dbang gis 'di 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar grags so /
tatphalādhikāreṇa vā jambūdvīpa iti yang na de'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar grags so /
narakāḥ kasminnavakāśe kiyatpramāṇāśca dmyal ba rnams ni gang rol na yod /
tshad ni ji tsam zhe na /
adhaḥ sahasraiviṃśatyā tanmātro 'vīcirasya hi /
asyaiva jambūdvīpasyādho viṃśatyā yojanasahasrairavīcirmahānarako viṃśatisahasrapramāṇa evodvedhavistārābhyāmevamasyādharatalamitaścatvāriṃśatā yojanasahasrairbhavati /
duḥkhanirantaratvādavīciḥ 		'di 'og stong phrag nyi shu na /
mnar med pa'o de tsam mo /
'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi 'og dpag tshad nyi khri na dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yod de /
gnam 'phang dang rgyar ni dpag tshad nyi khri'o /
de'i 'og gzhi yang de dang 'dra ste; 'di nas ni dpag tshad bzhi khri yod do /
sdug bsngal bar chad med pas na mnar med pa'o /
gzhan dag ni sdug bsngal bar chad dang bcas pa yin te /
anyeṣu sāntaraṃ duḥkham taddyathā saṃjīve cchinnāvabhinnasaṃpiṣṭaśarīrāṇāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti punarapi tān sattvān saṃjīvayanti /
ata eva saṃjīvaḥ 		'di lta ste /
yang sos na ni lus rnams bcad cing phug la btags kyang rlung grang mo dag langs na sems can de dag yang sos par 'gyur bas de'i phyir yang sos yin no /
nāsmin sukhavīcirastītyavīcirityapare gzhan dag na re de na bde ba'i gnas skabs med pas na mnar med pa ste /
anyeṣvapi sukhā vedanā vipāko nāsti /
naiḥ ṣyandikī na vāryate /
tadūrdhvaṃ sapta narakāḥ 		gzhan dag na yang bde ba'i tshor ba rnam par smin pa las byung ba ni med kyi rgyu mthun par byung ba ni 'gag pa med do zhes zer ro /
de yi steng na dmyal ba bdun /
tasmādavīcerūrdhvaṃ sapta narakāḥ uparyupari saṃniviṣṭāḥ /
pratāpanastāpano mahārauravo rauravaḥ saṃghātaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃjīvaśca 		mnar med pa de'i steng na dmyal ba bdun po rab tu tsha ba dang tsha ba dang du 'bod chen po dang du 'bod dang bsdus 'joms dang thig nag dang yang sos dag gong nas gong du gnas so /
avīcipārśveṣvityapare /
te punaḥ /
sarve 'ṣṭau ṣoḍaśotsadāḥ 		gzhan dag na re mnar med pa'i gro dag na gnas so zhes zer ro /
de dag kyang /
brgyad po kun la lhag bcu drug /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā bcom ldan 'das kyis /
ityete narakā aṣṭāvākhyātā duratikramāḥ de ltar de dag dmyal ba ni /
brgyad ces bya ste rgal bar dka' /
raudrakarmabhirākīrṇāḥ pratyekaṃ ṣoḍaśotsadāḥ drag po'i las kyis kun du gang /
re re la yang lhag bcu drug /
catuskandhāścaturdvārā vibhaktā bhāgaśo 'sitāḥ rtsig pa bzhi dang sgo bzhi ste /
rnam phye ris su chad pa yin /
ayaḥprākāraparyantā ayasā prativarjitāḥ lcags kyi ra bas kun du bskor /
lcags dag gis ni gang ba yin /
taptā caivāyasī bhumirjvalitā tejasā yutā de la lcags 'bar sa gzhi ste /
'bar ba'i mi dang ldan pa yin /
anekayojanaśatā sphuṭā tiṣṭhati arcciṣeti dpag tshad brgya phrag du mar ni /
me lce dag gis khyab par gnas /
ṣoḍaśotsadāḥ katame /
kukūlaṃ kuṇapaṃ cātha kṣuramārgādikaṃ nadī 		zhes gsungs so /
lhag ma bcu drug gang zhe na /
de dag gi ni ngos bzhi na /
teṣāṃ caturdiśaṃ me ma mur dang ro myags dang /
dvāre dvāre teṣāṃ catvāra utsadāḥ /
kukūlaṃ jānumātram /
yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nikṣipte saṃśīryate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamutkṣipte pāde punarapi saṃjāyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitam 		spu gri la sogs chu bo yin /
de dag gi sgo re re na lhag pa bzhi bzhi yod de /
me ma mur pus mo nub tsam gang du sems can de dag gi rkang pa bzhag na ni pags pa dang sha dang khrag zhig par 'gyur la /
kuṇapaṃ gūthamṛttikā yatra nyaṅkuṭā nāma prāṇinaḥ prativasanti sarvaśvetāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ sūcimukhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yāvadasthīni bhindanti /
kṣuradhārācito mahāpathaḥ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānā manvākrāmatāṃ nikṣipte pāde saṃchidyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamiti pūrvavat /
asipatravanaṃ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tīkṣṇā asayaḥ saṃnipatanti aṅgapratyaṅgānyavakṛntanti śyāmaśabalāśca śvāno bhakṣayanti 		rkang pa bteg na ni pags pa dang sha dang khrag slar skye ba dang ro myags rkyag pa'i 'dam rdzab gang du 'bu mchu rnon zhes bya ba lus thams cad dkar zhing mgo gnag la mchu smyung ba'i srog chags dag gnas shing de dag gis sems can de dag gi rus pa'i bar du 'bigs par byed pa dang spu gri'i sos gtams pa'i lam po che gang du sems can de dag 'gro ba na rkang pa bzhag na ni pags pa dang sha dang khrag zhig par 'gyur zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no /
lo ma ral gri lta bu'i gnas gang du ral gri rnon po rnams lhung zhing /
sems can de dag gi yan lag dang nyid lag rnams gcod par 'gyur zhing /
ayaḥśālmalīvanaṃ tīkṣṇaṣoḍśāṅgulakaṇṭakam /
teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhirohatāṃ kaṇṭakā avāṅmukhībhavantaḥ kāyaṃ bhindanti avataratāṃ cordhvībhavantaḥ 		khyi sre bo rnams kyang za bar byed pa dang lcags kyi shal ma ri nags tsher ma rnon po sor bcu drug pa gang du sems can de dag 'dzeg pa na ni tsher ma de rnams kha thur du lta bar 'gyur zhing lus 'bigs par byed la /
'bab ba na ni kha gyen du lta bar 'gyur zhing /
ayastuṇḍāśca vāyasā akṣīṇyutpāṭyotpāṭya bhakṣayanti khva lcags kyi mchu can rnams kyis mig dag phyung zhing phyung nas za bar byed pa ste /
tadetat kṣuramārgādika trayaṃ śastrābhinipātaṃ sāmānyādekīkriyante /
caturtha utsado nadī vaitaraṇi pūrṇa taptasya kṣārodakasya yasyāṃ te sattvā asiśaktiprāsahastaiḥ puruṣairubhābhyāṃ tīrābhyāṃ prativāryamāṇā ūrdhvamapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante adhastiryagapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante /
tadyathā bahūdakāyāṃ sthālyāmagnāvadhiśritāyāṃ tilataṇḍuilādayaḥ /
sā hi mahānarakasya parikhevotpannā 		spu gri'i lam la sogs pa gsum po de ni mtshon cha mngon par 'bab pa 'dra ba'i phyir gcig tu bya'o /
lhag ma bzhi pa ni chu bo rab med thal chu khol mas gang ba ste /
gang du sems can de dag 'gram gnyis nas skyes bu lag na ral gri dang mdung thung dang thag mdung thogs pa dag gis 'gog cing /
dper na phru ba chu mang pos bkang ba thab tu bcug pa'i nang du til dang 'bras thug po che la sogs pa blugs pa bzhin du /
steng du 'gro na yang gdu zhing 'tshed la /
'og dang thad kar 'gro na yang gdu zhing 'tshed par byed pa'o /
des kyang dmyal ba chen po 'obs bzhin du bskor ro /
ta ete catvāra utsadā digbhedena ṣoḍaśocyante /
adhikayātanāsthānitvādutsadāḥ ityucyante 		lhag ma bzhi po 'di dag ni phyogs kyi bye brag gis bcu drug ces bya'o /
gnod pa lhag ma'i gnas yin pa'i phyir lhag pa'o zhes bya ste /
narakeṣu hi patitā eteṣu punaryātyante dmyal ba dag tu gnod pa byas nas yang 'di dag tu gnod par byed do /
narakā varodhādurdhvameteṣu sīdantyutsadā ityapare /
praśnātpraśnāntaramupajāyate 		gzhan dag na re dmyal ba pa'i 'ching ba'i 'og tu 'di dag tu bying bas na lhag pa'o zhes bya'o zhes zer ro /
dri ba las dri ba gzhan 'byung ste /
kiṃ te narakapālāḥ sattvasaṃkhyātā utāho neti ci dmyal ba'i srung ma de dag sems can du bgrang ba zhig yin nam /
'on te ma yin zhe na /
netyeke /
kathamidānīṃ ceṣṭante /
sattvānāṃ karmabhirvivarttanīvāyubījavat 		kha cig na re ma yin no zhes zer ro /
da ni ji ltar na de dag g yo ba yin zhe na /
sems can rnams kyi las dag gis te /
'chags pa'i rlung bzhin no /
yattrhi bhadantadharmasubhūtinoktaṃ 'o na btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor gyis /
gang dag khro zhing gtum las dang /
krodhanāḥ krūrakarmāṇaḥ pāpābhirucayaśca ye sdig la mngon par dga' ba dang /
sdug bsngal ba la dga' de dag /
duḥkhiteṣu ca nandanti jāyante yamarākṣasā iti gshin rje srin por skye bar 'gyur /
zhes gang bshad pa ji ltar drang zhe na /
ye te yamenānuśiṣṭāḥ sattvān narakeṣu prakṣipanti ta ete yamarākṣasā uktā na tu ye kāraṇāḥ kārayantīti gshin rjes bsgo ba gang dag gi sems can rnams dmyal ba dag tu khrid par byed pa de dag gshin rje srin po zhes bshad kyi /
gang dag las rnam par byed pa de ni ma yin no /
sattvasaṃkhyātā ityeke /
tasyedānīṃ karmaṇaḥ kva vipākaḥ 		gzhan dag na re sems can dag tu bgrang ba yin no zhes zer ro /
da ni las de dag gang du rnam par smin zhe na /
teṣveva narakeṣu hi ānantaryakāriṇāṃ vipākāvakāśastatra teṣāṃ ko vipratibandhaḥ dmyal ba de dag nyid du ste /
gang dag tu mtshams med pa byed pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i go skabs yod pa de dag gi su zhig 'gog pa /
kathamagninā na dahyante me'i nang na gnas pa rnams ji ltar mi tshig ce na /
agnernūnaṃ karmabhiḥ kṛtāvadhitvāt me ni gdon mi za bar las dag gis mtshams gcad pa'i phyir ro /
bhūtaviśeṣanirvṛttervā yang na 'byung ba'i khyad par grub pa'i phyir ro /
ime tāvaduṣṇā aṣṭau mahānarakā ucyante re zhig de dag ni tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams zhes bya'o /
śītā anye 'ṣṭāvarvudādayaḥ /
anye śītanarakā aṣṭau 		chu bur can sogs grang brgyad gzhan /
gzhan yang grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad de /
'di lta ste /
tadyathā arvudo nirarvudaḥ aṭato hahavaḥ huhuvaḥ utpalaḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca chu bur can dang chu bur rdol pa dang so thams thams dang aa chu zer ba dang kyi hud zer ba dang autpala ltar gas pa dang padma ltar gas pa dang padma ltar cher gas pa'o /
teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tīrvaśītābhihatānāṃ kāyaśabdavikārānurūpāṇyetāni nāmāni /
te 'pyasyaiva jambūdvīpasyādhastāt mahānarakāṇāṃ tiryak 		mir 'di rnams ni sems can grang ba mi bzad pas nyen pa de dag gi lus dang sgra 'gyur ba dang sgra mthun pa dag yin no /
de dag kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi 'og dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi thad ka na yod do /
kuta iyato jambūdvīpasyādhastādavīcyādīnāmavakāśaḥ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di tsam gyi 'og rnam nar med pa la sogs pa'i go skabs ga la yod ce na /
dhānyarāśivadadho viśālā hi dvīpāḥ gling rnams ni 'phru'i phung po bzhin du zhabs rgya che ba yin te /
ata eva mahāsamudro 'nupūrvanimnaḥ de nyid kyi phyir rgya mtsho chen po rim gyis gzhol ba yin no /
itīme ṣoḍaśa narakāḥ sarve sattvakarmādhipatyanirvṛttāḥ de ltar na sems can dmyal ba bcu drug po de rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi las kyi dbang gis mngon par grub pa dag yin no /
pratyekaṃ narakāstu svaiḥ svaiḥ karmabhirabhinirvṛttāḥ nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams ni mang po'am gnyis sam gcig gi so so'i las dag gis mngon par grub pa yin te /
bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ dvayorekasya vā de dag gi rnam pa'i bye brag ni rnam pa dum yod do /
teṣāmanekaprakalpo bhedaḥ sthānaṃ cāniyataṃ nadīparvatamarupradeśeṣvanyeṣu vā 'dhaśca bhāvāt gnas ni ngas pa med de /
chu bo dang ri dang mya ngam gyi phyogs dag dang gzhan dag dang 'og na yang yod pa'i phyir ro /
eṣa tāvannarakabhājanānāṃ saṃniveśaḥ re zhig 'di ni dmyal ba'i snod rnams kyi gnas pa yin no /
tiryañcaḥ sthalajalākāśagocarāḥ dud 'gro ni thang dang chu dang nam mkha'i spyod yul pa dag yin no /
teṣāṃ kila mūlaṃ sthānaṃ mahāsamudrastato 'nyatra visṛtā iti de dag gi gnas kyi rtsa ba ni rgya mtsho chen po yin te /
gzhan ni de dag las 'phros pa dag yin no /
pretānāṃ yamo rājā /
tasya jambūdvīpasyādhastāt pañcayojanaśatāntaraparicchinnā rājadhānī teṣāṃ mūlasthānaṃ tato 'nyatra visṛtāḥ 		yi dgas rnams kyi rgyal po ni gshin rje zhes bya ba yin no /
de dag gi gnas kyi rtsa ba rgyal po'i khab ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i 'og dpag tshad lnga brgyas bcad pa na yod de /
gzhan ni de las 'phros pa dag yin no /
kecit pretā maharddhikā daivīmiva śriyamudvahanti de las yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen po kha cig ni lha'i dpal lta bu yang nyams su myong ngo /
śeṣā yathā pretāvadāne /
athemau candrārkau kasmin pratiṣṭhitau 		lhag ma ni ji ltar yi dags kyi rtogs pa brjod pa dag las 'byung ba yin no; /
yang nyi ma dang za ba 'di dag ci la brten zhe na /
vāyau /
vāyavo'ntarīkṣe sarvasattvasādhāraṇakarmādhipatyanirvṛttā āvartavat sumeruṃ parivartante 		rlung la ste /
sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gi sa bar snang la nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma rnams 'phul bar byed pa'i rlung dag grub ste /
candrārkatārāṇāṃ vordhvacāraḥ ri rab la rlung gi 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor ro /
kiyadvīprakṛṣṭāvitaścandrārkau nyi ma dang zla ba dag 'di nas thag ji srid ce na /
ardhena meroścandrārkau nyi zla lhun po'i phyed na'o /
yugandharagirermūrdhnā samaṃ vahataḥ ri gnya' shing 'dzin gyi rtse mo dang mnyam pa nas rgyu'o /
kiṃ pramāṇau tshad ji tsam zhe na /
yathākramaṃ /
paṇcāśatsaikayojanau /
pañcāśat yojanāni candramaṇḍalasya pramāṇam 		go rims bzhin du /
dpag tshad lnga bcu gcig dang bcas /
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni dpag tshad lnga bcu'o /
saikāni pañcāśat sūryamaṇdalasya pramāṇam nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni gcig dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu ste /
ekapañcāśadityarthaḥ /
tārakāvimānānāṃ yasyālpapramāṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya krośaḥ 		lnga bcu rtsa gcig ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
skar ma'i gzhal yas khang rnams kyi nang gi tshad chung ba de'i ni rgya nga grags gcig go /
sūryavimānasyādhastāt vahiḥ sphaṭikamaṇḍalaṃ taijasamabhinirvṛttaṃ tāpanaṃ prakāśanaṃ ca srog chags rnams kyi las dag gis nyi ma'i gzhal med khang 'og gi phyi rol ni me shel gyi dkyil 'khor tsha bar byed pa dang snang bar byed pa mngon par grub bo /
candravimānasyādhastādāpyaṃ śītalaṃ bhāsvaraṃ ca /
praṇīnāṃ karmabhirdṛṣṭiśarīraphalapuṣpasasyoṣadhīnāmanugrahārthamupaghātakārthaṃ yathāsaṃbhavam 		zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi ni chu shel bsil bar byed pa dang snang bar byed pa mngon par grub ste /
ci rigs par mig dang lus dang 'bras bu dang me tog dang lo tog dang sman rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang; gnod par byed pa dag yin no /
caturdvīpake ekaścandramāḥ kṛtyaṃ karotyekaḥ sūryaḥ gling bzhi pa gcig tu ni zla ba gcig kho na dang nyi ma gcig gis bya ba byed do /
kiṃ punaścaturdvīpeṣu sūryo yugapat kṛtyaṃ karoti ci gling bzhi po dag tu nyi mas cig car bya ba byed dam zhe na /
netyāha ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
teṣu /
ardharātro'staṅgamanaṃ madhyāhna udayaḥ sakṛt 		de dag tu /
nam phyed nyi ma nub pa dang /
nyi ma phyed dang 'char dus gcig /
yadottarakurāvardharātraṃ tadā pūrvavidehe sūryasyāstaṅgamanaṃ jambūdvīpe madhyāhno godānīye udayaḥ gang gi tshe byang gi sgra mi snyan du nam phyed pa de'i tshe shar gyi lus 'phags su ni nyi ma nub bo /
'dzam bu'i gling du ni nyi ma phyed do /
ba lang spyod du ni nyi ma shar te /
evamanyeṣvapi yojyam /
sūryasyeha gatibhedena rātridivānāṃ vṛddhihrāsau /
tatra punaḥ 		de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
nyi ma'i 'gros kyi bye brag las 'di na nyin mo dang mtshan mo rnams ring thung du 'gyur te /
de la /
prāvṛṇmāse dvitīye 'ntyanavamyāṃ vardhate niśā dbyar gyi zla ba gnyis pa yi /
tha ma'i tshes dgu nas mtshan ring /
varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse bhādrapade dvitīyasya pakṣasya navamyāṃ vardhate rātriḥ /
hemantānāṃ caturthe tu hīyate 		dbyar rnams kyi zla ba gnyis pa dbyar zla tha chungs yar gyi ngo'i tshes dgu nas mtshan mo ring ngo /
dgun rnams kyi ni bzhi pa la /
saiva hemantānāṃ caturthe māse punarhīyate /
antyanavamyāmiti varttate 		thung ngur 'gyur ro /
de bzhin du dgun rnams kyi zla ba bzhi pa'i tha ma'i tshes dgu nas thung ngur 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar te /
phālgunamāsasya dvitīyapakṣanavamyām dgun zla tha chungs yar gyi ngo'i tshes dgu nas so /
aharviparyayāt nyin mo bzlog /
yadā rātrirvardhate tadā divaso hīyate gang gi tshe mtshan mo ring ba de'i tshe nyin mo thung bar 'gyur ro /
yadā rātrirhīyate tadā divaso vardhate gang gi tshe mtshan mo thung ba de'i tshe nyin mo ring bar 'gyur ro /
kiyatyā mātrayā vardhate ji tsam zhig gis ring por 'gyur zhe na /
lavaśo rātryaharvṛddhī nyin mtshan mtshan ring ba thang cig go /
lavaṃ lavaṃ rātrirvardhate divaso vā /
te ca hānivṛddhī yathākramaṃ /
dakṣiṇottarage ravau 		nyin mo 'am mtshan mo thang cig thang cig gis ring bar 'gyur ro /
ring ba de dag kyang go rims bzhin du /
nyi ma lho byang 'gro tshe'o /
jambūdvipasya dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gacchati bhāskare rātrivṛddhiḥ uttaraṃ gacchatyaharvṛddhiḥ nyi ma 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs kyi ngos su 'gro ba mtshan mo ring ngo /
byang phyogs su 'gro ba na nyin mo ring ngo /
śuklapakṣasyādau candramaso vikalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate zla ba yar gyi ngo'i dang po'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ma rangs par snang ba de la rgyu ci yod ce na /
kiṃ tatra kāraṇam nyi ma dang ni nye ba las /
svacchāyayā 'rkasāmīpyādvikalendusamīkṣaṇam rang gi grib mas 'grib par snang /
btags pa las /
yadā hi saurasya vimānasyāsanne cāndramasaṃ vimānaṃ vahati tadā kila sauryo bhāsastasmin vimāne patanti gang gi tshe zla ba'i gzhal med khang nyi ma'i gzhal med khang dang nye bar rgyu ba de'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis de'i gzhal med khang la 'bab ste /
tato 'parapārśve chāyā patantī vikalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ darśayatīti prājñaptiko nirdeśaḥ /
vāhayogaḥ sa tādṛśo bhavati yatkadācidvimānasyārdhaṃ dṛśyata iti pūrvācāryāḥ /
athaitāni sūryādivimānāni katame sattvā adhyāvasanti 		des na de'i phyi rol gyi ngos su grib ma bab pas dkyil 'khor ma rangs par snang ngo zhes bstan to zhes grag go /
sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re gang res 'ga' gzhal med khang gi phyed snang ba de lta bu de ni rgyu ba'i tshul yin no zhes zer ro /
yang nyi ma la sogs pa'i gzhal med khang 'di dag na sems can gang dag cig gnas she na /
devāścāturmahārājakāyikāḥ /
kimetānyeva teṣāṃ sthānāni 		rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa'i lha rnams so /
ci de dag gi 'di dag kho na'am zhe na /
vimānavāsināmetāni /
bhūminivāsināṃ punaḥ sumerūpariṣaṇḍādīni 		gzhal med khang na gnas pa rnams kyi ni 'di dag go /
sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ni ri rab kyi bang rim la sogs pa'o /
kati cāsya pariṣaṇḍāḥ kiyatyo vā 'di la bang rim ni du zhig yod /
thag ni ji srid ce na /
pariṣaṇḍāścatasro 'sya daśasāhasrikāntarāḥ /
daśayojanasahasrāṇyudgamyaikā /
evaṃ yāvaccaturthī 		'di la bang rim bzhi yod de /
bar gyi thag ni stong phrag bcu /
dpag tshad ni khri'i ltag na gcig yod de /
bzhi'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o /
tābhiḥ sumerorardhamākṣiptam de dag gis ni ri rab kyi phyed man chad du phyin to /
tāśca tato yathāsaṃkhyaṃ de dag kyang de las grangs bzhin du /
ṣoḍaśāṣṭau sahasrāṇi catvāri dve ca nirgatāḥ /
prathamā pariṣaṇḍā ṣoḍaśa sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ sumerornirgatā 		stong phrag dag ni bcu drug dang /
brgyad dang bzhi dang gnyis 'phags so /
bang rim dang po ni ri rab las dpag tshad stong phrag bcu drug 'phags so /
dvitīyā 'ṣṭau tṛtīyā catvāri caturthī dve gnyis pa ni brgyad do /
gsum pa ni bzhi'o /
karoṭapāṇayastāsu mālādhārāssadāmadāḥ /
mahārājikadevāśca /
prathamāyāṃ pariṣaṇḍāyāṃ karoṭapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti 		bzhi pa ni gnyis so /
de la lag na gzhong thogs dang /
phreng thogs dang ni rtag myos dang /
rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams gnas /
bang rim dang po la ni gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs zhes bya ba rnams gnas so /
dvitīyāyāṃ mālādhārāstṛtīyāyāṃ sadāmadāḥ sadāmattāḥ gnyis pa la ni phreng thogs rnams gnas so /
gsum pa la ni rtag tu myos rnams gnas te /
sarva ete caturmahārājakāyikāḥ /
caturthyāṃ tu catvāro mahārājāḥ svayaṃ prativasanti tatparicārāśca /
atastasyāṃ mahārājakāyikā devā ityuktam /
yathā pariṣaṇḍāsu caturmahārājakāyikā devā evaṃ /
parvateṣvapi saptasu 		lha 'di dag thams cad kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa dag yin no /
bzhi pa la ni rgyal po chen bo bzhi bdag nyid dang de'i 'khor rnams gnas te /
de'i phyir na rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams zhes bshad do /
ji ltar bang rim dag la rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ka nas pa de bzhin du /
ri bo bdun po dag la yang /
yugandharādiṣu parvateṣu teṣāṃ grāmanigamāḥ /
ata evaiṣa devanikāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ mahiṣṭhaḥ 		ri gnya' shing 'dzin la sogs pa na yang de dag gi grong dang grong rdal dag yod de /
de nyid kyi phyir lha'i ris de ni thams cad pas che ba yin no /
merumūrdhni trayastriṃśāḥ lhun po'i rtse na sum cu gsum /
atha kiyānmerumūrdhā /
sa cāśītisahasradik /
ekaikapārśvamaśītisahasrāṇi yathaivādhastāt 		yang lhun po'i rtse mo ji tsam zhi [*zhe?] na /
de yi ngos la brgyad khri'o /
thur du ji lta bar ngos re re la yang brgyad khri'o /
anye punarāhuḥ gzhan dag na re /
sa viṃśatisahasradik de yi ngos la nyi khri'o /
catvāri pārśvanyasya catasro diśaḥ zhes zer te /
'di la ngos bzhir phyogs bzhi yod de /
ekaikaṃ pārśvaṃ viṃśatiryojanasahasrāṇi samantāt parikṣepeṇāśītiriti ngos re re zhing yang dpag tshad nyi khri nyi khri yod la kun du bskor na ni brgyad khri'i zhe'o /
tasya ca /
vidikṣu kūṭāścatvāra uṣitā vajrapāṇibhiḥ 		phyogs mtshams brtsegs pa bzhi la ni /
lag na rdo rje gnas /
sūmerumūrdhno vidiśaḥ koṇāḥ ri rab rtse mo'i phyogs mtshams ni gru bzhi ste /
tāsu pañcayojanaśatapramāṇāścatvāraḥ kūṭā abhyudgatā yeṣu vajrapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti /
tasya ca merumūrdhnaḥ 		de dag las dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsam gyis brtsegs pa bzhi gyen du 'phags te /
de dag la gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba gnas so /
ri rab kyi rtse mo de'i dbus na /
grong khyer blta na sdug ces pa /
madhye sārdhadvisāhasrapārśvamadhyardhayojanam ngos la nyis stong lnga brgya ba /
dpag tshad byed dang gnyis gser gyi /
puraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma haimaṃ citratalaṃ mṛdu /
sumerutalasya madhye sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaram dairdhye sārdhatṛtīyayojanasahasre ekaikaṃ parśvamucchrāyeṇādhyardhayojanam 		rang bzhin gzhi bkra mnyen pa yod /
ri rab kyi gzhi'i dbus na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba ngos re re zhing yang dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya pa /
'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa /
prākāraḥ sauvarṇa ekottareṇa dhātuśatenāsya bhumiścitritā /
tacca bhūmitalaṃ tūlapicuvat mṛdusaṃsparśaṃ pādakṣepotkṣepābhyāṃ natonnataṃ śakrasya devānāmindrasya rājadhānī 		gser gyi rang bzhin 'di'i sa gzhi tshon brgyas bkra bar byas la /
sa gzhi de yang shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du reg na 'jam pa rkang pa gzhag pa dang bteg pa dag gis na nems zhes byed pa dang par zhes byed pa yod do /
sārdhadviśatapāśrvo 'tra vaijayantaḥ de na rnam par rgyal byed do /
ngos la nyis brgya lnga bcu'o /
śakrasya devānāmindrasya vaijayanto nāma prāsādo nagarasya madhye nānāratnasthānavidhānasaṃpadā sarvānyabhavanaśrīmahimnā hrepaṇo dairdhyeṇārdhatṛtīye yojanaśate pārśvaṃ pārśvam /
iyaṃ tāvannagarasyābhirāmatā 		grong khyer gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba rin po che dang gnas rnam pa du ma phun sum tshogs pa gnas gzhan thams cad kyi dpal gyi che ba'i bdag nyid do tsha bar byed pa ngos ngos kyi srid du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu pa zhig yod do /
re zhig 'di ni grong gi mngon par dga' ba yin no /
bahiḥ punaḥ /
taccaitrarathapāruṣyamiśranandanabhūṣitam 		de'i phyi rol shing rta sna tshogs dang /
rtsub 'gyur 'dres pa dga' bas brgyan /
tasya hi nagarasya bahiścaturṣu pārśveṣu catvāryudyānādīni devānāṃ kriḍābhūmayaḥ grong khyer de'i phyi rol gyi ngos bzhi dag na lha rnams kyi rtsed mo'i sa skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de /
caitrarathamudyānaṃ pāruṣyakaṃ miśrakāvaṇaṃ nandanavanaṃ ca /
taistannagaraṃ bahiralaṅkṛtam 		'di lta ste skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can dang rtsub 'gyur dang 'dres pa dang dga' ba'i tshal te /
de dag gis grong khyer de'i phyi rol brgyan to /
viṃśatyantaritānyeṣāṃ subhūmīni caturdiśam /
eṣāṃ codyānānāṃ caturdiśaṃ catvāri sumūmīni viṃśatiyojanāntaritāni krīḍāsthānānyeva devānāṃ parasparaspardhayaiva śobhāṃ vitanvanti /
vahireva nagarasya pārśve 		de dag gi ni phyogs bzhi na /
nyi shus bcad nas gzhi bzang /
skyed mos tshal de dag gi phyogs bzhi dpag tshad nyi shus bcad pa na lha rnams kyi rtse ba'i gnas sa gzhi bzang po phan tshun 'gran pa lta bur mdzes pa dang ldan pa bzhi yod do /
grong khyer gyi phyi rol gyi ngos /
pūrvottare pārijātaḥ sudharmā dakṣiṇāvare byang shar mtshams na yongs 'du ste /
lho nub mtshams na chos bzang ngo /
pārijāto nāma kovidārastrāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ kāmaratiprakarṣāśrayaḥ shing sa brtol yongs 'du zhes bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba mchog gi gnas zhig yod de /
tasya pañca yojanāni mūlāhiniveśo yojanaśatamucchrāyaḥ /
pañcāśat yojanāni śākhāpatrapalāśaṃ skaritvā tiṣṭhati 		de'i rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu zug go /
gnam 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya 'phags so /
yal ga dang 'dab ma dang lo ma ni dpag tshad lnga bcur khyab par gnas so /
tasya khalu sarvapariphullasya yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojana yojanāni prativātam de'i me tog dang 'dab ma thams cad rgyas pa'i dri dad rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar ldang ngo /
rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ldang ngo /
yuktaṃ tāvadanuvātam /
prativātaṃ tu katham 		re zhig rdzi phyogs su ni rigs na rdzi phyogs ma yin par go ji ltar zhe na /
vṛkṣānatikramaṃ saṃdhāyoktamityeke kha cig na re shing las mi 'da' ba las dgongs te gsungs so zhes zer ro /
nahi nāma sprativātaṃ vāto vāti de rdzi phyogs sum yin par 'gro ba ma yin gyi /
tasyaiva tu sā gandhasya tādṛśo prabhāvasaṃpadeṣṭavyā yāt pratibadhyamāno'pi divyairmṛdumārutairgandhāntaraṃ saṃtanoti dri de nyid kyi phun sum tshogs pa lha'i rlung chung du dag gis bkag bzhin du yang dri gzhan gyi rgyun 'byung ba de lta bur 'dod par bya'o /
mandataratamasamārambhāttu saṃtāna āśveva samucchidyate yato na tathā viprakṛṣṭamadhvānaṃ prasarpati /
kiṃ punaḥ svabhūtāśrita evamapuṣpagandhasaṃtāno vartate utāho vāyuradhivāsito jāyate 		rgyun chung ba dang ches chung ba dang ches shin tu chung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir myur ba kho nar kun du chad par 'gyur te /
de bzhin du lam ring por mi 'gro'o /
ji me tog gi dri'i rgyun de rang gi 'byung ba kho na la brten nas 'jug gam /
'on te rlung la brten nas kyang skye zhe na /
nātra niyamaḥ /
ubhayathāpi hyācāryeṣṭiḥ 		slob dpon gyi 'dod pa ni de la nges pa med de /
gnyi ga ltar yin pa'o /
yattarhi bhagavatoktaṃ 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis /
na puṣpagandhaḥ prativātameti na maulikastāgaraścāndano vā me tog dri ni rdzi phyogs min mi 'gro /
rtsa ba'am rgya spos tsan dan yang ma yin /
satāṃ tu gandhaḥ prativātameti sarvā diśaḥ satpuruṣaḥ pravātīti mkhas rnams dri ni rdzi phyogs min 'gro ste /
skyes bu dam pa phyogs rnams kun du 'gro /
zhes gang gsungs pa ji ltar drang zhe na /
mānuṣyakaṃ puṣpagandhaṃ saṃdhāyoktam mi'i me tog gi dri'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa yin no /
taddhi pratītaṃ loke /
na ca tasya tādṛśī śaktiḥ mahīsāsakāstu pathanti yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojanāni prativātamiti 		de ni 'jig rten na grags pa yin te /
de la mthu de lta bu ni med do /
sa ston sde rnams rdzi phyogs su ni dpag chad brgyar dri'i ngad ldang ngo; /
rlung med na ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ldang ngo zhes 'don to /
sudharmā nāma devasabhā dakṣiṇapaścime digbhāge yasyāṃ niṣadya devāḥ kṛtyākṛtyaṃ samarthayanti lho nub kyi phyogs cha na gang du lha rnams 'khod nas bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa 'gro bar byed pa lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs zhes bya ba yod do /
eṣa tāvattridaśānāṃ bhājanasaṃniveśaḥ /
tataūrdhvaṃ vimāneṣu devāḥ 		re zhig de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi snod gnas pa yin no /
de'i steng lha rnams gzhal med khang /
tridaśebhya ūrdhvaṃ devā vimāneṣu pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
te punaryāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaśca brahmakāyikādayaśca pūrvoktāḥ ṣoḍaśasthānāntaragatāḥ 		sum cu rtsa gsum gyi steng gi lha rnams ni gzhal yas khang dag na gnas te /
de dag kyang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang sngar bshad pa tshangs ris la sogs pa gnas gzhan bcu drug tu gtogs pa rnams te /
ityete dvāviṃśatidevanikāyāḥ samāsena yeṣāṃ bhājanaṃ prajñāyate de ltar na gang dag gi snong mngon pa ni mdor bsdu na lha'i ris nyi shu rtsa gnyis po de dag yin no /
kāmabhujastu ṣaṭ /
teṣāṃ tu ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devanikāyāḥ kāmān paribhuñjate na śeṣāḥ 		'dod pa spyod pa drug yin no /
de dag las 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po 'di lta ste /
tadyathā caturmahārājakāyikā yāvat paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar rnams ni 'dod pa dag la spyod kyi lhag ma rnams ni ma yin no /
te punaḥ de dag kyang /
dvandvāliṅganapāṇyāptihasitekṣitamaithunāḥ gnyis gnyis 'khyud dang lag bcangs dang /
dgod dang bltas pas 'khrig pa yin /
dvandvena maithunaṃ bhūmisambaddhavāsinām /
cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ trāyastriṅkśānāṃ yathā manuṣyāṇām /
teṣāṃ tu vāyunirmokṣāt dāhavigamaḥ śukrābhāvāt 		sa dang 'brel par gnas pa rgyal chen bzhi pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams ni mi rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis gnyis kyis 'khrig go /
de dag la yang khu chu med pa'i phyir rlung btang bas yongs su gdung ba dang bral lo /
āliṅganena maithunaṃ yāmānāmāliṅganamātreṇa dāhavigamāt /
pāṇisaṃprāptyā tuṣitānāṃ hasitena nirmāṇaratīnāṃ prekṣitena paranirmitavaśavartinām 		'thab bral ba rnams ni 'khyud pas 'khrig pa yin te /
'khyud pa tsam gyis yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro /
dga' ldan pa rnams ni lag bcangs byas pas so /
'phrul dga' ba rnams ni dgod pas so /
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams ni bltas pas so /
svavartināṃ sarveṣāṃ dvandvasamāpattyā /
kālaparimānaṃ tu prajñaptāvuktamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re thams cad kyang gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pas yin no /
brtags pa las bshad pa ni dus kyi tshad yin te /
yāvadyāvadviṣayāṇāṃ tīvrataratā tāvattāvadrāgo'pi tīvrataraḥ /
yasya devasya devyā vā utsaṅge devakumāro devakanyā vā jāyate sa tayoḥ putro bhavati sā ca duhitā 		ji tsam ji tsam du yul rnams ches shas che ba de tsam de tsam du 'dod chags kyang ches shas che'o zhes zer ro /
lha 'am lha mo gang gi pang du lha gzhon nu 'am lha'i bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba de ni de gnyis kyi bu yang yin la /
de'i bu mo yang yin no /
kiyatpramāṇo jāyate bong tshod ji tsam du skye zhe na /
pañcavarṣopamo yāvat daśavarṣopamaḥ śiśuḥ byis pa lo lnga lon pa nas /
lo bcu lon pa lta bu'i bar /
saṃbhavatyeṣu de dag tu skye /
yathāsaṃkhyaṃ ṣaṭsu devanikāyeṣu /
te tu kṣipramevābhivardhante 		lha'i ris de dag tu grangs bzhin te /
de dag kyang myur ba nyid du skye'o /
saṃpūrṇāḥ savastrāścaiva rūpiṇaḥ /
rūpāvacarā devāḥ saṃpūrṇakāyāḥ vastreṇa saṃvītā upapadyante 		gzugs can rnams /
kun rdzogs gos dang bcas pa nyid /
gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams ni lus kun rdzogs pa dang gos gyon bzhin du skye'o /
sarve devā āryabhāṣābhāṣiṇaḥ /
tadatra kāmadhātau veditavyāḥ 		lha thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i skad du smra'o /
de la 'dod pa skye ba gsum po ni /
kāmopapattayastisraḥ kāmadevāḥ samānuṣāḥ /
kathaṃ kṛtvā 		'dod pa'i lha dang mir bcas rnams /
'dod pa'i khams su rig par bya ste /
santi sattvāḥ pratyupasthitakāmāḥ pratyupasthiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti /
tadyathā manuṣyāstadekatyāśca devāḥ 		ji lta zhe na sems can 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa rnams 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa dag la dbang phyug gis dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de /
'di lta ste mi rnams dang lha kha cig go /
te punaścatvāro devanikāyāḥ de dag kyang lha'i ris bzhi rnams so /
santi sattvā nirmitakāmā nirmāya kāmānaiśvarya vaśe vartayanti sems can 'dod pa sprul pa rnams 'dod pa rnams sprul zhing dbang phyug gis dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de /
tadyathā devā nirmāṇaratayaḥ dper na 'phrul dga'i lha rnams lta bu'o /
santi sattvāḥ paranirmitakāmāḥ paranirmiteṣu kāmeṣvaiśvarya vaśe varttayanti sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa rnams 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa dag la dbang phyug gis dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de /
tadyathā devāḥ paranirmitavaśavarttinaḥ 'di lta ste /
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams so /
tā etā yathot pannaparibhogitvāt yathecchātmanirmitaparibhogitvādyathecchātmapara nirmitaparibhogitvācca tisraḥ kāmopapattaya ityucyante /
rūpadhātau tu 		de dag ni ji ltar byung ba la yongs su longs spyod pa nyid kyi phyir dang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bdag nyid kyis sprul pa la yongs su longs spyod pa nyid kyi phyir dang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bdag dang gzhan gyis sprul pa la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir 'dod pa skye ba gsum zhes bya'o /
gzugs kyi khams ni /
sukhopapattayastriso navatridhyānabhūmayaḥ bde ba skye ba gsum po ni /
bsam gtan gsum la sa dgu yin /
triṣu dhyāneṣu yā nava bhūmayaḥ tāstisraḥ sukhopapattayaḥ /
te hi devā vivekajena samādhijena ca prītisukhena ca niṣprītikena ca sukhena sukhaṃ viharanto dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhanti /
ata etā nirduḥkhadīrghasukhatvātsukhā upapattayaḥ sukhopapattayaḥ 		bsam gtan gsum dag nas dgu po gang dag yin pa de dag ni bde ba skye ba gsum yin te /
lha de dag ni dben pa las skyes pa dang ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba dang dga' ba med pa'i bde bas bde bar gnas pa na yun ring mo zhig tu gnas te /
de'i phyir bde ba skye ba de dag ni sdug bsngal ba med pa dang yun ring por bde ba'i phyir bde ba skye ba dag yin no /
dhyānāntarotpattau tu prītisukhābhāvātsukhopapattitvaṃ vicāryam bsam gtan khyad par can du skyes pa la ni dga' ba dang bde ba med pa'i phyir bde ba skye ba nyid dpyad par bya'o /
yānyetāni devānāṃ dvāviṃśatisthānānyuktāni teṣāmadharāduttaraṃ kiyadviprakṛṣṭam gang dag lha rnams kyi gnas nyi shu rtsa gnyis bshad pa de dag la 'og ma nas gong mar thag ji srid ce na /
naitat sarvaṃ yojanaparisaṃkhyayā sukaraṃ parisaṃkhyātum /
api tu 		de dag thams cad dpag tshad kyi grangs kyis bgrang bar ni sla ba ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang /
sthānāt sthānādadho yāvattāvadūrdhvaṃ tatastataḥ /
jambūdvīpāt prabhṛti yaduttaraṃ sthānaṃ tasmādyāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvat punastasmādūrdhvaṃ sthānāntaram 		gnas dang gnas 'og ji srid pa /
de nas de yi gong de srid /
'dzam bu'i gling nas bzung ste gong pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni de nas 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par de nas gong ma'i gnas gzhan du yang de srid de /
tadyathā caturthī pariṣaṇḍā caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ mūlasthānamitaścatvāriṃśadyojanasahasrāṇi 'di lta ste /
'di nas dpag tshad bzhi khri na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rtsa ba'i gnas bang rim bzhi pa yod pa de nas 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du /
tasmādyāvadadhojambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ tridaśānāṃ sthānam tasmādapi yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ yāmānāṃ sthānam /
tato'pi yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃ tuṣitānāṃ sthānamiti 		ji srid bar gong ma sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do /
de nas kyang 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par gong ma 'thab bral ba rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do /
de nas kyang 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par gong ma dga' ldan pa rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do /
evaṃ vistareṇa sarvamanukramya sudarśanebhyo yāvadadho jambūdvīpastāvadūrdhvaṃmakaniṣṭhānāṃ sthānam /
tasmādūrdhvaṃ na punaḥ sthānamasti 		de bzhin du rgyas par thams cad go rims dang mthun par bya ste /
shin du mthong ba dag nas 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par gong ma 'og min pa rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do /
de'i gong na ni gnas med do /
ata eva jyeṣṭhabhūtvādakaniṣṭhā ucyante de nyid kyi phyir de dag ni thu bor gyur pa'i phyir 'og min zhes bya'o /
aghaniṣṭhā ityapare gzhan dag na re thog mtha' zhes bya ste /
aghaṃ kila cittasthaṃ rūpaṃ tanmātraniṣṭheti thogs pa ni bsags par gnas pa'i gzugs te /
de ni 'dir mthar thug go zhes zer ro /
kiṃ punaradharasthānopapannā urdhvāni vimānāni gatvā paśyanti yang cig nas 'og mar skyes pa rnams gong ma'i gzhal med khang du dong nas mthong bar 'gyur ram zhe na /
nordhvaṃ darśanamastyeṣāmanyatrarddhiparāśrayāt /
ṛddhyā vā trāyastriṃśā yāmān 		rdzu 'phrul gzhan brten ma gtogs par /
de dag gong ma mthong ba med /
rdzu 'phrul gyis sam /
gaccheyuḥ /
parāśrayeṇa vā yadvṛddhimatā nīyeran devena vā tatratyena /
evaṃ śeṣāḥ /
āgataṃ tūrdhvopapannaṃ paśyennatūrdhvadhātukaṃ nordhvabhūmikam /
yiathā spraṣṭavyaṃ na spṛśedaviṣayatvāt 		gzhan la brten nas te /
rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'am /
de na gnas pa'i lhas khrid par gyur na sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams 'thab bral ba'i nang du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
lhag ma rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o /
gong du skyes pa 'ongs pa mthong bar 'gyur gyi /
khams gong ma pa yang ma yin la /
sa gong ma pa yang ma yin te /
dper na yul ma yin pa'i phyir reg bya reg par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no /
de nyid kyi phyir rang gi lus kyis mi 'ong ngo /
ata eva tenāsvena kāyenāgacchanti 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
sa 'og ma'i sprul pas so /
kiṃ tarhi nirmitenādharabhūmikena tadicchayā paśyedihatyamiveti nikāyāntarīyāḥ /
athaiṣāṃ yāmādivimānānāṃ kiyat pramāṇam 		sde pa gzhan dag na re /
de'i 'dod pas 'di na 'khod pa bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
yang 'thab bral ba la sogs pa'i gzhal med khang de dag gi tshad ji tsam zhe na /
caturṇāṃ tāvadyāvatsumerumūrdhnaḥ ityeke re zhig kha cig na re bzhi rnams kyis ni ri rab kyi rtse mo de tsam mo zhes zer ro /
dviguṇottaramityapare /
prathamaṃ tu dhyānaṃ yāvāṃścāturdvīpakaḥ 		gzhan dag na re gong ma gnyis 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
kha cig na re bsam gtan dang po'i ni gling bzhi pa tsam mo /
dvitīyaṃ yāvān sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ gnyis pa'i ni stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo /
tṛtīyaṃ yāvān dvisāhasraḥ gsum pa'i ni stong gnyis pa tsam mo /
caturthaṃ yāvāṃsrisāhasra ityeke bzhi pa'i ni stong gsum pa tsam mo zhes zer ro /
prathamādīni sāhasrādiparimāṇāni /
caturthaṃ tvaparimāṇamityapare 		gzhan dag na re dang po la sogs pa ni stong la sogs pa'i tshad tsam mo; /
bzhi pa ni tshad med do zhes zer ro /
atha ko'yaṃ sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ ko dvisāhasrastrisāhasro vā yang stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ci /
stong gnyis pa 'am /
stong gsum pa ni ci zhe na /
caturdvīpakacandrārkamerukāmadivaukasām gling bzhi dang ni nyi zla dang /
ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang /
brahmalokasahasraṃ ca sāhasraścūḍiko mataḥ /
sahasrañjaṃbūdvīpānāṃ pūrvavidehānāmaparagodānīyānāmuttarakuruṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryāṇāṃ candrāṇāṃ sumerūṇāṃ sahasraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sahasraṃ brahmalokānāmayamucyate sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ 		tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni /
stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod /
'dzam bu'i gling dang shar gyi lus 'phags dang nub kyi ba lang spyod dang byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang nyi ma dang zla ba dang ri rab stong dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar stong dang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'di ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o /
tatsahasraṃ dvisāhasro lokadhātustu madhyamaḥ de stong la ni stong gnyis pa /
bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no /
teṣāṃ cūḍikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātuḥ /
tatsahasraṃ trisāhasraḥ 		stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag stong ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams yin no /
de stong la ni stong gsum mo /
teṣāṃ dvisāhasrāṇāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag stong ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yin te /
eṣa hi kṛtsnaḥ 'di thams cad ni /
samasaṃvartasaṃbhavaḥ /
samaṃ saṃvartate samaṃ vivartate /
saṃbhavo hi vivartaḥ ityuttaratra vyākhyāsyate /
kiṃ khalu yathā bhājanānāṃ pramāṇabheda evaṃ tadvāsināmapi sattvānāṃ pramāṇabhedo'sti 		mnyam du 'jig cing 'byung ba yin /
mnyam du 'jig cing mnyam du 'byung ste /
'byung ba ni chags pa yin no zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o /
yang ji ltar snod rnams kyi tshad bye brag yod pa de bzhin du de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshad kyang /
bye brag yod dam zhe na /
astītyāha /
tatra tāvat 		smras pa yod de /
de la re zhig /
jāmbūdvīpāḥ pramāṇena catuḥsārdhatrihastakāḥ 'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams kyi tshad /
khru bzhi pa dang phyed dang bzhi /
jambūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ pramāṇārdhacaturhastakāḥ kecittu caturhastakāḥ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni phal cher khru phyed dang bzhi pa'o /
kha cig ni khru bzhi pa dag yin no /
dviguṇottaravṛddhyā tu pūrvagodottarāhvayāḥ shar dang ba lang spyod dang ni /
byang zhes bya ba gnyis 'gyur bskyed /
pūrvavidehakā godānīkā uttarakauravāśca manuṣyā aṣṭaṣoḍaśadvātriṃśaddhastakā yathākramam /
pādavṛddhyā tanuryāvatsārdhakrośo divaukasām /
kāmināṃ /
pādaḥ krośasya caturtho bhagaḥ /
tanmātraṃ śarīraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ dvau pādau trāyastriṃśānāṃ trayo yāmānāṃ catvārastuṣitānāṃ pañca nirmāṇaratīnāṃ adhyardhaḥ krośaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinām /
rupiṇāṃ tvādau yojanārdhaṃ 		shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni rim bzhin du khru brgyad pa dang bcu drug pa dang sum cu rtsa gnyis pa dag yin no /
'dod dang ldan pa'i lha yi lus /
bzhi cha nas ni rgyang grags dag /
phye dang gnyis kyi bar du bskyed /
bzhi cha zhes bya ba ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha ste /
rgyal chen bzhi'i ris ba rnams kyi lus ni de tsam mo /
sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni bzhi cha gnyis so /
'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni bzhi cha gsum mo /
dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig go /
'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig dang bzhi cha gcig go /
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis so /
gzugs can dang po dpag tshad phyed /
rūpiṇāṃ devānāṃ prathame sthāne brahmakāyikānāmardhayojanamātraṃ śarīram gzugs can gyi lha rnams kyi gnas kyi dang po ni tshangs ris pa rnams kyi lus ni dpag tshad phyed tsam mo /
tataḥ param /
ardhārdhavṛddhiḥ /
triṣu sthānesu brahmapurohitānāṃ yojanaṃ mahābrahmaṇo 'dhyardhaṃ parīttābhānāṃ dve yojane 		de yi gong ma phyed phyed bskyed /
gnas gsum dag na tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams kyi dpag tshad gcig go /
tshangs pa chen po'i ni phyed dang gnyis so /
urdhvaṃ tu parīttābhebhya āśrayaḥ /
dviguṇadviguṇā hitvā 'nabhrakebhya'striyojanam 		'od chung pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gnyis so /
'od chung rnams kyi lha yan chad /
lus ni nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur te /
sprin med dpag tshad gsum dor ro /
apramāṇābhānāṃ catvāri yojanāni tshad med 'od rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi'o /
ābhāsvarāṇāmaṣṭau 'od gsal ba rnams kyi ni brgyad de /
evaṃ dviguṇavṛddhyā yāvacchubhakṛtsnānāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ de bzhin du dge rgyas pa rnams kyi ni drug cu rtsa bzhi yin pa'i bar du nyis 'gyur du bskyed do /
anabhrakāṇāṃ tato yojanatrayeṇa hīnaṃ dviguṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatiyojana śatam sprin med pa rnams kyi ni nyis 'gyur du bsgyur nas de las dpag tshad gsum phri nas dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o /
tasmāt pareṇa punaḥ puṇyaprasavānāṃ dviguṇaṃ dviguṇaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśayojanasahasrāṇi śarīram /
evaṃ pramāṇabhinnānāṃ kimāyuṣo'pyasti bhedaḥ 		de yan chad bsod nams skyes pa la sogs pa nas 'og min pa rnams kyi lus dpag tshad khri drug stong yin pa'i bar du nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur du bsgyur ro /
ci de ltar bod tshod tha dad pa rnams kyi tshe yang bye brag yod dam zhe na /
astītyāha smras pa yod de /
sahasramāyuḥ kuruṣu sgra mi snyan na tshe stong ste /
varṣāṇām lo rnams so /
dvayorardhārdhavarjitam gnyis la phyed phyed spangs pa'o /
dvayordvipayorardhārdhaṃ varjayitvā pañca varṣaśatāni godānīyānām gnyis la ni phyed phyed spangs nas /
ba lang spyod pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ni lo lnga brgya'o /
ardhatṛtīye varṣaśate pūrvavidehānām shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams kyi ni nyis brgya lnga bcu'o /
ihāniyatam 'di na ma nges /
jambūdvīpe nāstyāyuṣo niyamaḥ kadācit bhūyo bhavati kadācidalpīyaḥ 'dzam bu gling 'di na ni tshe nges pa med de /
res 'ga' ni ring por 'gyur ro /
res 'ga' ni thung ngo /
ante tu daśābdāḥ tha mar ni /
lo bcu /
abdaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ lo zhes bya ba ni lo skor yin te /
ante hīyamānaṃ daśa varṣāṇyāyurbhavati tha ma thung ngur gyur pa na tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro /
ādito'mitam dang po dpag tu med /
āditaḥ prāthamakalpikānaṃ manuṣyāṇāmaparimāṇamāyurbhavati /
sahasrādisaṃkhyayā parimātuṃ na śakyate 		bskal pa dang po pa'i mi rnams kyi tshe ni dpag tu med pa yin to /
stong la sogs pa'i grangs kyis yongs su tshad gzung bar mi nus so /
uktaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ devānāṃ vaktavyam /
taccāhorātraṃ vyavasthāpya śakyaṃ vaktumiti sa eva caiṣāṃ vyavasthāpyate 		mi rnams kyi bshad zin to /
lha rnams kyi brjod par bya ste /
de yang nyin zhag rnam par bzhag nas brjod par nus pas re zhig de dag gi de nyid rnam par gzhag par bya ste /
nṛṇāṃ varṣāṇi pañcāśadahorātro divaukasām mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu la /
'dod pa dag gi lha rnams las /
kāme'dharāṇāṃ /
yāni manuṣyāṇāṃ pañcāśadvarṣāṇi tāni kāmadhātāvadharāṇāṃ devānāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāmekaṃ rātrindivam 		'og ma dag gi nyin zhag gcig /
mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go /
tenāyuḥ pañcavarṣaśatāni tu des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o /
tena tatastenāhorātreṇa teṣāṃ triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa divyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ pramāṇam de'i nyin zhag des na de rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go /
zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya'o /
dviguṇottaramūrdhvānāmubhayaṃ /
ūrdhvānāṃ devānāmubhaya dviguṇottaramahorātraścāyuśca 		gong ma gnyi ga nyis 'gyur ro /
lnga po gong ma rnam sa ni nyin zhag dang tshe gnyi ga nyis 'gyur te /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
yanmanuṣyāṇāṃ varṣaśataṃ tattrāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāmekaṃ rātrindivam 		ji lta zhe na /
mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la /
tena rātrindivena divyaṃ varṣasahasramāyuḥ nyin zhag des na tshe lha'i lo stong thub bo /
evaṃ yāmādīnāṃ yathākramam /
mānuṣyakāṇi dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa varṣaśatānyekaṃ rātrindivam 		de bzhin du mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya dang bzhi brgya dang brgyad brgya dang stong drug brgya ni 'thab bral la sogs pa'i nyin zhag gcig yin la /
tena rātrindevena dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa divyāni varṣasahasrāṇyāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam nyin zhag des na tshe'i tshad lha'i lo nyis stong dang bzhi stong dang brgyad stong dang khri drug stong thub bo /
yugandharādūrvaṃ sūryācandramasorabhāvāt /
kathaṃ devānāmahorātravyavasthānamālokakṛtyaṃ vā 		gnya' shing 'dzin yan chad na nyi ma dang zla ba med pa'i phyir lha rnams kyi nyin zhag rnam par gzhag pa dang snang ba'i bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocavikāsātkumudabandhu vat śakunīnāṃ kūjanākūjanāt middhāpagamāgamācca ālokakṛtyaṃ svayaṃprabhatvāt ku mu ta dang pad ma bzhin du me tog rnams kha 'dzums pa dang kha 'byed pa dang bya rnams skad 'byin pa dang skad mi 'byin pa dang gnyid sangs pa dang bro ba las so /
snang ba'i bya ba ni bdag nyid la 'od yod pa'i phyir ro /
uktamāyuḥ kāminām /
rūpiṇāṃ punaḥ 		'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bshad zin to /
nāstyahorātramāyustu kalpaiḥ svāśrayasaṃmitaiḥ gzugs can nyin mtshan med tshe ni /
rang lus gzhal ba'i bskal pa yis /
yeṣāṃ rūpiṇāmardhayojanamāśrayaḥ teṣāmardhakalpamāyuḥ gzugs can gang dag gi lus dpag tshad phyed yin pa de dag gi tshe bskal pa phyed yin la /
yeṣāṃ yojanaṃ teṣāṃ kalpam /
evaṃ yasya yāvadyojanamāśrayastasya tāvatkalpamāyuryavadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśakalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥ pramāṇam 		gang dag gi dpag tshad gcig yin pa de dag gi ni bskal pa gcig yin pa nas /
de bzhin du 'og min pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bskal pa khri drug stong yod pa'i bar du gang gi lus dpag tshad ji snyed pa de'i tshe yang bskal pa de snyed do /
ārūpye viṃśatiḥ kalpasahasrāṇya dhikādhikam gzugs med bskal pa stong phrag ni /
nyi shu lhag pas lhag pa yin /
ākāśānantyāyatane viṃśatikalpasahasrāṇyāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched na ni tshe'i tshad bskal pa nyi khri'o /
vijñānānantyāyatane tasmādadhikaṃ viṃśatiḥ sahasrāṇi rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni de las nyi khri lhag go /
ākiñcanyāyatane tasmādadhikaṃ viṃśatiḥ /
bhavāgre tasmādadhikaṃ viṃśatiḥ /
evaṃ teṣāṃ yathākramaṃ viṃśatiścatvāriṃśat ṣaṣṭiraśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam 		ci yang med pa'i skye mched na ni de las nyi khri lhag go /
srid pa'i rtse mon ni de las nyi khri lhag pa'o /
de ltar na de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni go rims bzhin du bskal pa nyi khri dang bzhi khri dang drug khri dang brgyad khri yin no /
katamo'tra kalpo veditavyaḥ kimantarakalpo'tha saṃvartakalpo'tha vivarttakalpo'tha mahākalpaḥ 'dir bskal pa gang zhig yin par rig par bya /
ci bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'chags pa dang gang yang chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu pa chen po zhig yin zhe na /
mahākalpaḥ parīttābhāt prabhṛtyardhamadhastataḥ 'od chung nas bzung bskal chen te /
de yi 'og ma phyed yin no /
