yathākramaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaistrayāṇāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
tatra punaḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re rgyu gsum gyis go rims bzhin du gsum rnam par gzhag go zhes zer ro /
de la /
cetanā mānasaṃ karma sems pa yid kyi las yin no /
cetanā manaskarme ti veditavyam sems pa ni yid kyi las yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o /
tajjaṃ vākkāyakarmaṇī /
yattaccetanājanitaṃ cetayitvā karmetyuktaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇī te veditavye 		des bskyed lus dang ngag gi las /
sems las skyes pa gang yin pa bsams pa'i las zhes gsungs pa de dag ni lus dang ngag gi las su rig par bya'o /
te tu vijñaptyavijñaptī de dag rnam rig rnam rig min /
te tu kāyavākkarmaṇī pratyekaṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāve veditavye /
tatra tu /
kāyavijñaptiriṣyate /
saṃsthānaṃ 		lus dang ngag gi las de dag ni so sor rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dag tu rig par bya'o /
de la'ang /
lus rnam rig byed dbyibs su 'dod /
cittavaśena kāyasya tathā tathā saṃsthānaṃ kāyavijñaptiḥ sems kyi dbang gis lus de dang de ltar gnas pa ni lus kyi rnam par rig byed yin no /
gatirityapare /
prasyandamānasya hi kāyakarma no 'prasyandamānasyeti 		gzhan dag na re 'gro ba yin te /
lus g yo ba las yin gyi mig g yo ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te /
ta ucyante /
na gatiryasmātsaṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ 		de dag la /
'gro min gang phyir 'dus byas ni /
skad cig pa yin zhes bya ba brjod do /
ko 'yaṃ kṣaṇo nāma skad cig ces bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
ātmalābho 'nantravināśī bdag nyid du red ma thag tu 'jig pa'o /
so 'syāstīti kṣaṇikam /
daṇḍakavat /
sarva hi saṃskṛtamātmalābhā dūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti yatraiva jātaṃ tatraiva dhvasyate 		de 'di la yod pas na skad cig pa ste dbyug pa bzhin no /
'dus byas thams cad bdag nyid thob pa las phan chad du med pa'i phyir gang du skyes pa de nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ro /
tasyāyuktā deśāntarasaṃkrāntiḥ de ni yul gzhan du 'pho bar rig pa ma yin te /
tasmānna gatiḥ kāyakarma de lta bas na lus kyi las ni 'gro ba ma yin no /
syādetadeva yadi sarvasya ṣkṇikatvaṃ sidhyet gal te thams cad skad cig par grub par gyur na ni de de lta yin no /
siddhamevaitat viddhi /
kutaḥ /
saṃskṛtasyāvaśyaṃ /
vyayāt 		'di'i grub pa kho nar khong du chud par gyis shig /
ga las she na /
'dus byas ni gdon mi za bar 'jig phyir ro /
akasmiko hi bhāvānāṃ vināśaḥ /
kiṃ kāraṇam 		dngos po rnams 'jig pa ni rgyu med pa las byung ba yin no /
kāryasya hi kāraṇaṃ bhavati /
vanāśaścābhāvaḥ /
yaścābhāvastasya kiṃ kartavyam /
so 'sāvākasmikok vināśo yadi bhāvasyotpannamātrasya na syāt paścādapi na syādbhāvasya tulyatvāt 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
bya ba'i rgyu yin na 'jig pa yang med pa yin pas med pa gang yin pa de la ni ci zhig byar yod /
rgyu med pa las byung ba'i 'jig pa de ni dngos po skyed pa tsam la ma yin na phyis kyang mi 'byung ste /
dngos po mtshungs pa'i phyir ro /
tathānyathībhūtaḥ /
na yuktaṃ tasyaiva /
nyathātvam 		'on te gzhan du gyur pa yin no zhe na /
de nyid gzhan du gyur pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
na hi sa eva tasmādvilakṣaṇo yujyate de nyid de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun par ni mi rung ngo /
dṛṣṭo vai kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogādvināśaḥ /
na ca dṛṣṭādgariṣṭhaṃ pramāṇamastīti /
na ca sarvasyākasmiko vināśaḥ kathaṃ tāvat bhavān kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogādvināśaṃ paśyāmīti manyate 		shing la sogs pa dag me dang 'brel pa las 'jig par yang mthong la mthong ba las brling ba'i tshad ma yang med pas thams cad kyi 'jig pa ni rgyu med pa las byung ba ma yin no zhe na /
re zhig khyod shing la sogs pa dag me dang 'brel pa las 'jig par blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ji lta bur sems /
teṣāṃ punaradarśanāt /
saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetat /
kimagnisaṃyogātkāṣṭhādayo vinaṣṭā ato na dṛśyante utāho svayaṃ vinaṣṭā anye ca punarnotpannā ato na dṛśyante /
yathā vāyusaṃyogātpradīpaḥ pāṇisaṃyogādghaṇṭāśabda iti 		de yod na de dag la yang mi snang ba'i phyir ro /
re zhig 'di dpyad par bya ste /
ci me dang 'brel ba las shing la sogs pa zhig ste /
de'i phyir mi snang ba zhig yin nam /
'on te rang nyid zhig la gzhan dag kyang ma skyes pas de'i phyir mi snang ste dper na rlung dang phrad pa las mar me dang lag pa dang phrad pa las dril bu'i sgra lta bu zhig yin /
tasmādanumānasādhyo 'yamarthaḥ /
kiṃ punaratrānumānam 		de lta bas na don 'di ni rjes su dpag pas bsgrub par bya ba yin no /
'di la rjes su dpag pa gang zhe na /
uktaṃ tāvat akāryatvādabhāvasyeti /
punaḥ 		re zhig med pa ni bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhes ni bshad zin to /
yang na /
na kasyacidahetoḥ syāt rgyu med pa las 'ga' mi 'byung /
yadi vināśo hetusāmānyānna kasyacidahetukaḥ syādutpādavat /
kṣaṇikānāṃ ca buddhiśabdārciṣāṃ dṛṣṭa ākasmiko vināśa iti nāyaṃ hetumapekṣate 		gal te 'jig pa rgyu dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur na skye ba bzhin du 'ga' yang rgyu med pa las mi 'gyur ba zhig na skad cig ma blo dang sgra dang me lce dag 'jig pa rgyu med pa las byung ba yang mthong bas 'di rgyu la ltos pa ma yin no /
yastu manyate buddhyantarādbuddhervināśaḥ śabdāntarācchabdasyeti /
tadayuktam 		gang zhig blo yang blo gzhan gyis 'jig la sgra yang sgra gzhan gyis 'jig go snyam du sems pa de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
buddhyorasamavadhānāt blo gnyis phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro /
na hi śaṃsayaniścayajñānayoryuktaṃ samavadhānaṃ sukhaduḥkhayo rāgadveṣayorvā /
yadā ca paṭubuddhiśabdānantaramapaṭubuddhiśabdāvutpadyete tadā kathamapaṭuḥ samānajātīyo dharmaḥ paṭīyāṃsaṃ hiṃsyāt 		the tshom can dang nges pa'i shes pa dag dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dag dang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag phrad par ni rigs pa ma yin no /
gang gi tshe blo dang sgra gsal ba nyid dag gi mjug thogs su blo dang sgra mi gsal ba 'byung ba de'i che [*tshe?] ji ltar na mi gsal ba rigs mthun pa'i chos kyi gsal ba 'jig par 'gyur /
antyayośca kathaṃ yo 'pyarciṣāmavasthānahetvabhāvāddharmādharmavaśādvā vināśaṃ manyate tadapyayuktam gang yang gnas pa'i rgyu med pa'am /
chos dang chos ma yin pa'i dbang gis me lce dag 'jig go snyam du sems pa de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
na hyabhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati med pa ni rgyu yin par 'os pa ma yin no /
na cāpyutpādavināśahetvordharmārdharmayoḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe vṛttilābhapratibandhau bhavitumarhataḥ /
sakyaṣcaiṣa kāraṇa parikalpaḥ sarvatra samskṛte kartumityalaṃ vivādena /
yadi ca kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogahetuko vināśaḥ syādevaṃ sati pākajānāṃ guṇānāṃ pakvataratamotpattau 		skye ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyu chos dang chos ma yin pa dag kyang skad cig skad cig nyid la 'jug pa thob pa dang bgegs byed par 'os pa ma yin no /
rgyu yongs su brtags pa 'di yang 'dus byas thams cad la bya bar nus pas brtsad mi dgos so /
gal te shing la sogs pa dag 'jig pa me dang 'brel ba'i rgyu las byung ba zhig yin na de lta na ni tshos byed las skyes pa rnams kyi tshos pa dang ches tshos pa dang ches cher tshos pa byung bal /
hetuḥ syācca vināśakaḥ rgyu yang 'jig pa por 'gyur ro /
hetureva ca vināśakaḥ syāt rgyu nyid 'jig pa por 'gyur ba ji lta zhe na /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
ghāsādyagnisaṃbandhā guṇāḥ pākajā utpannāstata eva tādṛśādvā punaḥ pakvataratamotpattau teṣāṃ vināśa iti hetureva teṣāṃ vināśakaḥ syāddhetvaviśiṣṭo vā 		me dang 'brel pa gang las tshos byed las skyes pa 'byung ba de nyid dam de dang 'dra ba las tshos pa dang ches tshos pa dang ches cher tshos pa byung na de dag 'jig pas rgyu nyid de dag gi 'jig pa por 'gyur ba'am yang na rgyu bye brag med par 'gyur ro /
gang las sam /
na ca yuktaṃ yata eva tādṛśāddvā teṣāṃ bhāvastata eva tādṛśācca teṣāṃ punarabhāva iti gang dag 'dra ba las de dag 'byung ba nyid dam /
de dang 'dra ba las yang med par 'gyur ba ni rigs pa ma yin no /
jvālāntareṣu tāvaddhetubhedakalpanāṃ parikalpeyuḥ re zhig me lce gzhan dag las rgyu tha dad par yongs su brtag par ni bya la reg na /
kṣarahimaśuktasūryodakabhūmisaṃbandhāttu pākajaviśeṣotpattau kāṃ kalpanāṃ kalpayeyuḥ /
yattarhyāpaḥ kvāthyamānāḥ kṣīyante kiṃ tatrāgnisaṃyogāḥ kurvanti 		thal ba dang kha ba dang rtsva dang nyi ma dang chu dang sa dang 'brel pa las smin byed las skyes pa'i bye brag byung ba la gang la brtag par bya /
'o na gang chu bskol bzad par 'gyur ba de la me dang 'brel pa dag ci zhig byed ci zhe na /
tejodhātuṃ prabhāvato vardhayanti yasya prābhāvādapāṃ saṃghātaḥ kṣāmakṣāmo jāyate yāvadatikṣāmatāṃ gato 'nte na punaḥ saṃtānaṃ saṃtanoti /
idamatrāgnisaṃyogāḥ kurvanti /
tasmānnāsti bhāvānāṃ vināśahetuḥ svayameva tu bhaṅguratvādvinaśyanta utpannamātrā vinaśyantīti siddha eṣāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgācca gatyabhāvaḥ 		mthu'i sgo nas me'i khams 'phel bar byed cing de'i mthus na chu'i tshogs nyam chung zhing nyam chung bar 'gyur la shin tu nyam chung ba'i bar du gyur pa dang mjug tu rgyun yang rgyun chags par mi byed de /
'di la me dang 'brel ba dag gis ni 'di byed do /
de lta bas na dngos po rnams 'jig pa la rgyu ni med kyi rang nyid 'jig pa'i ngang can yin pa'i phyir 'jig pa na byung ba tsam gyis 'jig pa'i phyir 'di dag skad cig ma la 'jig par yang grub la skad cig ma la 'jig pa'i phyir 'gro ba yang med do /
gatyabhimānastu deśāntareṣu nirantarotpattau tṛṇajvālāvat /
gatyabhāve ca saṃsthānaṃ kāyavijñaptiriti siddham /
nāsti saṃsthānaṃ dravyata iti sautrāntikāḥ 		yul gzhan dag tu 'dab chags par 'byung ba las 'gro bar mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed par zad de rtsva'i me bzhin no /
'gro ba med na lus kyi rnam par rig byed de dbyibs yin no zhes bya bar grub bo /
mdo sde pa rnams na re dbyibs ni rdzas su med de /
ekadiṅmukhe hi bhūyasi varṇa utpanne dīrghaṃ rūpamiti prajñapyate phyogs gcig gi sgor kha dog phal cher byung ba la gzugs ring por zhes 'dogs par byed /
tamevāpekṣyālpīyasi hrasvamiti /
caturdiśaṃ bhūyasi caturasramiti 		de nyid la ltos nas nyung ngur byung ba la thung du zhes 'dogs par byed /
phyogs bzhir mang por byung ba la gru bzhi zhes 'dogs par byed /
sarvatra same vṛttamiti /
evaṃ sarvam 		thams cad du mnyam pa na lham pa zhes 'dogs par byed de /
tadyathā 'lātamekasyāṃ diśi deśāntareṣvanantareṣu nirantaramāśu dṛśyamānaṃ dīrghamiti pratīyate sarvato dṛśyamānaṃ maṇḍalamiti thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o /
dper na mgal me phyogs gzhan gcig tu myur du 'dab chags par snang ba ni ring po'o snyam du shes la /
na tu khalu jātyantaramasti saṃsthānam /
yadi hi syāt /
dvigrāhyaṃ syāt 		thams cad du snang na zlum po'o snyam du shes kyi dbyibs rdzas su gzhan yod pa ni ma yin pa bzhin no /
gal te yod na ni /
gnyis gzung 'gyur /
cakṣuṣā hi dṛṣṭvā dīrghamityavasīyate kāyendriyeṇāpi spṛṣṭveti dvābhyāmasya grahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
na ca rūpāyatanasya dvābhyāṃ grahaṇamasti /
yathā vā spraṣṭavye dīrghādigrahaṇaṃ tathā varṇe saṃbhāvyatām /
smṛtimātraṃ tatra spraṣṭavyasāhacaryāt bhavati /
sa tu sāhacaryāt bhavati na tu sākṣāt grahaṇam /
yathā 'gnirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyoṣṇatāyāṃ smṛtirbhavati puṣpagandhaṃ ca ghrātvā tadvarṇa iti /
yuktamatrāvyabhicāratvādanyenānyasya smaraṇaṃ natu kiñcit spraṣṭavyaṃ kvacit saṃsthāne niyataṃ yatastatra smaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt 		mig gis mthong na yang ring po'o snyam du shes par 'gyur la /
lus kyi dbang po reg na yang shes par 'gyur bas 'di dbang po gnyis kyi gzung bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
gzugs kyi skye mched la ni gnyis kyis 'dzin pa med do zhes zer ro /
yang na ji ltar reg bya la ring po la sogs par 'dzin pa ltar kha dog la yang de bzhin du yid ches par bya'o /
de la ni reg bya dang lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir dran pa tsam yin gyi mngon sum du 'dzin pa ni ma yin gyi /
dper na me'i gzugs mthong nas de'i tsha ba'i dran pa 'byung ba dang me tog gi dri bsnams nas de'i kha dog gi dran pa 'byung ba bzhin no zhe na /
'di la ni 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir gzhan gyis gzhan dran par rigs kyi gang las 'di nges par dran par 'gyur ba reg bya las ni cung zad kyang dbyibs gang la yang nges par med do /
athāsatyapi sāhacaryaniyame saṃsthānasmaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt 'on te lhan cig spyod par nges pa med kyang nges par dbyibs dran par 'gyur na ni kha dog kyang 'gyur ro /
varṇe 'pi syāt varṇavaddhā saṃsthāne 'pyaniyamena syāt /
nacaivaṃ bhavati 		yang na ni kha dog bzhin du dbyibs kyang nges par mi 'gyur ba zhig na de lta yang ma yin par reg bya las 'di dran par ni rigs pa ma yin no /
ayuktamasya spraṣṭavyātsmaraṇaṃ /
citrāstaraṇevā 'nekavarṇasaṃsthāne darśanādbahūnāmaikadeśyaṃ prāpnuyāt /
taccāyīuktaṃ varṇavat /
tasmānnāsti dravyataḥ saṃsthānam 		ri mos bkram pa la dbyibs du ma snang ba'i phyir mang po yang phyogs gcig par 'gyur ba zhig na de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
kha dog bzhin no /
de lta bas na dbyibs ni rdzas su med do /
yaccāpi kiñcit sapratighaṃ rūpamasti tadavaśyaṃ paramāṇau vidyate /
na cāṇau tat /
na ca saṃsthānaṃ paramāṇau vidyate dīrghādi 		gang yang thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs cung zad yod pa de ni gdon mi za bar rdul phra rab la yod pa yin na de rdul la med de /
ring po la sogs pa'i dbyibs ni rdul phra rab la med do /
tasmādbahuṣveva tathā saṃniviṣṭeṣu dīrghādiprajñaptiḥ de lta bas na dbyibs ni mang po de ltar gnas pa dag kho na la ring po la sogs pa 'dogs par zad do /
atha mattaṃ saṃsthānaparamāṇava eva tathā saṃniviṣṭā dīrghādisaṃjñāṃ labhanta iti /
so 'yaṃ kevalaḥ pakṣapātasteṣāmasiddhatvāt /
siddhasvalakṣāṇānāṃ hi teṣāṃ saṃcayo yujyate /
na ca saṃsthānāvayavānāṃ varṇādivat svabhāvaḥ siddha iti kuta eṣāṃ saṃcayaḥ /
yattarhi varṇaścābhinno bhavati saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnaṃ dṛśyate mṛdbhājanānām /
nanu coktaṃ yathā kṛtvā varṇe dīrghādisaṃjñā prajñapyate tathā ca pipīlikādīnāmabhede paṅkticakrādīnāṃ bhedaḥ prajñāyate tathā saṃsthānasyāpi 		'on te dbyibs kyi rdul phra rab dag kho na de ltar gnas pa la ring po la sogs pa'i ming 'dogs par 'dod na ni de dag ma grub pa'i phyir de ni phyogs 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do /
rang gi mtshan nyid rnams grub na ni de dag bsags pa cung bar 'gyur na dbyibs kyi yan lag rnams ni kha dog la sogs pa de bzhin du rang gi ngo bor grub pa yang med na de dag bsags pa lta zhig ga la yod /
'on gang kham pa'i snod rnams kha dog kyang tha mi dad pa la dbyibs kyang tha dad par snang ngo zhe na /
ji ltar gnas par gyur pa'i kha dog la ring po la sogs par ming 'dogs par zad do zhes ma bshad dam /
dper na grog ma la sogs pa tha mi dad bzhin du 'khor lo la sogs pa tha dad par 'dogs pa ltar dbyibs kyang de dang 'dra'o /
yattarhi tamapi dūrādvā varṇamapaśyantaḥ sthāṇvādīnāṃ dairghyādīni paśyanti varṇameva te tatrāvyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīrghādiparikalpaṃ kurvanti 'o na gang mun khung dang thag ring po nas sdong dum la sogs pa'i kha dog ma mthong bar ring po la sogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
de dag gi de kha dog mi gsal ba kho na mthong nas ring po la sogs par yongs su rtog par byed de /
paṅktisenāparikalpavat /
itthaṃ caitadevam /
yatkadācidanirdhāryamāṇaparicchedaṃ saṃghātamātramavyaktaṃ dṛśyate kimapyetaditi /
athedānīṃ kāyasya gatiṃ nirākṛṭya samsthānaṃ ca tatra bhavantaḥ sautrāntikāḥ kāṃ kāyavijñarptiṃ prajñapayanti 		phreng ba dang dmag la sogs pa la yongs su rtog pa bzhin no /
de ni gdon mi za bar de ltar shes par bya ste /
gang res 'ga' yongs su chad pa nges par mi zin pa ni tshogs pa tsam dang mi gsal ba snang ba yin no /
yang da ni mdo sde pa khyed rnams kyi lugs kyis lus kyi 'gro ba dang dbyibs kyang bsal nas gang la lus kyi rnam par rig byed du 'dogs par byed ce na /
saṃsthānameva hi te kāyavijñarpti prajñapayanti /
natu punardravyataḥ 		de dag ni dbyibs kho na la lus kyis rnam par rig byed 'dogs par byed la rdzas su ni ma yin no /
tāṃ ca prajñapayantaḥ kathaṃ kāyakarma prajñapayanti de la 'dogs par byed pa na ji ltar lus kyi las su 'dogs par byed ce na /
kāyādhiṣṭhānaṃ karma kāyakarma yā cetanā kāyasya tatra tatra praṇetrī /
evaṃ vāṅmanaskarmaṇī api yathāyogaṃ veditavye /
yattarhi cetanā karma cetayitvā cetyuktaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ caivaṃ ca kariṣyāmīti 		lus la brten pa'i las ni lus kyi las te /
de dang der lus 'jug par byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa'o /
de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi las dag la yang ci rigs par rig par bya'o /
'o na gang sems pa dang bsam pa'i las so zhes gsungs so zhe na /
'di dang 'di lta bu zhig bya'o snyam pa'i kun du rtog pa ni sngar 'byung la /
tathā cetayitvā paścāt kriyā cetanotpadyate /
yayā kāyaḥ preryate sā 'sau cetayitvā karmetyucyate /
evaṃ tarhi vijñaptyabhāvādavijñaptirapi kāmāvacarī nāstīti mahānto doṣā anuṣajyante 		de ltar bsams nas de'i 'og tu gang gis lus 'jug par byed par bya ba'i sems pa skye bar 'gyur te /
de ni bsam pa'i las zhes bya'o /
de ltan na 'o na rnam par rig byed med pa'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yang med bas nyes pa chen por thal bar 'gyur ro /
anuṣaṅgānāṃ punaḥ pratyanuṣaṅgā bhaviṣyanti thal ba rnams la yang thal ba'i gnyen po dag yod de /
yadi tasmādeva kāyakarmasaṃśabditāccetanāviśeṣādavijñaptiḥ syāt /
cittānuparivartinī syātsamāhitavijñaptivat nai vaṃ bhaviṣyati 		gal te lus kyi las zhes bya ba'i sems pa'i khyad par de nyid las rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'byung bar 'gyur na yang cir 'gyur mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzhin du sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin par 'gyur ro /
de ltar mi 'gyur te /
cetanāviśeṣeṇa tadākṣpaviśeṣāt sems pa'i khyad par gyis de'i 'phen pa khyad par yod pa'i phyir ro /
sā 'pi ca vijñaptiḥ satī tadākṣepe cetanāyā balaṃ nibhālayate /
jaḍatvāt 		rnam par rig byed de yod na yang de 'phang bar bya ba ni sems pa'i stobs la rag las pa yin te de blun pa'i phyir ro /
dravyameva tu saṃsthānaṃ vaibhāṣikā varṇayanti saṃsthānātmikāṃ tu kāyavijñaptim /
vāgvijñaptistu vāgdhvaniḥ /
vāksvabhāvo yaḥ śabdaḥ saiva vāgvijñaptiḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re dbyibs kyang rdzas kho na yin la /
lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid yin no zhes zer ro /
ngag rnams rig byed 'di ngag sgra /
ngag gi rang bzhin gyi sgra gang yin pa de nyid ngag gi rnam par rig byed yin no /
avijñaptiḥ pūrvamevoktā /
sā 'pi dravyato nāstīti sautrāntikāḥ /
abhyupetyākaraṇamātratvāt /
atītānyapi mahābhūtānyupādāya prajñaptesteṣāṃ cāvidyamānasvabhāvatvādrūpalakṣaṇābhāvācca 		rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni sngar bshad pa kho na yin no /
mdo sde pa rnams na re yang rdzas su med de /
khas blangs nas mi byed pa tsam gyi phyir dang 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams la yang brten nas 'dogs pa'i phyir dang de dag kyang rang gi ngo bo med pa'i phyir dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir dang zhes zer ro /
astīti vaibhāṃṣikāḥ /
kathaṃ jñāyate 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re yod do zhes zer ro /
ji ltar shes she na /
trividhāmalarūpoktivṛddhyakurvatpathādibhiḥ /
trividhaṃ rūpamuktaṃ sūtre /
tribhiḥ sthānai rūpasya rūpasaṃgraho bhavati 		rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang /
'phel dang ma byas lam sogs phyir /
mdo las /
gnas gsum gyi gzugs kyis gzugs bsdus pa yin te /
asti rūpaṃ sanidarśanaṃ sapratigham bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyang yod /
asti rūpamanidarśanaṃ sapratigham bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyang yod /
asti rūpamanidarśanamapratighamiti /
anāsravaṃ ca bhagavatā rūpamuktam /
anāsravāḥ dharmāḥ katame 		bstan du yang med la thogs pa yang med pa'i gzugs kyang yod do zhes gzugs rnam pa gsum gsungs so; /
zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang gang zhe na /
yasmin rūpe 'tītānāgatapratyutpanno notpadyate 'nunayo vā pratigho vā yāvadyasminvijñāne /
ima ucyante 'nāsravā dharmā iti /
na cā vijñaptiṃ virahayyāsti rūpamanidarśanamapratighaṃ nāpyanā sravam /
vṛddhirapi coktā 		gzugs 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba gang dang rnam par shes pa'i bar gang la rjes su chags pa'am khong khro ba mi skye ba 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o zhes gzugs zag pa med pa yang gsungs te /
rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs par ni bstan du yang med la thogs pa yang med pa'i gzugs kyang med la zag pa med pa yang med do /
ebhiḥ saptabhiraupadhikaiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ samanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā carato vā svapato vā tiṣṭhato vā jāgrato vā satatasamitamabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ni rgyu yang rung 'dug kyang rung nyal yang rung mi nyal yang rung ste /
rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsod nams mngon par 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur zhing bsod nams nye bar skye ba kho nar 'gyur te /
evaṃ niraupadhikairiti /
na cāvijñaptimantareṇānyamanaso 'pti puṇyasyābhivṛddhiryujyate /
akurvataśca svayaṃ paraiḥ kārayataḥ karmapathā na sidhyeyurasatyāmavijñaptau 		rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes 'phel bar yang gsungs te /
rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs par ni yid gzhan dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyang mngon par 'phel bar mi rung ngo /
rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med na bdag nyid kyis ma byas la /
gzhan dag byed du bcug pa'i las kyi lam dag 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
nahyājñāpanavijñaptiḥ maulaḥ karmapatho yujyate lung du bsgo ba tsam gyis las kyi lam du mi rung ste /
tasya karyaṇo 'kṛtatvāt las de ma byas pa'i phyir ro /
kṛte 'pi ca tasyāḥ svabhāvaviśeṣāditi byas su zin kyang de'i rang gi ngo bo la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā dharmā bhikṣavo bāhyamāyatanamekādaśabhirāyatanairasaṃgṛhītamanidarśanamapratighamiti bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong chos ni phyi'i skye mched yin te /
skye mched bcu gcig gis ma bsdus pa bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa'o zhes gsungs kyi /
na tvarūpītyuktam /
tatra kiṃ prayojanaṃ syādyadi dharmāyatanāntargatamavijñaptirūpaṃ naśyeta 		gzugs can ma yin pa'o zhes ni ma gsungs te /
der gal te chos kyi skye mched kyi khongs su ma gtogs pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs shig ma gzigs na dgos pa ci zhig yod par 'gyur ro /
aṣṭāṅgaśca mārgo na syādavijñaptimantareṇa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs med na lam yan lag brgyad par yang mi 'gyur te /
samāpannasya samyagvākkarmāntājīvānāmayogāt snyoms par 'jug pa la ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams mi rung ba'i phyir ro /
yattarhīdamuktaṃ tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ samyagdṛṣṭirbhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati samyak saṃkalpaḥ samyak vyāyāmaḥ samyak smṛtiḥ samyak samādhiḥ 'o na 'di skad du de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong ba de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro /
pūrvameva cāsya samyak vāvakrmāntājīvāḥ pariśuddhā bhavanti paryavadātā iti 'di'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams ni sngon yongs su dag cing yongs su byang ba yin no zhes gang gsungs so zhe na /
laukikamārgavairāgyaṃ pūrvakṛtamabhisaṃdhāyaitaduktam /
prātimokṣasaṃvaraścapi na syādasatyāmavijñaptau /
na hi samādānādurdhvaṃ tadasti yenānyamanasko 'pyayaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt bhikṣuṇī veti 		'di ni sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral bar byas pa la dgongs te gsungs pa yin no /
rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med na so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang med par 'gyur te /
yang dag par blangs pa'i 'og tu gang gis na yid gzhan dang ldan pa 'di yang dge slong ngam dge slong mar 'gyur ba de ni med do /
setuśca sūtre viraktiruktā /
dauḥśīlyavivandhatvāt 		mdo las spong ba ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi bgegs byed pa'i phyir chu lon du yang gsungs te /
na vā bhavantī seturbhavitumarhatītyastyevāvijñaptiḥ med pa ni chu lon yin par 'os pa yang ma yin pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni yod pa kho na'o /
atra sautrāntikā āhuḥ bahvapyetaccitramapyetat /
naivaṃ tvetat 		'di la mdo sde ba rnams na re 'di ni mang po yang yin la /
'di ni sna tshogs pa yang yin mod kyi 'di de ltar yang ma yin no zhes zer mod /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
yat tāvaduktaṃ trividharūpokteri ti 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
re zhig gang gzugs rnam pa gsum gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa /
tatra yogācārā upadiśanti /
dhyāyināṃ samādhiviṣayo rūpaṃ samādhiprabhāvādutpadyate 		de la rnal 'byor spyod pa dag na re bsam gtan pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyi gzugs skye ste /
cakṣurindriyāviṣayatvāt anidarśanam /
deśānāvaraṇatvādapratighamiti /
atha matam 		de yang dbang po'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ni bstan du med pa yin la; yul la mi sgrib pa'i phyir ni thogs pa med pa yin no zhes ston par byed do /
kathamidānīṃ tat rūpam iti /
etadavijñaptau samānam /
yadapyuktamanāsravarūpokteriti tad eva samādhiprabhāvasaṃbhūtaṃ rūpamanāsrave samādhāvanāsravaṃ varṇayanti yogācārāḥ 		da ni de ji ltar gzugs yin snyam du sems na de ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la yang mtshungs so /
gang yang gzugs zag pha med pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa ni rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams na re ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu las skyes ba'i gzugs de nyid zag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zag pa med pa yin no zhes brjod do /
arhato yadrūpaṃ bāhyaṃ cetyapare gzhan dag na re dgra bcom pa'i gzugs dang phyi rol gang yin pa ste /
āsravāṇāmaniśrayatvāt /
yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ sāsravā dharmāḥ katame /
yāvadeva cakṣuryavadeva rūpāṇīti vistaraḥ /
tatra punarāsravāṇāmapratipakṣatvātsāsravamuktam /
paryāyeṇa tarhi tadeva sāsravaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca syāt 		zag pa rnams kyi rten ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
'o na gang mdo las zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
mig ji snyed pa dang gzugs ji snyed pa dag yin no zhes rgyas par gsungs so zhe na /
de ni zag pa rnams kyi gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas par gsungs pa yin no /
'o na ni rnam grangs kyis de nyid zag pa dang bcas pa yang yin la zag pa med pa yang yin par 'gyur ro /
kiṃ syāt cir 'gyur na /
lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ syāt /
yathā tat sāsravaṃ tathā na kadācidanāsravamiti ko 'tra saṃkaraḥ /
yadi ca rūpāyatanādīni ekāntena sāsravāṇi syuriha sūtre kimartha viśeṣitāni syuryāni rūpāṇi sāsravāṇi sopādānīyāni cetaḥkhilamrakṣavastviti vistaraḥ /
yadapyuktaṃ puṇyābhivṛddhivacanāditi tatrāpi pūrvācāryā nirdiśanti dharmatā hyeṣā yathā dātṝṇāṃ dāyāḥ paribhujyante tathā tathā bhoktṝṇāṃ guṇaviśeṣādanugrahaviśeṣāccānyamanasāmapi dātṝṇāṃ tadālambanadānacetanā bhāvitāḥ saṃtatayaḥ sūkṣmaṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣaṃ prāpnuvanti yenāyatyāṃ bahutaraphalābhiniṣpattaye samarthā bhavanti 		mtshan nyid 'tshol bar 'gyur ro /
ji ltar de zag pa dang bcas pa yin pa de ltar nam yang zag pa med pa ma yin pas 'di la 'chol ba ci zhig yod /
gal te yang gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams gcig tu zag pa dang bcas pa dag yin par 'gyur na /
ci'i phyir mdo las gzugs zag pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len par 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni sems kyi thab dang spags pa'i gzhi yin no zhes rgya cher khyad par du mdzad par 'gyur /
gang yang bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa de la yang sngon gyi slob dpon dag na re ji lta ji ltar sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya ba dag yongs su spyad pa de lta de ltar za ba po rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par dang phan btags pa'i khyad par gyis yid gzhan dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa po rnams la yang gang gis na tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu ches mang po mngon par bsgrub nus par 'gyur ba de la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i sems pas yongs su bsgos pa'i rgyu de yongs su 'gyur pa'i khyad par phra mo 'thob pa 'di ni chos nyid yin te /
idamabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ bhavedabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam iti /
atha mataṃ kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣādanyamanaso 'pi saṃtānāntarasya pariṇāmaḥ setsyatīti 		bsod nams mngon par 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur zhing bsod nams nye bar skye ba kho nar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni 'di las dgongs te gsungs pa srid do zhes ston par byed do /
'on te de ji ltar na rgyud gzhan gyi khyad par gyis yid gzhan dang ldan pa'i rgyud gzhan yongs su 'gyur bar ji ltar 'gyur snyam du sems na /
etadavijñaptau smānam /
kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣātsaṃtānāntare dharmāntaramavijñaptiḥ setsyatīti nirūpadhikeṣvidānīṃ puṇyakriyāvastuṣu kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
abhikṣṇaṃ tadālambanacetanābhyāsātsvapneṣvapi tā anuṣaṅginyo bhavanti 		na rgyud gzhan gyi khyad par gyis yid gzhan dang ldan pa'i la chos gzhan rnam par rig byed ma yin par 'gyur zhes rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la yang mtshungs so /
da ni rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dag la ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
yang dang yang du de la dmigs pa'i sems pa la goms pas rmi lam dag na yang de dag rjes su 'brel par 'gyur ro /
avijñaptivādinastu niraupadhike yatra vijñaptirnāsti tatra kathāmavijñaptiḥ syāt rnam par rig byed ma yin par smra ba'i ltar na rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa gang la rnam par rig byed med pa de la ji ltar rnam par rig byed ma yin par 'gyur zhe na /
aupadhike 'pyabhīkṣaṇaṃ tadālambanecetanābhyāsādityapare /
yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ yasyograbhikṣuḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā piṇḍakaṃ paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ cetaḥsamārdhiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatyapramāṇastannidānadāyakasya dānapateḥ puṇyābhiṣyandaḥ kuśalābhiṣyandaḥ sukhāsvādadhāraḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya ityatra tadānīṃ dātuḥ kaścetanāviśeṣaḥ /
tasmātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣa eva nyāyyaḥ /
yadapyuktaṃ kārayataḥ kathaṃ karmapathāḥ setsyantīti tatrāpyevaṃ varṇayanti /
tatprayogeṇa pareṣāmupaghātaviśeṣātprayoktuḥ sūkṣmaḥ saṃtatipariṇāma viśeṣo jāyate yata āyatyāṃ samante 'pi bahutaraphalābhinirvarttanasamarthā bhavatīti svayamapi ca kurvataḥ kriyāphalaparisamāptāveṣa eva nyāyo veditavyaḥ /
so 'sau saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣaḥ karmapatha ityākhyāyate 		gzhan dag na re rdzas las byung ba dag la yang dang yang du de la dmigs pa'i sems pa de la goms par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
'o na mdo las gang drag shul can dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
dge ba'i chos dang ldan pas gang gi bsod snyoms yongs su zos nas sems kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa lus kyis mngon du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas na /
de'i gzhi las sbyin pa po'i sbyin pa dag gis bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang bde ba'i gzhi tshad med par re bar bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de la de'i tshe sbyin pa po'i sems pa'i khyad par gang zhig yin no /
de lta bas na rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par kho na rigs pa dang ldan pa yin no /
gang yang byed du bcug pa'i las kyi lam du ji ltar 'gyur zhes smras pa de la yang 'di skad du de'i sbyor bas gzhan dag la gnod pa'i bye brag gis sbyor ba po la rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par phra mo gang las na tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu ches mang po mngon par 'grub nus pa'i rgyu de skye bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod de /
bdag nyid kyi byed pa la 'ang bya ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs nas tshul ni 'di nyid yin par rig par bya'o /
rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par 'di ni las kyi lam zhes bya ste /
kārye kāraṇopacārāt /
kāyikavācikatvaṃ tu tatkriyāphalatvādyathā vijñaptivādināmavijñapteriti 		'bras bu la rgyu btags pa'i phyir ro /
lus kyi dang ngag gi ni de dag gi bya ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dper na rnam par rig byed ma yin par smra ba rnams kyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa lta bu'o /
upātteṣu skandheṣu trikālayā cetanayā prāṇātipātāvadhvena spṛśyata iti bhadantaḥ btsun pa na re 'di gang gi tshe zin pa'i phung po dag la bsad par bya'o /
gsod do /
haniṣyāmi hanmi hatamiti cāsya yadā bhavatīti /
na tviyatā karmapathaḥ parisamāpyate 		bsad do snyam du sems pa na dus gsum pa'i sems pas srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ro zhes zer na /
ma la sogs pa ma bsad par bsad do snyam pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la /
mā bhūdahate 'pi mātrādau hatābhimānināmānantaryaṃ karmeti /
svayaṃ tu ghnata etāvāṃścetanāsamudācāra ityayamatrābhiprāyo yuktarūpaḥ syāt /
ka idānīmeṣa pradveṣo yadavijñaptiḥ prakṣipyate saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣaścābhyupagamyate tathaivāprajñāyamānaḥ 		mtshams med pa'i las kyi lam du 'gyur du 'ongs pas de tsam gyis las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa ni ma yin gyi 'di la bsam pa ni bdag nyid kyis gsod pa la sems pa de snyed cig kun du 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di yin par rigs pa'i ngo bo yin no /
da ni rnam par rig byed ma yin ba ni spong bar byed cing de kho na dang 'dra bar mi mngon par rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i bye brag khas len par byed pa'i rab tu snang ba de gang zhe na /
na khalu kaścit pradveṣaḥ /
kintu cittānvayakāyaprayogeṇa kriyāparisamāptau tābhyāṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaraṃ prayojayiturutpadyata iti notpadyate paritoṣaḥ /
yatkṛtaprayogasaṃbhūtā tu kriyāparisamāptistasyaiva tannimittaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmo bhavatīti bhavati paritoṣaḥ 		rab tu snang ba ni ci yang med mod kyi 'on kyang sems kyi rgyu las byung ba'i lus kyi sbyor bas bya ba yongs su rdzogs na sbyor ba po la de dag dang tha dad par gyur pa'i chos gzhan zhig na skye'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su dga' ba mi skye'o /
gang gis byas pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa de kho na la de'i rgyu can gyi rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni yongs su dga' bar 'gyur te /
cittacaitasaṃtānāccāyatyāṃ phalotpatteḥ /
uktaṃ cātra 		sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyud las tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu byung ba'i yang phyir ro /
'di la bshad kyang zin to /
kimuktam /
vijñaptyabhāvādityevamādi /
tadabhāvādavijñapterabhāvaḥ /
yadapyuktaṃ dharmāyatanasyārūpitvaṃ yasmānnoktamiti /
tadyadevātra rūpamanidarśanamapratighaṃ coktaṃ tadevāstu dharmāyatanaparyāpannam 		ji skad du bshad ce na /
rnam par rig byed med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
gang yang 'di ltar chos kyi skye mched gzugs can ma yin par gsungs so zhes smras pa ni bstan du yang med la thogs pa yang med pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de nyid chos kyi skye mched du gtogs pa yin no /
yadapyuktamaṣṭāṅga āryamārgo na syāditi /
aṅgaṃ tāvadācakṣva /
kathaṃ mārgasamāpannasya samyagvākkarmāntājīvā bhavantīti 		gang yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa ni re zhig ji ltar na lam la snyoms par zhugs pa la yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba dag yod pa khyod smros shig /
ci 'di tshig tu smra 'am /
'on te bya ba byed dam /
kimasau vācaṃ bhāṣyate kriyāṃ vā karoti cīvarādīn vā paryeṣate /
netyāha 		'on te chos gos la sogs pa dag 'chol bar byed /
smras pa /
ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
tadrūpāmanāsravāmavijñaptiṃ pratilabhate /
yasyāḥ pratilambhādvyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate samyagvāgādiṣu ca pravartate 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
gang zhig thob pa'i phyir langs na yang log pa'i ngag la sogs pa dag la ni mi 'jug la /
yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa dag la ni 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zag pa med pa 'thob ste /
ato nimitte naimittikopacārādavijñaptau tadākhyā kriyate /
yadyevamihāpyevaṃ kiṃ na gṛhyate mārgasamāpanno vināpyavijñaptyā tadrūpamāśayaṃ ca āśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate yasya pratilambhāt vyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate samyagvāgādiṣu ca pravartate 		de'i phyir rgyu mtshan la rgyu mtshan can btags pa nas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la der bshad do /
gal te de lta na go 'di la yang de bzhin du lam la snyoms par zhugs pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med bzhin du gang zhig thob pa'i phyir langs na yang log pa'i ngag la sogs pa dag la ni mi 'jug la /
yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa dag la ni 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bsam pa dang lus thob par 'gyur te /
ato nimitte naimittikopacāraṃ kṛtvā aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyanta iti /
aparastvāha /
tadakriyāmātramatrāṅgamuktaṃ syāt /
yadasāvāryamārgasāmarthyādakriyāniyamaṃ pratilabhate taccānāsravamārgasaṃniśrayalābhādanāsravaṃ syāt 		de'i phyir rgyu mtshan la rgyu mtshan can nye bar btags pa byas nas lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnam par gzhag go zhes bya bar ci'i phyir mi gzung gzhan dag na re de dag mi byed pa tsam 'dir yan lag tu gsungs pa yin te /
'dis 'phags pa'i lam gyi mthus nges par mi byed par 'thob pa gang yin pa de yang zag pa med pa'i lam la brten nas 'thob pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yin no /
nahi sarvatra dravyamanto dharmāḥ parisaṃkhyāyante thams cad du rdzas su yod pa'i chos yongs su bgrang ba yang ma yin te /
tadyāthā 'ṣṭau lokadharmāḥ lābho 'lābhaḥ yaśo 'yaśaḥ nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
nacātra cīvarādīnāmalābho nāmāsti dravyāntaram /
prātimokṣasaṃvaro 'pi syāt yayā cetanayā vidhipūrvaṃ kṛtvā 'bhyupagamaḥ pratiṣiddhātkarmaṇaḥ kāyavācau saṃvṛṇoti 		dper na 'jig rten pa'i chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang snyan pa pa dang mi snyan pa dang bstod pa dang smad pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba bzhin te /
de la ni chos gos la sogs pa dag ma rnyed pa zhes bya ba rdzas gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no zhes zer ro /
so sor thar pa'i sdom par yang 'gyur te /
sems pa gang gis cho ga sngon du btang ba'i khas blangs te las bkag nas lus dang ngag dag sdom par byed do /
anyacittona saṃvṛtaḥ syāditi cet gal te sems gzhan dang ldan na ma bsdams par 'gyur ro zhe na /
na /
tadbhāvanayā kriyākāle smarataḥ tatpratyupasthānāt setubhāvo 'pi syādakriyāṃ pratijñāṃ saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya lajjito dauḥśīlyākaraṇāt ityarthameva ca tasyāḥ samādānam 		ma yin te /
de la goms par byas pa'i dus su dran pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro /
chu lon gyi ngo bor yang 'gyur te /
ngo tsha shes pas mi bya bar dam bcas pa yang dag par dran zhing yang dag par dran nas 'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi byed pa'i phyir te /
de lta bu kho na'i don du de yang dag par len pa yang yin no /
yadi punaravijñaptereva dauḥsīlyaṃ pratibadhnīyāt na kaścitmuṣitasmṛtiḥ śikṣāṃ bhindyāt gal te rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi bgegs byed pa yin par gyur na ni brjed ngas pa 'gags kyang tshul khrims 'dral bar mi 'gyur ro /
alaṃ vistareṇāstyeva dravyāntaramavijñaptirūpati vaibhāṣikāḥ /
yadyasti tacca mahābhūtānyupādāyetyuktam tat kim vijñaptimahābhūtānyevopādāyāvijñaptirutpadyate athānyāni 		rgyas par ni mi dgos so /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs rdzas gzhan kho nar yod do zhes zer ro /
gal te yod la de yang 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas pa yin no zhes bshad na de ci rnam par rig byed kyi 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas nas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skye ba'am /
'on te gzhan dag kyang yin zhe na /
smras pa /
ma yin no /
anyānyeva sā mahābhūtānyupādāyotpadyate /
na hi saiva sāmagrī sukṣmaphalā caudārikaphālā ca yujyate 		de ni 'byung ba chen po gzhan dang gzhan dag kho na rgyur byas nas skye bar 'gyur te /
tshogs pa de nyid 'bras bu phra mo can yang yin la; 'bras bu rags pa can yang yin par ni mi rung ngo /
kiṃ khalu yadātanī vijñaptistadātanānyeva sā mahābhūtānyupādāya vartate yang ci de gang gi tshe rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yod pa de'i tshe yod pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag kho na rgyur byas nas 'byung ngam zhe na /
sarvamupādāyarūpaṃ prāyeṇaivaṃ kiñcittu vartamānamanāgataṃ cātītāni mahābhūtānyupādāya rgyur byas pa'i gzugs phal cher thams cad ni de lta bu yin no /
da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa cung zad cig ni 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas nas 'byung ngo /
kiṃ punastaditi de yang gang zhe na /
kṣaṇādūrdhvamavijñaptiḥ kāmāptātītabhūtajā 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig /
phyi chad 'das pa'i 'byung las skye /
prathamāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamavijñaptiḥ kāmāvacarī atītāni mahābhūtānyupādāyotpadyate 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni skad cig ma dang po phyin cad 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas nas skye'o /
tānyasyā āśrayārthena bhavanti /
pratyutpannāni śarīramahābhūtāni saṃniśrayārthena /
pravṛtyanuvṛttikāraṇatvādyathākramam 		de dag ni 'di'i gzhi'i don du 'gyur la lus kyi 'byung ba chen po de ltar 'byung ba rnams ni rten gyi don du 'gyur te /
'jug pa dang rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir go rims bzhin te /
cakrasyeva bhūmau saparivartamānasya pāṇyāvedhabhūmipradeśau 'khor lo sa la 'dril ba la lag pas 'phul ba dang sa'i phyogs bzhin no /
atha kutastyāni mahābhūtānyupādāya kutastyaṃ kāyavākkarma yang gang na yod pa'i lus dang ngag gi las gang na yod pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas pa yin zhe na /
svāni bhūtānyupādāya kāyavākkarma sāsravam zag bcas lus dang ngag gi las /
rang gi 'byung ba dag rgyur byas /
kāmāvacaraṃ kāyavākkarmaṃ kāmāvacarāṇyeva mahābhūtānyupādāya evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ tadbhūmikānyevopādāya 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lus dang ngag gi las ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas pa yin la /
de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi ba'i sa pa'i bar du yang de'i sa pa'i 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas pa yin no /
anāsravaṃ yatra jātaḥ /
asravaṃ tu kāyavākkarma yasyāṃ bhūmau jātastadutpādayati tadbhūmikānyupādāya tadveditavyam /
dhātvapatitatvādanāsravāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāmabhāvāttadvalena cotpatteḥ 		zag med gang du skyes pa yin /
zag pa med pa'i lus dang ngag gi las de ni sa gang du skyes te skyed par byed pa de'i sa pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas pa yin te /
khams gsum ma gtogs pa'i phyir dang zag pa med pa rnams las 'byung ba dag med pa'i phyir dang de'i stobs las skye ba'i phyir ro /
tatra vijñaptyavijñaptyākhyakarmaṇī veditavye rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i las de las kyang /
avijñaptiranupāttikā /
naiḥṣyandikī ca sattvākhyā 		rnam rig byed min ma zin dang /
rgyu mthun las byung sems can ston /
kiñca /
niṣyandopāttabhūtajā 		gzhan yang /
rgyu mthun zin pa'i 'byung las skye /
naiḥṣyandikānyeva bhūtānyupādāya cittacaittāni copādāyāvijñaptirbhavati rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rgyu mthun pa dang zin pa'i 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas nas skye ste /
asamāhitabhūmikāyā eṣa prakāraḥ 'di ni mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i sa pa'i rnam pa yin no /
samādhijaupacayikānupātābhinnabhūtajā /
dhyānānāsravasaṃvarāvijñaptiḥ samādhijā /
sā samādhisaṃbhūtānyaupacayikānyanupātāni ca mahābhūtānyupādāyotpadyate abhinnāni ca yānyeva ca bhūtānyupādāya prāṇātipātādviratirutpadyate tānyeva yāvat saṃbhinnapralāpāt 		ting 'dzin skyes 'byung ma zin dang /
rgyas byung tha dad min las skye /
ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa ni bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yin te de ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa rgyas pa las byung ba dang ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas nas skye'o /
tha mi dad pa dag kyang 'byung ba yin te /
'byung ba chen po gang dag kho na rgyur byas nas srog gcod pa spong ba skye ba de dag kho na las tshig kyal pa spong ba'i bar du skye'o /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
cittavat bhūtābhedāt /
prātimokṣasaṃvare tvanyānyāni mahābhūtānyupādāya saptāvijñaptayo bhavanti 		sems bzhin du 'byung ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro /
so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni 'byung ba gzhan dang gzhan dag rgyur byas nas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bdun skye'o /
vijñaptistu naiḥṣyandikī /
upāttā tu kāyikī /
kiṃ punariyaṃ vijñaptirutpadyamānā pūrvakasya saṃsthānasya saṃtānaṃ bādhitvotpadyate utāho na 		rnam par rig byed ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba ste /
lus kyis ni zin pa yin no /
yang ci rnam par rig byed 'di skye ba na dbyibs snga ma'i rgyud bshig nas skye'am /
kiñcātaḥ yadi bādhitvotpadyate 'on te ma yin /
de las cir 'gyur /
na /
vipākarūpasyocchinnasya punaḥ pravandhādavaibhāṣikīyaṃ prāpnoti /
athābādhitvā 		gal te bshig nas skye na ni /
rnam par smin pa'i gzugs chad pa yang rgyun chags pa'i phyir 'di bye brag tu smra ba ma yin par 'gyur ro /
kathamekasminbhūtasaṃghāte saṃsthānadvayaṃ sidhyati /
anyānyeva tāni naiḥṣyandikāni tadānīmupajāyante yānyupādāya vijñaptirbhavati /
evaṃ tarhi yadyadevāṅgaṃ niśrityotpadyate vijñaptistena tenāṅgena mahīyasā bhavitavyam /
tanmahābhūtairabhivyāpanāt 		'on te ma bshig par skye na ni ji ltar 'byung ba'i tshogs gcig la dbyibs gnyis 'grub par 'gyur /
de'i tshe gang dag rgyur byas nas rnam par rig byed skye bar 'gyur ba rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po gzhan dang gzhan de dag skye bar 'gyur ro /
anabhivyāpane ca punaḥ kathaṃ kṛtsnāṅgena vijñapayet /
śuṣiratvāt kāyasyāsti teṣāmavakāśaḥ 		de dag de lta na ni 'o na de'i 'byung ba chen po de dag gis mngon par khyab pa'i phyir yan lag dang gang dang gang la brten nas rnam par rig byed skye bar 'gyur ba'i yan lag de dang de chen por 'gyur ro /
tat khalvetat karma paryāyeṇa dvividhaṃ trividhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ cottam /
cetanā cetayitvā ceti /
cetayitvā punardvidhā /
kāyavākkarma cetanā ca 		mngon par ma khyab na ni ji ltar na yan lag zad par gyis rnam par rig par byed par 'gyur /
lus la gseb yod pa'i phyir de dag gi go skabs yod do /
kāyakarma punaḥ dvividhaṃ vijñaptyākhyamavijñaptyākhyaṃ ca /
evaṃ vākkarma cetanā ceti pañcavidhaṃ bhavati 		yang las de rnam grangs kyis rnam pa gnyis dang rnam pa gsum dang rnam pa lngar bshad pa de la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba rnam pa gnyis so /
tatra punaravijñaptirdvidhā /
kuśalā 'kuśalā ca 		rnam rig min lung bstan min med /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
nāvyākṛtāstyavijñaptiḥ /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
avyākṛtaṃ hi cittaṃ durbalamato na śaktaṃ balavatkarmākṣeptuṃ yanniruddhe 'pi tasminnanuvadhnīyāt 		lung du ma bstan pa'i sems ni stobs chung ba yin te /
de'i phyir gang 'gags kyang de'i rjes su 'brel par 'gyur ba'i las stobs dang ldan pa 'phen par mi nus so /
tridhā 'nyat gzhan ni rnam gsum /
anyatkarma trividham /
kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtam 		las gzhan ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin no /
kiṃ tadanyat /
vijñaptiścetanā ca 		gzhan de yang gang zhe na /
rnam par rig byed dang sems pa'o /
aśubhaṃ punaḥ /
kāme 		mi dge ni /
'dod na'o /
akuśalaṃ vastu karma kāmahātau veditavyam mi dge ba'i las ni 'dod pa'i khams na yod par rig par bya'o /
nānyatra /
akuśalamūlānāṃ prahīṇatvādāhrīkyānapatrāpyayośca 		gzhan dag na ni med de /
mi dag pa'i rtsa ba rnams dang ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa dag spangs pa'i phyir ro /
kuśalāvyākṛtaṃ tu sarvatrā prativedhāt /
tatra 		dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa ni ma bkag pa'i phyir thams cad na yod do /
rūpe 'pyavijñaptiḥ /
kāme 'pītyapiśabdāt 		de la gzugs na'ang rnam rig min /
yang gi sgras ni 'dod pa na yang yod do /
ārūpyeṣu nāsti bhūtābhāvāt /
yatra hi kāyavācoḥ pravṛttistatra kāyavāksaṃvarau 		gzugs med pa dag na ni 'byung ba med pa'i phyir med do /
gang na lus dang ngag dang 'jug pa de na lus dang ngag gi sdom pa yod do /
iha tarhi samāpannasya syādanāsravā vijñaptivat /
na /
tasyā dhātvapatitatvāt 		'o na 'dir snyoms par 'jug pa la yod par 'gyur te /
zag pa med pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
ma yin te /
de ni khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro /
ārūpyāvacarī tvavijñaptināṃrhati visabhāgāni bhūtānyupādāya bhavitum /
sarvarūpavaimukhyāccārūpyasamāpattunārlaṃ rūpotpattaye 		gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni skal pa mi mnyam pa'i 'byung ba rgyur byas nas skye ba ni 'os pa ma yin no /
gzugs thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzugs skyed par mi nus te /
vibhūtarūpasaṃjñatvāt gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir ro /
dauḥśīlyapratipakṣeṇa śīlam /
tacca dauḥśīlyaṃ kāmāvacaram /
ārūpyāśca kāmadhātorāśrayā kārālambanapratipakṣadūratābhirdūre /
ata eṣvavijñaptirnāstīti vaibhāṣikāḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re tshul khrims ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gnyen po yin la /
'chal pa'i tshul khrims de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa yin na gzugs med pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nas rten dang rnam pa dang dmigs pa dang gnyen po ring ba dag gis ring ste /
de'i phyir 'di dag rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med do zhes zer ro /
vijñaptiḥ savicārayoḥ /
vijñaptistu savicārayoreva bhūmyoḥ /
kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne na tata ūrdhvam /
kāme 'pi nivṛtā nāsti /
nivṛtā tu vijñaptiḥ kāmadhātāvapi nāsti /
brahmaloka evāsti 		rnam rig dpyod dang bcas dag na /
rnam par rig byed ni sa gnyis po 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po kho na na yod kyi de yan chad na ni med do /
'dod pa na yang bsgribs pa med na /
bsgribs pa med pa'i rnam par rig byed ni 'dod pa'i khams na yang med kyi tshangs pa'i 'jig rten kho na na yod do /
mahābrāhmaṇo hi śāṭhyasamutthitaṃ kāyakarma śrūyate tshangs pa chen po la yang g yos kun nas slong ba'i ngag gi las yod de /
sa hi svaparṣanmadhye āyuṣmato 'śvajitaḥ kṣepārthamātmānaṃ kṣiptavāt /
tata ūrdhvamasatyāṃ vāgvijñaptau kathaṃ tatra śabdāyatanaṃ bāhyamahābhūtahetukam 		des rang gi 'khor gyi nang du tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la gtam rlung bskur ba'i phyir bdag nyid rnam par bsngags so zhes grag go /
de yan chad ni ngag gi rnam par rig byed med na sgra'i skye mched ji ltar yod ce na /
phyi'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyur byas pa yod do /
anye punarāhuḥ /
dvitīyādiṣvapi dhyāneṣu vijñaptirastyanivṛtāvyākṛtā /
na kuśalā na kliṣṭā 		gzhan dag na re bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na yang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par rig byed ni yod kyi dge ba yang med la /
nyon mongs pa can yang med do /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
na hi teṣūpapannastajjātīyamadhobhūmikaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti yena tāṃ vijñaptiṃ samutthāpayet 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
de dag tu skyes ba ni sa 'og ma pa'i sems gang gis na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mngon sum du mi byed de /
nyūnatvātprahīṇatvacca /
pūrvameva tu varṇayanti /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamūrdhvaṃ brahmalokānnāsti vijñaptiḥ kāmadhātau ca nivṛktāvyākṛtā nāsti 		dman pa dang spangs zin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te snga ma kho na brjod do /
ci'i phyir tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yan chad na rnam par rig byed med la /
'dod pa'i khams na yang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa med ce na /
samutthānamasadyataḥ /
savitarkavicāreṇa hi cittena vijñaptiḥ samutthāpyate 		gang phyir kun slong med /
rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed na /
tacca dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu nāsti bhāvanāprahātavyena cotthāpyate /
darśanaprahātavyasyāntarmukhapravṛttatvāt /
tacca kāmadhātau nivṛtavyākṛtaṃ nāsti 		de yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na med do /
bsgom pas spang bar bya bas slong bar byed kyi de kha nang du bltas pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni ma yin no /
bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems de yang 'dod pa'i khams na med do /
kiṃ khalu samutthānavaśādevaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalatvaṃ veditavyam yang ni kun nas slong ba'i dbang po kho na las chos rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid du rig par bya 'am zhe na /
netyāha /
kiṃ tarhi /
caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvataḥ saṃprayogataḥ samutthānataśca /
tatra tāvat 		smas pa [*smras?] /
ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
rnam pa bzhis te /
don dam pa dang ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas slong bas so /
de la re zhig /
paramārthaśubho mokṣaḥ /
nirvāṇaṃ hi sarvaduḥkhavyupaśamaḥ /
tataḥ paramakṣematvāt paramārthena kuśalamārogyavat 		thar pa dam pa'i don du dge /
mya ngan las 'das pa ni sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba yin te de bas na mchog tu bde ba'i phyir don dam par dge ba ste nad med pa bzhin no /
svato mūlahyar patrapāḥ /
trīṇi kuśalamūlāni /
hriścāpatrapyaṃ ca svabhāevna kuśalāni anyasaṃprayogasamutthanānapekṣatvāt 		rtsa ba ngo tsha khrel yod bdag nyid kyis /
dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang po tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa na gzhan mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas slong ba la mi ltos pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyis dge ba yin te 'phrod pa'i sman bzhin no /
pathyauṣadhavat /
saṃprayogeṇa tadyuktāḥ /
taireva kuśalamūlahyar patrāpyaiḥ saṃprayuktā dharmāḥ saṃprayogeṇa kuśalāstairasaṃprayuktānāṃ kuśalatvābhāvādauṣadhamiśrapānīyavat 		de dag dang ldan mtshungs ldan gyis /
dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa de dag nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams ni mtshungs par ldan pas dge ba dag yin te /
de dag dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa rnams la dge ba nyid med pa'i phyir sman dang sbyar ba'i btung ba bzhin no /
samutthā nāt kriyādayaḥ /
kāyavāvakkarmaṇi cittaviprayuktāśca saṃskārajātyādayaḥ prāptinirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattayastaireva kuśalamūlādisaṃprayuktai dharmaḥ samupasthāpitāḥ samutthānena kuśalāḥ /
auṣadhapānīyasaṃbhūtadhātrīkṣīravat 		bya ba la sogs kun slong bas /
dge ba'i rtsa ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos de dag kho nas kun nas slong ba'i lus dang ngag gi las dang skye ba la sogs pa dang thob pa dang 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni kun nas slong ba'i dge ba yin te sman dang sbyar ba'i btung ba las 'byung ba'i 'o ma bzhin no /
prāptīnāṃ tu visabhāgacittasamutthāpitānāṃ kathaṃ kuśalatvamiti vaktavyam /
tadyathā vicikitsayā kuśalamūlapratisaṃdhānaṃ dhātupratyāgamaparihāṇibhyāṃ ca /
yathā ca kuśalamuktaṃ tato /
viparyayeṇākuśalaṃ /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
saṃsāraḥ paramārthenākuśalaḥ /
sarvaduḥkhapravṛttyātmakatvena paramākṣematvāt 		bskal pa mi mnyam pa'i sems kyi kun nas slong ba'i thob pa rnams ji ltar dge ba nyid yin pa ni brjod dgos so /
dge ba ji skad du bshad pa de las /
bzlog pa ni mi dge /
ji ltar byas pas she na /
'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'jug pa'i bdag nyid kyis mchog tu mi bde ba'i phyir don dam par mi dge ba yin no /
akuśalamūlāhrīkyānapatrāpyāṇi svabhāvataḥ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa rnams ni ngo bo nyid kyis so /
tatsaṃprayuktā dharmāḥ saṃprayogataḥ /
tatsamutthāpitāḥ kāyavākkarmajātyādiprāptayaḥ samutthānataḥ vyādhyapathyauṣadhādibhirūpameyāḥ 		de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams ni mtshungs par ldan pas so /
de dag gis kun nas slong ba'i lus dang ngag gi las dang skye ba la sogs pa dang thob pa rnams ni kun nas slong ba las te nang dang mi 'phrod pa'i sman la sogs pas dper bya'o /
evaṃ tarhi na kiñcitsāsravamavyākṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati kuśalaṃ vā de lta na 'o na ni 'khor ba'i khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa cung zad kyang lung du ma bstan pa'am /
saṃsārābhyantaratvāt /
paramārthata evamuktaṃ vipākaṃ tu prati yatsāsravaṃ na vyākriyate tadavyākṛtamityucyate 		dge bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
don dam par de skad du bshad kyi zag pa dang bcas pa gang zhig rnam par smin pa'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya la /
iṣṭavipākaṃ ca kukśalamityucyate /
yadi tu paramārthenāvyākṛtaṃ mṛgyate tat 		rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba can ni dge ba zhes bya'o /
gal te don dam par lung du ma bstan pa btsal na ni de la /
paramāvyākṛte dhruve don dam par lung ma bstan pa dag /
dve asaṃskṛte niṣparyāyeṇānivṛtāvyākṛte /
ākāśamapratisaṃkhyānirodhaśca /
idaṃ vicāryate 		'dus ma byas /
gnyis po nam mkha' dang so sor ma brtags pas 'gog pa ni rnam grangs med par lung du ma bstan pa dag yin no /
da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /
yadi samutthānavaśātkuśalākuśalatvaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇaḥ kiṃ na mahābhūtānām gal te kun nas slong ba'i dbang gis lus dang ngag gi las dag dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid yin na /
ci ste 'byung ba chen po rnams ma yin zhe na /
karmaṇi hi kartturabhiprāyo na mahābhūteṣu byed pa po ni las la sems pa yin gyi 'byung ba rnams la ni ma yin no /
samāhitasyāvijñaptau nāstyabhiprāyo na cāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ tasyāḥ samutthāpakaṃ visabhāgabhūmikatvāditi kathaṃ tasyāḥ kuśalatvam mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la ni bsam pa med do /
mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i phyir de kun nas slong bar byed pa ma yin na ji ltar de dge ba nyid yin no /
divyayorapi vā cakṣuḥśrotrayoḥ kukśalatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
karttavyo 'tra yatnaḥ /
yaduktaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ cittaṃ vijñapterasamutthāpakamiti /
kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktaṃ tato 'pi mithyādṛṣṭermithyāsaṃkalpaḥ prabhavati mithyā vāgmithyākarmānta mityevamādi 		yang na lha'i mig dang rna ba dag kyang dge ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur bas 'di la 'bad par bya'o /
mthong nas spang bar bya ba'i sems ni rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pa ma yin no zhes gang bshad pa /
'o na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis log par lta ba de las ni log par rtog pa dang log pa'i ngag dang log pa'i las kyi mtha' 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs she na /
aviruddhametat /
samutthānaṃ dvidhā hetutatkṣaṇotthānasaṃjñitam 		'di ni 'gal ba med de /
'di ltar /
kun slong rnam gnyis rgyu dang ni /
de yi dus kyis slong zhes bya /
dvividhaṃ samutthānaṃ hetusamutthānaṃ tatkṣaṇasamutthānaṃ ca /
tatraiva kṣaṇe tadbhāvāt 		kun nas slong ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
rgyu'i kun nas slong ba dang de'i dus kyis kun nas slong ba ste /
de'i dus kho na na de yod pa'i phyir ro /
pravartakaṃ tayorādyaṃ dvitīyamanuvartakam /
hetusamutthānaṃ pravartakamākṣepakatvāt 		gnyis las dang po rab 'jug byed /
gnyis pa rjes su 'jug byed yin /
rgyu'i kun nas slong ba ni 'phen par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rab tu 'jug par byed pa yin no /
tatkṣaṇasamutthānamanuvartakaṃ kriyākālānuvartanāt /
kimidānīṃ tasya tasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ sāmarthyam 		de'i dus kyis kun nas slong ba ni bya ba'i dus su /
mthun par 'jug pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug par byed pa yin no /
da ni bya ba de la de'i nus pa ci zhig yod /
tena hi vinā 'sau mṛtasyeva na syādā kṣiptā 'pi satī /
acittakasya tarhi saṃvarotpattau kathaṃ bhavati 		'phangs su zin kyang de med na shi ba bzhin du de yod par mi 'gyur ro /
'o na sems med pa'i sdom pa skye ba la ji ltar yod /
sphuṭatarā tarhi sacittakasya bhavatītyetatsāmarthyam /
tatra ca 		'o na ni sems dang bcas pa la ches gsal ba yin pas nus pa ni de yin no /
de la yang /
pravartakaṃ dṛṣṭiheyaṃ vijñānam mthong bas spang bya'i rnam shes ni /
darśanaprahātavyaṃ cittaṃ vijñapteḥ pravartakam /
tatsamutthāpakayorvitarkavicārayornidānabhūtatvāt /
na tvanuvartakam /
bahirmukhacittasya kriyākāle tadabhāvāt /
tatsamutthāpitaṃ ca rūpaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ syāt 		rab tu 'jug byed yin /
mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems ni de kun nas slong bar byed pa rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag gi gzhir gyur pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed rab tu 'jug par byed pa yin gyi /
sems kha phyir bltas pa'i bya ba'i dus na de med pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug par byed pa ni ma yin no /
des kun nas slong ba'i gzugs kyang mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin par 'gyur ro /
kiṃ syāt cir 'gyur /
abhidharmobādhitaḥ syāt chos mngon pa la gnod par 'gyur ro /
vidyā 'vidyābhyāṃ cāvirodhānnāsti rūpaṃ darśanaprahātavyam gzugs ni rig pa dang ma rig pa dag dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin no /
sādhya eṣa pakṣaḥ /
bhūtānyapi tarhi darśanaprahātavyāni syuḥ /
samānacittotthāpitatvāt 		phyogs 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no /
'o na ni sems dang mtshungs pas bslang ba'i phyir 'byung ba rnams kyang mthong bas spang bar bya bar 'gyur ro /
naivaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā na kuśalākuśalāni bhavanti de ltar ni mi 'gyur te /
ji ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba dag tu mi 'gyur ba bzhin no /
athavā punarbhavantu /
naivaṃ śakyam 		yang na 'gyur du zad mod /
de skad brjod pa ni mi nus te /
nahi tāni darśanaprahātavyāni yujyante nāpyaprahātavyāni /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
akliṣṭasya dharmasya vidyā 'vidyābhyāmavirodhāt /
ato hetusamutthānamadhikṛtya sūtre paṭhanānnāsti virodhaḥ 		nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i chos ni rig pa dang ma rig pa dag dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba yang ma yin la spang bar bya ba ma yin pa yang ma yin no /
de lta bas na mdo las rgyu'i kun nas slong ba'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo /
ubhayaṃ punaḥ /
mānasaṃ bhāvanāheyaṃ 		yid ni /
bsgom pas spang bya gnyi ga yin /
bhāvanāheyaṃ punarmanovijñānamubhayaṃ bhavati yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni gnyi ga yin te /
pravarttakaṃ cānuvartakaṃ ca /
pañcakaṃ tvanuvartakam 		rab tu 'jug par byed pa yang yin la rjes su 'jug par byed pa yang yin no /
lnga ni rjes su 'jug byed yin /
pañca vijñānakāyā anuvartakā eva /
tadidaṃ catuṣkoṭikaṃ bhavati /
pravartakameva darśanaprahātavyaṃ cittam 		rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga ni rjes su 'jug par byed pa kho na yin no /
de lta bas na 'di ni mu bzhir 'gyur te /
mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa kho na yin no /
anuvartakā eva pañca vijñānakāyāḥ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga ni rjes su 'jug par byed pa kho na yin no /
ubhayaṃ bhāvanāheyaṃ manovijñānam yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni gnyi ga yin no /
nobhayamanāsravam /
kiṃ khalu yathā pravartakaṃ tathaivānuvartakaṃ bhavati /
nāyamekāntam 		zag pa med pa ni gnyi ga ma yin no /
yang ci rab tu 'jug par byed pa ji lta bar rjes su 'jug par byed pa yang de dang 'dra 'am zhe na /
'di ni nges pa med de /
pravartake śubhādau hi syāttridhā 'pyanuvartakam rab tu 'jug byed dge sogs las /
rjes 'jug byed kyang rnam gsum 'gyur; /
kuśale pravartake kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtamanuvartakaṃ syāt /
evamakuśale cāvyākṛte ca 		rab tu 'jug par byed pa dge ba las kyang rjes su 'jug par byed pa dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan par 'gyur la /
mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la yang de dang 'dra'o /
tulyaṃ muneḥ thub pa'i 'dra ba'am /
buddhasya tu bhagavatastulyaṃ pravartakenānuvartakam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa dang rjes su 'jug par byed pa 'dra ste /
kuśale kuśalamavyākṛte cāvyākṛtam /
śubhaṃ yāvat 		dge ba las kyang dge ba yin la lung du ma bstan pa las kyang lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
de dge ba /
kuśalaṃ vā bhavatyanuvartakamavyākṛte 'pi pravartake /
na tu kadācit kuślaṃ pravartakamanuvartakaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ bhavati 		yang na rab tu 'jug par byed pa lung du ma bstan pa las kyang rjes su 'jug par byed pa dge bar 'gyur gyi /
rab tu 'jug par byed pa dge ba las rjes su 'jug par byed pa lung du ma bstan par ni rnam yang mi 'gyur te /
āmnāyamānā hi buddhānāṃ deśaneti /
nāsti buddhānāmavyākṛtaṃ cittamiti nikāyāntarīyāḥ /
kuśalaikatānā hi buddhānāṃ saṃtatayo nityaṃ samāhitatvāt /
uktaṃ hi sūtre 		sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs ni dman par 'gyur ba ma yin no /
sde pa gzhan dag na re sangs rgyas rnams la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems med de /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyud ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir dge bar rgyud gcig pa ni yin no /
mdo las kyang /
caran samāhito nāgastiṣṭhannāgaḥ samāhitaḥ /
svapan samāhito nāgo niṣaṇṇo 'pi samāhita iti 		glang chen gshegs na'ang mnyam par gzhag /
glang chen bzhengs na'ang mnyam par gzhag /
glang chen mnal na'ang mnyam par gzhag /
bzhugs na'ang mnyam par gzhag pa yin /
zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro /
anicchayā 'sya cittasyāvisaraṇādevamuktaṃ na tu na santyavyākṛtāni vipākajairyā pathikanirmāṇacittāni buddhānāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'di'i thugs mi bzhed bzhin du mi 'gro ba'i phyir de skad gsungs kyi sangs rgyas rnams la lung du ma bstan pa rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang spyod lam pa dang sprul pa'i sems kyis mi mnga' ba ni ma yin no zhes zer ro /
mānasaṃ bhāvanāheyaṃ pravartakaṃ cānuvartakaṃ cetyuktam /
tatkuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ veditavyam 		bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i yid ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa yang yin la rjes su 'jug par byed ba yang yin no zhes bshad pa de thams cad ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o /
nobhayaṃ tu vipāpkajam rnam smin las skyes gnyi ga min /
vipākajaṃ tu cittaṃ naiva pravartakaṃ nānuvartakaṃ nirabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i sems ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug ba nyid kyi phyir rab tu 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin la rjes su 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin no /
kimidānīṃ yathā pravartakaṃ tathā vijñaptirāhosvidyathā 'nuvartakam /
kiṃ cātaḥ 		da ni ci rab tu 'jug par byed pa ji lta bar rnam par rig byed kyang de dang 'dra 'am /
'on te rjes su 'jug par byed pa ji lta ba bzhin du yin /
yathā pravartakaṃ cet /
ihāpi nivṛtāvyākṛtā vijñaptiḥ prāpnoti /
satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭipravartitatvāt 		de las cir 'gyur /
gal te rab tu 'jug par byed pa ji lta ba bzhin yin no zhe na ni 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta bas rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir 'di ni yang bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par rig byed yod par 'gyur ro /
na vā sarvaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ pravartakamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam yang na mthong bas spang bar bya ba thams cad ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa ma yin no zhes khyad par du brjod dgos so /
yathānuvartakaṃ cet akukśalāvyākṛtacittasya prātimokṣavijñaptiḥ kuśalā na prāpnoti gal te rjes su 'jug par byed pa ji lta ba bzhin no zhe na ni sems mi dge ba lung du ma bstan pa can gyi so sor thar ba'i rnam par rig byed dge bar mi 'gyur ro /
yathā pravartakaṃ tathā vijñaptirnatu yathā darśanaprahātavyam /
bhāvanā heyāntaritatvāt /
yadi nānuvartakavaśādvijñapteḥ kuśalāditvaṃ na tarhīdaṃ vaktavyam 		rab tu 'jug par byed pa ji lta bar rnam par rig byed kyang de dang 'dra mod kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya bas bar du gcod pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba ji lta ba bzhin ni ma yin no /
gal te rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i dbang gis dge ba la sogs pa nyid ma yin na /
hetusamutthānaṃ saṃdhāyoktaṃ sūtre na tatkṣaṇasamutthānam /
ato nāstīha nivṛtāvyākṛtā vijñaptiriti /
evaṃ vaktavyam /
anyavyavahitaṃ hetusamutthānaṃ saṃdhāyoktamiti /
avasitaḥ prasaṅgaḥ 		'o na ni mdo las rgyu'i kun nas slong ba las dgongs te gsungs kyi de'i dus kyi kun nas slong ba las ni ma yin pas de'i phyir 'di ni bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par rig byed med do zhes bya ba 'di brjod par mi bya'i 'di skad du gzhan gyis chod pa'i rgyu'i kun nas slong ba las dgongs nas gsungs so zhes brjod par bya'o /
zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs so /
sngar bshad pa'i /
rnam rig min /
de ni rnam gsum zhes bya /
sā tu pūrvoktā /
avijñaptistridhā jñeyā saṃvarāsaṃvaretarā /
saṃvaraścāsaṃvaraśca /
tābhyāṃ cetaro naivasaṃvaro nāsaṃvaraḥ 		sdom dang sdom pa min dang gzhan /
sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dang de dag las gzhan pa sdom pa yang ma yin /
sdom pa ma yin pa yang ma yin pa ste /
dauḥśīlyaprasarasya saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃrodhaḥ saṃvaraḥ /
tatra punaḥ 		'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgyu sdom zhing 'gogs pas na sdom pa'o /
de la /
saṃvaraḥ prātimokṣākhyo dhyānajo 'nāsravastathā /
trividhaḥ saṃvaraḥ /
prātimokṣasaṃvara ihatyānāṃ kāmāvacaraṃ śīlam 		sdom pa so sor thar zhes bya /
de bzhin zag med bsam gtan skyes /
sdom pa rnam pa gsum ste /
so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni 'di pa rnams kyi 'dod pa na spyod pa'i tshul khrims so /
dhyānasaṃvaro rūpāvacaraṃ śīlam /
anāsravasaṃvaro 'nāsravaṃ śīlam /
tatra punaḥ 		bsam gtan gyi sdom pa ni gzugs na spyod pa rnams kyi tshul khrims yin no /
zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ni zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yin no /
de la /
aṣṭadhā prātimokṣākhyaḥ /
bhikṣusaṃvaro bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇāsaṃvara śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerīsaṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvara upāsikāsaṃvara upavāsasaṃvaraśca /
eṣo 'ṣṭavidhasaṃvaraḥ prātimokṣasaṃvara ityākhyāyate 		so sor thar zhes bya rnam brgyad /
dge slong gi sdom pa dang dge slong ma'i sdom pa dang dge tshul gyi sdom pa dang dge tshul ma'i sdom pa dang dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang dge bsnyen ma'i sdom pa dang bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa ste /
sdom pa rnam pa de brgyad ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa zhes bya ste /
nāmata eṣo 'ṣṭavidhaḥ ming du ni rnam pa de brgyad yin no /
dravyatastu caturvidhaḥ /
bhikṣusaṃvaraḥ śramaṇerasaṃvara upāsakasaṃvara upavāsasaṃvaraśca 		rdzas su rnam pa bzhi yin no /
dge slong gi sdom pa dang dge tshul gyi sdom pa dang dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa'o /
ityeṣa caturvidhaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarastu dravyataḥ de ltar nas sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni mtshan nyid so sor nges pa'i phyir rdzas nyid du rnam pa de bzhin yin te /
pratiniyatalakṣaṇatvāt /
bhikṣusaṃvarādbhikṣuṇīsaṃvaro nānyaḥ śrāmaṇerasaṃvarācca śikṣamāṇāśrāmaṇerīsaṃvarau /
upāsakasaṃvarādupāsikāsaṃvaro nānyaḥ 		dge slong gi sdom pa las ni dge slong ma'i sdom pa gzhan ma yin no /
dge tshul gyi sdom pa las kyang dge slong ma dang dge tshul ma'i sdom pa gzhan ma yin no /
dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa las kyang dge bsnyen ma'i sdom pa gzhan ma yin no /
kathaṃ jñāyate /
liṅgato nāmasaṃcārāt /
liṅgamiti vyañjanasyākhyā yena strīpuruṣau liṅgyete 		ji ltar shes she na; mtshan las ming ni 'pho ba'i phyir /
mtshan zhes bya ba ni rtags zhes bya ba ste /
gang gis skyes pa dang bud med dag tu mtshon par byed pa'o /
liṅgato hi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyādīnāṃ nāmasaṃcāro bhavati mtshan las ni dge slong dang dge slong ma la sogs pa'i ming 'pho par 'gyur te /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
parivṛtte hi vyañjane bhikṣurbhikṣuṇītyucyate bhikṣuṇī ca punarbhikṣuḥ /
śrāmaṇerītyucyate śrāmaṇerī ca punaḥ śikṣamāṇā ca śrāmaṇeraḥ /
upāsaka upāsiketyucyate upāsikā ca punarūpāsaka iti 		ji ltar byas pas she na /
mtshan gyur na dge slong ni dge slong ma zhes bya /
dge slong ma yang dge slong zhes bya'o /
dge tshul ni dge tshul ma zhes bya la dge tshul ma dang dge slong ma yang dge tshul zhes bya'o /
dge bsnyen ni dge bsnyen ma zhes bya la dge bsnyen ma yang dge bsnyen zhes bya ste /
na ca vyañjanaparivṛttau pūrvasaṃvaratyāge kāraṇamasti nāpyapūrvasaṃvarapratilambhe /
tasmādabhinna eṣāṃ caturṇā saṃvarāṇāṃ tribhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
ya upāsakasaṃvarācchrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte tasmācca punarbhikṣusaṃvaraṃ kiṃ te saṃvarā virativṛddhiyogādanyo 'nya ucyante pañcadaśa viṃśativat dīnāraśateravacca āhosvit pṛthageva te sakalā jāyante 		mtshan gyur pa las sngon gyi sdom pa gtong ba'i rgyu yang yod pa ma yin la sngon med pa'i sdom pa 'thob pa'i rgyu yang yod pa ma yin no /
de lta bas na sdom pa bzhi po de dag ni gsum po las rang bzhin tha mi dad do /
gang gi dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa las dge tshul gyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs la /
de las yang dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par blangs na /
ci spong ba'i 'phel ba dang ldan pa'i phyir sdom pa de dag lnga dang bcu dang nyi shu zhes bya ba lta bu dang dong tse gcig dang gnyis zhes bya ba bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan zhes bya ba'am /
'on te de dag thams cad tha dad pa nyid gcig tu skye zhe na /
āha /
pṛthak 		smras pa /
tha dad /
avyāmiśrā eva te pṛthaglakṣaṇā upajāyante /
triṣu saṃvareṣu tisraḥ prāṇātipātaviratayo yāvanmadyapānaviratayaḥ 		de dag ni ma 'dres pa nyid de /
sdom pa gsum dag la srog gcod pa spong ba gsum nas myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spong ba gsum gyi bar du mtshan nyid tha dad par skye ste /
evaṃ śeṣāḥ /
ko nu tāsāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
nidānaviśeṣādviśeṣaḥ 		lhag ma rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o /
de dag la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
gzhi'i khyad par las khyad par yod do /
kathaṃ kṛtvā ji ltar byas pas she na /
yathā yathā hi vahutarāṇi śikṣāpadāni samāditsate tathā tathā bahutarebhyo maddapramādapadebhyo nivartamāno bahutarebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādīnāṃ nidānebhyo nivartate viratīnāṃ ca nidāneṣu pravartata iti nidānaviśeṣādviratīnāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
evaṃ cāsati bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ pratyācakṣāṇastrīnapi saṃvarānvijahyāddayorapi tatrāntarbhāvāt 		ji lta ji ltar bslab pa'i gzhi chos mang po dag yang dag par len par 'dod pa de lta de ltar rgyags pa dang bag med pa'i gnas ches mang po dag las ldog pa na srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i gzhi ches mang po dag las ldog par 'gyur zhing spong ba'i gzhi rnams la yang 'jug par 'gyur bas gzhi'i khyad par las spong ba rnams khyad par yod do /
de lta ma yin na gnyi ga yang der 'dus pa'i phyir dge slong gi sdom pa btang bas sdom pa gsum char yang btang bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ni mi 'dod do /
na caitadiṣṭam /
tasmāt pṛthageva te saṃvarāḥ 		de lta bas na sdom pa de dag ni tha dad pa kho na'o /
te cāvirodhinaḥ de dag 'gal ba med /
te ca trayo 'pi saha vartante /
nottarasaṃvarasamādānāt purvakasya tyāgaḥ 		de gsum char yang lhan cig par 'gyur gyi /
sdom pa phyi ma yang dag par blangs pas snga ma gtong ba ni ma yin te /
mā bhūt bhikṣusaṃvaraparityāgādanupāsaka eveti /
kathaṃ cāyamupāsako bhavati kathamupavāsastho yāvat bhikṣuḥ 		de lta ma yin na dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su btang bas dge bsnyen yang ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur du 'ong ngo /
'di ji ltar na dge bsnyen yin /
ji ltar na bsnyen gnas pa nas dge slong gi bar du yin zhe na /
pañcāṣṭadaśasarvebhyo varjyebhyo viratigrahāt spang bya lnga brgyad bcu dang ni /
thams cad spong ba mnos pa las /
upāsakopavāsasthaśramaṇoddeśabhikṣutā dge bsnyen dang ni bsnyen gnas dang /
dge tshul ched dang dge slong nyid /
yathāsaṃkhyamanudeśo veditavyaḥ grangs bzhin du bstan par rig par bya ste /
pañccabhyo varjanīyebhyo dharmebhyo viratisamādānādupāsakasaṃvarastho bhavati /
prāṇātipātādadattādānātkāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādātsurāmaireyamadyapānācca 		spang bar bya ba lnga po srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g yem pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la gnas pa yin no /
aṣṭābhyo viratisamādānādupavāsasthaḥ /
prāṇātipātādattādānābrahmacaryamṛṣāvādamadyapānebhyo gandhamālyavilepananṛtyagītavāditrāduccaśayanamahāśayanādakālabhojanācca /
daśabhyo viratisamādānācchrāmaṇero bhavati /
ebhya eva jātarūparajatapratigrahācca /
nṛtyagitavāditragandhamālyavilepanaṃ cātra dvayīkṛtya daśa bhavanti /
sarvebhya eva varjanīyebhyaḥ kāyavākkarmabhyaḥ viratisamādānāt bhikṣurityucyate /
sa eṣa prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ /
śīlaṃ sucaritaṃ karma saṃvaraścocyate 		brgyad po srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang mi tshangs par spyod pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba dag dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang gar dang glu dang rol mo dang khri stan mthon po dang khri stan chen po dang dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni bsnyen gnas la gnas pa yin no /
de dag nyid dang gser dang dngul 'dzin pa dang bcu spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni dge tshul yin te /
'di gar dang glu dang rol mo dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa gnyis su byas nas bcur 'gyur ro /
lus dang ngag gi las spang bar bya ba thams cad spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni dge slong yin no /
so sor thar pa'i sdom pa de ni /
tshul khrims dang ni legs spyad dang /
las dang sdom pa zhes bya'o /
viṣamakarmaṇāṃ viratisamādānācchīlam las mi mnyam pa can rnams yang dag par 'jog par byed pas na tshul khrims se /
śītalatvāditi niruktiḥ /
sukhaśīlasamādānaṃ kāyo na paridahyata iti 		nges pa'i tshig tu na bsil ba'i phyir te /
tshigs su bcad pa las /
lus las yongs su gdung med pas /
tshul khrims yang dag blangs pa bde /
gāthāvacanāt /
vidvatpraśastatvātsucaritam /
kriyāsvabhāvatvātkarma 		zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'i phyir legs par spyad pa'o /
bya ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir las so /
nanu cāvijñaptirakriyetyucyate /
sā kathaṃ kriyā bhāti 		rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes mi bya'am de ji ltar na bya ba yin zhe na /
na kurvanti tayā samāttayā lajjinaḥ pāpamityakriyetyucyate ngo tsha shes pa rnams yang dag par blangs pa des sdig pa mi byed pas na bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya la /
sāpi tu vijñapticittābhyāṃ kriyata iti kriyā bhavati /
kriyāhetutvāt kriyāphalatvāccetyapare 		de yang rnam par rig byed dang sems dag gis byed pas na bya ba yin no /
gzhan dag na re bya ba'i rgyu yin pa dang bya ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
saṃvara iti kāyavācoḥ saṃvaraṇāt /
evaṃ tāvadaviśeṣeṇa prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ saṃśabdyate /
punaḥ 		lus dang ngag sdom pa'i phyir so sor thar pa'i sdom pa zhes kyang bya'o /
de ltar re zhig bye brag med par so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang dag par bstan to /
yang /
ādye vijñaptyavijñaptī prātimokṣakiyāpathaḥ /
saṃvarasamādānasya prathame vijñaptyavijñaptī prātimokṣa ityucyate /
pāpasya tena prātimokṣaṇādutsarjanādityarthaḥ 		dang po'i rnam rig rnam rig min /
so sor thar dang bya ba'i lam /
sdom pa yang dag par blang pa'i rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang po dag ni so sor thar pa zhes bya ste /
des sdig pa las so sor thar pa'i phyir te /
svārthe vṛddhividhānādvaikṛtavaiśasavat /
prātimokṣasaṃvara ityapi kāyavāksaṃvaraṇāt karmapatha ityucyate 		spang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
so sor thar pa'i sdom pa zhes kyang bya ste /
lus dang ngag sdom pa'i phyir ro /
maulasaṃgṛhītatvāt las kyi lam zhes kyang bya'o /
dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣui prātimokṣasaṃvara eva na prātimokṣaḥ skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa la ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa kho na yin gyi so sor thar pa ni ma yin no /
pṛṣṭhaṃ ca na maulaḥ karmapathaḥ mjug yin gyi las kyi lam dngos ni ma yin no /
athaiṣāṃ saṃvarāṇāṃ kena kaḥ samanvāgataḥ yang sdom pa 'di rnams las gang zhig gang dang ldan zhe na /
prātimokṣānvitā aṣṭau /
prātimokṣasaṃvareṇāṣṭau nikāyāḥ samanvāgatā bhikṣurbhikṣuṇī yāvadupavāsastho 'ṣṭamaḥ 		so sor thar dang ldan pa brgyad /
so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang ni ris brgyad po dge slong dang dge slong ma dang brgyad pa bsnyen gnas pa'i bar dang ldan no /
kiṃ khalu bāhyakānāṃ samādānaśīlaṃ nāsti /
asti natu prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ 		yang ci phyi rol pa rnams la yang dag par blangs pa'i tshul khrims med dam zhe na /
yod mod kyi so sor thar ba'i sdom pa ni ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
nahi tadatyantaṃ pāpasya pratimokṣaṇāya saṃvartate /
bhavasaṃniśritatvāt /
dhyānajena tadanvitaḥ 		de ni srid pa la brten pa'i phyir gtan du sdig pa las so sor thar par byed pa ma yin no /
bsam gtan skyes dang de ldan pa /
dhyānāddhyāne vā jāto dhyānajaḥ bsam gtan las bsam gtan gyis bskyed pas na bsam gtan skyes te /
yo dhyānena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ dhyānasaṃvareṇa /
sāmantakamapyatra dhyānaṃ kṛtvocyate /
yathā grāmasāmantakamapi grāma ityucyate /
astyasmin grāme śāleyaṃ kṣetramasti vraiheyamiti /
anāsraveṇāryasattvāḥ 		gang bsam gtan dang ldan pa de gdon mi za bar bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang ldan no /
'dir ni nyer bsdogs kyang bsam gtan du brjod nas bstan te /
dper na grong 'di na s'a lu'i zhing yod do /
'bru'i zhing yod do zhes grong gi nye 'khor la yang grong zhes bya ba bzhin no /
zag med 'phags pa'i sems can dang /
āryapudgalā anāsraveṇa saṃvareṇa samanvāgatāḥ zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dang /
'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ldan te /
te punaḥ śaikṣāśaikṣāḥ de dag kyang slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams so /
yaduktaṃ sahabhūhetāvucyamāne dvau saṃvarau cittānuvartināviti /
katamo tau 		lhan cig 'byung ba'i rkyen bshad par sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sdom pa gnyis zhes gang bshad pa de gnyis gang yin zhe na gsum po 'di dag nyid las /
eṣāmeva trayāṇām /
antyau cittānuvartinau /
dhyānasaṃvaro 'nāsravasaṃvaraśca 		tha ma gnyis ni sems rjes 'brang /
bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'o /
na prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
anyacittācittakasyāpyanuvṛtteḥ 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
sems gzhan dang ldan pa dang sems med pa la yang rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
punastāveva dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau prahāṇasaṃvarākhyāṃ labhete bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa de dag nyid spong ba'i sdom pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo /
kasyāmavasthāyāmityāha gang gi gnas skabs su zhe na /
smras pa /
anāgamye prahāṇākhyau tāvānantaryamārgajau bar chad med lam skyes de gnyis /
mi lcogs med la spong zhes bya /
anāgamye tau dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau navasvānantaryamārgeṣu prahāṇasaṃvarāvityucyete /
tābhyāṃ dauḥśīlyasya tatsamutthāpakānāṃ ca kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt /
ata eva syāddhyānasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate 		mi lcogs pa med pa la bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa de gnyis bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dag tu spong ba'i sdom pa zhes bya ste /
de gnyis kyis 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi sdom pa yin la /
spong ba'i sdom pa ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhir bya ste /
prathamā koṭiranāgamyānantaryamārgavarjyaḥ sāsravo dhyānasaṃvaraḥ mu dang po ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ma gtogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan gyi sdom pa'o /
dvitīyā anāgamyānantaryamārgeṣvanāsravaḥ gnyis pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dag tu zag pa med pa'o /
tṛtīyā anāgamyānantaryamārgeṣu sāsravaḥ gsum pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dag tu zag pa dang bcas pa'o /
caturthī anāgamyānantaryamārgavarjyo 'nāsravasaṃvaraḥ /
evaṃ syādanāsravasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyam 		bzhi pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ma gtogs pa dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'o /
de bzhin du zag pa med pa'i sdom pa yin la spong ba'i sdom pa ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhir ci rigs par rig par bya'o /
yattarhi bhagavatoktaṃ 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis /
kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu vācā 'tha saṃvaraḥ lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste /
ngag gi sdom pa'ang legs pa yin /
manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ yid kyi sdom pa'ang legs pa ste /
thams cad du ni sdom pa legs /
yaccoktaṃ cakṣurindriyeṇa saṃvarasaṃvṛto viharatīti zhes gang gsungs pa dang gang yang mig gi dbang po 'di sdom pas bsdams te /
gnas so zhes gsungs pa /
etau manaindriyasaṃvarau kiṃsvabhāvau yid dang dbang po'i sdom pa 'di gnyis kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
naitāvavijñaptiśīlasvabhāvau /
kiṃ tarhi 		'di gnyis rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no /
'o na ci zhe na /
saṃprajñānasmṛtī dve tu manaindriyasaṃvarau /
pratyekaṃ dvisvabhāvajñapanārthaṃ punardvigrahaṇaṃ mā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vijñāyīti manaḥsaṃvaro 'pi smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāva iti 		shes bzhin dang ni dran dag gnyis /
yid dang dbang po sdom pa yin /
grangs bzhin du shes par 'gyur du 'ong bas so sor gnyis kyi rang bzhin yin par bstan pa'i phyir yang gnyis zhes bya ba smos te /
yid kyi sdom pa yang dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin yin la /
indriyasaṃvaro 'pi /
idaṃ vicāryate /
kaḥ katamayā vijñaptyā 'vijñaptyā vā kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samanvāgata iti /
tatra 		dbang po'i sdom pa yang dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin no /
gang zhig rnam par rig byed dam /
rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang zhig dang dus ji srid cig tu ldan zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya ste /
de la /
prātimmokṣasthito nityamatyāgādvartamānayā so sor thar gnas ji srid du /
ma btang bar rtag da ltar gyi /
avijñaptyā 'nvitaḥ rnam rig mi ldan /
yaḥ prātimokṣāsaṃvarasthaḥ pudgala uktaḥ sa yāvattāmavijñaptir na tyajati tāvattayā vartamānayā nityaṃ samanvāgataḥ so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas pas bshad pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de ni ji srid du rnam par rig byed ma yin pa de mi gtong ba de srid du rtag tu da ltar gyi de dang ldan no /
skad cig ma /
pūrvāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamatītayā dang po phyin chad 'das pa dang; /
prathamāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamatītayā 'pi samanvāgataḥ skad cig ma dang po phyin chad ni 'das pa dang yang ldan te /
atyāgāditi sarvatrādhikṛtaṃ veditavyam /
yathā prātimokṣasaṃvarastha uktaḥ /
tathaivāsaṃvarastho 'pi /
asaṃvarastho 'pi yāvadasaṃvaraṃ na tyajati tāvannityamavijñaptyā vartamānayā samanvāgataḥ 		thams cad du yang ji srid du ma btang bar zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas par rig par bya'o /
so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa ji skad du bshad pa /
sdom min gnas pa'ang de dang 'dra /
sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa yang ji srid du sdom pa ma yin pa mi gtong ba de srid du rtag tu da ltar gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan no /
kṣaṇādūrdhvamatītayā 'pi /
dhyānasaṃvaravān sadā 		skad cig ma gcig phyin chad ni 'das pa dang yang ldan no /
bsam gtan sdom dang ldan pa ni /
atītājātayā /
dhyānasaṃvarasya lābhī nityamatītānāgatābhyāmavijñaptibhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ ātyāgāt /
prathame hi kṣaṇe sa janmāntaratyaktaṃ dhyānasaṃvaramatītaṃ labhate /
āryastu prathame nābhyatītayā 		rtag tu 'das dang ma 'ongs dang /
