trīṇi karmāṇi 		las bstan pa'i dbang du byas pa yin pas 'di man chad ni mdo las bstan pa'i las rnams bshad par brtsam mo /
las ni gsum ste /
kuśalaṃ karmākuśalamavyākṛtaṃ kameti /
tatra 		las dge ba dang las mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa zhes 'byung ba de la /
kṣemākṣemetaratkarma kuśalākuśaletarat /
idaṃ kuśalādīnāṃ lakṣaṇam 		las bde mi bde dang gzhan ni /
dge dang mi dge ni gzhan yin /
'di ni dge ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
kṣemaṃ karma kuśalaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ nirvāṇaprāpakaṃ ca duḥkhaparitrāṇāt /
tatkālamatyantaṃ ca akṣemamakuśalaṃ kṣemapratidvandvabhāvena yasyāniṣṭo vipākaḥ 		las bde ba ni dus re zhig dang gtan du sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob pa'i phyir dge ba yin te /
'bras bu yid du 'ong ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par byed pa yin no /
mi dge ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis mi dge ba yin te /
gang gis rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba'o /
tābhyāmitaratkarma naiva kṣemaṃ nākṣemaṃ yattatkuśalākuśalābhyāmitarat veditavyam de nyed [*nyid?] las gzhan pa bde ba yang ma yin mi bde ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba las gzhan pa yin par rig par bya ste /
avyākṛtamityarthaḥ /
punaḥ 		lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
yang /
puṇyāpuṇyamaviñjaṃ ca sukhavedyādi ca trayam bsod nams bsod nams min mi g yo /
bde ba myong 'gyur la sogs gsum /
trīṇī karmāṇi puṇyamapuṇyamāneñjaṃ ca /
punaḥ trīṇi 		las ni gsum ste /
bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang mi g yo ba'o /
yang gsum ste /
sukhavedanīyaṃ karma duḥkhavedanīyamaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ ca /
tatra tāvat /
kāmadhātau śubhaṃ karma puṇyamāneñjamūrdhvajam 		bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'o /
de la re zhig bsod nams 'dod khams dge ba'i las /
mi g yo gong ma las skyes pa'i /
śubhamiti vartate dge ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ karmāneñjam gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las dge ba ni mi g yo ba yin no /
nanu ca trīṇi dhyānāni señjitānyuktāni bhagavatā /
yadatra vitarkitaṃ vicāritamidamatrāryā iñjitamityāhurityevamādi 		bcom ldan 'das kyis /
'di la rnam par brtags pa dang rnam par dpyad pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'dir 'phags pa rnams kyis g yo ba'o zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa bsam gtan gsum po g yo ba dang bcas par gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
samādau sāpakṣālatāṃ teṣāmadhikṛtyaivamuktam de dag gi ting nge 'dzin skyon dang bcas pa las dgongs nas de skad du gsungs par zad kyi /
āniñjānyapi tu tānyuktānyāniñjasūtre /
āniñjasaṃpreyagāminīṃ pratipadamārabhya 		de dag ni mi g yo ba'i mdo las mi g yo ba dang mthun par 'gro ba'i lam las brtsams te mi g yo bar gsungs so /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ señjitamevānyatrāniñjamuktam yang ci'i phyir g yo ba dang bcas pa kho na gzhan du mi g yo bar gsungs she na /
tadbhūmiṣu yataḥ karmavipākaṃ prati neñjati gang phyir sa ni de dag tu /
las rnams smin phyir mi g yo'i phyir /
kāmāvacaraṃ hi vipākaṃ prati kampate /
kathaṃ kampate 		'dod pa na spyod pa'i las ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir g yo ba yin no /
avyavasthānāt /
anyagati kamapi hyanyasyāṃ gatau vipacyate 		ji ltar g yo zhe na rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir 'gro ba gzhan yang 'gro ba gzhan du rnam par smin par 'gyur la /
anyadevanaikāyikaṃ cānya devanikāye lha'i ris gzhan pa yang lha'i ris gzhan du rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
yadeva hi pramāṇabalavarṇakarmānyabhūmika sukhabhogādi saṃvartanīyaṃ karma deveṣu vipacyate tadeva kadācidanyapratyayavaśānmanuṣyatiryakapreteṣu vipacyate /
rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ tu karmānyabhūmikamanyasyāṃ bhūmau vipaktuṃ na jātūtsahate 		bong tshod dang stobs dang kha dog dang bde ba dang longs spyod la sogs par 'gyur ba'i las lha dag gi nang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de nyid res 'ga' rkyen gzhan gyi dbang gis mi dang dud 'gro dang yi dags kyi nang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ro /
gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las ni sa gzhan las gzhan du rnam par smin par nam yang mi nus so /
tasmādvyavasthitavipākatvādāneñjamityucyate /
apuṇyaṃ tu karmākuśalamiti prasiddhaṃ loke /
yaśca lokato 'rthaḥ prasiddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena /
kṛtaḥ puṇyādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ nirdeśaḥ 		de lta bas na rnam par smin pa rnam par gnas pa'i phyir mi g yo ba zhes bya'o /
bsod nams ma yin pa'i las ni mi dge ba'o zhes 'jig rten na grags bas 'jig rten las grags pa gang yin pa de la 'bad pas ci zhig bya /
bsod nams la sogs pa'i las bstan zin to /
sukhavedanīyādīnāṃ kartavyaḥ /
sa eṣa kriyate 		bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ste de tsam mo /
bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar dge ba /
sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyāt /
kuśalaṃ karma sukhavedanīyaṃ yāvat tṛtīyāddhyānāt /
eṣā hi bhūmiḥ sukhāyā vedanāyā yaduta kāmadhātustrīṇi ca dhyānāni 		bde ba myong 'gyur /
bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar gyis las dge ba ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin pas bde ba'i tshor ba'i sa ni 'di yin te /
'di lta ste /
'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan gsum mo; /
ataḥ param de yan chad /
aduḥkhāsukhavedyaṃ tu sdug min bde min myong 'gyur ba /
śubhamiti vartate /
tṛtīyadhyānāt pareṇa kuśalaṃ karmāduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ sukhaduḥkhavedanā 'bhāvāt 		bde ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
bsam gtan gsum pa yan chad kyi las dge ba ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba yin te /
de na bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med pa'i phyir ro /
duḥkhavedyamihāśubham /
akuśalaṃ karma duḥkhavedanīyam /
ihagrahaṇaṃ kāmadhātāveva tadbhāvajñāpanārtham /
na caiṣāṃ vedanaiva phalam 		sdug bsngal myong 'gyur 'di'i mi dge /
las mi dge ba ni sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'o /
'di'i zhes smos pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kho na na de yod par bstan pa'i phyir ro /
'di dag gi 'bras bu tshor ba 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad do /
kiṃ tarhi /
sasaṃbhārā /
adho 'pi madhyamastyeke 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
tshogs dang bcas pa yin no /
'og na'ang bar ma yod do zhes /
anye punarāhuḥ tadetanmadhyamaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karmoktametaccaturthadhyānādadho 'pyasti kha cig zer te /
gzhan dag na re bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las su bshad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi pa man chad na yang yod do zhes zer ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
dhyānāntaravipākataḥ 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang gi phyir /
bsam gtan khyad par rnam smin las /
itarathā hi dhyānāntarakarmaṇo vipāko na syāddhyānāntaraṃ vā kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ de ltar ma yin na bsam gtan khyad par can gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'am /
las gang gis kyang bsam gtan khyad par can du rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te /
tatra sukhaduḥkhayorabhāvāt de na bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag med pa'i phyir ro /
dhyānāntarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendrīyaṃ vipāka ityeke /
naiva tasya vedanā vipāka ityapare 		kha cig na re bsam gtan khyad par can gyis las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i dbang po kho na yin no zhes zer ro /
gzhan dag na re de'i rnam par smin pa tshor ba med pa nyid do zhes zer ro /
tadetaducchāstram /
śāstre hi paṭhitaṃ syātkarmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta /
syātkuśalasyāvitarkasya karmaṇa iti /
apurvācaramaḥ pākastrayāṇāṃ ceṣyate yataḥ 		'di ni bstan bcos dang 'gal ba yin te /
bstan bcos las ni /
las kyi rnam par smin pa sems kyi tshor ba kho na rnam par smin par 'gyur ba yod ngam [*dam?] zhe na /
yod do /
rtog pa med pa'i las dge ba yin no zhes 'byung ngo /
snga phyi med gsum smin 'dod phyir /
yataścoktaṃ sūtre syāttrayāṇāṃ karmaṇāmapūrvācaramo vipāko vipacyeta ji ltar las gsum po rnams kyi rnam par smin pa snga phyi med par smin par 'gyur ba yod ngam [*dam?] zhe na /
yod de /
syātsukhavedanīyasya rūpaṃ duḥkhavedanīyasya cittacaittā dharmāḥ bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba ni gzugs so /
sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so /
aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasya cittaviprayuktā ityato 'pyastyaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karmādhastāt /
nahi kāmadhātoranyatrāsti yugapatkarmatrayasya vipāke saṃyogaḥ 		bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ni sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams so zhes 'byung ste /
'di'i phyir yang 'og na bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las yod de /
'dod pa'i khams las gzhan na ni las gsum gyi rnam par smin pa dang cig car du ldan pa med do /
kimidānīṃ tatkukśalamāhosvidakuśalaṃ /
durbalaṃ tu tat /
evaṃ tarhi sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyā diṣṭavipākaṃ ca kuśala mityasya virodhaḥ 		da ni ci las de dge ba yin nam /
'on te mi dge ba yin zhe na /
dge ba ste stobs chung du ni ma yin no /
de lta na ni 'o na /
bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar dge ba /
bde ba myong 'gyur zhes bya ba dang rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba ni dge ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di dang 'gal lo /
bāhulika eṣa nirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ de ni phal che ba bstan pa yin par blta bar bya'o /
kathaṃ punaravedanāsvabhāvaṃ karma sukhādivedinīyamityucyate ji ltar na tshor ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i las bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba zhes bya zhe na; bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'am /
sukhavedanāyai hitaṃ sukhavedanoyaṃ sukho 'sya vedanīya iti vā 'di'i bde ba myong bar bya ba yin pas na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin no /
myong bar 'gyur ba yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
kaśca vedanīyaḥ rnam par smin pa ste /
yo vipākaḥ /
sa hyasau vidyate sukhasya vā vedanīyaṃ yena sukhaṃ vedayate 		de myong bar byed pa yin no /
yang na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin pas bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba ste /
snānīyakapāyavat /
evaṃ duḥkhavedanīyamaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
api ca /
svabhāvasaṃprayogābhyāmālambanavipākataḥ 		gang gi bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba ni /
'khru bar byed pa'i 'dag pa'i chal bzhin no /
sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la yang de bzhin du ba lta bar bya'o /
gzhan yang /
ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs ldan dang /
saṃmukhībhāvataśceti pañcadhā vedanīyatā dmigs pa dang ni rnam smin dang /
mngon sum du ni gyur ba las /
svabhāvavedanīyatā vedanānām myong 'gyur rnam pa lnga yin no /
svabhāvenaiva vedanīyatvāt /
saṃprayogavedanīyatā sparśasya 		ngo bo nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ba ni tshor ba rnams so /
mtshungs par ldan pas myong bar 'gyur ba ni reg pa ste /
sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśaḥ iti bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa zhes bya ba'o /
ālambanavedanīyatā viṣayāṇām dmigs pa myong bar 'gyur ba ni yul rnams te /
yathoktaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rūpapratisaṃvedī bhavati notu rūparāgapratisaṃvedītyevamādi ji skad du /
mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas gzugs so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur gyi gzugs la 'dod chags so sor yang dag par myong ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
vedanayā hi tāmālambamānaḥ pratisaṃvedayate /
vipākavedanīyatā karmaṇaḥ /
dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karmeti vistaraḥ 		dmigs pa na tshor bas de dag so sor yang dag par myong bar byed do /
rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba ni las yin te /
mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o /
saṃmukhībhāvavedanīyatā /
yathoktaṃ yasmin samaye sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate dve asya vedane tasminsamaye niruddhe bhavata iti 		mngon sum du gyur pa myong bar 'gyur ba ni ji skad du /
gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa de'i tshe tshor ba gnyis 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ste /
nahi yasminsamaye sukhā vedanā vartate tasminpunaranyā vedanā 'sti sa yāṃ tāṃ vedayate /
saṃmukhīkurvastu tāṃ vedayata ityucyate /
ato vipākasya vedanīyatvāt karmāpyucyate sukhavedanīyamityevamādi /
niyatāniyataṃ tacca /
taccaitatsukhavedanīyādi trividhaṃ karma niyataṃ cāniyataṃ ca veditavyam 		gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba 'jug pa de'i tshe gang gis na de myong bar 'gyur ba gzhan ni med kyi des mngon sum du byed na ni de myong bar 'gyur zhes bya ste /
de'i phyir rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir las kyang bde ba myong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do /
de yang nges dang ma nges pa /
bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i las rnam pa gsum po de yang nges pa dang ma nges pa yin par rig par bya ste /
nāvaśyavedanīyamaniyatam gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no /
niyataṃ trividhaṃ punaḥ mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la /
dṛṣṭadharmādivedyatvāt /
dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyamupapadyavedanīyamaparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ cetyetattrividhaṃ karma niyatamityetaccaturvidhaṃ karma bhavati sahāniyatavedanīyena 		myong 'gyur phyir na nges rnam gsum /
mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ste /
las rnam pa 'di gsum ni nges pa'o /
pañcadhā karma kecana /
apare punaḥ pañcavidhaṃ karmecchanti 		de ltar na de ni myong bar 'gyur ba ma nges pa dang bcas pa ste las rnam pa bzhi yin no /
kha cig las rnam pa lnga zhes zer /
aniyatavedanīyaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā /
vipākena niyatamaniyataṃ ceti /
tatra dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ yatra janmani kṛtaṃ tatraiva vipacyate 		gzhan dag ni myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa la rnam par smin par nges pa dang ma nges pa rnam pa gnyis su phye nas las rnam pa lngar yod do /
de la mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ni skye ba gang du byas pa de nyid du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'o /
upapadyavedanīyaṃ dvitīye janmani skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba ni skye ba gnyis pa la'o; /
aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ tasmātpareṇa lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ni de phan chad du'o /
janmāntare 'pyasti dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyasya karmaṇo vipāka ārambhavaśāttannāmavyavasthānamityapare /
mā bhūdyadevamiṣṭakarma tasyālpiṣṭho vipākaḥ iti 		gzhan dag na re ches stobs dang ldan pa'i las gang yin pa de'i rnam par smin pa chung ches par 'gyur du 'ong bas mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa tshe rabs gzhan dag na yang yod mod kyi rtsom pa'i dbang gis ming de rnam par gzhag go zhes zer ro /
tadevaṃ necchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
asti hi karma saṃnikṛṣṭaphalaṃ na viprakṛṣṭaphalamasti viparyayādbāhyabījavat 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni de mi 'dod do /
'bras bu nye la 'bras bu ring ba ma yin pa'i las kyang yod /
bzlog pa yang yod de phyi'i sa bon bzhin no /
yathā tripakṣā suvarcalā tribhiḥ pakṣaiḥ phalaṃ dadhāti yavagodhūmādayaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsairiti ji ltar lcam pa la sogs pa ni zla ba phyed dang gnyis kyis 'bras bu smin la /
nas dang gro la sogs pa ni zla ba drug gis 'bras bu smin pa bzhin no /
catuṣkoṭikamityanye gzhan dag mu ni bzhi zhes zer /
dārṣṭāntikāstu catuṣkoṭikaṃ kurvanti /
asti karmāvasthāniyataṃ na vipāke niyatam /
yatkarma dṛṣṭadharmādivedanīyaṃ vipāke 'nīyatam /
asti vipāke niyataṃ nāvasthāyām 		dpes ston pa rnams ni gnas skabs nges la rnam par smin par ma nges pa yang yod de /
mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la myong bar 'gyur la rnam par smin pa ni ma nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o /
rnam par smin par nges la gnas skabs dag tu ma yin pa yang yod do /
yatkarmāniyatavedanīyaṃ vipāke niyatam /
astyubhayaniyataṃ yadṛṣṭadharmādivedanīyaṃ vipāke niyatam /
asti nobhayaniyataṃ yatkarmāniyatavedanīyaṃ vipāke aniyatam /
teṣāṃ tatkarmāṣṭavidhaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ niyatamaniyataṃ ca /
evaṃ yāvadaniyatavedanīyam /
niyatameva tu dṛṣṭadharmādivedanīyamaniyataṃ caturthamiti varṇayanti 		rnam par smin pa ni nges la myong bar 'gyur ba ni ma nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o /
gnyi ga nges pa yang yod de /
mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la myong bar 'gyur la rnam par smin par yang nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o /
gnyi ga ma nges pa yang yod de /
myong bar 'gyur ba yang ma nges la rnam par smin par yang ma nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba mu bzhir byed de de dag gi ltar na las rnam pa brgyad de /
mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang ma nges pa ni myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o /
mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa ni nges pa kho na yin no /
bzhi pa ni ma nges pa yin no zhes brjod do /
syādekasmin kṣaṇe caturvidhaṃ karmākṣipet skad cig ma gcig la las rnam pa bzhi 'phen par 'gyur ba lta yod dam zhe na /
yod de /
syāttriṣu paraṃ prayojya kāmamithyācāre svayaṃ prayuktasteṣāṃ yugapatsamāptau /
eṣāṃ ca punaścaturṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ 		pha rol po gsum la sbyar nas bdag nyid 'dod pas log par g yem pa la zhugs te /
de dag cig car mthar phyin par 'gyur na'o /
las bzhi po de dag las /
nikāyākṣepaṇaṃ tribhiḥ /
nahi dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyena karmaṇā nikāyasabhāga ākṣipyate 		gsum gyis ris ni 'phen par byed /
mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis ni ris mthun pa 'phen par mi byed do /
katamasmindhātau katividhaṃ karmākṣipyate kasyāṃ vā gatau khams gang ngam /
'gro ba gang na las kyi 'phen pa rnam pa du zhig yod ce na /
sarvatra caturākṣepaḥ thams cad na ni 'phen pa bzhi /
sarveṣu triṣu dhātuṣu sarvāsu ca gatiṣu caturṇāṃ karmaṇāmākṣepaḥ kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam khams gsum po thams cad dang 'gro ba thams cad na dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams ci rigs par las bzhi'i 'phen pa yod de /
asyotsargasyāyamapavādaḥ /
śubhasya narake tridhā /
narakeṣu kuśalasya karmaṇastrividhasyā kṣepo na dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyasya 		spyir bstan pa 'di'i dmigs kyis bstan pa ni 'di yin te /
dmyal ba na ni dge ba'i gsum /
dmyal ba dag na ni las dge ba rnam pa gsum gyis 'phen pa yod kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ni med de /
tatreṣṭavipākābhāvāt /
yadviraktaḥ sthiro bālastatra notpadyavedyakṛt /
yato bhūmeḥ vītarāgapṛthagjano bhavatyasau ca sthiro bhavatyaparihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyavedanīyaṃ karma na karoti 		de na rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro /
gang las 'dod chags bral brtan pa'i /
byis pa der skyes myong mi byed /
so so'i skye bo yin pa de yang brtan pa yin te /
yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can zhig na de ni sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba der skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las mi byed do /
kimanyatkaroti /
nānyavedyakṛdapyāryaḥ 		gzhan dag rnam pa gsum ni byed do /
'phags pa gzhan du'ang myong mi byed /
thara iti vartate /
āryapudgalastu yato vītarāgo na ca parihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyadanīyaṃ cāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ ca karma na karoti 		brtan pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
'phags pa'i gang zag yin la yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can yang yin nas gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba der skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang mi byed de /
na hyasau bhavyaḥ punarādhastanīṃ bhūmimāyātumaniyataṃ kuryāddṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ cātropapannaḥ 'di na yangs 'og mar 'ong bar rung ba ma yin no /
gang du skyes par ma nges pa dang mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ni byed do /
kāme 'gre vā 'sthiro 'pi na 'dod rtse'i mi brtan pa yang min /
parihāṇadharmāpi tvāryapudgalaḥ kāmadhātorbhavāgrā dvītarāgaḥ tayorūpapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karmābhavyaḥ karttum 'dod pa'i khams sam /
srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag tu yongs su nyams pa'i chos can yin yang skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las byed par rung ba ni ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
phalāddhi sa parihīṇo bhavati /
na cāsti laparihīṇasya kālakriyeti paścātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
de ni 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa las ni 'chi ba med do zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o /
kimantarābhave 'pyasti karmaṇa ākṣepaḥ /
astītyāha 		ci srid pa bar ma na yang las kyi 'phen pa yod dam zhe na smras pa /
yod de /
dvāviṃśatividhaṃ kāmeṣvākṣipatyantarābhavaḥ srid pa bar ma 'dod khams su /
'phen pa rnam pa nyi shu gnyis /
gāmāvacaro hyantarābhavo dvāviṃśatividhaṃ karmākṣipati 'dod pa na spyod pa'i srid pa bar ma ni las rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'phen te /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
pañca hi garbhāvasthāḥ 		ji ltar byas pas she na /
mngal gyi gnas skabs lnga ste /
kalalārvudapeśīghanapraśākhāvasthāḥ /
pañca jātāvasthāḥ /
bālakumāravamadhyavṛddhāvasthāḥ /
tatrāntarābhavaḥ kalalavedanīyaṃ karmākṣipatyaniyataṃ niyataṃ ca /
evaṃ yāvadvṛddhavedanīyamantarābhavavedanīyaṃ ca /
dṛṣṭadharma phalaṃ tacca /
taccaitadantarābhavikaṃ karma yanniyatamekādaśavidhamuktaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ tadveditavyam 		nur nur po dang mer mer po dang nar nar po dang gor gor po dang rkang lag 'gyus pa'i gnas skabs rnams so /
skyes pa'i gnas skabs rnam pa lnga ste /
byis pa dang gzhon nu dang dar la bab pa dang dar yol ba dang rgan po'i gnas skabs rnams so /
de la srid pa bar ma ni nur nur po myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang ma nges pa'i las kyang 'phen par byed pa nas /
de bzhin du rgan po myong bar 'gyur ba dang srid pa bar ma myong bar 'gyur ba'i bar du 'phen par byed do /
de ni mthong chos 'bras bu yin /
srid pa bar ma'i las nges pa rnam pa bcu gcig bshad pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba yin par rig par bya'o /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
nikāyo hyeka eva saḥ /
eka eva hyasau nikāyasabhāga ekakarmākṣipto yaścāntarābhavo yāśca tadanvayā daśāvasthāḥ /
ata evānyadantarābhavavedanīyaṃ karma noktam 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
de ni ris gcig kho na yin /
de ni ris mthun pa gcig kho na yin te /
srid pa bar ma gang yin pa dang de'i rgyu las byung ba gnas skabs bcu po gang dag yin pa de ni las gcig gis 'phangs pa yin no /
de nyid kyi phyir srid pa bar ma myong bar 'gyur ba'i las gzhan ma bshad de /
upapadyavedanīyena ca tasyākṣepāt de ni skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba kho nas 'phangs pa'i phyir ro /
kīdṛśaṃ karma niyataṃ veditavyam /
tīvrakleśaprasādena sātatyena ca yatkṛtam 		yang nges pa'i las ci 'dra bar rig par bya zhe na /
nyon mongs rab dang drag po dang /
guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat yon tan zhing dang rgyun chags su /
byas pa gang zhig yin pa dang /
yaddhi karma tīvreṇa kleśena kṛtaṃ yacca tīvreṇa prasādena yacca sātatyena gunakṣetre ca tanniyataṃ veditavyam pha ma gsod gang de nges so /
nyon mongs pa drag pos byas pa'i las gang yin pa dang rab tu dang ba drag pos byas pa gang yin pa dang rgyun du byed pa gang yin pa dang yon tan gyi zhing la byed pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa yin par rig par bya ste /
tatra guṇakṣetraṃ trīṇi ratnāni /
pudgalaviśeṣo vā kaścitphalasamāpattiviśeṣaprāptaḥ /
tatra hyantareṇāpi tīvrakleśaprasādānāṃ sātatyaṃ ca kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca karma niyataṃ saṃpadyate /
pitarau punarmātā ca pitā ca /
tayoścāpi yatra ghātikaṃ karma yathā tathā vā tanniyataṃ saṃpadyate nānyat /
atha dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma kīdṛśaṃ veditavyam 		de la yon tan gyi zhing ni dkon mchog gsum mam /
'ga' zhig gis 'bras bu dang snyoms par 'jug pa khyad par can thob pa'i gang zag khyad par can te /
de la ni nyon mongs pa dang rab tu dang ba drag po dang rgyun du byed pa med par yang dge ba'am mi dge ba'i las nges par 'gyur ro /
pha ma ni pha dang ma ste /
pha dang ma gnyis gsod pa'i las de ni ci 'dra yang rung ste /
nges par 'gyur ro /
gzhan ni ma yin no /
yang mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ci 'dra bar rig par bya zhe na /
dṛṣṭadharmaphalaṃ karma kṣetrāśayaviśeṣataḥ mthong chos 'bras bu can gyi las /
zhing dang bsam pa'i khyad par las /
dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma kṣetraviśeṣādvā bhavati /
yathā saṃghastrīvādasamudācārādvyañjanaparivṛttiḥ śrūyate 		mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las /
zhing gi khyad par las 'gyur ba ni dper na dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun la bud med do zhes thab mo brgal ba las mtshan gyur to zhes grags pa lta bu'o /
āśayaviśeṣādvā /
yathā śaṇḍhasya gavāmapuṃstvapratimokṣaṇātpumbhāvaḥ 		bsam pa'i khyad par las ni dper na nyung rum zhig gis glang zhig rlig pa dbyung ba las thar bar byas pas skyes pa nyid du gyur pa lta bu'o /
athavā /
tadbhūmyatyantavairāgyāt /
tasya vā karmaṇo yā bhūmiḥ kuśalasyākuśalasya vā tato 'tyantavairāgyāttatkarma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate 		yang na /
sa de'i 'dod chags gtan bral phyir /
yang na las dge ba'am mi dge ba'i las gang yin de las gtan du 'dod chags dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir las de mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ro /
tasyāṃ bhūmau jātasya kīdṛśaṃ karmetyāha las ji lta bu zhig ce na /
rnam smin nges pa gang yin pa'o /
vipāke niyataṃ hi yat /
yaddhi karma niyataṃ vipāke na tvavasthāyāṃ nāpyaniyataṃ tatyaiṣa niyamaḥ /
yatpunaravasthāntaraniyataṃ tasya tatraiva niyato vipākastadvato 'tyantavairāgyāsaṃbhavāt 		las gang rnam par smin par nges la /
gnas skabs su yang ma yin /
ma nges pa yang ma yin pa de ni de ltar nges kyi gnas skabs gzhan du nges pa gang yin pa de ni de dang ldan bzhin du gtan du 'dod chags dang bral mi srid pas de nyid du rnam par smin par 'gyur ro /
yaccāniyataṃ tasyāvipāka evātyantavairāgyāt /
kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kṣetraṃ yatrāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate 		ma nges pa gang yin pa de ni gtan du 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par mi smin pa nyid do /
gang du gdon mi za bar mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ba'i zhing de ji lta bu zhig ce na /
āha /
buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ pudgalāstu pañca 		smras pa sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang gang zag lnga po /
ye nirodhāraṇāmaitrīdarśanārhatphalotthitāḥ gang dag 'gog byams nyon mongs med /
mthong dang dgra bcom 'bras langs pa /
teṣu kārāpakārasya phalaṃ sadyo 'nubhūyate /
nirodhasamāpattivyutthitaḥ parāṃ cittaśāntiṃ labhate /
nirvāṇasadṛśatvātsamāpatteḥ 		de la phan gnod byas pa yis /
'bras bu 'phral du myong bar 'gyur /
'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir sems mchog tu zhi ba 'thob ste /
sa hi gatapratyāgata eva nirvāṇādbhavati de ni mya ngan las 'das par son pa las slar log pa dang 'dra ba yin no /
araṇāvyutthitasyāpramāṇasattvāraṇāhitādhyāśayānugatātyudagrāpramāṇapuṇyaparibhāvanānugatā ca saṃtatirvartate /
maitrīvyutthitasyāpramāṇasattvasukhādhyāśayānugatātyudagrāpramāṇapuṇyaparibhāvanānugatā ca saṃtativartate /
darśanamārgavyutthitasyāśeṣadarśanaprahātavyaprahāṇāt pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttinirmalā saṃtatirvartate 		nyon mongs pa med pa la langs pa'i rgyud ni sems can tshad med pa la nyon mongs pa med pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su 'brel ba dang shin tu gsal ba'i bsod nams tshad med pas yongs su bsgos pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yin no /
byams pa las langs pa'i rgyud ni sems can tshad med pa la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su 'brel ba dang shin tu gsal ba'i bsod nams tshad med pas yongs su bsgos pa dang rjes su 'brel ba yin no /
mthong ba'i lam las langs pa'i rgyud ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma lus par spangs pa'i phyir gnas yongs su gyur pa sar pa yin pa dri ma med pa yin no /
arhatphalavyutthitasyāśeṣabhāvanāprahātavyaprahāṇātpratyagrāśrayaparivṛttiśuddhā saṃtatirvartate dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu las langs pa'i rgyud ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma lus par spangs pa'i phyir gnas yongs su gyur pa sar pa yin pas dri ma med pa yin no /
ata eteṣu kṛtānāṃ kārāpakārāṇāṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme niyataṃ prāpyate /
śeṣasya tu bhāvanāmārgasyāparipūrṇasvabhāvaphalatvācca tadvyutthitānāṃ na tathā pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttiśuddhāśayasaṃtatirvartata iti na te tathā puṇyakṣetraṃ bhavati 		de nyid kyi phyir de dag las phan pa dang gnod pa byas pa rnams kyi 'bras bu mthong ba'i chos kho na la nges pa 'thob par 'gyur ro /
lhag ma bsgom pa'i lam ni rang bzhin dang 'bras bu yongs su ma rdzogs pa can nyid kyi phyir de las langs pa rnams kyi rgyud de ltar gnas yongs su gyur pa sar pa dang dag pa ma yin pas de dag ni de ltar bsod nams kyi zhing ma yin no /
vipākaḥ punarvedanāpradhānaḥ /
tadidānīṃ vicāryate /
syāt karmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta na kāyikī 		rnam par smin pa'i gtso bo ni tshor ba yin pas de'i phyir 'di dpyad par bya ste /
las kyi rnam par smin pa sems kyi tshor ba kho na yin la lus kyi ma yin pa yod dam /
syāt kāyikyeva na caitasikī syādityāha lus kyi kho na yin la sems kyi ma yin pa yang yod dam zhe na /
smras pa /
yod de /
kukśalasyāvitarkasya karmaṇo vedanā matā rnam par rtog pa med pa yi /
dge ba'i las kyi rnam smin ni /
vipākaścaitasikyeva sems kyi tshor ba kho nar 'dod /
avitarkaṃ karma dhyānāntarāt prabhṛti yāvat bhavāgre /
tasyāvitarkasya kuśalasya karmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipākaḥ 		rnam par rtog pa med pa'i las ni bsam gtan khyad par can nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar dag na yod de /
dge ba'i las rnam par rtog pa med pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni sems kyi tshor ba kho na yin no /
kasmānna kāyikī /
tasyā avaśyaṃ savitarkavicāratvāt 		ci'i phyir lus kyi ma yin zhe na /
de ni gdon mi za bar rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dpyad pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
kāyikyevāśubhasya tu mi dge ba ni lus kyi yin /
akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kāyikyeva vedanā vipākaḥ mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni lus kyi tshor ba kho na yin no /
kasmānna caitasikī /
tasya hi duḥkhā vedanā vipākaścaitasikī ca duḥkhā vedanā daurmanasyaṃ na ca daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vyākhyātametat 		ci'i phyir sems kyi ma yin zhe na /
de'i rnam par smin pa ni sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yin la /
sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba ni yid mi bde ba yin te /
yattarhi sattvānāṃ cittakṣepo bhavati yid mi bde ba ni rnam par smin pa ma yin no zhes de ni bshad zin to /
katamasminnasau citte bhavati kena vā kāraṇena /
cittakṣepo manaścitte /
manovijñāna ityarthaḥ /
nahi pañcasu vijñānakāyeṣu cittaṃ kṣipyate 		'o na sems can rnams kyi sems g yeng bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sems gang zhig la gnas pa yin /
rgyu ni ci zhig gis 'gyur zhe na /
g yeng ba'i sems ni yid sems las /
yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga la gnas pa la ni g yeng ba med de /
avikalpakatvāt /
sa ca karmavipākajaḥ 		rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro /
de ni las kyi rnam smin skyes /
sa caiṣa cittakṣepaḥ sattvānāṃ karmajaḥ /
ye hi dravyamantraprayogeṇa vā pareṣāṃ cittaṃ kṣepayanti akāmakaṃ vā viṣaṃ madyaṃ vā pāyayanti trāsayanti vā mṛgayādiṣvagnim vā dāveṣutsṛjanti prapātādvā pātayantyanyena vā kenacitpareṣāṃ smṛtiṃ bhraṃśayanti teṣāṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāyatyāṃ cittaṃ kṣipyate 		g yeng ba'i sems de ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yin te /
rdzas dang gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas pha rol gyi sems g yeng bar byed pa'am /
mi 'dod bzhin du dug dang myos par 'gyur ba ldud pa'am /
ri dags la sogs pa skrag par byed pa'am /
nags mes gtong ba 'am /
g yang du 'dor bar byed pa 'am /
gzhan gang yang rung bas pha rol po dag gi sems nyams par byed pa de dag las de'i rnam par smin pas che phyi ma la sems g yeng bar 'gyur ro /
bhayopaghātavaiṣamyaśokaiśca skrag gnod ma mnyam mya ngan gyis /
kathaṃ tāvadbhayena re zhig skrag pas ji lta bu zhe na /
amanuṣyādayo manuṣyānvirūpeṇa rūpeṇopasaṃkrāmanti /
tebhyo bhītānāṃ cittaṃ kṣīpyate 		mi ma yin pa gzugs mi sdug pas mi'i gan du nye bar 'ongs la de dag gis skrag pa rnams sems g yeng bar 'gyur ro /
kathamupaghātena gnod pas ji lta bu zhe na /
amanuṣyā eva kupitā manuṣyāṇāṃ marmasu praharanti mi ma yin pa de dag nyid du 'khrugs nas gnad du snun par byed pas so /
kathaṃ mahābhūtavaiṣamyeṇa 'byung ba chen po ma mnyam pas ji lta bu zhe na /
vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ prakopamāpadyante rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dag 'khrugs par gyur pa'o /
kathaṃ śokena /
yathā vāsiṣṭhīprabhṛtīnām 		mya ngan gyis ji lta bu zhe na /
dper na gnas byed kyi bu la sogs pa lta bu'o /
yadi mano vikṣipyate karmavipākajaśca cittakṣepaḥ /
kathaṃ na caitasikī vedanā vipākaḥ prāpnoti 		gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa g yeng bar 'gyur la /
sems g yengs pa yang las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yin pa yin na go /
ji ltar na sems kyi tshor ba rnam par smin pa ma yin par 'gyur zhe na /
nahi brūmastadeva cittavipāka ityapi tu yo mahābhūtānāṃ prakopaḥ sa vipākaḥ /
tasmājjātamato vipākajam 		sems de nyid rnam par smin pa yin no zhes ni mi zer ro /
de lta mod kyi 'byung ba chen po rnams 'khrugs pa gang yin pa de rnam par smin pa yin la de las skyes pas de'i phyir rnam par smin pa yin te /
karmajena hi dhātunā vaiṣamyeṇa vyākulamavaśaṃ bhraṣṭasmṛtikaṃ cittaṃ vartata iti kṣiptamityucyate /
evaṃ cedaṃ catuṣkoṭikaṃ yujyate /
asti cittaṃ kṣiptaṃ na vikṣiptamiti vistaraḥ 		las las skyes pa'i khams rnams 'khrugs pas sems 'khrugs pa dang dbang med pa dang dran pa nyams par 'gyur bas na sems g yengs pa zhes bya'o /
de ltar na de ni sems g yengs la rnam par ma g yengs pa yang yod ces bya bar mu bzhir rung ste /
kṣiptaṃ tāvanna kṣiptaṃ vikṣiptacittasya re zhig g yengs la rnam par ma g yengs pa ni sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o /
kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ na kṣiptaṃ svasthacittasya kliṣṭam rnam par g yengs la sems ma g yengs pa ni sems rnal du 'dug pa'i nyon mongs pa can no /
ubhayaṃ kṣiptacittasya kliṣṭam gnyi ga yin pa ni sems g yengs pa'i nyon mongs pa can no /
nobhayaṃ svasthacittasyākliṣṭam /
katameṣāṃ punaḥ sattvānāṃ cittaṃ kṣipyate 		gnyi ga ma yin pa ni sems rnal du 'dug pa'i nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o /
sems can gang dag gi sems g yengs par 'gyur zhe na /
akurukāminām /
akuruṇāṃ kāminām 		sgra mi snyan min 'dod ldan rnams /
deveṣvapi hi deva /
unmattāḥ santi prāgeva manuṣyatiryakpreteṣu /
nārakāstu nityaṃ kṣiptacittā eva 		sgra mi snyan ma yin pa 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ni lha dag gi nang na yang lha smyon pa yod na mi dang dud 'gro dang li dags kyi nang na lta smos kyang ci dgos /
dmyal ba rnams ni rtag tu sems g yengs pa kho na yin te /
te hi vividhayātanāsahasravyatibhinnamarmāṇastīrvābhirvedanābhirabhitunnā ātmānamapi tāvannābhicetayanti kiṃ punaḥ kāryamakāryaṃ vā /
hācittaparidevakaścātra nāraka udāhāryaḥ 		gnod pa sna tshogs stong phrag dag gis gnad gcod pa'i tshor ba drag po dag gis mngon par nyen pa de dag ni re zhig bdag nyid kyang mi dran na bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
'dir kyi hung sems zhes smre sngags 'don pa'i dmyal ba dper bya'o /
āryāṇāmapi cittaṃ kṣipyate bhūtavaiṣamyeṇānyatra buddhāt sangs rgyas ma gtogs pa'i 'phags pa rnams la yang 'byung ba ma mnyam pas sems g yeng ba yod do /
las kyis ni ma yin te /
na karmaṇā niyatasya pūrvaṃ vipākādaniyatasyāvipākāt nges pa ni sngon rnam par smin zin pa'i phyir ro /
ma nges pa ni rnam par mi smin pa'i phyir ro /
na bhayena /
pañcabhayasamatikramāt /
nopaghātena 		'jigs pas kyang ma yin te /
'jigs pa lnga las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro /
gnod pas kyang ma yin te /
manuṣyaprakopakāraṇasyāprāsādikasyākaraṇāt mi ma yin pa 'khrugs pa'i rgyu mi mdzes pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro /
na śokena /
dharmatābhijñatvāt /
punastrayo vaṅkā uktāḥ sūtre /
kāyavaṅkok vāgvaṅko manovaṅkaḥ 		mya ngan gyis kyang ma yin te /
chos nyid mngon par shes pa'i phyir ro /
mdo las /
yon po gsum gsungs te /
lus kyi yon po dang ngag gi yon po dang yid kyi yon po'o /
trayo doṣāḥ nyes pa gsum ste /
kāyadoṣo vāgdoṣo manodoṣaḥ /
trayaḥ kaṣāyāḥ 		lus kyi nyes pa dang ngag gi nyes pa dang yid kyi nyes pa'o /
snyigs ma gsum ste /
kāyakaṣāyo vākkaṣāyo manaḥ kaṣāyaḥ iti lus kyi snyigs ma dang ngag gi snyigs ma dang yid kyi snyigs ma'o /
de la /
tatra yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ yon po snyigs mar gsungs pa ni /
vaṅkadoṣakaṣāyoktiḥ śāṭhyadveṣajarāgaje de dag kyang rim bzhin du /
g yo dang zhe sdang 'dod chags skyes /
śaṭhyajaṃ kāyakarma kāyavaṅka ityuktam /
kuṭilānvayatvāt /
evaṃ vāṅmanovaṅkau /
dveṣajaṃ kāyakarma kāyadoṣa ityuktam 		lus kyi g yo las skyes pa ni gya gyu'i rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir lus kyi yon po zhes bshad de ngag dang yid kyi yon po yang de dang 'dra'o /
lus kyi las zhe sdang las skyes pa ni sdang ba'i rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir lus kyi nyes pa zhes bshad de /
cittapradoṣānvayatvāt /
evaṃ vāṅmanodoṣau 		ngag dang yid kyi nyes pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
rāgajaṃ kāyakarma kāyakaṣāya ityuktam /
rāñjanānvayatvāt 		lus kyi las 'dod chags las skyes pa ni chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir lus kyi snyigs ma zhes bshad de /
evaṃ vāṅmanaḥkaṣāyau /
kṛṣṇaśuklādibhedena punaḥḥ karma caturvidham 		ngag dang yid kyi snyigs ma yang de dang 'dra'o /
dkar nag la sogs bye brag gis /
las ni rnam pa bzhi yin no /
asti karma kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākam /
asti karma śuklaṃ śuklavipākam /
asti karma kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākam /
asti karmākṛṣṇamaśuklamavipākam /
yattatkarma karmakṣayāya saṃvartata iti /
tatra 		gnag la rnam par smin pa gnag pa'i las kyang yod; dkar la rnam par smin pa dkar ba'i las kyang yod /
dkar gnag la rnam par smin pa dkar gnag pa'i las kyang yod /
mi dkar mi gnag cing rnam par smin pa med pa las zad par byed pa'i las kyang yod de /
de la /
aśubhaṃ rūpakāmāptaṃ śubhaṃ caiva yathākramam mi dge gzugs dang 'dod gtogs pa'i /
dge ba nyid ni rim bzhin du /
kṛṣṇaśuklobhayaṃ karma tatkṣayāya nirāsravam gnag dang dkar dang gnyi ga'i las /
de zad byed pa zag med yin /
aśubhaṃ karma ekāntena kṛṣṇaṃ kliṣṭatvāt kṛṣṇavipākaṃ cāmanojñavipākatvāt las mi dge ba ni nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa yang gnag pa yin no /
rūpāptaṃ śubhamekāntena śuklamakuśalenāvyatibhedāt /
śuklavipākaṃ ca manojñavipākatvāt /
ārupyāptaṃ kasmānnocyate 		gzugs su gtogs pa'i dge ba ni /
mi dge ba dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir gcig tu dkar ba yin la /
rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa yang dkar ba yin no /
ci'i phyir gzugs med par gtogs pa ma bshad ce na /
yatra kila dvividho 'sti vipāka āntarābhavika aupapattibhavikaśca /
trividhasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo yatraiva saṃbhavastatraivoktamiti /
tadapi tūktaṃ sūtrāntare 		gang na rnam par smin pa rnam pa gnyis po srid pa bar ma pa dang skye ba'i srid pa yang yod pa dang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnam pa gsum char gyi yod pa de kho nar bshad do zhes grag ste /
mdo gzhan las de yang bshad do /
kāmāptaṃ śubhaṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklamakuśalavyavakīrṇatvat kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ vyavakīrṇavipākatvāt 'dod par gtogs pa'i dge ba ni mi dge ba dang 'dres pa'i phyir dkar gnag yin la /
rnam par smin pa 'dres pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa yang dkar gnag yin no /
saṃtānata etadvyavasthāpitaṃ na svabhāvataḥ /
na hyevañjātīyakamekaṃ karmāsti vipāko vā yat kṛṣṇaṃ ca syāt śuklaṃ cānyonyavirodhāt /
nanu caivamakuśalasyāpi karmaṇaḥ kuśalavyavakīrṇatvāt kṛṣṇaśuklatvaṃ prāpnoti 		'di ni rgyud kyi sgo nas rnam par gzhag gi ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas ni ma yin te /
las sam rnam par smin pa gcig la dkar po yang yin /
nag po yang yin pas de lta bu ni med do /
phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
de lta na mi dge ba yang dge ba dang 'dres pa'i phyir /
dkar gnag tu 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
nāvaśyamakuśalaṃ kuśalena vyavakīryate /
kāmadhātau tasya balavattvāt 		'dod pa'i khams ni mi dge ba gdon mi za bar dge ba dang 'dre ba ni ma yin te /
de stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
kukśalaṃ tu vyavakīryate /
durbalatvāditi /
anasravaṃ karmaiṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣayāya prahāṇāya saṃvartate 		dge ba ni stobs chung ba'i phyir 'dre bar 'gyur ro /
zag pa med pa'i las ni las gsum po de dag zad par byed cing spong bar byed pa yin no /
taddhyakṛṣṇamakliṣṭatvādaśuklaṃ vipākaśuklatā 'bhāvāt de ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir mi gnag pa'o /
rnam par smin pa dkar po nyid med pa'i phyir mi dkar ba'o /
ābhiprāyiko hyeṣo 'śukla śabdaḥ mi dkar ba zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni dgongs pa can yin te /
uktaṃ tu bhagavatā mahatyāṃ śunyatāyā maśaikṣān dharmānārabhya ime te ānanda dharmā ekāntakuśalā ekāntānavadyā iti bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa chen po'i mdo las mi slob pa'i chos las brtsams te /
kun dga' bo chos 'di dag ni gcig tu dkar ba gcig tu dge ba /
gcig tu kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no zhes gsungs so /
śāstre ca /
śuklā dharmāḥ katame 		bstan bcos las kyang /
chos dkar po rnams gang zhe na /
kuśalā dharmā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśceti /
avipākaṃ dhātvapatitatvāt pravṛttivirodhācca 		dge ba'i chos rnams dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa rnams yin no zhes 'byung ngo /
'jug pa dang 'gal bas khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa med pa yin no /
kiṃ punaḥ sarvamanāsravaṃ karma sarvasyāsya trividhasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāya saṃvartate ci zag pa med pa'i las dang las thams cad las rnam pa gsum po 'di dag thams cad zad par byed pa yin nam zhe na /
netyucyate smras pa /
kiṃ tarhi /
dharmakṣāntiṣu vairāgye cānantaryapathāṣṭake 		ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
chos bzod 'dod chags bral ba yi /
bar chad med lam brgyad kyi gang /
yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat sems pa rnam pa bcu gnyis de /
nag po zad par byed pa'i las /
darśanamārge catasṛṣu dharmajñānakṣāntiṣu kāmavairāgye cāṣṭāsvānantaryamārgeṣu yā cetanā seyaṃ dvādaśavidhā cetanā kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya karma mthong ba'i lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa bzhi dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba las bar chad med pa'i lam brgyad kyi sems pa gang yin pa ste /
sems pa rnam pa bcu gnyis po de ni nag po'i las zad par byed pa'i las yin no /
navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca /
navame kāmavairāgyānantaryamārge yā cetanā sā kṛṣṇaśuklasya kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇasya cākuśalasya navamasya prakārasya prahāṇāya 		dgu pa'i sems pa gang yin pa /
de ni dkar nag zad byed yin /
'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba las bar chad med pa'i lam dgu pa'i sems pa gang yin pa de ni dkar gnag ste dge ba dang mi dge ba nag po rnam pa dgu po spong bar byed pa yin no /
śuklasya dhyānavairāgyeṣvantyānantaryamārgajā dkar po bsam gtan chags bral la /
bar chad med lam skyes tha mas /
dhyānādvyānādvairāgyaṃ kurvato yo 'ntyo navama ānantaryamārgastatra yā cetanā iyaṃ caturvidhā cetanā śuklasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamantyenaivānantaryamārgeṇa kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇaṃ nānyena 		bsam gtan dang bsam gtan las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam tha ma dgu pa de'i sems pa gang yin pa ste /
sems pa rnam pa bzhi po de ni dkar po'i las spong bar byed pa yin no /
ci'i phyir bar chad med pa'i phyir lam tha ma kho nas spong bar byed la gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhe na /
nahhi tasya svabhāvaprahāṇaṃ prahīṇasyāpi saṃmukhībhāvāt de'i rang gi ngo bo ni spong ba ma yin te /
spangs kyang mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ tarhi /
tadālambanakleśaprahāṇāt /
ato yāvadeko 'pi tadālambanakleśaprakāra āste tāvadasya prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir te /
de'i phyir ji srid du de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gcig yod pa de srid du de mi spong ba mi 'thad do /
anye narakavedyānyakāmavedyaṃ dvayaṃ viduḥ /
anye punarācāryāḥ paśyanti narakavedanīyaṃ narakāccānyakāmadhātuvedanīyaṃ karma yathākrama kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ ceti /
narake hyakuśalasyaiva karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇamityucyate ato 'nya kāmadhātau kuśalākuśalasya karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklamityuktam 		gzhan ni dmyal ba myong 'gyur dang /
'dod gzhan myong 'gyur gnyis su rigs /
slob dpon gzhan dag ni dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang dmyal ba las gzhan pa'i 'dod pa'i khams myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ni rim bzhin du nag po dang dkar nag yin te /
dmyal ba na ni las mi dge ba kho na'i rnam par smin pa yod pas de'i phyir de myong bar 'gyur ba ni nag po zhes bya'o /
de las gzhan pa'i 'dod pa'i khams na ni las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yod pas de'i phyir de myong bar 'gyur ba ni dkar nag ces bya bar lta'o /
dṛgdheyaṃ kṛṣṇamanye gzhan ni mthong bas spang bya gnag /
anye punarāhurdarśanaprahātavyaṃ karma kṛṣṇa kuśalenāmiśratvāt gzhan dag na re mthong bas sdang bar bya ba'i las ni dge ba dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir nag po yin no zhes zer ro /
anyatkṛṣṇaśuklaṃ tu kāmajam /
anyattu kāmāvacaraṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklam 		'dod pa las skyes gzhan dkar gnag /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i las gzhan ni dkar gnag yin no /
kiṃ tadanyat /
bhāvanāprahātavyam /
taddhi kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ceti 		de las gzhan pa ci zhig ce na /
bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ste /
de ni dge ba yang yin la mi dge ba yang yin no /
sūtra uktaṃ trīṇi mauneyāni kāyamauneyaṃ vāṅmauneyaṃ manomauneyaṃ ca /
tatra /
aśaikṣaṃ kāyavākkarma manaścaiva yathākramam 		mdo las thub pa'i ni gsum ste /
thub pa'i lus dang thub pa'i ngag dang thub pa'i yid yod do zhes gsungs pa de la /
mi slob lus ngag las yid nyid /
thub pa'i gsum ste go rims bzhin /
maunatrayam /
aśaikṣe kāyavākkarmaṇī kāyavāṅmauneye /
aśaikṣaṃ tu mana eva manomauneyaṃ na manaskarmeti 		mi slob pa'i lus dang ngag gi las dag ni thub pa'i lus dang dag yin no /
mi slob pa'i yid kho na yid kyi thub pa yin te /
yid kyi las ni ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
cittaṃ hi paramārthamuniḥ 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
sems ni don dam par thub pa yin la /
tat kila kāyavākkarmabhyāmanumīyata iti de ni lus dang ngag gi las dag gi sgo nas rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhes grag go /
api khalu kāyavākkarmaṇī viratisvabhāvena na manaskarma /
cittā vijñaptyabhāvāt 		gzhan yang lus dang ngag gi las dag ni spong ba'i rang bzhin yin gyi sems la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med pa'i phyir yid kyi las ni ma yin no /
viramārthena ca maunam thub pa'i yang spong ba'i don gyis yin te /
ato mana eva virataṃ maunamityucyate /
kasmādaśaikṣameva nānyat /
arhataḥ parmārthamunitvāt /
sarvakleśajalpoparateḥ /
trīṇi śauceyāni uktāni sūtre /
kāyaśauceyaṃ vākśauceyaṃ manaḥsauceyaṃ ca 		de'i phyir yid nyid spong ba la thub pa zhes bya'o /
ci'i phyir mi slob pa kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin zhe na; dgra bcom pa ni nyon mongs pa'i brjod pa thams cad med pas don dam par thub pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
mdo las lus gtsang byed dang ngag gtsang byed dang yid gtsang byed dang gtsang byed gsum gsungs pa de ni /
tadetat /
tridhā śaucaṃ sarvaṃ sucaritatrayam 		legs spyad gsum po thams cad ni /
gtsang byed rnam pa gsum yin no /
sarvaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ kāyaśaucam lus kyi legs par spyad pa thams cad ni lus gtsang byed yin no /
sarvaṃ vāṅmanaḥ sucaritaṃ vāṅmanaḥ śaucam ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyad pa thams cad ni ngag dang yid kyi gtsang byed yin te /
duścaritamalāpakarṣaṇāttāvatkālamatyantaṃ vā /
eṣā ca deśanā mithyāmauna śaucādhimuktikānāṃ vivecānārtham 		dus re zhig dang gtan du nyes par spyad pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma spongs pa'i phyir ro /
de ltar bstan pa 'di ni log pa'i thub pa dang gtsang sbra la mos pa rnams dkar ba'i phyir ro /
trīṇi duścaritānyuktāni nyes par spyad pa gsum gsungs pa de la /
tatra /
aśubhaṃ kāyakarmādi mataṃ duścarita trayam /
akuśalaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma yathākramaṃ kāyavāṅmanoduścaritam /
akarmāpi tvabhidhyādimanoduścaritaṃ tridhā 		lus kyi la sogs mi dge ba /
nyes par spyad pa gsum du 'dod /
lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi dge ba ni rim pa bzhin du lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no /
brnab sems la sogs las min yang /
yid kyi nyes spyad rnam gsum mo /
akarmasvabhāvamapyasti trividhaṃ manoduścaritaṃ cetanārthāntarabhūtamabhidhyā vyāpādo mithyādṛṣṭiśca las kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa yang yid kyi nyes par spyad pa rnam pa gsum yod de /
sems pa las don gzhan du gyur pa brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba'o /
abhidhyādaya eva manaskarmeti dārṣṭāntikāḥ /
saṃcetanīyasūtre vacanāt /
evaṃ tu sati karmakleśayoraikyaṃ syāt /
kim syādyadi kaścit kleśo 'pi karma syāt 		dpes ston pa rnams na re ched du bsam par bya ba'i mdo las gsungs pa'i phyir brnab sems la sogs pa kho na yid kyi las yin no zhes zer ro /
de lta na ni las dang nyon mongs pa dag gcig tu 'gyur ro /
gal te nyon mongs pa 'ga' zhig las su gyur na yang cir 'gyur /
naitadasti /
sūtraṃ viruddhaṃ syāt /
sūtre tu cetanāyāstanmukhena pravṛttestaistāṃ darśayatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re mdo dang 'gal ba'i phyir de ni med de /
mdo las ni de'i sgo nas sems pa zhugs pa'i phyir de dag gis de ston par byed do zhes zer ro /
aniṣṭaphalatvātkuṭsitaḥ kāyavāṅmanaścāro duścaritam lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa smad pa ni 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong ba yin pa'i phyir nyes par spyad pa yin no /
viparyayātsucaritam /
iṣṭaṃ kuśalaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarmānabhidhyā 'vyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭayaśca /
parānugrahopaghātābhisaṃdhyabhāve kathaṃ samyagdṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭavyoḥ kuśalākuśalatvam /
tanmūlatvāt 		bzlog pa legs par spyad pa yin /
nyes par spyad pa las bzlog pa ni legs par spyad pa yin par 'dod de /
lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dge ba dang brnab sems med pa dang gnod sems med pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba rnams so /
pha rol la phan 'dogs pa dang gnod pa bya ba'i bsam pa med par na ji ltar na yang dag pa'i lta ba dang log pa'i lta ba dag dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid yin zhe na /
de'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
yāni caitāni duścaritasucaritānyuktāni /
tadaudārikasaṃgrahāt 		nyes par spyad pa dang legs par spyad par bshad pa gang dag yin pa /
de las che long bsdus nas ni /
daśa karmapathā uktā yathāyogaṃ śubhāśubhāḥ dge dang mi dge ci rigs par /
las kyi lam ni bcur gsungs so /
teṣāmeva sucaritaduścaritānāṃ caudārikasaṃgraheṇa daśa karmapathāḥ sūtra uktāḥ yathāyogaṃ kuśalāḥ sucaritebhyo 'kuśalā duścaritebhyaḥ nyes par spyad pa dang legs par spyad pa de dag nyid bas che long bsdus te ci rigs par mdo las las kyi lam bcur gsungs te /
dge ba rnams ni legs par spyad pa dag las so /
mi dge ba rnams ni nyes par spyad pa dag las so /
kimatra duścaritamasaṃgṛhītaṃ kiṃ vā sucaritam /
akukśaleṣu tatkarmapathesu kāyaduścaritasya pradeśo na saṃgṛhītaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhabhūtaḥ kliṣṭaścānyo 'pi bandhānādiḥ /
tasya nātyaudārikatvāt 		'dir nyes par spyad pa ci zhig gam /
legs par spyad pa ci zhig ma bsdus she na /
re zhig mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams su ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa'i phyogs sbyor ba dang mjug dang nyon mongs pa can gzhan yang ma bsdus te /
de ni shin tu rags pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
yaddhi kāyaduścaritaṃ pareṣāṃ jīvitabhogadārebhyaścyāvakaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tato vivecanārtham /
vāgduścaritamapi yadeva praśādaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tadarthameva 		lus kyi nyes par spyad pa gzhan dag 'tsho ba dang longs spyod dang chung ma rnams dang 'bral bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni de dang 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir las kyi lam du bshad do /
ngag gi nyes par spyad pa yang tshabs po che gang yin pa de kho na nyid kyi phyir las kyi lam du bshad do /
manoduścaritasya ca pradeśacetanā yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'i phyogs sems pa yang ma bsdus so /
kuśaleṣvapi kāyasucaritasya pradeśaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhamadyādiviratidānejyādiko vāksucaritasya priyavacanādiko manaḥ sucaritasya cetanā /
eṣāṃ ca karmapathānām 		dge ba la yang lus kyi legs par spyad pa'i phyogs sbyor ba dang mjug dang myos par 'gyur ba la sogs pa spong ba dang sbyin pa dang mchod sbyin la sogs pa ma bsdus so /
ngag gi legs par spyad pa'i yang snyan par smra ba la sogs pa ma bsdus so /
yid kyi legs par spyad pa'i yang sems pa ma bsdus so /
las kyi lam de rnams las /
aśubhāḥ ṣaḍavijñaptiḥ mi dge drug ni rnam rig min /
akuśalāḥ ṣaṭ karmapathā avaśyamavijñaptisvabhāvāḥ prāṇātipātādattādānamṛṣāvādapaiśunyapārupyasaṃbhinnapralāpāḥ /
pareṇa kārayato maulavijñaptyabhāvāt 		mi dge ba'i las kyi lam drug po srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang ngag kyal pa rnams ni gzhan byed du 'jug pa la dngos kyi rnam par rig byed med pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no /
dvidhaikaḥ gcig rnam gnyis so /
kāmamithyācāro nityaṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāvastasya svayeva niṣṭhāpanāt /
nahi taṃ pareṇa kārayatastādṛśī prītirbhavatīti 		'dod pas log par g yem pa de ni bdag nyid kyis mthar phyin par byed pa la ni dus de'i tshe shi na rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
de gzhan byed du bcug pa ni de dang 'dra bar dga' ba ma yin no /
te 'pi kurvataḥ de dag kyang byed na /
te 'pi ṣaṭ karmapathāḥ svayaṃ kurvato dvividhā bhavanti vijñaptiravijñaptiśca tatkālamaraṇe paścāt maraṇe tvavijñaptireva las kyi lam drug po de dag kyang bdag nyid byed pa la ni dus de'i tshe shi na rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro /
phyis shi na ni rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na yin no /
kuśalānāṃ punaḥ karmapathānāṃ /
dvividhāḥ sapta kuśalāḥ 		dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams las ni /
dge ba bdun rnam gnyis /
kuśalāḥ sapta rūpiṇaḥ karmapathā avaśyaṃ dviprakārā vijñaptiravijñaptiśca /
vijñaptyadhīnatvātsamādānaśīlasya 		yang dag par blangs pa'i tshul khrims ni rnam par rig byed la rag lus pa'i phyir las kyi lam gzugs can bdun ni gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga yin no /
avijñaptiḥ samādhijāḥ ting 'dzin las skyes rnam rig min /
dhyānānāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītāḥ samādhijāḥ ucyante /
te hyavijñaptireva cittamātrādhīnatvāt 		bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa rnams ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa zhes bya ste /
de dag ni sems tsam la rag lus pa'i phyir /
rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na yin no /
sāmantakāstu vijñaptiḥ nyer bsdogs rnams ni rnam rig byed /
karmapathasāmantakāstu vijñaptisvabhāvā avaśyam las kyi lam nyer bsdogs rnams ni gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed kyi rang bzhin yin no; /
avijñaptirbhavenna vā rnam rig byed min 'gyur ba'am /
ma yin /
yadi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena pramādena vā ghanarasena prayogamārabheta syādavijñaptiranyathā na syāt gal te kun nas dkris pa drag po'am /
rab tu dang ba lhur len pa chen pos sbyor ba rtsom pa rnam par rig byed ma yin par 'gyur gyi /
viparyayeṇa pṛṣṭhāni gzhan du ni ma yin no /
sāmantakebhyo viparyayeṇa karmapathānāṃ pṛṣṭhāni veditavyāti bzlog pa mjug yin no /
nyer bsdogs las bzlog pa ni las kyi lam rnams kyi mjug yin par blta bar bya ste /
tāni avaśyamavijñaptisvabhāvāni /
vijñaptistu bhavenna vā 		de dag ni gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed kyi rang bzhin ni ma yin no /
rnam par rig byed du ni 'gyur ba'am /
yadi karmapathaṃ kṛṭvā punastasyānudharmaṃ ceṣṭeta tasya syāt vijñaptiranyathā na syāt yang na ma yin te /
gal te las kyi lam byas nas de'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos spyod na ni rnam par rig byed du 'gyur gyi /
atha kuto yāvadeṣāṃ prayogamaulapṛṣṭhānāṃ vyavasthānam /
yadā tāvadiha kaścit paśuṃ hantukāmo mañcakāduttiṣṭhati mūlyaṃ gṛhlāti gacchatyāmṛśati paśuṃ krīṇātyānayati puṣṇāti praveśayati nihantuṃ śāstramādatte prahāramekaṃ dadāti dvau vā yāvanna jīvitā dvacyaparopayati tāvat prayogaḥ /
yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ 		gzhan du ni ma yin no /
yang ji tsam gyis na sbyor ba dang dngos dang mjug 'di dag rnam par bzhag ce na /
'di ltar re zhig 'di na kha cig phyugs gsod par 'dod la /
khri la sogs pa las ldang bar byed /
rin len par byed /
'gro bar byed /
nom par byed; phyugs nyo bar byed /
'khrid par byed /
dran par byed /
'dzud par byed /
gnod par byed /
mtshon len par byed /
mtshon len gcig gam lan gnyis 'debs par byed pa nas ji srid du srog gcod par mi byed pa de srid du ni sbyor ba yin no /
bsnun pa gang gis srog gcod par byed pa de'i tshe'i rnam par rig byed dang de'i skad cig gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni las kyi lam dngos yin no /
dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate prayogataḥ mṛte sati phalaparipūritaśca rgyu gnyis kyis ni srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur te /
sbyor ba dang 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pas so /
tata ūrdhvamavijñaptikṣaṇāḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti /
yāvacca taṃ paśuṃ kuṣṇāti śodhayati vikrīṇīte pacati khādayatyanukīrtayati vā tāvadasya vijñaptikṣaṇā api pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti 		de phyin chad kyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i skad cig ma rnams ni mjug yin no /
ji srid du phyugs de'i pags pa 'chu ba'am /
bkru bshal byed pa 'am /
'tshong ba'am /
'tshed pa'am /
za ba'am rjes su sgrogs pa de srid du ni de'i rnam par rig byed kyi skad cig ma dag kyang mjug yin no /
evamanyeṣvapi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojyam /
abhidhyādīnāṃ nāsti prayogo na pṛṣṭhaṃ saṃmukhībhāvamātrātkarmapathaḥ 		de bzhin du gzhan drug la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o /
brnab sems la sogs pa ni mngon du gyur pa tsam gyis las kyi lam du 'gyur ba'i phyir sbyor ba yang med la mjug kyang med do /
idamatra vaktavyam /
kiṃ tāvat maraṇabhavasthe tasmin prāṇini ye vijñaptyavijñaptī te karmapatha āhosvinmṛte /
kiṃ cātaḥ 		'dir ci re zhig srog chags de 'chi ba'i srid pa la gnas pa de'i tshe rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang dag las kyi lam yin nam 'on te shi ba'i srid pa la gnas pa de'i tshe yin pa zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya'o /
de las cir 'gyur /
yadi tāvanmaraṇabhavasthe sahamṛṭasyāpio anturghātayiturvā prāṇātipātāvadyena yogaḥ prāpnoti re zhig gal te 'chi ba'i srid pa la gnas pa yin na ni gsod pa'am /
gsod du 'jug pa lhan cig shi ba yang srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang ldan par 'gyur te /
na ceṣa siddhāntaḥ /
atha mṛte 		grub pa'i mtha' las ni de skad du mi 'byung ngo /
yaduktaṃ yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvacyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapatha iti tanā vaktavyam /
yaccāpīdaṃ śāstra uktaṃ syāt prāṇī hataḥ prāṇātipātaścāniruddhaḥ /
syādyathā hi tatprāṇī jīvitādvyaparopito bhavati prayogaścāpratiprasragdha ityatra pṛṣṭhaṃ prayogaśabdenoktamiti vaibhāṣikīyo 'rthavirodho maulasyaiva tadānīmaniruddhatvāt 		'on te shi ba yin na ni bsnun pa gang gis srog gcod par byed pa de'i tshe'i rnam par rig byed dang de'i skad cig gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni las kyi lam dngos yin no zhes gang smras pa de brjod par mi bya'o /
gang yang bstan bcos las 'di skad du /
srog chags bsad la srog gcod pa ma 'gags pa yod dam zhe na /
yod de /
'di lta ste /
dper na srog chags kyi srog gcod la sbyor ba med par mi 'gyur ba lta bu'o zhes gsungs pa 'dir mjug sbyor ba'i sgrar gsungs so zhes bya ba bye brag tu smra ba'i don ni 'gal te /
yathā na doṣastathā 'stu de'i tshe dngos kho na ma 'gags pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ ca na doṣaḥ /
maula evātra prayogaśabdenokta iti 		ji ltar nyes pa med pa de lta bu yin no /
ji ltar na nyes pa med pa de dngos kho na sbyor ba'i sgrar gsungs zhes bya ba'o; /
vijñaptistarhi tadā kathaṃ maulaḥ karmapatho bhavati /
kathaṃ ca na bhavitavyam 		'o na de'i tshe rnam par rig byed ji ltar las kyi lam dngos su 'gyur /
ji ltar na mi 'gyur /
asāmarthyat mi nus pa'i phyir ro /
avijñaptiridānīṃ kathaṃ bhavati de ni rnam par rig byed ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur te /
tasmāt prayogaphalaparipūrikāle tadubhayaṃ karmapathaḥ syāt karmatpatho 'pyanyasya prayogaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ ca bhavati de'i phyir sbyor ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshe gnyi ga las kyi lam yin no /
las kyi lam gzhan gyi sbyor ba'am mjug las kyi lam gzhan yin pa yang yod dam zhe na /
prāṇātipātasya daśāpi karmapathāḥ prayogaḥ /
yathā ca śatrorvadhārthaṃ kṛtyaṃ samupasthāpayan paśunā valiṃ kuryāt parakīyaṃ kṛtvā dāreṣu cāsya vipratipadyeta taireva tadghātanārtham anṛtapiśunaparuṣasāntavaiścāsya mitrabhedaṃ kuryādyānyasya paritrāṇāya kalperan abhidhyāṃ ca tatsva kuryāttatraiva ca vyāpādaṃ tadvadhārthaṃ ca mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vṛṃhayediti 		yod de /
srog gcod pa'i sbyor ba las kyi lam bcu tshar yang yin te /
dper na dgra gsad pa'i phyir gshed byed gsad bar gzhan gyi nor 'grogs nas phyugs kyis gtor ma /
byed pa dang de nyid kyis de gsod du gzhug pa'i phyir de'i chung ma la nyal po byed pa dang de la gang dag yongs su skyob par 'gyur ba de'i mdza' bo la brdzun dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang kyal pa dag gis dbyen byed pa dang de'i nor la brnab sems byed pa dang de nyid la gnod sems byed pa dang de gsad pa'i phyir log pa'i lta ba 'phel bar byed pa lta bu ste /
evamanyeṣvapi yathāyogaṃ yojyam /
na tvabhidhyādayaḥ prayogā yujyante 		de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o /
brnab sems la sogs pa ni sbyor ba yin par mi rung ste /
nahi cittotpādamātreṇa prayukto bhavati bya ba ma brtsams pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa tsam gyis ni sbyor ba byas pa ma yin no /
kriyānārambhāt /
sūtra uktaṃ prāṇātipāto bhikṣavastrividho lobhajo dveṣajo mohajo yāvanmithyādṛṣṭiriti /
tatra kīdṛśaḥ prāṇātipāto lobhaja ityevamādi vaktavyam 		mdo las dge slong dag srog gcod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
chags pa las skyes pa dang zhe sdang las skyes pa dang /
gti mug las skyes pa'o zhes bya ba nas log par lta ba'i bar du gsungs pa de la srog gcod pa chags pa las skyes pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig ces bya ba de la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
nātra sarveṣāṃ karmapathānāṃ lobhādibhirniṣṭhā /
prayogastu trimūlajaḥ 		'di la las kyi lam thams cad chags pa la sogs pas mthar phyin par byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
sbyor ba rtsa pa gsum las skyes /
prayogasteṣāmakuśalamūlatrayājjāta ityādisamutthānavacanādevamuktaḥ /
tatra lobhajapraṇātipāto yathā taccharīrāvayavārthamarthārthaṃ krītārthaṃ ca prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayati ātmasuhṛtparitrāṇāya 		de dag gi sbyor ba ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum las skyes pa yin pas na dang po kun nas slong ba'i tshig las de skad bshad do /
de la srog gcod pa chags pa las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste /
de'i lus kyi yan lag gi phyir ram /
nor gyi phyir ram /
rtsed mo'i phyir ram /
bdag gam mdza' bo yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir srog gcod par byed pa'o /
zhe sdang las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste /
dveṣajo yathā vairanipīḍanārtham kho na las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir gsod par byed pa'o /
mohajo yathā yājñikānāṃ dharmabuddhyā rājñāṃ ca dharmapāṭhakaprāmāṇyāddhiṃsatām gti mug las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste /
mchod sbyin byed pa rnams dang rgyal pos chos 'don pa tshad mar byas nas chos kyi blos gsod pa dag ste /
duṣṭānāṃ kila nigrahaṃ kurvanto rājānaḥ puṇyabhājo bhavantīti /
pārasīkānāṃ ca 		mi bsgrungs pa rnams chad pas bcad na; rgyal po bsod nams kyi snod du 'gyur ro zhas grags pa lta bu dang par sig pa rnams kyi lta bu ste /
te hyevamāhuḥ de dag ni 'di skad du /
mātāpitarau jīrṇau vā glānau vā hantavyāviti pha dang ma rgas sam nad tshabs chen pos thebs na gsod par bya'o zhes zer ro /
ye cānye 'pyevamāhurahivṛścikatryamvukādayo manuṣyāṇāmupaghātāpakā hantavyāḥ mṛgapaśupakṣimahiṣādayaścopabhogārthatvāditi /
yaśca mithyādṛṣṭipravartitaḥ prāṇātipātaḥ /
lobhajamadattādānaṃ yo yenārthi sa tadvarati anyalābhasatkārayaśo 'rthaṃ vā ātmasukṛtaparitrāṇāya vā 		gang yang 'di skad du sbrul dang sdig pa dang sbrang bu trya [?] ma bu ka la sogs pa rnams ni mi rnams la gdung bar byed pa yin pas gsad par bya'o /
ri dags dang phyugs dang bya dang ma he la sogs pa rnams ni longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir gsad par bya'o zhes zer ba dang gang yang log par lta bas rab tu bcug pa'i srog gcod pa'o /
ma byin par len pa chags pa las skyes pa ni gang zhig gang don du gnyer ba des 'phrog pa'am /
gzhan gyi rnyed pa'am bkur sti'am grags pa'i phyir ram /
bdag gam mdza' bo yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir 'phrog pa'o /
dveṣajaṃ yadvairanipīḍanārtham /
mohajaṃ yathā rājñāṃ dharmapāṭhakaprāmāṇyāt /
duṣṭanigrahārthaṃ yathā brāhmaṇā āhuḥ sarvamidaṃ brahmaṇā brāhmaṇebhyo dattaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ daurbalyādvṛṣlāḥ paribhuñjate /
tasmādapaharan brāhmaṇaḥ sumādatte svameva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ce ti 		zhe sdang las skyes pa ni kho na las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir 'phrog pa gang yin pa'o /
gti mug las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste rgyal pos chos 'don pa tshad mar byas nas mi bsgrungs pa chad pas bcad pa'i phyir 'phrog pa lta bu dang 'di lta ste /
bram ze rnams na re 'di thams cad ni tshangs pas bram ze rnams la byin pa yin na bram ze rnams dmas pas dmangs rigs rnams yongs su spyod par zad de /
de lta bas na bram ze 'phrog pa na bram ze bdag nyid kyis len pa yin /
bdag nyid kyis za ba yin /
bdag nyis kyis gyon pa yin /
bdag nyid kyis sbyin pa yin no zhes zer ba lta bu'o /
na caiśāmaparasvasaṃjñā bhavati de dag la bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes mi 'byung ba ni ma yin no /
yacca mithyādṛṣṭipravarttitam /
lobhajaḥ kāmamithyācāraḥ dārādiṣu tatsaṃrāgādabrahmacaryaṃ lābhasatkārārthamātmasuhṛtparitrāṇāya /
dveṣajo vairanipīḍanārtham /
mohajo yathā pārasīkānāṃ mātrādigamanaṃ gosave ca yajñe /
yothoktaṃ brāhmaṇo gosaveneṣṭyā saṃvatsaragovratī bhavati 		gang yang log par lta bas rab tu bcug pa'i ma byin par len pa'o /
'dod pas log par g yem pa chags pa las skyes pa ni gzhan gyi chung ma la sogs pa la de la chags pa'am /
rnyed pa 'am bkur sti'i phyir ram /
bdag gam mdza' bo yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir mi tshangs par spyod pa 'o /
zhe sdang las skyes pa ni kho na las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir nyal po byed pa gang yin pa'o /
gti mug las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste /
par sig la sogs pa ma la sogs pa la nyal ba dang ba lang 'bring gi mchod sbyin la cho ga can gyi chu btung ngo /
rtsva bcad do /
ma'i gan du nyal po la 'gro'o /
sring mo'i gan du 'gro'o /
upahā udakaṃ cūṣati tṛṇāni cchinatti upaiti mātaramupasvasāramupa sagotrāmiti rus gcig pa'i gan du 'gro'o zhes bya ba dang gang dang gang na 'di dag rnyed pa de dang der 'gro bar bya ste /
ye cāhu rudūkhalapuṇyaphalapakvānnatīrthamārgaprakhyo mātṛgrāma iti /
mṛṣāvādādayo lobhajā dveṣajāścapūrvavat /
mohajo mṛṣāvādo yathāha /
na narmayuktamanṛtaṃ hi nāsti /
na strīṣu rājanna vivāhakāle /
prāṇātyaye sarvadhanāpahāre 		de lta bas na ba lang dang 'jig rten las rgyal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lta bu dang gang dag bud med ni gtun dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang zas smin pa dang ngogs dang lam dang 'dra'o zhes zer ba lta bu'o /
brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa chags pa las skyes pa dang zhe sdang las skyes pa ni snga ma bzhin no /
brdzun du smra ba gti mug las skyes pa ni ji skad du /
rgyal po bzhad gad ldan dang bud med dang /
bag ma len pa'i tshe dang gsod pa dang /
nor kun 'phrog tshe brdzun byas gnod med de /
pañcānṛtānyāhurapātakānīti brdzun lnga ltung bar byed pa min zhes bshad /
yaṣca mithyādṛṣṭipravartito mṛṣāvādaḥ /
paiśunyādayastu mithyādṛṣṭipravartitā mohajāḥ /
yaṣcaca vedādyasacchāstrapralāpaḥ 		zhes smras pa lta bu dang gang yang log par lta bas rab tu bcug pa'i brdzun du smra ba'o /
phra ma la sogs pa gti mug las skyes pa ni log pa'i lta bas rab tu bcug pa dang gang yang rig byed la sogs pa bstan bcos ngan pa rdol ba'o /
abhidhyādayaḥ kathaṃ lobhajāḥ /
tadanantarasaṃbhūterabhidhyādyāstrimūlajāḥ 		ji ltar na brnab sems la sogs pa chags pa la sogs pa las skyes pa yin zhe na /
de yi mjug thogs las byung phyir /
brnab sems sogs rtsa gsum las skyes /
lobhādanantaramutpannā lobhajāḥ dveṣādanantaraṃ dveṣajā mohādanantaraṃ mohajāḥ chags pa'i mjug thogs su byung ba ni chags pa las skyes pa dag yin no /
zhe sdang gi mjug thogs su byung ba ni zhe sdang las skyes pa dag yin no /
uktā kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ /
kuśalāḥ kathamityāha /
kuśalāḥ saprayogāntā alobhadveṣamohajāḥ 		gti mug gi mjug thogs su byung ba ni gti mug las skyes pa dag yin no /
mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams bshad zin to /
dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams ji lta bu zhe na /
saprayogapṛṣṭhāḥ kuśalāḥ karmapathā alobhadveṣamohajāḥ dge ba sbyor dang mjug bcas rnams /
chags sdang gti mug med las skyes /
kuṣalacittasamutthitatvāt /
tasya ca avaśya malobhādibhiḥ saṃprayogāt tatrākuśala karmapathaprayogādviratiḥ kuśalakarmapathaprayogaḥ /
maulādviratiḥ maulaḥ /
pṛṣṭhād viratiḥ pṛṣṭhaḥ /
tadyathā śrāmaṇera upasaṃpādyamāno nānāvāsaṃ praviśati bhikṣūnvandate upādhyāyaṃ yācate yāvadekaṃ karmavācanaṃ kriyate dvitīyaṃ ca /
ayaṃ prayogaḥ 		dge ba'i las kyi lam sbyor ba dang mjug dang bcas pa rnams ni dge ba'i sems kyis kun nas bslang ba'i phyir dang de yang gdon mi za bar ma chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ma chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa las skyes pa dag yin no /
de la mi dge ba'i las kyi lam ni sbyor ba spong ba ni dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi sbyor ba yin no /
dngos spong ba ni dngos yin no /
mjug spong ba ni mug yin te /
'di sta [*lta?] ste dge tshul bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa gnas sna tshogs par 'jug par byed /
dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar byed /
mkhan po la gsol ba 'debs par byed pa nas las lan gcig brjod pa dang lan gnyis brjod pa'i bar 'di ni sbyor ba yin no /
tṛtīya karmavācane yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ lan gsum pa brjod pa'i che rnam par rig byed dang de'i skad cig gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang yin pa 'di ni las kyi lam dngos yin no /
tata ūrdhvaṃ yāvanniśrayā ārocyante tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vijñapayati avijñaptica yāvadatuvartate idaṃ pṛṣṭham de'i 'og tu ji srid du gnas bsgo ba'am /
de'i rten rnam par rig par byed pa dang ji srid du rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin pa rjes su 'brang ba 'di ni mjug yin no /
yaduktaṃ na sarveṣāṃ karmapathānāṃ lobhādibhirniṣṭhetyatha kasya kena niṣṭhā las kyi lam thams cad chags pa la sogs pas mthar phyin par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes gang bshad na /
'o na gang zhig gang gis mthar phyin par byed ce na /
vadhavyāpādapāruṣyaniṣṭhā dveṣeṇa gsod dang gnod sems tshig rtsub po /
zhe sdang gis ni mthar phyin byed /
eṣāṃ prāṇātipātavyāpādapāruṣpāṇāṃ dveṣeṇa samāptiḥ srog gcod pa dang gnod sems dang tshig rtsub po dang 'di dag ni zhe sdang gis mthar phyin par byed de /
parityāgaparuṣacittasaṃmukhī bhāvāt yongs su 'dor ba dang rtsub pa'i sems mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro /
lobhataḥ /
parastrīgamanābhidhyā 'dattādānasamāpanam 		log g yem brnab sems ma byin len /
chags pa sems ni rdzogs par byed /
lobhena kāmamithyācārābhidhyā 'dattādānānāṃ samāptiḥ 'dod pas log par g yem pa dang brnab sems dang ma byin par len pa rnams ni chags pas rdzogs par byed do /
mithyādṛṣṭestu mohena log par lta ba gti mug gis /
adhimātrabhūto hi tāṃ niṣṭhāpayati cher rmongs par gyur na mthar phyin par byed do /
śeṣāṇāṃ tribhiriṣyate lhag ma gsum gyis rdzogs par 'dod /
ke punaḥ śeṣāḥ /
mṛṣāvādapaiśunyasaṃbhinnapralāpāḥ 		lhag ma yang gang dag ce na /
brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang tshig kyal pa ste /
de dag ni chags pa'am /
eṣāṃ tribhirapi niṣṭhā lobhena dveṣeṇa mohena vā zhe sdang ngam /
gti mug gsum kas kyang mthar phyin par byed do; /
ya ete karmapathāścaturbhiḥ kāṇḍairuktāstrayastraya ekastrayaśca eṣāṃ yathākramaṃ gang 'di las kyi lam cha bzhir bshad pa de dag ni gsum dang gsum dang gcig dang gsum dang go rims bzhin te /
sattvabhogāvadhiṣṭhānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca gzhi ni sems can longs spyod dang /
ming dang gzugs dang ming yin no /
sattvādhiṣṭhānā vadhādayaḥ srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i gzhi ni sems can yin no; /
bhogādhiṣṭhānāṃ parastrīgamanādayaḥ gzhan gyi bud med kyi gan du 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gzhi ni longs spyod yin no /
nāmarūpādhiṣṭhāmithyādṛṣṭiḥ log par lta ba'i gzhi ni ming dang gzugs yin no /
nāmakāyādhiṣṭhānā mṛṣāvādādayaḥ brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa'i gzhi ni ming gi tshogs yin no /
yaḥ paraṃ maraṇānniyamayya samaṃ tena pūrvaṃ vā mriyate kimasya maulaḥ karmapatho bhavatyutāho na gang zhig gi pha rol po 'chi bar nges par byas nas de dang mgo mnyam du 'am sngar shin ci de la las kyi lam dngos yod dam 'on te med ce na /
samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ /
ata evocyate syāt prayogaṃ kuryāt phalaṃ ca paripūrayenna ca prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate 		snga dang mnyam du shi ba la /
dngos po med de nyid kyi phyir /
sbyor ba yang byas la 'bras bu yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur kyang srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis sam /
āha /
syāt yathāpi tadvyaparopavaḥ pūrvaṃ saha vā kālaṃ kuryāditi kiṃ punastatkāraṇam nahi vadhye jīvati hantuḥ prāṇātipātāvadyenāsti yogo nāpi sahamṛtasya hantuḥ /
anyāśrayodayāt /
thenāśrayeṇa tatprayogaḥ kṛtaḥ sa ucchinno 'nya evāśrayo nikāyasabhāgabhinna utpannaḥ 		bka' stsal pa yod de /
'di lta ste gsod pa po sngar ram mnyam du shi bar gyur pa lta bu'o zhes gsungs so /
de la rgyu ci zhig yod ce na /
gsad par bya ba gson bzhin du gsod pa po la kha na ma tho ba dang ldan pa yang med la /
gsod pa po shi ba la yang ma yin te /
lus gzhan skyes phyir ro /
lus gang gis de la sbyor ba byas pa de ni chad la ris mthun pa tha dad pa gzhan gyi lus kho na zhig byung ste /
tasya prayoktṛtvāt karmapathena yogo na yuktaḥ de ni sbyor ba po ma yin pa'i phyir las kyi lam dang ldan par rig pa ma yin no /
yatsenāpātamṛgayāvaskandheṣu pareṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ bahavaḥ samagrāḥ patantyekaśca prāṇātipātaṃ karoti kastena samanvāgato bhavati gang dmag gis gdab pa dang lings 'debs pa dang ma 'phrigs par gdab pa dag tu pha rol po gsad par bya ba'i phyir mang po tshogs pas btab la gcig cig gis srog gcod na de dang su zhig ldan par 'gyur zhe na /
senādiṣvekakāryatvāt sarve kattṛvadanvitāḥ /
yathaiva hi karttā tathā sarve samanvāgatā bhavantyekakāryatvāt 		dmag la sogs par don gcig phyir /
thams cad byed pa blo bzhin ldan /
don gcig pa'i phyir thams cad byed pa po ji lta ba bzhin ldan par 'gyur te /
arthato hi te 'yonyaṃ payoktāro bhavanti /
yastarhi balānnīyate so'pi samanvāgato bhavatyanyatra ya evaṃ naścitya yāyāt yāvajjīvitahetorapi prāṇinaṃ na haniṣyāmīti 		de dag ni don gyis na phan tshun du sbyor bar byed pa yin no /
'o na gang zhig nan gyis khrid pa de ji lta bu zhe na /
de yang ldan par 'gyur ba ste /
gang zhig 'di snyam du sog gi phyir yang srog chags mi gsod de zhes bya bar nges bar byas te 'gro ba ni ma gtogs so /
kiyatā punaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ svayaṃ kurvataḥ karmapatho bhavati kiyatā yāvanmithyādṛṣṭiḥ karmapathaḥ iti lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ taducyate rang gi srog gcod par byed pa la ji tsam gyis las kyi lam du 'gyur zhes bya ba nas ji tsam gyis na log par lta ba'i las kyi lam du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
de brjod do /
prāṇātipātaḥ saṃcintya parasyābhrāntimāraṇam srog gcod pa ni bsams bzhin du ma nor ba ni gzhan gsad pa'o /
yadi mārayiṣyāmyenamiti saṃjñāya paraṃ mārayati tameva ca mārayati nānyaṃ bhramitvā gal te 'di bsad do snyam du bsams nas gsod par byed la /
gzhan dang ma nor bar de nyid kyang gsod par byed na de tsam gyis srog gcod pa yin no /
iyatā prāṇātipāto bhavati 'o na gang zhig 'di ci srog chags sam srog chags ma yin /
yastarhi saṃdigdho mārayati kimayaṃ prāṇī na prāṇīti sa evānyo veti so 'pyavaśyametaṃ niścayaṃ labdhvā tatra praharati /
yo 'stu so 'stviti kṛtamevānena tyāgacittaṃ bhavati 		de 'am gzhan zhig yin snyam du the tsom zos nas gsod par byed pa de ji lta bu zhe na /
de yang gdon mi za bar gang yin pa yin zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di rnyed nas de la snun par byed pas des na 'dor ba'i sems su byas pa kho na yin no /
kathaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu skandheṣu prāṇātipāto bhavati /
prāṇo nāma vāyuḥ kāyacittasaṃniśrito vartate 		phung po skad cig ma rnams la ji ltar srog gcod pa yin zhe na /
srog zhes bya ba ni lus dang sems la brten nas 'jug pa'i rlung yin te /
tamabhipātayati de gcod par byed do /
yathā pradīpaṃ nirodhayati ghaṇṭāsvanaṃ vā dper na mar me 'am /
dril bu'i skad 'gag par byed pa dang 'dra'o /
jīvitendriyaṃ vā prāṇāstannirodhayati /
yadyekasyāpi jīvitakṣaṇasyotpadyamānasyāntarāyaṃ karoti prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate nānyathā 		yang na srog gi dbang po srog yin te /
de 'gag par byed do /
gal te srog gi dbang po'i skad cig ma gcig skye ba la bar chad byed na yang srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
kasya tajjīvitaṃ yastadabhāvānmṛto bhavati de med pas gang zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i srog de gang yin zhe na /
kasyeti ṣaṣṭhīṃ pudgalavāde vicārayiṣyāmaḥ gang gi zhes bya ba'i drug pa ni gang zag tu smra ba dgag par dpyad par bya'o /
uktaṃ tu bhagavatā bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
āyuruṣmā 'tha vijñānaṃ yadā kāyaṃ jahatyamī gang tshe tshe dang drod rnams shes /
'di dag gis ni lus 'dor zhing /
apaviddhastadā śete yathā kāṣṭhamacetana /
tasmātsendriyaḥ kāyo jīvatītyucyate anindriyo mṛta iti 		bor na de tshe 'dug pa ni /
ji ltar shing la sems med bzhin /
zhes gsungs te /
de lta bas na dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus ni gson po zhes bya la /
dbang po med pa ni shi ba zhes bya'o /
abuddhipūrvādapi prāṇivadhāt karturadharmo yathā 'gnisaṃyogāddāha iti nirgranthāḥ gcer bu pa rnams na re blo sngar ma btang ba'i srog gcod pas kyang byed pa po chos ma yin pa dang ldan par 'gyur te /
dper na me dang reg pa las tshig par 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes zer ro /
teṣāṃ paradāradarśane 'pyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ /
nirgranthaśiroluñcane ca kaṣṭatapodeśane ca śāstuḥ tadvisūcikāmaraṇe ca dāturvaidyānāṃ cāturapīḍane maraṇe ca mātṛgabhasthayoścānyonyaṃ duḥkhanimittatvāt 		de dag gi ltar na gzhan gyi chung ma mthong ba dang reg pa la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro /
gcer bu pa skra 'bal ba dang dka' thub drag po'i lung 'bogs pa dang de dag gsad de shin yang sbyin pa po la de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro /
ma dang bu lto na yod pa dag kyang phun tshun sdug bsngal gyi rgyu mtshan du gyur pa'i phyir de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro /
vadhyasyāpi ca tatkriyāsaṃbandhādagnisvāśrayadāhavat /
kāryataścāprasaṅgastadasambandhāt 		gsod par bya ba yang de'i bya ba dang 'brel ba'i phyir de ltar thal bar 'gyur te /
mes rang gi rten sreg pa bzhin no /
byed du 'jug pa la yang thal par mi 'gyur te /
pareṇāgnim sparśayatastenādāhavat gzhan me la reg tu 'jug pa me des mi 'tshig pa bzhin no /
acetanānāṃ ca kāṣṭhādīnāṃ gṛhapāte prāṇivadhāt pāpaprasaṅgo na vā dṛṣṭāntamātrātsiddhiriti /
uktaḥ prāṇātipātaḥ /
adattādānamanyasvasvīkriyā balacauryataḥ 		khyim rdib na srog chags dag 'chi ba'i phyir shing la sogs pa med pa rnams kyang sdig pa dang ldan par thal bar 'gyur ro /
nad pa la gnod pa dang shi ba na sman pa rnams la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro /
yang na dpe tsam gyis ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ro /
srog gcod pa bshad zin to /
ma byin len pa gzhan gyi nor /
mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir byed /
abhrāntyeti vartate ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
yadi balādvā cauryeṇa vā parasvaṃ svīkaroti yatraiva ca balacauryābhiprāyeṇānyatra saṃjñāvibhramāt iyatā 'dattādānaṃ bhavati gal te gzhan gyis bdag gir byas pa la mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir byed cing /
gang du mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir bya bar bsams pa de las gzhan du 'du shes kyang ma 'khrul na de tsam gyis ma byin par len pa yin no /
stūpādapaharato buddhāda dattādānam mchod rten las phrogs pa ni sangs rgyas las ma byin par blangs pa yin te /
sarvaṃ hi tadbhagavatā parinirvāṇakāle parigṛthītamiti bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i che de dag thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ro /
yeṣāṃ samrakṣyamityapare /
asvāmikaṃ ca nidhimuddharato viṣayasvāmikāt parivartakaṃ harataḥ kṛte karmaṇi sīmāprāptebhyaḥ akṛte sarvabuddhaśaikṣyebhyaḥ 		gzhan dag na re srung ma gang dag yin pa las so zhes zer ro /
bdag po med pa'i gter brus na ni yul gyi bdag po las so /
shi ba'i nor phrogs na las byas pa zhig yin na ni mtshams kyi nang du gtogs pa rnams las so /
ma byas pa zhig yin na ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad las so /
agamyagamanaṃ kāmamithyācāraścaturvidhaḥ bgrod mi ma 'gro ba 'dod pa yis /
log par g yem pa rnam pa bzhi /
catuṣprakāramagamyagamanaṃ kāmamithyācāraḥ /
agamyāṃ gacchati paraparigṛhītāṃ vā mātaraṃ duhitaraṃ vā mātṛpitṛsaṃbandhinīṃ vā 		bgrod par bya ba ma yin par 'gro ba 'dod pas log par g yem pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
bgrod pa bya ba ma yin pa gzhan gyis yongs su gzung ba 'am /
ma 'am /
bu mo 'am pha dang ma dang 'brel ba'i gan du 'gro'am /
anaṅge vā gacchati svāmapi bhāryām apāne mukhe vā rang gi chung ma yin yang yan lag ma yin par 'gro ba ste /
kha'am rkub tu 'jug pa'am /
adeśe vā gacchati prakāśe caitye vihāre vā yul ma yin par 'gro ba'am /
snang ba'am mchod rten nam /
akāle vā gacchati /
kaḥ punaḥ akālaḥ /
garbhiṇīṃ vā gacchati pāyayantīṃ vā saniyamāṃ vā 		gtsug lag khang ngam /
dus ma yin par 'gro ba ste /
dus ma yin pa gang zhe na /
sbrum ma'am /
nu zho 'thung ba'am /
nges pa dang bcas pa'i gan du 'gro ba'o /
yadi bharturanujñayā saniyamā bhavatītyeke kha cig na re gal te khyos gnang na nges pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes zer ro /
abhrāntyeti vartate ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
yadi svasaṃjñī parastriyaṃ yāyāt na syāt karmapathaḥ gal te bdag gi yin pa'i 'du shes kyis gzhan gyi chung ma'i gan du song na las kyi lam du mi 'gyur ro /
yadyanyaḥ parastrīsaṃjñayā 'nyāmabhigacchet paradāraprayogādvastuparibhogācca syādityeke /
anyatra prayogānna syāt prāṇāti pātavadityapare /
bhikṣuṇīṃ gacchataḥ kasyāntikāt kāmamithyācāraḥ 		gal te gzhan gyi chung ma ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis gzhan zhig gi gan du song na /
kha cig na re gzhan gyi chung ma la sbyar bar byas pa'i phyir dang dngos po yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
gzhan dag na re sbyor ba gzhan du byas pa'i phyir mi 'gyur te /
srog gcod pa bzhan [*bzhin?] no zhes zer ro /
dge slong ma'i gan du 'gro ba su las 'dod pa la log par g yem pa yin zhe na /
viṣayasvāminaḥ /
tasya hi tanna marṣaṇīyam /
tasyāpi saniyamā svabhāryeva tu sā na gamyā /
kumārīṃ gacchato yasya nisṛṣṭā no cedyasya rakṣā 'ntato rājñaḥ 		yul gyi bdag po las te des ni de mi bzod par bya ba yin no /
des ni rang gi chung ma nges pa dang bcas pa bzhin du bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa yang yin no /
gzhon nu ma'i gan du 'gro ba ni gang la byin pa las so /
gal te sbyin pa med na srung ba gang yin pa dang tha na rgyal po las so /
anyathāsaṃjñino vākyamarthābhijñe mṛṣāvacaḥ /
yadi yamarthaṃ bravīti tasminnanyathāsamjñī bhavati yaṃ cādhikṛtya bravīti sa tasya vākyasyārthābhijño bhavati tadvākyaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ 		brdzun tshig 'du shes gzhan bsgyur ba'i /
tshig don mngon par go ba'o /
don smra ba gang yin pa de la 'du shes gzhan du bsgyur la des gang gi dbang du byas nas smras pa'i tshig de'i don yang go na tshig de ni brdzun du smra ba'i yin no /
anabhijñe kiṃ syāt /
saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ syāt 		mngon par ma go na cir 'gyur zhe na /
tshig kyal par 'gyur ro /
vākyamityucyate /
kadācicca bahavo varṇā vākyaṃ bhavantīti katamaḥ tatra karmapathaḥ 		tshig ces bya ba ni res 'ga' yi ge mang po zhig las tshig tu 'gyur na de la las kyi lam gang zhig yin zhe na /
paścimaḥ sahāvijñaptyā yatra cārthābhijño bhavati /
pūrve tu varṇāḥ prayogaḥ 		tha ma rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang bcas pa'o /
yang na gang las don go bar 'gyur ba ste /
yi ge snga ma rnams ni sbyor ba yin no /
arthābhijña ityucyate /
ki tāvadabhijñātārthe śrotari āhosvit abhijñātuṃ samarthe /
kiṃ cātaḥ /
yadyabhijñātārthe manovijñānaviṣayatvādvākyārthasya śrotravijñānena saha nirodhācca vāgvijñapteravijñaptireva syāt karmapathaḥ 		don mngon par go ba zhes bya ba ci re zhig nyan pa pos don mngon par go ba yin nam /
'on te mngon par go bar nus pa zhig yin /
de las cir 'gyur /
gal te don mngon par go ba yin na ni tshig gi don yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'gags pa'i phyir /
athābhijñātuṃ samarthe /
evaṃ doṣo na bhavati /
kathaṃ cābhijñātuṃ samartho 'pyutpannabhāva utpanne śrotravijñāne 		rnam par rig byed ma yan pa kho na las kyi lam du 'gyur ro /
'on te mngon par go bar nus pa ma yin na ni de lta ni nyes par mi 'gyur te /
ji ltar na mngon par go bar nus pa yin zhe na /
skad byang ba dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa'o /
yathā na doṣastathā 'stu ji ltar nyes pa med pa de lta bu yin no /
ṣodaśa vyavahārāḥ sūtra uktāḥ /
