adṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā aśrute 'mate 'vijñāte vijñātavāditā dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭavāditā yāvad vijñāte 'vijñātavāditā itīme 'nāryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ 		mdo las tha snyad bcu drug gsungs pa la ma mthong ba la mthong zhes smras pa dang ma thos pa dang ma rtogs pa dang rnam par ma shes pa la rnam par shes so zhes smra ba dang mthong ba la ma mthong ngo zhes smra ba dang rnam par shes pa'i bar la rnam par ma shes so zhes smra ba dang brgyad po 'di ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad dag yin no /
dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadvijñāte vijñātavāditā adṛṣṭ 'dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadavijñāte avijñātavāditā itīme āryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ /
tatraiṣāṃ dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātānāṃ kiṃ lakṣaṇam 		mthong ba la mthong ngo zhes smra ba nas rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes so zhes smra ba'i bar dang; ma mthong ba la ma mthong ngo zhes smra ba nas rnam par ma shes so zhes smra ba'i bar brgyad po 'di ni 'phags pa'i tha snyad dag yin no /
de la mthong ba dang thos pa dang rtogs pa dang rnam par shes pa de dag gi mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
cakṣuḥ śrotramanaścittairanubhūtaṃ tribhiśca yat mig rna yid kyi rnam shes dang /
gsum gyis nyams su myong gang des /
taddṛṣṭaśrutavijñātaṃ mataṃ coktaṃ yathākramam /
yaccakṣurvijñānenānubhūtaṃ taddṛṣṭamityuktam 		mthong thos rnam par shes pa dang /
rtogs pa yin te go rims bshad /
mig gi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni mthong ba zhes bshad do /
yacchrotravijñānena tacchrutam /
yanmano vijñānena tat vijñātam /
yat ghrāṇajihvākāyavijñānaistanmatam /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
gandharasaspraṣṭavyānyavyākṛtatvānmṛtakalpāni /
ata eteṣu matākhyeti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
kimatra jñāpakam /
sūtraṃ yuktiśca /
sūtraṃ tāvat tatkiṃ manyase māhakīmātaḥ yāni tvayā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi na dṛṣṭāni na dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi na paśyasi nāpi te evaṃ bhavati paśyeyamiti /
api nu te tannidānamutpannaśchando vā rāgo vā sneho vā yena vā ālayo vā nīyatiradhyavasānaṃ vā 		rna ba'i rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni thos pa zhes bshad do /
yid kyi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bshad do /
sna dang lce dang lus kyi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa zhes bshad do /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir shi ba dang 'dra ste /
de'i phyir de dag la ni rtogs pa zhes zer ro /
de'i phyir de dag la ni rtogs pa zhes zer ro /
'di la khungs ci zhig yod ce na /
mdo dang rigs pa yod de /
re zhig mdo ni mchod byed kyi ma can 'di ji snyam du sems /
gzugs gang dag khyod kyi mig gis ma mthong ste sngon ma mthong zhing mi lta la /
khyod 'di snyam du blta bar bya'o snyam du yang mi sems na /
gzhi de las khyod 'dun pa'am /
'dod chags sam 'dod pa'am dga' ba'am /
no bhadanta /
ye tvayā śrotreṇa śabdā na śrutā na śrutapūrvā vistareṇa yāvanmanasā dharmā na vijñātā vistareṇa yāvanno bhadanta 		chags pa'am /
'chums pa'am /
lhag par chags pa skye ba'am /
btsun pa ma lags so /
sgra gang dag khyod kyi rna bas ma thos te /
sngon ma thos zhes bya ba dang rgyas par yid kyis chos rnams rnam par ma shes te zhes bya ba nas rgyas par btsun pa ma lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
atra ca te māhakīmātardṛṣṭe dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhaviṣyati śrute mate vijñāte vijñātapātramityuktam mchod byed kyi ma can khyod 'di la mthong na yang mthong ba tsam du 'gyur la /
thos pa dang rtogs pa dang; rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa tsam du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs ba yin te /
atastriṣu viṣayeṣu dṛṣṭaśrutavijñātaśabdāpadeśādgandhādiṣu matākhyā amyate /
ata evaṃ cāniṣyamāṇe dṛṣṭādibhāvabāhyatvāt gandhādiṣu vyavahāro na syādityeṣā yuktiḥ /
sūtraṃ tāvajjñāpakamanyārthatvāt 		de'i phyir yul gsum la mthong ba dang thos pa dang rnam par shes pa'i sgras bstan pa'i phyir dri la sogs pa la rtogs zhes bya bar go 'o /
de ltar mi 'dod na mthong ba la sogs pa'i dngos po'i nang du ma gtogs pa'i phyir dri la sogs pa la tha snyad 'dogs par yang mi 'gyur te /
'di ni rigs pa yin no /
re zhig mdo 'di don gzhan yin pa'i phyir /
khungs ma yin te /
na hyatra sūtre bhagavān vyavahārānāṃ lakṣāṇaṃ śāsti sma bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di la tha snyad rnams kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa de ni ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
atra ca te ṣaḍvidhe viṣaye caturṣu vyavahāreṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāramātraṃ bhaviṣyati na priyāpriyanimittādhyāropa ityayamatra sūtrārtho dṛśyate 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
'dir ni khyod yul rnam pa drug po 'di la mthong ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad bzhi la mthong ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad tsam du 'gyur gyi sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan mar sgro 'dogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mdo'i don yin par snang ngo /
kiṃ punarḍṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ ca yāvadvijñātam /
kecittāvadāhuḥ /
yat pañcabhirindriyaiḥ pratyakṣaṃ taddṛṣṭam 		yang mthong ba ni ci zhig yin /
rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang ci zhig yin zhe na /
re zhig kha cig na re dbang bo lngas mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'o /
yat parata āgamitaṃ tacchrutam pha rol las 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa'o /
yat svayaṃ yuktyanumānato rucitaṃ tanmatam bdag nyid kyi rigs pas rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa'o /
yanmanaḥpratyakṣabhāvenādhiṣṭitaṃ pratyātmavedyaṃ tadvijñātamiti /
ete ca pañca viṣayāḥ pratyekaṃ dṛṣṭā iti vā kṛtvā vyavahrilyante 		yid kyi mngon sum du gyur pa bsgoms na sa rtogs pa so so rang gis rig par bya ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o /
yang yul lnga po 'di dag re re la yang mthong ba'am thos pa'am /
śrutā matā vijñātā iti vā /
ṣaṣṭho 'nyatra dṛṣṭāditi nāsti gandhādiṣu vyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ 		rtogs pa'am /
rnam par shes pa yin no zhes tha snyad gdags la /
drug pa la ni mthong ba ma gtogs te /
de ltar na dri la sogs pa la tha snyad 'dogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba yang med de /
tasmādyuktiṃrapyeṣā yuktirna bhavati /
pūrvācāryā evamāhuḥ /
yad dṛṣṭaṃ yat pratyakṣīkṛtaṃ cakṣuṣā /
śrutaṃ yac chrotreṇa parataścākharitam 		de lta bas na rigs pa de yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes zer ro /
sngon gyi slob dpon rnams ni 'di skad du /
mig gis mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'o /
rna bas thos pa dang pha rol las 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa'o /
mataṃ yat svayaṃ cintitam bdag nyid kyis bsam pa gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa'o /
vijñātaṃ yat pratyātmapratisaṃveditamadhigataṃ cotpannam bdag nyid kyis so sor yang dag par rig pa dang rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes zer ro /
prasaṅgena śāstraṃ pravartayatām zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs so /
bstan bcos la 'jug par bya ste /
yaḥ kāyenānyathātvaṃ prāpyetsyānmṛṣāvādaḥ gang zhig lus kyi don gzhan go par byed na brdzun du smra par 'gyur ram zhe na /
syāt /
ata evocyate /
syiānna kāyena parākrameta prāṇātipātāvadyena ca spṛśyeta 		'gyur ro /
de nyid kyi phyir /
lus kyis mi byed na srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho pa'i reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na yod do /
syādvācā parākrameta syānna vācā parākrameta mṛṣāvādāvadyena ca spṛśyeta /
syāt kāyena parākrameta syānna kāyena na vācā parākrakmeta ubhayāvadyena ca spṛśyeta 		ngag gis byed par 'gyur na'o /
ngag gis mi byed na brdzun gyi kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na yod do /
lus kyis byed par 'gyur na'o /
lus kyis kyang mi byed /
ngag gis kyang mi byed na /
kha na ma tho ba gnyi gas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
syāt ṛśīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣeṇa poṣadhanidarśanaṃ cātreti /
yadyubhayathā 'pi na parākrameta na cāvijñaptikāstyavijñaptiḥ kāmāvacarī kathaṃ tayoḥ karmapathaḥ siddhyati /
kartavyo 'tra yatnaḥ 		yod de /
'dir drang srong rnams yid rab tu khros pa dang gso sbyong dper bya'o zhes gsungs so /
gnyi gas yang mi byed na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rnam par rig byed med pa can yang med pas ji ltar na de gnyis kyis las kyi lam du 'grub ste /
'di la 'bad par bya'o /
gato mṛṣāvādaḥ brdzun du smra ba rdzogs so /
paiśunyaṃ kliṣṭacittasya vacanaṃ parabhedane phra ma pha rol dbye ba'i phyir /
nyon mongs can gyi sems kyi tshig /
yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāṃ bhedāya vacanamaprītaye tat paiśunyam pha rol po dag dbye zhing mi mdza' bar bya ba'i phyir sems kyi nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig gang yin pa de ni phra ma yin te /
arthabhijña iti vartate abhrāntyeti ca don mngon par go ba dang ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
pāruṣyamapriyaṃ /
vacanat 		tshig rtsub po ni mi snyan pa /
kliṣṭacittasyeti vartate /
arthābhijñe abhrāntyeti ca 		sems nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig dang don mngon par go ba dang ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāmapriyavacanamarthābhijñe tatraiva ca yat vivakṣitaṃ tat pāruṣyam sems nyon mongs pa can gyis ci'i tshig mi snyan pa pha rol po la smras shing don mngon par go la gang la smra bar 'dod pa de nyid la smra ba gang yin pa de ni tshig rtsub po yin no /
sarvaṃ kliṣṭaṃ bhinna pralāpitā nyon mongs can kun kyal pa nyid /
vākyamityadhikāro vartate tshig ces bya ba'i dbang du byas par sbyar te /
sarvaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig thams cad ni tshig kyal pa yin no /
saiva saṃbhinnapralāpitā /
tadyogena hi saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati 		de nyid na ni kyal pa nyid yin te /
de dang ldan pa ni tshig kyal pa can yin no /
ato 'nyat kliṣṭamityanye gzhan ni de las gzhan nyon mongs /
ato mṛṣāvādādikādvākkarmaṇo yadanyat kliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ tatsaṃbhinnapralāpa ityapare gzhan dag na re ngag gi las brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa de dag las gzhan pa nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig gang yin pa de ni tshig kyal pa yin no zhes zer te /
lapanāgītanāṭyavat kha gsag glu dang zlos gar bzhin /
kuśāstravacca bstan bcos ngan bzhin /
tadyathā bhikṣurmithyājīvī lapanāṃ karoti raktāśca kecit gāyanti nāṭacye ca naṭāḥ pareṣāṃ rañjanārthaṃ pralapanti /
kukśāstrāṇi ca taddṛṣṭayo 'pi gadanti /
evaṃ paridevasaṃgaṇikādikamapi yadanyanmṛṣāvādādibhyaḥ kliṣṭaṃ vākkarma tatsaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ 		dper na dge slong log pas 'tsho ba can kha gsag byed pa dang chags pas kha cig glu len pa dang zlos gar mkhan rnams zlos gar gyi tshe gzhan dag mgu bar bya ba'i phyir 'khyal pa dang de'i lta bar gyur nas bstan bcos ngan pa dag gdon pa dang de bzhin du smre sngags 'don pa dang 'du 'dzi'i gtam la sogs pa brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa las gzhan pa nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig gang yin pa de yang tshig kyal pa yin no /
ji ltar na 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe glu yang yod la tshig kyal pa yang ma yin zhe na /
kathaṃ cakravartikāle gītaṃ cāsti na ca saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ /
naiṣkramyopasaṃhitāni hi tadānīṃ giyante sma na grāmyarasopasaṃhitāni /
tadāpyāvāhavivāhadyabhilāpasadbhāvādasti saṃbhinnapralāpo na karmapatha ityapare 		de'i tshe nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i glu dag blangs kyi stegs sngags dang ldan pa dag ni ma yin no /
gzhan dag na re de'i tshe yang bag ma len pa dang /
bag ma gtong ba la sogs pa'i mngon par brjod pa yod pas tshig kyal pa ni yod mod kyi las kyi lam ni ma yin no zhes zer ro /
abhidhyā tu parasvaviṣamaspṛhā brnab sems ni /
log pas gzhan gyi nor la chags /
aho vata yat pareṣāṃ tanmama syāditi parasvebhyo yā viṣameṇānyāyena spṛhā svīkaranecchā balādvā copāyādvā sā 'bhidhyā karmapathaḥ /
sarvaiva kāmāvacarī tṛṣṇābhidhyetyapare 		pha rol po dag gi gang yin pa de bdag gi yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam nas gzhan gyi nor dag la mthu'am 'jab bu 'ang rung log par mi rigs pas bdag gi ra byed 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni brnab sems kyi las kyi lam yin no /
gzhan dag na re 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sred pa thams cad brnab sems yin te /
tathā hi nivaraṇādhikāre kāmacchandamadhikṛtyoktaṃ sūtre so 'bhidhyāṃ loke prahāye tyevamādi /
yadyapi sarvābhidhyā natu sarvā karmapatha audārikaduṣcaritasaṃgrahādityapare 		'di ltar sgrib pa'i skabs su 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i dbang du mdzad nas mdo las de 'jig rten na brnab sems spangs te zhes bya ba de la sogs pa gsungs so zhes zer ro /
gzhan dag na re 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang brnab sems kyi las kyi lam yod par 'gyur du 'ong bas /
mā bhūccakravartināmapyuttarakauravānāṃ pābhidhyā karmapatha iti /
vyāpādaḥ sattvavidveṣaḥ /
sattveṣu vidveṣo vyāpādaḥ parapīḍākārapravṛttaḥ 		gal te thams cad brnab sems yin na yang thams cad las kyi lam ni ma yin te /
nyes par spyad pa che long bsdus pa'i phyir zhes zer ro /
gnod sems sems can la sdang ba /
sems can dag la zhe sdang ba pha rol la gnod pa'i rnam par zhugs pa ni gnod sems yin no /
nāstidṛṣṭiḥ śubhāśubhe dge dang mi dge med lta ba /
mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
śubhe cāśubhe ca karmaṇi yā nāstīti dṛṣṭiḥ sā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
tadyathā nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti hutaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityevamādi yāvanna santi loke 'hanta iti /
saiṣā sākalyena karmaphalāryāpavādikā mithyādṛṣṭirbhavati 		log par lta ba yin /
las dge ba dang mi dge ba med do zhes lta ba de ni log par lta ba yin te /
'di lta ste sbyin pa med do /
mchod sbyin med do /
sbyin sreg med do /
legs par spyad pa med do /
nyes par spyad pa med do zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa nas 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa med do zhes bya ba'i bar las dang 'bras bu dang 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ni ril gyis log par lta ba yin no /
ādimātraṃ tu śloke darśitam tshigs su bcad par ni dang po tsam zhig bstan par zad do /
evaṃlakṣaṇā ete daśa karmapathāḥ las kyi lam bcu po de dag gi mtshan nyid ni de lta bu yin no /
karmapathā iti ko'rthaḥ /
trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca 		las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
'di la /
gsum mam bdun ni las kyang yin /
abhidhyādayo hi trayaḥ karmaṇaḥ panthāna iti karmapathāḥ brnab sems la sogs pa gsum ni las kyi lam yin pas las kyi lam dag yin no /
tatsaṃprayogiṇī hi cetanā teṣāṃ vāhena vahati teṣāṃ gatyā gacchati /
tadvaśena tathābhisaṃskaraṇāt /
sapta tu prāṇātipātādayaḥ karma ca kāyavākkarmatvāt karmaṇaśca panthāna iti karmapathāstatsamutthānacetanāyāstānadhiṣṭhāya pravṛtteriti /
karmapathāścakarma ca karmapathāśceti karmapathāḥ 		de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa can gyi sems pa ni de dag gi rgyu bas rgyu ste /
de dag gi dbang gis de bzhin du mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir de dag gi 'gros kyis 'gro'o /
srog gcod pa la sogs pa bdun ni lus dang ngag gi las yin pa'i phyir las kyang yin la las kyi lam yin pas las kyi lam yang yin te /
de dag kun nas slong ba'i sems pa ni de dag la brten nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
de ltar na las kyi lam dang las dang las kyi lam yin pas na las kyi lam ste /
asarūpāṇāmapyekaśeṣasiddheḥ mi 'dra ba rnams la yang gcig bsdus par 'grub pa'i phyir ro /
evamanabhidhyādayaḥ prāṇātipātaviratyādayaśca jñeyāḥ brnab sems med pa la sogs pa dang srog gcod pa spong ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o /
prayogapṛṣṭāni karmāṇi karmapathāḥ yasmāttadarthaṃ tanmūlikā ca teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ ci'i phyir sbyor ba dang mjug dag las kyi lam ma yin zhe na /
'di ltar de dag gi de'i don dang de'i rtsa ba can du 'jug pa yin no /
yathaudārikaṃ ca grahaṇādityuktaṃ prāk sngar yang che long bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bshad pa yang yin no /
yeṣāṃ cotkarṣāpakarṣeṇādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānāmutkarṣāpakarṣau loke bhavataḥ 'jig rten na gang dag 'phel ba dang 'grib pas phyi nang gi dngos pa rnams 'phel ba dang 'grib pa yang yin no /
ye tarhi dārṣṭāntikā abhidhyādīneva manaskarmecchanti teṣāṃ te kathaṃ karmapathāḥ 'o na mdo sde pa gang dag brnab sems pa la sogs pa kho na yid kyi las su 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na de dag ji ltar las kyi lam yin zhe na /
ta eva hi praṣṭavyāḥ de dag nyid la dris shig /
api tu śakyaṃ vaktuṃ karma ca te panthānaśca sugatidurgatīnāmiti karmapathāḥ de lta mod kyi brjod par nus te /
de dag ni bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro rnams kyi las kyang yin la lam yang yin pas las kyi lam yin pa'am /
itaretarāvāhanādvā /
ya ete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ sarve ete kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samudācāravirodhinaḥ 		yang na gcig gis gcig 'dren pas na las kyi lam yin no /
mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dge pa'i chos rnams kun tu spyod pa dang 'gal ba yin la /
mūlacchedastvasaddṛṣṭyā /
kuśalamūlacchedastu mithyādṛṣṭyā bhavatyadhimātraparipūrṇayā 		med par lta bas rtsa ba gcod /
dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa ni log par lta ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par gcod do /
yattarhi śāstra uktaṃ katamānyadhimātrāṇyakuśalamūlāni 'o na ci'i phyir bstan bcos la mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rnams gang dag yin zhe na /
yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti kāmavairāgyaṃ cānuprāpnuvan yāni tatprathamata upalikhatīti mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod par byed pa dang 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par byed pa na dang po nyid du spong ba dag yin pa'o zhes bshad ce na /
akuśalamūlādhyāhṛtatvāt mithyādṛṣṭesteṣveva tatkarmāpadeśa eṣa kriyate tadyathāgnireva grāmaṃ dahani caurāstu tasyādhyāhārakā iti caurairgrāmo dagdha ityucyate log par lta ba mi dge ba'i rtsa bas drangs pa'i phyir de dag kho na la las kyi lam de bstan par mdzad de /
dper na me kho nas grong sreg par byed na rkun po rnams me de 'dren pa byed pa yin pas rkun po rnams kyis grong bsregs so zhes bya ba bzhin no /
katameṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ samucchedo bhavati dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gcig kun du 'chad par 'gyur zhe na /
kāmāptotpattilābhinām 'dod gtogs skyes nas thob pa rnams /
kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlāni samuchidyante 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du 'chad par 'gyur te /
rūpārūpyāvacarairasamanvāgatatvāt /
prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ tarhi kathaṃ nīyate /
iyatā 'nena pudgalena traidhātukāni kuśalamūlāli samucchinnāni bhavantīti /
tatprāptidūrīkaraṇamabhisaṃdhāyaitaduktam /
saṃtatestadabhājanatvāpādanāt 		gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dag dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro /
'o na btags pa las 'di tsam gyis na gang zag 'dis khams gsum pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcad pa yin no zhes ba shad pa ji ltar grangs de ni de'i thob pa thag sring par byed pa las dgongs nas gsungs pa yin te /
rgyud de'i snod ma yin pa nyid du byed pa'i phyir ro /
upapattipratilābhikānyeva ca samucchidyante skyes nas thob pa kho na dag kun du chad par 'gyur te /
prāyogikebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ parihīṇatvāt sbyor ba las byung ba dag las ni sngar yongs su nyams zin pa'i phyir ro /
kimālambanayā mithyādṛṣṭyā samucchidyante /
phalahetvapavādinyā /
yā ca hetumapavadate nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamiti yā ca phalaṃ nāsti sucaritaduścaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti 		ci la dmigs pa'i log par lta bas kun du gcod par byed ce na /
rgyu dang 'bras la skur 'debs pa /
legs par spyad pa med do /
nyes par spyad pa med do zhes rgyu la skur pa 'debs pa gang dag yin pa dang legs par spyad pa dang nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa med do zhes 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs pa gang dag yin pa'o /
ānantaryavimuktimārgasthānīye ete ityapare /
sāsravālambanayaiva nānāsravālambanayā sabhāgadhātvālambanayaiva ca na visabhāgadhātvālambanayā 		gzhan dag na re de dag ni bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam lta bu yin no zhes zer ro /
kha cig na re zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa kho nas yin gyi zag pa med pa la dmigs pas ni ma yin no /
skal ba mnyam pa'i khams la dmigs pa kho nas yin gyi skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams la ni dmigs pas ni ma yin te /
saṃprayogamātrānuśāyitvena durbalatvādityeke /
evaṃ tu varṇayanti 		mtshungs par ldan pa tsam gyi sgo nas rgyas pas nyam chung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
sarvathā /
navaprakārāṇyapi kuśalamūlāni sakṛtsamucchidyante 		'di skad du kun gyis kha cig na re dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa dgu char yang cig car du 'chad de /
darśanaprahātavyavadityeke mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag bzhin no zhes zer ro /
evaṃ tu varṇayanti /
kramaśaḥ 		'di skad du rim gyis zhes brjod de /
navaprakārayā mithyādṛṣṭyā navaprakārāṇi kuśalamūlāni samucchidyante /
bhāvanā heyakleśavat yāvadadhimātrādhimātrayā mṛdumṛdūnīti /
evamayaṃ granthaḥ pālito bhavati /
katamānyaṇusahagatāni kuśalamūlāni /
āha 		bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du chen po'i chen pos chung ngu'i chung ngu gcod par byed pa'i bar du log par lta ba rnam pa dgus dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa dgu gcod par byed de /
de ltar na phra mo dang lhan cig tu gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gang zhe na /
yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalāni samucchinnāni sarvapaścāt vijahāti yaiḥ vikīrṇaiḥ samucchinna kuśalamūla iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatīti /
asya tarhi granthasya ko nayaḥ /
katamānyadhiṃmātrādhimātrāṇyakuśalamūlāni 		dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod par byed pa na thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba gang dag yin pa ste /
gang dag med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du 'chad pa zhes bya ba'i grang su 'gro ba yin no zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di bskyab pa yin no /
'o na mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po gang dag yin zhe na /
yairakukśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinattīti /
samāptimetat saṃdhāyoktam /
tainiravaśeṣacchedāt /
eko 'pi hi prakāra steṣāmasamucchinnaḥ sarveṣāṃ punarutpattau hetuḥ syāditi 		mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di'i tshul ji lta bu yin zhe na; de dag gis ma lus par gcod pa'i phyir de ni rdzogs pa las dgongs te gsungs pa yin te /
de dag las rnam pa gcig ma chad na yang thams cad skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro /
darśanamārgavadabhyutthānena cchinattītyeke kha cig na re mthong ba'i lam bzhin du ma langs par gcod par byed do zhes zer ro /
evaṃ tu varṇayantyubhayatheti /
pūrvaṃ saṃvaraṃ vijahāti paścāt kuśalamūlāni samucchinattītyeke /
evaṃ tu varṇayanti /
yasya cittasya phalasaṃvarastattyāgāttasya tyāga iti 		'di skad du gnyi gar gcod par byed do zhes brjod do /
kha cig na re sngar sdom pa spangs la phyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod do zhes zer ro /
'di skad du sdom pa sems gang gi 'bras bu yin pa de gtong ba de yang gtong ngo zhes brjod do /
atha kuśalamūlāni samucchidyante /
nṛṣu 		gang du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod ce na /
manuṣyeṣveva nāpāyeṣu /
kliṣṭākliṣṭayoḥ prajñayoradṛḍhatvāt /
na deveṣu karmaphala pratyakṣatvāt /
triṣu dvīpeṣu nottarakurau /
apāpāśayatvāt jambūdvīpa evetyapare 		mi'i nang du mi'i nang kho na dag tu gcod kyi ngan song dag na ni ma yin te; shes rab nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dag mi bstan pa'i phyir ro /
lha dag gi nang na yang med de /
las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
gling gsum dag na yod kyi byang gi sgra mi snyan dag na yang med de /
sdig pa'i bsam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
teṣāmayaṃ grantho virudhyate /
jāmbūdvīpakaḥ sarvālpairaṣṭābhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ 		gzhan dag na re 'dzam bu'i gling kho na na yod do zhes zer te /
'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad pas nyung na dbang po brgyad dang ldan pa yin te /
evaṃ pūrvavidehako godānīyaka iti /
tāni punaḥ /
chinatti strī pumān /
stri ca samucchinatti puruṣaśca mandacchandavīryaprajñatvāt /
na strītyapare 		shar gyi lus 'phags po dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro /
de dag kyang /
skyes pa bud med kyis gcod do /
skyes pa dang bud med kyis kun du gcod par byed de /
gzhan dag na re 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus zhen pa'i phyir bud med kyis ni ma yin no zhes zer te /
ayaṃ grantho virudhyeta /
yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgato niyatamasāvaṣṭābhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgata iti /
teṣāmapi tṛṣṇācarito na samucchinatti 		gong ma'i dbang po dang ldan pa de dag gdon mi za bar dbang po brgyad dang ldan no zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro /
de dag las kyang sred pa spyad pas ni kun du gcod par mi byed de /
calāśayatvāt /
kastarhi /
dṛṣṭicaritaḥ 		bsam pa g yo ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
'o na ci zhe na /
lta spyad /
dṛḍhagūḍhapāpāśayatvāt /
ata eva na śaṇḍādayastṛṣṇācarite pakṣyatvāt 		sdig pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang /
mkhyud pa can yin pa'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir ma ning la sogs pas kyang ma yin te /
āpāyikavacca /
kiṃsvabhāvaḥ kuśalamūlasamucchedaḥ /
so 'samanvayaḥ /
yadā hi kuśalamūlānāṃ prāptirna punarutpadyate aprāptirapyutpadyate 		sred pa'i spyad pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyir dang ngan song bzhin no dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du 'chad pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig yin zhe na /
de ni mi ldan pa'o /
gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi thob pa yang mi skye la ma thob pa skye ba ste /
tasminnasamanvāgama utpanne samucchinnāni kuśalamūlānyucyante /
teṣāṃ samucchinnānāṃ kathaṃ punaḥ pratisaṃdhiḥ 		mi ldan pa de skyes na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du chad pa zhes bya'o /
kun du chad pa de dag ji ltar na yang nyid mtshams sbyor zhe na /
saṃdhiḥ kāṅkṣāstidṛṣṭibhyāṃ mtshams ni the tshom yod lta bas /
yadā 'sya hetuphale vicikitsā cotpadyate /
aṣṭidṛṣṭirvā samyak dṛṣṭirityarthaḥ 		nam zhig 'di la rgyu dang 'bras bu la the tshom skyes pa'am /
yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba'i don te /
tadā punaḥ tatprāptisamutpādāt pratisaṃdhitāni kuśalamūlānyucyante yod par lta ba skyes pa de'i tshe yang de'i thob pa kun du spyod pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nying mtshams sbyor zhes bya'o /
navaprakārāṇāṃ yugapat pratisaṃdhānaṃ krameṇa tu saṃmukhībhāva ārogyabalalābhavat nying mtshams ni rnam pa dgu cig car du sbyar ba la /
mngon sum du ni rim gyis 'gyur te /
nad med nas stobs rnyed pa bzhin no /
sa punasteṣāṃ pratisaṃdhiḥ yang de dag gi nying mtshams sbyor ba ni /
nehānantaryakāriṇaḥ /
anyasyaiveha syādānantaryakāriṇastu neha syāt 		mtshams med byed pa 'di las min /
gzhan gyis ni 'di nyid la 'gyur gyi mtshams med par byed pa ni ma yin te /
tameva saṃdhāyoktam abhavyo'yaṃ pudgalo dṛṣṭa eva dharme kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhātuṃ niyatamayaṃ navakebhyaścyavamāno vā upapadyamāno vā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhāsyati iti de nyid la dgongs nas /
gang zag 'di ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skal pa dang ldan pa ma yin gyi 'di ni nges par dmyal ba dag na 'chi 'pho ba 'am skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te /
skye ba ni srid pa bar ma la gnas pa'o /
'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho ba la mngon du phyogs pa'o /
upapadyamāno 'ntarābhavasthaścyavamānaścyutyabhimukhastatra punaryo hetubalena samucchinatti sa cyavamānaḥ pratisaṃdadhāti yaḥ pratyayabalena sa upapadyamānaḥ de la gang zhig rgyu'i stobs kyis kun du gcod pa de ni 'chi 'pho ba na nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro /
gang zhig rkyen gyi stobs kyis kun du gcod pa de ni skye ba na nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te /
evaṃ yaḥ svabalena parabalena /
punarāha /
ya āśayavipannaḥ samucchinatti sa dṛṣṭe dharme pratisaṃdadhāti 		rang gi stobs kyis gcod pa gang yin pa dang gzhan gyi stobs kyis gcod pa gang yin pa de dang 'dra'o /
yang smras pa /
gang zhig bsam pa nyams pas kun du gcod par byed pa de ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro /
ya āśayaprayogavipannaḥ sa bhedātkāyasyeti /
evaṃ yo dṛṣṭivipanno dṛṣṭi śīlavipanna iti /
syātsamucchinna kuśalamūlo na mithyātvaniyata iti /
catuṣkoṭikam 		gang zhig bsam pa dang sbyor ba nyams pas gcod par byed pa de ni lus zhig nas nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te /
lta ba nyams pa gang yin pa dang lta ba dang tshul khrims nyams pa gang yin pa de yang de dang 'dra'o /
dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du 'chad pa yin la log pa nyid du nges pa ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhi ste /
prathamā koṭiḥ pūraṇādayaḥ mu dang po ni rdzogs byed la sogs pa'o /
dvitīyā 'jātaśatruḥ gnyis pa ni ma skyes dgra'o /
tṛtīyā devadattaḥ gsum pa ni lha sbyin no /
caturthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā /
kuśalamūlasamucchedikāyā mithyādṛṣṭeravīcau vipākaḥ /
ānantaryakāriṇāṃ tu tatra vā 'nyatra vā narake 		bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du gcod par byed pa'i log par lta ba'i rnam par smin pa ni mnar med pa yin no /
karmapathaprasaṅga evāyaṃ vartate mtshams med par byed pa rnams kyis ni der ram gzhan gyi nang du'o /
tatra vaktavyaṃ katibhiḥ karmapathaiḥ saha cetanā yugapadutpannā vartata iti 'di ni las kyi skabs yin pas de la las kyi lam du zhig dang sems pa lhan cig tu 'byung bar 'gyur par brjod par bya ste /
yugapadyāvadaṣṭābhiraśubhaiḥ saha vartate /
cetanā /
ekena tāvatsaha vartate /
vinā 'nyenābhidhyādisaṃmukhībhāve akliṣṭacetaso vā tatprayogeṇa rūpiṇāmanyatamaniṣṭhāgamane 		mi dge brgyad kyi bar dag dang /
sems pa cig car lhan cig 'byung /
re zhig sems pa gcig dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni gzhan med par brnab sems la sogs par mngon du 'gyur ba'am /
dvabhyāṃ saha vartate /
vyāpannacittasya prāṇivadhe abhidhyāviṣṭasya vā 'dattādāne kāmamithyācāre saṃbhinnapralāpe vā 		sems pa nyon mongs pa can /
de'i sbyor bas gzugs can rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig mthar phyin par byed na'o /
gnyis dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba ni gnod sems su 'gyur ba srog gcod pa dang brnab sems dang ldan pa ma byin par len pa'am /
'dod pas log par g yem pa'am /
tribhiḥ saha vartate tshig kyal pa smra na'o /
vyāpannacittasya parakīya prāṇimāraṇāpaharaṇe yugapat gsum dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba na brnab sems dang ldan pa cag car du gzhan gyis srog chags bsad pas 'phrog na'o /
na tarhīdānīmadattādānasya lobhenaiva niṣṭā sidhyati 'o na ni de chags pa kho nas ma byin par len pa mthar phyin par byed pa mi 'grub pa ma yin nam zhe na /
ananyacittasya tatsamāptau sa niyamo jñeyaḥ nges pa de ni sems gzhan dang mi ldan pa'i de rdzogs pa la shes par bya'o /
abhidhyādyāviṣṭasya ca tatprayogeṇa rūpidvayaniṣṭhāgamane tribhireva brnab sems mngon sum du gyur pa de'i sbyor bas gzugs can gnyis mthar phyin par byed na yang gsum kho na dang lhan cig 'byung ngo /
caturbhiḥ saha vartate /
bhedābhiprāyasyānṛta vacane paruṣavacane vā /
tatra himānasa eko bhavati vācikāstrayaḥ 		bzhi dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dbye na bya ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa brdzun gyi tshig gam tshig rtsub po smra na ste /
de la ni yid kyi gcig yin la ngag gi gsum yin no /
abhidhyādigatasya vā tatprayogeṇā nyarūpitraya niṣṭhāgamane /
evaṃ paṇcaṣaṭsaptabhiryo jayitavyā 		yang na brnab sems la sogs par gyur pa de'i sbyor bas gzhan gsum mthar phyin par byed na ste /
lnga dang drug dang bdun dang yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o /
aṣṭābhiḥ saha vartate /
ṣaṭsu prayoggaṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ kāmabhithyācāraṃ kurvataḥ samaṃ niṣṭhāgamane 		brgyad dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni brnab sems la sogs pa mngon du gyur pa kho na drug la sbyor ba byas nas 'dod pas log par g yem pa dag nyid kyis byed la mnyam du mthar phyin par 'gyur na'o /
evaṃ tāvadakuśalaiḥ /
daśabhiryāvacchubhaiḥ 		re zhig mi dge ba dag dang ni de lta bu yin no /
dge ba bcu yi bar dag dang /
kuśalaiḥ punaḥ karmapatharyāvat daśabhiḥ saha cetanā vartata ityutsargaṃ kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti dge ba'i las kyi lam dag ni bcu'i bar dang sems pa lhan cig 'byung ngo zhes spyir bstan nas dmigs kyis ston par byed de /
naikāṣṭapañcabhiḥ /
ekenāṣṭābhi pañcabhiśca karmapathaiḥ saha na vartate 		gcig dang brgyad dang lnga dang min /
las kyi lam gcig dang brgyad dang lnga dang lhan cig tu mi 'byung ngo /
tatra dvābhyāṃ saha vartate /
kuśaleṣu pañcasu vijñāneṣu /
ārūpyasamāpattau ca kṣayānutpādajñānayoḥ 		de la gnyis dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni de dag rnam par shes pa lnga la gnas pa ni /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i gnas pa'o /
tribhiḥ samyagdṛṣṭisaṃprayukte manovijñāne /
caturbhirakuśalāvyākṛtacittasyo pāsakaśrāmaṇerasaṃvarasamādāne /
ṣaḍbhiḥ kuśaleṣu pañcaṣu vijñānakāyeṣu tatsamādāne /
saptabhiḥ kuśale manovijñāne tatsamādāna eva akuśalāvyākṛtacittasya ca bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāne 		gsum dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o /
bzhi dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dge tshul gyi sdom pa yang dag par len pa na'o /
drug dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba'i rnam par shes pa lnga la gnas pa de yang dag par len pa na'o /
navabhiḥ kuśaleṣu pañcaṣu vijñāneṣu /
tatsamādāne kṣayānutpādajñānasaṃprayukte ca manovijñāne tasminneva ca dhyānasaṃgṛhīte /
daśabhistato 'nyatra kuśale manovijñāne bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāna eva /
sarvā ca dhyānānāsrava saṃvarasahavartinī cetanā 'nyatra kṣayānutpādajñānābhyām saṃvaranirmuktena tvekenāpi saha syādanya cittasyaikāṅgaviratisamādāne /
pañcāṣṭābhirapi syātkuśale manovijñāne dvipañcāṅgasamādāne yugapat /
kasyāṃ gatau kati karmapathā akuśalā kuśalā vā saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamato vā 		bdun dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas te de kho na yang dag par len pa dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par len pa na'o /
dgu dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba'i rnam par shes pa lnga la gnas pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa de yang dag par len pa dang de nyid bsam gtan gyis bsdus pa la gnas pa bcu dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas pa dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par len pa kho na dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag kho na ma gtogs pa bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dang lhan cig 'jug pa'i sems pa thams cad yin no /
sdom pa ma gtogs par ni gcig dang lhan cig 'byung ba yang yod de /
sems gzhan dang ldan pa spong ba'i yan lag gcig yang dag par len pa na'o /
lnga dang brgyad dang lhan cig 'byung ba yang yod de /
dge ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa cig car du yan lag gnyis dang lnga yang dag par len pa na'o /
'gro ba gang na dge ba'am mi dge ba'i las kyi lam du zhig mngon sum du gyur pa'am ldan pa'i sgo nas yod ce na /
bhinnapralāpapāruṣyavyāpādā narake dvidhā dmyal ba na ni kyal pa dang /
tshig rtsub gnod sems rnam gnyis so /
ityete trayaḥ karmapathā narake dvābhyāṃ saprakārābhyāṃ santi /
saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamabhāvataśca 		dmyal ba na ni las kyi lam 'di gsum mngon sum du gyur pa dang ldan pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga'i sgo nas yod de /
paridevanātsaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ smre sngags 'don pa'i phyir tshig kyal pa yin no /
parasparaparitāpanātpāruṣyaṃ rukṣasaṃtānatayā phan tshun brgyad gags byed pa'i phyir tshig rtsub po yin no /
parasparadveṣādvyāpādaḥ /
samanvāgamato 'bhidhyāmithyādṛṣṭī 		gcig la gcig sems kyi rgyud rtsub pos zhe sdang ba'i phyir gnod sems yin no /
brnab sems log lta ldan pas so /
na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ /
rañjanīyavastvabhāvātkarmaphalapratyakṣatvācca 		chags par bya ba'i dngos po med pa'i phyir dang las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du gyur ba'i phyir mngon sum du gyur pa'i sgo nas ni med do /
karmakṣayeṇa maraṇānna prāṇātipātaḥ /
dravyastrīparigrahābhāvānnadattādānakāmamithyācārau prayojanābhāvānna mṛṣāvādaḥ /
ata eva na paiśunyaṃ nityabhinnatvācca 		las zad nas 'chi ba'i phyir dang rdzas dang bud med yongs su gzung ba med pa'i phyir srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g yem pa dag med do /
dgos pa med pa'i phyir brdzun du smra ba med do /
de nyid kyi phyir dang rtag tu byed zin pa'i phyir phra ma med do /
kurau trayaḥ /
samanvāgamata iti vartate 		sgra mi snyan na gsum yod do /
brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba dag ste /
abhidhyāvyāpādamithyādṛṣṭayo na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ /
amamāparigrahatvāt snigdha saṃtānatvādāghātavastvabhāvādapāpāśayatvācca 		ldan pa'i sgo nas yod par sbyar gyi nga yir 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir dang rgyud 'jam pa'i phyir dang kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir dang sdig pa can gyi bsam pa ma yin pa'i phyir mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas ni med do /
saptamaḥ svayamapyatra /
asaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pyasti 		de na bdun pa dngos su yang /
de na tshig kyal pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa'i sgo nas yang yod de /
te hi kliṣṭacittāḥ kadācit gāyanti /
apāpāśayatvāt na prāṇatipātādayaḥ /
niyatāyuṣkatvāddravyastrīparigrahābhāvāt prayojanābhāvācca 		nyon mongs pa can gyi sems su gyur pa de dag ni res 'ga' glu dag len to /
sdig pa can gyi bsam pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang tshe nges pa'i phyir dang rdzas dang bud med yongs su gzung ba med pa'i phyir dang dgos pa med pa'i phyir srog gcod pa la sogs pa med do /
kathameṣāmabrahmacaryam ji ltar 'di dag mi tshangs par spyod pa yin zhe na /
te khalu yayā striyā sārdhaṃ rantukāmā bhavanti tāṃ bāhau gṛhītvā vṛkṣamūlamupasarpanti de dag ni bud med gang dag lhan cig dga' bar 'dod pa de'i lag nas gzung nas zhing gi drung du 'gro ste /
gamyā cet vṛkṣaśchādayati tāṃ te gacchanti gal te bgrod par bya ba zhig yin na ni shing gis sgrib par byed pas de dag de la nyal po byed do /
agamyā cenna chādayati tāṃ te na gacchanti /
kāme 'nyatra daśāśubhāḥ 		ci ste bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa zhig yin na ni sgrib par mi byed pas ni de dag de la nyal po mi byed do /
'dod pa gzhan na mi dge bcu /
svayamapīti vartate /
narakottarakurubhyāmanyatra kāmadhātau daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi vidyante 		dngos su yang yod ces bya bar sbyar te /
dmyal ba dang byang gi sgra mi snyan dag las gzhan pa'i 'dod pa'i khams na ni mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu mngon sum du 'gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang yod de /
tiryakpretadeveṣvasaṃvaranirmuktāḥ /
manuṣyeṣvasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītā api /
yadyapi devo devaṃ na mārayati anyagatisthaṃ tu mārayati /
devā api śiromadhyacchedāt bhriyanta ityapare 		dud 'gro dang yi dags dang lha dag gi nang na ni sdom pa ma yin pa ma gtogs so /
mi dag gi nang na ni sdom pa ma yin pas bsdus pa yang yod do /
gal te yang lhas lha mi gsod kyang 'gro ba gzhan na gnas na ni gsod par byed do /
gzhan dag na re lha yang mgo dang rked pa bcad na 'chi'o zhes zer ro /
uktā aśubhāḥ /
śubhāstrayastu sarvatra saṃmukhībhāva lābhataḥ 		mi dge ba rnams bshad zin to /
dge ba gsum ni thams cad na /
rnyed dang mngon du gyur sgo nas /
pañcasu gatiṣu traidhātuke sarvatrānabhidhyā 'vyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭyaḥ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamataśca vidyante brnab sems med pa dang gnod sems med pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba rnams ni khams gsum po thams cad na /
'gro ba lnga char du ni mngon du gyur pa dang ldan pa'i sgo nas yod do /
ārupyāsaṃjñisattveṣu lābhataḥ sapta /
kāyikavācikāḥ sapta kuśalā ārūpyeṣvasaṃjñisattveṣu samanvāgamata eva /
ārūpyoopapannānāmāryāṇāmatītānāgatānāsravasaṃvarasamanvāgamāt /
asaṃjñisattvānāṃ ca dhyānasaṃvarasamanvāgamāt 		gzugs med 'du shes med sems can /
rnyed pa bdun yod /
gzugs med pa dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can dag na ni lus dang ngag gi dge ba'i las kyi lam bdun ldan pa'i sgo kho na nas yod de /
gzugs med par skyes pa'i 'phags pa rnams la zag pa med pa'i sdom pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang ldan pa'i phyir dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
yadbhūmyā śrayamāryeṇānāsravaṃ śīlamutpāditaṃ nirodhitaṃ bhavati tenārūpyeṣvatītena samanvāgato bhavati gzugs med pa dag na 'phags pas gang la brten pa can gyi zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bskyed de 'gag pa ni 'das pa de dang ldan no /
pañca bhūmyāśrayeṇa tvanāgatena /
śeṣite /
saṃmukhībhāvataścāpi hitvā sanarakān kurun 		sa lnga char la brten pa can dang ma 'das pa dang ldan no /
lhag par byas na mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang /
śesaḥ kṛtaḥ śeṣitaḥ dmyal bcas sgra mi snyan ma gtogs /
yo 'nyo dhātuḥ śeṣito gatirvā /
tatraite sapta kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi saṃvidyante 'nyatra narakottarakurubhyaḥ 		lhag mar byas pas na lhag byas te lhag mar byas pas ni khams sam 'gro ba gzhan gang yin pa'o /
dmyal ba dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa dag ma gtogs pa de na ni dge ba'i las kyi lam bdun po 'di dag mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang yod de /
te punastiryakpreteṣu saṃvaranirmuktā rūpadhātau tu saṃvarasaṃgṛhītā anyatrobhayathā /
ta ete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ kuśalāśca 		de dag kyang dud 'gro dang yi dags kyi nang dag na ni sdom pas bsdus pa ma gtogs pa rnams so /
gzugs kyi khams na ni sdom pas bsdus pa rnams so /
gzhan na ni gnyis ga yod do /
dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po 'di dag ni /
sarve 'dhipatiniṣyandavipākaphaladā matāḥ thams cad bdag po rgyu mthun dang /
rnam smin 'bras bu 'byin par 'dod /
akuśalaistāvatsarvairevāsevitabhāvitabahulīkṛtaiḥ narakeṣrapapadyate /
tadeṣāṃ vipākaphalam 		re zhig mi dge ba kun du bstan pa dang goms par byas pa dang lan mang du byas pa thams cad kyis ni dmyal ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
'di ni de dag gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yin no /
sa ceditthaṃ tvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ praṇātipātenālpāyurbhavati adattādānena bhogavyasanī bhavatikāmamithyācārena sa saṃpannadāraḥ mṛṣāvādenābhyākhyānabahulaḥ paiśunyena mitrabhedo 'sya bhavati pāruṣyeṇāmanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpenānādeyavākyaḥ abhidhyayā tīvrarāgaḥ vyāpādena tīvradveṣaḥ mithyādṛṣṭyā tīvramohaḥ brgya la 'di lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'ongs na yang srog gcod pas ni tshe thung bar 'gyur ro /
ma byin par len pas ni longs spyod kyis phongs par 'gyur ro /
'dod pas log par g yem pas ni dgra dang bcas pa'i chung ma can du 'gyur ro /
brdzun du smra bas ni skur ba mang por 'gyur ro /
phra mas ni de mdza' bo dang 'byed par 'gyur ro /
tshig rtsub pos ni yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro /
tshig kyal pas ni tshig gzung bar mi 'os par 'gyur ro /
brnab sems kyis ni 'dod chags shas che bar 'gyur ro /
gnod sems kyas ni zhe sdang shas che bar 'gyur ro /
log par lta bas ni gti mug shas che bar 'gyur te /
tasyā mohabhūyastvāt de la ni gti mug mang po'i phyir ro /
idameṣāṃ niḥṣyandaphalam 'di ni de dag gi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no /
alpamapyāyurmanuṣyeṣu kuśalaphalam /
tat kathaṃ prāṇātipātasya niḥṣyandaphalaṃ bhavati /
nocyate tadevāyustasya phalam 		ma dag gi nang na tshe thung ba yang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yin na de ji ltar srog gcod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin zhe na /
tshe de nyid de'i 'bras bu yin no zhes ni mi zer ro /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
tenālpāyurbhavatīti /
ato 'ntarāyahetuḥ prāṇāti pātastasyāyuṣo bhavatīti veditavyam 		des tshe thung ngur 'gyur bas de'i phyir srog gcod pa ni tshe de'i bar chad byed pa'i phyir rgyu yin par rig par bya'o /
prāṇātīpātenātyāsevitena bāhyā bhāvā alpaujaso bhavantīti /
adattādānenāśanirajobahulāḥ kāmamithyācāreṇa rajo 'vakīrṇāḥ mṛṣāvādena durgandhāḥ paiśunyenotkūlanikūlāḥ pāruṣyeṇoparajāṅgalā pratikuṣṭāḥ pāpabhūmayaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpena viṣamartupariṇāmāḥ abhidhyayā śuṣkaphalāḥ vyāpādena kaṭukaphalā mithyādṛṣṭyā 'lpaphalā aphalā vā /
idameṣāmadhipatiphalam 		srog gcod pa ha cang kun du bsten pas ni phyi'i dngos po rnams gzi mthu chung bar 'gyur ro /
ma byin par len pas ni ser ba dang char ba mang bar 'gyur ro /
'dod pas log par g yem pas ni rngul gyis 'khrig par 'gyur ro /
brdzun du smra bas ni dring bar 'gyur ro /
phra mas ni mthon dman can du 'gyur ro /
tshig rtsub pos ni sa tshva sgo can dang dgon dung dang tha chad dang sdig pa can gyi sar 'gyur ro /
tshig kyal pas ni dus log pa can du 'gyur ro /
brnab sems kyis ni 'bras bu phra mor 'gyur ro /
gnod sems kyis ni 'bras bu kha bar 'gyur ro /
log par lta bas ni 'bras bu chung ngu'am 'bras bu med par 'gyur te /
'di ni de dag gi bdag po'i 'bras bu yin no /
kiṃ tenaiva karmaṇā 'yamihālpāyurbhavatyathānyena ci las de kho nas de 'dir tshe thung ngur 'gyur ram /
'on te gzhan zhig gis she na /
tenevetyeke /
tadvipākaphalamidaṃ niṣyandaphalamiti /
tatra prayogeṇeha maulelnetyeke 		kha cig na re de kho nas te /
de ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yin la 'di ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes zer ro /
gzhan dag na re der ni sbyor bas yin la /
pare saparivāragrahaṇāttu prāṇātipātenetyuktamiti /
yadapyetanniḥṣyandaphalamuktaṃ naitaddvayamativartate vipākaphalamadhipatiphalaṃ ca 		'dir ni dngos kyis yin te /
'khor dang bcas pa smos pa'i phyir srog gcod pas zhes gsungs par zad do zhes zer ro /
rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bur bshad pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dang gnyis po 'di las ni mi 'da'i /
sādṛśyaviśeṣāttu tathoktam /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇameṣāṃ karmapathānāmetattrividhaphalamabhinivartate 		'dra ba'i khyad par las de skad du bshad par zad do /
yang ci'i phyir las kyi lam 'di dag gis 'bras bu rnam pa gsum mngon par 'grub ce na /
prāṇātipātaṃ hi tāvatkurvatā māryamāṇasya duḥkhamutpāditaṃ māritamojo nāśimato 'sya re zhig srog gcod par byed pas ni gsad par bya ba sdug bsngal bskyed pa dang gsad pa dang gzi byin med par bya bas yin te /
de nyid kyi phyir 'di /
duḥkhanānmāraṇādojonāśanāttrividhaṃ phalam sdug bsngal phyir dang gsad phyir dang /
gzi byin med phyir 'bras rnam gsum /
parasya duḥkhanādvipākaphalena narake duḥkhito bhavati pha rol po sdug bsngal bar byas pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bus dmyal ba dag tu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro /
māraṇanniḥṣyandaphalenālpāyurbhavati gsad pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus tshe thung ngur 'gyur ro /
ojonāśanādadhipati phalenālpaujaso bāhyā auṣadhayo bhavanti gzi byin med par byas pa'i phyir bdag po'i 'bras bus phyi'i sman rnams gzi mthu chung bar 'gyur te /
evamanyeṣvapi yojyam /
evaṃ kuśalānāmapi karmapathānāṃ phalatrayaṃ veditavyam prāṇātipātaviratyā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā deveṣupapadyate 		gzhan dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o /
dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi 'bras bu gsum yang de bzhin du rig par bya ste /
srog gcod pa spong ba kun tu bsten pa dang goms par byas pa dang lan mang du byas pas ni lha dag gi nang du skyes par 'gyur ro /
sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ dīrghāyurbhavatītyakuśalaviparyayeṇa sarvaṃ yojayitavyam brgya la 'di lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'ongs na yang tshe ring por 'gyur te /
thams cad mi dge ba las bzlog ste sbyar bar bya'o /
yadbhagavatā mithyāvāṃimathyākarmānto mithyājīva ityuktaṃ ko 'yamanyastābhyāṃ mithyājīvaḥ /
nāyamanyo 'sti /
tadeva tu /
lobhajaṃ kāyavākkarma mithyājīvaḥ 		bcom ldan 'das kyis log pa'i ngag dang log pa'i las kyi mtha' dang log pa'i 'tsho ba zhes gang gsungs pa de gnyis las gzhan pa'i log pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhig yin zhe na /
'di gzhan ni med kyi de nyid yin te /
lus dang ngag las chags las skyes /
log 'tsho /
dveṣamohajau tu kāyavākkarmāntau /
sa caiṣa tābhyāṃ /
pṛthak kṛtaḥ /
duḥśodhatvāt /
hārī hi lobhadharmaḥ /
tatsamutthāt karmaṇaścittaṃ na surakṣyam 		lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' zhe sdang las skyes pa dang gti mug las skyes pa ni log pa'i ngag dang log pa'i las kyi mtha' yin no /
de ni sbyang dka'i phyir /
de gnyis las logs shig tu bstan to /
chags pa'i chos ni 'phrog par byed pa yin pas des kun nas bslang ba'i las las sems bsrung bar sla ba ma yin te /
ata ājīvo duḥkhaśodha ityādarotpādanārthaṃ tatrāsau pṛthagnirdiṣṭaḥ /
āha cātra 		de'i phyir ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sbyang dka' bas bsgrim par bya ba'i phyir de ni der logs shig tu bstan to /
'dir smras pa /
duḥśodhā gṛhiṇāṃ dṛṣṭirnityaṃ vividhadṛṣṭinā rtag tu lta ba sna tshogs kyis /
khyim pas lta ba sbyang bar dka' /
ājīvo bhikṣuṇā caiva pareṣvāyattadṛṣṭineti gzhan la 'tsho ba rag lus pa'i /
dge slong gis ni 'tsho bar dka' /
pariṣkāralobhotthaṃ cet gal te yo byad la /
chags bslang /
yo manyate jīvitpariṣkāralobhotthameva kāyavākkarma mithyājīvonānyat gang zhig 'tsho ba'i yo byad la /
chags pas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las kho na log pa'i 'tsho ba yin gyi /
gzhan ni ma yin te /
nahyātmaratinimittaṃ nṛttagītādi ājīvayoga iti tat /
na sūtrataḥ /
śīlaskandhikāyāṃ hi bhagavatā hastiyuddha darśanādīnyapi mithyājīve nyastāni 		bdag dga' bar bya ba'i ched du gar dang glu len pa la sogs pa ni log pa'i 'tsho ba yin par mi rigs so snyam du sems pa de ni /
mdo dang 'gal phyir min /
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po'i mdo las glang po che 'thab pa la lta ba la sogs pa la yang log pa'i 'tsho ba gzhag ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
mithyaviṣayaparibhogāt /
gatametat 		log pa'i yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir ro /
'di ni rdzogs so /
yāni pūrvaṃ pañca phalānyuktāni teṣāṃ katamat karma katibhiḥ phalaiḥ prahāṇam gong du 'bras bu lnga bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag las las gang zhig 'bras bu du zhig 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin zhe na /
prahāṇamārge samale saphalaṃ karma pañcabhiḥ /
prahāṇārthaṃ mārgaḥ prahīyante vā 'nena kleśā iti prahāṇamārgaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ 		drir bcas spong ba'i lam dag gis /
las ni lnga yi 'bras bur bcas /
spong ba'i phyir lam yin pa'am /
'dis nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pas spong ba'i lam ste /
bar chad med pa'i lam yin no /
tasminsāsrave yat karma tat pañcabhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalam zag pa dang bcas pa de'i las gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu lngas 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te /
tasya hi vipākaphalaṃ svabhūmāviṣṭo vipākaḥ /
niḥṣyandaphalaṃ samādhijā uttare sadṛśā dharmāḥ 		de'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rang gi sar gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba yin no /
rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i chos 'dra ba phyi ma rnams so /
visaṃyogaphalaṃ visaṃyoga eva bral ba'i 'bras bu ni bral ba kho na yin te /
yattat prahāṇam spangs pa gang yin pa de yin no /
puruṣakāraphalaṃ tadākṛṣṭā dharmastadyathā 'dhimuktimārgastatsahabhuvaśca /
yaccānāgataṃ bhāvyate tacca prahāṇam /
adhipatiphalaṃ svabhāvādanye sarvasaṃskārāḥ pūrvotpannavarjyāḥ /
caturbhiramale 		skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni des drang pa'i chos 'di lta ste /
rnam par grol ba'i lam dang de dag lhan cig 'byung ba dang gang yang ma 'ongs pa thob pa dang spangs pa de yang yin no /
bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba rnams ma gtogs pa rang gi ngo bo las gzhan pa'i 'du byed thams cad do /
dri med bzhi yis /
anāsrave prahāṇamārge yatkarma taccaturbhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalaṃ vipākaphalaṃ hitvā spong ba'i lam zag pa med pa'i las gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu bzhis 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te /
rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
anyacca sāsravaṃ yacchubhāśubham zag bcas gzhan /
dge dang mi dge gang yin pa'ang /
yaccānyat prahāṇamārgātsāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karmaṃ yaccākuśalaṃ tadapi caturbhirvisaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā /
anāsravaṃ punaḥ śeṣāṃ tribhiravyākṛtaṃ ca yat 		spong ba'i lam las gzhan pa'i las dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa dang mi dge ba gang yin pa de yang 'bras bu bzhis 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te /
bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
zag pa med pa lhag ma dang lung stan min gang gsum gyis so /
prahāṇamārgādanyadanāsravaṃ karma avyākṛtaṃ ca karma tribhirvipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā /
catvāri dve tathā trīṇi kuśalasya śubhādayaḥ 		spong pa'i lam las gzhan pa'i las zag pa med pa dang lung du ma bstan pa'i las gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu gsum gyi 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te /
rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
dge ba'i dge la sogs pa ni /
bzhi dang gnyis dang de bzhin gsum /
anukramamiti paścādvakṣyati rim pa bzhin no zhes 'og nas 'chad do; /
kuśalsya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāścatvāri phalāni vipākaphalaṃ hitvā las dge ba'i 'bras bu chos dge ba ni bzhi ste /
rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
akuśalā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /
avyākṛtā strīṇi niḥṣyandavisaṃyogaphale hitvā 		mi dge ba gnyis te /
skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dang lung du ma bstan pa gsum ste /
rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
aśubhasya śubhādyā dve trīṇi catvāryanukramam mi dge'i dge sogs gnyis dang ni /
gsum dang bzhi ste rim pa bzhin /
yathākramamityarthaḥ /
akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale 		go rims ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i tha tsheg ste /
las mi dge ba'i 'bras bu chos dge ba gnyis te /
skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go /
akuśalāstrīṇi vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā mi dge ba ni gsum ste /
rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
avyākṛtāścatvāri visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā lung du ma bstan pa ni bzhi ste bral ba ma gtogs so /
avyākṛte hi satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭī akuśalānāṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ duḥkhadarśana heyānāṃ ca niḥṣyandaphalam lung du ma bstan pa 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dag ni mi dge ba kun tu 'gro ba rnams dang sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no /
avyākṛtasya dve trīṇi trīṇi caite śubhādayaḥ lung bstan min gyi dge la sogs /
de dag gnyis dang gsum dang gsum /
avyākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphalel las lung du ma bstan pa'i 'bras bu chos dge ba gnyis te /
skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go /
akuśalāḥ trīṇi vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā mi dge ba ni gsum ste /
bral ba dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bum gtogs so /
akuśalā hi duḥkhadarśanādiheyā avyākṛtayordṛṣṭyoniḥrṣyandaphalam /
avyākṛtā dharmā etānyeva trīṇi 		sdug bsngal la sogs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i mi dge ba rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'i lta ba gnyis kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no /
lung du ma bstan pa'i chos ni gsum ste /
rgyu de dag kho na yin no /
sarve 'tītasya catvāri 'das pa'i thams cad bzhi yin no /
sarva iti traiyadhvikāḥ /
atītasya karmaṇastraiyadvikāḥ dharmāścatvāri phalāni 		thams cad ces bya ba ni dus gsum pa rnams te /
'das pa'i las kyi 'bras bu dus gsum pa'i chos ni bzhi ste /
visaṃyogaphalalṃ hitvā /
madhyamasyāpyanāgatāḥ /
pratyutpannasyāpi karmaṇo 'nāgatā dharmāścatvāti phalānyetānyeva /
madhyamā dve 		bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
bar ma yi ni ma 'ongs pa'ang /
da ltar byung ba'i las kyi 'bras bu chos ma 'ongs pa yang bzhi ste /
de dag nyid do /
bar ma gnyis so /
pratyutpannā dharmāḥ pratyupannasya dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale da ltar byung ba'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba'i chos ni gnyis te /
skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go /
ajātasya phalāni triṇyanāgatāḥ /
anāgatasyānāgatāni trīṇi phalāni 		ma skyes pa'i /
'bras bu ma 'ongs gsum yin no /
ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa'i chos ni gsum ste /
niḥṣyandavisaṃyogaphale hitvā /
svabhūmidharmāścatvāri /
svabhūmikasya karmaṇaḥ svabhūmikā dharmāścatvāri phalāni visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā /
trīṇi dve vā 'nyabhūmikāḥ /
anyabhūmikā dharmā anāsravāścet trīṇi phalāni 		rgyu mthun pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
rang gi sa pa yin no /
rang gi sa pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rang gi sa ba'i chos ni bzhi ste /
bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
gzhan gyi sa pa gsum dang gnyis /
gal te gzhan gyi sa pa'i chos zag pa med pa zhig yin na ni 'bras bu gsum ste /
vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
dhātvapatitatvāt khams gsum ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro /
sāsravāścet dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /
śaikṣasya trīṇi śaikṣādyāḥ 		gal te zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na ni gnyis te /
skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go /
slob pa'i slob pa sogs pa gsum /
śaikṣasya karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā /
aśaikṣā apyevam 		slob pa'i las kyi 'bras bu slob pa'i chos ni gsum ste /
rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
mi slob pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā api vipākaniḥṣyandaphale hitvā /
aśaikṣasya tu karmaṇaḥ /
dharmāḥ śaikṣādikā ekaṃ phalaṃ trīṇyapi ca dvayam 		slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa yang gsum ste /
rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
mi slob las kyi 'bras bu ni /
slob pa yi ni chos la sogs /
gcig dang gsum dang gnyis yin no /
aśaikṣasya karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmāḥ ekamadhipatiphalam mi slob pa'i las kyi 'bras bu slob pa'i chos ni gcig ste /
bdag po'i 'bras bu'o /
aśaikṣāstrīṇi vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā mi slob pa ni gsum ste /
rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /
tābhyāmanyasya śaikṣādyā dve dve pañca phalāni ca 		slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa ni gnyis te /
skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go /
de las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu ni /
slob sogs gnyis dang gnyis dang lnga /
śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāmanyasya karmaṇo naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣasya śaikṣā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale /
aśaikṣā apyevam 		slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i las kyi 'bras bu slob pa'i chos ni gnyis te; skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go /
mi slob pa'ang de dang 'dra'o /
naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣāḥ pañca phalāni /
trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛgdheyasya tadādayaḥ 		slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa ni 'bras bu lnga char yin no /
mthong bas spang bya'i de la sogs /
gsum dang bzhi dang gcig yin no /
darśanaheyasya karmaṇodarśanaheyā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni vipākavisaṃyogaphalehitvā mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos ni gsum ste /
rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
bhāvanāheyāścatvāri visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni bzhi ste /
bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
apraheyā ekamadhipatiphalam /
te dve catvāryatha trīṇi bhāvanāheyakarmaṇaḥ 		spang bar bya ba ma yin pa ni gcig ste /
bdag po'i 'bras bu'o /
bsgom pas spang bar bya las kyi /
de dag gnyis dang bzhi dang gsum /
bhāvanāheyasya karmaṇo darśanaheyā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni gnyis te /
skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go /
bhāvanāheyāścatvāri visaṃyogaphalaṃ muktvā /
apraheyāstrīṇi vipākaniḥṣyandaphale muktvā 		bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni bzhi ste /
bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
spang bar bya ba ma yin pa ni gsum ste /
rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
apraheyasya te tvekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam spang bya min pa'i de dag gcig /
gnyis dang bzhi ste go rims bzhin /
apraheyasya karmaṇo darśanaheyā dharmā ekamadhipatiphalam spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i las kyi 'bras bu mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni gcig ste bdag po'i 'bras bu'o /
bhāvanāheyā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni gnyis te /
skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu'o /
apraheyāścatvāri vipākaphalaṃ muktvā /
punaryathākramagrahaṇamādyantavanmadhye 'pi jñāpanārtham 		spang bar bya ba ma yin pa ni bzhi ste /
rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
yang go rims bzhin zhes smos pa ni dbus su yang thog ma dang tha ma bzhin shes par bya ba'i phyir te /
eṣa hi peyāladharmaḥ de ni mthun par sbyor ba'i chos yin no /
karmanirdeśaprasaṅgenedamapi paripraśnyate las bstan pa'i skabs su 'di yang yongs su bri bar bya ste /
bstan bcos dag las /
śāstreṣu ayogavihitaṃ yogavihitam naivayogavihitaṃ nāyogavihitaṃ ca karmoktam /
tasya kiṃ lakṣaṇam 		rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa dang rigs pas bskyed pa dang rigs pas bskyed pa yang ma yin rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa yang ma yin pa'i las zhes gsungs pa de'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
ayogavihitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vidhibhraṣṭaṃ ca kecana rigs min bskyed pa nyon mongs can /
kha cig cho ga nyams pa zhe'o /
kliṣṭaṃ karmāyogavihitamayoniśomanaskārasaṃbhūtatvādityeke /
vidhibhraṣṭamapītyapare /
yena yathā gantavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ pravicaritavyamityevamādi /
taccānyathā vidadhāti /
tadayuktavidhānādayogavihitamiti 		kha cig na re rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa ni las nyon mongs pa can yin te /
tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid las byung ba las byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes zer ro /
gzhan dag na re cho ga nyams pa yang yin te /
gang gis ji ltar 'gro bar bya ba dang gnas par bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba dang bgo bar bya ba dang de la sogs pa de gzhan du byed na de ni rigs pa ma yin pas byed pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin pas skyes pa zhes bya'o /
rigs pas bskyed pa ni las dge ba yin no /
kuśalaṃ karmaṃ yogavihitamavidhibhraṣṭaṃ cetyapare gzhan dag na re cho ga ma nyams pa yang yin no zhes zer ro /
ubhābhyāmanyannobhayathā /
naivayogavihitaṃ nāyogavihitam /
kimekaṃ karma ekameva janmākṣipati atha naikamapi 		de gnyis las gzhan pa ni gnyi ga ma yin pa'o /
ci las gcig gis skye ba gcig kho na 'phen tam 'on te du ma yang 'phen /
tathā kimekamapi karmaikaṃ janmākṣipatyathānekam de bzhin du las du mas kyang skye ba gcig 'phen tam /
'on te du ma kho na zhig 'phen zhe na /
eṣa hi siddhāntaḥ 'di ni grub pa'i mtha' yin te /
ekaṃ janmākṣīpatyekam gcig gis skye ba gcig 'phen to /
ekameva janmākṣipatyekameva ca karma nānekaṃ janmeti nikāyasabhāgasyākhyā /
tatra hi labdhe jāta ityucyate 		las gcig kho nas skye ba gcig kho na 'phen gyi du ma ni ma yin no /
skye ba zhes bya ba ni ris mthun pa la bya ste /
der phyin nas skye ba zhes brjod do /
yattarhi sthavirāniruddhenoktaṃ so 'haṃ tasyaikapiṇḍapātasya vipākena saptakṛtvastrayastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapanno yāvadetahyrādye śākyakule jāta iti 'o na gnas brtan ma 'gags pas bdag ni bsod snyoms gcig po de'i rnam par smin pas lan bdun gyi bar du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa nas da ltar sh'akya phyug po'i rigs su skyes pa'i bar du yin no zhes gang smras pa de ji lta bu zhe na /
tena hyasau samṛdviṃ labdvā jātismaraḥ punaranyat puṇyaṃ kṛtavān /
tata utthānaṃ darśayati sma 		'di des 'byor pa rnyed nas tshe rabs dran pa dang yang bsod nams gzhan byas pas de'i phyir slob pa ston par byed pa yin te /
yathā manuṣyo dīnārottho 'nena sahasraṃ nirviśyāha ekena dīnāreṇāhamaita dīśvaryaṃ prāpta iti /
apare tvāhuḥ 		dper na mi zhig gis dong tse gcig gis stong du bsgyur te bdag ni dong tse gcig gis dbang phyug 'di thob par gyur to zhes smra ba lta bu'o /
yang smras pa /
tasya taṃ piṇḍapātamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā dānacetanānāṃ pravāho mahānutpannaḥ kayācit kiñcitphalaṃ parigṛhītamiti de bsod snyoms de la brten te sems pa rnams kyi rgyun mang po byung nas 'ga' zhig gi 'bras bu 'ga' yongs su gzung ba yin no /
anekenāpyekamākṣipyate mā bhūt khaṇḍaśo nikāyasabhāgasyākṣepa iti /
ekena tu karmaṇā kliṣṭasya nikāyasabhāgasyeṣyate karma 		ris mthun pa dum bur 'phen pa 'gyur du 'ongs bas du mas kyang gcig 'phen pa ma yin gyi las gcig gis 'phangs pa'i ris mthun pa la las yongs rdzogs byed pa du ma yin par 'dod de /
dper na ri mo mkhan gyi ri lu gcig gis gzugs kyi sa bcad nas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang 'dra ste /
anekaṃ paripūrakam 'di ltar mir mtshungs mod kyi /
yathā citrakara ekayā vartyā rūpamālikhya vahvībhiḥ paripūrayati kha cig dbang po dang yan lag dang nying lag thams cad tshang bar 'gyur zhing /
tathā hi tulye mānuṣye kaścit sakalendriyāṅgapratyaṅgo bhavativarṇakṛtipramāṇabalasaṃpadā vibhrājamānaḥ kaścideṣāṃ kenacidvikalaḥ /
na ca kevalaṃ karmaivākṣepakaṃ janmanaḥ 		kha dog dang sha tshugs dang bong tshod dang nyams stobs phun sum tshogs pas rnam par mdzes pa yin la /
kha cig ni de dag las la lam tshang ba yin no /
las 'ba' zhig tshe 'phen par byed pa yang ma yin te /
kiṃ tarhi /
anyadapi savipākam /
sarvathā tu 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa gzhan yang yin no /
rnam pa thams cad du /
nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca sems med snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
'phen byed ma yin thob pa'ang yin /
avipākābhyāmapyacittasamāpattibhyāṃ nikāyasabhāgo nākṣipyate rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis kyang ris mthun pa 'phen par mi byed de /
karmāsahabhūtatvāt /
prāptibhiśca karmaṇo 'nekaphalatvāt 		las dang lhan cig mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro; /
thob pa rnams kyis kyang ma yin te /
triṇyāvaraṇānyuktāni bhagavatā las dang 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇaṃ ca /
teṣāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
ānantaryāṇi karmāṇi tīvrakleśo 'tha durgatiḥ 		bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang sgrib pa gsum gsungs pa de dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
mtshams med pa yi las rnams dang /
kauravāsaṃjñisattvāśca matamāvaraṇatrayam /
pañcānantaryāṇi karmāvaraṇam 		nyon mongs shas chen ngan 'gro dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang sgra mi snyan sgrib gsum du 'dod /
mtshams med pa'i las rnams ni las kyi sgrib pa yin te /
tadyathā mātṛvadhaḥ pitṛvadho 'rhadvadhaḥ saṃghabhedaḥ tathāgataśrīre duṣṭacittarudhirotpādanam 'di lta ste /
ma gsod pa dang pha gsod pa dang dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa'o /
tīvrakleśatā kleśāvaraṇam /
dvividho hi kleśaḥ /
tivraśca ya abhikṣṇikaḥ tīkṣṇaśca yo 'dhimātraḥ /
tatra yastīvraḥ sa āvaraṇam 		nyon mongs pa shas chen po ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'o /
nyon mongs pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
nyon mongs pa shas che ba dang rno ba'o /
de la shas che ba ni rgyun du 'byung ba gang yin pa'o /
rno ba ni chen po gang yin pa'o /
de la shas che ba gang yin pa de ni sgrib pa yin te /
yathā śaṇṭhādīnām /
śakto hyadhimatravego 'pi kleśaḥ kādācitko nihantuṃ natu samūho 'pyājasrikaḥ 		dper na za ma la sogs pa rnams kyi lta bu'o /
nyon mongs pa res 'ga' 'byung ba ni shugs drag kyang gzhom par nus kyis rgyun du 'byung ba ni dpal yang ma yin te /
ājasrike he kleśe tannirghātāya parākramakālaṃ na labhate nyon mongs pa rgyun du 'byung ba ni de nges par gzhom pa'i phyir rtsol ba'i dus mi rnyed do /
tasya mṛduṃ pratītya madhya upajāyate de ni chung ngu la brten nas 'bring skye'o /
madhyaṃ pratītyādhimātraḥ /
tasmāt evāvaraṇaṃ trividhā durgatiḥ vipākāvaraṇaṃ sugateśca pradeśaḥ auttarakauravā asaṃjñisattvāśca 		'bring la brten nas chen po skye ste /
de lta bas na de nyid sgrib pa yin no /
ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum dang bde 'gro'i phyogs byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa yin no /
kasyaitānyāvaraṇāni 'di dag gang la sgrib ce na /
āryamārgasyāryamārgaprāyogikāṇāṃ ca kuśalamūlānām anyānyapi hyapāyādiniyatāni aṇḍajasaṃsvedajastrītvāṣṭamabhavayatāni karmāṇi vaktavyāni syuḥ /
yānyeva tu pañcabhiḥkāraṇaiḥ sudarśakāni pajñakāni adhiṣṭhānataḥ phalato gatitaḥ upapattitaḥ pudgalataśca tānyevoktāni nānyāni /
kleśāvaraṇaṃ caiṣāṃ sarvajaghanyam 		'phags pa'i lam dang 'phags pa'i lam la sbyor bar byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la sgrib bo /
ngan song la sogs par nges par 'gyur ba dang sgo nga las skye bar 'gyur ba dang drod gsher las skye bar 'gyur ba dang bud med nyid du 'gyur ba dang srid pa brgyad par nges par 'gyur ba'i las gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
gang dag gzhi dang 'bras bu dang 'gro ba dang skye ba dang gang zag dang rgyu lngas bstan par sla zhing gdags par bya ba de dag kho na bshad kyis gzhan dag ni ma yin no /
de dag las nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni thams cad kyi tha shal yin no /
tataḥ karmāvaraṇam de'i 'og tu ni las kyi sgrib pa ste /
tāmyāṃ hi dvitīye 'pi janmanyacikitso bhavatyuttarottarāvāhanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ de gnyis kyis ni tshe phyi ma la yang gsor mi rung bar 'gyur ro /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re phyi ma phyi ma 'dren pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
ānantaryāṇīti ko 'rthaḥ mtshams med pa rnams zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
nāntarāyituṃ śakyāni vipākaṃ prati janmāntaraphalena karmāntareṇetyānantaryāṇi tshe rabs gzhan gyi 'bras bu can gyi las dag gi rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bar du gcod par mi nus pas mtshams med pa rnams te /
na tiraskartumityarthaḥ zil gyis mi gnon zhes bya pa'i tha tshig go /
na vā tatkāriṇaḥ pudgalasyetaścyutasyāntaramasti narakopapattigamanaṃ pratītyanantaraḥ yang na de byed pa'i gang zag 'di nas shi 'phos pa dang dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba la bar chad med pas de ni bar chad med pa'o /
tadbhāva ānantaryam de'i dngos po ni bar chad med pa nyid de /
yasya dharmasya yogātso 'nantaro bhavati chos gang dang ldan pa'i phyir de bar chad med pa yin te /
śrāmaṇyavat /
athaiṣāmāvaraṇānāṃ katamat kasyāṃ gatau veditavyam /
ekāntena tāvat 		dge sbyong gi tshul bzhin no /
yang sgrib pa 'di dag las gang zhig khams gang na yod par rig par bya zhe na /
re zhig gcig tu /
triṣu dvīpeṣvānantarya mtshams med gling gsum dag na yod /
nottarakurau nānyāsu gatiṣu /
kuta evānyatra dhātau 		byang gi sgra mi snyan dang 'gro ba gzhan dag na yang med na khams gzhan na lta smos kyang ci dgos /
tetṣvapi stripuruṣāṇāmeva /
śaṇḍā dīnāṃ tu neṣyate 		de dag na yang skyes pa dang bud med rnams kho na la yod kyi /
zam la sogs pa mi 'dod do /
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ci'i phyir zhe na /
tadevāsaṃvarābhāve kāraṇamuddiṣṭam sdom pa med pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin pa de nyid kyi phyir ro /
api ca /
alpopakārālajjitvāt /
yathākramaṃ mātāpitrosteṣāṃ ca /
alpopakārau kilaiṣāṃ mātāpitarau /
vikalātmabhāvādhipatitvādalpasnehatvācca /
teṣāmapi na tīvraṃ hyapatrāpyaṃ mātāpitrorantike pratyupasthitaṃ yadvipādanādānantaryeṇa spṛśyeran 		gzhan yang /
phan dang ngo tsha chung ba'i phyir /
pha ma dang de dag dang go rims bzhin te /
pha ma ni de dag gi lus ma tshangs ba'i bdag por 'gyur ba'i phyir dang byams pa chung pa'i phyir phan pa chung ba yin no /
de dag kyang pha ma la gang dag med par byas pas mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ba ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i shas ches po nye bar mi gnas te /
ata eva tiryavapretānāmapi neṣyate /
paṭubuddhīnāṃ syādaśvājāneyavaditi bhadantaḥ /
manuṣyasyāpyamānuṣau mātāpitarau mārayato na syādānantaryam 		de nyid kyi phyir yi dags dang dud 'gro rnams la yang mi 'dod do zhes grag go /
btsun pa na re blo gsal ba rnams la 'gyur te rta cang shes bzhin no zhes zer ro /
mi'i yang pha ma mi ma yin pa bsad na mtshams med par mi 'gyur ro /
uktaṃ karmāvaraṇam las kyi sgrib pa bshad zin to /
śeṣe gatiṣu pañcasu lhag ma 'gro ba lnga dag na /
ke punaḥ śeṣe /
kleśavipākāvaraṇe /
manuṣyeṣu vipākāvaraṇam /
kauravā deveṣvasaṃjñisattvāḥ /
kiṃsvabhāvānyānantaryāṇi /
catvāri kāyakarma ekaṃ vākkarma trīṇi prāṇātipāta ekaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ ekaṃ prāṇātipātaprayogaḥ 		lhag ma gang dag ci yin zhe na /
nyon mongs pa dang rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa ste /
mi dag gi nang na ni sgra mi snyan pa rnam par sman pa'i sgrib pa yin no /
lha dag gi nang na ni 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams so /
mtshams med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
bzhi ni lus kyi las yin la /
gcig ni ngag gi las yin te /
gsum ni srog gcod pa yin no /
gcig ni brdzun du smra ba yin no /
gcig ni srog gcod pa'i sbyor ba ste /
anupakramadharmāṇo hi tathāgatāḥ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nye bar mi brdzi ba'i chos can yin no /
hetau phalopacārātsaṃghabheda ānantaryamuktam /
bhidyate vā 'neneti kṛtvā 		rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa'am /
'dis 'byed par byed pas na dge 'dun gyi dbyen la mtshams med pa zhes bshad kyi /
saṃghabhedastvasāmagrīsvabhāvo viprayuktakaḥ dge 'dun dbyen ni mi 'phrod pa'i /
rang bzhin ldan pas ma yin chos /
akliṣṭāvyākṛto dharmaḥ nyon mongs can min lung bstan min /
asāmagrī nāna cittaviprayuktaḥ saṃskāro 'nivṛtāvyākṛtaḥ saṃghabhedaḥ /
sa kimānantaryaṃ bhaviṣyati naiva ca tena bhettā samanvāgataḥ 		dge 'dun gyi dbyen ni mi 'phrod pa zhes bya ba sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed de /
ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin na de ji ltar mtshams med par 'gyur /
de dang byed pa por yang mi ldan pa kho na yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
saṃghastena samanvitaḥ 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
de dang dge 'dun yang dag ldan /
yo hi bhinnastasya bhedo na bhettuḥ gang bye ba de dbyen dang ldan gyi /
'byed pa po la ni ma yin no /
atha bhettā kena samanvāgataḥ 'o na 'byed pa po ci dang ldan zhe na /
sadavadyamṛṣāvādastena bhettā samanvitaḥ de yi kha na ma tho brdzun /
de dang byed po yang dag ldan /
saṃghabhedāvadyena bhettā samanvāgataḥ /
tat punarmṛṣāvādaḥ 		'byed pa po ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen gyi kha na ma tho ba dang ldan te /
de ni brdzun yin no /
sa punaḥ saṃghabhedasahaje vāgvijñaptyavijñaptī /
sa ca tenāvadyena samanvāgato bhettā 		de yang dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang lhan cig skyes pa'i ngag gi rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag yin no /
kha na ma tho ba de dang ldan pa'i byed pa po de ni /
avīcau pacyate kalpan bskal par mnar med par smin 'gyur /
antarakalpamavīcau mahānarake vipacyate /
anyaistu nāvaśyamavīcau 		bar gyi bskal par mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por smin par 'gyur ro /
gzhan gyis ni mnar med par ma nges so /
atha yena bahunyānantaryāṇi kṛtāni bhavanti anantarameva tāni vipacyante /
kiṃ tu taistasya bhavati 		yang gang zhig gis mtshams med pa mang po byas pa yin la /
de dag bar chad med pa kho na smin par 'gyur na de la de dag gis ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
adhhikairadhikā rujaḥ /
sahi bhūyobhirānantaryaistasminnavīcau ghanataraṃ sukumārataraṃ cāśrayaṃ labhate kāraṇāśca bahutarāstīvratarāśca yena dvitricatuṣpañcaguṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate 		lhag pas gnod pa lhag par 'gyur /
de mtshams med pa mang pos mnar med pa der gang gis na gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lngar 'gyur gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i lus chen po dang shin tu gzhon sha can gyi lus 'thob cing /
kaḥ punareṣa saṃghaṃ bhanatti /
bhikṣurdu kvacarito vṛttī bhinatti /
bhikṣurbhinatti na gṛhī na bhikṣuṇyādayaḥ /
sa ca dṛṣṭicarita eva na tṛṣṇācaritaḥ 		gnod pa yang rab tu mang ba dang shin tu mi bzad par 'gyur ro /
dge 'dun 'byed par byed pa de su zhig yin zhe na /
dge slong dka' spyod tshul ldan pas /
'byed do /
dge slong gis 'byed kyi khyim pa yang ma yin la /
dge slong ma la sogs pa yang ma yin no /
de yang lta ba spyod pa kho nas 'byed kyi sred pa spyod pas ni ma yin no /
ṛtastho na bhinnavṛttastasyānādeyavākyatvāt tshul dang ldan pas 'byed kyi tshul nyams pas ni ma yin te /
de'i tshig mi btsan pa'i phyir ro /
kva bhinatti gang du 'byed ce na /
atra bhagavān saṃnihitastataḥ gang na bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs pa de las /
anyatra gzhan du'o /
nahi śāstureva saṃnidhau śakyo bhettum /
tathāgatānāṃ duṣprasahatvādādeyavākyatvācca 		de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bzod par dka' ba'i phyir dang bka' stsal ba'i phyir ston pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa nyid du dbye par mi nus so /
kān bhinatti su dag cig 'byed ce na /
bāliśān /
pṛthagjanāneva nāryān pratyakṣadharmatvāt 		byis pa rnams /
byis pa rnams kho na yin gyi 'phags pa rnams ni ma yin te /
chos mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir ro /
tānapi na kṣāntilābhina ityapare /
kiyatā bhinnaḥ saṃgho bhavati 		kha cig na re de dag las kyang bzod pa thob pa rnams ni ma yin no zhes zer ro /
ji tsam gyis na dge 'dun bye ba yin zhe na /
śāstṛmārgāntarakṣāntau bhinnaḥ ston dang lam gzhan la bzod pa /
bye ba'o /
yadā tebhyastathāgatādanyaḥ śāstā kṣamate tadupadiṣṭācca mārgādanyo mārga iyatā bhinnaḥ saṃgho vaktavyaḥ gang gi tshe de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las gzhan pa'i ston pa dang des bstan pa'i lam las gzhan pa'i lam la bzod na de tsam gyis dge 'dun bye ba zhes brjod do /
kiyantaṃ kālaṃ bhinna āste bye nas dus ji srid du cig tu 'dug ce na /
tāmeva rātriṃ /
na vivasatyasau /
aparyuṣita eva hi saṃghabhede saṃgho 'vaśyaṃ pratisaṃdhīyate 		de nyid kyi nub gcig tu de ni mi gnas so /
dge 'dun dbye na gdon mi za bar nam ma langs pa nyid du dge 'dun slar 'dum par 'gyur ro /
yo 'yaṃ saṃghabheda uktaḥ dge 'dun gyi dbyen du bshad pa gang yin pa /
cakrabhedaḥ sa ca mataḥ de ni 'khor lo'i dbyen du 'dod /
dharmacakraṃ hi tadā bhagavato bhinnaṃ bhavati /
mārgapravṛttiviṣṭhāpanāt /
ata eva cakrādaścocyate saṃghabhedaśca 		de'i tshe lam du 'jug pa'i bgegs su gyur pa'i phyir de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang phye ba yin te /
de nyid kyi phyir 'khor lo'i dbyen zhes kyang bya la /
dge 'dun gyi dbyen zhes kyang bya'o /
kva punaścakrabhedo bhavati 'khor lo'i dbyen yang gang na yod ce na /
jambūdvīpe /
nānyeṣu dvīpeṣu 		'dzam bu'i gling na'o /
gling gzhan dag na ni med do /
katibhirbhikṣubhiḥ dge slong du zhig gis she na /
navādibhiḥ /
navādiṃ kṛtvā /
pareṇāniyamaḥ /
aṣṭau bhikṣayaḥ saṃgho bhavati 		dgu sogs kyis dgu la sogs pa smos pas yan chad ni ma nges so /
dge slong brgyad ni dge 'dun yin no /
navamo bhettā /
avaśyaṃ hi saṃghena dvayoḥpakṣayoḥ sthātavyam /
evaṃ bhinno bhavati /
anyastu saṃghabhedaḥ karmabhedād bhavati /
yadyekasīmāyāṃ vyagrāḥ karma kurvanti 		dgu pa ni 'byed pa po yin te /
gdon mi za bar dge 'dun phyogs gnyis su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni bye ba yin no /
dge 'dun gyi dbyen gzhan ni las kyi dbyen las 'gyur te /
gal te mtshams gcig gi nang du mi mthun pas las dag byed na'o /
sa caiṣa /
karmabhedastriṣu dvīpeṣu 		las kyi dbyen ni gling gsum na yod de /
yeṣveva śāsanam /
katibhirbhikṣubhiḥ 		gang dag na bstan pa yod pa kho na na'o /
dge slong du zhig gis she na /
aṣṭābhiradhikaiśca saḥ /
cakrabhedastu ṣaṭsu kāleṣu na bhavati 		de ni brgya da dag yan chad kyis 'khor lo'i dbye na ni dus drug dag tu mi 'byung ste /
katameṣu /
ādāvante 'rbudāt pūrvaṃ yugāccoparate munau 		gang dag tu zhe na /
dang po mtha' skyon zung gcig gi /
snga rol thub pa nongs pa dang /
sīmāyāṃ cāpyabaddhāyāṃ cakrabhedo na jāyate /
ādāvacirapravartite dharmacakre /
ante parinirvāṇakāle bhagavataḥ /
etayorhi dvayoravasthayoḥ saṃgha ekaraso bhavati 		mtshams ma bcad pa dag tu yang /
'khor lo'i dbyen ni mi 'byung ngo /
dang po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas ring po ma lon pa dang tha ma bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe dang gnas skabs de gnyis su ni dge 'dun sha gcig ma yin no /
madhye 'pyarbudāt pūrvaṃ na bhidyate yāvacchāsane śīlārbudaṃ dṛṣṭyarbudaṃ ca notpannaṃ bhavati bar du yang skyon ma byung ba'i sngon rol du 'byed par mi 'gyur te /
ji srid du bstan pa la tshul khrims kyi skyon dang lta ba'i skyon ma byung gi bar du'o /
yugācca pūrvaṃ na bhidyate yāvacchrāvakāgrayugaṃ notpannaṃ bhavati zung gcig ma byung ba'i sngon rol du yang dbye bar mi 'gyur te /
ji srid du nyan thos kyi mchog zung gcig ma byung gi bar du ste /
bhinnanyāyaparivāsāttena ca pratisaṃdhānīyatvāt /
uparate munau śāstari parinirvṛte pratidvandvābhāvāt /
sīmāyāmabaddhāyāṃ yāvat sīmā na baddhā bhavati 		bye ba yongs su mi gnas pa'i phyir dang des phyir sdum par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
thub pa nongs na yang mi 'byung ste /
ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das na 'gran zla med pa'i phyir ro /
mtshams ma bcad pa dag tu yang ste /
ji srid du mtshams ma bcad par mi 'byung ste /
ekasīmāyāṃ hi pakṣadvayāvasthānātsaṃghabheda ityeṣu kālesu cakrabhedona bhavati mtshams gcig gi nang du phyogs gnyis su gnas pa'i phyir bye ba zhes bya'o /
de ltar na dus drug po de dag tu 'khor lo'i dbyen mi 'byung ngo /
na ca punaḥ sarveṣāṃ baddhānāṃ cakrabhedaḥ /
karmādhīnatvāt 		las la rag lus pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo la yang dbyen mi 'byung ngo /
kasmāt mātṛvadhādiṣvānantaryaṃ nānyatra ci'i phyir ma bsad pa la sogs pa mtshams med pa yin la gzhan ni ma yin zhe na; /
upakāriyuṇakṣetranirākṛtivipādanāt phan 'dogs pa dang yon tan zhing /
spangs dang med par byas phyir ro /
mātāpitṛvadhe tāvadupakāriṇo nirākaraṇāt re zhig pa ma gsad pa ni phan 'dogs pa med par byas pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ tāvupakāriṇau /
ātmabhāvasya tatprabhavatvāt 		ji ltar de gnyis phan 'dogs pa yin zhe na /
de dag las lus skyes pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ tayornirākaraṇam de dag spangs ba ji lta bu zhe na /
parityāgaḥ yongs su bor ba'o /
guṇakṣetratvādarhadvadhād ānantaryam /
yadi punarmāturvyañjanaṃ parivṛttaṃ syāt piturvā tatraikasminnāmnāyo 		yon tan gyi zhing yin pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa gsad pa la sogs pa yang mtshams med pa yin no /
gal te pha'am ma mtshan gyur pa na yang lus gcig pa de la ni /
vyañjanāntarito 'pi syāt mtshan ni gzhan du gyur kyang 'gyur /
ata evocyate syāt puruṣaṃ jīvitādvacyaparopayenna pitaraṃ nārhantam /
ānantaryāvadyena ca spṛśyeta 		de nyid kyi phyir pha yang ma yin dgra bcom pa yang ma yin pa'i skyes pa zhig bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
yod de /
syānmāturvyañjanaṃ parivṛttaṃ syāditi ma mtshan gyur pas bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ro /
syāt strīṃ jīvitādvyaparopayenna mātaraṃ nārhantīm ānantaryāvadyena ca spṛśyeta ma yang ma yin dgra bcom pa yang ma yin pa'i bud med gcig bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
yod de /
syāt piturvyañjanaṃ parivṛttaṃ syāditi /
anyasyāḥ striyāḥ kalalaṃ prasrutamanyayā yonyā pītam /
katarā tasya mātā yāṃ ghnataḥ syādānantaryam /
mātā yacchoṇitodbhavaḥ 		pha mtshan gyur pas bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do /
bud med gzhan las nur nur po zags nas bud med gzhan gyi mang la du blugs na gang zhig bsad na mtshams med par 'gyur ba de'i ma gang yin zhe na /
gang gi zla mtshan las byung ma /
yasyāḥ śoṇitādasāvudbhūtaḥ sattvaḥ sā 'sya mātā dvitīyā tu sarvakṛtyeṣvavalokyā sems can de gang gi zla mtshan las byung ba de ni de'i ma yin no /
gnyis pa yang bya ba thams cad khu par bya ba yin te /
sā hyāpāyikā poṣikā saṃvardhikā ca /
yadi mātari prayogaṃ kṛtvā 'nyāṃ mārayenna syādānantaryam /
amātṛprayogeṇa mārayettathāpi na syāt /
mañcatalāvalīnamātṛmāraṇaṃ cātrodāhārya dhāvakasya ca putreṇa masaka prayogeṇa piturmāraṇaṃ ca 		de ni nu zho ldud par byed pa dang gso bar byed pa dang skyed par byed pa yin no /
gal te ma la sbyor ba byas nas gzhan bsad na yang mtshams med par mi 'gyur la ma ma yin pa la sbyor ba byas nas ma bsad na yang mtshams med par 'gyur te /
ma khri'u 'i 'og na 'dug pa bsad pa dang khrus pa'i bus sbrang bu la sbyor ba byas pas pha bsad pa dper bya'o /
ekena prahāreṇa mātaramanyāṃ ca mārayato dve avijñaptī bhavataḥ /
vijñaptistvānantaryameva 		mtshon thabs gcig gis ma dang gzhan zhig kyang bsad na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni gnyis yin la /
rnam par rig byed ni mtshams med pa kho na yin te /
tasya karmaṇo balīyastvāt las de stobs che ba'i phyir ro /
paramāṇusaṃcitatvādvijñaptirapi dvidheti bhadantaghoṣakaḥ btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs na re rdul phra rab bsags pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed kyang rnam pa gnyis so zhes zer ro /
anarhatsaṃjñayā 'pi arhadghāte bhavatyānantaryam aham hanmītyāśrayāvadhāraṇāt /
yaḥ pitaramarhantaṃ hiṃsyāttasyāpyekameva syādānantaryamāśrayaikatvāt 		dgra bcom pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dgra bcom pa bsad na yang mtshams med par 'gyur te /
'di gsad do snyam du rten nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro /
gang zhig gis pha dgra bcom pa bsad na yang de la mtshams med pa ni gcig kho nar 'gyur te /
rten gcig pa'i phyir ro /
idamavadānaṃ kathaṃ nīyate gaccha śikhaṇḍinaṃ brūhi dve ānantarye bhavatā kṛte /
yacca pitā jīvitādvyaparopito yaccārhanniti 		song la skra can la khyod kyis ni mtshams med pa gnyis byas te /
pha gsad pa gang yin pa dang gang yang dgra bcom pa gsad pa'o zhes smros shig ces bya ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa 'di ji lta bu zhe na /
dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmiti vaktavyam rgyu gnyis kyis zhes brjod par bya'o /
dvābhyāṃ vā mukhābhyāṃ paribhāṣitaḥ yang na sgo gnyis nas spyos pa yin no /
kimavaśyaṃ tathāgatasyāsti kuṭuṣṭacittarudhirotpādanādānantaryam /
vadhābhiprāyasya syāt 		de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung bas gdon mi za bar mtshams med par 'gyur ram zhe na /
buddhe na tāḍanecchasya bgrod par sems pa la ni 'gyur gyi /
yadi tāḍanābhitrāya utpādayenna syāt sangs rgyas brdeg par sems pa la'ang min /
yadyanarhati praharetsa ca prahārādūrdhvamarhan syāt gal te dgra ma choms pa'i tshe bsnun la bsnun pa'i 'og tu dgra bcom par gyur na /
prahārānnordhvamarhati bsnun 'og dgra bcom pa la min /
syādānantaryamiti vartate /
