nahi tena tatra prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ 		mtshams med par 'gyur bzhes bya bar sbyar te /
des ni de la sbyor ba ma byas so /
kimānantarye prayogaṃ kṛtvā tasminnavyāvartite vairāgyaṃ phalaṃ vā na prāpnuyāt ci mtshams med pa'i sbyor ba byas te /
de yang ma bzlog par 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur zhe na /
nānantaryaprayuktasya vairāgyaphalasaṃbhavaḥ /
anyakarmaphalapathaprayogaṃ tu kṛtvāryamārgotpattau na punaḥ karmapathotpattirāśrayasyātyantaṃ tadviruddhatvāt 		mtshams med sbyor ba byas pa la /
'dod chags bral 'bras mi srid do /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
bsam pa shin tu 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
las kyi lam gzhan gyi sbyor ba byas nas 'phags pa'i lam skyes pa la ni yang las kyi lam mi skye ste /
rten de dang shin tu 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
eṣāmānantaryāṇāṃ katamat mahāsāvadyam /
saṃghamede mṛṣāvādo mahāvadyatamo mataḥ 		mtshams med pa'i las 'di dag las thams cad kyi nang na kha na ma thob dang bcas pa chen po gang yin zhe na /
dge 'dun dbye phyir brdzun smra ba /
kha na ma tho bar cher 'dod /
yaḥ saṃghabhedanimittaṃ mṛṣāvādo dharmādharmajñasya viparyayadyotanāt sa sarveṣāṃ duścaritānāṃ mahāvadyatamaḥ gang zhig chos dang chos ma yin pa shes bzhin du dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir brdzun du smra na log par ston pa'i phyir nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi nang na kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa rab tu che ba yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
tathāgatadharmaśarīraprahāritatvāt lokānāṃ ca svargāpavargamārgāntarāyakatvāt /
saṃghe hi bhinne lokasya niyāmāvakrantiphalaprāptivairāgyāsravakṣayāḥ pratibadhyante dhyānādhyayanasvādhyāyacintākarmāṇyapi na pravartante sadevanāgamanuṣyaṃ jagaccākulaṃ vimanaskaṃ vartate yāvat punarna pratisaṃdhito bhavatiyasmāccāvicau kalpaṃ vipākaḥ /
śeṣāṇāmānantaryāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ pañcamatṛtīyaprathamāni gurutarāṇi sarvalaghuḥ pitṛvadhaḥ 		de ci'i phyir zhe na /
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bsnun pa'i phyir dang 'jig rten rnams kyi mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam gyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i phyir te /
dge 'dun dbye na ji srid du slar ma dum gyi bar du 'jig rten nges pa la 'jug pa dang 'bras bu 'thob pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang bag [*zag?] pa zad par bya ba rnams la bgegs su gyur pa yin zhing /
bsam gtan dang klog pa dang kha ton dang sems pa'i las rnams kyang mi 'jug cing /
lha dang klu dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba yang 'khrugs pa dang yid mi bde ba dang rang dbang med pa dang dran pa nyams par 'gyur la /
'di ltar 'di'i rnam par smin pa yang bskal pa gcig tu mnar med par skye ba yin no /
mtshams med pa lhag ma rnams las ni go rims bzhin du lnga ba dang gsum pa dang dang po rnams ches lci ba yin te /
pha gsod pa ni thams cad kyi nang na yang ba yin no /
yattarhi bhagavatā trayāṇāṃ daṇḍānāṃ manodaṇḍo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ punarmithyādṛṣṭiḥ paramavadyānāmityuktam ānantaryāṇi niyamasya saṃghabhedo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis nyes pa gsum gyi nang na yid kyi nyes pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chen por gsungs pa dang yang log par lta ba ni kha na ma tho ba dam pa yin no zhes gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
mtshams med pa rnams nges par mdzad nas ni dge 'dun gyi dbye na kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chen por gsungs la /
trīṇi karmāṇi niyamayya manodaṇdaḥ dṛṣṭīrniyamayya mithyādṛṣṭiḥ las gsum nges par mdzad nas ni yid kyi nyes pa gsungs /
lta ba rnams nges par mdzad nas ni log par lta ba gsungs pa'am /
athavā vipākavistaraṃ mahājanavyāpādanaṃ kuśalamūlasamucchedaṃ cādhikṛtya yathākramam yang na rnam par smin pa rgya che ba dang skye bo phal po che 'chi ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du gcod pa'i dbang du mdzad nas go rims bzhin du gsungs pa yin no /
sucaritānāṃ punaḥ katamat mahāphalatamam legs par spyad pa rnams las 'bras bu rab tu che ba gang yin zhe na /
bhavāgracetanā loke mahāphalatamā śubhe 'jig rten pa'i dge ba la /
srid rtse'i sems pa 'bras rab che /
kuśale punaḥ karmaṇi bhavāgracetanā sarveṣāṃ mahāphalatamā las dge ba la ni thams cad kyi nang na srid pa'i rtse mo'i sems pa 'bras bu rab tu che ba yin te /
tasyā aśītikalpasahasrāṇyatipraśānto vipākaḥ /
vipākaphalaṃ cādhikṛtyaitaduktam 		de'i rnam par smin pa ni bskal pa brgyad khrir rab tu zhi ba yin no /
rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'i dbang du byas nas de skad bshad kyi /
visaṃyogaphalaṃ tvadhikṛtya vajropamasamādhicetanā sarveṣāṃ mahāphalā sarvasamyojanaparyādānaphalatvāt bral ba'i 'bras bu'i dbang du byas nas ni thams cad kyi nang na rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems pa 'bras bu che ba yin te /
kun du sbyor ba thams cad gtan du gtugs pa 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro /
ata eva loka ityuktam /
kimānantaryairevāvaśyaṃ narakeṣūpapadyate /
ānantaryasabhāgairapyavaśyamupapadyate /
natvanantaramevetyapare /
katamāni tānītyāha /
dūṣaṇaṃ māturarhantyā niyatisthasya māraṇam 		de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten pa'i zhes bshad do /
ci mtshams med pa rnams kho nas dmyal ba dag tu gdon mi za bar skye bar 'gyur ram /
'on te gzhan dag gis kyang skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
mtshams med pa dang cha 'dra ba rnams kyis kyang gdon mi za bar skye bar 'gyur ro /
gzhan dag na re bar chad med pa kho nar ni ma yin no zhes zer ro /
de dag kyang gang zhe na /
smras pa /
ma dgra bcom ma sun byas dang /
bodhisattvasya śaikṣasya saṃghāyadvārahārikā /
ānantaryasabhāgāni pañcamaṃ stūpabhedanam /
etāni pañca pañcānāmānatnaryāṇāṃ yathākramam sabhāgāni 		byang chub sems dpa' des [*nges] gnas dang /
slob pa gsod dang dge 'dun gyi /
'du ba'i sgo ni 'phrogs pa dag /
mtshams med pa dang cha 'dra ste /
lnga pa mchod rten 'jig pa yin /
lnga po 'di dag ni go rims bzhin du mtshams med pa lnga dang cha 'dra pa yin te /
yadi mātaramarhantīṃ dūṣayatyabrahmacaryakaraṇāt niyatipatītaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mārayati śaikṣaṃ mārayati saṃghasya sukhāyadvārikaṃ harati stūpabhedaṃ karoti gal te mi tshangs par spyod pas ma dgra bcom ma sun par byed pa dang nges par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsod pa dang slob pa gsod pa dang dge 'dun gyi zhal du 'du pa'i sgo 'phrogs pa dang mchod rten 'jig par byed pa'o /
anyadapi tu karma savipākaṃ triṣu kāleṣvatyarthaṃ vighnayati rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa'i las gzhan yang dus gsum po dag tu shin tu bgegs byed de /
katameṣu trisu /
kṣāntyanāgāmitārhattvaprāptau karmātivighnakṛt 		gsum po gang dag tu zhe na /
bzod dang phyir mi 'ong dgra bcom /
'thob pa las bgegs shin tu byed /
mūrdhabhyaḥ kṣāntimākirata āpāyikāni karmāṇi vighnāyopatiṣṭhante /
tadvipākabhūmyatikramāt 		rtse mo las bzod pa thob pa la ni de'i rnam par smin pa'i sa las 'da' ba'i phyir ngan song ba'i las rnams bgegs bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas te /
yathā puruṣasya deśatyāgaṃ kurvato dhanikā upatiṣṭhante /
anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuvataḥ kāmāvacarāṇi vighnāyopatiṣṭhante tathaiva sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma 		dper na mi zhig yul 'dor bar byed pa la bu lon pa dag ldang ba bzhin no /
de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa la ni /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i las rnams bgegs bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas te /
mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ni ma gtogs so /
arhattvaṃ prāpnuvato rūpārūpyāvacarāṇi tathaiva /
yaduktaṃ bodhisattvasya māraṇamiti 		de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa la ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las rnams bgegs bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas so /
byang chub sems dpa' gsad pa zhes bshad pa gang yin pa /
bodhisattvaḥ kuto yāvat gang nas byang chub sems dpa' yin /
kuta upādāya bodhisattvovaktavyaḥ gang na gzung ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod par bya /
yato lakṣaṇa karmakṛt /
yataḥ prabhṛti lakṣaṇavipākāni karmāṇyārabhate kartuṃ sa hi tadānīṃ niyatipatito bhavati 		gang nas mtshan gyi las byed pa gang phan chad nas mtshan rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i las rnams byed par rtsom ba de'i tshe nges par rtogs pa yin no /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
sa hi tasmāt kālāt prabhṛti nityaṃ bhavati /
sugatiḥ kulajo 'vyakṣaḥ pumān jātismaro 'nivṛt 		ji lta zhe na /
de ni dus de phan chad rtag tu yang /
bde 'gror rigs mthor skye dbang tshang /
phor 'gyur tshe rabs dran mi ldog /
praśastā gatirasyeti sugatirdevamanuṣyopapatteḥ /
tasyāṃ ca sugatau kṣatriyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatimahāśālakulajo bhavati nānyaḥ kulīnaḥ /
vikalānyakṣāṇyasyeti vyakṣaḥ /
na vyakṣo 'vyakṣaḥ avikalendriyaḥ ityarthaḥ 		pa yin no /
'di'i 'gro ba rab tu bsngags pa yin pas na bde 'gro ste /
lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba'i phyir ro /
'gro ba de dag tu yang rgyal rigs dang bram ze dang khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bur skye ba yin gyi rigs dma' bar ni mi skye'o /
'di'i dbang po rnams ma tshang bas na dbang po ma tshang ba'o /
dbang po tshang bas na dbang po tshang ba ste /
dbang po ma tshang ba med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
puruṣa eva na strī kuta eva śaṇḍhādiḥ /
jātismaraśca bhavati /
sarvasyāṃ jātau nivartata iti nivṛt 		pho kho nar 'gyur gyi mor yang mi 'gyur na za ma la sogs par lta smos kyang ci dgos /
skye ba thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro /
nur bas na ldog pa'o /
nur ba med pas na mi ldog pa ste /
na nivṛdanivṛt /
anivartaka ityarthaḥ /
sattvahitārthaṃ sarvaduḥkhaprakāraiḥ sarvasattvavipratipattibhiścākheditatvāt 		ldog pa med ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa thams cad dang log par sgrub pa thams cad kyis skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro /
yattalloka ucyate apaṇakrīto dāsa iti /
bodhisattvāste te hi mahātmānaḥ sarvasaṃpatprakarṣaviśeṣaprāptā api santo niṣkāraṇakaruṇāpāratantryātsarvasattveṣu caṇḍālakumārakasadṛśamātmānaṃ nirmānatayā vyavasthāpya sattvebhyaḥ sarvakadarthānāṃ soḍhāro bhavanti sarvaśramayantraṇānāṃ codvoḍhāraḥ /
yaccaitallakṣaṇavipākaṃ karmetyuktam 		'jig rten na zong gis ma nyos pa'i bran zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag yin te /
bdag nyid chen po de dag ni; /
'byor pa'i mchog khyad par can thams cad brnyas kyang thugs rje'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i phyir bdag nyid sems can thams cad kyi drung du khyi dang 'dra bar nga rgyal med par gnas te /
sems can thams cad kyis brnyas gnod byas pa thams cad bzod cing ngal ba dang mnags pa thams cad kyang nyams su len pa yin no /
mtshan rnam par smin pa can gyi las su bshad pa gang yin pa /
jambūdvīpe pumāneva saṃmukhaṃ buddhacetanaḥ de ni 'dzam gling phor gyur nyid /
mngon sum sangs rgyas la sems pa /
cintāmayaṃ kalpaśate śeṣa ākṣipate hi tat bsams pa las byung bskal pa brgya /
lus pa dag tu 'phen par byed /
jambūdvīpa eva bodhisattvo lakṣaṇavipākaṃ karmākṣipati /
nānyatra 		byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dzam bu gling kho nar mtshan rnam par smin pa can gyi las 'phen par byed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ tīkṣṇabuddhitvāt 'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams blo rno ba'i phyir ro /
puruṣa eva na strī /
saṃmukhībhūta eva śāstari buddhālambanayaiva cetanayā cintāmayaṃ tatkarma na śrutamayaṃ na bhāvanāmayam /
kalpaśate ca śeṣa ākṣipati na bahubhavesu /
bhagavatā tu śākyamuninottaptavīryatayā nava kalpā apāvartitā ekanavatyā kalpairākṣiptam /
ata eva cokta mito 'haṃ grāmaṇīrekanavataṃ kalpamupādāya na samanusmarāmi nābhijānāmi yadekakulamapi pakṣabhikṣāpradānahetoḥ kṣataṃ vā syādupahataṃ veti /
tataḥ prabhṛti prakṛtijātismaratvāt prathamakalpāsaṃkhyeyaniryāta eva bodhisattva etāṃścaturo doṣān vyāvartayati dvau ca guṇo pratilabhata iti pūrvācāryāḥ 		pho lo nas 'phen gyi mos ni ma yin no /
ston pa mngon sum du gyur pa dang sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems pa kho nas bskal pa brgya lus pa'i tshe 'phen gyi mang po lus pa'i tshe ni ma yin no /
las de yang bsams pa las byung ba yin gyi thos pa las byung ba yang ma yin la bsgoms pa las byung ba yang ma yin no /
bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas ni brtson 'grus spyad pas bskal pa dgu bsdums te /
bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig lus pa'i tshe 'phangs so /
de nyid kyi phyir grong dpon ngas 'di nas bzung ste /
bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du yang dag par rjes su dran te /
zas smin pa ster bar bya ba'i phyir khyim 'ga' la yang mi 'di ba 'am /
gnod par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par mi mkhyen to zhes gsungs te /
de tshun chad rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pa'i phyir ro /
sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re bskal pa dang po tshar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kho nas skyon bzhi po 'di dag ni bzlog par byed pa /
teṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇānām yon tan gnyis po ni 'thab bo zhes zer ro /
ekaikaṃ puṇyaśatajam /
kiṃ puṇyasya parimāṇam /
saṃnikṛṣṭabodhisattvaṃ sthāpayitvā yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ bhogaphalamityeke /
yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena trisāhasramahāsāhasrako loko 'bhinivartata ityapare /
buddhā eva ca tatparimāṇajñā ityapare 		mtshan de dag kyang re re 'ang bsod nams brgya las skyes /
bsod nams kyi ni tshad ji tsam zhe na /
kha cig na re byang chub sems dpa' nye ba ma gtogs pa sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod kyi 'bras bu can ji snyed pa de tsam mo zhes zer ro /
gzhan dag na re sems can thams cad kyi las kyi dbang gis stong gsum 'chags pa ji snyed tsam mo zhes zer ro /
gzhan dag na re de'i tshad ni sangs rgyas kho nas mkhyen par zad do zhes zer ro /
yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas she na /
atha bodhisattvabhūto bhagavān kiyato buddhān paryupāsayāmāsa bskal pa grangs med pa dang po la ni sangs rgyas bdun khri lnga stong la bsnyen bkur byas so /
pratheme kalpāsaṃkhyeye pañcasaptatisahasrāṇi dvitīye ṣaṭsaptatiṃ tṛtīye saptasaptatim gnyis pa la ni bdun khri drug stong la bsnyen bkur byas so /
gsum pa la ni bdun khri bdun stong la bsnyen bkur byas so /
atha kasya kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyānte katamo buddha āsīt bskal pa grangs med pa gang gi tha mar sangs rgyas gang zhig byung bar gyur zhe na /
pratilomānukrameṇa yathākramam bzlog pa'i go rims kyis go rims bzhin du /
asaṃkhyeyatrayāntyajāḥ rnam gzigs mar me rin chen gtsug /
vipaśyī dīpakṛdratnaśikhī grangs med gsum gyi tha mar byung /
ratnaśikhini samyaksaṃbuddhe prathamo 'saṃkhyeyaḥ samāptaḥ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi tshe ni bskal pa grangs med pa dang po rdzogs so /
dīpaṅkare bhagavati dvitīyaḥ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi tshe ni gnyis pa rdzogs so /
vipaśyini tathāgate tṛtīyaḥ /
sarveṣāṃ tu teṣāṃ /
śāsyamuniḥ purā 		de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi tshe ni gsum pa rdzogs so /
de dag thams cad kyi dang po sh'akya thub pa yin /
śākyamunirnāma samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ vabhūva /
yatra bhagavatā bodhisattvabhūtenādyaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam evaṃprakāra evāhaṃ buddho bhaveyamiti no 'pyevaṃ kaliyuga evotpannavānāryavattasyāpyevaṃ varṣa sahasrāntaṃ śāsanaṃ babhūva 		sngon sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rnam pa kho nar sangs rgyas par shog shig ces dang por smon lam btab pa byung ste /
de yang 'di bzhin du rtsod pa'i dus kho na la byung la /
de'i bstan pa yang la stong gi mtha'i bar du gnas par gyur to /
atha kasyāmavasthāvāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kāṃ pāramitāṃ paripūrayate yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas skabs gang dag tu pha rol tu phyin pa gang yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
sarvatra sarvaṃ dadataḥ kāruṇyāddānapūraṇam kun la thams cad snying rje yis /
sbyin par byed pas sbyin pa rdzogs /
yadā sarvasmai sarvaṃ dadāti ā akṣṇaḥ ā majjāyāḥ kāruṇyānnābhyudayaviśeṣaṃ lipsamānaḥ iyatā dānapāramitā paripūrṇā bhavati gang gi cha gang la kun la ni mig gi bar dang rkang gi bar thams cad mngon par mtho ba'i khyad par la mi re bar snying rjes sbyin par byed na de tsam gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no /
aṅgacchede 'pyakopāttu rāgiṇaḥ kṣāntiśīlayoḥ chags bcas yan lag bcad kyang ni /
mi 'khrug bzod dang tshul khrims kyi /
yadā 'yamavītarāgo 'pi cchidyamāneṣvaṅgeṣu nālpamapi kupyati tadā 'sya kṣāntiśīlapāramite paripūrṇe bhavataḥ gang gi tshe 'dod chags dang ma bral bzhin du yan lag bcad kyang cung zad kyang mi 'khrug pa de'i tshe 'di'i tshul khrims dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag yongs su rdzogs pa yin no /
tiṣyastotreṇa vīryasya skar rgyal bstod pas brtson 'grus kyi /
tiṣyaṃ tathāgataratnaguhāyāṃ tejodhātusamāpannadṛṣṭyā bhagavān bodhisattvabhūta ekena pādena sthitvā sapta divasān stutavānekagāthayā bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal ri'i phug cig na me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa mthong nas rkang pa gcig gis 'grengs te zhag bdun gyi bar du /
na divi bhuvi vā nāsmin loke na vaiśravaṇālaye /
na marubhavane divye sthāne na dikṣu vidikṣu vā /
caratu vasudhāṃ sphītāṃ kṛtsnāṃ saparvatakānanām 		skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dri'i dge sbyong chen po gzhan dag lha yul pa la med /
'jig rten 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin rnam thos bu yi gnas na'ang yod ma yin /
lha yi pho brang gnas mchog dag na'ang yod min phyogs sam phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med /
ri dang nags su bcas pa'i sa steng rgyas par kun tu yul gcig ga la yod /
puruṣavṛṣabhastvattulyo 'nyo mahāśramaṇaḥ kuta iti /
tadā kila vīryapāramitā paripūrṇā nava ca kalpāḥ pratyudāvartitāḥ 		ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa de'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs la /
dhīsamādhyoranantaram /
bodheḥ pūrvasamanantaraṃ dhyānaprajñāpāramitayoḥ paripūrirvajropamasamādhau svasyāḥ saṃpadaḥ pāragamanāt pāramitāḥ 		bskal pa dgu yang bsdums so zhes grag go de ma thag la ting nge 'dzin blo'i byang chub pa'i sngon rol gyi de ma thag rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bdag yongs su rdzogs te /
rang rang gi phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dag yin no /
sūtra uktaṃ trīṇi puṇyakriyāvastūni /
dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayamiti /
kathametattrayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu 		mdo las sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi dang tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi dang bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum gsungs pa /
ji ltar na gsum po 'di dag bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi yin zhe na /
puṇyaṃ kriyā 'tha tadvastu trayaṃ karmapathā yathā /
puṇyamapyetattrayaṃ kriyā 'pi vastvapi yathāyogamiti puṇyakriyāvastu /
tadyathā karma ca te panthānaśca panthāna eva ca karmaṇa iti karmaṃpathā uktāḥ 		gsum po bsod nams bya ba dang /
de'i gzhi dper na las lam bzhin /
gsum po 'di dag ni ci rigs par bsod nams kyang yin /
bya ba yang yin /
gzhi yang yin pas bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi ste /
dper na de dag ni las kyang yin la las kyi lam yang yin pa dang las kyi lam kho na yin pas las kyi lam mo zhes bshad pa bzhin no /
tatra dānamaye tāvat puṇyakriyāvastuni kāyavākkarma tridhā bhavati /
tatsamutthāpikā cetanā puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca 		de la re zhig sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi la lus dang ngag gi las ni rnam pa gsum char yin no /
de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems pa ni bsod nams kyang yin la bya ba yang yin no /
tatsahabhuvo dharmāḥ puṇyameva de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni bsod nams kho na yin no /
śīlamayaṃ tu kāyavākkarmaiveti tridhā bhavati tshul khrims las byung ba ni lus dang ngag gi las kho na yin pas rnam pa gsum char yin no /
bhāvanāmayo maitrī puṇyaṃ ca puṇyakriyāyāśca vastu /
tatsaṃprayuktāyāścetanāyā maitrīmukhenābhisaṃskaraṇāt tatsahabhuvaścetanā śīlaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca /
anye tatsahabhuvaḥ puṇyameva puṇyasya vā kāraṇaṃ puṇyakriyā puṇyaprayogastasyā etāni trīṇi vastūni 		bsgom pa las byung ba la byas pa ni bsod nams kyang yin la bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi yang yin te /
byams pa'i sgo nas de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir ro /
de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i sems pa dang tshul khrims ni bsod nams kyang yin la bya ba yang yin no /
de dang lhan cig 'byung ba gzhan ni bsod nams kho na yin no /
yang na bsod nams byed pa ni bsod nams bya ba ste /
eṣāṃ saṃpādanārthaṃ puṇyaprayogārambhāditi /
kuśalacetanāparamārthena puṇyakriyā /
tasyā etāni vastūnītyapare /
kimidaṃ dānaṃ nāma 		sbyor ba'o /
'di dag sgrub pa'i ched du bsod nams kyi 'byor ba rtsom pa'i phyir gsum po 'di dag ni de'i gzhi yin no /
gzhan dag na re bsod nams bya ba ni don dam par na sems pa dge ba yin la /
'di dag ni de'i gzhi yin no zhes zer ro /
sbyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na /
yadapi dīyate daddānam /
iha tu 		gang sbyin par bya ba de yang sbyin pa yin mod kyi 'dir ni /
dīyate yena daddānaṃ gang gis sbyin byed de sbyin pa /
bhavati sma /
rāgādibhirapi dīyate /
na cātra tadiṣṭam /
ato viśeṣaṇārthamāha /
pūjānugrahakāmyayā 		'jigs pa dang lan la re ba dang 'dod chags pa la sogs pas kyang sbyin par byed mod kyi /
de ni 'dir mi 'dod pas de'i phyir khyad par du bya ba'i phyir /
mchod dang phan gdags 'dod pa yis /
zhes bya ba smos te /
pareṣāṃ pūjānugrahakāmatābhyāṃ yena dīyate gang gis gzhan dag la mchod pa dang phan gdags par 'dod pa dag gis sbyin par byed pa'o /
kiṃ punastatsyādyena dīyate /
kāyavākkarma sotthānaṃ 		gang gis sbyin par byed pa de yang gang zhig ce na /
lus dang ngag la slong dang bcas /
kiṃ punastadutthānam slong ba yang gang zhig ce na /
yena kalāpena tadutthāpyate /
āha cātra 		tshogs gang gis de slong bar byed pa'o /
'dir smras pa /
śubhena manasā dravyaṃ svaṃ dadāti yadā pumān gang tshe skyes bu dge yid kyis /
rang gi rdzas ngag sbyin byed pa /
tat kṣaṇaṃ kuśalāḥ skandhāḥ dānamityabhidhīyate /
mahābhogyaphalaṃ ca tat /
taccaitaddānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahābhogyaphalam 		de tshe dge ba'i phung po rnams /
sbyin pa zhes ni brjod pa yin /
zhes bya ba'o /
de 'bras longs spyod chen po can /
sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu longs spyod chen po yin no /
svabhāve caiṣa mayaḍveditavyaḥ 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin yin par rig par bya ste /
tadyathā tṛṇamayaṃ gṛhaṃ parṇamayaṃ bhājanamiti /
tat khalvetaddānaṃ /
svaparārthobhayārthāya nobhayārthāya dīyate 		dper na rtsa las byung ba'i khyim dang lo ma las byung ba'i snod ces bya ba bzhin no /
yang sbyin pa de ni /
bdag gzhan don phyir gnyis don phyir /
gnyi ga'i don du min phyir sbyin /
tatra yadavītarāgaḥ āryaḥ pṛthagjano vā vītarāgaścaitye dānaṃ dadāti tadasyātmana evārthāya /
pareṣāṃ tenānugrahābhāvāt 		de la 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'am /
so so'i skye bo 'dod chags dang ma bral bas mchod rten la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa des pha rol po dag la phan 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid kho na'i don gyi phyir sbyin pa yin no /
yadāryo vītarāgaḥ parasattvebhyo dānaṃ dadāti sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ tatra dānaṃ pareṣāmarthāya /
tena teṣāmanugrahāt /
nātmano 'rthāya /
tadvipākabhūmeratyantasamatikrāntatvāt 		'phags pa 'dod chags dang bral bas sems can pha rol po dag la sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par des de dag la phan btags pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don gyi phyir yin gyi bdag gi don gyi phyir ni ma yin te /
de'i rnam par smin pa'i sa las shin tu yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro /
yadavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjano vā vītarāgaḥ parasattvebhyo dadāti taddānamubhayeṣāmarthāya 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'am /
so so'i skye bo'i 'dod chags dang bral bas sems can pha rol po dag la sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga'i don gyi phyir yin no /
yadāryo vītarāgaścaitye dadāti sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ taddānamubhayeṣāṃ nārthāya /
taddhi kevalaṃ gauravaṃ kṛtjñābhyāṃ dīyate 		'phags pa 'dod chags dang bral bas mchod rten la 'bul bar byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par gnyi ga'i don gyi phyir yang ma yin te de ni bkur sti dang byas pa gzo ba 'ba' zhig gis 'bul bar zad do /
sāmānyena dānaṃ mahābhogyaphalamuktam sbyin pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod chen po can zhes spyir bstan pa /
tadviśeṣaḥ punardātṛvastukṣetraviśeṣataḥ /
tatra tāvat 		de'i khyad par sbyin bdag dang /
dngos dang zhing gi khyad par las /
de la re zhig /
dātā viśiṣṭaḥ śraddhādyaiḥ sbyin bdag khyad 'phags dad sogs kyis /
śraddhāśīlaśrutādiguṇayukto dātā viśiṣṭo bhavati /
tasya taddānadātṛviśeṣeṇa phaladānaṃ prativiśiṣyate /
sa ca tādṛśo dātā 		dad pa dang tshul khrims dang thos pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i sbyin bdag ni khyad par du 'phags pa yin no /
sbyin bdag de'i sbyin pa de ni sbyin bdag gi khyad par gyis 'bras bu 'byin pa la khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur te /
sbyin bdag de lta bu de ni /
satkṛtyādi dadāti gus pa la sogs pas sbyin par byed /
satkṛtya svahastaṃ kāle parānupahatya dadāti gus pa dang rang gi lag dang dus su dang gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin par byed de /
ataḥ /
satkārodārarucitā kālānācchedyalābhitā /
ato 'sya dātustattādṛśaṃ dānaṃ dattvā yathākramaṃ catvāro viśeṣā bhavanti 		de phyir bkur sti rgya chen dang /
dus dang bar chad med par rnyed /
de'i phyir sbyin bdag 'di'i sbyin pa de lta bur byin pas go rims bzhin du khyad par bzhir 'gyur te /
satkāralābhī bhavati bkur sti rnyed par 'gyur /
udāreṣu ca bhogeṣu ruciṃ labhate longs spyod rgya chen po la dad pa rnyed par 'gyur /
kālelna ca bhogān labhate nātikrāntikālena longs spyod dus las mi yol bar dus su rnyed par 'gyur /
anācchedyāṃśca bhogān labhate longs spyod bar chad med par 'gyur te /
nāsya bhogāḥ parairācchādyante nāpyagnyādibhirvināśyante 'di'i longs spyod gzhan dag gis bar du mi chod cing /
me la sogs pas med par mi 'gyur ro /
uktaṃ yathā dātā viśiṣyate tadviśeṣācca dānaviśeṣaḥ ji ltar na sbyin bdag khyad par du 'phags pa yin pa dang de'i khyad par gyis sbyin pa'i khyad par yang bshad zin to /
atha vastu kathaṃ viśiṣyate /
varṇādisampadā vastu 		ji ltar na dngos po khyad par du 'phags pa yin zhe na /
kha dog la sogs phun sum dngos /
viśiṣṭamiti vartate /
yadi yaddīyate dadvarṇagandharasasparśānāmanyatamenāpi saṃpannaṃ bhavati 		khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
gal te gang sbyin par bya ba de kha dog dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig gis phun sum tshogs pa yin na /
evaṃ vastu viśiṣyate /
tādṛśaṃ vastu dattvā kiṃ bhavati 		de lta bu ni dngos po khyad par du 'phags pa yin no /
dngos po de lta bu byin pas ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
yathākramam rim pa bzhin du /
surūptvaṃ yaśasvi vā de las gzugs bzang grags ldan dang /
priyatā sukumārartusukhasparśāṅtā tataḥ dga' dang shin tu gzhon sha can /
dus su reg na bde lus 'gyur /
varṇasampannaṃ dattvā surūpo bhavati reg bya phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni gzugs bzang por 'gyur ro /
gandhasaṃpannaṃ dattvā yaśasvī bhavati /
gandhavadyaśaso dikṣu vidhāraṇāt 		dri phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni dri bzhin du grags pas phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur ro /
rasasaṃpannaṃ dattvā priyo bhavati /
rasa iva svāduḥ /
sparśasaṃpannaṃ dattvā sukumārāṅgāśca bhavati ṛtusukhasparśāni cāsyāṅgāni bhavanti yathā strīratnasya 		ro phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni ro zhim po bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur ro /
reg bya phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni lus shin tu gzhon sha can dang; bud med rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du 'di'i dus su reg na bde ba'i lus su 'gyur ro /
atha kṣetraṃ kathaṃ viśipyate yang ji ltar na zhing khyad du 'phags pa yin zhe na /
gatiduḥkhopakāritvaguṇaiḥ kṣetraṃ viśiṣyate 'gro dang sdug bsngal phan 'dogs dang /
yon tan rnams kyis zhing khyad 'phags /
gativiśeṣātāvadviśiṣyate /
tathā hyuktaṃ bhagavatā tiryagyonigatāya dānaṃ dattvā śataguṇo vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ 		re zhig 'gro ba'i khyad par gyis khyad du 'phags pa 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la sbyin pa byin na slar rnam par smin pa brgya 'gyur du re bar bya'o /
duḥśīlāya manuṣyabhūtāya dānaṃ dattvā sahasraguṇa iti /
duḥkhaviśeṣā dviśiṣyate 		tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur pa'i mi la sbyin pa byin na stong 'gyur du re bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
tathā hyaupadhikeṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu /
glāne dānaṃ glānopasthāpake dānam /
śītalikādiṣu ca dānamuktvoktame bhiḥ saptabhiḥ auṣadhikaiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥsamanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā na labhyaṃ puṇyānāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītumiti 		sdug bsngal gyi khyad par du 'phags pa ni 'di ltar rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dag tu nad pa la sbyin pa dang nad g yog la sbyin pa dang grang ba la sogs pa la sbyin par gsungs nas /
rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di bdun dang ldan pa'i dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
rigs kyi bu mo'i bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
upakāritvaviśeṣādyathā mātāpitroranyeṣāṃ copakāriṇām ṛṣyamṛgajātakādyudāharaṇāt phan 'dogs pa'i khyad par las ni 'di lta ste pha ma dang phan 'dogs pa gzhan rnams la sbyin pa byin pa ste /
dom dang ri dvags la sogs pa'i skyes pa'i rabs dper bya'o /
guṇaviśeṣādyathā śīlavate dattvā śatasahasraguṇo vipāka ityevamādi yon tan gyi khyad par las ni 'di lta ste /
tshul khrims dang ldan pa la byin na rnam par smin pa 'bum 'gyur zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
sarveṣāṃ tu dānānām sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na /
agraṃ muktasya muktāya mchog ni grol bas grol ba la'ang /
yadvītarāgo vītarāgāya dattvā 'tidānamidaṃ śreṣṭhamāmiṣadāneṣu dānamityuktaṃ bhagavatā /
bodhisattvasya ca 		'dod chags dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral ba la byin pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis zang zing gi sbyin pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog yin no zhes gsungs so /
byang chub sems dpa' yis /
yadvā dānaṃ bodhisattve dadāti sarvasattvahitahetostadamuktasyāpyamukte 'bhyādānamagram yang na byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni grol ba ma yin pas ma grol ba rnams la yang byin na mchog yin no /
tat sthāpayitvā yāni bhagavato 'nyānyaṣṭau dānānyuktāni teṣām /
aṣṭamam 		de ma gtogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dag sbyin pa brgyad gsungs pa de dag gi nang na ni brgyad pa mchog yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
agramiti vartate /
katamānyaṣṭau /
āsādya dānaṃ bhayadānam adānme dānaṃ dāsyati me dānaṃ dattpūrvaṃ me dānaṃ pitṛbhiśca pitāmahaiśceti dānaṃ dadāti svargārthaṃ dānaṃ kīrtyarthaṃ dānaṃ cittālaṅkārārthaṃ dānaṃ cittapariṣkārārthaṃ yiogasaṃbhārārthamuttamārthasya prāptaye dānaṃ dadāti 		brgyad gang zhe na /
nye ba la sbyin pa dang 'jigs pas sbyin pa dang bdag la byin pas sbyin pa dang bdag la sbyin par 'gyur bas sbyin pa dang sngon bdag gi pha dang mes po dag gis sbyin pa byin pas sbyin pa byin pa dang mtho ris kyi don du sbyin pa dang grags pa'i don du sbyin pa dang sems kyi rgyan gyi don dang sems kyi yo byad kyi don dang rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi don dang don gyi mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa'o /
tatrāsādya dānaṃ yat āsannebhya upagatebhyo dānaṃ dadātīti paurāṇāḥ de la nye ba la sbyin pa ni snga ma dag na re nam nye bar gyur cing nye bar lhags pa dag la sbyin par byed pa'o zhes zer ro /
bhayadānaṃ yadvināśābhimukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā varaṃ dadāmīti dadāti 'jigs pas sbyin pa ni med par byed pa mngon sum du mthong nas dam pa sbyin no zhes sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa'o /
śeṣaṃ sugamatvānna vibhaktam lhag ma ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o /
srota āpattiphalapratipannakāya dānaṃ dattvā 'prameyavipākaḥ mdo las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa la sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa gzhal du med do /
tato 'prameyataraḥ srota āpannāyeti vistareṇoktaṃ sūtre rgyun du zhugs pa la byin na de bas kyang ches gzhal du med do zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs mod kyi /
apitu /
mātṛpitṛglānadhārmakathikebhyo 'ntyajanmane 		gzhan yang; 'phags pa min yang pha ma dang /
nad pa dang ni chos smra dang /
bodhisattvāya cāmeyā anāryebhyo 'pi dakṣiṇā skye mtha'i byang chub sems dpa' la /
yon ni gzhal du med pa yin /
ebhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ pṛthagjanabhūtebhyo 'pyaprameyā phalato dakṣiṇā bhavati lnga po 'di dag la ni so so'i skye bor gyur pa yin yang 'bras bu'i sgo nas yon gzhal du med pa yin no /
tatrāntyajanmā bodhisattvaścaramabhavikaḥ /
dharmakathikaścaturvidhe kṣetraviśeṣe katamasmin pakṣe dikṣeptavyaḥ 		de la skye ba tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni srid pa tha ma pa yin no /
chos smra ba zhing gi khyad par rnam pa bzhi po'i phyogs gang du gtogs par bya zhe na /
upakāripakṣe /
sa hi mahākalyāṇamitram avidyāndhāyāṃ prajāyāṃ prajñācakṣuṣo dātā samaviṣamasya prakāśayitā anāsravasya dharmakāyasyātinivartayitā samāsato buddhakṛtyasya kartā 		phan 'dogs pa'i phyogs su gtogs te /
de ni skye dgu ma rig pas ldongs pa rnams la shes rab kyi mig sbyin par byed pa dang mthun pa dang mi mthun pa rab tu ston par byed pa dang chos kyi sku zag pa med pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang mdor na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed pa yin pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po yin no /
karmaṇāṃ tu gurulaghutvaṃ jñātukāmena samāsataḥ ṣaṭ kāraṇāni jñeyāni las rnams kyi lci ba dang yang ba nyid shes par 'dod pas mdor na rgyu drug shes par bya ste /
tadyathā 'di lta ste /
pṛṣṭhaṃ kṣetramadhiṣṭhānaṃ prayiogaścetanāśayaḥ /
eṣāṃ mṛdvadhimātratvāt karmamṛdvadhimātratā 		mjug dang zhing dang gzhi dang ni /
sbyor dang sems pa bsam pa ste /
de dag chung dang che ba las /
las kyang chung dang che ba nyid /
pṛṣṭhaṃ nāma yatkṛtasya punaranukriyā mjug ces bya ba ni byas pa'i rjes la byed pa gang yin pa'o /
kṣetraṃ nāma yatra kārāpakārāḥ kriyante /
adhiṣṭhānaṃ karmapathaḥ /
prayogastadarthaṃ kāyavākkarma 		zhing zhes bya ba ni gang du phan pa dang gnod pa dag byed pa'o gzhi ni las kyi lam mo /
sbyor ba ni de'i don du lus dang ngag gis las byed pa'o /
cetanā yayā karmapathaṃ niṣṭhāpayati /
āśayastadabhiprāya evaṃ caivaṃ ca kuryāmevaṃ caivaṃ ca na kariṣyāmīti /
kasyacit pṛṣṭhaparigraheṇaiva tatkarma guru saṃpadyate 		sems pa ni gang gis las kyi lam mthar phyin par byed pa'o /
bsam pa ni de dag la de dang 'di lta bu zhig ni bya'o /
de dang 'di lta bu zhig ni phyis bya'o snyam du sems pa ste /
la la'i mjug yongs su bzung ba kho na las de lci bar 'gyur te /
vipākanaiyamyenāvasthānāt rnam par smin par nges par gnas pa'i phyir ro /
kasyacit kṣetravaśenaiva /
tatraiva kṣetre punaradhiṣṭhānavaśāt guru saṃpadyate nānyathā 		la la'i ni zhing gi dbang kho nas so /
zhing de nyid la gzhi'i dbang gis lci bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
yathā mātāitroḥ prāṇātipātāt na tvevamadattādānādikāt ji ltar pha dang ma la srog gcad pas lci bar 'gyur ba ltar ma byin par blangs pa la sogs pas ni de lta ma yin no /
evamanyadapi yojyam /
yasya tu sarvāṇyadhimātrāṇi bhavanti tasyātyarthamadhimātraṃ guru karma veditavyam /
yasya mṛdūni tasyātyarthaṃ mṛdu veditavyam /
kṛtaṃ copacitaṃ ca karmocyate /
kathaṃ karmopacitaṃ bhavati 		de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
gang gi thams cad che ba yin pa de ni las kyang shin tu ches lci ba yin par rig par bya'o /
gang gi chung ngu yin pa de ni shin tu chung ba yin par rig par bya'o /
las byas pa dang bsags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar na las bsags pa yin zhe na /
pañcabhiḥ karaṇaiḥ bsams bzhin pa dang rdzogs pa dang /
saṃcetanasamāptibhyāṃ niṣkaukṛtya vipakṣataḥ /
parivārādvipākācca karmopacitamucyate 		mi 'gyod gnyen po med pa dang /
'khor dang rnam par smin pa las /
bsags pa'i las zhes bya ba bzhin /
kathaṃ saṃcenataḥ bsams bzhin pa las ji lta bu zhe na /
saṃcintya kṛtaṃ bhavati nābuddhipūrvaṃ na sahasā kṛtam ched du bsams nas byas pa yin gyi blo sngon du ma btang ba yang ma yin la bab col du byas pa yang ma yin pa'o /
kathaṃ samāpattitaḥ rdzogs pas ji lta bu zhe na /
kaścidekena duścaritenāpāyānyātikaścidyāvattribhiḥ kha cig ni nyes par spyad pa gcig gis ngan song du 'gro la /
kaścidekena karmapathena kaścidyāvaddaśabhiḥ kha cig ni gsum gyi bar gyis 'gro ba dang kha cig ni las kyi lam gcig gis ngan song du 'gro la /
tatra yo yāvatā gacchati tasminnasamāpte kṛtaṃ tatkarma nopacitam samāpte tūpacitam kha cig ni bcu'i bar gyis 'gro ba de gang zhig gis ji tsam gyis der 'gro bar 'gyur ba rdzogs par ma byas na yang las de byas pa yin gyi bsags pa ni ma yin no /
rdzogs na ni bsags pa yin no /
kathaṃ niṣkaukṛtyavipakṣataḥ /
nirvipratisāraṃ ca tat karma bhavati niṣpratipakṣaṃ ca 		mi 'gyod pa dang gnyen po med pas ji lta bu zhe na /
las de la yid la gcags pa med pa dang gnyen po med pa yin no /
kathaṃ parivārataḥ /
akuśalaṃ cākuśalaparivāraṃ ca bhavati 		'khor las ji lta bu zhe na /
mi dge ba la 'khor yang mi dge ba ma yin no /
kathaṃ vipākataḥ /
vipākadāna niyataṃ bhavati 		rnam par smin pa las ji lta bu zhe na /
rnam par smin pa 'byin par nges pa yin no /
evaṃ kuśalamapi yojyam de bzhin du dge ba la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
ato 'nyathā karma kṛtaṃ bhavati nopacitam de las gzhan du byas pa'i las ni ma bsags pa yin no /
caitye sarāgasyātmārthaṃ dānamityuktam /
tatrāsatyupabhoktari kathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavati /
dvividhaṃ hi puṇyaṃ tyāgānvayaṃ tyāgādeva yadupapadyate paribhogānvayaṃ ca deyadharmaparibhogādyadutpadyate 		'dod chags dang bcas pas mchod rten la sbyin pa byin pa ni bdag gi don du'o zhes bshad pa /
de la longs spyod par byed pa med na ji ltar bsod nams su 'gyur zhe na /
bsod nams ni rnam pa gnyis te /
btang ba'i rgyu las byung ba ni btang ba kho na las byung ba gang yin pa'o /
yongs su longs spyod pa las byung ba ni sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su longs spyod pa las byung ba gang yin pa'o /
caitye tyāgānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ /
paribhogānvyaṃ puṇyaṃ nāsti 		de la mchod rten la btang rgyus byung ba'i bsod nams yongs su longs spyod pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni med do /
kathaṃ tatrāpratigṛhṇati kasmiṃścit puṇyam de la len pa su yang med na ji ltar bsod nams yin zhe na /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sati pratigrahītari bhavitavyaṃ nāsatīti len par byed pa yod na ni bsod nams su 'gyur la /
med na ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la yang rgyu ci zhig yod /
kasyacidapyanugrahābhāvāt su la yang phan btags pa med pa'i phyir ro /
idamakāraṇam 'di ni rgyu ma yin te /
yadi hi puṇyaṃ parānugrahādeva syāt maitryādyapramāṇasamyagdṛṣṭibhāvanāyāṃ na syāt gal te phan btags pa kho nas bsod nams su gyur na ni /
byams pa la sogs pa tshad med pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba bsgoms pa rnams bsod nams su mi 'gyur te /
tasmādeṣṭavyaṃ caityai 'pi puṇyam de lta bas na mchod rten la yang bsod nams su 'dod par bya'o /
maitryādivadagṛhṇati len med byams sogs bzhin /
yathā maitryādiṣvantareṇāpi pratigrāhakaṃ parānugrahaṃ vā puṇyaṃ bhavati svacittaprabhavaṃ tathābhyatīte 'pi guṇavati tadbhaktikṛtaṃ svacittāt puṇyaṃ bhavati ji ltar byams pa la sogs pa la len par byed pa 'am /
gzhan la phan 'dogs par med kyang rang gi sems kyi mthus bsod nams su 'gyur ba de bzhin du yon tan dang ldan pa 'das kyang de la dad pa byas pa rang gi sems las bsod nams su 'gyur ro /
dānamānakriyā tarhi vyarthā prāpnoti 'o na ni sbyin pa dang mchod par bya ba don med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
na /
tatkarmasamutthāpikāyā bhakteḥ prakṛṣṭataratvāt 		ma yin te /
las de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i dad pa ni ches mchog yin pa'i phyir te /
yathā hi śatruvadhābhiprāyasya tatsamutthāpitaṃ kāyavākkarma /
śatrusaṃjñayā tasminmṛte 'pi kurvato bahutaramapuṇyaṃ jāyate 		ji ltar dgra gsang pa'i bsam pa can des kun nas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las de shi bzhin du dgra'i 'du shes kyis byed na bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi bsams pa tsam gyis ni ma yin pa de bzhin du /
nābhiprāyamātreṇa /
tathābhyatīte śāstari tadbhaktisamutthāṃ dānamānakriyāṃ kurvato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ jāyate 		ston pa 'das kyang de la dad pas kun nas bslang ba'i sbyin pa dang mchod pa'i bya ba byed na bsod nams ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi dad pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no /
na bhaktimātreṇa /
yadi svakṣetre dānakriyāvījamiṣṭaphalaṃ bhavati tatkṣetre tarhyaniṣṭaphalaṃ bhaviṣyati 		gal te zhing bzang po la sbyin par bya ba'i sa bon 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba can yin no /
'o na zhing ngan pa la byin na 'bras bu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
kukṣetre 'pīṣṭaphalatā phalabījāviparyayāt rgyu las 'bras bu mi 'khrul phyir /
ngan pa'i zhing la'ang 'bras yid 'ong /
kukṣetre 'pi phalasya bījādaviparyayo dṛṣṭo mṛdvīkābījānmṛdvīkāphalamevotpadyate madhuraṃ nimbavījānnimbameva tiktam zhing ngan pa la yang sa bon las 'bras bu mi 'khrul ba mthong ste /
rgun 'brum gyi sa bon las ni rgun 'brum gyi 'bras bu mngar ba kho na skye la; nim pa'i sa bon las ni nim pa'i 'bras bu kha ba kho na skye'o /
evaṃ kukṣetre 'pi parahitādhyāśayapravṛttasya dānabījasyeṣṭameva phalaṃ nirvartate nāniṣṭam de bzhin du zhing ngan pa la yang gzhan la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa'i sbyin pa'i sa bon gyi 'bras bu yang yid du 'ong ba kho na 'grub kyi yid du mi 'ong ba ni ma yin no /
kṣetradoṣāttu tadvījamalpaphalaṃ vā bhavatyaphalaṃ vā zhing gi skyon gyis ni sa bon de'i 'bras bu chung ba 'am /
'bras bu med par 'gyur ro /
gataṃ dānamayapuṇyakriyāvastu saprasaṅgam sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi zhar la 'ongs pa dang bcas te rdzogs so /
śīlamayaṃ vaktavyam /
taducyate 		tshul khrims las byung ba brjod par bya ste /
des smras pa /
dauḥśītlamaśubhaṃ rūpaṃ śīlaṃ tadviratiḥ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims mi dge'i gzugs /
de spang tshul khrims /
akuśalaṃ hi rūpaṃ dauḥśīlyamucyate gzugs mi dge ba ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o /
tasmādviratiḥ śīlam de spong ba ni tshul khrims yin no /
sā punarviratiḥ /
dvidhā /
yayā ca viramyate vijñaptyā yacca tadviramaṇam avijñaptiḥ /
na ca kevalaṃ dauḥśīlyādviratiḥ śīlam 		spong ba de yang rnam pa gnyis so /
rnam par rig byed gang gis spong bar byed pa dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa spong ba gang yin pa'o /
tshul khrims ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims las spong ba 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
pratikṣiptācca buddhena /
yadapi na prakṛtyā dauḥśīlayaṃ bhagavatā ca buddhena pratikṣiptamakālabhojanādikaṃ tasmādapi dvidhā viratiḥ śīlam 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
sangs rgyas kyis ni bcad pa yang /
rang bzhin gyis 'chal ba'i tshul khrims ma yin yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcad pa dus ma yin pa'i zas la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag spong ba rnam pa gnyis kyang tshul khrims yin te /
samāttaśikṣasya tu tadadhyācārāddauḥśīlyaṃ jāyate slab pa mnos pas de dag spyad na 'chal ba'i tshul khrims su 'gyur ro /
uktaṃ tamāsena śīlam tshul khrims mdor bshad zin to /
viśuddhaṃ tu caturguṇam rnam dag yon tan bzhi ldan no /
tattu śīlaṃ caturguṇaṃ bhavati /
viparyayādaviśuddham 		yon tan bzhi dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims de ni rnam par dag pa yin no /
bzlog pa ni rnam par ma dag pa yin no /
atha kathaṃ caturguṇamityāha ji ltar na yon tan bzhi dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
dauḥśīlyataddhetvahataṃ tadvipakṣaśamāśritam tshul khrims de rgyus 'phen ma byung /
de yi gnyen po zhi la brten /
dauḥśītyena tāvadanupahataṃ bhavati yathoktena dauḥśīlyena re zhig 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis 'phen ma byung ba ni ji skad du bshad pas 'phen ma byung ba yin no; /
hetunā 'pyanupahataṃ bhavati /
lobhādibhiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ dauḥśīlyavipakṣāśritaṃ ca bhavati 		'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi rgyus 'phen ma byung ba ni chags pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'phen ma byung ba'i phyir ro /
smṛtyupasthānasaṃniśritatvāt samāśritaṃ ca bhavati 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi gnyen po la brten pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la brten pa'i phyir ro /
nopapattiviśeṣāśritam /
nirvāṇapariṇāmitavāt /
pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ ityapare 		zhi ba la brten pa ni skye ba'i khyad par la mi brten gyi mya ngan las 'das par yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro /
gzhan dag na re rgyu lnga ste /
maulaiḥ karmapathairviśuddhaṃ bhavati sāmantakairviśuddhaṃ vitarkairanupahataṃ smṛtyā 'nuparigahītaṃ nirvāṇapariṇāmitaṃ ceti las kyi lam dngos kyis rnam par dag pa yin pa dang nyer bsdogs dag gis rnam par dag pa dang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis 'phen ma byung ba dang; dran pas yongs su bzung ba dang mya ngan las 'das par yongs su bsngos pa yin no zhes zer ro /
caturvidhaṃ śīlamityapare gzhan dag na re tshul khrims ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
bhayaśīlaṃ yadā jīvikāślokadaṇḍadurgatibhayāt pālyate /
āśāstiśīlaṃ yadbhavabhogasatkāratṛṣṇākṛtam /
bodhyaṅgānulomaṃ śīlaṃ yanmokṣārthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭikāṇām /
pariśuddhaṃ śīlamanāsravaśīlaṃ nirmalatvāditi /
gataṃ śīlam /
samāhitaṃ tu kuśalaṃ bhāvanā 		'jigs pa'i tshul khrims ni 'tsho ba med pa dang tshigs su bcad pa med pa dang chad pa dang ngan 'gros 'jigs nas srung ba gang yin pa'o /
legs su smon pa'i tshul khrims ni srid pa dang longs spyod dang bkur sti la chags nas srung ba gang yin pa'o /
byang chub kyi yan lag gi rjes su mthun pa'i tshul khrims ni yang dag pa'i lta ba can rnams thar pa'i don du srung ba gang yin pa'o /
yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims ni dri ma med pa'i phyir zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yin no zhes zer ro /
tshul khrims rdzogs so /
mnyam par gzhag pa'i dge ba ni sgom pa'o /
kimidaṃ samāhitaṃ nāma mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na /
samādhisvabhāvaṃ sahabhū yat /
kimarthametat bhāvanetyucyate 		ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dang de dang lhan cig 'byung ba gang yin pa'o /
'di ci'i phyir bsgom pa zhes bya zhe na /
cittavāsanāt sems la sgo phyir ro /
taddhi samāhitaṃ kuśalamatyarthaṃ cittaṃ vāsayati /
guṇaistanmayīkaraṇātsaṃtateḥ 		mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i dge ba de ni rgyud yon tan rnams kyis de'i bdag nyid du byed pa'i phyir sems la shin tu sgo bar byed pa yin te /
puṣpaistilabhāvanāvat /
dānaṃ tāvanmahābhogatāyai saṃvartata ityuktam 		me tog rnams kyis til la bsgos pa bzhin no /
re zhig sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro zhes bshad na /
atha śīlaṃ bhāvanā ca /
svargāya śīlaṃ prādhānyāt visaṃyogāya bhāvanā 		yang na tshul khrims dang bsgom pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
mtho ris don du tshul khrims dang /
'bral ba'i don du bsgom gtso'i phyir /
dānamapi svargāya śīlaṃ prādhānyāt /
śīlamapi visaṃyogāya /
bhāvanā tu prādhānyāt /
sutra uktaṃ catvāraḥ pudgalā brāhmaṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantīti 		sbyin pa yang mtho ris kyi don du ni 'gyur mod kyi tshul khrims ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro /
tshul khrims kyis kyang 'bral bar mi 'gyur mod kyi bsgom pa ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro /
mdo las gang zag bzhi ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams skyed do zhes gsungs pa /
katamat tad brāhmapuṇyam /
yattallakṣaṇavipākasya karmaṇaḥ parimāṇajñāpanāyoktam iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
pūrvācāryās tu vyācakṣate 		tshangs pa'i bsod nams gang zhig yin zhe na /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
mtshan ma rnam par smin pa can gyi las kyi tshad shes par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa gang yin pa'o zhes zer ro /
sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re /
bskal par mtho ris dag gnas phyir /
caturṇāṃ brāhmapuṇyatvaṃ kalpaṃ svargeṣu modanāt bzhi yi tshangs pa'i bsod nams yin /
zhes zer te /
yāvatā puṇyena kalpaṃ svargeṣu modate idaṃ brāhmaṃ puṇyam bsod nams ji tsam gyis na bskal par mtho ris su dga' bar gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams yin te /
brahmapurohitānāṃ kalpāyuṣkatvāt /
nikāyāntare gāthāṃ paṭhanti 		tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams kyi tshe bskal par thub pa'i phyir ro /
sde pa gzhan las kyang /
tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa ni /
brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati kalpaṃ svargeṣu modata iti bskal par mtho ris dga' bar gnas /
zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ngo /
āmiṣadānamuktam /
dharmadānaṃ vaktavyam 		zang zing gi sbyin pa bshad zin to /
chos kyi sbyin pa brjod par bya ste /
tadidamucyate des smras pa /
dharmadānaṃ yathābhūta sūtrādyakliṣṭadeśanā chos sbyin nyon mongs can min pas /
mdo sogs yang dag ji bzhin ston /
sūtrādīnāṃ yathābhūtamakliṣṭadeśanā dharmadānam chos kyi sbyin pa ni mdo la sogs pa nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ston pa'o /
ato mahatīṃ ta ātmanaḥ puṇyajyāniṃ kurvanti ye viparītadharmaṃ deśayanti /
kliṣṭacittā vā lābhasatkāra yaśāṃsi vāñchantaḥ 		de'i phyir gang dag chos log par 'chad par byed pa'am /
sems nyon mongs pa can rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang grags pa 'dod pas chad pa de dag ni bdag nyid kyi bsod nams chen po nyams par byed pa yin no /
uktaṃ puṇyakriyāvastubhedena trividhaṃ kuśalaṃ punaḥ bsod nams bya ba'i gzhir bye brag gis dge ba rnam pa gsum bshad zin to /
puṇyanirvāṇanirvedhabhāgīyaṃ kuśalaṃ tridhā bsod nams mya ngan 'das pa dang /
nges 'byed cha mthun dge rnams gsum /
puṇyabhāgīyaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ mokṣabhāgīyaṃ yasminnutpanne niyataṃ parinirvāṇadharmā bhavati bsod nams kyi cha dang mthun pa ni rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba can gang yin pa'o /
thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni gang skyes na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos su nam 'gyur ba ste /
yasya saṃsārādīnavanairātmyanirvāṇaguṇadyotikāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā romaharṣāśrūpātau bhavatastasyāsti mokṣabhāgīyaṃ kuśalamūlamityavaseyaṃ pravṛṣīvāṅkuraprarohāt khalavileṣu bījāstitvam gang la 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs dang bdag med pa dang dmyal ba las 'das pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i gtam thos nas sgu zing zhes byed pa dang mchi ma 'khrug ces byed pa de la ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yod par shes par bya ste /
dbyar myu gu skye ba las na g yul gyi gseb na sa bon yod par shes pa bzhin no /
nirvedhabhāgīyamuṣmādi caturvidhaṃ paścādvyākhyāsyāmaḥ /
yadidaṃ loka ucyate lipimudrāgaṇanā kāvyaṃ saṃkhyeti ka eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ 		des par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi yin te /
'og nas bshad par bya'o /
'jig rten yig 'bru dang rgya dang bgrang ba dang snyan ngag dang grangs zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
yogapravartitaṃ karma sasamutthāpakaṃ tridhā rigs pa'i rab tu bcug pa'i las /
rnam gsum kun slong bcas pa ni /
lipimudre sagaṇanaṃ kāvyaṃ saṃkhyā yathākramam yig 'bru rgya dang grangs bcas pa'i /
snyan ngag grangs te go rims bzhin; /
yogapravartitamiti upāyaviśeṣapravartitam /
tridhā karmeti kāyavāṅmanaskarma 		rigs pas bcug pa zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi bye brag gis bcug pa'o /
las rnam pa gsum zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las so /
tatra lipimudre tāvadyogapravartitaṃ kāyakarma samutthāpanam /
gaṇanā kāvyaṃ ca vākkarma 		de la re zhig yig 'bru dang rgya ni lus kyi las rigs pas rab tu bcug pa kun nas slong ba dang bcas pa yin no /
bgrang ba dang snyan ngag ni ngag gi las te /
ityetāni pañcaskandhasvabhāvāni /
saṃkhyā manaskarma /
yanmanasā saṃkalanaṃ dharmāṇām 		de ltar na de dag ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin no /
grangs ni yid kyi las te /
yid kyi chos rnams sdom par byed pa gang yin pa'o /
dharmāṇāmidānīṃ kecit paryāyā ucyante da ni rnam grangs kha cig brjod par bya ste /
sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnāḥ kliṣṭā dharmāḥ sgrab ngan kha na ma tho bcas /
nyon mongs can ches /
kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnā iti paryāyāḥ /
śubhāmalāḥ 		kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang bsgribs pa dang ngan pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams kyi rnam grangs dag yin no /
dri med dge /
praṇītāḥ gya nom /
kuśalānāsravāṇāṃ praṇītā iti paryāyaḥ gya nom pa zhes bya ba ni dge ba zag pa med pa rnams kyi rnam grangs yin no /
hīnapraṇītebhyo 'nye madhyā iti siddhaṃ bhavati /
saṃskṛtaśubhāḥ sevyāḥ 		ngan pa dang gya nom pa dag las gzhan pa ni bar ma zhes bya bar grub pa yin no /
'dus byas dge bsten bya /
kusalasaṃskṛtānāṃ sevitavyā iti paryāyaḥ bsten par bya zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas kyi chos dge ba rnams kyi rnam grangs yin no /
śeṣā asevitavyā iti siddhaṃ bhavati lhag ma rnams ni bsten par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no /
kasmādasaṃskṛtaṃ na sevyam ci'i phyir 'dus ma byas bsten par bya ba ma yin zhe na /
anabhyasanīyatvādaphalatvācca /
phalarthaṃ hi sevā bhavati 		goms par byar mi rung ba'i phyir dang 'bras bu'i don du bsten par bya ba yin na 'bras bu yang med pa'i phyir ro /
sottarā anye sarvadharmāḥ /
mokṣastvanuttaraḥ 		chos gzhan thams cad ni bla ma dang bcas pa yin gyi /
thar pa bla na med pa yin /
nahi nirvāṇādviśiṣṭataramasti /
tacca sarvebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ kuśalanityatvāt /
abhidharmakośabhāṣye karmanirddeśo nāma caturthaṃ kośasthānamiti 		mya ngan las 'das pa las ches khyad par du 'phags pa ni med kyi /
de ni dge ba dang rtag pa yin pa'i phyir thams cad pas khyad par du 'phags pa yin no /
chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las las bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas bzhi pa'o /
pañcamaṃ kośasthānam las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skyes /
oṃ namo buddhāya zhes bshad pa /
karmajaṃ lokavaicitrya mityuktam /
tāni karmāṇyanuśayavaśādupacayaṃ gacchanti antareṇa cānuśayān bhavābhinirvarttane na samarthāni bhavanti /
ato veditavyāḥ 		las de dag kyang phra rgyas kyi dbang gis bsags par 'gyur gyi; phra rgyas med par ni srid pa mngon par 'grub par mi nus pa de'i phyir /
srid pa'i rtsa ba phra rgyas yin par rig par bya ste /
mūlaṃ bhavasyānuśayāḥ /
kleśo hi pravartamāno daśa kṛtyāni karoti /
mūlaṃ ca dṛḍhīkaroti saṃtatimavasthāpayati kṣetramāpādayati niḥṣyandaṃ nirvartayati karmabhavamabhinirharati svasaṃbhāraṃ arigṛhṇāti ālambane saṃmohayati vijñānasroto namayati kuśalapakṣādvyutkrāmati pandhanārthaṃ ca spharati dhātvanatikramayogeneti 		nyon mongs pa 'jug pa na bya ba bcu byed de /
rtsa ba brtan par byed do /
rgyud gnas par byed do /
zhing du sgrub par byed do /
rgyu mthun par sgrub par byed do; /
las kyi srid pa mngon par sgrub par byed do /
rang gi tshogs yongs su 'dzin par byed do /
dmigs pa la kun du rmongs par byed do /
rnam par shes pa'i rgyun 'khrid par byed do /
dge ba'i phyogs las g yo bar byed do /
khams las mi 'da' ba'i tshul gyis 'ching ba'i don du khyab par byed do /
kati ceme 'nuśayāḥ /
samāsena ṣaṭ 		phra rgyas de dag kyang du zhig ce na /
mdor bsdus na /
katame /
ṣaḍrāgaḥ pratighastathā /
māno 'vidyā ca dṛṣṭiśca vicikitsā ca 		drug drug gang zhe na /
'dod chags de bzhin khong khro dang /
nga rgyal ma rig lta ba dang /
the tshom yin te /
athāgrahaṇaṃ rāgavaśenānyeṣāmālambanānuśāyitajñāpanārtham de bzhin zhes smos pa ni 'dod chags kyi dbang gis gzhan dag dmigs pa las rgyas par gyur pa nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir te /
etacca paścāt pravedayiṣyāmaḥ de ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o /
te punaḥ de drug kyang /
ṣaḍrāgabhedātsaptoktāḥ 'dod chags dbye bas bdun du bshad /
ta ete ṣaḍnuśayāḥ sūtre rāgasya dvidhā bhedaṃ kṛtvā saptoktāḥ phra rgyas drug po de dag kyang mdo las 'dod chags phye nas bdun du bshad de /
kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayo bhavarāgānuśayo mānānuśyaḥ avidyānuśayo dṛṣṭyanuśayo vicikitsānuśaya iti /
kathamidaṃ jñātavyaṃ kāmarāga evānuśayaḥ kāmarāgānuśayaḥ āhosvit kāmarāgasyānuśayaḥ kāmarāganuśayaḥ /
kiṃ cātaḥ 		'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas dang khong khro ba'i phra rgyas dang srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas dang nga rgyal gyi phra rgyas dang ma rig pa'i phra rgyas dang lta ba'i phra rgyas dang the tshom gyi phra rgyas so /
ji ltar shes par bya /
'dod pa'i 'dod chags nyid phra rgyas yin pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin nam /
'on te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin /
de las cir 'gyur /
kāmarāga evānuśayaścet sūtravirodhaḥ gal te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nyid phra rgyas yin na ni /
ihaikatyo na kāmarāgaparyavasthitena cetasā bahulaṃ viharati 'di na la las 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyi las mang du mi gnas la /
utpannasya kāmarāgaparyavasthānasyottari niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa byung na yang phyis nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes shing /
tasya tatkāmarāgaparyavasthānaṃ sthāmaśaḥ samyaktvasamavahataṃ sānuśayaṃ prahīyataiti /
kāmarāgasyānuśayaścedviprayuktānuśayaprasaṅgādabhidharmavirodhaḥ kāmarāgānuśayastribhirindriyaiḥ saṃprayukta iti 		de'i 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa de'i mthus yang dag par shin tu kun nas 'joms shing phra rgyas dang bcas par spong bar byed do zhas gsungs pa'i mdo dang 'gal lo; /
gal te de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin na ni phra rgyas ldan par ma yin par thal bar 'gyur bas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ni dbang po gsum dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no zhas 'byung ba'i chos mngon pa dang 'gal lo /
kāmarāga evānuśya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
evaṃ yāvadvicikitsaivānuśaya iti /
nanu coktamevaṃ sūtravirodha iti /
nāsti virodhaḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nyid phra rgyas yin te /
the tshom nyid phra rgyas yin pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro /
de lta na mdo dang 'gal lo zhes bshad pa ma yin nam /
'gal ba med de /
sānuśayaṃ sānubandhamityarthaḥ /
aupacāriko vā sūtre 'nuśayaśabdaḥ prāptau /
yathā duḥkho 'gniriti /
lākṣaṇikastvabhidharme kleśa evānuśayaśabdaḥ /
tasmātsaṃyuktā evānuśayāḥ /
kathamidaṃ gamyate 		phra rgyas dang bcas pa ni rjes su 'bral ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don yin pa'i phyir ro; /
yang na mdo las phra rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba ni thob pa la nye bar btags pa yin te /
dper na me sdug bsngal zhes bya ba bzhin no /
chos mngon pa las phra rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba ni nyon mongs pa kho na la mtshan nyid pa yin te /
de lta bas na phra rgyas rnams ni mtshungs par ldan pa kho na yin no /
'di ji ltar shes she na /
anuśayānāṃ /
cittakleśakaratvādāvaraṇatvācchubhairviruddhatvāt /
yasmādanuśayaiḥ kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ bhavatyapūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ notpadyate utpannācca parihīyate tasmānna viprayuktāḥ /
atha viprayuktairapyevaṃ syāt 		phra rgyas rnams ni /
sems ni nyon mongs byed phyir dang /
sgrib phyir dge dang 'gal phyir dang /
gang gi phyir phra rgyas rnams kyi sems nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ba dang sngon med pa'i dge ba mi skye ba dang skyes pa las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de'i phyir ldan pa ma yin no /
kuśalaṃ na kadācidupalabhyeta /
teṣāṃ nityaṃ saṃnihitatvāt /
upalabhyate ca /
ataḥ /
kuśalasya copalambhādaviprayuktāḥ atha ihānuśayāḥ iti 		'on te ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang de ltar 'gyur na ni de dag rtag tu nye ba'i phyir dge ba nam yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba zhig na dmigs te /
de lta bas na dge ba 'ang dmigs pa'i phyir na 'dir /
phra rgyas ldan pa ma yin min /
'di ni gtan tshigs su mi rung ste /
tadidamajñāpakaṃ yasmādyo viprayuktamanuśayamicchati sa etatsarvamanuśayakṛtaṃ necchati 'di ltar gang zhig phra rgyas ldan pa ma yin par 'dod pa de yang 'di thams cad phra rgyas kyis byas par ni mi 'dod kyi nyon mongs pas byas pa kho nar 'dod do /
kleśakṛtamevecchati /
evaṃ tu sādhu yathā sautrāntikānām 		mdo sde pa rnams kyi ji lta ba de lta bu ni legs pa yin no /
kathaṃ ca sautrāntikānām mdo sde pa rnams kyi ji lta bu yin zhe na /
kāmarāgasyānuśayaḥ kāmarāgānuśaya iti /
na cānuśayaḥ saṃprayukto na viprayuktastasyādravyāntaratvāt 		'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin la /
de rdzas gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir phra rgyas ni mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin la /
prasupto hi kleśo 'nuśaya ucyate /
prabuddhaḥ paryavasthānam /
kā ca tasya prasuptiḥ 		ldan pa ma yin pa yang ma yin gyi /
nyon mongs pa nyal ba la ni phra rgyas zhes bya la /
sang pa la ni kun nas dkris pa zhes bya'o /
de la nyal ba gang yin zhe na /
asaṃmukhībhūtasya bījabhāvānubandhaḥ mngon sum du ma gyur par sa bon gyi dngos pos rjes su 'brel lo /
kaḥ prabodhaḥ sad pa gang yin zhe na /
saṃmukhībhāvaḥ mngon sum du 'gyur ba'o /
ko 'yaṃ vījabhāvo nāma /
ātmabhāvasya kleśajā kleśotpādanaśaktiḥ /
yathānubhavajñānajā smṛtyutpādanaśaktiryathā cāṅkurādīnāṃ śāliphalajā śāliphalotpādanaśaktiriti /
yastu kleśānāṃ bījārthamarthāntaraṃ vīprayuktamanuśayaṃ kalpayati tena smṛtibījamapyarthāntaraṃ kalpayitavyaṃ jāyate 		sa bon gyi dngos po zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
lus kyi nyon mongs pa las skyes pa nyon mongs pa bskyed pa'i mthu yin te /
dper na nyams su myong ba'i shes pa las skyes pa dran pa bskyed pa'i mthu dang yang dper na myu gu la sogs pa s'a lu'i 'bras bu las bskyed pa'i mthu dang 'dra'o /
gang zhig nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sa bon gyi don du phra rgyas ldan pa ma yin pa don gzhan du rtog par byed pa des na dran pa'i sa bon yang don gzhan du brtag par bya bar 'gyur ro /
yattarhi sūtre kleśa evānuśaya uktaḥ ṣaṭṣaṭke so 'sya bhavati sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti 'o na mdo las nyon mongs pa nyid phra rgyas su gang gsungs pa de ji lta bu ste /
drug tshan drug pa las 'di'i 'dod pa'i 'dod chags de bde ba'i tshor ba la rgyas par 'gyur ro /
bhavatīti vacanānnāsau tadaivānuśayaḥ /
kadā tarhi bhavati 		rgyas par gsungs so she na /
'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir /
de kho na ni phra rgyas ma yin no /
'o na nam 'gyur zhe na /
yadā prasupto bhavati gang gi tshe nyal ba na 'gyur ro /
hetau vā tadupacāra eṣa draṣṭavyaḥ yang na 'di ni rgyu las de nye bar btags pa yin par blta bar bya'o /
tiṣṭhatu prasaṅgaḥ /
śāstraṃ pravarttatām /
ya eṣa sūtre rāgasya bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ kāmarāgo bhavarāga iti 		zhar la 'ongs pa bzhag nas bstan bcos la 'jug par bya ste /
mdo las 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes 'dod chags che ba gang yin pa /
ko 'yaṃ bhavarāgaḥ /
bhavarāgo dvidhātujaḥ 		srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
khams gnyis las skyes srid 'dod chags /
rūpārūpyadhātujo rāgo bhavarāgaḥ kṛṭaḥ /
kiṃ kāraṇamevaṃ kṛtaḥ 		gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams las skyes pa'i 'dod chags ni srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do /
ci'i phyir de skad du bshad ce na /
antarmukhatvāttanmokṣasaṃjñāvyāvṛttaye kṛtaḥ kha ni nang du bltas phyir der /
thar ba'i 'du shes bzlog phyir bshad /
samāpattirāgo hi teṣāṃ prāyeṇa /
sa cāntarmukhapravṛttastasmāt bhavarāgaḥ 		de dag ni phal cher snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'dod chags pa yin la /
de yang kha nang du bltas pa yin te /
uktastayoḥ kila dhātvormokṣasaṃjñāvyāvyavarttanārthamekeṣāmiti de lta bas na kha cig khams de gnyis las thar pa yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes bzlog pa'i phyir srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do zhes grag go /
ātmabhāva eva tu bhavaḥ /
te ca sattvāḥ samāpattiṃ sāśrayā māsvādayanta ātmabhāvamevāsvādayanti kāmavītarāgatvāt /
ataḥ sa rāgo bhavarāga ityuktaḥ 		lus kho na srid pa yin la sems can de dag kyang snyoms par 'jug pa rten dang bcas pa ro myong bar byed pa na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir lus kho na ro myong bar byed pa yin te /
de'i phyir 'dod chags de ni srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do /
punarete ṣaḍanuśayā abhidharme daśa kriyante yang chos mngon pa las phra rgyas drug po de las bcur yang 'chad de /
kathaṃ kṛtvā ji ltar byas pas she na /
dṛṣṭayaḥ pañca satkāyamithyāntagrāhadṛṣṭayaḥ lta ba lnga ste 'jig tshogs dang /
log dang mthar 'dzin lta ba dang /
dṛṣṭiśīlavṛtaparāmarśāviti punardaśa /
ṣaṇṇāmanuśayānāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pañcadhā kṛtvā daśa bhavanti /
pañca dṛṣṭisvabhāvāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrahadṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭirdṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavṛtaparāmarśaśca 		lta ba dang ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin dang bcu /
phra rgyas drug las lta ba rnam pa lngar byas na bcur 'gyur te /
lta ba'i rang bzhin lnga ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang log par lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o /
yathā dṛṣṭisvabhāvāḥ rāgahpratidhho māno 'vidyā vicikitsā lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa lnga ni 'dod chags dang /
khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa dang the tshom mo /
ete punarete daśānuśayā abhidharme 'ṣṭānavatiḥ kriyante /
kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśat ārūpyāvacarā ekatriṃśat 		yang chos mngon pa las phra rgyas bcu po de dag las 'dod pa na spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug dang gzugs na spyod pa sum cu rtsa gcig dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa sum cu rtsa gcig ste /
dgu bcu rtsa brgyad du yang 'chad do /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
samāsato hyete 'nuśayāstraidhātukā darśanaprahātavyā bhāvanāprahātavyāśca /
tatra tāvat kāmāvacarā darśanaprahātavyā dvātriṃśat 		ji ltar byas pas she na /
phra rgyas de dag ni mdor bsdu na khams gsum pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no /
de la re zhig 'dod pa'i khams na spyod pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so /
katame ta ityāha /
daśaite saptasaptāṣṭau tridvidṛṣṭivivarjitāḥ 		de dag gang zhe na /
de dag bcu dang bdun bdun brgyad /
lta ba gsum gnyis ma gtogs par /
yathākramaṃ prahīyante kāme duḥkhādidarśanaiḥ 'dod na sdug bsngal la sogs pa /
mthong bas rim bzhin spong bar byed /
zhes bya ba smos te /
ya ete daśānuśayā uktā ete kāmadhātau daśāpi duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ santi phra rgyas bcur bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag 'dod pa'i khams na sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni bcu yod do /
ebhya eva sapta samudayadarśanapraheyāḥ /
sapta nirodhadarśanaheyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ ca varjayitvā /
aṣṭau mārgadarśanaheyāḥ /
satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ ca varjayitvā 		de dag nyid la kun 'byung 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba bdun dang; 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba bdun te /
'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ma gtogs so /
lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni brgyad de /
'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba ma gtogs so /
ityete kāmāvacarā dvātriṃśadanuśayā darśanaprahātavyāḥ /
satyānāṃ darśanamātreṇa prahāṇāt 		de ltar na phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gnyis so /
de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag yin te /
bden pa rnams mthong ba tsam gyis spong ba'i phyir ro /
catvāro bhāvanāheyāḥ bzhi ni bsgom pas spang bya yin /
tadyathā rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā ca /
dṛṣṭasatyasya paścāt mārgābhyāsena prahāṇāt /
tadevaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭirekaprakārā bhavati duḥkhadarśanaheyā 		'di lta ste /
'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang ma rig pa dang nga rgyal dang /
den pa mthong bas phyis lam goms par byas pas spong ba'i phyir ro /
de ltar na 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni rnam pa gcig ste /
sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la /
evamantagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ mithyādṛṣṭiścatuṣprakārā bhavati /
duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyā /
evaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśo vicikitsā ca 		mthar 'dzin par lta ba yang de dang 'dra'o /
log par lta ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la /
lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom yang de dang 'dra'o /
śīlavrataparāmaṛśo dviprakāraḥ duḥkhamārgadarśanaheyaḥ /
rāgapratighamānāvidyāḥ pañcaprakārāścatuḥsatyadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca 		tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mtshog tu 'dzin pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
sdug bsngal dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no /
'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa rnams ni rnam pa lnga ste /
bden pa bzhi mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no /
kīdṛśā ete duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kīdṛśā yāvad bhāvanāheyāḥ /
ye yaddarśanaheyālambanāste taddarśanaheyā avaśiṣṭā bhāvanāheyāḥ /
tā eva dvādaśa dṛṣṭayo bhavanti catasro vicikitsāḥ pañca rāgāḥ pañca pratighāḥ pañca mānāṃ pañcāvidyā ityete kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti 		sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba de dag ni ci lta bu yin /
bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bar du ni ji lta bu yin zhe na /
gang dag gang zhig mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i dmigs pa can de dag ni de mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la lhag ma ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no /
de dag la lta ba ni bcu gnyis yin no /
the tshom ni bzhi yin no /
'dod chags ni lnga yin no /
khong khro ba ni lnga yin no /
nga rgyal ni lnga yin no /
ma rig pa rnams ni lnga yin te /
de ltar na phra rgyas sum cu rtsa drug po de dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no /
ta evāpratighāḥ punaḥ khod khrom gtogs de dag nyid /
rūpadhātau gzugs khams /
pañcaprakāraṃ pratighamapahāya ta eva rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti khong khro ba lnga bor nas gzugs na spyod pa'i phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gcig po de dag nyid yin no /
yathā rūpadhātau /
tathārūpye 		gzugs kyi khams na ji lta bar gzugs med pa yang de dang 'dra /
ekatriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti /
ityaṣṭānavatirmatāḥ 		phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gcig ste /
de ltar dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'dod /
ta evamete ṣaḍanuśayā ākāraprakāradhātubhedairaṣṭānavatirmatāḥ āmidhārmikāṇām de ltar na chos mngon pa dag na re phra rgyas drug po de dag rnam pa dang bye brag dang khams kyi dbye pas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad du 'dod do /
ya ime darśanaprahātavyānuśayā uktāḥ kimete niyataṃ darśanenaiva prahīyante ci mthong ste spang bar bya ba'i chos phra rgyas su bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag nges par mthong ba kho nas spong ngam zhe na /
smras pa /
netyāha ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
bhavāgrajāḥ kṣāntivadhyā dṛggheyā eva 		'o na ci lta bu zhe na /
srid rtse las skyes bzod pa yis /
gzhom bya mthong bas spang bya nyid /
ye bhavāgrabhūmijā anvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayāste darśanaheyā eva na bhāvanāheyāḥ /
śeṣajāḥ /
dṛgbhāvanābhyām 		srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa las skyes pa'i phra rgyas gang dag rjes su shes pa'i bzod pas gzhom par bya ba de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba kho na yin gyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag ni ma yin no /
lhag skyes mthong dang bsgom gnyis kyis /
kṣāntivadhyā iti vartate bzod pas gzhom par bya ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu yathāyogaṃ dharmānvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayā āryāṇāṃ darśanaheyāḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ sa lhag ma dag na chos dang rjes su shes pas bzod pa spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas yod pa rnams ni ci rigs par 'phags pa rnams kyis ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la /
so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no; /
akṣāntivadhyā bhāvanayaiva tu bzod pas gzhom min bsgom kho nas /
sarvāsu bhūmiṣu ye 'nuśayā jñānavadhyāste ubhayeṣāṃ nityaṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ sa thams cad na phra rgyas gang dag shes pas gzhom par bya ba yod pa de dag ni gnyi ga'i yang rtag tu bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no /
naiva hi bāhyakānāṃ darśanaprahātavyāḥ prahīyanta ityapare /
tathāhi mahākarmavibhāgasūtre pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ ca śāśvatavādināmekatyaśāśvatikānām ahetusamutpattikānāṃ ca vītarāgāṇāṃ ca kāmadhātvālambanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ 		gzhan dag na re phyi rol pa rnams kyis ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams ni spong ba kho na ste /
'di ltar las rnam par 'byed pa chen po'i mdo dang sngon gyi mtha' las rtog pa spong ba rnams las rtag par smra pa rnams dang la la rtag par smra ba rnams dang rgyu med pa las kun du 'byung bar smra ba 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la 'dod pa'i khams las dmigs pa'i lta ba kun du 'byung bar gsungs te /
na ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ kāmadhāturālambanaṃ vītarāgatvāt gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa ni ma yin te /
'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ro /
tasmāt kāmapratisaṃyuktā eva tā aprahīṇā iti de lta bas na 'dod pa dang ldan pa de dag kho na ma spangs pe yin no zhes zer ro /
dṛṣṭyutpādasamakālaṃ te parihīṇā devadatta iveti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
dṛṣṭayaḥ paṇca nāmato nirdiṣṭā na tu svabhāvatastat kastāsāṃ svabhāvaḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de dag kyang lta ba bskyed pa dang dus mnyam du yongs su nyams pa'i phyir te /
lha sbyin bzhin no zhes zer ro /
lta ba lnga ming gi sgo nas bstan gyi rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas ni ma bstan pas 'di dag gi rang gi ngo bo ci zhe na /
ātmātmīyadruvocchedanāstihīnā gradṛṣṭayaḥ bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang /
me dang sman la mchog lta dang /
ahetvamārge taddṛṣṭiretāstāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayaḥ rgyu min lam min der lta ba /
de dag lta ba lnga yin no /
ātmadṛṣṭirātmīyadṛṣṭirvā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ bdag gam bdag gir lta ba ni /
'jig tshogs la lta ba'o /
sīdatīti sat /
cayaḥ kāyaḥ saṃghātaḥ skandha ityarthaḥ 		'jig pas na 'jig pa'o /
bsags pas na tshogs pa ste /
mang po dang phung po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
saccāyaṃ kāyaśceti satkāyaḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ 'di ni 'jig pa yang yin la tshogs kyang yin pas 'jig tshogs te /
nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o /
nityasaṃjñāṃ piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ ca tyājayitumevaṃ dyotitā rtag par 'du shes pa dang ril por 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir /
de skad du bshad de /
etatpūrvako hi teṣvātmagrahaḥ de dag la bdag tu 'dzin pa ni de dag sngon du 'gro ba can yin no /
satkāye dṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ 'jig tshogs la lta bas na 'jig tshogs la lta ba'o /
sarvaiva sāsravālambanā dṛṣṭiḥ satkāye zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa thams cad kyang 'jig tshogs la lta ba yin mod kyi /
ātmātmīyadṛṣṭireva tu satkāyadṛṣṭiruktā ci nas kyang 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yin gyi /
bdag gam bdag gi la ni ma yin no /
yathā gamyeta satkāyadṛṣṭiriyaṃ nātmani nātmīye veti zhes rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bdag dang bdag gir lta ba kho na 'jig tshogs ji lta bar bshad de /
yathoktaṃ ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāniti /
tasyaivātmābhimatasya vastuno dhruvadṛṣṭirucchedadṛṣṭirvā 'ntagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ /
śāśvatocchedāntagrahaṇāt /
sati duḥkhādisatye nāstīti dṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiḥ 		ji skad du dge slong dag dge sbyong ngam /
bram ze gang la la bdag go snyam du yang dag par rjes su lta ba na yang dag par rjes su lta ba de dag thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la lta ba kho nar zad do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
bdag tu mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po de nyid la rtag par lta ba'am /
chad par lta ba ni mthar 'dzin par lta ba ste /
rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i bden pa yod na med do zhes bya ba ni log par lta ba'o /
sarvaiva hi viparītasvabhāvapravṛṭtā dṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiḥ ekaiva tūktā log par zhugs pa'i lta ba thams cad log par lta ba yin pa las mar drang ba bzhin du ha cang chabs chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir gcig kho na bshad de /
atiśayavattvāt durgandhakṣatavat /
eṣā hyapavādikā anyāstu samāropikāḥ 		'di ni skur pa 'debs par byed pa yin la /
gzhan dag ni sgro 'dogs par byed pa yin no /
hīne agradṛṣṭirdṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ dman pa la mchog tu 'dzin par lta ba ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa'o /
kiṃ hīnam /
sarvaṃ sāsravam /
āryaiḥ prahīṇatvāt /
tasyāgrato grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ 		dman pa yang ci zhig yin zhe na /
zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad de /
'phags pa rnams kyis spang ba'i phyir ro /
de la mchog tu 'dzin pa ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa yin te /
dṛṣṭyādiparāmarśa iti vaktavye ādiśabdalopaḥ kṛtaḥ lta ba la sogs pa mchog tu 'dzin pa zhes brjod par bya ba'i rigs pa la sogs pa'i sgra mi mngon par byed do /
ahetau hetudṛṣṭiramārge mārgadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavṛtaparāmarśaḥ rgyu ma yin pa la rgyur lta ba dang lam ma yin pa la lam du lta ba ni tshul khrims dang brdul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yin te /
tadyathā maheśvaro na heturlokānām 'di lta ste /
dbang phyug chen po'am /
taṃ ca hetuṃ paśyati prajāpatimanyaṃ vā skye dgu'i bdag po'am /
gzhan yang rung ste /
agnijalapraveśādayaśca na hetuḥ svargasya tāṃśca hetuṃ paśyati /
śīlavratamātrakaṃ sāṃkhyayogajñānādayaśca na mārgo mokṣāsya tāṃśca mārgaṃ paśyati 		'jig rten rnams kyi rgyu ma yin na de la yang rgyur lta ba dang me dang chur 'jug pa la sogs pa mtho ris kyi rgyu ma yin na de dag la yang rgyur lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam dang grangs can dang rnal 'byor gyi shes pa la sogs pa thar pa'i lam ma yin na de dag la yang lam du lta ba lta bu ste /
atrāpi kilādiśabdalopaḥ kṛta ityetāstāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayo veditavyāḥ 'dir yang sogs pa'i sgra mi mngon par byas so zhes grag go /
de ltar na de dag ni lta ba lnga yin par rig par bya'o /
satyakāraṇe kāraṇadṛṣṭiḥ śilavrataparāmarśaḥ gal te rgyu yin pa las rgyur lta ba tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yin na /
kasmādayaṃ na samudayadarśanaprahātavyaḥ ci'i phyir kun 'byung bas mthong bas spang bar bya pa ma yin zhe na /
yo hi kaścidīśvaraḥ prajāpatimanyaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ paśyati sa tannityamekaṃ cātmānaṃ kartāramabhiniviśya /
tadyasmāt sa 		gang la la dbang phyug gam /
skye dgu'i bdag po la rgyur lta ba de ni de la rtag pa gcig pu dang bdag dang byed pa por mngon par zhen nas lta ste /
de lta bas na 'di ltar /
īśvarādiṣu nityātmaviparyāsāt pravartate dbang phyug sogs rgyur mngon zhen pa /
de ni rtag bdag phyin ci log pa yis /
kāraṇābhiniveśo 'to duḥkhadṛggheya eva saḥ rab tu 'jug pas de phyir de /
sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bya nyid /
duḥkhadarśanādeva hi teṣu tau nityātmagrāhau prahīyete /
tasmāttatkṛto 'pi kāraṇābhiniveśastata eva prahīyate /
yastarhi jalāgnipraveśādibhiḥ svargopapattiṃ paśyati śīlavṛtena vā śuddhiṃ so 'pi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya eva 		de dag la rtag pa dang bdag tu 'dzin pa de gnyis ni sdug bsngal mthong ba kho nas spong bar 'gyur te /
de lta bas na des byas pa rgyur mngon par zhen pa yang de nyid kyis spong bar 'gyur ro /
'o na gang me dang chur 'jug pa la sogs pas mtho ris su skye ba'am /
tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyis 'dag par lta ba ji lta bu yin /
de yang sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin te /
eṣa hi śāstrapāṭhaḥ /
ye caivaṃ dṛṣṭaya evaṃvādino yadayaṃ puruṣapudgalo gośīlaṃ samādāya vartate mṛgaśīlaṃ kukkuraśīlaṃ sa tena śudhyati mucyate sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti /
akāraṇaṃ kāraṇataḥ pratyeti śīlavrataparāmarśo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ iti vistaraḥ /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamasau duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ /
duḥkhe vipratipannatvāt 		bstan bcos las 'di skad du /
gang dag skyes bu gang zag gang zhig ba lang gi tshul khrims dang rid gas kyi tshul khrims dang bya gag gi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas pa ste /
des dag par 'gyur /
grol bar 'gyur /
nges par 'byung bar 'gyur /
bde ba dang sdug bsngal las rnam par 'da' bar 'gyur zhing bde ba dang sdug bsngal las rnam par 'das pa yang rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad du smra ba ni rgyu ma yin pa la rgyur mngon par yid ches pas tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste /
sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo /
de ci'i phyir sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin /
sdug bsngal la log par zhugs pa'i phyir ro /
sarveṣāṃ sāsravālambanānāṃ duḥkhe vipratipannatvāt zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa thams cad sdug bsngal la log par zhugs pa'i phyir ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro /
kīdṛśo vā 'nyaḥ śīlavṛtaparāmarśo mārgedarśanaprahātvyaḥ yang na tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa la mthong bas spang bar bya ba gzhan ji lta bu zhig yong [*yod?] /
yo mārgadarśanaprahātavyālambanaḥ /
so 'pi hi nāma duḥkhe vipratipannaḥ /
yasya ca mārgālambanā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā vā 'sti sa nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan vicikitsan vā kathaṃ tayā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyati 		lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba la dmigs pa gang yin pa'o /
de yang sdug bsngal la logs par zhugs pa yin no /
yang gang la lam la dmigs pa log par lta ba'am /
the tshom yod pa de thar pa'i lam med do zhes lta ba'am /
athānyaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ parāmṛśya eṣa mokṣamārgo nāstītyāha /
so 'pi tenaivānyena śuddhiṃ pratyeti na tayā mithyādṛṣṭyeti /
tasyāpyasau mārgadarśanaprahātavyālambano na sidhyati 		the tshom za ba na ji ltar dpe dag par yid ches par 'gyur /
'on te thar pa'i lam gzhan mchog tu bzung nas 'di ni thar pa yin gyi lam ni med do zhes smra'o zhe na /
de yang gzhan de kho nas dag par yid ches kyi log par lta ba de ni ma yin pas de'i de yang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba la dmigs par mi 'grub bo /
yaścāpi samudayanirodhadarśanaprahātavyālambanayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeti sa kasmānna taddarśanaheyaḥ yang gang zhig kun 'byung dang 'gog pa mthong pas spang bar bya ba la dmigs pa'i log par lta bas yang dag par yid ches par 'gyur ba de yang /
ci'i phyir de dag mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin /
tasmāt parīkṣya eṣo 'rthaḥ de lta bas na don 'di ni rtag par bya ba yin no /
yaduktaṃ nityātmaviparyāsāditi /
kimetāveva dvau viparyāsau /
catvāro viparyāsāḥ 		bdag rtag phyin ci log pa yis /
zhes gang bshad pa /
ci phyin ci log de gnyis kho nar zad dam zhe na /
anitye nityamiti phyin ci log ni bzhi ste /
duḥkhe sukhamiti /
aśucau śucīti /
anātmanyātmeti /
athaitadviparyāsacatuṣkaṃ kiṃsvabhāvam 		mi rtag pa la rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba la bde ba dang mi gcang ba la gtsang ba dang bdag med pa la bdag tu phyin ci log pa'o /
yang phyin ci log bzhi chan 'di'i rang bzhin ci zhe na /
dṛṣṭitrayādviparyāsacatuṣkaṃ lta ba gsum las phyin ci log /
bzhi tshan /
antagrāhadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭirnityaviparyāsaḥ mthar 'dzin par lta ba las rtag par lta ba ni /
rtag par ni phyin ci log go /
dṛṣṭiparāmarśātsukhaśuciviparyāsau /
satkāyadṛṣṭerātmadṛṣṭirātmaviparyāsaḥ 		lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa las ni bde ba dang gtsang bar phyin ci log go /
'jig tshogs su lta ba las ni bdag tu lta ba phyin ci log go /
sakaletyapare /
kathamātmīyadṛṣṭirviparyāsaḥ /
kathaṃ ca na viparyāsaḥ 		gzhan dag na re thams cad yin no zhes zer ro /
ci ltar na bdag gir lta ba phyin ci log ma yin /
ci ltar na phyin ci log ma yin /
viparyāsasūtrād /
ātmānameva tatra vaśinaṃ paśyennātmīyaṃ paśyatītyātmadṛṣṭirevāsau dvimukhī athāhamityetasmāt mameti dṛṣṭyantaraṃ syāt /
mayā mahyamityetadapi syāt /
kasmādanye kleśā na viparyāsāḥ 		phyin ci log gi mdo las mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
de las ni bdag kho na dbang byed par lta ba na /
bdag gir lta bar 'gyur bar bshad pa yin pas /
bdag tu lta ba 'di nyid sgo gnyis pa can yin no /
'on te bdag ces bya ba 'di las bdag gi zhes bya ba lta pa gzhan zhig yin na ni bdag gis zhes bya ba dang bdag gi phyir zhes bya ba 'dir yang 'gyur ro /
ci'i phyir nyon mongs pa gzhan dag phyin ci log ma yin zhe na /
yasmāt tribhiḥ kāraṇairviparyāsānāṃ vyavasthānam katamaistribhiḥ /
vīparītataḥ 		'di ltar rgyu gsum gyis rten phyin ci log rnam par bzhag ste /
gsum gang zhe na /
nitīraṇāt samāropāt /
ekāntaviparyastatvādālambane nitīrakatvātsamāropaṇācca /
ucchedadṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiśca na samāropike /
abhāvamukhapravṛttatvāt 		phyin ci log phyir dang nges rtog phyir dang sgro 'dogs phyir /
dmigs pa la gcig tu phyin ci log pa'i phyir dang nges par rtog pa'i phyir dang sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir te /
chad par lta ba dang log par lta ba ni med pa'i sgor zhugs pa'i phyir dang sgro 'dogs par byed pa ma yin no /
śīlavrataparāmarśo naikāntaviparyastastanmātraśuddhyālambanatvāt tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ni de tsam zhig gis /
'dag par dmigs pa'i phyir gcig tu phyin ci log pa ma yin no /
anye kleśā na santīrakā ato na viparyāsāḥ /
yattarhi sūtre ukta manitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa iti /
dṛṣṭirevātra viparyāsaḥ /
saṃjñācitte tu tadvaśāt /
dṛṣṭiviparyāsavaśādeva tatsaṃprayukte saṃjñācitte viparyāsāvuktau /
vedanādayo 'pi kasmānnoktāḥ 		nyon mongs pa gzhan dag ni des par rtog par byed pa ma yin pas de'i phyir phyin ci log dag ma yin no /
'o na mdo las mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang; lta ba phyin ci log pa zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
'dir ni lta ba kho na phyin ci log yin la /
sems dang 'du shes de'i dbang gis lta ba phyin ci log gi dbang gis de dang mtshungs par ldan pa 'du shes dang sems phyin ci log tu bshad do /
tshor ba la sogs pa yang ci'i phyir ma bshad ce na /
lokaprasiddhyā /
loke hi viparyastasaṃjño viparyastacitta iti prasiddhaṃ na punarviparyastavedana iti 		'jig rten na grags pa'i phyir te /
'jig rten na ni 'du shes phyin ci log /
