sems phyin ci log ces grags kyi tshor ba phyin ci log ces ni ma grags so /
ta ete viparyāsāḥ sarve 'pi srota āpannasya prahīṇā bhavanti phyin ci log de dag thams cad kyang /
rgyun du zhugs pas spang ba yin te /
darśanapraheyatvāt dṛṣṭīnāṃ sasaṃprayogāṇām lta ba mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa rnams ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
dvādaśa viparyāsāḥ /
anitye nityamiti saṃjñādṛṣṭicittaviparyāsāstrayaḥ /
evaṃ yāvadanātmanyātmeti /
tatrāṣṭau darśanaprahātavyāścatvāro bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ /
duḥkhe ca saṃjñā cittaviparyāsāvaśucau ceti nikāyāntarīyāḥ 		sde pa gzhan dag na re mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam pa'i 'du shes dang sems dang lta ba phyin ci log gsum nas de bzhin du bdag med pa la bdag go snyam pa'i bar gsum ste /
phyin ci log ni bcu gnyis yin no /
de la brgyad ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no /
sdug bsngal ba dang mi gtsang ba la 'du shes dang sems phyin ci log pa bzhi ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no /
itarathā hi kathamantareṇa sukhaśucisaṃjñāmavītarāgasyāryasya kāmarāgaḥ saṃbhavediti /
tadetannecchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
yadi hi sukhaśucisaṃjñācittasamudācārādāryasya tadviparyāsāvīkṣyete /
sattvasaṃjñācittasamudācārāttadviparyāsāvapi kiṃ neṣyete /
na hi striyāmātmani ca vinā sattvasaṃjñāyā kāmarāgo yukta iti /
sūtre 'pi coktaṃ yataśca śrutavānāryaśrāvaka idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti 		de lta ma yin na bde ba dang gtsang ba'i 'du shes dag mid par ji ltar na /
'phags pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyes par 'gyur zhes zer ro /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'di mi 'dod de gal te 'phags pa la bde ba dang gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang sems kun du 'byung ba dang de dag gi phyin ci log dag tu 'dod na ni /
sems can gyi 'du shes dang sems kun du 'byung bas de dag gi phyin ci log dag tu yang ci'i phyir mi 'dod /
bud med dang bdag la sems can du 'du shes pa med par mi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skye bar rigs pa ma yin no /
mdo las kyang 'di ltar 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba nas /
yāvat tasya tasmin samaye yo 'nitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭivīparyāsaḥ sa prahīyata iti vistaraḥ de'i tshe de'i mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang lta ba phyin ci log pa gang yin pa de spong bar byed do zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs so /
tasmād dṛṣṭisamutye eva saṃjñācitte viparyāsau nānye tatkāla bhrāntimātratvādalātacakracitra yakṣabhrāntivat de lta bas na lta bas kun nas bslang ba'i 'du shes dang sems kho na phyin ci log yin gyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te /
de'i dus su 'khrul pa tsam yin pa'i phyir mgal me'i 'khor lo dang ri mo'i gnod sbyin la 'khrul pa bzhin no zhes zer ro /
yattarhi sthavirānandenārthaṃ vāgīśamadhikṛtyoktaṃ gzhan dag na re 'o na gnas brtan kun dga' bos /
'phags pa ngag gi dbang phyug gi dbang du byas nas /
viparyāse ca saṃjñānāṃ cittaṃ te paridahyate /
nimittaṃ varjyatāṃ tasmācchubhaṃ rāgopasaṃhitam /
tasmāt sarva evāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsāḥ śaikṣasyāprahīṇā ityapare /
te 'pi cāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtaparijñānāt prahīyante 		'du shes phyin ci log pa yis /
khyod kyi sems ni yongs su gdung /
zhes gang smras pa ji lta bu /
de'i phyir slob pas 'du shes dang sems phyin ci log brgyad po thams cad ma spangs pa kho na'o /
de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pas spang bar 'gyur gyi /
na vinā tenetyupāyasamā khyānānnāsti sūtravirodhaḥ de med par ni ma yin no zhes thabs yang dag par bstan pa yin pa'i phyir mdo dang 'gal ba med do zhes zer ro /
atha kiṃ dṛṣṭyanuśayasya eva bhedo nānyasya /
mānasyāpyasti 		yang ji lta ba'i phra rgyas kho na la dbye ba yod kyi gzhan la med dam zhe na /
nga rgyal la yang yod de /
kathamityāha /
sapta mānāḥ 		ji lta zhe na /
nga rgyal bdun /
zhes bya ba smos te /
māno 'timāno mānātimāno 'smimāno 'bhimāna ūnamāno mithyāmānaśca /
abhedena cittasyonnatirmāna uktāḥ /
sa pravṛttibhedāt saptadhā bhavati 		nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang log pa'i nga rgyal lo /
bye brag med par sems khengs pa la nga rgyal zhes bshad do /
de la 'jug pa'i bye brag las ni rnam pa bdun yin te /
hīnādviśiṣṭaḥ samena vā samo 'smīti manyamānasyonnatirmānaḥ chung ngu bas bdag khyad par du 'phags pa'am /
mnyam pa dang mnyam mo snyam du sems khengs pa ni nga rgyal lo /
samādviśiṣṭo 'smītyabhimānaḥ /
viśiṣṭādviśiṣṭo 'smīti mānātimānaḥ /
pañcopādānaskandhānātmata ātmīyato vā manyamānasyāsmimānaḥ 		mnyam pa bas bdag khyad par du 'phags so snyam pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal lo /
khyad par du 'phags pa bas kyang bdag khyad par du 'phags so snyam pa ni nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal lo /
nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la bdag gam bdag gis sems pa ni nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo /
aprāpte viśeṣādhigame prāpto mayetyabhimānaḥ khyad par thob par bya ba ma thob par bdag gis thob po snyam pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo /
bahvantaraviśiṣṭādalpāntarahīno 'smītyūnamānaḥ /
aguṇavato guṇavānasmīti mithyāmānaḥ /
yattarhi śāstre nava mānavidhā uktāḥ /
śreyānasmīti mānavidhā /
sadṛśo 'smīti mānavidhā /
hīno 'smīti mānavidhā /
asti me śreyānasti me sadṛśo 'sti me hīnaḥ 		ches khyad par du 'phags pa bas bdag cung zad cig gis dman no snyam pa ni cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo /
yon tan ma yin pa dang ldan pa la bdag yon tan dang ldan no snyam pa ni log pa'i nga rgyal lo /
'o na bstan bcos las nga rgyal rnam pa dgu ste /
bdag mchog yin no snyam pa nga rgyal gyi rnam pa dang bdag dang 'dra'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi rnam pa dang bdag dman no snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi rnam pa dang bdag pas mchog yod do /
bdag dang mnyam pa yod do /
bdag pas dman pa yod do /
bdag pas mchog med do /
bdag dang mnyam pa med do /
nāsti me śreyānnāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīna iti bdag pas dman pa med do snyam pa nga rgyal gyi rnam pa zhes gang bshad pa ji lta bu zhe na /
ebhya eva mānebhya etāḥ /
navavidhāstribhyaḥ 		rnam pa dgu pa de dag ni gsum po 'di dag nyid las byung ba ste /
gsum gang las she na /
katamebhyastribhyaḥ mānātimānonamānebhyaḥ /
tatra prathamaṃ trayaṃ dṛṣṭisaṃniśritāstrayo mānāḥ 		nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dag las so /
de la dang po'i gsum ni lta ba la brten pa'i nga rgyal gsum ste /
atimānamānonamānāḥ /
dvitīyaṃ trayamūnamānamānātimānāḥ /
tṛtīyaṃ trayaṃ mānātimānonamānāḥ /
yuktastāvad bahvantaraviśiṣṭādalpāntarahīno 'smītyūnamāna unnatisthānatvāt /
nāsti me hīna ityatra kimunnati sthānam /
asti sadṛśo yo 'bhiprete vare sattvarāśau nihīnamapyātmānaṃ bahu manyate 		lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal rnams so /
gnyis pa'i gsum ni cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal rnams so /
gsum pa'i gsum ni nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal rnams so /
re zhig ches khyad par du 'phags pa bas bdag cung zad cig gis dman no snyam pa ni sems khengs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal du rigs na /
bdag pas dman pa med do snyam pa 'di la go khengs pa'i gnas ci zhig yod ce na /
gang zhig mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can gyi tshogs dam pa'i nang na bdag nyid dman yang tha gi'o snyam du sems pa de lta bu de yod do /
api cāstyeva jñānaprasthānavihito vidhiḥ /
prākaraṇaṃ tu nirdeśaṃ parigṛhya śreyānasmītyekeṣu māno 'pi syādati māno 'pi mānātimāno 'pi hīnasamaviśiṣṭāpekṣayā 		gzhan yang 'di ni ye shes la 'jug pa las bshad pa'i lugs yin gyi rab tu byed pa las bstan pa yongs su bzung ste /
bdag mchog yin no snyam pa 'di ni dman pa dang mnyam pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa la ltos nas nga rgyal yang yin la /
lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang yin /
nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal yang yin no /
athaite sapta mānāḥ kiṃprahātavyā ityāha yang na nga rgyal bdun po 'di dag ci zhig gis spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
smras pa /
dṛgbhāvanākṣyāḥ /
dṛgbhāvanābhyāmeṣāṃ kṣayaḥ 		mthong dang bsgom pas zad bya ba /
de dag ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa dag gis zad par bya ba ste /
etaduktaṃ bhavati sarve darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā iti yadbhāvanāheyamaprahīṇaṃ kimavaśyaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ samudācarati de nas 'di skad du thams cad mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro /
ci 'phags pa rnams bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma spangs pa gang yin pa de kun du spyod dam zhe na /
nāvaśyaṃ tadyathā /
vadhādiparyavasthānaṃ heyaṃ bhāvanayā 		nges pa med de 'di ltar bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni /
gsod sogs kun nas dkris pa'o /
yena kleśaparyavasthānena saṃcintya prāṇivadhaṃ kuryādyāvanmṛṣāvādaṃ tad bhāvanāheyaṃ bhāvanāheyadharmālambanatvāt nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa gang gi ched du bsams te /
srog chags kyi srog gcod par byed pha nas brdzun du smra bar byed pa'i bar de ni bsgos pas spang bar bya ba yin te bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
tathā /
vibhavecchā /
vibhavatṛṣṇā 'pi bhāvanāheyā 		de bzhin 'jig sred /
'jig pa'i sred pa yang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no /
vibhavo nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ /
traidhātukī anityatā /
tatra prarthanā vibhavatṛṣṇā 		'jig pa'i sred pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
khams gsum pa'i mi rtag pa ste /
de la don du gnyer ba ni 'jig pa'i sred pa'o /
tathāśabdena bhavatṛṣṇāyāḥ pradeśo gṛhyate /
aho vatāhamairāvaṇaḥ syāṃ nāgarāja ityevamādi /
mānavidhā api bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ santītyuktamasmimamānaśca 		de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgras ni skye ba'i sred pa'i phyogs bdag ni glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bur gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa bzung ngo /
bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni nga rgyal gyi rnam pa rnams kyang yod do zhes bshad la /
na cāryasya saṃbhavanti vidhādayaḥ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal yang yod mod kyi /
'phags pa la /
nāsmitā /
ādigrahaṇena yāvadvibhavatṛṣṇāyā grahaṇam /
kiṃ kāraṇamaprahīṇā apyete na samudācaranti 		rnam sogs pa'o snyam mi 'byung /
sogs pa smos pas ni 'jig pa'i sred pa'i bar du bzung ngo /
ci'i phyir de dag ma spangs kyang mi 'byung zhe na /
dṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt /
satkāyadṛṣṭipuṣṭā hi mānavidhā asmimānaśca /
ato bhagnapṛṣṭhatvāt notthātum punarutsahante 		lta bas rgyas par 'gyur phyir ro /
nga rgyal gyi rnam pa rnams dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal ni 'jig tshogs la lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba yin no /
de'i phyir rked pa bcag pa'i phyir yang ldan par mi nus so /
vadhādiparyavasthānaṃ mithyādṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt gsod pa la sogs pa'i kun nas dkris pa ni log par lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
vibhavatṛṣṇā uccheddṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt 'jig pa'i sred pa ni chad par lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
bhavatṛṣṇāyāḥ pradeśaḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt /
kaukṛtyaṃ nāpi cāśubham /
akukśalaṃ cāpi kaukṛtyaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyam /
na cāryasya tatsaṃbhavati vicikitsā samutthitatvāt 		skye ba'i srid pa'i phyogs ni rtag par lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
mi dge ba'i 'gyod pa'am ma yin no /
'gyod pa mi dge ba yang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin na 'phags pa la ni mi 'byung ste /
de the tshom gyis kun nas bslang ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
athaiṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ kati sarvatragāḥ katyasarvatragāḥ yang phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni kun du 'gro ba dag yin /
sarvatragā duḥkhahetudṛggheyā dṛṣṭayastathā du ni kun du 'gro ba ma yin zhe na /
sdug bsngal rgyu mthong spang bya ba /
vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yā 'vidyā 'veṇikī ca yā /
duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyā dṛṣṭayo vicikitsā ca tābhiśca saṃprayuktā avidyā āveṇikī ca duḥkhasamudayaprahātavye cāvidyā 		lta dang de bzhin the tshom dang gang de lhan cig ma 'dres pa'i /
ma rig gang yin kun du 'gro /
sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i lta ba rnams dang the tshom dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ma rig pa dang sdug bsngal pa dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i ma rig pa ma 'dres pa kho na ste /
itīme ekādaśānuśayāḥ sabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ /
sapta dṛṣṭayo dve vicikitse dve avidye sakalasvadhātvālambanatvāt 		de ltar na lta ba bdun dang the tshom gnyis dang ma rig pa gnyis dang phra rgyas bcu gcig po de dag ni rang gi khams mtha' dag la dmigs pa'i phyir /
skal ba mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba yin no /
kimebhiryugapadālambate āhosvit krameṇa /
yadi krameṇa anyeṣāmapi prasaṅga 		ci re zhig rim gyis sam 'on te cig car yang dmigs gal te rim gyis na ni gzhan dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro /
'on te cig car ro zhe na ni /
atha yugapat kaḥ sakalena kāmadhātunā śuddhiṃ pratyetyakāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇataḥ /
sakalaṃ nocyate sakalaṃ yugapadālambanta iti /
api tu pañcaprakāramapi sarvaṃ yugapat /
evamapi yatrātmadṛṣṭistatrātmatṛṣṇā yatrāgraśuddhidṛṣṭī tatra tatprārthanā tena ca māna iti tṛṣṇāmānayorapi sarvatragatvaṃ prāpnoti /
evaṃ sati darśanabhāvanāheyālambanatvādetadubhayaṃ kiṃprahātavyaṃ syāt /
bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ vyāmiśrālambanatvāt /
athavā punarastu darśanaprahātavyaṃ dṛṣṭibalādhānavartitvāt 		su zhig 'dod pa'i khams mtha' dag gis 'dag par yid ches par 'gyur ba'am /
mtha' dag rgyu ma yin pa las rgyur yid ches par 'gyur /
mtha' dag la ni cig car du dmigs so zhes ni mi zer ro /
'on kyang rnam pa lnga po thams cad kyang cig car du dmigs so /
de lta na yang gang la bdag tu lta ba yod pa de la bdag la sred pa yod la /
gang la mchog dang dag par lta ba yod pa de la de'i don du gnyer ba yod cing /
des kyang nga rgyal du 'gyur bas sred pa dang nga rgyal dag kyang rung kun du 'gro ba yin par 'gyur ro /
de lta yin na de gnyi ga mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba la dmigs pa'i phyir ci zhig gis spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
'dren ma la dmigs pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no /
yang na lta ba'i stobs bskyed pas bcu pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no /
svalakṣaṇakleśāvetau na sāmānyakleśau /
tasmānna sarvatragāviti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
va ete sabhāgadhātusarvatragā ekādaśānuśayā uktāḥ /
navodhrvālambanā eṣāṃ dṛṣṭidvayavivarjitāḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re nyon mongs pa 'di gnyis rang gi mtshan nyid pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa spyi pa 'di ni ma yin te /
de lta bas na kun tu 'gro ba dag ma yin no zhes zer ro /
yang skal ba mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba dag tu phra rgyas bcu gcig bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag las dgu gang du dmigs /
lta ba gnyis po ma gtogs so /
satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ ca varjayitvā 'nye navānuśayā visabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba las ma gtogs pa phra rgyas gzhan dgu ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba dag yin no /
kadācittu visabhāgamekaṃ dhātumālambante kadācit dvau /
ye 'nuśayāḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā rūpapratisaṃyuktālambanāḥ /
kāmapratisaṃyuktā ārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanāḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanā iti vacanāt /
yadā kāmadhātau sthito brahmaṇi sattvadṛṣṭiṃ nityadṛṣṭiṃ cojtpādayati tadā kathaṃ satkāyānta grāhadṛṣṭī visabhāgadhātvālambane na bhavataḥ /
ātmātmīyatvenāgrahaṇādantagrāhadṛṣṭiśca tatsamutthitatvāt 		res 'ga' ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams gcig la dmigs so /
res 'ga' ni gnyis la dmigs te /
'dod pa dang ldan pa gzugs dang ldan pa la dmigs pa rnams la /
gzugs med pa dang ldan pa la dmigs pa rnams dang 'dod pa dang ldan pa gzugs med pa dang ldan pa la dmigs pa'i phra rgyas gang dag yin pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa tshangs pa la sems can du lta ba dang rtag par lta ba skyed par byed pa de'i tshe ji ltar 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta bskal pa mi mnyam pa'i khams la dmigs pa dag ma yin zhe na /
bdag dang bdag gir mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang mthar 'dzin par lta pa yang des kun nas bslang ba'i phyir ro /
kā tarhīyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ /
neyaṃ dṛṣṭirmithyājñānaṃ punaḥ etadityābhidhārmikāḥ /
kuto nu khalvetadanyā tadālambanā dṛṣṭireṣā na dṛṣṭiriti siddhāntastu pramāṇayitayaḥ 		'o na 'di lta ba gang zhig yin zhe na /
chos mngon pa pa rnams na re 'di ni lta ba ma yin gyi 'di ni log pa'i shes pa yin no zhes zer ro /
yang de la dmigs pa gzhan dag ni lta ba yin gyi 'di ni lta ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
grub pa'i mtha' ni tshad mar bya dgos so /
kiṃ khalvanuśayāḥ eva sarvatragāḥ yang ci phra rgyas kho na kun du 'gro ba dag yin nam zhe na /
smras pa /
netyāha ma yin te /
prāptivarjyāḥ sahabhuvo ye'pyebhiste 'pi sarvagāḥ /
sarvatragairanuśayaiḥ sahabhuvo ye 'pyanye dharmāste 'pi sarvatragāḥ prāptayastu naivam 		de dag dang ni lhan cig gang /
'byung de 'ang kun 'gro thob ma gtogs /
chos gzhan phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba rnams dang lhan cig 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang kun du 'gro ba yin no /
aneka phalatvāt /
ata eva syuḥ sarvatragānuśayā na sarvatrahetunā heturiti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate 		thob pa rnams ni 'bras bu du ma'i phyir de lta ma yin no /
de nyid kyi phyir phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba dag yin la phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba'i rgyus rgyu ma yin pa dag kyang yod ces bya ba mu bzhir bya ste /
prathamā koṭiranāgatāḥ sarvatragā anuśayāḥ /
dvitīyā 'tītapratyupannāstatsahabhuvaḥ 		mu dang po 'di ma 'ongs pa'i phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba rnams so /
gnyis pa ni 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i lhan cig 'byung ba rnams so /
tṛtīyācatuthau yojye gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag ni sbyar bar bya'o /
eṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ kati sāsravālambanāḥ katyanāsravālambanāḥ phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa dag yin no /
mithyādṛgvimatī tābhyāṃ yuktā 'vidyā 'tha kevalā du ni zag pa med pa la dmigs pa dag yin zhe na /
nirodhamārgadṛggheyāḥ ṣaḍanāsravagocarāḥ /
nirodhadarśanaprahātavyāstrayo 'nuśayā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā 'vidyā ca tābhyāṃ saṃprayuktā ’ 'veṇikī ca /
mārgadarśanaprahātavyā apyeta eva trayaḥ 		'gog dang lam mthong spang bya ba /
log lta the tshom de dag dang /
ldan dang 'ba' zhig ma rig pa /
drug ni zag med spyod yul can; /
'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas gsum po log par lta ba dang the tshom dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang ma 'dres pa'i ma rig pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba yang gsum po de dag nyid de /
ityete ṣaḍanāsravālambanāḥ /
śeṣāṃ sāsravālambanā iti siddham /
tatra punaḥ 		de ltar na drug po de dag ni zag pa med pa la dmigs pa dag yin no /
lhag ma rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag la dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar grub po /
de la yang /
svabhūmyuparamo mārgaḥ ṣaḍbhūminavabhūmikaḥ rang gi sa pa'i 'gog pa dang /
lam ni phan tshun rgyu yin pas /
tadgocarāṇāṃ viṣayo mārgo hyanyo 'nyahetukaḥ /
nirodhālambanānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ svabhūminirodha evālambanaṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kāmadhātoreva yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikānāṃ bhavāgrasyaiva /
mārgālambanānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ ṣaḍbhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ sarva evālambanam /
yo 'pi rūpārūpyapratipakṣaḥ rūpārupyāvacarāṇāmapyadṛṣṭabhūmikānāṃ navabhūmikaḥ /
sa evānvayajñānapakṣyo mārga ālambanaṃ mārgasyānyo 'nyahetukatvāt /
yadyapi dharmajñānānvayajñāne apyanyonyahetuke natvanvayajñānaṃ kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti /
na kāmāvacarā mārgālambanā anvayajñānapakṣānālambante /
dharmajñānaṃ tarhi rūpārūpyapratipakṣatvāttadbhūmikānāṃ mārgalambanānāmālambanaṃ bhaviṣyati /
na tat sakalaṃ pratipakṣo duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānayoratatpratipakṣatvāt 		sa drug sa dgu'i lam ni de'o /
spyod yul can gyi yul yin no /
'gog pa la dmigs pa log par lta ba la sogs pa'i dmigs pa ni rang gi sa pa'i 'gog pa kho na yin te /
'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyi yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi kho na yin la /
srid pa'i rtse mo'i pa rnams kyi bar du yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i kho na yin no /
lam la dmigs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni sa drug gi chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam thams cad yin te /
gang yang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i gnyen po yang yin no /
gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pas brgyad po rnams kyi dmigs pa yangs dgu pa'i rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam thams cad yin te /
lam ni phan tshun rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro /
gal te chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dag kyang phan tshun rgyu yin mod kyi rjes su shes pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po ni ma yin pas lam la dmigs pas 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam la ni mi dmigs so /
'o na ni chos shes pa gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i gnyen po yin pa nyid kyi phyir lam la dmigs pa de'i sa pa rnams kyi dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa dag de dag gi gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir dang mtha' dag kyang gnyen po ma yin la /
nāpi sakalayo rūpārūpyayyordarśanaprahātavyānāmapratipakṣatvādityādyābhāvānna bhavatyālambanam mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa mtha' dag gi yang ma yin te /
de lta bas na dang po med pa'i phyir dang dang po rnams kyi ma yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa ma yin no /
atha kasmādrāgapratighamānā dṛṣṭiśīlavṛataparāmarśau cānāsravālambanā neṣyante /
na rāgastasya varjyatvāt /
varjanīyo hi rāgaḥ yadi cānāsravālambanaḥ syānna varjanīyaḥ syātkuśaladharmacchandavat /
na dveṣo 'napakārataḥ /
apakāravastuni hi pratigha utpadyate /
na caivaṃ nirodhamāgauṃ 		yang ci'i phyir 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dag zag pa med pa la dmigs pa dag tu mi 'dod ce na /
'dod chags min te spang bya'i phyir /
'dod chags ni spang bar bya ba yin na gal te zag pa med pa la dmigs pa yin na go spang bar bya ba ma yin par 'gyur te /
dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa bzhin no /
gnod mi byed phyir zhe sdang min /
gnod par byed pa'i dngos po la ni khong khro ba skye na 'gog pa dang lam dang ni de lta ma yin no /
na māno na parāmarśau śāntaśuddhayagrabhāvataḥ zhi dang dag dang mchog gyur phyir /
nga rgyal ma yin mchog 'dzin min /
nirodhamārgayoḥ śāntatvānna tābhyāmunnatirbhavitumarhati 'gog pa dang lam dag ni zhi ba yin pa'i phyir de dag gis khengs par 'gyur ba 'ongs ba yang ma yin la /
bhūtārthaśuddhitvānna tayoḥ śuddhigrāhaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ yang dag pa'i don du dag pa yin pa'i phyir de gnyis la dag par 'dzin pa ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yang ma yin no /
agrau ca tau /
hīne cāgragrāho dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ /
tasmādayuktameṣāmanāsravālambanatvam 		dman pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa yin na de gnyis ni mchog kyang yin te /
de lta bas na de dag gi dmigs pa zag pa med pa yin par rigs pa ma yin no /
eṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ katyālambanato 'nuśerate kati saṃprayogata eva phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur; du ni mtshungs par ldan pa kho na'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur zhe na /
sarvatragā anuśayāḥ sakalāmanuśerate phra rgyas kun du 'gro rnams ni /
dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sa /
svabhūmimālambanataḥ svanikāyamasarvagāḥ thams cad du ni rgyas par 'gyur /
kun 'gro ma yin rang ris so /
ye sarvatragā anuśayāste sakalāṃ pañcaprakārāmapi svāṃ bhūmimālambanato 'nuśerate phra rgyas gang dag kun du 'gro ba de dag ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sa pa'i rnam pa lnga po thams cad la yang rgyas par 'gyur ro /
asarvatragāstu svasyāṃ bhūmau svameva nikāyamālambanato 'nuśerate nānyam /
tadyathā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyameva nikāyam /
evaṃ yāvadbhāvanāprahātavyā bhāvanāprahātavyameva nānyam 		thams cad du ni 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sar rang gi ris kho na la rgyas par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
'di lta ste /
sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i ris kho na la rgyas par 'gyur la /
de bzhin du bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na la rgyas pa'i bar du 'gyur gyi /
gzhan du ni ma yin no /
utsargaṃ kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti spyir btang bar byas nas dmigs kyis ston par byed de /
nānāsravordhvaviṣayāḥ zag med gong ma'i yul can min /
anāsravālambanā anuśayā naivālambanato 'nuśerate zag pa med pa la dmigs pa'i phra rgyas rnams ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par mi 'gyur ba kho na yin la /
nāpyūrdhvabhūmyālambanāḥ sa gong ma la dmigs pa rnams kyang ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
tadālambanasya vastunaḥ de dag gi dmigs pa'i dngos po ni /
asvīkārādvipakṣataḥ /
yaddhi vastvātmadṛṣṭitṛṣṇābhyāṃ svīkṛtaṃ bhavati tatrānye 'pyanuśayā anugamayitumutsahante 		bdag gir ma byas gnyen po'i phyir /
dngos po gang zhig bdag tu lta ba dang sred pa dag gis bdag gir byas pa de la phra rgyas gzhan dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur bar nus te /
ārdra iva paṭe rajāṃsi saṃsthātum /
na caivamanāsravā nāpyevamūrdhvā bhūmiḥ 		snam bu gsher ba la rdul chags pa bzhin no /
zag pa med pa yang de lta ma yin la /
ato na tadālambanāsteṣvanuśerate /
yastvihasthastāṃ bhūmiṃ prārthayate /
kuśalo 'sau dharmmacchandaḥ vipakṣabhūtau ca nirvāṇamārgau tadālambanānāṃ kleśānāmūrdhvā ca bhūmiradharāṇām /
ato na teṣu pratiṣṭhāṃ labhante 		sa 'og ma la yang ma yin pas de'i phyir de dag la dmigs pa rnams ni de dag la rgyas par mi 'gyur ro /
gang zhig 'di na gnas pa las de don du gnyer bar byed pa de ni mi dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yin no /
mya ngan las 'das pa dang lam ni de dag la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa yin la /
sa gong ma yang 'og ma rnams kyi gnyen po yin pas de'i phyir yang de dag tu gnas mi mthong ste /
tapta ivopale talāni pādānām rdo bsreg pa la rkang mthil dag gi gnas mi mthong ba bzhin no /
ānuguṇyārtho 'trānuśayārthaḥ /
na ca te tadanuguṇā ityapare 		gzhan dag na re phra rgyas kyi don ni rjes su mthun pa'i don yin de dag ni de rnams kyi rjes su mthun pa ma yin te /
vātikasya rukṣānanuśayanavat /
ata uktā ālambanato 'nuśerate /
yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ 		rlung nad can la kha zas rtsub po rgyas par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes zer ro /
dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bshad zin to /
gang zhig gang dang mtshungs ldan pa /
de ni der mtshungs ldan sgo nas /
anuśareta iti vartate rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar te /
yo 'nuśayo yena dharmeṇa saṃprayuktastasmin saṃprayogato 'nuśete /
yāvadaprahīṇa iti viśeṣaṇārthastuśabdaḥ 		phra rgyas gang zhig chos gang dang mtshungs par ldan pa de ni der mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro /
ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ji srid du ma spangs ba zhes bya ba khyad par du bya ba'i phyir ro /
syuranuśayā nānāsravālambanā na visabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ zag pa med pa la dmigs pa de dag kyang ma yin skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams kun tu 'gro ba dag kyang ma yin la /
te cānuśayāḥ saṃprayogato 'nuśayīrannālambanataḥ na syurvisabhāgabhūmisarvatragā anuśayāḥ /
eṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ katyakuśalāḥ katyavyākṛtāḥ 		phra rgyas de dag kyang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur gyi dmigs pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin pa'i phra rgyas dag lta yod dam zhe na /
yod de /
skal pa mi mnyam pa'i sa la kun du 'gro ba'i phra rgyas rnams so /
phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni mi dge ba yin /
du ni lung du ma bstan pa yin zhe na /
ūrdhvamavyākṛtāḥ sarve gong ma thams cad lung ma bstan /
rūpārupyāvacarāstāvatsarva evāvyākṛtāḥ /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ duḥkhavipākaḥ syāt 		re zhig gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no /
chos nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni sdug bsngal yin na de yang de gnyis na med de /
tacca tayoirnāsti paravyābādhahetvabhāvāt pha rol po la yang gnod pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro /
kāme satkāyadarśanam /
antagrāhaḥ sahābhyāṃ ca mohaḥ 		'dod na 'jig tshogs lta ba dang /
mthar 'dzin lhan cig ma rig pa /
kāmadhātau satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭī tatsaṃprayuktā cāvidyā avyākṛtāḥ 'dod pa'i khams na ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ma rig pa lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
dānādibhiraviruddhatvāt /
ahaṃ pretya sukhī bhaviṣyāmīti dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati /
ucchedadṛṣṭirapi mokṣānukūlā /
ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā etadagraṃ bāhyakānāṃ dṛṣṭigatānāṃ yaduta no ca syāṃ no ca me syāt na bhaviṣyāmi na me bhaviṣyatīti /
api cānayordṛṣṭyoḥ svadravyasaṃmūḍhatvādaparapīḍāpravṛttatvācca 		sbyin pa la sogs pa dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir dang bdag 'jig rten pha rol du bde bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sbyin par byed /
tshul khrims srung bar byed do /
chad par lta ba yang thar ba'i rjes su mthun pa dag yin te /
de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
phyi rol pa'i lta bar gyur pa rnams kyi nang na ni 'di lta ste /
bdag med par gyur cig /
bdag gi med par gyur cig /
bdag 'byung bar ma gyur cig /
bdag gi 'byung bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i lta ba 'di mchog yin no zhes gsungs so /
gzhan yang lta ba 'di gnyis ni rang gi rdzas la kun du rmongs pa'i phyir dang pha rol po la gnod pa'i rnam par zhugs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
svargatṛṣṇā 'smimānayorapyevaṃ prasaṅgaḥ /
sahajā satkāyadṛṣṭiravyākṛtā /
yā mṛgapakṣiṇāmapi varttate /
vikalpitā tvakuśaleti pūrvācāryāḥ 		mtho ris la sred pa dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dag kyang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro /
sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re /
lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba ri dags dang bya rnams la yang yod pa gang yin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
rnam par brtag pa ni mi dge ba yin no zhes zer ro /
śeṣastvihāśubhāḥ lhag ma rnams 'dir mi dge ba'o /
śeṣās tvaśubhā anuśayāḥ kāmadhātāvakuśalāḥ phra rgyas lhag ma rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams na mi dge ba dag yin no /
katyakuśalamūlāni kati na /
kāme 'kuśalamūlāni rāgapratighamūḍhayaḥ 		du ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yin /
du ni ma yin zhe na /
'dod na 'dod chags khong khro dang /
rmongs rnams mi dge'i rtsa ba yin /
kāmadhātau sarvarāgaḥ sarvapratighaḥ sarvo moho 'nyatra satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktādyathākramam /
trīṇyakuśalamūlāni /
lobho 'kuśalamūlaṃ dveṣo moho 'kuśalamūlam /
yaddhyakuśalaṃ cākuśalasya ca mūlaṃ tadevākuśalamūlamiṣṭam 		'dod pa'i khams na 'dod chags thams cad dang khong khro ba thams cad dang 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma gtogs pa'i rmongs pa thams cad ni go rims bzhin du mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa chags pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang zhe sdang mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang gti mug mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin te /
gang zhig mi dge ba yang yin la mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yin pa de kho na mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin par 'dod do /
śeṣā anuśayā nākuśalamūlānīti siddham phra rgyas lhag ma rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo /
katyavyākṛtamūlāni kati na /
trīṇyavyākṛta mūlāni /
katamāni trīṇi 		du ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba dag yin /
du ni ma yin zhe na /
lung ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba gsum /
gsum po gang dag ce na /
tṛṣṇā 'vidyā matiśca sā /
setyavyākṛtatāṃ darśayati yā kācidavyākṛtā tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā cāntato vipākajā api sarvā 'sāvavyākṛtamūlamiti kāśmīrāḥ 		de ni sred dang ma rig blo /
de zhes bya ba ni lung du ma bstan pa yin par ston te /
kha che ba rnams na re sred pa dang ma rig pa dang shes rab tha na rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yang rung ste /
gang cung zad lung du ma bstan pa de thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa de rtsa ba dag kyang yin no zhes zer ro /
dvaidhordhvavṛtternāto 'nyau rnam gnyis mthor 'jug phyir de las /
gzhan min /
vicikitsā kila dvaidhavṛtterna mūlaṃ bhavitumarhati the tshom ni rnam pa gnyis nyid du 'jug pa'i phyir rtsa bar 'ong ba ma yin te /
calatvāt /
unnatilakṣaṇenordhvavṛtterna māno mūlam /
vividhasmṛtimūlāni hi sthirāṇyadhovṛttīni ca loke dṛṣṭānnīti /
catvāryeveti bāhyakāḥ 		g yo ba'i phyir ro /
nga rgyal ni khengs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mthon por 'jug pa'i phyir ma yin te /
rtsa ba dang chos mi mthun pa'i phyir ro /
'jig rten na rtsa ba rnams ni brtan pa dang 'og na gnas pa dag yin par mthong ngo zhes grag go /
bzhi zhes nyi 'og pa /
bāhyakā ścatvāryavyākṛtamūlānīcchanti nyi 'og pa rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba bzhir 'dod de /
tṛṣṇādṛṅ mānamohāste de dag sred lta nga rgyal rmongs /
sa ityavyākṛtā iti darśayati /
avyākṛtā tṛṣṇā dṛṣṭirmāno 'vidyā ca 		de dag ces bya ba ni lung du ma bstan pa dag ces bya bar ston te /
lung du ma bstan pa'i sred pa dang lta ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa'o /
kiṃ kāraṇametānyavyākṛtamūlānīcchanti ci'i phyir de dag kho na lung du ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba rnams su 'dod ce na /
dhyāyitritvādavidyayā bsam gtan pa gsum ma rig las /
yasmāttrayo dhyāyinaḥ 'di ltar bsam gtan pa ni gsum ste /
tṛṣṇādṛṣṭimānottaradhyāyinaḥ /
te cāvidyāvaśādbhavantīti 		sred pa dang lta ba dang nga rgyal shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa dag yin la /
de dag kyang ma rig pa'i dbang gis 'gyur ro /
yāni sūtre caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūni kiṃ tāni avyākṛtatvāt mdo las lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po bcu bzhi gsungs pa ci de dag lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir yin nam /
netyāha /
kiṃ tarhi /
sthāpanīyaḥ praśno 'vyākṛta ityuktam /
caturvidho hi praśnaḥ 		smras pa ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu yin zhe na /
gzhag par bya ba'i dri ba la lung du ma bstan pa zhes bshad do /
'dri ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyo vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ paripṛcchayya vyākaraṇīyaḥ sthāpanīyaśca /
tatra yathākramaṃ veditavyam 		mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba dang rnam par phye nas lung bstan par bya ba dang; dris nas lung bstan par bya ba dang gzhag par bya ba'o /
de la go rims bzhin du /
ekāṃśato vyākaraṇaṃ vibhajya paripṛcchaya ca /
sthāpyaṃ ca maraṇotpatti viśiṣṭātmā 'nyatādivat 		mgo gcig dang ni rnam phye dang /
dri dang gzhag par lung bstan pa /
'chi dang skye dang khyad par 'phags /
bdag gzhan la sogs lta bu yin /
kiṃ sarvasattvā mariṣyantītyekāṃśena vyākarttavyaṃ mariṣyantīti bar rig par bya ste; ci sems can thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ram zhes 'dri na /
'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya'o /
kiṃ sarve janiṣyanta iti vibhajya vyākarttavyaṃ saṃkleśā janiṣyante na niḥkleśā iti /
kiṃ manuṣyo viśiṣṭo hīna iti paripṛcchayya vyākattevyam 		ci sems can thams cad skye bar 'gyur ram zhes 'dri na /
nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni skye bar 'gyur gyi nyon mongs pa med pa rnams ni ma yin no zhes rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bya'o /
ci mi 'di khyad par du 'phags pa yin nam dman pa yin zhes 'dri na /
kānadhikṛtya praśnayasīti /
yadi brūyād devāniti /
hīna iti vyākarttavyam 		gang las ltos te 'dri zhes dris nas lung bstan par bya ste /
gal te lha rnams la ltos te'o zhes zer na ni dman no zhes lung bstan par bya'o /
atha brūyādapāyāniti /
viśiṣṭa iti vyākarttavyam /
kimanyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ sattvo 'nanya iti sthāpanīyaḥ /
sattvadravyasyābhāvāt vandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivat 		'on te ngan song rnams las ltos te'o zhes zer na ni khyad par du 'phags so zhes lung bstan par bya'o /
ci phung po rnams las sems can gzhan nam gzhan ma yin zhes 'dri na /
sems can gyi rdzas med pa'i phyir gzhag par bya ste /
kathametadvyākaraṇaṃ bhavati avyākṛtametaditi /
evaṃ vyākaraṇāt /
apara āha /
idamapyekāṃśavyākaraṇaṃ yanna sarve janiṣyanta iti /
yastu pṛcchedye mariṣyanti kiṃ te janiṣyanta ityetadvibhajyavyākaraṇīyaṃ syāt 		mo gsham gyi bu sngo bsangs sam dkar sham zhes bya ba bzhin no /
'di ji ltar na lung ma bstan pa yin zhe na /
de ni lung ma bstan no zhes de lta bur lung du bstan pa'i phyir ro /
gzhan dag na re thams cad skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yang mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba yin no zhes zer ro /
gang zhig ci gang dag 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag skye bar 'gyur ram zhes 'dri ba de la ni rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bya ba yin no /
manuṣyeṣu cobhayamasti hīnatvaṃ viśiṣṭatvaṃ cāpekṣikamityubhayamekāṃśena vyākarttavyam mi la yang dman pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa gnyi ga yod de /
ltos pa yin pas mgo gcig tu gnyis kar lung bstan par bya dgos te /
tadyathā vijñānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ceti ekāntena tu pṛcchato naikāntavyākaraṇāt vibhajyavyākaraṇaṃ yujyate dper na rnam par shes pa ni rgyu yang yin la 'bras bu yang yin pa bzhin no /
gcig tu 'dri ba la gcig tu lung bstan du mi rung bas rnam par phye ste lung bstan par rigs so /
skandhebhyo 'nyaḥ sattva ityetadavyākṛtameva phung po dag las sems can gzhan nam zhes 'dri ba 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin te /
na cāvyākaraṇameva vyākaraṇaṃ yujyata iti lung du ma bstan pa kho na ni lung bstan par mi rung ba'o /
yastu sthāpanīyaḥ praśnaḥ sthāpanīyatvena vyākriyate /
kathaṃ na vyākṛto bhavati 		gzhag par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang yin pa gzhag par bya ba nyid du lung ston pa de ji ltar na lung du ma bstan pa yin /
ābhidharmikā āhuḥ /
tathāgato bhagavānarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svākhyāto 'sya dharmaḥ supratipannaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ rūpamanityaṃ yāvadvijñāna duḥkhaprajñaptiryāvanmārgaprajñaptirekāṃśena vyākarttavyamarthopasaṃhitatvāt 		chos mngon pa rnams na re bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang; de'i legs par bshad pa'i chos dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun legs par zhugs pa dang gzugs mi rtag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal gdags pa nas lam gdags pa'i bar ni don dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir /
mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya'o /
vibhajjavyākaraṇaṃ nāma yadi kaścid brūyāddharmān vadeti sa vaktavyo bahavo dharmā atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannāḥ katamān vadāmīti rnam par phye ste lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ni gal te 'ga' zhig chos dag smros shig ces zer na /
de la 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang da ltar byung ba dag dang chos mang po zhig yod na gang dag smra bar bya zhes brjod par bya'o /
yadi brū yādatītāniti /
sa vyaktavyo 'tītā api bahavo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti 		gal te 'das pa dag smros shig ces zer na /
de la 'das pa rnams la yang gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du mang du yod na zhes brjod par bya'o /
athaṃ brūyādrūpamiti 'on te gzugs smros shig ces zer na /
sa vaktavyo rūpamapi trividhaṃ kuśalamakuśalamavyākṛtaṃ ca gzugs la yang dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa rnam pa gsum yod na zhes brjod par bya'o /
yadyāha kuśalamiti /
tadapi saptaprakāraṃ prāṇātipātādviratiryāvatsaṃbhinnapralāpāditi /
yadyāha prāṇātipātādviratimiti 		gal te dge ba smros shig ces zer na /
de la yang srog gcod pa spong ba nas tshig kyal pa las spong ba'i bar du rnam pa bdun yod do zhes brjod par bya'o /
sā 'pi triprakārā alobhajā 'dveṣajā 'mohajā gal te srog gcod pa las spong ba smros shig zer na /
yadyāhālobhajāmiti /
alobhajā 'pi dvividhā vijñāptyavijñaptibhedādityevaṃ vibhajya vaktavyamiti /
etadeva ca śaṭhasya paripṛcchya vyākaraṇam /
tasya vaktavyaṃ dharmā bahava iti /
na tu vibhaktavyā yāvattūṣṇim vā tiṣṭhati svayaṃ vā vyākarotīti /
yadā tau na kiñcit pṛcchataḥ kevalamadhyeṣayataḥ tayośca na kiñcit vyākriyate kevalaṃ paripraśnyete tat kathamanayoḥ praśno bhavati kathaṃ vā vyākaraṇam 		de la yang ma chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa las skyes pa dang rnam pa gsum yod la ma chags pa las skyes pa la yang rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis yod na zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa rnam par phye ste brjod par bya ba yin no /
g yon can gyi 'dri ba la lung bstan pa yang de nyid yin te /
de la ni chos mang po zhig yod na zhes brjod par bya'i rnam par dbye bar ni mi bya ste /
cang mi smra ba'am /
bdag nyid lung ston du gzhug ces bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes zer ro /
gang gi tshe de gnyis cung zad kyang mi 'dra ba'i gsol ba 'debs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad la /
de gnyis la yang cung zad kyang lung mi ston gyi 'dri ba 'ba' zhig zad na de ji ltar na de gnyis kyi 'dri ba yin /
ji ltar na lung du ston pa yin /
yo hhi panthānaṃ brūhītyāha kim tena panthā na pṛṣṭo bhavati /
paripṛcchayaiva vyākaraṇāt kathaṃ na paripṛcchāvyākaraṇaṃ bhavati 		gang zhig lam smros shig ces zer na /
ci des lam ma dris pa yin nam /
dri ba nyid kyis de lung bstan pa'i phyir ji ltar dris nas lung bstan pa ma yin /
gzhag par bya ba ni dper na 'jig rten mtha' yod pa zhig gam /
sthāpanīyastu yathā antavān loko 'nantavānityevamādi sūtrāntādeva tu praśnavyākaraṇānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam mtha' med pa zhig ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
dri ba lung bstan pa rnams kyi mtshan 'di ni mdo kho na las blta bar bya ste /
bhadantamahāsāṅghikāḥ sūtraṃ paṭhanti /
catvārīmāni bhikṣavaḥ praśnavyākaraṇānīti /
katamāni catvāri 		btsun pa dge 'dun phal chen sde pa rnams dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni /
dri ba lung du bstan pa dag yin te /
bzhi gang zhe na /
asti bhikṣava ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ dge slong dag mgo gcig tu lung du bstan par bya ba'i dri ba yang yod /
asti yāvat sthāpanīyaḥ gzhag par bya ba'i bar du yang yod de /
katamaśca bhikṣavaḥ ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ dge slong dag mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang zhe na /
sarve saṃskārā anityā ityayaṃ bhikṣava ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa yin nam zhes 'dri ba 'di ni /
dge slong dag mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba'i dri ba yin no /
katamaśca bhikṣavo vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ dge slong dag rnam par phye ste /
lung bstan par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang zhe na /
saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtvā kiṃ prativedayata ityayam vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ ched du bsam par bya ba'i las byas nas ci zhig so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur zhe na /
'dri ba 'di ni dge slong dag mgo rnam par phye ste /
katamaśca bhikṣavaḥ paripṛcchyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ /
saṃjñāsu puruṣasyātmā utāho 'nyāsaṃjñā anya ātmeti pṛṣṭena satā paripraṣṭavyaḥ katamaṃ punarāyuṣmānātmānaṃ pratyeti 		lung bstan par bya ba'i 'dri ba yin no /
dge slong dag dris nas lung bstan par bya ba'i dri ba gang zhe na /
'du shes skyes bu bdag nyid yin nam /
'on te 'du shes kyang gzhan zhig la /
bdag kyang gzhan zhig yin zhes dris na /
tshe dang ldan pa bdag gang yin par yid ches zhes 'dri bar bya'o /
sa cedevaṃ vadedau dārikaṃ khalvahayāyuṣmannātmānaṃ pratyemi /
evaṃ satyanyā saṃjñā anya ātmetyevaṃ vacanīyaḥ 		gal te 'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis ni rig pa bdag yin par shes so zhes zer na /
de lta yin na 'di skad du 'du shes kyang gzhan la bdag kyang gzhan yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
ayaṃ hi paripṛcchya vyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ 'di ni dge slong dag dris nas lung bstan par bya ba'i dri ba 'di yin no /
katamaśca bhikṣavaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ praśnaḥ dge slong dag gzhag par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang zhe na /
tadyathā śāśvato loko 'śāśvataḥ dper na 'jig rten rtag pa zhig gam /
mi rtag pa zhig gam /
śāśvataścāśāśvataśca /
naiva śāśvato nāśāśvataḥ /
antavānantataḥ /
antavāṃścānantaśca 		rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag pa zhig gam /
rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa zhig gam /
mtha' yod pa zhig gam /
mtha' yod pa ma yin pa zhig gam /
naivāntavānnānantavān /
bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇānna bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt yāvadanyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramityayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ praśna iti /
yasya pudgalasya yo 'nuśayo yasminnālambane 'nuśete sa tena tasmin saṃprayuktaḥ 		mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' med kyang med pa zhig gam /
mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin pa zhig gam /
de bzhin 'ongs pa shi nas yod pa zhig gam zhes bya ba nas srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan zhig gam zhes bya ba'i bar du 'dri ba lta bu ste /
'di ni dge slong dag gzhag par bya ba'i 'dri ba yin no zhes 'don to /
gang zag gang gi phra rgyas gang zhig dmigs pa gang la rgyas par 'gyur ba 'di ni des de dang ldan pa yin no /
idaṃ tu vaktavyamatīte na kasmin yāvat pratyupanne na kasminniti 'das pas ni gang dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas da ltar byung bas ni gang dang ldan zhes bya ba'i bar 'di brjod par bya ste /
samāsata ime dvividhāḥ kleśāḥ mdor bsdu na nyon mongs pa ni rnam pa 'di gnyis te /
svalakṣaṇakleśāśca rāgaprativamānāḥ /
sāmānyakleśāśca dṛṣṭivicikitsāda 'vidyāḥ /
tatra tāvat 		rang gi mtshan nyid pa'i nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal rnams so /
nyon mongs pa spyi pa ni lta ba dang the tshom dang ma rig pa rnams so /
de la re zhig /
rāgapratighamānaiḥ syādatītapratyupasthitaiḥ 'das dang nyer gnas 'dod chags dang /
khong khro nga rgyal dag gis ni /
yatrotpannā 'prahīṇāste tasmin vastuni saṃyutaḥ /
atītāḥ pratyutpannāśca rāgapratighamānā yasmin vastunyutpannā na ca prahīṇāstasmin vastuni taiḥ saṃyuktaḥ 		gang la de skyes ma spangs pa'i /
dngos po da dang ldan pa yin /
dngos po gang la 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal rnams skyes la ma spangs pa de dag gi dngos po de dang ldan te /
ete hi svalakṣaṇakleśatvānna sarvasyāvaśyaṃ sarvatrotpadyante de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid pa'i nyon mongs pa yin pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar thams cad la thams cad du 'byung ba ma yin no /
sarvatrānāgatairebhirmānasaiḥ nyid kyis de dag ma 'ongs pas /
yatrāprahīṇāste iti varttate /
anāgatairebhireva rāgapratighamānairmanobhūmikaiḥ sarvatra vastuni saṃyutastraiyadhvike 		kun dang gang la ma spangs pa de dag ces bya bar sbyar te /
yid kyi sa pa'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal ma 'ongs pa de dag nyid kyis dus gsum pa'i dngos po thams cad dang ldan te /
mānasānāṃ tryadhvaviṣayatvāt yid dag gi yul ni dus gsum pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
svādhvike paraiḥ gzhan gyis rang dus pa /
anyai rāgapratighairanāgatairanāgata eva vastuni saṃyuktaḥ 'dod chags dang khong khro ba gzhan dag gis ni ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po kho na dang ldan no /
ke punaranye /
ye pañca vijñānakāyikā rāgāśca pratighāśca 		gzhan yang gang dag yin zhe na /
gang gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba ste /
utpattidharmabhireva /
taireva tu 		skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi ni de lta bu yin no /
de dag nyid /
ajaiḥ sarvatra /
anutpattidharmabhiḥ pañcavijñānakāyikairapi sarvatra vastuni saṃyuktaḥ /
traiyadhvike 'pi 		mi skye rnams kyis thams cad dang /
mi skye ba'i chos can rnams kyis rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag gis kyang dus gsum pa'i dngos po thams cad dang ldan no /
śeṣaistu sarvaiḥ sarvatra saṃyutaḥ /
ke punaḥ śeṣāḥ /
dṛṣṭivicikitsā 'vidyāstraiyadhvikāḥ 		lhag ma kun gyi kun dang ldan /
lhag ma yang gang dag cig yin zhe na /
lta ba dang the tshom dang ma rig pa rnams te /
taiḥ sarvairapi sarvasminvastuni saṃyuktaḥ /
sāmānyakleśatvāt 		nyon mongs pa spyi dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir dus gsum pa'i dngos po med pa'i dngos po thams cad ldan no /
yāvadaprahīṇā ityadhikāro 'nuvarttata eva /
kiṃ punaridamatītānāgatamucyate 'styatha na /
yadyasti sarvakālāstitvātsaṃskārāṇāṃ śāśvatatvaṃ prāpnoti 		ji srid du ma spangs pa zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa kho na yin no /
ci 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po rdzas su yod dam /
'on te med /
gal te yod na ni dus thams cad du yod pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
atha nāsti /
kathaṃ tatra tena vā saṃyukto bhavati visaṃyukto vā /
na saṃskārāṇāṃ śāśvatatvaṃ pratijñāyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogāt /
pratijñāyate tu viśadaṃ /
sarvakālāstitā 		'on te med na ni ji ltar na de dang ngam /
des ldan pa'am bral ba yin zhe na /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir 'dus byas rnams rtag pa nyid du dam mi 'cha'o /
dus rnams kun du yod par ni gsal bar dam 'cha'o /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
uktatvāt /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā 'tītaṃ ced bhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo 'bhaviṣyat /
yasmāttarhyastyatītaṃ rūpaṃ tasmācchrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo bhavati 		gsungs phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gal te 'das pa'i gzugs shig yod par ma gyur na 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'das pa'i gzugs la mi lta bar yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
gang gi phyir 'das pa'i gzugs yod pa de'i phyir 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'das pa'i gzugs la mi lta ba yin no /
anāgataṃ cedrūpaṃ nābhaviṣyat na śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'nāgataṃ rūpaṃ nābhyanandiṣyat /
yasmāttarhyastyanāgataṃ rūpamiti vistaraḥ 		gal te ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs shig yod par ma gyur na 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs la mngon par dga' ba med par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
gang gi phyir ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs yod pa zhes rgyas par gsungs so /
dvayāt /
dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpāda ityuktam /
dvayaṃ katamat /
cakṣū rūpāṇi yāvat mano dharmā iti /
asati vā 'tītānāgate tadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya na syāt 		gnyis phyir /
rnam par shes pa ni gnyis la brten nas skye'o zhes gsungs pa /
gnyis gang zhe na /
mig dang gzugs rnams nas yid dang chos rnams kyi bar yin te /
'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag med na de la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa gnyis la brten par mi 'gyur ro /
evaṃ tāvadāgamato 'styatītānāgataṃ yuktito 'pi re zhig lung las 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yod pa ni de lta bu yin no /
rigs pas kyang /
sadviṣayāt yul yod phyir /
sati viṣaye vijñānaṃ pravartate nāsati /
yadi cātītānāgataṃ na syādasadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ syāt /
tato vijñānameva na syādālambanābhāvāt 		yul yod na rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur gyi med par ni ma yin no /
gal te 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa med na ni dmigs pa med pa'i rnam par 'gyur te /
de bas na dmigs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur ro /
phalāt /
yadi cātītaṃ na syāt śubhāśubhasya karmaṇaḥ phalamāyatyāṃ kathaṃ syāt /
na hi phalotpattikāle varttamāno vipākaheturastīti 		'bras phyir /
gal te 'das pa zhag med na tshe phyi ma la las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bur yang ji ltar 'gyur te /
'bras bu bskyed pa'i tshe ni da ltar gyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni med do; /
tasmādastyevātītānāgatamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
avaśyaṃ ca kilaitatsarvāstivādena satā 'bhyupagantavyam 		de lta bas na bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro /
thams cad yod par smra ba yin phan chad gdon mi za bar 'di khas blang bar bya dgos so zhes grags te /
yasmāt 'di ltar /
tadastivādāt sarvāstivādā iṣṭāḥ de yod smra ba'i phyir thams cad /
yod par smra bar 'dod /
ye he sarvamastīti vadanti atītamanāmataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca te sarvāstivādāḥ gang dag 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad yod par smra ba de dag gi thams cad yod par smra ba yin gyi /
ye tu kecidasti yat pratyutpannamadattaphalaṃ cātītaṃ karma kiñcinnāsti yaddattaphalamatītamanāgataṃ ceti vibhajya vadanti te vibhajyavādinaḥ gang dag da ltar byung ba dang 'bras bu ma bskyed pa'i las 'das pa gang yin pa cung zad cig ni yod /
ma 'ongs pa dang 'bras bu bskyed zin pa'i 'das pa gang yin pa cung zad cig ni med do zhes rnam par phye ste smra ba de dag ni rnam par phye ste smra ba dag yin no /
kati caite sarvāstivādā ityāha thams cad yod par smra ba de dag kyang du zhig ce na /
caturvidhāḥ smras pa /
de dag /
te bhāvalakṣaṇāvasthā 'nyathā 'nyathikasaṃjñitāḥ rnam bzhi dngos dang mtshan nyid dang /
gnas skabs gzhan gzhan 'gyur zhes bya /
bhāvānyathiko bhadantadharmatrātaḥ dngos po gzhan du 'gyur ba pa ni /
sa kilāha /
dharmasyādhvasu pravartamānasya bhāvānyathātvaṃ bhavati na dravyānyathātvam 		btsun pa chos skyob yin te /
de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na dngos po gzhan du 'gyur gyi rdzas gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvā 'nyathā kriyamāṇasya saṃsthānānyathātvaṃ bhavati na varṇānyathātvam /
yathā ca kṣīraṃ dadhitvena pariṇamadrasavīryavipākān parityajati na varṇam 		dper na gser gyi snod bcom nas gzhan du byed pa na /
dbyibs gzhan du 'gyur gyi kha dog gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin pa dang yang dper na 'o ma zho nyid du 'gyur ba na ro dang mthu dang smin par byed pa dag /
evaṃ dharmo 'pyanāgatādadhvanaḥ pratyutpannamadhvānamāgacchannanāgatabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvam yongs su 'dor gyi kha dog ni ma yin pa de bzhin du chos kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus nas da ltar byung ba'i dus su 'ongs pa na ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po 'dor gyi rdzas kyi dngos po ni ma yin no /
evaṃ pratyutpannādatītamadhvānaṃ gacchan pratyutpannabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvamiti de bzhin du da ltar byung ba nas 'das pa'i dus su 'gro ba na da ltar byung ba'i dngos po 'dor gyi /
rdzas kyi dngos po ni ma yin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
lakṣāṇānyathiko bhadantaghoṣakaḥ /
sa kilāha 		mtshan nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba pa ni btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs yin te /
dharmo 'dhvasu pravarttamāno 'tīto 'tītalakṣaṇayukto 'nāgatapratyutpannābhyāṃ lakṣaṇābhyāmaviyuktaḥ de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na 'das pa na 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan la ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i mtshan nyid dag ni mi ldan pa ma yin no /
anāgato 'nāgatalakṣaṇayukto 'tītapratyutpannābhyāmaviyuktaḥ ma 'ongs pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la 'das pa da ltar byung ba dag ni mi ldan pa ma yin no /
evaṃ pratyutpanno 'pyatītānāgatābhyāmaviyuktaḥ de bzhin du da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang mi ldan pa ma yin te /
tadyathā puruṣa ekasyāṃ striyāṃ raktaḥ śeṣāsvavirakta iti dper na skyes bu bud med dag cig la chags pa lhag ma rnams la 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa bzhin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
avasthā 'nyathiko bhadantavasumitraḥ /
sa kilāha /
dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamāno 'vasthāmavasthāṃ prāpyānyo 'nyo nidiśyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ 		gnas skabs gzhan du 'gyur ba pa ni btsun pa dbyig bshes yin te /
de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na gnas skabs dang gnas skabs su phyin nas gnas skabs gzhan gyi sgo nas gzhan dang gzhan zhes ston gyi rdzas gzhan gyi sgo nas ni ma yin te /
dper na ri lu gcig gcig gi shad mig tu gzhag na gcig ces bya /
yathaikā vartikā ekāṅke nikṣiptā ekamityucyate śatāṅke śataṃ sahasrāṅke sahasramiti brgya'i shod mig tu gzhag na brgya /
stong gi shod mig tu gzhag na stong zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
anyathānyathiko bhadantabuddhadevaḥ /
sa kilāha /
dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamānaḥ pūrvāparamapekṣyānyo 'nya ucyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ /
yathaikā strī mātā vocyate duhitā veti 		gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur ba ni btsun pa sangs rgyas lha yin te /
de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na snga ma dang phyi ma la ltos nas gzhan dang gzhan zhes brjod de /
dper na bud med gcig la ma zhes kyang bya; bu mo zhes kyang bya ba bzhin no zhes zer ro zhes grag ste /
ityete catvāraḥ sarvāstivādāḥ /
eṣāṃ tu prathamaḥ pariṇāmavāditvāt sāṃkhyapakṣe nikṣeptavyaḥ 		de ltar na bzhi po de dag ni thams cad yod par smra ba dag yin no /
de dag las dang po ni yongs su 'gyur bar smra ba'i phyir grangs can gyi phyogs la bslan par bya'o /
dvitīyasyādhvasaṃkaraḥ prāpnoti /
sarvasya sarvakṣaṇayogāt /
puruṣasya tu kasyāñcit striyāṃ rāgaḥ samudācarati kasyāñcit kevalaṃ samanvāgama iti kimatra sāmyam /
caturthasyāpyekasminnevādhvani trayo 'dhvānaḥ prāpnuvanti 		gnyis pa'i yang thams cad la mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir dus 'chol bar 'gyur te /
skyes bu zhig bud med la la la ni 'dod chags kun du 'byung la /
la la la ni ldan pa 'ba' zhig go zhes bya ba 'dir ci zhig mtshungs /
bzhi pa'i yang dus gcig la dus gsum char du 'gyur te /
atīte 'dhvani pūrvapaścimau kṣaṇāvatītānāgatau madhyamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pratyutpanna iti 'das pa'i dus la snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma dag ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yin la /
evamanāgate 'pi /
ata eṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ /
tṛtīyaḥ śobhanaḥ 		dbus kyi skad cig ma ni da ltar byung bar 'gyur ro /
de lta bas na de dag thams cad kyi nang na /
gsum pa bzang ste /
yo 'yamavasthā 'nyathikaḥ gnas skabs gzhan du 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o /
tasya kila de yis ni /
adhvānaḥ kāritreṇa vyavasthitāḥ /
yadā sa dharmaḥ kāritraṃ na karoti tadā 'nāgataḥ 		bya ba yis /
dus rnams rnam gzhag gang gi tshe chos de bya ba mi byed pa de'i tshe ma 'ongs pa yin la /
yadā karoti tadā pratyutpannaḥ /
yadā kṛtvā niruddhastadā 'tīta iti /
parigatametatsarvam 		gang gi tshe byed pa de'i tshe ni da ltar byung ba yin /
gang gi tshe byas nas 'gags pa de'i tshe ni 'das pa yin no zhes grag go /
idaṃ tu vaktavyam /
yadyatītamapi dravyato 'styanāgatamiti /
kasmāttadatītamityucyate 'nāgatamiti vā 		de dag thams cad ni yongs su go na gal te 'das pa yang rdzas su yod la ma 'ongs pa yang rdzas su yod na /
ci'i phyir 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya dgos so /
nanu coktamadhvānaḥ kāritreṇa vyavasthitā iti /
yadyevaṃ pratyutpannasya tatsabhāgasya cakṣuṣaḥ kiṃ kāritram 		bya ba yis /
dus rnams rnam gzhag ces bshad pa ma yin nam /
gal te khyim de lta na da ltar byung ba'i mig de dang 'dra ba'i bya ba gang zhig yin /
phaladānapratigrahaṇam 'bras bu 'byin pa dang 'dzin pa yin no /
atītānāmapi tarhi sabhāgahetvādīnāṃ phaladānāt kāritraprasaṅgo 'rdhakāritrasya veti lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ /
idaṃ ca vaktavyam 		'o na ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu la sogs pa 'das pa rnams kyang 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir bya ba'am bya ba byed du thal bar 'gyur bas mtshan nyid 'chol bar 'gyur ro /
'di yang brjod par bya dgos te /
tenaivātmanā sato dharmasya nityaṃ kāritrakaraṇe /
kiṃ vighnaṃ /
yena kadācit kāritraṃ karoti kadācinneti 		gal te chos de'i bdag nyid kho nar yod na rtag tu bya ba byed pa la /
bgegs su byed /
gang gis na res 'ga' ni bya ba byed la res 'ga' ni ma yin zhes bya /
pratyayānāmasāmagrayamiti cet gal te rkyen rnams ma tshogs pa yin no zhe na /
na /
nityamāstitvābhyupagamāt /
yacca tat kāritramatītānāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ cocyate /
tatkathaṃ /
kiṃ kāritrasyāpyanyadasti kāritram /
atha tannaivātītaṃ nāpyanāgataṃ na pratyutpannamasti ca 		mi rung ste /
rtag tu yod pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /
bya ba 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa /
de yang ji ltar /
bya ba la yang bya ba gzhan zhig yod dam ci /
'on te de 'das pa yang ma yin /
ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin da ltar byung ba yang ma yin la /
tenāsaṃskṛtatvānnityamastīti prāptam /
ato na vaktavyaṃ yadā karitraṃ na karoti dharmastadā 'nāgata iti 		yod pa yang yin na ni des na 'dus ma byas yin pas rtag tu yod do zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
de'i phyir gang gi tshe chos bya ba mi byed pa de'i tshe ma 'ongs pa yin no zhes brjod par mi bya'o /
syādeṣa doṣo yadi dharmāt kāritramanyatsyāt /
tattu khalu 		gal te chos las bya ba gzhan zhig yin na ni skyon der yang 'gyur ba zhig na de ni gzhan ma yin te /
nānyat /
ato na bhavatyeṣa doṣaḥ 		de'i phyir skyon der mi 'gyur ro /
evaṃ tahi sa eva /
adhvāyogaḥ /
yadi dharma eva kāritraṃ kasmātsa eva dharmastenaivātmanā vidyamānaḥ kadācidatīta ityucyate kadācidanāgata ityadhvanāṃ vyavasthā na sidhyati 		de lta na ni 'o na de nyid dus su mi rung ste /
gal te chos kho na bya ba yin na chos de de'i bdag nyid kho nar yod bzhin du ci'i phyir res 'ga' ni 'das pa zhes bya /
res 'ga' ni ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ste /
kimatra na sidhyati /
yo hyajāto dharmaḥ so 'nāgataḥ 		dus rnam par gzhag pa mi 'grub bo /
chos gang ma skyes pa de ni ma 'ongs pa yin no /
yo jāto bhavati na ca vinaṣṭaḥ sa varttamānaḥ gang skyes la ma zhig pa de ni da ltar byung ba yin no /
yo vinaṣṭaḥ so 'tītaḥ iti /
etadevātra vaktavyam /
yadi yathā varttamānaṃ dravyato 'sti tathā 'tītamanāgataṃ cāsti /
tasya /
tathā sataḥ 		gang zhig pa de ni 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la mi 'grub pa ci zhig yod /
'dir de nyid brjod par bya dgos te /
gal te ji ltar da ltar gyi rdzas su yod pa de bzhin du /
'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la yang yod na ni /
de bzhin du /
ajātanaṣṭatā kena yod na ci'i phyir ma skyes shig /
tenaiva svabhāvena sato dharmasya kathamidaṃ sidhyatyajāta iti yo vinaṣṭaḥ iti veti chos de'i rang gi ngo bo kho nar yod na ni ji ltar na ma skyes pa zhes bya ba'am /
zhig pa zhes bya ba 'di 'grub par 'gyur /
kimasya pūrvaṃ nāsīdyasyābhāvādajāta ityucyate /
kiṃ ca paścānnāsti yasyābhāvā dvinaṣṭa ityucyate /
tasmānna sidhyati sarvathā 'pyatrādhvatrayam /
yadyabhutvā bhavatīti neṣyate bhūtvā ca punarna bhavatīti 		gang zhig med pas ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni sngon ci zhig ma byung bar 'gyur /
gang zhig med pas zhig pa zhes bya ba yang phyis ci zhig med de /
de lta bas na gal te ma byung ba las byung ba dang byung nas kyang yang mi 'byung bar mi 'dod phan chad dus gsum rnam pa thams cad du mi 'grub bo /
yadapyuktaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogānna śāśvatatvaprasaṅga iti /
tadidaṃ kevalaṃ vāṅmātramutpādavināśayorayogāt 		gang yang 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa de yang skye ba dang 'jig pa dag mi rung ba'i phyir tshig tsam ste /
nityaṃ ca nāmāsti sa dharmo na ca nitya ityapūrvaiṣā vāco yuktiḥ /
āha khalvapi /
svabhāvaḥ sarvadā cāsti bhāvo nityaśca neṣyate /
na ca svabhāvād bhāvo 'nyo vyaktamīśvaraceṣṭitam /
yattūktamuktatvāditi /
vayamapi brūmo 'styatītānāgatamiti /
atītaṃ tu yad bhūtapūrvam /
anāgataṃ yatsati hetau bhaviṣyati /
evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'stītyucyate na tu punardravyataḥ 		chos de rtag pa yang yod la mi rtag pa yang yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lugs 'di ni sngon ma byung ba yin no /
yang smras pa /
rang bzhin yang ni rtag tu yod /
dngos po yang ni rtag mi 'dod /
rang bzhin las kyang dngos mi gzhan /
dbang phyug tha snyad yin par gsal /
gang yang gsungs phyir zhes smras pa /
kho bo cag kyang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yod do zhes smras te /
sngon byung ba gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yin la /
rkyen yod na 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni ma 'ongs pa yin no zhes de ltar byas nas yod de zhes bya'i /
kaścaivamāha /
vartamānavattadastīti /
kathamanyathā 'sti 		rdzas su ni ma yin no /
da ltar bzhin du yod do zhes de skad du zer /
gzhan du na ji ltar yod /
atītā nāgatātmanā /
idaṃ punastavopasthitam /
kathaṃ tadatītamanāgataṃ cocyate yadi nityamastīti /
tasmāt bhūtapūrvasya ca hetorbhāvinaśca phalasya bhūtapūratāṃ bhāvitāṃ ca jñāpayituṃ hetuphalāpavādadṛṣṭipratiṣedhārthamuktaṃ bhagavatā astyatītamastyanāgatamiti 		'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i bdag nyid du yod mod /
gal te rtag tu yod na de ji ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba de nyid nye bar gnas so /
de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs pa'i lta ba dgag pa'i phyir sngon byung ba'i rgyu dang phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu sngon byung ba nyid dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du shes par bya bar 'das pa yod do /
ma 'ongs pa yod do zhes gsungs par zad do /
astiśabdasya nipātatvāt /
yathā 'sti dīpasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva iti vaktāro bhavanti yathā cāsti niruddhaḥ sa dīpo na tu mayā nirodhita iti /
evamatītānāgatamapyastītyuktam /
anyathā hyatītānāgatabhāva eva na sidhyet 		yod ces bya ba'i sgra ni tshig gi sgra yin pa'i phyir te /
dper na smra ba po mar me snga ma med pa yod do /
phyis med pa yod do zhes smras pa dang yang dper na mar me de shi ba ni yod mod kyi kho bos ni ma bsad do zhes 'dzer ba de bzhin du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yang yod do zhes gsungs kyi /
de lta ma yin na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa mi 'grub pa kho nar 'gyur ro /
yattarhi laguḍaśikhīyakānparivrājakānadhikṛṭyoktaṃ bhagavatā yatkarmābhyatītaṃ kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ tadastīti /
kiṃ te tasya tasya karmaṇo bhūtapūrvatvaṃ necchanti sma 		'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du rgyu dbyug thogs thor tshugs can rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
las 'das pa dang zad pa dang 'gog pa dang; bral ba dang rnam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yod do zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu /
ci de dag las de sngon byung ba nyid du mi 'dod par gyur tam /
tatra punastadāhitaṃ tasyāṃ saṃtatau phaladānasāmarthyaṃ saṃdhāyoktam de las ni rgyud de las des kun du drangs par 'bras bu bskyed pa'i mthu yod pa las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no /
anyathā hi svena bhāvena vidyamānamatītaṃ na sidhyet /
itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yat paramārthaśūnyatayāmuktaṃ bhagavatā cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacitsaṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
iti hi bhikṣavaścakṣurabhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca pratigacchatīti /
yadi cānāgataṃ cakṣuḥ syānnoktaṃ syād bhūtvā na bhavatīti 		de lta ma yin te /
rang gi ngo bo kho nar yod na 'das pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro /
de ni gdon mi za bar de lta bu yin par shes par bya ste /
'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mdo las /
mig ni skye ba na yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong la /
'gag pa na yang gang du yang sogs par mi 'gyur ro /
de lta bas na dge slong dag mig ni ma byung ba las 'byung zhing byung nas kyang slar 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te /
gal te ma 'ongs pa'i mig cig yod par gyur na ma byung ba las 'byung ngo zhes gsungs par mi 'gyur ro /
varttamāne 'dhvanyabhūtvā bhavatīti cet na gal te da ltar gyi dus su ma byung ba las 'byung ngo zhe na mi rung ste /
adhvano bhāvādanarthāntaratvāt dus ni dngos po las don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
atha svātmanyabhūtvā bhavati /
siddhamidamanāgataṃ cakṣurnāstīti /
yadapyuktaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādāditi idaṃ tāvadiha saṃpradhāryam /
yanmanaḥ pratītya dharmaścotpadyate manovijñānaṃ kiṃ tasya yathā manojanakaḥ pratyaya evaṃ dharmā āhosvidālambanamātraṃ dharmā iti 		'on te rang gi mtshan nyid du ma byung ba las 'byung ngo zhe na ni ma 'ongs pa'i mig med do zhes bya ba 'di grub pa yin no /
gang yang rnam par shes pa ni gnyis la brten nas skye ba'i phyir ro zhes smras pa ni re zhig 'dir yid dang chos rnams la brten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba gang yin pa de ji ltar yid skyes par byed pa'i rkyen yin pa de ltar chos rnams kyang de dang 'dra 'am /
'on te chos rnams dmigs pa tsam zhig yin zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya ste /
yadi tāvat janakaḥ pratyayo dharmāḥ kathaṃ yadanāgataṃ kalpasahasreṇa bhaviṣyati vā na vā tadidānīṃ vijñānaṃ janayiṣyati /
nirvāṇaṃ ca sarvapravṛttinirodhājjanakaṃ nopapadyate /
athālambanamātraṃ dharmā bhavanti /
atītānāgatamapyālambanaṃ bhavatīti brūmaḥ /
yadi nāsti kathamālambanam 		re zhig gal te chos rnams skyed par byed pa'i rkyen yin no zhe na ni ji ltar na ma 'ongs pa bskal pa stong na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am /
yang na mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de da ltar gyi rnam par shes pa bskyed par 'gyur /
mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'jug pa thams cad dang 'gal ba'i phyir skyed par byed pa yin par mi 'thad do /
'on te chos rnams dmigs pa tsam zhig yin no zhe na ni 'das pa dang ma 'das pa yang dmigs pa yin no zhes smra'o /
gal te med pa ji ltar dmigs pa yin na zhe /
atredānīṃ brūmaḥ /
yadā tadālambanaṃ tathāsti kathaṃ tadālambanam abhūt bhaviṣyati ceti /
na hi kaścidatītaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāṃ vā smarannastīti paśyati 		da ni 'dir de ji ltar na dmigs pa yin pa de ltar yod do zhes smra'o /
de'i ji ltar na dmigs pa yin zhe na /
byung bar gyur pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste /
'das pa'i gzugs sam /
tshor ba dran pa na yod do zhes bya bar ni su yang mi lta'o /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
abhūditi /
yathā khalvapi varttamānaṃ rūpamanubhūtaṃ tathā tadatītaṃ smaryate 		byung bar gyur to zhes bya bar lta'o /
yang ji ltar da ltar gyi gzugs nyams su myong ba de ltar 'das pa yang dran no /
yathā cānāgataṃ varttamānaṃ bhaviṣyati tathā buddhyā gṛhyate /
yadi ca tattathaivāsti vartamānaṃ prāpnoti 		ma 'ongs pa ji ltar da ltar du 'gyur ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen to /
gal te yang de de bzhin du yod do zhe na ni da ltar du 'gyur ro /
atha nāsti /
asadapyālambanaṃ bhavatīti siddham 		'on te med do zhe na ni med pa yang dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no /
tadeva tadvikīrṇamiti cet /
na 		gal te de nyid sil bu yin no zhe na ma yin te /
vikīrṇasyāgrahaṇāt /
yadi ca tattadeva rūpaṃ kevalaṃ paramāṇuśo vibhaktam 		sil bu la mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
gal te yang de ni gzugs de kho na yin te /
evaṃ sati paramāṇavo nityāḥ prāpnuvanti /
paramāṇusaṃcaryāvabhāgamātraṃ caivaṃ sati prāpnoti /
na tu kiñcidutpadyate nāpi nirudhyata ityājīvikavāda ālambito bhavati /
sūtraṃ cāpaviddhaṃ bhavati cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatīti vistaraḥ 		rdul phra rab tu gyes pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhe na /
de lta na ni rdul phra rab rnams rtag par 'gyur te; de lta na rdul phra rab bsags pa dang gyes pa tsam du 'gyur gyi cung zad kyang skye ba yang med la 'gag pa yang med pas 'tsho byed kyi rtsod pa blangs pa yin no /
mig ni nam skye ba na yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong zhes rgyas par gsungs pa'i mdo yang bor bar 'gyur ro /
aparamāṇusaṃcitānāṃ vedanādīnāṃ kathaṃ vikīrṇatvam /
te 'pi ca yathotpannānubhūtāḥ smaryante /
yadi ca te tathaiva santi nityāḥ prāpnuvanti 		tshor ba la sogs pa rdul phra rab bsags pa ma yin pa rnams kyang ji ltar na sil bu nyid yin /
de dag kyang ji ltar byung zhing nyams su myong ba dran te /
gal te yang de dag de bzhin du yod do zhe na ni rtag par 'gyur ro /
atha na santi 'on te med do zhe na ni /
asadapyālambanamiti siddham /
yadyasadapyālambanaṃ syāt trayodaśamapyāyatanaṃ syāt /
atha trayodaśamāyatanaṃ nāstītyasya vijñānasya kimālambanam /
etadeva nāmalambanam /
evaṃ tarhi nāma eva nāstīti pratīyeta /
yaśca śabdasya prāgabhāvamālambate kiṃ tasyālambanam /
śabda eva /
evaṃ tarhi yaḥ śabdābhāvaṃ prārthayate tasya śabda eva kartavyaḥ syāt 		med pa yang dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no /
gal te med pa yang dmigs pa yin na skye mched bcu gsum pa yang dmigs pa yin par 'gyur ro /
'o na skye mched bcu gsum pa med do snyam pa'i rnam par shes pa 'di'i dmigs pa ci zhig yin /
ming de nyid dmigs pa yin no /
de lta ni 'o na ming de nyid med do zhes bya bar rtogs par 'gyur ro /
gang zhig sgra'i snga na med pa la dmigs pa de'i dmigs pa yang ci zhig yin /
sgra kho na yin no /
de lta na ni 'o na gang zhig sgra med pa don du gnyer ba de la sgra dbyung dgos pa kho nar 'gyur ro /
anāgatāvasya iti cet /
sati kathaṃ nāstibuddhiḥ 		gal te ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs yin no zhe na ni yod na ji ltar na med pa'i blor 'gyur /
vartamāno nāstīti cet /
na /
ekatvāt 		gal te da ltar med pa yin no zhe na ni ma yin te /
gcig pa'i phyir ro /
yāvatā tasya viśeṣastasyābhūtvābhāvasiddhiḥ /
tasmādubhayaṃ vijñānasyālambanam bhāvaścābhāvaśca /
yattarhi bodhisattvenoktam yattat loke nāstitadahaṃ jñāsyāmi vā drakṣyāmi vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti 		yang na de'i bye brag gang yin pa de ma byung ba las 'byung bar 'grub ste /
de lta bas na rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni yod pa dang med pa de gnyi ga yin no /
'o na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten na med pa gang yin pa de dag gis shes pa'am mthong ba 'di ni gnas med do zhes gang smras pa de ji lta bu /
apare ābhimānikā bhavantyasantamapyavabhāsaṃ santaṃ paśyanti /
ahaṃ tu santamevārstīti paśyāmītyayaṃ tatrābhiprāyaḥ 		'dir bsam pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gzhan dag snang ba med bzhin du yod par lta'i bdag ni yod pa kho na la yod do zhes bya bar lta'o zhes bya ba 'di yin no /
de lta ma yin te /
itarathā hi sarvabuddhīnāṃ sadālambanatve kuto 'sya vimarśaḥ syāt ko vā viśeṣaḥ blo thams cad kyi dmigs pa yod pa nyid yin na 'di rtog par yang ga la 'gyur /
yang na khyad par yang ci zhig yod /
itthaṃ caitadevam /
yadanyatra bhagavatoktam etat bhikṣurmama śrāvako yāvatsa mayā kalpamavoditaḥ sāyaṃ viśeṣāya paraiṣyati 		de ni gdon mi za bar de lta bu yin par shes par bya ste /
'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan du nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba nas de ngas nang gtams na nub khyad par du 'gro /
sāyamavoditaḥ kalpaṃ viśeṣāya paraiṣyati /
sacca sato jñāsyati asaccāsataḥ sottarañca sottarataḥ anuttaraṃ cānurattarata iti 		nub gtams na nang khyad par du 'gro ste /
yod pa la yod par shes la /
med pa la yang med par shes so /
bla na yod pa la yang bla na yod par shes la /
bla na med pa la yang bla na med par shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te /
tasmādayamapyahetuḥ /
sadālambanatvādvijñānasyeti /
yadaṣyuktaṃ phalāditi /
naiva hi sautrāntikā atītāt karmaṇaḥ phalotpatti varṇayanti 		de lta bas na rnam par shes pa ni yod pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de yang gtan tshigs su mi rung ngo /
gang yang 'bras phyir zhes smras pa /
mdo sde pa rnams ni las dang 'das pa las 'bras bu 'byung bar mi brjod pa kho na'o /
kiṃ tarhi /
tatpūrvakātsaṃtānaviśeṣādityātmavādapratiṣedhe saṃpravedayiṣyāmaḥ /
yasya tvatītānāgataṃ dravyato 'sti tasya phalaṃ nityamevāstīti kiṃ tatra karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyam 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
de sngon du 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi khyad par las te /
bdag tu smra ba dgag pa nas bshad par bya'o /
gang gi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rdzas su yod pa de'i 'bras bu rtag tu yod pa kho na bas de la las kyi nus pa ci zhig yod /
utpādane sāmarthyam bskyed par nus so /
utpādastarhyabhūtvā bhavatīti siddham 'o na ni skye ba ma byung ba las dang 'byung ba zhes bya bar grub pa yin no /
atha sarvameva cāsti /
kasyedānīṃ kva sāmarthyam 		yang thams cad yod pa kho na yin na da ni gang la gang zhig 'dus te /
vārṣagaṇyavādaścaivaṃ dyotito bhavati /
yadastyastyeva tat /
yannāsti nāstyeva tat 		de lta na lo rtsis pa rnams kyi rtsod pa skad du gang yod pa di ni yod pa kho na'o /
gang med pa de ni med pa kho na'o /
med pa la ni skye ba yang med do /
asato nāsti saṃbhavaḥ /
sato nāsti vināśa iti 		yod pa la ni 'jig pa yang med do zhes brjod pa yin no /
vartamānīkaraṇe tarhi sāmarthyam /
kimidaṃ varttamānīkaraṇaṃ nāma 		'o na da ltar du byed pa nus pa yin no /
da ltar du byed pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin /
deśāntarākarṣaṇam cet /
nityaṃ prasaktam 		gal te yul gzhan du 'dren pa yin no zhe na ni rtag par thal bar 'gyur ro /
arūpiṇāṃ ca kathaṃ tat gzugs can ma yin pa rnams la yang de ji lta bu /
yacca tadākarṣaṇaṃ tadabhūtvā bhūtam de 'dren pa gang yin pa de yang ma byung ba las byung ba yin no /
svabhāvaviśeṣaṇaṃ cet siddhamabhūtvā bhavanam gal te rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par zhig yin no zhe na ni ma byung ba las 'byung ba grub pa yin no /
tasmānnaivaṃ sarvāstivādaḥ śāsane sādhurbhavati /
yadatītānāgataṃ dravyato 'stīti vadati /
evaṃ tu sādhurbhavati /
yathā sūtre sarvamastītyuktaṃ tathā vadati /
kathaṃ ca sūtre sarvamastītyuktam 		de lta bas na 'di skad du /
gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i rdzas su yod par smra ba'i thams cad yod par smra ba ni bstan pa la legs pa ma yin gyi /
ji skad du mdo las thams cad yod do zhes gsungs pa de bzhin du smra ba de dag ni legs pa yin no /
mdo las ji lta bu thams cad yod ces gsungs she na /
sarvamastīti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva dvādaśāyatanānīti thams cad yod ces bya ba ni bram ze skye mched bcu gnyis kho na'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes gsungs so /
adhvatrayaṃ vā /
yathā tu tadasti tathoktaṃ athāsatyatītātānāgate kathaṃ tena tasminvā saṃyukto bhavati /
tajjataddhetvanuśayabhāvāt kleśena tadālambane kleśānuśayabhāvādvastuni saṃyukto bhavati 		yang na dus gsum ste /
de ji ltar yod pa de bzhin du ni bshad zin to /
yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang med na ji ltar na des sam /
der ldan pa yin zhe na /
de las skyes pa /
de'i rgyu'i phra rgyas yod pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa des ldan la /
de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i phra rgyas yod pas dngos po dang ldan pa yin no /
astyeva tvatītānāgatamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
yatra netum śakyate tatrātmakātmanaivaṃ veditavyam /
gambhīrā khaludharmatā 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni yod pa kho na yin no /
gang zhig drang bar mi nus pa de la ni 'di ltar /
chos nyid dag ni zab pa yin /
nāvaśyaṃ tarhyasādhyā bhavatīti /
asti paryāyo yadutpadyate tannirudhyate 		de gdon mi za bar rtogs pas sgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes zer ro /
gang skyes pa de 'gag pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod de /
rūpamutpadyate rūpaṃ nirudhyate /
asti paryāyo 'nyadutpadyate 'nyannirudhyate /
anāgatamutpadyate varttamānaṃ nirudhyate /
adhvā 'pyutpadyate /
utpadyamānasyādhvasaṃgṛhītatvāt /
adhvano 'pyutpadyate /
anekakṣaṇikatvādanāgatasyādhvanaḥ 		gzugs skye la gzugs 'gag go /
gzhan skye la gzhan 'gag pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod de /
ma 'ongs pa skye la da ltar 'gag go; /
dus kyang skye ste /
skye ba dus kyis bsdus pa'i phyir ro /
dus las kyang skye ste /
ma 'ongs pa'i dus skad cig ma du ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
gatametat yatprasaṅgenāgatam zhar la 'ongs pa 'di rdzogs so /
idānīmidaṃ vicāryate /
yadvastu prahīṇaṃ visaṃyuktaḥ sa tasminvastuni 		da ni dngos po gang zhig spangs na de dngos po de dang bral ba yin nam /
yatra vā visaṃ yuktaḥ prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastviti /
yatra tāvadvisaṃyuktaḥ prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastu /
syātu prahīṇaṃ na ca tatra visaṃyuktastadyathā 		gang dang bral na des dngos po de spangs pa yin zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya ste /
re zhig gang dang bral na des dngos po de spangs pa yin no /
spangs la de dang ma bral ba yang yod de /
'di lta ste /
prahīṇe duḥkhadṛggheye saṃyuktaḥ śeṣasarvagaiḥ sdug bsngal mthong spang bya spangs kyang /
kun 'gro lhag ma rnams kyis ldan /
prāk prahīṇe prakāre ca śeṣaistadviṣayairmalaiḥ dang po'i rnam pa spangs kyang de'i; /
yul can dri ma lhag rnams kyis /
duḥkhajñāne samutpanne samudayajñāne 'nutpanne duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyaḥ prahīṇo bhavati sdug bsngal shes pa ni skyes la /
kun 'byung shes pa ni ma skyes pa'i tshe sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i ris spangs pa yin no /
tasmin prahīṇe tadālambanaiḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaiḥ sarvatragaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ /
bhāvanāprahātavye 'pi nikāye navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yaḥ prakāraḥ prāk prahīṇastasmin prahīṇe 'pi śeṣaistadālambanaiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto veditavyaḥ 		de spangs kyang de la dmigs pa kun du 'gro ba kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyis ldan no /
bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i ris la yang rnam pa dgu las dang po'i rnam pa spangs na de spangs kyang de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa lhag ma rnams kyis lhag par rig par bya'o /
kasminvastuni katyanuśayā anuśerata iti etatpratipadamabhidhīyamānaṃ bahutaraṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate dngos po gang la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di re re nas bshad na ni brjod par bya ba mang por 'gyur te /
tasmāt piṇḍavibhāṣāṃ kurvanti /
kathamalpenālpena yatnena mahato mahataḥ praśnaughān pratipādyemahīti 		de lta bas na ci nas kyang 'bad pa chung du chung dus 'dri ba'i tshogs mang po go bar 'gyur bar bsdus te rnam par 'chad par byed do /
samāsata ime ṣoḍaśa dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyāvacarāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ anāsravāśca mdor bsdu na chos ni bcu drug po 'di lta ste /
'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa lnga lnga dang zag pa med pa'o /
cittānyapi ṣoḍaśa etānyeva /
tatra katamo dharmaḥ kasya cittasyālambanamiti jñātvā amuṣminniyanto 'nuśayā anuśerata ityetadabhyūhitavyam /
tatra tāvat 		sems kyang bcu drug ste /
de dag nyid do /
de la chos gang zhig sems gang gi dmigs pa yin pa shes par byas nas 'di la ni phra rgyas 'di de snyed cig rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni rtag par bya'o /
de la re zhig /
duḥkhahetudṛgabhyāsapraheyāḥ kāmadhātujāḥ sdug bsngal rgyu mthong goms pa yis /
spang bya 'dod khams las skyes pa /
svakatrayaikarūpāptāmalavijñānagocarāḥ rang gi gsum dang gzugs gtogs gcig /
dri med rnam shes spyod yul lo /
svakaṃ ca tattrayaṃ ca svakatrayam /
ekaṃ ca tadrūprāptaṃ ca ekarūpāptam 		de dag ni rang gi yang yin la gsum yang yin pas rang gi gsum mo /
de ni gcig kyang yin la gzugs su gtogs pa yang yin pas gzugs gtogs gcig ste /
eṣā vigrahajātiḥ /
kāmāvacarāstāvad duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca dharmāḥ pañcānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva ūrdhvadhātukasyaikasya bhāvanāheyasyaiva anāsravasya ceti 		de ni tshig rnam par sbyar ba'i rnam pa yin no /
re zhig sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams ni sems lnga'i dmigs pa yin te /
rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
de dag nyid dang; gzugs na spyod pa gcig ste /
bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na dang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin no /
svadādharatrayordhvaikāmalānāṃ rūpadhātujāḥ /
rūpāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā aṣṭānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva 		gzugs khams las skyes rang gi dang /
'og gsum gong gcig dri med kyi /
chos rnam pa gsum po de dag nyid gzugs na spyod pa ni sems brgyad kyi dmigs pa yin te /
rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
adharadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva /
ūrdhvadhātukasyaikasya bhāvanāheyasyaiva 		de dag nyid dang khams 'og ma pa gsum ste /
de dag nyid dang khams gong ma pa gcig ste /
anāsravasya ceti /
ārupyajāstridhātvāptatrayānāsravagocarāḥ 		bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na dang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin no /
gzugs med las skyes khams gsum gtogs; /
ārūpyāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā daśānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
traidhātukānāṃ triprakārāṇāṃ teṣāmeva 		gsum dang zag med spyod yul lo /
chos rnam pa gsum po de dag nyid gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sems bcu'i dmigs pa yin te /
khams gsum pa rnam pa gsum gsum ste /
anāsravasya ceti /
uktāstraidhātukā duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca dharmāḥ 		de dag nyid dang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin no /
sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos khams gsum pa dag bshad zin to /
nirodhamārgadṛggheyāḥ sarve svādhikagocarāḥ /
nirodhamārgadarśanaheyānāṃ svaṃ cittaṃ nirodhamārgadarśanaheyameva 		'gog dang lam mthong spang bya kun /
rang gis glags pa'i spyod yul lo /
'gag pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams kyi rang gi sems ni 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba kho na yin te /
tasyādhikasya te dharmā ālambanaṃ jñeyāḥ chos de dag ni des glags pa'i spyod yul yin par shes par bya ste /
kathaṃ kṛtvā ji ltar byas pas she na /
kāmāvacarā hi nirodhadarśanaheyā dharmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam /
pūrvoktānāṃ pañcānāṃ tasyaiva ca nirodhadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya /
mārgadarśanaheyā apyevam /
pañcānāṃ pūrvoktānāṃ tasyaiva ca mārgadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya /
evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇi /
nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyāstasyaiva nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya cittasyālambanamiti navānāmekādaśānāṃ ca cittānāmālambanaṃ bhavanti /
uktāstraidhātukāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ dharmāḥ 		'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams ni rnam par shes pa drug gi dmigs pa yin te /
sngar bshad pa lnga dang 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba glags pa de nyid kyi dmigs pa yin no /
lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste /
sngar bshad pa lnga dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba glags pa de nyid kyi dmigs pa yin te /
de bzhin du 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyang 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems glags pa de'i dmigs pa yin pas sems dgu dang bcu gcig gi dmigs pa yin no /
khams gsum pa'i chos rnam pa lnga bshad zin to; /
anāsravāstridhātvantyatrayānāsravagocarāḥ /
anāsravā dharmā daśānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
traidhātukānāmantyānāṃ triprakārāṇāṃ nirodhamārgadarśanabhāvanāheyānāmanāsravasyeti /
punarasyaivārthasyādhyardhena ślokena saṃgraho bhavati 		zag med khams gsum mtha' gsum dang /
zag pa med pa'i spyod yul lo /
chos zag pa med pa rnams ni sems bcu'i dmigs pa yin te /
khams gsum pa'i tha ma gsum ste /
