'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin no /
yang don de nyid tshigs su bcad pa phyed pa dang gnyis kyis bsdus pa yin te /
duḥkhahetudṛgabhyāsaheyā dhātutraye 'malāḥ khams gsum sdug bsngal rgyu mthong dang /
bsgom pas spang bya zag pa med /
pañcāṣṭadaśavijñānadaśavijñānagocarāḥ rnam shes lnga brgyad bcu dang ni /
rnam shes bcu yi spyod yul te /
nirodhamārgadṛggheyāḥ sarve svādhikagocarāḥ 'gog dang lam mthong spang bya kun /
rang gis glags pa'i spyod yul lo /
evameṣāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ ṣoḍaśadharmālambanavyavasthāṃ viditvā kathamanuśayakāryāṃ yojayitavyam de ltar sems bcu drug po de dag gi dmigs par chos bcu drug po rnam par gzhag par rig nas /
ji ltar na phra rgyas kyi dgos pa yin pa sbyar bar bya ste /
diṅamātraṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
sukhendriyālambane vijñāne katyanuśayāḥ anuśerata iti praśna āgate vicārayitavyam /
sukhendriyaṃ saptavidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca pañcaprakāramanāsravaṃ ceti 		phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya ste /
bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'ongs pa la dpyad par bya ste /
bde ba'i dbang po ni rnam pa bdun te /
'dod pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang zag pa med pa'o /
tadetatsamāsato dvādaśadharmasya vijñānasyālambanaṃ bhavati de dag kyang mdor bsdu na rnam par shes pa rnam pa gcu gnyis kyi dmigs pa yin te /
kāmāvacarasya catuṣprakārasyānyatra nirodhadarśanaheyāt /
rūpāvacarasya pañcaprakārasyārūpyāvacarasya dviprakārasya mārgadarśanabhāvanāheyasyānāsravasya ca /
idaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ sukhendriyālambanaṃ vijñānam /
tatra yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāśca saṃskṛtālambanā ārūpyāvacarau ca dvau nikāyau sarvatragāścānuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam /
sukhendriyālambanālambane vijñāne katyanuśayā anuśerate /
tat punaḥ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ vijñānaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam /
tasyaiva dvādaśavidhāsyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyasya 		'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma gtogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa rnam pa bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te /
lam mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin te /
rnam pa bcu gnyis po 'di ni bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no /
de la ci rigs par phra rgyas 'dod pa na spyod pa ris bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa ris gnyis dang kun du 'gro ba rnams rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o /
bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhe na /
bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams pa bcu gnyis po de ni rnam par shes pa gang gi dmigs pa yin zhe na /
rnam pa bcu gnyis po de nyid dang yang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te /
sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i dmigs pa yin te /
idaṃ caturdaśavidhaṃ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ tatrārūpyāvacarau dvau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtālambanā anuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam rnam pa bcu bzhi po 'di ni bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no /
de la gzugs med pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag bskyed nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa ris bzhi bzhi dang gzugs na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par bya ste /
anayā vartanyā 'nyadapyanugantavyam lam 'dis gzhan yang khong du chud par bya ste /
yairanuśayairyaccittaṃ sānuśayaṃ te 'nuśayāstasmiścitte 'nuśerate phra rgyas dang bcas pa'i phra rgyas de dag sems de la rgyas par 'gyur ram zhe na /
syuranuśerate /
ye 'nuśayāstena cittena saṃprayuktā aprahīṇāstadālambanāścāprahīṇāṃ 		rgyas par 'gyur ba dag kyang yod de /
sems de dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma spangs la de la dmigs pa yang ma spangs pa'i phra rgyas gang dag yin pa'o /
syurnānuśerate /
ye 'nuśayāstena cittena saṃprayuktāḥ prahīṇāstadālambanāśca /
tadevaṃ kṛtvā bhavati 		rgyas par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod de /
sems de dang mtshungs par ldan pa spangs pa'i phra rgyas gang dag yin pa'o /
de ltar byas na /
dvidhā sānuśayaṃ kliṣṭamakliṣṭamanuśāyakaiḥ /
kliṣṭaṃ cittamanuśayānaiścānuśayaiḥ sānuśayaṃ tatsaṃprayuktatadālambanairaprahīṇairananuśayānaiśca tatsaṃprayuktaiḥ prahīṇaistatsahitatvāt 		nyon mongs phra rgyas bcas rnam gnyis /
yin la /
nyon mongs can min rgyas 'gyur gyi /
sems nyon mongs pa can ni de dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang de la dmigs pa ma spangs par bya ba'i phra rgyas rgyas par 'gyur ba rnams dang de dang mtshungs par ldan pa spangs pa rgyas par mi 'gyur ba rnams kyi phra rgyas dang bcas pa yin te /
de dang lhan cig pa'i phyir ro /
akliṣṭaṃ tu cittamanuśayānaireva tadālambanairaprahīṇairiti sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni de la dmigs pa ma spangs pa rgyas par 'gyur ba dag kho nas phra rgyas dang bcas pa yin no /
athaiṣāṃ daśānāmanuśayānāṃ kathaṃ pravṛttiriti yang phra rgyas bcu po 'di dag ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur zhe na /
ādita eva tāvadavidyāyyogātsatyeṣu sa muhyati /
duḥkhamasmai na rocate yāvat mārgastataḥ 		re zhig dang po kho nar ma rig pa dang ldan pa las bden pa rnams la kun du rmongs par 'gyur te /
de sdug bsngal nas lam gyi bar du mi 'dod do /
de'i 'og tu /
mohākāṅkṣā /
mūḍhasya pakṣadvayaṃ śrutvā vicikitsotpadyate 		rmongs las the tshom /
the tshom rmongs par gyur pa phyogs gnyis thos nas 'di sdug bsngal yin nam /
duḥkhaṃ nvidaṃ natvidaṃ duḥkhamityevamādi /
tato mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
vicikitsāyā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pravartate 		'di sdug bsngal ma yin snyam pa de lta bu la sogs pa'i the tshom skye bar 'gyur ro /
de nas ni log lta /
the tshom las log pa'i lta ba 'jug ste /
saṃśayitasya mithyāśramaṇacittānāṃ mithyāniścayotpatteḥ /
nāsti duḥkhamityevmādi 		the tshom skyes pa log par thos pa dang bsams pa las sdug bsngal med do zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa log par nges pa skye ba'i phyir ro /
satkāyadṛktataḥ /
mithyādṛṣṭeḥ kila satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ pravartate 		de nas 'jig tshogs lta /
log par lta ba la 'jig tshogs la lta ba 'jug ste /
duḥkhataḥ skandhānapohyātmato 'bhiniveśāt /
tato 'ntagrahaṇaṃ /
satkāyadṛṣṭerantagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ pravartate 		sdug bsngal las phung po bsal nas bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go /
de nas mthar 'dzin 'jig tshogs la lta ba las mthar 'dzin par lta ba 'jug ste /
ātmanaḥ śāśvatocchedāntagrahaṇāt bdag rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
de nas ni /
tasmācchhīlāmarśaḥ tshul khrims mchog 'dzin /
antagrahācchīlavrataparāmarśaḥ /
yamevāntaṃ gṛhṇāti tena śuddhipratyāgamanāt /
tato dṛśaḥ 		mthar 'dzin pa las tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa 'jug ste /
gang kho na la mthar 'dzin pa des dag par yid ches pa'i phyir ro /
de nas lte /
āmarśa iti vartate mchog tu 'dzin ces bya bar sbyar te /
śīlavrataparāmarśāddṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ pravartate tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa las lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa 'jug ste /
yena śuddhiṃ pratyeti tasyāgrato grahaṇāt /
tato /
rāgaḥ svadṛṣṭau mānaśca /
tasyāmabhiṣvaṅgāt tayā connatigamanāt 		gang gis dag par yid ches pa de las mchog tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
de nas ni /
rang gi lta la nga rgyal chags /
de la chags pa'i phyir dang des khengs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
dveṣo 'nyatra /
svadṛṣṭyadhyavasitasya tatpratyanīkabhūtāyāṃ paradṛṣṭau dveṣaḥ pravartate /
apare svadṛṣṭāvevānyatra gṛhīte tyaktāyāṃ dveṣamicchanti darśanaheyānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ svāsāntānikadṛṣṭyālambanatvāt /
ityanukramaḥ /
eṣa eṣāṃ daśānāṃ kleśānāṃ pravṛttikramaḥ /
utpadyamānastu tribhiḥ kāraṇairutpadyate 		gzhan la zhe sdang rang gi lta ba la lhag par zhen par gyur pa de'i dgra bor gyur pa gzhan gyi lta ba la zhe sdang 'jug go /
gzhan dag ni rang gi lta ba blangs nas bor ba gzhan la zhe sdang bar 'dod do /
'dod chags la sogs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi dmigs pa ni rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i lta ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
de ltar rim /
'di ni phra rgyas bcu po de dag gi 'jug pa'i rim pa yin no /
skye ba ni rgyu gsum gyis skye ste /
aprahīṇādanuśayādviṣayāt pratyupasthitāt phra rgyas spang ba ma yin dang /
yul ni nye bar gnas pa dang /
ayoniśo manaskārāt kleśaḥ /
tadyathā rāgānuśayo 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra evaṃ kāmarāga utpadyate 		tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed las /
nyon mongs skye ste /
'di lta ste 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes pa yin /
'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa dang mthun pa'i chos rnams kyang snang bar 'gyur ba yin /
de la yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin te /
de ltar na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skye bar 'gyur ro /
tānyetāni yathākramaṃ hetuviṣayaprayogabalāni /
evamanyo 'pi kleśa utpadyata iti veditavyo yaḥ 		de dag ni go rims bzhin du rgyu dang yul dang sbyor ba'i stobs dag yin te /
nyon mongs pa gzhan yang de bzhin du skye bar rig par bya'o /
saṃpūrṇakāraṇaḥ /
kadācitkial viṣayabalenaivotpadyante 		gang zhig rgyu ni tshangs pa yin /
res 'ga' yul gyi stobs kho na /
na hetubalena /
yathā parihāṇadharmakasyārhata iti 		skye'i rgyu'i stobs kyis ma yin te /
dper na dgra bcom pa yongs su nyams pa'i chos can gyi lta bu'o zhes grag go /
eta evānuśayāḥ sūtre bhagavatā traya āsravā uktāḥ kāmasravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti /
catvāra oghāḥ kāmaugho bhavaugho dṛṣṭyobho 'vidyaughaśca 		yang phra rgyas de dag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis zag pa gsum du gsungs te /
'dod pa'i zag pa dang srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa'o /
chu bo bzhi ste /
'dod pa'i chu bo dang srid pa'i chu bo dang lta ba'i chu bo dang ma rig pa'i chu bo'o /
catvāro yogā eta eva /
catvāryupādānāni kāmopādānaṃ dṛṣṭyupādānaṃ śīlavṛtopādānamātmavādopādānamiti /
tatra tāvat 		sbyor ba bzhi ste /
de dag nyid do /
nye bar len pa bzhi ste /
'dod pa nye bar len pa dang lta ba nye bar len pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs nye bar len pa dang bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa'o /
de la re zhig /
kāme saparyavasthānāḥ kleśāḥ kāmāsravo vinā /
mohena 		'dod na gti mug ma gtogs pa'i /
nyon mongs kun nas dkris bcas zag /
avidyāṃ varjayitvā 'nye kāmāvacarāḥ kleśāḥ saha paryavasthānaiḥ kāmāsravo veditavya ekacatvāriṃśaddravyāṇi ma rig pa rnams ma gtogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa rdzas bzhi bcu rtsa gcig ni 'dod pa'i zag pa yin par rig par bya ste /
ekatriṃśadanuśayāḥ pañcaprakārāmavidyāṃ hitvā daśa paryavasthānāni ma rig pa rnam pa lnga ma gtogs pa phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gcig dang kun nas dkris pa bcu'o /
anuśayā eva rūpārūpye bhavāsravaḥ gzugs dang gzugs ni med pa na /
phra rgyas kho na srid pa'i zag /
vinā moheneti vartate ma rig pa ma gtogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
rūpārūpyāvacarā avidyāvarjyā anuśayā bhavāsravo dvāpañcāśaddravyāṇi ma rig pa rnams ma gtogs par gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phra rgyas rdzas lnga bcu rtsa gnyis ni srid pa'i zag pa yin te /
rūpāvacarāḥ ṣaḍviṃśatiranuśayāḥ pañcaprakārāmavidyāṃ hitvā /
ārūpyāvacarāḥ ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ /
nanu ca tatrāpyasti paryavasthānadvayaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ ca 		ma rig pa rnam pa lnga ma gtogs pa gzugs na spyod pa'i phra rgyas nyi shu rtsa drug dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyi shu rtsa drug go /
de na yang rmugs pa dang rgod pa dang kun nas dkris pa gnyis yod pa ma yin nam /
prakaraṇeṣu coktaṃ bhavāsravaḥ katamaḥ rab tu byed pa dag las kyang /
srid pa'i zag pa gang zhe na /
avidyāṃ sthāpayitvā yāni tadanyāni rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāni /
saṃyojanabandhanānuśayopakleśaparyavasthānānīti 		ma rig pa rnams ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i kun du sbyor ba dang 'ching ba dang phra rgyas dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang kun nas dkris pa gang dag yin pa'o zhes bshad na ci'i phyir 'dir de ma smos she na /
kasmā diha tasyāgrahaṇam /
asvātantryāditi kāśmīrāḥ 		kha che ba rnams na re rang dbang can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarā anuśayāḥ samasyaiko bhavāgra uktaḥ ci'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phra rgyas rnams gcig tu bsdus nas srid pa'i zag par bshad ce na /
avyākṛtāntarmukhā hi te samāhitabhūmikāḥ /
ata ekīkṛtāḥ 		de lung ma bstan kha nang bltas /
mnyam gzhag pa yi phyir gcig byas /
te hyūbhaye 'pyavyākṛtā antarmukhapravṛttāḥ samāhitabhūmikāśceti trividhena sādhamyerṇaikatāḥ /
yenaiva ca kāraṇena bhavarāga uktastenaiva bhavāsravaḥ ityavidyedānīṃ traidhātukyavidyāsrava iti siddham 		de gnyi ga yang lung du ma bstan pa dang kha nang du bltas te 'jug pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa dag yin pa'i phyir chos mthun pa rnam pa gsum gyis gcig tu byas te; rgyu gang gis srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad pa de nyid kyi srid pa'i zag pa zhes bya'o /
da ni ma rig pa'i khams gsum pa rdzas bco lnga ni ma rig pa'i zag pa zhes bya bar grub bo /
tāni pañcadaśa dravyāṇi ci'i phyir 'di logs shig tu rnam par gzhag ce na /
kiṃ kāraṇamasau pṛthagvyavasthāpyate /
sarveṣāṃ hi teṣāṃ /
mūlamavidyetyāsravaḥ pṛthak /
yathā caite āsravā uktā veditavyāḥ /
tathaughayogā dṛṣṭīnāṃ pṛthagbhāvastu pāṭavāt 		de dag thams cad kyi /
rtsa ba ma rig yin pas na /
logs shig tu ni zag par bstan /
zag pa de dag ji skad du bshad pa ltar /
chu bo sbyor ba'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
lha rnams gsal phyir logs shig bstan /
kāmāsrava eva kāmaughaḥ kāmayogaśca /
evaṃ bhavāsrava eva bhavaugho bhavayogaścānyatra dṛṣṭibhyaḥ 		lta ba rnams ma gtogs pa 'dod pa'i zag pa kho nar 'dod ba'i chu bo dang 'dod pa'i sbyor ba yin la /
de bzhin du srid pa'i zag pa kho na srid pa'i chu bo dang srid pa'i sbyor ba yin no /
tāḥ kila paṭutvādoghayogeṣu pṛthak sthāpitāḥ /
nāsraveṣvasahāyānāṃ na kilāsyānukūlatā 		de dag ni bsal ba'i phyir chu bo dang sbyor ba dag ni nang du logs shig tu bsal ba'i rnam par gzhag go zhes grag go /
zag pa ma yin grogs med rnams /
'jog pa'i rjes su mi mthun lo /
āsayantītyāsravāṇāṃ nirvacanaṃ paścādvakṣyate zag pa rnams kyi nges pa'i tshig ni 'jog par byed pas na zhes 'og nas 'chad na /
na ca kila kevalā dṛṣṭya āsyānukūlāḥ paṭutvāt /
ata āsraveṣu na pṛṭhak sthāpitāḥ /
miśrīkṛtya sthāpitā iti tadevaṃ kāmaugha ekānnatriṃśaddravyāṇi /
rāgapratighamānāḥ pañcadaśa vicikitsāścatasro daśa paryavasthānānīti 		lta ba rnams 'ba' zhig ni bsal ba'i phyir 'jog pa'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin pas de'i phyir zag pa dag tu logs shig tu ma bzhag gi bsres te ni bzhag go zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
de ltar na 'dod pa'i chu bo ni rdzas nyi shu rtsa dgu ste /
'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal bco lnga dang the tshom bzhi dang kun nas dkris pa bcu'o /
bhavaugho 'ṣṭāviṃsatidravyāṇi srid pa'i chu bo ni sngas nyi shu rtsa brgyad de /
rāgamānā viṃśatirvicikitsā 'ṣṭau 'dod chags dang nga rgyal nyi shu dang the tshom brgyad do /
dṛṣṭyoghaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśaddravyāṇi /
avidyaughaḥ pañcadaśa dravyāṇi 		lta ba'i chu bo ni rdzas sum cu rtsa drug go /
ma rig pa'i chu bo ni rdzas bco lnga ste /
oghavad yogā veditavyāḥ sbyor ba yang chu bo bzhin du rig par bya'o /
yathoktā eva sā 'vidyā dvidhā dṛṣṭivivecanāt ji skad bshad nyid ma rig bcas /
nyer len rnams te lta rnam gnyis /
upādānāni /
kāmayoga evasahāvidyayā kāmopādānaṃ catustriṃśaddravyāṇi /
rāgapratighamānā 'vidyāviṃśatirvicikitsāścatasro daśa paryavasthānāni 		phye ba'i phyir ro /
'dod pa'i sbyor ba ma rig pa dang bcas pa rdzas sum cu rtsa bzhi kho na 'dod pa nye bar len pa yin te /
'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa nyi shu dang the tshom bzhi dang kun nas dkris pa bcu'o /
bhavayoga eva sahāvidyayā ātmavādopādānamaṣṭatriṃśaddravyāṇi srid pa'i sbyor ba nye bar ma rig pa dang bcas pa rdzas sum cu rtsa brgyad kho na bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa yin te /
rāgamānāvidyāstriṃśadvicikitsā aṣṭau 'dod chags dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa sum cu dang the tshom brgyad do /
dṛṣṭiyogācchīlavrataṃ niṣkṛṣya dṛṣṭyu pādānaṃ triṃśaddravyāṇi lta ba'i sbyor ba las tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs phyung ste /
lta ba la nye bar len pa rdzas sum cu yin no /
śīlavratopādānaṃ ṣaḍdravyāṇi karmadṛṣṭibhyo niṣkṛṣṭam /
mārgapratidvandvitvā dubhayapakṣavipralambhanācca 		tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs nye bar len pa ni rdzas drug go /
ci'i phyir lta ba rnams las phyung zhe na /
lam gyi dgrar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang phyogs gnyi ga bslu ba'i phyir te /
gṛhiṇo 'pyanena vipralabdhā anaśanādibhiḥ svargamārgasaṃjñayā pravrajitā apīṣṭaviṣayaparivarjanena śuddhipratyāgamanāditi 'dis khyim pa rnams kyang lam ma yin pa la lam du 'du shes pas zas mi za ba la sogs pas bslus la /
rab tu byung ba rnams kyang yul yid du 'ong ba yongs su spangs pas dag par yid ches pas bslus so /
kiṃ kāraṇamavidyāṃ miśrayitvopādānamuktaṃ na pṛthak ci'i phyir ma rig pa bsres te nye bar len par bshad la logs shig tu ma bshad ce na /
bhavagrahaṇādupādānāni /
avidyā tu grāhikā neti miśritā /
asaṃprakhyānalakṣaṇatayā 'paṭutvādavidyā na grāhikā bhavatyataḥ kila miśritā 		srid pa 'dzin pa'i phyir nye bar len pa dag yin no /
ma rig pa /
'dzin par byed pa min phyir bsres /
ma rig pa ni mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mi gsal ba'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te /
sūtre tu bhagavatoktaṃ kāmayogaḥ katamaḥ /
vistareṇa yāvadyo 'sya bhavati kāmeṣu kāmarāgaḥ kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ kāmaprema kāmecchā kāmamūrcchā kāmagṛddhaḥ kāmaparigarddhaḥ kāmanandī kāmaniyantiḥ kāmādhyavasānaṃ tadanyacittam paryādāya tiṣṭhati 		de'i phyir bsres so zhes grag go /
bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las ni 'dod pa'i sbyor ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba nas rgyas par 'di'i 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa dang 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang 'dod pa la sred pa dang 'dod pa la dad che ba dang 'dod pa la 'dod pas brgyal ba dang 'dod pa la zhen pa dang 'dod pa la dga' ba dang 'dod pa la 'chums pa dang 'dod pa la lhag par chags pa yod pa gang yin pa des 'di'i sems yongs su gtugs te gnas pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar dang lta ba'i sbyor ba yang de dang 'dra ba'i bar gsungs so /
ayamucyate kāmayogaḥ /
evaṃ yāvadbhavayogaḥ /
cchandarāgaścopādānamuktaṃ sutrāntareṣvato vijñāyate kāma hyupādānamapi kāmādiṣu cchandarāga iti /
uktamidamanuśayā evāsravaughayogopādānasaṃśabditāḥ sūtreṣviti 		mdo gzhan dag las 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyang nye bar len pa yin par gsungs te /
de'i phyir 'dod pa la sogs pa la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa ni 'dod pa nye bar len pa la sogs pa yang yin par shes so /
mdo dag las phra rgyas rnams kho na zag pa dang chu bo dang sbyor ba dang nye bar len pa'i ming du gsungs pa 'di ni bshad zin to /
atha ko 'yamanuśayārthaḥ kaśca yāvadupādānārthaḥ yang phra rgyas kyi don ni ci yin /
nye bar len pa'i bar gyi don ni ci yin zhe na /
aṇavo 'nugatāścaite dvidhā cāpyanuśerate gang phyir de dag phra ba dang rjes 'brel rnam gnyis rgyas 'gyur dang /
anubadhnanti yasmācca tasmādanuśayāḥ smṛtāḥ /
tatrāṇavaḥ sūkṣmapracāratvāt durvijñānatayā 		rjes su 'brang ba de yi phyir /
phra rgyas rtag tu bshad pa yin /
de la phra ba rnams ni rtogs par dka' bas rgyu ba phra ba'i phyir ro /
anugatāḥ prāptyanuṣaṅgataḥ rjes su 'brel pa ni thob pa dang rjes su 'grel pas so /
anuśerate dvābhyāṃ prakārābhyāmālambanataḥ saṃprayogataśca rgyas par 'gyur ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas so /
anubadhnantyaprayogeṇa prativārayato 'pi punaḥ punaḥ saṃmukhībhāvāt rjes su 'brang bas ni sbyor ba med par te /
bzlog bzhin du yang dang yang du mngon par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
ebhiḥ kāraṇairanuśayā ucyante rgyu de dag gis na phra rgyas rnams zhes bya'o /
āsayantyāsravantyete haranti śleṣayantyatha de dag 'jog byed zag byed dang /
khyer bar byed dang 'byar byed dang /
upagṛhṇanti cetyeṣāmāsravādiniruktayaḥ nye bar 'dzin phyir zag la sogs /
de dag gi ni nges tshig yin /
āsayanti saṃsāre āsravanti bhavāgrādyāvadavīciṃ ṣaṅbhirāyatanavraṇair ityāsravāḥ 'khor bar 'jog par byed pa dang /
srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i bar du skye mched drug gi rma nas 'dzag pas na zag pa dag yin no /
harantītyoghāḥ /
śleṣayantīti yogāḥ /
upagṛhṇantīti upadānāni 		khyer bar byed pas na chu bo dag yin no; /
'byar bar byed pas na sbyor ba dag yin no /
nye bar 'dzin pas na nye bar len pa dag yin no /
evaṃ tu sādhīyaḥ syād 'di skad du 'di dag gis /
āsravatyebhiḥ saṃtatirviṣayeṣvityāsravāḥ rgyud yul rnams la 'dzag par byed pas na zag pa rnams yin te /
tadyathā āyuṣmanto naurmahadbhirabhisaṃskāraiḥ pratisroto nīyate /
sā teṣāmeva saṃskārāṇāṃ gratiprasravdhyā 'lpakṛcchreṇānusrota uhyata'’ iti sūtravādānusārāt /
adhimātravegatvādoghāḥ 		tshe dang ldan pas dper na gru mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos chu'i bzlog phyogs su bkri ba de mngon par 'du bya ba de dag nyid med par tshegs chung dus chu'i 'bab phyogs su 'khyer bar 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes gsungs pa'i mdo'i tshig dang mthun pa'i phyir ro /
shugs chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir chu bo dag ste /
de'i rjes su 'byed pa'i phyir de dag gis de dag dang ldan pa 'khyer bar 'gyur ro /
tarhi tadvānuhyate tadanuvidhānāt che ba dang kun du mi 'byung ba rnams ni sbyor ba dag ste /
nātimātrasamudācāriṇo 'pi yogā vividhaduḥkhasaṃyojanāt sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang sbyor ba'i phyir ram /
yang na yang dang yang du rjes su 'brel ba'i sgo nas so /
ābhīkṣṇyānuṣaṅgato vā kāmādyupādānādupādānānīti 'dod pa la sogs pa nye bar len pa'i phyir nye bar len pa rnams ni yin no zhes bya ba ni ches legs pa yin no /
saṃyojanādibhedena punaste pañcadhoditāḥ de dag kun du sbyor sogs kyi /
dbye bas yang rnam ldar bshad do /
ta evānuśayāḥ punaḥ saṃyojanabandhanānuśayopakleśaparyavasthānabhedena pañcadhā bhittvoktāḥ /
tatra nava saṃyojanānyanunvayapratighamānāvidyādṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitserṣyā mātsaryasaṃyojanāni 		phra rgyas de dag nyid kun du sbyor ba dang 'ching ba dang phra rgyas dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang kun nas dkris pa'i dbye bas yang rnam pa lngar phye nas bshad de /
de la kun du sbyor ba ni dgu ste /
rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa dang lta ba dang mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom dang phrag dog dang ser sna'i kun du sbyor ba rnams so /
tatrānunayasaṃyojanaṃ traidhātuko rāgaḥ de la rjes su chags pa'i kun du sbyor ba ni khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags te /
evamanyāni yathāsaṃbhavam yojyāni de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang ci rigs par sbyor bar bya'o /
dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ tisro dṛṣṭayaḥ lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba ni lta ba gsum mo /
parāmarśasaṃyojanaṃ dve dṛṣṭī mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun du sbyor ba ni lta ba gnyis so /
ata evocyate syāt dṣṭisaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣvanunayasaṃyojanena saṃyukto na dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena na ca tatra dṛṣṭyanuśayo nānuśayīta /
āha syāt samudayajñāne utpanne nirodhajñāne 'nutpanne nirodhamārgadarśānaprahātavyeṣu dṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśasaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣu 		de nyid kyi phyir lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams la rjes su chags pa'i kun du sbyor bas ldan zhing lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba ma yin pa /
de la lta ba'i phra rgyas rgyas par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin pa lta yod dam zhe na /
smras pa yod de /
kun 'byung shes pa skyes pa la 'gog pa shes pa ma skyes pa'i tshe 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams te /
teṣvanunayasaṃyojanena saṃyuktastadālambanena dṛṣṭisaṃyojanenāsaṃyuktaḥ de dag ni rjes su chags pa'i kun du sbyor ba de la dmigs par ldan la lta ba'i kun du sbyor bas ni mi ldan te /
sarvatragasya prahīṇatvādasarvatragasya ca tadālambanasaṃprayogiṇo dṛṣṭisaṃyojanasyābhāvāt kun du 'gro ba ni spangs pa'i phyir la kun du 'gro ba ma yin pa de la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa can lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba ni med pa'i phyir ro /
dṛṣṭyanuśayaśca teṣvanuśete de dag la lta ba'i phra rgyas dag ni rgyas par 'gyur te /
te eva parāmarśaḍṛṣṭī saṃprayogataḥ /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃyojaneṣu tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃprayojanaṃ pṛthaguktaṃ dve punardṛṣṭī parāmarśāsaṃyojanaṃ pṛthak 		mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba de dag kho na mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas /
yang ci'i phyir kun du sbyor ba dag gi nang du lta ba gsum ni logs shig tu lta ba'i kun du sbyor bar bshad la /
gnyis ni logs shig tu mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun du sbyor ba'i nang du bshad ce na /
dravyāmarśana sāmānyāddṛṣṭī saṃyojanāntaram rdzas dang mchog 'dzin 'dra ba'i phyir /
lta gnyis kun du sbyor gzhan no /
aṣṭādaśa dravyāṇi tisro dṛṣṭayaḥ lta ba mchog gsum yang rdzas bco brgyad yin la /
aṣṭādaśaiva dve parāmarśadṛṣṭī /
ataḥ kila dravya sāmānyādete saṃyojanāntaram kṛte /
ete ca dve parāmarśasvabhāvena śeṣāiti parāmarśanasāmānyādapyete pṛthagvihite grāhyagrāhakabhedāt 		mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba gnyis kyang rdzas bco brgyad kho na yin te /
de'i phyir rdzas mnyam pas 'di gnyis kun tu sbyor bas gzhan du byas so zhes grag go /
'di gnyis ni mchog tu 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
lhag ma rnams ni ma yin pas mchog tu 'dzin par 'dra ba'i phyir yang 'di gnyis logs shig tu bshad de /
gzung ba dang 'dzin pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
atha kasmādīṣryāmātsarye saṃyojane pṛthaksaṃyojanadvayamuktaṃ nānyat paryavasthānam yang ci'i phyir kun tu sbyor ba dag tu phrag dog dang ser sna ni logs shig tu kun du sbyor ba gnyis su bshad la /
kun nas dkris pa gzhan ni ma yin zhe na /
ekāntākuśalaṃ yasmāt svatantraṃ cobhayaṃ yataḥ gang phyir gnyi ga gcig tu ni /
mi dge rang dbang de yi phyir /
īṣryāmātsaryameṣūktaṃ pṛthak saṃyojanadvayam /
nahyanyatparyavasthānamevañjātīyakamasti yatraitadubhayaṃ syādekāntākuśalatvaṃ svatantratvaṃ ceti 		phrag dog ser sna de dag las /
logs shig kun sbyor gnyis su bshad /
gang la gcig tu mi dge ba dang rang dbang can 'di gnyis ka yod pa de lta bu'i kun nas dkris pa gzhan ni med do /
yasyāṣṭau paryavasthānāni tasyevaṃ syāt /
yasya punardaśa tasya krodhamrakṣāvapyubhayaprakārau /
tasmānna bhavatyayaṃ parihāra ityapare 		gzhan dag na re gang gi kun nas dkris pa brgyad yin pa de'i phyir ni de ltar 'gyur gyi /
gang gi bcu yin pa de ni khro ba dang 'chab pa yang rnam pa gnyi ga yin pas de'i phyir 'di la lan ma yin no zhes zer ro /
punaranyatra bhagavatā saṃyojanamuktam /
pañcadhā 'varabhāgīyaṃ /
tadyathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti 		yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan du kun du sbyor ba /
tha ma'i cha dang mthun rnam lnga /
gsungs te /
'di lta ste /
'jig tshogs la lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom dang 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems so /
kasmādetānvavarabhāgīyānyucyante ci'i phyir 'di dag tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa rnams zhes bya zhe na /
avarabhāgahitatvāt /
avaro hi bhāgaḥ kāmadhāturetāni ca tasyānuguṇāni 		tha ma'i cha dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
tha ma'i cha ni 'dod pa'i khams yin la /
yasmāt /
dvābhyāṃ kāmānatikramaḥ /
tribhistu punarāvṛttiḥ 		'di dag kyang de'i rjes su mthun pa yin te /
'di lta gnyis kyis 'dod pa las mi 'da' la /
gsum po yis ni phyir zlog byed /
kāmacchandavyāpādābhyāṃ kāmadhātuṃ nātikrāmati 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems dag gis ni 'dod pa'i khams las mi 'da'o /
satkāyadṛṣṭyādibhiratikrānto 'pi punarāvartyate dauvārikānucarasādharmyāt 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa dag gis ni 'das kyang phyir zlog par byed de /
sgo ba dang rjes su 'brang ba dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro /
tribhiḥ sattvāvaratāṃ nātikrāmati pṛthagjanatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ dhātvavaratāṃ kāmadhātum gzhan dag na re gsum gyis ni sems can gyi tha ma so so'i skye bo nyid las mi 'da' la /
gnyis kyis ni khams kyi tha ma 'dod pa'i khams las mi 'da' ste /
ata eva tānyavarabhāgīyānītyapare /
yadā srota āpannasya paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇāt ṣaṭkleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ kimarthaṃ tisro dṛṣṭīrapahāya trayamevāha satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ ca 		de'i phyir 'di dag tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa rnams zhes bya'o zhes zer ro /
gang gi tshe rgyun du zhugs pas kun du sbyor ba gsum yongs su gtugs te spang ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa drug spangs pa yin na /
ci'i phyir lta ba gsum bor la /
'jig tshogs la lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom gsum kho na gsungs she na /
sarvametadvaktavyaṃ syāt /
kiṃ tūktaṃ /
mukhamūlagrahāttrayam 		de dag thams cad brjod par bya ba ni yin mod kyi 'on kyang /
sgo dang rtsa ba bsdus phyir gsum /
du bshad de /
triprakārāḥ kila kleśā ekaprakārā dviprakārākścatuprakārākśca /
teṣāmebhistribhirmukhaṃ gṛhītamiti 		nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam pa gsum ste /
rnam pa gcig dang rnam pa gnyis dang rnam pa bzhi dag yin la /
de dag gi sgo ni 'di gsum gyis bsdus so /
apicāntagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭipravartitā gzhan yang mthar 'dzin par lta ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta lta bas rab tu bcug la /
dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśapravartitaḥ mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsāpravatitā lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pas rab tu bcug /
log par lta ba ni the tshom gyis rab tu bcug ste /
mūlaṃ gṛhītamiti /
apare punarāhuḥ 		de'i phyir rtsa ba bsdus so zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
gzhan dag na re /
agantukāmatāmārgavibhramo mārgasaṃśayaḥ 'gro mi 'dod dang lam nor dang /
lam la the tshom de snyed cig /
ityantarāyā mokṣasya gamane 'tastrideśanā thar pa bgrod pa bgegs byed pa /
de yi phyir na gsum bstan to /
trayo 'ntarāyā deśāntaragamane bhavanti /
agantukāmatā mārgavibhramo 'nyamārgasaṃśrayaṇāt mārgasaṃśayaśca /
evaṃ mokṣagamane 'pyeta eva trayontarāyāḥ 		yul gzhan du bgrod par bya ba la bar chad byed pa ni gsum yod do /
'gro mi 'dod pa dang lam gzhan la brten pa'i phyir lam nor ba dang lam la the tshom za ba'o /
de bzhin du thar ba bgrod par bya ba la yang gsum po de dag nyid bar chad byed de /
tatra satkāyadṛṣṭyā mokṣādutrāsamāpannasyāgantukāmatā bhavati de la 'jig tshogs la lta bas ni thar pas skrag par 'gyur bas 'gro mi 'dod par 'gyur ro /
śīlavrataparāmarśenānyamārgasaṃśrayaṇānmokṣavibhramaḥ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin bas ni lam gzhan la yang dag par brten pa'i phyir lam nor bar 'gyur ro /
vicikitsayā mārgasaṃśayaḥ the tshom gyis ni lam la the tshom za bar 'gyur te /
eṣāṃ mokṣagamanāntarāyāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ dyotayan bhagavān kleśatrayasyaiva prahāṇaṃ deśitavān bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyun du zhugs pas thar par bgrod pa'i bar chad byed pa de dag spang bar ston pa na nyon mongs pa gsum kho na spang bar bstan to zhes zer ro /
yathā bhagavatā pañcavidhamavarabhāgīyaṃ saṃyojanamuktam /
evaṃ punaḥ 		bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar kun du sbyor ba tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga bshad pa de bzhin du yang /
pañcadhaivordhvabhāgīyaṃ gong ma'i cha dang mthun lnga nyid /
kathamityāha ji lta zhe na /
dvau rāgau rūpyarūpijau /
tau 		gzugs dang gzugs med las skyes pa'i /
auddhatyamānamohāśca 'dod chags gnyis rgod nga rgyal rmongs /
ityetāni pañcordhvabhāgīyāni saṃyojanāni /
tadyathā rūparāga ārūpyarāga auddhatyaṃ māno 'vidyā ca /
eṣāmaprahāṇenordhvadhātvanatikramāt 		zhes te /
'di dag gi kun du sbyor ba gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga yin te /
'di lta ste gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang rgod pa dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa ste /
de dag ma spangs par khams gong ma las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro /
samāptaḥ saṃyojanaprasaṅgaḥ /
bandhanāni katamāni /
trīṇi bandhanāni /
rāgo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ dveṣo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ moho bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ /
kasmādetadeva trayaṃ bandhanamuktaṃ bhagavatā 		kun du sbyor ba'i skabs rdzogs so /
'ching ba rnams gang zhe na /
'ching ba ni gsum ste /
'ching ba 'dod chags thams cad dang 'ching ba zhe sdang dang gti mug thams cad do /
ci'i phyir gsum po ni 'ching bar bshad ce na /
vidvaśād bandhanatrayam /
trivedanāvaśārttīṇi bandhanāni 		tshor ba'i dbang gis 'ching ba gsum /
tshor ba gsum gyi dbang gis 'ching ba gsum ste /
sukhāyāṃ hi vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśete ālambanasaṃprayogābhyām bde ba'i tshor ba la ni 'dod chags dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur la /
duḥkhāyāṃ dveṣaḥ /
aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ moho na tathā rāgadveṣau /
svāsāṃtanikālambanato vā niyamaḥ /
anuśayāḥ pūrvamevoktāḥ /
upakleśāḥ vaktavyāḥ 		sdug bsngal la ni zhe sdang ngo /
bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa la ni gti mug ste /
'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag ni de lta ma yin no; /
yang na rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i dmigs pa'i sgo nas nges pa yin no /
phra rgyas rnams ni sngar bshad pa kho nar zad do /
nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams brjod par bya ste /
tatra ye yāvat kleśā upakleśā api te /
cittopakleśanāt /
ye 'pyanye caitasāḥ kliṣṭāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃjñitāḥ 		de la re zhig gang dag nyon mongs pa yin pa de dag ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang yin te /
sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa'i phyir ro /
nyon mongs las gzhan nyon mongs can /
sems byung 'du byed phung zhes bya /
kleśebhyaste 'pyupakleśāste tu na kleśasaṃjñitāḥ gang de'ang nye ba'i nyon mongs te /
de dag nyon mongs zhes mi bya /
ye 'pyanye kleśebhyaḥ kliṣṭā dharmāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītāścaitasikāsta upakleśāste punarye kṣudravastuke paṭhitāḥ /
iha tu paryasthānakleśamalasaṃgṛhītāneva nirdekṣyāmaḥ 		nyon mongs pa rnams las gzhan pa chos nyon mongs pa can sems las byung ba 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa kho na yin gyi /
nyon mongs pa dag ni ma yin te /
de dag kyang gzhi phran tshegs las byung ba gang dag yin ba'o /
'dir ni kun nas dkris pa dang nyon mongs pa'i dri mas bsdus pa kho na bstan par bya ste /
kun nas dkris pa rnams gang zhe na /
kāni punaḥ paryavasthānānītyāha /
kleśā apīhiparyavasthānaṃ kāmarāgaparyavasthānapratyayaduḥkhamiti sūtre vacanāt 		smras pa nyon mongs pa yang kun nas dkris pa yin te /
mdo las /
'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa sdug bsngal gyi rkyen zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
prakaraṇaśāstre tu bstan bcos rab tu byed pa las ni /
āhlīkyamanapatrāpyamīrṣyāmātsaryamuddhavaḥ ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang /
phrag dog ser sna rgod pa dang /
kaukṛtyaṃ styānamiddhaṃ ca paryavasthānamaṣṭadhā 'gyod dang rmugs dang gnyid dang ni /
kun nas dkris pa rnam pa brgyad /
vaibhāṣikanyāyena punardaśa paryavasthānānyetāni cāṣṭau 'byung ngo /
bye brag tu smra ba'i lugs kyis ni kun nas dkris pa bcu ste /
krodhabhrakṣau ca /
tatrāhlīkyānapatrāpye vyākhyāte 		brgyad po de dag dang khro dang 'chab pa'o /
de la ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa ni bshad zin to /
parasaṃpattau cetaso vyāroṣa īrṣyā /
dharmāmiṣakauśalapradānavirodhī cittāgraho mātsaryam 		phrag dog ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la sems khong nas 'khrug pa'o /
ser sna ni chos dang zang zing dang mkhas pa rab tu sbyin pa dang 'gal ba can sems kyis kun nas 'dzin pa'o /
auddhatyaṃ cetaso 'vyupaśamaḥ /
kaukṛtyaṃ styānaṃ ca vyākhyāte 		rgod pa ni sems rnam par ma zhi ba'o /
'gyod pa dang rmugs pa ni bshad zin to /
kāyasaṃdhāraṇāsamarthaścittābhisaṃkṣepo middham gnyid ni lus yang dag par 'dzin par mi nus pa sems mngon par sdud pa'o /
tattu kliṣṭameva paryavasthānam de dang 'gyod pa ni nyon mongs pa can kho na kun nas dkris pa yin no /
kaukṛtyaṃ ca vyāpāda vihiṃsāvarjitaḥ sattvāsattvayorāghātaḥ krodhaḥ khro ba ni gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba ma gtogs pa sems can dang sems can ma yin pa la kun nas mnar sems pa gang yin pa'o /
avadyapracchādanaṃ bhrakṣaḥ /
eṣāṃ ca daśānāṃ paryavasthānānāṃ 		'chab pa ni kha na ma tho ba mkhyud pa'o /
kun nas dkris pa de rnams las /
rāgotthā āhlīkyauddhatyamatsarāḥ 'dod chags dang ngo tsha med rgod ser sna bslang /
ete traya upakleśā rāganiḥṣyandāḥ /
bhrakṣe vivādaḥ 		nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gsum po 'di dag ni 'dod chags kyi rgyu mthun pa yin no /
'chab pa rtsod do /
kha cig na re /
tṛṣṇāniḥṣyanada ityeke sred pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o zhes zer ro /
avidyāniḥṣyanda ityapare /
ubhayorityanye /
yathā kramaṃ jñātājñātānāmiti 		gzhan dag na re ma rig pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o zhes zer ro /
gzhan dag na re de gnyi ga'i yin te /
go rims bzhin du shes pa dang mi shes pa rnams kyi yin no zhes zer ro /
avidyātaḥ styānamiddhānapatrapāḥ ma rig pa las /
rmugs dang gnyid dang khrel med do /
ete trayo 'vidyāniḥṣyandāḥ gsum po 'di dag ni ma rig pa'i rgyu mthun pa yin no /
kaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsātaḥ kodherṣye pratighānvaye /
pratighasamutthe ityete ca daśa kleśaniḥṣyandā upakleśāḥ /
anye ca ṣaṭkleśamalāḥ 		the tshom las 'gyod khro ba dang phrag dog khong khro'i rgyu las byung /
khong khro bas kun nas bslang ba dag yin te /
de ltar na nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcu po de dag ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyu mthun pa dag yin no /
gzhan yang nyon mongs dri ma drug /
tadyathā /
māyā śāṭhyaṃ madastathā 		'di lta ste /
sgyu dang g yo dang rgyags pa dang /
pradāśa upanāhaśca vihiṃsā ceti /
tatra paravañcanā māyā 		de bzhin 'tshig dang khon 'dzin dang /
rnam 'tshe /
de la sgyu ni gzhan 'drid pa'o /
cittakauṭilyaṃ śāṭhyaṃ yena yathābhūtaṃ nāviṣkaroti vikṣipatya parisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate g yo ni sems gya gyu ba ste /
gang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi 'chags gyi [*kyi?] gtam rlung bskur ba 'am mi gsal bar byed pa'o /
madaḥ pūrvoktaḥ rgyags pa ni sngar bshad zin to /
sāvadyavastudṛḍhagrāhitā pradāśo yena nyāyasaṃjñaptiṃ na gṛhṇāti 'tshig pa ni kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'i dngos po dam du 'dzin pa ste /
gang gis rig par gtams pa mi 'dzin pa'o /
āghātavastuvahulīkāra upanāhaḥ /
viheṭhnaṃ vihiṃsā yena prahārapāruṣyādibhiḥ parān viheṭhyate /
eṣāṃ punaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ kleśamalānāṃ 		khon du 'dzin pa ni kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po lan mang du byed pa'o /
rnam par 'tshe ba ni rnam par tho 'tshams pa ste /
gang gis mtshon cha dang tshig rtsub po dag gis pha rol po rnam par tho 'tshams par byed pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma drug po de dag las /
rāgajau /
māyāmadau pratighaje upanāhavihiṃsane 		sgyu dang rgyags pa ni /
'dod chags las skyes khon 'dzin dang /
dṛṣṭyāmarśāt pradāśastu śāṭhyaṃ dṛṣṭisamutthitam rnam 'tshe khong khro las skyes so /
'tshig pa lta ba mchog 'dzin las /
kiṃ kuṭilaṃ pāpikā dṛṣṭiriti gāthāvacanād yujyate g yo ni lta bas kun nas bslang /
gya gyu ci yin sdig can lta /
śāṭhyaṃ dṛṣṭiniḥṣyandaḥ /
ka eṣāṃ kiṃprahātavyaḥ /
yāni tāvat daśa paryavasthānānyuktāni 		zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ba'i phyir g yo ni lta ba'i rgyu mthun pa yin par rung ngo /
'di dag ci zhig gis spang bar bya ba yin zhe na /
re zhig kun nas dkris pa bcur bshad pa gang dag yin pa /
tatrāhlīkyānapatrāpyastyānamiddhoddhavā dvidhā /
ete pañca dharmā dvividhā darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā ubhayaprakārakleśasaṃprayogāt /
yaśca yaddarśanaheyasaṃprayuktaḥ sa taddarśanaprahātavyaḥ /
tadanye bhāvanāheyāḥ 		de las ngo tsha med pa dang /
khrel med rmugs gnyid rgod rnam gnyis /
chos lnga po 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa rnam pa gnyis ka dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnam pa gnyis yin te /
gang zhig gang mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa de ni de mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no /
de las gzhan ni bsgom spang bya /
tebhyo 'nye paryavasthānasaṃgṛhītā upakleśā bhāvanāheyā eva /
irṣyāmātsaryakaukṛtyakrodhabhrakṣāḥ svatantrāśca 		de dag las gzhan pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pas bsdus pa phrag dog dang ser sna dang 'gyod pa dang khro ba dang 'chab pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na dang; nye ba'i nyon mongs pa lnga po de dag ni /
svatantrāścaite pañcopakleśā adhimātrasaṃprayogitvāt rang dbang can yin te /
ma rig pa tsam dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro /
yathaite īrṣyādayaḥ pañcopakleśā bhāvanāheyāḥ /
svatantrāśca tathā malāḥ /
ṣaṭkleśamalāstathaiva 		ji ltar phrag dog la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa lnga po de dag bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang rang dbang can yin pa /
de bzhin dri ma rnams /
nyon mongs pa'i dri ma drug kyang de dang 'dra'o /
ete punaryathoktā upakleśāḥ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ji skad du bshad pa de dag ni /
kāme 'śubhāḥ 'dod na mi dge /
kāmadhātāvakuśalāḥ /
tatrāpi /
trayo dvidhā 		'dod pa'i khams na ni mi dge ba dag yin no /
de dag las kyang /
gsum rnam gnyis /
styānauddhatyamiddhānyakuśalāvyākṛtāni /
pareṇāvyākṛtāstataḥ 		rmugs pa dang rgod pa dang gnyid rnams ni mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dag yin no /
de yan chad ni lung ma bstan /
kāmadhātorurdhvamavyākṛtāḥ upakleśā yathāsaṃbhavam 'dod pa'i khams yan chad kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni ci rigs par lung du ma bstan pa dag yin no /
kati punareṣāṃ kutastyā veditavyāḥ /
māyā śāṭhyaṃ ca kāmādyadhyānayoḥ /
etau dvau kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne 		de dag las du zhig gang na yod par rig par bya zhe na; 'dod dang bsam gtan dang po na /
g yo sgyu /
'di gnyis ni 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po na yod do /
kathaṃ brahmaloke māyāḥ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na sgyu ji ltar yod ce na /
brahmavañcanāt tshangs pas 'drid phyir ro /
sa hi tatra mahābrahmā vitathātmasaṃdarśanatayā āyuṣmantamaśvajitaṃ vañcayituṃ pravṛttaḥ tshangs pa chen po de ni bdag nyid log par kun ston pas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'dred par zhugs so /
uktamapi śāṭhyaṃ prasaṅgāgataṃ punarevoktam g yo ni bshad zin mod kyi zhar la 'ongs pas smos so /
styānauddhatyamadā dhātutraye rmugs rgod rgyags pa khams gsum na /
ete trayastraidhātukāḥ gsum po 'di dag ni khams gsum po dag yin no /
anye kāmadhātujāḥ /
ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ pañcāpanīyānya ekādaśopakleśāḥ kāmāvacarā eva 		gzhan dag na 'dod khams las skyes pa; bcu drug las lnga bor te /
nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcu gcig ni 'dod pa na spyod pa kho na yin no /
uktā kleśāḥ upakleśāśca /
athaiṣāmanuśayānāṃ kati manobhūmikāḥ kati ṣaḍvijñānakāyikāḥ /
saṃkṣepataḥ 		nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams bshad zin to /
yang de rnams las yid kyis pa ni du zhig yin /
rnam par shes pa drug gi sa pa ni du zhig yin zhe na /
mdor bsdu na /
samānasiddhā dṛggheyā manovijñānabhūmikāḥ /
darśanaprahātavyāḥ sarve manobhūmikāḥ saha mānasiddhābhyāṃ bhāvanāheyābhyāmapi 		mthong spang bya nyid nga rgyal bcas /
yid rnam shes kyi sa pa yin /
mthong bas spang bar bya ba thams cad ni yid kyi sa pa dag yin te /
gnyid dang nga rgyal bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang yang bcas pa thams cad ni yid kyi sa pa dag yin te /
te hi sakale manobhūmike de dag ni thams cad yid kyi sa pa dag yin no /
upakleśāḥ svatantrāśca nye ba'i nyon mongs rang dbang yang /
ye ca kecidupakleśāḥ svatantrāste bhāvanāheyā api santo manobhūmikā eva draṣṭavyāḥ /
ṣaḍvijñānāśrayāḥ pare 		nyon mongs pa rang dbang can gang dag yin pa de dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin yang yid kyi sa pa kho na yin par blta bar bya'o /
gzhan ni rnam shes drug rten can /
anye kleśopakleśāḥ ṣaḍvijñānabhūmikāḥ veditavyāḥ nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan dag ni rnam par shes pa drug gis pa dag yin par rig par bya'o /
ke punaranye /
bhāvanāprahātavyā rāgapratighāvidyā upakleśāśca tatsaṃprayuktāḥ /
āhlīkyānapatrāpyastyānauddhatyāni /
ye ca kleśamahābhūmikeṣūktāḥ /
yānīmāni sukhādīni pañcendriyāṇi eṣāṃ katamenendriyeṇa katamaḥ kleśa upakleśo vā saṃprayuktaḥ 		gzhan yang gang dag cig yin zhe na /
bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang ma rig pa rnams dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa dang rmugs pa dang rgod pa rnams dang nyon mongs pa'i sa pa mang po ba dag gi nang du bshad pa gang dag yin pa'o /
bde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po gang dag yin pa /
de dag las dbang po gang zhig nyon mongs pa 'am /
nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang dang mtshungs par ldan zhe na /
sukhabhyāṃ saṃprayukto hi rāgaḥ bde ba dag dang 'dod chags su /
mtshungs ldan /
sukhasaumanasyābhyāṃ rāgaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ 'dod chags ni bde ba dang yid bde ba dag dang mtshungs par ldan no; /
dveṣo viparyayāt zhe sdang bzlog pa'o /
duḥkhābhyāmityarthaḥ /
duḥkhena daurmanasyena ca 		sdug bsngal dag dang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan te /
harṣadainyākāravartitvāt ṣaṅvijñānabhūmikatvācca rāgadveṣayoḥ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag ni dga' ba dang skyo ba'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir dang rnam par shes pa drug gi sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
mohaḥ sarvaiḥ /
avidyāyāḥ sarvakleśasaṃprayogitvāt pañcabhirapīndriyaiḥ saṃprayogaḥ /
asaddṛṣṭirmanoduḥkhasukhena tu /
manoduḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ manaḥsukhaṃ saumanasyaṃ ca 		ma rig pa dag thams cad dang /
ma rig pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dbang po lnga char dang yang mtshungs par ldan no /
med lta yid bde sdug bsngal dang /
yid sdug bsngal ba ni yid mi bde ba'o /
yid bde ba ni yid bde ba ste /
tābhyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ saṃprayuktā puṇyakarmaṇāṃ pāpakarmaṇāṃ ca yathākramam log par lta ba ni de dag de dang mtshungs par ldan te /
bsod nams kyi las can rnams dang sdig pa'i las can rnams kyi dang go rims bzhin no /
daurmanasyena kāṅkṣā yid mi bde ba dang the tshom mo /
saṃśayito hi niścayenārthī durmanāyate the tshom zos pa nges pa don du gnyer ba na /
anye saumanasyena yid mi bde bar 'gyur ro /
anye 'nuśayāḥ saumanasyenaiva saṃprayuktāḥ gzhan yid bde dang phra rgyas gzhan dag ni yid bde ba kho na dang mtshungs par ldan no /
ke punaranye /
catasro dṛṣṭano mānaśca /
harṣākāravartitvāt 		gzhan yang gang dag gcig yin zhe na /
lta ba bzhi dang nga rgyal te /
dga' ba'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃpratisaṃyuktā ime 'nuśayā nirdiṣṭāḥ phra rgyas su bshad pa de dag ci zhig dang ldan zhe na /
āha /
kāmajāḥ 		'dod las skyes /
evaṃ pratiniyataṃ saṃprayogamuktvā sāmānyenāha de ltar na mtshungs par ldan pa so sor nges pa bshad nas spyir smras pa /
sarve 'pyupekṣayā btang snyoms dang kun /
sarve 'pyete 'nuśayā upekṣendriyeṇa saṃprayuktāḥ phra rgyas 'di dag thams cad ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan te /
pravāhacchedakāle kila kleśānāmavaśyamupekṣā saṃtiṣṭhate nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rgyun 'chad pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar btang snyoms kun du gnas so zhes grag go /
adhobhūmikāḥ kathamityāha yang sa gong ma pa rnams ji lta bur zhe na /
svaiḥ svairyathābhumyūrdhvabhūmikāḥ /
svaiḥ svairindriyairurdhvabhūmikā anuśayāḥ saṃprayujyante /
yasyāṃ bhūmau yāvantīndriyāṇi 		sa gong ma rnams /
sa ji bzhin du rang rang dang sa gong ma'i phra rgyas rnams ni sa gang na dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa rang rang gi dbang po rnams dang mtshungs par ldan te /
tatrāpi cāturvijñānakāyikāścāturvijñānakāyikairmanobhūmikā manobhūmikaireva yathāsaṃbhavam de na yang ci rigs par rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhin pa rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhi pa rnams dang mtshungs par ldan la yid kyi sa pa rnams ni yid kyi sa pa rnams kho na dang mtshungs par ldan no /
uktaḥ kleśānāmindriyasaṃprayogaḥ nyon mongs pa rnams dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa bshad zin to /
upakleśānāṃ punaḥ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams las /
daurmanasyena kaukṛtyamīrṣyā krodho vihiṃsanam 'gyod dang phrag dog khong khro dang /
rnam 'tshe khon du 'dzin pa dang /
upanāhaṃ pradāśaśca 'chab pa yid mi bde ba dang /
saṃprayuktānīti vartate mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
dainyākāravartitvādeṣāṃ manobhūmikatvācca /
mātsaryaṃ tu viparyayāt 		'di dag ni skyo ba'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir dang yid kyi sa pa yin pa'i phyir dang ser sna dag gi bzlog pa yin /
saumanasyenetyarthaḥ /
lobhānvayatvena harṣākāravartitvāt /
māyā śāṭhyamathī bhrakṣo middhaṃ cobhayathā 		yid bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba dga' ba'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
g yo dang sgyu dang rgyags 'chab gnyid /
gnyi ga dang ldan /
saumanasyadaurmanasyābhyāṃ saṃprayujyante yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dag dang mtshungs par ldan te /
kadāciddhi sumanāḥ paraṃ vañcayate res 'ga' ni yid bde ba dag gis pha rol po 'drid par byed la /
kadāciddurmanāḥ /
evaṃ yāvat svapiti /
madaḥ 		res 'ga' ni yid mi bde ba dag gis te /
gnyid kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra'o /
sukhābhyām /
tṛtīye dhyāne sukhenādhastātsaumanasyena ūrdhvamupekṣayā 		bde dag dang rgyags pa /
bsam gtan gsum pa na ni bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan no /
man chad na ni yid bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan no /
yasmāt /
sarvagopekṣā /
atastayā sarve 'nuśayāḥ saṃprayujyante /
na hi tasyāḥ kvacit pratiṣedho yathā 'vidyāyāḥ 		yan chad na ni btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan no /
'di ltar btang snyoms kun du 'gro /
thams cad btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan te /
de ni ma rig pa bzhin du gang la yang 'gag pa med do /
cātvāryanyāni pañcabhiḥ bzhi po gzhan ni lnga dag dang /
āhlīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ caitānicatvāri paryavasthānāni pañcabhirapīndriyaiḥ saṃprayujyante ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa dang rmugs pa dang rgod pa dang kun nas dkris pa bzhi po 'di dag ni dbang po lnga char dang mtshungs par ldan te /
akuśalamahābhūmikatvāt kleśamahābhūmikatvācca mi dge ba'i sa mang po ba yin pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
yāni sūtre pañca nivaraṇāni uktāni kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca /
tatra kiṃ traidhātukyaḥ styānauddhatyavicikitsā gṛhyante 		mdo las /
'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems dang rmugs pa dang gnyid dang rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang the tshom dang sgrib pa lnga gsungs pa gang dag yin pa de la ci rmugs pa dang rgod pa dang the tshom khams gsum pa dag bzung ngam /
atha kāmapratisaṃyuktā eva /
kevalo 'yaṃ paripūrṇo'kuśala rāśiryaduta pañca nivaraṇānītyekāntākuśalatvavacanātsūtre 		'on te 'dod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag kho na gzung zhe na /
mdo las /
'di ni mi dge ba'i phung po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin te /
kāme nivaraṇāni /
nānyatra dhātau /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ dve styānamiddhe ekaṃ nivaraṇamuktaṃ dve cauddhatyakaukṛtye ekam 		'di lta ste /
sgrib pa lnga'o zhes gcig tu mi dge bar gsungs pa'i phyir dang 'dod na sgrib rnams /
yod na khams gzhan na ni med do /
ci'i phyir rmugs pa dang gnyid gnyis kyang sgrib pa gcig tu bshad la /
rgod pa dang 'gyod pa gnyis kyang gcig tu bshad ce na /
ekavipakṣāhārakṛtyataḥ /
dvyekatā /
dvayorekatā dvyekatā /
vipakṣaḥ pratipakṣo 'nāhāra ityeko 'rthaḥ /
styānamiddhayoreka āhāraḥ sūtre 'nāhāraśca 		mi mthun dang zas dang bya ba gcig pa'i phyir /
gnyis gcig /
gnyis gcig tu byas pa ni gnyis gcig go /
mi mthun pa dag dang gnyen po dang zas ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni don gcig go /
mdo las rmugs pa dang gnyid dag gi zas kyang gcig /
zas ma yin pa yang gcig tu gsungs te /
kaḥ styānamiddhanivaraṇasyāhāraḥ /
pañca dharmāḥ 		rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pa'i zas gang zhe na /
chos lnga ste /
tandrā aratirvijṛmbhikā bhakte 'samatā cetaso līnatvamiti rmya ba dang mi dga' ba dang bya rmyang dang kha zas kyi drod mi zin pa dang sems zhum pa nyid do /
atha styānamiddhanivaraṇasyānāhāraḥ ālokasaṃjñeti /
kṛtyamanayorapyekam 		rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa gang zhe na /
snang ba'i 'du shes so /
'di gnyis kyi bya ba yang gcig ste /
ubhe api hyete cittaṃ layaṃ codayataḥ 'di gnyi gas kyang sems zhum par byed do /
auddhatyakaukṛtyayorapyeka āhāra uktaḥ ekonāhāraḥ /
kaścauddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasyāhāraḥ /
catvāro dharmāḥ 		rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dag gis kyang zas kyang gcig /
zas ma yin pa yang gcig tu gsungs te /
rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i zas gang zhe na /
chos bzhi ste /
jñātivitarko janapadavitarko 'maravitarkaḥ paurāṇasya ca hasitakriḍitaramitaparibhāvitasyānusmartā bhavatīti /
kaścauddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasyānāhāraḥ /
śamatha iti /
kṛtyamapyanayorekam 		nye du'i rnam par rtog pa dang yul gyi rnam par rtog pa dang mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang sngon dgod pa dang rtses pa dang dga' ba dang dga' mgur yongs su spyad pa rnams rjes su dran pa yin no /
rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa gang zhe na /
zhi gnas so /
'di gnyis kyi bya ba yang gcig ste /
ubhe api hyete cittamavyupaśāntaṃ vartayataḥ /
ata ekavipakṣāhārakṛtyatvāt dvayorapyekatvamuktam 		'di gnyi gas kyang sems rnam par ma zhi bar byed do /
de lta bas na mi mthun pa dang zas dang bya ba gcig pa'i phyir gnyis gcig tu bshad do /
yadi sarvakleśā nivaraṇaṃ kasmāt pañcaivoktāni gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang sgrib pa yin na ci'i phyir lnga kho nar bshad ce na /
pañcatā skandhavidhātavicikitsanāt phung po gnod byed dang the tshom phyir na lnga nyid do /
kāmacchandavyāpādābhyāṃ śīlaskandhavidhātaḥ /
styānamiddhena prajñāskandhasyauddhatyakaukṛtyena samādhiskandhasya samādhiprajñayorabhāve satyeṣu vicikitsako bhavatītyataḥ pañcoktāni 		'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnod par byed do /
rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis ni shes rab kyi phung po la gnod par byed do /
rgod pa dang 'gyod pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la gnod par byed do /
ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dag med na /
bden pa dag la the tshom za bar 'gyur te /
etasyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ samādhiskandhavirodhina auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇasya pūrva grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti /
ato yathāsaṃkhyametābhyāṃ samādhiprajñāskandhopaghāta ityapare /
samādhiprayuktasya hi styānamiddhādbhayam 		de'i phyir lngar bshad do /
gzhan dag na re rtog pa 'di la ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang 'gal ba rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa sngar smos par 'gyur te /
de'i phyir grangs bzhin du 'di gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi phung po la gnod par byed pa yin te /
ting nge 'dzin la brtson pa ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis 'jigs la /
dharmapravicayaprayuktasyauddhatyakaukṛtyāditi /
anye tvanyathā varṇayanti 		chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la brtson pa ni rgod pa dang 'gyod pas 'jigs so zhes zer ro /
gzhan dag ni gzhan du brjod do /
kathaṃ varṇayanti ji skad du brjod ce na /
cāragatasya priyāpriyarūpeṣu viṣayeṣu nimittagrāhādvihāragatasya tatpūrvakau kāmacchandavyāpādau samādhipraveśasyādito 'ntarāyaṃ kurutaḥ /
tataḥ samādhipraviṣṭasyāprayogeṇa śamathavipaśyanā sevanāt styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanayorantarāyaṃ kurutaḥ /
vyutthitasyāpi dharmanidhyānakāle vicikitsāntarāyaṃ karoti 		rgyu bar gyur bas gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i yul dag la mtshan mar gzung ba'i phyir gnas par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin du 'jug pa la /
de sngon du 'gro ba'i 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems dag dang po nyid du bar chad byed do /
de'i 'og tu ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pas rigs pa ma yin par zhi gnas lhag mthong bstan pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du rmugs pa dang gnyid dang rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang the tshom ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dge la bar chad byed la /
langs pa la yang chos la 'os par rtog pa'i tshe the tshom gyi bar chad byed de /
ataḥ pañca nivaraṇānyuktāni /
idaṃ vicāryate /
visabhāgadhātusarvatragāṇāṃ nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ ca sāsravālambanānāṃ yadālambanaṃ parijñāyate tadā na prahīyante 		de'i phyir sgrib pa lngar bshad do zhes brjod do /
'di dpyad par bya ste /
skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba rnams dang 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa la rnams gang gi tshe dmigs pa yongs su shes pa de'i tshe ni spong bar mi 'gyur la /
yadā prahīyante tadālambanaṃ na parijñāyate iti kathameṣāṃ prahāṇam /
nāvaśyamālambanaparijñānāt kleśānāṃ kṣayo bhavati 		gang gi tshe spong bar 'gyur la de'i tshe ni dmigs pa yongs su mi shes na ji ltar de dag spong zhe na /
nyon mongs pa rnams ni dmigs pa yongs su shes pas zad par nges pa ma yin no /
kim tarhi /
caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
rnam pa bzhis so /
katamaiścaturbhiḥ rnam pa bzhi po gang dag gis she na /
darśanaheyānāṃ tāvat /
ālambanaparijñānāttadālambanasaṃkṣayāt /
ālambanagrahāṇācca /
tatrālambanaparijñānād duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyānāṃ svabhūmyālambanānāmanāsravālambanānāṃ ca 		re zhig mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams ni /
dmigs pa yongs su shes pa dang de la dmigs pa yang dag par /
zad dang dmigs pa spangs pas so /
de la dmigs pa yongs su shes pas ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba rang gi sa la dmigs pa rnams dang 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang par bya ba zag pa med pa la dmigs pa rnams zad par 'gyur ro /
tadālambanasaṃkṣayād visabhāgadhātusarvatragāṇām de la dmigs pa yang dag par zad pas ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba rnams zad par 'gyur te /
tadālambanā hi sabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ /
teṣu prahīṇeṣu te 'pi prahīṇā bhavanti 		de la dmigs pa ni skal ba mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba dag yin pas de dag spangs na de dag kyang spang ba yin no /
ālambanaprahāṇānnirodhamārgaheyānāṃ sāsravālambanānām /
te hyanāsravālambanāsteṣāmālambanam /
atasteṣu prahīṇeṣu te 'piprahīṇā bhavanti 		dmigs pa spangs pas ni 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa rnams zad par 'gyur te /
zag pa med pa la dmigs pa rnams ni de dag gi dmigs pa yin pas de dag spangs na de dag kyang spang ba yin no /
bhāvanāheyānāṃ punaḥ /
pratipakṣodayāt kṣayaḥ /
yasya hi kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣo mārga utpadyate sa prahīyate 		bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams ni gnyen po skyes pas zad par 'gyur /
nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gang dag gi gnyen po lam gang yin pa skyes pa de spong bar byed do /
kasya punaḥ kaḥ pratipakṣaḥ gang gi gnyen po gang zhig yin zhe na /
adhimātrādhimātrasya mṛdumṛduriti vistāreṇa paścāt pravedayiṣyāmaḥ chen po'i chen po ni chung ngu'i chung ngu zhes bya ba ste /
rgyas par ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o /
katividhaśca pratipakṣa ityāha gnyen po yang rnam pa du ma zhig yod ce na smras pa /
prahāṇādhārabhūtatvadūṣaṇāruyaścaturvidhaḥ /
pratipakṣaḥ 		gnyen po rnam bzhi spong ba dang /
gzhi dang srid nyid rnam par ni /
prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ sun 'byin zhes bya spong ba gnyen po ni bar chad med pa'i lam mo /
ādhārapratipakṣastasmātpareṇāryo mārgo yena tatprāpitaṃ prahāṇamādhāryate gzhi gnyen po ni de yan chad kyi lam gang yin pa ste /
gang gis des thob pa'i spong ba kun du 'dzin par byed pa'o /
dūrībhāvapratipakṣo vimuktimārgātpareṇa yo mārgaśchinnaprāptidūrīkaraṇāt thag bsring ba'i ngo bo'i gnyen po ni rnam par grol ba'i lam yan chad kyi lam gang yin pa ste /
rnyed pa chad pa thag bsring ba'i phyir ro /
vimuktimārgo 'pītyapare gzhan dag na re rnam par grol ba'i lam yang yin te /
so 'pi hi tāṃ prāpti dūrīkaroti des kyang thob pa de thag srid par byed do zhes zer ro /
vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣo yena mārgeṇa taṃ dhātum doṣato darśanādvidūṣayati /
api tveṣāmiyamātupūrvīṃ sādhvī bhavet /
vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣo duḥkhasamudayālambanaḥ prayogamārgaḥ /
prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ sarva ānantaryamārgaḥ /
ādhārapratipakṣo vimuktimārgaḥ 		rnam par sun 'byin pa'i gnyen po ni lam gang gis khams de la skyon du mthong nas rnam par sun 'byin par byed do /
gzhan yang 'di dag gi go rims rnam par sun 'byin pa'i gnyen po ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa sbyor ba'i lam mo /
spong ba gnyen po ni bar chad med pa'i lam thams cad do /
gzhi gnyen po ni rnam par grol ba'i lam mo /
dūrībhāvapratipakṣo viśeṣamārga iti /
prahīyamāṇaḥ kleśaḥ kutaḥ prahātavyaḥ 		thag bsring ba'i ngo bo'i gnyen po ni khyad par gyi lam mo zhes bya ba 'di ni ches legs par 'gyur ro /
nyon mongs pa spong ba na gang las spang bar bya zhe na /
prahātavyaḥ kleśa ālambanāt mataḥ /
na hi saṃprayogāt kleśo vivecayituṃ śakyate ālambanācca śakyate /
yasmānna punastadālambyotpadyate /
anāgatastāvacchakyetālambanādvivecayitum /
atītastu katham /
athālambana parijñānātprahātavya ityayamasyārthaḥ /
eṣo 'pi naikāntaḥ 		dmigs pa las nyon mongs pa ni spang bar byar 'dod /
mtshungs par ldan pa las ni nyon mongs par rnam par dbye bar mi nus so /
dmigs pa las ni nus te /
'di ltar yang de la dmigs nas mi skyi'o /
re zhig ma 'ongs pa ni dmigs pa las rnam par da bye bar yang nus grang na 'das pa go ji ltar nus /
'on te 'di'i don ni dmigs pa yongs su shes pas spang bar bya ba 'di yin no zhe na de yang ma nges te /
tasmādvaktavyametat de lta bas na 'di brjod par bya dgos so /
kiyatā kleśaḥ prahīṇo vaktavyaḥ /
svāsaṃtānikaḥ prāpticchedāt /
pārasāṃtānikastu kleśaḥ sarvaṃ ca rūpamakliṣṭaśca dharmastadālambanasvāsāṃtānikakleśaprahāṇāt 		ji tsam gyis na nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes brjod ce na rang gi rgyud la yod pa ni thob pa chad pas so; /
gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa ni nyon mongs pa dang gzugs med pa thams cad dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i chos ni de dag la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa rang gi rgyud la yod pa spangs pa'o /
dūrībhāva ityucyate /
katividhho dūrībhāvaḥ 		thag bsring ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba thag bsring ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du yod ce na /
caturvidhā kila dūratā /
vailakṣaṇyādvipakṣatvāddeśavicchedakālataḥ 		thag bsring ba'i ngo bo ni rnam pa bzhi yod do zhes grag ste /
mtshan nyid mi mthun mi mthun phyogs /
yul rnams chad dang dus kyis te /
bhūtaśīlapradeśādhvadvayānāmiva dūratā 'byung dang tshul khrims phyogs dang ni /
dus gnyis ring ba nyid lta bu'o /
vilakṣaṇadūratā yathā mahābhūtānām /
vailakṣaṇyātsahajānāmapi dūratā 		mtshan nyid kyis ring ba nyid ni dper na 'byung ba chen po rnams lhan cig skyes pa yin yang mtshan nyid mi mthun pas ring ba nyid lta bu'o /
vipakṣadūratā yathā śīlasya dauḥśīlyam /
deśavicchedadūratā yathā viprakṛṣṭadeśānāṃ deśavicchedāt pūrvapaścimasamudravat /
kāladūratā yathā atītānāgatadūramucyate 		gnyen pos ring ba nyid ni dper na 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las tshul khrims lta bu'o /
yul gyis ring ba nyid ni dper na bskal pa'i yul rnam par chad pas te /
shar dang nub kyi rgya mtsho bzhin no /
dus kyis ring ba nyid ni dper na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa lta bu'o /
dutastaddūram /
vartamānāt /
yadanantarātamutpadyamānaṃ vā tat kathaṃ dūram 		ring ba zhes bya ba de gang las ring ba yin /
de ltar las so /
'das ma thag pa dang skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ji ltar na ring ba yin /
adhvanānātvena taddūraṃ na cirabhūtabhāvitvena /
vartamānamapyevaṃ dūraṃ prāpnoti 		de ni dus tha dad pa nyid kyis ring ba yin gyi yun ring mo zhig na byung ba dang 'byung ba nyid kyis ni ma yin no /
de ltar yang de bzhin du ring bar 'gyur ro /
akāritrā ttarhi taddūram /
asaṃskṛtasya kathamantikatvaṃ sidhyati /
sarvatra tatprāpteḥ 		'o na ni byed pas ring ba nyid yin no /
'dus ma byas ji ltar na nye ba nyid du 'grub /
de thams cad du thob pa'i phyir ro /
atītānāgate 'pi tatprasaṅgaḥ /
ākāśaṃ ca katham 		'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro /
nam mkha' yang ji ltar nye ba yin /
evaṃ tarhyatītānāgatamanyo 'nyaṃ varttamānavyavahitatvād dūram de lta na 'o na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni da ltar gyis chod pa'i phyir phan tshun du ring ba nyid yin no /
varttamānamubhayo rāsannatvādantikam /
asaṃskṛtaṃ cāpyavyavahitatvāditi 		de ltar ni gnyi ga dang nye ba'i phyir nye ba yin la /
'dus ma byas kyang chod pa med pa'i phyir nye ba yin no /
evamapyatītānāgataṃ varttamānasyāntikatvādubhayaṃ prāpnoti /
evaṃ tu yuktaṃ syāt /
dharmasvalakṣaṇādanāgataṃ dūramasaṃprāptatvāt 		de lta na yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang nye ba'i phyir gnyi gar 'gyur ro /
'di skad du ma 'ongs pa ni ma thob pa'i phyir chos kyi rang gi mtshan nyid las ring ba yin la /
atītaṃ ca pracyutatvāditi /
kim mārgaviśeṣagamanāt kleśānāṃ punaḥ prahāṇaviśeṣo bhavati /
naitadasti 		'das pa ni zhig pa'i phyir ring ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs par 'gyur ro /
ci lam khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams kyi spangs pa yang dang yang du khyad par du 'gyur ram zhe na /
sarveṣāṃ hi kleśānāṃ /
sakṛt kṣayaḥ /
yasya yaḥ prahāṇamārgastenaiva tasya kṣayaḥ 		de ni med de nyon mongs pa thams cad ni lan cig tu zad /
gang gi spong ba'i lam gang yin pa de kho nas de zad pa yin no /
visaṃyogalābhasteṣāṃ punaḥ punaḥ de dag gi dral ba'i thob pa yang dang yang /
katiṣu kāleṣvityāha ṣaṭsu kāleṣu dus du zhig tu zhe na /
smras pa /
pratipakṣodayaphalaprāptīndriyavivṛddhiṣu dus drug tu ste /
gnyen po skyes dang 'bras thob dang dbang po rnam par 'phel rnams su /
pratipakṣo vimuktimārga etasminnabhipretaḥ 'di ni gnyen po'i rnam par grol ba'i lam min par bsams pa'o /
phalāni catvāri śrāmaṇyaphalāni 'bras bu dag ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhi'o /
indriyavivṛddhirindriyasaṃcāraḥ /
eteṣu kāleṣu kleśasya visaṃyogalābhaḥ 		dbang po rnam par 'phel ba ni dbang po lnga po 'pho ba'o /
dus de dag tu nyon mongs pa'i bral ba 'thob bo /
sa punareṣa yathāyogaṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
keṣāñcit ṣaṭsu kāleṣu keṣāñcid yāvaddvayoḥ 		de yang ci rigs par kha cig gis dus drug tu 'thob pa nas kha cig gis ni dus gnyis kyi bar du 'thob par blta bar bya'o /
sa eva visaṃyogastāsu tāsvavasthāsu parijñāsaṃjñāṃ labhate /
dve hi parijñe jñānaparijñā prahāṇaparijñā ca /
tatra jñānaparijñā sāsravaṃ jñānam /
prahāṇaparijñā tu prahāṇameva 		bral ba de nyid gnas skabs de dang de dag tu yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo /
yongs su shes pa ni gnyis te /
ye shes kyi yongs su shes pa dang spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa'o /
de la ye shes kyi yongs su shes pa ni zag pa med pa'i shes pa'o /
spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa ni spang ba kho na ste /
phale hetūpacārāt /
kimekaiva parijñā sarvaprahāṇam 		'bras bu la rgyu btags pa'i phyir ro /
ci spangs pa thams cad yongs su shes pa gcig kho na yin nam zhe na; smras pa /
netyāha ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
parijñā nava 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
yongs su shes dgu /
tatra tāvat /
kāmādyaprakāradvayasaṃkṣayaḥ /
ekā 		de la re zhig 'dod pa na /
dang po'i rnam gnyis zad la gcig /
kāmadhātāvādyasya prakāradvayasya duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyasya prahāṇamekā parijñā 'dod pa'i khams na dang po'i rnam pa gnyis te /
sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pa ni yongs su shes pa gcig yin no /
dvayoḥ kṣaye dve te /
kāmadhātāveva nirodhadarśanaheyasya prakārasyaprahāṇamekā parijñā 		gnyis zad pa ni de gnyis so /
'dod pa'i khams kho na na 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam pa spangs ba ni yongs su shes pa gcig yin la /
mārgadarśanaheyasyaikā /
yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tisraḥ parijñāḥ /
tathordhvaṃ nisra eva tāḥ /
rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tathaiva tisraḥ parijñā bhavanti /
duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇamekā nirodhadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ dvitīyā mārgadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tṛtīyeti traidhātukānāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ ṣaṭ parijñā bhavanti 		lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam pa spangs pa yang gcig yin no /
ji ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs ba yongs su shes pa gsum yin pa ltar /
de bzhin gong ma'i de gsum nyid /
de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam pa spangs pa yang yongs su shes pa gsum yin te /
sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni gcig yin no /
'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni gnyis yin no /
lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni gsum yin no /
de ltar na khams gsum pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni yongs su shes pa drug yin no /
anyā avarabhāgīyarūpasarvāsravakṣayāḥ /
tisraḥ parijñāḥ 		yongs su shes pa gzhan gsum ste tha ma'i cha dang mthun gzugs dang zag pa kun zad /
avarabhāgīyaprahāṇamekā parijñā /
rūpāsravaprahāṇamekā rūparāgakṣayaparijñā /
ārūpyāptānāṃ sarvāsravaprahāṇamekā sarvasaṃyojanaparyādāna parijñā 		tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa yang /
yongs su shes pa gcig yin no; /
gzugs kyi zag pa spangs pa yang gcig yin te /
gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad pa'i yongs su shes pa'o /
zag pa thams cad spangs pa yang gcig yin te /
kun du sbyor ba thams cad yongs su gtugs pa'i yongs su shes pa'o /
kasmādrūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ pṛthak parijñā na darśanaheyānām ci'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa ni tha dad par bstan la mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi ni ma yin zhe na /
bhāvanāheyānāmatulyapratipakṣatvāt /
ityetā nava parijñāḥ 		bsgom pas spong bar bya ba rnams kyi gnyen po mi 'dra pa'i phyir ro; /
de ltar na yongs su shes pa ni de dgu yin no /
āsāṃ pūrvikāḥ de dag las /
ṣaṭ kṣāntiphalaṃ /
yā eva darśanaheyaprahāṇasvabhāvāḥ 		snga ma drug bzod 'bras /
mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pa'i rang bzhin gang dag yin pa'o /
jñānasya śeṣitāḥ lhag ma rnams ni shes pa yis /
avarabhāgīyaprahāṇādiparijñā bhāvanāmārgaphalatvāt /
kathaṃ kṣāntiphalaṃ parijñā bhavanti 		tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa la sogs pa'i yongs su shes pa ste /
bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro /
ji ltar yongs su shes pa bzod pa'i 'bras bu yin zhe na /
kṣāntīnāṃ jñānaparivāratvāt bzod pa rnams ni shes pa'i 'khor can yin pa'i phyir te /
rājaparivāre rājopacāravat /
jñānaikaphalatvācca 		rgyal po'i 'khor la rgyal po nye bar btags pa bzhin pa dang shes pa dang 'bras bu gcig pa'i phyir ro /
anāgamyaphalaṃ sarvā dhyānānāṃ pañca vāthavā /
aṣṭau 		mi lcogs med 'bras thams cad do /
bsam gtan rnams kyi lnga'am brgyad /
vaibhāṣikamatena mauladhyānaphalaṃ pañca parijñā yā rūpārūpyāvacarakleśaprahāṇa svabhāvāḥ bye brag tu smra ba'i lugs kyis ni bsam gtan kyi [*gyi?] dngos gzhi'i 'bras bu yongs su shes pa lnga ste /
gzugs dang gzugs med pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spongs pa'i rang bzhin gang dag yin pa'o /
kāmāvacarakleśaprahāṇasyānāgamyaphalatvāt bhadantaghoṣakasya matenāṣṭau 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa rnams ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro /
btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs kyi lugs kyis ni brgyad de /
sa hi vītarāgasyāpi kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ darśanamārgaphalamicchanti /
anāsravavisaṃyogaprāptilābhāt 		de ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa yang bral ba'i thob pa zad pa med pa rnyed pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam gyi 'bras bur 'dod do /
avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñā tvanāgamyaphalameva tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu kho na yin no /
dhyānāntaraṃ dhyānavaddraṣṭavyam bsam gtan khyad par can yang bsam gtan bzhin du blta bar bya'o /
ārupyāṇāṃ tu /
sāmantakasyaikā 		gzugs med pa rnams kyis ni nye bar bsdogs pa gcig yin te /
ākāśānantyāyatanasāmantakasyaikā rūparāgakṣayaparijñā phalam /
maulārūpyatrayasya ca 		nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyi 'bras bu ni gcig yin te /
gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad pa'i yongs su shes pa'o /
gzugs med dngos gzhi gsum gyi yang /
maulānāṃ ca trayāṇāmārūpyāṇāmekaiva sarvasaṃyojanaparyādānaparijñā phalam gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi gsum gyi 'bras bu yang gcig kho na ste /
kun du sbyor ba thams cad yongs su gtugs pa'i yongs su shes pa yin no /
āryamārgasya sarvāḥ /
nava parijñāḥ phalam /
dve laukikasya 		yongs su shes pa dgu po thams cad 'phags pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu yin no /
gnyis /
'jig rten pa yi /
laukisya mārgasya dve avarabhāgīyarūparāgakṣayaparijñe phalam /
anvayasya ca 		lam gyi 'bras bu ni gnyis te /
tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad pa'i yongs su shes pa dag go /
rjes su yang /
anvayajñānasyāpi dveparijñe phalaṃ paścime rjes su shes pa'i 'bras bu yang yongs su shes pa gnyis te tha ma dag go /
dharmajñānasya tisrastu /
paścimā eva tridhātukabhāvanāheya pratipakṣatvāt /
ṣaṭ tatpakṣasya pañca ca 		chos shes pa ni gsum yin no /
tha ma dag kho na ste /
khams gsum pa'i bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyogs mthun gyi drug dang lnga /
dharmajñānapakṣasya ṣaṭ parijñāḥ phalaṃ yā eva dharmajñāna kṣantijñānānām chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni yongs su shes pa drug ste /
chos kyi bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyi 'bras bu gang dag yin pa kho na'o /
anvayajñānapakṣasya pañca yā evānvayakṣāntijñānānām /
pakṣagrahaṇena hi kṣāntijñānāni gṛhyante /
kasmānnaikaikaṃ prahāṇaṃ parijñā vyavasthāpyate /
yasmāt kṣāntiphalaṃ tāvat prahāṇaṃ vyavasthāpyate 		rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa ni lnga yin te /
rjes kyi bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyi 'bras bu gang dag yin pa kho na'o /
phyogs dang mthun pa smos pas ni bzod pa dang shes pa rnams bzung ngo /
ci'i phyir spangs pa re re yongs su shes par rnam par mi gzhag ce na /
'di ltar re zhig bzod pa'i 'bras bu bral ba ni /
anāsravaviyogāpterbhavāgravikalīkṛteḥ /
hetudvayasamudghātāt parijñā /
yatraitāni trīṇi kāraṇāni bhavanti tat prahāṇaṃ parijñocyate /
pṛthagjanasya tāvadanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirnāsti bhavāgravikalīkaraṇaṃ ceti nāsya prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate /
āryasyāpi yat kṣāntiphalaṃ tāvat prahāṇam /
tatra yāvat duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntāvanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirasti na tu bhavāgravikalīkṛṭam 		bral ba'i thob pa zag med dang /
srid rtse nyams par byas pa dang /
rgyu gnyis kun du bcom pa'i phyir /
yongs shes su rnam par gzhag go /
gang la rgyu 'di gsum yod pa de spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa zhes bya zhe na /
re zhig so so'i skye bo la ni bral ba'i thob pa zag pa med pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo nyams par byed pa med pas 'di'i spangs pa yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba'i ming mi thob bo /
'phags pa la yang bzod pa'i 'bras bu spangs pa gang yin pa de ni /
de la ji srid du sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa la gnas pa /
de srid du bral ba'i thob pa zag pa med pa yod mod kyi /
srid pa'i rtse mo mnyam par byas pa ni ma yin no /
duḥkhe 'nvayajñāne ubhayamasti na tu hetudvayasamudghātaḥ sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa la ni gnyis yod mod kyi /
rgyu gnyis kun du bcom pa ni ma yin te /
samudayadarśanaprahātavyasya sarvatragahetoraprahīṇatvāt rgyu kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'i phyir ro /
anyeṣu dharmānvayajñāneṣu sarvaṃ trayamasti chos dang rjes su shes pa gzhan dag la ni gsum po thams cad yod pas /
atastāsvavasthāsu prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate de'i phyir gnas skabs de dang de dag tu de spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa'i ming 'thob po /
jñānaphalaṃ tu prahāṇam /
ataśca kāraṇatrayāt parijñākhyāṃ labhate 		shes pa'i 'bras bu spangs pa ni rgyu gsum po de dang bzhi pa khams las 'das pa las /
yongs su shes pa'i ming 'thob ste /
caturthācca /
dhātvatikramāt 		khams mtha' dag las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir /
yadā dhātuṃ samatikrāmati gang gi tshe khams las yang dag par 'da' ba na'o /
kṛtsnadhātuverāgyāt ubhayasaṃyogaviyogaṃ pañcamaṃ kāraṇamāhurapare /
yaḥ prakāraḥ prahīṇo yadi tatrānyena tadālambanena kleśena visaṃyukto bhavatīti /
sa tu nāsya ubhayahetusamudghātāt dhātusamatikramācceti na brūmaḥ 		gnyis pa kun du sbyor ba dang bral ba rgyu lnga pa de smras pa /
rnam pa gang zhig spangs la gal te de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa gzhan dang bral bar gyur na'o zhes bya ba ni /
de ni rgyu gnyi ga yang dag par bcom pa dang khams las yang dag par 'das pa las gzhan ma yin par mi brjod do /
kaḥ katibhiḥ parijñābhiḥ samanvāgataḥ gang zhig yongs su shes pa du zhig dang ldan zhe na /
naikayā pañcabhiryāvaddarśanasthaḥ samanvitaḥ /
pṛthagjanastāvannaiva samanvāgataḥ 		gcig la gnas min mthong la gnas pa ni /
lnga pa'i bar dang yang dag ldan /
re zhig so so'i skye bo mi ldan pa kho na'o /
āryo 'pi darśanamārgastho yāvatsamudayadharmajñānakṣāntiṃ naiva samanvāgataḥ /
samudaye dharmajñāna ekayā samanvāgataḥ 		'phags pa mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa yang /
kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa'i bzod pa la gnas pa'i bar du mi ldan pa nyid do /
kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa ni gcig dang ldan no /
kun 'byung ba la rjes su shes pa ni gnyis dang ldan no /
samudaye 'nvayajñāne dvābhyām 'gog pa la chos shes pa ni gsum dang ldan no /
nirodhe dharmajñāne tisṛbhhirnirodhānvayajñāne catasṛbhirmārgadharmajñāne pañcabhiḥ 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa ni bzhi dang ldan no /
lam la chos shes pa ni lnga dang ldan no /
bhavanāsthaḥ punaḥ ṣaṅbhirekayā vā dvayena vā bsgom pa la gnas pa drug gam ni /
gcig gam yang na gnyis dang ngo /
bhāvanāmārgasthaḥ punarāryapudgalo mārgānvayajñāne ṣaḍibhiḥ parijñābhiḥ samanvāgato yāvat kāmavairāgyaṃ na prāptaḥ 'phags pa'i gang zag bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa lam la rjes su shes pa la gnas pa ji srid du /
'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba ma 'thob pa'am /
parihīṇo vā tataḥ kāmavairāgyaṃ prāptaḥ pūrvaṃ paścād vā ekayā 'varabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā de las yongs su nyams pa ni yongs su shes pa drug dang ldan no /
sngon nam phyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa ni /
tha ma'i cha dang mthun pas spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa gcig pu dang ldan no /
arhattvaṃ prāpta ekayaiva sarvasaṃyojanaparyādānaparijñayā dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa ni /
kun du sbyor ba thams cad yongs su gtugs pa'i yongs su shes pa gcig kho na dang ldan no /
parihīṇo 'pi rūpāvacareṇa paryavasthānenaikayā 'varabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā gzugs kyi spyod pas kun nas dkris pas yongs su nyams nas /
yang tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa gcig dang ldan no /
rūpavairāgyaṃ prāpto dvabhyāmavarabhāgīyaprahāṇarūparāgakṣayaparijñābhyām gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa ni; tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad pa'i yongs su shes pa gnyis dang ldan no /
prahīṇo 'pyārūpyāvacareṇa paryavasthānenābhyāmeva gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i kun nas dkris pas yongs su nyams pa yang gnyis po de dag dang ldan no; /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanāgāmyarhatorekaiva parijñā vyavasthāpyate na bhūyasyaḥ ci'i phyir /
phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dag gi yongs su shes pa gcig kho nar rnam par gzhag gi /
yasmāt /
tāsāṃ saṃkalanaṃ dhātuvairāgyaphalalābhataḥ /
dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parijñānāṃ saṃkalanaṃ bhavatyekatvena vyavasthāpanaṃ dhātuvairāgyāt phalaprāptitaśca 		mang du ni ma yin zhe na /
'di ltar khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'bras bu thob phyir de dag bsdoms /
yongs su shes pa rnams sdom zhing /
gcig tu rnam par 'jog pa ni /
khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'bras bu thob pa dang rgyu gnyis kyis yin la /
tayoścāvasthayoretadubhayaṃ bhavati de gnyi ga yang gnas skabs de gnyis na srid pas /
ataḥ sarvaṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃkalayyaikā parijñocyate de'i phyir spang pa thams cad bsdoms te yongs su shes pa gcig shes bya'o /
atha kaḥ kati parijñāstyajati labhate vā yang gang zhig gis yongs su shes pa du zhig yongs su gtong ngam /
'thob ce na /
ekāṃ dve pañca ṣaṭ kaścijjahātyāpnoti pañca na /
ekāṃ tyajati arhattvāt kāmavairāgyād vā parihīyamāṇaḥ 		la la gcig gnyis lnga dang drug /
gtong ste thob pa lnga min no /
dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba las /
yongs su nyams na gcig gtong ngo /
phyir mi 'ong ba gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig /
dve parijñe tyajatyanāgāmī rūpavītarāgaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇaḥ 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams na /
yongs su shes pa nyid gtong ngo /
pañca tyajati vītarāgapūrvī mārgānvayajñāne /
sa hyavarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñālābhe pūrvikāḥ pañca parijñāstyajati 		'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba /
lam la rjes su shes pa la gnas pa la ni lnga stong ste /
de ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa 'thob pa na /
yongs su shes pa snga ma lnga gtong ngo /
ṣaṭ parijñāstyajatyānupoūrvikaḥ kāmavairāgyāt mthar gyis pa la 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pas ni /
yongs su shes pa drug gtong ngo /
lābhe 'pyevameva /
kaścidekāṃ parijñāṃ labhate 		de bzhin du thob pa yang la las ni yongs su shes pa gcig kho na 'thob ste /
yaḥ kaścidapūrvā labhate /
kaścid dve yaḥ kevalādārūpyadhātuvairāgyāt parihīyate 		gang la la zhig gis sngon med pa 'thob bo /
la las ni gnyis te /
gang zhig gzugs med pa'i khams las /
'dod chags dang bral ba 'ba' zhig las yongs su nyams pas so /
kaścit ṣaṭ yo 'nāgāmiphalāt parihīyate /
pañca tu nai kaścillabhate 		kha cig gis ni drug ste /
gang zhig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa'o /
lnga 'thob pa ni 'ga' yang med pa nyid do /
samāptaḥ parijñāprasaṅgaḥ yongs su shes pa'i skabs rdzogs so /
abhidharmakośabhāṣye 'nuśayanirddeśo nāma /
pañcamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptmiti 		chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las; phra rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas lnga pa'o /
śrīlāmāvākasya yadatra puṇyam /
ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānam /
namo buddhāya /
uktaṃ yathā prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate /
tadapi ca /
kleśaprahāṇamākhyātaṃ satyadarśanabhāvanāt 		sarba mangg'a lam /
/
ji skad du spangs pa ni yongs su shes pa'i ming 'thob po zhes bshad pa de yang /
bden pa mthong dang bsgom pa las /
nyon mongs spangs pa zhes bshad pa /
darśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca kleśā iti vistareṇākhyātam nyon [dd] mongs pa rnams mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no zhes rgyas par bshad pa /
tāvidānīṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgau kimanāsravau sāsravāviti vaktavyam /
ata idamucyate 		da ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam de dag ci zag pa med pa'am /
zag pa dang bcas pa zhes brjod par bya zhe na /
de'i phyir 'di dag brjod de /
dvividho bhāvanāmārgo darśanakhyastvanāsravaḥ bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam gnyis te /
mthong ba zhes bya zag pa med /
dvidho bhavanāmārgo laukikok lokottaraśca /
darśanamārgastu lokottara eva traidhātukapratipakṣatvāt /
navaprakārāṇāṃ darśana heyānāṃ sakṛtprahāṇācca /
na hi laukikasya eṣā śaktirasti /
satyadarśanādityuktam 		bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam gnyis te /
'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o /
mthong ba'i lam ni khams gsum pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dang mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnam pa dgu cig car du sprang ba'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa kho na yin te; 'jig rten pa la ni de 'dra ba'i mthu med do /
bden pa mthong ba las zhes bshad pa /
bden pa de dag kyang gang zhig tu /
bden pa dag ni bzhir bshad do /
kānīmāni satyāni kati ca /
satyānyuktāni catvāri /
vavoktāni /
sāsravānāsravadharmanirdeśe /
anāsravā mārgasatyamiti svaśabdena pratisaṃkhyānirodho yo visaṃyoga iti nirodhasatyaṃ duḥkhaṃ samudayo loka ityatra duḥkhasamudayasatye 		gang du bshad ce na /
chos zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa bstan par zag med lam gyi bden pa dang zhes lam gyi bden ba rang gi ming gis bstan to /
so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gang /
bral ba'o zhes 'gog pa'i bden ba bstan to /
sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang /
zhes bya ba der sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi bden bdag bstan to /
ci 'di dag gi rim pa 'di kho na yin nam zhe na /
kimeṣa evaiṣāmanukramaḥ /
netyāha /
kiṃ tarhi /
duḥkhaṃ samudayastathā /
nirodhamārga iti 		smras pa /
ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu yin zhe na /
sdug bsngal kun 'byung de bzhin du /
'gog dang lam ste de ltar na /
eṣa eṣāmanukramaḥ /
svabhāvastu yathā pūrvamuktastayaivetipradarśanārthastathāśabdaḥ 		de dag gi rim ba ni 'di yin no /
de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rang gi ngo bo ni sngar ji skad bshad ba de kho na bzhin no zhes rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro /
sa punarayam /
eṣāṃ yathā 'bhisamayaṃ kramaḥ /
