yasya hi satyasyābhisamayaḥ pūrvasya pūrvanirdeśaḥ /
itarathā hi pūrvaṃ hetunirdeśo 'bhaviṣyat paścāt phalanirdeśaḥ 		de ni /
de dag ji ltar mngon rtogs rim /
bden pa gang zhig sngar mngon par rtogs pa de sngar bstan to /
de lta ma yin na rgyu ni sngar bstan la 'bras bu ni phyis bstan par 'gyur ro /
keṣāñcidutpattyanukūlā deśanāḥ kha cig ni skye ba dang mthun pa bstan te /
yathā smṛtyupasthānadhyānādīnām dper na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang; bsam gtan la sogs pa lta bu'o /
deṣāñcitprarūpaṇānukūlā deśanā yathā samyak prahāṇānām /
na hyeṣa niyamo yat pūrvamutpannānāṃ prahāṇāya cchandaṃ janayati 		kha cig ni rab tu brtag pa dang mthun par bstan te /
dper na yang dag par spong ba rnams lta bu ste /
gang sngar ni skyes pa rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed la /
paścādanutpannānāmanutpādāyeti /
satyānāṃ tvabhisamayānukūlā deśanā /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamevameṣāṃ satyānāmabhisamayaḥ 		phyis ni ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun bskyed pa'i nges pa 'di ni med do /
bden pa rnams ni mngon bar rtogs pa dang mthun par bstan pa yin no /
ci'i phyir bden pa rnams de ltar mngon par rtogs she na /
yatra hi satto yena ca vādhyate yataśca mokṣaṃ prarthayate tadevādau vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ parīkṣyate gang la chags pa dang gang gis gnod pa byed pa dang gang las thar pa don du gnyer ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bden bde nyid la dang por rnam par dpyod pa'i gnas skabs na yongs su rtog la /
phyis 'di'i rgyu ni gang zhig yin zhes kun 'byung gi bden pa la yongs su rtog go /
paścātko 'sya heturiti samudayasatyaṃ ko 'sya nirodha iti nirodhasatyaṃ ko 'sya mārga iti mārgasatyam /
vyādhiṃ dṛṣṭvā tannidānakṣayameṣajānveṣāṇavat /
sūtre 'pyeṣa eva satyānāṃ dṛṣṭānto darśitaḥ /
katamasmin sūtre /
caturbhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bhiṣaktalpasarttetyatra 		'di'i 'gog pa ni gang zhig yin zhes 'gog pa'i bden ba la yongs su rtog go /
'di'i lam ni gang zhig yin zhes lam gyi bden pa la yongs su rtog ste /
nad mthong bas de'i gzhi dang zad pa dang sman tshol ba bzhin no /
bden pa rnams kyi dpe 'di ni mdo las kyang bshad do /
mdo gang las she na /
yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i sman pas zug rdu 'byin pa zhes gsungs pa de las bstan to /
yathā ca vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ satyaparīkṣā tathābhisamayāvasthāyāṃ satyābhisamayaḥ /
pūrvavedhāt 		sngar 'phangs pa'i phyir ji ltar rnam par dpyod pa'i gnas skabs na bden ba la yongs su rtog pa de kho na bzhin du mngon par rtogs pa'i gnas skabs na yang bden pa mngon par rtogs te /
dṛṣṭabhūminiḥsaṃgāśvadhāvanavat dkyus sa bstan pa'i rta thags thogs med par rgyug pa bzhin no /
abhisamaya iti ko 'rthaḥ mngon bar rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i don ni ci zhe na /
abhisaṃbodha iṇo bodhanārthatvāt mngon par yang dag par rtogs pa'o /
karamādanāsrava eva na sāsravaḥ /
sa hi nirvāṇābhimukhaḥ samyakbodhaḥ 		ci'i phyir zag ba med pa kho na yin gyi zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin zhe na /
de ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par yang dag par rtog pa ste /
samyagiti tattvena /
tatra phalabhūtā upādānaskandhā duḥkhasatyam /
hetubhūtāḥ samudayasatyam /
samudetyasmāditi kṛtvā /
ata eva tayoḥ phalahetubhāvānnāmato bhedo na dravyataḥ /
nirodhamārgayostu dravyato 'pi 		yang dag pa zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid du'o /
de la nye bar len pa'i phung po 'bras bur gyur pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yin no /
rgyur gyur pa rnams ni kun 'byung gi bden ba yin te /
'di las kun 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir 'di gnyis ni rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pas ming gi sgo nas bye brag yod kyi rdzas su ni ma yin no /
'gog pa dang lam ni rdzas su yang bye brag yod do /
āryasatyānīti sūtra ucyante /
ko 'syārthaḥ /
āryāṇāmetānisatyāni tasmādāryasatyānīti sūtra evoktam 		mdo las 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes 'byung ba de'i don ci zhe na /
'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams la bden pas /
de lta bas na mdo kho na las /
kimanyeṣāmetāni mṛṣā 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bshad do /
sarveṣāmetāni satyānyaviparītatvāt ci 'di dag gzhan rnams la brdzun nam zhe na /
āryaistu yathaitāni tathā dṛṣṭāni nānyaiḥ /
ata āryāṇāmetāni satyānyucyante na tvanāryāṇāṃ vīparītadarśanāt /
yadāryāḥ sukhataḥ prāhustat pare duḥkhato biduḥ /
yatpare sukhatḥ prāhustadāryā duḥkhato biduḥ 		'di dag ni phyin ci ma log pa'i phyir thams cad la bden na 'phags pa rnams kyis ni 'di dag ji lta bde kho na bzhin du gzigs kyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin pas de'i phyir 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa zhes bya ba'i phyin ci log tu mthong ba'i phyir 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ni ma yin te /
tshigs su bcad pa las /
'phags pas bde bar gang gsungs pa /
de ni gzhan gyis sdug bsngal rig /
gzhan gyis bde bar gang smras pa /
de ni 'phags pas sdug bsngal rig /
iti gāthā ces 'byung ngo /
dve āryāṇāṃ satye dve ārye cāryāṇāṃ ca satye ityapare /
yathā vedanaikadeśo duḥkhasvabhāvaḥ /
kathaṃ sarve sāsravāḥ saṃskārā duḥkhamityucyante /
duḥkhāstriduḥkhatāyogādyathāyogamaśeṣataḥ 		gzhan dag na re gnyis ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin la /
gnyis ni 'phags pa yang yin 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yang yin no zhes zer ro /
gang gi tshe tshor ba'i phyogs gcig sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin pa de'i tshe ji ltar na 'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal zhes brjod ce na /
yid 'ong yid du mi 'ong dang /
de las gzhan zag bcas rnams nyid /
sdug bsngal nyid gsum ldan pa'i phyir /
manāṣā amanāpāśca tadanye caiva sāsravāḥ /
tisro hi duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā ca /
tābhiryathāyogamaśeṣataḥ sarva sāsravāḥ saṃskārā duḥkhāḥ 		ci rigs ma lus sdug bsngal lo /
sdug bsngal nyid ni gsum ste /
sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid dang 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid do /
de dag gis ci rigs par 'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ma lus par sdug bsngal ba yin te /
tatra manāṣā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā /
amanāṣā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā /
tebhyo 'nye saṃskāraduḥkhatayā /
ke punarmanāpāḥ ke 'manāṣāḥ ke knobhayathā /
tisro vedanā yathākramaṃ tadvaśena sukhavedanīyādayo 'pi saṃskārā manāpādisaṃjñāṃ labhante 		de la yid du 'ong ba rnams ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid do /
yid du mi 'ong ba rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid do /
de dag las gzhan pa rnams ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid do /
yid du 'ong ba ni gang dag yin /
yid du mi 'ong ba ni gang dag yin /
gnyi ga ma yin pa ni gang dag yin zhe na /
tshor ba gsum dang go rims bzhin te /
de'i dbang gis bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i 'du byed rnams kyang yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'i ming 'thob po /
sukhāyā hi vedanāyā vipariṇāmena duḥkhatā bde ba'i tshor ba ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid de /
mdo las /
sūtra uktaṃ sukhā vedanā utpādamukhā sthitisukhā vipariṇāmaduḥkhti bde ba'i tshor ba ni skye ba na yang bde /
gnas pa na yang bde la /
'gyur ba na sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs so /
duḥkhāyāḥ duḥkhasvabhāvenaiva duḥkhatā /
duḥkhā vedanā utpādaduḥkhā sthitiduḥkhā iti sūtre 		sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal gyi rang gi ngo bo kho nas sdug bsngal ba nyid de /
mdo las /
sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba ni skye ba na yang sdug bsngal la /
gnas pa na yang sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs so /
aduḥkhāsukhāvedanāyāḥ saṃskāreṇaiva duḥkhatā /
pratyayābhisaṃskaraṇādyadanityaṃ tadduḥkhamiti /
vedanāvattadvedanīyā api saṃskārā ucyante 		bde ba yang ma yin; sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin ba'i tshor ba ni rkyen gyis mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed kho nas sdug bsngal ba nyid de /
gang mi rtag pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin no zhes 'byung ngo /
de myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang tshor ba dang 'dra bar brjod do /
duḥkhameva duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā /
evaṃ yāvat saṃskārā eva duḥkhatetyapare 		gzhan dag na re sdug bsngal nyid sdug bsngal nyid yin pas sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid yin la /
'du byed nyid sdug bsngal yin pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro /
asādhāraṇatvāt manāṣā 'manāpānāṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhaduḥkhate ukte 'gyur ba yang sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dag ni yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir bshad do /
sarve tusaṃskārāḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatayā duḥkhāḥ /
tāṃstvāryā eva paśyanti /
āha cātra 		'du byed thams cad ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis sdug bsngal ba nyid la de dag kyang 'phags pa rnams kho nas gzigs so /
'dir smras pa /
ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vedyate pumbhiḥ lag mthil sbu nyag gcig 'dug pa /
mi rnams kyis ni mi rtogs la /
akṣigataṃ tu tathaiva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍaṃ ca /
karatalasadṛśo bālo na vetti saṃskāraduḥkhatāpakṣma 		de nyid mig tu song na ni /
mi bde ba dang gnod skyed ltar /
byis pa lag mthil 'dab yis; /
'du byed sdug bsngal spu mi rtogs /
akṣisadṛśastu vidvāṃstenaivodvijyate gāḍhamiti 'phags pa mig dang 'dra ba ni /
de yis shin tu yid kyang 'byung /
na hi bālānāmāvīcikeṣvapi skandheṣu tathā duḥkhabuddhiḥ pravartate yathāryāṇāṃ bhāvāgrikeṣvapīti /
evaṃ tarhi mārgasyāpi saṃskāraduḥkhatāprasaṅgaḥ /
saṃskṛtatvāt 		ji ltar 'phags pa rnams srid pa'i rtse mo pa dag la yang sdug bsngal gyi blo 'jug pa ltar byis pa rnams ni mnar med pa'i phung po rnams la yang de ltar sdug bsngal gyi blo mi 'jug go /
de lta na 'o na ni lam yang 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
pratikūlaṃ hi duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇānna mārgo duḥkham /
na hi tasyotpāda āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaḥ sarvaduḥkhakṣayāvāhanāt /
yadāpi te nirvāṇaṃ śāntataḥ paśyanti tadāpi yadeva duḥkhato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaiva nirodhaṃ śāntataḥ paśyantina mārgasya 		sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni mi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir lam ni sdug bsngal ba ma yin te /
de skye ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa 'dren pa'i 'phags pa rnams dang mi mthun pa med do /
gang gi tshe de dag mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar lta ba de'i tshe yang /
sdug bsngal du mthong ba gang yin pa de kho na'i 'gog pa la zhi bar lta'o /
yadāpi duḥkhamapyatrāsti tasmāt duḥkhamevāryasatyamucyate gang gi tshe 'di dag la bde ba yang yod pa de'i tshe ci'i phyir sdug bsngal kho na 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya zhe na /
sukhasyālpatvāt mūdgādibhāve 'pi māṣarāśyapadeśavadityeke kha cig na re bde ba myong ba'i phyir te /
mon sran sde'u la sogs pa yod bzhin du mon sran gre'u'i phung bo zhes ston pa bzhin te /
ko hi vidvān pariṣekasukhāṇukena gaṇḍasukhamiti vyavasyet /
āha khalvapi /
duḥkhasya ca hetutvāt duḥkhaiścānalpakaiḥ samuditatvāt /
duḥkhe ca sati tadiṣṭerduḥkhaṃ sukhamiti vyavasyanti iti 		mkhas pa su zhig chus btab pa'i bde ba chung dus 'bras bu bde ba yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur /
yang smras pa /
sdug bsngal gyi ni rgyu phyir dang /
sdug bsngal mang pos bskyed phyir dang sdug bsngal yod na bde 'dod phyir /
sahaiva tu sukhena sarvaṃ bhavamāryā duḥkhataḥ paśyanti /
saṃskāraduḥkhataikarasatvāt 		bde ba sdug bsngal zhes rtog go /
srid pa thams cad ni bde ba dang bcas te 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal du ro gcig ba'i 'phags ba rnams kyis sdug bsngal du gzigs te /
ato duḥkhamevāryāsatyaṃ vyavasthāpyate na sukham /
kathamidānīṃ sukhasvabhāvāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhataḥ paśyanti 		de'i phyir sdug bsngal kho na 'phags pa'i bden bar rnam par gzhag gi bden ba ni ma yin no /
da ni ji ltar bde ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshor ba rnams la sdug bsngal du lta zhe na /
anityatayā pratikūlatvāt /
yathā rūpasaṃjñādīnyapi duḥkhataḥ paśyanti 		mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mi mthun pa'i phyir te /
dper na gzugs dang 'du shes la sogs pa la yang sdug bsngal du lta mod kyi /
na catānyevaṃ duḥkhāni yathā duḥkhavedaneti de dag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba bzhin du sdug bsngal ba ni ma yin pa bzhin no /
yastu manyate duḥkhahetutvāditi /
tasyāsau samudayākāraḥ syānna duḥkhakāraḥ 		gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa de'i de ni kun 'byung gi rnam pa yin gyi sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa ni ma yin no /
āryāṇāṃ carūpārupyopapattau kathaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pravarteta /
na hi punasteṣāṃ duḥkhavedanāhetuḥ skandhā bhavanti /
saṃskāraduḥkhatā ca sūtre kimarthaṃ pṛthaguktā bhavet 		gzugs dang gzugs med par skyes pa dag gis 'phags pa rnams la yang ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes 'jug par 'gyur te /
de dag gi phung po rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rgyu ma yin no /
mdo las 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyang ci'i phyir gsungs par gyur /
yadi tarhyanityatvāt duḥkhataḥpaśyanti /
anityaduḥkhākārayoḥ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ 		gal te mi rtag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal nyid du lta na 'o na mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa dag la khyad par ci zhig yod /
udayavyayadharmitvādanityaṃ paśyanti skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag par lta la /
pratikūlatvāt duḥkham /
anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatītyanityākāro duḥkhākāramākarṣati /
nāstyeva sukha vedanetyekīyā duḥkhaiva tu sarvā 		mi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du lta ste /
mi rtag par mthong na mi mthun par 'gyur bas mi rtag pa'i rnam pas sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa 'dren par byed do /
kha cig na re bde ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba ni med pa nyid de /
kathamidaṃ gamyate thams cad sdug bsngal kho na yin no /
sūtrādyuktitaśca 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na /
kathaṃ tāvatsūtrāt mdo dang rigs pa las te /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti /
duḥkhā vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyeti /
duḥkhe sukhamiti saṃjñāviparyāsa iti /
evaṃ tāvatsūtrāt 		re zhig mdo las ji lta bu zhe na bcom ldan 'das kyis gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bde ba'i tshor ba ni sdug bsngal du blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal la bde ba'o snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log go zhes gsungs te /
re zhig mdo las ni de lta bu'o /
kathaṃ yuktitaḥ rigs pa las ji lta bu zhe na /
sukhahetvavyavasthānāt /
ya eva hi kecitpānabhojanaśītoṣṇādaya iṣyante sukhahetavasta evātyupayuktā akālopayuktāśca punarduḥkhahetavaḥ saṃpadyante 		bde ba'i rgyu rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir te /
kha cig bde ba'i rgyu btung ba dang bza' ba dang grang ba dang dro ba la sogs par 'dod pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho na ha cang spyad pa dang dus ma yin par spyad pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dag tu 'gyur ro /
na ca yuktā sukhahetubṛddhacyā samena vā 'nyasminkāle duḥkhotpattirityādita eva te duḥkhahetavo na sukhasya /
ante tu tadduḥkhaṃ vṛddhimāpannaṃ vyaktimāpadyata iti 		bde ba'i rgyu 'phel ba'am mnyam pas ni dus gzhan na sdug bsngal skyed par rigs pa ma yin pas de dag ni dang po kho na nas sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dag yin zhing bde ba'i rgyu ni ma yin la /
mjug tu ni sdug bsngal de 'phel bar 'gyur bas bsal bar 'gyur bar zad de /
evamīryāpathavikalpe 'pi vaktavyam spyod lam gyi bye brag la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o /
duḥkhapratikāre ca sukhabuddherduḥkhavikalpe ca /
na hi tāvat sukhamiti vedyate kiñcidyāvanna duḥkhāntareṇopadruto bhavati kṣutpipāsāśītoṣṇaśramakāmarāgaprabhaveṇa 		sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po dang sdug bsngal gyi bye brag la bde ba'i blo skye ba'i yang phyir te /
ji srid du bkres pa dang skom pa dang grang ba dang tsha ba dang ngal ba dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gtses par ma gyur ba de srid du bde ba'o snyam du tshor ba cung zad kyang med do /
tasmāt pratīkāra evāviduṣāṃ sukhabuddhirnasukhe duḥkhavikalpe ca vālaḥ sukhabuddhimutpādaynti yathāṃśādaṃśaṃ bhāraṃ saṃcārayantaḥ /
tasmānnāstyeva sukhamiti /
astyevetyābhivārmikāḥ 		de lta bas na mi mkhas pa rnams ni gnyen po kho na la bde ba'i blo 'jug gi bde ba la ni ma yin no /
byis pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi bye brag la yang bde ba'i blo skyed par byed de /
dper na phrag pa nas phrag par khur yod par byed pa lta bu'o /
de lta bas na bde ba ni med pa kho na'o zhes zer ro /
chos mngon pa pa rnams na re /
yod pa nyid do zhes zer te /
eṣa eva canyāyaḥ 'di nyid rigs pa yin no /
kathaṃ kṛtvā ji ltar byas pas she na /
idaṃ hi tāvadayaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ sukhāpavādī /
kimidaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāma 		re zhig bde ba la skur ba 'debs pa de la 'di dri bar bya ste /
sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin /
yadvādhanātmakaṃ cet /
kathamiti vaktavyam 		gal te gnod pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa'o zhes zer na ni ji lta bu yin zhes brjod par bya'o /
upaghātakaṃ cet /
anugrāhakaṃ sukhamiti siddham 		gal te gnod par byed pa yin no zhes zer na ni phan par byed pa bde ba yin no zhes bya bar grub po /
anabhipretaṃ cet /
abhipretaṃ sukhamiti siddham /
tadeva hyabhipretaṃ punaranabhipretaṃ bhavatyāryāṇāṃ naivālpakāle 		gal te mi 'dod pa yin no zhes zer na ni 'dod pa bde ba yin no zhes bya bar grub po /
gal te 'dod pa de nyid 'phags pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshe mi bzhed pa yin te /
tasmādaniṣpanamabhipretatvaṃ cet /
na 		de lta bas na 'dod pa nyid yongs su ma grub pa yin no zhes zer na ni ma yin te /
anyathā 'nabhipretatvāt /
yā hi vedanā svena lakṣaṇenābhipretā nāsau pouonastenaiva jātvanabhipretā bhavati 		mi 'dod pa ni gzhan du yin pa'i phyir ro /
tshor ba gang zhig rang gi mtshan nyid kyis 'dod pa de ni nam yang de kho nas mi 'dod par mi 'gyur te /
tathā hyenāmākārāntareṇa vidūṣayantyāryāḥ pramādapadaṃ caināṃ paśyanti mahābhisaṃskārasādhyāṃ ca vipariṇāminīṃ cānityāṃ cayenānabhipretā bhavati /
na tu khalu svalakṣaṇākāreṇa 		'di ltar 'phags pa rnams ni 'di gang gis na mi bzhed par 'gyur ba rnam pa gzhan gyis rnam par sun 'byin par byed cing /
'di la bag med pa'i gnas dang mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos bsgrub par bya ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba can dang mi rtag par lta'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pas ni ma yin no /
yadi cāsau svenātmanānabhipretā bhavennaiva tasyāṃ kasyacidrāgo bhavedyato vairāgyārthaṃ prakārāntareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ /
tasmādastyeva svalakṣaṇataḥ sukha vedanā /
yattu bhagavatoktaṃ yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti tadbhagavataiva nītārthaṃ saṃskārānityatāmānanda mayā saṃghāya bhāṣitaṃ saṃskāraviopariṇāmatāṃ ca yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti 		gal te 'di rang gi mtshan nyid kyis mi 'dod pa zhig yin bar gyur na ni de la su yang 'dod chags skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
gang gi phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ched du rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang skyon can du lta bar 'gyur te /
de lta bas na bde ba'i tshor ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis yod pa kho na'o /
bcom ldan 'das kyis gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kho nas kun dga' bo gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba ni ngas 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid dang 'du byed rnam par 'gyur ba nyid la dgongs nas gsungs so zhes don nges par mdzad pa yin no /
ato na duḥkhadukhatāṃ saṃdhāyaitaduktamiti siddhaṃ bhavati de lta bas na 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid las dgongs te gsungs pa ma yin par grub pa yin no /
yadica svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditavyaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyatkimarthamāryānanda evaṃ bhagavantamaprakṣyat /
tisra ime vedanā uktā bhagavatā sukhā duḥkhā 'duḥkhāsukhā ca /
uktaṃ cedaṃ bhagavatā yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti /
kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhagavatā bhāṣitam yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti 		gal te tshor ba thams cad rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba zhig yin par gyur na ni ci'i phyir 'phags pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba yang ma lags sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags ba dang tshor ba 'di gsum yang gsungs la /
bcom ldan 'das kyis gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes kyang gsungs na /
bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bka' stsal zhes zhus par gyur te /
evaṃ hi so 'prakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti /
bhagavānaṣyeva vyākariṣyat /
idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti /
na tvevamāha /
tasmātsantyeva svabhāvatastisro vedanāḥ /
idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkimcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyābhīprāyikametadvākyaṃ darśayati /
yadaṣyuktaṃ sukhā vedanā duḥkheti draṣṭavyeti /
ubhayaṃ tasyāmasti 		des kyang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas tshor ba gsum zhes bka' stsal zhes zhus par 'gyur la bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du tshor ba gsum zhes bya ba 'di ni ngas dgongs nas bshad pa yin no zhes lung bstan par 'gyur ba zhig na de skad kyang bka' stsal te /
de lta bas na tshor ba gsum ni rang gi ngo bos yod la /
gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba 'di ngas dgongs nas bshad pa yin no zhes tshig 'di ni dgongs pa can du ston par mdzad pa yin no /
gang yang bde ba'i tshor ba ni sdug bsngal du blta bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yang de la gnyi ga yod do /
sukhatvaṃ ca svabhāvatomanāpatvād duḥkhatvaṃ ca paryāyato vipariṇāmānityadharmatvāt rang gi ngo bos yid du 'ong ba'i phyir ni bde ba nyid yin la rnam par 'gyur ba dang mi rtag pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir rnam grangs kyis ni sdug bsngal nyid yin no /
sā tu sukhato dṛśyamānā bandhāya kalpate tadāsvādanāt /
duḥkhato dṛśyamānā mokṣāya kalpate 		de la bde bar mthong na ni 'dod chags can rnams de'i ro myong bar byed pa'i phyir 'ching bar 'gyur la /
tadvairāgyāditi /
yathā dṛśyamānā mokṣāya kalpate tathaināṃ draṣṭumājñāpayanti buddhāḥ /
kathamidaṃ gamyate svabhāvataḥ sā sukheti 		sdug bsngal du mthong na ni de la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir thar bar 'gyur bas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ji ltar mthong na thar bar 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du blta bar bka' stsal pa yin no /
de rang gi ngo bos bde zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na /
ya dāha /
saṃskārānityatāṃ jñātvā atho vipariṇāmatām /
vedanā duḥkhataḥ proktā saṃbuddhena prajānaneti /
yadapi coktaṃ duḥkhe sukhamiti saṃjñāviparyāsa iti /
ābhiprāyika eṣa nirdeśaḥ 		'di ltar /
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab mkhyen gyis /
'du byed mi rtag nyid dang ni /
rnam par 'gyur ba nyid mkhyen nas /
tshor ba sdug bsngal bar gsungs so /
zhes bya ba smos so /
gang yang sdug bsngal la bde ba'o snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log go zhes gsungs pa yang bstan ba 'di ni dgongs pa can yin te /
lokasya hi sukhasaṃjñā vedanāyāṃ kāmaguṇeṣūpapattau ca 'jig rten ni tshor ba dang 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang skye ba la bde bar 'du shes so /
tatra sūkhaṃ vedanāṃ paryāyeṇa duḥkhaṃ satīmekāntasukhāṃ paśyato viparyāsaḥ /
evamupapattim /
tasmānnātaḥ sukhavedanā 'bhāvasiddhiḥ /
yadi tu svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyat tisro vedanā iti vacane koguṇo 'bhaviṣyat 		de la bde ba'i tshor ba la ni rnam grangs kyis sdug bsngal yang yod na gcig tu bde bar lta ba ni phyin ci log yin la /
'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la yang bde ba ni chung la sdug bsngal ni mang ba yin na gcig tu bde bar lta ba ni phyin ci log pa yin te /
skye ba la de dang 'dra'o /
de lta bas na bde ba'i tshor ba med par mi 'grub po /
gal te tshor ba thams cad rang gi ngo bo kho nas sdug bsngal ba yin par 'gyur na tshor ba gsum zhes gsungs pa la yon tan ci zhig yod par 'gyur /
lokānuvṛttyeti cet na /
sarvaveditaduḥkhatvasya saṃskāravipariṇāmānityatāṃ saṃdhāya bhāṣitavacanāt yathābhūtavacanācca /
yacca sukhendriyaṃ yacca saumanasyendriyaṃ sukhaiṣā vedanā draṣṭavye ti vistareṇoktvā yenemāni pañcendriyāṇyevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭāni trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni prahīṇāni bhavantī tyevamādi 		gal te 'jig rten dang mthun par gsungs pa yin no zhe na ma yin te /
tshor ba thams cad sdug bsngal ba nyid ni ngas dgongs nas gsungs so zhes bka' stsal pa'i phyir ro /
yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin zhes gsungs pa'i yang phyir te /
bde ba'i dbang po gang yin pa dang yid bde ba'i dbang po gang yin pa 'di ni bde ba'i tshor ba yin par blta bar bya'o zhes rgyas par gsungs nas gang gis dbang po lnga po 'di dag de ltar yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong zhing /
loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ vyavasyet /
mṛdvadhimātramadhyāsu yathākramaṃ sukhādibuddhiriti cet /
na /
sukhasyāpi trividhatvāt mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣvadhimātrā disukhabuddhiḥ syāt /
yadā ca gandharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā katamat duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhirbhavati 		de'i kun du sbyor ba gsum yang sbangs pa yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs so /
'jig rten yang ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la rnam pa gsum du rtog par 'gyur gal te chung ngu dang chen po dang 'bring dag la go rims bzhin du bde ba la sogs pa'i blo skye'o zhe na ni bde ba la yang rnam pa gsum yod pas sdug bsngal chung ngu la sogs pa la bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur ro /
gang gi tshe dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khyad par las skyes pa'i bde ba sang ba de'i tshe gang la 'di bde ba'i blor 'gyur ba sdug bsngal chung ngur gyur pa yang gang zhig yin /
anutpannavinaṣṭe catasminmṛduni duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukabuddhiḥ syāt /
aśeṣaduḥkhāpagamāt /
evaṃ kāmasukhasaṃmukhībhāve 'pi vaktavyam /
kathaṃ ca nāmedaṃ yojyate yanmṛdunivedite suvyaktastīvro 'nubhavo gṛhyate madhye punaravyakta iti 		sdug bsngal chung ngu de ma skyes pa dang 'gags pa na sdug bsngal ma lus pa dang bral ba'i phyir bde ba'i blo shin tu ches skye bar 'gyur te /
'dod pa'i bde ba mngon sum du gyur pa la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o /
tshor ba chung du la ni nyams su myong ba shin tu gsal ba dang shas chen por 'dzin la /
'bring la ni mi gsal bar 'dzin zhes bya ba gang yin ba 'di yang ji ltar rung /
triṣu ca dhyāneṣu sukhavacanāt mṛdu duḥkhaṃ syāt bsam gtan gsum na bde ba yod do zhes 'byung bas sdug bsngal chung dur yang 'gyur la /
ūrdhvamaduḥkhasukhavacanānmadhyaṃ duḥkhamiti na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkheṣu sukhādivedanāvyavasthānam gang na bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yod do zhes 'byung bas sdug bsngal 'bring du yang 'gyur te /
de lta bas na sdug bsngal chung ngu la sogs pa la bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba rnam par gzhag tu mi rung ngo /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā rūpaṃ cenmahānāmannekāntaduḥkhamabhaviṣyanna sukhaṃ na sukhānugatamityevamādi /
tasmādapyasti kiñcitsukham /
evaṃ tāvanna sūtrātsukhavedanā 'bhāvaḥ sidhyati /
yatpunaḥ sukhahetvavyavasthānādityuktam 		bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ming chen gal te gzugs gcig tu sdug bsngal ba zhig yin par gyur na ni bde ba yang med /
bde ba dang rjes su 'brel pa yang med ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs pas de'i phyir yang bde ba cung zad cig yod de /
re zhig de lta na mdo las bde ba'i tshor ba med par mi 'grub bo /
gang yang bde ba'i rgyu rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa /
hetvaparijñānādidamucyate /
āśrayaviśeṣāpekṣo hi viṣayaḥ sukhaheturvā bhavati duḥkhaheturvā /
na kevalo viṣayaḥ 		de yang rgyu yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir smra bar zad de /
rten gyi khyad par la ltos pa'i yul bde ba'i rgyu 'am /
sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin gyi yul 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no /
sa yāṃ kāmavasthāṃ prāpya sukhaheturbhavati na tāṃ punaḥ prāpya kadācinna bhavatīti vyavasthita eva sukhahetuḥ de lus kyi gnas skabs gang zhig dang phrad na bde ba'i rgyu yin pa de ni de dang phrad na ma yin pa ni nam yang ma yin pas bde ba'i rgyu rnam par gnas pa kho na yin te /
tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣāpekṣaḥ svādupākaheturbhavati sa evāsvādapākahetuḥ na tu yāṃ pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svadupākahetustāṃ punaḥ prāpya na heturityeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetuḥ 		dper na btso bar bya ba'i 'byung ba'i khyad par la ltos pa'i me de nyid zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yang yin zhing /
de nyid mi zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yang yin la btso bar bya ba'i 'byung ba'i gnas skabs gang dang phrad nas zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yin pa de dang phrad nas rgyu ma yin pa ni ma yin pa bzhin te 'di ni dpe yin no /
bsam gtan dag na yang bde ba'i rgyu ji ltar rnam par mi gnas pa yin /
yattu punaḥ duḥkhapratikāre sukhabuddhirityuktaṃ tatra vihitaḥ pratīkāraḥ /
yadā gandhādiviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā kasya pratīkāreṣu sukhabuddhirbhavatyanutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukhabuddhiḥ syāt 		gang yang gnyen po la bde ba'i blo skye zhes smras pa de la yang gang gi tshe dril la sogs pa'i khyad par las skyes pa'i bde ba myong ba de'i tshe gang gis gnyen po la bde ba'i blor 'gyur /
sdug bsngal de ma skyes pa dang 'gags nas bde ba'i blo shin tu ches skye bar yang 'gyur ro /
dhyānaje sukhe kaḥ kasya pratīkāra ityevamādi /
bhāvasaṃcāre 'pi cāvasthāntarajaṃ sukhamevotpadyate /
yāvadasau tādṛśī kāyāvasthā 'ntarghīyate 		bsam gtan las skyes pa'i bde ba la yang gang gi gnyen po yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa lan bshad zin to /
khur sbed pa la yang ji srid du lus kyi gnas skabs de lta bu med par ma gyur gyi bar du gnas skabs gzhan las skyes pa'i bde ba khon skye bar 'gyur ro /
anyathā hi paścādbhūyasī sukhabuddhiḥ syāt de lta ma yin na phyis bde ba'i blo rje mang du skye bar 'gyur te /
evaṃ śrāntasyeryāpathavikalpeṣu veditavyam ngal ba'i spyod lam gyi rnam pa dag la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
ante kuto duḥkhabuddhirārambho yadi nādita iti /
cet 		gal te dang po nas rtsom pa zhig med na mjug tu sdug bsngal gyi blor ga la 'gyur zhe na /
kāyapariṇāmaviśeṣānmadyādīnāmante mādhuryaśuktatāvat lus yongs su 'gyur pa'i khyad par las te /
chang la sogs pa mngar ba la mjug tu skyur por 'gyur ba bzhin no /
tasmādastyeva sukhā vedaneti siddham de lta bas na bde ba'i tshor ba yod pa kho na'o zhes bya ba yang grub la /
triduḥkhatāyogādvā sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ duḥkhamiti /
yattu samudayasatyaṃ tadevocyate /
idamutsūtram sūtre hi tṛṣṇaivoktā /
pradhānyādasau sūtra uktā /
anye 'pi tu samudayaḥ 		sdug bsngal nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba yang grub pa yin no /
kun 'byung gi bden pa gang yin pa de nyid sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yin no zhes bya ba de ni mdo las thal ba yin te /
mdo las ni sred pa kho na yin par bshad do /
de ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir mdo las bshad kyi gzhan dag kyang kun 'byung ni yin no /
kathamidaṃ pratyetavyam 'di ji ltar khong du chud par bya zhe na /
anyatrānyasyāpi vacanāt gzhan las gzhan yang yin par gsungs pa'i phyir te /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā /
karma ca tṛṣṇā ca atho avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ heturabhisaṃparāya iti 		bcom ldan 'das kyis /
las dang srid pa dang ni ma rig pa /
phyi ma'i tshe la 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu /
punaścoktaṃ pañca bījajātānīti sopādānasya vijñānasyaitadadhivacanam zhes gsungs la yang sa bon gyi rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba /
'di ni nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dags yin no /
pṛthivīdhāturiti catasṛṇāṃ vijñānasthitīnāmetadadhivacanamiti sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi'i tshig bla dags yin no zhes kyang gsungs te /
tasmādābhiprāyikaḥ sūtreṣu nirdeśo lākṣaṇikastvabhidharme /
api tvabhinirvṛttihetuṃ brūvatā samudayasatyaṃ tṛṣṇaivoktā 		de lta bas na mdo las bstan pa ni dgongs pa can yin la /
chos mngon pa las bstan pa ni mtshan nyid pa yin no /
gzhan yang mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu bka' stsol pa na ni kun 'byung gi bden pa sred pa kho na yin par gsungs la /
skye ba dang mngon bar 'grub pa'i rgyu /
upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ brūvatā gāthāyāṃ karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyoktā rgyu dang bcas par bka' stsol pa ni tshigs su bcad pa las /
las dang sred pa dang ma rig pa yin par gsungs te /
mdo las /
las ni skye ba'i rgyu yin la /
karmaheturūpapattaye tṛṣṇāheturabhinirvṛttaya iti sūtre vacanāt srid pa ni mngon bar 'grub pa'i rgyu yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
yang na mdo las rgyu dang bcas /
rkyen dang bcas /
sahetusapratyayasanidānasūtrakrameṇa vā bījakṣetrabhāvaṃ pratipādayatā vijñānādayo 'ṣyuktāḥ gzhi dang bcas zhes 'byung ba'i rim par bstan pa yin no /
sa bon dang zhing gi dngos por ston par mdzad pas rnam par shes pa la sogs pa la yang gsungs so /
kā punaruṣapattiḥ kā cābhinirvṛttiḥ /
dhātugatiyonyādiprakārabhedenātmabhāvasyoṣapadanamupapattiḥ 		skye ba ni gang yin /
mngon par 'grub ba ni gang yin zhe na /
khams dang 'gro ba dang skye gnas la sogs pa'i bye brag gis lus skye ba ni skye ba yin la /
abhedena punarbhavapratisaṃdhānamabhinirvṛttiḥ /
tayoryathākramaṃ karma ca bhavatṛṣṇā ca hetuḥ /
tadyathā bījaṃ śālivādijātiprakārabhedenāṅkuroopapadanasya hetuḥ /
āpaḥ punarabhedena sarvaṅkuraprarohamātrasyetyeva dṛṣṭāntaḥ 		bye brag med par yang srid par nyid mtshams sbyor ba ni mngon par 'grub pa yin no /
de gnyis kyi rgyu ni go rims bzhin du las dang sred pa yin te /
dper na sa bon s'a lu dang nas la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bye brag gis myu gu skye ba'i rgyu yin la /
chu ni bye brag med par myu gu thams cad skye ba tsam gyi rgyu yin ba lta bu ste 'di ni dpe yin no /
tṛṣṇā 'bhinirvṛttiheturiti kā 'tra yuktiḥ /
vītatṛṣṇasya janmābhāvāt 		mngon bar grub pa'i rgyu sred pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod ce na /
ubhaye 'pi briyante /
satṛṣṇā vītatṛṣṇāśca 		sred pa dang bral ba skye ba med pa'i phyir te /
satṛṣṇā eva jātā dṛśyante na vītatṛṣṇā iti /
vinā tṛṣṇayā janmābhāvāt /
bhavasyābhinirvṛttau tṛṣṇāhetuṃ pratīmaḥ /
saṃtatinamanācca /
yatra ca satṛṣṇā tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ cittasaṃtatiṃ namantīṃ paśyāmaḥ /
tasmāt punarbhave 'ṣyevamiti vyavasyāmaḥ 		sred pa dang bcas pa dang sred pa dang bral ba gnyi ga yang 'chi ba las sred pa dag kho na skye bar snang gi sred pa dang bral ba rnams ni ma yin pas sred pa med na skye ba med pa'i phyir sred pa mngon par 'grub par bya ba la sred pa rgyu yin par shes so /
rgyud gzhol ba'i yang phyir te /
gang la sred pa dang bcas pa der sems kyi rgyud yang dang yang du gzhol bar mthong bas /
de lta bas na yang sred pa la yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya bar shes so /
na cātmabhāva evaṃ kenacidāgṛhīto yathā tṛṣṇayā ji ltar sred pas 'dag pa'i chal sran chung gi phye ma'i lde gu bskams pas lus bzung ba bzhin du lus /
śuṣkamasūropasnānalepāṅgavat /
na cānyo heturevamanuṣatto yathātmasneha ityeṣā yuktiḥ /
catvāryapi satyānyuktāni bhagavatā 		kun du bzung ba de ltar ni gang gis kyang lus kun du ma bzung ste /
rgyu gzhan ni ji ltar bdag la chags pa de ltar rjes su 'brel ba ma yin te /
'di ni rigs pa yin no /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa bzhi zhes kyang gsungs /
dve api satye saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ca kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang don dam pa'i bden pa dang bden ba gnyis zhes kyang gsungs la /
tayoḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇam /
yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat 		de gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
gang la bcom dang blo yis gzhan /
bsal na de blo mi 'jug pa /
ghaṭārthavatsaṃvṛtisat paramārthasadanyathā /
yasminnavayavaśo bhinne na tadbuddhirbhavati tat saṃvṛtisat 		bum chu bzhin du kun rdzob tu /
yod de don dam yod gzhan no /
gang la cha shas su bcom na de'i blo mi 'jug pa de ni kun rdzob tu yod pa ste /
tadyathā ghaṭaḥ /
tatra hi kapālaśo bhinne ghaṭabuddhirna bhavati /
tatra cānyānapohya dharmān buddhacyā tadbuddhirna bhavati taccāpi saṃvṛtisadveditavyam 		dper na bum pa lta bu'o /
de la ni gyo mor bcom na bum pa'i blo mi 'jug go /
gang la blos chos gzhan bsal na de'i blo mi 'jug pa de yang kun rdzob tu yod pa yin par khong du chud par bya ste /
tadyathāmbu /
tatra hi buddhacyā rūpādīndharmānaṣohyāmbubuddhirna bhavati /
teṣveva tu saṃvṛtisaṃjñā kṛteti saṃvṛtivaśāt ghaṭaścāmbu cāstīti brūbantaḥ satyamevāhurna mṛṣetyetatsaṃvṛtisatyam 		dper na chu lta bu'o /
de la ni blos gzugs la sogs pa'i chos bsal na /
chu'i blo mi 'jug go /
de dag kho na la kun rdzob tu de'i ming du btags pa yin pas kun rdzob kyi dbang gis bum pa dang chu yod do zhes brjod pa ni bden pa kho na smras pa yin gyi /
brdzun pa ni ma yin pas de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin no /
atonyathā paramārtha satyam de las gzhan pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
tatra bhinne 'poi tadbudhirbhavatyeva /
anyadharmāpohe 'pi buddhacyā tat paramārthasat 		gang la bcom yang de'i blo 'jug pa kho na yin la /
blos chos gzhan bsal yang de'i blo 'jug pa de ni don dam par yod pa yin te /
tadyathā rūpam /
tatra hi paramāṇuśo bhinne vastuni rasārhānapi ca dharmānapohya buddhacyā rūpasya svabhāvabuddhirbhavatyeva /
evaṃ vedanādayo 'pi draṣṭavyāḥ 		dper na gzugs lta bu'o /
de la rdul phra bar tu bcom yang rung /
blos ro la sogs pa'i chos bsal kyang rung gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi blo 'jug pa nyid de /
tshor ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o /
etat paramārthena bhāvāt paramārthasatyamiti de ni don dam par yod pa'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o /
sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re /
yathā lokottarena jñānena gṛhyate tat pṛṣṭhalabdhena vā laukikena tathā paramārthasatyam ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa'am /
de'i rjes la thob pa 'jig rten pas 'dzin pa de ltar ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin no /
yathānyena tathā saṃvṛtisatyam iti pūrvācāryāḥ ji ltar gzhan gyis 'dzin pa de ltar ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin no zhes zer ro /
uktāni satyāni bden pa rnams bshad zin to /
kathaṃ punasteṣāṃ darśanaṃ bhavati ji ltar na de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba brjod par bya ste /
vaktavyam /
ata ādiprāthānamārabhyocyate 		de'i phyir dang po 'jug pa las brtsams te brjod par bya'o /
vṛttasthaḥ śrutacintāvānbhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate tshul gnas thos dang bsam gtan pa /
bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor /
satyāni ha draṣṭukāma ādita eva śīlaṃ pālayati bden pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa ni dang po kho nar tshul khrims srung bar byed do /
tataḥ satyadarśanasyānulomaṃ śrutamudgṛhlātyarthaṃ vā śruṇeni de'i 'og tu bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa'i thos pa 'dzin pa'am /
don nyan par byed do /
śrutvā cintayati aviparītaṃ cintayitvā bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate thos nas phyin ci ma log par sems par byed do /
bsams nas ting nge 'dzin sgom pa la rab tu sbyor bar byed do /
samādhau tasya śrutamayīṃ prajñāṃ niśritya cintāmayī jāyate de thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab la brten nas bsam pa las byung ba skye'o /
cintāmayīṃ niśritya bhāvanāmayī jāyate /
kiṃ punarāsāṃ prajñānāṃ lakṣaṇam /
nāmobhayārthaviṣayā śrutamayyādikā dhiyaḥ 		bsam pa las byung ba la brten nas bsgom pa las byung ba skye'o /
shes rab 'di dag gi mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
thos sogs las byung blo rnams ni /
ming dang gnyi ga don yul tsan /
nāmālambanā kila śrutamayī prajñā /
nāmārthālambanā cintāmayī /
kadācidvacyañjanenārthamākarṣati kadācidarthena vyañjanam 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni ming la dmigs pa yin la /
bsam pa las byung ba ni ming dang don la dmigs pa yin te /
res 'ga' ni yi ges don 'dren par byed do /
arthalamvanaiva bhāvanāmayī /
sā hi vyañjananirapekṣā arthe pravartate 		bsgom pa las byung ba ni don la dmigs pa kho na yin te /
de ni yi ge la mi ltos par don la 'jug go /
tadyathā 'mbhasi plotumaśikṣitaḥ plavanneva muñcati /
kiyacchikṣitaḥ kadācit muñcet kadācidālamvate 		dper na stong rkyal legs par ma lobs pa chu'i nang du 'ju bar bya ba mi gtong ba kho na yin la; cung zad lo bas pa ni res 'ga' ni gtong res 'ga' ni 'ju bar byed do /
suśikṣitā plavan nirapekṣastaratītyeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ legs par lobs pa ni 'ju par bya ba la mi ltos bar rgal ba lta bu ste 'di ni dpe yin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ cintāmayī prajñā na siddhacyatītyapare /
yāhi nāmālambanā śrutamayī prāpnoti yā 'rthālambanā bhāvanāmayīti 		gzhan dag na re rtog pa 'di la ni ming la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa las byung ba yin par 'gyur la /
don la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsgom pa las byung ba yin par 'gyur bas bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi /
idaṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ nāniravadyaṃ vidyate /
āptavacanaprāmāṇyajātaniścayaḥ śrutamayī 		thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni yid ches pa'i lung tshad ma nyid las skyes pa'i nges pa yin no /
yuktinidhyānajaścintāmayī /
samādhijjo bhāvanāmayīti 		bsam pa las byung ba ni rigs pas nges par brtags pa la skyes pa yin no /
hetau mayaṭvidhānāt /
yadyathā 'nnamayāḥ prāṇāḥ tṛṇamayyo gāyaḥ iti /
tasya punarevaṃ bhāvanāyāṃ prayuktasya kathaṃ bhāvanā saṃpadyata ityāha 		bsgom pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'di dag gi mtshan nyid kha na mtho ba med par snang ngo zhes zer ro /
de ltar bsgom pa la rab tu brtson pa de ji ltar na sgom pa rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na /
vyapakarṣadvayavataḥ bsrings gnyis ldan zhes bya ba smos te /
yadi hi kāyacittābhyāṃ vyapakṛṣṭo bhavati /
saṃsargākuśalavitarkadūrīkaraṇāt 		gal te 'du 'dzi dang mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thag bsrings pa'i phyir lus dang sems dag gis bsrings pa yin na rdzogs par 'gyur ro /
tattarhi vyapakarṣadvayaṃ kasya sukaraṃ bhavati /
yo 'lpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaśca 		'o na bsrings pa de gnyis su la sla zhe na /
'dod pa chung ba dang chog shes pa la sla'i /
nāsaṃtuṣṭamahecchayoḥ /
kā punariyamasaṃtuṣṭiḥ 		chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen can la ma yin no /
chog mi shes pa 'di ni gang zhig yin no /
kā ca mahecchatā /
labdhe bhūyaḥspṛhā 'tuṣṭiralabdhecchā mahecchātā 		'dod chen can ni gang zhig yin zhe na /
rnyed la yang sred chog mi shes /
ma rnyed la 'dod 'dod chen can /
labdheṣu kila praṇīteṣu cīvarādiṣu bhūyaskāmata 'saṃtuṣṭiḥ chos mngon pa pa rnams na re chos gos la sogs pa gya nom pa rnyed pa la yang dang yang du 'dod pa ni chog mi shes pa yin la /
alabdheṣu tatkāmatā mahecchatetyābhidhārmikāḥ ma rnyed pa dag la de 'dod pa ni 'dod chen can yin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
nanu ca sā 'tibhūyaskāmatā 'labdha eva na labdhe bhavatīti ko 'nayorviśeṣa iti vaktavyametad /
evaṃ tu yujyate 		yang dang yang du 'dod pa de yang ma rnyed pa kho na la yin gyi rnyed pa la ni ma yin pa ma yin nam /
'di gnyis la khyad bar ci zhig yod de 'di ni brjod par bya dgos so /
'di ltar ni rung ste /
labdhenāpraṇītenāprabhūtena paritāpo 'saṃtuṣṭiḥ gya nom pa ma yin pa dang mang po ma yin pa rnyed pas yid mi bde ba ni chog mi shes pa yin no /
alabdhapraṇītaprabhūtecchā mahecchatā gya nom pa dang mang po ma rnyed pas 'dod pa ni 'dod chen can yin no /
viparyāsāttadvipakṣau bzlog pa de yi gnyen po dag /
asaṃtuṣṭimahecchatāviparyayeṇa tatpratipakṣau veditavyau /
saṃtuṣṭiścālpecchatā ceti 		chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen can las bzlog pa ni de dag gi gnyen po chog shes pa dang 'dod chen chung ba yin par rig par bya'o /
tridhātvāptāmalau ca tau /
tadvipakṣāviti vartate 		de gnyis khams gsum gtogs dri med /
de'i gnyen po zhes bya bar sbyar te /
tridhātukau ca poratisaṃyuktau ca khams gsum pa dag dang mi ldan pa dag kyang yin no /
sāsravānāsravatvāt /
asaṃtuṣṭimahecchate ca kāmāvacaryāveva 		chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen can ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dag kho na yin no /
kaḥ punaranayoralpecchatāsaṃtuṣṭacyoḥ svabhāva ityāha 'dod chen chung ba dang chog shes pa 'di gnyis kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
alobhaḥ /
alobhasvabhāve hyete /
āryavaṃśāśca /
alobha iti vartate 		ma chags zhes bya ba smos te /
'di dag ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no /
'phags rigs ma chags pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
āryāṇāmebhyaḥ prasavādāryavaṃśāścatvāraḥ /
te 'pyalobhasvabhāvāḥ 		'di dag las 'phags pa rnams skye bas na 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi ste /
de dag kyang ma chags pa'i rang bzhin no /
teṣāṃ tuṣṭacyātmakāstrayaḥ de dag las gsum ni chog shes bdag nyid do /
jsaṃtuṣṭisvabhāvāḥ /
cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanasaṃtuṣṭayaḥ 		dang po gsum po chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang stan gyis chog shes pa rnams ni chog shes pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no /
prahāṇabhāvanārāmatā caturtha āryavaṃśaḥ kathamalobhasvabhāvaḥ 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi pa ni spong ba dang bsgom pa dag la dga' ba nyid yin no; /
ji ltar na ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin zhe na /
bhavakāmarāgavaimukhyāt /
atha caturbhirāryavaṃśaiḥ kiṃ darśitaṃ bhagavatā 		srid pa dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro /
yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis ci zhig bstan ce na /
karmāntena tribhirvṛttiḥ gsum gyis tshul bstan thams cad las /
dharmasvāminā hi bhagavatā parityaktasvavṛttikarmāntebhyaḥ śiṣyebhyo mokṣārthamabhyupagatebhyo dvayaṃ prajñaptaṃ vṛttiśca karma ca chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das kyis /
rang gi tshul dang las kyi mtha' yongs su spangs shing thar pa don du gnyer bar khas 'che ba'i slob ma rnams la tshul dang las gnyis bcas te /
tribhirāryavaṃśairvṛttiścaturyena karma /
anayā vṛttyedaṃ karma kurvāṇā bhavantī na cirānmokṣaṃ prāpsyantīti /
kasmātpunariyamīdṛśī vṛttiridaṃ ca karma prajñaptam 		'phags pa'i rigs gsum gyis ni tshul bcas so /
bzhi pas ni las bcas te /
khyed tshul 'dis las 'di byed na ring por mi thogs par thar pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so /
ci'i phyir tshul 'di lta bu dang las 'di lta bu bcas she na /
tṛṣṇotpādavipakṣataḥ /
catvārastṛṣṇotpādāḥ sūtra uktāḥ 		sred pa skye ba'i gnyen po'i phyir /
mdo las sred pa skye ba bzhi gsungs te /
cīvarahetorbhikṣostṛṣṇotpadyamānā utpadyate pratitiṣṭhanti pratitiṣṭhati abhiniviśamānā 'bhiniviśate dge slong sred pa skye ba na chos gos kyi phyir dang bsod snyoms kyi phyir dang; mal cha dang stan gyi phyir skye'o /
gnas pa na gnas so /
piṇḍapātahetoḥ śayyāsanahetoriti /
bhavavibhavahetorbhikṣostṛṣṇotpadyamānā utpadyata iti vistaraḥ /
eṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāra āryavaṃśā deśitāḥ 		mngon par zhen pa na mngon par zhen to /
dge slong sred pa skye ba na 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de lta bu'i phyir skye'o zhes rgyas par gsungs te /
de dag gi gnyen por 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi bstan to /
mamāha kāravastvicchātatkālātyantaśāntaye /
sa evārthaḥ punaḥ pariśeṣeṇocyate 		bdag gi bdag 'dzin dngos 'dod pa /
de yi dus dang gtan zhi phyir /
don de nyid rnam grangs kyis ston pa ste /
mamakāravastu cīvarādayo 'haṃ kāravastvātmabhāvaḥ /
tatrecchā tṛṣṇā 		bdag gir 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni chos gos la sogs pa'o /
bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni lus so /
de dag la 'dod pa ni sred pa'o /
tatra mamakāravastvicchāyāstatkālaśāntaye traya āryavaṃśā bhavanti /
ubhayecchātyantaśāntaye caturtha iti 		de la 'phags pa'i rigs gsum ni bdag gir 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'dod pa de'i dus su zhi bar byed pa yin no /
bzhi pa ni gnyi ga 'dod pa gtan du zhi bar byed pa yin no /
uktāmidaṃ yathā bhūtasya bhāvanā saṃpadyate /
tasya tvevaṃ pātrobhūtasya katham tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāmavatāro bhavati 		ji lta bu'i bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba 'di ni bshad zin to /
de ltar snod du gyur pa de ji ltar na bsgom pa de la 'jug pa yin zhe na /
tatrāvatāro 'śubhayā cānāpānasmṛtena ca /
smṛtireva smṛtam 		de la 'jug pa mi sdug dang /
dbugs rngub 'byung ba dran pa yis /
dran pa nyid dran pa yin no /
gang dag ni mi sdug pas 'jug /
keṣāṃ punaraśubhayā keṣāmānāpānasmṛtyā gang dag ni dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pas 'jug ce na /
yathākramam go rims bzhin du /
adhirāgavitarkāṇām 'dod chags rnam rtog lhag rnams so /
adhiko rāgo vitarkaścaiṣāṃ ta ime adhirāgavitarkāḥ /
yo hi pratyāsannamatyarthaṃ rāgacaritastasyāśubhayā 		'di dag la 'dod chags dang rnam par rtog pa lhag pa yod pas /
'di dag ni 'dod chags dang rnam par rtog pa lhag pa dag ste /
gang zhig 'dod chags nye ba dang shin tu spyad pa de ni mi sdug pas 'jug go /
yo hi vitarkacaritastasyānāpānasmṛtyeti gang zhig rnam par rtog pa spyad pa de ni dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pas 'jug go /
avicitrālambanatvādeṣāṃ vitarkopacchedāya saṃvartata ityeke /
aśubhā tu yatra saṃsthānaviśeṣālambanatvādvitarkamāvahatīti 		kha cig na re 'di ni sna tshogs la mi dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa gcod par byed pa yin gyi /
mi sdug pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bye brag la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa 'dren par byed do zhes zer ro /
avahimukhatvādityapare gzhan dag na re kha phyir ma bltas pa'i phyir te /
aśubhā hi cakṣurvijñānavadbahirmukhī mi sdug pa ni mig gi rnam bar shes pa bzhin du kha phyir bltas pa yin te /
tadviṣayopanidhyānāt /
tatra punaścaturvidho rāgaḥ varṇarāgaḥ saṃsthānarāgaḥ sparśarāga upacārarāgaśca 		de'i yul la nye bar rtog pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
de la 'dod chags ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
kha dog gi 'dod chags dang dbyibs kyi 'dod chags dang reg ba'i 'dod chags dang bsnyen bkur gyi 'dod chags so /
prathamasya pratipakṣeṇa vinolakādyālambanāmaśubhāṃ varjayanti dang po'i gnyen por ni rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i mi sdug pa rjod par byed do /
dvitiyasya vikhāditakavikṣiptālambanāṃ tṛtīyasya vipaṭumnā pūyanibaddhāsthyālambanāṃ caturthasya niśceṣṭamṛtkāyālambanām /
abhadena tu śasyate 		gnyis pa'i ni rnam par zos pa dang rnam par 'thor ba la dmigs pa'o /
gsum pa'i ni rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dang rgyus pas brang breng du sbrel ba'i keng rus la dmigs pa'o /
bzhi pa'i ni shi ba'i ro g yo ba med pa la dmigs pa'o /
bye brag med par ni /
śaṅkalā sarvarāgiṇām /
asthisaṃkaklāyāṃ hi sarvametaccaturvidhaṃ rāgastu nāstīti adhimuktiprādeśikamanaskāratvādaśubhayā na kleśaprahāṇam viṣkambhaṇaṃ tu /
sa punar ayam aśubhāṃ bhāvayan yogācāras trividha ucyate /
ādikārmikaḥ kṛtaparijayo 'tikrāntamanaskāraś ca /
tatra /
āsamudrāsthivistārasaṃkṣepād ādikarmikaḥ 		keng rus chags bcas thams cad la /
shis te /
rus pa'i keng rus la ni chags pa'i gzhi rnam ba bzhi po 'di dag thams cad med do /
mos pa dang nyi tshe ba yid la byed pa yin pa'i phyir mi sdug pas nyon mongs pa spong ba ni ma yin gyi rnam par gnon pa ni yin no /
mi sdug ba bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa de ni rnam pa gsum du brjod de /
las dang po ba dang yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang yid la byed pa rdzogs pa'o /
de la rus pa rgya mtsho'i bar du ni /
aśubhāṃ bhāvayitukāma ādito yogācāraḥ /
svāṅgāvayave cittaṃ nibadhnāti pādāṅguṣṭhe lalāṭe yatra cāsyābhiratiḥ 		spro zhing sdud pa las dang po /
mi sdug pa bsgom par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa ni dang po nyid du rang gi lus kyi yan lag rkang pa'i mthe bo'am /
dpral ba'i dbyes sam /
yang na de gar dga' bar sems gtod par byed cing /
sa tatra māṃsakledapītā dhimokṣakrameṇāsthiviśodhayan sakalāmasthisaṃkalāṃ paśyati /
tathaiva ca punardvitīyāmadhimucyate yāvadvihārārāmakṣetrakrameṇa samudraparyantām pṛthivīmasthisaṃkalāṃ pūrṇāmadhimucyate 'dhimokṣābhivardhanārtham /
punaśca saṃkṣipanyāvadekāmeva svamasthisaṃkalāmadhimucyate cittasaṃkṣepārtham 		des der sha myags shing zag par mos pas rim gyis rus pa rnam par spyod bar byed ba na thams cad rus pa'i keng rus su lta zhing /
de bzhin du mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir gnyis ba la mos par byed pa nas gtsug lag khang dang kun dga'i rab dang grong dang zhing dang rim gyis rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i bar gyis gzhi rus pa'i keng rus kyis gang bar mos par byed do /
yang sdud pa na sems bsdu ba'i phyir bdag gcig pu kho na la rus pa'i keng rus su mos pa'i bar du sdud de /
iyatā kila kālenāśubhā opariniṣpannā bhavati 'di tsam gyis na mi sdug pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no zhes grag ste /
ayam ādikarmiko yogācāraḥ 'di ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa yin no /
pādāsthna ākapālārthatyāgāt kṛtajayaḥ smṛtaḥ /
sa punaḥ cittasaṃkṣepaviśeṣārtha tasyāmasthiśaṅkalāyāṃ pādāsthīni hitvā śeṣaṃ manasi karoti /
evaṃ krameṇa yāvat kapālasyārdhaṃ hitvā 'rdhaṃ manasi karoti kṣayakṛtaparijayaḥ 		rkang rus nas ni thod phyed par /
btang bas sbyang ba byas par bshad /
de sems bsdu ba khyad par can du bya ba'i phyir rus pa'i keng rus de las rkang pa'i rus ba rnams bor nas lhag ma yid la byed cing /
de bzhin du thod pa'i byed bor nas thod ba phyed kyi bar yid la byed ba 'di ni yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yin no /
atikrāntamanaskāro brūmadhye cittadhāraṇāt smin ma'i bar du sems 'dzin pas /
yid la byed pa rdzogs pa yin /
so 'rdhamapi kapālasya muktvā brūvormadhye cittaṃ dhārayati /
ayaṃ kilāśubhāyāmatikrāntamanaskāro yogācāraḥ /
astyaśubhā ālalmbanaparīttatayā parīttā na vaśitāparīttatayā parītteti catuṣkoṭikam 		de thod pa'i phyed kyang bor nas smin ma gnyis kyi bar du sems 'dzin par byed ba 'di ni mi sdug pa yid la byed pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa yin no zhes grag go /
dmigs pa chung bas chung la dbang chung bas ma yin pas yang mi sdug pa yang yod de zhes bya ba mu bzhi ste /
jitājitamanaskārayorajitajitamanaskārayośca svakāyasamudraparyantālambanāt /
atha kiṃsvabhāveyamaśubhā katibhūmikā kimālambanā kva cotpadyate 		yid la byed pa sbyang pa byas pa dang sbyang ba ma byas pa dang yid la byed pa sbyang ba ma byas pa dang sbyang ba byas pa dag rang gi lus dang rgya mtsho'i mtha' klas pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
yang mi sdug pa 'di'i rang bzhin ci zhig yin /
sa ni du zhig yin /
dmigs pa ni ci zhig yin /
gang du skyed bar byed ce na /
yathākramam /
alobho daśabhūḥ kāmadṛśyālambā nṛjā 'śubhā /
alobhasvabhāvā daśabhūmikā sasāmantakadhyānāntareṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣui kāmadhātau ca kāmāvacara dṛṣyālambanā kiṃ poounrdṛśyavastusaṃsthāne /
atha evārthālamvaneti siddham /
manuṣyeṣvevotpadyate 		go rims bzhin du /
mi sdug ma chags sa bcu dang dmigs ba 'dod snang mis skyed do /
rang bzhin ni ma chags pa'o /
sa ni bcu pa ste /
bsam gtan bzhi nyer bsdogs dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bcas pa dang 'dod pa'i khams na yod do /
dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i snang ba yin no /
snang ba zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
kha dog dang dbyibs te /
nānyasyāṃ gatau /
kuta eva dhātau /
tatrāpi nottarakurau /
nāmnaiva siddhamaśubhākāreti /
yadadhvikā tadadhvālambanā /
anutpattidharmiṇī tu vyadhvālambanā /
adhimuktimanaskāratvātsāsravā 		de nyid kyi phyir don la dmigs pa zhes bya bar grub bo /
mi rnams kyi nang kho nar skyed kyi 'gro ba gzhan du yang ma yin na khams gzhan du lta smos kyang ci dgos /
der yang byang gi sgra mi snyan du ni ma yin no /
mi nyid kyis mi sdug pa'i rnam ba zhes bya bar grub bo /
dus gang yin pa de'i dus la dmigs so /
mi skye ba'i chos can gyi yul ni dus gsum yin no /
mos pa yid la byed ba yin pa'i phyir zag ba dang bcas pa yin no /
vairāgyalābhikī ca prāyogikī ca /
ucitānucitatvāt 		'dris pa dang ma 'dris pa yin pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas thob ba dang sbyor ba las byung ba yin no /
uktamaśubhāyāḥ saprabhedaṃ lakṣaṇam mi sdug pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba dang bcas te bshad zin to /
ānāpānasmṛtiḥ prajñā pañcabhūrvāyurgīcarā /
kāmāśrayā 		dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung dran pa ni /
shes rab sa lnga spyod yul rlung /
'dod rten /
ānanamāna āśvāso yo vāyuḥ praviśati dbugs rngub pa ni dbugs rngub pa ste rlung 'jug pa gang yin pa'o /
apānanamapānaḥ praśvāso yo vāyuḥ niṣkrāmati dbugs 'byung ba ni dbugs 'byin pa ste rlung 'byung ba gang yin pa'o /
tayoḥ smṛtirānāpānasmṛtiḥ /
saiva prajñāsvabhāvā 		de gnyis dran pa ni dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dran pa ste /
de ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin no /
smṛtivacanaṃ tu smṛtyupasthānavattadvalādhānavṛttitvāt dran pa zhes smos pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste /
de'i stobs bskyed pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
pañcasu bhūmisu triṣu sāmantakeṣu dhyānāntare kāmadhātau copekṣāsaṃprayogitvāt /
vitarkānuguṇatvāt kila lsukhaduḥkhayostatpratipakṣasya tābhyāmasaṃprayogaḥ 		sa lnga po nyer ba sngogs gsum dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang 'dod pa'i khams na yod do /
btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro /
bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag ni rnam par rtog pa dang mthun pa'i phyir de'i gnyen po ni de dag dang mtshungs par mi ldan no; /
sukhasaumanasyayoścāvadhānaparipanthitvāt tasyāścāvadhāne sādhyatvāditi bde ba dang yid bde bdag kyang gtod pa la bar chad byed pa'i phyir la /
de yang gtad pas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go /
ye tu mauleṣvapi dhyāneṣu samāpannasyopekṣāmicchanti neṣāmaṣṭabhūmikā gang dag bsam gtan dngos gzhi dag na yang snyoms par zhugs pa la btang snyoms kyi dbang po yod par 'dod pa de dag gi ltar nas brgyad pa yin no /
pareṇāśvāsapraśvāsānamabhūmitvāt /
vāyvālambanā caiṣā kāmadhātvāśrayā /
devamanuṣyeṣu prāyogikī vairāgyalābhiko ca 		yan chad ni dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba'i sa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
de'i dmigs pa ni rlung yin no /
'dod pa'i khams kyi rten can yin no /
lha dang mi dag gi nang nas skyed do /
sbyor ba las byung ba dang 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa yin no /
tatvamanaskāraścaiṣā /
idaṃ dharmāṇāmeva 		'di ni de kho na yid la byed pa yin no /
chos 'di pa rnams kho na'i yin gyi /
na bāhyānām phyi ba'i ma yin no /
upadeśābhāvāt /
svayaṃ ca sūkṣmadharmānabhisaṃbodhāt 		lung med pa'i phyir dang bdag nyid kyis chos zab mo mngon par mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
sā ceyaṃ /
ṣaḍvidhā gaṇanādibhiḥ 		de yang bgrang ba la sogs pa rnam pa drug /
ṣaṭkāraṇayuktā caiṣā paripūrṇā bhavati /
gaṇanayā 'nugamena sthāpanayā upalakṣaṇayā vivarttena pariśūddhacyā ca /
tatra ca gaṇanā nāma āśvāsapraśvāseṣu cittaṃ dattvā 'nabhisamskāreṇa kāyaṃ cittaṃ cādhyupekṣya smṛtimātreṇa gaṇayatyekaṃ dvau yāvaddaśa 		de ni bgrang ba dang rjes su 'gro ba dang 'jog pa dang nye bar rtogs pa dang bsgyur ba dang yongs su dag pa ste /
rgyu drug dang ldan na yongs su rdzogs pa yin no /
de la bgrang ba zhes bya ba'i dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dag la sems gtad nas mngon par 'du bya ba med par lus dang sems rnal du gzhag ste dran pa tsam gyis gcig dang gnyis nas bcu'i bar du bgrang bar byed pa'o /
cittābhisaṃkṣepa vikṣepabhayānnālpavahutarā /
tasyāṃ tu trayo doṣāḥ 		sems mngon par sdud pa dang rnam par g yeng bar dogs pas ha cang mang ba dang nyung ngur ni ma yin no /
de la skyon ni gsum yod de /
ūnagaṇanā yadi dvāvekaṃ gṛhlāti gal te gnyis la gcig tu 'dzin nam tshang bar bgrang ba'i skyon no /
adhikagaṇanā yadyekaṃ dvāviti gal te gcig la gnyis su 'dzin na lhag par bgrang ba'i skyon no /
saṃkaro yadyāśvāsaṃ praśvāsato gṛhlāti viparyayādvā /
ato 'nyathā samyaggaṇanā /
antaravikṣepe punarādito gaṇayitavyaṃ tāvadyāvatsamādhi labhate 		gal te dbugs rngub pa la dbugs 'byin par 'dzin tam /
dbugs 'byin pa la dbugs rngub par 'dzin na 'chol bar bgrang ba'i skyon no /
de las gzhan pa ni yang dag pa'i bgrang ba yin no /
bar skabs su sems rnam par g yeng na yang mgo nas ji srid du ting nge 'dzin ma thob kyi bar du bgrang bar bya'o /
anugamo nāma anabhisaṃskāreṇāśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ gatimanugacchati rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni 'di dag thag ni ji srid gcig tu 'byung zhing 'jug /
kiyaddūramete praviśanti vā niṣkrāmanti vā kimete sarvaśarīravyāopina ekadeśacāriṇa iti ci 'di dag lus thams cad la khyab pa dag cig gam /
phyogs 'ga' zhig na rgyu ba dag yin zhes mngon par 'du bya ba med par dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba'i 'gros kyis rjes su 'gro ba ste /
tān praviśataḥ kaṇṭhahṛdayanābhikaṭyurujaṅghāpraveśakram yāvat pādāvanugacchati de 'jug pa na lkog ma dang snying ga dang lte ba dang rked pa dang brla dang byin par 'jug pa'i rim gyis rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du rjes su 'gro la /
niṣkrāmato vitastivyāmāntaraṃ yāvadvāyumaṇḍalaṃ vairambhāśca vāyava ityapare 'byung ba na mtho gang dang 'dom gang gi bar du 'byung ngo /
gzhan dag na re rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par 'thor byed kyi rlung gi bar du'o zhes zer te /
tadetattatvamanasikāratvānna yuktam 'di ni kho na yid la byed pa yin pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin no /
sthāpanā nāma nāsikāgre yāvat pādanṅguṣṭhe sthitāṃ paśyati /
maṇisūtravat /
kimanugrāhakā ete upadhātakāḥ śītā uṣṇā iti 		'jog pa zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i thag pa bzhin du sna'i rtse mo nas rkang pa'i mthe bong gi bar du gnas par lta zhing /
ci 'di dag phan 'dogs par byed pa zhig gam /
gnod par byed pa zhig gam /
grang ngam /
dro ba dag cig ces rtog pa'o /
upalakṣaṇā nāma naite kevalā vāyava eva /
catvāryetāni mahābhūtāni mahābhūtābhinirvṛttamupādāyarūpaṃ tadāśritāścittacaittā iti pañcaskandhānupalakṣayati 		nye bar rtog pa ni 'di dag ni rlung 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang 'byung ba dag las mngon par grub pa rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang de dag la brten pa sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyang yod do zhes phung po lnga la nye bar rtog par byed pa'o /
vivarto nāma vāyvālambanāṃ vṛddhiṃ vivarttyottareṣu kuśalamūleṣu saṃniyojanaṃ yāvadagradharmeṣu /
pariśuddhirdarśanamārgādiṣvavatāraḥ /
smṛtyupasthānādivajropamasamādhyantā vivarta ityapare 		bsgyur ba zhes bya ba ni rlung la dmigs pa'i blo bsgyur te chos kyi mchog gi bar du gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la yang dag par sbyor ba'o /
yongs su dag pa ni mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa la 'jug pa'o /
gzhan dag na re bsgyur ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar yin la /
kṣayajñānādiśuddhiriti /
gaṇanānugamaḥ sthānaṃ lakṣaṇārthavivarttnā 		rnam par dag pa ni zad pa shes pa la sogs pa yin no zhes zer ro /
dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung dran pa ni /
bgrang dang rjes 'gro 'jog pa dang /
pariśuddhiśca ṣoḍheyamānāpānasmṛtirmatā iti saṃgrahaślokāḥ rtog pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang /
yang dag rnam ba drug tu 'dod /
tatra punarveditavyau /
ānāpātau yataḥ kāyaḥ 		ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa yin no /
de la /
dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung gang las lus /
yadbhūmiko hi kāyaḥ tadbhūmikāvetai /
kāyaikadeśatvāt /
kāyacittaviśeṣasaṃniśritā āśvāsapraśvāsā vartante /
ārupyakalalādigatānāmabhāvāt acittacaturthadhyānasamāpannānāṃ ca /
yadi hi kāyaḥ śuṣiro bhavati āśvāsapraśvāsabhūmikaṃ ca cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtamevaṃ te varttante /
jāyamānasya caturthadhyānādvyuttiṣṭhamānasya ca praviśanti bhiyamāṇasya caturthaṃ ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya niṣkrāmanti 		'di gnyis ni lus kyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir lus sa pa gang yin pa de'i sa pa dag yin par rig bar bya'o /
dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba ni gzugs med pa dang nur nur po la sogs par gyur pa rnams dang sems med pa dang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams la med pa'i phyir lus dang sems khyad par can la brten nas 'jug pa yin te /
gal te lus kyang sbubs yod pa yin la dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung pa'i sa pa'i sems kyang mngon sum du gyur na de lta na 'jug go /
skye ba dang bsam gtan bzhi pa las ldang ba la ni 'jug la /
'chi ba dang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa la ni 'byung ngo /
etau cānāpānau /
sattvākhyau /
nāsattvasaṃkhyātau /
anupāttakau /
indriyavinirbhāgitvāt 		dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba 'di gnyis ni /
sems can zhes bya /
sems can du mi bgrang ba dag ni ma yin no /
ma zin pa'o /
dbang po dang tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
naiḥṣyandikau rgyu mthun las byung /
naupacayikavipākajau /
kāyopacayanānupacayāt chhinnānāṃ punaḥ pratisaṃdhānācca 		lus rgyas pas 'grib par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang chad nas yang nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i phyir rgyas pa las byung ba dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni ma yin te /
nahyetadvipākarūpasyāsti rnam par smin pa'i gzugs la ni de lta bu med do /
nādhareṇa lakṣayete manasā ca tau /
svabhūmyuparibhūmikena ca tayościttenopalakṣaṇam 		'og ma yi /
yid kyis de gnyis mi rtogs so /
de gnyis ni rang gi sa pa dang sa gong ma pa'i sems kyis rtogs kyi /
nāvareṇeryāpathika nairmāṇikena 'og ma pa spyod lam pa dang sbrul pa'i sems kyis mi rtogs so /
ukte dve avatāramukhe 'jug pa'i sgo gnyis bshad zin to /
tābhyāṃ tu samādhilabdhā de gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin thob nas /
niṣpannaśamathaḥ kuryāt smṛtyupasthānabhāvanām lhag mthong bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
zhi gnas grub par gyur pa yis /
vipaśyanāyāḥ saṃpādanārtham /
kathaṃ ca punaḥ kuryāt 		dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom par bya /
ji ltar bya zhe na /
kāyaviccittadharmāṇāṃ dvilakṣaṇaparīkṣaṇāt lus tshor sems dang chos rnams la /
mtshan nyid gnyis su yongs brtags pas /
kāyaṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhyāṃ parīkṣate /
vedanāṃ cittaṃ dharmāśca /
svabhāva evaiṣāṃ svalakṣaṇam /
sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tu anityatā saṃskṛtānāṃ duḥkhatā sāsravāṇāṃ śunyatā 'nātmate sarvadharmāṇām 		lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos rnams la rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dag tu yongs su brtags pa ste /
de dag gi rang gi mtshan nyid ni rang gi ngo bo'o /
spyi'i mtshan nyid ni 'dus byas rnams ni mi rtag pa nyid dang zag pa dang bcas pa rnams sdug bsngal ba nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa dang bdag med pa nyid dag go /
kāyasya punaḥ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
dharmāstribhyo 'nye /
sāmāhitasya kila kāyaṃ paramāṇuśaḥ kṣaṇikataśca paśyataḥ kāyasmṛtyupasthāṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavati 		lus kyi rang gi ngo bo ci zhe na /
'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid do /
gsum las gzhan pa dag ni chos so /
mnyam par gzhag pas lus la rdul phra rab dang skad cig mar mthong bas lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa grub pa yin no /
zhes grag go /
atha smṛtyupasthānānāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
vividhasmṛtyupasthānaṃ svabhāvasaṃsrgālambanasmṛtyupasthānam /
tatra svabhāvasmṛtyupasthānam 		dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
rang bzhin dang 'brel pa dang dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o /
de la rang bzhin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
prajñā /
kīdṛśī prajñā /
śrutādimayī 		shes rab bo /
shes rab ji lta bu zhig ce na /
thos sogs las byung ba'o /
śrutamayī cintāmayī bhāvanāmayī ca /
trividhāni smṛtyupasthānāni śrutacintābhāvanāmayāni 		thos pa las byung ba dang bsam pa las byung ba dang bsgom pa las byung ba'o /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag kyang rnam pa gsum ste /
thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa las byung ba dag go /
anye saṃsargālambanāḥ /
anye tatsahabhuvo dharmāḥ saṃsargasmṛtyupasthānam 		gzhan ni 'brel dang dmigs pa las /
gzhan de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni 'brel ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no /
tadālambanā ālambanasmṛtyupasthānam /
svabhāvasmṛtyupasthānaṃ prajñeti /
kuta eva tat 		de dag gi dmigs pa ni dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o /
rang bzhin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes rab yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
kāme kāyānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānamiti vacanāt lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
kā punaranupaśyanā rjes su lta ba zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
prajñā /
tayā hi tadvānanupaśyaḥ kriyate /
yataścokta madhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānupaśyī viharatīti 		shes rab ste /
des de dang ldan pa rjes su lta bar byed do /
'di ltar nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so zhes kyang gsungs te /
anupaśyamasyāsti darśanamityanupaśyī 'di la rjes su lta ba ste lta ba yod pas na rjes su lta ba'o /
kāye 'nupaśyī kāyānupaśyī /
kasmāt prajñā smṛtyupasthānamityuktā bhagavatā 		lus la rjes su lta ba ni lus kyi rjes su lta ba'o /
ci'i phyir shes rab la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bshad ce na /
smṛtyudrekatvāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re dran pa shas che ba'i phyir te /
smṛtivalādhānavṛttitvāditi yo 'rthaḥ /
dārūpāṭana kīlasaṃdhāraṇavat /
evaṃ tu yujyate 		shing gshegs pa'i khye'u dag gis 'dzin pa ltar dran pa'i stobs bskyed pas 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes zer ro /
'di ltar ni rung ste /
smṛtiranayopatiṣṭhata iti smṛtyupasthānaṃ prajñā yathādṛṣṭasyābhilapanāt 'dis dran pa nye bar 'jog pas na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni shes rab yin te /
ji ltar mthong ba mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro /
tadyathā hyuktamāyuṣmatā aniruddhena tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharataḥ kāyālalmbanānusmṛtistiṣṭhati saṃtiṣṭhata iti vistaraḥ /
bhagāvatā 'pi coktaṃ tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharata upasthitā smṛtirbhavatyasaṃmūḍheti /
yatra tūktaṃ kathaṃ bhikṣavaścaturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ samudayaśca bhavatyastaṅgamaśca /
āharasamudayātkāyasya samudayo bhavatyāhāranirodhātkāyasyāstaṅgamaityatrālambanameva smṛtyupasthānamuktam /
smṛtiratropatiṣṭhata iti kṛtvā /
yathālambanaṃ caiṣāṃ nāma svaparobhayasaṃtatyālambanatvāt pratyekameṣāṃ traividhyam 		'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas kyang /
lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de'i lus la dmigs pa'i dran pa gnas pa yang dag par gnas zhes rgyas par bshad do /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de'i dran pa nye bar gnas shing kun tu mi rmongs pa yin zhes gsungs so /
gang las dge slong dag ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kun 'byung ba dang nub pa yin zhe na /
zas kun 'byung bas ni lus kun 'byung pa yin la /
zas 'gags pas ni lus nub pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de las ni dmigs pa khon dran pa nye bar gzhag par gsungs pa yin te /
'di la dran pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro /
'di dag gi ming ni dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin no /
'di dag rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i rgyud la dmigs pa'i phyir re re zhing rnam pa gsum gsum yin no /
kramaḥ /
yathotpatti /
kasmātpunarevamutpattiḥ /
audārikasya pūrvaṃ darśanāt /
yato vā kāmarāgasya kāyo 'dhaṣṭhānaṃ sa ca vedanā 'bhilāṣātsa ca cittasyādāntatvāt tatkleśāprahāṇāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ 		rim ni ji ltar skye ba bzhin ci'i phyir de ltar skye zhe na /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
sngar rags pa mthong ba'i phyir ro /
yang na 'di ltar 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa'i rten ni lus yin la /
de yang tshor ba mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro /
de yang sems ma zhi ba'i phyir ro /
catuṣkaṃ tu viparyāsavipakṣataḥ /
śucisukhanityātmaviparyāsanāṃ caturṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāri smṛtyupasthā nānyuktāni yathākramaṃ nādhikanyūnāni evaṃ ca trīṇyasaṃbhinnālambanāni caturthamubhayathā /
yadidharmāneva paśyatyasaṃbhinnālambanam /
atha kāyādīnāṃ dve trīṇi catvāri vā samastāni paśyati saṃbhinnālambanam 		de yang nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro; /
phyin ci log gi gnyen por bzhi /
gtsang ba dang bde ba dang rtag pa dang bdag tu phyin ci log rnam pa bzhi'i gnyen por dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi go rims bzhin du bstan te mi mang mi nyung ngo /
de dag las gsum ni ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no /
bzhi pa ni gnyi ga yin te /
gal te chos kho na la lta na ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no /
'on te lus la sogs pa gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi po spyi la lta na 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no /
evaṃ kāyādyālambanāni smṛtyupasthānānyabhyasya /
sa dharmasmṛtyupasthāne samastālambane sthitaḥ 		de ltar lus la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams goms par byas nas; de ni chos dran nye gzhag pa /
spyi la dmigs pa la gnas te /
ānatyaduḥkhataḥ śūnyānātmatastānvipaśyati de dag la ni mi rtag dang /
sdug bsngal stong bdag med par lta /
saṃbhinnalambane dharmasmṛtyupasthāne sthitastān kāyādīn sarvānabhisamasya caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyati chos dran pa nye bar gzhag par 'dres pa la dmigs pa la gnas te /
lus la sogs pa de dag thams cad spyir bsdus te /
anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataśca mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o /
tat ūṣmagatotpattiḥ /
tasmāddharmasmṛtyupasthānādevamabhyastāt krameṇeṣmagataṃ nāma kuśāmūlamutpadyate 		de las dro bar gyur pa 'byung /
chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la de ltar goms pa las rim gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba do bar gyur ba zhes bya ba skye'o /
ūṣmagatamivoṣmagatam /
kleśendhanadahanasyāryamārgāgneḥ pūrvarūpatvāt /
taccatuḥsatyagocaram /
tadūṣmagataṃ prākarṣikatvāccatuḥsatyālambanam 		dro bar gyur pa dang 'dra bas na dro bar gyur pa ste /
nyon mongs pa'i bud shing sreg par byed pa 'phags pa'i lam gyi me'i snga ltas yin pa'i phyir ro /
de ni bden bzhi spyod yul can /
dro bar gyur pa de ni rgyun chags pa yin pa'i phyir bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa yin no /
ṣoḍaśākāram /
duḥkhaṃ caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyatyanityato duḥkhatḥ śūnyato 'nātmataśca 		rnam pa bcu drug /
sdug bsngal la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o /
samudayaṃ caturbhirhetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataśca kun 'byung la rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o /
nirodhaṃ caturbhiḥ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataśca 'gog pa la 'gog pa dang zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o /
mārgaṃ caturbhirmārgato nyāyataḥ pratipattito nairyāṇikataśca lam la lam dang rigs pa dang sgrub pa dang nges par 'byin pa dang rnam pa bzhir lta ste 'di dag gi bye brag ni /
eṣāṃ tu viśeṣaṇam paścādvakṣayāmaḥ /
ūṣmabhyo mūrdhānaḥ /
te 'pi tādṛśāḥ /
yādṛśā ūṣmāṇaścatuḥsatyālambanāḥ ṣoḍaśākārāśca 		'og nas bshad par bya'o /
dro ba las /
rtse mo /
dro ba chung ngu dang 'phring dang chen po'i rim gyis mngon par 'phel ba las rtse mo dag kyang skye ste /
de yang de dang 'dra /
ji ltar dro bar gyur pa rnams bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa dang rnam pa bcu drug yin pa bzhin te /
utkṛṣṭataratvāttu nāmāntaraṃ cala kuśalamūlamūrdhatvāt mūrdhānaḥ ches mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir na ming gzhan du btags so /
dge ba'i rtsa ba g yo ba'i rtse mo yin pa'i phyir rtse mo rnams te /
ebhyo hi pāto 'tikramo vā de dag las ltung ba'am 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
ubhayākaraṇaṃ dharmeṇa gnyi ga chos kyi rnam pa gtod /
eṣāṃ punarubhayeṣamūṣmagatamūrdhnāṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānenākaraṇam dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mo gnyis ka chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pas rnam pa gtod par byed do /
kimidamākaraṇam /
satyeṣvakārāṇāṃ prathamatovinyasanam 		rnam pa gtod ces bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
dang po nyid du bden pa rnams la rnam pa dag 'god pa'o /
anyairapi tu vardhanam /
caturbhirapi smṛtyupasthānaireṣāṃ vardhanam 		gzhan dag gis kyang 'phel bar byed /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char gyis kyang de dag 'phel bar byed do /
vivardhayataḥ pūrvapratilabdhānāmaṃsaṃmukhībhābo 'vahumānatvāt /
mṛdumadhyādhimātrakramābhivṛddhebhyaḥ punarutpadyate /
tebhyaḥ kṣāntiḥ 		rnam par 'phel bar byed pa na sngon thob pa rnams mngon sum du mi byed de /
dga' ba chen po med pa'i phyir ro /
de las bzod pa yang skye ste /
de chung ngu dang 'breng dang chen po'i rim gyis mngon par 'phel ba dag las yang /
bzod pa skye ste /
adhimātrasya kṣamaṇādaparihāṇitaḥ yongs su mi nyams pa'i sgo nas bden pa la cher bzod pa'i phyir ro /
sā 'pi triprakārā mṛdvī madhyā 'dhimātrā ca de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o /
dvidhā tadvat /
yathā mūrdhāna uktāḥ evaṃ mṛdumadhye kṣāntī tathaivākaraṇāt /
vivardhane tvayaṃ viśeṣaḥ 		de la rnam pa gnyis de bzhin /
rtse mo rnams ji skad bshad pa ltar bzod pa chung du dang 'bring dag kyang de dang 'dra ste /
de kho na bzhin du rnam pa gtong ba'i phyir ro /
rnam par 'phel ba la ni khyad par 'di yod de /
sarvasyāḥ bzod pa ni /
kṣāntyā dharmeṇa vardhanam /
smṛtyupasthānenaiva nānyena /
kāmāptaduḥkhaviṣayā tvadhimātrā /
kṣāntiriti varttate /
apradharmasaṃśleṣādasau kāmāvacaraduḥkhālambanaiva /
ata evoṣmagatādīnāṃ traidhātukaduḥkhadyālambanatvasiddhirniyamāvacanāt /
yadā kila rūpārupyapratipakṣādyekaikasatyālambanāpahlāsena yāvat kāvāvacarameva dukhaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ manasi karotyeṣā sarvaiva madhyā kṣāntiryadaikameva kṣaṇaṃ tadadhimātreti 		thams cad chos kyis 'phel bar byed chos dran pa nye bar gzhag ba kho nas 'phel bar byed kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no /
chen po 'dod gtogs sdug bsngal yul /
bzod pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
de ni chos kyi mchog dang nye ba'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la dmigs pa kho na'o /
de nyid kyi phyir dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa'i nges pa ma smos pa'i phyir khams gsum pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa la dmigs pa nyid du grub po /
gang gi tshe gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i gnyen po la sogs pa bden pa'i rnam pa dmigs pa re re nas phri nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal kho na la skad cig ma gnyis su yid la byed pa'i bar de thams cad ni bzod pa 'bring yin la /
gang gi tshe skad cig ma gcig khon yin pa de'i tshe na chen po yin no zhes grag go /
kṣaṇaṃ ca sā de ni skad cig gcig /
kṣaṇikā cāsau na prākarṣikī de ni skad cig ma gcig yin gyi rgyun chags pa ni ma yin no /
tathāgradharmāḥ /
yathaivādhimātrā kṣāntiḥ /
te 'pi hi kāmāvacaraduḥkhālambanāḥ kṣaṇikāśca laukikāścaite 'grāśca dharmāḥ 		de bzhin du chos mchog /
de dag kyang bzod pa chen po ji lta ba bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dmigs pa dang skad cig ma gcig pa dag yin no /
de dag ni 'jig rten pa yang yin la chos kyi mchog kyang yin zhing /
sarvalaukikaśreṣṭhatvāditi laukikāgradharmāḥ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams te /
vinā sabhāgahetunā mārgasya tatpuruṣakāreṇākarṣaṇāt skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu med par de'i rtsal gyis lam 'dren par byed pa'i phyir ro /
ta eta ūṣmagatādayaḥ smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvatvāt prajñātmakā ucyante /
sarve tu pañcaskandhāḥ 		dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'o /
thams cad phung po lnga /
saparivāragrahaṇāt 'khor dang bcas te smos pa'i phyir ro /
vināptibhiḥ thob pa ma gtogs /
prāptayo noṣmagatādibhiḥ saṃgṛhyante thob ba rnams ni dro bar gyur ba la sogs pas ma bsdus te /
mā bhūdāryasya tatsaṃmukhībhāvādūṣmagatādīnāṃ saṃmukhībhāva iti /
tatra trisatyālambanoṣmagatākaraṇe dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannamanāgatāni catvāri bhāvyante /
nirodhasatyālambane tadevobhayathā 		'phags pa la de mngon sum du gyur pas dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur du 'ongs pas so /
de la bden pa gsum la dmigs pa'i dro bar gyur pa rnam pa gtod pa la ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa da ltar byung ba yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char 'thob bo /
'gog pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa la ni de kho na gnyi ga yin no /
sarvatrākārāḥ sabhāgāḥ rnam pa dag ni thams cad du 'dra ba yin no /
vivardhane caturṇāmanyatamadanāgatāni catvāri rnam par 'phel ba la ni bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro /
tatraiva nirodhālambane 'ntyamanāgatānicatvāri ākārāḥ sarve 'gog pa la dmigs pa de kho na la ni tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro /
rnam pa ni thams cad do /
labdhatvādgotrāṇām /
mūrdhākaraṇe catuḥsatyālambane 'pi nirodhālambanavardhane cāntyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve /
trisatyālambanavardhane caturṇāmanyatamadanāgatānicatvāri ākārāḥ sarve /
kṣāntīnāṃ sarvatra cāntyam 		rigs rnams tho ba zin pa'i phyir ro /
rtse mo bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa rnam pa gtod pa dang 'gog pa la dmigs pa 'phel ba la ni tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro /
rnam pa ni thams cad do /
bden pa gsum la dmigs pa rnam par 'phel ba la ni bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro /
rnam pa ni thams cad do /
anāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve /
agradharmeṣvantyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāścatvāra eva 		bzod pa rnams la ni thams cad du tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro /
rnam pa ni thams cad do /
chos kyi mchog dag la ni tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro /
anyābhāvāddarśanamārgasādṛśyācca /
iti nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ caturdhā 		rnam pa ni bzhi kho na ste /
gzhan med pa'i phyir dang mthong ba'i lam dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro /
ityetāni catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni yadutoṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaḥ kṣāntayo 'gradharmāśca de lta na nges 'byed cha mthun rnam pa bzhi bzhi po 'di dag ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yin te /
'di lta ste /
eṣāṃ dve mṛdūnī calatvāt parihāṇitaḥ kṣāntayo madhyamagradharmā adhimātram /
nirvedhabhāgīyānīti ko 'rthaḥ /
vidha vibhāge /
niścito vedhā nirvedhaḥ āryamārgastena vicikitsā prahāṇāt satyānāṃ ca vibhajanādidaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ yāvat mārga iti 		dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mo rnams dang bzod pa rnams dang chos kyi mchog rnams so /
de dag las gnyis ni yongs su nyams pa'i sgo nas g yo ba'i phyir chung ngu dag yin no /
bzod pa rnams ni 'bring yin no /
chos kyi mchog rnams ni chen po yin no /
nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
nges par 'byed pas na nges par 'byed pa ste /
'phags pa'i lam mo /
des the tshom spong ba'i phyir dang bden pa rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba nas 'di ni lam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir ro /
tasya bhāgo darśanamārgaikadeśaḥ de'i cha ni mthong ba'i lam gyi phyogs gcig yin te /
tasyāvāhakatvena hitatvānnirvedhabhāgīyāni /
taccaitaccaturvidhamapoi nirvedhabhāgīyam /
bhāvanāmayam 		de 'dren par byed pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams so /
nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni rnam pa 'di bzhi char yang /
bsgoms byung /
na śrutacintāmayam /
anāgamyāntaradhyānabhūmikam /
anāgamyaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ catvāri ca dhyānānyasya bhūmistatsaṃgṛhītatvāt /
nordhva darśanamārgaparivāratvāt 		thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba ni ma yin no /
mi lcogs med pa dang khyad par bsam gtan sa pa'o /
'di'i sa pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan bzhi yin te /
de dag gis bsdus pa'i phyir ro /
mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir gong na med do /
tadabhāvaḥ kāmadhātvālambanatvāt /
tasya ca pūrvaparijñeyapraheyatvāt 		de med pa ni 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
de yang sngar yongs su shes par bya zhing spang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
teṣāṃ rūpadhātau pañcaskandhako vipākaḥ de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni gzugs kyi khams kyi phung po lnga yin no; /
pūripūrakāṇyevanākṣepakāṇi /
bhavadveṣitvāt /
dve tvadho 'pi vā /
vāśabdo matavikalpārthaḥ /
bhadantaghoṣakasya tu dve prathame nirvedhabhāgīye saptabhūmike kāmāvacare api taḥ 		yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dag kho na yin gyi 'phen par byed pa dag ni ma yin te /
srid pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro /
gnyis ni 'og na'ang yod pa'am /
'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni lugs tha dad pa'i don te /
btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs kyi ltar na nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang po gnyis sa bdun pa yin te /
sarvāṇyapi tvetāni catvāri /
kāmāśrayāṇi 		'dod pa'i khams na yang yod do /
bzhi po de dag thams cad kyang /
trīṇi manuṣyeṣvevotpadyante /
triṣu dvīpeṣu 		'dod rten gsum ni mi dag gi nang kho na dang gling gsum du skyed par byed do /
utpāditapūrvāṇāṃ tu deveṣu saṃmukhībhāvaḥ sngon bskyed pa rnams ni lha dag gi nang du mngon sum du byed do /
caturthaṃ deveṣvapi /
trīṇi strīpuruṣā ubhayāśrayāṇi labhante 		bzhi pa ni lha dag gi nang du yang skyed bar byed do /
gsum ni skyes pa dang bud med kyi gnyi ga'i rten can dag 'thob bo /
agradharmān dvacyāśrayān labhate 'ṅganā /
agradharmāstu stryeva dvacyāśrayān labhate 		chos mchog bud med kyis gnyi ga'i rten can 'thob par 'gyur /
chos kyi mchog ni bud med kho nas gnyi ga'i rten can 'thob bo /
puruṣaḥ puruṣāśrayāneva /
strītva syāpratisaṃkhyānirodhalābhāt 		skyes pa ni skyes pa'i rten can 'ba' zhig 'thob ste /
bud med nyid ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa thob pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyānāṃ tyāgaḥ nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams ji ltar stong zhe na /
bhūmityāgāttyajatyāryastāni /
yadbhūmikānyanena pratilabdhānibhavanti tāṃ bhūmi tyajannāryastānyapi tyajati nānyathā bhūmityāgaḥ punarbhūmisaṃcārāt 		'phags pas de dag sa bor nas /
stong ngo /
'phags pa ni sa gang dag thob par gyur pa'i sa de dag 'dor ba na de dag kyang gtong gi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
sa 'dor ba ni sa 'phos pa'i phyir ro /
anāryastu mṛtyunā /
pṛthagjanastu nikāyasabhāgatyāgenaiva tyajatisatyasati vā bhūmisaṃcāre 		'phags min 'chi bas so /
so so'i skye bo ni sa 'pho yang rung mi 'pho yang rung ste ris mthun pa btang ba kho nas gtong ngo /
ādye dveparihāṇyā ca /
tyajati mṛtyunā ca pṛthagjana eva 		dang po gnyis yongs nyams pas kyang /
gtong la 'chi bas kyang gtong ste /
āryasya tu nāsti tābhyāṃ parihāṇiḥ /
kṣāntyagradharmābhyāṃ tu pṛthagjanasyāpi nāsti parihāṇiḥ /
maulestatraiva satyadṛk 		so so'i skye bo kho na yin gyi 'phags pa ni de gnyis las yongs su nyams pa med do /
bzod pa dang chos kyi mchog dag las ni so so'i skye bo yang yongs su nyams pa med do /
dngos gzhis de nyid la bden mthong /
