yo mauladhyānabhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayati satatraiva janmāti satyānyavaśyaṃ paśyati gang zhig bsam gtan dngos gzhi'i sa ba'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams skyed par byed pa des ni tshe 'di nyid la gdon mi za bar bden pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur te /
tīvrasaṃvegatvāt /
apūrvāptirvihīneṣu 		yid 'byung ba shas che ba'i phyir ro /
rnam par nyams na dngos med 'thob /
yadā vihineṣu punarlābhobhavatyapūrvāṇyeva tadā labhyante na pūrvaṃ tyaktāni /
pratimokṣasaṃvaravadanucitayatnasādhyatvāt 		gang gi tshe rnam par nyams pa dag gis yang thob pa de'i tshe so sor thar pa'i sdom pa bzhin du sngon med pa dag kho na 'thob kyi sngon btang ba dag ni ma yin te ma 'dris pa dang 'bad de bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
sati pratisīmādaiśike pareṇotpādayatyasati mūlādeva mtshams ston par byed pa zhig yod na ni gong ma skyed par byed do /
med na ni gzhi kho nas skyed par byed do /
ete punarvihīniparihāṇī kiṃsvabhāve rnam par nyams pa dang yongs su nyams pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
hānī dve asamanvitiḥ nyams pa gnyis ni mi ldan pa /
ubhe apyete asamanvāgamasvabhāve nyams pa gnyi g yang mi ldan pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
parihāṇistu doṣakṛtā nāvaśyaṃ vihāniḥ /
guṇaviśeṣakṛtā ca sā 		yongs su nyams pa ni nyes pas byas pa yin gyi rnam par nyams pa ni gdon mi za ba yin no /
parihīṇo 'pyūṣmagatalābhī niyataṃ parinirvāṇadharmā bhavati dro bar gyur pa thob pa ni yongs su nyams kyang nges par mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yin no /
mokṣabhāgīyātko viśeṣaḥ /
satyadarśanāsannataratvamasatyantarāye 		thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang khyad par ci yang ce na /
bar chad byed pa med na bden ba mthong ba la ches nye ba nyid yin no /
mūrdhalābhī na mūlacchit rtse mo thob pa rtsa mi 'chad /
parihīṇo 'pi mūrdhalābhī kuśalamūlāni na samucchinatti /
apāyāṃstu pāpādānantaryāṇyapi kuryāt 		rtse mo thob pa ni yongs su nyams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun tu mi 'chad kyi ngan song du yang 'gro la mtshams med pa dag kyang byed do /
kṣāntilābhyanapāyagaḥ /
vihīnāyāmapi kṣāntau na punarapāyānyāti tadbhūmikakarmakleśadūrīkaraṇāt /
kṣāntilābhādeva hi gatiyonyupapattyāśrayāṣṭamādibhavakleśānāṃ keṣāñcidanutpattidharmatā pratilabhate 		bzod thob ngan song mi 'gro'o /
bzod pa las ni rnam par nyams kyang ngan song du mi 'gro ste /
der 'gro ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro /
bzod pa thob pa kho nas 'gro ba dang skye gnas dang skye ba dang lus dang srid pa dang nyon mongs pa rnams las kha cig gis mi skye ba'i chos nyid thob ste /
apāyagatīnāmaṇḍajasaṃsvedajayonyorasaṃjñisattvottarakurumahābrahmopapattināṃ śaṇḍhapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanāśrayāṇāmaṣṭamādibhavānāṃ darśanaheyakleśānāṃ ca /
tāṃ tu yathāyogaṃ mṛdvadhimātrāyāṃ ca 		ngan song gi 'gro ba rnams dang sgo nga las skyes pa dang drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnas dag dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can dag dang byang gi sgra mi snyan dang tshangs pa chen por skye ba rnams dang zam dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa'i lus rnams dang brgyad pa la sogs pa'i srid pa rnams dang mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos nyid 'thob bo /
de dag ni ci rigs par te /
mṛdvacyāmapāyagatīnām /
adhimātrāyāmitareṣām 		chung ngus ni ngan song gi 'gro ba rnams kyi mi skye ba 'thob la /
chen pos ni gzhan dag gi'o /
nirvedhabhāgīyāni trigotrāṇi śrāvakādigotrabhedāt /
tatra 		nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs tha dad pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams rigs gsum yin te; de la /
śiṣyagotrā nnivartya dve buddhaḥ syāt /
ūṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaṃ ca śrāvakagotrādutpannaṃ vyāvartya punarbuddhaḥ syādityasti saṃbhavaḥ /
kṣāntau tu labdhāyāṃ nāstyeva saṃbhavaḥ 		gnyis slob rigs las bzlog nas ni /
sangs rgyas su 'gyur /
dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mor skyes pa nyan thos kyi rigs las bzlog nas yang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba ni srid kyi bzod pa thob pa la ni de lta bu mi srid do /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
apāyānāṃ kila vyāvṛttatvāt 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
ngan song bzlog pa'i phyir te /
bodhisattvāśca parahitkriyāpāratantryādapāyānapyavagāhanta iti byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang gis ngan song du yang 'gro'o zhes grag go /
tasyaiva tu gotrasyāvivartyatvādasaṃbhavaḥ /
trīṇyapītaraḥ 		rigs de nyid bzlog tu mi rung ba'i phyir mi srid do /
gzhan gsum yang /
vivartya syāditi vartate /
trīṇyapi nirvedhabhāgīyāni śrāvakagotrādvacyāvartya buddhādibhavaḥ syāt pratyekabuddha ityarthaḥ 		bzlog nas 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar te /
nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gsum yang nyan thos kyi rigs las ldog nas sangs rgyas las gzhan par 'gyur te rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
pratyekabuddhagotrāṇi tu vyāvartayitumaśakyāni rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnams ni bzlog par mi nus te /
'di ltar /
ābodheḥ sarvamekatra dhyānāntye śāstṛkhaḍgayoḥ ston dang bse ru byang chub par /
bsam gtan mtha' rten gcig la kun /
śāstā budhaḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ /
tayorekatraivāsane caturthameva dhyānaṃ niśrityaniñjyapaṭusamādhitvānnirvedhabhāgīyānyārabhya yāvadbodhirutpadyate /
kṣayānutpādajñāne hi bodhiriti paścādupapādayiṣyāmaḥ /
aśubhāmārabhya yāvadvodhirityapare 		ston pa ni sangs rgyas so /
bse ru lta bu ni rang sangs rgyas te /
de gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin mi g yo ba dang gsal ba'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi ba kho na la kha rten te stan gcig kho na la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams nas bzung ste /
byang chub kyi bar du skyed par byed do /
byang chub ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i ye shes yin no zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o; /
gzhan dag na re mi sdug pa nas bzung ste /
byang chub kyi bar du'o zhes zer ro /
yeṣāṃ tu khaḍgādanyo 'pi pratyekabuddho 'stitadgotrāṇāṃ vyāvartanāpratiṣeṣaḥ /
kiṃ punaḥ prathama eva janmani kṛtaprayogo nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayet 		gang dag bse ru lta bu las gzhan pa'i rang sangs rgyas yod par 'dod pa de'i rigs rnams ni bzlog par dgag pa med do /
ci tshe dang po kho na la sbyor ba byas te nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams skyed par byed dam zhe na /
naitadasti avaśyaṃ hi /
prāktebhyo mokṣabhāgīyaṃ 		de lta bu ni med kyi nges par de'i sngon du thar pa'i cha mthun bskyed par bya dgos so /
utpādayitavyam /
sarvasvalpaṃ hi /
kṣipraṃ mokṣastribhirbhavaiḥ /
ekasmin janmani mokṣabhāgīyaṃ kuśalamūlamutpādayet 		thams cad pas shin tu /
myur ba'i srid pa gsum gyis thar /
sa bon 'debs pa dang 'bru skye ba dang 'bras bu chags pa bzhin du tshe gcig la ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed do /
dvitīye nirvedhabhāgīyāni /
tṛtīye āryamārgam 		gnyis pa la ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams skyed par byed do /
bījaviropaṇa sasyābhivṛddhiphalotpattikramavat /
krameṇa hi saṃtānasyāsyāṃ dharmatāyāmavatāraparipākavimuktayo bhavantīti 		gsum pa la ni 'phags pa'i lam skyed par byed de /
chos nyid 'di la ni rgyud rim gyis 'jug pa dang yongs su smin pa dang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro /
tacca punarmokṣabhāgīyaṃ varṇayanti /
śrutacintāmayaṃ 		thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa de yang thos bsam las byung ba yin par brjod de /
na bhāvanāmayam /
kati karmāṇi /
trīṇi karmāṇi 		bsgom pa las byung ba ni ma yin no /
las du dag cig ce na /
las gsum mo /
prādhānyena tu manaskarmma gtso bor ni yid kyi las yin no /
tatpraṇidhanaparigrahāttu kāyavākkarmāpi mokṣabhāgoyaṃ bhavati de'i smon lam gyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir lus dang ngag gi las kyang thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa yin te /
kaścidekabhikṣāmapi dattvaika śikṣāmapi cādāya mokṣābhilāṣavalādhānānmokṣabhāgīyānyākṣipati la la zhig gis zas 'ga' tsam byin nas sam bslab pa 'ga' tsam yang mnos nas thar pa 'dod pa'i stobs bskyed pas thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i 'phen par 'gyur ro /
tattvetat de yang /
ākṣipyate nṛṣu mi yi nang nas 'phen par byed /
manuṣyeṣveva triṣu dvīpeṣu /
nānyatra 		mi rnams kyi nang kho na dang gling gsum nas 'phen gyi gzhan nas ni ma yin te /
prajñānirvedayorabhāvādyathāyogam ci rigs par shes rab dang skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro /
uktaṃ prasaṅgena mokṣabhāgīyam /
abhisamayakramastu vaktumārabdhaḥ /
tatra ca yāvadagradharmā uktāḥ 		thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhar las 'ongs pa bshad zin to /
mngon par rtogs pa'i rim ba bshad par brtsams pa de la chos kyi mchog gi bar rnams ni bshad zin to /
śeṣaṃ vaktavyam /
ata idamucyate 		lhag ma brjod par bya ste /
de'i phyir /
laukikebhyo 'gradharmebhyo dharmakṣāntiranāsravā 'jig rten pa yi chos mchog las /
chos kyi bzod pa zag pa med /
laukikāgradharmānantaramanāsrava dharmajñānakṣāntirutpadyate ces bya ba 'di smos te /
'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi mjug thogs su chos shes pa'i bzod pa zag pa med pa skye'o /
kasminnālambane dmigs pa gang la zhe na /
kāmaduḥkhe /
kāmāvacaraduḥkhamasyā ālambanam /
seyaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirityucyate 		'dod sdug bsngal la /
de'i dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal yin te /
de ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o /
anāsravajñānārthaṃ niḥṣyandena viśeṣaṇam zag pa med pa nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyu mthun pas bye brag tu byas te /
karmajñānārthaṃ kṣāntiḥ /
puṣpaphalavṛkṣavat /
saiva ca niyāmāvakrāntirityucyate 		chos shes pa'i phyir bzod pa ni chos shes pa'i bzod pa ste me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing bzhin no /
de nyid nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ste /
samyaktvaniyāmāvakramaṇāt yang dag pa nyid du nges par zhugs pa'i phyir ro /
samyaktvaṃ nirvāṇamuktaṃ sūtre /
tatra niyamo niyāma ekāntībhāvaḥ 		yang dag pa nyid ni mdo las mya ngan las 'das pa yin par bshad do /
der nges pa ni nges pa ste gcig tu gyur pa'o /
tasyābhigamanamavakramaṇam /
tasyāṃ cotpannāyāmāryapudgala ucyate 		der 'jug pa ni mngon par 'gro ba ste /
de skyes na 'phags pa'i gang zag ces bya'o /
anāgatayā pṛthagjanatvaṃ vyāvartyate /
etadeva tasyāḥ kāritramanāgatāyāmabhyupagamyate nānyat /
pradīpajātivat 		ma 'ongs pas ni so so'i skye bo nyid zlog par byed do /
ma 'ongs pa de'i bya ba ni de kho na yin par khas len gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
mar me dang skye ba bzhin no /
laukikāgradharmairityapare /
na taddharmatvāttadvirodhitvādadoṣaḥ /
śatruskandhāruḍhatadghātanavat /
ubhayairityapare 		gzhan dag na re 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams kyis bzlog go zhes zer ro /
ma yin te /
de'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro /
de dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir nyes pa med de /
dgra bo'i phrag pa la zhon nas de la 'tshog pa bzhin no /
gzhan dag na re gnyi gas bzlog ste /
ānantaryavimuktimārgasādhrmyāditi /
tato 'traiva dharmajñānaṃ /
tataḥ punarduḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteranantaramatraia kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpadyate 		bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
de nas ni de nyid la chos she na /
sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal ba de kho na la chos shes pa skye ste /
tat duḥkhe dharmajñānamityucyate de ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa zhes bya'o /
anāsravādhikāraḥ sarvatra veditavyaḥ /
yathā ca kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānaṃ cotpadyate /
tathā punaḥ /
śeṣe duḥkhe 'nvayakṣāntijñāne /
duḥkhe dharmajñānānantaraṃ rūpārupyāvacare duḥkhe samastālambanānvayajñānakṣāntirutpadyate 		thams cad du yang zag pa med pa'i gnas skabs yin par rig par bya'o /
ji ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang chos shes pa skye ba de bzhin du /
sdug bsngal lhag la rjes bzod shes /
sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa spyi la dmigs pa skye ste /
sā duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntirityucyate de ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o /
tato 'nvayajñānamutpadyate de nas ni rjes su shes pa skye ste /
tat duḥkhe 'nvaya jñānamityucyate de ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa zhes bya'o /
prathamatodharmatattvajñānāddharmajñānam dang po nyid du chos kyi de kho na nyid shes pa'i phyir chos shes pa yin no /
tadanvayādūrdhvaṃ duḥkhālambanamanvayajñānam /
tathaivānugamanāt /
yathā caitāni duḥkhasatye catvāri kṣāntijñānānyutpadyante 		de'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir gong ma'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa la dmigs pa ni rjes su shes pa ste /
de bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la bzod pa dang shes pa bzhi po de dag skye ba ltar /
satyatraye tathā /
duḥkhānvayajñānādanantaraṃ kāmāvacare samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntirutpadyate /
tataḥ samudaye dharmajñānam /
evaṃ samanantarotpattikrameṇa śeṣe samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānam kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntirnirodhe dharmajñānaṃ śeṣe nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntirnirodhe 'nvayajñānaṃ kāmavacaraduḥkhapratipakṣamārge dharmajñānakṣāntirmārge dharmajñānaṃ śeṣe mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntirmārge 'nvayajñānam 		bden pa gsum la de bzhin no /
sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa ni spyod pa'i kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa skye zhing /
de nas kun 'byung la chos shes pa skye la /
de bzhin du mjug thogs su skye ba'i rim gyis kun 'byung lhag ma la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa skye'o /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang 'gog pa la chos shes pa skye'o /
'gog pa lhag ma rnams la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa skye'o /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang lam la chos shes pa skye'o /
lam lhag ma rnams la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang lam la rjes su shes pa skye ste /
iti ṣoḍaśacitto 'yaṃ satyābhisamayaḥ /
ityanena krameṇāyaṃ satyānāmabhisamayaḥ ṣoḍaśacittako bhavati 		de ltar bden pa mngon rtogs 'di /
sems bcu drug go /
de ltar na rim pa 'dis na bden pa mngon par rtogs pa 'di ni sems bcu drug yin no /
ye tarhi nikāyāntarīyāḥ satyānāmekābhisamayaṃ varṇayanti /
abhiprāya eṣa draṣṭavyaḥ 		sde ba gzhan gang dag bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs pa 'di ni gcig go zhes brjod pa de dag gi bsam pa ltar bya ste /
abhedena hyabhisamaya ucyate satyeṣu bye brag med par ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o /
tridhā /
darśanālambakāryākhyaḥ 		de ni rnam gsum ste /
mthong dmigs bya ba zhes bya'o /
darśanābhisamayo 'nāsravayā prajñayā satyānām /
ālambanābhisamayastatsaṃprayuktairvedanādibhirapi 		mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa ni zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs pa'o /
dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams kyis kyang mngon par rtogs pa'o /
kāryābhisamayo viprayuktairapi śīlajātyādibhiḥ /
duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ samudayādīnāṃ kāryābhisamayaḥ 		bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa ni ldan pa ma yin pa tshul khrims dang skye ba la sogs pas kyang mngon par rtogs pa'o /
sdug bsngal mthong na de'i mngon par rtogs pa ni gsum mo /
kun 'byung la sogs pa ni bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa yin te /
prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇabhāvanāt spong ba dang mngon gsum du byed pa dang sgom pa'i phyir ro /
tadyadi satyānāṃ darśanābhisamayaṃ pratyekābhisamayaṃ brūyāt /
ayuktaṃ brūyādākārabhedāt /
athāpyanātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ darśanamiti brūyāt 		de lta bas na gal te bden pa rnams mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa gcig go zhes smra ni rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir mi rigs par smra ba yin no /
'on te thams cad bdag med pa'i rnam par mthong ngo zhes zer na ni /
na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt 'o na ni bden pa rnams la sdug bsngal la sogs par mthong bar mi 'gyur bas de lta bas na /
evaṃ ca sūtravirodhaḥ /
ihāryaśravakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasi kūrvataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato yāvat mārga vā mārgato manasi kurvato 'nāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto yo dharmāṇo pravicaya iti 		'phags pa nyan thos sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du yid la byed pa'am /
kun 'byung la kun 'byung du yid la byed pa'am /
lam la lam gyi bar du yid la byed pa'i zag pa med pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa zhes gsungs pa'i mdo dang 'gal lo /
bhāvanāmārga evamiti cet gal te de lta bu ni bsgom pa'i lam ma yin no zhe na /
na /
yathādarśanaṃ bhāvanāt 		ma yin te /
ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bsgom pa'i phyir ro /
athāpyekasya darśanāccheṣeṣu va brūyānna doṣaḥ syāt /
antarā tu vyutthānamasti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syāt 		'on te gcig mthong bas lhag ma rnams lnga dbang thob pa'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa gcig kho na zhes zer na ni nyes pa med de bar skabs su ldan pa yod dam med ces dpyad par bya ba yin no /
atha punarbrūyāt duḥkhameva parijānansamudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣāt karoti mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
ata ikābhisamaya iti /
evamapi na doṣaḥ syādekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanāt /
darśanābhisamayaṃ tu prati sūtre satyānāṃ krameṇābhisamaya ukto lakṣyate /
nahaiva gṛhapate satyānāmekābhisamayo 'pi pūrvābhisayaya iti vistareṇa sadṛṣṭāntāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi 		'on te sdug bsngal kho na yongs su shes na kun 'byung yang spongs la 'gog pa yang mngon sum du byed cing lam yang sgom par byed pas de'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa gcig go zhes zer na de lta na yang nyes pa med de; gcig mthong na lhag ma rnams kyang bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
mdo las mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir bden pa rnams rim gyis mngon par rtogs par gsungs par mngon te /
khyim bdag bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs pa gcig pa ni med pa nyid de /
'on kyang mthar gyis mngon par rtogs so zhes rgyas par gsungs pa dpe dang bcas pa'i mdo gsum khungs su yod do /
gal te mdo las /
yo duḥkhe niṣkāṅkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa iti sūtrādekābhisamaya iti cet gang zhig sdug bsngal la ne ma nur med cing the tshom med pa de ni sangs rgyas la yang zhes gsungs pas mngon bar rtogs pa gcig go zhes zer na /
na /
asaṃmudācārāvaśyaṃprahāṇābhisaṃdhivacanāt 		ma yin te /
kun du mi 'byung ba dang gdon mi za bar spong ba las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
ya eṣauktaḥ ṣoḍhaśacittako 'bhisamayaḥ /
so 'gradharmaikabhūmikaḥ 		mngon par rtogs pa sems bcu drug par bshad pa gang yin pa de ni chos mchog dang sa gcig /
yadbhūmiko 'gradharmastadbhūmikānyetāni ṣoḍaśa cittāni chos kyi mchog sa gang yin ba sems bcu drug po 'di dag kyang de'i sa pa ste /
ta punaḥ ṣaḍbhūmikā ityuktaṃ prāk de dag ni sa drug pa'o zhes sngar bshad zin to /
kasmāt punaḥ kṣāntayo jñānāni cavaśyaṃ bhavanti ci'i phyir gdon mi za bar bzod pa dag dang shes pa dag yin zhe na /
yasmāt /
kṣāntijñānānyanantarya muktimārgā yathākramam 		bzod dang shes pa go rims bzhin /
bar chad med dang rnam grol lam /
anantaryamārgāḥ kṣāntayaḥ kleśaprāptivicchedaṃ pratyantarayitumaśakyatvāt bzod pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i thob pa rnam par gcod pa la bar chad bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir bar chad med pa'i lam dag yin no /
vimuktimārgāstu jñānāni /
kleśaprāptivimuktānāṃ visaṃyogaprāptisahotpādāt 		shes pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i thob pa las rnam par grol ba rnams la bral ba'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i lam dag yin te /
ata ubhayairavaśyaṃ bhavitavyam de'i phyir gnyi ga yang yin par 'gyur te /
dvābhyāṃ cauraniṣkāsanakapāṭapidhānavat /
yadi punardvitīyenānantaryamārgeṇaiva saha visaṃyogaprāptirutpadyeta kiṃ syāt /
prahīṇavicikitsaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivālambane notpannaṃ syāt 		gnyis kyis rkun po 'byin pa dang sbo gcod pa bzhin no /
gal te bar chad med pa'i lam gnyis pa kho na bral ba'i thob ba dang lhan cig skye bar gyur na ni dmigs pa de kho na la the tshom spangs ba'i shes pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro /
kṣāntibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇānnava saṃyojananikāyā jñānavadhyā iti śāstravirodha iti cet gal te brjod pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir bstan bcos las kun du sbyor ba'i ris dgu zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal lo zhe na /
na /
kṣāntīnāṃ jñānaparivāratvāt /
rājaparivārakṛtasya rājakṛtavyapadeśavat /
kiṃ punaḥ sarvāṇi ṣoḍaśacittāni satyadarśanāddarśanamārgaḥ 		ma yin te /
bzod pa rnams ni shes pa'i 'khor yin pa'i phyir rgyal bo'i 'khor gyis byas pa las rgyal pos byas so zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa bzhin no /
ci sems bcu drug po thams cad bden pa ma mthong ba mthong ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam yin nam zhe na /
netyāha smras pa /
kiṃ tarhi /
adṛṣṭadṛṣṭerdṛṇṭṅmārgastatra pañcadaśa kṣaṇāḥ /
duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntimārabhya yāvat mārge 'nvayajñāna kṣāntirete pañcadaśa kṣāṇā darśanamārgaḥ 		ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
de las skad cig bco lnga ni /
ma mthong mthong phyir mthong ba'i lam /
sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa nas bzung ste lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i bar gyi skad cig ma bco lnga po de dag ni mthong ba'i lam yin no /
ki kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
adṛṣṭasatyadarśanāt bden pa ma mthong ba mthong ba'i phyir ro /
ṣoḍaśe tu nāstyapoūrvaṃ dravyamiti /
yathādraṣṭābhyasanādbhāvanāmārga eva /
nanu ca tenāṣyadṛṣṭaṃ paśyati mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntim 		bcu drug pa la ni sngon ma mthong ba blta bar bya ba med kyi ji ltar mthong ba ni goms par byed pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam kho na yin no /
des kyang lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ma mthong ba mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
satyaṃ prati cintā na kṣaṇam bden pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi skad cig ma la ni ma yin no /
na hi kṣaṇenādṛṣṭena satyamadṛṣṭaṃ bhavati skad cig ma gcig ma mthong bas ni bden ba ma mthong ba ma yin te /
yathā naikena luṅgenālūnena dedāramalūnaṃ bhavati /
phalatvādaṣṭajñānaṣoḍaśākārabhāvanāt pūrvamārgavihāneḥ pravandhikatvācca mārgānvayajñānaṃ bhāvanāmārgaḥ 		dper na nyag ma gcig ma brngas pas zhing ma brngas pa ma yin pa bzhin no /
'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dang shes pa brgyad dang rnam pa bcu drug thob pa'i phyir dang lam snga ma rnam par nyams pa'i phyir dang rgyun chags pa yin pa'i phyir lam la rjes su shes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam yin no /
aparihāṇistudarśanaheyakleśaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇāt /
ata eva darśanamārga iti cet 		yongs su ma nyams pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i spangs pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
gal te de nyid kyi phyir mthong ba'i lam yin zhe na /
na /
atiprasaṅgāt /
sapta jñānāni kasmāddarśanamārgaḥ /
darśanasyāsamāptatvāt /
na hi sarvaṃ satyadarśanaṃ samāptamiti tadantarālatvāttanyappi darśanamārgaḥ /
uktaṃ yathā darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārga ścotpadyate /
yathedānīmutpannāryamārgāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ tathā vakṣyāmaḥ 		ma yin te /
ha cang thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro /
ci'i phyir shes pa bdun mthong ba'i lam yin zhe na /
mthong ba ma rdzogs pa'i phyir te /
bden pa mthong ba thams cad ma rdzogs pas de'i bar mar gyur pa'i phyir de dag kyang mthong ba'i lam yin no /
mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam ji ltar skye ba bshad zin to /
da ni ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam skyes pa'i gang zag rnams rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
ya ete darśanamārgasvabhāvāḥ pañcādaśa kṣaṇa uktā veditavyau mthong ba'i lam gyi rang bzhin gyi skad cig ma bco lngar bshad pa gang dag yin pa /
mṛdutīkṣṇendriyau teṣu śraddhādharmānusariṇau dbang po rno rtul de dag tu /
dad dang chos kyis rjes 'brang ba /
yin par rig par bya ste /
mṛddhindriyastesu vartamānaḥ śraddhānusārītyucyate dbang po rtul po de dag la gnas pa ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o /
tīkṣṇendriyo dharmānusārīti dbang po rnon po ni chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o /
śraddhayānusāraḥ śraddhānusāraḥ dad bas rjes su 'brang bas na dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o /
so 'syāstīti śraddhānusārī /
śraddhayānusartuṃ śīlamasyeti vā 		de 'di la yod pas sam /
'di dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i dang tshul can yin pas na dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ste /
pūrvaṃ parasaṃpratyayenārthānusaraṇāt sngon gzhan gyi dring gis don gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro /
evaṃ dharmānusārī /
pūrvaṃ svayameva sūtrādibhirdharmairarthānusaraṇāt 		chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba yang de dang 'dra ste; sngon bdag nyid kho nas mdo la sogs pa'i chos kyi don gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro /
tau punaḥ de gnyis ni /
ahīnabhāvanāheyau phalādyapratipannakau /
phalānāmādyaṃ srota āpattiphalaṃ sarvaphalaprāptau tasya prathamatvāt 		bsgom pas spang bya ma spangs na /
'bras bu dang po la zhugs pa /
'bras bu rnams kyi dang po ni 'bras bu dang po ste /
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o /
de ni 'bras bu thob par bya ba thams cad kyi dang po yin pa'i phyir ro /
tāveva śraddhādharmānusāriṇau yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇāprahīṇabhāvanāheyau bhavataḥ sakalavandhanau to srota āpattiphalapratipannakāvucyete /
yāvat pañcaprakāraghnau 		dad pa dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba de dag nyid gal te sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma spangs pa 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa zhig yin na ni de gnyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya'o /
rnam lnga'i bar bcom /
yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarāṇaṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ yāvat pañca prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /
tathaiva prathamaphalapratīpannakāvucyete 		gal te sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsgoms te spang bar bya ba 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams las rnam pa lnga'i bar du spangs pa zhig yin na yang de kho na bzhin du dang po'i 'bras bul zhugs pa dag ces bya'o /
gnyis pa la /
dvitīye 'rvāṅnavakṣayāt dgu pa tshun chad zad pa yin /
dvītīyanimittaṃ dvitīye gnyis pa la zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'i phyir te /
yadi tayostasmāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaprahīṇā bhavanti /
dvau tau dvitīyaphalapratipannakāvucyete /
katamacca dvitīyam 		gal te de gnyis kyis de yan chad rnam pa drug gam /
bdun nam brgyad dag cig sngon spangs ba yin na ni de gnyis 'bras bu gnyis pa la zhugs pa zhes bya ste /
gnyis pa gang zhe na /
sakṛdāgāmiphalam lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o /
kāmādviraktāburdhva vā tṛtīyapratipannakau 'dod pa'am yang na gong ma las /
chags bral gsum pa la zhugs pa /
yadi punarnavamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇāt kāmadhātorvītarāgau bhavata ūrdhvaṃ vā yāvadākiñcanyāyatanāt tau tṛtīya pratīpannakāvucyete /
katamacca tṛtīyam 		gal te rnam pa dgu ba yang spangs pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin nam /
gong ma ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na de gnyis 'bras bu gsum pa la zhugs pa zhes bya ste /
gsum gang zhe na /
anāgāmiphalam /
ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ /
ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne tau na punaḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇāvucyete 		phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o /
gang zhig gang la zhugs pa ni /
bcu drug pa la de 'bras gnas /
sems bcu drug pa skyes na de gnyis dad pa dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba zhes kyang mi bya la /
nāpi pratipannakau zhugs pa zhes kyang ni bya'o /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
phalastho /
yatra phale yaḥ pratipannako bhūtaḥ sa tadānīṃ tatra phalasthito bhavati /
srota āpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā /
arhattvaṃ tu na śakyamāditaḥ prāptum 		'bras bu la gnas pa dag yin te /
gang zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am /
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am /
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang rung 'bras bu gang la zhugs par gyur ba de ni de'i tshe 'bras bu de la gnas pa yin no /
dgra bcom pa nyid ni dang po nyid du thob par mi nus te /
darśanamārgeṇa bhāvanāheyānāmaprahāṇāt /
pūrvaṃ ca bhavāgravairāgyāsaṃbhavāt 		mthong ba'i lam gyis bsgom pas spang bar bya ba mi spong ba'i phyir dang sngar yang srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro /
śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭacyāptau mṛdutokṣṇendriyau tadā de'i tshe dbang po rno rtul dag /
dad bas mos dang mthong bas thob /
tasminkāle yo mṛdvindriyaḥ śraddhānusāripūrvī sa śraddhādhimukta ityucyate de'i tshe dbang po rtul bo sngon dad pas rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa de ni dad pas mos ba zhes bya'o /
yastīkṣṇendriyo dharmānusāripūrvī sa dṛṣṭiprāpta ityucyate /
śraddhāprajñādhikatvenādhimokṣadṛṣṭiprabhāvitatvāt 		dbang po rnon po sngon chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba gang yin ba de ni mthong bas thob pa zhes bya ste /
dad pa dang shes rab lhag bas mos pa dang mthong bas rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prahīṇapañcaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte srota āpanna evocyate na sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ ci'i phyir rnam pa lnga spangs kyang sems bcu drug pa la rgyun du zhugs pa kho na zhes bya la /
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes mi bya zhe na /
yasmāt /
phale phalaviśiṣṭasya lābho mārgasya nāstyanaḥ 		gang gi phyir /
'bras thob 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis /
lam thob med pas de yi phyir /
nāprayukto viśeṣāya phalasthaḥ pratipannakaḥ /
phale hi labhyamāne phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na labhyata ityeṣa niyamaḥ /
ataḥ phalastho yāvanna viśeṣāya prayujyate phalāntaraprāptau tāvat pratipannako nocyate /
evamanyatrāpi phale veditavyam 		'bras gnas khyad par bya ba'i phyir /
mi brtson pa ni zhugs ma yin /
'bras bu thob na 'bras bu khyad par can gyi lam mi 'thob po zhes bya ba 'di ni nges so /
de lta bas na 'bras bu la gnas pa ji srid du khyad par du bya ba'i phyir 'bras bu gzhan thob par bya pa la mi brtson pa de srid du zhugs pa zhes mi bya ste /
de bzhin du 'bras bu gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
yastu tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgo 'dharāṃ bhūmi niśritya niyāmamavakrāmati so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārga saṃmukhīkaroti gang zhig bsam gtan gsum ba las 'dod chags dang bral la /
sa 'og ma la brten te nges par 'jug pa de ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu khyad par can gyi lam mngon du byed do /
anyathā hi sa tasmādūrdhvopapannaḥ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt de lta ma yin na de'i gong du skyes pa de bde ba'i dpang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro /
evaṃ tāvadbhūyaḥ kāmavītarāgāṇāṃ niyāmāvakrāntau pudgalavyavasthānam re zhig phal cher las dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis nges par 'jug pa'i gang zag rnam par gzhag pa ni de lta bu yin no /
ānupūrvikaṃ tu vaktavyam /
ata idaṃ tāvadvacyavasthāpyate /
yathaite kāmadhātau navaprakārāḥ kleśā upadiṣṭā evaṃ 		mthar gyis 'jug ba brjod par bya ste /
de'i phyir re zhig 'di rnam par gzhag par bya'o /
ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu po de dag bstan pa de bzhin du /
navaprakārā doṣā hi bhūmau bhūmau /
yāvadbhavāgre /
yathā ca doṣāḥ /
tathā guṇāḥ /
tatpratipakṣā apyānantaryavimuktimārgākhyā guṇā bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārā eva 		sa dang sa na nyes rnam dgu /
srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du'o /
nyes pa rnams ji lta bde bzhin du yang yon tan rnams sa dang sa na de'i gnyen bo bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba yon tan yang rnam pa dgu dgu kho na yod do /
kathaṃ kṛtvā ji ltar byas pas she na /
mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇāṃ punarmṛdvādibhedataḥ chung dang 'bring dang che rnams kyi /
chung ngu la sogs tha dad phyir /
mṛdumadhyādhimātrā hi trayo mūlaprakārāḥ /
teṣāṃ punaḥ pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratvena trividhatvāt nava vyavasthāpyante /
tadyathā mṛdumṛduḥ prakāro mṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātro madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātro 'dhimātramṛduradhimātramadhyo 'dhimātrādhimātraśceti /
tatra mṛdumṛdunāmārgeṇādhimātrādhimātrasya kleśasya prahāṇam 		rtsa ba'i rnam pa gsum ste /
chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o /
de dag re re zhing yang chung du dang 'bring dang chen po nyid kyis rnam pa gsum yin pa'i phyir dgur rnam par gzhag ste /
chung ngu'i chung ngu'i rnam pa dang chung ngu'i 'bring dang chung ngu'i chen po dang 'bring gi chung ngu dang 'bring gi 'bring dang 'bring gi chen po dang chen po'i chung ngu dang chen po'i 'bring dang chen po'i chen po'o /
de la lam chung ngu'i chung dus ni nyon mongs pa chen po'i chen po sbong la /
evaṃ yāvadadhimātrādhimātreṇa mṛdumṛdoḥ /
ādita evādhimātramārgasaṃbhavādutpannādhimātramārgasya cādhimātrakleśāsaṃbhavāt audāriko hi malaścelātpūrvaṃ nirdūyate paścāt sūkṣmaḥ /
audārikaṃ ca tamaḥ sūkṣmeṇālokena hanyate sūkṣmaṃ cādhimātreṇetyeṣa dṛṣṭāntayogaḥ 		de bzhin du ma chen po'i chen pos ni nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bar du spong ste /
dang po kho nar lam chen po mi srid pa'i phyir dang lam chen bo skyes pa la nyon mongs ba chen po mi srid pa'i phyir ro /
gos la dri ma che long ni sngar 'khrul phra mo ni phyis 'khru ba dang mun pa che long ni snang ba chung ngus 'joms la phra mo ni chen pos sel zhes bya ba 'di ni dpe'i rnam pa yin no /
śuklā hi dharmā valavanto durbalāstu kṛṣṇāḥ /
kṣaṇikamṛdukenāpyāryamārgeṇānādisaṃsāraparaṃparāpyāyitādhimātrāṇāṃ kleśānāmunmūlatvāt 		'phags pa'i lam skad cig ma chung ngus kyang 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas brgyud pas spel ba'i nyon mongs pa chen po rnams rtsa ba nas med par byed pa'i phyir chos dkar po rnams ni stobs dang ldan pa yin la /
nag po rnams ni stobs chung ba yin te /
bahukālasaṃvarddhitānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ trivṛtkarṣavat kṣaṇikālpapradīpamahātamopaghātavacya /
evaṃ navaprakāreṣu kleśeṣu sarvatra 		yun ring po nas bsags pa'i skyon rnams sman tri byid thun gcig gis 'byin pa lta bu dang mar me skad cig ma chung ngus mun pa chen po 'joms pa bzhin no /
de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams pa dgu po de dag thams cad du /
akṣīṇabhāvanāheyaḥ phalasthaḥ saptakṛtparaḥ 'bras gnas bsgom spang bya ma zad /
re ltar thogs na lan bdun pa /
yasya hi phalasthasyaiko 'pi bhāvanāheyaḥ prakāro 'prahīṇaḥ sa srota āpanaḥ 'bras bu la gnas pa gang zhig gis /
bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa gcig kyang ma spangs pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa yin la /
saptajanmāni karotīti saptakṛta tshe bdun gyi bar du skye bas na re ltar thogs na lan bdun pa'o /
paraḥ sarvāntyaḥ /
na hi sarvasaptakṛditi /
saptakṛtvaḥparama iti sūtrapāṭhaḥ /
saptakṛtvaḥ paramaṃ janmā 'syetyarthaḥ /
prakarṣe paramaśabdaḥ 		thams cad du ni lan bdun pa ma yin pas re ltar thogs na zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi tha shal ba'o /
mdo las /
mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa zhes 'byung ba ni de mchog tu thogs na skye ba lan bdun pa zhes bya pa'i tha tshig ste /
mchog ces bya ba'i sgra ni rab tu'o /
nirvāṇasroto hi mārgastena tatra gamanāt mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyun ni lam ste /
des na der 'gro ba'i phyir ro /
tadasāvāpanna āgataḥ prāpta iti srota āpannaḥ 'di ni der zhugs shing phyin la son pas na rgyun du zhugs pa yin no /
kathamāpannaḥ ji ltar na zhugs pa yin /
ādyamārgalābhāccet aṣṭamako 'pi syāt gal te lam dang pho thob pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni brgyad pa yang yin par 'gyur ro /
ādyaphalalābhāccet bhūyo vītarāgo 'pi syāt /
kāmavītarāgaḥ /
sarvaphalaprāpiṇamadhikṛtyādyaphalalābhāt /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sa eva nāṣṭamakaḥ 		gal te 'bras bu dang po thob ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni phal tshor las 'dod chags dang bral pa yang yin par 'gyur la /
'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba yang yin par 'gyur ro /
'bras bu thams cad thob pa'i dbang du byas nas 'bras bu dang po thob pa'i phyir ro /
ci'i phyir de kho na yin la brgyad pa ni ma yin zhe na /
pratipannakaphalamārgalābhāt darśanabhāvanāmārgalābhāt sakalasroto 'bhisamayācca mārgānvayajñāne lam la rjes su shes pa la ni zhugs pa dang 'bras bu'i lam thob ba'i phyir dang mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam thob pa'i phyir dang rgyun thams cad mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
sa eva tasmādanyānsaptopapattibhavānmanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdadhāti saptāntarābhavān /
evaṃ deveṣvityaṣṭāviṃśatiyavān pratisaṃdadhāti /
saptakasāmānyāttu saptakṛtvaḥ /
parama uktaḥ /
saptasthānakauśalasaptaparṇavaditi vaibhāṣikāḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de ni de las gzhan ba skye ba'i srid pa bdun dang srid pa bar ma bdun du mi rnams kyi nang du nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed la de bo zhin du lha dag gi nang du yang nying mtshams sbyor bar byed do /
de ltar na srid pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du nying mtshams sbyor bar byed do /
srid pa bdun tshan du 'dra ba'i phyir mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa zhes bshad de /
gnas bdun la mkhas pa zhes bya ba dang 'dab ma bdun ba zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes zer ro /
yattarhhi sūtra uktaṃ asthānamanavakāśo yaddaṣṭisaṃpannaḥ pudgalo 'ṣṭamaṃ bhavamabhinirvartayiṣyati /
nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti 		'o na gang mdo las /
gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa srid pa brgyad pa mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de 'di ni gnas med do zhes gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
ekasyāṃ gatāvityabhiprāyaḥ 'gro ba gcig tu dgongs pa yin no /
yathārutaṃ vā kalpyamāne 'ntarābhavo 'pi na syāt evamapyūredhvasrotaso bhavāgraparamasyaikasyāṃ gatāvaṣṭama upapattibhāvo na prāpnoti 'on te sgra ji bzhin du brtags na ni srid pa bar ma yang yod par mi 'gyur ro /
de lta na yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du gong du 'pho ba 'gro ba gcig tu skye ba'i srid pa brgyad par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
kāmadhātvabhi saṃdhivacanādadoṣaḥ 'dod pa'i khams las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir nyes pa med do /
kimatra jñāpakaṃ sūtraṃ yuktirvā /
iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtvo na pounarubhayeṣveva saptakṛtva iti /
evaṃ hi paṭhacyate /
saptakṛtvo devāśca manuṣyāśceti 		'di la shes par byed pa mdo'am rigs pa ci zhig yod /
lha dang mi dag gi nang nas sor lan bdun skye'i gnyi ga'i nang du lan bdun ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba 'di la yang shes par byed pa ci zhig yod de /
'di skad du lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun zhes 'byung ngo zhe na /
pratyekamapi tu kāśyapīyāḥ paṭhanti 'od srungs pa rnams lha rnams su lan bdun /
saptakṛtvo devān saptakṛtvo manuṣyāniti /
nātrābhiniveṣṭavyam /
yaśca manuṣyesu srota āpanno bhavati sa tānevāgamya parinirvāti /
yo deveṣu sa tāneva /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamaṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayati /
tāvatā kakalenāvaśyaṃ saṃtatiparipākāt /
mārgo hi sa tajjātīyaḥ 		mi rnams su lan bdun zhes so sor yang 'don pas 'di la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o /
gang zhig mi dag gi nang du rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa de ni de kho nar 'ongs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das la /
gang zhig lha dag gi nang du rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa de ni de kho nar 'ongs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o /
ci'i phyir srid pa brgyad pa mngon par mi 'grub ce na /
dus de srid kyis gdon mi za bar rgyud yongs su smin pa'i phyir ro /
lam de ni de 'dra ste /
saptapadāśīviṣa daṣṭavaccāturthakajvaravacca /
saptasaṃyojanāvaśeṣatvācca /
dve avarabhāgīye pañca cordhvabhāgīyānīti 		sprul gom pa bdun pas zin pa lta bu dang rims nyin bzhi ba bzhin no /
kun tu sbyor ba bdun po tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa gnyis dang gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga lus pa'i yang phyir ro /
antareṇāpyāryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkurvāṇo na parinirvāti bar skabs su yang 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed cing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste /
tāvat bhavavedanīyasya karmaṇo valādhānāt /
asati buddhotpādagrahastha evārhattvaṃ prāpnoti /
agāraṃ tu pounarnādhyāvasati 		de srid du srid ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro /
sangs rgyas 'byung pa med na khyim pa kho nar dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob na khyim na ni mi gnas so /
dharmatāpratilambhikaṃ tu bhikṣuliṅga pratilabhate chos nyid kyis 'thob pa'i dge slong gi mtshan ma yang 'thob bo /
gzhan dag na re /
anyāśramikaṃ liṅgenetyapare dge spyong gzhan gyis mtshan mas so zhes zer ro /
kasmādavinipātakadharmā bhavati ci'i phyir log bar ltung pa'i chos can ma yin zhe na /
tadgāmi karmānupacayādupacitavipākadānavaiguṇyācca saṃtaterbalavatkuśalā dhivāsanātprayogāśayaśuddhitaḥ /
apāyanipāte tu karmaṇyasau kṣāntimapi notpādayet 		der 'gro ba'i las mi sogs pa'i phyir dang bsags pa yang sbyor ba dang bsam pa dag ba'i sgo nas dge ba'i rtsa ba stobs dang ldan pas bsgos pa'i phyir rgyud rnam par smin ba dang mi mthun pa byas pa'i phyir ro /
ngan song du nges ba'i las yod na ni des bzod pa yang bskyed bar mi 'gyur ro /
āha cātra /
kṛtvā budho 'lpamapi pāpamadhaḥ prayāti 		'dir smra sa pa /
mi mkhas pas ni sdig pa chung du byas kyang 'og tu 'gro /
kṛtvā budho mahadapi prajahātyanartham mkhas pas chen po byas kyang gnod ba rab tu spong bar 'gyur /
majjanyadho 'lpamapi vāriṇi saṃhataṃ hi /
pātrikṛtaṃ mahadapi plavate tadeva iti 		lcags kyi gong bu chung yang chu yi gting du 'bying 'gyur la /
de nyid snod du byas na che yang steng du 'phyo bar 'gyur /
duḥkhasyāntaṃ karotīti ko duḥkhasyāntaḥ /
yasmāt pareṇa duḥkhaṃ nāsti 		sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed do zhes bya ba sdug bsngal gyi mtha' gang yin zhe na /
gang phan chad sdug bsngal med ba ste /
apratisaṃdhikaṃ duḥkhaṃ karotītyarthaḥ sdug bsngal gyi nying mtshams mi sbyor bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
athavā nirvāṇamantaḥ /
kathaṃ nirvāṇaṃ karoti 		yang na mtha' ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no /
mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar byed ce na /
tatprāptivivandhāpanayanāt /
yathākāśaṃ kuru maṇḍapaṃ pātayeti bhavanti vaktāraḥ /
anyo 'pi ca syātsaptakṛtvaḥ paramo na tu niyata iti nocyate /
evaṃ tāvadakṣīṇabhāvanāheyaḥ phalasthaḥ saptakṛtvaḥ paramo bhavati 		de 'thob pa'i bgegs bsal ba'i phyir te dper na smra ba po 'dun khang rdib la nam mkha' gyis [*yis] zhes 'dzer ba lta bu yin no /
mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa gzhan yang yod mod kyi ma nges pas mi brjod do /
re zhig 'bras bu la gnas ba bsgos pas spang par bya ba ma zad pa mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa ni de lta bu yin no /
tricaturvidhamuktastu dvitrijanmā kulaṅkulaḥ rnam gsum rnam bzhi las grol ba /
tshe gnyis gsum du rigs nas rigs /
sa eva srota āpannastribhiḥ /
kleśaprahāṇatastricatuḥporakāraprahīṇatvāt /
indriyatastatpratipakṣānāsravendriyalābhāt /
janmato dvitrijanmāvaśeṣatvāt 		rgyun du zhugs pa de nyid rgyu gsum gyis na rigs nas rigs su skye ba yin te /
nyon mongs pa spang ba las ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gsum mam bzhi spang ba'i phyir ro /
dbang po lngas ni de'i gnyen po zag pa med pa'i dbang po thob pa'i phyir ro /
skye ba las ni tshe gnyis sam gsum lus pa'i phyir ro /
śloke tu dvayorgrahaṇaṃ srota āpannasya paścātprahīṇe sati tatpratipakṣānāsravendriyasyānuktasiddhatvāt tshigs su bcad pa'i nang du gnyis shig smos pa ni /
rgyun du zhugs pa phyis nyon mongs pa spong bar byed na de'i gnyen po zag ba med pa'i dbang bo thob pa ni ma smos kyang grub pa'i phyir ro /
pareṇa bhavyatvād /
ato 'sya grahaṇam /
kasmānna pañcaprakāraprahāṇāt /
tatprahāṇe ṣaṣṭhasyāvaśyaṃ prahāṇāt nahi tasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samarthaḥ 		skye ba ni gal te gong ma'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ches nyung dur yang 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'di smos so /
ci'i phyir rnam pa lnga spangs pa'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
de spangs na drug pa yang gdon mi za bar spong ba'i phyir te /
de'i rnam ba gcig gis ni bar chad gcig pa'i bzhin du 'bras bu la bgegs bya bar mi nus te /
ekavīcikasyeva dhātvanatikramāt khams las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro /
sa eva kulaṅkulo dvividhaḥ rigs nas rigs su skye bde ni rnam pa gnyis te /
devakulaṅkulo yo deveṣa dve trīṇi vā kulāni saṃśritya parinirvāti tatra vā 'nyatra vā devanikāye lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni lha dag gi nang du rigs gnyis sam gsum du 'khor nas lha'i rigs de'am gzhan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o /
manuṣyakulaṅkulo yo manuṣyeṣu tatra vā 'nyatra va dvīpe parinirvāti /
sa eva punaḥ phalasthaḥ 		mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni mi dag gi nang du rigs gnyis sam gsum du 'khor nas gling de'am gzhan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o /
'bras bu la gnas ba de nyid /
āpañcamaprakāraghno dvitīyapratīpannakaḥ rnam pa lnga yi bar bcom pa /
gnyis pa la ni zhugs pa yin /
yasya phalasthasyaikaprakāroyāvatpañcamaḥ prahīṇo bhavati asau dvitīyaphalapratipannako veditavyaḥ 'bras bu la gnas pa gang gis rnam pa gcig nas lnga'i bar du spangs ba yin na de'i 'bras bu gnyis pa la zhugs pa yin bar rig par bya'o /
kṣīṇaṣaṣṭhaprakārastu sakṛdāgāmyasau punaḥ /
dvitīyaphalaprāpto bhavati 		rnam pa drug pa zad gyur pa /
de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba /
de ni 'bras bu gnyis pa thob pa yin te /
devān gatvā sakṛnmanuṣyalokāgamanātsakṛdāgāmī lha dag gi nang du song nas mi'i 'jig rten du lan cig phyir 'od ba'i phyir 'ong ba ste /
pareṇa janmāghāvāt /
rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tanutvādityucyate /
mṛduprakārāvaśeṣatvāt /
sa eva punaḥ phalasthaḥ 		phan chad skye ba med pa'i phyir ro /
'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams bsrabs pa'i phyir zhes 'byung pa ni chung du'i rnam pa lus pa'i phyir ro /
'bras bu la gnas pa de nyid /
kṣīṇasaptāṣṭadoṣāṃśa ekajanmaikavīcikaḥ /
tṛtīyapratipannaśca 		nyis cha bdun dang brgyad zad pa /
tshe gcig bar chad gcig pa dang /
gsum pa la ni zhugs pa'ang yin /
tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ /
sa eva sakṛdāgāmyekavīcido veditavyaḥ /
saptāṣṭaprakāraprahāṇāt /
tatpratipakṣānāsravendriyalābhādekajanmāvaśeṣatvāt /
kathamasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vidhnayitum śaknoti 		yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba de nyid rgyu gsum gyis bar chad gcig pa yin par rig par bya ste /
nyon mongs pa'i rnam ba bdun nam brgyad spangs pa'i phyir dang de'i gnyen po zag pa med pa'i dbang bo thob pa'i phyir dang tshe gcig lus pa'i phyir ro /
ji ltar na 'di'i rnam pa gcig gis 'bras bu la bgegs byed bar nus she na /
dhātvatikramāt khams las 'da' ba'i phyir te /
avasthātraye hi karmāṇi vidhnāyopatiṣṭhanta ityuktaṃ prāk /
yathā karmāṇyevaṃ kleśā api veditavyā iti 		gong du las rnams ni gnas skabs gsum du bgegs byed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so zhes bshad zin to /
las rnams ji lta bar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste /
vipākaniḥṣyandaphalabhūmyatikramāt /
vīcirnāmāntaraṃ tasya caikajamavyavahitatvāt nirvāṇasya ekakleśaprakāravyavahitatvādvā 'nāgāmiphalasyaiko vīcirasyetyekavīcikaḥ /
tṛtīyaphalapratipannakaścaikavīciko veditavyaḥ prahīṇasaptāṣṭaprakāraḥ 		rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'i sa las 'da' ba'i phyir ro /
bar chad ces bya ba ni bar chad byed pa'o /
de'i mya ngan las 'da' ba la tshe gcig gis chod pa'i phyir ram /
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gcig gis chod pa'i phyir 'di la bar chad gcig yod pas na bar chad gcig pa yin no /
rnam pa bdun dang brgyad spangs pa de ni 'bras bu gsum pa la zhugs pa yin par rig par bya'o /
pūrvaprahīṇaprakārastu phalaprāptau na tāvatkulaṅkulo bhavatyekavīciko vā yāvatphalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na samukhīkṛtaḥ sngon rnam pa gsum dang bzhi spangs pa'am /
bdun pa dang brgyad pa spangs pa 'bras bu thob pa ni ji srid du 'bras bu khyad par can gyi lam mngon du ma byas pa de srid du rigs nas rigs su skye ba'am bar chad gcig pa ma yin no /
so 'nāgāmī navakṣayāt /
sa evapunaḥ phalastho navaprakāraprahāṇādanāgāmī upadiṣṭaḥ 		de dgu zad pas phyir mi 'ong /
'bras bu la gnas pa de nyid rnam pa dgu spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba yin par rig par bya ste /
kāmadhātvanāgamanāt 'dod pa'i khams su mi 'ong ba'i phyir ro /
pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādityucyate prahāṇasaṃkulanāt kun tu sbyor ba tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa rnam pa lnga spangs pa'i phyir zhes 'byung ba ni spangs pa sngom pa'i phyir te /
avaśyaṃ dve trīṇi vā pūrvaṃ prahīṇāni bhavanti gdon mi za bar sngon gnyis sam gsum spangs pa yin no; /
so 'ntarotpannasaṃskārāsaṃskāraparinirvṛtiḥ de ni bar skyes 'du byed dang /
'du byed med spangs mya ngan 'da' /
ūrdhvasrotāśca /
antarā parinirvṛtirasyetyantarāparinirvṛtiḥ 		gong du 'pho ba rnams 'di bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas na bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste /
evamutpannasya saṃskāreṇāsaṃskāreṇeti yojyam /
sa evānāgāmī punaḥ pañcadhā bhavati 		de bzhin du skyes nas dang 'du byed pa dang 'du byed pa med pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
phyir mi 'ong ba de nyid rnam pa lnga yin te /
antarāparinirvāyī yo 'ntarābhave parinirvāti /
upapadyaparinirvāyī ya upapannamātrī na cirāt parinirvātyabhiyuktavāhimārgatvāt /
sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇena 		bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni srid pa bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o /
skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni skyes pa tsam las mi 'chi bar phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste /
mngon par brtson pa dang lam ngang gis 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro /
so 'ppi nirūpadhiśeṣeṇetyapare /
nāyurutsargāvaśitvāt /
sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī kila upapadyāprati prasrabdhaprayogaḥ /
sābhisaṃskāraṃ parinirvātyabhiyuktāvāhimārgatvāt 		gzhan dag na re de yang phung po'i lhag ma med pas so zhes zer ro /
ma yin te /
tshe 'dor ba la dbang med pa'i phyir ro /
mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni skyes nas sbyor ba ma btang zhing mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa ste /
anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī tvaṃnabhisaṃskāreṇābhiyogavāhimārgābhāvāt /
saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtālambanamārganirvāṇādityapare /
tattu na /
atiprasaṅgāt /
sūtre tvanābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pūrva paṭhacyate /
tathaiva ca yujyate /
vāhyavāhimārgayoranabhisaṃskārābhisaṃskārasādhyatvādayatnayatnaprāptitaḥ /
upapadyaparinirvāyiṇastu vāhitaro 'dhimātrataraśca mārgo mṛdutarāścānuśayā iti /
ūrdhvasrotā yasyordhvaṃ gatirna tatriva parinirvāṇaṃ yatropapannaḥ /
sroto gatirityeko 'rthaḥ 		mngon par brtson pa dang lam ngang gis 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste /
mngon par mi brtson pa dang lam ngang gis 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go /
gzhan dag na re 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa la dmigs pa'i lam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
de ni mi rung ste /
ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
mdo las ni mngon bar 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba sngar 'byung bas de kho na bzhin du rung ste /
lam ngang gis 'byung ba dang ngang gis 'byung ba ma yin pa dag ni 'bad pa med pa dang 'bad pas 'thob ba'i sgo nas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang mngon par 'du byed pas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni lam ches ngang gis 'byung ba dang ches che ba dang phra rgyas ches chung ba yin no /
gong du 'pho ba ni gang du skyes pa de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gong du 'gro ba gang yin pa ste /
'pho ba dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni don gcig go /
sa dhyāne vyavakīrṇo 'kaniṣṭhagaḥ de ni bsam gtan spel nas 'og min 'gro /
ūrdhvasrotā dvivadho hetutaḥ phalataśca gong du 'pho ba de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas rnam pa gnyis te /
hetuto vyavakorṇāvyavakīrṇadhyānatvāt rgyu'i sgo nas ni bsam gtan spel ba dang spel ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
phalato 'kaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvāt tatra yena dhyānaṃ vyavakīrṇaṃ so 'kaniṣṭhān gatvā parinirvāti /
sa pluto 'rdhaplutaḥ sarvacyutaśca 		'bras bu'i sgo nas ni 'og min dang srid pa'i rtse mo la thug pa'i phyir ro /
de la gang gis bsam gtan spel ba de ni 'og min du song nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o /
de 'phar phyed 'phar thams cad du /
sa punareṣo 'kaniṣṭhaparama ūrdhvaṃsrotāstrividhaḥ /
plutādibhedāt 		'chi 'pho gong du 'pho ba 'og min gyi mthar thug pa de yang 'phar ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum ste /
tatra pluto nāma ya iha dhyānāni vyayakīrya dhyānacyāt oparihīṇaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamāsvādya brahmakāyikeṣūpapannaḥ pūrvābhyāsavaśāccaturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tasmāt pracyuto 'kaniṣṭheṣūpapadyate de la 'phar ba zhes bya ba ni 'dir bsam gtan rnam par spel nas bsam gtan dang po'i ro myangs te bsam gtan gsum las yongs su nyams pa tshangs ris pa dag gi nang du skyes nas sngon goms ba'i dbang gis bsam gtan bzhi pa spel te /
de nas shi 'phos nas 'og min pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa ste /
eṣa himadhyānimajjanāt plutaḥ de ni bar du mi 'gro bas na 'phar ba zhes bya'o /
ardhpluto nāma yastataḥ śuddhāvāseṣūpapadya madhyādekamapi sthānāntaraṃ vilaṅghacyākaniṣṭhān praviśati /
mahābrahmasvāryo nopapadyate dṛṣṭisthānatvādekanāyakatvācceti /
sarvacyuto nāma yaḥ sarvāṇi sthānāntarāṇi saṃcaryākaniṣṭhān praviśati /
na ca dakācidanāgāmī /
tatraivolpatyāyatane dvitīyaṃ janmābhinirvartayati 		phyed du 'phar ba zhes bya ba ni de nas gnas gtsang ma rnams su skyes la bar nas gnas gzhan 'ga' tsam yang rgal te 'og min du 'phos nas 'og min du 'jug pa gang yin pa'o /
'phags pa ni tshangs chen pa dag gi nang du mi skye ste /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
lta ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dang gtso bo gcig tu zad pa'i phyir dang gnas thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni gnas gzhan thams cad du 'phos nas 'og min du 'jug pa gang yin pa'o /
phyir mi 'ong ba ni nam yang skye ba'i skye mched de nyid du tshe gnyis pa mngon par 'grub par mi byed de /
viśeṣagāmitvāt /
evaṃ cāsya paripūrṇamanāgāmitvaṃ bhavati /
yatropapannastasyādhastatra cātyantamanāgamanāt 		khyad par du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
'di ltar na 'di'i phyir mi 'ong ba nyid yongs su rdzogs pa yin te /
gang du skyes pa de 'og dang der gtan du mi 'ong ba'i phyir ro /
evaṃ tāvaddhacyāne vyavakīrṇe 'kaniṣṭago veditavyaḥ /
tataḥ 		re zhig bsam gtan spel nas 'og min du 'gro ba ni de lta bu yin par rig par bya'o /
anyo bhavāgragaḥ de las gzhan srid rtse mor 'gro /
avyavakīrṇadhyāna ūrdhvaṃsrotā bhavāgraniṣṭho bhavati /
sa hi samāpattyantarāṇyāsvādayan sarvasthānāntareṣūpapadyāpraviśyaiva śuddhāvasānārupyakramotpattito bhavāgraṃ gatvā parinirvāti /
śamathacarito hyeṣaḥ /
pūrvakastu vipaśyanācaritaḥ 		gong du 'pho ba bsam gtan ma spel ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa yin te /
de ni snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan rnams ro myong bar byed cing gnas gzhan thams cad du skye la /
gnas gtsang ma rnams su mi 'jug pa kho na ra gzugs med par skye ba'i rim gyis srid pa'i rtsa mor song ste /
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o /
'di ni zhi gnas spyad pa yin no /
snga ma ni lhag mthong spyad pa yin no /
antarāpi tu parinirvāṇamūrdhvaṃsrotaso yujyamānaṃ paśyāmaḥ gong du 'pho ba bar skabs su yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar rung bar blta'o /
akaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvaṃ tu pareṇa gatyabhāvādyathā sapta kṛtvaḥparamatvaṃ srota āpannasyeti 'og min dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa nyid ni phan chad du 'gro ba med pa'i phyir te /
dper na rgyun du zhugs pa mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa nyid bzhin no /
ime tāvat pañca rupopagā anāgāminaḥ re zhig de dag ni gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba lnga yin no /
ārugyagaścaturdhānyaḥ gzhan ni gzugs med 'gro rnam bzhi /
anya ārupyago 'nāgāmī yo rūpavītarāga itaścacyutvārupyeṣupapadyate /
sa punaścaturvidha upapadyādiparinirvāyibhedāt 		phyir mi 'ong ba gzhan ni gzugs med par nye bar 'gro ba ste /
gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas gzugs med pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa'o /
de yang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa bzhi ste /
ta ete ṣaḍanāgāmino bhavanti /
tataḥ 		de dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba rnam pa drug yin no /
iha nirvāpako 'paraḥ gzhan ni 'di la mya ngan 'da' /
ihaiva janmanyaparaḥ parinirvāti gzhan ni tshe 'di kho na la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
sa dṛṣṭadharmaparinirvāyo saptamaḥ mthong ba'i chos la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de ni bdun pa yin no /
punastrīṃstrividhān kṛtvā nava rupopagāḥ smṛtāḥ /
punastrayāṇāmanāgāmināṃ tridhā bhedādrūpopagā navānāgāmino bhavanti /
katameṣāṃ trayāṇām 		gsum la rnam gsum phyi nas su /
gzugs su nyer 'gro dgur bshad do /
phyir mi 'ong ba gsum la yang rnam pa gsum du phye bas gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba dgu yin no /
gsum po gang dag /
antaropapadyaparinirvāyiṇorurdhvasrotasaśca ce na; bar ma do dang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang gong du 'pho ba'o /
kathaṃ tridhābhedāt rnam pa gsum du phye bas ji lta bu zhe na /
antarāparinirvāyiṇastāvadāśvanāśuciraparinirvāṇāt dṛṣṭāntatrayeṇa /
upapadyaparinirvāyiṇa upapadyābhisaṃskārānabhisaṃskāraparinirvāṇāt /
sarve hyete trayo 'pyupapanna parinirvāṇādupapadyaparinirvāyiṇaḥ 		re zhig bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni dpe gsum gyis myur ba dang myur ba ma yin pa dang yun ring mo zhig nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro /
skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni skyes nas dang mngon par 'du byed pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro /
de dag thams cad kyang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag yin no /
ūrdhvaṃsrotasaḥ plutādibhedāt gong du 'pho ba ni 'phar ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so /
sarveṣāṃ vā trayāṇāmāśvanāśuciraparinirvāṇāditi tritvam yang na gsum po thams cad myur ba dang myur ba ma yin pa dang yun ring mo zhig nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro /
tadviśeṣaḥ punaḥ karmakleśendriyaviśeṣataḥ /
teṣāṃ punastrayāṇāṃ navānāṃ cānāgāmināṃ karmakleśenriyaviśeṣādviśeṣaḥ /
trayāṇāṃ tāvadabhinirvṛttyupapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmopacitatvādyathākramaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātra kleśasamudācāra tvādadhimātramadhyamudvindriyatvācca 		de dag gi ni khyad par rnams /
las dbang nyon mongs bye brag las /
phyir mi 'ong ba gsum dang dgu po de dag gi khyad par ni las dang nyon mongs pa dang dbang po'i bye brag las te /
re zhig gsum po ni go rims bzhin du mngon par 'grub ba dang skyes pa dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa kun du spyod pa chung ba dang 'bring dang chen po'i phyir dang dbang po chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'i phyir ro /
teṣāmapi navānāṃ prtyekamata eva yathāyogaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
prathamayostrikayoḥ kleśendriyaviśeṣāt pūrvavat 		de nyid kyi phyir de dag so so'i khyad par yang ci rigs par gsum tshan dang po gnyis ni gong ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang dbang po'i bye brag las so /
paścimasya trikasyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmaviśeṣācceti /
ta ete navaprakārakleśendriyatvānnavānāgāmino bhavanti 		gsum tshan tha ma ni lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi bye brag las kyang khyad par du blta ste /
de dag ni nyon mongs pa dang dbang po'i rnam pa dgu'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba dgu yin no /
kathaṃ tarhi sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitāḥ 'o na mdo las skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na /
ūrdhvaṃsroturabhedena sapta sadgatayo matāḥ gong du 'pho ba ma phye bar /
dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun du 'dod /
ūrdhvaṃ sravaṇadharmā ūrdhvaṃsrotā gong du 'gro ba'i chos ni gong du 'gro ba'o /
tasyābhedanirdeśātsapta satpuruṣagatayaḥ sūtre 'bhihitāḥ mdo las ni de ma phye bar bstan pa'i phyir mdo las skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun zhes gsungs so /
kasmāt punaretā eva satpuruṣagatayo nānyāḥ śaikṣagatayaḥ ci'i phyir 'di dag kho na skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba yin la /
slob pa'i 'gro ba gzhan dag ni ma yin zhe na /
etā hi gatayo yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ satyeva karmāṇi vṛttiḥ kuśale asatyavṛttirakuśale /
etāśca gatīrgatānāṃ na punaḥ pratyāgatirasti 		gang dag la 'gro ba 'di dag yod pa de dag ni las dam pa dge ba kho na la 'jug cing dam pa ma yin pa mi dge ba la mi 'jug pa dang 'gro ba 'di dag tu son pa rnams la yang phyir 'ong ba med pa yin la ji skad du bshad pa 'di dag gzhan la ni med pas de'i phyir /
natvetadyathoktamanyatrāsti dam pa dam min 'jug mi 'jug /
ataḥ /
sadasadvṛttyavṛttibhyāṃ gatāopratyāgateśca tāḥ 		son pa phyir mi 'ong phyir te /
skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba dag yin gyi gzhan dag ni ma yin no /
sapta satpuruṣagatayo nānyā iti /
yattarhi sūtre evoktaṃ satpuruṣāḥ katamaḥ /
śaikṣyaḥ samyagdṛṣṭacyā samanvāgata iti vistaraḥ 		'o na mdo kho na las skyes bu dam pa gang zhe na /
slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba rang ldan pa'o zhes rgyas par gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
anyeṣāmapyasti poāryāyikaṃ satpuruṣatvam /
pañcavidhasya pāpasyātyantamakaraṇasaṃvarapratilambhāt prāyeṇākuśalaprahāṇācca 		gzhan dag la yang sdig pa rnam pa lnga gtan mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa mi dge ba phal cher spangs pa'i phyir rnam grangs pa'i skyes bu dam pa nyid yid mod kyi /
yeṣāṃ tu niṣparyāyeṇa teṣāmihādhhikāraḥ /
kiṃ punaḥ parivṛttajanmano 'pyanāgāmina eṣa bhedo 'sti 		'dir ni gang dag la rnam grangs med par yod pa de dag gi skabs yin no /
ci phyir mi 'ong ba tshe yongs su gyur pa la yang dbye ba 'di yod dam zhe na /
yasmāt /
na parāvṛttajanmāryaḥ kāme dhātvantaropagaḥ /
kāmadhātau parāvṛttajanmāntara āryo na dhātvantaraṃ gacchati /
anāgāmi phalaṃ prāpya tatraiva janmani parinirvāṇāt 		med de /
'di ltar /
'dod par tshe yongs su gyur pa'i 'phags /
khams gzhan du ni 'gro ba med /
'dod pa'i khams su tshe yongs su gyur pa'i 'phags pa ni khams gzhan du mi 'gro ste /
tshe 'di nyid la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro /
rūpadhātau tu parāvṛttajanma kadācidārupyānpraviśati gzugs kyi khams su tshe yongs su gyur ba ni gal te na gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu yang 'jug ste /
ya ūrdhvaṃsrotā bhavāgraparamaḥ /
yattarhi śakreṇoktaṃ ye te devā akaniṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ /
ante me hīyamānasya tatropapattirbhaviṣyati 		gong du 'pho ba srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug par 'gro ba gang yin pa'o /
'o na brgya byin gyis /
bdag ni tham nyams na lha gang 'og min zhes /
rnam par grags ba de ni skye bar 'gyur bar shog /
abhidharmā nabhijñatvāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /
bhavatā pyanivāraṇaṃ saṃharṣaṇīyatvā diti /
sa cordhvajaśca naivākṣasaṃcāraparihāṇibhāk /
sa ca kāmadhātau parivṛttajanmā ūrdhvadhātūpapannaścāryo naivendriyāṇi saṃcarati nāpi kathañcit parihīyate /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ parivṛttajanmāntāsyāryasya rūpārupyapraveśendriyasaṃcāraparihāṇayo neṣyante 		ces gang smras pa ji lta bu zhe na /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re chos mngon ba mngon par mi shes pa'i phyir te /
yang dag par dga' bar bya ba yin ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma bkag go zhes zer ro /
de dang gong mar skyes pa ni /
yongs nyams dbang po 'pho mi bsten /
'dod pa'i khams su tshe yongs su gyur pa'i 'phags pa de dang khams gong mar skyes ba'i 'phags pa ni dbang po rnams kyang 'di mi 'pho la ji ltar yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro /
ci'i phyir 'phags pa tshe gzhan du yongs su gyur pa gzugs dang gzugs med par 'jug pa dang dbang po 'pho ba dang yongs su nyams pa dag tu mi 'dod ce na /
yasmānna santi /
kasmānna santi /
janmāntaraparivāsenendriyāṇāṃ paripakvataratvādāśrayaviśeṣalābhācca /
atha kasmādvītarāgaḥ śaikṣo nāntarāye parinirvāyī bhavati 		'di ltar med pa'i phyir ro /
ci'i phyir med ce na; tshe rabs gzhan nas yongs su 'dris pas dbang por nams ches yongs su smin pa'i phyir dang rten khyad par can thob pa'i phyir ro /
yang ci'i phyir slob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
mārgasyājitatvādasaṃmukhībhāvataḥ anuśayānāṃ ca nātimandatvāt duḥsamatikrāmatvātkāmavātoriti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
bahu hyanena kartavyaṃ bhavati /
akuśalāmyākṛtakleśaprahāṇaṃ dvitriśrāmaṇyaphalaprāptistridhātusamatikramaśca /
taccāntarābhavastho na śaktaḥ kartumiti 		lam ma 'dris pas mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang phra rgyas rnams shin tu chung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar dka' ba'i phyir te /
'dis nyon mongs pa mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa spangs pa dang dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gnyis sam gsum thob pa dang khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' ba dang mang po zhig bya dgos la /
de yang srid pa bar ma la gnas pas bya bar mi nus zhes zer ro /
yaduktaṃ sa dhyāne vyavakīrṇe 'kaniṣṭhaga iti de ni bsam gtan spel nas 'og min 'gro /
zhes bshad pa /
atha katamaddhacyānaṃ prathamato vyavakīryate yang dang po nyid du bsam gtan gang spel bar byed ce na /
ākīryate caturthaṃ prāk /
sa hi sarvakarmaṇyaḥ samādhiḥ sukhapratipadāmagracyatvāt /
evaṃ ca punaḥ vyavakīryate 		dang por bzhi ba spel bar byed /
ting nge 'dzin ni thams cad pas las su rung ba dang lam sla ba rnams kyi nang na mchog yin pa'i phyir ro /
'di ltar spel bar byed de /
arhannanāgāmī vā pravāhayuktamanāsravaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dgra bcom pa 'am phyir mi 'ong ba yang rung ste zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa rgyun dang ldan pa la snyoms par 'jug cing /
tasmādvacyutthāya pravāhayuktaṃ tadeva sāsravaṃ samāpadyate punaścānāsravam de las langs nas de nyid zag pa dang bcas pa rgyun dang ldan pa la snyoms par 'jug la /
yang zag pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug ste /
evaṃ pravāhāprahāsena yadā kila dvau kṣaṇāvanāsravau samāpadyate dvau sāsravau punaścānāsravāvayaṃ vyavakiraṇasya prayogaḥ /
niṣpatti kṣaṇamiśraṇāt 		de bzhin du rgyun phri nas /
gang gi tshe skad cig ma gnyis zag pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug cing skad cig ma gnyis zag pa dang bcas pa la snyoms bar 'jug la yang zag pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug go zhes grag ste /
'di ni spel ba'i sbyor ba yin no /
skad cig ma ni bsres pas 'grub /
yadā tvanāsravasya kṣayasyānantaraṃ sāsravaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti sāsravasyānāsravam /
evaṃ sāsravasya kṣaṇasyānāsravābhyāṃ miśraṇāt vyavakiraṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gang gi tshe zag pa med pa'i skad cig ma'i mjug thogs su zag pa dang bcas pa mngon sum du byed cing /
zag pa dang bcas pa'i mjug thogs su yang zag pa med pa mngon sum du byed la /
de ltar zag pa dang bcas pa'i skad cig ma dang zag pa med pa dag tu bsres pas spel ba 'grub pa yin te /
dvau hi kṣaṇāvānantaryamārgasadṛśau tṛtī yo vimuktimārgasadṛśa iti skad cig ma gnyis ni bar chad med pa'i lam lta bu yin la /
gsum pa ni rnam par grol ba'i lam lta bu yin no zhes zer ro /
evaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tadvalelnānyānyapi vyavakīryante de ltar bsam gtan bzhi pa spel nas /
de'i stobs kyis gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang spel bar byed de /
kāmadhātau triṣu dvīpeṣu prathamaṃ vyavakīryate dang por 'dod pa'i khams su gling gsum dag tu spel bar byed la /
paścāt parihīṇena rūpadhātau /
aśakyaṃ tu kṣaṇavyavakiraṇamanyatra buddhāt 		phyis ni yongs su nyams pas gzugs kyi khams su spel bar byed do /
sangs rgyas ma gtogs pas skad cig ma spel bar mi nus te /
ata icchātaḥ pravāhatrayasamāpattito niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti paśyāmaḥ de'i phyir rgyun chags gsum la ji srid du 'dod par snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas rdzogs pa yin no zhes bya bar blta'o /
kimarthaṃ pounardhyānaṃ vyavakīryate ci'i phyir bsam gtan spel bar byed ce na /
upapattivihārārthaṃ kleśabhīrutayā 'pi ca skye dang gnas par bya phyir dang /
nyon mongs pas ni 'jig phyir yang /
tribhiḥ kāraṇairdhyānaṃ vyavakiranti /
tīkṣṇendriyā anāgāminaḥ śuddhāvāsopapattyarthaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ ca 		rgyu gsum gyis na bsam gtan spel bar byed de /
phyir mi 'ong ba dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang ma rnams su skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas bar bya ba'i phyir ro /
mṛdvindriyāḥ kleśabhirutayā cāsvādanāsaṃprayuktasamādhidūrīkaraṇādaparihīṇārtham /
arhantastu tīkṣaṇendriyā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārtham 		dbang po rtul po rnams ni nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa'i yang phyir te /
ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thag bsrings pa'i sgo nas yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir ro /
dgra bcom pa dbang po rnon po rnams ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro /
mṛdvindriyāḥ kleśabhīrutvāccāparihīṇārtham /
atha kasmāt pañcaiva śuddhāvāsopapattayaḥ 		dbang po rtul po rnams ni nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa'i yang phyir te /
yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir ro /
yang ci'i phyir gnas gtsang mar skye ba lnga kho na yin zhe na /
yadetadvacyavakīrṇabhāvitaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamuktam /
tatpāñcavidhyātpañcaiva śuddhāvāsopapattayaḥ 		bsam gtan bzhi pa spel mar bsgoms par bshad pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa lnga'i phyir; gnas gtsang skye ba lnga kho na /
sā hi vyavakīrṇabhāvanā pañcaprakārā mrdumadhyādhimātrataratamabhedāt spel mar bsgom pa de ni chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang shin tu che ba dang shin tu ches che ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa lnga yin te /
prathamāyāṃ trīṇi cittāni saṃmukhīdriyante /
anāsravaṃ sāsravamanāsravaṃ ca 		dang po la ni zag pa med pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang po dang sems gsum mngon sum du byed do /
dvitīyāyāṃ ṣaṭ gnyis pa la ni drug go /
tṛtīyāyāṃ nava /
caturthyāṃ dvādaśa 		gsum pa la ni dgu'o /
bzhi pa la bcu gnyis so /
pañcamyāṃ pañcadaśa lnga pa la ni bco lnga ste /
tāsāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pañca śuddhāvāsāḥ phalam /
yattatra sāsravaṃ tadvaśātteṣūpapattiḥ 		de dag gi 'bras bu ni grangs bzhin du gnas gtsang ma lnga yin la de la zag pa dang bas pa gang yin pa de'i dbang gas de dag tu skye'o /
śraddhādīndriyādhikyāt pañcetyapare /
nirodhalābhyanāgāmī kāyasākṣī punarmataḥ 		gzhan dag na re dad pa'i dbang po la sogs pa lhag pa'i phyir lnga yin no zhes zer ro /
'gog pa thob pa'i phyir mi 'ong /
lus kyis mngon du byed par 'dod /
nirodhalābho 'syāstīti nirodhalābhī /
yo hi kaścidanāgāmī nirodhasamāpattilābhī sa kāyasākṣītyucyate /
nirvāṇasadṛśasya dharmasya kāyena sākṣātkaraṇāt 		'di la 'gog pa'i thob pa yod pas na 'gog pa thob pa ste /
phyir mi 'ong ba gang la la 'gog pa thob pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i chos lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir lus kyis mngon sum du thob pa zhes bya'o /
kathaṃ punaḥ kāyena sākṣātkaroti ji ltar na lugs kyis mngon sum du byed ce na /
cittābhāvāt kāyāśrayotpatteḥ sems med pas lus la brten te skye ba'i phyir ro /
evaṃ tu bhavitavyam /
sa hi tasmādvyutthāyāpratilabdhapūrvā savijñānakāṃ kāyaśāntiṃ pratilabhate /
yato 'syaivaṃ bhavati śāntā vata nirodhasamāpattirnirvāṇasadṛśī vata nirodhasamāpattiriti /
evamanena tasyāḥ śāntatvaṃ kāyena sākṣatkṛtaṃ bhavati /
prāptijñānasākṣātkriyābhyāṃ pratyakṣīkāro hi sākṣātkriyā /
aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā ityatra sūtre ki kāraṇaṃ kāyasākṣī noktaḥ 		'di lta bu yin par 'gyur te /
de 'gog pa de las langs nas gang las de ni 'di snyam du kye ma 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra bar zhi ba yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ba rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus zhi ba sngon ma thob pa thob par 'gyur te /
de ltar na 'dis de'i zhi ba nyid du lus kyis mngon du byas pa yin te /
thob pa dang shes pas mngon sum du byed pa dag gis mngon sum du gyur pa ni mngon du byed pa yin no /
mdo las slob pa bco brgyad ces gsungs pa der lus kyis mngon du byed pa ci'i phyir ma gsungs she na /
kāraṇābhāvāt rgyu med pa'i phyir ro /
ki punaḥ kāraṇam /
anāsravāstisraḥ śaikṣāstatphāṃ ca 		rgyu gang zhig yin zhe na /
zag pa med pa'i slob pa gsum dang de'i 'bras bu ste /
tadviśeṣeṇa hi śaikṣāṇāṃ vyavasthānam /
nirodhasamāpattiśca naivaśaikṣānāśikṣā phalam 		de'i khyad par gyis slob pa rnams rnam par gzhag go /
'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni slob pa yang ma yin la slob pa'i 'bras bu yang ma yin te /
ato na tadyogācdhaikṣaviśeṣa uktaḥ de'i phyir de dang ldan pas slob pa'i khyad par du ma gsungs so /
eṣa tāvadanāgāmināṃ yathāsthūlaṃ bhedaḥ 'di ni re zhig phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi dbye ba che long yin no; /
sūkṣmaṃ tu bhidyamānāḥ sahasraśo bhidyante zhib tu dbye na ni stong phrag tu dbye ba yod de /
antarāparinirvāyiṇastrayo mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyabhedāt bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la dbang po rtul po dang 'bring po dang rnon po'i bye brag gis gsum mo /
bhūmibhedāccatvāraḥ /
parihāṇadharmādigotrabhedāt ṣaṭ 		de dag nyid sa'i bye brag gis bzhi'o /
yongs su nyams pa'i chos can la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bye brag gis drug go /
sthānāntarabhedāt ṣoḍaśa bhūmivairāgyabhedāt ṣaṭtriṃśat gnas gzhan gyi bye brag gis bcu drug go /
sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bye brag gis sum cu rtsa drug ste /
rūpadhatau sakalābandhano yāvaccaturthadhyānāṣṭaprakāravītarāgaḥ /
sthānāntaragotravairāgyendriyabhedādvānavatāni pañcaviṃśatiḥ śatāni 		gzugs kyi khams kyi 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rnam pa brgyad las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar ro /
gnas gzhan dang rigs dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang dbang po'i bye brag gis nyis stong lnga brgyad gu bcu rtsa gnyis te /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
ekasmin sthāne ṣaṭ gotrāṇi 		ji ltar byas pas she na /
gnas gcig na rigs drug go /
gotre gotre nava pudgalāḥ sakalabandhano yāvadaṣṭaprakāravītarāgaḥ svasmātsthānāt ṣaṇṇṇavakāni catuṣpañcāśat ṣoḍaśa catuṣpañcāśatkāni catuḥṣaṣṭānyaṣṭau śatāni rigs re re la 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa nas rang gi gnas kyi rnam pa brgyad las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar gang zag dgu dgu ste /
dgu drug ni lnga bcu bzhi'o /
lnga bcu rtsa bzhi phrag bcu drug ni brgyad brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi'o /
yang dbang pa'i bye brag gis sum 'gyur te /
indriyabhedāt punastriguṇā ityevaṃ kṛtvā yo 'dharadhyāne navaprakāravītarāgaḥ sa uttare sakalabandhana uktaḥ /
samagaṇanārtham 		de ltar byas pas so /
'dra bar rtse ba'i phyir bsam gtan 'og ma'i rnam pa dgu las 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni gong ma'i 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan par bshad pa yin no /
yathāntarāparinirvāyiṇa evaṃ yavadūrdhvasrotasa ityabhisamasya sarve catvāriṃśadūnāni trayodaśasahasrāpyanāgāmināṃ bhavanti bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ji lta bar gong du 'pho ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bas thams cad bsdus na phyir mi 'ong ba khri nyis stong dgu brgya drug cu yin no /
ābhavāgrāṣṭabhāgakṣidarhattve pratipakṣakaḥ srid rtse'i bar cha brgyad zad pa /
dgra bcom nyid la zhugs ba yin /
anāgāmītyadhikṛtam /
sa khalvayamanāgāmī prathamadhyānaikaprakāravairāgyāt prabṛti yāvat bhavāgrāṣṭaprakāraprahāṇādarhattvapratipannako bhavanti 		phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa ste /
yang phyir mi 'ong ba de bsam gtan dang po'i rnam pa gcig las 'dod chags dang bral ba nas bzung ste /
srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam par brgyad kyi bar spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid la zhugs pa yin no /
navamasyāpyānantaryapathe dgu yi bar chad med lam yang /
navamasyāpi bhāvāgrikasya prakārasya prahāṇāyānantaryamārge so 'rhattvapratipannaka eva /
vajropamaśca saḥ 		de srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam pa dgu pa spong bar byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam la gnas pa na /
yang dgra bcom pa nyid la zhugs pa kho na yin no /
de ni rdo rje lta bu yin /
sa cānantaryamārgo vajropamaḥ samādhirityucyeta /
sarvānuśayabheditvāt 		bar chad med pa'i lam de ni phra rgyas thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o /
bhinnatvādasau na punaḥ sarvān bhinatti bcom zin pa'i phyir 'dis thams cad 'joms pa ni ma yin gyi /
sarvāstu bhettuṃ samarthaḥ /
sarvānantaryamārgāṇāmadhimātratamatvāt 		bar chad med pa'i lam thams cad kyi nang nas shin tu che ba yin pa'i phyir thams cad 'joms bar nus pa yin no /
vajropamānāṃ tu bahubhedaṃ varṇayanti rdo rje lta bu rnams kyi bye brag ni rnam ba mang po zhig tu brjod de /
anāgāmyasaṃgṛhītā bhāvāgrikaduḥkhasamudāyālambanairduḥkhasamudayānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau /
nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau /
nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāḥ prathamadhyānanirodhālambanāścatvāraḥ /
evaṃ yāvat bhavāgranirodhālambanāścatvāraḥ /
mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāścatvāraḥ 		mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa srid pa'i rtse mo'i sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la dmigs pas sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa brgyad dang 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes ba'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs pa ldan pa brgyad dang 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bsam gtan dang po'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa bzhi nas de bzhin du srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i bar du bzhi dang lam la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bzhi ste /
rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa zad par la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
de dag ni shes pa'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu lnga bcu rtsa gnyis yin no /
kṛtsnasyānvayajñānapakṣasyālambanāt /
ta ime jñānākārālambanabhedabhinnā dvāpañcāśadvajropamā bhavanti /
yathā 'nāgāmyasaṃgṛhītā evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānasaṃgṛhītāḥ /
ākāśavijñānānantyākiñcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā yathāsaṃkhyamaṣṭāviṃśatiścaturviṃśativiṃśatiśca bhavanti 		mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa ji lta bar bsam gtan bzhi pas bsdus pa'i bar dag kyang de dang 'dra'o /
nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa rnams ni grangs bzhin du nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang nyi shu yin te /
teṣu dharmajñānasyādhobhūminirodhālambanasya cānvayajñānasyābhāvāt /
adhobhūmipratipakṣālambanaṃ tu bhavati /
tasyānyo 'nyahetutvāditi /
yeṣāṃ tu mārgānvayajñānamapyekaikabhūmipratipakṣālambanamiṣṭaṃ teṣāmaṣṭāviṃśatimadhikān prakṣīpyānāgamyasaṃgṛhītā aśītirvajropamā bhavanti /
evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyāna saṃgṛhītāḥ /
ākāśānantyāyatanādiṣu yathākramaṃ catvāriṃśat dvātriṃśaccaturviśatiśca bhavanti /
punargotrendriyabhedāt bhūyāṃso bhavanti /
yastvasau bhāvāgriko navamaḥ prakāra ukto yasya vajropamena prahāṇaṃ /
tatkṣayāptyā kṣayajñānaṃ /
tasya punarnavamasya prakārasya saha kṣayaprāptyā kṣayajñānamutpadyate /
vajropamasamādheranantaraṃ paścimo vimuktimārgaḥ /
ata eva tatkṣayajñānaṃ sarvāsravakṣayaprāptisahajatvātprathamataḥ 		de dag ni chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pas sa 'og ma'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
sa 'og mi'i gnyen po la dmigs pa ni yod de /
de ni phan tshun du rgyu pa'i phyir ro; /
gang dag lam la rjes su shes pa yang sa re re'i gnyen po la dmigs pa yin par 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na nyi shu rtsa brgyad lhag par bsnan nams mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa rdo rje lta bu ni brgyad cu yin te /
bsam gtan bzhi pas bsdus pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o /
nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa dag ni go rims bzhin du bzhi bcu dang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin no /
yang rigs dang dbang po'i bye brag gis ni ches mang ba yin no /
gang srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam pa dgu par bshad pa rdo rje lta bus spangs pa gang yin pa /
de zad thob dang zad pa shes /
rnam pa dgu pa de zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig tu zad pa shes pa skye ste /
rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mjug thogs su rnam par grol ba'i lam tham skye ba yin no /
de nyid kyi phyir de ni dang po nyid du zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye ba'i phyir zad pa shes pa yin no /
aśaikṣo 'rhannasau tadā /
utpanne ca punaḥ kṣayajñāne so 'rhattvapratipannakaḥ aśaikṣo bhavatyarhaścārhattvaphalaprāptaḥ /
phalāntaraṃ prati punaḥ śikṣitavyābhāvādaśaikṣaḥ /
ata eva sa paramārtaṃ karaṇārthatvāt sarvasarāgapūjārhattvāccārhanniti siddhaṃ bhavatyanye sapta pūrvoktāḥ pudgalāḥ śaikṣā iti 		de tshe de mi slob dgra bcom /
yang dgra bcom pa nyid la zhugs pa de zad pa shes pa skye nas mi slob pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob pa yin te /
'bras bu gzhan gyi phyir slob par bya ba ma med pa'i phyir mi slob pa yin no /
de nyid kyi phyir de ni gzhan gyi don byed par 'os pa'i phyir dang 'dod chags dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa yin no /
gang zag sngar bshad pa gzhan bdun ni slob pa dag yin no zhes bya bar grub bo /
kena te śaikṣāḥ /
āsravakṣayāya nityaṃ śikṣaṇaśīlatvācchikṣātraye adhiśīlamadhicittamadhiprajñaṃ ca 		ci'i phyir de dag slob pa yin zhe na /
zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa gsum po lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab la rtag tu slob pa'i dang tshul can yin pa'i phyir to /
tāḥ punaḥ śīlasamādhiprajñāsvabhāvāḥ /
pṛthagjano 'pi śaikṣaḥ prāpnoti 		de dag ni tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin dag yin no /
so so'i skye bo yang slob pa yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
na /
yathābhūtaṃ satyāprajñānāt punaścāpaśikṣaṇāt /
ata eva dvirabhidhānaṃ sūtre śikṣāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣāyāṃ śikṣata iti śivakatasmācchaikṣa ityucyata iti 		ma yin te /
bden pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes pa'i phyir dang yang slob ba gtong ba'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir ci nas kyang gang zhig slob pa de kho na slob pa yin gyi slob pa 'dor ba ni ma yin no zhes dmigs kyis bsal ba shes par bya ba'i phyir mdo las /
yaḥ śikṣata eva nāpaśikṣate sa śaikṣa ityavadhāraṇaṃ yathā vijñāyeta zhi byed bslab pa la slob cing /
bslab pa la slob pas ni de'i phyir slob pa zhes bya'o zhes lan gnyis su gsungs so /
prakṛtistha āryaḥ kathaṃ śikṣaṇaśīlaḥ 'phags pa rang bzhin du gnas pa ji ltar slob pa'i dang tshul can yin zhe na /
āśayataḥ /
sthitādhvagavat prāptyanuṣaṅgataśca ṣikṣātrayasya /
atha śaikṣā dharmāḥ katame 		bsam pa'i sgo nas te /
lam du 'gro ba gnas pa bzhin no /
thob pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i yang phyir ro /
yang slob pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
śaikṣasyānāsravāḥ /
aśaikṣāḥ katame 		slob pa'i zag pa med pa rnams so /
mi slob pa rnams gang zhe na /
aśaikṣasyānāsravāḥ mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa rnams so /
nirvāṇaṃ kasmānna śaikṣam ci'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa slob pa ma yin zhe na /
aśaikṣapṛthagjanayorapi tadyogāt mi slob pa dang so so'i skye bo gnyi ga yang de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro; /
kasmānnāśaikṣam /
śaikṣapṛthagjanayorapi tadyogāt 		ci'i phyir mi slob pa ma yin zhe na /
slob pa dang so so'i skye bo gnyi ga yang de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
ta ete sarva evāṣṭāvāryapudgalā bhavanti /
pratipannakāścatvāraśca phale sthitāḥ 		de dag thams cad ni zhugs pa bzhi dang 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi dang 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad kho na yin te /
tadyathā srota āpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ srota āpannaḥ /
evaṃ yāvadarhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratiṃpannako 'rhanniti 		'di lta ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang rgyun du zhugs pa nas de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang dgra bcom pa'i bar yin no /
nāmata ete 'ṣṭau bhavanti /
dravyatastu pañca /
prathamaḥ pratipannakaścatvāraśca phalasthāḥ 		ming gi sgo nas ni brgyad yin no /
rdzas su ni lnga yin te /
zhugs pa dang po dang 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi'o /
śeṣāṇāṃ pratipannakānāṃ triphalasthāvyatirekāt zhugs pa lhag ma rnams ni 'bras bu la gnas pa gsum las tha mi dad ba'i phyir ro /
anupūrvādhigamaṃ pratyevamucyate /
bhūyaḥkāmavītarāgau tu syātāṃ darśanamārge sakudāgāmyanāgāmiphalapratipannakau na ca srota āpanna sakṛdāgāmināviti /
dvividho hi bhāvanāmārga ukto laukiko lokottaraśceti /
kenāyaṃ śaikṣaṃḥ kuto vairāgyaṃ prāpnoti /
lokottareṇa vairāgyaṃ bhavāgrāt 		mthar gyis 'thob ba'i phyir de skad ces bshad kyi /
phal cher dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba dag cig yin na ni mthong ba'i lam la lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa dag yin gyi /
rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dag ni ma yin no /
bsgom pa'i lam 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa la /
slob pa 'di gang gis gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob ce na /
'jig rten 'das kyis srid rtse las /
na laukikena /
ki kāraṇam /
tata ūrdhva laukikābhāvāt svabhūmikasya vā pratipakṣatvāt /
kasmānna pratipakṣaḥ 		chags bral 'jig rten pas ni ma yin no /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
de'i gong na 'jig rten pa med pa'i phyir dang rang gis pa'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
ci'i phyir gnyen po ma yin zhe na /
tatkleśānuśayitatvāt /
yo hi kleśo yatra vastunyanuśete na tasya tadvastu oprahāṇāya saṃvartate yasya ca yaḥ pratipakṣo na tatra sa kleśo 'nuśete iti 		de'i nyon mongs pa rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
nyon mongs pa gang zhig dngos po gang la rgyas par 'gyur ba de ni dngos po des spong bar byed pa ma yin la /
gang gi gnyen po gang yin pa de la ni nyon mongs pa de rgyas par yang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
anyato dvidhā gzhan las rnam pa gnyis /
bhavāgrādanyataḥ sarvato bhūmelaukikenāopi vairāgyaṃ lokottareṇāpi srid pa'i rtse mo las gzhan pa'i sa thams cad las ni 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis kyang 'dod chags dang bral la /
tatra punaḥ /
