laukikenāryavairāgye visaṃyogāptayo dvidhā /
laukikena mārgeṇāryavairāgyaṃ gacchato dvividhā visaṃyogaprāptaya utpadyante laukikyo lokottarāśca 		'jig rten las 'das pas kyang 'dod chags dang bral lo /
'jig rten pa yis chags bral ba'i /
'phags la bral ba'i thob rnams gnyis /
'phags pa 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa la bral ba'i thob pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang rnam pa gnyis skye'o /
lokottareṇa cetyeke kha cig 'jig rten 'das kyis kyang /
lokottareṇāpyevamityapare /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
tyavate kleśāsamanvayāt 		gzhan dag na re 'jig rten las 'das pas kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
btang la nyon mongs mi ldan phyir /
yadi hyāryamārgeṇa vairāgyaṃ prāpnuvato laukikī visaṃyogaprāpotirnotpadyate evaṃ sati ya āryamārgeṇākiñcanyāyatanādvītarāgo dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati sakṛtsnapūrvamārgatyāgātkevalaphalamārgalābhāccordhvabhūmikleśavisaṃyogenāsamanvāgataḥ syāt /
tyakte ca tasmin taiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgataḥ syāditi 		gal te 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob pa la 'jig rten pa'i bral ba'i thob pa mi skye na /
de lta na 'phags pa'i lam gyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral ba bsam gtan la brten te dbang po rnams 'pho bar byed pa gang yin pa de lam snga ma zad par btang pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu'i lam 'ba' zhig thob pa'i phyir sa gong ma pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bral ba dang mi ldan par yang 'gyur la /
de btang na yang nyon mongs pa de dag dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro /
bhavāgrādhavimuktordhvajātavattvasamanvayaḥ /
asatyāmapi tu tasyāṃ laukikyāṃ visaṃyogaprāptau na taiḥ samanvāgamaḥ syāt /
tadyathā bhavāgrādardha prakāravimuktasyāsatyāmapi tu laukikyāṃ tadvisaṃyogaprāptau tyaktāyāmapi cendriyasaṃcāreṇa lokottarāyāṃ na punastaiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavati /
yathā ca pṛthagjanasya prathamadhyānabhūmerurdhvaṃ jātasya kāmāvacarakleśavisaṃyogaprāptityāgānna punastaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatītyajñāpakametat 		srid rtse'i phyed las rnam grol dang /
gong du skyes pa bzhin mi ldan /
de la 'jig rten pa'i bral ba'i thob pa med du zin kyang de dag dang ldan par mi 'gyur te /
dper na srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam pa phyed la rnam par grol ba la de'i bral ba'i 'thob pa 'jig rten pa yang med la /
dbang po 'pho bas 'jig rten las 'das pa yang btang bzhin du nyon mongs pa de dag dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba dang yang dper na so so'i skye bo bsam gtan dang po yan chad du skyes pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bral ba'i thob pa btang bas yang de dag dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba bzhin bas 'di ni shes par byed pa ma yin no /
katapayā punarbhūmyā kuto vairāgyaṃ bhavati sa gang zhig gis gang las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur zhe na /
anāsraveṇa vairāgyamanāgāmyena sarvataḥ zag med mi lcogs med pa yis /
thams cad las ni 'dod chags bral /
ābhavāgrāt /
atha yaḥ sāmantakaṃ niśrityādharabhūmivairāgyaṃ prāpnoti kimasyānantaryamāgavatsarve vimuktimārgāḥ sāmantakādbhavanti 		srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar las so /
yang gang zhig nyer bsdogs la brten te sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob na /
ci'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i lam thams cad bar chad med pa'i lam bzhin du nyer bsdogs las skye'am zhe na /
netyāha smras pa /
kiṃ tarhi /
dhyānātsāmantakādvā 'ntyo mukti mārgastribhūjaye 		ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
sa gsum rgyal la bsam gtan nam /
nyer bsdogs las mtha'i rnam grol lam /
nava hyapapattibhūmayaḥ /
sarvakāmadhāturaṣṭau ca dhyānārupyāḥ 		skye ba'i sa ni thams cad du dgu ste /
'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa brgyad do /
tatra yāvat dvitīyadhyānavairāgyaṃ tribhūmijayaḥ /
tasmin paścimo vimuktimārgaḥ sāmantakādbhavati dhyānādvā maulāt 		de la bsam gtan gnyis kyi bar las 'dod chags dang bral ba sa gsum las rgyal ba de la ni rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma nyer bsdogs sam bsam gtan dngos gzhi las skye'o /
nordhvaṃ sāmantakāt gong ma'i nye bar bsdogs las min /
tribhūmijayādūrdhvaṃ maulādeva na punaḥ sāmantakādupekṣendriyasāmānyāt /
triṣu hi dhyāneṣu sāmantakamaulayorindriyabhedāt kaścinna śaknoti maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praveṣṭum /
indriyasaṃcārasya duṣkaratvāt 		sa gsum las rgyal ba yan chad ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir dngos gzhi kho na las skye'i nyer bsdogs las ni ma yin no /
bsam gtan gsum na ni nyer bsdogs dang dngos gzhi gnyis kyi dbang po tha dad pa'i phyir la la bsam gtan dang dngos gzhi la 'jug mi nus te /
dbang po'i 'pho ba ni dka' ba'i phyir ro /
atastribhūmivairāgye dhyānasāmantakādapyanyo vimuktimārgo bhavati de lta bas nas gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma nyer bsdogs las kyang skye'o /
zag med mi lcogs med pa yis /
anāsraveṇa vairāgyamanāgamyena sarvata ityuktamanyaistu noktam thams cad las ni 'dod chags bral /
zhes bshad kyi gzhan dag gis ni ma bshad pas de'i phyir /
ata ucyate /
āryairaṣṭābhiḥ svordhvabhūjayaḥ 		'phags /
brgyad kyis rang gong sa las rgyal /
zhes bya ba smos te /
anāsravairaṣṭābhirdhyānadhyānāntarārupyaiḥ svasyā ūrdhvāyāśca bhūmervairāgyaṃ nādharāyā vītarāgatvāt /
tatra lokottarā ānantaryavimuktimārgāḥ satyālambanatvātsatyākārapravṛttā iti siddham 		zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang gzugs med pa brgyad kyis ni rang gi sa dang sa gong ma las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro /
'og ma las ni ma yin te /
'dod chags dang bral zin pa'i phyir ro /
de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni bden pa la dmigs pa'i phyir bden pa'i rnam par zhugs pa dag yin no zhes bya bar grub po /
vimuktyānantaryapathā laukikāstu yathākramam /
śāntādyudārādyākārāḥ 		'jig rten pa yi rnam grol dang /
bar chad med lam go rims bzhin /
zhi sogs rags sogs rnam pa can /
vimuktimārgāḥ śāntādyākārā ānantaryamārgā audārikādyākārāḥ /
te punaryathākramam /
uktarādharagocarāḥ /
vimuktimārgā uttarāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsarṇataścākārayanti saṃbhavataḥ 		rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa can dag yin la /
bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can dag yin no /
de dag kyang go rims bzhin du /
gong dang 'go ma'i spyod yul can /
rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni ci rigs par sa gong ma la zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par blta'o /
ānantaryamārgā adharāṃ bhūmimaudārikato duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikataśca /
aśāntatvādaudarikato mahābhisaṃskārataratvāt 		bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni sa 'go ma la rags pa dang tha ma ngan pa dang rtsig pa stug po lta bur blta ste /
mngon par 'du byed pa shin tu che ba nyid kyis ma zhi ba'i phyir rags pa blta'o /
gya nom pa ma yin pa'i phyir tha ba ngan par blta ste /
apraṇītatvāt duḥkhilato bahudauṣṭhulyataratvena pratikūlabhāvāt gnas ngan len rab tu mang ba nyid kyis mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir ro /
sthūlabhittikatastayaiva tadbhūmyaniḥsaraṇāt bhittyaniḥsaraṇavat rtsig pa las nges par mi 'byung ba bzhin du de nyid kyis sa de las nges par mi 'byung ba'i phyir rtsig pa steg po lta bur blta'o /
eṣāṃ viparyayeṇa śāntapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārāḥ de dag las bzlog pa ni zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa can dag yin no /
gata mānuṣaṅgikam zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs so /
idaṃ tu vaktavyam /
atha kṣayajñānākanantaraṃ kimutpadyate 		dkyus ma kho na brjod par bya ste; yang zad pa shes pa'i mjug thogs su ci zhig skye zhe na /
yadyakopyaḥ kṣayajñānādanutpādamatiḥ /
akopyadharmā cedarhanbhavati kṣayajñānātsamanantaramanutpādajñānamasyotpadyate 		gal te mi g yo zad shes las /
mi skye'i blo gros /
gal te dgra bcom pa mi g yo ba'i chos can zhig yin na de la zad pa shes pa'i de ma thag tu mi skye ba'i shes ba skye'o /
na cet /
kṣayajñānamaśaikṣī vā dṛṣṭiḥ 		gal te min /
zad pa shes sam mi slob lta /
na cedakopyadharmā bhavati kṣayajñānāt kṣavajñānamevotpadyate aśaikṣī vā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ gal te mi g yo ba'i chos can ma yin na ni zad pa shes pa las zad pa shes pa kho na'am /
mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye'o /
na tvanutpādajñānaṃ parihāṇisaṃbhavāt yongs su nyams pa srid pa'i phyir mi skye bshes pa ni ma yin no /
kiṃ punarakopoyadharmaṇaḥ sā naivotpadyate ci mi g yo ba'i chos can la de mi skye ba kho na yin nam zhe na /
sarvasya sā 'rhataḥ /
akopyadharmaṇo 'pyanutpādajñānātkadācidanutpādajñānamevotpadyate kadācidaśaikṣī samyagdṛṣṭiḥ 		de ni dgra bcom thams cad la /
mi g yo ba'i chos can la yang res 'ga' mi skye ba shes pa las mi skye ba shes pa kho na skye la /
res 'ga' ni mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye'o /
yānyetāni catvāri phalānyuktāni kasyaitāni phalāni /
śramaṇyaphalāni 		gang dag 'bras bu bzhir bshad pa de dag gang gi 'bras bu dag yin zhe na dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu yin no /
kimidaṃ śrāmaṇyaṃ nāma /
śrāvaṇyamamalo mārgaṃḥ 		dge sbyong gi tshul zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na /
dge sbyong tshul ni dri med lam /
anāsravo mārgaḥ śramaṇyam dge sbyong gi tshul ni zag pa med pa'i lam yin no /
tena hhi śramaṇo bhavati /
kleśasaṃśamanāt 		des nyon mongs pa yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i sgo nas dge sbyong du 'gyur te /
mdo las /
śamitā anena bhavanti anekavidhāḥ ṣāpakā akuśalā dharmā vistareṇa yāvajjarāmaraṇīyāstasmācchramaṇa ityucyata iti sūtre vacanāt 'dis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos zhes bya ba nas rgyas par rga shir 'gyur ba'i bar rnam pa du ma zhi bar byas pa yin pas /
de'i phyir dge sbyong zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
anatyantaśamanānna pṛthagjanaḥ paramārthaśramaṇaḥ /
tasya punaḥ śrāmaṇyasya 		so so'i skye bo ni gtan du zhi bar mi byed pa'i phyir don dam pa'i dge sbyong ma yin no /
saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ phalam /
saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtāni hi śrāmaṇyaphalāni punaścatvāryuktāni sūtre /
api tu 		dge sbyong gi tshul de'i 'bras bu 'dus byas 'dus ma byas /
dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams yin no /
de dag kyang mdo las rnam pa bzhir gsungs so /
ekānnanavatistāni /
kāni punastāni /
muktimārgāḥ saha kṣayaiḥ /
darśanaheyaprahāṇāyāṣṭāvānantryamārgā aṣṭau vimuktimārgā bhāvanāheyaprahāṇāya navasu bhūmiṣu pratyekaṃ nava prakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya tāvanta evānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca 		gzhan yang de dag brgyad cu rtsa dgu'o /
de dag kyang gang zhe na /
grol lam zad pa rnams dang bcas /
mthong bas spang bar bya ba spong bar byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam brgyad dang rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba spong bar byed pa sa dgu po re re zhing yang nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu dgu spong bar byed pa de snyed kho na'i bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dag go /
tatrānantaryamārgāḥ śrāmaṇyaṃ vimuktimārgāḥ saṃskṛtāni śrāmaṇyaphalāni de la bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni dge sbyong gi tshul yin no /
rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu 'dus byas dag yin te /
tanniṣyandapuruṣakāraphalatvāt /
teṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇānyasaṃskṛtāni śrāmaṇyaphalāni 		de'i rgyu mthun pa dang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro /
nyon mongs pa de dag gi spangs pa ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu 'dus ma byas dag yin te /
evamekānnanavatirbhavanti de ltar brgyad cu rtsa dgu yin no /
evaṃ tarhi buddhasyopasaṃkhyānaṃ kartavyaṃ jāyate /
na kartavyam 		de ltar na 'o na ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa kha bskang bar bya dgos par 'gyur ro zhe na /
bya mi dgos te /
yadyapi bhūyāṃsi phalāni gal te yang 'bras bu rnams mang mod kyi /
catuṣphalavyavasthā tu pañakāraṇasaṃbhavāt /
yasyāṃ hi prahāṇamārgāvasthāyāṃ pañca kāraṇāni saṃbhavanti tasyāṃ kia bhagavatā phalaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
katamāni pañca 		'bras bu bzhi rnam gzhag pa ni /
rgyu lnga dag ni srid phyir ro /
bcom ldan 'das kyis spong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs gang la rgyu lnga srid pa de la 'bras bu rnam par gzhag go zhes grag go /
lnga gang zhe na /
pūrvatyāgo 'nyamārgāptiḥ kṣayasaṃkalanaṃ phale 'bras la sngon lam btang ba dang /
gzhan thob pa dang zad bsdoms dang shes pa brgyad tshan thob pa dang /
jñānāṣṭakasya lābho 'tha ṣoḍaśākārabhāvanā /
pūrvamārgatyāgo 'pūrvamārgāptiḥ pratipannakaphalamārgatyāgalābhāt 		rnam pa bcu drug thob pa'o /
lam snga ma btang ba dang sngon med pa'i lam thob pa ni zhugs pa dang 'bras bu'i lam btang ba dang thob pa'i phyir ro /
prahāṇasaṃkalanaṃ sarvasyaikaprāptilābhāt /
yugapadaṣṭajñānalābhaścaturvidhanāṃ dharmānvayajñānānām 		spangs pa bsdoms pa ni thams cad kyis thob pa cig rnyed pa'i phyir ro /
shes pa brgyad cig car du 'thob pa ni chos dang rjes su shes pa rnam pa bzhi'o /
ṣoḍaśākārabhāvanā anityādyākārāṇām rnam pa bcu drug thob pa ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa ste /
imāni hi pañca kāraṇāni phale phale bhavanti /
yadyanāsravo mārgaḥ śrāmaṇyaṃ kathaṃ laukikamārgaprāptaṃ phaladvayaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ yujyate 		rgyu lnga po de dag ni 'bras bu re re la yod do /
gal te zag pa med pa'i lam kho na dge sbyong gi tshul yin na 'jig rten ba'i lam gyis thob pa'i 'bras bu gnyis ji ltar dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bur rung zhe na /
laukikāoptaṃ tu miśratvānāsravāptiḥ dhṛteḥ phalalm /
na hi tatra laukikamārgaphalamev prahāṇaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā bhavatyanāgāmiphalaṃ vā 		'jig rten pa yis thob 'bras ni /
bsres dang zag med thob 'dzin phyir /
de la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'bras bu spangs pa kho na yang ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
darśanamārgaphalamapi prahāṇaṃ tatra miśrīkriyate 		'o na ci zhe na /
mthong ba'i lam gyis 'bras bu spangs pa yang der bsre bar bya ste /
sarvasya tatphalasaṃgṛhītaikavisaṃyogaprāptilābhāt thams cad kyi thob pa de'i 'bras bur bsdus pa cig rnyed pa'i phyir ro /
ata eva hi sūtra uktaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ katamat de nyid kyi phyir mdo las /
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na /
yattrayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇaṃ rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tatutvamiti /
anāgāmiphalaṃ katamat 		kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pa dang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams bsrabs pa gang yin pa de yin na /
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na /
yaduta pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇamiti /
anāsravayā ca visaṃyogāprāptyā tatprahāṇaṃ sadhāryate /
tadvalena parihīṇāmaraṇāt /
ato 'pyasya maraṇaṃ yuktaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalam 		kun du sbyor ba tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga spangs pa gang yin pa de yin no zhes gsungs so /
de'i stobs kyis yongs su nyams pa mi 'chi ba'i phyir bral ba'i thob pa zag pa med pas spangs pa de 'dzin par yang byed de /
'di'i phyir yang 'di dge sbyong gi 'bras bu nyid du rigs so /
yadeva caitacchrāmaṇyayuktaṃ dge sbyong gi tshul du bshad pa gang yin pa /
brāhmaṇyaṃ brahmacakraṃ ca tadeva de nyid tshangs tshul tshangs pa yi /
'khor lo /
kleśānāṃ vāhanādvāhmaṇyaṃ brahmacakraṃ tu nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i tshul lo /
tshangs pa'i 'khor lo ni /
brahmāvartanāt tshangs pas bskor phyir ro /
anuttarabrahmaṇyayogāt bhagavānbrahmā /
eṣa hi bhagavān brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapīti sūtrāt 		bcom ldan 'das ni tshangs pa'i tshul bla na med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir tshangs pa yin te /
mdo las /
bcom ldan 'das de ni tshangs pa zhes kyang bya /
zhi ba dang bsil bar gyur pa zhes kyang bya zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
tasyedaṃ cakramiti brāhmaṃ tena prartitatvāt 'khor lo 'di ni de'i yin pas na tshangs pa'i 'khor lo ste /
des bskor pa'i phyir ro /
dharmacakraṃ tu dṛṅmārgaḥ chos kyi 'khor lo mthong ba'i lam /
caṅkramaṇāccakraṃ tatsādharmyāddarśanamārgo dharmacakram rgyu bas na 'khor lo'o /
de dang chos mthun pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam ni chos kyi 'khor lo yin no /
kathamasya sādharmyam /
āśugatvādyarādibhiḥ 		'di'i chos mthun pa ji lta bu zhe na /
myur bar 'gro sogs rtsibs sogs kyis /
āśugatvāttyajanakramaṇāt ajitajayajitādhyavasanādutpatananipattanācca /
evamāśugatvādibhiḥ arādibhiḥ sādharmyādāryāṣṭāṅṅgo mārgaścakramiti bhadantaghoṣakaḥ 		myur du 'gro ba'i phyir dang 'dor ba dang 'jug pa'i phyir dang ma rgyal ba rgyal bar byed pa dang rgyal ba rnal du dgod pa'i phyir dang 'phar ba dang 'bab pa'i phyir te /
myur bar 'gro ba la sogs pa ni de lta bu yin no /
btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs na re 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rtsibs la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir 'khor lo zhes bya ste /
samyagdṛṣṭisaṃkalpavyāyāmasmṛtayo hyarasthānīyāḥ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang rtog pa dang rtsol ba dang dran pa rnams ni rtsibs lta bu yin no /
samyagvākkarmāntājīvā nābhisthānīyāḥ samādhirnemisthānīya iti darśanamārgo dharmacakramiti yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams ni lte ba lta bu yin no /
ting nge 'dzin ni mu khyud lta bu yin no zhes zer ro /
kuta etat āryakauṇḍinyasya tadutpattau pravarttitaṃ dharmacakramiti vacanāt /
kathaṃ tattriparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ ca 		mthong ba'i lam chos kyi 'khor lo yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na 'phags pa koondi n+ya la de skyes pa na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
ji ltar na de lan gsum du bzlas pa dang rnam pa bcu gnyis yin zhe na /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyam 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o /
tat khalu parijñeyaṃ tat khalu parijñātamityete trayaḥ parivartāḥ de yongs su shes par bya'o /
de yongs su shes so zhes bya ba 'di dag ni lan gsum du bzlas pa yin no /
ekaikasmiṃśca parivarte cakṣurudapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhirudapādi ityete dvādaśākārāḥ bzlas pa re re la mig skyes so /
shes pa dang rigs pa dang blo skyes so zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rnam pa bcu gnyis yin te /
pratisatyemevaṃ bhavanti bden pa re re la yang de dang 'dra'o /
trikadvādaśakasādharmyāttu triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāramuktam /
dvayasaptasthānakauśalādeśanāvat /
ebhiśca parivartairdarśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśatā iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
yadyevaṃ na tarhi darśanamārga eva triparivartto dvādaśākāra iti kathamasau dharmacakraṃ vyavasthāpyate 		gsum tshan dang bcu gnyis su chos mthun pa'i phyir lan gsum du bzlas te /
rnam pa bcu gnyis zhes bshad de /
gnyis dang gnas bdun la mkhas pa bstan pa bzhin no /
bzlas pa 'di dag gis ni grangs bzhin du mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam rnams bstan to zhes zer ro /
gal te de lta na 'o na ni mthong ba'i lam kho na la lan gsum du bzlas pa yang ma yin la rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang ma yin na ji ltar na mthong ba'i lam 'di chos kyi 'khor lor rnam par gzhag /
tasmātsa eva dharmaparyāyo dharmacakraṃ triparirtaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ ca yujyate /
kathaṃ ca punastriparivartam 		de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid chos kyi 'khor lo yang yin lan gsum du bzlas pa dang rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang yin par rung ngo /
ji ltar na lan gsum du bzlas pa yin zhe na /
satyānāṃ triḥ parivarttanāt bden pa rnams lan gsum du bzlas pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ dvādaśākāram ji ltar na rnam pa bcu gnyis yin zhe na /
caturṇāṃ satyānāṃ tridhākaraṇāt bden pa rnams la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung /
duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti 'gog pa /
lam zhes bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya /
spang bar bya /
parijñeyaṃ praheyaṃ sākṣātkartavyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti mngon sum du bya /
bsgom par bya zhes bya ba dang /
yongs su shes spangs /
parijñātaṃ prahīṇaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ bhāvitamiti mngon sum du byas /
bsgoms zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum du byas pa'i phyir ro /
tasya punaḥ pravartanaṃ parasaṃtāne gamanamarthajñāpanāt de bskor ba ni gzhan gyis rgyud la go bar byed pa ste /
don shes par byed pa'i phyir ro /
athavā sarva evāryamārgo dharmacakraṃ veneyasaṃtānakramaṇāt /
tattu parasaṃtāne darśanamārgotpādanādvartayitumārabdhamataḥ pravartitamityucyate 		yang na 'phags pa'i lam thams cad kyang gdul bya'i rgyud la 'jug pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo yin te /
de ni gzhan gyi rgyud la mthong ba'i lam bskyed pa'i phyir bskor bar brtsams pa yin pas de'i phyir bskor ba zhes bya'o /
atha kasmindhātau kati śrāmaṇyaphalāni prāpyante /
kāme trayāptiḥ /
kāmadhātāveva trayāṇāṃ śrāmaṇyaphalānāṃ prāptirnānyatra 		yang khams gang du dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu du dag cig 'thob ce na /
'dod par gsum thob /
gsum ni 'dod pa'i khams kho nar 'thob kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
antyasya triṣu tha ma ni /
gsum du /
antyaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalamarhatvaṃ tasya triṣu dhātuṣu prāptiḥ dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu tha ma ni dgra bcom pa nyid de /
de ni khams gsum du 'thob po /
phaladvayasya tāvadavītarāgaprāpyatvādūrdhvamaprāptiryuktā re zhig 'bras bu gnyis ni 'dod chags dang ma bral bas thob bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir gong mar mi 'thob par yang rigs na gsum pa go /
tṛtīyasya tu kasmādaprāptiḥ /
nordhvaṃ hi dṛkpathaḥ /
ūrdhvaṃ hi kāmadhātordarśanamārgo nāsti /
na ca tena vinā 'sti vītarāgasyānāgāmi phalaprāptirityetat kāraṇam /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra darśanamārgo nāsti /
ārupyeṣu tāvat śravaṇābhāvādadhodhātvanālambanācca /
rūpadhātau tu 		ci'i phyir mi 'thob ce na /
gong na mthong lam med /
'dod pa'i khams las gang na ni mthong ba'i lam med la /
de med par yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa med pas zhes bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs yin no /
ci'i phyir de na mthong ba'i lam med ce na /
re zhig gzugs med pa'i khams na ni nyan pa med pa dang khams 'og ma la mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro; /
gzugs kyi khams na ni /
asaṃvegādiha vidhā tatra niṣṭheti cāgamāt mi skye lung las 'dir rtsom zhing /
der mthar phyin zhes 'byung phyir ro /
rūpāvacarā hi pṛthagjanāḥ samāpattimukhasaṅgā duḥkhavedanābhāvācca na saṃvijante /
na ca vinā saṃgenāryamārgaḥ śakto labdhum /
iyaṃ tāvadyuktiḥ /
āgamo 'pyayaṃ pañcānāṃ pudgalānāmiha vidhā tatra niṣṭhā antarāparinirvāyiṇo yāvadūrdhvaṃsrotasa iti 		gzugs na spyod pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba la chags pa'i phyir dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med pa'i phyir kun du skyo bar mi 'gyur la /
skyo ba med bar yang 'phags pa'i lam thob par mi 'gyur te /
'di ni re zhig rigs pa yin no /
lung yang /
bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas na gong du 'pho ba'i bar gang zag lnga ni 'dir rtsom zhing der mthar phyin bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa 'di yin no /
vidhā hi mārgarambho nirvāṇopāyatvāt /
idamuktaṃ yadyakopyaḥ kṣayajñānādanutpādamati riti /
tatra kimarhatamapyasti bhedaḥ 		rtsom pa zhes bya ba ni lam rtsom pa yin te /
mya ngan las 'das pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro /
'di skad du /
gal te mi g yo'i zad shes la /
mi skye blo gros zhes bshad de /
ci dgra bcom pa la yang dbye ba yod dam zhe na smras pa yod de /
astītyucyate dgra bcom drug 'dod /
ṣaḍarhanto matāḥ /
sūtra uktaṃ ṣaḍarhantaḥ parihāṇadharmā cetanādharmā anurakṣaṇā dharmā sthitākampoyaḥ prativedhanābhavyo 'kopyadharmā ceti 		mdo las dgra bcom pa drug gsungs te /
yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang rjes su srung ba'i chos can dang gnas pa las mi bskyod pa dang rtogs pa'i skal ba can dang mi g yo ba'i chos can no /
teṣāṃ pañca śraddhādhhimuktijāḥ de dag las /
lnga ni dad pas mos las skyes /
akokpyadharmāṇaṃ varjayitvā 'nye pañca śraddhādhimukti pūrvakāḥ mi g yo ba'i chos can ma gtogs pa gzhan lnga ni dad pas mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dag yin no /
vimuktiḥ sāmayikyeṣām de dag rnam grol dus dang sbyor /
eṣāṃ ca pañcānāṃ sāmayikī kānta cetovimuktirveditavyā lnga po 'di dag gi sems kyi rnam par grol ba ni dus dang sbyor bas 'phangs pa yin par rig par bya ste /
nityānurakṣyatvāt rtag tu rjes su srung ba'i phyir ro /
ata evaite samayavimuktā ucyante de nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni dus kyi rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o /
samayāpekṣāścaite 'dhimuktāśceti samayavimuktā madhyapadalopāt dhṛtaghaṭavat /
eṣāṃ hi samayāpekṣāsamādhisaṃmukhībhāva upakaraṇārogyadeśaviśeṣāpekṣatvāt 		'di dag ni dus la ltos pa yang yin la rnam par grol ba yang yin pas dus kyi rnam par grol ba dag ste /
bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir mar gyi bum pa bzhin no /
'di dag gi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du gyur pa ni yo byad dang nad med pa dang yul gyi bye brag la ltos pa'i phyir dus la ltos pa yin no /
akopyākopyadharmaṇaḥ mi g yo'i chos can mi g yo ba /
akopyadharmaṇastvakopyā vimuktiḥ /
kopayitumaśakyatvādaparihāṇitaḥ /
ato 'samayamukto 'sau 		mi g yo ba'i chos can gyi rnam par grol ba ni yongs su mi nyams pa'i sgo nas g yo bar mi nus pa'i phyir mi g yo ba yin no /
de'i phyir de dus mi sbyor grol /
ata evāsamayavimukti ucyate /
sa hyasamayāpekṣāvimuktiśca /
icchātaḥ samādhisaṃmukhībhāvāt 		de nyid kyi phyir de ni dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ste /
de ni 'dod dgur ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du gyur ba'i phyir dus la mi ltos par rnam par grol ba yin no /
kālāntarātyantavimuktito vā kopyākopyadharmaṇoḥ samayāsamaye vimuktatvaṃ parihāṇisaṃbhavāsaṃbhavataḥ yang na yongs su nyams pa srid pa dang mi srid pa'i sgo nas dus gzhan gyi bar dang gtan du rnam par grol ba'i phyir dus kyi rnam par grol ba dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba nyid yin no /
dṛṣṭipraptānvayaśca saḥ de ni mthong thob rgyu las byung /
sa cākopyadharmā dṛṣṭiprāptapūrvako veditavyaḥ mi g yo ba'i chos can de ni mthong bas thob pa sngon du 'gro ba yin par rig par bya'o /
kiṃ punarete ṣaḍarhanta ādita eva tadgotrā bhavantyatha paścāt ci dgra bcom pa drug po 'di dag dang po kho na nas de'i rigs can kho na dag cig yin nam /
'on te phyis yin zhe na /
tadgotrā āditaḥ kecitkeciduttāpanāgatāḥ kha cig dang po nas de'i rigs /
kha cig sbyangs pa las gyur to /
kaścitprathamata eva cetanādharmagotrako bhavati /
kaścitpunaḥ parihāṇadharmā bhūtvendriyāṇāmuttāpanayā cetanādharmatāṃ gataḥ 		kha cig ni dang po nyid nas 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can gyi rigs can yin la kha cig ni yongs su nyams pa'i chos can du gyur pa las dbang po rnams sbyangs pas 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can du gyur pa yin te /
evaṃ yāvadakoopyadharmatāṃ gato veditavyaḥ mi g yo ba'i chos can du gyur ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o /
tatra parihāṇadharmā yaḥ parihātuṃ bhavyo na cetanādidharmā /
cetanādharmā yaścetayituṃ bhavyaḥ /
anurakṣaṇādharmā yo 'nurakṣituṃ bhavyaḥ /
sthitākampyo yaḥ parihāṇipratyayaṃ balavantamantareṇānurakṣannapi sthātuṃ bhavyo na hātuṃ nāpi vardhayituṃ vinābhiyogena 		de la yongs su nyams pa'i chos can ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i skal ba dang ldan gyi 'chi bar sems pa la sogs pa'i chos can ni ma yin pa gang yin pa'o /
'chi bar sems pa'i chos can ni 'chi bar sems par 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa'o /
rjes su srung ba'i chos can ni rjes su srung bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa'o /
gnas pa las mi bskyod pa ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i rkyen stobs dang ldan pa med na rjes su ma bsrungs kyang gnas par 'gyur ba'i skal ba can yin zhing nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang mngon par brtson pa med na 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa'o /
prativedhanābhavyo yo 'kopyaḥ prativeddhaṃ bhavyaḥ rtogs pa'i skal pa can ni mi g yo ba rtogs par 'gyur ba'i skal pa can gang yin pa'o /
akopyadharmā yo naiva parihātuṃ bhavyaḥ /
prathamau dvau pūrvameva śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogavikalau /
tṛtīyaḥ sātatyaprayogī 		mi g yo ba'i chos can ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa de kho na'o /
dang po gnyis ni sngon slob pa'i gnas skabs kho na na rgyun du sbyor ba dang gus par sbyor ba med pa yin no /
gsum pa ni rgyun du sbyor ba yin no /
caturthaḥ satkṛtyaprayogī bzhi pa ni gus par sbyor ba yin no /
pañcama ubhayathāprayogī mṛdvindriyastu /
ṣaṣṭha ubhayathāprayogī tīkṣṇendriyaśca 		lnga pa ni gnyi gar sbyor ba pa ni yin la dbang po rtul po yin no /
drug pa ni gnyi gar sbyor ba dang dbang po rnon po yin no /
nacāvaśyaṃ varihāṇadharmā parihīyate nāpi yāvat prativedhanābhavyaḥ pratividhyati /
saṃbhavaṃ tu pratyevamucyate 		yongs su nyams pa'i chos can yang gdon mi za bar yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ma yin la /
rtogs pa'i skal ba can gyi bar du yang rtogs bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi srid ba'i phyir de skad ces bshad do /
evaṃ kṛtvā dhātutraye 'piṣaḍarhanto yujyante de ltar byas na khams gsum char na yang dgra bcom pa drug yod par rung ngo /
yeṣāṃ tvavaśyaṃ parihīyate yāvat pratividhyati teṣāṃ kāmadhātau ṣaṭ rūpārupyadhātvoḥ sthitākampyo 'kopyadharmā ca gang dag gi gdon mi za bar yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba nas mngon par rtogs pa'i bar du 'gyur ba de dag gi ltar na 'dod pa'i khams na ni drug go /
gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag na ni gnas pa las mi bskyod ba dang mi g yo ba'i chos can dang gnyis te /
tayoḥparihāṇicetanendriyasaṃcārābhāvāt /
kaḥ punareṣāṃ kutaḥ parihīyate /
phalāt gotrādvā 		de gnyis na yongs su nyams pa dang 'chi bar sems pa dang dbang po 'pho ba med pa'i phyir ro /
'di dag las gang zhig 'bras bu 'am rigs gang las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro zhe na /
gotrāccaturṇāṃ pañcānāṃ phalāddhāniḥ bzhi ni rigs las lnga 'bras las /
nyams 'gyur /
cetanādharmādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ gotrātparihāṇiḥ /
na hi parihāṇadharmā punaḥ svagotrāt parihīyate 		'chi bar sems pa'i chos can la sogs pa bzhi ni rigs las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro /
yongs su nyams pa'i chos can ni rang gi rigs las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro /
parihāṇadharmādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ phalāt parihāṇiḥ /
teṣāmapi tu 		yongs su nyams pa'i chos can la sogs pa lnga ni 'bras bu las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro /
de dag kyang /
na pūrvakāt /
yasya yat prathamagotraṃ sa tasmānna parihīyate 		dang po las ma yin /
gang gi rigs dang po gang yin pa de las ni de yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te /
śaikṣāśaikṣamārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkutatvāt /
śaikṣastu laukikalokattarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt na parihīyate svagotrāt /
yattu paścāt pratilabdhamuttāpanayā tasmāt parihīyate /
yasya ca yat prathamaṃ phalaṃ sa tasmānā parihīyate 		slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir ro /
slob pa ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir ro /
phyis sbyangs pas thob pa gang yin pa de las ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro /
gang gi 'bras bu dang po gang yin pa de las kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro /
śeṣāt parihīyate /
ata eva srota āpattiphalānnāsti parihāṇiḥ /
evaṃ ca kṛtvā parihāṇadharmaṇastrayaḥ prakārā bhavanti 		lhag ma las ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro /
de nyid kyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa med do /
de ltar byas na yongs su nyams pa'i chos can ni rnam pa gsum yin te /
tadavasthasya parinirvāṇamindriyasaṃcāraḥ de'i so na gnas pa bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang dbang po 'pho ba'am /
parihāya vā śaikṣatvam yongs su nyams nas slob pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o /
cetanādharmaṇaścatvāraḥ /
eta eva trayaḥ parihāṇadharmagotrapratyāgamanaṃ ca /
evamanyeṣāṃ trayāṇāmekaikaprakāravṛddhacyā yathākramaṃ pañca ṣaṭ sapta prakārā veditavyāḥ /
yasya ca yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ sa parihāya śaikṣobhūtastatraivāvatiṣṭhate nānyasmin /
anyathā hi tadgotraviśeṣa labhād vṛddhirevāsya syānna parihāṇiḥ /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamānām nāsti parihāṇiḥ 		'chi bar sems pa'i chos can ni bzhi ste /
gsum po de dag nyid dang yongs su nyams pa'i chos can gyi rigs su slar 'ong ba'o /
de bzhin du gsum la yang re re bskyed de /
go rims bzhin du rnam pa lnga dang drug dang bdun yin par rig par bya'o /
de slob par gyur na gang gi rigs dang po gang yin pa de kho na la gnas kyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin no; /
de lta ma yin na rigs khyad par can rnyed pa'i phyir de 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur gyi yongs su nyams par ni mi 'gyur ro /
ci'i phyir 'bras bu dang po las yongs su nyams pa med ce na /
darśanaheyānāmavastukatvāt mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams gzhi med pa'i phyir te /
ātmādhiṣṭhānapravṛttā hyete /
satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakatvāt 		de dag ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir bdag gi gzhi la 'jug pa can yin na bdag de yang med do /
sa cātmā nāstīti /
asadālambanāstarhi prāpnuvanti /
nāsadālambanāḥ 		'o na med pa la dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
bden pa la dmigs pa'i phyir med pa la dmigs pa ni ma yin gya phyin ci log te dmigs pa dag ni yin no /
satyālambanatvāt /
vitathālambanāstu /
katamaśca kleśo naivamasti viśeṣaḥ /
ātmadṛṣṭihi rūpādike vastuni kārakavedakavaśavartitvenātmatvamabhūtamadhyāropayati tadadhiṣṭhānānuvṛttāścāntagrāhadṛṣṭacyādaya ityavastukā ucyante 		de lta ma yin pa'i nyon mongs pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
khyad par yod de /
bdag tu lta ba ni bdag med bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang dbang bsgyur ba nyid du bdag yang dag ba ma yin pa sgro 'dogs par byed la /
mthar 'dzin pa la sogs pa yang de'i gzhi la zhugs pa yin pas gzhi med pa dag ces bya'o /
bhāvanāheyāstu rāgapratighamānāvidyā rūpādike vastuni kevalaṃ saktyāghātonnatyasaṃprakhyānabhāvena vartanta iti savastukā ucyante /
asti ca tacdhrātādimātraṃ yatra teṣāṃ pravṛttayaḥ na tvātmādileśo 'pi 		bsgom pas spang bar bya ba 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa rnam pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la chags pa dang kun nas mnar sems dang khengs pa dang mi gsal ba'i ngo bor zhugs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad pas gzhi dang bcas pa dag ces bya ste /
gang la de dag 'jug par 'gyur ba sdug pa la sogs pa tsam de ni yod kyi /
bdag la sogs pa ni bdag kyang med do /
gzhan dag ni 'di skad ces zer te /
tathā hi bhāvanāheyānāmasti pratiniyataṃ vastumanāpāmanāpalakṣaṇaṃ na tu darśanaheyānāmātmādilakṣaṇam 'di ltar bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams la ni gzhi yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid so sor nges pa yod kyi /
mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams la ni bdag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid med de /
tasmādapyavastukāucyante /
api khalvāryasyānupanidhyāyataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt kleśa utpadyate nopanidhyāyato rajjvāmiva sarpasaṃjñā /
na cānupanidhyāyata ātmadṛṣṭacyādīnāmupapattiryujyate santīrakatvāditi nāsti darśanaheyakleśa prahāṇātparihāṇiḥ 		de lta bas na gzhi so sor nges pa med pa dag ces bya'o /
gzhan yang 'phags pa des par mi rtog pa la dran pa nyams pas nyon mongs pa rnams skye bar 'gyur gyi nges par rtog pa la ni ma yin te /
thag pa la sprul gyi 'du shes bzhin no /
nges par mi rtog pa la ni bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa 'byung bar mi rung ste /
kun du rtog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
de lta bas na mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pas sa dang po las yongs su nyams pa med do /
arhatvādapi nāsti parihāṇiriti sautrāntikāḥ mdo sde ba rnams na re dgra bcom pa nyid las kyang yongs su nyams pa med do zhes zer te /
eṣa eva canyāyaḥ /
kathamidaṃ gamyate 		de nyid rigs pa yin no /
'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na /
āgamādyuktitaśca lung dang rigs pa las so /
kathamāgamāt /
taddhi bhikṣavaḥ prahīṇaṃ yadāryayā prajñayā prahīṇamityuktam /
ādyantayośca phalayorāryayaiva prajñayā 'dhigamaḥ /
śaikṣasya cāpramādakaraṇiye 'pramādakaraṇīyaṃ vadāmī tyuktaṃ nā 'rhataḥ /
arhato 'pyahamānanda lābhasatkāramantrāyakaraṃ vadāmītyatra sūtre dṛṣṭadhamesukhavihāramātrādeva parihāṇiruktā /
yā tvanenākopyacetovimuktiḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtā /
tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇaṃ vadāmīti coktam 		lung las ji lta bu zhe na /
dge slong dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis spangs pa gang yin pa de ni spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang slob pa la bag yod pa la bag yod par bya'o zhes dang smra'o gsungs kyi dgra bcom pa la ni ma yin no /
kun dga' bo dgra bcom pa la yang rnyed pa dang bkur stis bar chad byed pa yin par nga smra'o zhes gsungs pa'i mdo de las ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa tsam kho na las yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar gsungs par zad de /
'dis sems rnam par grol ba mi g yo ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de las ni rnam grangs gang gis kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar nga mi smra'o zhes gsungs so /
sāmayikyā astīti cet gal te dus dang sbyor ba la yod do zhe na /
vayamapyevaṃ brūmaḥ kho bo cag kyang de skad ces ni zer ro /
sā tu vicāryā /
kimarhattvamāhosviddhacyānānīti /
maulo hi dhyānasamādhiḥ samaye saṃmukhībhāvātsāmayikī cimuktirityucyate /
dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ ca punaḥ punareṣaṇīyatvātkāntetyucyate 		ci de dgra bcom pa nyid yin nam /
'on te bsam gtan pa rnams yin zhes bya ba dpyad par byas te /
bsam gtan dngos gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ni dus su mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba zhes kyang bya la mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir yang dang yang du btsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir yid du 'ong ba zhes kyang bya'o /
āsvādanīyatvādityapare /
arhattvavimuktistu nityānugatatvānna yujyate /
yadi cārhattvāt parihaṇisaṃbhavo 'bhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ bhagavānādhicetasikebhya eva dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇimavakṣyat /
ato gamyate sarvasyaivārhato vimuktirakopyādṛṣṭadhrmasukhavihāretyustu 		gzhan dag na re ro myang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rnam par grol ba ni rtag tu rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir dus dang sbyor ba yin par yang mi rung la /
yang don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir yid du 'ong ba yang ma yin no /
gal te yang dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa srid pa zhig tu gyur na /
ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par lhag pa'i sems las byung ba dag kho na las yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar gsungs par gyur te /
de'i phyir dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ni mi g yo ba yin par khong du chud do /
kaścit lābhasatkāravyākṣepadīṣāt parihīyate vaśitvabrhaśādyo mṛdvindriyaḥ mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dag las ni la la ni rnyed pa dang bkur stis g yen sbyo ba'i nyes pas dbang nyams pa'i phyir yongs su nyams par 'gyur te /
kaścinna parihīyate yastīkṣṇendriyaḥ /
tatra yaḥ parihīyate sa parihāṇadharmā /
yo na parihīyate so 'parihāṇadharmā /
evaṃ cetanādharmādayo 'pi yojyāḥ /
aparihāṇadharmasthitākampyākopyadharmaṇāṃ ko viśeṣaḥ /
aparihāṇadharmā 'nuttāpanāgataḥ /
akopyadharmā tūttāpanāgataḥ 		dbang po rtul po gang yin pa'o /
la la yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te /
dbang po rnon po gang yin pa'o /
de la gang zhig yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de ni yongs su nyams pa'i chos can yin la /
gang zhig yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur pa de ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin te /
de bzhin du 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can dang gnas pa las mi bskyod pa dang mi g yo ba'i chos can rnams la khyad par ci yod ce na /
yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can ni sbyangs pa las gyur pa ni ma yin la /
mi g yo ba'i chos can ni sbyangs pa las gyur pa yin te /
tau hi yaṃ yameva samāpattiviśeṣamutpādayatastasmānna parihīyete de gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gang kho na skyed par byed pa de las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro /
sthitākampyastu yasminneva guṇe sthitastasmātkevalaṃ na parihīyate na tvanyamutpādayati /
utpādayati vā tasmāttu kampata ityeva viśeṣo lakṣyate 		gnas pa las mi bskyod pa ni yon tan gang kho nal gnas pa de las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi /
gzhan yang skyed par mi byed pa'am /
skyed par byed na yang de las g yo bar 'gyur ba yin pas 'di ni khyad par yin par mngon no /
āyuṣmānbhautikaḥ śaikṣībhūtaḥ sāmayikyā vimukteratyāsvādanānmṛdvindriyatvāccabhīkṣṇaṃ parihīyamāṇo nirviṇnaḥ śastramādhārayan kāyajīvitanirapekṣatvānmaraṇakāla evārhattvaprāptaḥ parinirvṛttaśca /
tasmātso 'pi nārhattvāt parihīṇaḥ 		tshe dang ldan pa gnag tshogs can slob par gyur pa ha cang ro myang ba'i phyir dang dbang bo rtul po yin pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba pa las yang dang yang du yongs su nyams pa dang yi chad nas lus dang srog la mi lta bar mtshon gyis 'debs par byed la /
'chi ba'i dus kho nar dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das par yang gyur te /
de lta bas na de yang dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa ma yin no /
daśottare coktam /
eko dharma utpādayitavyaḥ sāmayikī kāntā cetovimuktiḥ 		bcu las 'phros pa las kyang bskyed par bya ba'i chos ni gcig ste /
sems rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba yid du 'ong ba yin no /
eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ akopyā cetovimuktiriti /
yadi cārhattvaṃ sāmayikī kāntā cetovimuktirabhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ tatraiva daśake 'rhattvasya dvigrahaṇamakariṣyāt 		mngon sum du bya ba'i chos ni gcig ste /
sems rnam par grol ba mi g yo ba yin no zhes gsungs te /
gal te sems rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba pa yid du 'ong ba dgra bcom pa nyid kho na yin par gyur na; ci'i phyir bcu tshan de kho na las dgra bcom pa nyid lan gnyis su smos par 'gyur /
na ca kvacidarhattvamutpādayitavyamuktam dgra bcom pa nyid bskyed par bya ba yin par ni gang du yang ma gsungs so /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
sākṣātkartavyaṃ mṛdvindriyasaṃgṛhītaṃ cārhattvamutpādayitavyamiti /
kimanena jñāpitaṃ bhavati 		mngon sum du bya ba yin no /
dbang po rtul pos bsdus pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid bskyed par bya ba yin no zhe na /
yang 'dis ci zhig shes par bya ba yin /
yadi tāvadutpādayituṃ śakyamityadapi śakyam re zhig gal te bskyed par bya bar nus pa yin no zhe na ni /
gzhan yang nus so /
athotpādanamarhatīti /
anyatsutarāmarhati 		'on te bskyed par 'os pa yin no zhe na ni gzhan ches shin tu 'os pa yin te /
tasmānna sāmayikī vimuktirarhattvam /
kathaṃ tarhi samayavimukto 'rhannucyate 		de lta bas na rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no /
'o na dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom pa zhes ji skad ces bya zhe na /
yasya mṛdvindriyatvātsamayāpekṣaḥ samādhisamukhībhāvaḥ gang zhig dbang po rtul po'i phyir ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du 'gyur ba dus la ltos pa yin no /
viparyayādasamayavimuktaḥ /
abhidharme 'pi coktaṃ tribhiḥ sthāneḥ kāmarāgānuśayasyotpādo bhavati /
kāmarāgānuśayio 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra iti 		bzlog pa ni dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba yin no /
chos mngon pa las kyang /
gnas gsum gyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas skye bar 'gyur te /
'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes pa yin /
'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris par gyur pa'i chos rnams kyang snang bar gyur pa yin /
de la yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin zhes gsungs so /
paripūrṇotpattirevamiti cet /
kasya vā paripūrṇakāraṇasyotpattiḥ 		gal te de lta bu ni rgyu yongs su tshang ba las skyes pa yin no zhe na /
rgyu yongs su ma tshang bar go gang zhig skye zhe na /
evaṃ tāvadāgamāt /
kathaṃ yuktitaḥ /
yadi tāvadarhatastadrūpaḥ pratipakṣa utpanno yena kleśā atyantamanutpattidharmatāmāpannāḥ kathaṃ punaḥ parihīyate /
atha notpannaḥ 		re zhig lung las ni de lta bu yin no /
rigs pa las ji lta bu zhe na /
re zhig gal te dgra bcom pa la gang gis na nyon mongs pa rnams gtan tu mi skye ba'i chos nyid du gyur pa de lta bu'i gnyen po zhig skyes na ni ji ltar na yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur /
kathaṃ kṣīṇāsravo bhavati /
atyantamanayoddhratāyāṃ tadbījadharmatāyāmakṣīṇāsravo vā punaḥ kathamarhanbhavatītyevaṃ yuktiḥ 		'on te ma skyes te de'i sa bon gyi chos nyid gtan du rtsa nas ma bton na ni ji ltar zag pa zad pa yin /
zag pa ma zad na yang ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid yin te /
aṅgārakarṣūpomaṃ sūtraṃ tarhi parihāryam /
yatredamuktaṃ tasya khalu śrutavata āryaśrāvakasyaivaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ kadācitkarhicit smṛtisaṃpramoṣādutpadyante pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā iti /
sa hi tatrārhanneva jñāpitaḥ 		rigs pa las ni de lta bu yin no /
'o na ni gang las 'di skad du 'phags pa nyan thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar spyod pa de ltar gnas pa de brgya la res 'ga' zhig dran pa nyams pa las sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa sol ba'i phung po lta bu'i mdo'i lan gdab dgos so /
de ni de las dgra bcom pa kho na yin par bstan te /
dīrgharātra vivekanimnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati yāvannirvāṇaprāgbhāramiti vacanāt yun ring po nas sems dben ba la gzhol ba yin zhes bya ba nas /
mya ngan las 'das pa la bab pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
arhato hyetadbalamanyatroktam gzhan las de ni dgra bcom pa'i stobs yin par yang gsungs la /
sarvairāsravasthānīyairdharmaiḥ śītībhūtaṃ vāntībhūtamiti cābhidhānāt astyetadevam /
yāvattu cāro na supratibaddhastāvadevaṃ carato 'pi śaikṣasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ kleśotpattāviti śaikṣāvasthāmadhikṛtyaivaṃ vacanādadoṣaḥ /
pratijñāyate hi laukikamārgapratilabdhātphaladvayātparihāṇiḥ 		zag pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos thams cad las ni bsil bar gyur cing bsil bar gyur pa zhes kyang gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
de skad du 'byung ba yang yod mod kyi ji srid du spyod pa legs par ma rtogs pa de srid du slob pa de ltar spyod pa la yang nyon mongs pa 'byung ba srid pa yod pas slob pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbang du mdzad nas de skad du gsungs pa'i phyir nyes pa med do /
arhattvādapi tu parihāṇiṃ varṇayanti vaibhāṣikāḥ bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni dgra bcom pa nyid las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar brjod do /
kiṃ punarime 'rhanta eva ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti athānye 'pi ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti ci dgra bcom pa de dag kho na rigs drug dang ldan nam /
'on te gzhan dag kyang rigs drug dang ldan zhe na /
śaikṣānāryāśca ṣaḍgotrāḥ /
śaikṣapṛthagjanā apyevaṃ ṣaḍgotrāḥ 		slob dang 'phags min rigs drug ldan /
slob pa dang so so'i skye bo rnams kyang de bzhin du rigs drug dang ldan te /
tatpūrvakāṇyeva hyarhatāṃ gotrāṇi dgra bcom pa'i rigs rnams ni de dag sngon du 'gro ba yin no /
api tu /
saṃcāro nāsti darśane 		gzhan yang /
mthong ba la ni 'pho ba med /
darśanamārgādanyatrendriyasaṃcāro bhavati /
prayogāsaṃbhavānna darśanamārge 		mthong ba'i lam las gzhan pa la dbang po 'pho ba yod kyi sbyor ba mi srid pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam la ni ma yin no /
kaścit pṛthagjanāvasthāyāmindriyāṇi saṃcarati /
kaścicchaddhādhimuktāvasthāyām /
yadidaṃ sūtra uktaṃ ye tvanena catvāra ādhicaitasikā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāstato 'hamasyānyatamānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmi yā tvanenaikākinā yāvadakopyā cetovimuktiḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtā tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇiṃ vadāmīti /
kathamakopyadharmaṇo dṛṣṭdharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇiḥ 		la la ni so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs na dbang po rnams 'pho'o /
la la ni dad pas mos pa'i gnas skabs na'o /
mdo las 'di skad du /
'dis mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa lhag pa'i sems las byung ba bzhi thob pa gang dag yin pa de las gang yang rung ba zhig las 'di yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar ni nga smra'i 'di gcig pus sems kyi rnam par grol ba mi g yo ba'i bar du lus kyis mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de las ni 'di'i rnam grangs gang gis kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar na mi smra'o zhes gang gsungs pa yang ji ltar na ma g yo ba'i chos can mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dag las yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhe na /
parihāṇistridhā jñeyā prāptāprāptopabhogataḥ /
prāptaparihāṇiryadi pratilabdhāt guṇāt parihīyate 		thob dang ma thob nyer spyad las /
yongs nyams rnam pa gsum shes bya /
gal te yon tan thob pa las yongs su nyams na thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no /
aprāptaparihāṇiryadi prāpyaṃ guṇaṃ na prāpnoti /
upabhogaparihāṇiryadi prāptaguṇaṃ na saṃmukhīkaroti 		gal te yon tan thob par bya ba ma thob na ma thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no /
gal te yon tan thob pa mngon sum du mi byed na nye bar spyod pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no /
āsāṃ punaḥ parihāṇīnām yongs su nyams pa 'di rnams las /
antyā śāsturakopyasya madhyā cānyasya tu tridhā ston pa tha ma mi g yo la /
bar ma 'ang gzhan la rnam gsum mo /
buddhasyopabhogaparihāṇireva nānyā /
akopyadharmaṇaḥ sā cāprāptaparihāṇiśca 		sangs rgyas lan nye bar spyad pa las yongs su nyams pa kho na mnga'i gzhan ni mi mnga'o /
mi g yo ba'i chos can la ni de dang ma thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yang yod de /
pudgalaviśeṣadharmāprāpaṇāt /
anyasyārhataḥ prāptaparihāṇirapyasti 		gang zag khyad par can gyi chos ma thob pa'i phyir ro /
dgra bcom pa gzhan la ni thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yang yod do /
ata upabhogaparihāṇivacanādakopyadharmaṇaḥ sūtravirodhaḥ de'i phyir mi g yo ba'i chos can nye bar spyad pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir mdo dang mi 'gal lo /
sarvasyānāsravā vimuktirakopyā /
akopyadharmavyavasthānaṃ tu yathā tathoktam /
ata etadcodyamityaparihāṇivādī 		yongs su mi nyams par smra ba na re thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba zag pa med pa ni mi g yo ba yin la /
mi g yo ba'i chos can du ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa ni de bzhin du bshad zin pa de'i phyir 'di ni klan kar mi rung ngo zhes zer ro /
atha yoi 'rhatphalātparihīyate kimasau punarjāyate yang gang zhig dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams na ci de yang skye 'am zhe na /
nāstyetat /
yasmāt /
mriyate na phalabhraṣṭaḥ /
naiva hi kaścitphalāt parihīṇaḥ kālaṃ karoti 		de lta bu ni med de /
'di ltar /
'bras las nyams pa 'chi ba med /
'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa ni 'ga' yang 'chi ba med de /
dhandhā bhikṣava āryaśrāvakasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣā atha ca punaḥ kṣipramevāntaṃ parikṣayaṃ sapadi saṃgacchanīti sūtre vacanāt mdo las /
dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa la dran pa nyams pa chung du 'byung mod kyi 'on kyang yang myur ba kho nar nub pa dang yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
anyathā hyanāśvāsikaṃ brahmacaryaṃ syāt /
yataśca phalāt parihīyate tatphalasthena yadakāryaṃ 		de lta ma yin na tshangs par spyod pa yid brtan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro /
'bras bu gang zhig las yongs su nyams pa ni 'bras bu de la gnas pas bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa'i /
tādakāryaṃ karoti na /
parihīṇo 'pi saṃstatphalaviruddhāṃ kriyāṃ na karoti 		bya ba ma yin de mi byed /
yongs su nyams kyang 'bras bu de dang 'gal ba'i bya ba mi byed de /
śūrapraskhalanāpatanavat rtsal po che bred pa rdeg mi 'cha' ba bzhin no /
athendriyāṇi saṃcaratāṃ katyānantaryavimuktimārgā bhavanti yang dbang po rnams 'pho ba la bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam du dag cig skye zhe na /
vimuktyānantaryapathā navokopye mi g yo rnam grol bar chad med /
lam dgu'o /
akopyagotre pratividhyamāne pritivedhabhāvanābhavyasya navānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca bhavanti rtogs pa'i skal ba can zhig mi g yo ba'i rigs can rtogs par byed na bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu skye ste /
yathārhattvaṃ prāpnuvataḥ dper na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa bzhin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
atisevanāt /
tasya mṛdvindriyagotraṃ bhavatīti nālpena vyāvarttayituṃ śakyate /
śaikṣāśaikṣa mārgabhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt /
dṛṣṭacyāptatāyāmekaikaḥ /
dṛṣṭiprāptāyāṃ pratividhyamānāyāmeka evānantaryamārgo bhavatyeko vimuktimārgaḥ /
prayogamārgastu sarvatraika eva /
te punaḥ sarva evānantaryavimuktimārgāḥ 		dbang po rtul po'i rigs de shin tu brten phyir ro /
des dbang po rtul po'i rigs de shin tu goms par byas pa yin pas 'bad pa chung dus bzlog par mi nus te /
slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir ro /
mthong bas thob la re re'o /
mthong bas thob pa rtogs par byed na bar chad med pa'i lam gcig kho na dang rnam par grol ba'i lam gcig kho na skye'o /
sbyor ba'i lam ni thams cad du gcig kho na yin no /
bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam de dag thams cad ni /
anāsravāḥ zag med /
na hi sāsraveṇa mārgeṇāryāṇāmindriyasaṃcāraḥ 'phags pa rnams kyi dbang po ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam gyis 'pho ba med do /
kva punarindriyāṇi vardhante dbang po rnams gang du 'pho zhe na /
nṛṣu vardhanam mi yi nang du 'pho /
manuṣyeṣvevendriyasaṃcāro nānyatra mi rnams kyi nang kho nar dbang po 'pho'i gzhan du ni ma yin te /
parihāṇyasaṃbhavāt /
kaḥ punaḥ katamāṃ bhūmi niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati /
aśaikṣo nava niśritya bhūmīḥ 		yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro /
gang zhig sa gang la brten nas dbang po rnams 'pho bar byed ce na /
mi slob pa dgu la brten te /
anāgamyasyānantaraṃ catvāri dhyānāni trīṇi cārupyāṇi /
śaikṣastu ṣaṭ 		mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa gsum pa la'o /
slob pa drug la /
ārupyavarjyaḥ /
kiṃ kāraṇam 		gzugs med pa rnams ma gtogs so /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
yataḥ /
saviśeṣaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā phalamāpnoti vardhayan /
indriyāṇi hi saṃcaran phalaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ ca mṛdvindriyamārgaṃ tyaktvā tīkṣṇendriyagotrakaṃ phalamārgameva pratilabhate /
na cānāgāmiphalamārupyabhūmisaṃgṛhītamastītyetat kāraṇam 		gang gi phyir; 'phel ba 'bras bu khyad par can /
btang ste 'bras bu thob par 'gyur /
dbang po rnams 'pho ba na dbang bo rtul po'i lam gyi 'bras bu dang 'bras bu khyad par can btang ste dbang po rnon po'i rigs kyi lam gyi 'bras bu kho na 'thob par 'gyur na /
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzugs med pas bsdus pa ni med do zhes bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs yin no /
ta ete ṣaḍevārhanto nava bhavanti /
indriyabhedāt 		dgra bcom pa 'di dag thams cad ni dbang po'i bye brag las dgu kho na yin te /
kathaṃ kṛtvā ji ltar byas pas shi na /
dvau buddhau śrāvakāḥ sapta navaite navadhendriyāḥ /
katame sapta śrāvakāḥ 		sangs rgyas gnyis dang nyan thos bdun /
de dgu dbang po rnam dgu can /
nyan thos bdun gang zhe na /
parihāṇadharmādayaḥ pañca /
akopyadharmā ca dvividha uttāpanāgata āditaśca tadgotraḥ akopyabheda eva /
dvau buddhau pratyekabuddho buddhaśca 		yongs su nyams pa'i chos can la sogs pa lnga dang mi g yo ba'i chos can rnam pa gnyis te /
sbyangs pa las gyur pa dang dang po nas de'i rigs can no /
sangs rgyas gnyis ni mi g yo ba'i bye brag kho na yin te /
rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas so /
ityate mṛdumṛdvādinavaprakārendriyabhedānnava pudgalā bhavanti /
sarva eva tvāryapudgalāḥ sapta bhavanti /
śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī śraddhādhimukto dṛṣṭioprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī prajñāvimukta ubhayatovimuktaśca 		de ltar na de dag ni chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa dbang po rnam ba dgu'i bye brag gis gang zag dgu yin no /
'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ni thams cad du bdun yin te /
dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang dad pas mos pa dang mthong bas thob pa dang lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa dang shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dang gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba'o /
ete punaḥ /
prayogākṣasamāpattivimuktyubhayataḥ kṛtāḥ 		gang zag bdun po de dag kyang sbyor ba dang dbang po snyoms 'jug rnam grol dang /
pudgalāḥ sapta gnyi gas byas pa'o /
prayogataḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇau /
pūrvameva parapratyayadharmānusārābhyāmartheṣu prayogāt 		sbyor ba las ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag ste /
dang po nyid nas gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag gis don rnams la sbyor ba'i phyir ro /
indriyata śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptau dbang po las ni dad pas mos pa dang mthong bas thob pa dag ste /
mṛdutīkṣṇendriyatvāt śraddhādhimokṣaprajñādhikyataḥ dad pas mos pa dang shes rab lhag pa'i sgo nas dbang po rtul po dang rnon po yin pa'i phyir ro /
samāpattitaḥ kāyasākṣī nirodhasamāpatti sākṣātkaraṇāt /
vimuktitaḥ prajñāvimuktaḥ 		snyoms par 'jug pa las ni lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ste /
'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro /
rnam par grol ba las ni shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba'o /
samāpattivimuktitaḥ ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par grol ba las ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba'o /
nāmata ete sapta pudgalāḥ ming gi sgo nas ni gang zag de bdun yin no /
ṣaṭ tvete /
dravyatastvete ṣaṭ bhavanti /
dvau dvau mārgatraye yataḥ 		de dag drug /
rdzas su ni de dag drug yin te /
'di ltar lam gsum la gnyis gnyis /
darśanamārge hi dvau pudgalau śraddhādharmānusāriṇau /
tāveva bhāvanāmārge dvau bhavataḥ 		mthong ba'i lam la gang zag gnyis te /
dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag go /
de dag nyid bsgom pa'i lam la gnyis te /
śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptau /
tau punaraśaikṣamārge dvau bhavataḥ /
samayāsamayavimuktāviti 		dad pas mos pa dang mthong bas thob pa dag go /
de gnyis kyang mi slob pa'i lam la gnyis yin te /
dus kyis rnam par grol ba dang /
tatrendriyatastrayaḥ /
śraddhānusāriṇaḥ gotrataḥ pañca /
mārgataḥ pañcadaśa /
aṣṭa kṣāntisaptajñānasthāḥ 		dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba dag go /
de la dad pas rjes 'brang ba dbang po'i sgo nas ni gsum mo /
rigs kyi sgo nas ni lnga'o /
lam gyi sgo nas bco lnga ste /
bzod pa brgyad dang shes pa bdun la gnas pa'o /
vairāgyatastrisaptatiḥ /
sakalabandhanaḥ 		'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo nas ni bdun cu rtsa gsum ste /
kāmavairāgyānnava /
evaṃ yāvadākiñcanyāyatanavairāgyāt /
āśrayato nava /
tridvīpaṣāḍdevanikāyajāḥ /
indriyagotramārgavairāgyāśrayataḥ paṇḍitāḥ śatasahasraṃ saṃpadyante sahasrāṇi ca saptacatvāriṃśacchatāni cāṣṭau pañcaviśatiśca /
evamanye 'pi pudgalāḥ saṃbhavataḥ saṃkhyeyāḥ 		'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir dgu nas de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir gyi bar du'o /
rten gyi sgo nas ni dgu ste /
gling gsum dang lha'i ris drug tu skyes pa'o /
dbang po dang rigs dang lam dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang rten gyi sgo nas bsdoms na ni /
'bum bzhi khri bdun stong brgyad brgya nyi shu rtsa lngar 'gyur te /
gang zag gzhan dag kyang ci rigs par de bzhin du brtsi bar bya'o /
koyimubhayatobhāgavimukta ityucyate kaśca prajñāvimuktaḥ gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni gang /
shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba ni gang zhe na /
nirodhalābhyubhayatovimuktaḥ prajñayetaraḥ 'gog thob gnyi ga las rnam grol /
shes rab kyis ni cig shos so /
yo nirodhasamāpattilābhī sa ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ gang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa de ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba yin te /
prajñāsamādhibalābhyāṃ kleśavimokṣāvaraṇavimuktatvāt /
itaraḥ prajñāvimuktaḥ /
prajñābalena kevalaṃ kleśāvaraṇavimuktatvāt /
yaduktaṃ bhagavatā kleśān prahāyeha hi yastu pañca ahāryadharmā paripūrṇaḥ śaikṣa iti 		shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dag gis nyon mongs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro /
cig shos ni shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba yin te /
shes rab kyi stobs kyis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa 'ba' zhig las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro /
bcom ldan 'das kyis /
'di la gang zhig nyon mongs lnga spangs te /
mi 'phrogs chos ldan slob pa yongs su rdzogs /
zhes gang gsungs pa /
kiyatā paripūrṇaḥ śaikṣo bhavati ji tsam gyis na slob pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na /
samāpattindriyaphalaiḥ pūrṇaḥ śaikṣo 'bhidhīyate snyoms 'jug dbang po 'bras rnams kyis /
slob pa yongs rdzogs zhes bya'o /
trividhā śaikṣasya parīpūriḥ slob pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
phalataḥ indriyataḥ samāpattitaśca 'bras bu dang dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa las so /
phalata eva śraddhādhimuktasyākāyasākṣiṇo 'nāgāminaḥ phyir mi 'ong ba dad pas mos pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa ni 'bras bu kho na las so /
indriyata eva dṛṣṭiprāptasyāvītarāgasya mthong bas thob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni dbang po kho na las so /
phalendriyato dṛṣṭiprāptasya kāyasākṣiṇo 'nāgāminaḥ phyir mi 'ong ba mthong bas thob pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa ni 'bras bu dang dbang po las so /
phalasamāpattitaḥ śraddhādhimuktasya kāyasākṣiṇaḥ dad pas mos pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ni 'bras bu dang snyoms par 'jug pa kho na las so /
phalendriyasamāpattito dṛṣṭiprāptasya kāyasākṣiṇaḥ /
samāpattita eva samāpattīndriyaśca paripūrṇatvaṃ nāsti vina phalena 		mthong bas thob pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ni 'bras bu dang dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa las so /
snyoms par 'jug pa kho na dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang dbang po las yongs su rdzogs pa nyid ni mad do /
aśaikṣaparipūrṇatvaṃ dvābhyām /
indriyataḥ samāpattiśca 		gnyis kyis mi slob yongs su rdzogs /
dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa las so /
phalena tvaparipūrṇasyāśaikṣatvameva nāstīti nāsya punaḥ phalena paripūrṇaparipūrṇatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate 'bras bu yongs su ma rdzogs pa la ni mi slob pa nyid kyang med pa kho na yin pas 'di'i 'bras bu rdzogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa nyid du rnam par ma bzhag go /
indriyat evāsamayavimuktasya prajñāvimuktasya /
samāpattita eva samayavimuktasyobhayabhāgavimuktasya 		shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba ni dbang po kho na las so /
gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba dus kyis rnam par grol ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa kho na las so /
indriyasamāpattibhyāmasamayavimuktasyobhayatobhāgavimuktasya gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba ni dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag las so /
vahava ime mārgabhedā uktā laukikalokokttaradarśanabhāvanā 'śaikṣamārgāḥ prayogānantaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgā iti /
katividha eṣa samāsato mārga iti 		'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam rnams dang sbyor ba dang bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dang khyad par can gyi lam rnams zhes bya ba lam gyi bye brag mang po zhig bshad pa de dag mdor bsdu na lam rnam pa du zhig yin zhe na /
mārgaḥ samāsataḥ mdor na lam ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
viśeṣamuktyānantaryaprayogākhyaścaturvidhaḥ khyad par can dang rnam grol dang /
bar chad med dang sbyor zhes bya /
prayogamārgo yasmādanantarmānantaryamārgotpattiḥ /
ānantaryamārgo yenāvaraṇaṃ prajahāti 		sbyor ba'i lam ni gang gi mjug thogs su bar chad med pa'i lam skye ba'o /
bar chad med pa'i lam ni gang gis sgrib pa rab tu spong ba'o /
vimuktimārgo yastatpraheyāvaraṇavinirmuktastat prathamata utpadyate rnam par grol ba'i lam ni des spang bar bya ba'i sgrib pa las nges par grol pa dang po nyid du skye ba gang yin pa'o /
viśeṣamārgo ya ebhyo 'nyo mārgaḥ /
kasmāt mārga ityucyate 		khyad par can gyi lam ni de dag las gzhan pa'i lam gang yin pa'o /
ci'i phyir lam zhes bya zhe na /
eṣa hi nirvāṇasya panthā etena tadgamanāt /
nirvāṇaṃ mārgayantyaneneti vā /
vimuktiviśeṣamārga yoḥ kathaṃ mārgatvam 		de nas der 'gro ba'i phyir ram /
'dis mya ngan las 'das pa tshol ba'i phyir 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yin no /
rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam dag ji ltar na lam nyid yin zhe na /
tajjātīyādadhimātrataratvāduttarottaraprāpaṇāt nirūpadhiśeṣapraveśādvā /
mārga eva punaḥ pratipadityukto nirvāṇapratipādanāt 		de dang 'dra ba dang ches che ba yin pa'i phyir te /
gong nas gong du phyin par byed pa'i phyir ram /
phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
yang lam nyid mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir sgrub pa zhes gsungs so /
catasraḥ pratipadaḥ /
asti pratipadduḥkhā dhandhābhijñā 		lam ni bzhi ste /
mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i lam yang yod /
asti duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam yang yod de /
evaṃ sukhā 'pi dvidhā /
tatra /
dhyāneṣu mārgaḥ pratipatsukhā 		de bzhin du sla ba yang rnam pa gnyis so /
de la /
bsam gtan dag gi lam rnams sla /
caturdhyāneṣu mārgaḥ sukhā pratipadaṅgaparigraha śamathavipaśyanā samatābhyāmayiatnavāhitvāt bsam gtan bzhi'i lam ni sla ba yin te /
yan lag gis yongs su zin pa dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mnyam pa dag gis 'bad mi dgos par rang gi dang gis 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
duḥkhā 'nyabhūmiṣu sa gzhan dag gi dka' ba yin /
anyāsvanāgamyadhyānāntarārupyabhūmiṣu mārgo duḥkhā pratidaṅgāparigrahācchamathavipaśyanānyūnatvācca yatnavāhitvāt śamathanyūne hyanāgamyadhyānāntare vipaśyanānyūnā ārupyā iti mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang gzugs med pa rnams kyi lam ni /
yan lag gis yongs su ma zin pa'i phyir dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chung ba'i phyir lam dka' ba yin te /
mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can na ni zhi gnas chung ngo /
sā punardvividhā 'pi pratipat gzugs med pa dag na ni lhag mthong chung ngo /
dhanyābhijñā mṛdumateḥ kṣiprābhijñetarasya tu lam de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
blo rtul mngon shes bul ba ste /
mṛdvindriyasya sukhā duḥkhā vā pratipaddhandhābhijñā tīkṣṇendriyasya kṣiprābhijñā dhandhābhijñā asyāṃ pratipadi /
seyaṃ dhandhābhijñā /
evaṃ kṣiprābhijñā 		cig shos kyi ni mngon shes myur /
dbang po rtul po ni lam sla ba 'am dka' ba yang rung ste /
mngon par shes pa bul ba yin no /
dbang po rnon po ni mngon par shes pa myur ba yin no /
dhandhasya vā pudgalasyeyamiti dhandhābhijñā /
punarapyeṣa mārgo bodhipakṣyākhyāṃ labhate /
saptatriṃśadvodhipakṣā dharmāḥ /
catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni /
catvāri samyak prahāṇāni /
catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ 		lam nyid la mngon par shes pa bul ba yod pas na 'di ni mngon par shes pa bul ba ste /
mngon par shes pa myur ba yang de dang 'dra'o /
yang na 'di gang zag dbang po rtul po'i yin pas mngon par shes pa bul ba yin la /
pañcendriyāṇi /
pañca balāni 		yid rnon po'i yin pas mngon par shes pa myur ba'o /
sapta bodhyaṅgāni /
āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ iti 		lam 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob ste /
tatra /
anutpādakṣayajñāne bodhiḥ /
kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca /
pudgalabhedena tisro bodhaya utpadyante /
śrāvakabodhiḥ pratyekabodhiranuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti /
aśeṣāvidyāprahāṇāt /
tābhyāṃ svarthasya yathābhūta kṛtāpunaḥkartavyatāvavodhācca /
tādanulomyataḥ /
saptatriṃśattu tatpakṣyāḥ /
bodheranulomatvādbodhipakṣyāḥ saptatriṃśadutpadyante /
nāmato dravyato daśa /
daśa dravyāṇi sarve bodhipakṣyāḥ /
katamāni daśa 		byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa sum cu rtsa bdun ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par sbong ba zhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do /
de la zad dang mi skye shes pa ni /
byang chub zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa na gang zag gi bye brag gis nyan thos kyi byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang byang chub gsum zhes bya ste /
de gnyis kyis ma rig pa ma lus par spangs pa'i phyir dang rang gi don byas pa dang yang byar med pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
de dang mthun nyid phyir /
sum cu rtsa bdun de'i phyogs mthun /
byang chub dang mthun pa'i phyir ro /
ming gi sgo nas /
byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya'o /
rdzas su bcu /
byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa thams cad ni rdzas su bcu ste /
bcu gang zhe na /
śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā samādhiḥ prītyupekṣaṇe dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang /
shes rab ting 'dzin btang snyoms dga' /
praśrabdhiśīlasaṃkalpāḥ rtog dang tshul khrims shin tu sbyangs /
ityetāni daśa dravyāṇi de ltar byas na de dag ni rdzas su bcu'o /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
prajñā hi smṛtyupasthitiḥ 		ji ltar byas pas shan /
dran pa nyer gzhag shes rab ste; /
vīryaṃ samyakprahāṇākhyamṛddhipādāḥ samādhayaḥ /
prajñāvīryasamādhisvabhādhā hi smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādāḥ ata indriyāṇi tāvadvalāni ca nāmagrāhikayā śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñādravyāṇi ca smṛtyupasthānāni dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samyagṛṣṭiśca prajñaiva 		brtson 'grus yang dag 'jog ces bya /
rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ting 'dzin to /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shes rab dang brtson 'grus dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no /
de'i phyir re zhig dbang po dang stobs rnams ni ming gis smos pa dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi rdzas lnga yin te /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i lta ba ni shes rab kho na yin no /
samyakprahāṇāni vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samyagvyāyāmaśca vīryameva yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams dang brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni brtson 'grus kho na yin no /
ṛddhipādāḥ samādhisambodhyaṅgaṃ samyak samādhiśca samādhireva /
smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samyak smṛtiśca smṛtireva 		rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin kha na yin no /
dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i dran pa ni dran pa kho na yin no /
kimavaśiṣyate ci zhig lus she na /
prītiprasrabdhyupekṣasaṃbodhyaṅgāni samyaksaṃkalpaḥ śīlāṅgani ca /
tānyetāni pañca dravyāṇi evamete bodhipakṣyā daśa dravyāṇi bhavanti 		dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang tshul khrims kyi yan lag rnams dang rdzas de lnga ste /
de ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa de dag ni rdzas bcu yin no /
vaibhaṣikāṇā mekādaśa /
kāyavākkarmaṇorasaṃbhinnatvāt śīlāṅgāni dve dravye iti 		bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi ltar na lus dang ngag gi las dag tha dad cing rigs mi mthun pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi yan lag rnams rdzas gnyis yin pas rdzas bcu gcig yin no /
yattvetaduktaṃ prajñāvīryasamādhisvabhāvāḥ smṛtyupasthānādaya iti /
atra veditavyam /
pradhānagrahaṇaṃ sarve gunāḥ prāyogikāstu te /
pradhānagrahaṇenaivamuktam 		'di skad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa ni shes rab dang brtson 'grus dang ting 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa der ni /
gtso bo smos pa yin par rig par bya'o /
de dag ni /
sbyor byung yon tan kun kyang yin /
gtso bo smos pas de skad bshad kyi /
sarve tu prāyogikā guṇāḥḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādāḥ /
kasmādvīrya samyakpradhānamuktam /
tena samyakkāyavāṅmanāṃsi pradhīyante 		dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i yon tan thams cad kyang yin no /
ci'i phyir brtson 'grus la yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa zhes bshad ce na /
des lus dang ngag dang yid yang dag par 'jog pas so /
samādhiḥ kasmād ṛddhipāda uktaḥ /
tatpratiṣṭhatvātsarvaguṇasaṃpatteḥ /
ye tvāhuḥ samādhirevarddhiḥ pādāśchandādaya iti 		ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bshad ce na /
de ni yon tan thams cad sbyor ba'i rten yin pa'i phyir ro /
gang dag rdzu 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin kho na yin la /
teṣāṃ dravyatastrayodaśa bodhipakṣyāḥ prāpnuvanti /
cchandacittayoirādhikyātsūtraṃ ca virudhyate 		'dun pa la sogs pa ni rkang pa yin no zhes zer ba de dag gi ltar na ni 'dun pa dang sems dag lhag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rdzas bcu gsum du 'gyur la /
ṛddhim ca vo bhikṣavo darśayiṣyāmi ṛddhipādāṃśaca yāvadṛddhiḥ katamā dge slong dag rdzu 'phrul yang bshad pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang bshad do zhes bya ba nas /
rdzu 'phrul gang zhe na /
iha bhikṣuranekavidhamṛddhiviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati 'di na dge slong rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed cing /
eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavatīti vistaraḥ /
kasmādindriyāṇyeva valānyuktāni 		gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gsungs pa'i mdo dang yang 'gal lo /
ci'i phyir dbang po rnams kho na yang stobs rnams su bshad ce na /
mṛdvadhimātrabhedādavamardanīyānavamardanīyatvāt /
indriyāṇāṃ kiṅkṛto 'nukramaḥ 		chung ngu dang chen po'i bye brag gis rdzi ba dang rdzi ba med pa'i phyir ro /
dbang po rnams kyi go rims cis byas she na /
śraddadhāno hi phalārthaṃ vīryamārabhate dad par gyur pa ni 'bras bu'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do /
ārabdhavīryasya smṛtirūpatiṣṭhate brtson 'grus brtsams na dran pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro /
upasthitasmṛteravikṣepāccittaṃ samādhīyate dran pa nye bar gnas na rnam par mi g yeng ba'i phyir sems mnyam par 'jog go /
samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti sems mnyam par gzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes par 'gyur ro /
kasyāmavasthāyāṃ katame te bodhipakṣyāḥ prabhāvyante gnas skabs gang du byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gang zhig rab tu 'byed can bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
ādikarmikanirvedhabhāgīyeṣu prabhāvitāḥ /
bhāvane darśane caiva sapta vargā yathākramam /
ādikarmikāvasthāyāṃ kāyādyupalakṣaṇārthaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni 		sde tshan bdun ni go rigs bzhin /
las ni dang po pa dag dang /
nges 'byed cha mthun rnams dang ni /
bsgom dang mthong la rab tu phye /
las dang po pa'i gnas skabs su ni lus la sogs pa la nye bar brtag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so /
viśeṣādhigamena vīryasaṃbadhaṃnādūṣmagateṣu samyakpradhānāni khyad par thob pas brtson 'grus yang dag par spel ba'i phyir dro bar gyur pa dag la ni yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams so /
aparihāṇīyakuśalamūlapraveśatvāt mūrdhaṣvṛddhipādāḥ yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'jug pa'i phyir rtse mo dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so /
apunaḥparihāṇita ādhipatyaprāptatvāt kṣāntiṣvindriyāṇi yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i sgo nas dbang po thob pa'i phyir bzod pa dag la ni dbang po rnams so /
kleśānavamardanīyatvādgradharmeṣu balāni laukikānyadharmānavamardanīyatvādvā nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir ram /
'jig rten pa'i chos can gzhan dag gis mi brdzi ba'i phyir chos kyi mchog dag la ni stobs rnams so /
bodhyāsannatvāt bhāvanāmārge bodhyaṅgāni byang chub dang nye ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam dag la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so /
gamanaprabhāvitvāddarśanamārge mārgāṅgānī 'gro bas rab tu phye ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam la ni lam gyi yan lag rnams te /
tasyāśugāmitvāt /
saṃkhyānupūrvīvidhānārthaṃ tu pūrva saptoktāni paścādaṣṭau 		de ni myur bar 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
grangs kyi rim pa bzhin du bya ba'i phyir sngar bdun bshad la phyis brgyad bshad do /
tatra dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ ca samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni byang chub kyang yin la byang chub kyi yan lag kyang yin no /
yang dag pa'i lta ba ni lam yang yin la lam gyi yan lag kyang yin no zhes zer ro /
apare punarabhittvaiva kramaṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāmānupūrvī varṇayanti gzhan dag ni go rims ma nyams pa kho nar byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams go rims bzhin du brjod do /
ādita eva tāvadvahuvidhaviṣapavyāsekavisāriṇīnāṃ buddhīnāṃ nigrahārya smṛtyupasthānāni cetasa upanibaddhāni bhavanti yāvadeva gardhāśritānāṃ smarasaṃkalpānāṃ prativinodanāyeti sūtre vacanāt /
tadvalena vīryasaṃvardhanāccaturvidhakāryasaṃpādanāya samyakcittaṃ pradadhātīti samyakpradhānāni 		re zhig dang po kho nar yul rnam pa mang po la g yeng bar 'phro ba'i blo rnams tshar bcad pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de'i sems kyi nye bar 'dogs pa yin te /
mdo las 'di lta ste /
zhen pa la brten pa'i dran pa'i kun du rtog pa rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
de'i stobs kyis brtson 'grus yang dag par 'phel bas dgos pa rnam pa bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir sems yang dag par rab tu 'jog pas na yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams so /
tataḥ samādhiviśodhanādṛddhipādāḥ /
samādhisaṃniśrayeṇa lokottaradharmādhipatibhūtāni śraddhādīnīndriyāṇi 		de'i 'og tu ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbyong ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so /
ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par brten nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur ba'i phyir dad pa la sogs pa ni dbang po rnams so /
tānyeva ca nirjitavipakṣasamudācārāṇi balāni de dag nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs kun tu spyod pa las nges par rgyal ba ni stobs rnams so /
darśanamārge bodhyaṅgāni mthong ba'i lam la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams te /
prahamato dharmatattvāvalokāt ubhayormārgāṅgāni /
tathā hyuktam āryāṣṭāṅge khalu mārge bhāvanāparipūri gacchati 		dang po nyid du chos kyi de kho na rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
gnyi ga la ni lam gyi yan lag rnams te /
'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur na /
catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti yāvat sapta bodhyaṅgānīti /
punaścoktaṃ yathābhūtavacanārocanamiti bhikṣavaścaturṇāmāryasatyānāmetadadhivacanaṃ yathāgatena mārgeṇa prakramaṇamiti bhikṣo āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyaitadadhivacanamiti 		dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi bar du bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so /
yang dge slong yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig brjod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i tshig bla dags yin no /
dge slong ji ltar rtogs pa'i lam gyis 'jug ces bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi tshig bla dags yin no zhes gsungs so /
tasmādubhayorāryāṣṭāṅgo mārga eṣṭavyaḥ /
siddho 'nukramaḥ 		de lta bas na gnyi ga la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 'dod par bya dgos pas go rims grub pa yin no /
idaṃ tu vaktavyam /
kati bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ sāsravā iti katyanāsravā iti 		byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa du zhig ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag yin /
du zhig ni zag pa med pa dag yin zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya ste /
anāsravāṇi bodhyaṅgamārgāṅgāni byang chub yan lag lam yan lag /
zag pa med /
bhāvanādarśanamārga yostadvacyavasthāpanāt de gnyis ni bsgom pa'i lam dang mthong ba'i lam la rnam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
laukikā api hi samyagdṛṣṭacyādayaḥ santi 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa yang yod mod kyi /
te tu nāryamārgaśabdaṃ labhante de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i sgra mi 'thob po /
dvidhetare gzhan rnam gnyis so /
anye bodhipakṣāḥ sāsravāḥ /
kasyāṃ bhūmau kati bodhipakṣāḥ /
sakalāḥ prathame dhyāne /
sarve saptatriṃśatprathame dhyāne 		byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gzhan dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yang yin no /
sa gang na byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa du zhig yod ce na bsam gtan dang po na thams cad /
bsam gtan dang po na sum cu rtsa bdun po thams cad yod do /
anāgamye prītivarjitāḥ mi lcogs med na dga' ma gtogs /
kasmādanāgamye prītyabhāvaḥ /
sāmantakānāṃ balavāhanīyatvādadharabhūmisāśaṅkatvācca 		ci'i phyir mi lcogs pa med pa na dga' ba med ce na /
nyer bsdogs rnams ni stobs kyis drang dgos pa'i phyir dang sa 'og ma'i dogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro /
dvitīye 'nyatra saṃkalpāt gnyis pa na ni rtog ma gtogs /
dvitīye dhyāne samyaksaṃkalpavarjyāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadeva bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa drug kho na yod de /
tatra vitarkābhāvāt /
dvayostaddvayavarjitāḥ 		de na rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro /
gnyis na de gnyis ma gtogs pa /
tṛtīyacaturthayordhyānayoḥ prītisaṃkalpābhyāṃ varjitāḥ pañcatriṃśat /
dhyānāntare ca 		bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag na ni dga' ba dang rtog pa dag ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga yod do /
bsam gtan bar na'ang /
tābhyāmeva dvābhyāṃ varjitāḥ pañcatriṃśadeva de gnyis nyid ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga kho na yod do /
gzugs med pa /
śīlāṅgaistābhyāṃ ca triṣvarupiṣu gsum na'ang de dang mtshungs yan lag /
varjitā iti vartate ma gtogs zhes bya bar sbyar te /
ārupyesu samyagvākkarmāntājīvaiḥ prītisaṃkalpābhyāṃ ca varjitā dvātriṃśat /
kāmadhātau bhavāgre ca bodhimārgāṅgavarjitāḥ 		gzugs med pa dag na ni yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams dang dga' ba dang rtog pa dag ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do /
byang chub dang ni lam yan lag /
ma gtogs 'dod khams srid rtse na /
dvārviśatirbodhipakṣyāstayoranāsravamārgābhāvāt /
bodhipakṣeṣu vartamānasya kasyāmavasthāyāmavetyaprasādalābho veditavyaḥ 		de gnyis ni zag pa med pa'i lam med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis yod do /
byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams la gnas pa gnas skabs gang du shes nas dad pa 'thob par rig par bya zhe na /
trisatyadarśane śīladharmāvetyaprasādayoḥ bden gsum mthong na tshul khrims dang /
chos la shes nas dad pa 'thob /
lābho mārgābhisamaye buddhatatsaṃghayiorapi /
duḥkhasamudayanirodhasatyānyabhisamayan dharme cāvetyaprasādamāryakāntāni ca śīlāni pratilabhate 		lam mngon rtogs na sangs rgyas dang /
de yi dge 'dun dag la yang /
sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs na chos la shes nas dad pa dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims rnams 'thob bo /
mārgasatyamabhisamayan buddhe tasya ca śrāvakasaṃghe 'vetyaprasādaṃ pratilabhete lam gyi bden pa mngon par rtogs na sangs rgyas dang de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa 'thob ste /
yo hi tayoḥ prasādaḥ so 'śaikṣyeṣu buddhakarakeṣu dharmeṣu śaikṣāyāśaikṣeṣu ca saṃghakarakeṣu prasādaḥ gang zhig de gnyis la dad pa de ni sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos mi slob pa rnams dang dge 'dun du byed pa'i chos slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams la dad pa yin no /
api śabdācchīladharmāvetyaprasādau ca pratilabhate yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni tshul khrims dang chos la shes nas dad pa dag kyang 'thob par ston to /
ko 'yamiha dharmo 'bhipretaḥ /
dharmaḥ satyatrayaṃ bodhisattvapratyekabuddhayoḥ 		'dir gang la chos su dgongs pa yin zhe na /
chos bden gsum dang rang sangs rgyas /
mārgaśca /
ataścatvaryapi satyānyabhisamayato dharmāvetyaprasādalābhaḥ 		byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin no /
de'i phyir bden pa bzhi char yang mngon par rtogs na chos la shes nas dad pa 'thob po /
ta ete śraddhādhiṣṭhānabhedānnāmataścatvāro 'vetyaprasādā ucyante /
dravyatastu dve śraddhā śīlaṃ ca 		de dag ni dad pa'i gzhi'i bye brag las ming gi sgo nas shes nas dad pa bzhi zhes bya ba'o /
rdzas su gnyis te dad pa dang tshul khrims /
buddhadharmasaṃghāvetyaprasādāḥ śraddhāsvabhāvāḥ āryakāntāni ca śīlāni śīlamiti dve dravye bhavataḥ /
kiṃ punarete sāsravānāsravā ekāntenāvetyaprasādāḥ 		sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa rnams ni dad pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no /
'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims rnams ni tshul khrims yin pas rdzas gnyis so /
ci 'di dag zag pa dang bcas pa dag cig gam zag pa med pa dag cig yin zhe na /
shes nas dad pa rnams ni gcig tu /
nirmalā /
avetyaprasādā iti ko 'rthaḥ 		dri ma med pa yin /
shes nas dad pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
yathābhūtasatyānyavabudhya saṃpratyayo 'vetyaprasādaḥ /
yathā ca vyutthitaḥ saṃmukhīkaroti tathaiṣāmānupūrvīm /
kathaṃ vyutthitaḥ saṃmukhī karoti 		bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs nas yid ches pa ni shes nas dad pa yin no /
'di dag gi rim pa ni langs nas ji ltar mngon sum du byed pa de bzhin du bkod do /
langs nas ji ltar mngon sum byed ce na /
kye ma bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no /
de'i chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin no /
samyaksaṃbuddho vata bhagavān svākhyāto 'sya dharmavinayaḥ supratipanno 'sya śrāvakasaṃgha iti vaidyabhaiṣajyopasthāpakabhūtatvāt /
cittaprasādakṛtaśca śīlaprasāda ityucyate caturtha uktaḥ 		de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa yin no zhes bya bar mngon sum du byed de /
sman pa dang sman dang nad g yog lta bur gyur pa'i phyir ro /
sems rab tu dang bas byas pa'i tshul khrims kyang rab tu dang ba yin pas tha mar bzhi pa bshad de /
evaṃ prasannasyaiṣā pratipattiriti /
ārogyabhūtatvādvā deśika mārga sārthikayānavadvā /
sūtra uktamaṣṭābhiraṅgai samanvāgataḥ śaikṣo darśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato 'śaikṣa iti /
kasmācchaikṣasya samyak vimuktiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca noktam /
noktā vimuktiḥ śaikṣāṅga baddhatvāt 		'di ni de ltar rab tu dang bar gyur pa'i sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
yang na nad med pa lta bur gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
yang na ston par byed pa dang lam dang lam grogs dang bzhon pa lta bu yin no /
mdo las slob pa ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan no /
