mi slob pa ni yan lag bcu dang ldan no zhes gsungs pa /
ci'i phyir slob pa la yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang yang dag pa'i shes pa ma bshad ce na /
baddho hi śaikṣaḥ kleśabandhanairadyāpīti /
kathaṃ baddhasyaiva sato vimuktirvyavasthāpyeta /
na hi bandhanaikadeśānmukto mukta ityucyate /
binā ca vimuktacyā kathaṃ vimuktijñānam vyavasthāpyate /
aśaikṣastu sarvakleśabandhanātyantanirmokṣādvimuktitatpratyātmajñānābhyāṃ prabhāvita iti tasyaiva tadvacanaṃ nyāyyam 		bcings phyir slob pa'i yan lag tu /
rnam grol ma bshad /
slob pa ni da dung nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba rnams kyis bcings pa yin pas bcings bzhin du ji ltar rnam par grol bar rnam par gzhag ste 'ching ba'i phyogs gcig las grol bas ni grol zhes mi bya'o /
rnam par grol ba med par yang ji ltar rnam par grol ba'i shes pa rnam par gzhag /
mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad las gtan du nges par thar pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba dang de so so rang gi shes pa dag gis rab tu phye ba yin pas de kho na la de smos pa rig pa dang ldan pa yin no /
keyaṃ vimuktirnāma /
sā punardvidhā /
saṃskṛtā cāsaṃskṛtā ca /
tatra /
asaṃskṛtā kleśahānamadhimuktastu saṃskṛtā /
kleśaprahāṇamasaṃskṛtā vimuktiḥ /
aśaikṣādhimokṣaḥ saṃskṛtā vimuktiḥ 		rnam par grol zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
de rnam gnyis /
'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas so /
de la /
nyon mongs bcom pa 'dus ma byas /
mos pa 'dus byas nyon mongs pa spangs pa ni rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas yin no /
mi slob pa'i mos pa ni rnam par grol ba 'dus byas yin no /
sāṅgaḥ /
saivāsaṃskṛtā vimuktiraśaikṣāṅgayuktā 		yan lag ni de yin /
rnam par grol ba 'dus byas de ni mi slob pa'i yan lag tu bshad de /
aṅgānāṃ saṃskṛtatvāt /
saiva vimuktī dve /
saiva saṃskṛtā vimuktirdve vimuktī sūtra ukte 		yan lag rnams ni 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir ro /
de nyid rnam grol gnyis /
rnam par grol ba 'dus byas de nyid mdo las /
ceto vimuktiḥ prajñāvimuktiśca /
vimuktiskndho 'pi sa eva draṣṭṭavyaḥ 		sems rnam par grol ba dang shes rab rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba gnyis su gsungs te /
de nyid rnam par grol ba'i phung po yin par yang blta'o /
yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ katamacca vyāgrābodhyāyanā vimuktipariśuddhipradhānam /
iha bhikṣavo rāgāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktaṃ dveṣānmohāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktamityaparipūrṇasya vā vimuktiskandhasya paripūraye paripūrṇasya cānugrahāya cchandovīryamiti vistaraḥ /
tasmānādhimokṣa eva vimuktiḥ 		gzhan dag na re mdo las /
stag gi byang chub kyi bu dag rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa gtso bo gang yin zhe na /
'di na dge slong 'dod chags las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol ba yin /
zhe sdang dang gti mug las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol ba yin te /
'di ltar rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su ma rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'am /
yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus gang yin pa zhes rgyas par gang gsungs pa ji lta bu /
de'i phyir rnam par grol ba ni mos pa kho na yin par ma zad do /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
tattvajñānāpanīteṣu rāgādiṣu cetaso vaimalyaṃ vimuktirityapare de kho na shes pas 'dod chags la sogs pa spangs nas sems dri ma med pa nyid rnam par grol ba yin no zhes zer ro /
uktā vimuktiḥ /
samyagjñānaṃ tu samyagdṛṣṭiḥ /
vyatiriktaṃ katamat /
jñānaṃ bodhiryathoditā /
yaiva hi pūrvaṃ bodhiruktā saiveha samyagjñānaṃ veditavyam 		yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba bshad zin to /
yang dag pa'i lta ba las ma gtogs pa yang dag pa'i shes pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
byang chub ji skad bshad shes pa /
sngar byang chub ji skad du bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid 'dir yang dag pa'i shes pa yin par rig par bya ste /
yaduta kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca /
katamat punaścittaṃ vimucyate kimatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannam 		'di lta ste /
zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o /
sems gang zhig rnam par grol bar 'gyur /
ci 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa 'am da ltar byung ba yin zhe na /
vimucyate jāyamānasaśaikṣaṃ cittamāvṛteḥ /
anāgataṃ cittamutpadyamānaṃ visucyate aśaikṣamāvaraṇebhya iti śāstrapāṭhaḥ /
kiṃ punastasyāvaraṇam /
kleśaprāptistadutpattivivandhatvāt 		mi slob sems ni skye 'gyur ba /
sgrib pa las ni rnam grol 'gyur /
bstan bcos las mi slob pa'i sems ma 'ongs pa sgrib pa rnam las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo /
de'i sgrib pa yang gang zhe na /
nyon mongs pa'i thob pa yin te /
vajropame hi samādho sa ca prahīyate de skye ba la bgegs byed pa'i phyir ro /
taccotpadyamānamaśaikṣaṃ cittaṃ vimucyate /
sā ca prahīṇā bhavati 		rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe de yang slong bar 'gyur la mi slob pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro /
tacāśaikṣaṃ cittamutpannaṃ vimuktaṃ ca de spangs nas ni mi slob pa'i sems de yang skyes pa dang rnam par grol ba yin no /
yattarhi notpadyamānaṃ laukikaṃ ca /
tadapi vimucyate /
yattu niyatamutpattau tadevoktam 		'o na skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang 'jig rten pa gang yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
de dag kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur mod kyi skye bar nges pa gang yin pa de kho na bshad do /
laukikaṃ kuto vimucyate /
tata evotpattyāvaraṇāt /
nanu cāmuktasyāpi śaikṣasya laukikamutpadyate na tattādṛśam 		gang las 'jig rten pa rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhe na /
skye ba'i sgrib pa de nyid las so /
ma grol ba la yang 'jig rten pa'i skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
de ni de dang mi 'dra'o /
kīdṛśaṃ tat de ci 'dra zhe na /
kleśaprāptisahitam /
kimavastho mārgastadutpattyāvaraṇaṃ prajahāti 		nyon mongs pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig pa yin no /
gnas skabs gang yin pa'i lam gyis de skye ba'i sgrib pa spong zhe na /
nirudhyamāno mārgastu prajahāti tadāvṛtim 'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis ni /
de yi sgrib pa rab tu spong /
vartamāna ityarthaḥ /
yā cāsaṃskṛtā vimuktiruktā ye ca trayodhātava ucyante prahāṇadhāturviṃrāgadhātunirodhadhāturiti /
ka eṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
asaṃskṛtaiva dhātvākhyā /
saivāsaṃskṛtā vimuktistrayo dhātavaḥ /
tatra punaḥ 		de ltar gyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas su bshad pa gang yin pa dang khams gsum po spangs pa'i khams dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams dang 'gog pa'i khams zhes 'byung ba gang yin de dag la khyad par ci yod ce na /
'dus ma byas nyid khams zhes bya /
rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas de nyid khams gsum yin no /
de la /
virāgo rāgasaṃkṣayaḥ 'dod chags kun zad 'dod chags bral /
rāgasya prahāṇaṃ virāgadhātuḥ 'dod chags spangs pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams yin no /
prahāṇadhāturanyeṣāṃ spangs pa'i khams ni gzhan dag go /
saṃkṣaya iti vartate yang dag par zad pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
rāgādanyeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ prahāṇadhātuḥ 'dod chags las gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa ni spangs pa'i khams yin no /
nirodhākhyastu vastunaḥ /
saṃkṣaya ityevānuvartate 		'gog pa'i khams zhes bya ba gzhi /
yang dag par zad pa zhes bya ba kho nar sbyar te /
kleśanirmuktasya vastunaḥ prahāṇaṃ nirodhadhātuḥ nyon mongs pa las ma gtogs pa bzhi spangs pa ni 'gog pa'i khams yin no /
yena vastu nirvidyate virajyate 'pi tena vastunā /
catuṣkoṭikam 		dngos po gang gis yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po des 'dod chags dang bral bar yang 'gyur ram zhe na /
mu bzhi'o /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
nirvidyate duḥkhahetukṣāntijñānaiḥ 		ji ltar byas pas she na /
sdug bsngal rgyu bzod shes rnams kyis /
duḥkhe samudayakṣāntijñānaireva nirvidyate nānyaiḥ /
virajyate /
sarvairjahāti yaiḥ /
sarvairapi duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga kṣāntijñānairvirajyate /
yaiḥ kleśān prajahāti 		yid 'byung sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kho nas yid 'byung bar 'gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no /
gang gis spong 'gyur ba /
kun gyis 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur /
sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam la bzod pa dang shes pa gang dag gis nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyis kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro /
evaṃ catuṣkoṭikasaṃbhavaḥ de lta na ni mu bzhi srid; de lta na mu bzhir grub ste /
evaṃ catuṣkotikaṃ sidhyati /
nirvidyata eva duḥkhasamudayakṣāntijñānaiḥ /
kleśān prajahat nirvedavastvālambanatvāt 		sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag mi spong na yid 'byung ba kho na yin te /
yid 'byung ba'i dngos po kho na la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
virajyata eva nirodhamārgakṣāntijñānaiḥ kleśān prajahat /
prāmodyavastvālambanatvāt 		'gog pa dang lam la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag spong na 'dod chags dang bral ba kho na yin te /
mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
ubhayaṃ pūrvaiḥ kleśān prajahat snga ma rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag spong na gnyi ga yin no /
nobhayamuttaraiḥ kleśānaprajahaditi /
tatra vītarāgaḥ satyāni paśyandharmajñānakṣāntibhiḥ kleśānna prajahāti /
jñānaistu prayogavimuktiviśeṣamārgasaṃgṛhītairna prajahātīti /
abhidharmakośabhāṣye mārgapudgalanirdeśo nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti 		phyi ma rnams kyis nyon mongs bdag mi spong na gnyi ga ma yin no /
de la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig bden pa rnams la lta na chos shes pa dang bzod pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag mi spong ngo /
shes pa rnams kyis ni sbyor ba dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam gyis bsdus pa rnams kyis mi spong ngo /
chos mngon pa mdzod kyi bshad pa las lam dang gang zag bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas drug pa'o /
saptamaṃ kośasthānam bzod pa rnams zhes kyang 'byung /
namo buddhāya /
kṣāntayaścocyante jñānāni ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca /
kiṃ punaḥ kṣāntayo na jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ ca na dṛṣṭiḥ 		shes pa rnams zhes kyang 'byung /
yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes kyang 'byung /
yang dag pa'i shes pa zhes kyang 'byung na ci bzod pa dag yin la shes pa ma yin nam /
yang dag pa'i shes pa yin la yang dag pa'i lta ba ma yin nam zhe na /
nāmalā kṣāntayo jñānaṃ /
tatpraheyasya vicikitsā 'nuśayasyāgrahīṇatvāt 		dri med bzod rnams shes pa yin /
des spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas the tshom ma spangs pa'i phyir ro /
dṛṣṭayastu tā santiraṇātmakattvāt yathā ca kṣāntayo dṛṣṭirna jñānamevaṃ punaḥ /
kṣayānutpādadhīrna dak /
kṣayānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca na dṛṣṭirasantīraṇāparimārgaṇāśayatvāt /
tadnyobhayathāryā dhīḥ /
kṣāntikṣayānutpādajñānebhyo 'nyā 'nāsravā prajñā dṛṣṭiḥ jñānaṃ ca 		de dag yang dag par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir lta ba dag yin no /
ji ltar bzod pa rnams lta ba yin gyi shes pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
zad dang mi skye'i blo lta min /
zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa med pa dang yongs su 'tshol ba'i bsam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir lta ba ma yin no /
de las gzhan 'phags blo gnyi ga /
bzod pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag las gzhan pa zag pa med pa'i shes rab ni lta ba dang shes pa yang yin no /
anyā jñānaṃ /
laukikī prajñā sarvaiva jñānam /
dṛśaśca ṣaṭ /
pañca dṛṣṭayo laukikī ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ /
eṣā ṣaḍvidhā laukikī prajñādṛṣṭiḥ anyā na dṛṣṭiḥ /
jñānaṃ tveṣā cānyā ca /
kiyatā sarvajñānasaṃgrahaḥ 		gzhan shes 'jig rten pa'i shes rab thams cad ni shes pa kho na yin no /
drug ni lta ba'ang yin /
lta ba lnga dang 'jig rten pa'i lta ba yang dag pa'i lta ba ste /
'jig rten pa'i shes pa rnam pa drug ni lta ba yin gyi gzhan ni lta ba ma yin no /
'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang shes pa ni ma yin no /
ji snyed cig gis shes pa thams cad bsdus she na /
daśabhirjñānaiḥ /
samāsena tu /
sāsravānāsravaṃ jñānaṃ 		shes pa bcus bsdus so /
mdor bsdu na ni gnyis te /
shes pa zag bcas zag pa med /
tayoḥ punaḥ /
ādyaṃ saṃvṛtijñāpakam 		de gnyis las kyang /
dang po kun rdzob ces bya'o /
yatsāsravaṃ tatsaṃvṛtijñānam /
prāyeṇa ghaṭapaṭastrīpuruṣādisaṃvṛtigrahāt /
ajñānasaṃvṛtatvāt ityapare /
anāsravaṃ dvidhā dharmajñānamanvayameva ca 		zag pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni phal cher bum pa dang snam bu dang skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa kun rdzob 'dzin pa'i phyir kun rdzob shes pa yin no /
zag med rnam gnyis chos dang ni /
rjes su shes pa kho na yin /
zag pa med pa'i shes pa la rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
anāsrvaṃ jñānaṃ dvidhā bhidyate chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa'o /
dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ ca /
evagete dve jñāne trīṇi bhavanti /
saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dharmajñānaṃ ca /
tatra /
sāṃvṛtaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ 		de ltar na shes pa 'di gnyis ni gsum yin te /
kun rdzob shes pa dang chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa'o /
de la /
kun rdzob yul ni thams cad do /
saṃvṛtijñānasya sarvadharmāḥ saṣkṛtāsaṃskṛtā ālambanaṃ saṃbhavataḥ kun rdzob shes pa'i dmigs pa ni ci rigs par 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad yin no /
kāmaduḥkhadigocaram chos shes bya ba'i spyod yul ni /
dharmakhyam /
dharmajñānasya kāmāvacaraṃ dukhaṃ tatsamudayanirodhapratipakṣāścālambanam 		'dod pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa /
chos shes pa'i dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang de kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams yin no /
anvayajñānaṃ tūrdhvaduḥkhādigocaram /
anvayajñānasya rūpārupyāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ tatsamudayanirodhapratipakṣāścālambanam /
te eva satyabhedena catvāri /
te eva dharmajñānānvayajñāne satyabhedena punaścatvāri jñānāni bhavanti /
duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānāni /
tadālambanatvāt 		rjes su shes pa'i spyod yul ni /
gong ma'i sdug bsngal la sogs yin /
rjes su shes pa'i dmigs pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang de kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams so /
de dag nyid bden bye brag gis /
bzhi ste /
chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa de dag nyid bden pa'i bye brag gis sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams dang shes pa bzhi yin te /
de dag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
ete caturvidhe /
anutpādakṣayajñāne /
ete eva dharmajñānānvayajñāne caturvidhe adṛṣṭisvabhāve kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ cocyate 		rnam bzhi de dag ni /
mi skye ba dang zad pa shes /
chos dang rjes su shes pa lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa rnam pa bzhi po de dag kho nar zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa zhes bya'o /
te punaḥ prathamodite /
duḥkhahetvanvayajñāne /
prathamotpanne tu kṣayajñānānutpādajñāne duḥkhasamudayānvayajñāne duḥkhasamudayākārairbhāvāgrikaskandhālambanatvāt 		de gnyis dang po skyes pa ni /
sdug bsngal rgyu rjes shes pa yin /
zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang po skyes pa ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin te /
srid pa'i rtse mo'i phung po la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
kim khalu vajropamo 'pi tābhyāmekālamvano 'sti yang ci rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de gnyis dang dmigs pa gcig pa zhig yin nam zhe na /
yadi duḥkhasamudayālamvano bhavati gal te sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la dmigs na ni yin no /
atha nirodhamārgālambano naikālambanaḥ 'on te 'gog pa dang lam la dmigs pa zhig yin na ni dmigs pa gcig pa ma yin no /
caturbhyaḥ paracittavit bzhi las pha rol sems rig pa /
vettīti vit jñānam /
paracittajñānaṃ caturbhyo jñānebhyo draṣṭavyam 		rig par byed pas na rig pa ste shes pa'o /
pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni shes pa bzhi las skye bar blta bar bya ste /
dharmānvayajñānamārgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānebhyaḥ /
tasya punarayaṃ niyamaḥ 		chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang lam shes pa dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams las so /
de'i nges pa ni 'di yin te /
bhūmyakṣapudgalotkrāntam naṣṭājātaṃ na veti tat des ni sa dbang gang zag 'das /
zhig dang ma skyes mi rig go /
bhūmyatikrāntaṃ na jānātīti /
adharadhyānabhūmikenottaradhyānabhūmikamindriyātikrāntaṃ na jānāti /
śraddhādhimuktasamayamuktamārgeṇa dṛṣṭiprāptāsamayavimuktārga pudgalotkrāntaṃ na jānāti 		sa 'das pa mi shes pa ni bsam gtan 'og ma'i sa pas bsam gtan gong ma'i sa pa mi shes pa'o /
dbang po 'das pa mi shes pa ni dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam mi shes pa'o /
anāgāmyahañcchāvaka pratyekabuddhabuddhamārggaṇāmadhareṇottaraṃ naṣṭājātaṃ na jānāti gang zag 'das pa mi shes pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi lam rnams 'og mas gong ma mi shes pa'o /
atītānāgataṃ vartamānapara cittacaittaviṣayatvāt /
kiṃ ca bhūyaḥ 		zhig pa dang ma skyes pa mi shes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa mi shes pa ste /
da ltar gyi pha rol gyi sems yul yin pa'i phyir ro /
ta dharmānvayadhīpakṣyamanyo 'nyaṃ gzhan yang chos rjes blo phyogs phan tshun min /
dharmajñānapakṣyaṃ paracittajñānamanvayajñānapakṣyaṃ cittaṃ na jānāti pha rol gyi sems shes pa chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pas kyang rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems mi shes la /
anvayajñānapakṣyaṃ ca dharmajñānapakṣyaṃ na jānāti rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pas kyang chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems mi shes te /
kāmadhāturdhvadhātupratikṣālambanatvāttayoḥ /
darśanamārge paracittajñānaṃ nāsti /
tadālambanaṃ tvasti /
tatra paracittajñānena darjñanamārga jñātukāmaḥ prayogaṃ kṛtvā prathamau 		de gnyis ni 'dod pa'i khams dang khams gong ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
mthong ba'i lam la pha rol gyi sems shes pa med do /
de'i dmigs pa ni yod de /
de la pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba'i lam shes par 'dod pas sbyor ba byas na /
darśanakṣaṇau /
śrāvako vetti khaṅgastrīn sarvānbuddho 'prayogataḥ /
śrāvako darśanamārgāt paracittajñānena dvau kṣaṇau jānāti /
duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ dharmajñānaṃ ca /
anvayajñānapakṣālambanasyānyaprayogasādhyatvāt /
yāvacca sa tatra prayogamāra mate tāvadayaṃ ṣoḍaśacittamanuprāpto bhavatītyantarā na jānāti 		nyan thos mthong ba'i skad cig gnyis /
rig ste bse ru lta bus gsum /
sangs rgyas sbyor ba med par kun /
nyan thos kyis ni pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba'i lam las skad cig ma gnyis shes te /
sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang chos shes pa'o /
rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa la dmigs pa ni sbyor ba gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir de ji srid kyis sbyor ba rtsom pa de srid gyis [*kyis] des sems bcu drug rjes su 'thob par 'gyur bas bar du ni mi shes so /
pratyekabuddhastrīn kṣaṇān /
prathamau ca dvāvaṣṭamaṃ ca samudayānvayajñānaṃ mṛduprayogatvāt 		rang sangs rgyas kyis ni dang po gnyis dang brgyad pa kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa dang gsum shes te /
sbyor ba chung ba'i phyir ro /
prathamadvitīyapañcadaśānityapare /
buddhastu sarvāneva darśanamārgakṣaṇānaprayogeṇa jānāti /
atha kṣayajñānānutpādajñānayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ 		gzhan dag na re dang po dang gnyis pa dang bco lnga pa rnams shes so zhes zer ro /
sangs rgyas kyis ni sbyor ba med par mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma thams cad mkhyen to /
yang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag la khyad par ci yod ce na /
kṣayajñānaṃ hi satyeṣu parijñātādiniścayaḥ zad pa shes pa bden rnams la /
yongs shes la sogs nges pa'o /
na parijñeyamityādiranutpādamatirmatā yongs shes byar med ces la sogs /
mi skye ba yi blor 'dod do /
bstan bcos las /
kṣayajñānaṃ katamat zad pa shes pa gang zhe na /
duḥkhaṃ me parijñātamiti jānāti /
samudayaḥ prahīṇo nirodhaḥ sākṣātakṛto mārgo bhāvita iti jānāti /
tadupādāya yat jñānaṃ darśanaṃ vidyā buddhirbodhiḥ prajñā āloko 'bhisamayamidamucyate kṣayajñānam /
anutpādajñānaṃ katamat 		bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes bya bar shes pa dang kun 'byung spangs so /
'gog pa mngon du byas so /
lam bsgoms so zhes bya bar shes pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i shes pa dang mthong ba dang rig ba dang blo dang rtogs pa dang shes rab dang snang ba dang mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa 'di ni zad pa shes pa zhes bya'o /
mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na /
duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na pounaḥ parijñeyamiti jānāti yāvat mārgo bhāvito na punarbhāvayitavya iti /
tadupādāyeti vistareṇoktaṃ śāstre 		bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes te /
yang yongs su shes par byar med do zhes bya bar shes pa nas bdag gis lam bsgoms te yang bsgom du med do zhes bya ba'i bar du shes pa de'i rgyu las byung ba'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo /
kathamanāsraveṇa jñānenaivaṃ jānāti /
tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena vyutthita evaṃ jānāti 		ji ltar na zag pa med pa'i shes pas de ltar shes she na /
kha che ba rnams na re bstan bcos las /
de'i rjes la langs bas de ltar shes te /
atastadviśeṣeṇa tayorviśeṣaḥ /
śāstre jñāpiota iti kāśmīrāḥ 		de'i phyir de'i bye brag gis de gnyis kyi bye brag bstan to zhes zer ro /
anāsraveṇāpyevaṃ jānātītyapare darśanavacanaṃ tu bhāṣyākṣepāt gzhan dag na re zag pa med pas kyang de ltar shes te /
mthong ba smos pa ni bshad pa 'phangs pa'i phyir ram /
jpratyakṣavṛttitvādvā /
ata evoktaṃ yāvat jñānaṃ darśanamapi taditi /
ityetāni daśa jñānāni bhavanti yaduta dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayañṇyānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca /
tatra saṃvṛtijñānamekaṃ jñānamekasya ca bhāgaḥ 		yang na mngon sum du 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir re zhig shes pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba yang yin no zhes 'byung ngo zhes zer ro /
de ltar na de dag ni shes pa bcu yin te /
'di lta ste chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang kun rdzob shes pa dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang sdug bsngal shes pa dang kun 'byung shes pa dang 'gog pa shes pa dang lam shes pa dang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o /
dharmajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ saptānāṃ ca bhāgaḥ de la kun rdzob shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la gcig gi cha yang yin no /
duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga kṣayānutpādaparacittajñānānām chos shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bdun gyi cha yang yin te /
evamanvayajñānam /
duḥkhajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ caturṇā ca bhāgaḥ /
dharmānvayakṣayānutpādajñānānām /
evaṃ samudayanirodhajñāne caturṇāṃ bhāgaḥ 		rjes su shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
sdug bsngal shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bzhi'i cha yang yin te /
kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa shes pa de dang 'dra'o /
mārgajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ pañcānāṃ ca bhāgaḥ /
caturṇāmanantaroktānāṃ paracittasya ca /
paracittajñanamekaṃ jñānaṃ caturṇāṃ ca bhāgaḥ /
dharmānvayamārga saṃvṛtijñānānām /
kṣayajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ca bhāgaḥ /
dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānām /
evamanutpādajñānam /
kasmāt punaretāni vīṇi santi daśa vyavasthāpyante /
svabhāvapratipakṣānyāmākārākāragocarāt /
prayogakṛtakṛtyatvahetūpacayoto daśa 		lam shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la lnga'i cha yang yin no /
pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bzhi'i cha yang yin no /
zad pa ni shes pa gcig yin la /
drug gi cha yang yin te /
mi skye ba shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
ci'i phyir de dag gsum yod la bcur rnam par gzhag ce na /
rang bzhin dang ni gnyen po dang /
rnam pa rnam pa spyod yul dang /
sbyor dang bya ba byas nyid dang /
rgyu rgyas pa las bcu yin no /
saptabhiḥ kila kāraṇairdaśa jñānāni vyavasthāpyante rgyu bdun gyis shes pa bcur rnam par gzhag go zhes grag ste /
svabhāvataḥ saṃvṛtijñānamaparamārthajñānatvāt rang bzhin las ni kun rdzob shes pa ste /
don dam pa mi shes pa'i phyir ro /
pratipakṣato dharmānvayajñāne gnyen po las ni chos dang rjes su shes pa dag ste /
kāmathāturdhvadhātupratipakṣatvāt 'dod pa'i khams dang khams gong ma'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro /
ākārato duḥkhasamudayajñāne /
ālambanābhedāt /
ākārālambanato nirodhamārgajñāne 		rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba shes pa dag ste /
dmigs pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro /
rnam pa dang dmigs pa las ni 'gog pa dang lam shes pa dag ste /
ākārālambanabhedāt /
prayogataḥ paracittajñānam /
na hi tena caittā na jñāyate /
cittajñānārthe tu prayuktasyābhiniṣpatteḥ paracittajñānamuktam 		rnam pa dang dmigs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
sbyor ba las ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa ste /
des ni sems las byung ba rnams kyang mi shes pa ma yin mod kyi sems shes par bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba byas pa las grub pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bshad do /
bya ba byas pa las ni zad pa shes pa ste /
kṛtakṛtyataḥ kṣayajñānaṃ kṛtakṛtyasaṃtānotpatteḥ bya ba byas pa'i rgyud la dang po nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro /
prathamataḥ hetūpacayato 'nutpādajñānaṃ sarvānāsravahetukatvāditi rgyu rgyas pa las ni mi skye ba shes pa ste /
zag pa med pa'i shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro /
sakalasya sakalapratipakṣatvāt kāmadhātupratīpakṣo dharmajñānamityuktam /
api tu /
dharmajñānanirodhe yanmārge vā bhāvanāpathe 		thams cad kyi gnyen po thams cad yin pa'i phyir /
chos shes pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po zhes bshad par zad kyi gzhan yang /
bsgom pa'i lam la 'gog pa'am /
lam la chos shes gang yin pa /
tridhātupratipakṣastat /
nirodhamārgajñāne bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhīte tridhātupratipakṣaḥ 		khams gsum gyi ni gnyen po yin /
'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa bsgom pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa dag ni khams gsum char gyi gnyen po yin no /
kāmadhātostu nānvayam 'dod pa'i khams kyi rjes ma yin /
anvayajñānam tu sarvathā nāsti kāmadhātuporatipakṣaḥ /
eṣāṃ daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ 		'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po rjes su shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad du med do /
shes pa bcu po de dag las /
dharmajñānānvayajñānaṃ ṣoḍḍaśākāram chos shes pa dang rjes su shes /
rnam pa bcu drug /
tān purastādupadekṣyāmaḥ de dag ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o /
anyathā /
tathā ca sāṃvṛtaṃ 		kun rdzob ni /
de bzhin gzhan du'ang /
saṃvṛtijñānaṃ ṣoḍaśākāramanyathākāraṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇādigrahaṇāt kun rdzob shes pa ni rnam pa bcu drug can yang yin la gzhan gyi rnam pa can yang yin te /
chos thams cad kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiścatuṣṭayam rang rang gi bden pa'i rnam pas bzhi yin no /
duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga jñānāni svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiḥ pravartanta ityekaikaṃ caturākāraṃ bhavanti /
tathā paramatojñānaṃ nirmalaṃ 		sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams ni rang rang gi bden pa'i rnam pa dag tu 'jug pas re re zhing rnam pa bzhi bzhi yin no /
pha rol yid shes dri med kyang /
anāsravaṃ paracittajñānaṃ tatheva /
svasatyākāratvāccuturākāraṃ mārgajñānatvāt 		de bzhin pha rol gyi sems shes pa zag pa med pa yang de bzhin kho nar rang gi bden pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi can yin te /
lam shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
samalaṃ punaḥ dri ma dang bcas ni /
śeyasvalakṣaṇākāraṃ shes bya'i rang gi mtshan nyid rnams /
sāsravaṃ paracittajñānaṃ jñeyānāṃ cittacaittānāṃ yat svalakṣaṇam tadākārayati pha rol gyi sems shes pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni shes bya sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de'i rnam pa 'dzin te /
svalakṣaṇagrāhakatvāt /
labhayamapi tu /
ekaikadravyagocaram 		rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
gnyi ga yang /
rdzas re re zhig spyod yul lo /
yadā cittaṃ gṛhlāti na tadā cittānāṃ yadā vedanāṃ na tadā saṃjñāmityevamādi gang gi tshe sems 'dzin pa de'i tshe sems las byung ba rnams mi 'dzin la /
gang gi tshe tshor ba 'dzin pa de'i tshe 'du shes mi 'dzin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
yattarhi bhagavatīktam sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātītyevamādi /
na tayordugapadgrahaṇam /
vastramalāyugāpadgrahaṇavat 		'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
de gnyis cig car du 'dzin pa ni ma yin te /
gos dang dri ma cig car du mi 'dzin pa bzhin no /
sarāgaṃ cittamiti dvidhā sarāgatā /
saṃsṛṣṭasarāgatā saṃyoiga sarāgatā ca /
tatra sarāgaṃ saṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ dvābhyāṃ sarāgaṃ tato 'nyatsāsravaṃ saṃyogasarāgatayā sarāgam 		'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid rnam pa gnyis te /
'dres pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid do /
de la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni gnyis kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no /
de las gzhan pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pas na 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no /
atra tu sūtre rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ sarāgaṃ rāgapratipakṣī vigatarāgamityeke /
yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syādanyakleśasamprayuktamapi syāt 		kha cig na re mdo 'dir ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin la /
'dod chags kyi gnyen por ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bshad pa yin te /
gal te 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na ni nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
evaṃ tarhi tadapratipakṣaḥ sāsravaṃ cittamakliṣṭaṃ naiva sarāgaṃ na vigatarāgaṃ syādityevamādi /
tasmādrāgasaṃprayuktatayā 'pi sarāgaṃ cittamatreṣṭavyamityapare 		gzhan dag na re de lta na ni 'o na de'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma yin la /
'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par 'gyur bas /
de lta bas na mdo 'dir 'dod chags dang ldan pas kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su 'dod par bya ste /
evaṃ yāvatsamohaṃ vigatamohaṃ ca veditavyam /
saṃkṣiptaṃ kuśalamālambanābhisaṃkṣepāt /
vikṣiptaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vikṣepasaṃprayogāt /
saṃkṣiptaṃ middhasaṃprayuktaṃ vikṣiptamanyata kliṣṭamiti pāścāttyāḥ /
tadetanna varṇayanti /
tadeva hi cittaṃ saṃkṣiptavikṣiptaṃ syāt kliṣṭamiddhasaṃprayīgāt /
śāstravirodhaśca syāt 		gti mug dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bral ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o zhes zer ro /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re kun du bsdus pa ni dmigs pa la mngon par sdud pa'i phyir dge ba yin no /
rnam par g yeng ba ni rnam par g yeng ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no zhes zer ro /
nub phyogs pa rnams na re kun tu bsdus pa ni gnyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no /
rnam par g yeng ba ni nyon mongs pa can gzhan yin no zhes zer ro /
de skad du mi brjod de /
nyon mongs pa can gyi gnyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir sems de nyid bsdus pa yang yin la rnam par g yengs pa yang yin par 'gyur ro /
bstan bcos las /
saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sems kun du bsdus pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so /
tajjñānaṃ catvāri jñānāni dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ mārgajñānamiti de shes pa'i shes pa ni bzhi ste /
chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang kun rdzob shes pa dang lam shes pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro /
līnaṃ cittaṃ kliṣṭaṃ kauśīdyasaṃprayogāt sems zhum pa ni le lo dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa yin no /
pragṛhītaṃ kuśalaṃ vīryasaṃprayogāt rab tu bzung ba ni brtson 'grus dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dge ba yin no /
parītāṃ kliṣṭaṃ vyavadānaparīttairniṣevitatvāt chung ngu ni rnam par byang ba chung du dag gis bsten pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no /
mahadgataṃ kuśalaṃ tadviparyayāt /
mūlamūlyaparivārānuparivartakavalālpavahutvācca 		chen por gyur pa ni de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no /
rtsa ba dang rin dang 'khor dang rjes su 'brang ba dang stobs che chung gi yang phyir te /
kliṣṭacittaṃ dvābhyāmakuśalamūlābhyāṃ samulam nyon mongs pa can ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis kyis rtsa ba dang bcas pa yin no /
kuśalaṃ tribhiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ dge ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum gyis so /
kliṣṭamalpamūlyamayatnasādhyatvāt /
kuśalaṃ bhumūlyaṃ vahābhisaṃskārasādhyatvāt /
kliṣṭaṃ tajjātīyānāgatabhāvanā 'bhāvānna mahāparivāraṃ tribhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam /
kuśalaṃ tu mahāparivāraṃ caturbhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam /
alpabalaṃ khalvapi kliṣṭaṃ bahubalaṃ kuśalam 		nyon mongs pa can ni 'bad pas bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir rin chung ba yin no /
dge ba ni tshogs chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rin che ba yin no /
nyon mongs pa can ni de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa 'thob pa'i phyir 'khor mang ba ma yin la phung po gsum gyis rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa yin no /
dge ba ni 'khor mang ba yin la phung po bzhis rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa yin no /
yang nyon mongs pa can ni stobs chung ba yin no /
ekayā hi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyā daśānuśayātyantasamudghātaḥ kriyate /
tasmādapi kliṣṭam parīttaṃ kuśalaṃ mahadgatam 		dge ba ni stobs che ba yin no /
sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa gcig gis kyang phra rgyas bcu gtan du 'joms par byed pas de'i phyir yang nyon mongs pa ni chung ba yin la dge ba ni chen por gyur pa yin no /
uddhataṃ kliṣṭamauddhatyasaṃprayogāt rgod pa ni rgod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no /
anuddhataṃ kukśalaṃ tatpratipakṣatvāt rgod pa ma yin pa ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no /
evamabyupaśāntṃ vyupaśāntaṃ ca rnam par ma zhi ba dang rnam par zhi ba yang de dang 'dra'o /
asamāhitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vikṣepasaṃprayogāt /
samāhitaṃ kuśalaṃ tatpratipakṣatvāt 		mnyam par ma bzhag pa ni rnam par g yeng ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can no /
mnyam par bzhag pa ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no /
abhāvitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ pratilambhatiṣevaṇabhāvanābhyāmabhāvitatvāt /
bhāvitaṃ kuśalaṃ tābhyāṃ bhāvitatvāt vimuktaṃ kliṣṭaṃ svabhāvasaṃtānavimuktibhyāmavimuktatvāt /
vimuktaṃ kuśalaṃ tābhayaṃ vimuktatvāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /
evaṃ tu sūtraṃ nānulomitaṃ bhavati 		ma bsgoms pa ni 'thob pa dang bsten pa'i bsgom pa dag gis ma bsgoms pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can no; /
bsgoms pa ni de gnyis kyis bsgoms pa'i phyir dge ba yin no /
rnam par ma grol ba ni rang bzhin dang rgyud rnam par ma grol ba dag gis rnam par grol ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no /
rnam par grol ba ni de gnyis kyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dge ba yin no zhes zer ro /
de lta na ni mdo dang mi mthun par byas pa yang yin la /
eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavati /
sūtra uktaṃ kathaṃ cittamadhyātmaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ bhavati 		tshig de rnams kyi don gyi khyad par yang ma bshad pa yin no /
ji ltar na mdo dang mi mthun par byas pa yin zhe na /
mdo las ji ltar na sems nang du kun du bsdus pa yin zhe na /
yaccittam styānamiddhasahagatamadhyātmaṃ saṃnirodhasahagataṃ no tu vipaśyanayā samanvāgatam sems gang rmugs pa dang gnyid dang lhan cig par gyur cing nang du kun du 'gog pa dang lhan cig par gyur la lhag mthong dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa yin no /
kathaṃ vahirvikṣiptaṃ bhavati ji ltar na phyi rol du rnam par g yengs pa yin zhe na /
yaccittaṃ pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣvanuvikṣiptaṃ bhavatyanuvisṛtamiti /
nanu coktaṃ tadeva cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ syādvikṣiptaṃ ceti 		sems gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la rjes su g yengs pa yin zhing rnam par 'phros pa yin no zhes gsungs so /
sems de nyid kun du bsdus pa yin la rnam par g yengs pa yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad pa yin nam zhe na /
uktamidamayuktaṃ tūktaṃ viddhasahagatasya kliṣṭasya vikṣiptatvāpratijñānāt /
nanu coktaṃ śāstravirodhaḥ syāditi 		de skad du ni bshad mod kyi rigs par bshad pa ni ma yin te /
nyon mongs pa can gyi gnyid dang lhan cig par gyur ba rnam par g yengs pa nyid du dam ma bcas pa'i phyir ro /
bstan bcos dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad pa ma yin nam /
varaṃ śāstravirodho na sūtravirīdhaḥ bstan bcos dang 'gal ba ni bla'i mdo dang 'gal ba ni ma yin no /
kathameṣāṃ padānāṃ nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavati ji ltar na tshig de rnams kyi don gyi khyad par ma bshad pa yin zhe na /
vikṣiptalilinoddhatāvyupaśāntāsamāhitābhāvitāvimuktānāṃ cittānāmabhinnalakṣaṇavacanāt saṃkṣiptapragṛhītādīnāṃ ca /
na vai noktaḥ padānāmarthaviśeṣo bhavati /
kliṣṭasāmānye 'pi taddoṣasaṃdarśanāt /
ityapyetat kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnamiti vistaraḥ /
evaṃ kuśalasyāpi guṇaviśeṣasaṃdarśanādukta evarthaviśeṣo bhavati 		sems rnam par g yengs pa dang zhum pa dang rgod pa dang rnam par ma zhi ba dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang ma bsgoms pa dang rnam par ma grol ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang tha mi dad par bshad pa'i phyir la /
kun du bsdus pa dang rab tu bzung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang tha mi dad par bshad pa'i phyir ro /
tshig rnams kyi don gyi khyad par ni ma bshad pa ma yin pa nyid de /
nyon mongs pa can du mtshungs kyang 'di ltar sems nyon mongs pa can 'di ni rnam par g yengs pa yin no /
'di ni zhum pa yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par de'i nyes pa'i khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir la /
de bzhin du dge ba yang yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir don gyi khyad par bshad pa kho na yin no /
sūtravirodhasyāparihārānnaiṣa eṣāṃ padānāmarthaḥ /
yadi ca sūtre tadeva līnaṃ cittaṃ tadevoddhatamityabhipretaṃ syāt idaṃ noktaṃ syāt /
yasminsamaye līnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati layābhirśaṅka vā akālastasminsamaye prasrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyāḥ 		mdo dang 'gal ba ma spangs pa'i phyir de ni tshig de rnams kyi don ma yin no /
gal te mdo las sems de nyid zhum pa yang yin la de nyid rgod pa yang yin no zhes bya bar bshad na ni gang gi tshe sems zhum pa dang zhum par dogs pa de'i tshe shin tu sbyangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i dus ma yin no /
yasminsagaye uddhātaṃ cittaṃ bhavati auddhatyābhiśaṅki vā akālastasminsamaye dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyā iti gang gi tshe sems rgod pa dang rgod par dogs pa de'i tshe chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang brtson 'grus dang dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i dus ma yin no zhes pa 'di dag gsungs par mi 'gyur ro /
kiṃ punarvodhyaṅgānāṃ vyagrā bhāvanā ci 'di la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so sor bsgom mam zhe na /
manasikaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ bhāvaneṣṭā na saṃmukhībhāva ityadoṣa eṣaḥ /
kauśīdyādhikamatra cittaṃ līnamityuktam /
auddhatyādhikaṃ coddhatamityavirodhaḥ /
tayostu sahabhāvāttadeva cittaṃ līnaṃ tadevoddhatamiti brūmaḥ 		'di dag yid la byed pa bsgom pa yin par 'dod kyi mngon sum du gyur pa ni ma yin pas nyes pa med pa nyid do /
'di las le lo lhag pa'i sems ni zhum pa zhes bshad la /
rgod pa lhag pa ni rgod pa zhes bshad pas 'gal ba med de /
de gnyis kyang lhan cig pa yin pa'i phyir sems de nyid zhum pa yang yin la de nyid rgod pa yang yin zhes smra'o /
nābhiprayikaṃ vacanaṃ vāryate /
sūtre tu nāyamabhiprāya iti brūmaḥ /
yattūktaṃ sarvameva rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamiti /
katamaccittaṃ rāgasaṃprayuktam 		bsam pa can gyi tshig la ni bzlog pa med kyi mdo'i dgongs pa ni 'di ma yin no zhes smra'o /
'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems thams cad 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no zhes gang bshad pa /
'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems gang zhig yin /
rāgaprāptisahitaṃ cet /
asāsravamiti sarāgaṃ prāpnoti śaikṣacittam 		gal te 'dod chags kyi thob pa dang lhan cig pa yin no zhe na ni slob pa'i sems zag pa med pa yang 'dod chags dang bcas par 'gyur ro /
rāgālambanaṃ cet /
arhato 'pi sāsravaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamiti gṛhlīyāt /
rāgālambanatvāt /
kathaṃ vā tatsāsravam /
sāmānya kleśālambanatvāditi cet 		gal te 'dod chags kyi dmigs pa yin no zhe na ni dgra bcom pa'i sems zag pa dang bcas pa yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhes bya bar gzung bar 'gyur te /
'dod chags kyi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
yang na ji ltar de zag pa dang bcas pa yin /
gal te nyon mongs pa spyi ba'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni /
evamapi samohaṃ gṛhlīyānmohālambanatvāt /
na ca paracittajñānaṃ prāptyālambanaṃ nāpi taccittālambanaṃ rāgālambanam 		de lta na yang gti mug dang bcas par gzung bar 'gyur te /
gti mug gi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni thob pa la dmigs pa yang ma yin la /
sems de la dmigs pa'i 'dod chags la dmigs pa can yang ma yin no /
tasmānna rāgasaṃprayogātsarāgaṃ cittamatreṣṭam /
kiṃ tarhi 		de lta bas na 'dir 'dod chags dang ldan pas 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su 'dod par mi bya'o; 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamasaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgamiti sūtrābhigrāyo dṛśyate /
yat tūktaṃ vigatarāgamasya taccittaṃ bhavati vigatadveṣaṃ vigatamohamanāvarttikadharmi kāmabhave rūpabhave ārupyabhave iti /
tatra tatpraptivigamaṃ saṃdhāyoktam 		mdo'i dgongs pa ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin la /
'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no zhes bya bar snang ngo /
gang las 'di'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba yin /
zhe sdang dang bral ba dang gti mug dang bral ba yin /
'dod pa'i srid pa dang gzugs kyi srid pa dang gzugs med pa'i srid par phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can yin zhes gsungs pa der ni de'i thob pa dang bral ba las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no /
nanu coktam anyakleśasaṃprayuktamapi cittaṃ rāgaviprayuktatvādvigatarāgaṃ syāditi /
etenābhisaṃdhinā na doṣaḥ /
na tu tadvigatarāgamiti kṛtvā gṛhyate 		nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ma yin nam dgongs pa 'di ni nyes pa med de /
de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya bar mi gzung ngo /
kiṃ tarhi /
sadveṣaṃ samohamityevamādi /
alaṃ prasaṅgena siddhānto varṇyatām /
kiṃ paracittajñānaṃ paracittasyākāramālambanaṃ vā gṛhlāti 		'o na ci lta zhe na /
zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bcas pa zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par gzung ngo /
zhar la 'ongs pas chog go /
grub pa'i mtha' brjod par bya ste /
ci pha rol gyi sems shes pa pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam pa 'am dmigs pa 'dzin zhe na /
mi 'dzin to /
na gṛhlāti ākāralambananirapekṣaṃṃ hi tadraktamidaṃ cittamiti jānāti natvamuṣmin rupe raktamiti jānāti /
anyathā hi tadrūpālambanamapi syāt tadālambanaṃ ca paracittaṃ gṛhlataḥ svabhāvagrahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
sarvaṃ ca paracittajñānaṃ dravyasvalakṣaṇacittacaittapratyutpannaparasaṃtatikāmarūpapratisaṃyuktāpratisaṃyuktaviṣayaṃ darśanamārgapratiṣiddhaṃ bhāvanāmārga upalabhyate /
śūnyatā 'nimittasamādhi viprayuktaṃ kṣayānutpādajñānāsaṃgṛhītamānantaryamārga pratiṣiddhaṃ ca vedittavyam 		de ni rnam pa dang dmigs pa la mi ltos pa yin te /
sems 'di chags pa yin no zhes bya bar shes kyi gzugs che ge mo zhig la chags so zhes bya bar ni mi shes so /
de lta ma yin na /
de gzugs la dmigs par yang 'gyur la /
de la dmigs pa'i pha rol gyi sems 'dzin pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro /
gzhan gyi sems shes pa thams cad ni sems dang sems las byung ba dang rdzas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang da ltar byung ba dang pha rol gyi rgyud dang 'dod pa dang gzugs dang ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yul can mthong ba'i lam bkag pa dang bsgom pa'i lam la dmigs pa dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang mi ldan pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pas ma bsdus pa dang bar chad med pa'i lam bkag pa yin par rig par bya'o /
uktaṃ paracittajñānam pha rol gyi sems shes pa bshad zin to /
śeṣe caturdaśākāre śūnyānātmavivarjite lhag ma rnam pa bcu bzhi can /
stong dang bdag med ma gtogs so /
kṣayānutpādajñāne śeṣe te caturdaśākāre śūnyānātmakārau varjayitvā lhag ma ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag ste /
de gnyis ni stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag ma gtogs pa rnam pa bcu bzhi can yin no /
pāramārthikayorapi saṃvṛtibhajanāt śīṇā me jātirnāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti tadvalānuvyavahārataḥ /
kimanāsravaḥ svalakṣaṇākāro 'styatha na 		don dam pa pa dag yin yang de dag gi stobs kyi rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i sgo nas bdag gi skye ba zad do /
'di las srid pa gzhan rab tu mi shes so zhes kun rdzob la ston pa'i phyir ro /
ci zag pa med pa la rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa yod dam /
'on te med ce na /
kāśmīrāṇāṃ tāvat /
nāmalaḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo 'nya ākāraḥ /
nāstyanāsravākāraḥ ṣoḍaśākāranirmuktaḥ 		re zhig kha che ba rnams kyi ltar na /
dri med bcu drug gzhan rnams med /
rnam pa bcu drug las ma gtogs pa zag pa med pa'i rnam pa med do /
anye 'sti śāstrataḥ /
śranye punarastītyāhurvahirdeśakāḥ 		gzhan yod ces bya bstan bcos las /
gzhan nyi 'og pa rnams na re yod do zhes zer ro /
kathaṃ gamyate /
śāstrataḥ iti /
śāstre hyevamāha /
syādapratisaṃyuktena cittena kāmapratisaṃyuktāndharmānvijānīyāt 		ji ltar na khong du chud ce na /
bstan bcos las zhes bya ba smos te /
bstan bcos las 'di skad du mi ldan pa'i sems kyis 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
shes par 'gyur te /
anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataḥ /
astyetasthānamastyetadvastviti 		rigs pas bskyed pa'i sgo nas mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa dang rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen dang 'di ni gnas yod do /
'di ni gzhi yod do zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo /
yogavihitatī vijānoyāditi /
nāsyāyamartho yadastyetatsthānamastyetadvastvityevaṃ vijānīyāditi api tvastyetat sthānamastyetadvastu yadanityādito vijānīyāditi cet 		gal te gang las 'di ni gnas yod do /
'di ni gzhi yod do zhes de snyam du shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni 'di ma yin te /
'on kyang mi rtag pa la sogs pa shes par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni gnas yod do /
'di ni gzhi yod do zhes bya ba yin no /
na /
anyatrāvacanāt 		zhe na /
ma yin te /
eṣa cecchāstrārtho 'bhaviṣyat gzhan nas mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
yadidaṃ paṭhacyate syāddarśanaprahātavyena cittena kāmapratisaṃyuktāndharmānvijānīyāditi /
āha 		gal te 'di bstan bcos kyi don yin par 'gyur na /
'di skad du mthong bas spang par bya ba'i sems kyis 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
vijānīyāt shes par 'gyur te /
ātmata ātmīyata ucchedataḥ śāśvatataḥ ahetuto 'kriyāto 'pavādato 'grataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataḥ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataḥ kāṅkṣāto vimatito vicikitsātaḥ rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i sgo nas bdag dang bdag gi dang rtag pa dang chad pa dang rgyu med pa dang byed pa med pa dang skur ba 'debs pa dang mchog dang gtso bo dang khyad par du 'phags pa dang dam pa dang dag pa dang grol ba dang nges par 'dzin par byed pa dang nem nur dang yid gnyis dang the tshom du shes par 'gyur zhing /
rajyeta dviṣyānmanyeta muhyedayogavihitato vijānīyāditi /
atrāpyevaṃ pāṭho 'bhaviṣyat /
astyetat sthānamastyetadvastviti /
na tvevaṃ paṭhacyate /
tasmānnāsyāyamarthaḥ 		chags pa dang sdang ba dang rlom pa dang rmongs par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa der yang 'di skad du 'di ni gnas yod do /
'di ni gzhi yod do zhes 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
de skad kyang mi 'byung ste /
de lta bas na 'di ni de'i don ma yin no /
kiṃ punarime ṣoḍaśākārā nāmata āhosvit dravyataḥ ci rnam pa bcu drug po 'di dag ming gi sgo nas sam /
'on te rdzas su zhe na /
sapta dravyato nāmataḥ ṣoḍaśetyeke /
duḥkhakārāścatvāraḥ samudayanirodhamārgākārāṇāmekakadravyatvāt 		kha cig na re rdzas su ni bdun yin la ming gi sgo nas ni bcu drug yin te /
kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams rdzas su re re yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
evaṃ tu varṇayanti /
dravyataḥ ṣoḍaśākārāḥ /
tatpratyayādhīnatvāt anityam 		'di skad du brjod de rdzas su rnam pa bcu drug go /
de la rkyen la rag lus pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o /
ṣīḍātmakatvāt duḥkham /
ātmīyadṛṣṭivipakṣeṇa śūnyam 		gnod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o /
bdag gir lta ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis stong pa'o /
ātmadṛṣṭivipakṣeṇānātmā /
heturvījadharmayogena 		bdag tu lta ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis bdag med pa'o /
sa bon gyi chos kyi tshul gyis rgyu'o /
samudayaḥ prādurbhāvayoigena 'byung ba'i chos kyi tshul gyis kun 'byung ba'o /
prabhavaḥ prabandhayogena 'brel ba'i tshul gyis rab tu skye ba'o /
abhiniṣpādanārthena pratyayaḥ mngon par sgrub pa'i don gyis ni rkyen te /
tadyathā mṛtpiṇdadaṇdacatrasūtrodakasamavāyāt ghaṭābhiniṣpattirbhavati tadvaditi /
akndhoparamatvāt nirodhaḥ /
agninirvāṣaṇāt śāntaḥ 		dper na 'jim pa'i gong bu dang thal zhar dang 'khor lo dang thag gu dang chu rnams 'dus pa las bum pa mngon par grub pa de bzhin no /
phung po zhig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o /
me gsum zhi ba'i phyir zhi ba'o /
nirūpadravtvāt praṇītaḥ /
sarvāpakṣālavimuktatvānniḥ saraṇamiti /
gamanārthena mārgaḥ 		'tshe ba med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o /
skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o /
bgrod pa'i don gyis lam mo /
yogayuktatvānnyāyaḥ rigs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir rigs pa'o /
samyakpratipādanārthena pratipat yang dag par bsgrub pa'i don gyis sgrub pa'o /
atyantasamatikramaṇānnairyāṇika iti shin tu yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byin par byed pa'o /
athavā anātyantikatvādanityam yang na gtan du ba ma yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o /
abhinyāsabhūtatvāt duḥkham /
antarvyāpārapuruṣaparahitattvācchūnyam 		khur lta bur gyur pa'i phyir /
sdug bsngal ba'o /
nang gi skyes bu dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o /
akāmakāritvādanātmā /
heturāgamanayogena 		'dod dgur byed pa med pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o /
'ong ba'i tshul gyis rgyu'o /
samudaya unmajjanayogena 'byung ba'i tshul gyis kun 'byung ba'o /
prabhavaḥ prasaraṇayogena 'phel ba'i tshul gyis rab tu skye ba'o /
pratisaraṇārghena pratyaya iti /
asaṃbandhaḥ saṃbandhoparamatvānnirodhaḥ /
trisaṃskṛtalakṣaṇavimuktatvācchāntaḥ /
kuśalatvāt praṇītaḥ 		so sor 'brad ba'i tshul gyis rkyen no /
'brel ba med pas 'brel pa zhig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o /
'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang 'bral ba'i phyir zhi ba'o /
dge ba'i phyir gya nom pa'o /
paramāśvāsatvānniḥ saraṇamiti yid brtan pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o /
kumārgavipakṣeṇa mārgaḥ lam ngan pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis lam mo /
anyāyavipakṣeṇa nyāyaḥ /
nirvāṇapurāvirodhanārthena pratipat /
sarvabhavapratipakṣatvānnairyāṇikaḥ /
ityeṣāṃ vyākhyānamanekaparyāyaḥ 		rigs pa ma yin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis rigs pa'o /
mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong dang mi 'gal ba'i don gyis sgrub pa'o /
srid pa thams cad kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byin par byed pa'o /
yathābhipretaṃ pravakṣyāmaḥ /
udayavyayatvādanityam 		ji ltar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o /
pratikūlabhāvāt /
duḥkham /
ātmarahitatvācchūnyam 		mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o /
bdag dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o /
svayamanātmatvādanātma /
hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayatvaṃ tu yadeva sūtra uktam /
ime pañcopādānaskandhāśchandamūlakāśchandasamudayāśchandajātīyāśchandaprabhavā iti 		bdag nyid kyis bdag ma yin pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o /
rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen nyid ni gang mdo las nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag ni 'dun pa'i rtsa ba can /
'dun pa las kun 'byung ba /
'dun pa dang 'dra ba /
'dun pa las rab tu skye ba dag yin no zhes gsungs pa kho na yin te /
prabhavaśabdaḥ kevalaṃ paścāt paṭhitavyaḥ śāstre rab tu skye ba zhes bya ba'i sgra tha mar gdon ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do /
kaḥ punareṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ yang 'di dag la khyad par ci yod ce na /
caturvidho hi cchandaḥ 'dun pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
asmītyabhedenātmabhāvcchandaḥ nga'o snyam pa ni bye brag med par lus pa 'dun pa yin no /
syāmityabhedena punarbhavacchandaḥ gyur cig snyam pa ni bye brag tu med par yang srid pa la 'dun pa yin no /
ityaṃ syāmiti bhedena punarbhavacchandaḥ 'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa ni /
bye brag tu yang srid pa la 'dun pa yin no /
pratisaṃdhivandhacchandaścaturthaḥ bzhi pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i 'ching ba la 'dun pa yin no /
karmābhisaṃskāracchando vā /
tatra prathomo duḥkhasyādikāraṇatvānmūlahetuḥ /
phalasyeva vījam /
dvitīyaḥ samudayastena tatsamudāgamātphalasyevāṅkurādiprasavaḥ 		yang na las mngon par 'du byed pa la 'dun pa yin no /
de la dang po ni sdug bsngal gyi dang po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyu yin te /
'bras bu'i sa bon bzhin no /
gnyis pa ni kun 'byung ba yin te /
des de yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir /
'bras bu'i myu gu la sogs pa skye ba bzhin no /
tṛtīyastajjātīyaduḥkhapratyayaḥ /
phalasyeva kṣotrodakapāśyādikam /
kṣetrādivaśena hi phalasya gandharasavīryavipākaprabhāvabhedā bhavanti caturthaḥ prabhavastataḥ eva tatsaṃbhavāt phalasyeva puṣpāvasānamiti 		gsum pa ni de dang 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rkyen yin te /
'bras bu'i zhing dang chu dang lud la sogs pa bzhin no /
zhing la sogs pa'i dbang gis ni 'bras bu'i dri dang ro dang nus pa dang smin pa dang mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro /
bzhi pa ni rab tu skye ba ste /
de kho na las de skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i tha ma me tog bzhin no /
athavā /
tṛṣṇāvicaritānāṃ dvau pañcakau dvau catuṣkau catvāraśchandāḥ 		yang na sred pa rnam par spyad pa rnams kyi 'dun pa bzhi ni sred pa'i bye brag rnams las lnga tshan gnyis dang bzhi tshan gnyis yin te /
asmīti bhikṣavaḥ sāti itthamasmīti bhavati evamasmīti bhavati anyathā 'smīti sadasmīti asadasmīti /
bhaviṣyāmītyasya bhavati na bhaviṣyāmi itthaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi śranyathā bhaviṣyāmi /
syāmityasya bhavati itthaṃ syām evaṃ syām anyathā syām apitu syām apītthaṃ syām apyevaṃ syām apyanyathā syāmityasya bhavati /
pravṛttyuparmatvānnirodhaḥ /
nirduḥkhatvācchantaḥ /
iti hi bhikṣavo duḥkhāḥ saṃskārāḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti vacanāta /
niruttaratvāt praṇītaḥ /
apunarāvṛttitvānniḥsaraṇam /
pathibhūtatvānmārgaḥ /
yathābhūtapravṛttatvānnyāyaḥ /
pratiniyatatvāt pratipat /
yathoktam /
eṣa mārgo hi nāstyanyo darśanasya viśuddhaya iti 		dge slong dag nga'o snyam pa yod na nga 'di lta bu'o snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
nga ni 'di 'dra'o snyam pa dang nga de lta ma yin no snyam pa dang nga bzang ngo snyam pa dang nga ngan no snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
de la 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam par 'gyur zhing /
de la 'byung bar 'gyur bar mi bya'o snyam pa dang 'di lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang 'di 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang de lta ma yin par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
de la gyur cig snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
de la 'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa dang de 'dra bar gyur cig snyam pa dang de lta ma yin par gyur cig snyam pa dang gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang 'di lta bur gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang 'di 'dra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang de lta ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no /
'jug pa med pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o /
sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir zhi ba ste /
dge slong dag de ltar na 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o /
mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
gong na med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o /
yang phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o /
lam lta bur gyur pa'i phyir lam mo /
yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du zhugs pa'i phyir rigs pa'o /
so sor nges pa'i phyir sgrub ba ste /
ji skad du mthong ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'di lam yin gyi gzhan ni med do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
atyantaniryāṇānnairyāṇikaḥ /
athavā nityasukhātmīyātmadṛṣṭicaritānāṃ pratipakṣeṇānityaduḥkhaśunyānātmākārāḥ /
ahetvekahetupariṇāmabuddhipūrvaka dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayākārāḥ 		gtan du nges par 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byin pa'o /
yang na rtag pa dang bde ba dang bdag gi dang bdag tu lta pa spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag yin no /
rgyu med pa dang rgyu gcig pu dang 'gyur ba dang blo sngar btang ba dang lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen gyi rnam pa dag yin no /
nāsti mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ nirodhākāraḥ thar pa med do snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por 'gog pa'i rnam pa yin no /
duḥkho mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ śāntākāraḥ /
dhyānasukhapraṇītadṛṣṭicaritānāṃ praṇītākāraḥ 		sdug bsngal la thar pa yin no snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen bor zhi ba'i rnam pa yin no /
bsam gtan gyi bde ba gya nom pa yin par lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por gya nom pa yin no /
punaḥ punaḥ parihāṇito nātyantiko mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ niḥsaraṇākāraḥ yang dang yang yongs su nyams bar 'gyur ba'i sgo nas thar ba ni gtan du ma yin no snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa yin no /
nāsti mārgaḥ kumārgo 'yamanyo mārgaḥ punarāvartī mārga iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ mārganyāyapratipannairyāṇikākārā iti lam med do snyam pa dang lam 'di yin no snyam pa dang gzhan yang lam yin no snyam pa dang lam 'di yang lhag go snyam du lta bar spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du lam dang regs pa dang sgrub pa dang des par 'byin pa'i rnam pa dag yin no /
ākāro nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ rnam pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhe na /
prajñākāraḥ rnam pa shes rab /
evaṃ tarhi prajñā sākārā na bhaviṣyati de lta na ni 'o na shes rab gzhan dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir /
prajñāntarāsaṃyogāt /
evaṃ tu yuktaṃ syāt /
sarveṣāṃ cittacaittānāmālambanagrahaṇaprakāra ākāra iti /
atha kiṃ prajñaivākārayati netyāha 		shes rab rnam pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur gyi /
'di ltar rnam pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad kyi dmigs pa 'dzin pa'i bye brag ni rnam pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs par 'gyur ro /
yang ci shes rab kho nas 'dzin par byed dam zhe na /
kiṃ tarhi smras bam yin no /
tayā saha /
ākāraynti sālambāḥ /
prajñā cānye ca sarve sālambanā dharmā ākārayanti 		'on ji lta bu zhe na /
de dang bcas pa'i dmigs pa dang bcas pas 'dzin par byed /
shes rab dang dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos gzhan thams cad kyis kyang 'dzin par byed do /
sarvamākāryate tu sat yod pa thams cad gzung bya yin /
yatkiñcidasti sarvamākāryate /
tadevaṃ kṛtvā siddhaṃ bhavati prajñā ākāraścākārayati cākāryante ca 		gang ci yod kyang rung thams cad gzung bar bya ba yin no /
de ltar byas na shes rab ni rnam ba yang yin /
'dzin par byed pa yang yin /
ālambanā ākāryanta eveti /
ataḥ parameṣāṃ jñānānāṃ kuśalādibhedaṃ nirvekṣyāmaḥ /
tridhādyaṃ kuśalānyanyāni /
saṃvṛtijñānaṃ ślokādau bhavatvādādyam /
tattrividham /
kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtam /
anyāni nava jñānāni kuśalānyeva 		gzung bar bya ba yang yin no /
dmigs pa dang bcas pa gzhan ni 'dzin par byed pa dang gzung bar bya ba yin no /
dmigs pa med pa rnams ni gzung bar bya ba kho na yin no /
'di man chad ni shes pa bcu po 'di dag gi dge ba la sogs pa'i bye brag bstan par bya ste /
dang po rnam gsum gzhan rnams dge /
kun rdzob shes pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i dang po ni yod pa'i phyir dang po ste /
de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin no /
shes pa gzhan dgu ni dge ba kho na yin no /
ādyaṃ sarvāsu bhūmiṣu dang pos rnams thams cad na /
kāmadhātī yāvadbhavāgre /
dharmākhyaṃ ṣaṭsu /
dharmajñānaṃ caturṣu dhyāneṣvanāgamye dhyānāntare ca /
navasu tvanvayākhyaṃ /
anvayajñānaṃ tāsveva ca ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣvārupyatraye ca /
tathaiva ṣaṭ /
duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgakṣayānutpādajñānānyapyetāsveva navasu bhūmiṣvabhedena /
bhedena punrdharmajñānasaṃgṛhītāni ṣaṭsu anvayajñāna saṃgṛhītāni navasu /
dhyāneṣvanyamanojñānaṃ /
paracittajñānaṃ caturṣveva dhyāneṣu nānyatra /
kāmarūpāśrayaṃ ca tat /
kāmarūpadhātvośca tat paracittajñānaṃ saṃmukhīkriyate /
kāmāśrayaṃ tu dharmāruyam 		'dod pa'i khams nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar na yod do /
drug na chos shes bya /
chos shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi dang mi lcogs pa med ba dang bsam gtan khyad par can na yod do /
dgu na rjes shes bya ba /
rjes su shes pa ni sa drug po de dag nyid dang gzugs med pa gsum na yod do /
de bzhin du drug /
sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog ba dang lam dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyang bye brag med bar ni sa dgu po de dag nyid na yod do /
dbye ba ni chos shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni sa drug na yod do /
rjes su shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni sa dgu na yod do /
gzhan yid shes pa bsam gtan bzhi /
pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi kho na na yod kyi gzhan na med do /
de na 'dod dang gzugs rten can /
pha rol gyi sems shes pa de ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams dag tu mngon sum du byed do /
chos shes bya ba 'dod rten can /
chos shes pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi rten can kho na yin gyi /
gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu ni mngon sum du mi byed do /
khams gsum pa yi rten can gzhan /
gzhan gang zhe na; pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang chos shes pa ma gtogs pa'o /
sa dag dang rten bshad zin to /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis bsdus pa brjod par bya ste /
de smras pa /
dharmajñānaṃ tu kāmadhātvāśrayameva /
na rūpārupyadhātvoḥ saṃmukhīkriyate /
anyattraidhātukāśrayam /
kiṃ punaranyat /
paracittajñānaṃ dharmajñānanirmuktam /
kṛto bhūmyaśrayanirdeśaḥ /
smṛtyupasthānasaṃgraho vaktavyaḥ /
so 'yamucyate /
smṛtyupasthānamekaṃ dhīrnirodhe /
dhīḥ prajñā jñānamiti paryāyāḥ /
nirodhajñānamekaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam /
paracittadhīḥ /
trīṇi /
paracittajñānaṃ trīṇi vedanācittadharmasmṛtyupasthānāni /
catvāri śeṣāṇi /
nirodhaparacittajñānābhyāmanyāni jñānāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni /
katamasya jñānasya kati jñānānyālambanam /
dharmadhīgocaro nava /
dharmajñānasya nava jñānānyālambanamanyatrānvayajñānāt /
nava mārgānvayadiyoḥ 		'gog blo dran pa nyer gzhag pa /
gcig ste blo dang shes rab dang /
shes pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin no /
'gog pa shes pa ni gcig ste /
chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no /
pha rol gyi sems blo ni gsum mo /
pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni gsum ste /
tshor ba dang sems dang chos dran ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin no /
lhag ma bzhi yin no /
'gog pa dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa dag las gzhan pa'i shes pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no /
shes pa gang gis dmigs pa shes pa du zhig yin zhe na /
chos blo'i spyod yul dgu yin no /
chos shes pa'i dmigs pa ni shes pa dgu yin te; rjes su shes pa ma gtogs so /
lam rjes blo yi dgu yin no /
anvayajñānasyāpi nava jñānānyālambanamanyatra dharmajñānāt rjes su shes pa'i dmigs pa yang shes pa dgu yin te /
chos shes pa ma gtogs so /
mārgajñānasyāpi nava jñānānyālambanamanyatra saṃvṛtijñānāt lam shes pa'i dmigs pa yang dgu yin te /
kun rdzob shes pa ma gtogs so /
duḥkhahetudhiyordvayam /
duḥkhasamudayajñānayordve saṃvṛtiparacitajñāne ālambanam /
caturṇāṃ daśa 		sdug bsngal rgyu blo'i gnyis yin no; sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung shes pa dag gi dmigs pa dag ni gnyis te /
kun rdzob dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa yin no /
bzhi yi bcu yin /
saṃvṛtiparacittakṣayānutpādajñānānāṃ daśa jñānānyālambanam /
naikasya /
ekasya nirodhajñānasya naiva jñānamālambanam /
yojyā dharmāḥ punardaśa /
katame daśa /
traidhātu kāmalā dharmā akṛtāśca dvidhā dvidhā 		kun rdzob shes pa dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni shes pa bcu char yang yin no /
gcig gi min /
'gog pa shes pa ni gcig phu'i dmigs pa ni shes pa ma yin pa nyid do /
chos bcu dag ni sbyar bar bya /
bcu gang dag ce na /
khams gsum pa dang dri med chos /
saṃkṛtā dharmā aṣṭadhā kriyante 'dus ma byas rnams gnyis gnyis so /
kāmarūpārupyāvacarānāsravāṇāṃ saṃprayuktaviprayuktabhedāt /
asaṃskṛtā dvidhā kriyante /
kuśalāvyākṛtabhedāt /
ime daśa dharmāḥ kathaṃ yojyāḥ kasya jñānasya katyālambanamiti /
tatra saṃvṛtijñānasya sarve daśa dharmā ālambanam 		chos 'dus byas rnams la 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med ba na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa rnams mtshungs par ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa brgyad du bya'o /
'dus ma byas rnams la dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i bye brag gis rnam ba gnyis su bya'o /
chos bcu po 'di dag ji ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na /
shes pa gang gis dmigs pa du zhig yin zhes sbyar bar bya ste /
de la kun rdzob shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos bcu po thams cad yin no /
dharmajñānasya pañca /
kāmāvacarānāsravā ścatvāraḥ kuśalaṃ cāsaṃskṛtam 		chos shes pa ni lnga ste /
'dod pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa dang gzhi dang 'dus ma byas dge ba yin no /
anvayajñānasya sapta rjes su shes pa ni bdun te /
rūpārupyāvacarānāsravāḥ ṣaṭ kuśalaṃ cāsaṃskṛtam gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa dang drug dang 'dus ma byas dge ba yin no /
duḥkhasamudayajñānayoḥ kāmarūpārupyāvacarāḥ ṣaṭ /
nirodhajñānasyaikaḥ /
kuśalamevāsaṃskṛtam 		sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung shes pa dag gi ni drug ste /
'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams yin no /
'gog pa shes pa'i ni gcig ste /
'dus ma byas dge ba kho na yin no /
mārgajñānasya dvāvanāsravau lam shes pa'i ni gnyis te /
zag pa med pa dag yin no /
paracittajñānasya trayaḥ gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i ni gsum ste /
kāmarūpāvacarānāsravāḥ saṃprayuktāḥ /
kṣayānutpādajñānayoḥ nava dharmā ālambanamavyākṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ muktvā 		'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba rnams yin no /
zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag gi dmigs pa ni chos dgu yin te /
'dus ma byas lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so /
syādekena jñānena sarvadharmān jānīyāt /
na syāt 		shes pa gcig gis chos thams cad shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
med do /
api tu 'on kyang /
sāṃvṛtaṃ svakalāpānyadekaṃ vidyādanātmataḥ /
saṃvṛtijñānaṃ svasmātkalāpādanyān sarvadharmānanātvato jānīyāt sarvadharmā anātmāna iti 		kun rdzob gcig pus rang tshogs las /
gzhan ni bdag med nyid rigs 'gyur /
kun rdzob shes pas ni rang gi tshogs las gzhan pa'i chos thams cad ni bdag med ba'i zhes bdag med pa nyid du shes par 'gyur ro /
jsvabhāvastatsahabhuvaśca dharmāstasya svakalāpaḥ /
teṣāmagrahaṇaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhedādekālambanatvāditi /
saṃnikṛṣṭatvācca 		de'i rang gi tshogs ni rang gi ngo bo dang de dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba'i chos rnams yin te /
de dag ni yul dang yul can tha dad pa'i phyir dang dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir dang ha cang nye ba'i phyir mi 'dzin to /
tacca kāmāvacaraṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ śrutamayam bhāvanāmayam /
tasya vyavacchinnabhūmyālambanatvāt 		de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa las byung ba yin no /
gzugs na spyod pa ni thos pa las byung ba yin no /
bsgom pa las byung ba ni ma yin te /
de ni sa rnam pa chad pa las dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
anyathā hi yugapatsarvato vairāgyaṃ syāt /
gatametat 		de lta ma yin na thams cad las cig car 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro /
'di ni rdzogs so /
idaṃ tu vaktavyam gang zhig shes pa du dang ldan /
kaḥ katibhirjñānaiḥ samanvāgata iti zhes bya ba 'di brjod bar bya ste /
pṛthagjanastāvadekena samanvāgataḥ /
saṃvṛtijñānena 		re zhig so so'i skye bo ni kun rdzob shes pa gcig bu dang ldan no /
vītarāgastu paracittajñānenāpi /
āryaḥ punaḥ 		'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang yang ldan no /
'phags pa ni /
ekajñānānvito rāgīprathame 'nāsravakṣaṇe /
kāmāvītarāgo duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntavekenaiva saṃvṛtijñānena samanvāgato bhavati 		zag med skad cig dang po la /
chags can shes pa gcig dang ldan /
'dod pa las 'dod chags dang ma bral ba zhig yin na /
sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa la kun rdzob shes pa gcig kho na dang ldan pa yin no /
dvitīye tribhiḥ /
duḥkhadharmajñāne tribhiḥ saṃvṛtijñānadharmajñānaduḥkhajñānaiḥ 		gnyis pa la gsum /
sdug bsngal la chos shes pa la ni kun rdzob shes pa dang chos shes pa dang sdug bsngal shes pa ste /
gsum dang ldan no /
ūrdhvastu catuṣrvekaikavṛddhimān yan chad ni /
bzhi la re re 'phel dang ldan /
ataḥ paraṃ caturṣu kṣaṇeṣu ekaikajñānavṛddhirasya jñātavyā /
duḥkhe 'nvayajñāne 'nvayajñānaṃ vardhate /
samudayanirodhamārgadharmajñāneṣu samudayanirodhamārgajñānāni vardhanta iti mārgadharmajñāne saptabhirjñānaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
vītarāgastu sarvatrādhikena paracittajñānena samanvāgato veditavyaḥ 		de yan chad kyi skad cig ma bzhi la ni /
de la shes pa re re /
'phel bar shes bar bya ste /
sdug bsngal la rjes su shes ba la ni rjes su shes pa 'phel la /
kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa rnams la ni kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams 'phel bas lam la chos shes pa la shes pa bdun dang ldan pa yin no /
'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni thams cad du gzhan gyi sems shes pa lhag par ldan par rig par bya'o /
atha kasyāmavasthāyāṃ kati jñānāni bhavyante yang na gnas skabs gang du shes pa du dag cig 'thob ce na /
yathotpannāni bhāvyante kṣāntijñānāni darśane mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa dang /
shes pa ji ltar skyes pa rnams /
anāgatāni /
darśanamārge yadyadevotpadyate kṣāntirjñānaṃ vā tajjātīyamanāgataṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati tadākārā eva catvāraḥ 		ma 'ongs pa 'thob /
mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa'am /
shes pa gang dang gang skyes pa de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa de'i rnam pa bzhi kho na 'thob bar 'gyur ro /
ci'i phyir /
mthong ba'i lam la shes pa dang /
kasmāddarśanamārge sabhāgajñānākārabhāvanaiva gotrāṇāmaporatilabdhatvāt rnam ba 'dra ba kho na 'thob ce na /
rigs rnams ma thob pa'i phyir ro /
tatraiva sāṃvṛtaṃ cānvayatraye /
tatraiva darśanamārge saṃvṛtijñānaṃ cāpi bhāvyate triṣu duḥkhasamudayanirodhānvayajñāneṣu 		de nyid las /
rjes gsum la ni kun rdzob kyang /
mthong ba'i lam de nyid la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa la rjes su shes ba gsum la kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo /
chos shes pa la ni ma yin te /
na dharmajñāneṣvakṛtsnasatyābhisamayāt bden pa zad par mngon par ma rtogs ba'i phyir ro /
ato 'bhisamayāntyākhyaṃ de nyid kyi phyir mngon rtogs mtha' zhes bya ba /
ata eva tadābhisamayāntikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānamākhyāvate de nyid kyi phyir kun rdzob shes pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba zhes bya ste /
ekaikasatyābhisamayānte bhāvanāt /
kasmānna mārgānvayajñāne bhāvanāṃ gacchati 		bden pa re re mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes la 'thob pa'i phyir ro /
ci'i phyir lam la rjes su shes pa na 'thob bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
mārgasatyasya pūrva laukikena mārgeṇānabhisamitatvāt akṛtsnābhisamayācca lam gyi bden ba ni sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis mngon par ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang zad par mngon par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
kṛtsnaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ śakyate parijñātuṃ samudayaḥ prahātuṃ nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartu na tu mārgaḥ śakyate kṛtsno bhāvayitum ityabhisamayāntābhāvānna tasminnābhisamayāntikaṃ bhāvyate sdug bsngal zad par yongs su shes par bya ba dang kun 'byung spang bar bya ba dang; 'gog pa mngon du bya bar ni nus kyi /
lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus pas mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir /
samudayo 'pi na tadā sarvaḥ prahīṇo bhavatīti na syādābhisamayāntikam /
na /
tatsatyadarśanaheyaḥ sarvaḥ prahīṇno bhavati /
mārgastaddarśanaheyapratipakṣo na sarvaḥ śakyate bhāvayituṃ vahugotratvāt ityasti mahānviśeṣaḥ /
darśanamārgaparivāratvādityapare 		de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba mi 'thob bo /
de'i tshe kun 'byung ba la yang thams cad spangs pa ma yin pas mngon par rtogs ba'i mtha' las byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
de'i bden pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba thams cad spangs pa yin no /
lam ni rigs mang ba'i phyir /
mthong bas spang ba'i gnyen por thams cad bsgom par mi nus pas khyad par cher yod do /
gzhan dag na re mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
tadidaṃ sādhyatvādajñāpakam /
kiṃ punastadābhisamayāntikaṃ samvṛtijñānaṃ kadācitsaṃmukhīkriyate /
na kadācit ekāntena hi 		'di ni bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir shes par byed pa ma yin no /
ci kun rdzob shes pa mngon par rtogs ba'i mtha' las byung ba de res 'ga' mngon sum du byed dam zhe na /
nam yang mi byed de /
tadānutpattidharmakam gcig kho nar de ni mi skye ba'i chos can yin /
kathaṃ punastadbhāvitaṃ bhavati /
alabdhalābhāt kathamidānīṃ tatpratilabdhaṃ yadi naiva saṃmukhīkartu śakyate 		ji ltar na de thob pa yin te /
ma rnyed pa las rnyed pa'i phyir ro /
da ni gal te de mngon sum du bya ba mi nus pa kho na yin na ji ltar na de rnyed pa yin /
prāptitaḥ /
yasmāllabdhaṃ tasmāllabdhamityapūrvaiṣā nirdeśajātiḥ 		thob pa'i sgo nas so /
gang gi phyir rnyed pa de'i phyir rnyed do zhes ston pa 'di ni sngon ma byung ba'i rnam pa yin no /
tasmānnaivaṃ bhāvanā sidhyati /
evaṃ tu sidhyati yad āhuḥ pūrvācāryāḥ /
kathaṃ ca pūrvācāryā āhuḥ /
lokottaramārgasāmarthyāt saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate yad vyutthitaḥ satyālambanam viśiṣṭataraṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti /
eṣa eva ca tasya lābho yattatsaṃmukhībhāvasamarthāśrayalābhaḥ 		de lta bas na de lta na ni thob pa mi 'grub pa nyid kyis sngon gyi slob dpon dag ji skad zer ba de lta na 'grub bar 'gyur ro /
sngon gyi slob dpon dag ji skad zer zhe na /
'jig rten las 'das ba'i lam gyi mthus de las langs nas 'jig rten pa'i shes pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa bden pa la dmigs ba mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba kun rdzob shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro /
de mngon sum du 'gyur bar nus pa'i rten rnyed pa gang yin pa de nyid rnyed pa yin te /
gotre hi labdhe labdhaṃ gautrikaṃ bhavati /
eva tu necchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
katibhūmikaṃ punastatsaṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate 		rigs rnyed na rigs las byung ba yang rnyed pa yin no zhes zer ro /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'di mi 'dod do /
sa du pa'i kun rdzob shes pa de 'thob ce na /
darśanamārgasya mthong ba'i lam gyis ni /
svadhobhūmi /
yadbhūmiko darśanamārgo bhavati tadbhūmikam cāvarabhūmikaṃ ca saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate 		rang dang 'gog pa mthong ba'i lam las sa gang pa yin pa sa de pa dang sa 'og ma pa'i kun rdzob shes pa 'thob ba ste /
gal te mthong ba'i lam mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa zhig yin na ni /
ānāgamyabhūmikaścedbhavati dvibhūmikaṃ bāvyate /
anāgamyabhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ ca /
evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmike darśanamārge saptabhūmikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāṣyate /
tatra punaḥ kati smṛtyupasthānāni /
nirodhe 'ntyaṃ 		mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa dang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang sa gnyis pa thob la /
de bzhin du mthong ba'i lam /
bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin na sa bdun pa'i kun rdzob shes pa thob ba'i bar du'o /
de yang dran ba nye bar gzhag pa du dag cig yin zhe na /
'gog pa'i mtha' /
nirodhe 'bhisamite yat saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tadantyaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam 'gog pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i kun rdzob shes pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tha ma ste /
chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no /
ekasya parisaṃkhyānātsiddhaṃ bhavati śeṣaṃ catvāri smṛtyupasthānānīti gcig grangs bcad pas lhag ma ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no /
taccaitadābhisamayāntikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ /
svasatyākāraṃ 		kun rdzob shes pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba de ni rang bden rnams can /
yatsatyābhisamayāllabhyate tatsatyākārameva bden pa gang zhig mngon bar rtogs pa'i 'thob pa bden pa de'i rnam pa can kho na yin no /
tadākāravacanādālambanasya tadeva satyamityuktaṃ bhavati de'i rnam pa can yin no /
zhes smos pas 'di'i dmigs pa yang bden pa de nyid yin no zhes bshad pa yin no /
darśanamārgalabhyatvācca tat /
yatnikam /
prāyogikamityarthaḥ /
saparivāragrahaṇātkāmarūpāvacārāṇi catuṣpañcaskandhasvabhāvāni 		de ni mthong ba'i lam gyis 'thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir 'bad las byung ba sbyor ba las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa smos pa'i phyir /
'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa ni phung po bzhi dang lnga'i rang bzhin yin no /
ṣoḍaśe ṣaṭ sarāgasya chags bcas bcu drug pa la drug /
bhāvyanta iti vartate 'thob ces bya bar sbyar te /
avītarāgasya ṣoḍaśe mārgānvayajñānakṣaṇe dve jñāne pratyutpanne /
mārgajñānamārgānvayajñāne /
purāgatāni ṣaṭ bhāvyante 		'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa las shes pa gnyis da ltar byung ba yin la /
ma 'ongs pa drug 'thob ste /
dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānāni /
vītarāgasya sapta tu 		chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams so /
'dod la chags dang bral bas bdun /
vītarāgasya paracittajñānaṃ saptamaṃ bhāvyate /
sarāgabhāvanā mārge tadūrdhvaṃ saptabhāvanā 		'dod chags dang bral bas ni bdun pa pha rol gyi sems shes pa 'thob bo /
de yi gong ma chags bcas kyi /
bsgom ba'i lam la bdun 'thob po /
ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇādurdhvaṃ bhāvanāmārge yāvanna vītarāgo bhavati tāvat sarveṣu prayogāntaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante skad cig ma bcu drug gi gong ma'i bsgom pa'i lam la ni ji srid du 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bam yin pa de srid du sbyor ba dang bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam thams cad la shes pa bdun 'thob ste /
dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgasaṃvṛtijñānāni /
laukikaścet bhāvanāmārgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pratyutpannam /
lokottaraścet caturṇāṃ dharmajñānānāmanyatamat 		chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams so /
gal te bsgom ba'i lam 'jig rten pa zhig yin na ni kun rdzob shes pa da ltar byung ba yin no /
gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa zhig yin na ni /
chos shes pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no; /
saptabhūmijayā 'bhijñākopyāptyākīrṇabhāvite sa bdun las rgyal mngon shes dang /
mi g yo 'thob dang spel bsgoms pa'i /
ānanataryapatheṣūrdhvaṃ muktimārgāṣṭake 'pi ca /
saptajñānāni bhāvyante iti vartate /
sapta bhūmayaḥ catvāri dhyānāni trayaścārupyāḥ /
tāsāṃ jayaḥ vairāgyaṃ tasmin saptabhūmike vairāgye pañcasu cābhijñāsu akopyaprativedhe ca vyavakīrṇabhāvite ca dhyāne śaikṣasya yāvantaḥ ānantaryamārgāsteṣvapi sarveṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante tānyeva 		bar chad med pa'i lam dag dang /
gong ma'i grol ba'i lam brgyad la'ang /
shes pa bdun 'thob bo zhes bya bar sbyar te /
sa bdun ni bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa gsum mo /
de dag las rgyal ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ste /
slob pas bdun po de dag las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang mi g yo ba rtogs par byed pa dang bsam gtan spel mar bsgom pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ji snyed ba de dag thams cad la shes pa bdun 'thob ste /
de dag nyid do /
laukikeścet bhāvnāmārgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pratyutpannam gal te bsgom pa'i lam 'jig rten pa zhig yin na ni /
kun rdzob shes pa da ltar byung ba yin no /
lokottaraśceccaturṇāmanvajñānānāṃ dvayośca dharmajñānayoranyatamat 'jig rten las 'das pa zhig yin na ni rjes su shes pa bzhi dang chos shes pa gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no /
akopyaprativedhe tu saṃvṛtijñānaṃ na bhāvyate /
bhavāgrāprati pakṣatvāt /
tatra jayajñānaṃ saptamaṃ veditavyam /
saptabhūmivairāgyādapi cordhvaṃbhavāgravairāgye vimuktimārgeṣvaṣṭāsu saptaiva jñānāni bhāvyante 		mi g yo ba rtogs par byed ba la ni kun rdzob shes pa mi 'thob ste; srid pa'i tse mo'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
der ni zad pa shes ba bdun ba yin par rig par bya'o /
sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i yang gong ma srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad la yang shes pa bdun kho na 'thob ste /
dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgaparacittajñānāni /
saṃvṛtijñānaṃ na bhāvyate 		chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog ba dang lam dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa rnams so /
kun rdzob shes pa ni mi 'thob ste /
bhavāgrāpratipakṣatvāt /
pratyutpannaṃ tu caturṇāmanvayajñānānāṃ dvayośca dharmajñānayoranyatamat 		srid pa'i rtse mo'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
rjes su shes pa rnam pa bzhi dang chos shes pa rnam pa gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no /
śaikṣottāpanamuktau vā ṣaṭsaptajñānabhāvanā /
śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāṃ vimuktimārge sarāgasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānāṃ vitarāgasya saptānāṃ paracittajñānaṃ prakṣipya 		slob pa sbyong ba'i grol ba la /
shes pa drug dang bdun 'thob bam /
slob pa 'dod chags dang bcas pas ni dbang po sbyor ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam la drug 'thob ste /
chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams so /
'dod chags dang bral bas ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa bsnan te /
saṃvṛtijñānasyāpyubhayoriti kecit /
tatra matavikalpajñāpanārtho vāśabdhaḥ /
prayogamārge tu tayoḥ saṃvṛtijñānasyāpi bhāvanā 		bdun 'thob bo /
'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni kha cig na re gnyi gas kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo zhes zer ba'i lugs tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro /
sbyor ba'i lam la ni de gnyis kyis kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo /
ānantaryapatha ṣaṇṇāṃ /
vītarāgasyāvītarāgasya vā śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāmānantaryamārge ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā pūrvavat 		bar chad med pa'i lam la drug /
slob pa 'dod chags dang bral ba yang rung /
'dod chags dang ma bral ba yang rung /
dbang po sbyor ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam la drug 'thob ste /
na saṃvṛtijñānasya /
darśanamārga sādṛśyāt 		snga ma bzhin no /
kun rdzob shes pa ni ma yin te /
mthong ba'i lam dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
na paracittajñānasya pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang ma yin te /
sarvānantaryamārga pratipiddhatvāt bar chad med pa'i lam thams cad la bkag pa'i phyir ro /
kimartha pratipidhyate /
apratipakṣatvāt 		ci'i phyir bkag pa ci zhe na /
gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
bhavāgravijaye tathā /
bhavāgravairāgye 'pyānantaryamārgeṣu ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā tathaiva /
navānāṃ tu kṣayajñāne 		de bzhin srid rtse'i rnam rgyal la /
srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam rnams la yang de bzhin du drug 'thob bo /
zad pa shes pa la dgu'o /
bhavāgravairāgye navamo vimuktimārgaḥ kṣayajñānam /
tatra navānāṃ jñānānāṃ bhāvanā anyatrānutpādajñānāt 		srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa ni zad pa shes pa yin te /
de la mi skye ba shes pa ma gtogs pa shes pa dgu 'thob po /
akopyasya daśa bhāvanā mi g yo bas ni bcu 'thob bo /
yastvakopyadharmā bhavati tasya daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ bhāvanā mi g yo ba'i chos can gang yin pa des ni bcu 'thob ste /
anutpādajñānalābhāt /
tatsaṃcare 'ntyamuktau ca 		mi skye ba shes pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro /
der 'pho ba'i grol ba tha ma la'ang /
yo 'pyakopyatāṃ saṃcarati tasyāpyantye vimuktimārge daśānāṃ bhāvanā gang zhig mi g yo ba nyid du 'pho ba de'i rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma la yang bcu 'thob bo; /
proktaśeṣe 'ṣṭabhāvanā bshad pa'i lhag ma la brgyad 'thob bo /
kiṃ punaḥ śeṣam lhag ma yang gang zhig ce na /
kāmavairāgye navamo vimuktimārgaḥ saptabhūmivairāgyābhijñāvyavakīrṇabhāviteṣu vimuktimārgaḥ akopyaprativedho 'ṣṭau vimuktimārgāḥ sarve ca vītarāgasya prayogaviśeṣamārgāḥ 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa dang sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mngon par shes pa dang spel mar bsgom pa dag gis rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams dang mi g yo ba rtogs par byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sbyor ba dang khyad par can gyi lam thams cad de /
teṣu sarveṣvaṣṭau jñānāni bhāvyante /
anāgatabhāvanayā kṣayānutpādajñāne hitvā 		de dag thams cad la ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa ma gtogs pa shes pa brgyad ma 'ongs pa 'thob pas 'thob pa ste /
śaikṣasyaivam /
aśaikṣasya punarabhijñādiprayogavimuktaviśeṣamārgeṣu nava jñānāni daśa vā /
abhijñāvyavakīrṇabhāvitānantaryavimuktimārgeṣu tvaṣṭau nava vā dvayostvabhhijñāvimuktimārgayoravyākṛtatvānna kicidanāgate bhāvyate /
pṛthagjanasya tu kāmatridhyānavairāgyāntyavimuktimārgeṣu dhyānabhūmikeṣu ca prayogābhijñātrayavimuktimārgāpramāṇādiguṇābhinirhāreṣu saṃvṛtijñānamanāgataṃ bhāvyate paracittajñānaṃ cānyatra nirvedhabhāgīyebhyaḥ /
teṣu hi paracittajñānaṃ na bhāvyate /
darśanamārgaparivāratvāt /
anyatrāpūrvamārgalābhe saṃvāṛtijñānamevānāgataṃ bhāvyate /
atha kasminmārge katibhūmikaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvyate /
