saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tāvadyadbhūmiko mārgo yāṃ ca prathamato bhūmi labhate tadbhūmikamanāgataṃ bhāvyate /
anāsravaṃ tu na kevalaṃ yadbhūmiko mārgaḥ 		slob pa ni de lta bu yin no /
mi slob pa'i mngon pa shes pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam rnams la shes pa dgu 'am bcu 'thob bo /
mngon par shes pa dang spel mar bsgom pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam rnams la ni brgyad dam dgu 'thob po /
mngon par shes pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa cung zad kyang mi 'thob bo /
so so'i skye bo ni 'dod pa dang bsam gtan gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma rnams dang bsam gtan gyis pa dag gi sbyor ba rnams dang mngon par shes pa gsum gyi rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams dang tshad med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mngon par sgrub pa rnams la kun rdzob shes pa ma 'ongs pa dang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag gi sbyor ba rnams dang mngon par shes pa gsum gyi rnam par grol ba ma gtogs pa pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang 'thob bo /
de dag la ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa yang mi 'thob ste /
mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro /
sngon med pa'i lam thob pa gzhan la ni kun rdzob shes pa kho na ma 'ongs pa 'thob bo /
yang lam gang las du pa'i shes pa thob ce na /
re zhig kun rdzob shes pa ni lam sa gang pa'i yin pa dang dang po nyid du sa gang 'thob pas de pa'i ma 'ongs pa 'thob bo /
zag pa med pa'i lam gang yin pa 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad do /
kiṃ tarhi /
yardvarāgyāya yallābhastatra cādhaśca bhāvyate /
yadbhūmivairāgyāyāpi hi dvividho 'pi mārgo bhavati prayogamārgādiḥ yāṃ ca bhūmi labhate vairāgyatastdbhūmikānyadhobhūmikāni cānāsravāṇi jñānāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
gang las chags bral bya phyir gang /
'thab pa der yang 'og ma'ang 'thob /
sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba la yang lam yang sbyor ba'i lam la sogs pa rnam pa gnyis yin la /
'dod chags dang bral ba sa gang zhig thob ba de'i sa ba dang sa 'og ma ba'i zag pa med pa'i shes pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro /
sāsravāśca kṣayajñāne /
kṣayajñāne tu sarvabhūmikāḥ sāsravā api guṇāḥ kṣayajñānalābhikā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti a rajjucchedāducchvasantīva peḍāsādharmyeṇa 		zad pa shes la zag bcas kyang /
sa kun zad pa shes pa la ni zad pa shes pas 'thob pa zag pa dang bcas pa'i yon tan mi sdug pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang tshad med pa dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pas thams cad sprog ma thag pa bcad de /
dbugs phyin pa lta bu dang chos mthun pa 'thob ste /
svacittādhirājyaprāptasya prāptibhiḥ sarvakuśaladharmapratyudgamanādādhirājyaporaptau prābhṛtena viṣayapratyudgamanavat rgyal srid chen po thob na /
yul gyi mi rnams kyis dbul bar bya bas bsu ba bzhin du rang gi sems la rgyal srid chen po nyid 'thob pa la dge ba'i chos thams cad 'thob pa rnams kyis bsu ba'i phyir ro /
yat kicillabhyate tatsarva bhāvyate gang ci rnyed pa de thams cad 'thob bam zhe na /
smras pa /
yadapūrva labhyate tat bhāvyate /
labdhapūrva na bhāvyate /
yadvihīnaṃ punarlabhyate na tt bhāvyate 		gang sngon med pa las rnyed pa yin pas /
de thams cad ni 'thob kyi /
sngon rnyed zin pa ni mi 'thob bo /
gang rnam par nyams pa las yang rnyed ba de yang mi 'thob ste /
bhāvitotsṛṣṭatvāt /
kiṃ khalu pratilambha eva bhāvanā netyucyate 		thob pa btang ba'i phyir ro /
ci 'thob pa rnyed pa kho na yin nam zhe na /
caturvidhā hi bhāvanā /
pratilambhabhāvanā niṣevaṇabhāvanā pratipakṣabhāvanā vinirdhāvanabhāvanā ca 		smras pa ma yin no /
'thob pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
nyen pa 'thob pa dang bsten pa 'thob pa dang gnyen po 'thob pa dang thag bsring ba 'thob ba'o /
tatra /
pratilambhaniṣevākhye śubhasaṃskṛtabhāvane 		de la rnyed pa dang bsten ces bya ba ni /
dge ba 'dus byas 'thob bo /
pratipakṣavinirdhavabhāvane sāsravasya tu gnyen po dang ni thag bsring ba'i /
'thob pa zag dang bcas pa'i yin /
pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane kujñalasaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmanāgatānāmekā pratyutpannānāmubhe rnyed pa dang bsten pa 'thob pa dag ni dge ba 'dus byas rnams kyi yin te /
ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi ni gcig go /
da ltar byung ba rnams kyi ni gnyi ga'o /
pratipakṣavinirdhāvanabhāvane sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇām /
tadevaṃ kuśalasāsravāṇāṃ catasro bhāvanā bhavanti 		gnyen po dang thag bsring ba 'thob pa dag ni /
zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi yin te /
de ltar na dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi ni 'thob pa bzhi yin no /
anāsravāṇāṃ dve kliṣṭāvyākṛtānāṃ ca /
bāhyābhidharmikāṇāṃ ṣaṭ bhāvnāḥ /
etāścatasraḥ saṃvarabhāvanā vibhāvana ca 		zag pa med pa rnams dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi ni gnyis yin no /
chos mngon pa pa nyi 'og pa rnams kyi ltar na 'thob pa drug ste /
bzhi po de dag dang sdom pa 'thob pa dang rnam par 'jig pa 'thob pa'o /
indriyāṇāṃ pūrvī kāyasyottarā /
ṣaḍigānīndriyāṇi sudāntāni yāvatsubhāvitāni tathā santyasminkāye kleśā iti vistaraḥ 		snga ma ni dbang po rnams kyi yin la /
phyi ma ni lus kyi yin te /
dbang po drug po 'di dag shin tu dul ba dang shin tu bsgoms pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang de bzhin du lus 'di la skra yang yod ces bya ba rgyas par gsungs pa yin no /
te tu pratipakṣanirdhāvabhāvanāntarbhūte iti kāśmīrāḥ gang dag kha che ba rnams na re de gnyis ni gnyen po dang thag bsring ba 'thob pa'i khongs su 'dus so zhes zer ro /
sāmānyena sarveṣāṃ pudgalānāṃ kṣayajñāne guṇabhāvanoktā /
aṣṭādaśāveṇikāstu buddhadharmā balādayaḥ 		gang zag thams cad kyis zad pa shes pa'i tshe /
yon tan 'thob pa'i phyir bshad kyi /
sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa /
stobs la sogs pa bco brgyad do /
ye buddhasyaiva bhagavataḥ kṣayajñāne bhāvanāṃ gacchanti nānyasya /
katame 'ṣṭādaśa /
daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni mahākaruṇā ca 		gang dag sangs rgyas kho nas zad pa mkhyen pa'i tshe brnyes par 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin pa'o /
bco brgyad gang zhe na /
stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang thugs rje chen po'o /
asādhāraṇaṃ hyāveṇikamityucyate /
tatra /
sthānāsthāne daśa jñānāni /
sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ daśa jñānāni /
aṣṭau karmaphale 		thun mong ma yin pas na ma 'dres pa zhes bya'o /
de la /
gnas dang gnas min shes pa bcu /
gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa bcu yin no /
las 'bras la brgyad /
kamavipākajñānabalamaṣṭī jñānāni las dang rnam par smin pa 'am mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa brgyad de /
nirodhamārgajñāne hitvā 'gog pa dang lam shes pa dag ma gtogs so /
nava /
dhyānādyakṣādhhimokṣeṣu dhātau ca 		bsam gtan sogs /
dbang po mos dang khams la ni /
dgu'o /
dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalaṃ nava jñānāni bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa dgu yin te /
nirodha jñānaṃ hitvā /
evamindriyaparāparajñāna balaṃ nānādhimuktijñānabalaṃ nānādhātujñānabalaṃ veditavyam /
pratipatsu tu /
daśa vā /
nava veti matavikalpā 'rtho vāśabdaḥ 		'gog pa shes pa ma gtogs so /
dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
lam dag la bcu'am /
'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dgu 'am zhes lugs tha dad pa'i don te /
yadi saphalā pratipat gṛhyate /
sarvatragāminī pratipajjñānabalaṃ daśa jñānāni 		gal te lam de 'bras bu dang bcas par gzung na ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen ba'i stobs shes pa bcu'o /
na cennava /
anyatra nirodhajñānāt 		gal te ma yin na ni dgu ste /
'gog pa shes pa ma gtogs so /
saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dvayoḥ gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa yin /
pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānabalaṃ ca saṃvṛtijñānam /
ṣaṭ daśa vā kṣaye /
āsravakṣayajñānabalaṃ saḍ jñānāni dharmānvayanirodhakṣayānutpādasaṃvṛtijñānāniṃ /
yadi nirodhajñānamevāsravakṣayajñānam 		sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang shi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ni kun rdzob shes pa yin no /
zad pa drug gam bcu yin no /
gal te zag pa zad pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa kho na zhig yin na ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs shes pa drug yin te /
chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang 'gog pa shes pa dang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams so /
atha kṣīṇasravasaṃtāne jñānamāsravakṣayajñānaṃ tato daśa jñānāni 'on te zad pa shes pa zad pa zad pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i shes pa yin na ni /
des na shes pa bcu yin no /
uktaḥ svabhāvo bhūmiridānīmucyate rang bzhin bshad zin to /
da ni sa brjod par bya ste /
prāṅinavisacyutotpādabaladhyāneṣu sngon gnas shi 'pho skye ba'i stobs /
bsam gtan dag na /
cyutireva cyutam /
pūrvanivāsacyutyupapatījñānaṃ balaṃ caturdhyānabhūmikam 		'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho ba kho na ste /
sngon gyi gnas dang shi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa ba yin no /
śeṣitam /
sarvabhūmiṣu /
śeṣaṃ balaṃ sarvabhūmisaṃgṛhītam 		lhag ma ni sa rnams kun na /
stobs lhag ma ni sa thams cad kyis bsdus pa yin te /
tāḥ punarekādaśa /
kāmadhāturanāgamya dhyānāntaraṃ dhyānārupyāśca 		de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams dang mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'o /
sarvāṇi /
jambūdvīpapuruṣāśrayāṇi 		thams cad kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa'i rten can yin te /
anyatra duddhānutpādāt /
tadetaddaśavidhaṃ jñānamanyasya balaṃ nocyate 		gzhan du sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
shes pa rnam pa bcu po 'di nyid gzhan gyi ni stobs zhes mi bya'o /
buddhasyaiva balamiti sangs rgyas kho na'i stobs zhes bya'o /
kenāsya balamavyāhatam yataḥ ci'i phyir /
'di'i stobs gang phyir thogs mi mnga' /
yasmādasya sarvatra jñeye jñānabhavyāhataṃ vartate tasmādvalam gang gi phyir 'di'i mkhyen pa shes bya thams cad la thogs pa mi mnga' bar 'jug pa de'i phyir stobs yin no /
aneṣāṃ tu vyāhanyate /
jñānaṃ vavacidicchatāmapyapravṛtteriti nārhati tadbalādhyāṃ labdhum /
sthaviraśāriputreṇa pravrajyāpekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānaṃ śyenopadrutasya pakṣiṇa upapattyādīparyantājñānaṃ cātrodāharaṇam 		gzhan dag gi shes pa ni la lar 'dod kyang mi 'jug pa'i phyir /
thogs pa yin pas de ni stobs zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'os pa ma yin te /
'dir dpe ni gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi phyir btang ba dang bya zhig khras gtses pa skye ba la sogs pa'i mtha' ma shes pa lta bu yin no /
evaṃ tāvadavyāhatajñānatvādbuddhānāṃ jñeyavadanantaṃ mānasaṃ balam re zhig de ltar na mkhyen pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi stobs ni shes bzhin du mtha' yas pa yin no /
nārāyaṇabalaṃ kāye sku la sred med bu yi stobs /
kāye punarbuddhasya nārāyaṇaṃ balaṃ varṇayati sangs rgyas kyi sku la ni srid med bu'i stobs mnga'o zhes brjod do /
saṃdhiṣvanye gzhan dag tshigs na /
sandhau sandhau nārāyaṇabalamityapare gzhan dag na re tshigs dang tshigs na sred med kyi bu'i stobs mnga'o zhes zer ro /
mānasavat kāyikamapyasyāna taṃ balamiti bhadantaḥ /
anyathā hyananatajñānabalasahiṣṇu naṃ syāditi 		btsun pa na re sku'i stobs kyang thugs kyi stobs bzhin du mtha' yas pa yin no /
de lta ma yin na mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pas bzod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
nāgagrandhiśaṅkalāśaṅkusaṃdhayaśca budhapratyekabuddhacakravartinaḥ sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi tshigs kyi mdud pa dang lu gu brgyud dang gzar bus btab pa lta bu dag yin no /
kiṃ punarnārāyaṇasya balasya pramāṇam sred med kyi bu'i stobs kyi tshad ji tsam zhe na /
daśādhikam /
hastyādisaptakabalam 		glang chen sogs bdun cus glags pa'i stobs yin no /
yaddaśānāṃ prākṛtahastināṃ balaṃ tadekasya gandhahastinaḥ glang po che phal pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni spos kyi glang po che gcig gi stobs yin no /
evaṃ mahānagnapraskandivarāṅgacānūranārāyaṇānāṃ daśottaravṛddhirvattavyā de bzhin du tshan po che chen po dang rab gnon dang yan lag mchog dang stobs mchog dang sred med kyi bu rnams gong nas gong du bcu 'gyur du bskyed de brjod par bya'o /
prākṛtagandhahastimahānagnapraskandināṃ daśāttaravṛddhacyārdhanārāyaṇaṃ balaṃ tat dviguṇaṃ nārāyaṇa mityapare /
yathā tu vahutara tathā yujyate /
spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ ca tat /
taccatatkāyikaṃ balaṃ sarvasyaiva spraṣṭavyāyatanasvabhāvaṃ mahābhūtaviśeṣa eva 		gzhan dag na re glang po che phal ba dang spos kyi glang po che dang tshan po che chen po dang rab gnon dang yan lag mchog dang stobs mchog rnams gong nas gong du bcu 'gyur du bskyed pa ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs kyi phyed yin la /
de gnyis su bsgyur ba ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs yin no zhes zer te /
ji ltar ches che ba de ltar rung ngo /
de ni reg bya'i skye mched do /
lus kyi stobs de ni thams cad kyang reg bya'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin 'byung ba chen po'i khyad par kho na yin par rig par bya'o /
upādāyarūpaṃ saptabhyo 'rthāntaramityapare gzhan dag na re bdun las don gzhan du gyur pa rgyur byas pa'i gzugs yin no zhes zer ro /
uktāni valāni /
vaiśāradhyaṃ caturdhā tu 		stobs rnams bshad zin to /
mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi /
yathāsūtram /
etāni punaścatvāri vaiśāradyāni 		mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no /
mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag kyang /
yathādyadaśame bale /
dvitīyasaptame caiva /
yathā sthānāsthānajñānabalamevaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me sate ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam /
yathāsravakṣayajñānabalamevaṃ kṣīṇāsravasya vata me sata ityetadvaiśāradyam /
yathā karmasvakajñānavalamevaṃ ye vā punarmayā śrāvakāṇāmantarāyikā dharmā ādhyātā ityetadvaiśāradyam /
yathā sarvatragāminī pratipajjñānaṃ valamevaṃ yo va punarmayā śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ādhyāta ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam 		ji ltar stobs ni dang po dang bcu pa gnyis pa bdun pa bzhin no /
gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar /
kye mang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o /
zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar kye mang zag pa zad par gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra'o /
las bdag gir bya ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar ngas gang dag nyan thos rnam la bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra'o /
kun du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar das gang nyan thos rnams kyi nges par 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o /
kathaṃ na jñānameva vaiśārdyam /
nirbhayatā hi vaiśāradyam 		ji ltar na mkhyen pa nyid mi 'jigs pa yin zhe na /
mi 'jigs pa ni mi skrag pa yin la /
ebhiśca nirbhayo bhavati 'di dag gis kyang mi skrag par 'gyur ro /
jñānakṛtaṃ vaiśāradyaṃ yujyate /
na jñānameva /
trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni parṣadbhedāt bhavanti yathāsūtram 		shes pas byas pa ni mi 'jigs par rung gi shes pa nyid ni ma yin no /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni 'khor gyi bye brag las gsum yin te /
tattvetat /
smṛtiprajñātmakaṃ trayam /
smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāvānyetāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni 		mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no /
de yang dran pa shes rab dag nyid gsum /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum po 'di dag ni dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no /
yadā śrāvakasyāpi śuśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūpamāṇobhayeṣvānandī na bhavatyāghāto vā gang gi tshe nyan thos dag kyang gus par nyan pa dang gus par mi nyan pa dang gnyi ga la kun du dga' ba'am /
kun nas mnar sems mi 'byung ba na /
kasmādete āveṇikā buddhadharmā ucyante ci'i phyir /
'di dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya zhe na /
savāsanaprahāṇāt /
athavā yasya śrāvakāstasya cacchūśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūṣamāṇobhayeṣu saumanasyādyavakāśaḥ sutarāṃ na tathā 'nyasyeti tasyaiva tānutpādādāścarya vyavasthāpyate nānyasyeti 		bag chags dang bcas par spangs pa'i phyir ro /
yang na nyan thos rnams gang yin pa de la ni gus par nyan pa dang gus par mi nyan pa dang gnyis po de dag la shin tu yang yid bde ba la sogs pa'i go skabs su mi 'gyur gyi /
gzhan la ni de lta ma yin pas de kho na la de mi 'byung ba ya mtshan du rnam par gzhag gi gzhan la ni ma yin no /
mahākaruṇedānī vaktavyā da ni thugs rje chen po brjod par bya ste /
seyamucyate de smras pa /
mahākṛpā saṃvṛtidhīḥ thugs rje chen po kun rdzob blo /
saṃvṛtijñānātmikā mahākaruṇā thugs rje chen po ni kun rdzob shes pa'i bdag nyid yin no /
anyathā hi na sarvasattvālambanā sidhyet na ca triduḥkhatākārā /
karuṇāvat /
kasmādiyaṃ mahākaruṇetyucyate 		de lta ma yin na sems can thams cad la dmigs par yang mi 'grub la /
snying rje bzhin du sdug bsngal gsum gyi rnam pa can du yang mi 'grub bo /
'di ci'i phyir thugs rje chen po zhes bya zhe na /
saṃbhārākāragocaraiḥ tshogs dang rnam pa spyod yul dang /
samatvādādhimāvyācca mnyam pa'i phyir dang ches che'i phyir /
sabhāreṇa mahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhārasamudāgamāt tshogs ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen pos yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro /
ākāreṇa triduḥkhatākaraṇāt rnam pa ni sdug bsngal gsum la rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
ālambanena tridhātukālambanāt dmigs pa ni khams gsum pa'i sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
samatyena sarvasattveṣu samavṛttitvāt mnyam pa nyid ni sems can thams cad la 'dra bar 'jug pa'i phyir ro; /
abhimātratvena sarvasttveṣu samavṛttitvāt ches che ba nyid ni de bas cha ba med pa'i phyir ro /
adhimātratvena tato 'dhimātratarābhāvāt /
karuṇāmahākaruṇayoḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇam 		snying rje dang thugs rje chen po gnyis la tha dad du bya ba ni ci zhig yod ce na /
nānākaraṇamaṣṭdhā tha dad bya ba rnam pa brgyad /
svabhāvato 'dveṣāmohasvabhāvatvāt /
ākārata ekatriduḥkhatākāratvāt /
ālambanata ekatridhātvālambanatvāt /
bhūmitaścaturdhyānacaturthadhyānabhūmikatvāt 		ngo bo nyid las ni zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal gcig dang gsum gyi rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir ro /
dmigs pa las ni khams gcig dang gsum gyi sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
sa las ni bsam gtan bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
saṃtānataḥ śrāvakādibuddhasaṃtānajatvāt /
lābhataḥ kāmadhātubhavāgravairāgyalabhyatvāt /
aparitrāṇaparitrāṇataḥ atulyakaruṇāyanācca 		rgyud las ni nyan thos la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
thob pa las ni 'dod pa'i khams dang srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ punaḥ sarve buddhāḥ sarvaprakārasāmānyā bhavanti /
netyāha 		yongs su mi skyob pa dang yongs su skyob pa dang mi 'dra ba dang 'dra bar thugs rje mdzad pa'i phyir ro /
saṃbhāradharmakāyābhyāṃ jagataścārthacaryayā ci sangs rgyas thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyis mnyam ba yin nam zhe na /
samatā sarvabuddhānāṃ nāyurjātipramāṇataḥ sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs dang ni /
chos sku 'gro ba'i don spyod pas /
tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sāmyaṃ sarvabuddhānām /
sarvapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārasamudāgamataḥ dharmakāyapariniṣpattitaḥ arthacaryayā ca lokasya /
āyurjātigotrapramāṇakṛtastu bhedo bhavati 		mnyam pa nyid de sku tshe dang /
rigs dang sku bong tshod kyis min /
sangs rgyas thams cad ni rgyu gsum po sngon gyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'grub pa dang chos kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa dang 'jig rten gyi don spyod pas mnyam pa nyid yin no /
cirālpatarajīvanāt kṣatriyavrāhmaṇajātibhedāt kāśyapagautamādigotrabhedāt alpānalpapramāṇabhedācca yathakālamiti /
etāmeva ca trividhāṃ saṃpadaṃ manasikurvāṇena viduṣā śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike tīvraprema gauravaṃ cotpādayituṃ yaduta hetusaṃpadaṃ phalasaṃpadamupakārasaṃpadaṃ ca 		sku tshe dang rigs dang gdung dang sku bong tshod du mdzad pa la ni bye brag yod de dus ji lta ba bzhin du yun shin tu ring ba dang thung ngur 'tsho ba'i phyir dang rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rigs tha dad pa'i phyir dang 'od srungs dang sh'akya la sogs pa gdung tha dad pa'i phyir dang sku bong tshod chung ba dang chung ba ma yin pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum po 'di kho na yid la byed pa mkhas pas ni /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dga' ba dang gus pa chen po skyed par nus te /
'di lta ste /
rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o /
tatra caturdhā hetusaṃpat de la rgyu phun sum tshogs pa ni; rnam pa bzhi ste /
sarvapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārābhyāso dīrghakālābhyāso nirantarābhyāsaḥ satkṛtyābhyāsaśca bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la goms pa dang yun ring po nas goms pa dang bar chad med par goms pa dang gus par byas te goms pa'o /
caturvidhā phalasaṃpat /
jñānasaṃpat prahāṇasaṃpat prabhāvasaṃpadrūpakayasaṃpacva 		'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa ba ni ste /
ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang spang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa'o /
caturvidhopakārasaṃpat /
apāyatrayasaṃsāraduḥkhātyantanirmokṣasaṃpat yānatrayasugati pratiṣṭhāpanasaṃpadvā /
jñānasaṃpat punaścaturvidhā 		phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las gtan du thar bar mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'o /
yang na theg pa gsum dang bde 'gro la 'god par mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'o /
ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
anupadiṣṭajñānaṃ sarvatrajñāna sarvathājñānamayatnajñānaṃ ca ma bstan par mkhyen pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ma 'bad par mkhyen pa'o /
caturvidhā prahāṇasaṃpat /
sarvakleśaprahāṇam atyantaprahāṇaṃ savāsanaprahāṇaṃ sarvasamādhisamāpattyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ ca caturvidhā prabhāvasaṃpat 		spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang gtan du spangs pa dang bag chags dang bcas te spangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib ba thams cad spangs pa'o /
mthu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
bāhyaviṣayanirmāṇapariṇāmanā dhiṣṭhānavaśityasaṃpat āyurutptargādhiṣṭhānavaśitvasaṃpat āvṛtākāśadūrakṣīpragamanālpavahutvapraveśana vaśitvasaṃpat vividhanijāścaryadharmasaṃpacca phyi'i yul sprul pa dang yongs su bsgyur ba dang sku tshe gtong ba dang byin gyis rlob pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang sgrib pa dang nam mkha' dang shin tu ring ba la myur du gshegs pa dang chung ngur mang po 'jug par mdzad pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang ya mtshan gyi chos nar ma rnam ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'o /
caturvidhā rūpakāyasaṃpat gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
lakṣaṇasaṃpat anuvyañjanasaṃpat balasaṃpat vajrasārāsthisaṃpat /
ityetatsāmāsikaṃ buddhānāṃ māhātmyam /
anantaprabhedaṃ tu tadbhidyamānaṃ jāyate 		mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang sku gdung rdo rje ltar sra ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa'o /
de ltar na de dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid mdor bsdus pa yin no /
de dbyen ni mtha' yas par 'gyur te /
tacca punarbuddhā eva sakalaṃ jñātuṃ baktuṃ ca samarthāḥ yadyanekāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kalpaṃ jīvitamadhitiṣṭheyuḥ de yang bcom ldan 'das rnams kho na nas gal te sku tshe bskal pa grangs med pa du mar byin gyis brlabs par gyur na mtha' dag mkhyen pa dang brjod par spyod do /
evaṃ ca tāvadanantādbhūtaguṇajñānaprabhāvopakāramāharatnākarāstathāgatāḥ /
atha capunarbālāḥ svaguṇadāridracyahatādhimokṣāḥ śruṇvanto 'pi tāṃ tādṛśīṃ guṇasamṛddhiṃ buddhaṃ ca nādriyante tasya ca dharmam 		re zhig de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yon tan dang ye shes dang mthu dang phan 'dogs pa mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba ni rin po che chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no /
'on kyang byis pa rang nyid yon tan dbul bas mos pa bcom pa rnams ni yon tan 'byor pa de lta bu de thos su zin kyang sangs rgyas dang de'i chos la gus par mi byed kyi /
paṇḍitāstu punarmajjābhirapi taṃ bhagavantamabhiprapadyante tasya ca dharmam mkhas pa rnams ni rkang yan chad nas kyang /
bcom ldan 'das de dang de'i chos la mngon par rab tu dang bar 'gyur te /
te he śraddhāmātrakeṇāpyekāntikenābhiprasannā aniyatavipākānāṃ pāpānāṃ rāśīnabhibhūya daivīṃ mānuṣīṃ ca śriyamabhibhūya nirvāṇaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvartante /
ata eva tathāgatā anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetramucyante 		gcig tu rab tu dang ba de dag ni dang ba tsam gyis kyang rnam par smin par ma nges pa'i sdig pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan te lha dang mi'i legs pa nyams su myong nas bgrod par bya ba'i mchog mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro /
de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa zhes bya ste /
avandhyeṣṭhaporakṛṣṭāśusvantaphalatvāt /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā /
ye 'nyānapi jine kārānkariṣyanti vināyake /
vicitraṃ svargamāgamya te lapsyante 'mṛtaṃ padamiti /
ime tāvadaṣṭādaśa buddhānāmāveṇikā dharmā ucyante 		'bras bu med pa ma yin pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang mchog tu gyur pa dang myur ba dang mtha' bzang ba'i phyir ro /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
gang dag rgyal ba rnam 'dren la /
bya ba chung ngu byed 'gyur ba'ang /
de dag mtho ris sna tshogs dag /
bgrod nas bdud rtsi'i go 'phang 'thob /
ces gsungs so /
re zhig de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya'o /
śiṣyasādhāraṇā anye dharmāḥ /
śrāvakasādhāraṇāstvanye guṇā buddhānām /
kecit pṛthagjanaiḥ /
ke punasta iti yathāyogam 		chos gzhan slob dang thun mong min /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan gzhan dag ni nyan thos dang thun mong yin no /
kha cig so so'i skye bo dang de dag kyang gang zhe na /
ci rigs par /
nyon mongs med dang smon nas shes /
so so yang dag rig sngon sogs /
araṇāpraṇidhijñānapratisaṃvidguṇādayaḥ /
araṇapraṇidhijñānapratisaṃvidabhijñādhyānārupyāṃpramāṇavimokṣābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanādayaḥ /
tatrāraṇā nāma kaścidevārhan kleśaprabhavaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ viditvātmānaṃ ca dakṣiṇīyaviśeṣaṃ pareṣāṃ tadālambanaṃ kleśotpādaṃ parihartukāmastādṛśaṃ jñānamutpādayati bhena pareṣāṃ sarvathā 'pi raṇaṃ notpādayati 		nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa dang tshad med pa dang rnam par thar pa dang zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang zad par gyi skye mched la sogs pa'o /
de la nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa la sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni nyon mongs pa las rab tu skye ba dang bdag nyid kyang yon gnas gyi [*kyi] khyad par yin par rig nas pha rol po dag de la dmigs nas /
nyon mongs pa skye ba yongs su spangs par 'dod de /
na kasyacittadālambano rāga utpadyate dveṣo māno vā /
naiṣā pratipat kañcideva raṇayatītyaraṇā /
sā punareṣā /
saṃvṛtijñānamaraṇā /
ayamasyā svabhāvaḥ /
dhyāne 'ntye /
caturthadhyāna bhūmikā sukhapratipadāmagratvāt 		gang gis na pha rol po dag rnam pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa skye bar mi byed cing 'ga' yang de la dmigs nas 'dod chags sam /
zhes sdang ngam /
nga rgyal skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes pa skyed bar byed pa ste /
lam de ni 'ga' yang nyon mongs pa skyed par mi byed pas na nyon mongs pa med pa yin no /
nyon mongs pa med par de ni /
kun rdzob shes /
de'i rang bzhin ni 'di yin no /
bsam gtan mtha' na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin te /
lam sla ba rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro /
akopyadharmaṇaḥ mi g yo ba'i chos /
nānyasyārhataḥ /
anyo hi svasaṃtānādapi kadācit kleśaraṇaṃ parihartu na śaknoti 		dgra bcom pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
gzhan ni res 'ga' rang gi rgyud las kyang nyon mongs pa mtha' dag yongs su spang bar mi nus so /
nṛjā /
manuṣyeṣvevotpadyate triṣu dvīpeṣu 		mis skyed /
gling gsum du mi dag gi nang kho nar skyed par byed do /
anutpannakāmāptasavastukleśagocarāḥ nyon mongs 'dod gtogs pa /
ma skyed gzhir bcas spyod yul can /
anāgatāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ savastukāḥ kleśāḥ asyā ālambanaṃ nāpareṣāṃ kleśa udapādītyevaṃ pravṛttatvāt 'di'i dmigs pa ni nyon mongs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa ma 'ongs pa gzhi dang bcas pa rnams yin te /
pha rol po dag nyon mongs pa skye bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba de ltar zhugs pa'i phyir ro /
avastukāstu kleśā na śakyāḥ parihartuṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ sakalasvabhūmyālambanatvāt nyon mongs pa gzhi med pa rnams ni yongs su spang bar mi nus te /
thams cad du 'gro ba rnams ne rang gis mtha' dag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
yathā cāraṇoktā /
tathaiva praṇidhijñānaṃ /
tadapi hi saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dhyāne 'ntye 'kopyadharmaṇaḥ manuṣyāśrayaṃ ca 		nyon mongs pa med pa ji skad du bshad pa /
smon nas shes pa'ang de bzhin no /
de yang kun rdzob shes pa dang /
bsam gtan mtha' na yod pa dang /
mi g yo ba'i chos can gyi yin pa dang mi'i rten can yin no /
sarvālambaṃ tu tat /
sarvadharmālambanaṃ tu praṇidhijñānamityeva viśeṣaḥ 		de'i dmigs pa thams cad do /
smon nas shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos thams cad yin bas 'di ni bye brag yin no /
ārupyāstu na sākṣāt prāṇidhijñānena jñāyante bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re smon nas shes pa gzugs med pa rnams mngon sum du mi shes so /
kiṃ tarhi /
niṣpannacaritaviśeṣāt /
karṣakanidarśanaṃ cātreti vaibhāṣikāḥ 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
rgyu mthun pa dang spyod pa'i bye brag las shes te /
'dir dpe ni zhing ba lta bu'o zhes zer ro /
praṇidhipūrvakaṃ jñānaṃ praṇidhijñānaṃ yaddhi praṇidhāya prāntakoṭikaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ samāpadyate smon pa sngar btang ba'i shes pa ni smon nas shes pa ste /
'di shes par bya'o snyam du smon nas rab kyi mtha'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug cing /
idaṃ jānīyāmiti tadyathābhūtaṃ jānāti /
sarvastatsamādhiviṣayaḥ 		ting nge 'dzin de'i yul du ji tsam zhig gyur pa gang yin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'o /
tathā /
dharmārthayorniruktau ca pratibhāne ca saṃvidaḥ 		de bzhin chos don des tshig dang /
spobs pa so so yang dag rig /
catasro hi pratisaṃvidaḥ so so yang dag par rig pa ni bzhi ste /
dharmapratisaṃvidarthapratisaṃvinniruktipratisaṃvitpratibhānapratisaṃvicca chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang don so so yang dag par rig pa dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o /
tā api dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidastathaiva yathā 'raṇā /
kimāsāṃ tathaiva akopyadharmamanuṣyāśrayatvam /
ālambanabhūmisvabhāvaviśeṣastvāsāṃ pṛthagucyate 		de dag kyang nyon mongs pa med pa ji lta ba de dang 'dra'o /
de dag gi de dang 'dra ba ci zhe na /
mi g yo ba'i chos can gyi yin pa dang mi'i rten can nyid yin no /
'di dag gi dmigs pa dang sa dang rang gi ngo bo'i bye brag ni tha dad par brjod de /
tisro nāmathavāgjñānamavivartya yathākramam gsum ni go rims bzhin ming dang /
don dang ngag la thogs med shes /
nāmapadavyañjanakāyeṣvarthavācitā avivartyajñānaṃ dharmāthaṃniruktipratisaṃvido yathākramam chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni go rims bzhin du ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams dang don dang ngag la thogs pa med par shes pa yin no /
caturthīyuktomuktābhilāpamārgavaśitvayoḥ bzhi pa rigs pa thags thogs med /
mngon brjod lam la dbang nyid dang /
avivartyaṃ jñānamiti vartate thogs pa med par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
yuktamutābhilāpitāyāṃ samādhivaśisaṃprakyāne cāvivartyaṃ jñānaṃ pratibhānasaṃvit /
vāṅmārgālambanā cāsau /
vākca mārgaśca tasyāḥ ālmvanam 		spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni rigs pa dang thags thogs med par mngon par brjod pa nyid dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang gsal bar bya ba la thogs pa med par shes pa yin no /
de yi dmigs pa ngag dang lam /
de'i dmigs pa ni ngag kyang yin la lam yang yin no /
nava jñānāni shes pa dgu'o /
navajñānasvabhāvā pratibhānapratisaṃvidanyatra nirodhajñānāt spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes pa dgu'i rang bzhin yin te /
'gog ba shes pa ma gtogs so /
sarvabhūḥ sa thams cad /
sarvabhūmikā cāsau kāmadhātau yāvat bhavāgre vāṅmārgayoranyatarālambanāt /
daśa ṣaḍvā 'rthasaṃvit 		'di ni ngag dang lam gnyis las gang yang rung pa zhig la dmigs pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar sa thams cad ba yang yin no /
yang dag don rig bcu 'am drug /
arthapratibhānasaṃvit sarvadharmāśccedarthā daśa jñānāni don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gal te don chos thams cad yin na ni shes pa bcu yin no /
nirvāṇaṃ cedarthaḥ ṣaṭ jñānāni gal te don mya ngan las 'das pa yan na ni shes pa drug ste /
dharmānvayanirodhakṣayānutpādasaṃvṛtijñānāni /
sā sarvatra 		chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang 'gog pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams so /
don ni kun na /
sā punareṣā 'rthapratisaṃvit sarvabhūmikā don so so yang dag par rig pa de ni sa thams cad pa yin no /
anye tu sāṃvṛtam gzhan kun rdzob /
anye tu dve dharmaniruktipratisavidau saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāve nāmakāyādivāgālambanasvabhāvatvāt gzhan chos dang nges pa'i tshigs so so yang dag par rig pa gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa'i rang bzhin dag yin te /
ming gi tshogs la sogs pa dang ngag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
kāmadhyāneṣu dharme vit chos rig 'dod dang bsam gtan na /
dharmapratisaṃvit pañcabhūmikā kāmadhātucaturthadhyānasaṃgṛhītā ūrdhvaṃ nāmakāyābhāvāt chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni sa lnga po 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan bzhis bsdus pa yin te /
yan chad na ming gi tshogs med pa'i phyir ro /
vāci prathamakāmayoḥ /
vāṅniruktir ity eko 'rthaḥ 		ngag ni 'dod pa dang po na /
ngag dang nges pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni don gcig go /
niruktipratisaṃvitkāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmikā ūrdhvaṃ vitarkābhāvāt /
prajñaptau tu pratisaṃvidāmeva nirdeśaḥ 		nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'dad pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag yin te /
yang chad na rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
padavyañjane tasyaivarthe tasyaikadvivahustrīpuruṣādyadhivacane tasyāsaktatāyāmavivartyajñānaṃ dharmāvipratisaṃvida ityata evāsāṃ kramasiddhiḥ /
nirvacanaṃ niruktiḥ /
yathā rupyate tasmādrūpamityevamādi /
uttarottarapratibhā pratibhānamityapare /
āsāṃ ca kila pratisaṃvidāṃ gaṇitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ śabdavaidyā hetuvidyā ca pūrvaprayogo yathākramam /
nāpyeteṣvakṛtakauśalastā utpādayituṃ śaknotīti 		btags pa ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'di skad du tshig dang yi ge dang de nyid kyi don dang de nyid kyi gcig dang gnyis dang mang po dang pho dang mo la sogs pa'i tshig bla dags dang de la thags thogs med par bya ba la thogs pa med par shes pa ni chos so so yang dag par rigs pa la sogs pa yin no zhes ston te /
de nyid kyis 'di dag gi go rims grub pa yin no /
tshig nges pa ni nges pa'i tshig ste /
dper na gzugs su rung bas ni de'i phyir /
gzugs zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yin no /
gzhan dag na re lan dang lan la spobs pas na spobs pa yin no zhes zer ro /
so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba ni go rims bzhin du rtsis dang sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang sgra rig pa dang gtan tshigs rig pa dag yin te /
'di dag la mkhas par ma byas bar de dag skyed par mi nus so zhes grag go /
buddhavacanameva tu sarvāsāṃ prayogaṃ varṇayanti thams cad kyi sbyor ba sangs rgyas kyi bka' kho na yin no zhes brjod do /
yasya caikā tasyāvaśyaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidī bhavanti /
vikalābhirna tallābhī 		gang la gcig yod pa de la gdon mi za bar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi char yod do /
ma tshang bar ni de thob med /
nahi vikalābhistābhiḥ pratisaṃvillābhī bhavati de dag ma tshang bar ni so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob pa ma yin no /
ye caita upadiṣṭā araṇādayo guṇāḥ nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bstan pa gang dag yin pa /
ṣaḍete prāṇtakoṭikāḥ drug po de dag rab mtha' bas /
prāntakoṭikadhyānavalenaiṣāṃ lābhaḥ de dag ni rab kyi mtha' pa'i bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis 'thob po /
tatṣaḍivadhaṃ de ni rnam drug /
tadapi prāntakoṭikaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ ṣaḍātmakam /
araṇāpraṇidhijñānaṃ tisraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ 		bsam gtan bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' pa de yang nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa gsum dang rab kyi mtha' pa de nyid dang drug gi bdag nyid yin no /
tadeva prantakoṭikam /
niruktipratisaṃvidastadvalena lābho na tu sā caturthadhyānabhūmikā 		nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni de'i stobs kyis 'thob pa yin gyi de bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa ba ni ma yin no /
kiṃ punaridaṃ prāntakoṭikaṃ nāma rab kyi mtha' pa zhes bya ba ni ci zhe na /
dhyānamantyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam /
sarvabhūmyanulomitam 		bsam gtan mtha' /
bsam gtan bzhi pa yin no /
de ni sa kun gyis mthun pas /
vṛddhikāṣṭāgataṃ tacca 'phel ba'i rab tu phyin pa yin /
kathaṃ sarvabhūmyanulomitam /
kāmāvacarāccittātprathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate 		ji ltar nas thams cad kyis mthun par byas pa yin zhe na /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la /
tato dvitīyamevaṃ krameṇa yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam /
pratilomaṃ punaryāvatkāmāvacaraṃ cittaṃ tataḥ punaranulomaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamevaṃ sarvabhūmyanulomitam 		de las ni bsam gtan gnyis pa ste /
de bzhin du rim gyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar la snyoms par 'jug go /
mi mthun pa ni yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems kyi bar la'o /
de la yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du mthun pa yin te /
katham vṛddhikāṣṭāgatam /
tathābhāvitānmṛduno madhyaṃ madhyādadhimātraṃ samāpadyate /
vṛddhiprakarṣo hi vṛddhikāṣṭā 		de ltar na sa thams cad kyis mthun par byas pa yin no /
ji ltar na 'phel ba'i rab tu phyin pa'i bar du yin zhe na /
de ltar bsgoms pa chung ngu las 'bring /
'bring las chen po la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
'phel ba'i mchog ni 'phel ba'i rab yin no /
idamīdṛśaṃ prāntakoṭikaṃ pragatā 'nta koṭirasyeti kṛtvā /
koṭiḥ punaratra vṛddhiḥ prakāro vā 		bsam gtan 'di lta bu 'di ni rab kyi mtha' pa yin te /
'di la mthar rab tu phyin pa yod pa'i phyir ro /
'dir mtha' ni 'phel ba 'am rnam pa yin te /
catuṣkoṭikavat mu bzhi pa bzhin no /
ete punaḥ buddhatuṇāḥ yon tan drug po de dag kyang /
buddhānyasya prayogajāḥ sangs rgyas las gzhan sbyor las skyes /
buddhādanyasya prāyogikā na vairāgyalābhikāḥ /
buddhasya nāsti kiñcit prāyogikam 		sangs rgyas las gzhan pa ni sbyor ba las byung ba yin gyi 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa ni ma yin no /
sangs rgyas kyi ni sbyor ba las byung ba cung zad kyang med de /
tasya sarvadharmeśvaratvādicchāmātra pratibadhaḥ sarvaguṇasaṃpatsaṃmukhībhāvaḥ 'dod chags can gyi dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir /
de'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa ni bzhed pa tsam la rag las pa yin no /
ime tāvacchrādakasādhāraṇaguṇā abhijñādayaḥ pṛthagjanairapi /
keyamabhijñā nāma /
ṛddhhiśrotramanaḥpūrvajanmacyutyudayakṣaye 		re zhig de dag ni nyan thos dang thun mong pa'i yon tan dag yin no /
mngon par shes pa la sogs pa ni so so'i skye bo dag dang yang thun mong yin no /
mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
rdzu 'phrul rna ba yid dang ni /
sngon tshe 'chi 'pho skye ba dang /
jñātasākṣīkriyā 'bhijñā ṣaḍvidhā zad shes mngon du bya ba yi /
mngon shes rnam pa drug /
ṛddhiviṣaye jñānasākṣātkriyā abhijñā /
divyaśrotracetaḥparyāyapūrvanivāsānusmṛticyutyutpapādāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyā abhijñāḥ 		rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes dang lha'i rna ba dang sems kyi rnam grangs dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa ste /
etāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā /
āsāṃ pañca pṛthagjanaiḥ sādhāraṇāḥ 		de dag ni mngon par shes pa drug yin no /
de dag las lnga ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong ba yin no /
sarvāstvetāḥ /
muktimārgadhīḥ 		de dag thams cad ni /
rnam grol blo /
vimuktimārgaprajñāsvabhāvāḥ /
śrāmaṇyaphalavat 		dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhin du /
rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin no /
catasraḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bzhi ni kun rdzob shes pa ste /
cetaḥparyāyāsravakṣayajñānābhijñe hitvā /
cetasi jñānapañcakam 		sems kyi rnam grangs dang zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ma gtogs so /
sems la shes pa lnga yin no /
cetaḥparyāyābhijñā pañca dharmānvayamārgasaṃvṛtiparacittajñānāni /
kṣayābhijñā balaṃ yadvat 		sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa ni lnga yin te /
chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang lam dang kun rdzob dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa rnams so /
zag pa mngon shes stobs bzhin no /
yathāsravakṣayajñānavalamuktaṃ tathā veditavyā /
ṣaḍ daśa jñānānīti /
sarvabhūmikā 'pyeṣā tathaiva jñātvyā 		'di ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji skad du bshad pa de bzhin du shes pa drug gam bcu yin bde yang rig par bya la /
de bzhin du 'di ni sa thams cad pa yin par yang shes par bya'o /
śeṣāstu /
pañca dhyānacatuṣṭaye 		lhag ma /
lnga ni bsam gtan bzhi dag na /
pañcābhijñāḥ caturthadhyānabhūmikāḥ /
kasmādārupyabhūmikā na santi /
tisrastāvanna santi /
rūpālambanatvāt 		mngon par shes pa lnga ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa pa dag yin no /
ci'i phyir gzugs med pa'i sa pa dag med ce na /
re zhig gsum ni med de /
gzugs la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
cetaḥparyāyābhhijñāpi nāsti rūpatīrthābhiniṣpādyatvāt sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa yang med de gzugs la stegs bcas nas mngon par bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
pūrvanivāsasmṛtirapyanupūrvāvasthāntaramaraṇābhiniṣpatteḥ /
sthānagotrādyālambanatvācca 		sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa yang med de mthar gyis sngon gyi gnas gzhan rjes su dran pas mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir dang gnas dang rus la sogs pa la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir te /
paracittaṃ hi jñātukāma ātmanaḥ kāyacittayornimittamudgṛhlāti /
kīdṛśe 'pi me kāye kīdṛśaṃ cittam bhavaty evaṃ pareṣāmapyābhujataścittajñānādabhiniṣpannā bhavati 		gzhan gyi sems shes par 'dod pa ni bdag gi lus 'di 'dra ba zhig las sems ni 'di 'dra ba zhig yin no zhes lus dang sems kyi mtshan ma 'dzin cing de bzhin du pha rol bo dag la yang gtod de /
sems shes pa las mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro /
abhiniṣpannāyāmabhijñāyāṃ rūpanirapekṣo jānāti mngon par shes pa mngon par grub na ni gzugs la mi ltos par mngon par shes so /
pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmartukāmaḥ samanantaraniruddhamanovijñāno nimittamudgṛhya tatsamanantaraprātilomyenāvasthāntarāṇi manasikaroti /
yāvatsaṃdhicittam /
tato 'ntarābhavasyaikakṣaṇaṃ maraṇe 'pi niṣpanno bhavati /
evaṃ parasyāpi smarati /
abhiniṣpannāyāṃ vilaṅghyāpi smaraṇam /
anubhūtapūrvasyaiva smaraṇam /
śuddhāvāsānāṃ katham smaraṇam /
śravaṇenānubhūtatvāt 		sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'dod pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gags ma thag pa'i mtshan ma bzung nas de'i lugs las bzlog ste /
mtshams sbyor ba'i sems kyi bar du de ma thag pa'i gnas skabs gzhan rnams yin la byed do /
de nas srid pa bar ma'i skad cig ma gcig dran na yang grub pa yin no /
de bzhin du gzhan gyi yang dran no /
mngon par grub nas ni thod rgal du yang dran no /
sngon nyams su myong ba kho na dran no /
gnas gtsang ma rnams ji ltar dran zhe na /
thos pas nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro /
ārupyacyutasyehopapannasya parasaṃtatyadhiṣṭhānenotpādanam gzugs med pa nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa na pha rol pa'i rgyud la brten nas skyed de; /
anyeṣāṃ svasaṃtatyadhiṣṭhānena /
ṛddhyādīnāṃ tu laghatvaśabdālokamanasikaraṇaṃ prayogaḥ 		gzhan dag ni rang gi rgyud la brten nas so /
rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni yang ba dang sgra dang snang ba yid la byed pa yin no /
tāḥ punaretāḥ pañcābhijñāḥ mngon par shes pa lnga po 'di dag ni /
svādhobhūviṣayāḥ rang dang 'og sa'i yul can yin /
yadbhūmikā ṛddhacyabhhijñā bhavati tāṃ bhūmi tayā gacchati /
nirmiṇoti vā adharāṃ noktarām /
evaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñayā svabhūmikameva śabdaṃ śṛṇotyadharabhūmikaṃ vā nordhvabhūmikam /
cetaḥ paryāyābhijñayā nordhvabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ jānāti /
pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyā na smarati /
cyutopapādābhijñayā na paśyati 		rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa gang yin pa des sa de 'am 'og mar 'gro ba'am sprul par byed kyi gong du ni ma yin no /
de bzhin du lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pas kyang rang gi sa kho na'am sa 'og ma ba'i sgra thos kyi sa gong ma ni ma yin no /
sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pas kyang sa gong ma pa'i sems ni mi shes so /
sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas kyang mi dran no /
'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mngon par shes pas kyang mi mthong ngo /
ata evārupyabhumikaṃ cittaṃ cetaḥparyāyapūrvanivāsabhijñābhyāṃ na gṛhlātyurdhvabhūmikatvāt de nyid kyi phyir gzugs med pa'i sa pa'i sems ni sa gong ma pa yin pa'i phyir /
sems kyi rnam grangs dang sngon gyi gnas mngon par shes pa gnyis kyis mi 'dzin to /
kathametā labhyante 'di dag ji ltar 'thob ce na /
atucittāḥ prayogataḥ ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sbyor bas /
labhyā ucitāstu virāgataḥ thob bya 'dris pa chags bral bas /
janmāntarābhyastā abhijñā vairāgyato labhyante vaiśeṣikyaḥ prayogataḥ mngon par shes pa tshe rabs gzhan na goms pa rnams ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob bo /
bye brag can rnams ni sbyor bas so /
sarvāsāṃ tu prayogeṇotpādanam /
tṛtīyā trīpyupasthānāni 		thams cad kyang sbyong bas bskyed pa yin no /
gsum pa dran pa nyer gzhag gsum /
cetaḥparyāyābhijñā trīṇi vedanācittadharmasmṛtyupasthānāni /
cittacaittālamlbanatvāt /
ādyaṃ śrotrardvivakṣuṣi 		sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir /
tshor ba dang sems dang chos dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyi rang bzhin no /
dang po rdzu 'phrul rna ba mig /
abhijñeti vartate /
ṛddhidivyaśrotradivyacakṣurabhijñā ādyaṃ smṛtyupasthānamityarthaḥ /
rūpālambanatvāt /
ṛddhiścaturbāhyāyatanālambanā 'nyatra śabdāt /
divyaśrotracakṣurabhijñe śabdarūpāyatanālambane 		mngon par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
rdzu 'phrul dang lha'i rna ba dang lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa ni gzugs la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po yin te /
lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
rdzu 'phrul gyi dmigs pa ni phyi'i skye mched bzhi yin te /
sgra ma gtogs so /
lha'i rna ba dang mig gi mngon par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni sgra dang gzugs kyi skye mched yin no /
kathaṃ tarhi cyutopapādajñānenaiva jānāti amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ ityevamādi /
na tattena jānāti /
abhijñāparivārajñānaṃ tu tadanyadāryāṇāmutpadyate yenaivaṃ jānanti 		'di ji ltar na /
'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pas 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa dang ldan no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par shes she na /
de ni des mi shes kyi 'phags pa rnams la de las gzhan pa gang gis na de lta bur shes par 'gyur ba mngon par shes pa'i 'khor du gyur pa'i shes pa skye'o /
anirdhāraṇāccheṣe catuḥsmṛtyupasthānasvabhāve iti siddham lhag ma ni dmigs kyis ma phye ba'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes bya bar grub bo /
avyākṛte śrotracakṣurabhijñe itarāḥ śubhāḥ mig dang rna ba'i mngon shes ni /
lung du ma bstan lhag rnams dge /
divyacakṣuḥśrotrābhijñe avyākṛte lha'i mig dang rna ba'i mngon par shes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
te punaścakṣuḥśrotravijñānasaṃprayuktaprajñe de dag kyang mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba'i shes rab yin no /
kathaṃ tarhi te caturdhyānabhūmike sidhyataḥ /
āśrayavaśena tadbhūminirdeśāt /
tadāśraye hi cakṣuḥśrotre caturdhyānabhūmike 		'o na de dag ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi'i sa par grub ce na; rten gyi dbang gis de'i sa bstan pa'i phyir te /
de'i rten mig dang rna ba ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa pa yin no /
ānantaryamārgavaśena vā yang na bar chad med pa'i lam gyi dbang gis so /
anyāścatasraḥ kuśalāḥ gzhan bzhi ni dge ba dag yin no /
yattarhi prakaraṇeṣūktam abhijñā katamā 'o na rab tu byed pa las mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
kuśalā prajñeti /
pradhānika eṣa nirdeśo vāhuliko vā /
āsāṃ cābhijñānāṃ 		shes pa dge ba yin no zhes gang bshad pa ji lta bu zhe na /
de ni gtso bo'am phal che ba bstan pa yin no /
mngon par shes pa 'di rnams las /
tisro vidyāḥ gsum ni rig pa /
pūrvanivāsacyutyupapādāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyāstisraḥ aśaikṣyo vidyā ucyante sngon gyi gnas dang 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba rnams ni mi slob pa'i rig pa gsum zhes bya'o /
kasmādetā eva nānyāḥ /
avidyāyāḥ pūrvāntādau nivarttanāt 		ci'i phyir de dag kho na yin gyi gzhan dag ma yin zhe na /
sngon mtha' sogs /
ma rig pa ni bzlog phyir ro /
etā hi pūrvāparāntamadhyasaṃmohaṃ vyāvartayanti yathākramam 'di dag gis ni go rims bzhin du sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang bar la kun du rmongs pa bzlog par byed do /
āsāṃ paramārthena de dag las kyang don dam par /
aśaikṣyantyā /
āsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyaivāśaikṣī vidyā 		mi slob tha ma /
zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba kho na mi slob pa'i rig pa yin no /
tadāsye dve tatsaṃtānasudbhavāt gnyis ni de'i /
rgyud las skyes phyir de zhes bya /
anye dve aśaikṣyasaṃtānasaṃbhūtatvādaśaikṣyāvucyete /
naiva tu te śaikṣyo nāśaikṣyau 		gzhan gnyis ni mi slob pa'i rgyud las skyes pa'i phyir mi slob pa zhes bya'i de gnyis ni slob pa yang ma yin la mi slob pa yang ma yin no /
kiṃ punarete abhijñe śaikṣyasya nocyete /
yataḥ śaikṣyau vidye nocyete 		mngon par shes pa 'di dag slob ba'i yin par mi 'dod dam zhe na gang gi phyir slob pa'i rig pa dag ces mi bya zhe na /
iṣṭe śaikṣsya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ slob la 'dod de ma rig dang /
bcas rgyud phyir na rig ma bshad /
na hi sāvidyasaṃtāne vidyāvyavasthānaṃ yujyate /
punarapyavidyābhibhavāt /
āsāṃ cābhijñānām 		rgyud ma rig pa dang bcas bzhin du rig pa rnam par gzhag tu ni mi rung ste /
yang ma rig pas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro /
mngon par shes pa 'di dag las /
ādyā tṛtīyā ṣaṣṭhī ca prātihāryāṇi dang po gsum pa drug pa ni /
cho 'phrul rnams yin rdzu 'phrul dang /
ṛddhicetaḥparyāyāsravakṣayābhijñāstrīṇi prātihāryāṇi yathākramam ṛddhacyādeśanānuśāsanaprātihāryāṇi /
vineyamanasāmādito 'tyartha haraṇāt prātihāryāṇi prātiśabdayorādikarmabṛśārthatvāt 		sems kyi rnam grangs dang zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni go rims bzhin du cho 'phrul gsum yin te /
rdzu 'phrul dang kun rdzob pa dang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams yin no /
dang po nyid du gdul bya'i yid shen tu 'phrog par byed pa'i phyir cho 'phrul dag yin pa 'am /
pratihatamadhyasthānāṃ manāṃsyebhiḥ pratiharantīti prātihāryāṇi vā 'di dag gis zhe 'gras pa dang bar mar gnas pa rnams kyi yid 'phrog par byed pas na cho 'phrul dag yin no /
eṣāṃ punaḥ 'di dag gi nang na /
śāsanam /
agcryam /
anuśāsanaṃ pratihāryamagcya m 		bstan pa mchog /
rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni /
mi 'khrul phyir dang phan pa dang /
avyabhicāritvāddhiteṣṭaphalayojanāt yid 'ong 'bras la sbyor byed phyir /
mchog yin no /
ṛddhacyādeśane hi vidyayā vikeiyete rdzu 'phrul dang kun brjod pa dag ni rig sngags kyis kyang /
asti hi ca gāndhārī nāma vidyā yayāphāśena gacchati īkṣaṇikā ca nāma vidyā yayā paracittaṃ jānāti /
na tu yathābhūtānuśāsanam anyathā śakyaṃ kartumavybhicāritvāt /
pradhānamāvarjanamātraṃ ca tābhyāmanuśāsanaprātihāryeṇa tu hitena iṣṭenaphalena yogo bhavatyupāyopadeśādityevāvaśyam ṛddhirityucyate 		byed de /
ghan dha ri zhes bya ba'i rig sngags gang gis na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang rtog byed ces bya ba'i rig sngags gang gis na pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang yod mod kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bstan pa ni gzhan gyis bya bar mi nus pas mi 'khrul pa'i phyir 'di ni gtso bo yin no /
de gnyis kyis ni gtod pa tsam du zad kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis ni thabs nye bar bstan pa'i sgro nas phan pa dang yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor bas 'di nyid mchog yin no /
keyamṛddhiḥ /
vaibhāṣikanyāyena /
ṛddhiḥ samādhiḥ 		rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyis ni /
rdzu 'phrul ting nge 'dzin /
ṛdhyatyaneneti kṛtvā yojayitavyam 'dis 'byor par byed pas na zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
kiṃ tena samṛdhyati /
gamanaṃ nirmāṇaṃ ca 		des ci zhig yang dag par 'byor par 'gyur zhe na /
de las ni /
sprul dang 'gro ba ste /
tatastatra /
gatistridhā /
śarīravāhinī ādhimokṣikī manojavā ca tatra gatiḥ /
śāsturmanojavā 		de la 'gro ba ni rnam pa gsum ste /
lus kyis phyin byed dang mos pa las byung ba dang yid mgyogs pa'o /
ston pa la /
yid mgyogs 'gro ba dang yid bzhin du mgyogs pas ni yid mgyogs kyi 'gro ba ste /
manasa ivāsyā rava iti manojavā gatirbuddhasyaiva nānyasya de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho na yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no /
sudūramapi deśaṃ cittotpādakālelna gamanāt yul thag shin tu ring por yang thugs bskyed pa'i dus kyi byon pa'i phyir ro /
ata evācintyo buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣaya ityuktaṃ bhagavatā de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba gsungs so /
itare tu gatī buddhasyānuktasiddhe 'gro ba gzhan dag ni ma bshad kyang sangs rgyas la mnga' bar grub po /
anyeṣāṃ vāhinyapyādhimokṣikī /
śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śarīravāhinī ca gatiḥ 		gzhan dag la /
phyin byed mos pa las byung yang /
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la ni lus phyin byed kyi 'gro ba yang yod de /
pakṣivatkrameṇa śarīravāhanāt bya bzhin du rim gyis lus phyin par byed pa'i phyir ro /
ādhimokṣikī ca dūrasyāsannādhimokṣeṇāśugamanāt mos pa las byung ba yang yod de /
thag ring po la nye bar mos nas myur du 'gro ba'i phyir ro /
nirmāṇaṃ punardvividham /
kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca /
tatra tāvat 		sprul pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'o /
de la re zhig /
kāmāptaṃ nirmitaṃ bāhyaṃ caturāyatanaṃ /
kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇaṃ rūparasagandhaspraṣṭavyāyatanasvabhāvam 		'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa ni /
phyi'i skye mched bzhi /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa ni gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin yin no /
tat punar /
dvidhā /
svaparaśarīrasaṃbaddham /
rūpāptaṃ dve tu 		de yang rnam gnyis /
bdag dang gzhan gyi lus dang sprul pa'o /
gzugs gtogs gnyis /
rūpāvacaranirmāṇaṃ dve rūpaspraṣṭavyāyatane /
tatra gandharasābhāvāt /
tadapi dvividhaṃ tathaiva /
kāmadhātāvidaṃ caturvidhaṃ nirmāṇamevaṃ rūpadhātauityaṣṭavidhaṃ samāsato nirmāṇam 		gzugs na spyod pa'i sprul pa ni /
de na dri dang ro med pa'i phyir gzugs dang reg bya'i skye mched gnyis yin no /
de yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi ji lta ba de kho na bzhin du rnam pa gnyis yin te /
'di ni sprul pa rnam pa bzhi yin no /
gzugs kyi khams na yang de dang 'dra bas mdor bsdu na sprul pa ni rnam pa brgyad yin no /
kathaṃ rūpadhātūpapannasya kāmāvacaranirmāṇe gandharasābhyāṃ na samanvāgamo bhavati /
vastrābharaṇavanna samanvāgamaḥ 		gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa 'dod pa na spyod pa sprul pa na ji ltar na dri dang ro dag dang mi ldan pa yang yin zhe na /
gos dang rgyan bzhin du mi ldan no /
dvacyāyātanaṃ nirmiṇotītyapare gzhan dag na re skye mched gnyis sprul par byed do zhes zer ro /
kiṃ khalvabhijñayaiva nirmāṇaṃ nirmīyate yang ci mngon par shes pa kho nas sprul pa sprul par byed dam zhe na /
netyucyate smras pa /
kiṃ tarhi /
abhijñāphalaiḥ /
nirmāṇacittaistāni caturdaśa 		ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu /
sprul sems dag gis de dag kyang ni bcu bzhi'o /
tāni punaścaturdaśa nirmāṇacittāni /
yathākramaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ dve yāvat pañca 		sprul pa'i sems bcu bzhi po de dag ni /
bsam gtan 'bras gnyis nas lnga'i bar rim bzhin /
prathamadhyānaphalaṃ dve kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmike nirmāṇacitte /
dvitīyadhyānaphalaṃ trīṇi kāmadhātuprathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikāni /
evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri pañca ca yojyāni /
svabhūmikādharabhūmikaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ veditavyam 		bsam gtan dang po'i 'bras bu sprul pa'i sems ni gnyis te /
'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa dag go /
bsam gtan gnyis pa'i 'bras bu ni gsum ste /
'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i sa pa dag go /
da bzhin du bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i sa pa dag kyang bzhi dang lngar spyor bar bya'o /
bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu sprul pa'i sems ni rang gis pa dang sa 'og ma yin par rig par bya'o /
nordhvajam /
nordhvabhūmikaṃ nirmāṇacittamadharadhyānaphalamasti 		gong ma las skyes min /
bsam gtan 'og ma'i 'bras bus gong ma'i sprul pa'i sems ni med do /
dvitīyādidhyānaphalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikādgatito viśiṣyate /
tallabho dhyānavat /
teṣāṃ ca nirmāṇacittānāṃ dhyānavallābhaḥ /
ki khalu nirmāṇacittādeva syāt vyutthānam 		'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ni /
bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa de'i 'bras bu las 'gros kyi sgo nas khyad par du 'phags so /
de rnyed bsam gtan bzhin /
sprul pa'i sems de dag rnyed pa ni bsam gtan bzhin no /
yang ci sprul pa'i sems kho na las ldang bar 'gyur ram zhe na /
nāstyetat /
yasmādutpadyate 		de lta bu ni med de /
'di ltar /
śuddhāttatsvataśca /
śuddhakāddhacyānādantaraṃ nirmāṇacittamutpadyate nirmāṇacittadvā nānyataḥ /
tato 'pi te /
nirmāṇacittādapi śuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ cotpadyate nānyat /
na hi samādhiphalasthitasvāpraviśya punaḥ samādhiṃ tasmāt vyutthānamasti /
sarvasya ca nirmitasya 		de ni /
dag dang rang las skye bar 'gyur te /
sprul pa'i sems ni bsam gtan dag pa pa'am sprul pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su skye'i gzhan du ni ma yin no /
de las gnyis /
sprul pa'i sems las kyang bsam gtan dag pa pa dang sprul pa'i sems skye ste /
gzhan du ni ma yin no /
ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu la gnas pa ni yang ting nge 'dzin la ma zhugs par ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ba med do /
sprul pa thams cad kyang /
svabhūmikena nirmāṇaṃ /
nānyabhūmikena nirmāṇacittenānyabhūmikaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmīyate /
bhāṣaṇaṃ tvadhareṇa ca 		rang gi sa pas sprul par byed /
sa gzhan pa'i sprul pa'i sems kyis sa gzhan pa'i sprul par ni mi byed do /
smrar 'jug pa ni 'og mas kyang /
svabhūmikena ceti caśabdaḥ /
kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmiko hi nirmitaḥ svabhūmikenaiva cittena bhāṣyate /
ūrdhvabhūmikastu prathamadhyānabhūmikena 		kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rang gi sa pas kyang smrar 'jug go zhes bya ba yin te /
'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i sprul pa ni rang gis pa'i sems kho nas smrar 'jug go /
sa gong ma pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa ste /
ūrdhvaṃ vijñaptisamutthāpakābhāvāt yan chad na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pa med pa'i phyir ro /
vahūnāṃ nirmitānāṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ /
nirmātraiva sahāśāstuḥ /
buddhādanyasya nirmāṇaṃ nirmātrā saha bhāṣate 		sprul pa mang po rnams smra ba ni ston min sprul pa dang bcas /
sangs rgyas las gzhan pa'i sprul pa ni sprul pa dang bcas te /
smra bas gang gi tshe sprul pa mang po zhig yin pa de'i tshe cig car smra ste /
yadā ca vahavo nirmitā bhavanti tadā yugapat bhāṣante gcig cig smra bar byed pa na /
sprul pa thams cad smra bar byed /
ekasya bhāṣamāṇasya bhāṣante saha nirmitāḥ /
ekasya tūṣṇīṃbhūtasya sarvetūṣṇīṃ bhavanti ta iti gāthā 		gcig mi smra bar gyur pa dang /
de dag thams cad smrar mi 'gyur /
zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
buddhasya pūrva paścādvā yathecchaṃ nirmitā bhāṣante /
yadā bhāṣaṇacittaṃ tadā nirmāṇacittābhāvo nirmāṇacittābhāvānnirmitābhāva iti kathamenaṃ bhāṣayanti 		sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ni snga phyi ji ltar bzhed par smra'o /
gang gi tshe smrar 'jug pa'i sems yod pa de'i tshe sprul pa'i sems med pa'i phyir sprul pa med na ji ltar smrar 'jug ce na /
adhiṣṭhāyānyavarttanāt byin gyis brlabs nas gzhan 'jug phyir /
nirmāṇamadhiṣṭhāyāvasthānakāmatayā 'nyena manasā vācaṃ pravartayanti gnas par 'dod pas sprul pa byin gyis brlabs nas yid gzhan rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pas ngag 'jug par byed do /
kiṃ jīvita evādhiṣṭhānamanuvartate atha mṛtaścāpi /
mṛtasyāpyastyadhiṣṭhānaṃ 		ci gson po kho na la byin gyi rlabs yod dam /
'on te shi ba la yod ce na /
shi ba la yang byin gyi rlabs yod /
āryamahākaśyapādhiṣṭhānena tadasthisaṃkalāvasthānāt 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i rus pa'i keng rus gnas pa'i phyir ro /
tattu /
nāsthirasya /
asthirasya tu bhāvasya nāstyadhiṣṭhānam 		de yang mi brtan la med /
mi brtan pa'i dngos po la ni byin gyi rlabs med de /
āryakāśyapena māṃsādīnāmadhhiṣṭhānāt 'phags pa 'od srungs chen pos sha la sogs pa byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i phyir ro /
apare tu na /
apare punarāhurnāsti mṛtasyādhiṣṭhānam /
asthiśaṅkalāvasthānaṃ tu devatānubhāvāditi 		gzhan dag min gzhan dag na re /
shi ba la byin gyi rlabs med kyi /
rus pa'i keng rus gnas pa ni lha'i mthus so zhes zer ro /
kimekena cittenaikameva nirmita nirmiṇoti ci sems gcig gis sprul pa gcig kho na sprul bar byed dam zhe na /
ādāvekamanekena jitāyāṃ tu viparyayāt dang por du mas gcig yin te /
bya bar gyur nas bzlog pa'o /
ādita ekaṃ nirmitamanekena nirmāṇacittena nirmiṇoti dang po nyid du ni sprul pa'i sems du mas sprul pa gcig sprul par byed do /
jitāyāṃ tvabhijñāyāmekena cittenānekaṃ nirmiṇoti yāvannirmātumiṣṭaṃ bhavati mngon par shes pa byang nas ni sems gcig gis sprul pa po ji snyed dod pa du ma sprul par byed do /
atha kiṃ sarvanirmāṇacittamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati yang sprul pa'i sems thams cad lung du ma bstan pa yin nam zhe na /
avyākṛtaṃ bhāvanājaṃ bsgoms las skyes pa lung ma bstan /
yadbhāvanāphalaṃ tadavaśyamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni nges par lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
trividhaṃ tūpapatījam /
upapattipratilambhikaṃ tu nirmāṇacittaṃ kuśalākuśalamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati devanāgapiśācādīnām 		skye ba las skyes rnam gsum mo /
lha dang klu dang sha za la sogs pa'i skye bas thob pa'i sprul pa'i sems ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
tatkṛtaṃ ca svaparaśarīranirmāṇaṃ navāyatanikaṃ bhavatyaśabdarupyāyatanatvādindriyāvinirbhūtatvāt /
na tvindriyaṃ nirmīyate /
kimeṣaiva dvividharddhibhāvanāmayī copapattilābhikā ca 		de dag gis byas pa'i sprul ba rang dang gzhan gyi lus dang 'brel ba ni sgra med pa'i gzugs can gyi skye mched yin pa'i phyir /
skye mched dug pa yin te /
dbang po dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro /
dbang po ni sprul par mi byed do /
ci bsgoms pa las byung ba dang skye bas thob pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam pa 'di gnyis kho nar zad dam zhe na /
eṣā ca dvividhā /
ṛddhirmantrauṣadhābhyāṃ ca karmajā ceti pañcadhā 		rdzu 'phrul rnam pa gnyis pa de dang gsang sngags sman dag dang las las skyes dang rnam pa lnga /
samāstaḥ pañcavidhāmṛddhhiṃ varṇayanti rdzu 'phrul ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga'o zhes brjod de /
bhāvanāphalamupapattilābhikaṃ mantrajāmauṣadhajāṃ karmajāṃ ca bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu dang skye bas thob pa dang gsang sngags las skyes pa dang sman las skyes pa dang las las skyes pa ste /
yathā māndhāturantarābhavikānāṃ ca dper na nga las nu dang srid pa bar ma pa rnams kyi lta bu'o /
yadidaṃ divyaśrotramuktaṃ cakṣuśca lha'i rna ba dang mig tu bshad pa gang yin pa de dag ci lha'i kho na yin nam /
kimete divye eva āhosvit divye eva divye /
yathā bodhisattvacakravartigṛhapatiratnānām /
divyaśrotrākṣiṇī 		'on te byang chub sems dpa' dang 'khor los sgyur ba dang khyim bdag rin po che rnams kyi lta bur lha'i dang 'dra bas lha'i yin zhe na /
lha yi mig dang rna ba yin /
yasmātte /
rūpaprasādau dhyānabhūmikau /
dhyānasamāpannasya śabdālokābhogaprayogeṇa dhyānabhūmikāni bhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādau nirvartete cakṣuḥśrotrasāmantake rūpaśabdyordarśanaśravaṇahetū iti dhyānabhūmikatvāt divye eva te cakṣuḥśrotre 		'di ltar de gnyis ni /
bsam gtan sa pa'i gzugs dang ba /
bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i mig dang rna ba'i thod kor du sgra dang snang ba la gtod pa'i sbyor bas bsam gtan gyis pa'i 'byung ba rnams rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang sgra dag mthong ba dang thos pa'i rgyu mngon par 'grub pas bsam gtan gyis pa yin pa'i phyir mig dang rna ba de dag ni lha'i kho na yin no /
te ca punaḥ /
sabhāgāvikale nityaṃ dūrasūkṣmādigocare /
nāsti divyaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca tatsabhāgaṃ nityaṃ vijñānasahitatvāt nāpi vikalaṃ kāṇavibrāntābhāvāt 		de gnyis kyang rtag tu brten bcas ma tshang med /
thag ring phra sogs spyod yul can /
lha'i mig dang rna ba ni rtag tu rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs pa med do /
zhar ba dang 'on pa med pa'i phyir ma tshang ba yang ma yin te /
rūpāvacarasattvavat gzugs na spyod pa'i sems can bzhin no /
dūrasūkṣmavatānyapi rūpāṇi śabdhāśca tayiorviṣyaḥ /
āha cātra /
dūrasthamāvṛtaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sarvataśca na paśyati 		de gnyis kyi yul ni gzugs dang sgra thag ring ba dang phra ba dang bsgribs pa dag kyang yin no /
'dir smras pa /
gang phyir sha yi mig gis gzugs /
thag ring gnas dang bsgribs pa dang /
phra rgyas thams cad mi mthong ba /
māṃsacakṣuryato rūpamato divyaṃ dṛgiṣyate /
kiyaddūraṃ punardivyena cakṣuṣā paśyati /
yasya yādṛśaṃ cakṣurbhavati /
śrāvakapratyekabuddhabuddhāstvanabhhisaṃskāreṇa sāhasradvisāhasratrisāhasrakān lokadhātūn yathāsaṃkhyaṃ paśyanti /
abhisaṃskāreṇa tu 		de phyir lha yis mthong bar 'dod /
lha'i mig gis thag ji srid cig mthong zhe na /
gang gi mig ji lta bu yin ba'o /
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par stong dang stong gnyis pa dang stong gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ngo /
mngon par 'du byed pas ni /
dvitrisāhasrakāsaṃkhyadṛśo 'rhatkhaṅgavaiśikāḥ dgra bcom bse ru ston rnams kyis /
stong gnyis gsum dang grangs med mthong /
sarvābhhisaṃskāreṇa saha śrāvako 'pi dvisāhasra lokadhātuṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati nyan thos chen pos kyang mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis lha'i mig gis stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ngo /
trisāhasraṃ khaṅgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ bse ru lta bus ni stong gsum pa mthong ngo /
buddhastu bhagavānasaṃkhyeyān lokahātūn paśyati yāvadevecchati sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ji tsam bzhed par 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gzigs so /
kimṛddhirevopapattilābhikā bhavatyarhānyadapi ci rdzu 'phrul kho na skye bas 'thob pa yin nam /
'on te gzhan yang yin zhe na /
anyadapyupapattyāptaṃ /
divyaśrotrādikamapi catuṣṭayamupapattipratilabhyamasti /
na tūpapattyāptaṃ kiñcidabhijñākhyāṃ labhate 		gzhan yang skye bas kyang 'thob /
lha'i rna ba la sogs pa bzhi yang skye bas 'thob bar bya ba yod mod kyi /
skye bas thob pa ni cung zad kyang mngon par shes pa'i ming mi 'thob bo /
yattūpapattipratilambhikaṃ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ skye bas 'thob pa'i lha'i mig gang yin pa /
des ni /
taddṛśyo nāntarībhavaḥ srid pa bar ma mi mthong ngo /
abhijñācakṣuṣaiva hyantarābhavo dṛśyate /
nopapattipratilabdhena /
cetojñānaṃ tu tattredhā 		srid pa bar ma ni mngon par shes pa'i mig kho nas mthong gi /
skye bas thob pa ni ma yin no /
sems shes de ni rnam pa gsum /
upapattyāptamiti vartate /
paracittajñānaṃ tūpapattipratilabdhaṃ trividhaṃ veditavyaṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtam 		skye bas 'thob pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
pha rol gyi sems shes pa skye bas 'thob pa de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin par rig par bya'o /
tarkavidyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
yaccāpi tārkikaṃ paracittajñānaṃ naimittikānāṃ yacca vidyākṛtaṃ tadapi trividhaṃ veditavyam 		gang rtogs dang rig sngags kyis byas pa'ang /
gang yang mtshan ma pa rnams kyis pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang rtog ge ba dang gang yang rig sngags kyis byas pa de yang rnam pa gsum yin bar rig par bya ste /
na yathā bhāvanāphalaṃ kuśalameva ji ltar bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu dge ba kho na yin pa lta bu ni ma yin no /
upapattipratilambhikābhyāṃ tu paracittajñānapūrvanivāsānusmṛtibhyāṃ /
jānate nārakā ādau 		pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa skye bas thob pa dag gis ni dmyal ba pas ni dang po shes /
yāvanna duḥkhavedanābhyāhatā bhavanti ji srid du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas ma nyen pa de srid du shes so /
anyagatisthā nityaṃ jānate /
nṛṇāṃ notpattilābhikam /
mānuṣyāṇāmetadyathoktamṛddhacyādikaṃ nāstyupapattiprātilambhikam 		'gro ba gzhan na gnas pas ni rtag tu shes so /
mi la skye bas thob pa med /
mi rnams la ni rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa de skye bas thob pa med do /
yattarhi prakṛtijātismarā bhavanti 'o na rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pa gang yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
karmaviśeṣajā 'sau teṣām de dag gi de ni las kyi khyad par las skyes pa yin te /
trividhā hi pūrvanivāsānusmṛtirbhāvanāphalamupapattilabdhā karmajā ceti sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu dang skye bas thob pa dang las las skyes pa'o /
sthaviraśrīlāmāvākasya yadatra puṇyam /
aṣṭamaṃ kośasthānam 		chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa las ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas bdun pa'o /
oṃ namo buddhāya /
jñānādhikāreṇa jñānamayānāṃ guṇānāṃ kṛto nirdeśaḥ 		shes pa'i skabs kyis shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi yon tan rnams ni bshad zin to /
asya svabhāvānāṃ tu kartavya ityādita eva dhyānānyārabhyante sarvaguṇāśrayatvāt rang bzhin gzhan rnams brjod par bya ste /
de lta bas na yon tan thams cad kyi rten yin pa'i phyir dang po kho nar bsam gtan rnams brtsams te /
dvidhā dhyānāni bsam gtan dag ni rnam pa gnyis /
samāsato dvividhāni dhyānānyupapattisamāpattidhyānabhedāt bsam gtan rnams ni mdor bsdu na skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis so /
tāni punaḥ /
catvāri /
prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvaccaturtham /
tatra dhyānopapattayaḥ punarna vaktavyāḥ /
lokanirdeśakośasthāne hi 		de dag kyang bzhi /
bsam gtan dang po nas bzhi pa'i bar ro /
de la bsam gtan du skye ba rnams ni yang mi brjod de /
'jig rten bstan pa'i mdzod kyi gnas su /
proktāstadupapattayaḥ der skye ba dag rab tu bshad /
kathaṃ proktāḥ ji skad du bshad ce na /
pṛthak pṛthak /
dhyānaṃ tribhūmikaṃ tatra caturtha tvaṣṭabhūmikamiti 		der so so'i /
bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yin /
bzhi pa sa ni brgyad pa yin /
zhes bya ba yin no /
samāpattidhyānaṃ tu vaktavyam snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan brjod par bya ste /
ata ucyate de'i phyir smras pa /
samāpattiḥ śubhaikāgyraṃ snyoms 'jug dge ba rtse gcig pa /
abhedena kuśalacittaikāgratā dhyānam bye brag med par dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa ni bsam gtan yin te /
samādhisvabhāvatvāt /
pañcaskandhāstu sānugam /
saparivāraṃ tu pañcaskandhasvabhāvaṃ veditavyam 		ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro /
rjes 'brang bcas na phung po lnga /
'khor dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin par rig par bya'o /
keyamekāgratā nāma /
ekālambanatā /
evaṃ tarhi cittānyevaikālambanāni samādhirna caitasikaṃ dharmāntaramiti prāpnoti 		rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
dmigs pa gcig pa nyid do /
de lta na ni 'o na sems dmigs pa gcig pa dag kho na ting nge 'dzin yin gyi chos gzhan sems las byung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
na cittānyeva samādhiḥ /
yena tu tānyekāgrāṇi vartante sa dharmaḥ samādhiḥ 		sems rnams kho na ting nge 'dzin ma yin gyi gang gis de dag rtse gcig par byed pa'i chos de ting nge 'dzin yin la de nyid rtse gcig pa nyid yin no /
saiva cittaikāgratā /
nanu ca kṣaṇikatvātsarvaṃ cittamekāgraṃ dvitīyasya tasmādavikṣepa iti cet 		skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir sems thams cad rtse gcig pa ma yin nam /
gal te gnyis pa de las rnam par mi g yeng ba yin no zhe na ni /
saṃprayukte samādhivaiyarthyam /
yata eva ca smādhistata eva cittānāmekālambanatvaṃ kiṃ neṣyate 		mtshungs par ldan pa la ting nge 'dzin don med pa yin no /
gang kho na las ting nge 'dzin yin pa de kho na las sems rnams kyi dmigs pa gcig pa nyid du yang ci'i phyir mi 'dod /
mahābhūmikatvācca samādheḥ sarvacittānāmekāgratāprasaṅgaḥ /
na durbalatvātsamādheḥ 		ting nge 'dzin sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir sems thams cad rtse gcig pa nyid du yang thal bar 'gyur ro /
ma yin te /
ting nge 'dzin stobs chung ba'i phyir ro /
cittānyevaikāgrāṇi samādhiḥ /
tathā hyadhicittaṃ śikṣā cittapariśuddhipradhānaṃ ca sūtre catvāri dhyānānyuktānītyapare /
dhyānamiti ko'rthaḥ 		gzhan dag na re sems rtse gcig pa dag kho na ting nge 'dzin yin te /
'di ltar mdo las /
lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang sems yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo ni bsam gtan bzhi yin no zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro /
bsam gtan zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
dhyāyantyaneneti /
prajānantītyarthaḥ /
samāhitacittasya yathābhūtaprajñānāt /
cintanārtho hyeṣa dhātuḥ /
cintanaṃ ca prajñeti siddhāntaḥ 		'dis sems par byed pas na bsam gtan te /
sems mnyam par bzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa'i phyir rab tu shes par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
skad kyi byings 'di ni sems pa'i don yin la /
sems pa yang shes rab yin no zhes grub pa'i mtha' las 'byung ngo /
evaṃ tarhi sarvasamādhidhyānaprasaṅgaḥ de lta na ni 'o na ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsam gtan du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
na /
prakarṣayukte tannāmavidhānādbhāskaravat 		ma yin te /
phul du phyin pa dang ldan ba la de'i ming du btags pa'i phyir nyi ma bzhin no /
kaśca prakarṣayuktaḥ /
yo 'ṅgasamāyuktaḥ samādhiḥ 		phul du phyin pa dang ldan pa yang gang zhe na /
ting nge 'dzin gang yan lag dang ldan pa yin te /
sa hi śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ yuganddhavāhitvāddṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāra uktaḥ sukhā ca pratipaditi /
sutarāṃ tena dhyāyanti /
kliṣṭasya kathaṃ dhyānatvam 		de ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel par ngang gis 'byung ba'i phyir mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dang lam sla ba zhes gsungs pas de ni shin tu yang sems par byed do /
nyon mongs pa can ji ltar bsam gtan yin zhe na /
mithyopanidhyānāt log par nges pa sems pa'i phyir ro /
atiprasaṅgaḥ /
na /
uktāni cākuśalāni dhyānānyapi bhagavatā /
kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kuśalamaikāgyraṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ yāvaccaturtham /
prathamaṃ tāvat /
vicāraprītisukhavat 		ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
ma yin te /
de dang mthun pa kho na la de'i ming du btags pa'i phyir te /
sa bon rul pa bzhin no /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan mi dge ba dag kyang gsungs so /
yang dge ba rtse gcig pa bsam gtan dang po ni ji lta bu /
bzhi pa'i bar ni ji lta bu zhe na /
re zhig dang po ni /
dpyod dang dga' dang bde dang ldan /
vicāraprītisukhasaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamaikāgyraṃ tat prathamaṃ dhyānam dge ba rtse gcig pa bsam gtan dang po ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no /
vicāravacanādvitarko 'pyukto bhavati dpyod pa smos pas rtog pa yang bshad pa yin te /
sāhacaryāddhūmāgnivat /
na hi prītisukhavānvicāro vinā vitarkeṇāsti 		lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir du ba dang me bzhin du /
rtog pa med par ni dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa med do /
śeṣaṃ punrdhyānatrayaṃ bsam gtan lhag ma gsum ni /
pūrvapūrvāṅgavarjitam /
śubhaikāgryam iti vartate /
vicāravivarjitaṃ prītisukhavat dvitīyaṃ vicāraprītivarjitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vicāraprītisukhavarjitaṃ caturthamiti 		yan lag lnga lnga spangs pa yin /
dge ba rtse gcig pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
bsam gtan gnyis pa ni dpyod pa spangs la /
dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa yin no /
gsum pa ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba spangs la bde ba dang ldan pa yin no /
bzhi pa ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba spangs pa yin no /
yathā dhyānāni /
tathārūpyāḥ 		bsam gtan rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs med /
kena prakāreṇa rnam pa gang gis she na /
ete 'pi hi dvidhā upapattisamāpattitaḥ /
catvāraśca eṣāmapi copapattaya uktāḥ /
samāpattyārupyāsvabhedena kuśalaikāgratāsvabhāvā ityanena prakāreṇa saparivārāḥ 		de dag kyang skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas rnam pa gnyis kyang yin la bzhi yang yin no /
de dag gi yang skye ba rnams ni bshad zin to /
snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzugs med pa rnams ni bye brag med par dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam pa des bshad zin to /
catuskandhāḥ 'khor dang bcas na ni /
anuparivartirūpābhāvāt /
adhobhūmivivekajāḥ 		phung po bzhi rjes su 'brang ba'i gzugs med pa'i phyir ro /
'og ma'i sa dben las skyes pa /
caturthadhyānavivekajaṃ hyākāśānantyāyatanam bsam gtan bzhi pa las dben pa las skyes pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched yin no /
tadvivekajaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam de las dben ba las skyes pa ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched yin no /
tadvivekajamākiñcanyāyatanam /
tadvivekajaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsamjñāyatanamityevaṃ catvāra ārupyāḥ 		de las dben ba las skyes pa ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched yin no /
de las dben pa las skyes pa ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched yin te /
de ltar na gzugs med pa bzhi yin no /
ko 'yaṃ viveko nāma dben pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
yena mārgeṇādhastādvimucyate lam gang gis ni 'og ma las rnam par 'byed pa ste /
vairāgyagamanāt /
ta eva cārupyāḥ 		'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir ro /
gzugs med pa de dag kyang /
vibhūtarūpasaṃjñākhyāḥ saha sāmantakaistribhiḥ /
ākāśānantyāyatanasāmantakaṃ caturthadhyānālambanatvādvibhūtarūpasaṃjñākhyāṃ na labhate 		nyer bsdogs gsum dang bcas par ni /
gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya /
nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la dmigs pa'i phyir gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya ba'i ming mi 'thob bo /
na hi tatra rūpasaṃjñā vibhūtā na vigatetyarthaḥ /
yaduktaṃ catuskandhā iti sādhyaṃ tāvadetadārupyeṣu rūpaṃ nāstīti 		de la ni gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig pa ma yin te /
ma bral zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
phung po bzhi zhes gang bshad pa re zhig gzugs med pa dag na gzugs med do zhes bya ba 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no /
yadi hi syātkathamārupyā ucyeran gal te yod na ji ltar na gzugs med pa rnams brjod par 'gyur /
īṣadrūpatvā dāpiṅgalavat /
kīdṛśaṃ tāvadīṣadrūpaṃ tatreṣyate 		gzugs cung zad cig yod pa'i phyir te /
cung zad zer ba bzhin no /
re zhig de ni gzugs ji lta bu zhig yod par 'dod /
yadi kāyavāk saṃvaramātraṃ kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṃvarau bhaviṣyataḥ gal te lus dang ngag gi sdom ba tsam zhig go zhe na /
de dag med na ji ltar de dag gi sdom par 'gyur /
na cāsati bhūte bhautikaṃ yujyate 'byung ba med par ni 'byung ba las gyur pa mi rung ngo /
anāsravasaṃvaravaccet gal te zag pa med pa'i sdom pa bzhin no zhe na /
sāsravabhūtasadbhāvāt /
smāpattāvapi tatpratiṣedha uktaḥ /
atha kāyo 'pyastīndriyāṇyapi rūpīṇi 		ma yin te zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba yod pa'i phyir ro /
snyoms par 'jug pa la yang de dgag par bshad do /
'on te lus kyang yod la dbang po gzugs can rnams kyang yod do zhe na ni /
kathaṃ tadīṣadrūpā iṣyante ji ltar na de dag gzugs cung zad yod par 'dod /
parimāṇālpatvāccet /
udakajantukeṣvapyadṛśyarupeṣu prasaṅgaḥ 		gal te bong tshod chung ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni chung ngu'i skye bo gzugs bltar mi snang ba dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro /
acchatvāccet /
antarābhavarūpāvacareṣvapi prasaṅgaḥ 		gal te dang ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni /
srid pa bar ma dag dang gzugs na spyod pa rnams la yang thal bar 'gyur ro /
yato nācchataraṃ cet /
bhavāgramevārupyaṃ syāt /
samāpattivattadupapattiviśeṣāt /
dhyānopapattirūpasyāpi cādharabhūmikendriyāgrahaṇāt kastatra viśeṣaḥ 		gal te gang las ches dang ba med pa yin no zhe na ni /
srid pa'i rtse mo kho na gzugs med pa yin par 'gyur te /
snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro /
bsam gtan du skye ba'i gzugs kyang sa 'og ma'i dbang pos mi zin pa'i phyir de dang yang khyad par ci zhig yod /
dvayoranvarthā saṃjñā nārupyadhātoriti cet gal te gnyis kyi ming ni don dang mthun pa yin gyi gzugs med pa'i khams kyi ni ma yin no zhe na /
kā 'tra yuktiḥ de la rigs pa ci zhig yod /
āyuruṣmaṇoḥ saṃsṛṣṭavacanānnaḍakalāpīdvayavannāmarūpayoranyonyaniśritavacanā dvijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti vacanāt anyatrarūpādyāvatsaṃskārebhyo vijñānasyāgatigatipratiṣedhāccārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhiriti cet gal te tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres par gsungs pa'i phyir dang 'dam bu'i shog gnyis bzhin du ming dang gzugs dag phan tshun brten to zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang /
rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang gzugs nas 'du byed rnams kyi bar las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'ong ba'am 'gro ba bkag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa dag na gzugs yod pa nyid du grub bo zhe na /
na /
saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetadyadidamāyuruṣmaṇoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvamuktam /
kimidaṃ kāmāvacaramāyuḥ saṃdhāyoktamāhosvitsarvamiti /
yacca nāmarūpayoranyonyāśritatvamuktaṃ kimidaṃ kāmarūpāvacaraṃ nāma saṃdhāyoktamāhosvitsarvamiti /
yacca vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamuktaṃ kimatra sarva vijñānaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyayamuktamāhosvitsarve nāmarūpaṃ vijñānapratyayamiti 		ma yin te /
dpyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
re zhig tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres pa nyid du gang gsungs pa 'di ci 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i tshe las dgongs te gsungs sam /
'on te thams cad las zhes bya ba dang gang yang ming dang gzugs dag phan tshun brten pa nyid du gsungs pa 'di ci 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa las dgongs te gsungs sam /
'on te thams cad las zhes bya ba dang gang yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs pa 'di ci rnam par shes pa thams cad ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du gsungs sam /
yaccānyatra rūpādibhyo vijñānasyāgatipratiṣedhaḥ /
kimatra sarvaireva tairvinā tatpratiṣedha āhosvit ekenāpīti 		'on te ming dang gzugs thams cad rnam par shes pa'i rkyen du gsungs zhes bya ba dang gang yang gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba bkag par gsungs pa 'di ci de dag thams cad med na de bkag gam /
aviśeṣavacanānna saṃpradhāryamiti cet 'on te 'ga' zhig kyang zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya dgos so /
atiprasaṅgaḥ /
bāhyasyāpi hyaṣmaṇa āyuṣā binā bhāvo na prāpnoti /
bāhyasyāpi ca rūpasya nāmāśritatvamaviśeṣavacanāt 		gal te bye brag med par gsungs pa'i phyir dpyad par mi bya'o zhe na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur te /
tshe med par phyi'i dro ba yang yod par mi 'gyur la /
phyi'i gzugs kyang rnam par shes pa la brten pa nyid du 'gyur te /
khyad par med par 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
caturvijñānasthitivaccāhāracatuṣkavacanādrūpārupyadhātvorapi kavaḍīkārāhāraprasaṅgaḥ rnam par shes pa gnas bzhin du zas bzhi gsungs pa'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag na yang kham du byed pa'i zas yod par thal bar yang 'gyur ro /
atikramya devān kavaḍīkārā hārabhakṣāniti vacanāt prītyāhāravacanāccāprasaṅga iti cet /
ārupyeṣvapi rūpasyāprasaṅgaḥ /
rūpāṇāṃ niḥsaraṇamārupyāḥ 		gal te kham du byed pa'i zas za ba'i lha rnams las 'das te zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang dga' ba'i zas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na ni gzugs med pa dag na yang gzugs yod par thal bar mi 'gyur te /
ye te śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārupyāḥ /
arupiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāditi vacanāt /
sati hi rupe svaṃ rūpamavaśyaṃ saṃjānīranniti /
audārikamadhobhūmikaṃ rūpamabhisaṃdhāyoktamiti cet 		gzugs med pa rnams ni gzugs rnams las nges par 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba dang gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba gang dag gzugs rnams las 'das nas zhes bya ba dang gzugs can ma yin pa'i sems can dag yod ces bya ba dang rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das nas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
gzugs shig yod na ni rang gi gzugs gdon mi za bar 'du shes par byed par 'gyur ro /
gal te sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs rags pa las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no zhe na ni /
kavaḍīkāre 'pi tulyam /
dhyānānāmapi cādhobhūminiḥsaraṇatvādārupya prasaṅgaḥ 		kham gyi zas la yang mtshungs so /
bsam gtan rnams kyang sa 'og ma pa las nges par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs med par thal bar 'gyur ro /
vedanādiniḥsaraṇaṃ ca kiṃ noktāḥ /
adhobhūmikavedanāniḥsaraṇāt /
rūpajātiṃ tu kutsnāmatikrāntā na vedanādijātim /
ato rūpāṇāṃ niḥsaraṇamuktāḥ 		sa 'og ma pa'i tshor ba la sogs pa las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir tshor ba la sogs pa las kyang nges par 'byung ba yin bar ci'i phyir ma bshad de /
