gzugs kyi rnam pa zad par las 'das la tshor ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa las ni ma yin pas de'i phyir gzugs rnams las nges par 'byung ba zhes gsungs so /
bhavena bhavasyāniḥsaraṇavacanaṃ tu tenaiva tasyāniḥsaraṇādasarvānatyanta niḥsaraṇācca srid pas srid pa las nges par mi 'byung bar gsungs pa ni de nyid kyis de las nges par mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang thams cad dang gtan du nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
dhyānesu coktaṃ bhagavatā yattatra bhavati rūpagataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ veti /
ārupyeṣu tūktaṃ yattatra bhavati vedanāgataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ veti 		bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan dag la ni gang de na gzugs kyi rnam pa yod pa'ang rung rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'i bar yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs la /
gzugs med pa dag la ni gang de na tshor ba'i rnam pa yod pa'ang rung rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'i bar yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs te /
satyāṃ tesu rūpajātau kasmādrūpagataṃ veti nāvakṣyat /
tasmāt /
nārupye rūpasadbhāvaḥ /
kathamidānīmanalpakalpocchinnādrūpāt punarapi rupotpattistataḥ pracyutānām /
rupotpattistu cittataḥ 		de dag na gzugs kyi rnam ba zhig yod na ci'i phyir gzugs kyi rnam pa yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs par mi 'gyur te de lta bas na gzugs med pa na gzugs med do /
de ni ji ltar na de nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi gzugs bskal pa mi nyung ba zhig tu gzugs rgyun chad pa las yang skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
gzugs ni sems las skye bar 'gyur /
rūpasya cittādevotpattistadvipākahetuparibhāvitāllabdhavṛttitaḥ /
kathamanāśritya rūpaṃ cittaṃ vartate /
kasmānna vartitavyam 		gzugs ni de'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyus yongs su bsgos pa'i sems 'jug pa rnyed pa las skye bar 'gyur ro /
ji ltar na sems gzugs lam brten par gnas she na /
ci'i phyir gnas par mi 'gyur /
ihaivamadarśanāt /
kavaḍīkārāntareṇā 'pi vinā rūpadhātau na vartitavyam 		'di na de lta bu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro /
kham gyi zas med par yang gzugs kyi khams na gnas par mi 'gyur ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
ihaivamadarśanāt /
uktaṃ ca pūrvaṃ yathā vartate 		'di na de lta bu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro /
ji ltar gnas pa ni sngar bshad zin to /
gatametadidaṃ vaktavyam /
kimepāmākāśānantyāyatanādīnāmākāśādaya evālambanaṃ yata evaṃ samākhyāyate 		'di ni rdzogs so /
'di brjod par bya ste /
ci nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa de dag nam mkha' la sogs pa kho na la dmigs pa yin pas de'i phyir de skad ces bya'am zhe na /
na hi /
kathaṃ tarhi /
trayastāvat 		ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
re zhig gsum mo /
ākāśānantyavijñānānantyākiñcanyasaṃjñakāḥ rnam shes mtha' yas mkha' mtha' yas /
ci yang med ces bya de ltar /
tathāprayogāt /
anantamākāśamanantaṃ vijñānaṃ nāsti kiñcidityeva manasikurvāṇasteṣu prayujyante yathāsaṃkhyam /
ata eṣāmetāḥ saṃjñā iti /
māndyāktu nasaṃjñanāpyasaṃjñakaḥ /
mṛdutvāttu saṃjñāyā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamuktam /
na hi sā paṭvī saṃjñā na ca punarnaiva saṃjñeti /
yadyapi tatrāpyevaṃ prayujyante saṃjñārogaḥ saṃjñāgaṇdaḥ saṃjñāśalyaḥ āsaṃjñikasaṃmohaḥ etacchāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamiti /
kasmāttu taistadevaṃ gṛhyata ityavaśyamidaṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate /
mṛdutvātsaṃjñāmityetadevoktam 		sbyor phyir grangs bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas so /
rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so /
ci yang med do zhes de ltar yid la byed cing de dag la rab tu sbyor bas de'i phyir de dag gi ming de dag yin no /
dman phyir 'du shes med /
'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa'o /
'du shes chung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min zhes bshad de /
de ni 'du shes gsal ba yang ma yin la 'du shes med pa kho na yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
gal te de la yang 'di ltar 'du shes ni nad do /
'du shes ni 'bras so /
'du shes ni zug rngu'o /
'du shes med pa ni kun du rmongs pa'o /
'di ltar 'du shes med /
'du shes med min skye mched 'di ni zhi ba'o /
'di ni gya nom pa'o zhes bya bar sbyor ba yod mod kyi ci'i phyir de dag gis de la de ltar 'dzin zhes byas pa dang 'du shes rnams chung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di gdon mi za bar brjod dgos par 'gyur bas de nyid bshad do /
de ltar snyoms 'jug dngos gzhi'i rdzas /
iti maulaṃ samāpattidravyamaṣṭavidhaṃ /
ityetānyaṣṭau maulāni samāpattidravyāṇi yaduta catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārupyā iti /
teṣāṃ punaḥ /
tridhā 		rnam pa brgyad /
de ltar na 'di dag ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i dngos gzhi'i rdzas brgyad yin te /
'di lta ste /
bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa bzhi'o /
sapta /
bhavāgrādanyāni sapta trividhāni 		de dag las bdun rnam pa gsum /
srid pa'i rtse mo las gzhan pa bdun ni rnam pa gsum yin te /
āsvādanāvacchūddhānāsravāṇi ro myang ldan dang dag pa dang /
zag med /
āsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni śuddhakānyanāsravāṇi ca ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang dag pa pa rnams dang zag pa med pa rnams so /
aṣṭamaṃ dvidhā /
bhavāgramāsvādanāsaṃprayuktaṃ śuddhakaṃ ca /
anāsrava nāsti /
tatra punaḥ 		brgyad pa rnam pa gnyis /
srid pa'i rtse mo ni ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang dag pa pa yin gyi zag pa med pa ni med do /
de la /
āsvādanāsaṃprayuktaṃ satṛṣṇaṃ /
tṛṣṇā hyāsvādanā 		ro myang mtshungs ldan sred bcas so /
ro myang ba ni sred pa yin no /
laukikaṃ śubham /
śuddhakaṃ 		'jig rten pa yi dge ba ni /
dag pa /
laukikaṃ kuśalaṃ samāpattidravyaṃ śuddhakamuccayate 'lobhādi śuddhadharmayogāt /
kiṃ punastenāsvādanāsaṃprayuktenāsvādyate /
tattadāsvādyaṃ /
tacchuddhakaṃ samāpattidravyaṃ tenāsvādyate samanantarātītam 		'jig rten pa'i dge ba snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas ni dag pa zhes bya ste /
ma chags pa la sogs pa chos dkar po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa des ci zhig ro myong bar byed ce na /
de ni des myang bya /
snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang 'das ma thag pa de ni des ro myong bar byed de /
yadāsvādayati tasmādvyutthito yenāsvādayati tatsamāpannaḥ ro myang bar bya ba gang yin pa de las ni langs pa yin no /
gang gis ro myong bar byed pa de la ni snyoms par zhugs pa yin no /
lokattaramanāsravam zag med 'jig rten 'das pa'o /
yallokottaraṃ samāpattidravyaṃ tadanāsravam /
eṣāṃ ca samāpattidravyāṇāṃ dhyānānyeva bhavanti nārupyāḥ 		'jig rten las 'das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang yin pa de ni zag pa med pa yin no snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas de dag las bsam gtan rnams kho na yan lag dang ldan pa yin gyi gzugs med pa rnams ni ma yin no /
tatra /
pañcādye 		de la dang po la lnga /
prathame bhāge pañcāṅgāni /
tarkacārau ca prītisaukhyasamādhayaḥ /
vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā cetyetāni pañcāṅgāni samādhiḥ kilāṅgaṃ dhyānaṃ ca 		bsam gtan po la yan lag lnga ste /
rtog dpyod dang dga' bas bde dang ting 'dzin rnams /
rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid de /
de ltar na de dag ni yan lag lnga yin no /
ting nge 'dzin ni yan lag kyang yin la bsam gtan yang yin no /
śeṣāṇyaṅgānīti /
yathā caturaṅgā senā evaṃ pañcāṅgaṃ dhyānam 		lhag ma rnams ni yan lag dag yin no zhes grag go /
yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag ji lta bar yan lag lnga'i bsam gtan yang de dang 'dra'o /
prītyādayaḥ prasādaśca dvitīye 'ṅgacatuṣṭayam /
dvitīye dhyāne catvāryaṅgāni /
adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittekāgratā ca /
tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /
tṛtīye tu dhyāne pañcāṅgāni /
upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajñānaṃ sukhaṃ smādhiśca /
samādhiparyāyo hi sthitiḥ 		gnyis pa la ni yan lag bzhi /
rab dang dad ni dga' la sogs /
bsam gtan gnyis pa la yan lag bzhi ste /
nang rab tu dang ba dang dga' ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid do /
gsum pa la lnga btang snyoms dang /
dran dang shes rab bde dang gnas /
bsam gtan gsum pa la yang yan lag lnga ste /
btang snyoms dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang bden pa dang ting nge 'dzin to /
gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam grangs yin te /
samyaksamādhiḥ katamaḥ /
yā cittasya sthitiriti sūtre vacanāt 		mdo las /
yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
gang sems gnas pa dang yang dag par gnas pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
catvāryante 'sukhāduḥkhopekṣāsmṛtisamādhayaḥ mtha' na bzhi dran btang snyoms dang /
bde min sdug min ting 'dzin rnams /
caturthaṃ dhyānamantyam /
tatra catvāryaṅgāni 		mtha' ma ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o /
de la yan lag bzhi ste /
aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiḥ samādhiśca /
tānyetānyaṣṭādaśa dhyānāṅgāni bhavanti 		bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang dran pa yongs su dag pa dang ting 'dzin yongs su dag pa'o /
de dag ni bsam gtan gyi yan lag bco brgyad yin te /
prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pañcāṅgatvāt /
dvitīyacaturthayoścaturaṅgatvāt 		dang po dang gsum pa dag la ni yan lag lnga yin pa'i phyir dang gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dag la ni yan lag bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro /
nāmata evam /
dravyato daśa caikaṃ ca 		ming gi sgo nas ni de lta'o /
rdzas su bcu gcig /
dravyata etānyekādaśa bhavanti rdzas su ni de dag bcu gcig yin te /
prāthamadhyānikāni pañca bsam gtan dang po la lnga'o /
dvitīye 'dhyātmasaṃprasādo vardhate gnyis pa la ni nang rab tu dang ba lhag go /
tṛtīye upekṣāsmṛtisaṃprajñānasukhāni gsum pa la ni btang snyoms dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang bde ba rnams so /
caturthe 'duḥkhāsukhā vedaneti /
ata evocyate yānyaṅgāni prathame dhyāne dvitīye 'pi tānīti catuṣkoṭikam 		bzhi pa la bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'o /
de nyid kyi phyir smras pa /
yan lag gang dag bsam gtan dang po na yod pa de dag gnyis pa na yang yod dam zhe na /
mu bzhi ste /
prathamā koṭirvitarkavicārau mu dang po ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag go /
dvitīyā adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ /
tṛtīyā prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca 		gnyis pa ni nang rab tu dang pa'o /
gsum pa ni dga' ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid do /
caturthī koṭiruktanirmuktā dharmā iti mu bzhi pa ni bshad pa las ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams so zhes bya'o /
evaṃ sarvāṇi dhyānāṅgāni parasparaṃ yojyāni /
kasmāt /
tṛtīye dhyāne sukhaṃ dravyāntaramucyate /
yasmāttadvedanāsukhaṃ dhyānayostu 		de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi yan lag thams cad phan tshun du sbyar bar bya'o /
ci'i phyir bsam gtan gsum pa na yod pa'i bde ba rdzas gzhan du brjod ce na /
'di ltar de'i bde ba ni tshor ba yin la /
prasrabdhisukhamādyayoḥ /
prathamadvitīyayostu dhyānayoḥ prasrabdhisukhamityuktam 		bsam gtan dang po na; shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin /
bsam gtan dang po dag na ni shin tu sbyangs pa la bde ba zhes bshad do /
iha prasrabdhisukhaṃ tatra vedanāsukhamiti kuta etat 'di la ni shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin la /
de la ni tshor ba bde ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las shes she na /
dvayordhyānasamāpattyoḥ sukhendriyāyogāt /
na hi tattayoḥ kāyikaṃ yujyate 		snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gnyis na bde ba'i dbang po dang mi ldan pa'i phyir te /
de gnyis na de lus kyi yin par ni mi rung ste /
samāpannasya vijñānakāyābhāvāt /
nāpi caitasikaṃ prītivacanāt /
prītirhi saumanasyam /
na ca sukhasaumanasyayoryaugapadyamasti /
na cāpi tayoḥ paryāyeṇa dhyāne vṛttiryuktā pañcāṅgavacanāditi 		snyoms par zhugs pa la rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga med pa'i phyir ro /
sems las byung ba yang ma yin te /
dga' ba zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin na /
bde ba dang yid bde ba gnyis cig car 'byung ba med do /
de gnyis rnam grangs kyis bsam gtan na yod par yang rigs pa ma yin te /
apare punarāhuḥ /
nāstyeva caitasikaṃ sukhendriyaṃ triṣvapi hi dhyāneṣu 		yan lag lnga zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
gzhan dag na re sems las byung ba'i bde ba'i dbang po ni kho na ste /
kāyikameva sukhamaṅgaṃ vyavasthāpitamiti /
yattarhi sutra uktaṃ sukhendriyaṃ katamat /
yatsukhavedanīyena sparśena spṛṣṭasyotpadyate kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamidamucyate sukhendriyamiti 		bsam gtan gsum char na yang lus kyi bde ba kho na yan lag tu rnam par gzhag go zhes zer ro /
'o na mdo las /
bde ba'i dbang po gang zhe na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pas reg pa na lus kyi dang sems las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rnam pa bde ba sim pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni bde ba'i dbang po zhes bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
adhyāropita eṣa pāṭhaḥ /
kenāpi sarvanikāyāntareṣu kāyikamityeva pāṭhāt /
sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata iti svaśabdena vacanācca 		tshig de ni 'ga' zhig gis sgro btags pa yin te /
sde pa gzhan thams cad las lus kyi zhes bya ba kho na 'byung ba'i phyir dang bde ba lus kyis myong la zhes rang gi sgras gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
manaskāyeneticet /
evamuktvā ko guṇaḥ /
caturthe dhyāne prasrabdhibhūyastve 'pi sukhāvacanācca 		gal te yid kyi lus kyis so zhe na ni; de skad bshad pa la yon tan ci zhig yod /
bsam gtan bzhi pa la shin tu sbyangs pa mang bzhin du bde ba ma smos pa'i yang phyir ro /
sukhavedanānukūlā prasrabdhiḥ sukhamiti cet gal te bde ba'i tshor ba dang mthun pa'i shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin no zhe na ni /
tṛtīye prasrabdhisukhāvacanaṃ kasmāt gsum pa na yod pa'i shin tu sbyangs pa bde bar ma gsungs pa yang ci'i phyir /
upekṣopahatatvāditi cet gal te btang snyoms kyis bcom pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
na upekṣayaiva tadvṛddhiḥ /
pūrvikābhyastādviśeṣāt /
yasminsamaye āryaśrāvakaḥ pravivekajāṃ prītiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatītyatra sūtre prasrabdhisukhayoḥ pṛthagvacanānna prasrabdhireva sukham 		ma yin te /
snga ma gnyis pas de khyad par du 'phags pas btang snyoms kho nas de 'phel ba'i phyir ro /
gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos rab tu dben pa'i bde ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa zhes 'byung ba'i mdo 'di las kyang shin tu sbyangs pa dang bde ba gnyis tha dad par 'byung ba'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa kho na bde ba ma yin no /
samāpannasya katham kāyavijñānamiti cet gal te snyoms par zhugs pa la ji ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung zhe na /
samādhiviśeṣajena prasrabdhisaṃjñakena sukhavedanīyena vāyunā kāyasphuraṇāt ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las skyes pa shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rlung gis lus la rgyas pa'i phyir ro /
bahirvikṣepāssamādhibraṃśa iti cet /
na /
samādhijasyāntaḥkāyasaṃbhūtasya kāyasukhasya samādhyanukūlatvāt 		gal te phyi rol du rnam par g yengs pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin las nyams par 'gyur ro zhe na /
ma yin te /
ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa lus kyi bde ba nang du 'byung ba'i lus kyi bde ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i phyir ro /
kāyavijñā nakāle vyutthitaḥ syāditi cet gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i tshe langs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
na /
ata eva /
kāmāvacareṇa kāyendriyeṇa rūpāvacaraspraṣṭavyavijñānānutpattiriti cet 		ma yin te /
de nyid kyi phyir ro /
gal te 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lus kyi dbang pos gzugs na spyod pa'i reg bya la rnam par shes pa mi skye'o zhe na /
na /
prasrabdhivijñānasyotpatteḥ 		ma yin te /
shin tu sbyangs pa'i rnam par shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro /
anāsrave api spraṣṭavyakāyavijñāne syātām /
mā bhūtkiñcidaṅgaṃ sāsravaṃ kiñcidanāsravamiti cet 		gal te yan lag cung zad cig ni zag pa dang bcas pa cung zad cig ni zag pa med pa yin na mi rung bas reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa zag pa med pa dag tu yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
kāyikaprasrabdhivodhyaṅga vacanāt /
iṣṭe bodhyaṅgānukūlatvāditi cet /
anāsravatvamapyevam 		lus shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu gsungs pas 'dod pa'i phyir ro /
gal te byang chub kyi yan lag dang mthun pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni zag pa med pa nyid kyang de dang 'dra'o /
sāsravā dharmāḥ katame /
cakṣuryāvadeva spraṣṭavyamityasya sūtrasya virodhāditi cet 		gal te zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
mig ji snyed pa zhes 'byung ba'i mdo 'di dang 'gal lo zhe na /
na /
anyaspraṣṭavya kāyavijñānābhisaṃdhivacanāt 		ma yin te /
reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
na cānāsrave kiñcidaṅgaṃ sāsravaṃ kicidanāsravaṃ syāditi cet /
ayaugapadyātko doṣaḥ sukhaprītyasamavadhānānna pañcāṅgaṃ syāditi cet 		gal te zag pa med pa la yan lag cung zad cig ni zag pa dang bcas ba cung zad cig ni zag pa med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
cig car ma yin pa'i phyir nyes pa ci zhig yod /
gal te bde ba dang dga' ba phrad pa med pa'i phyir yan lag lnga par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
ma yin te /
na saṃbhavaṃ pratyupadeśāndvitarkavicāravat srid pa'i phyir bstan pas rtog pa dang dpyod pa bzhin no /
sādhyamiti cet /
siddhaṃ cittasyaudārikasūkṣmatayorvirodhāt doṣāvacanācca 		gal te bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na /
sems rtsing ba dang zhib pa gnyis 'gal ba'i phyir dang nyes pa smos pa'i phyir grub pa yin no /
tasmādyānyeva prathamadhyāne pañcāṅgāni teṣāṃ dvitricaturaṅgāpakarṣeṇa dvitīyādidhyānavyavasthānam de lta bas na bsam gtan dang po la yod pa'i yan lag lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag kho na las yan lag gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi bor nas bsam gtan gnyis ba la sogs pa rnam par gzhag go /
ata eva ca prathame dhyāne pañcānāmaṅgatvamuktam /
tadapakarṣeṇottaradhyānavyavasthāpanāt /
na tu saṃjñādīnāmaṅgatvamuktam /
kimartha vā pañcānāmevāṅgatvamuktam 		de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan dang po la ni yan lag lnga nyid du bshad la /
de dag las thor bas ni bsam gtan phyi ma rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir 'du shes la sogs pa ni ma yin no /
yang na ci'i phyir lnga kho na yan lag nyid yin /
upakārakatvāditi cet gal te phan pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
na /
vitarkavicārābhyāṃ smṛtiprajñayorapakārakataratvāt /
astyeṣa ekeṣāṃ vādaḥ /
naiva tu pūrvācāryā evaṃ nirdiśanti sma yāvantaḥ prajñāntam 		ma yin te /
rtog pa dang dpyod pa gnyis pas dran pa dang shes rab dag ches phan pa'i phyir ro /
kha cig de skad du rgol ba yod mod kyi sngon gyi slob dpon rnams ni ji snyed mngon pa de ltar mi ston te /
tasmādvicāryametat /
adhyātmasaṃprasādo nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ 		de lta bas na 'di ni dpyad par bya ba yin no /
nang rab tu dang ba zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhe na /
vitarkavicārakṣobhavirahāt praśāntavāhitā saṃtater adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i 'khrug pa dang bral bas rgyud rab tu zhi bar gyur pa ni nang rab tu dang ba yin te /
sormikeva hi nadī vitarkavicārakṣobhitā saṃtatir aprasannā vartate iti /
na tarhi sa dravyāntaram iti kathaṃ dravyata ekādaśāṅgāni bhavanti /
tasmāttarhi 		rtog pa dang dpyod pas dkrugs pa'i rgyud ni chu bo dba' rlabs dang bcas pa bzhin du rab tu ma dang ba yin no /
'o na ni de rdzas gzhan ma yin pas ji ltar na rdzas su yan lag bcu gcig yin /
de lta bas na /
śraddhā prasādaḥ rab tu dang ba dad pa yin /
tasya hi dvitīyadhyānalātsamāhibhūminihsaraṇe saṃpratyaya utpadyate /
so 'tradhyātmasaṃprasāda iti /
naiva hi vitarkavicārasamādhayo nāpyadhātmasaṃprasādo dravyāntarāṇītyapare /
kathamasati dravyāntaratve caitasikatvaṃ siddhyati 		de ni bsam gtan gnyis pa thob pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa las nges par 'byung ba la yid ches ba skye ste /
de ni 'dir nang rab tu dang ba zhes bya'o /
gzhan dag na re rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rdzas gzhan ma yin la nang rab tu dang ba yang rdzas gzhan ma yin no /
rdzas gzhan med na ji ltar sems las byung pa nyid du 'grub ce na /
avasthāviseso hi nāma cetasaścetasiko bhavati sems can gyi gnas skabs kyi bye brag kyang sems las byung ba yin no zhes zer te /
natveṣa śastrasiddhāntaḥ 'di ni bstan bcos kyi grub pa'i mtha' ma yin no /
kathamidaṃ gamyate /
kimanyat bhavatu /
yathecchanti nikāyāntarīyāḥ dharmāntarameva caitasikaṃ prītiḥ 		dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin no zhes gang bshad pa 'di ji ltar khong du chud /
gzhan ci zhig yin /
ji ltar sde pa gzhan dag 'dod pa lta bu yin no /
saumanasyaṃ tu triṣvapi dhyāneṣu sukhamiti /
yathecchanti nikāyāntarīyāḥ dharmāntarameva caitasikaṃ prītiḥ saumanasyaṃ tu triṣvapi dhyānesu sukhamiti 		sde ba gzhan dag ji ltar 'dod ce na /
dga' ba ni sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan dag kho na yin la yid bde ba ni bsam gtan gsum char gyi yang bde ba yin par 'dod do /
na vai sukhaṃ dhyāneṣu saumanasyaṃ yujyate bsam gtan dag na yod pa'i bde ba ni yid bde ba yin par mi rung ba nyid kyi /
prītistu saumanasyaṃ dvidhāgamāt /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā aviparītakasūtre tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamuktvā atrāsyotpannaṃ saumanasyendriyamapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyata iti /
caturthe ca dhyāne sukhendriyaṃ nirudhyata ityuktam /
punaścoktaṃ sukhasya ca prahāṇāt duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṅgamādityato 'pi na tṛtīye dhyāne saumanasyendriyamasti 		lus rnams gnyis phyir dga' yid bde /
bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par sgyur ba'i mdo las bsam gtan gsum pa bka' stsal nas 'dir 'di'i yid bde ba'i dbang po skyes pa ma lus bar 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal la /
bsam gtan bzhi pa la ni bde ba'i dbang po 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to /
yang bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir yang bsam gtan gsum pa na yid bde ba'i dbang po med de /
tasmāt prītireva saumansyaṃ na sukham de ltar bas na dga' ba kho na yid bde ba yin gyi bde ba ni ma yin no /
kiṃ punaḥ kliṣṭeṣvapi dhyāneṣu yathāvihitānyaṅgāni bhavanti ci nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam gtan dag la yang ji skad du bshad pa ltar yan lag de dag yod dam zhe na /
na hi kiṃ teṣu na vidyate med do /
de dag na ci zhig med ce na /
kliṣṭeṣvasatprītisukhaṃ prasādaḥ saṃpradhīḥ smṛṭiḥ /
upekṣāsmṛtiśuddhiśca /
prathame dhyāne vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ nāsti 		nyon mongs can la dga' bde dang /
dran dang shes bzhin dran pa dang /
btang snyoms dran pa dag pa med /
bsam gtan dang po la ni bde ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba med de /
kleśāviviktatvāt /
dvitīye dhyāne 'dhyātmasaṃprasādo nāsti 		nyon mongs pa las dben ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
gnyis pa la ni nang rab tu dang ba med de /
kleśāvilatvāt /
tṛtīye smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ nāsti 		nyon mongs pas rnyog pa'i phyir ro /
gsum pa la ni dran pa dang shes bzhin med de /
kliṣṭasukhasaṃbrhamitatvāt /
ccaturthe upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhirnāsti 		nyon mongs pa can gyi bde bas kun du rmongs par bya ba'i phyir ro /
bzhi pa la ni btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa med de /
kleśamalinatvāt /
evaṃ tāvat kecidāhuḥ 		nyon mongs pas dri ma can du byas pa'i phyir ro /
re zhig kha cig de skad zer ro /
kecit prasrabdhyupekṣaṇe /
kecitpunaḥ prathamadvitīyayoḥ kliṣṭayoḥ prasrabdhirnāsti /
tṛtīyacaturthayorupekṣā nāsti 		kha cig shin tu sbyangs btang snyoms /
kha cig na re nyon mongs pa can dang po dang gnyis pa dag na ni shin tu sbyangs pa med la gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag na ni btang snyoms med de /
kuśalalmahābhūmikatvādanayoriti de gnyis ni dge ba'i sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
trīṇi ca dhyānāni señjitāni uktāni bhagavatā /
sāpakṣālatvāt 		bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan gsum ni skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir g yo ba dang bcas pa dag yin no zhes bka' stsal te /
aṣṭāpakṣālamuktatvādāniñjaṃ tu caturthakam skyon brgyad las ni grol ba'i phyir /
bzhi pa g yo ba med pa yin /
ke punaste 'pakṣālāḥ /
vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam 		skyon de dag kyang gang zhe na /
rtog dang dpyod dang dbugs dag dang /
bde ba la sogs bzhi yin no /
vitarkavicārau sukhaduḥkhe saumanasyadaurmanasye śvāsapraśvāsāśca rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dang dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba ste /
eṣāmaṣṭānāmeko'pyapakṣālaścaturthe nāstyatastadāneñjyamuktam bsam gtan bzhi pa na ni skyon brgyad po de dag gcig kyang med pas de'i phyir de ni mi g yo ba zhes bshad do /
vitarkavicāraprītisukhairakampanīyatvādāneñjyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ sūtre nirvāta pradīpanidarśanādityapare gzhan dag na re bzhi pa ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dag gis g yo bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mi g yo ba yin te /
mdo las rlung med pa'i mar me dper mdzad pa'i phyir zhes zer ro /
dvayordhyānayoḥ saumanasyamuktaṃ prītivacanāt bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni dga' ba zhes smos pa'i phyir yid bde ba yod par bshad /
tṛtīye sukhaṃ caturthe upekṣā /
taskiṃ yā dhyānasamāpattiṣu vedanāstā eva dhyānopapattiṣu /
netyāha 		gsum pa na ni bde ba /
bzhi pa na ni btang snyoms yod par bshad na /
de ci /
snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan dag na yod pa'i tshor ba gang dag yin ba de dag nyid skye ba'i bsam gtan dag na yod dam zhe na /
smras pa ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
saumanasyasukhopekṣā upekṣāsumanaskate /
sukhhopekṣe upekṣā pravido dhyānopapattiṣu /
prathamadhyānotpatto tisro vedanāḥ /
sukhaṃ trivijñānakāyikaṃ saumanasyaṃ manobhūmikam /
upekṣā caturvijñānakāyikī /
dvitīyadhyānopapattau dve vedane saumanasyopekṣe manobhūmike /
sukhaṃ nāstyasya vijñānakāyābhāvāt /
tṛtīyadhyānopapattī dve vedane /
sukhopekṣe manobhūmike /
caturthadhyānopapattāvupekṣaiva /
yadi dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu trayo vijñānakāyā na saṃvidyante vitarkavicārau ca katham te paśyanti yāvatspṛśanti katham cāvijñapti samutthāpayanti 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
skye ba'i bsam gtan dag na ni /
yid bde ba dang btang snyoms dang /
btang snyoms yid bde bde ba dang /
btang snyoms btang snyoms tshor ba yod /
skye ba'i bsam gtan dang po na ni /
tshor ba gsum yod de /
rnam par shes ba'i tshogs gsum pa'i bde ba dang yid kyis pa'i yid bde ba dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhi pa'i btang snyoms so /
skye ba'i bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni tshor ba gnyis te /
yid kyi sa ba'i yid bde ba dang btang snyoms so /
rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gzhan med pa'i phyir bde ba dang yid kyis pa'i yid bde ba dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhi pa'i btang snyoms so /
skye ba'i bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni tshor ba gnyis te /
yid kyi sa pa'i yid bde ba dang btang snyoms so /
rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gzhan med pa'i phyir bde ba med do /
skye ba'i bsam gtan gsum pa na ni tshor ba gnyis te /
yid kyi sa pa'i bde ba dang btang snyoms skye ba'i bsam gtan bzhi pa na ni btang snyoms kho na yod do /
gal te bsam gtan gsum pa la sogs pa dag na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gsum med pa la rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag kyang med na ji ltar na de dag gis mthong ba nas reg pa'i bar du 'gyur /
ji ltar na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed ce na /
na ve keṣūpapannānāṃ cakṣurvijñānādayona santi /
na tu svabhūmikāḥ 		de dag tu skyes pa rnams la mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa med pa nyid kyang ma yin la rang gis pa yang ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
kāyākṣiśrotravijñānaṃ vijñaptyutthāpakaṃ ca yat 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
gnyis pa sogs na lus mig dang /
rna ba'i rnam shes rnam rig slong /
dvitīyādau tadādyāptaṃ /
prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrakāyavijñānaṃ vijñaptisamutthāpakaṃ ca dvitīyādiṣu ca dhyāneṣu saṃmukhīkurvanti /
nirmāṇacittavadyena te paśyanti yāvadvijñapti samutthāpayanti 		gang yin de ni dang por gtogs /
bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na ni sprul pa'i sems bzhin du gang gis na de dag gis mthong bas na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pa'i bar bsam gtan dang po'i sa ba'i mig dang rna ba dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang rnam par rig byed kun nas slong par byed pa mngon sum du byed do /
akliṣṭāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat /
anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ veditavyaṃ yatte saṃmukhīkurvanti 		de lung ma bstan nyon mongs min /
de dag mngon sum du byed pa bsam gtan dang bo'i sa pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin gyi /
na kliṣṭaṃ vītarāgatvānna kuśalaṃ hīnatvāditi /
avasitaṃ dhyānakāryam 		'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yang ma yin la /
dman pa'i phyir dge ba yang ma yin no /
bsam gtan gyi bya ba rdzogs so /
atha śuddhakādīnāṃ dhyānārupyāṇāṃ kathaṃ lābhaḥ yang dag pa sa la sogs pa'i bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams ji ltar 'thob ce na /
atadvān labhate śuddhaṃ vairāgyeṇopapattitaḥ de dang mi ldan 'dod chags bral /
skye ba las ni dag pa 'thob /
asamanvāgatastena śuddhakaṃ dhayanamārupyaṃ vā pratilabhate /
adhobhūmivairāgyādvā 		de dang mi ldan pa ni bsam gtan nam gzugs med pa dag sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral ba'am /
adhobhūmyupapattito vā /
anyatra bhavāgrāt /
na hi tasyopapattito lābhaḥ 		srid pa'i rtse mo ma gtogs pas 'og mar skye ba las 'thob ste /
de ni skye bas 'thob pa med do /
atadvāniti kimartha samanvāgataḥ ci'i phyir de dang mi ldan pa zhes brjod ce na /
śuddhakena prayogato 'pi nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ śuddhakaṃ pratilabhate parihāṇito vā hānabhāgīyam dag pa ba dang ldan pa ni sbyor ba las kyang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dag pa pa 'thob la /
yongs su nyams pa las kyang nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'thob bo /
ata evocyate syācchuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ vairāgyeṇa pratilabheta vairāgyeṇa vijahyāt /
evaṃ parihāṇyā copapattyā ca 		de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan dag pa pa 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob par 'gyur la 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor bar 'gyur ba dang de bzhin du yongs su nyams pa dang skye bas 'thob pa dang 'dor bar 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na yod de /
syāddhānabhāgīyaṃ prathamaṃ dhayānam /
taddhi kāmavairāgyeṇa labhyate 		bsam gtan dang po nyams pa'i cha dang mthun par ro /
de ni 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob la /
brahmalokavairāgyeṇa tyajyate tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor ro /
brahmalokavairāgyaparihāṇyā labhyate /
kāmavairāgyaprahāṇyā tyajyate /
upariṣṭādbrahmaloka utpadyamāno labhate /
tasmāt punaḥ kāmadhātāvupapapadyamāno vijahātīti 		tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa las 'thob la /
'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa las 'dor ro /
gang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba na 'thob la /
des na 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba na 'dor ro zhes 'byung ngo /
anāsravaṃ tu vairāgyāt zag med 'dod chags bral ba yis /
atadvān labhate iti vartate de dang mi ldan pa las 'thob /
ces bya bar sbyor ro /
tadvāṃstu kṣayajñānato 'pyaśaikṣaṃ labhate indriyasaṃcārato 'pi śaikṣaśaikṣam de dang ldan pa ni zad pa shes pa las kyang mi sgrol ba 'thob la /
dbang po 'pho ba las kyang slob pa dang mi slob pa 'thob bo /
nanu ca niyāmā vakrāntito 'pyanāsravaṃ prathamato labhate nges par 'jug pa las kyang dang po nyid du zag pa med pa 'thob pa ma yin nam zhe na /
nāvaśyamānupūrvikeṇālābhāt mthar gyis pas mi 'thob pa'i phyir gdon mi za ba yin te /
yathā tvavaśyaṃ labhate tathoktam ji ltar gdon mi za bar 'thob pa de ltar bshad do /
kliṣṭaṃ hānyupapattitaḥ nyon mongs can nyams skye ba yis /
atadvān labhata ityevānuvartate de dang mi ldan ba las 'thob /
ces bya ba kho nar sbyar te /
parihāṇito yadi tadvairāgyātparihīyate /
upapattito yadyuparibhūmeradharāyāmupapadyate /
katamasmātsamāpattidravyādanantaraṃ katyupapadyante 		gal te de las 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams na yongs su nyams pa las 'thob bo /
gal te sa gong ma las nas 'og mar skyes na skye bas 'thob bo /
snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang gi mjug thogs su du zhig skye zhe na /
anāsravaprathamadhyānāntaraṃ ṣaḍutpadyante /
svabhūmike śuddhakānāsrave dvitīyatṛtīyadhyānabhūmike ca 		zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang po'i mjug thogs su drug skye ste /
rang gi sa pa dang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa gzhan dag go /
ākiñcanyāyatanānantaraṃ sapta /
svabhūmike śuddhakānāsrave vijñānākāśānantyāyatanabhūmike ca /
bhavāgraṃ śuddhakamevānāsravābhāvāt 		ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi mjug thogs su bdun te rang gis pa dang rnam shes dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa pa'i dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i dag pa kho na ste /
zag pa med pa med pa'i phyir ro /
dvitīyadhyānāntaramaṣṭau /
svabhūmike śuddhakānāsrave tṛtīyacaturthaprathamadhyānabhūmike ca /
vijñānānantyāyatanānantaraṃ nava /
svabhūmike dve ākāśānantyāyatanacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri ākiñcanyāyatanabhavāgrabhūmikāni trīṇīti /
evamanyadhyānārupyānantaraṃ daśa dravyāṇi yojyāni /
eṣa tu saṃkṣepaḥ 		bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mjug thogs su brgyad de /
rang gi sa pa dang bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang dang po'i sa pa'i dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa dag go /
rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi mjug thogs su dgu ste /
rang gi sa pa gnyis dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa bzhi dang ci yang med pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa ba gsum mo /
de bzhin du bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa gzhan gyi mjug thogs su yang rdzas bcu sbyar bar bya'o /
'di ni mdor bsdu ba yin te /
tṛtīyādyāvadūrdhvādho 'nāsravānantaraṃ śubham zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su /
ltag 'og gsum pa'i bar dge ba skye ba'o /
utpadyate /
śubhagrahaṇena śuddhamanāsravaṃ ca gṛhyate kuśalatvāt anāsravasya samāpatti dravyasyānantaraṃ svabhūmike ca śuddhānāsrave utpadyete /
ūrdhvādhobhūmike ca tṛtīvādyāvat 		dge ba smos pa ni dag pa ba dang zag pa med pa gzung ste /
dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
zag pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas kyi mjug thogs su rang gi sa pa dang sa god ma dang 'og ma sa gsum pa'i bar gyi dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa skye ste /
vyutkrāntakasamāpattāro hi tṛtīyāt pareṇa laṅghayituṃ notsahante thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug par byed pas gsum pa las phan chad du ni rgal bar mi nus so /
anvayajñānānantaraṃ cārupyān samāpadyante na dharmajñānānantaram /
tasyādharāśrayālambanatvāditi 		rjes su shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug gi chos shes pa'i mjug thogs su ni ma yin te /
de'i rten dang dmigs pa 'og ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
yathā cānāsravādanantaramuktam veditavyam /
tathā śuddhāt kliṭaṃ cāpi svabhūmikam /
svabhūmikaṃ kliṣṭamadhikaṃ śuddhakādanantaramutpadyate 		ji ltar zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su bshad pa ltar dag pa las de bzhin /
rig par bya la /
rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang /
dag pa pa'i mjug thogs su lhag par rang gis pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'o /
śeṣaṃ yathaivānāsravāt /
anāsravasya hi samanantaraṃ kliṣṭotpattirnāstīti 		lhag ma ni zag pa med pa las bshad pa ji lta ba bzhin no /
zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su ni nyon mongs pa can skye ba med do /
kliṣṭāt svaṃ śuddhakaṃ kliṣṭaṃ /
kliṣṭātsamāpattidravyādanantaraṃ svabhūmike śuddhakakliṣṭe utpadyete /
evaṃ cādharaśuddhakam 		nyon mongs can las rang dag dang /
nyon mongs pa can gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas kyi mjug thogs su ni rang gi sa pa'i dag pa ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag skye'o /
'og ma'i dag cig kyang /
kleśotpīḍito hyadharamapi samāpattiṃ śuddhakaṃ bahu manyate nyon mongs pas gzir ba ni 'og ma'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dag pa pa la yang dga' bar 'gyur ro /
yadi kliṣṭaṃ paricchidyādhaḥ saṃcarati /
kuśalātsaṃcarito bhavati na kliṣṭāt 		gal te nyon mongs pa can yongs su bcad nas 'og mar 'phon ni dge ba las 'phos pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa can las ni ma yin no /
athāparicchidya kathaṃ saṃcarati 'on te yongs su ma bcad na ni ji ltar 'pho zhe na /
pūrvāvedhāt pūrvaṃ hi sa evaṅkāmo bhavati varamadhastāt śuddhakaṃ nopariṣṭāt kliṣṭamiti /
pūrvābhiprāyaṃ ca saṃtatiranuvartate sattvānām /
praṇidhāya suptasyābhipretakālaprabodhavat /
anāsravaṃ tu kliṣṭādanantaraṃ sarvathā notpadyate /
samāpattikālaṃ pratyetaduktam /
śuddhakāt kliṣṭācca samanantaraṃ svabhūmikameva kliṣṭamutpadyate nānyabhūmikamiti 		sngon 'phangs pa'i phyir te /
sngon 'di snyam du 'og ma'i dag pa ba ni bla'i gong ma'i nyon mongs pa can ni ma yin no snyam du 'dod par 'gyur la /
sngon gyi bsam pa yang sems can rnams kyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brangs te /
bsams nas gnyid log par 'dod pa'i dus su sad pa bzhin no /
zag pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su rnam pa thams cad du mi skye'o /
snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus kyi phyir dag pa pa dang nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs pa can kho na skye'i gzhan gyi sa pa ni ma yin no zhes de skad du bshad kyi /
cyutau tu śuddhakāt kliṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ /
cyutikāle tu upapattilābhikācchuddhakādanantaraṃ sarvabhūmikaṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate 		'chi 'pho dag las nyon mongs kun /
'chi 'pho ba'i tshe skye bas thob pa'i dag pa pa'i mjug thogs su sa thams cad pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'o /
kliṣṭāttu nottaram nyon mongs can las gong ma min /
kliṣṭāttu dhyānārūpyādanantaraṃ cyutikāle svādharabhūmikaṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate /
nordhvabhūmikam /
na ca sarvasmācchuddhakādanāśravaṃ samāpattidravyamutpadyate 		'chi 'pho ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i mjug thogs su rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'i sa gong ma pa ni ma yin no /
dag pa pa thams cad las zag pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas skye ba yang ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
caturdhā śuddhakaṃ hānabhāgīyādi 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
dag pa nyams pa'i cha mthun sogs /
rnam bzhi /
hānabhāgīyaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyaṃ sthitibhāgīyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyamiti caturvidhaṃ śuddhakam dag pa pa ni nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa dang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang rnam pa bzhi'o /
bhavāgraṃ tu trividhamanyatra viśeṣabhāgīyāt /
kimasya lakṣaṇam 		srid pa'i rtse mo ni rnam pa gsum yin te /
khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs so /
'di'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
yathākramam de ni go rims bzhin du /
kleśotpattisvabhūmyūrdhvānāsravānuguṇaṃ hi tat /
kleśotpattyanuguṇaṃ hānabhāgīyaṃ svabhūmyanuguṇaṃ sthitibhāgīyamūrdhvabhūmyanuguṇaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyamanāsravānuguṇaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyam /
tasmādanāsravamutpadyate /
athaiṣāṃ caturṇā kati kasmādanantaramutpadyante /
dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram 		nyon mongs skye dang rang sa dang /
gong dang zag med rjes mthun pa'o /
nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni nyon mongs pa skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa'o /
gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni rang gi sa dang rjes su mthun pa'o /
khyad par can gyi cha dang rjes su mthun pa ni sa gong ma dang rjes su mthun pa'o /
nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni zag pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa ste /
zag pa med pa ni de las skye'o /
yang bzhi po de dag las gang gi mjug thogs su du zhig skye zhe na /
nyams cha mthun sogs mjug thogs su /
gnyis dang gsum dang gsum dang gcig /
hānabhāgīyaṃ hānabhāk /
tasmādanantaraṃ dve utpadyete 		nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa nyi nyams pa dang brten pa'o /
de'i mjug thogs su ni gnyis skye ste /
hānisthitibhāgīye /
sthitibhāgīyānantaraṃ trīṇyanyatra nirvedhabhāgīyāt /
viśeṣabhāgīyādanantaraṃ trīṇyanyatra hānabhāgīyāt nirvedhabhāgīyādanantaraṃ tadevaikamiti 		nyams pa dang gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag go /
gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i mjug thogs su ni gsum ste /
nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs so /
khyad par can gyi cha dang mthun pa'i mjug thogs su ni gsum ste /
nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs so /
nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i mjug thogs su ni gcig ste /
kathaṃ vyutkrāntakasamāpattirutpadyate de gcig pu skye'o /
thod rgal gyi snyoms par 'jug pa ji ltar skye zhe na /
gatvāgamya dvidhā bhūmīraṣṭau śliṣṭaikalaṅghitāḥ /
vyutkrāntakasamāpattirvisabhāgatṛtīyagā 		sa brgyad rnam gnyis 'brel ba dang /
gcig rgal song zhing 'ongs nas ni /
ris mi mthun pa gsum par 'gor /
gatvetyanulomaṃ samāpadya thod rgal gyi ni snyoms 'jug yin /
āgamyeti pratilomaṃ samāpadya /
dvidheti sāsravānāsravā bhūmīḥ /
aṣṭāviti dhyānārupyasamāpattīḥ 		sa brgyad ces bya ba ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so /
rnam gnyis zhes bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'o /
'brel pa dang zhes bya ba ni go rims bzhin du'o /
śliṣṭā ityanukrameṇa gcig rgal zhes bya ba ni re re rgal nas so /
ekalaṅghitā ityekāmekāmutkramya /
sāsravā aṣṭau bhūmiranulomapratilomasamāpattito nirjitya anāsravāśca sapta /
paścātsāsravāt prathamāddhyānāt sāsravaṃ tṛtīyaṃ samāpadyate /
tasmādākāśānantyāyatanaṃ tasmādākṃicanyāvatanam /
evaṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ nirjitya anāsravā apyekalaṅghitā anulomapratilomaṃ ca samāpadyate /
ayaṃ prayogo vyutkrāntakasamāpatteḥ /
yadā tu prathamātsāsravāt tṛtīyamanāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tasmātsāsravamākāśānantyāyatanaṃ tasmādanāsravamākiñcanyāyatanam 		song zhing zhes bya ba ni lugs dang mthun par snyoms par zhugs nas so /
'ongs nas zhes bya ba ni lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par bzhugs nas so /
zag pa dang bcas pa'i sa brgyad dang zag pa med pa'i sa bdun lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas byang bar byas nas /
phyis zag pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang po nas zag pa dang bcas pa'i gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug cing /
de nas ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la /
de nas ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /
de bzhin du lugs dang mi mthun pa yang byang bar byas nas zag pa med pa rnams kyang re re rgal zhing lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug pa ni thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yin no /
gang gi tshe zag pa dang bcas pa dang po nas zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug cing /
de nas ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la /
evaṃ punaḥ pratilomam /
tadā visabhāgatṛtīyadravyagamanādabhiniṣpannā bhavati /
ativiprakṛṣṭatvānna caturthī samāpadyate /
tāṃ ca triṣu dvīpeṣu asamayavimukta evārhannutpādayati 		de nas ni zag pa med pa'i ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug cing /
de bzhin du lugs dang mi mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe ris mi mthun pa'i rdzas gsum par 'gro ba'i phyir /
mngon par grub pa yin no /
shin tu ring ba'i phyir bzhi pa la ni snyoms par mi 'jug go /
de yang gling gsum du dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par gro ba'i dgra bcom pa kho nas skyed par byed de /
niḥkleśatvātsamādhivaśitvācca /
dṛṣṭiprāptasya yadyapi tīkṣṇendriyatvāt samādhau vaśitvaṃ na tu niṣkleśaḥ /
samayavimukto yadyapi niḥkleśo natvasya samādhau vaśitvamiti /
kenāśrayeṇa kati dhyānārupyāḥ saṃmukhīkriyante /
svādhobhūmyāśrayā eva /
dhyānāśrayā eva 		nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang pa'i phyir ro /
mthong bas 'thob pa ni gal te dbang po rnon po yin pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba yin yang nyon mongs pa med pa ni ma yin no /
dus kyis rnam par grol ba ni gal te nyon mongs pa med pa yin yang /
ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba ni ma yin no /
rten gang gis bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa du zhig mngon gsum du byed ce na /
bsam gtan gzugs med rang dang ni /
dhyānārūpyāḥ /
bhavāgraṃ bhavāgre ca saṃmukhīkriyate adhaśca yāvatkāmadhātau 		'og sa'i rten can srid pa'i rtse mor yang mngon sum du byed la 'og ma 'dod pa'i khams kyi bar du yang mngon sum du byed do /
śeṣāṇi svasyāṃ bhūmāvadhaśceti /
kiṃ kāraṇamūrdhvopapanno nādharāṃ samāpatti saṃmukhīkaroti 		de bzhin du lhag ma rnams kyang rang gis dang sa 'og mar mngon sum du byed do /
ci'i phyir gong du skyes pa snyoms par 'jug pa 'og ma mngon sum du mi byed ce na /
tasmāttasya /
vṛthā'dharam 		'di ltar de la 'og dgos med /
nahi tasyādhareṇa samāpattidravyeṇa kiñcit prayojanaṃ vidhīyate /
nihīnatvāt 		de la ni snyoms par 'jug pa 'og ma'i rdzas kyis cung zad kyang dgos pa mi byed de dman pa'i phyir ro /
utsarga kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti spyir bstan pa byas nas dmigs kyis ston par byed de /
āryākiñcanyasāṃmukhyāt bhavāgre tvāsravakṣayaḥ /
bhavāgre tūpapannasyānāsravākiñcanyāyatanasaṃmukhībhāvādāsravakṣayo bhavati /
kathaṃ tatropapannasya tatsaṃmukhībhāvaḥ 		srid rtser 'phags pa ci yang med /
mngon sum byas nas zag pa zad /
'phags pa srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa ni zag pa med pa'i ci yang med pa'i skye mched mngon sum du byas nas zag pa zad par 'gyur ro /
ji ltar na der skyes pa de mngon sum du byed ce na /
svasyābhāvāttasya cābhyāsāt /
athaiṣāṃ dhyānārūpyāṇāṃ kimālambanam /
satṛṣṇāḥ svabhavālambāḥ 		rang gi med pa'i phyir dang de yang nye ba'i phyir ro /
yang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa 'di dag gi dmigs pa ci zhig yin zhe na /
sred bcas rang gi srid la dmigs /
āsvādanāsaṃprayuktāḥ svabhūmikaṃ bhavamālambante ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan ba rnams ni rang gis pa'i srid pa la dmigs so /
bhavagrahaṇena sāsravaṃ vastu gṛhyate srid pa smos pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gzung ngo /
nādharamālambante vītarāgatvānnottaraṃ tṛṣṇāparichinnatvāt bhūmīnām 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'og ma la yang mi dmigs so /
sa rnams ni srid pas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir gong ma la yang ma yin no /
nānāsravaṃ kuśalatvaprasaṅgāditi /
dhyānaṃ sadviṣayaṃ śubham /
kuśalaṃ dhyānaṃ śubhakamanāsravaṃ ca 		dge ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zag pa med pa la yang ma yin no /
bsam gtan dge yul yod dgu yin /
dge ba'i bsam gtan dag pa dang /
tat sarvālambanaṃ yatkiñcidasti saṃskṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ vā zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan de'i dmigs pa ni 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas gang ci yod kyang rung ba thams cad yin no /
na maulāḥ kuśalārūpyāḥ sāsravādharagocarāḥ gzugs mod dngos gzhi dge rnams kyi /
spyod yul zag bcas 'og ma min /
maulānāṃ kuśalārūpyāṇāmadhobhūmikaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu nālambanaṃ svordhvabhūmyālambanatvāt gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi dge ba rnams kyi dmigs pa ni sa 'og ma pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po ma yin te /
rang gi sa pa dang sa gong ma la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
anāsravaṃ tvālambanam /
sarvānvayajñānapakṣyo na dharmajñānapakṣo nādhobhūminirodhaḥ 		dmigs pa zag pa med pa ni rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa thams cad yin gyi chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa yang ma yin la sa 'og ma'i 'gog pa yang ma yin no /
sāmantakānantaryamārgāṇāṃ tvadharā bhūmirālambanam /
eṣāṃ ca punastrividhānāṃ dhyānānāṃ rūpyārūpyāṇām 		nyer bsdogs kyi bar chad med pa'i lam rnams kyi dmigs pa ni sa 'og ma yin no /
bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnam pa gsum po 'di dag las /
anāsraveṇa hīyante kleśāḥ zag pa med pas nyon mongs pa rnams spong ngo /
na śuddhakena /
kuta eva kliṣṭena /
vītarāgatvānnādhaḥ /
tasyaiva tadapratipakṣatvānna svabhūmau /
viśiṣṭataratvānnordhvamiti 		dag pa pas kyang mi spong na /
nyon mongs pa can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'og ma la yang ma yin la /
de nyid de'i gnyen po ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi sa na yod pa yang ma yin no /
ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir gong ma yang ma yin no /
samantakena ca /
dhyānārūpyasāmantakena ca kleśāḥ prahīyante śuddhakenāpi /
adhobhūmipratipakṣatvāt 		nyer bsdogs dag pas kyang /
gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i nyer bsdogs ni dag pa pas kyang nyon mongs pa rnams spong ste /
sa 'og ma pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro /
kati punaḥ sāmantakāni /
aṣṭau sāmantakānyeṣāṃ /
ekaikasyaikaikaṃ yena tatpraveśaḥ /
kiṃ tānyapi trividhāni tathaiva ca teṣu vedanā 		nyer bsdogs du zhig yod ce na /
de dag la ni nyer bsdogs brgyad /
re re la gang gis de la 'jug pa re re yod do /
ci de dag kyang rnam pa gsum yin la de dag la tshor ba yang de dang 'dra bar yod dam zhe na /
netyucyate smras pa /
śuddhāduḥkhāsukhāni hi ma yin te /
dag pa bde min sdug bsngal min /
śuddhakāni ca tānyupekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yantabāhyatvādadhobhūmyudvegānapagamāt vairāgyapathatvācca nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni /
āryaṃ cādyaṃ /
ādyaṃ sāmantakamanāgamyaṃ tacchuddhakaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca yadyapi sāmantakacittena pratisaṃdhibandhaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati 		de dag ni dag pa yang yin la btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan ba dag kyang yin te /
'bad de drang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang sa 'og ma pa las yid 'byung ba dang ma bral ba'i phyir dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro myang ba dang mtshungs bar ldan pa ma yin no /
dang po 'phags pa'ang /
nyer bsdogs kyi dang po ni mi lcogs pa med pa ste /
de ni dag pa yang yin la zag pa med pa yang yin no /
samāhitasya tu kliṣṭatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
tridhā kecit /
kecitpunaricchanti /
āsvādanāsaṃprayuktamapyanāgamyaṃ sāmantakaṃ cocyate dhyānāntaraṃ ca 		nyer bsdogs kyi sems kyi snying mtshams sbyor ba nyon mongs pa can yin mod kyi mnyam par gzhag pa la ni nyon mongs ba can nyid dgag go /
kha cig gsum /
kha cig ni mi lcogs pa med pa ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang 'dod do /
nyer bsdogs zhes kyang 'byung /
bsam gtan khyad par can zhes kyang 'byung na /
kimidamekārthamāhosvinnānārtham /
sāmantakaṃ hi vairāgyamārgaḥ /
atarka dhyānamantaram 		ci 'di'i don gcig pa zhig gam /
'on te don tha dad pa zhig yin zhe na /
don tha dad ba yin te /
nyer bsdogs ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin la /
rtog med bsam gtan khyad par can /
dhyānameva hi vitarkāsaṃprayuktaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ dhyānaviśeṣatvāt bsam gtan dang po kho na rtog pa dang /
mtshungs par mi ldan pa ni bsam gtan khyad par can yin te /
ata eva dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu na vyayasthāpyate viśeṣābhāvāditi bsam gtan gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa na rnam par mi gzhag pa ste /
tatpunardhyānāntaraṃ /
tridhā /
āsvādanāsaṃprayuktam śuddhakamanāsravaṃ ca /
aduḥkhāsukhaṃ tacca 		khyad par med pa'i phyir ro /
bsam gtan khyad par can de ni /
rnam gsum /
ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang dag pa dang zag pa med pa yin no /
de bden min sdug min /
nātra sukhaṃ duḥkhamityaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣendriyasaṃprayuktamityarthaḥ /
na prītisaṃprayuktaṃ sābhisaṃskāravāhitvāt /
ata eva duḥkhā pratipat 		'di la bde pa yang med bas na bde ba yang ma yin pa sdug bsngal yang ma yin ba ste /
btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
mngon par 'du bya ba dang bcas pas drangs ba yin pa'i phyir /
dga' ba dang mtshungs par ldan ba yang ma yin te /
de nyid kyi phyir lam dka' ba yin no /
tasya tarhi dhyānāntarasya kaḥ phalaviśeṣaḥ /
taddhi /
mahābrahmaphalaṃ ca tat 		'o na bsam gtan khyad par can de'i 'bras bu khyad par can gang zhig yin zhe na /
de ni tshangs chen 'bras bu can /
tāṃ hi dhyānāntarikāṃ bhāvayitvā mahābrahmā bhavati bsam gtan khyad par can de bsgoms nas tshangs pa chen por 'gyur ro /
yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mdor bsdus te /
punaḥ sarvasamādhīn saṃkalayya trayaḥ samādhayaḥ uktāḥ sūtre /
savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ 		mdo las rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin gsum du bka' stsal te /
avitarko vicāramātraḥ /
avitarko 'vicāra iti /
tatra dhyānāntaraṃ tāvadavitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhhiriti jñāpitam /
vitarkamātrapratiṣedhāt 		de la re zhig bsam gtan khyad par can na ni /
rtog pa tsam zhig bkag pa'i phyir rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes shes par byas zin to /
tataḥ /
savitarkavicāro'dhaḥsamādhiḥ 		de man chad rtog dpyod bcas pa'i /
ting nge 'dzin /
tasmāddhyānāntarādadhaḥsamādhiḥ savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ /
prathamaṃ dhyānamanāgamyaṃ ca 		bsam gtan khyad par can de man chad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan dang po dang mi lcogs pa med pa ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa yin no /
parato 'dvayaḥ yan chad gnyi ga med pas na /
nātra dvayamastītyadvayaḥ 'di na gnyi ga med pa ste /
pareṇa tu dhyānāntarātsamādhiravitarko 'vicāraḥ /
dvitīyadhyānasāmantakādyāvat bhavāgram 		bsam gtan khyad par can yan chad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar ni rtog pa yang med pa dpyod pa yang med pa'o /
punastrayaḥ uktāḥ /
śūnyatāsamādhirapraṇihita ānimittaśca /
tatra /
ānimittaḥ samākāraiḥ 		yang stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang smon pa med ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs te /
de la /
mtshan med zhi ba'i rnam ba dang /
nirodhasatyākāraiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ samādhirānimittaścaturākāraḥ /
nirvāṇaṃ hi daśanimittāpagatatvādanimittam 		'gog pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa ste /
rnam pa bzhi pa yin no /
mya ngan las 'das pa ni mtshan ma bcu dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin la /
tadālambanaḥ samādhirānimittaḥ /
pañcaviṣayastrīpuruṣatrisaṃskṛtalakṣaṇanimittāni daśa 		de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin te /
mtshan ma bcu ni yul lnga dang pho dang mo dang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams so /
śūnyatānātmaśunyataḥ stong nyid bdag med stong nyid du /
pravartate /
anātmaśūnyatākārābhyāṃ saṃprayuktaḥ śūnyatāsamādhidvarcyākāraḥ 		'jug pa'o /
bdag med pa dang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni stong pa nyid de /
rnam pa gnyis pa yin no /
apraṇihitaḥ satyākārairataḥ paraiḥ smon pa med pa ni /
de las gzhan bden rnam pa dang /
paraiḥ śeṣaiḥ satyākāraiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ samādhipraṇihito daśākāraḥ bden pa lhag ma'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon pa med pa ste /
rnam pa bcu yin no /
anityaduḥkhataddhetubhya udvegāt mārgasya ca kolopamatayā 'vaśyatyājyatvāttadākāraḥ samādhirapraṇihitaḥ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal pa dang de'i rgyu dag gis yid 'byung ba'i phyir dang lam yang gdon mi za bar gzings lta bur dor bar bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir de'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin ni smon pa med pa yin te /
tadatikramābhimukhatvāt śūnyatānātmatābhyāṃ tu nodvego nirvāṇasāmānyāt de las 'da' bar mngon sum du phyogs pa'i phyir ro /
mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir stong pa dang bdag med pa dag gis ni yid mi 'byung ngo /
ta ete trayaḥ samādhayo dvividhāḥ ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni rnam pa gnyis te /
śuddhāmalāḥ dag dang dri ma med /
śuddhakāścānāsravāśca /
laukikalokottaratvāt /
laukikā ekādaśasu bhūmiṣu 		'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
dag pa pa yang yin la zag pa med pa dag kyang yin te /
'jig rten pa rnams ni sa bcu gcig na yod do /
lokottarā yatra mārgaḥ /
nirmalāstu te vimokṣamukhatrayam 		'jig rten las 'das pa rnams ni gang na lam yod pa na yod do /
de dag /
dri med rnam thar sgo gsum mo /
anāsravāstvete trayaḥ samādhayastrīṇi vimokṣamukhānyucyante /
śūnyatā vimokṣamukhamapraṇihitamānimittaṃ vimokṣamukhamiti 		ting nge 'dzin gsum po de dag dri ma med pa'i thar pa'i sgo yin pa'i phyir rnam bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang rnam par pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ste /
mokṣadvāratvāt /
punaścocyante /
śūnyatāśūnyatādyākhyāstrayo 'parasamādhayaḥ /
śūnyatāśūnyatā apraṇihitāpraṇihitaḥ ānimittānimittaśca /
śūnyatādyālambanatvāttannāma /
teṣāṃ punaḥ 		rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum zhes bya'o /
yang /
stong nyid stong nyid ces la sogs /
gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gsum mo /
zhes bya ba ste /
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang smon pa med pa smon pa med pa dang mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'o /
stong pa nyid la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ming de skad ces bya'o /
de dag las /
ālambete akṣaikṣaṃ dvau śūnyataścāpyanityataḥ gnyis ni stong dang mi rtag par /
mi slob pa la dmigs pa yin /
aśaikṣaṃ samādhiṃ dvāvaparasamādhī ālambete /
śūnyatāśūnyatā aśaikṣaṃ śūnyatāsamādhimālambate śūnyatākāreṇa 		ting nge 'dzin gzhan gnyis ni mi slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa yin te /
stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mi slob pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la stong pa'i rnam par dmigs so /
apraṇihitāpraṇihito 'pyaśaikṣamapraṇihitamanityākāreṇa /
na duḥkhato na hetvādito 'nāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvānna mārgākāraiḥ dūṣaṇīyatvāt 		smon pa med pa smon pa med pa yang mi slob pa'i smon pa med pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par dmigs so /
sdug bsngal bar yang ma yin la rgyu la sogs par yang ma yin te /
zag pa med pa ni de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
lam gyi rnam pa rnams su yang ma yin te /
sun dbyung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
ānimittānimittastu śāntato'saṃkhyayā kṣayam /
ānimittānimittastu samādhiraśaikṣasyānimittasyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhamālambate 		mtshan ma med pa mtshan med ni /
zhi bar ma brtags zad pa la /
mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi slob pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i so sor ma brtags pas /
śāntākāreṇa /
anāsravasya pratisaṃkhayānirodhābhāvāt 		'gog pa la zhi ba'i rnam par dmigs te /
zag pa med pa la so sor brtags pas /
'gos pa med pa'i phyir ro /
na nirodhapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārairanityatānirodhasādhāraṇatvādavyākṛtatvā /
davisaṃyogācca /
ekāntena caite parasamādhayaḥ 		'gog pa dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par ni ma yin te /
mi rtag ba nyid kyi 'gog pa dang thun mong yin pa nyed kyi phyir dang lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir dang bral ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
ting nge 'dzin gzhan 'di dag ni gcig tu zag bcas /
sāsravāḥ /
āryamārgadveṣitvāt nahyevamanāsravā iti 		'phags pa'i lam la sdang pa'i phyir te /
zag pa med pa dag ni de lta ma yin no /
kutrotpadyante gang du skyed par byed ce na /
nṛṣu /
manuṣyeṣveva na deveṣu /
kasyotpadyante 		mi'i nang /
mi rnams kyi nang kho nar skyed kyi lha dag gi nang du ni ma yin no /
akopyasya su la skye zhe na /
nānyasyārhataḥ /
katibhūmikāḥ /
saptasāmantavarjitāḥ 		mi g yo la dgra bcom pa gzhan la ni ma yin no /
sa du pa zhig la ni ma yin zhe na /
nyer bsdogs bdun ni ma gtogs so /
sapta sāmantakāni hitvānyāsvekādaśasu bhūmiṣu /
kāmadhātvanāgamyadhyānāntaradhyānārupyeṣu /
punaścatasraḥ samādhibhāvanā ucyante 		nyer bsdogs bdun ma gtogs pa sa gzhan bcu gcig po 'dod pa'i khams dang mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams na yod do /
yang ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa bzhi ste /
asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate iti vistaraḥ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun tu brten bsgoms par byas lan mang du byas na /
mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba yang yod ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba de la /
tatra /
samādhibhāvanā dhyānaṃ śubhamādyaṃ sukhāya hi /
kuśalaṃ prathamaṃ śuddhakamanāsravaṃ vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya samādhibhāvanā 		dge ba'i bsam gtan dang po ni /
bde 'gyur ting 'dzin bsgom pa yin /
dge ba'i bsam gtan dang po ste /
dag pa pa'am /
zag pa med pa ni /
mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no /
tadādikatvādanyānyapi jñeyāni /
nāvaśyaṃ saṃparāyasukhavihārāyāparihiṇordhvopapannaparinirvṛtānāṃ tadabhāvāt 		de dang po yin pa'i phyir gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang yin par shes par bya'o /
tshe phyi ma la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba ni nges pa med de /
yongs su nyams pa dang gong du skyes pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la de med pa'i phyir ro /
darśanāyākṣyabhijñeṣṭā mig gi mngon shes mthong 'gyur 'dod /
divyacakṣurabhijñā jñānadarśanāya samādhibhāvanā lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa ni shes pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no /
dhībhedāya prayogajāḥ sbyor ba las byung blo dbyer 'gyur /
prayogajāḥ sarve guṇāstraidhātukā anāsravāḥ prajñāprabhedāya samādhibhāvanā sbyor ba las byung ba'i yon tan khams gsum pa dang zag pa med pa thams cad ni shes rab rab tu rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no /
vajropamo'ntye yo dhyāne sāsravakṣayabhāvanā /
yaścaturthadhyāne vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ sa āsravakṣayāya samādhibhāvanā 		rdo rje lta bu'i bsam gtan mtha'i /
gang yin de zag zad 'gyur bsgom /
bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni zag pa zad par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no /
ātmopanāyikī kilaiṣā bhagavato dharmadeśanā bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston pa 'di ni bdag nyid la nyer bar gtod pa yin te /
ataścaturbhya evāha /
kṛtaḥ samādhīnāṃ kālagato nirdeśaḥ 		de'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi kho nar gsungs so zhes grag go /
ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi skabs nas 'ongs ba bshad zin to /
idānīṃ samādhisaṃniśritānāṃ guṇānāṃ nirdeśakāla iti vyākhyāyante nga ni ting nge 'dzin la brten pa'i yon tan rnams bstan pa'i skabs yin pas bshang bar bya ste /
apramāṇāni catvāri /
maitrī karuṇā muditopekṣā ca /
apramāṇasattvālambanatvāt 		tshad med pa ni bzhi yin no /
byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms te /
sems can tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
kimarthaṃ catvāryeva /
vyāpādādivipakṣataḥ 		ci'i phyir bzhi kho na yin zhe na /
gnod sems la sogs gnyen po'i phyir /
vyāpādaviṃhisā 'ratikāmarāgavyāpādabahulānāṃ tatprahāṇāya catvāri yathāsaṃkhyam gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang mi dga' ba dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems mang ba rnams kyis de dag spang bar bya ba'i phyir bzhi ste grangs bzhin no /
aśubhopekṣayoḥ kāmarāgapratipakṣatve ko viśeṣaḥ /
varṇarāgasyāśubhā maithunarāgasyopekṣeti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
evaṃ tu yujyate /
maithūnarāgasyāśubhā mātāpitṛputrajñātirāgasyopekṣeti /
tatra /
maitryadveṣaḥ /
adveṣasvabhāvā maitrī /
api karuṇā /
karuṇāpyevam 		mi sdug pa dang btang snyoms gnyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po nyid du khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
kha dog gi 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni mi sdug pa'o /
'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni btang snyoms so zhes zer ro /
'di skad du 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni mi sdug pa'o /
pha dang ma dang bu dang nye du'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni btang snyoms so zhes bya ba ni rung ngo /
de la /
zhe sdang med byams /
byams pa ni zhe sdang med pa'i rang bzhin no /
snying rje yang /
snying rje yang de dang 'dra'o /
muditā sumanaskatā /
saumanasyasvabhāvā muditā 		yid bde ba ni dga' ba yin /
dga' ba ni yid bde ba'i rang bzhin no /
upekṣā 'lobhaḥ btang snyoms ma chags /
alobhātmikopekṣā /
kathaṃ vyāpādapratipakṣaḥ 		btang snyoms ni ma chags pa'i bdag nyid yin no /
ji ltar na gnod sems kyi gnyer po yin zhe na /
tasya lobhākṛṣṭatvāt /
ubhayasvabhāvā tvasau yujyate 		de ni chags pas drangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
'di ni gnyi ga'i rang bzhin yin na rung ngo /
eṣāṃ tu maitryādīnāṃ byams pa la sogs pa 'di dag gi rnam pa ni /
ākāraḥ sukhitā duḥkhitā vata /
modantāmiti sattvāśca 		kye ma bder gyur sdug bsngal dang /
dgar gyur sems can rnams snyoms pa /
sukhitā vata sattvā iti manasikurvan maitrīṃ samāpadyate /
duḥkhitā vata sattvā iti karuṇāṃ modantāṃ vata sattvā iti muditāṃ sattvā ityeva manasi kurvannupekṣāṃ samāpadyate 		kye ma sems can rnams bde bar gyur cig snyam du yid la byed cing byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go /
kye ma sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal lo snyam du yid la byed cing snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go /
kye ma sems can rnams yid bde bar gyur cig snyam du yid la byed cing dga' ba la snyoms bar 'jug go /
sems can rnams mnyam mo snyam du de ltar yid la byed cing btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug ste /
mādhyasthyāt /
atadvatāṃ sukhādhimokṣatvāt kathaṃ na viparītatvaṃ bhavati 		bar mar gnas pa'i phyir ro /
de dang mi ldan pa rnams la bde bar mos pa'i phyir ji ltar na phyin ci log nyid du mi 'gyur zhe na /
santvityabhiprāyāt gyur cig snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro /
āśayasyāviparītatvādvā 'dhimuktisaṃjñānāt yang na bsam pa phyin ci ma log pa'i phyir te /
mos par 'du shes pa'i phyir ro /
athavā ka evaṃ viparītatve doṣaḥ yang na de ltar phyin ci log ba nyid yin na yang nyes pa ci zhig yod /
akuśalatvamiti cet /
na kuśalamūlatvādvyāpādādipratipakṣatvācca 		gal te mi dge ba nyid yin no zhe na ni /
ma yin te /
gnod sems la sogs pa'i gnyen po yin bas dge ba'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
ukta eṣāmākāraḥ /
kāmasattvāstu gocaraḥ 		'di dag gi rnam pa ni bshad zin to /
spyod yul 'dod pa'i sems can rnams /
kāmāvacarāḥ sattvā eṣāmālambanam /
tadālambanānāṃ vyāpādādīnāṃ pratipakṣatvāt /
yattūktamekāṃ diśamadhimucyeteti tadbhājanena bhājanagataṃ darśitam 		'di dag gi dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can rnams yin te /
de la dmigs pa'i gnod sems la sogs pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro /
phyogs gcig tu mos nas zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni snod kyi snod na gnas pa bstan pa yin no /
katibhūmikānyetāni de dag sa du pa zhig yin zhe na /
dhyānayormuditā dga' ba bsam gtan gnyis na yod /
prathamadvitīyadhyānayormuditā /
saumanasyatvāt 		dga' ba ni bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa na yod de /
yid bde ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
anyāni ṣaṭsu gzhan ni drug na /
anyāni trīṇi apramāṇāni ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣu /
anāgamye dhyānāntaredhyāneṣu ca 		tshad med pa gzhan gsum ni sa drug po mi lcogs pa med ba dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan rnams na yod do /
saprayogamaulagrahaṇāt /
kecittu pañcasu 		kha cig lnga /
kha cig ni 'di dag mi lcogs pa med pa ma gtogs pa lnga na yod par 'dod do /
kecit punaḥ anāgamyaṃ hitvā pañcasvetānīcchanti /
daśasvityapare 		gzhan dag na re 'dod pa'i khams dang nyer bsngogs rnams bsnan nas bcu na yod do zhes zer te /
kāmadhātuṃ sāmantakāni ca prakṣipya samāhitāsamāhitamaulalprayogagrahaṇāt mnyam par bzhag pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa ma yin pa dang dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba smos pa'i phyir ro /
gnod sems la sogs gnyen po'i phyir /
yaduktaṃ vyāpādādivipakṣata iti kimapramāṇairapi kleśagrahaṇaṃ bhavati /
na taiḥ prahāṇaṃ /
mauladhyānabhūmikatvādadhimuktimanaskāratvātsattvālambanatvācca 		zhes gang bshad pa /
ci tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang nyon mongs pa spong ba yin nam zhe na /
de yis mi spong /
bsam gtan dngos gzhi'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir dang mos pa yin la byed pa'i phyir dang sems can la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir te /
tatprayogeṇa tu vyāpādādiviṣkambhaṇāttatpratipakṣatvamuktam /
prahāṇa dūrīkaraṇācca 		de dag gi sbyor bas gnod sems la sogs pa rnam par gnon pa'i phyir dang spangs pa thag sring bar byed pa'i phyir de dag gi gnyen po nyid du bshad do /
kāmadhātvanāgamyabhūmikāni hi maitryādīni maulāpramāṇasadṛśāni saṃvidyante byams pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams dang mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa rnams ni dngos gzhi'i tshad med pa dang 'dra ba dag yod do /
taistānviṣkambhya prahāṇamārgaiḥ prajahāti de dag gis de rnams rnam par mnan nas spong ba'i lam rnams kyis rab tu spong bar byed do /
tato vītarāgāvasthāyāṃ maulāpramāṇalābhāt /
balavatpratyayalābhe 'pi tairanādhṛṣyo bhavati /
kathaṃ punarādikarmiko maitryāṃ prayujyate 		de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gnas skabs na ni dngos gzhi'i tshad med pa rnyed pa'i phyir rkyen stobs dang ldan pa rnyed kyang de dag gis mi brdzi ba yin no /
yang las dang po pa byams pa la ji ltar sbyor zhe na /
yathā sukhitamātmānaṃ manyate parānvā śṛṇoti buddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakāṃstathā sattvānāṃ tatsukhamadhimucyate evaṃ sukhitā vata santu sattvā iti /
na cecchaknoti kleśasyodbhatavṛttitvāt sa mitrapakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā 'dhimātre tatsukhamadhimucyate 		ji ltar bdag nyid kyi bde ba nyams pa yod pa'am /
gzhan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i thos pa de bzhin du kye ma sems can rnams ni de ltar bde bar gyur cig ces sems can rnams la bde bar mos par byed do /
gal te nyon mongs pa'i 'jug pa shas che ba'i phyir mi nus na des mdza' po'i phyogs la rnam pa gsum du phye nas chen po la bde ba de mos par byed do /
tato madhye mṛdau ca /
teṣu cetsamāṃ maitrīṃ labhate tata udāsīnapakṣe 		de nas 'bring dang chung du la bde ba de mos par byed do /
gal te de dag la byams pa mnyam pa thob na de'i 'og tu tha mal pa'i phyogs la mos par byed do /
tataḥ śatrūpakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā mṛdau tat sukhamadhimucyate /
tato madhye 'dhimātre ca /
tataścedadhimātra iva mitrapakṣe sukhādhimokṣo na vyāvartate /
tataḥ krameṇa grāmarāṣṭrasukhādhimokṣo yāvadekāṃ diśaṃ yāvatsarva lokaṃ maitryā sphurati /
yastu sarvaguṇagrāhī samaitrīṃ kṣipramutpādayati 		de'i 'og tu dgra bo'i phyogs la rnam pa gsum du phye nas chung du la bde ba de mos par byed do /
de nas 'bring dang chen po la mos par byed do /
gal te de la mdza' bo chen po'i phyogs bzhin du bde bar mos ba mi ldog bar gyur na de'i 'og tu rim gyis khyim dang grong dang yul 'khor gyi bar du bde bar mos par byas nas phyogs gcig nas 'jig rten thams cad kyi bar du ba mas pa rgyas par byed do /
gang zhig thams cad du yon tan 'dzin pa de ni byams pa myur du skyed par byed do /
śakyaṃ hi samucchinna kuśalamūle 'pi guṇagrāhiṇā bhavituṃ pratyekabuddhe ca doṣa grāhiṇā pūrvaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaphalasaṃdarśanāt sngon gyi bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'bras bu snang ba'i sgo nas dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa la yang yon tan gzung bar nus la /
rang sangs rgyas la yang skyon gzung bar nus so /
evaṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāṃ ca prayujyate amī sattvā bahuvidhavyasanīdhanimagnā apyevaṃ duḥkhādvimucyeran apyevātipramoderannityadhimucyamāna upekṣāṃ tūdāsīnapakṣādārabhate snying rje dang dga' ba la yang de bzhin du sems can sdug bsngal ba rnam pa mang po'i chu bor bying ba 'di dag sdug bsngal las myur du thar kyang ci ma rung /
mngon par dga' bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du mos shing dga' ba la sbyor bar byed do /
etāni cāpramāṇāni /
nṛṣveva janyante /
manuṣyeṣūtpādyante /
nānyatra /
kiṃ punarya ekenāpramāṇena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ sarvaiḥ 		btang snyoms ni tha mal ba'i phyogs las rtsom mo /
tshad med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni mi dag gi nang du skyed do /
mi rnams kyi nang du skyed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
ci tshad med pa gcig dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni gdon mi za bar thams cad dang ldan na ma zhe na /
kintu /
tryanvito dhruvam /
tṛtīyacaturthadhyānopapanno muditayā na samanvāgato bhavati /
tribhistvapramāṇalābhī nityaṃ samanvāgato bhavati /
aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ 		thams cad dang ldan pa ni nges pa med do /
'on kyang nges gsum ldan /
bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi par skyes pa dag dga' ba dang mi ldan no /
tshad med pa gsum dang ni rtag tu ldan pa yin no /
rnam par thar pa brgyad /
rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatīti prathamo vimokṣaḥ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa dang po yin no /
adhyātmarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatīti dvitīyaḥ /
śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ 		nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yin no /
sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yin no /
catvāra ārupyāḥ /
saṃjñāveditanirodhaścāṣṭamaḥ 		gzugs med pa bzhi dang brgyad pa 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'o /
teṣāṃ /
prathamāvaśubhā 		de rnams las /
dang po gnyis /
mi sdug /
prathamau dvau vimokṣāvaśubhāsvabhāvau /
vinīlakādyākāratvāt 		rnam par thar pa dang po gnyis ni rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir mi sdug pa'i rang bzhin dag yin te /
ata etayoraśubhāvannayo veditavyaḥ de nyid kyi phyir de gnyis kyi tshul ni mi sdug pa bzhin du rig par bya'o /
etau ca /
dhyānayordvayoḥ 		de gnyis kyang bsam gtan gnyis na yod /
prathamadvitīyayordhyānayornānyasyāṃ bhūmau bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dag na yod kyi sa gzhan na ni med do /
kāmāvacaraprathamadhyānabhūmikayorvarṇarāgayoḥ pratipakṣeṇa yathāsaṃkhyam /
tṛtīyo 'ntye 		'dod pa na spyod pa dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags kyi gnyen por grangs bzhin no /
gsum pa mtha' na /
śubho vimokṣaścaturthadhyāne sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa na yod do /
sa cālobhaḥ de ma chags /
so 'pyalobhasvabhāvo natvaśūbhāsvabhāvaḥ /
śubhākāratvāt /
saparivārāstvete pañcaskandhasvabhāvāḥ /
ārupyavimokṣāstu 		de yang ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin gyi sdug pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir mi sdug pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no /
de dag 'khor dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin no /
gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams ni /
śubhārupyāḥ samāhitāḥ gzugs med mnyam gzhag dge rnams so /
kuśalāḥ samāhitā eva cārūpyavimokṣākhyāṃ labhante na kliṣṭā nāpyasamāhitāstadyathāmaraṇabhave /
anyadāpyasamāhitāḥ santītyapare /
sāmantakavimukti mārgā api vimokṣākhyāṃ labhante 		gzugs med pa'i mnyam par bzhag pa dge ba rnams kho na rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob kyi /
nyon mongs pa can rnams kyang ma yin la /
mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams kyang ma yin no /
'di lta ste 'chi ba'i srid pa'i tshe lta bu'o /
gzhan dag na re gzhan na yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa yod do zhes zer ro /
nyer bsngogs kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam dag kyang rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo /
nānantaryamārgā adharālambanatvāt /
vaimukhyārtho hi vimokṣārtha iti /
nirodhastu samāpattiḥ /
saṃjñāveditanirodhastu aṣṭamo vimokṣo nirodhasamāpattiḥ /
sā ca pūrva nirdiṣṭā 		'og ma la dmigs pa'i phyir bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni ma yin te /
rnam par thar pa'i don ni rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i don yin no /
'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o /
rnam par thar pa brgyad pa 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yin te /
de ni sngar bshad zin to /
saṃjñāveditavaimukhyātsarvasaṃskṛtādvā 'du shes dang tshor ba'am /
'du byed thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro /
samāpattyāvaraṇavimokṣaṇādvimokṣa ityapare /
tāṃ tu samāpadyante /
sūkṣmasūkṣmādanantaram 		gzhan dag na re snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o zhes zer ro /
de la ni /
phra ba phra ba'i mjug thogs su /
snyoms par 'jug ste /
bhavāgraṃ hi saṃjñā sūkṣmaṃ tat punaḥ sūkṣmataraṃ kṛtvā nirodhaṃ samāpadyante /
samāpannānāṃ tu 		srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'du shes ni phra ba yin te /
de bas kyang ches phra bar byas nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug go /
snyoms par zhugs pa rnams ni /
svaśuddhakādharāryeṇa vyutthānaṃ cetasā tataḥ rang gi dag dang 'og ma yin /
'phags pa'i sems kyis de las ldang /
bhāvāgrikeṇa vā śuddhakena cetasā tato vyutthānaṃ bhavatyākiñcanyāyatana bhūmikena vā sāsraveṇa srid pa'i rtse mo'i sems dag pa'am /
ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa pa'i sems zag pa med pas de las ldang ste /
tadevaṃ tasyāḥ sāsravaṃ samāpatticittaṃ bhavati sāsravānāntarya tu vyutthānacittamiti /
eṣāṃ ca vimokṣāṇāṃ 		de ltar na de'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems na zag pa dang bcas pa yin la /
ldang ba'i sems ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yang yin no /
rnam par thar pa 'di dag las /
kāmāptadṛśyaviṣayāḥ prathamāḥ dang po 'dod gtogs snang yul can /
kāmāvacarameṣāṃ rūpāyatanamālambanamamanojñaṃ manojñaṃ ca yathāyogam 'di dag gi dmigs pa ni ci rigs par 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched yid du mi 'ong ba dang yid du 'ong ba yin no /
ye tvarūpiṇaḥ /
te 'nvayajñānapakṣordhvasvabhūduḥkhādigocarāḥ /
ārūpyavimokṣāṇāṃ svabhūmikordhvabhūmikaṃ duḥkhaṃ taddhetunirodhau cālambanaṃ sarvaścānvayajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ 		gang dag gzugs can min de dag /
spyod yul gong dang rang gi sa'i /
sdug bsngal sogs dang rjes shes phyogs /
gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni rang gi sa ba dang sa gong ma pa'i sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu dang 'gog pa dag rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam thams cad yin no /
apratisaṃkhyānirodhaśceti vaktavyamākāśaṃ caikasyeti /
kasmānna tṛtīye dhyāne vimokṣaḥ 		so sor ma brtags pas 'gog pa yang yin no zhes brjod par bya'o /
nam mkha' yang gcig gis yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
ci'i phyir bsam gtan gsum pa la rnam par thar pa ma bzhag ce na /
dvitīyadhyānabhūmikavarṇarāgābhāvāt sukhamaṇḍeñjitatvācca bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags med pa'i phyir dang bde ba'i snying pos skyed pa'i phyir ro /
tasmācchubhaṃ vimokṣamutpādayati ci'i phyir sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa skyed par byed ce na /
aśubhayā līnaṃ saṃtatiṃ pramodayituṃ jijñāsanārthaṃ vā mi sdug pas rgyud zhum par rab tu dga' bar bya ba'am /
kaccidaśubhāvimokṣau niṣpannāviti /
evaṃ ca punastau niṣpannau bhavato yadi śubhato 'pi manasi kurvataḥ kleśo notpadyata iti 		ci mi sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa dag grub pa yin nam ma yin zhes brtag pa'i phyir te /
gal te sdug par yid la byas kyang nyon mongs pa mi skye na de lta na de gnyis grub pa yin no /
dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ yogino vimokṣādīnutpādayanti rnal 'byor pa rnams ni rgyu gnyis kyis rnam par thar pa la sogs pa skyed par byed do /
kleśadūrīkaraṇārthaṃ samāpattivaśitvārthaṃ ca /
araṇādiguṇābhinirhārāya āryāyāścarddheḥ /
sā punaryayā vastupariṇāmādhiṣṭhānāyurutsargādīni kriyante 		nyon mongs pa med ba la sogs pa'i yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i ched dang 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par grub pa'i ched du /
nyon mongs pa thag bsring bar bya ba'i phyir dang snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang bar bya ba'i phyir ro /
de yang gang gis dngos po yongs su bsgyur ba dang byin gyis rlob pa dang tshe gtong ba la sogs par byed pa'o /
kasmāttṛtīyāṣṭamayoreva sākṣātkaraṇamuktaṃ nānyeṣām /
pradhānatvāddhātubhūmiparyantāvasthitatvācca 		ci'i phyir gsum pa dang brgyad pa dag khon mngon sum du bya bar bshad la gzhan dag ni ma yin zhe na /
gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang khams dang sa'i mtha' na gnas pa'i phyir ro /
abhibhvāyatanānyaṣṭau zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad /
adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī vahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūyajānātyabhibhūya paśyatītyevaṃsaṃjñī bhavatīdaṃ prathamamabhibhvāyatanam nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung bu ba dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes /
zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste /
de lta bur 'du shes par gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po yin no /
evamadhimātrāṇi /
adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñyevameva 		de bzhin du chen po rnams dang de kho na bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pa ste /
adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñyeva punarnīlapītalohitāvadātāni paśyatītyaṣṭau bhavanti de ltar bzhi po de dag dang gzugs med par 'du shes pa kho na sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams la lta ba ste /
teṣāṃ /
dvayamādyavimokṣavat /
yathā prathamo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane prathamadvitīye 		de ltar na brgyad yin no /
de dag las gnyis ni rnam par thar pa dang po bzhin no /
rnam par thar pa dang po ji lta bar zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis po dang gnyis pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
dve dvitīyavat gnyis ni gnyis pa bzhin no /
yathā dvitīyo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane tṛtīyacaturthe rnam par thar pa gnyis pa ji lta bar zil gyis gnon po'i skye mched gnyis po gsum pa dang bzhi pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
anyāni punaḥ śubhavimokṣavat /
yathā śubho vimokṣa evamanyāni catvāri 		gzhan sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa bzhin /
sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa ji lta bar gzhan bzhi yang de dang 'dra'o /
ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ tairvaimukhyamātram 'di ni khyad par yin te /
de dag gis ni rgyab kyis phyogs pa tsam du zad la /
ebhistvālambanābhibhavanaṃ yathecchamadhimokṣāt kleśānutpādācca /
daśa kṛtsnāni 		'di dag gis ni dmigs pa zil gyis gnon te /
ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mos pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i phyir ro /
zad par bcu'o /
daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni nirantarakṛtsnaspharaṇāt bar chad med par zad par rgyas par byed pa'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched ni bcu ste /
pṛthivyaptejovāyunīlapītalohitāvadātakṛtsnāni /
ākāśavijñānānantyāyatanakṛtsne ca 		zad par sa dang chu dang me dang rlu [*rlung] dang sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang zad par nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do /
teṣām /
alobhāṣṭau 		de rnams las /
brgyad ma chags /
prathamānyaṣṭāvalobhasvabhāvāni dang po brgyad ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no /
dhyāne 'ntye bsam gtan mtha' na /
caturtha eva dhyāne bsam gtan bzhi pa kho na na yod do /
gocaraḥ punaḥ /
kāmāḥ /
kāmāvacararūpāyatanameṣā mālambanam 		spyod yul ni 'dod pa /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched yin no /
vāyoḥ spraṣṭavyāyatana mityeke kha cig na re rlung gi ni reg bya'i skye mched yin no zhes zer ro /
dve śuddhakārupye de gnyis ni gzugs med dag /
dve paścime kṛtsne śuddhakārūpyasvabhāve /
svacatuḥskandhagocare /
svabhūmikāścatvāraḥ skandhā anyorālambanam 		zad par gyi skye mched tha ma gnyis ni gzugs med pa dag pa pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no /
spyod yul rang gi phung po bzhi /
'di gnyis kyi dmigs pa ni rang gis pa'i phung po bzhi yin no /
vimokṣaprāveśikānyabhibhvāyatanāni /
abhibhvāyatanaprāveśikāni kṛtsnāyatanāni /
uttarottaraviśiṣṭatvāt /
sarvāṇi caitāni vimokṣādīni pṛthagjanāryasāṃtānikāni sthāpayitvā nirodhavimokṣam /
nirodha uktaḥ /
nirodhavimokṣaḥ pūrvamevoktaḥ sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ /
vairāgyaprayogāptaṃ tu śeṣitam /
nirodhādanyāni vimokṣādīni vairāgyalābhikāni prāyogikāṇi ca 		zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams ni rnam par thar pa 'jug pa las byung ba can yin la /
zad par gyi skye mched rnams ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched 'jug pa las byung ba can yin te /
gong nas gong du khyad bar du 'phags pa'i phyir ro /
'gog pa'i rnam par thar pa ma gtogs pa rnam par thar ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad ni so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa'i rgyud la yod pa dag yin no /
ci rnam par thar pa la sogs pa de dag sbyor ba las byung ba yin nam 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa yin zhes bya ba'i 'dri ba 'di la 'gog ba bshad zin /
'gog pa'i rnam par thar pa ni sngar rnam pa thams cad du bshad zin to /
lhag ma ni /
'dod chags bral dang sbyor bas 'thob /
'gog pa las gzhan pa'i rnam par thar pa la sogs pa ni 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa yang yin la sbyor ba las byung ba dag kyang yin te /
ucitānucitatvāt /
tridhātvāśrayamārūpyasaṃjñaṃ śeṣaṃ manuṣyajam /
ārupyavimokṣā ārupyakṛtsne ca traidhātukāśrayāṇi śeṣaṃ manuṣyāśrayameva /
upadeśasāmarthyenotpādanāt /
kathaṃ rūpārupyadhātvorārūpyadhyānaviśeṣotpādanam 		'dris pa dang ma 'dris pa'i phyir ro /
gzugs med ces bya khams gsum gyi /
rten can lhag ma mi las skye /
gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang gzugs med pa'i zad par ni khams gsum pa'i rten can dag yin no /
lhag ma ni mi'i rten can kho na yin te /
lung gi mthus skyed pa'i phyir ro /
ji ltar na gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu gzugs med pa dang bsam gtan gyi khyad par skye zhe na /
tribhiḥ kāraṇairdhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāmupapattirhetukarmadharmatābalaiḥ /
tatra 		rgyu dang las dang chos nyid dang /
rgyu gsum gyis bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams skye ste /
de la /
hetukarmabalāddhātvorārūpyotpādanaṃ dvayoḥ khams gnyis dag tu gzugs med pa /
rgyu dang las kyi stobs kyis te /
dvayo rūpārūpyadhātvorārūpyasamāpattyutpādanam /
hetubalādāsannābhīkṣṇābhyāsāt karmabalāccordhvabhūmikasyāparaparyāyavedanīyasya karmaṇaḥ pratyupasthitavipākatvāt 		gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye ba rgyu'i stobs kyis ni nye ba dang yang dang yang du goms pa la sa so /
las kyi stobs kyis ni sa gong ma'i lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir te /
nahyadhastādavīta rāgeṇordhva śakyamutpattumiti 'og ma las 'dod chags dang ma bral bas ni gong du skye bar mi nus so /
dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca gzugs kyi khams su bsam gtan rnams /
de dag dang chos nyid kyis kyang /
rūpadhātau dhyānotpādanametābhyāṃ hetukarmabalābhyāṃ dharmatayā ca saṃvartanīkāle gzugs kyi khams su ni bsam gtan gzhan rgyu dang las kyi stobs de dag dang chos nyid kyis kyang skye ste /
'jig pa'i tshe lta bu'o /
tadānīṃ hi sarvasttvā evādharabhūmikāstaddhyānamutpādayanti de'i tshe ni sa 'og ma pa'i sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos rnams kyi 'jug pa shas che ba nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan de skyed par byed do /
kṛtsnānāṃ dharmāṇāmudbhūtavṛttitvāt gang la chos rnams kyi rnam pa ni du yod /
kiyacciraṃ punarayaṃ saddharmaḥ sthāsyati 'di lta bu'i mngon pa'i chos 'di ji srid du gnas she na /
yatreme īdṛśānām dharmāṇāṃ prakārāḥ prajñāyante /
saddharmo dvividhaḥ śāsturāgamādhigamātmakaḥ /
tatrāgamaḥ sūtravinayābhidharmā adhigamo bodhipakṣyā ityeṣa dvividhaḥ saddharmaḥ 		ston pa'i dam chos rnam gnyis te /
lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid do /
de la lung ni mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang chos mngon pa rnams so /
rtogs ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams te /
de ltar na dam pa'i chos 'di ni rnam pa gnyis yin no /
