dhātārastasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāra eva ca de 'dzin byed pa smra byed dang /
sgrub par byed pa khon yin /
āgamasya hi dhārayitāro vaktāraḥ lung 'dzin par byed pa ni smra bar byed pa yin no /
adhigamasya pratipattāraḥ rtogs pa 'dzin par byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa yan te /
ato yāvadete sthāsyanti tāvatsaddharma iti veditavyam /
teṣāṃ tu varṣasahasra mavasthānamāhuḥ 		de'i phyir de nyid ji srid du gnas pa de srid du dam pa'i chos gnas par rig par bya'o /
de dag kyang lo stong du gnas so zhes bshad do /
adhigamasyaivam /
āgamasya tu bhūyāṃsaṃ kālamityapare /
yo 'yamiha śāstre 'bhidharma uktaḥ kimeṣa eva śāstrābhidharmo deśitaḥ 		gzhan dag na re rtogs pa ni de lta bu yin gyi /
lung ni yun ring du gnas so zhes zer ro /
ci bstan bcos 'dir chos mngon pa bshad pa gang yin pa'i chos mngon pa 'di nyid ston pas bshad dam zhe na /
kāśmīravaibhāṣikanītisiddhaḥ prāyo mayā 'yaṃ kathito 'bhidharmaḥ bdag gis mngon pa'i chos 'di phal cher ni /
kha che bye brag smra ba'i tshul grub bshad /
yaddurgṛhītaṃ tadihāsmadāgaḥ saddharmanītau manayaḥ pramāṇam nyes par zin gang de 'dir bdag gis nyes /
dam chos tshul la tshad ma thub rnams yin /
prāyeṇa hi kāśmīravaibhāṣikāṇāṃ nītyādisiddha eṣo 'smābhirabidharma ākhyātaḥ bdag gis chos mngon pa 'di phal cher kha che bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi tshul du grub par bshad pa yin no /
yadatrāsmābhirdurgṛhītaṃ so 'smākamaparādhaḥ /
saddharmanītau tu punarbuddhā eva pramāṇaṃ buddhaputrāśca 		'di la bdag gis nyes par zin pa gang yin pa de ni bdag gis nyes pa yin te /
dam pa'i chos kyi tshul la ni sangs rgyas rnams 'khon dang sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams tshad ma yin no /
nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā ston pa 'jig rten mig ni zum gyur cing /
dbang gyur skye bo phal cher zad pa na /
adṛṣṭatattvairniravagrahaiḥ kṛtaṃ kutārkikaiḥ śāsanametadākulam de nyid ma mthong rang dgar gyur ba yi /
ngan rtog rnams kyis bstan pa 'di dkrugs so /
gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhurdhareṣu ca rang byung rang byung bstan pa gces 'dzin rnams /
mchog tu zhir gshegs 'gro mgon med pa na /
jagatyanāthe gunaghātibhirmataiḥ niraṅkuśaiḥ svairamihādya caryate 'doms med yon tan 'joms bar byed pa yi /
dri mas dga' mgur deng sang 'di na spyod /
iti kaṇṭhagataprāṇaṃ viditvā śāsanaṃ muneḥ /
balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ 		de ltar thub pa dag gi bstan pa ni /
lkog mar srog phyin 'dra dang dri ma rnams /
stobs dang ldan pa'i dus su rig nas ni /
navamaṃ kośasthānam /
namo buddhāya /
kiṃ khalvato 'nyatra mokṣo nāsti /
nāsti /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
vitathātmadṛṣṭiniviṣṭatvāt /
nahi te skandhasaṃtāna evātmaprajñaptiṃ vyavasyanti 		thar pa 'dod bdag gis bag yod gyis [*kyis] /
chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las snyoms par 'dug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas brgyad pa'o /
yang ci 'di las gzhan la thar pa yod dam zhe na /
med do /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
bdag tu lta ba phyin ci log la zhen pa nyid kyi phyir te /
phung po'i rgyud kho na la bdag tu 'dogs pa ni nges par mi 'dzin to /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
dravyāntaramevātmānaṃ parikalpayanti ātmagrāhaprabhavāśca sarvakleśā iti /
kathaṃ punaridaṃ gamyate skandhasaṃtāna evedamātmābhidhānaṃ vartate nānyasminnabhidheya iti 		rdzas gzhan kho na la bdag tu yongs su rtogs par byed la /
nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las rab tu skye ba yin no /
bdag tu mngon par brjod pa 'di ni phung po'i rgyud kho na la 'jug gi /
brjod par bya ba gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na /
pratyakṣānumānābhāvāt /
ye hi dharmāḥ santi teṣāṃ pratyakṣamupalabdhirbhavatyasatyantarāye /
tadyathā ṣaṇṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ manasaśca 		mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir te /
chos gang dag yod pa de dag ni bar chad byed pa med na mngon sum du dmigs pa yin te /
dper na yul drug dang yid lta bu'o /
anumānaṃ ca /
tadyathā pañcānāmindriyāṇām /
tatredamanumānam 		yang na rjes su dpag pas dmigs pa yin te; dper na dbang po lta bu'o /
de la 'di ni rjes su dpag pa yin te /
sati kāraṇe kāraṇāntarasyābhāve kāryasyābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhāve ca punarbhāvistadyathāṅkurasya /
satyeva cābhāsaprāpte viṣaye manaskāre ca kāraṇe viṣayagrahaṇasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ punaśca bhāvo 'ndhavadhirādīnāmanandhāvadhirādīnāṃ ca /
atastatrāpi kāraṇāntarasyābhāvo bhāvaśca niścīyate /
yacca tatkāraṇāntaraṃ tadindriyamityetadanumānam /
na caivamātmano 'stīti nāstyātmā 		rgyu yod kyang rgyu gzhan med na 'bras bu med par mthong la yod na ni yang yod par mthong ba ste /
dper na myu gu lta bu'o /
yul snang bar gyur pa dang rgyu yid la byed pa yod kyang yul 'dzin pa med par mthong la /
yang yod par mthong ba ste /
long ba dang 'on pa la sogs pa dang ma long ba dang ma 'on pa la sogs pa lta bu'o /
de'i phyir de la yang rgyu gzhan med pa dang yod par nges la /
rgyu gzhan gang yin bde ni dbang po yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rjes su dpag pa yin no /
bdag ni de ltar yod pa ma yin pas bdag med do /
yattrhi vātsīputriyāḥ pudgalaṃ santimicchanti 'o na gang gnas ma'i bu rnams gang zag yod par 'dod pa ji lta bu /
vicāryaṃ tāvadetat 'di ni re zhig dpyad par bya ba yin te /
kiṃ te dravyata icchantyāhosvit prajñaptitaḥ ci de dag rdzas su 'dod dam /
'on te btags par 'dod /
kiṃ cedaṃ dravyata iti kiṃ vā prajñaptitaḥ rdzas su zhes bya ba 'di yang ci yang ci zhig /
btags par zhes bya ba 'di yang ci zhig yin /
rūpādivat bhāvāntaraṃ cet dravyataḥ /
kṣīrādivat samudāyaścet prajñaptitaḥ /
kiṃ cātaḥ 		gal te gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du dngos po gzhan zhig yin no zhe na ni rdzas su yod pa yin no /
gal te 'o ma la sogs pa bzhin du spyi yin no zhe na ni btags par yod pa yin no /
de las cir 'gyur /
yadi tāvat dravyataḥ /
saṃbhinna svabhāvatvāt skandhebhyo 'nyo vaktavya itaretaraskandhavat 		re zhig gal te rdzas su yod na ni de rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir phung po rnams las gzhan no zhes brjod par bya ste /
kāraṇaṃ cāsya vaktavyam phan tshun gyi phung po bzhin no /
asaṃskṛto vā /
atastīrthikadṛṣṭiprasaṅgo niṣprayojanatvaṃ ca 		'di'i rgyu yang brjod dgos so /
'on te 'dus ma byas yin na ni de'i phyir mu stegs can gyi lta bar yang thal bar 'gyur la /
atha prajñaptitaḥ dgos pa med pa nyid du yang 'gyur ro /
vayamapyevaṃ trūmaḥ /
naiva hi dravyato 'sti nāpi prajñaptitaḥ /
kiṃ tarhi /
ādhyātmikānupāttānvarttamānān skandhānupādāya pudgalaḥ prajñapyate /
tadidamandhavacanamanunmīlitārthaṃ na budhyāmahe /
kimidamupādāyeti 		'on te btags par yod do zhe na ni kho bo cag kyang de skad ces smras so /
de ni rdzas su yod pa kho na yang ma yin la btags par yod pa yang ma yin no /
'o na ci zhe na /
da ltar gyi nang gi zin pa'i phung po rnams rgyur byas nas gang zag tu 'dogs so /
long ba lta bu'i tshig don mi gsal ba 'di ni mi go'o /
rgyur byas nas zhes bya ba 'di ci /
yadyayamarhtaḥ skandhānāṃ lakṣyate teṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti gal te 'di'i don phung po rnams la dmigs nas zhes bya ba 'di yin no zhe na ni /
de dag kho na la gang zag tu 'dogs par zad do /
yathā rūpādīnālamvya teṣveva kṣīraprajñaptiḥ dper na gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs nas /
de dag kho na la 'o ma 'dogs pa bzhin no /
athāyamarthaḥ skandhān pratīyeti /
skandhānāṃ pudgalaprajñaptikāraṇatvāt /
sa eva doṣaḥ 		'on te 'di'i don phung po rnams la brten nas zhes bya ba 'di yin no zhe na ni phung po rnams gang zag gdags pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir skyon de nyid du 'gyur ro /
de ni de ltar mi 'dogs so /
na sa evaṃ prajñapyate 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
kathaṃ tarhi yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ /
kathaṃ cendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate /
na hi vinendhanenāgniḥ prajñapyate na cānya indhanādagniḥ śakyate prajñapayituṃ nāpyananyaḥ /
yadi hānyaḥ syādanuṣṇamindhanaṃ syāt 		ji ltar bud shing rgyur byas nas me 'dogs pa bzhin no /
ji ltar na bud shing rgyur byas nas me 'dogs she na /
bud shing med par me mi 'dogs mod kyi /
bud shing las me gzhan yin par dam bca' bar yang mi nus la /
gzhan ma yin par dam bca' bar yang mi nus te /
gal te gzhan yin na ni bud shing dro ba nyid ma yin bar 'gyur ro /
athānanyaḥ syāddāhyameva dāhakaṃ syāt /
evaṃ na ca vinā skanvaiḥ pudgalaḥ prajñapyate /
na cānyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ śakyate pratijñātuṃ śāśvataprasaṅgāt 		'on te gzhan ma yin na ni bsreg bya nyid sreg byed yin par 'gyur ro /
de ltar phung po rnams med par yang gang zag mi 'dogs la /
phung po rnams las gzhan yin par dam bca' bar yang mi nus te rtag par thal bar 'gyur ro /
nāpyananya ucchedaprasaṅgaditi /
aṅga tāvadbrūhi kigindhanaṃ ko 'nniriti 		gzhan ma yin par yang dam bca' bar mi nus te chad par thal bar 'gyur ro /
re zhig kye bud shing ni ci /
tato jñāsyāmaḥ kathamindhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyata iti /
kimatra vaktavyaṃ dāhyamindhanaṃ dāhako 'gniḥ /
etadevātra vaktavyaṃ kiṃ dāhyaṃ kok dāhaka iti 		me ni ci yin pa smros shig dang de las ji ltar na bud shing rgyur byas nas me 'dogs par shes par bya'o /
'di la ci zhig brjod par bya /
bsreg bya ni bud shing yin la sreg byed ni me yin par zad mod /
'dir bsreg bar bya ba ni ci /
sreg par byed pa ni ci yin pa de nyid brjod par bya'o /
loke hi tāvadapradīptaṃ kāṣṭḥādikamindhanamucyate dāhyaṃ ca re zhig 'jig rten na ni shing la sogs ba ma 'bar ba la bud shing zhes kyang bya la bsreg bya zhes kyang bya'o /
pradīptamagnirdāhakaśca /
yacca bhasvaraṃ coṣṇaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ ca tena hi tadidhyate dhyate ca 		'bar ba la ni me zhes kyang bya la sreg byed ces kyang bya ste /
'bar ba dang shin tu tsha ba gang yin pa des de tshig pa dang sreg par byed de /
saṃtativikārāpādānāt rgyud 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro /
taccobhayamaṣṭadravyakaṃ taccegdhanaṃ pratītyāgnirutpadyate /
yathā kṣīraṃ pratītya dadhi madhu pratītyaśuktam 		de gnyi ga yang rdzas brgyad pa yin no /
bud shing la brten nas me 'byung ba de yang dper na 'o ma la brten nas zho 'byung ba dang mngar po la brten nas tsha ba 'byung ba lta bu yin te /
tasmādhigdhanamupādāyetyucyate /
anyaśca sa tasmādbhinnakālatvāt /
yadi caiyaṃ pudgalaḥ skandhān pratītyotpadyate sa tebhyo 'nyaścānityaśca prāpnoti 		de lta bas na bud shing rgyur byas nas zhes bya ba la de ni de dang dus tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan pa yang yin no /
gal te de ltar phung po rnams la brten nas gang zag skye na ni de dag las gzhan pa dang mi rtag par yang 'gyur ro /
atha punastatraiva kāṣṭhādau pradīpte yadīṣṇyaṃ tadagnistatsahajātāni trīṇi bhūtānīndhanamiṣyante /
tayorapi siddhamanyatvaṃ lakṣaṇabhedāt /
upādāyārthastu vaktavyaḥ /
kathaṃ tadindhanamupādāya so 'gniḥ prajñapyata iti /
na hi tattasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi tat prajñapteḥ /
agnireva hi tatprajñapteḥ kāraṇam /
yadyāśrayārtha upādāyārthaḥ sahabhāvārtho vā 		'on te shing la sogs pa 'bar ba de nyid la dro ba nyid yod pa gang yin pa de ni me yin la /
de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i 'byung ba gsum ni bud shing yin par 'dod na ni de gnyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan nyid yin par grub bo /
ji ltar na bud shing de rgyur byas nas me 'dogs par byed ba rgyur byas pa'i don yang brjod dgos te /
de ni de'i rgyu yang ma yin la de gdags ba'i rgyu yang ma yin gyi ma nyid de gdags ba'i rgyu yin no /
gal te rgyur byas pa'i don rten gyi don nam lhan cig 'byung ba'i don yin no zhe na ni /
skandhā apyevaṃ pudgalasyāśrayasahabhūtāḥ prāpnuvantīti vispaṣṭamanyatvaṃ pratijñāyate /
tadabhāve ca pudgalābhāvaḥ prāpnoti /
indhanabhāva ivāgnyabhāvaḥ /
yattu taduktaṃ yadīndhanādanyo 'gniḥ syādanuṣṇamindhanaṃ syāditi /
kimidamuṣṇaṃ nāma 		phung po rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar gang zag gi rten nam lhan cig 'byung ba dag yin par 'gyur bas gzhan nyid du gsal bar dam 'cha' ba yin no /
de med na gang zag med par yang 'gyur te /
bud shing med na me med pa bzhin no /
gang yang bud shing las me gzhan yin na ni bud shing dro ba nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes smras ba de dro ba zhes bya ba 'di ci /
yadi tāvādīṣṇyam anuṣṇamevendhanamanyabhūtasvabhāvatvāt /
atha yadauṣṇyavat /
anyadapi taduṣṇasvabhāvādagneruṣṇaṃ sidhyatyīṣṇyayogāditi /
nāstyanyatve doṣaḥ /
atha punaḥ sarvameva tat pradīptaṃ kāṣṭhādikamindhanaṃ cāgniśceṣyate /
tadupādāyārthaśca vaktavyaḥ /
skandhā eva ca pudgalā ityananyatvamanivāryaṃ prāpnoti 		re zhig gal te dro ba nyid yin no zhe na ni bud shing dro ba nyid ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur te /
'byung ba gzhan gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro /
'on te dro ba nyid dang ldan pa yin no zhe na ni dro ba nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi me las gzhan pa de yang dro ba yin par 'grub ste /
dro ba nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
de lta bas na don tha dad pa nyid yin na nyes pa med do /
'on te shing la sogs pa 'bar bde dag thams cad bud shing yang yin la me yang yin par 'dod na ni des na rgyur byas pa'i don yang brjod par bya'o /
phung po rnams kho na yang gang zag yin pas gzhan pa ma yin pa nyid mi ldog par 'gyur ro /
tasmānna sidhyatyetat /
yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate evaṃ skadhānupādāya pudgalaḥ iti /
yadi cāyamanyaḥ skandhebhyo na vaktavyaḥ pañcavidhaṃ jñeyamatītānāgataṃ pratyupannamasaṃskṛtamavaktavyamiti na vaktavyaṃ prāpnoti /
naiva hi tadatītādibhyaḥ pañcamaṃ nāpañcamaṃ vaktavyam /
yadā ca pudgalaḥ prajñapyate ki tāvatskandhānupalabhya prajñapyate āhosvit pudgalam /
yadi tāvat skandhāṃsteṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti /
pudgalasyānupalambhāt /
atha pudgalaṃ kathamasya skandhānupādāya prajñaptirbhavati /
pudgala eva hi tasyā upādānaṃ prāpnoti 		de lta bas na ji ltar bud shing rgyur byas nas me 'dogs pa de ltar phung po rnams rgyur byas nas gang zag 'dogs so zhes bya ba 'di mi 'grub bo /
gal te yang 'di phung po rnams las gzhan du brjod par bya ba ma yin na /
shes bya ni rnam pa lnga ste /
'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang 'dus ma byas dang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes brjod par mi bya bar 'gyur te /
de ni 'das pa la sogs pa las lnga pa yang ma yin la lnga ba ma yin pa yang ma yin par brjod par bya'o /
gang gi tshe gang zag 'dogs ba na ci re zhig phung po rnams dmigs nas 'dogs sam /
'on te gang zag dmigs nas 'dogs /
re zhig gal te phung po rnams na ni de dag kho na la gang zag 'dogs par 'gyur te /
gang zag mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
'on te gang zag na ni 'di ji ltar na phung po rnams rgyur byas nas 'dogs pa yin te /
gang zag kho na de'i rgyu yin par 'gyur ro /
atha mataṃ satsu skandheṣu pudgala upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya prajñaptirucyata iti 'on te phung po rnams yod na gang zag dmigs te /
de'i phyir phung po rnams rgyur byas nas 'di 'dogs so zhes bya bar 'dod do zhen ni /
tadevaṃ rūpasyāpi cakṣurmanaskārālokeṣu satsūpalambhāt tānupādāya prajñaptirbaktavyā /
rūpavacca pudgalasyānyatvaṃ spaṣṭam 		de lta na gzugs kyang dmigs pa dang yid la byed pa dang snang ba rnams yong na dmigs pas de dag rgyur byas nas btags pa yin par brjod par bya'o /
idaṃ tāvadvaktavyam re zhig 'di yang brjod par bya ste /
ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ katamena pudgalo vijñeyaḥ rnam par shes pa drug rnams las gang zag rnam par shes pa gang gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin /
ṣaḍbhirapītyucyate /
kathaṃ kṛtvā /
cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītyapudgalaṃ pratibhāvayati cakṣurvijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyaḥ no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vāno vā 		drug car gyis kyang shes bar bya ba yin no zhes bya'o /
ji ltar byas pas she na /
gal te mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la brten nas /
gang zag dmigs par byed na ni gang zag mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par bya la /
gzugs rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya /
evaṃ yāvat manovijñeyān ceddharmān pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayati manovijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyo no tu vaktavyo dharmā vā no vā /
evaṃ tarhi kṣīrādibhiḥ samānaḥ prāpnoti /
cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītya kṣīraṃ vibhāvayatyudakaṃ vā cakṣurvijñeyaṃ kṣīramudakaṃ ceti vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no vā 		gzugs rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o /
de bzhin du yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyi bar la brten nas /
gang zag dmigs bar byed na ni /
gang zag yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par bya la /
chos rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya la /
chos rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o /
de lta na ni 'o na 'o ma la sogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
gal te mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la brten nas 'o ma 'am /
chu dmigs par byed na ni 'o ma 'am chu mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par bya la gzugs rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya /
gzugs rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o /
evaṃ ghrāṇajihvākāyavijñeyaṃ vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ spraṣṭavyāni vā no vā /
mābhūt kṣīrodakayoścatuṣṭvaprasaṅga iti /
ato yathā rūpādīnyeva kṣīramudakaṃ vā prajñapyate samastānyevaṃ skandhāḥ pudgala iti siddham 		de bzhin du gal te sna dang lce dang lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin par brjod par bya la /
reg bya rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya /
reg bya rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya ste /
'o ma dang chu gnyis bzhi nyid du thal bar 'gyur du 'ong bas so /
de'i phyir ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i spyi kho na la /
'o ma 'am /
chu zhes 'dogs pa de bzhin du phung bo rnams la gang zag 'dogs so zhes bya bar grub bo /
yaccocyate cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayatīti /
ko 'sya vākyasyārthaḥ /
kiṃ tāvadrūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavatiti āhosvidrūpāṇyupalabhamānaḥ pudgalamupalabhata iti /
yadi rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti sa ca tebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ /
evaṃ tarhi rūpamapyālokacakṣurmanaskārebhyo 'nyanna vaktavyam /
teṣāṃ tadupalabdhikāraṇatvāt /
atha rūpāṇyupalabhamānaḥ pudgalamupalabhate /
kiṃ tayaivopalabdhyopalabhate āhosvidanyayā /
yadi tayaiva /
rūpādabhinnasvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāpnoti rūpa eva vā tatprajñāptiḥ /
idaṃ ca rūpamayaṃ pudgalaḥ kathamidaṃ gamyate 		gang yang mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la brten nas gang zag dmigs par byed ces smras pa'i tshig de'i don ci zhig yin /
ci re zhig gzugs rnams gang zag dmigs pa'i rgyu zhig yin nam /
'on te gzugs rnams dmigs na gang zag dmigs so zhes bya ba yin no /
gal te gzugs rnams gang zag dmigs pa'i rgyu yin la de yang de dag las gzhan du brjod bar mi bya'o zhe na ni /
de lta na ni 'o na gzugs kyang snang ba dang mig dang yid la byed pa dag las gzhan du brjod par mi bya ste /
de dag ni de dmigs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro /
'on te gzugs rnams dmigs na gang zag dmigs so zhe na ni ci dmigs pa de kho nas dmigs sam /
'on te gzhan gyis gal te de kho nas so zhe na ni gang zag gzugs las rang bzhin tha mi dad pa'am gzugs kho na la de 'dogs par 'gyur na /
'di ni gzugs so /
'di ni gang zag go zhes bya ba 'di yang ji ltar yongs su gcod /
athaivaṃ na paricchidyate /
kathamidaṃ pratijñāyate rūpamapyasti pudgalo 'pyastīti /
upalabdhivaśena hi tasyāstitvaṃ pratijñāyate 		'on te de ltar yongs su mi gcod na ni gzugs kyang yod do /
gang zag kyang yod do zhes bya ba 'di yang ji ltar dam 'cha' ste /
dmigs pa'i dbang gis de yod par dam 'cha' bar zad do /
evaṃ yāvaddharmebhyo vaktavyam /
athānyayā bhinnakālo palambhādanyo rūpātprāpnoti 		de bzhin du chos kyi bar dag la yang brjod par bya'o /
'on te gzhan gyis so zhe na ni /
dus tha dad dmigs pa'i phyir gzugs las gzhan yin par 'gyur te /
nīlādiya pītaṃ kṣaṇādiva ca kṣaṇāntaram sngon po las ser po lta bu dang skad cig ma las skad cig ma gzhan bzhin no /
evaṃ yāvaddharmebhyo vaktavyam de bzhin du chos kyi bar dag la yang brjod par bya'o /
atha rūpapudgalavaktadupalabdhyorapyanyānanyatvamavaktavyam 'on te gzugs dang gang zag bzhin du de dag dmigs pa dag kyang gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid du brjod par me bya'o zhe na /
tena tarhi saṃskṛte 'pyavaktavyaṃ bhavatīti siddhāntabhedaḥ /
yadi cāyamasti no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vā to vā 		'o na ni des na 'dus ma byas kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin par gyur pas /
grub pa'i mtha' nyams pa yin no /
gal te yang 'di yod la gzugs rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya /
gzugs rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya na /
kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktaṃ rūpamanātmā yāvadvijñānamanātmeti /
yena cāyaṃ cakṣurvijñānena pudgala upalabhyate /
kiṃ tadrūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate āhosvit pudgalamubhayaṃ vā 		'o na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs bdag ma yin pa nas /
rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar gsungs /
mig gi rnam par shes pa gang gis gang zag 'di dmigs pa de ci gzugs la brten nas skye'am /
'on te gang zag gam /
yadi rūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate gnyi ga la brten nas skye /
notsahiṣyate pudgalaṃ vijñātuṃ śabdādivat /
yameva hi viṣayaṃ cakṣurvijñāneṣu pratītyotpadyate vijñānaṃ sa eva tasyālambanapratyayaḥ 		gal te gzugs rnams la brten nas skye na ni sgra la sogs pa bzhin du gang zag dam par shes par mi nus te /
yul gang kho na na la brten nas rnam par shes pa skye ba de nyid de'i dmigs pa'i rkyen yin no /
atha pudgalaṃ pratītyotpadyate ubhayaṃ vā 'on te gang zag gam /
gnyi ga la brten nas skye'o zhe na /
idamutsūtram /
sūtre hi nirdhāritaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādo bhavatīti 		'di ni mdo las thal ba yin te /
mdo las ni /
gnyis la brten nas rnam par shes pa skye ba yin no zhes nges par gzung ngo /
tathā cakṣurbhikṣo hetū rūpāṇi pratyayaścakṣurvijñānasyotpādāya de bzhin du dge slong mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed pa la /
rgyu ni mig yin no /
rkyen ni gzugs rnams yin no /
tatkasya hetoḥ /
yatkiñcit bhikṣo cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvaṃ taccakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ceti /
anityaśca pudgala evaṃ prāpnoti 		de ci'i phyir zhe na /
mig gi rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas skye'o zhes gsungs so /
de lta na ni gang zag mi rtag par 'gyur te; mdo las /
ye hi hetayo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāya te 'pyanityā iti sūtre vacanāt mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed pa la rgyu gang dag yin ba dang rkyen gang yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
atha pudgalo na tasyālambanaṃ na tarhi tena vijñeyaḥ 'on te de'i dmigs pa gang zag ma yin na 'o na ni des rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro /
yadi ca pudgalaḥ ṣaḍvijñānavijñeyaḥ pratijñāyate /
sa śrotravijñānavijñeyatvādrūpādanyaḥ prāpnoti śabdhavat 		gal te yang gang zag rnam par shes pa drug gis rnam par shes bar bya ba yin par dam 'cha' na ni de rna ba'i rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs las gzhan yin par 'gyur te /
sgra bzhin no /
caturvijñānavijñeyatvācchabdādanyaḥ prāpnoti rūpavat mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir sgra las gzhan yin par 'gyur te gzugs bzhin no /
evamanyebhyo 'pi yojyam de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
idaṃ ca sūtrapadaṃ vādhitaṃ bhavati /
yānīmāni brāhmaṇa pañcendriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣyaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
nānyadanyasya gocaraviṣyaṃ pratyanubhavati /
tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyam /
mana eṣaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati manaścaiṣāṃ pratisaraṇamiti 		bram ze dbang po lnga po 'di dag ni spyod yul tha dad pa can yin zhing yul tha dad ba can yin te /
rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul so sor nyams su myong ba yin gyi gzhan gyi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong ba ni ma yin pa dag ste /
'di lta ste /
mig gi dbang po dang rna ba'i dbang po dang sna'i dbang po dang lce'i dbang po dang lus kyi dbang po lnga'o /
yid kyi dbang bo ni dbang po lnga po 'di dag gi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong ba yin zhing /
yid kyi dbang po ni 'di dag gi rten yin no zhes gsungs pa'i mdo'i tshig 'di dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro /
na vā pudgalo viṣayaḥ yang na gang zag yul ma yin par 'gyur ro /
na cedviṣayo na tarhi vijñeyaḥ /
yadyevaṃ manaindriyasyāpyavyabhicāraḥ prāpnoti 		gal te yul ma yin no zhe na /
'o na ni rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro /
gal te de lta na yid kyi dbang po yang 'khrul pa med bar 'gyur te /
ṣaḍimānīndriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣayamākāṅkṣantī tyuktaṃ ṣaṭprāṇakopame srog chags drug pa lta bu'i mdo las /
dbang po drug po 'di dag ni spyod yul tha dad ba can yin zhing yul tha dad pa can yin te /
na ttrendriyamemvendriyaṃ kṛtvoktam rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul 'dod pa dag yin no zhes gsungs so /
pañcānāṃ darśanādyā kāṅkṣaṇāsaṃbhavāt tadvijñānānāṃ ca /
atastadādhipatyādhyākṛtamatra manovijñānendriyaṃ kṛtvoktam /
yacca tatkevalaṃ mana ādhipatyādhyākṛtaṃ manovijñānaṃ naivaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ viṣayamākāṅkṣatyato nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā sarvābhijñeyaṃ vo bhikṣavo dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayiṣyāmītyuktvā cakṣurabhijñeyaṃ rūpāṇi cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yadapi taccakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayamadhyātmamutpadyate veditaṃ suḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā yāvat manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayam 		der ni dbang po kho na la dbang po yin par ma gsungs kyi lnga po dang de dag gi rnam par shes pa rnams ni mthong ba la sogs par 'dod mi srid pa'i phyir de dag gi dbang gis drangs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni dbang po yin par gsungs so /
yid kyi dbang po 'ba' zhig gis drangs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni de las gzhan pa dag gi spyod yul la mi 'dod pa nyid pas de'i phyir de nyes pa med do /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad bshad par bya'o zhes gsungs nas /
mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ni mig dang gzugs rnams dang mig gi rnam par shes ba dang mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang gang yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am /
sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa skye ba de dang zhes bya ba nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par gsungs te /
ayamucyate sarvābhijñeyaparijñeyo dharmaparyāyaḥ iti 'di ni mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad yin no zhes gsungs so /
ata etāvadevābhijñeyaṃ pratijñeyaṃ cetyavardhāryate na pudgalaḥ de'i phyir mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ni de snyed cig yin par nges par gzung gi /
gang zag ni ma yin pas /
tasmādvijñeyo 'pyasau na bhavati /
prajñāvijñānayoḥ samānaviṣayatvāt 		de lta bas na 'di rnam par shes par bya ba yang ma yin te /
shes rab dang rnam par shes pa gnyis ni yul 'dra ba'i phyir ro /
cakṣuṣa ca pudgalaṃ paśyām iti paśyanta paudgalikā anātmanā ātmānaṃ paśyāma iti dṛṣṭisthānamāpannā bhavanti /
sūtre ca bhagavatā nītametat 		gang zag pa rnams mig gis gang zag blta'o zhes gang zag lta ba ni bdag med pas bdag blta'o zhes bya ba yin pas bdag tu lta ba'i gnas su gyur ba yang yin no /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo las /
skandheṣveva pudgalādhyeti mānuṣyakasūtram /
cakṣuḥpratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśasahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetanā itīme catvāro rupiṇaḥ skandhāśvakṣurindriyaṃ ca rūpametāvanmanuṣyatvamucyate /
atreyaṃ saṃjñā sattvo naro manuṣyo mānavaśca poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo jīvo janturiti /
atreyaṃ pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmīti /
atrāyaṃ vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evañjātya evaṅgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evandīrghāyurevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyanta iti 		phung bo rnams kho na la gang zag ces bya'o zhes 'di nges par mdzad do /
nges pa'i don gyi mdo las kyang /
mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o /
gsum 'dus pas ni reg pa'o /
lhan cig skyes pas ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa dag ste /
de ltar na gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po de bzhin dang gzugs can mig gi dbang po dang de snyed cig la mi nyid ces bya'o /
'di la sems can dang ming dang shed las skyes dang shed bu dang gso ba dang gang zag dang srog dang skye bo zhes bya ba 'di ni ming yin no /
'di la bdag gis mig gi gzugs rnams blta'o zhes bya ba 'di ni khas 'che ba yin no /
'di la ni 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa de'i ming ni 'di zhes bya /
rigs ni 'di zhes bya /
rus ni 'di zhes bya /
kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za /
bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong /
tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub /
yun ni ji srid cig gnas /
iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātrakamevaita dvyavahāramātrakamevaitat /
sarva ime dharmāḥ anityāḥ saṃskṛtāśceti tāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti /
nītārthaṃ ca sūtraṃ pratisaraṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā 		tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig go zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad yin no /
dge slong dag de ltar na 'di dag ni ming tsam /
'di dag khas 'che ba tsam /
'di dag ni tha snyad tsam ste /
chos 'di dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa /
'dus byas pa /
sems pas 'phangs pa /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dag yin no zhes gsungs so /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo la brten par gsungs te /
tasmānna punaḥ parīkṣyate /
tathā coktaṃ sarvamastīti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva dvādaśāyanānīti 		de lta bas na 'di ni yang dang yang du brtag par bya ba yin no /
de bzhin du bram ze thams cad yod do zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu zad do zhes kyang gsungs so /
yadi cāyaṃ pudgalo nāyatanaṃ na sostīti siddham /
athāyatanaṃ na tarhyavaktavyaḥ /
teṣāmapi caivaṃ paśyato yāvatā bhikṣo cakṣuryāvatā rūpāṇi vistareṇa etāvatā bhikṣo tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ ca prajñāpayati sarvaprajñaptiṃ ceti /
bimbisārasūtre coktam ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito na tvātrā tmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā duḥkhamidamutpadya mānamutpadyate iti vistaraḥ /
śailayāpyarhantyā māramārabhyoktaṃ /
manyase ki nu sattveti māradṛṣṭigataṃ hi te /
śūnyaḥ saṃskārapuñjo 'yaṃ nahi sattvjotra vidyate 		gal te gang zag 'di skye mched ma yin na ni de yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo /
'on te skye mched yin no zhe na /
'o na ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no /
de dag gi ltar na yang 'di skad du dge slong mi ji snyed pa dang gzugs ji snyed pa zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs nas /
dge slong 'di ji snyed cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dogs par mdzad do /
thams cad brtags so zhes gsungs so zhes 'don to /
gzugs can snying po'i mdo las kyang /
dge slong dag bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas brtags pa la lhung bar zad de /
'di la bdag ga bdag gi ni med kyi sdug bsngal 'di skye ba na skye bar zad do zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs so /
dgra bcom pa drug gis kyang bdud las brtsams nas /
sems can zhes bya bdud ci sems /
khyod ni lta bar gyur pa yin /
'du byed phung po 'di stong ste; /
'di la sems can yod ma yin /
yathaiva hyaṅgasaṃbhārātsaṃjñā ratha iti smṛtā ji ltar yan lag tshogs rnams la /
shing rta'i ming du bshad pa ltar /
evaṃ skandhānupādāya saṃvṛtyā sattva ucyate de bzhin phung po rnams brten nas /
kun rdzob sems can zhes bya'o /
kṣadrake 'pi cāgame dāridrabrāhmaṇamathikṛtyoktaṃ /
śṛṇu tvaṃ svādare dharmaḥ sarvagranthipramocanam /
yathā saṃkliśyate cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ viśudhyati 		zhes bshad do /
lung phran tshegs las kyang /
bram ze rgya shug gi bu'i dbang du byas nas /
ji ltar sems ni kun nyon mongs /
ji ltar sems ni rnam byang dang /
mdud pa thams cad 'jig byed pa'i /
chos ni rgya shug bu khyod nyon /
ātmaiva hyātmano nāsti viparītena kalpyate /
nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ /
dvādaśaiva bhavāṅgāni skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ 		bdag nyid kyis ni bdag med de /
phyin ci log gis rtogs par byed /
'di la bdag gam sems can med /
chos 'di dag ni rgyu dang bcas /
srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang /
phung po skye mched khams rnams te /
vicintya sarvāṇyetāni pudgalo nopalabhyate rnam par bsams na 'di kun la /
gang zag dmigs pa ma yin no /
śūnyamadhyātmakaṃ paśya śūnyaṃ paśya bahirgatam nang gi stong pa yin par ltos /
phyi rol gnas pa stong par ltos /
na labhyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatāmiti rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa /
de yang 'ga' yang mi dmigs so /
tathoktaṃ pañcādīnavā ātmopalambhe zhes gsungs so /
de bzhin du bdag tu dmigs pa la nyes dmigs lnga yod do /
ātmadṛṣṭirbhavati sattvadṛṣṭiḥ bdag tu lta ba dang sems can du lta ba dang srog tu lta bar 'gyur /
nirviśeṣo bhavati tīrthikaiḥ sārdham /
unmārgapratipanno bhavati 		mu stegs can rnams dang khyad par med par 'gyur /
lam gol bar zhugs par 'gyur /
śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate na vimucyate 'di'i sems stong pa nyid la mi 'jug cing rab tu dang bar mi 'gyur la yang dag par mi gnas pas rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur /
āryadharmā asya na vyavadāyanta iti 'di'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so /
na vaita evaṃ grandhaṃ pramāṇaṃ kurvanti de dag ni gzhung 'di tshad mar mi byed pa nyid do /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
nāsmākamayaṃ nikāye paṭhacyata iti 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
'di kho bo cag gi sde pa mi 'don to zhes zer ro /
kiṃ punasteṣāṃ nikāya eva pramāṇamāhosvidbuddhavacanam ci de dag la sde pa kho na tshad ma yin nam /
'on te sangs rgyas kyi bka' tshad ma yin /
yadi nikāya eva pramāṇaṃ na tarhi teṣāṃ budhaḥ śāstā /
na ca te śākyaputrīyā bhavanti 		gal te sde pa kho na tshad ma yin na 'o na ni de dag gi ston pa yang sangs rgyas ma yin la /
sh'akya'i bu yang ma yin par 'gyur /
atha buddhavacanaṃ pramāṇam /
ayaṃ granthaḥ kasmānna pramāṇam 		'on te sangs rgyas kyi bka' tshad ma yin no zhe na ni gzhung 'di ci'i phyir tshad ma ma yin /
nahi kilaitat buddhavacanamiti 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
nāsmākaṃ nikāye paṭhacyata iti 		de ci'i phyir zhe na ni /
kho bo cag gi sde pa mi 'don pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
ayamanyāyo vartate 'di ni mi rigs par zhugs pa yin no /
ko 'trānyāyaḥ /
yo hi granthaḥ sarveṣu nikāyāntareṣvāmnāyate na ca sūtraṃ dharmatāṃ vā bādhate so 'smābhirapāṭhānna buddhavacanamiti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ sāhasamātram /
kiṃ cedamapi teṣāṃ sūtraṃ nāsti sarvadharmā anātāna iti /
syāt matam /
naiva hi pudgalo dharma ucyate nāpyanyo dharmāditi 		'dir mi rigs pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
gzhung gang zhig sde pa gzhan thams cad las 'byung la mdo dang chos nyid dang yang mi 'gal bde kho bo cag mi 'don pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes smra ba ste /
gzu lums tsam 'ba' zhig tu zad do /
gzhan yang de dag la chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di yang med dam /
gang zag ni chos zhes kyang mi bya la chos las gzhan zhes kyang mi bya'o zhes bya bar 'dod par gyur na /
evaṃ tarhi na manovijñeyaḥ sidhyati de lta na ni yid kyi rnam par shes par bya bar mi 'grub ste /
dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādaḥ ityavadhāraṇāt /
iha caivaṃ vikalpyate anātmanyāteti saṃjñāviparyāsa ścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa iti /
anātmanyātmeti viparyāso na tvātmani kiṃ ca punaḥ 		gnyis la brten nas rnam par shes pa skye'o zhes nges par gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
bdag med pa la bdag go snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang lta ba phyin ci log pa zhes bya ba 'di kho na la yang ji ltar rtog /
bdag med pa la bdag go snyam pa phyin ci log yin gyi bdag la ni ma yin no /
bdag med pa yang gang zhig yin /
nātmā skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ yattāvaduktaṃ prāk no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no veti tattāvadaśocam /
uktaṃ ca sūtrāntare ye kecit bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāniti 		phung po dang skye mched dang khams rnams yin no /
re zhig sngar gzugs rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o /
gzugs rnams ma yin zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa ni bsal to /
mdo gzhan las /
dge slong dag dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang la la bdag go snyam du rjes su lta ba de dag thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag kho na la zhes gsungs te /
tasmātsarva evānātmanyātmagrāhaḥ /
tathoktaṃ ye kecidanekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarantaḥ samanusmārṣuḥ samanusmaranti samanusmariṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve ta imāneva opañcopādanaskandhāniti 		de lta bas na bdag tu 'dzin pa thams cad ni bdag med pa kho na la yin no /
de bzhin du gang la sngon gyi gnas rnam pa dum rjes su dran par gyur tam /
rjes su dran nam /
rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag kho na la zhes gsungs so /
yadyevamidaṃ kasmādāha rūpavānahamabhūvamatīte adhvanīti gal te de lta na ni ci'i phyir bdag ni 'das pa'i dus na gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur to zhes gsungs /
evamanekavidhaṃ ye samanusmarantīti pradarśayati gang dag de ltar rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba rab tu ston par byed do /
yadi tu rūpavantaṃ pudgalaṃ paśyetsatkāyadṛṣṭiprasaṅgaḥ syāt gal te gang zag gzugs dang ldan par lta bar gyur na 'jig tshogs la lta bar thal bar 'gyur bas 'di la ni ma bton pa kho na skyabs yin no /
apāṭha eva tvanna śaraṇaṃ syāt /
tasmāt prajñāptisatpudgalo rāśidhārāvat 		de lta bas na gang zag ni btags pa'i yod pa yin te /
phung po dang rgyun la sogs pa bzhin no /
yadyevaṃ tarhi na buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ prapnoti gal te de ltar na 'on ni sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
na hi kiñcictrittamasti caittā vā yatsarvaṃ jānīyāt thams cad shes par 'gyur ba'i sems sam sems las byung ba gang yin pa de ni cung zad kyang med do /
kṣaṇikatvāt /
pudgalastu jānīyāt /
evaṃ tarhi cittavināśe pudgalasyāvināśābhyupagamāt nityatvamasyābhyupetaṃ bhavati 		skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir gang zag gis ni shes par 'gyur ro /
de lta ni 'o na sems 'jig pa na gang zag mi 'jig par khas blangs pa'i phyir 'di rtag pa nyid du khas blangs pa yin no /
naiva ca vayaṃ sarvatra jñānasaṃmukhībhāvād buddhaṃ sarvajñamācakṣmahe kho bo cag ni thams cad mkhyen pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa yin par ni mi smra'o /
kiṃ tarhi /
sāmarthyāt /
yā hyasau buddhākhyā saṃtatistasyā idamasti sāmarthyaṃ yadābhogamātreṇāviparītaṃ jñānamutpadyate yatreṣṭam /
āha cātra 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
mthu yod pa'i phyir te /
sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i rgyud gang yin pa de la gang du bzhed par gtang ba tsam gyis phyin ci ma log pa'i mkhyen pa skye ba gang yin pa'i mthu 'di yod do /
'dir smras pa /
saṃtānena samarthatvādyathāgniḥ sarvabhuṅmataḥ rgyun gyis spyod pa'i phyir na dper /
me yis thams cad sreg 'dod lta /
tathā sarvavideṣṭavyo 'sakṛtsarvasya vedanāt /
kathamidaṃ gamyate 		de bzhin thams cad mkhyen 'dod bya'i /
cig car thams cad mkhyen phyir min /
'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na /
atītādivacanāt /
ye cābhyatītāḥ saṃbuddhā ye ca buddhā anāgatāḥ 		'das pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir te /
rdzogs sangs rgyas 'das gang dag dang /
sangs rgyas ma byon gang dag dang /
yaśca etarhhi saṃbuddho bahūnāṃ śokanāśana iti da lta'i rdzogs sangs rgyas gang yin /
mang po rnams ni mya ngan sel /
skandhā eva ca traiyadhvikā iṣyante na pudgalā yuṣmābhiḥ zhes gsungs so /
khyed cag kyang phung po rnams kho na dus gsum pa yin par 'dod kyi gang zag ni ma yin no /
yadi skandhā eva pudgalāḥ kasmādidamāha /
bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi bhārādānaṃ ca bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ceti /
kasmādidaṃ na vaktavyaṃ syāt /
na hi bhāra eva bhārahāro yuktaḥ 		gal te phung po rnams kho na gang zag yin na ci'i phyir dge slong dag khyed la khur yang bstan to /
khur len pa dang khur 'dor ba dang khur khyer ba yang bstan gyi zhes gsungs /
ci'i phyir gsungs par mi bya /
khur nyid khur khyer ba yin par ni rigs pa ma yin te /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
nahyevaṃ dṛśyata iti de lta bu mi snang ba'i phyir ro /
avaktavyo 'pi na yuktaḥ brjod par bya ba ma yin pa yang rigs pa ma yin te /
kiṃ kāraṇam ci'i phyir zhe na /
na hyevaṃ dṛśyate /
bhārādānasyāpi skandhāsaṃgrahaprasaṅgācca 		de lta bu mi snang ba'i phyir ro /
khur len pa yang phung pos ma bsdus par yang thal bar 'gyur ro /
ityarthameva bhārahāraṃ nirdideśa bhagavān /
yo 'sāvāyupmānevaṃnāmā yāvadevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ sa eṣa yathā vijñāyeta /
mānyathā vijñāyi nityo vā avaktavyaṃ veti /
skandhā eva ca skandhānāmupadhātāya saṃvartante pūrvakā uttareṣāmiti bhāraṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ca kṛtvoktāḥ 		khur khyer ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas tshe dang ldan pa ming 'di zhes bya ba nas yun ni 'di srid cig gnas nas tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig go zhes bya ba'i bar gang yin pa de nyid shes par 'gyur zhing /
rtag pa'am gang zag ces bya ba gzhan du shes par mi 'gyur ba don de kho na'i phyir bstan te phung po snga ma rnams kho na phung po phyi ma rnams la gnod par byed pa yin pas khur dang khur khyer ba zhes bshad pa yin no /
upaghātārtho hi bhāra iti /
asty eva pudgalo yasmād uktaṃ nāsti sattva upapāduka iti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
kaścaivam āha nāsti sattva upapāduka iti 		gang zag ni yod pa nyid de /
'di ltar sems can skye ba ba med do zhes zer ba ni log par lta ba yin no zhes gsungs so /
sems can skye ba pa med do zhes su zer /
sattvastu yathā 'sti tathā vibhakto bhagavateti brūmo mānuṣyakasūtre /
tasmād yaḥ paratropapādukasattvākhyaskandhasaṃtānāpavādaṃ karoti tasyaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭir nāsti sattva upapāduka iti /
skandhānām upapādukatvāt /
athaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pudgalāpavādikā satī kiṃprahātavyā bhavet 		ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ba ltar yod do /
zhes zer ro /
de lta bas na 'di ni gang zhig pha rol du skye ba pa sems can zhes bya ba phung po'i rgyun la sems can skye ba pa med do zhes skur pa 'debs pa de'i log par lta ba yin te /
phung po rnams ni skye ba pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
gang zag la skur pa 'debs pa 'di log par lta ba yin na yang ci zhig gis spang bar bya bar 'gyur /
nahyeṣā darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā yujyate /
pudgalasya sattveṣvantarbhāvāt /
ekaḥ pudgalo loka utpadyamāna utpadyate iti vacanāt na skandhā iti cet 		'di bden pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin par yang mi rung la bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin par yang mi rung ste /
gang zag bden pa rnams kyi khongs su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro /
gal te 'jig rten na yang gang zag gcig pu skye ba na skye'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir phung po rnams ma yin no zhen ma yin te /
na /
samudāye 'pyekopacārādekatilaikataṇḍulavat ekarāśyekavacanavacca 		spyi la yang gcig nye bar 'dogs pa'i phyir til gcig dang 'bras thug po che gcig ces bya ba lta bu dang phung po gcig dang tshig gcig ces bya ba bzhin no /
saṃskṛta iti vā pudgalo vaktavya utpatīmattvābhyupagamāt yang na gang zag 'dus byas yin no zhes bya bar brjod par bya ste /
skye ba dang ldan pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /
na sa evamutpadyate yathā skandhā apūrvaprādurbhāvāt de ni ji ltar phung po rnams sngon med pa las byung ba de ltar skye ba ni ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
skandhāntaropādānāt 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
phung po gzhan len pa'i phyir te /
yathā yājñiko jāto vaiyākaraṇo jāta ityucyate vidyopādānāt dper na rig pa blangs pa'i phyir mchod sbyin pa skyes so /
bhikṣurjātaḥ parivrājako jāta iti liṅgopādānāt brda sprod pa pa skyes so zhes bya ba dang rtags blangs pa'i phyir dge slong skyes so /
buddhojāto vyādhito jāta ityavasthāntaropādānāditi /
na pratikṣepāt sūtra eva hi pratikṣiptaṃ bhagavatā paramārthaśūnyatāyām /
iti hibhikṣavo 'sti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate /
ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāditi 		kun du rgyu skyes so zhes bya ba dang gnas skabs gzhan blangs pa'i phyir rga ba skyes so /
na ba skyes so zhes bya ba bzhin no /
ma yin te /
bkag pa'i phyir ro /
bcom ldan 'das kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mdo khon las /
dge slong dag las ni yod do /
rnam par smin pa ni yod do /
chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa gang zhig phung po 'di rnams 'dor bar byed cing phung po gzhan dag nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i byed pa po ni mi dmigs so zhes gsungs so /
phalgusūtre coktam upādatta iti phalgu na vadāmīti dbo las skyes kyi mdo las kyang /
dbo las skyes len ces mi ba'o zhes gsungs te /
tasmānnāsti skandhānāṃ kaścidupādātā nāpi nikṣiptā de lta bas na phung po rnams len par byed pa yang 'ga' yang med la /
'dor bar byed pa yang med do /
kaṃ ca tāvadbhavānyājñikaṃ yāvadvacyā dhita madhimucyate re zhig khyod mchod sbyin pa nas rga ba'i bar gang gi dbang du byas nas dper byed /
dṛṣṭātaṃ karoti pudgalaṃ yadi /
so 'siddhaḥ /
atha cittacaittāḥ /
na /
teṣāṃ pratikṣaṇamapūrvotpattireva 		gal te gang zag yin no zhen ni de ma grub bo /
'on te sems dang sems las byung ba rnams yin no zhe na ni de dag skad cig re re la sngon med pa las skye ba khon yin no /
atha śarīram /
tasyāpi tathā /
śarīravidyāliṅgavacca skandhapudgalayoranyatvamāpadyate /
jīrṇa śarīrāntarameva jyādhitaṃ ca /
pratiṣiddho hi sāṃkhyīyaḥ pariṇāmavādaḥ 		'on te lus yin no zhe na /
de yang de dang 'dra la /
lus dang rig ba dang rtags bzhin du phung po dang gang zag gnyis gzhan nyid du yang 'gyur ro /
rga ba dang na ba yang lus gzhan khon yin no /
grangs can pa'i 'gyur bar smra ba ni bkag zin to /
tasmādadṛṣṭāntā ete /
yadi ca skandhānāmapūrvotpādo na pudgalasyeṣyate so 'nyaśca tebhyo nityaśca sphuṭaṃ dīpito bhavati /
pañca skandhā ekaḥ pudgala iti brūvatā kathamanyatvaṃ nocyate 		de lta bas na 'di dag ni dpe ngan pa yin no /
gal te yang phung po rnams ni sngon med pa las skyes pa yin la /
gang zag ni ma yin par 'dod na ni de de dag las gzhan pa dang rtag par gsal bar yongs su bstan pa yin no /
phung po ni lnga'o /
gang zag ni gcig go zhes smra bas ji ltar na gzhan nyid du mi brjod /
kathaṃ tāvat bhūtāni catvāri rūpaṃ tvekaṃ na ca bhūtebhyyo 'nyadrūpam re zhig ji ltar na 'byung ba dag ni bzhi yin /
gzugs ni gcig yin la 'byung ba rnams las gzugs gzhan yang ma yin /
pākṣika eṣa doṣaḥ /
katamasminpakṣa 		smra ba 'di ni phyogs la yod pa yin no /
phyogs gang la zhe na /
bhūtamātrikapakṣe /
tathāpi tu yathā bhūtamātraṃ rūpamevaṃ skandhamātraṃ pudgala ityabhyupetaṃ bhavati /
yadi skandhamātraṃ pudgalaḥ kasmāt bhagavatā sa jīvastaccharīrakanyo veti navyākṛtam 		'byung ba tsam pa'i phyogs la'o /
de lta na yang ji ltar 'byung ba tsam gzugs yin pa de bzhin du phung po tsam gang zag yin par khas blangs pa yin no /
gal te phung po tsam gang zag yin na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis srog de nyid lus yin pa'am /
gzhan yin no zhes lung ma bstan zhe na /
praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā /
sa hi jīvadravyamekamantarvyāpāra puruṣamadhikṛtya pṛṣṭavān /
sa ca kasmiścinnāstīti kathamasyānyatvamananyatvaṃ vā vyākriyatām /
kaurmasyeva romṇo 'ntaḥkharatā mṛdutā vā 		'dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos pa'i phyir te /
des na ni nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu srog gi rdzas gcig po dris so /
de yang 'ga' yang med na 'di ji ltar gzhan nyid dam gzhan ma yin pa nyid lung bstan par bya ste /
rus sbal gyi yul ba shor ram 'jam zhes bya ba bzhin no /
eṣa ca granthaḥ pūrvakaireva nirmocitaḥ mdud pa 'di ni snga ma dag kho nas kyang bkrol zin te /
sthāviro hi nāgasenaḥkaliṅgena rājñopasaṃkramyoktaḥ /
pṛccheyamahaṃ bhadantam bahuvollakāśca śravaṇā bhavanti /
yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti 		rgyal po des 'du sbyin gnas brtan klu sde'i thad du 'ongs nas btsun pa dge sbyong rnams ni smra ba mang ba ma lags so /
gal te gang dris pa de nyid lan 'debs na bdag 'dri bar 'tshal lo zhes smras so /
pṛcchetyuktaḥ pṛṣṭavān drir gsol zhes smras pa dag ci lags /
kiṃ nu sa jīvastaccharīramanyio jīvo 'nyaccharīramiti srog de nyid lus lags sam /
srog kyang gzhan lags la lus kyang gzhan lags zhes dris so /
avyākṛtametadityavocat sthaviraḥ /
sa āha 		gnas brtan gyis 'di ni lan mi gdags pa yin no zhes smras pa dang des smras pa /
nanu bhadantaḥ pūrvameva pratijñāṃ kārito nā 'nyadvacyākartavyamiti bdag gis snga nas btsun pa gzhan lung bstan par mi bya'o zhes dam 'char gsol ba ma lags sam /
kimidamanyadevoktamavyākṛtametaditi ci'i slad du 'di skad du 'di ni lan mi gdab pa yin no zhes gzhan kho na gsungs /
sthavira āha gnas brtan gyis smras pa /
ahamapi mahārājaṃ pṛccheyaṃ bahuvollakāśca rājāno bhavanti rgyal po chen po rgyal po rnams ni smra ba mang ba lags so /
yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti gal te gang dris pa de nyid lan 'debs na bdag kyang 'dri bar 'tshal lags so /
pṛcchetyuktaḥ pṛṣṭavān /
yaste 'ntaḥpure ābhravṛkṣastasya kimamlāni phalāni āhosvit madhurāṇīti /
naiva mamāntaḥpure kaścidābhravṛkṣo 'stītyāha /
nanu mayā pūrvameva mahārājaḥ pratijñāṃ kārito nānyadvacyākartavyamiti 		drir gsol zhes smras pa dang khyod kyi slas la shing ljon pa aa mra 'bras bu yod pa gang yin pa de'i 'bras bu rnams ci skyur ram 'on te mngar lags zhes dris so /
bdag gi smras la shing ljon pa aa mra nyid 'ga' yang med do zhes smras so /
bdag gis snga nas rgyal po chen po gzhan lung bstan par mi bya'o zhes dam 'char gsol ba ma lags sam /
kimidamanyadevoktamābhra eva nāstīti /
sa āha kathamasato vṛkṣasya phalānāmamlatāṃ madhuratāṃ vā vyākaromīti /
evameva mahārāja sa eva jīvo nāsti kuto 'sya śarīrādanyatāmananyatāṃ vā vyākaromīti 		ci'i slad du 'di skad du shing ljon pa aa mra nyid med do zhes gzhan kho na gsungs /
des smras pa /
ji ltar na shing ljon pa med pa'i 'bras bu rnams skyur ba'am mngar ba nyid du lung bstan par bya /
rgyal po chen po de bzhin du srog de nyid med na ci'i slad du 'di lus las gzhan pa nyid dam gzhan ma yin pa nyid du lung bstan par bgyi zhes bya ba lta bu'o /
kasmāt bhagavatā 'pi noktaṃ nāstyeveti ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang med pa kho na'o zhes ma gsungs she na /
praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā /
sa hi yasyāpi skandhasaṃtānasya jīva ityākhyā tasyāpyabhāvaṃ pratīyāditi mithyādṛṣṭiṃ pātitaḥ syāt 		dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos pa'i phyir te /
des srog ces bya ba phung po'i rgyun gang yin pa de yang med par go bar gyur na log par lta bar ltung bar 'gyur te /
pratotya samutpādasyājñānāt /
sa cataddeśanāyā akṣamaḥ /
itaścaitadevaṃ niścīyate /
yat bhagavatoktam astyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanvakalpaṃ syādvacanāya sarvadharmā anātmāna iti 		rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes pa'i phyir ro /
de ni de bstan pa yang mi bzod do /
'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo kun du rgyu gnas pa dang rus mthun pas dri ba dris pa dag yod do zhes lung bstan na ni chos thams cad bdag med pas tshig ma legs pa ma yin nam /
nāstyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanu vatsasagotraḥ parivrājakaḥ pūrvameva saṃmūḍho bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃmohamāpadyeta abhūt me ātmāsa me etarhi nāstīti /
astyātmetyānanda śāśvatāya pareti 		kun dga' bo kun du rgyu gnas pa dang rus mthun pa'i dri ba dris pa bdag med do zhes lung bstan na ni kun tu rgyu gnas pa dang rus mthun pa'i snga nas kun du rmongs pa yod pa dag gis bdag sngon yod par gyur pa las da ni bdag gi de yang med do zhes kun du rmongs pa phyir zhing ches rgyas par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
kun dga' bo bdag yod ces bya ba ni rtag pa'i mthar 'gyur ro /
nāstyātmetyānandocchedāya paretīti vistaraḥ /
āha cānna /
dṛṣṭidaṃṣṭrāvabhadaṃ ca braṃśaṃ cāpekṣya karmaṇām 		kun dga' bo bdag med ces bya ba ni chad pa'i mthar 'gyur ro zhes rgyas par gsungs pa gang yin pa 'di las kyang de bzhin du nges par zung shig /
'dir smras pa /
lta ba'i mche bas smras pa dang /
las rnams 'jig pa la ltos nas /
deśayanti jinā dharma vyāgrīpītāpahāravat stag mos phru gu khyer ba ltar /
rgyal bas chos ni ston par mdzad /
ātmāstitvaṃ hyupagato bhinnaḥ syāddṛṣṭidaṃṣṭrayā bdag yod nyid du khas blangs nas /
lta ba'i mche bas smras par gyur /
bhraṃśaṃ kukśalapotasya kuryādaprāpya saṃvṛtimiti kun rdzob rtog par ma gyur nas /
dge ba phru gu nyams byed 'gyur /
punarāha yang smras pa /
asattvādbhagavān jīvaṃ tattvānyatvena nāvadat /
nāstītyapi ca nāvocanmābhūt prājñaptikopyasan 		med phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis srog /
de nyid gzhan du ma gsungs so /
brtags pa'ang med du 'gyur 'ong bas /
med do zhes kyang ma gsungs so /
yatra hi skandhasaṃtāne śubhāśubhaphalāstitā phung po'i rgyu ni gang la dge /
mi dge'i 'bras bu yod pa nyid /
jīvākhyā tatra sā na syāt jīvanāstitvadeśanāt de la srog ces bya ste de /
srog ming bstan pas med par 'gyur /
prajñaptimātraṃ skandhesu jīva ityapināvadat srog ces bya ba phung po la /
btags tsam zhes kyang ma gsungs te /
abhavyaḥ śūnyatāṃ boddhuṃ tadānīṃ tādṛśo janaḥ /
tathā hyātmāsti nāstīti pṛṣṭo vāstyeva nāvadat /
āśayāpekṣāyā praṣṭuḥ sati tvastīti nāha kim /
śāśvatalokādīnāmapyavayākaraṇaṃ praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā 		de tshe'i skye bo de 'dra ste /
stong nyid rtogs pa'i skal ldan min /
'di ltar gnas pas bdag yod dam /
med ces dri ba 'dri ba yi /
bsam pa la ltos ma gsungs te /
yod na ci phyir yod mi gsungs /
'jig rten rtag ces bya ba la sogs pa yang 'dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos nas lung ma bstan te /
yadi hi tāvadātmā loka iṣṭaḥ syāttasyābhāvādayuktaṃ caturdhā vyākaraṇam re zhig gal te 'jig rten bdag yin bar 'dod par gyur na ni de med pa'i phyir lung ma bstan pa rnam pa bzhi char mi rigs so /
atha sarva eva saṃsāro lokastasyāpyayuktam 'on te 'jig rten 'khor ba thams cad yin no zhe na ni de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt 'jig rten rtag na 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro /
śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
aśāśvate sarvepāmucchedaḥ prāpnuyāt /
ubhayathātve niyamata ekeṣāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt ekeṣāṃ na /
anubhayathātve naiva parinirvāṇaṃ nāparinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt 		mi rtag na ni thams cad chad par 'gyur ro /
gnyi ga ltar yin na ni kha cig ni nges par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la kha cig ni mi 'gyur ro /
gnyi ga ltar ma yin na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang ma yin /
yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yang ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur ro /
ato mārgadhīnatvāt parinirvāṇasya caturdhāpi niyamo na vyākriyate nirgrantha de'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni lam la rag lus pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi char yang nges par lung mi ston te /
gcer bu pa'i nyan thos kyis byi'u bzung ba bzhin no /
ata evāntavān loka iti catuṣkāvyākaraṇam /
tulyārtho hyeṣa catuṣkaḥ 		de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi yang lung ma bstan te /
bzhi tshan 'di ni don mthun no /
tathāhi muktikaḥ parivrājaka eva catuṣkaṃ pṛṣṭvā punaḥ pṛṣṭavān kiṃ nu sarvo loko 'nena mārgeṇa niryātyāhosvidekadeśo lokasyeti /
sthavira ānanda āha yameva tvaṃ muktika tatprathamato bhagavantaṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstame vaitarhi pṛcchasyanena paryāyeṇeti sarvam 		'di ltar kun du rgyu smra byed kyis bzhi tshan 'di zhus nas yang ci lags /
'jig rten thams cad lam 'di nges par 'byung ngam /
'on te 'jig rten phyogs gcig lags zhes zhus pa dang gnas brtan kun dga' bos smra byed khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la dang po nyid du zhu ba zhus pa gang yin pa de nyid de rnam grangs gzhan gyis 'dri'am zhes smra'o /
bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maranādityapi catuṣkaḥ praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā na vyākṛtaḥ de bzhin 'ongs pa shi phan chad yod dam zhes bya ba bzhi tshan 'di yang dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos nas lung ma bstan te /
sa hi muktvāmānaṃ tathāgataṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭavān des ni bdag grol ba de bzhin 'ongs pa yin par bsams nas zhu ba zhus so /
paudgalikastu paryanuyojyaḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavān jīvantaṃ pudgalamastīti vyākaroti paraṃ maraṇānna vyākarotīti gang zag pa rnams la brgal zhing brtag par bya ste /
bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir gang zag gson po ni yod do zhes lung ston la shi phan chad ni lung mi ston /
śāśvata doṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
idaṃ tarhi kasmādvacyākaroti bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maitreyānāgate 'dhvani tathāgato 'rhan saṃyaksaṃbuddha iti /
kasmācca śrāvakamabhyatītaṃ kālagatamupapattau vyākarotyamuko 'mutropapanna iti /
evamapi hi śāśvatatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
yadi ca bhagavān pūrvaṃ pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvā parinirvṛtaṃ punaḥ na paśyatyajñānānna vyakarotīti sarvajñatvaṃ śāsturutpāditaṃ bhavati na vā so 'stītyabhyupagantavyam 		rtag pa'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
'o na ni ci'i phyir byams pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ston /
ci'i phyir che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes nyan thos 'das pa dus 'das pa skye ba la lung ston /
de lta yin na ni rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro /
gal te yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag sngar gzigs la yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang mi gzigs te /
mi mkhyen pa'i phyir lung mi ston to zhe na ni /
ston pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsal ba yin no /
atha paśyatyanucyamāno 'pyasāvasti śāśvataśceti siddhaṃ bhavati /
arthatadapi na vaktavyaṃ paśyati vā naveti 		yang na ni de med do zhes khas blang bar bya dgos so /
'on te gzigs na ni ma gsungs bzhin du yang de yod pa dang rtag pa zhes bya bar grub pa yin no /
'on te gzigs sam mi gzigs zhes bya ba 'di yang brjod par mi bya ba yin na /
evaṃ tarhi idamapi śanaiḥ śanairavaktavyaṃ kriyatāṃ sarvajño vā na vā bhagavānna veti de lta na ni 'o na bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa yin nam ma yin zhes bya ba 'di yang rim gyis mi brjod par gyis shig /
astyeva pudgalo yasmātsatyataḥ sthitito nāsti me ātmeti dṛṣṭisthānamuktam /
astītyapi dṛṣṭisthānamuktam 		gang zag ni yod pa nyid de /
'di ltar bden pa dang gnas par bdag gi bdag med do snyam pa ni lta ba'i gnas su gsungs so /
yod do snyam pa yang lta ba'i gnas su gsungs te /
tasmādajñāpakametat /
ubhayamapi tvetadantagrāhadṛṣṭi śāśvatocchedadṛṣṭisaṃgṛhītamityābhidharmikāḥ 		de lta bas na 'di ni khungs su mi rung ngo /
chos mngon ba ba rnams na re 'di gnyi ga yang mthar 'dzin pa yin te /
rtag pa dang chad par lta bas bsdus pa dag yin no zhes zer ro /
tathaiva ca yuktam /
astyātmetyānanda śāśvatāya paraiti nāstyātmetyānandocchedāya paraitīti vātsyasūtre vacanāt /
yadi tarhi pudgalo nāsti ka eṣa saṃsarati /
nahi saṃsāra eṣa saṃsaratīti yuktam 		de kho na bzhin du rigs te gnas ma bu'i mdo las /
kun dga' bo bdag yod ces bya ba mi rtag par 'gyur ro /
kun dga' bo bdag med ces bya ba ni chad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
gal te yang gang zag med na 'khor ba 'di su'i yin /
'khor ba nyid 'khor bar rig pa ma yin no /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā avidyānivaraṇānāṃ sattvanāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāmiti bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa can kun du rgyu ba rnams 'khor ro zhes gsungs so /
atha pudgalaḥ kathaṃ saṃsarati /
skandhāntaratyāgopādānāt 		yang gang zag ji ltar 'khor phung po gzhan 'dor ba dang len pa'i phyir ro /
uktottara eṣa pakṣaḥ /
yathātu kṣaṇiko 'gniḥ saṃtatyā saṃsaratītyucyate tathā sattvākhyaḥ skndhasamudāyastṛṣṇopādānaḥ saṃsaratītyucyate 		phyogs 'di ni lan btab zin to /
ji ltar me skad cig ma yin yang rgyun gyis dro ba de bzhin du sred pa nye bar len pa can sems can zhes bya ba phung po'i tshogs 'khor ro /
yadi skandhāmātramidaṃ kasmādāha bhagavān grahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena sunetro nāma śāstā 'bhūvamiti /
kasmānna vaktavyaṃ syāt 		gal te 'di phung po tsam yin na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na mig bzangs zhes /
bya ba'i ston par gyur to zhes gsungs so /
ci'i phyir gsung par mi 'gyur /
anyatvāt skandhānām phung po rnams gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro /
atha kiṃ pudgalaḥ /
sa evāsau /
śāśvato hi syāt /
tasmādahameva sa ityekasaṃtānatāṃ darśayati 		'o na ci de nyid gang zag yin na ni rtag par 'gyur ro /
de lta bas na nga nyid de yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyud gcig pa nyid du ston par mdzad pa yin te /
yathā sa evāgnirdahannāgata iti dper na me de nyid sreg cing 'ongs so zhes bya ba bzhin no /
yadi cātmā bhavettthāgatā eva suvyaktaṃ paśyeyuḥ gal te yang bdag de yod par gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu gsal ba kho nar gzigs par 'gyur ro /
paśyatāṃ cātmagrāho dṛḍhataraḥ syādātmasnehaśca gzigs na yang bdag tu 'dzin pa shin tu dam por 'gyur ro /
ātmani ca satyātmīyaṃ bhavatīti sūtre vacanādātmagrāho 'pyeṣāṃ skandheṣvadhikaṃ pravarteta /
saiṣā syātsatkāyadṛṣṭi 		bdag yod na bdag gir yang 'gyur ro zhes mdo las 'byung ba'i phyir de dag phung po rnams la bdag gir 'dzin pa lhag bar 'byung bas de ni de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta bar 'gyur ro /
ātmīyadṛṣṭau ca satyāmātmīyasnehaḥ /
evameṣāṃ dṛḍhatarātmātmīyasnehaparisāditavandhanānāṃ mokṣo dūratarībhavet 		bdag gir lta ba yod na yang bdag gir chags par 'gyur te /
de lta bas na bdag dang bdag gir chags pa'i 'ching ba shin tu dam pos glags pa de dag la thar pa thag ring bar 'gyur ro /
atha mataṃ naivātmani pravartate sneha iti /
tat ka idānīmeṣa yogo yadanātmanyātmadhimokṣāt sneha utpadyate ātmanyeva tu notpadyate /
tasmāt dṛṣṭacyarvudametasmin śāsane utpannaṃ ya eṣa ekeṣāṃ pudgalagrāha ekeṣāṃ sarvanāstitāgrāhaḥ /
ye 'pi ca dravyāntaramevātmānaṃ manyante tīrthakārāstepāmeva mokṣābhāvadoṣo niṣkampaḥ /
yadi tarhi sarvathāpi nāstyātmā kathaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu citteṣu cirānubhūtasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ bhavati pratyabhijñānaṃ vā /
smṛtiviṣayasaṃjñānvayāccittaviśeṣāt 		'on te bdag la chags pa mi 'byung ba kho na'o zhes bya bar 'dod na /
de ni bdag med pa la ni bdag tu rmongs pas chags pa skye'i bdag nyid la mi skye'o zhes bya ba de ga la rung ste /
de lta bas na kha cig ni gang zag tu 'dzin kha cig ni thams cad med pa nyid du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bstan pa 'di la skyon byung ba yin no /
mu stegs byed gang dag bdag rdzas gzhan kho na yin par sems pa de dag gi ltar na yang thar pa med pa'i nyes pa 'di g yo ba med pa yin no /
'o na gal te bdag rnam pa thams cad du med na sems skad cig ma rnams la nyams su myong nas ring mo zhig lon pa'i don ji ltar dran pa'am ngo shes par 'gyur /
dran pa'i yul la 'du shes pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems kyi khyad par las so /
kīdṛśāccittaviśeṣāt yato 'nantaraṃ smṛtirbhavati /
tadābhogasadṛśasamvandhisaṃjñādimato 'nupahata prabhāvādāśrayaviśeṣaśokavyākṣepādibhiḥ /
tādṛśo 'pi hyatadanvayaścittaviśeṣo na samarthaḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayituṃ tadanvayo 'pi cānyādṛśo na samarthastāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayitum 		sems kyi khyad par ji lta bu las she na /
gang gi mjug thogs su dran pa skye ba ste /
de dag la rtag pa dang 'dra ba dang 'brel ba can gyi 'du shes la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang rten gyi khyad par dang mya ngan dang rnam par g yengs pa la sogs pas mthu ma nyams pa can las so /
de lta bu yin yang de'i rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa'i sems kyi khyad par gyis ni dran pa de bskyed par mi nus so /
labhayathā tu samartha ityevaṃ smṛtirbhavatyanyasyāṃ sāmarthyādarśanāt /
kathamidānīmanyena cetasā dṛṣṭamanyatsmarati /
evaṃ hi devadattacetasā dṛṣṭaṃ yajñadattacetaḥ smaret 		de'i rgyu las byung ba yin yang gzhan lta bu ni dran pa de skyed par mi nus kyi gnyi ga ltar na nus pas de ltar na dran par 'gyur te /
gzhan la ni de'i mthu ma mthong pa'i phyir ro /
da ni ji ltar na sems gzhan gyis mthong la gzhan gyis dran de ltar na ni lha sbyin gyis sems kyis mthong la mchod sbyin gyis sems kyis dran par 'gyur ro /
nāsambandhāt /
na hi tayoḥ saṃbandho 'sti akārya kāraṇabhāvādyathaikasaṃtānikayoḥ /
na ca brūmo 'nyena cetasā dṛṣṭamanyatsmaratīti /
api tu darśanacittātsmṛticittamanyadutpadyate /
saṃtatipariṇatyā yathoktamiti ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ /
smaraṇādeva ca pratyabhijñānaṃ bhavati 		ma yin te 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro /
de gnyis ni rgyu dang 'bras bur ma gyur pa'i phyir ji ltar na rgyud gcig la yod pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel ba ni med do /
sems gzhan gyis mthong la gzhan gyis dran no zhes kyang mi zer ro /
'on kyang ji skad bshad pa ltar rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis mthong pa'i sems la dran pa'i sems gzhan skye'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la nyes pa ci zhig yod /
dran pa kho na las ngo shes pa yang yin no /
asatyātmanika eṣa smarati /
smaratīti ko 'rthaḥ 		bdag med na su zhig gis de ltar dran /
dran zhes bya ba'i don ci yin /
smṛtyā viṣayaṃ gṛhlāti /
kiṃ tadgrahaṇamanyatsmaraṇāt 		dran pas yul 'dzin pa'o /
ci de 'dzin pa dran pa las gzhan zhig yin nam /
smṛtiṃ tarhi kaḥ karoti 'o na ni dran pa byed pa yin no /
uktaḥ sa yastāṃ karoti smṛtihetucittaviśeṣaḥ /
yattarhi caitraḥ smaratītyucyate 		gang gis de byed pa de ni bshad zin te /
dran pa'i rgyu ni sems kyi khyad par yin no /
'o na gang nag pas dran no zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
tato caitrākhyātsaṃtānāttāṃ bhavantīṃ dṛṣṭvocyate caitraḥ smaratīti /
asatyātmani kasyevaṃ smṛtiḥ 		nag pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud de las de skye bar mthong nas smra bar zad do /
bdag med pa na dran pa 'di su'i yin /
kiṃarthaiṣā ṣaṣṭhī drug pa 'di'i don ji lta bu yin /
svāmyarthā rje bo'i don yin no /
yathā kasya kaḥ svāmī dper na gang gi rje bo gang lta bu yin /
yathā goścaitraḥ dper na ba'i nag pa lta bu yin no /
kathamasau tasyāḥ svāmī 'di ji ltar de'i rje bo yin /
tadādhīno hi tasyā vāhadohādiṣu viniyogaḥ de rmo ba dang bzho ba la sogs pa la sbyor ba de la rag lus pa yin no /
kva ca punaḥ smṛtirviniyoktavyā va evaṃ tasyāḥ svāmī mṛgyate dran pa gang du sbyar bar bya na /
'di ltar de'i rje bo btsal /
smartavye 'rthe dran par bya ba'i don la'o /
kimartha viniyoktavyā ci'i phyir sbyar bar bya /
smaraṇārtham /
aho sūktāni sukhaidhitānām /
saiva hi nāma tadarthaṃ viniyoktavyeti /
kathaṃ ca viniyoktavyā 		dran par bya ba'i phyir ro /
kye ma de nyid de'i don du sbyor ro zhes bya ba ni bsod nams kyis bskyed pa rnams kyis legs par smras so /
ji ltar sbyar bar bya /
utpādanata ahosvitsaṃpreṣaṇataḥ ci de bskyed pa'i sgo nas sam /
'on te mngag pa'i sgo nas /
smṛtigatyayogādutpādanataḥ /
hetureva tarhi svāmī prāpnoti phalameva ca svam /
yasmāddhetorādhipatyaṃ phale phalena ca tadvān heturiti /
yo hyeva hetuḥ smṛtestasyaivāsau /
yaścāpi sa caitrābhidhānaḥ saṃskārasamūhasaṃtāna ekato gṛhītvā gavākhyasvāmītyucyate sa cāpi tasya deśāntaravikārotpattau kāraṇabhāvaṃ cetasi kṛtvā na tu khalu kaścidekaścaitro nāmāsti na cāpi gauḥ /
tasmāttatrāpi na hetubhāvaṃ vyatītyāsti svāmihbāvaḥ /
evaṃ ko vijānāti kasya vijñānamityevamādiṣu vaktavyam 		dran pa la 'gro ba mi rung bas bskyed pa'i sgo nas so /
de lta na ni rgyu kho na la rje bo yin la 'bras bu kho na bran yin par 'gyur te /
'di ltar rgyu ni 'bras bu la dbang byed la 'bras bu yang de dang ldan na rgyu yin pas de ni dran pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de kho na yin no /
gang yang nag pa zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi tshogs kyi rgyun la gcig tu bzung nas ba zhes bya ba'i rje bo brjod pa de yang de yul gzhan du dang 'gyur ba 'byung ba la rgyu'i dngos po yid la bsams nas rje bo zhes brjod par zad kyi nag pa zhes bya ba gcig pu ni 'ga' yang med la ba zhes bya ba yang med do /
de lta bas na de la yang rgyu'i dngos po ma gtogs pa'i rje bo'i dngos po med do /
de bzhin du su zhig gis rnam par shes /
su'i rnam par shes pa yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yang brjod par bya ste /
tasya heturindriyārthamanaskārā yathāyogamityeṣa viśeṣaḥ de'i rgyu ni ci rigs par dbang po dang don dang yid la byed pa dag yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par yin no /
yo 'pyāha bhāvasya bhavitrapekṣatvāt sarvo hi bhāvo bhavitāramapekṣate gang yang bya ba ni byed pa bo la ltos pa'i phyir te /
bya ba thams cad ni byed pa po la ltos te /
yathā devadatto gacchatītyatra gatirbhāvo gantāraṃ devadattamapekṣate ji ltar lha sbyin 'gro'o zhes bya ba 'di la 'gro bar bya ba ni 'gro ba po lhas byin la ltos pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni bya ba yin no /
tathā vijñānaṃ bhāvaḥ /
tasmādyo vijānāti tena bhavitavyamiti 		de lta bas na gang zhig gis rnam par shes pa de yang brjod dgos so zhes zer ba de la lhas byin zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhes brjod par bya'o /
sa vaktavyaḥ /
ko 'yaṃ devadatta iti 		gal te bdag yin no zhe na /
de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no /
yadyātmā sa eva sādhyaḥ /
atha vyavahārapuruṣaḥ 		'on te skyes bur tha snyad gdags pa yin no zhe na /
so 'pi na kaścidekaḥ saṃskārā hi ta evaṃnāmānaḥ /
tatra yathā devadatto gacchati yathā vijānāti /
kathaṃ ca devadatto gacchati /
kṣaṇikā hisaṃskārā abhinnasaṃtānā devadatta iti bālairekasattvapiṇḍagraheṇādhimuktāḥ svasya saṃtānasya deśāntare kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante gacchati devadatta iti /
sā ca deśāntaropattirgatirita /
jvālāśabdasaṃtānayorgacchatigamanābhidhānavat /
ta eva ca punarvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante jānāti devadatta iti 		de yang gcig pu ni 'ga' yang med kyi 'du byed de dag la yang ming de skad ces bya'o /
de la ji ltar lhas byin 'gro pa de bzhin du rnam par shes so /
lha sbyin ji ltar 'gro zhe na /
'du byed skad cig pa rgyun tha mi dad pa rnams la byis pa rnams kyis gcig pa nyid du bzung nas lhas byin zhes mos pa rnams rang gi rgyun yul gzhan du 'byung ba la rgyur gyur na lhas byin 'gro'o zhes bya'o /
yul gzhan du 'byung ba de ni 'gro ba yin te /
me dang sgra'i rgyun dag la 'gro'o zhes brjod pa yin no /
de dag nyid rnam par shes pa'i rgyur gyur na lhas byin gyis rnam par shes so zhes kyang bya'o /
āryairapi teṣāṃ saṃjñayā tathocyante vyavahārārtham /
yattarhi vijñānaṃ vijānātīti sūtra uktaṃ kiṃ tatra vijñānaṃ karoti /
na kiñcitkaroti 		'phags pa rnams kyis kyang tha snyad gdags pa'i don du de dag la ming du de skad ces gsungs so /
'o na gang mdo las rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes gsungs pa de la rnam par shes pa ci zhig byed /
yathā tu kāryaṃ kāraṇamanuvidhīyata ityucyate /
sādṛśyenātmalābhādakurvadapi kiñcit /
evaṃ vijñānamapi vijānātītyucyate /
sādṛśyenātmalābhādakurvadapi kiñcit 		cung zad kyang mi byed de /
ji ltar 'bras bu ni cung zad kyang mi byed mod kyi 'dra bar bdag nyid thob pa'i phyir rgyu dang mthun par byed do zhes bya ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang cung zad kyang mi byed mod kyi 'dra bar bdag nyid thob pa'i phyir yul rnam par shes so zhes bya'o /
'di'i 'dra ba ci zhe na /
kiṃ punarasya sādṛśyam /
tadākāratā /
ata eva tadindriyādapyutpannaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātītyucyate nendriyam /
athavā tathā 'trāpi vijñānasaṃtānasya vijñāne kāraṇabhāvādvijñānaṃ vijānātīti vacanānnirdoṣaṃ kāraṇe dartṛśabdanirdeśāt 		de'i rnam pa nyid do /
de nyid kyi phyir de ni dbang po las kyang skyes mod kyi yul rnam par shes so zhes bya ba'i dbang po ni ma yin no /
yang na ni der yang rnam par shes pa'i rgyun rnam par shes ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes gsungs pas nyes pa med de /
ghaṇṭā rautīti yadvat /
api khalu yathā pradīpo gacchati tathā vijñānaṃ vijānātīti /
kathaṃ ca pradīpo gacchati 		rgyu la byed pa po'i sgrar bstan pa'i phyir dril bu sgrogs so zhes bya ba bzhin no /
gzhan yang ji ltar sgron ma 'gro ba ltar rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes bya ba yang de dang 'dra'o /
sgron ma ji ltar 'gro zhe na /
pradīpa ityarciṣāṃ saṃtāna upacaryate sgron ma zhes bya ba ni me lce rnams kyi rgyun la nye bar 'dogs par byed la /
sa deśāntareṣūtpadyamānastaṃ deśaṃ gacchatītyucyate de yul gzhan dag tu 'byung ba las yul de dang der 'gro'o zhes bya'o /
evaṃ vijñānamapi cittānāṃ saṃtāna upacaryate /
tadviṣayāntareṣūtpadyamānaṃ taṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātītyucyate 		de bzhin du rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni sems rnams kyi rgyun la nye bar 'dogs par byed la de yul gzhan dag la skye ba la yul de dang de rnam par shes so zhes bya'o /
yathā cābhijāyate tiṣṭhati rūpamityatra bhaviturbhāvādanarthantaratvamevaṃ vijñānasyāpi syāt /
yadi vijñānādvijñānamutpadyate nātmānaḥ kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatradivat 		yang na ji ltar gzugs 'gyur ro /
skye'o gnas so zhes bya ba 'di la 'gyur ba po dang 'gyur ba don gzhan ma yin pa ltar rnam par shes pa la de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro /
gal te rnam par shes pa las rnam par shes pa skye'i bdag las ma yin na ci'i phyir rtag tu de dag 'dra ba kho nar skye bar mi 'gyur zhing myu gu dang sdong po dang 'dab ma la sogs pa bzhin du rim pa nges par skye bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
sthityanyathātvasya saṃskṛtlakṣaṇatvāt /
eṣa hi saṃskṛtasya svabhāvo yadavaśyaṃ prabandhasyānyathātvaṃ bhavati /
anyathā hi nikāmadhyānasamāhitānāṃ sadṛśakāyacittotpattau prathamakṣaṇaniṃrviśeṣatvāt paścādapi na syāt svayaṃ vyutthānam 		gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
rgyun gdon mi za bar gzhan du 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin no /
de lta ma yin na bsam gtan rdzogs pas mnyam par gzhag pa rnams las lus dang sems 'dra ba skye na skad cig ma dang po dang khyad par med pa'i phyir phyis kyang bdag nyid ldang bar mi 'gyur ro /
kramo 'pi hi cittānāṃ niyata eva /
yato nūtpattavyaṃ tata eva tasyotpādāt /
tulyākāramapi hi kiñcidutpādane samarthaṃ bhavati /
gotraviśeṣāt 		gang las gang zhig skye bar 'gyur ba de kho na las de skye ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi rim pa yang nges pa kho na ste /
rigs kyi bye brag las sems rnam pa 'dra yang 'ga' zhig sems 'ga' bskyed pa la nus pa yin te /
dper na bud med kyi mjug thogs su gsal te de'i lus sun 'byin pa'i sems sam /
yadyathā strīcittānantaraṃ yadi tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittamutpannaṃ bhavati tatpatiputrādicittaṃ vā punaśca paścātsaṃtatipariṇatyā strīcittamutpadyate tat samartha bhavati tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane tatpatiputrādicittotpādane vā /
tadgotratvāt /
anyathā na samartham 		de'i khyo'am bu la sogs pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur la /
yang phyis rgyud yongs su 'gyur pas bud med kyi sems skye na de ni /
de'i lus sun 'byin pa'i sems bskyed pa'am /
de'i khyo 'am /
bu la sogs pa'i sems bskyed par nus pa yin te /
de'i rigs can yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
gzhan du ni mi nus so /
atha punaḥ paryāyeṇa strīcittādvahuvidhaṃ cittamutpannaṃ vahutara māsannataraṃ vā tadevotpadyate yang bud med kyi sems las rnam grangs kyi sems rnam pa mang po zhig skyes par gyur na de las ches mang ba dang ches gsal ba dang ches nye bar skyes pa gang yin pa de kho na skye bar 'gyur te /
tadbhāvanāyā valīyastvāt /
anyatra tatkālikātkāyabāhyapratyayaviśeṣāt 		de'i bsgos pa stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
de'i 'dus pa'i lus dang phyi rol gyi rkyen gyi khyad par ni ma gtogs so /
saiva balīyasī bhāvanā kasmānnityaṃ na phalati bsgos pa de nyid ches stobs dang ldan na ci'i phyir rtag tu 'bras bu mi 'byin zhe na /
sthityanyathātvasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvāt tasya cānyathātvasyānyabhāvanāphalotpattāvānuguṇyāt /
etaddhi sarvacittaprakāreṣu diṅmātram /
nirantarakāraṇajñāne tu buddhānāṃ prabhutvam 		gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur pa nyid ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir la /
gzhan du 'gyur ba de yang bsgos pa gzhan gyi 'bras bu skye ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro /
'di ni sems kyi rnam pa thams cad la phyogs tsam du zad kyi mjug thogs kyi rgyu shes pa la ni sangs rgyas rnams mnga' bdag yin te /
evaṃ hyāhuḥ /
sarvākārakāraṇamekasya mayūracandrakasyāpi /
nāsarvajñairjñeyaṃ sarvajñabalaṃ hi tajjñānamiti 		'di skad du rma bya'i mdongs ni gcig la yang /
rgyu yi rnam pa thams cad ni /
kun mkhyen min pas shes bya min /
de shes kun mkhyen stobs yin no /
zhes bshad na /
prāgevārupiṇāṃ cittabhedānām /
ya eva tvayamekīyastīrthika ātmaprabhavāṃ cittotpattiṃ manyate tasyaivedaṃ sphuṭaṃ codyamāpadyate kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatrādivaditi /
manaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣāpekṣatvāditi cet 		gzugs can ma yin pa sems kyi bye brag rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
ci'i phyir de dang 'dra ba kho nar skye bar mi 'gyur zhing myu gu dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma la sogs pa bzhin du rim pa nges par skye bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni mu stegs can gang la la sems ni bdag las skye'o snyam du sems pa de kho na la gsal bar klan kar 'gyur ro /
gal te yid dang phrad pa'i bye brag la ltos pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
na /
anyasaṃyogāsiddheḥ 		'brel pa gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
saṃyoginostu paricchinnatvādaprāptipūrvikā prāptiḥ samyoga iti lakṣaṇavyākhyānāccātmānaḥ paricchedaprasaṅgaḥ 'brel pa can dag yongs su chang pa'i phyir dang phrad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma phrad pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi phrad pa yin no zhes rnam par bshad pa'i phyir bdag yongs su chad par thal bar 'gyur ro; /
tato manaḥsamcārādātmanaḥ saṃcāraprasaṅgo virāgasya vā de'i phyir yid 'phros pa la bdag 'pho ba'am /
nyams par thal bar 'gyur ro /
pradeśasaṃyoga iti cet gal te phyogs gcig phrad do zhe na /
na /
tasyaiva tatpradeśatvāyogāt /
astu vā saṃyogastathāpi nityamaviśiṣṭe manasi kathaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ /
buddhiviśeṣāpekṣa iti cet /
sa eva paricodyate kathaṃ buddhiviśeṣa iti /
saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣādātmamanaḥ saṃyogāditi cet 		ma yin te /
phyogs de de nyid kyi yin pa nyid du mi rung ba'i phyir ro /
phrad pa yod du chug na yang 'on kyang yid rtag tu khyad par med pa la ji ltar phrad pa khyad par du 'gyur /
gal te blo'i khyad par la ltos pa yin no zhe na /
ji ltar blo'i khyad par yin zhes de nyid la klan ka tshol bar byed do /
gal te 'du byed kyi khyad par la ltos pa'i bdag dang yid phrad pa las so zhe na /
cittādevāstu saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣatvāt /
nahi kiñcidātmanaḥ upalabhyate sāmarthmauṣadha kāryasiddhāviva kuhakavaidyaphuḥsvāhānām 		'du byed kyi khyad par la ltos pa'i sems kho na las yin par zad kyi bdag gis nus pa ni cung zad kyang mi dmigs te /
sman gyi 'bras bu grub pa la sman pa ngan g yo can gyis phu sv'a h'a zhes smras pa dag bzhin no /
satyātmani tayoḥ saṃyoga iti cet gal te bdag yod na de gnyis srid do zhe na ni /
vāṅmātram /
āśrayaḥ sa iti cet 		tshig tsam du zad do /
gal te de ni rten yin no zhe na /
yathā kaḥ kasyāśrayaḥ /
na hi te citravadarādivadādhārye nāpi sa kuḍacyakuṇḍādivadādhāro yuktaḥ 		dper na gang gi rten gang yin pa lta bu de dag kyang ri mo dang rgya shug la sogs pa ltar brten pa ma yin la /
de yang rtsig pa dang gzhong bu la sogs pa ltar rten du rigs pa ma yin te /
pratighātiyutadoṣāt naiva sa evamāśrayaḥ thogs pa dang tha dad pa nyid kyis nyes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ tarhi /
yathā gandhādīnāṃ pṛthivīti cet /
atiparitoṣitāḥ smaḥ /
idameva hi naḥ pratyāyakaṃ nāstyātmeti /
yathā na gandhādibhyo 'nyā pṛthivīti 		gal te de ni de lta bur rten ma yin no /
'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
dper na dri la sogs pa'i sa lta bu'o zhe na /
'di nyid kho bo'i bdag med do zhes bya ba yid ches par byed pa yin pas kho bo yongs su tshim par byas te /
dper na dri la sogs pa las sa gzhan ma yin pa bzhin no /
ko hi sa gandhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nirdhārayati dri la sogs pa las sa gzhan yin par nges par 'dzin par byed pa de su zhig yin /
vyapadeśastu pṛthivyā gandhādaya iti viśeṣaṇārtham /
te hyeva tadākhyā gandhādayo yathā pratīyerannānya iti 		sa'i dri la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad ni ci nas dri la sogs pa de dag nyid de zhes bya'i /
gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ba khyad par du bya ba'i phyir te /
kāṣṭhapratimāyāṃ śarīravyapadeśavat /
satyapi ca saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣatve kasmānna yugapatsarvajñānotpattiḥ 		shing gi gzugs kyi lus zhes bya ba bzhin no /
'du byed kyi khyad par la ltos pa yin du zin kyang ci'i phyir shes pa thams cad dus gcig tu skye bar mi 'gyur /
yo hi baliṣṭhastenānyeṣāṃ prativandhaḥ /
sa eva valiṣṭhaḥ kasmānnityaṃ na phalati 		gang zhig stobs che ba des gzhan dag la gegs byed do /
stobs che ba de nyid ci'i phyir rtag par 'bras bu mi 'byin te /
yo 'sya nyāyaḥ so 'stu bhāvanāyāḥ /
ātmā tu nirarthakaḥ kalpyate /
avaśyamātmābhyupagantavyaḥ /
smṛtyādīnāṃ guṇapadārthatvāt tasya cārthādavaśyaṃ dravyāśritatvāt teṣāṃ cānyāśrayāyogāditi cet 		'di'i tshul gang yin pa de bsgos pa yin na bdag tu rtog pa ni don med pa yin no /
gal te bdag ni gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ste /
dran pa la sogs pa ni yon tan gyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir la de yang gdon mi za bar rdzas la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
de dag gi rten gzhan yin par yang mi rung pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
na /
na hyeṣāṃ guṇapadārthatvaṃ siddham /
sarvameva no vidyamānaṃ dravya 		ma yin te /
ma grub pa'i phyir ro /
'di dag ni yon tan gyi dngos po nyid yin par ma grub bo /
kho bo cag gi ltar na yod pa thams cad ni rdzas yin te /
ṣaṭ dravyāṇi śrāmaṇyaphalānīti vacanāt /
nāpyeṣāṃ dravyāśritatvaṃ siddham 		dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu ni rdzas drug go zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
de dag rdzas la brten pa nyid du yang ma grub ste /
parīkṣito hyāśrayārthaḥ /
tasmādyatkiñcideva tat 		rten gyi don ni brtags zin to /
de lta bas na 'di ni gyi na'o /
ātmanyasati kimarthaḥ karmārambhaḥ /
ahaṃ sukhī syāmahaṃ duḥkhī na syāmityevamarthaḥ 		bdag med na ci'i phyir las rtsom /
bdag bde bar gyur cig /
bdag sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba de'i phyir ro /
ko 'sāvahaṃ nāma yadviṣayio 'yamahaṅkāraḥ /
skandhaviṣayaḥ /
kathaṃ jñāyate /
teṣu snehāt /
gaurādibuddhibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāttu /
gauro 'hamahaṃ śyāmaḥ sthūlo 'hamahaṃ kṛśaḥ jīrṇo 'hamahaṃ yuveti gaurādibuddhibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇo 'yamahaṅkāro dṛśyate /
na cātmana ete prakārā dṛśyante 		yang bdag ces bya ba yang gang zhig yin /
bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di'i yul gang yin pa'o /
bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di'i yul gang zhig yin /
yul ni phung po yin no /
ji ltar shes /
de dag la chags pa'i phyir dang dkar sham la sogs pa'i blos gzhi mthun par byed pa'i phyir te /
bdag dkar sham mo /
bdag sngo bsangs so /
bdag sbom mo /
bdag skem mo /
bdag rgas so /
bdag dar la bab po zhes dkar sham la sogs pa'i blos bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di gzhi mthun par byed par snang ngo /
rnam pa de dag bdag gi yin par ni mi 'dod de /
tasmādapi skandheṣvayamiti gamyate /
ātmana upakārake 'pi śarīra ātmopacāro yathā ya evāyaṃ sa evāhaṃ sa evāyaṃ me bṛtya iti bhavatyupakārake 'pi ātmopacāro natvahaṅkāraḥ /
sati śarīrālambanatve paraśarīrālamvano 'pi kasmānna bhavati 		de lta bas na 'di ni phung po rnams la 'dzin par shes so /
bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i lus la yang bdag nye bar 'dogs te /
dper na bdag gang yin pa de nyid bdag gi bran 'di yin no zhes bya ba bzhin no phan 'dogs pa la bdag nye bar 'dogs pa yin yang bdag tu 'dzin pa ni ma yin no /
lus la dmigs pa yin na ci'i phyir pha rol gyi lus la dmigs pa yang ma yin /
asaṃvandhāt /
yenaiva hi sahāsya saṃvandhaḥ kāyena cittena vā yatraivāyamahaṅkāra utpadyate nānvatra 		'brel ba med pa'i phyir te /
'di ni lus sam sems gang dang lhan cig 'brel pa de kho na la bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di 'byung gi gzhan la ni ma yin te /
anādau saṃsārra evamabhyāsāt /
kaśca saṃbandhaḥ 		'khor ba thog ma med pa nas de ltar goms pa'i phyir ro /
'brel pa yang gang zhig yin /
kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
yadyātmā nāsti kasyāyamahaṅkāraḥ /
idaṃ punastadeāyātaṃ kimarthaiṣā ṣaṣṭhīti /
yāvadya evāsya hetustasyaivāyamiti 		rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i 'bras bu yin no /
gal te bdag med pa na bdag tu 'dzin pa ni su'i yin /
'di ni drug pa 'di'i don ji lta bu yin zhes bya ba nas de ni dran pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i bar de nyid 'ongs pa yin no /
kaścānyo hetuḥ /
pūrvāhaṅkāraparibhāvitaṃ svasaṃtativiṣayaṃ sāvadyaṃ cittam 		'di'i rgyu gang zhig yin zhe na /
sngon bdag tu 'dzin pas yongs su bsgos pa rang gi rgyud kyi yul can ma rig pa dang bcas pa'i sems yin no /
asatyātmani ka eṣa sukhito duḥkhito vā /
yasminnāśraye sukhamutpannaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā 		bdag med na bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba su zhig yin /
rten gang bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'byung ba ste /
dper na shing ljon ba me tog chags so /
yathā puṣpito vṛkṣaḥ phalitaṃ vanamiti nags tshal 'bras bu chags so zhes bya ba lta bu'o /
kaḥ punaranayorāśrayaḥ 'di gnyis kyi rten gang zhe na /
ṣaḍāyatanam skye mched drug yin te /
yathā kṛtvā tathoktam ji ltar yin pa de ltar ni bshad zin to /
asatyātmani ka eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā kaśca phalānāṃ bhoktā bhavati bdag med na las rnams kyi byed pa po ni gang yin /
'bras bu rnams kyi zab po gang yin /
