karteti ka eṣa vāhyarthaḥ byed pa po zhes bya ba'am /
karotīti kartā /
bhuṅkta iti bhoktā /
paryāya ucyate nārthaḥ /
svatantraḥ karteti kartṛ lakṣaṇamācakṣate lākṣaṇikāḥ 		za ba bo zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ji lta bu byed pas na byed pa po yin la /
za bas na zab po yin no /
rnam grangs smras su zin gyi don ni ma yin no /
mtshan nyid rnams ni byed pa po'i mtshan nyid rang dbang can ni byed pa po yin no zhes zer na /
asti punaḥ kvacideva kārye kasyacit svātantryam 'jig rten na 'bras bu 'ga' la yang la la zhig rang dbang yod pa lta bu mthong ngam /
loke dṛṣṭaṃ devadattasya snānāsanagamanādau mthong ste khrus dang zab dang 'gro ba la sogs pa la lhas byin lta bu'o /
kaḥ punarbhavān devadattamudāharati khyod lhas byin gang zhig dper brjod /
yadyātmānaṃ sa eva sādhyaḥ /
atha pañcaskandhakaṃ sa ev kartā /
trividhaṃ cedaṃ karma kāyavāṅmanaskarma /
tatra kāyakarmaṇi tāvat kāyasya cittaparatantrā vṛttiḥ /
cittasyāpi kāye svakāraṇaparatantrā vṛttistasyāpyevamiti nāsti kasyacit svātantryam 		gal te bdag yin no zhe na ni de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no /
'on te phung po lnga yin no zhe na ni de nyid byed pa po yin te /
las 'di ni rnam pa gsum ste /
lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las so /
de la re zhig lus dang ngag gi las la sems kyi gzhan gyi dbang gis 'jug go /
sems kyang lus dang ngag la rang gi rgyu'i gzhan gyi dbang gis 'jug go /
de yang de dang 'dra bas gang la yang rang dbang med de /
pratyayaparatantrā hi sarve bhāvāḥ pravartante /
ātmano 'pi ca nirapekṣasyākāraṇatvābhyupagamātra svātantryaṃ sidhyati 		dngos po thams cad ni rkyen gyi gzhan gyi dbang gis 'jug go /
bdag kyang ltos pa med par rgyu nyid du khas mi len pa'i phyir ro /
rang dbang can du mi 'grub bo /
tasmānnaivaṃlakṣaṇam upalabhyate kaścitkartā /
yattu yasya pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tattsya kartetyucyate /
na ca ātmanaḥ kvacidapi kāraṇatvaṃ dṛśyate /
tasmātsa evamapi na kartā yujyate /
smṛtijo hi cchandaḥ cchandajo vitarko vitarkātprayatnaḥ prayatnādvāyustataḥ karmeti kimatrātmā kurute /
phalasyāpica ka upabhogo yamayamātmā kurvannupabhoktā kalpyate 		de lta bas na de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi byed pa po ni 'ga' yang mi dmigs so /
gang zhig gang gi rgyu'i gtso bo yin ba de ni de'i byed pa po zhes bya na bdag ni gang la yang rgyu yin par mi snang ste /
de lta bas na de ni de lta bur yang byed pa por mi rung ngo /
dran pa las ni 'dun pa skye'o /
'dun pa las ni rtog pa skye'o /
rnam par rtog pa las ni rab tu 'bad pa'o /
rab tu 'bad pa las ni rlung ngo /
de las ni las 'byung na 'di la bdag ci zhig byed /
'bras bu la yang gang la bdag med na za ba bor brtags pa'i nye bar spyod pa de gang zhig yin /
upalabhiriti cet gal te dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
nātmanaḥ upalabdhau sāmarthyaṃ vijñāne pratipedhāt dmigs pa la bdag gi nus pa med de /
rnam par shes pa la nus pa bkag pa'i phyir ro /
asatyātmani kasmādasattvādhiṣṭhānaḥ pāpapuṇyopacayo na bhavati /
vedanādyanāśrayatvāt tadāśrayaśca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ nātmā yathā tathoktam 		bdag med na ci'i phyir sems can gyi rten ma yin pa la yang sdig pa dang bsod nams nye bar stsogs par mi 'gyur /
tshor ba'i rten ma yin pa'i phyir te /
de'i rten ni skye mched drug yin gyi bdag ma yin no /
ji ltar yin pa de ltar ni bshad zin to /
kathamasatyātmani venaṣṭātkarmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiḥ /
ātmanyapi sati kathaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiḥ 		bdag med na ji ltar na las zhig zin pa las tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu 'byung /
bdag yod na yang ji ltar na las zhi zhig zin pa las tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu 'byung /
tadāśritāddharmādharmāt /
yathā kaḥkimāśrita ityuktottaraiṣā vāco yuktiḥ 		de la brten pa'i chos dang chos ma yin pa las 'byung ngo /
tshig gi lugs 'di ni dper na gang gi rten gang yin pa lta bu zhes lan btab zin to /
tasmādanāśritādeva dharmādharmāt bhavatu /
naiva tu vayaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiṃ brūmaḥ 		de lta bas na chos dang chos ma yin pa rten med pa kho na las 'byung ngo /
kho bo cag kyang las zhig zin ba la tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu 'byung bar mi smra'o /
kiṃ tarhi /
tatsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣādvījaphalavat /
yathā vījātphalamutpadyata ityucyate 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
de'i rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las te /
sa bon dang 'bras bu bzhin no /
na ca tadvinaṣṭādvījādutpadyate /
nāpyanantarameva /
kiṃ tarhi /
tatsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣādaṅkurakāṇḍapatrādikramaniṣpannāt puṣpāvasānāt /
tat punaḥ puṣpānniṣpannaṃ kasmāttasya vījasya phalamityucyate 		dper na sa bon las 'bras bu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni zhig pa las 'byung ba yang ma yin la mjug thogs kho nar 'byung ba yang ma yin no /
'o na ci zhe na /
rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las te /
myu gu dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma la sogs pa me tog la thug pa rim pa rdzogs pa las 'byung ba bzhin no /
de ni me tog las grub pa yin na ci'i phyir sa bon de'i 'bras bu zhes bya zhe na /
tadāhitaṃ hi tat parayāpuṣpe sāmarthyam /
yadi hi tatpūrvikānnabhaviṣyat tattādṛśasya phalasyotopattau na samarthamabhaviṣyat /
evaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalamutpadyata ityucyate /
na ca tadviniṣṭātkarmaṇa utpadyate nāpyanantarameva 		des brgyud pas me tog la de'i nus pa bskyed pas so /
gal te sa bon de sngon du 'gro bar ma gyur na 'bras bu de 'dra ba skyed pa la de'i nus pa yod par mi 'gyur ro /
de bzhin du las las 'bras bu 'byung ngo /
zhes bya ba de yang las zhig pa las kyang mi 'byung la /
mjug thogs su yang ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi /
tatsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣāt /
kā punaḥ saṃtatiḥ kaḥ pariṇāmaḥ ko viśeṣaḥ 		'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las so /
rgyud ni ci yin /
yongs su 'gyur ba ni ci yin /
khyad par ni ci yin zhe na /
yaḥ karmapūrva uttarottaracittapravasaḥ sā saṃtatistasyā anyathotpattiḥ pariṇāmaḥ las sngon du 'gro ba'i sems phyir zhing 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni rgyud yin no /
de gzhan dang gzhan du skye ba ni yongs su 'gyur ba yin no /
sa punartho 'ntaraṃ phalotpādanasamarthaḥ so 'ntapariṇāmaviśiṣṭatvāt pariṇamaviśeṣaḥ de'i mjug thogs su 'bras bu skyed nus pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su 'gyur ba gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par yin te /
tadyāthā sopādānaṃ maraṇacittaṃ punarbhavasya /
trividhakarmapūrvakatve 'pi yatkarma guru vā bhavatyāsannamabhyastaṃ vā yatkṛtaṃ sāmarthyaṃ dyotyate natvanyasya 		dper na yang srid pa'i nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i 'chi ba'i sems lta bu'o /
las rnam pa sna tshogs pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid yin yang las gang lci ba'am /
nye ba 'am /
goms pa yin pa des byas pa'i nus pa bsal bar byed kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
āha ca /
yat guru yaccāsannaṃ yaccābhyastaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat 		ji skad du /
las kyi 'khor ba lci gang dang nye ba gang dang goms pa gang /
sngon byas gang yin de las ni /
pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ vīpacyate karmasaṃsāre /
tatra vipākahetvāhitaṃ tu vipākaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ vipākaṃ dattvā vinivartate 		snga ma snga ma rnam smin 'gyur /
zhes bshad pa lta bu'o /
de la rnam par smin pa'i rgyus bskyed pa rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa ni rnam par smin pa bskyed nas ldog go /
sabhāgahetvāhitaṃ tu niṣyandaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ kliṣṭānāṃ pratipakṣodayādvinivartate skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyus bskyed pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa ni nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi ni gnyen po skyes nas ldog go /
akliṣṭānāṃ cittasaṃtānātyantavinivṛtteryadā parinirvāti /
atha kasmādvipākādvipākāntaraṃ notpadyate vījaphalādiva phalāntaram 		nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa rnams kyi ni sems kyi rgyun gtan du log pa ste /
gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na'o /
yang ci'i phyir sa bon gyi 'bras bu bzhin du rnam par smin pa gzhan mi skye na /
na tāvat dṛṣṭāntena sarvaṃ samānaṃ bhavati /
tatrāpi tu na phalādeva punaḥ phalāntaramutpadyate 		re zhig thams cad dpe dang 'dra ba ni ma yin no /
de la yang 'bras bu kho na las 'bras bu gzhan skye ba ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
viklittiviśeṣajādvikāraviśeṣāt /
yo hi tatra bhūtaprakārāṅkuraṃ nirvartayati sa tasya vījaṃ nānyaḥ 		rnam par 'drul ba'i khyad par las skyes pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i khyad par las skye ste /
de la 'byung ba'i rnam pa myu gu 'grub par byed pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni de'i sa bon yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no /
bhāvinyā tu saṃjñāyā sādṛśyādvā pūrvako 'pi saṃtāno bījamityākhyāyate 'gyur ba'i ming gis sam /
'dra ba'i phyir rgyun snga ma yang sa bon zhes bya'o /
evamihāpi tasmādvipākādyadi sadasaddharmaśravaṇā dipratyayaviśeṣajaḥ kuśalasāsravo 'kuśalo vā cittavikāra utpadyate tasmātpunarvikārāntaramutpadyate nānyatheti samānametat /
athavā punaretadevaṃ vijñātavyam /
yathā lākṣārasarañjitāt mātuluṅgapuṣpātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phale raktaḥ keśara upajāyate na ca tasmāt punaranyaḥ evaṃ karmajādvipākāt na punarvipākāntaramiti 		de bzhin du 'di la yang rnam par smin pa de las gal te dam pa dang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos nyan ba la sogs pa'i rkyen las skyes pa dge ba zag ba dang bcas pa 'am /
mi dge ba'i sems kyi 'gyur ba skye na de las ni rnam par smin pa gzhan skye'i gzhan du ni ma yin pas 'di ni mtshungs so /
yang na de ni 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
ji star ma du lung ga'i me tog rgya skyegs kyi khu bas kha dog bsgyur ba las 'bras bu'i nang du rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las skyes pa ge sar dmar po skye bar 'gyur zhing de las ni gzhan mi skye ba de bzhin du las las skyes pa'i rnam par smin pa las yang rnam par smin pa gzhan mi skye'o /
yathāsthūlamidamasmadbuddhigamyaṃ darśitam che long tsam 'di ni bdag gi blos rtogs par bya ba rab tu bstan pa yin te /
nānāvidhaśaktibhinnaistu karmabhiradhivāsitāḥ saṃtataya etāmavasthāṃ gatā īdṛśaṃ phalamabhinivartayantīti buddhānāmeva viṣayaḥ /
āha khalvapi 		mthu rnam pa sna tshogs pas tha dad pa'i las rnams kyis bsgos pa'i rgyu rnams gnas skabs 'dir phyir na 'bras bu 'di lta bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kho na'i yul yin no /
yang smras pa /
karma tadbhāvanāṃ tasyā vṛttilābhaṃ tataḥ phalam las dang de'i bsgos de'i 'jug rnyed /
de las 'bras bu sangs rgyas las /
niyamena prajānāti buddhādanyio na sarvathā gzhan gyi rnam pa thams cad ni /
nges par rab tu mi shes so /
ityetāṃ suvihitahetumārgaśuddhāṃ de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung rab rigs pa'i lam /
buddhānāṃ pravacanadharmatāṃ niśamya legs par gsungs pa'i dag pa chos nyid 'di mthong nas /
andhānāṃ vividhakudṛṣṭiceṣṭitānāṃ mu stegs long ba ltas ngan sna tshogs g yo rnams kyi /
tīrthyānāṃ matamapavidhya yāntyanandhāḥ gzhung lugs spangs te long ba ma yin rnams 'gro'o /
imaṃ hi nirvāṇapuraikavartinīṃ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gsung 'od kyis /
tathāgatādityavacoṃ 'śubhāsvatīm /
nirātmatāmāryasahasravāhitāṃ /
na mandacakṣurvivṛtāmapīkṣate 		snang ldan mya ngan 'das grong lam gcig pa /
bdag med 'phags pa stong gis bgrod pa 'di /
phye yang dman pa'i mig gis mi mthong ngo /
iti diṅmātramevedamupadiṣṭaṃ sumedhasām de ltar 'di ni phyogs tsam zhig /
rang gi mthu yis rnam 'phel ba'i /
braṇadeśoviṣasyeva svasāmarthyavisarpaṇa iti dug la rma yi phyogs bzhin du /
shin tu mkhas pa rnams la bstan /
pudgalakośamabhidharmakośabhāṣyaṃ samāptamiti /
chos mngon pa'i mdzod las gang zag dgag pa bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas dgu pa ste /
kṛtiriyamācāryavasubandhupādānāmiti chos mngon ba'i mdzod kyi bshad ba slob dpon sh'akya'i dge slong dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa 'di rdzogs so /
